comments: very cute space and very central!

Anton's place was absolutely perfect. Superb Sydney location, very clean and comfortable and good value for money. His communication throughout was exemplary and in turn was very helpful. Highly recommended!

The location of this airbnb is just perfect. You can walk to town, to the beach - the neighbourhood is quiet, and the people are really friendly. Feels like a proper getaway from the busy city life. Perfect space for me, my partner and our little puppy dog. Highly recommend.
It was like my mom's house.
A great host, a real pleasure having met them. Recommended. D
Great location, could get anywhere easily & it was really nice.
Lovely space to unwind between city adventures

Thanks for the fantastic accomodation Vickie. Very clean and loved the personal touches, such as welcome chocolates and the fridge stocked with  milk, water, etc. The location was perfect, with everything being within a short walking distance. The flat was very quiet too which was surprising.  
Vickie was the perfect host and very good at communication. Thanks again!

Thanks to Casey and Larry ,we had a great time in Sydney.they are the greatest hosts.Lovely room and comfortable place leave us a good memory,Casey ’s informations are useful,we tried 4 restaurants that Casey wrote in the information book,all of them are delicious and have a great atmosphere,thank you so much!

First time in Airbnb, Kath’s apartment is really clean and warm, Kath was away in the first two days, her friend Kane helped us with checking in, and Kane is friendly. Kath’s adorable dog Ruski is really quiet and friendly, I like him!

We enjoyed our stay as 2 couples with children, and Bundeena is a beautiful place to spend a weekend.
Hilde's place is downstairs from their residence which is great in case you need anything, but is private, and the back garden and pool are yours. Our children loved picking oranges and playing in the grass.

Susan's garden studio is the perfect place for a few days stay. The location is fantastic and it was lovely for us to sit out on the terrace and have a delicious coffee (Susan kindly provides Nespresso pods to use in very stylish cups!). They studio decor is beautiful and there were so many thoughtful touches. Susan was so considerate in helping us with an early check in. I couldn't recommend her place more highly!
The best place where I have hosted ever !! And Don have been the only Airbnb host who thinks in each detail to make us feel comfortable and plenty . Thanks

Having previously lived in Bondi, we were pleased to discover Cat's quiet beach bungalow. Great proximity to everything in Bondi - just next door to the weekend markets at the local school, 3 minute walk to the beach. The house has lots of space - we had no issues with 8 adults and a baby. Cat was an excellent host. Enjoy your stay!

This was a lovely property in a great location. Simone had left a comprehensive welcome folder and a bottle of wine, which was a nice touch. The property is just around the corner from The Spot which has a great range of restaurants and cafes.
Angela is very kind and reply the messages to us is quick. she ready for everything is awesome! Her house is tidy and clean. It's very comfortable. highly recommend!

We had an fantastic stay in Lizzy's apartment. The location was excellent and Lizzy was so helpful and accommodating (making sure we had some breakfast provisions after we arrived late at night which was so very much appreciated). The apartment was more than spacious enough for our family of 5. The worst thing about this apartment was having to leave those amazing views behind when we left! I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone else and would stay here again.

Fantastic location near the beach, harbour and restaurants/bars. All no more than 5/6 minutes away.
Lovely apartment with beautiful garden.

This place is centrally located, super clean and well equipped and also very secure for the solo traveller. I was able to catch a train from the airport and walk only a couple of minutes to the destination. Nearby there are lots of restaurants and cafes, and I enjoyed the food from a different culture every meal. I would happily stay there again.

We enjoyed our stay in Louise's apartment this past January. The flat is really  fantastic, both beautiful and practical, very well equipped and pleasant. Louise and John were nice and helpful.  We would recommend this place to anyone. Only one little note: Alison Rd is very busy and rather noisy at the peak hours.
We come to Sydney every month for work – and this is the best Airbnb we've stayed in yet. Will definitely be back! :)

This is a really good sized one bed apartment for two but could easily fit two more in a sofa bed. It’s nicely decorated inside and has a cute little balcony. There was everything we needed inside - well kitted our kitchen for cooking our own meals and toiletries etc. Really comfy bed! Communication was super quick and really clear. The location is perfect for accessing the darling harbour area. We had a great two night stay, I would recommend this place.
Great location, just off the beach. Good bedrooms not adjoined. Simple house for a beach holiday. Thanks for the weekend away and opportunity to relax.
Lovely apartment in a great location, perfect for a weekend break in Sydney. Communication with Mohit was easy, a highly recommended host!
P

Sandra's apartment was very clean, comfortable bed, when you opened the windows a great breeze came through, for it was very hot in Sydney while we were there for the weekend. Very close to everything, beach down one street.
Near the famous Icebergs club which is a must when you visit Sydney.  Would recommend for long or short stays thankyou to Sandra for having my husband & myself.
Thank you so much for sharing your awesome accommodation, "a piece of heaven on earth " ! Hope to come back one day...
Nice clean apartment. Was nice and central to everything we needed. We had a great stay.

Victoria's place saved me from a terrible previous Air b&b experience I was in. It was extremely clean, comfortable, quiet, and relaxing. She was more than helpful when I arrived and had great pointers on what to do in the area. I wish I could've stayed longer! Highly recommend her place.
Fantastic location and a lovely place to stay when visiting Sydney.
A beautiful studio apartment with stunning views in an unbeatable location. Will definitely be staying here again next time. Thanks very much Ben!
Great location, well equipped and really good beds. Very friendly and immediate communications, really easy handling. Thanks for the juice and the coffee in the morning, Paul! I will be back.
Another great stay with Kerri, room lovely as always.

Great hosts. Lovely spot great for a mini getaway from the city really enjoyed the place close to lots of beaches and parks.
Thanks
Great location and friendly atmosphere in this big group house with young international people!

We have just returned from our trip to Australia and our stay at Beacon Hill. From the moment we entered the property we knew we had found our home for 3 weeks. The house had been carefully prepared to make us feel that we were not intruding but feel at home. All spaces were organised clean and of a very high standard. Communication with Mari has always been fast and informative. Our stay in Mari and James home has been a pure pleasure and we are so happy that we had the opportunity to share in their home. We had full access to all the house which made our stay comfortable and relaxed. 
The outside space for entertaining was excellent and the beds, linen towels and use of washing machine, dishwasher etc made for a very comfortable sleep and stay. We have 2 teenage sons so the extra space the house gave was very important for our trip as were spending quality time with our sister who lives in the northern beaches.
We were met by Mari 's mother who was so very welcoming and there was no problems at all during our stay. We would all recommend this home as a choice on AIRBNB
WITH REGARDS JO AND PAUL STEVENS

Donna is a very welcoming host and also very friendly. She was helpful all through my stay and very polite. 

The location of the place is far out of Sydney central but very close to the train so very easy to get there and back from most places in Sydney! 

The price of this place is very cheap and well worth it! I highly recommend this place!

We booked Fred & Bernadette's lovely apartment for my parents, who stayed one weekend in June. Because we live in the area, it was nice that they were so close to home, and experienced what Malabar-life is like. My mum even went swimming twice in the rock pool! The apartment was great - nicely furnished, in a scenic location and well-heated. They really enjoyed staying there. Breakfast items - tea, coffee, Milo, Vegemite, milk, orange juice and cereals were also provided. We will definitely book their place again if we ever need to!
You would enjoy Victoria and she is very helpful with any suggestions on what to do in Sydney and questions and help with anything to do with Sydney.  Enjoyed her company as well.
Awesome

We LOVED this place!  It was sparkling clean, central to the ferries, the Rocks, the botanical Gardens and the Opera House.  We appreciated the size, with two big windows on the top floor and all we needed for a very comfortable stay.  The water was good and hot, the wifi was good, the bed comfortable.  We would definitely go back and will recommend Jared's place to friends.

Luke and Paul's lovery apartment felt like a home away from home, making our stay warmly welcomed.  A comfortable bed to sleep on, a view of rush green, a smell of freshly baked goodies, a sound of vital city (Website hidden by Airbnb) was all so perfect:). We would love to return again!

On booking Chloe's apartment, I contacted her several times about check-in due to flights changing. She always got back to me within the hour and was very helpful with directions to her place (even sending pictures of the front door etc.) We had to get a very late check -in and she was very accommodating with this. 
When we arrived at Chloe's apartment it was exactly as it is on the pictures and was stocked with plenty of amenities (tea, coffee, breakfast goods, toiletries and tourist information). She had also very kindly left three Opal cards for us to access public transport easily, which we made use of.
Her apartment could not be more central as within minutes we were in the shopping area or The Rocks near the harbour. As this was our first time in Sydney, this made it very easy to navigate and see all the attractions we had intended to.
She had high speed Wi-Fi in the apartment and the rooftop pool and spa definitely relaxed us in the evenings. We also made use of the hotel restaurant which had very friendly staff and good food. On leaving our holiday the front desk organised a taxi for us and Chloe made the check-out very simple for us.
Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our trip and would recommend using Chloe’s apartment to anyone looking to visit Sydney’s attractions.

Elizabeth's hospitality blew me away.  The room and our own bathroom were immaculate and we had everything we needed for our stay.  Elizabeth was a warm and friendly host and also provided us with a lovely warm breakfast as part of the stay.
Glebe is an amazing area and Elizabeth's home is well located close to the shops, the light rail and Darling Harbour all being in walking distance.  
I'm so glad I got to stay in such a lovely home.  Thank you!

Hayley and Jack were great hosts, and the location of the apartment was very convenient, within walking distance of bus stops and the train station. The bed was huge and very comfy. Thank you for having me!

Shuang's place is exactly as described in the listing. The check-in and check-out process is super easy, which is great for the weary traveller! Convenient location if you want to be close to the international and domestic airports, plus within walking distance to the Wolli train station. The room was clean and stylishly decorated with little touches like mints. Bed is very comfortable and I had a great nights sleep! Very important if you have an early flight the next morning. I would stay again.
GREAT LOCATION!  Easy walking to downtown attractions/ restaurants, etc. Large space, well appointed. I recommend it without hesitation.

We really enjoying staying at this cozy studio! Place was sparkling clean, had a fully equipped kitchen n toilet/bathroom, comfortable bed, fast internet etc! Greg and Maggie are excellent hosts, very discreet and gave us some great tips. 
Studio is close to everything, i would recommend it even if you have no vehicle. 
See you next time Greg and Maggie☺️

We had a lovely time at Shuang's place. Everything was as we expected and more. It was nice and clean, and we had no trouble at all during our short stay there. If we need a place in the area some time in the future, I will definitely check if Shuang's place is available.
Millie's place is great. I have stayed here now 3 times. You can not beat yhe value and the locality

El departamento es como figura en las fotos, quizás un poco más chico de lo que pueden sugerir las imágenes. Una de las habitaciones es solo una división del salón, por lo cual no cuenta con la privacidad adecuada.  
Si bien la ubicación es buena, el departamento no tiene ventilación,las ventanas son fijas y el departamento tiene olor a humedad .
Por lo demás si no tenes presupuesto, esta bien.
Really good location. Close to train station that and easy to go to the city.

Cat’s place is amazing. It have a lovely yard and lovely plants in there. It is very close to the beach, just 10 min work. And Cat has a set of wonderful cook, the house is perfect for people who like cooking.

I loved staying with Susan and Greg! The studio was well-furnished, and it provided the comforts of home. The fridge was stocked w easy breakfast goodies, and I was really enchanted by their gorgeous gardens. It's also a very quiet and nice area, roughly 5-10 minute walk to Bronte Beach.  From Bronte, you can do the coastal walk through to Tamarama and Bondi. It made for a perfect weekend away to be at the beach and living like a local, and with such lovely hosts. I would stay with them again given the chance.

Tam is great! Super helpful and responsive, which was much appreciated. Especially when I lost my key 
Great location within a short walk of museum station and some cute restaurants near by. There was also a corner shop for milk etc which was useful. Very easy to get to from the airport. It was nice and clean too. Stanley Street is quite steep with wheelies but made for good exercise!

Home away from home! This is a great place to stay when traveling in Sydney. The place is cozy and safe! It’s a wonderful place that feels like home when you are traveling. Lots of room and clean! Great stay

Staying at Emmy's place was okay, and I would recommend it for the price, which is probably the cheapest you can find around. 
The house, as well as the room, is probably not the greatest, but you're absolutely paying what you get. 

I only had two minor issues:
1) I thought that 'flexible check-in' meant: 'tell me when you arrive and I'll open the door'. It's not like this, at least not in this case. I was arriving at 11PM/midnight and Emmy informed me she couldn't check me in and asked me to find another place where to stay. The problem was I didn't have the possibility to book another room as I was boarding the plane to get to Sydney, and I didn’t want to arrive to a place I didn’t know, late at night, without even knowing where to go to sleep. Luckily Emmy found a solution and I was granted access to the house. I haven’t seen Emmy during my stay, but I saw Patrick, who I think manages the room when she’s not there. They have both been nice and for any issues I encountered they were there to help. The house is a boarding house, so although you’ll have a private room, you’ll be sharing it with other people. The ones who were at Emmy’s when I was there were very nice as well! 
2) The bathroom wasn't too clean and the room was a bit dusty, which made it difficult for me to sleep, being allergic to dust. As I paid a cleaning fee, to be fair, I was expecting a higher standard in terms of cleanliness. If I hadn't paid that, it would have been totally understandable. But again, as it is cheap and they are nice, I absolutely recommend staying at Emmy’s!

Location-wise, David's place was conveniently situated close to some places of interest- only a few minutes walk to a couple of pharmacies, restaurants (McDonald's, Pizza Boccone, etc), groceries (Cole's and Woolworths), and some shops. It is also close to the King's Cross Train Station (only a 2-minute walk) and some bus stops. In terms of the home itself, it was very cozy and it didn't take long for us to feel at home. There was a lot of space for baggage storage, and it was generally easy to manoeuvre around. David was able to provide an assortment of breakfast cereals, coffee, and even tea for breakfast. Overall, this place would be one that I would gladly rebook in the future.
We loved staying the B&B at Bronte. A beatiful and peacefull gardenhouse and garden and great hospitallity from Susan and her family. Bronte is a beatifull neighbourhood as well.

Great host that is hospitable and caring.  Place is nice, clean, fully equipped, and conveniently located.  Prompt responses and wanted to check up on my status. Very important for solo travelers. Great price for location.  When in bondi, stay at natasha's studio.
Jason

Tim & Mel are very friendly host. The place they have is so clean and new and stylish, and the best part is the location which is just few mins walk away to an underground train station which connects directly to CBD in just a few stops. 

They also provided us with snacks in the room which was a very thoughtful gesture and they also allow us to use the dryer and washer which was handy for us after we have traveled outside for a few days. Just a little drawback to the apartment is the construction on going at the opposite building which stop late at night and starts around 7 am in the morning, which Tim provided us ear plugs for. Not an issue for us, as we are quite an early riser. 

Overall, is a very good stay at Tim and Mel's place! If i were to come back to Sydney, I will definitely be back to stay with them!
Superior communation with fast answers! Location is great, especially for flight passengers: trains are close and the apartment is easily accessible with luggages. Thank you!
Stylish house, great location, perfect!
Great stay.=)
An all you need apartment with good location close to store, bars and restaurants

Richards hospitality and beautiful home is an amazing place to stay for any occasion. We are seven women who appreciate great food and great environment. This is a perfect place to relax  read swim cook great food and be amazed by the views accords the water to Palm Beach.

Thé place is convenient, very clean, located privately at the end of a very nice little backyard. The owners gave me useful orientation. Goodies were awaiting both on the pantry shelf and in the fridge ! They lent me a rechargeable bus/ferry card on top of a few maps. In case you lose some hygiene items, a number were available.  Air conditioning worked well. Place to park for me. Super.

Arnie was a good host.  We didn't see all that much of him since we were out most of the time, but he was helpful in our short interaction.  He was also gracious about us waking them at 10:30 when we couldn't figure out the lock.

The house is old and interesting, and in a great location.  Very easy to get to many great neighborhoods in Sydney from his location.

My only complaints were having a shared bathroom, and that the room was right next to Arnie's own bedroom.  The close proximity didn't cause any issues really, we just had to be extra quiet to not disturb them.  There is another bedroom on the other side of the house which would have provided better privacy, but that was occupied during our stay.  The shared bathroom wasn't a major issue, though there was a couple times when it was unavailable.
I got this place on last minute and everything was absolutely wonderful :) The host provided very good instructions on everything and the self check in was extremely easy :) Thanks again.
Great and friendly place, loved the interior and balcony. Loved Rusty, the dog.
great for a group and great location

Cathy’s place is a delightful gem. I felt I was staying in a cosy Greek studio...close to the water, beautiful trees and a leafy terrace to enjoy an afternoon drink. 
Cathy’s local recommendations were spot on: sunset at nearby Paradise Beach; walk to Clareville Beach; French restaurant in Avalon and local shops were all excellent. 
My three days were just what I wanted, sun, swimming, long walks in beautiful bush and a charming village...I felt re-energised. Cathy is the perfect host: welcoming but not intrusive. The breakfast coffee, yoghurt, berries and muesli were a wonderful bonus. Many thanks, Cathy.
This place is good for the price! I loved my room. Very easy access to the city. A bit of construction noise, so I would suggest light sleepers to bring earplugs.
Clean and comfortable spot in the Sydney central business district. Location is great being less than a 5 min walk to Circular Quay and The Rocks.
Rachel was great to communicate with. The house is very comfortable and has all you need. The beds and all linen are excellent quality. Pretty verandahs and a courtyard to enjoy. A great location!

Calre is a great, communicative host with positive attitude. She loves her life, she loves Newton and is willing to show the neighbourhood, additionally she helps us to find ourselves in new city. Place was clean, warm and comfortable. What's more there is a cute puppy called Molly, one of the best we met :)
Great hosts, very cosy, but not very private. We did not expect a house share with family and lodgers. It meant we could not cook and enjoy the lovely garden. Great location.
Great location and lovely apartment. Very central. Only a 10min walk to the ferry station which goes direct to circular quay, walked from Bondi beach 35mins.  Would stay here again :)

A casa da Sarah é muito acolhedora e  a com uma excelente localização. Nos comunicamos pouco, porque em Sydney tudo é muito interativo, além de termos uma filha que mora por lá. Mas Sarah passou todas as informações necessárias e não tivemos necessidade de ligar para ela.
Um ótimo local para se hospedar. O único detalhe é que estávamos em três e para quem usava o sofá cama era necessário passar pelo quarto de casal para ir ao banheiro. Ideal para dois.
Outro detalhe é que seria melhor se houvesse uma pia/tanque na área de serviço.
we had such a great stay. the location is super, the host is flexible and accomodating and the appartment is sooooo nice plus, plus ,plus
Such a lovely place and village. Also, very good location.

I had a super smooth and comfortable stay. Newtown is a great, lively area, and I wish I had more time to poke around. I had a couple of snags with travel (broken lock, etc.) and Michelle was able to help me figure out a solution. The food/dishes situation is a little un-orthodox, but everything is clearly laid out, and works exactly as the description says. It was clean, quiet, stylish, and accessible to many interesting spots to check out & eat at. Textbook example of easy, restful place for my quick trip.
Awesome location great apartment

Ven ist ein sehr netter Gastgeber und stellt euch alles zur Verfügung was man benötigt. Das Zimmer und Bad war super sauber und es gab nichts auszusetzen.  Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis ist nicht zu toppen. Wir würden sofort wieder kommen.
Great location

Fabulous apartment in a lovely suburb of Sydney. Full facilities for a thoroughly enjoyable stay. Foolishly I had a lot of luggage and probably would have struggled with the stairs had my cousin not come to my rescue. Once my luggage was in the apartment the stairs weren't an issue at all. From the couch in the lounge room and the bed in the Main bedroom you can admire the spectacular harbour bridge and surrounds.
Bryan is a great host. Very friendly and helpful. His house is really nice, close to public transport - buses and lightrail. It seems bigger than shown at the photos. Super stay :-)
Very nice place, sparkling clean, host were lovely and extremely helpful. Will definitely recommend!

Angela's place was inviting, cosy and contemporary at the same time. my family and I quickly settled in during our stay and felt very comfortable throughout our stay. The size and facilities for our family of 4 was perfect ( the washing machine, dryer and lovely garden was especially handy having two young kids) Our privacy was not at all compromised yet Angela made sure she was available for any questions or help we may have had. The amenities located around the beach house are excellent and all within walking distances. I will say pushing a stroller with a toddler in tow was particularly tiring when returning back from the beach as the beach house was located at top of a relatively steep hill. I would bare this in mind if you plan to not hire or take a car. Other than that, an excellent location, beach house and host!
Excellent location, quick communication and confirmation. You can't go wrong
Great location. close to all nice places in Sydney.  Clean and tidy. good communications
Everything was perfect, a really convenient room with our own bathroom. Really clean, and the breakfast is included. Angela and her son are very discreet and nice! I recommend 100%, perfect value
Great location, large space and helpful host!
Very clean house as it shows in the picture. Me and my family enjoyed staying here. Not really close to city but quite nice neighbourhood!
It's great to stay for transit .
Perfect
Nice 10 days with a nice room!٩(๑^o^๑)۶
Great few days in Glebe at Brocks place!

The place was beautiful and so so close to the beach and cafes! It was the perfect girls weekend away and we all left feeling super relaxed! The place is exactly like the pictures. I've already recommended Cat's place to many friends. Thanks Cat.
Wonderful place. We loved the view and the interior of the unit. Many thanks, Yang!!

Evelyn is a Wanderflug host, she made me fell very welcomed and her place is real oasis of calm, luxury and beauty - it is peacful and relaxing. The view over Pittwater is amazing with spectacular sunsets and the swimming pool, completely privat for me. Evelyn did all to make my stay very confortable. I thanks Everlyn to having me!

Simon & Nicole's designer warehouse in Surrey Hills was a perfect getaway spot for my husband and I. 

Walking distance from so much and they truly made us feel at home right down to the little details of leaving a comprehensive guide of what is close by and leaving little treats for us by our bedside!

Would definitely stay here again and would recommend to anyone considering a holiday in Sydney.

This was our first experience with Airbnb and we have been very lucky to choose Desiree as a host. The apartment is lovely, very clean, confortable and well appointed. The size is perfect for two people and the location is very convenient, in front of Hide Park, easy to be reached by the airport via irport likn train that stops just few steps away. All the main city attractions are at walking distance. Desiree is very kind and supporting. You can easily reach her at any time via e-mail and she answers in a few minutes. Highly  recommended!
Really nice place, very clean. even left us some fresh coffee!!

Very nice apartment in the middle of Potts Point. Close to Kings Cross station and several restaurants and shops. The apartment is big and light and has heaters - good for winter!
And also David was a very good host and flexible with check-in.
Séjour très agréable chez Wyatt que nous recommandons. N'hésitez pas à laisser votre empreinte sur son mur ;)
This place is gorgeous and Paul was a terrific host. All you need for a short stay in Sydney!

It's a very good house , that u can have independent bathroom and space , Susan is a very good host , nice , very enthusiastically, and also have a good time with the little cat , every night he always talk to me , I really miss him now !
This apartment is really beautyful! We loved the perfect kitchen equipment. All the lovely details and the warm atmosphere made us feel like home. Very friendly and caring host. :-)
Perfect comms amazing location. We'll be back for sure on are next trip over... What's more to say..!!
This was a short one night stay in between flights and the location was perfect for this. It's modern, clean, and close to Wolli Creek station where there's lots of eateries. I would stay here again.

After reading the reviews I had high expectations about the apartment.
Yes the location is great but the apartment is ok. Way over priced for the quality of presentations offered.
Not enough towels for everybody, dishes and cutlery dirty, dusty furniture and kitchen, remote controls were not working, carpet floor dirty. We asked for shower gel as the one provided by the host was empty we got shampoo instead because "no more available".
When you pay $1,200 for 3 nights in Sydney you can expect a minimum of standard this apartment doesn't offer.
Disappointing.

Beautiful view, great central location with Milsons Point station just a few minutes walk away.
Charming place that had everything that was needed to make the stay a very good experience!
Communication with host was quick and easy, Millie seems like a lovely person.
Would recommend! :)
Sunny room in very central location close to everything.
Amazing location and Natasha was the perfect host.  Showed me around, left me some food and a bottle of wine... couldn't ask for any more.  I'll be back.
Big house near Sydney center around 10 mins driving. Tidy, clean and wide space could accommodate almost 10 people. Most of restaurant, bar and groceries nearby.

I had a great stay at Anita's flat. It was fully equipped and clean, even the shampoo and conditioner were provided in good quantities!  The location is perfect, the bus to the city stops right in front the building and its easy to walk everywhere in Bondi from here. 
Last but not least, Anita  remained available each time I needed it.
Excellent experience. Room was great and the bathroom was awesome!

David's place was stunning! When we first arrived (two couples) David patiently waited for us on the street so we could find the place more easily, though there was no need with the listings accurate address and pictures to find it. David showed us around the beautiful apartment, which was even more lovely than the pictures, then gave us a quick overview of the area on a map before leaving us with the keys! The four of us slept amazing in the two beds and couldn't have asked for a better place to stay to tour around Sydney for a weekend! David was extremely nice and accommodating, and we would highly recommend staying at his place!

Such a stylish little find. Loved the black and white theme of the house, it all flowed so beautifully. Great for short stays, no stove top etc but if you won’t be in the house for most of the day you’ll be fine. Also would’ve been good if there was shampoo and conditioner etc but just a note for next time. Make sure you come prepared!
it's very nice place , we enjoy  and will come again .thanks ! Vanessa

We both had an amazing stay the the Buxton House and really loved the Scandi-styled interior. Very clean and minimalistic! The place itself was cosy in the back of the house - it is an elongated kind of area, so could be quite hard to get things moving around. Nevertheless, we made it around comfortably. 

Neighborhood is safe, albeit hearing stories about walking at night around Refern. We had no troubles walking back to the apartment at about 11pm. 

There are lots of coffee and food options opened in the day and Buxton House is really close to Sydney Central with various methods there. Really loved the place and would definitely stay again when we're back in Sydney!

The apartment was as described and Eleanor was a great, communicative host. We had everything we needed during our stay and were within walking distance to everything we needed, including the train stations. Would highly recommend staying here if you’re looking for places in North Sydney. Laundry on site was definitely a plus. Thanks again!
Perfect, problem free stay.

Stayed at Lachlan’s place for a work trip for a week. The location is perfect only a 20min walk to the city and after work locally there are so many restaurants and things to do that it couldn’t have been better. The place is clean and exactly as the pictures show it to be. Lachlan was available for anything we needed. I would recommend this place to anyone and would definitely stay here again!
Fantastic place.  Fantastic host.
5-star everything
Anita’s communication throughout the whole process was great. The place is also fantastic, we had a very enjoyable stay.

Great location in the heart of Sydney, well equipped apartment with very interesting modern design. Matthew was easy to communicate to and very quick to respond. We enjoyed staying there and would be happy stay there again.

Great home! Jessica and Steven were very nice and helpful prior to arrival and in the small time we met them when checking in.
The place felt like home for the time we were there which was exactly what we were looking for thank you!
A lovely place, close to everything in Redfern.

The location could have been a bit closer to the tourist areas we wanted to visit. The train rides were longer then anticipated in listing. The train station was a bit of a walk with heavy luggage’s. But overall the area was quiet and  House was very comfortable and clean.  Daniel and Elena were very nice and respectful.

Wir haben zwei Nächte bei MissD verbracht. Die Lage war super, Newtown ist sehr hip, mit vielen Cafés, Restaurants, kleinen Läden, fernab von den Touristenströmen. MissD war eine grossartige Gastgeberin, die Kommunikation war reibungslos und wir konnten sogar früher einchecken, was wir nach einer 30-stündigen Reise sehr schätzten! Wir empfehlen dieses Airbnb sehr!

We were on a cycling trip around Kuran-Gai National Park and decided to stay around Newport for the night. Tessa And Rod’s place seemed like the perfect fit and it sure was.

Communication: Very easy to organize everything. It only took a few moments to organize our arrival and they were both there (and Charlie the dog :) to greet us when we arrived.

The place: It is a very cozy unit below their house. It was very peaceful and quiet. TV had Foxtel and it was nice to just chill and watch the news. Heaters were provided and very welcome as the weather git a but chilly.

Breakfast: Muesli, milk, tea, fruit, and homemade marmalade and toast - what else can you ask for! It was very nice to have access to these things.

Cleanliness: Very clean and very well kept! 

We cannot recommend this place enough, and if we ever decide to have another cycling trip close to the Northern beaches, we'll definitely stay here again. Thanks for everything!

Beautiful property with stunning views and beautiful pool! So many amazing beaches to check out around the area. Awesome Wholefoods cafe within walking distance of the house that we visited 3 days in a row for brekky (best smashed avo ever)!! Evelyn and Anthony provided a bottle of wine to welcome us which was lovely. As there is no oven in the unit, Anthony was kind enough to let us use his oven upstairs one night. Not a lot of phone reception in the area but the property has great wifi included! The bed was super comfy and shower pressure was awesome. 
Thanks :)
Love the view from the verandah!

Great stay, very easy to organise with and talk to.
I would highly recommend the flat for anyone wanting a private homely feeling!
Thank you again for your hospitality and lovely accommodation!
Great value and a great place to stay. I’ll definitely stay there when ever I’m in the area.
Nice place

An awesome and amazing house that just made for such a relaxing and easy weekend away. The view is just stunning and the house is very nicely decorated with all the essentials. Loved that the house had access to a private beach. Bailey was so easy to communicate with and always replied promptly to any questions. Thank you for making our stay so lovely.

Cat's place was perfect for our girls getaway.  Amazing location, right next to Bondi Beach with a market and Harry's Expresso on the corner.  We walked everywhere.  Lovely, clean and funky décor, great outdoor entertaining space and plenty of beds.  Loved it, thank you.

We stayed in this apartment for 2 nights over a weekend and found the location excellent. The apartment has great views of the beach. It was well equipped, clean and comfortable.  The owner was very helpful and easy to work with. We would definitely recommend this apartment to other visitors.

Me and my wife had an amazing stay in their apartment. The location is fantastic and there is good connectivity to the CBD. We loved dining at various restaurants near by and also there  aa beautiful lake near the house which is good for a morning walk. Total value for money.  Thanks Jared for this awesome experience.
Great little spot. Neat and tidy. Sam was a great communicator and nothing was too much trouble
A lovely and cosy cottage in the heart of Paddington. It was a great place to stay and was within walking distance of just about everything! We really enjoyed our stay.

Mike is a great guy, he will make you feel welcome. He was good to chat to.
I had a pleasant stay - as I had finished work earlier, I had a nice break, and being in Potts Point is the best place for a holiday. The flat is in a great location, near some of the best restaurants and cafes in Potts Point. Its a beautiful area for walks around the neighborhood, near the wharf. The flat is older style, but in excellent condition. There are magnificent 360 degree views on the rooftop! I recommend this place for your stay!

Andrea is most helpful and provided us with information on public transport and other things when asked.  The apartment is only a short walk to many things including the botanic gardens, Sydney opera house and circular quay.

We spent an excellent long weekend at this lovely spot. Even with six adults and two small children the place felt spacious. The house had everything we needed and more. You couldn't be any closer to the beach and Great Mackerel is a prefect location.

Jared and Diana were very accommodating hosts. The location is wonderful with nice shops and restraurants at your doorstep. The apartment is comfortable and very quiet.  I spent 6 nights here and greatly enjoyed my stay!

Exactly as described. The location was spot on, the apartment was exactly what was pictured. Anita went above and beyond to make sure that we were comfortable and provided additional information as first time guests to Australia. ie. public transportation. We arrived much earlier than check-in and she allowed us to leave our luggage at the apartment while we explored the beautiful Bondi Beach. Everything was provided in the apartment. There was no additional stress to locate sunscreen, beach towels, beach chair, even a beach hat was available! Comfortable cozy place, cozy bed, and it was so lovely waking up in the morning to see the beautiful sunrise off of the ocean while sipping a cup of coffee in the comfort of our room.

Anton’s place is right near Central Station and is great value. Lots of good little cafes nearby. The apartment has two tastefully decorated bedrooms with a new kitchen and city views. Beds were super comfy - thanks Anton for a great stay.

Loved the stay at Kerri's place. Beautifully appointed and fantastic location. The view from the apartment was incredible. Great also having a cool little caf right alongside a gorgeous park. Thanks Kerri for providing a high quality bnb stay. It was really appreciated.

Only stay here for one night but wanted to stay longer. Arriving late on Thursday night, we were warmly welcome by the host couple. Daniel and Elena were super hosts I've ever had as they fulfilled beyond our needs, so friendly and generous couple. We were invited to have a late meal with them too and apparently Daniel is a professional chef because the food was just amazing. Thank you isn't enough for these wonderful hosts. A truly enjoyable night. We will surely be back.

Bom apartamento, bem funcional. Perto da estação de trem, com lavanderia e AC. Acesso só por escada, com malas pesadas acho que seria o único contra. O chuveiro também achei baixo e só tenho 1,70m. Mas ótimo custo benefício.

One of the best Airbnbs we've ever stayed at. Great location, and a perfect space for a Sydney getaway. Newtown is brilliant and you couldn't ask for a better place to spend a long weekend away. Great access to Newtown, and just a few minutes from the Enmore. Perfect.
Such a gorgeous place ! The pictures do not to it justice - definitely recommend this place. Fred and Bernadette are such wonderful hosts !

Jonny was great! A good host to have, very friendly, and fun to be around. I was in Manly completing my open water diving certification and he was great with the flexibility of our schedules for the day. His location is close to the Corso and 2 beaches. It really is an amazing place to be. Thank Jonny for also being supportive with Zoe. I would recommend him any day.

This apartment is perfectly located, with easy access to public transport, amazing food spots (you MUST go to Spice Alley for dinner and finish with dessert at Koi), bars, restaurants and the city itself. Andrew is an excellent communicator who responds quickly, and the check in process is super easy. I would recommend this as a great spot to base yourself and go exploring all that Sydney has to offer.

The house was a great size in a good location for our group. It had most things we needed except hot water system broke down the last morning but that is an unpredictable.
Checkin was really easy and the place was lovely and clean.
Thanks Leena.
The room is clear and tidy. In addition, the hosts are very nice. Shuang answered questions very quickly and detail. Fen was friendly and helped me a lot. I had great time here. =)
Great location, 5 min drive to the city and 15 mins to the beach, very good value, couldn’t ask anymore from an Airbnb

Keith was a great host. Everything was well organised. My parents had a lovely stay. It's definitely a place that I will recommend to anyone who wants to stay somewhere quiet, convenient and very comfy.
A very warm welcome great hosts magnificent place to stay very central walking distance to two shopping centres and easy excess to where ever you want to go in Sydney

The studio was as described, location for us absolutely fantastic, the apartment was comfortable and clean
Carolina and Anita were fantastic hosts and we got some great tips on local restaurants 
We really enjoyed our stay

Everything about Ali's place - from check in to check out was absolutely perfect! The flat itself is very nice, clean, and comfortable. The neighborhood is beautiful too and there are lots of malls, shops, restaurants etc within a short driving distance. Thank you Ali for a wonderful stay :)
A great unit in an awesome spot. Close to cafes and Rose bay shops. Very nice street and quiet, well equipped living space. Would definitely recommend and would stay there again

We were very well received by Lina and her husband. The house is very clean, very well appointed, and the hosts are very nice and accommodating.
We will come again . Thank you for everything.

Had the most amazing 3 week stay here . 

I can't recommend the train enough. 

If you love peace and tranquility this is the place for you.

In the most beautiful setting. 

John and Margaret are perfect hosts.

I felt at home as soon as I arrived from the Uk.

The train has everything you need for a very comftable stay with lots of little personnel touches to.

Margaret provided me with some lovely things for breakfast upon my arrival .

I will always have the fondest of memories of my stay there and was sad to leave easily could have stayed longer .

What an incredibly beautiful location and charming beach house!! We were a group of 8 and found the house cosy and inviting with plenty of space for all of us to relax. Before our trip most of the group had not previously heard of Mackerel Beach, but it has quickly become a favourite destination in Sydney. Richard and Claudia are great hosts and were in touch before and throughout to ensure we had everything we needed. It’s not a matter of if we’ll go back but when! I have already recommended this property to family and friends. Thank you! It was a very memorable weekend away for all of us and the beautiful space you’ve created was a big part of that!
Nice house and friendly hosts. Quiet neighbourhood and easy to get into town, would recommend and stay again

Tess and Rod are just the lovliest people.   A fresh loaf of bread and home made jams and muffins and other breakfast goodies awaited us on arrival.  you actually have a totally separate lounge, bathroom, and bedroom.  As well there is a fantastic sunny open patio area, complete with a fishpond, beautiful flowering creepers and local frog (although we coud hear him we couldn't see him)!! All of this is the deal! We would definitely recommend, and would love to stay again if the situation arose. Thankyou Tess and Rod!

Great stay in Sydney and couldn't be happier with the acomodations. Even though this was a shared rental, it felt incredibly private. Upon showing up accessing the unit was super easy, and everything a hotel would provide for was provided by this rental. Overall very happy with the experience and would stay again!

We had a great time in North Curl Curl and loved staying at Richards place. We had everything we needed. Coffee, tea and little treats when we arrived. Amazing. Communication was really quick and efficient. Not used to having a shared entry with the host, but that was not a problem at all. We had all the privacy we needed. The beach is really close and the view is amazing.
Great location and space. Beds were comfortable!

This home is truly one of a kind. I enjoyed staying at Arnie and Lorraine's unforgettable home. The room was great and the Paddington location was a great base from which to explore. Highly recommended.
Really nice room with enough space and interesting environment :)

We had a great stay at Victoria’s apartment! We were in Sydney for almost a month as our daughter had just had her first baby and the apartment was perfect for a number of reasons. It was in the perfect location being only a 5 min walk to her place as well as the best street in Potts Point! Just one block away were our favorite places to eat on Challis Street.... Fratell’s, The Fish Shop and Fejays.  Across the street is a great grocery store ... Woolworths.
Every Saturday is a wonderful open Market up the street with the best corn fritters I’ve ever had and more. The Kings Cross train station is only 5 min away as well, which made getting around super easy.
Her apartment was very clean, bright and comfortable. For being a studio we were a little concerned it may feel cramped for a month stay, but it never felt that way and a lot of that had to do with the the wall of windows that had a great view overlooking the trees and the city.
The shower was a little tricky as it was small and you had to step up to get into it, so we bought a small shower mat and that did the trick so there was no more fear of slipping! 
Victoria has really thought everything thru as far as utilizing her space for the best efficiency and added great touches with all the amenities.
We will look forward to staying there again on our next visit to see our daughter and family!

This is a lovely, clean apartment in a very central location. Close to public transport and everything else we needed (e.g. Supermarket, cafes, restaurants). The apartment is very spacious for two people and the view is amazing, we even had a great view of some fireworks on our last night. I would definitely recommend this place. Ben was also a great host and easy to communicate with!

The location was great for our overnight trip visiting Palm Beach and surrounding areas. The bathroom with it’s clear roof gave amazing light and was a nice novelty.  The house had more of an older cabin type vibe, although the bathroom was really modern and white and clean. Check in was really easy with the lock box and we booked the day of and got a response within the hour. Great service.
Verything was perfect!

Lilian's place was just perfect. Gorgeous, clean and super central. I didn't meet Lilian in person, but her brother was kind enough to let me in and was only ever a text away (Lilian was put if town). Probably the best place I've stayed in Sydney!
The apartment could not be in a better location if you wish to explore the heart of the city.

Na is a warm and welcoming host. I will be back next year. The accommodation is very conveniently located for anyone needing somewhere in the Campbelltown area. With your own entrance and security lighting, it was easy to come and go. The water was warm and had excellent pressure for showers. Thanks again
I've never had a better place to sit and look at a view for hours each day. The best.

David's place is located in a great place, is easy to walk into town or to get public transport. Lots of places to eat around, shops are close by and the apartment has everything you need to feel at home. I would for sure contact David again if I ever get back to Sydney.

We had a great (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was great and respond was always fast.
The place is great and better than the pictures as they we’re taken in the evening.
The location of the appartment is great
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jared's apartment is in a perfect location so close to the centre of  Sydney and also to the train stations. It is ideal for a couple. Small but we found it ideal for us and definitely value for the cost. The bed is very comfortable. It is a bit noisy at the moment with road construction going on but I still slept very well and I'm a light sleeper! Just used ear plugs. The bathroom is a bit dated but the shower works well.  Check in and out was easy and apartment very easy to find and secure. Would definitely stay again if returning to Sydney. Jared is a great host!

Five star, book this wonderful apartment with confidence. Super host (Anita) who takes great pride in the property and service that she provides.  The apartment is modern, spotlessly clean and wonderfully located - everything in Bondi is no more than a 3 minute walk away. My wife and I had 7 wonderful trouble-free nights at this property and it will be our first choice when we return.
Very well presented and an amazing position !

Ben's place is centrally located with a great view of the Sydney skyline. The place looked exactly as it did in the pictures and was the perfect size for the two of us. Ben was a great host -- always quick to respond to my messages and happy to answer any questions. I would highly recommend this place.
It was a very pleasant stay. Thank you Shuang for your hospitality!
Anita’s place is excellent. Great location with everything you need.
L'appartement est fidèle à sa description, et l'accueil de David est très chaleureux. Possibilité de laisser les valises avant le check in, très pratique.

A very large home that can genuinely handle a larger group. Lots of retreat areas so people can spread out. Location is the quintessential waterfront Pittwater experience. The host was good on the communication and any issues or advice quickly addressed. Highly recommend this property
Excellent location. Check in smooth and easy! Great stay

Location, room, security, comfort etc are all great. Natasa as a host is what makes this more that a place to just crash. She is a very sweet woman who gave us some great insights into the city. She even showed us the best (and secret) place to get front row for the NYE fireworks overlooking the bridge and harbour. 

With this being the first Air bnb experience for us we were a little anxious, but as soon as we arrived, we were sure we had made the best decision.

Travellers may want to consider a rail card if choosing this location as it saves lots of money for those staying a few days or more.

Hernan is a very nice guy and his house is very tidy and cozy. My wife and I just spent one night there, but we were really welcomed and we enjoyed our time there.

We recommend Hernan's place. Five stars for sure.
Beautiful home in a very convenient location! Will definitely come back!

Philip was a great host- good communication from the start and very welcoming on arrival. Great house in an ideal location for restaurants, bars, walking into the city and public transport. Perfect for city break. Thanks Philip.

Fabulous location, only a few minutes walk to North Sydney ferry stop. A 15 minute walk to many Kirribilli restaurants and cafes. The apartment is very comfortable and well equipped. There are all the little added extras, that you don’t get in a hotel. Views of the harbour are beautiful. We had beautiful weather 17-24 degrees. If it was a hotter evening, the apartment may have been a bit warm, as there is no aircon or thru flow of breezes. We would definitely stay again, but not in summer.

Imran was friendly and hospitable, and I slept very well in the bed in the large room.  The apartment is very close to North Sydney station which so convenient and wonderful when travelling to things in Sydney.  The room is also great value. The apartment has simple decor and is in an old block of flats, but the other benefits more than make up for it. Thanks Imran !
Great spot.
Michele's place is in a great little neighborhood and a super quick walk to King's Street for amazing food options! The place is so cozy and we couldn't have asked for a better stay/location.
Great accommodation.  Thanks

The department of Anita is the best of Manly, I say it without knowing the others, but I assure you that it is impossible to find a better one. Location 10, comfort 10, cleaning 10 and hostess Anita 10. I think I was clear! Thank you very much Anita, I hope to return soon
Fantastic apartment with good location

A wonderful place, great location - simply take a glass of wine across the road and watch the sunset. 
Very friendly and welcoming hosts.

Location of Shaun's place was amazing. I just had to walk a couple blocks away, catch the ferry, and go anywhere I liked. He recommended some good places to go and I love them all. Loved having the kitchen and all the necessary appliances needed to cook for myself, lovely cute place!

I booked Sarah’s place very last minute and she responded immediately and let me know we could check in within the hour! Her place was spotless, the linens were great, and she supplied coffee and cream. We loved the location as it was central to everything but very quiet and peaceful. Sarah was helpful and kind.  We would definitely stay there again!!
Narelle was a wonderful host, quick to respond to any enquiry, the place is so neat, clean and homely. My partner and I enjoyed the locAtion and the night we cooked the most. Everything was spot on!!

Het appartement ligt in een rustige straat en op loopafstand van zee en ferry naar the city Sydney. De voorzieningen zijn basic, geen extra comfort. Geen wifi. Het appartement is donkerder dan foto's suggereren. Prijs / kwaliteit verhouding niet in evenwicht.

Very clean with all the amenities you need. Very nice shared bathroom. Had no difficulties finding the address. Although there was a little language barrier Shaung was very nice. I had no issues checking in to the room.
Can't beat the location.

George is a very helpful and fast responsive person. He answered all our queries and help in provide the transport and places to visit. The house is very spacious and fully equipped would recommend for big group.

Very clean, well decorated, bright and comfortable space. Pretty roomy inside compared to other apartments in the area. Unbeatable location close to great cafes, Sydney harbour and transport. Contained within a pretty nice older building too, and very quiet at all times of day/night. Recommend.

Shuangs place is absolutely perfect for folks arriving and travelling from Sydney airport. wonderfully clean. Shuang responds very quickly to questions and issues. His dad is a delight and was very helpful when a thunderstorm knocked out the power. they made me feel very welcome in Sydney!
Great place and a lovey apartment! Highly recommended! I would definitely stay here again in Sydney!

Our stay at Pauls place was very enjoyable. It was clean and comfortable and very central. Only minutes to the Manly Wharf, shops and restaurants. I would definitely stay there again. Paul was very easy to communicate with.
Shuang was very accommodating and helpful! The room was lovely, big and bright and the location so close to the airport was ideal for me!

Die Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral im angesagten Kirribilli, zu den Cafés 5-10 Minuten Fußweg, ebenso zur Harbour Bridge und der Bahnstation Milsons Point.
Zur Fähre 3 Minuten und dann in 10 Minuten zum circular quay.
Wir können die Wohnung nur empfehlen und werden sie bei unserem nächsten Sydney Aufenthalt bestimmt wieder buchen. Auch die Fotos im Internet entsprechen genau den Gegebenheiten.
Awesome location. Nice and tidy.

As a family of 5 we have enjoyed the spacious and nice apartment. The parking lot at the garage and its location makes it very easy and convenient. 

There are also a variety of restaurants, supermarkets and playgrounds just walking distance.

Communicating with David was easy and would just suggest they have a closer eye on their outsourced cleaning and maintenance to be sure everything is cleaned and working prior to guests arrival.

We had a great stay at Linda's place. Loved the location, perfect too as we were there for an event at Carriagworks which is a five minute walk away. Close to the train, good cafes/restaurants in the area. You can easily work to Redfern and Chippendale to explore the wider neighbourhood. Easy check in and quick response from Linda, helpful info booklet on the apartment and area.  Clean apartment, balconies, all details thought through with everything you need for an enjoyable stay. Quiet at night, I slept so well! Recommended and would definitely stay again
Ideal location, walking distance to most main attractions, very friendly neighbourhood and a beautiful and comfortable home.
Fei and his wife were lovely and very accommodating people. The house and decor are beautiful and this was probably the best value-for-money place in Sydney I've come across. I'd highly recommend it.
one time place. except few hot water problems
Fantastic place! Location is excellent, and Angela is a great hostess. I really enjoyed staying there and would recommend it to anyone.
Perfect place for convenience to the Airport. As advertised, great communication. Thanks!
Great place

This place is amazing - in a great location.  Close to shops and buses which enable you to get into the city in around 20 minutes.  The ferry terminal is also close by.  

The accommodation is lovely and most importantly has a really comfortable bed with lovely pillows.  The wetroom was the highlight of the day which houses an amazing rainfall shower as well as attachments.  The hosts provide shower gel, shampoo, conditioner and gorgeous thick towels.  There was also an easy to use washing machine which again the liquid detergent is supplied.

The kitchen is small but very functional.  There is a fridge, microwave (which we didn't use), toaster, kettle and all the cutlery you will need.  Best of all there is a Nespresso machine and again pods are supplied but it might be a good idea to bring your own personal favorites.  

There is plenty of drawer and hanging space in the bedroom.  My only negative about this place is the smell of moth balls in the drawers and wardrobe.  There is also a safe in the wardrobe with an easy to remember code because it is the last 4 digits of your own phone number and this is also the case for the front door so no need to carry a key.

We would definitely stay here again as long as the hosts will have us back!
Nick & Ed were so warm welcoming & friendly. They helped me get settled in, recommended a good spot for dinner & left me alone. I slept peacefully & the location was perfect :)

Fantastic location!  We are half way through our 2 week stay and can’t wait to book again. Nathan & April are super hosts for a reason!  Beautiful Maroubra Beach is right across the street, saltwater pools are a 5 minute walk as are plenty of charming cafes. No need for a car, walk or use the bus that stops directly in front of the apartment.  Great for families & couples.
Very clean studio, Xiaowen met us outside to make sure we got in safely. Was small but perfect for our one night stay!
Tops! Stayed at Stevens with 2 y/o daughter and it was super convenient clean and comfy. Steven was friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!!
If you need a place to stay near to Macquarie University, this is perfect. It’s only a short walk to the campus.
Fantastic place at a great location.

Prime location in the middle of an funky hipster neighborhood. Great shops, cafe, restaurants, bar, weekend flea markets, train station, etc., within 5mins from the house. The room is neat, tidy and lovely but expect to hear noises and footsteps from the upper floor if you book room downstairs.

We enjoyed our 5 night stay at Ven's very much.  He is a very friendly, easy going man and we would definetely stay with him again. Easy check in even though Ven was at work and our room had everything that was needed. We appreciated having the spacious bathroom and separate toilet for our use only.   
Thank you very very much for your hospitality Ven. :-))
值得推荐,下次还住!

Victoria's place is ideally situated.  It has absolutely everything you may need and the supermarket and shops along the road are super handy!  Victoria is great at maintaining communication and is very accommodating.  We had a super stay and wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.  Be sure to check out the local market at the square with the fountain if you are there on a Saturday.

The room was exactly as described and the self check-in process was super easy. The house is in a great location - Newtown has great restaurants, bars etc.

MissD was a pleasure to deal with (although we never met face to face).

I would happily stay here again in future. Thanks for having me!

I really enjoyed the stay at Hayley's and Jake's place. They were really helpful and down-to-earth. 
The neighborhood is fantastic to explore the city. You can do everything by foot, it's safe by night too.
Would definitely recommend this place to a friend.

We loved staying here!  
Vickie was the ultimate host:  Timely, clear communication, extra amenities, and useful tips for this ideally-located (easy walk to key areas) fun, funky, highly diverse neighborhood with a great vibe.
Stay HERE, you'll be glad you did.

Ali's place is stunning, beautifully appointed and clean. I am a returning guest, and extremely appreciative of Ali and his family to be so respectful of my privacy, but immediately and happily available when help is required. Such a great place to stay.

Andrew’s apartment is so central for going out in the city. The rooms were clean and spacious. Andrew was so helpful to deal with leading up to our stay and very understanding about changing our check in time. Highly recommend staying here!

This is the perfect location. Just a block from a great transit connection but walkable to the main sites too. 

It’s easy to get anywhere. We took the bus to Coogee and Bondi beaches, to Sydney Fish Market, to Opera House and ferry hub of Circular Quay for the ferry to Manly.  You are also on subway routes too!

The home is quiet even though the street and park are well used.  It feels super safe to walk in.

There are great grocery and restaurant options right here...and we were hooked on Greenhouse Coffee just a few blocks down to start our day. We enjoyed the Sydney Festival and walked to their events and free activities. 

The home had lots of lovely touches and thoughtful additions in the bath, the kitchen and a nice collection of books and info.
房子近机场,但交通不算十分便利,早上飞机起降噪音相当大…!并且有蟑螂出没

Margaret is an amazing host and the carriage was some much more nostalgic than I expected.  The touches around the carriage added to the nostalgia. The bush setting ia amazing. The train was spotless and comfortable. Would definately stay here again. Thanks again Margaret and John.

Me and my family had a wonderful time at  David's place throughout out our stay in Sydney. On the day of arrival, we met Cathy, David's wife who was friendly and helpful. And we were happy to be there as the apartment was well equipped and located near to the king cross station. Will definitely recommend this place.
房间很干净,可以自己做饭｡距离火车站大约步行20分钟,还是挺方便的｡火车站有大超市｡房间内东西很全｡

My family loved our stay in Andrea's apartment, great location, walking distance to Sydney Opera house and harbor bridge. Would definitely book again! 
Thx Andrea!

We had a lovely stay in the garden studio. Cath was friendly and gave us some great tips for places to visit in the area. The studio is well designed and had everything we needed. We would definitely stay again.

Yang & Edward provided stylish accommodation 5 mins by car to Sydney Olympic Park. Their apartment had all the amenties needed for a comfortable stay. The late check out (12pm) was wonderful after a night out at a concert and very much appreciated.
Thank you for your hospitality Yang & Edward.

Johannes is a great host and was super easy to get in contact with.  The apartment is very conveniently located by Martin Place and provided us with a good base in Sydney for a few days.  The space is a reasonable size for inner city Sydney, and the king bed was a huge plus.  I would definitely stay here again in future.

it was a beautiful place with a very friendly host!
thanks for all

Pamela and Hugo have an amazing apartment here. I was visiting for a conference at Sydney ICC and this was the perfect home base. It's walking distance to the conference center, opera house, botanical gardens. The large windows make the views incredible. Street noise was minimal and we slept very well in the comfortable bed.

Great place to stay for a weekend away on the northern beaches. The apartment was clean with modern amenities and a great view in a lovely location. Our host was very reliable to contact and we would definitely stay here again!

We enjoyed our stay with Susan! She was amazing and gave us loads of tips on things to do in Sydney and for our further (Website hidden by Airbnb) cabin is a nice size with private bathroom...all nice and clean. We would recommend Susan to everyone.

We loved staying here! Perfect location + the flat was a great for a girls weekend away. The host Paul was very good with communication and there was lots of information about what to do in Sydney which was super helpful. The cleaner/host Wendy who checked us in was lovely & both her and Paul were wonderful about a later check in time due to a late flight. The flat itself is great. Thank you!
Exceeded expectations!
Wicked location, great place to crash for a couple of nights to explore Sydney!
Very convenient, private and well-resourced room near King Street, Newtown.

Great location! Gavin's place is right around the corner from the busiest public transportation station in Sydney. This made getting around easy and allowed us to take full advantage of the time we had. The room was very spacious and had all the essentials. 

Gavin was a great host! He made us feel at home at all times and even asked us to join him to some local sporting events. He gave us great tips on Sydney, and answered any other questions we had. 

Overall a great place to stay in Sydney!

This apartment was very nice to stay in. The pictures are all very accurate. The location of the apartment is very convenient being around a 10 minute walk away from multiple shops. I recommend this apartment to anyone wishing to stay in the Mosman area.
A great little apartment in a fantastic location. Views from the deck are stunning and it is a lovely walk along the coast to either Bondi or Bronte beaches.

Judith and Paul are very nice hosts. They live in a beautiful old house in one of the hipper parts of the town with lots of nice little cafes and interesting shops just around the corner. We had a quiet room and a bathroom on our own.  
Public transport is perfect, three bus lines are operating nearby and also one station of the local trains is in walking distance. They even gave us a "rechargeable" ticket for the busses and boats which was very useful. Don't miss a ferry tour with the boats on the Sydney harbour. They operate between the different suburbs and start at Circular Quay, for example.  We can recommend Judith and Pauls house definetly for your visit in Sydney.
Studio is located in the very heart of Sydney, can't get any better for exploring the city. It is small, but very well equipped. Swimming pool on the roof is a nice bonus too.

Easy to find; lots of space; lovely, clean, near-new as described.  Perfect location for our night-before (too early!) domestic flight.  Very easy access to two train lines, so of Sydney close at-hand.  We'd stay there again!

We had a wonderful time staying with Kerri for almost three weeks.  She is a fantastic host and made us feel truly welcome in her lovely home.  We especially enjoyed the delicious fresh fruit salad prepared freshly every day to accompany breakfast.  The property is only a few minutes away from the train station, just 15 mins to the centre of the city, ideal for Sydney sightseeing.  Newtown, with its vibrant shops and estaurants is just a short walk away which was excellent for us as we became regular visitors to the Cow and Moon (voted best ice cream in the world).  We have no hesitation recommending Kerri and will definitely stay again when we next return to Australia.
great location and apartment! we really enjoyed our stay in sydney.
We had a great time here. The host is so generous and thoughtful. One of the best places I've stayed! Highly recommend!!!
干净,整洁,性价比超级高,房东想的很周到,会推荐给其他的人
Warming department,tidy room,detail tips .Such a good experience in Sydney.Hernan is a kindly host.Hope to have a chance come again.
Very enjoyable stay! Nice and cosy house. Donna and Matt are very friendly and hospitable.
Cindy and her husband are really kind and helpful hosts. We had good conversations and they felt like good friends to me. It was great to stay with them!

Julia was a caring host. Altough we have not met in person she was available online, giving us hints and information about restaurants etc.
Place is just 5 minutes from metro station and eventhough its located close to bars & restaurants its calm and peaceful. Last but not least - the interior. Place is well designed - scandinavic minimalism (visible hygge concept influences) , a lot of space, nice lights, well equiped kitchen, new tv with (Hidden by Airbnb) chromecast so you can share your mobile screen on tv.  This is really a place you feel good in and cant wait to come back ;-)

Loved loved loved staying here. I booked the place for my (rather particular mother in law) and she said it was the first rental she didn’t have to go out and buy cleaning supplies and scrub head to toe. Our favorite - apart from the wonderful location - was the styling of the place, from the high quality linens to the choice of crockery and decor. Thanks!

Top Rate AirBNB.  Spotless, cosy and beautifully presented. Easy access to Transport, Shopping and Restaurants - We only drove our hire car 20 klm in 3 days!!
George and Lucia have thought of everything and are fantastic communicators.  We Highly Recommend staying with them.
It was located on perfect and easy to find the place with nice views!^^

Extremely comfortable, stylish and well stocked with all amenities and equipment for a great stay. Modern, well furnished apartment with huge windows and lots of natural light.  Very easy access to hip neighborhoods as well as the gardens and parks.  Andrea was easy to communicate with and responded instantly.  An excellent resource for any  visitor to Sydney.
Beautiful apartment in a great location. Very close to ANZ stadium.
Great apartment with wonderful host. There is a beautiful beach  just 3 mins walk. The room has got everything you need,  Highly recommend.
Didn't see/meet the host. A clean flat with well equipped kitchen in a very quiet/safe feeling neighbourhood. We could walk to the bus, the ferry, shops and cafes. Good shower, comfy bed.

Anita was at the apartment to greet us upon arrival with a very warm welcome. She has thought of every detail and has everything you need for your stay! The location is perfect! Easy transport from CBD to Bondi and right across the road from the apartment. The view across Bondi is amazing and very convenient for the coastal walks. The apartment is spotlessly clean and comfortable. Anita is helpful providing a tour of the building and also giving valuable hints and tip for great coffee and breakfasts. We loved our stay in Bondi and if back will definitely be staying at Anita’s again. Highly recommended.
The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Edi is very friendly and nice! she let me know the best and cheapest option of travel from the airport to her place! its very helpful knowing that you are exhausted after travelling on planes and want to arrive at your accomdation conviniently and fast! she also tells me where to go for food and other which is very handy! also the house is only few minutes away from a train station!! overall it is a great experience and I really recommend to stay with Edi!
Awesome location. Cannot find any apartment convenient than this house in Airbnb. It is very suitable for tourists who come to Sydney first time.
Brenda's place is well worth a stay. It is quirky and the art alone fascinating.We would recommend the accommodation without hesitation.

We had a great stay at Stephanie's house.
A walking distance from cafes, groceries stores and other amenities came in very handy. The apartment is very well kept and very clean. It has a cozy flavour as well.
We stayed 2night in Leslie's accommodation,it was a lovely place. Leslie was really friendly and we appreciated the accommodation and what a beautiful view.

Comfortable, nicely furnished apartment in secure building with an excellent location walkable to downtown Sydney attractions.  Check-in on the weekends is a little difficult as the property manager is not available and you have arrange to have someone pick up the keys ahead of time or pick them up from a lockbox in a completely different location.  During our stay, there was serious construction noise at night that started on the second night of our stay.  This was unexpected and anticipated to last two weeks.  Keris was kind enough to allow us to relocate to a hotel and refunded us for the unused nights which we greatly appreciated.  We were sad to have to end our stay early.  We would stay here again in the future if we have the opportunity.

Great location and such a cozy place! Paul is a very helpful host and responded all questions immediately. A note to people who would stay there on a Saturday night: be extra careful parking along the street as the place is very close to a popular bar and the Manly wharf. Someone used a marker (thank god not a permanent marker) to sign a signature on my white car and now I have to send the car to polish to be able to get that off completely. There is a public car park next to the place offering overnight parking.
Very happy with the house, beautifully decorated and very spacious. Only issue was there was no wifi.

A great place if you're wanting to explore and make the most of Sydney's pubic transport - walking distance to supermarkets and cafes and super close to a main train station. A very welcoming space :)

Angela's place is absolute luxury! We loved the provision of additional fruit and gourmet food! It's a really a nice touch and super handy when in a rush. I booked her place the day before my wedding - and it did not disappoint. Angela herself is very helpful and responsive. I would definitely stay here again for a holiday experience.
非常好的房源,地段很好,去达令港步行十几分钟就到了,离海德公园和澳洲博物馆还有圣玛丽教堂都很近,机场过来不到二十分钟｡旁边有一个超大的Coles超市,也有亚洲超市,方便买菜做饭｡按摩椅很棒,超级舒服｡房东人很好,回复很及时｡

This gorgeous studio is beautifully kept and the thought put into the set up and arrangement makes staying here a comfortable and relaxing experience. Close to everything and wonderfully quiet. A smaller space as a studio, yet it feels spacious and open. An uncluttered kitchen that has all the things you need. All the paradoxes. A joy to stay there. :)
Great location and Anita provides a well accommodated apartment with the little extras that were appreciated.

Fantastic location. Within walking distance to many places of interest. Getting grocery was such an easy feat!Can save a lot on transport. We checked in late and Ana was very kind enough to accommodate my boy & me since I was my first time using Airbnb. Ana was very sweet and helpful in!!! That really makes us feel so welcome! I have read about other feedbacks about noises. As for me, I felt the noise level was not as loud as what others claimed. Since we were living right at the heart of the CBD, we do not expect total silence like living in a cave. We actually enjoyed the random sound of siren from ambulance, party-goers chiming to Christmas songs. It really represents a true heart of a city!
A big thumb up for the cleanliness of the places. Not a insect to be found! The air-con system was great! 
Discover that there is no shower curtain. Not sure if it is to deter people from taking long shower. Maybe having a simple one will be helpful to prevent unnecessary splashes. Just need to put a gentle note to remind to conserve water!
Thank you so much Jared for your prompt response and Ana for your great hospitality!
Rhonda's place was as described. It was clean and Rhonda was very helpful with information about the area. Rhonda travels around and uses Airbnb herself so knows how to make your stay comfortable.

Great little pad in a truly sensational location, very clean, has everything you need. It was smaller than expected, and it's on the ground floor which means the window looks out on to the main road. A little noisy at night (backpackers opposite) and you can hear the early risers rushing down to the beach, but it's not too bad. All in all very good!

The main reason I chose Nathan's place was the kids bedroom. When we arrived and saw it, it exceeded our expectations indeed. For those that are traveling with kids, the kids room in this apartment is any child's dream wonderland which made settling our little girl in all that much easier. The location of the beach (just across the road) made it all the more fun.
