For a small apartment, I was very impressed with how Nathan has maximised the space. The apartment has obviously been updated with quality appliances. It was my first time using an induction stove top - it was most impressive. The heated master bed was also a great luxury.

Finally, it was all the little extras that Nathan provided that made it a memorable experience. We got a large box of chocolates, quality soap and well known brand name (eco and organic) hand wash and cleaning products.

Nathan kept in contact throughout the week and even recommended local places for us to check out which was very helpful for us. Check out was also very convenient for us which was great considering we were traveling with a child.
Very good value and great location. Very comfortable and spacious and great for 2 couples.
Stayed for one night due to proximity to airport. Clean. Easy check-in. Shower leaks a bit on floor. 7/11 close by with snacks.
Perfect!
The perfect Australian beach break, in the heart of Sydney
Excellent accommodation
Thanks for welcoming me at 11pm as my flight got delayed. Wifi is good and got connected straight away.

I had a great stay at Linda's place. The apartment was as described: neat, with full amenities, and well situated close to the Redfern train station. Linda herself was very well organized and communicative during the stay. I'd definitely recommend it. I especially liked the box of TimTams she left out before my arrival :)
Fantastic spot and views. Perfect for a Sydney coastal getaway.

Desireé apartment is so centrally - ideal location! 
The apartment is a real home from home & has everything you need.
Desireé is a super host, very easy to checkin & out. 
We loved our stay here & didn’t want to leave. :)
Great host and lovely apartment. Perfect communications made our stay so easy and enjoyable. Loved the location of the apartment too. Thank you!!
Great value for space and close to everything in the city

The house was a perfect place to stay in Sydney. The rooms were all clean and tidy and cleaners came by regularly, the kitchen had everything we needed to cook up some good food (including fresh herbs outside). Robbie made us feel incredibly welcome - just make sure if you stay there you pester him to give you a guided meditation. Well worth it. If we are ever in need of a place to stay in Sydney we will be back.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Couldn't recommend this place enough. From the moment we arrived Craige and Leonie were so kind and made us feel at home by showing us around and giving us guidance on where to visit and things to do. The house is amazing, clean and the garden is beautiful. It's a perfect spot as restaurants and bars are literally round the corner and bondi beach is only 5 mins walk. Even though it is so close to the nightlife it's on a quiet road so getting a good nights sleep was easy. We had Xmas dinner with their family which was incredible generous. You have to do the walk from bondi beach along the coast to Coogee as it's stunning!! 

Overall couldn't fault anything about our stay and if we ever need somewhere to stay near bondi in future I will be coming straight back here. 

Thanks again for an amazing few days. 

Patrick and Elle x

This place is as beautiful as it looks in the pictures. It is clean, tidy, well-decorated and makes you feel like home. The living room is nice and bright in the day and if you need a break from drinking in the bars and pubs at night (which are within walking distance by the way), the balcony is a nice place to relax too. Lucile has been super helpful and friendly in providing us with all the necessary details required for our stay. If there is one thing you need to know about this place, it is that the beds are really comfy! It's like sleeping in your favorite clean, old t-shirt. Be careful, you might find it hard to peel yourselves off the bed in the mornings. Thank you once again for sharing your beautiful home with us!
It’s a very wonderful place to be!!!
Good location

Great location for access to all sorts of transport, eateries, coffee spots, etc. Though Macleay Street is busy, we found it was only a daytime phenomenon. Nice sleeping sat night in a comfy bed. Very pleased with our choice.
Falta un punt de llum per poder llegir.

Fred met us upon arrival and explained everything we needed to know about the unit, which has everything we needed.  A plate of lovely homemade slice made by Bernadette was on the kitchen bench for us! The local area is quiet and beautiful, with the beach only across the road and a corner cafe a short walk away for coffee, breakfast or casual dinner.
I travel on business and use Shuang's place. Very reliable and clean.
Good apartment and location but the building has a no airbnb policy so there is a chance of being kicked out if caught which is unsettling
房屋干净､舒适,房东准备了丰富的小吃食,让我居住的很舒心｡

Apartment is situated in the heart of Sydney . We walked to nearby sights such as the Rocks , Sydney Aquarium and Barangaroo . Get your Opal Card and take a Ferry over to the Opera House and take in the amazing sight of the Harbor Bridge . Wynyard Station is within walking distance . Take the train up to Katoomba and spend the day at the Blue Mountains . 
After a long day of sightseeing make your way back to the apartment for a quite evening on the Balcony where you can relax and take in the city views of Sydney .

The house is located in a great neighborhood with lots of places to eat around and just a short train ride from the touristic center. Kitchen and bathrooms were nice and spacious. The room looked just like in the photos, really nice and big enough for two suitcases and stuff. The window faces the street so it might be a bit too noisy  if u're very sensitive to that. MissD was very helpful with our questions although we never met her. The cleanliness of the bathrooms depends a lot on the other guests too. For us it could have been a bit better, but was ok. Value for money is great!
Enjoyed our stay though we did not meet Yoco nor any other Airbnb guests there.

Great cabin - must be well insulated as it was very cosy!  Extremely comfortable bed and a very quiet place.   Friendly host and welcoming cat!  Having checked in quickly, then left, it was really nice to come back later to a well lit cabin with the heater on. 
A quick walk to a bus stop - and the Light Rail is within walking distance as well.

Our stay at this airbnb in Manley is highly recommended! The kitchen is very well equipped and practical, great to have a washing machine. The beds are very comfortable and the space very comfortable for 4 people. The view is absolutely stunning and its very easy to get to busses and ferries into the city. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay!

Really good studio apartment in perfect location in Bondi Beach. The apartment is right next to the 333 bus stops on Campbell Parade and one minute from the beach, Bondi icebergs and the Bondi to Bronte Coastal walk. And It has a great view of the beach! Anita was a wonderful host, on time, helpful, welcoming. We had a great experience. We will be back to this apartment and would definitely recommend it to others.
The charming apartment is conveniently located with beautiful view of Sydney Tower and Habour Bridge.

The hosts were great. They made sure we were comfortable. Terry was there at the airport to pick us up and on our way she even gave a quick orientation of nearest train station, restaurants and convenience stores that helped us a lot throughout our stay. The room and bath room were very neat and clean. They had even kept basic toiletaries. We were free to use the kitchen and walk into the house at anytime. Bus stops and train stations are walking distance which is a big plus point. And, not to forget the beautiful view from their house that Yiu cab wake up to. I would rate 5/5 in all aspects. Highly recommended
Great location.

Susan and Gregg are the perfect hosts, not only with their warm welcome and lovely local bread, yoghurt and fruit, but their considered expert knowledge both locally and the wider Sydney area. Their studio matched the expectation and was snug, private, quiet and well presented, we liked it so much we stayed twice! Bronte is a perfect location for stunning coastal walks, funky eats(3 blue ducks and the Pavilion mm!) and easy bus and train, best of all is Susan and Gregg as hosts!
Naveen and Triston were awesome hosts! They're place is in a great location in Darlinghurst with many things to explore. We had great time hanging out with them and thoroughly enjoyed their home.

Our stay in Sydney was fabulous. Not only because the city itself is fantastic, also because Duncan and Ashlee were most helpful whenever needed. Room is very pleasant with comfy bed. Always very clean and tidy. 10-12 minutes bus ride to city centre. Its a shame though that we didn't have  more time to chat together, because these guys are really easygoing. Highly recommended to stay here.
Unbelievable facilities, location and cleanliness. Leigh is unbelievably organised, professional and punctual. Highly recommend
An appartement at a perfect location, really beautiful and good communication with the owner. I highly recommend it.

Angela was a great Host, very friendly and kind. It was the first time we used Airbnb and we had a problem with the booking but Angela called Airbnb for us and helped to solve our problem within 5 minutes. Thanks for that again :). The room was clean as shown on the pictures. My girlfriend and me stayed 3 nights. Reaching the beach just takes 2 minutes by foot.

Everything as described, but nothing more. Paid a fair bit for this, so was a tad disappointed to see no effort is made beyond the bare minimum - no info/handbook or anything. I did appreciate the easy check-in and not having to meet, makes things alot quicker and easier.
Fantastic location to explore Sydney... thanks Naveen for all your recommendations and making us feel welcome. Loved being so close to the sauna!. Cheers Heather
Small but very stylish and clean. Great for one person or a couple. 15 min walk to the beach and off street parking available 100-200m away (free and untimed).
Great people felt like I had known them for years

Many good things can be said about the room and atmosphere Elizabeth and Simon provide. They are down to earth people and gladly help you in anyway they can. Everything was clean and the bed was comfy. The location is great for sightseeing with light rail and buses close by.

This apartment (in a hotel) is in a great location in the heart of Sydney's main attractions and easily accessible by public transport. Grocery store, shops, Sydney Harbor, etc were all within very short walking distance as described. 

The apartment itself is spacious and clean. Makes for a good base to prep breakfast and do laundry. Beds were comfy.  As mentioned in the description there is ongoing light rail work but w/ windows closed the noise isn't bad. 

Finally the host was responsive to messages and check in was smooth.
Andrei’s place is a comfortable unit close to the sights of Sydney. I would definitely stay here again.
Great place to stay specially if you want a quiet and serene location. Though a few stairs can hinder an easy access.

This is the BEST HOST ever!! So sweet and nice! Thanks for taking caring of us, me and my family really enjoy our staying^^ Thank you so much!! You guys gonna love this city as well^^
Sincerely from Abess

We did not feel welcome, we lost our way not Narelle's fault but her response when we called her was a put off.  The raising of voice as she questioned how we could loose our way was  unpleasant and unnecessary
It was a good location with friendly locals and good bars

Great stay! Spacious unit for Sydney CBD. Perfect location for circular quay, Pitt st mall, train stations, the rocks, all just 5min walks away. Thanks Jared will definitely recommend your property to others.
What a great downtown Airbnb! 5 star unit and amazing communication with the host. Easy to get to get to and the area is a blast too, would definitely recommend
Have written before - great space, comfortable, easy to relax, convenient kitchen and bathroom, restful sleep in comfortable bed!!
Easy, convenient, value. All good

Highly recommended.  Duncan and Ashlee are great and very accomodating.  The place is neat, quiet, and perfect and is just one bus stop away from the city.  The neighborhood feels safe as well.  Would love to be back in their place someday.
Linda was a very helpful hostess to us! She prepared everything we needed. We enjoyed cooking every morning.

This was a great stay! The place exceeded my expectations and is definitely better then the pictures. Belinda and Chris were very friendly. The location is right by the water and there are so many great walking tracks nearby. I would definitely stay again

Craige was accommodating from the moment we arrived late and he stayed up to give us the tour to the very end of our stay. Super helpful with advice for us regarding local attractions and the easiest way to get from A to B. The actual property itself was stunning and brilliantly placed, literally a few mins from Bondi Beach. Couldn't recommend this highly enough.
Good location, nice view. Excellent!

Great location, roomy apartment and decent amenities. Disappointing that the apartment wasn't clean - bed linen was clean, but the carpets and tops of surfaces weren't clean (dead bugs, crumbs, hair, fluff, threads etc) and there are a few maintenance items that need to be addressed. 
Overall, once I cleaned the apartment myself, we had a great stay and the price was very reasonable.

Cedric went above and beyond to make sure I had a great stay. He was amazing to communicate with and I felt very comfortable and at home from the moment I arrived. The place was clean, spacious and in a fantastic area I would definitely recommend this place.
We loved our stay at Eleanor’s place! The apartment is cosy and clean. A home away from home! The location is amazing! Next time we are in sydney we will be staying here again.

We had a very brief stay and the apartment was literally across the road from Central Station. Our booking was very last minute and Alexey's responses were very prompt - very good communication. The one negative was the noise from the station which was quite noticeable from the bedroom.

Millie’s apartment is perfect for a solo traveller like myself, or for a couple. The location is perfect, only a short train ride right into circular quay! The view from the balcony  overlooking harbour bridge while I ate my breakfast was something else! 
Millie responded to my messages super quickly and answered all my questions. 
Definitely recommend staying here and if I ever get the chance to go back to Sydney this is where I’d hope to stay!

This apartment is a in a great location and is almost new. The furniture was modern and nice, bed comfortable. Very quite in the bedrooms. However, we had a number of maintenance issues that were clearly there prior to our arrival and left unfixed. This was disappointing and seemed careless. For example the toilet seat in the ensuite was broken and not stable to sit on, the ensuite door handle had been snapped off so if the door closed could not be opened from the bedroom, there was a broken drying rack that had been dumped on the patio, the towel rail in the main bathroom was broken off and there was no where to hang towels, the coffee machine was broken and the heating system on the top floor emitted a really bad smell. I guess there was a dead mouse or rat in the system or roof.
Perfect

DJ was a very nice host.

The room and the bed are very comfortable. You get your own bathroom which is a very nice plus. The apartment is very well located, well connected in terms of public transportation. Recommended.
Jeremy was easy to communicate with and his place was really great!
The house was very private and well equipped, and we had an unforgettable evening.
The property is a great place to base yourself in central Sydney. There are 4 double beds and 2 bathrooms. Jeremy was a great host and was very easy to communicate with.

Shaun is an amazing host! He pretty much makes me feel like in a home. I can wander around and use many facilities in the house. Also Shaun responded text or in person very quick and kind. The room is big and clean. but the whole house's too cold to me. One thing I'd like to suggest to Shaun is that "the hot water only running 8 mins" should be info on the house profile, so people can consider if this condition fits them.

A great place with great hosts, easy walk to everything and so close to the light rail and buses. Quiet at night for a great sleep and space for everyone to chill. Lots of places an easy walk to eat, really was the perfect spot for us to have our holiday . Definitely planning to stay here again.
Lovely stay and very nice apartment. Helena was a great host

Sam’s apartment is a tidy and comfortable place which is just a few steps from the shopping centers and other landmarks. 2 queen beds and a mattress are ample for 6 (or more) persons. Whatever you expect about a nice and affordable place to stay in the middle of crowded Sydney, you can find it here. The hosts were very friendly and helpful as well. Definitely would come again in the future.

Great location, near to the beach and restaurants. Craige & Leonie are friendly and relaxed. After checkout we may use facilities., very kindful. Spitefully the house wasn’t clean, a lot of dust in the sleepingroom,  and the bathroom was’t clean either.
Min很好 房子地角很好 很便利
Kathy's place was perfect, a minutes walk to the beautiful Centennial Park and great amenities. Perfect if you have a car and want it as a base to explore Sydney and its surrounds.

Nice spot at a great location. Supermarket and 24h food kiosks just round the corner, and the train station is just minutes away on foot. However, might not be suitable for younger travellers as it is within the red light district of Sydney with plenty of strip clubs around. That said, it is a safe gated building which never left us any worries.

Perfect location!  Close to the train station so it was very easy to get anywhere.  The neighborhood was full of great restaurants or if you want to stay “home” there are grocery stores close by.  The kitchen had everything you needed to cook.  We loved hanging out on the balcony to unwind and relax after full days of exploring.  Beautiful place!!!

Pamela and Hugo's apartment has a fantastic location, right next to Hyde Park, close to stations Town Hall and Museum, near the supermarket, shops and restaurants. It is comfortably furnished, has a comfy bed and great TV. The kitchen, although functional, could possibly be updated to modern standards I think. But it has fantastic views over Hyde Park and part of Sydney Harbour.

Wonderful stay at George and Lucia’s lovely home.
Lovely private setting and sparkling clean and with everything we could ever need for our short stay.
George’s recommendation for dinner was also a real highlight to our stay.
Thank you
Gregoire's place is just amazing and well-located near the train station! Just minutes away from all the bustling City! The atmosphere back at home is surreal, it's a perfect airbnb house to go for!
住这里非常舒服,干净,东西齐全｡就像自己家一样,非常满意｡周边交通便利,购物便利,下次来悉尼依然会首选Francoise的家
Great place close to Nepean Hospital.  Worked out really well for a 6 week stay. Host is very friendly and helpful. Has everything you need for short or longer stay.

Good apartment. If you've got kid(s) be aware that there is no door for the bedroom. At all. Also if you come in a car, the parking outside is 1P or 4P and incredibly expensive, up to $17 per hour. You can find free parking about 10-15 minute walk away. Bondi waves always work so if that's your thing this place is worth the steep price
nice view!

The garden studio gave us the escape we needed for our first anniversary getaway. Offering self contained comfort with calm, beautiful beaches and shops/cafes a stroll away and nearby the Coastal Walk with its dramatic cliff edges and seascapes, it would be challenging to find a more well situated spot. Highly recommended for a few days away.
很小巧精致的房间,独立的厨房卫生间,各项设备齐全,居住十分方便｡位置也十分便利,能观望到悉尼大桥和海湾景色｡美中不足的是入住第一晚隔壁房子在举办彻夜的party及高声唱歌,相当打扰睡眠

Susan and Greg were brilliant hosts having thought of everything beyond just a comfortable stay for the three of us. There was Greg ready with maps and things to do, places to eat, Cricket kit for my 7 yr old boy and easy to remember wifi password. Susan had a mini botanic tour for us at her pretty garden early morning. And to top it all they even helped us pack!
Best hosts ever...
Fantastic beautiful relaxing place to stay. Perfect hosts. Great location. Will stay again.
Very nice house and Bill is very thoughtful.

This is a wonderful modern apartment which has all the modern conveniences that one could hope for. Great for a couple with one bedroom . There is a provision to convert the sofa into a sofa bed as well. The apartment is in a secure building and also has a parking space in the basement.
But this icing on the cake is the wonderful responsiveness of the host Yang. Very accomodating and quick in responses. Highly recommended.

Great place.
Yang and her husband are lovely and efficient hosts who provided helpful tips/maps/etc for us.
The apartment itself was clean and modern, walking distance to the ferry, IGA, and some cafes, and a 10 minute drive from spotless stadium.
Thanks a bunch for everything!

First experience in Manly with Maria is really wonderful. The room is so spacious and bright just as displayed in the album. We enjoy the sunrise and breakfast on that colourful balcony very much. Maria and her husband are warm sunshine in chilly windy Sydney. We really appreciate their hospitality and kindness. Looking forward to our next visit to that shiny sea and this cute accommodation.

Lizzys house is an amazing spot in sydney.
Tamarama is so nice and close to bronte pool that i personally lovee
Also lizZy have alot of details with us. She is always responding in a small time!
The house is just perfect!
We are looking forward to come back
I really love this place and fully recomend it!!!!
A very well located and convenient apartment with a wonderful host. Highly recommended.
He is the greatest host!! I highly recommend this Airbnb:)
Great comms, lovely place and location
Een heel bijzonder huis om in te verblijven in een superieure buurt in Sydney. Prima uitvalsbasis voor een bezoek aan de stad.
If you stay in this apartment and feel that it is not up to the standard you are expecting then you are the type of person who expects to buy a Rolls Royce for BMW money.

空港へのｱｸｾｽも良く､期待以上に良かったです｡お風呂やﾄｲﾚなどすべて清潔で､おもてなしの精神を感じました｡
ただ､となりの部屋が近いのであまり騒げません

Evelyn and Andy are the most warm-hearted and helpful hosts we ever had. The place is truly worth the label "AirBNB plus" as it has everything one could dream: spacious and light filled living room, comfortable bed and bathroom, amazing views, pool and sauna... We enjoyed our stay to the fullest!

Lovely apartment in very central location, perfect for easy access to trains and buses and within walking distance of the City and Circular Quay. Bright, compact and comfortable - a very enjoyable stay. Many thanks Hugo.

We had a really good time at Wyatt's house. We loved the area, cause it was possible to walk into the city and Annandale has several nice cafés and shops and it was not too busy. We enjoyed ourselves during a breakfast on the little balcony. Wyatt's place is furnitured with a lot of love and good taste. He always was there if we had any questions about the city. The only little thing we could criticise is that the bed in the smaller room is like a sleeping couch which was not the most comfy sleep. But it was ok for us. We had a great time at his place and would recommend it!

Had a chance to stay with Karen over the weekends and I'm glad I have chosen her place. It's very near to everything especially to the beach. Place is very cozy and nice. Karen is a super host! She is very hospitable and kind. She even gave me a tour and recommended the best spots to visit in Bondi, and on my last day I was a bit in a hurry to get back to the city and she offered me a ride to the bondi junction.
Victoria's place was the perfect location for our holiday. Vickie was there to meet us upon check-in and shared some priceless tips with us. We had a great time!

Great location. Only issue we had was due to no air conditioning and no fly-screens there were bugs everywhere as it was hot when we stayed. The downstairs shower is a hassle as water goes all over the bathroom floor after each shower as there is only a shower curtain around it. Other then that the house was clean and in a very nice, quiet neighborhood and Jeremy made organizing the trip and our stay incredibly easy.

The place was absolutely amazing and in the perfect location! Communication was so easy and the little touches like the bottle of wine made it extra special. Honestly could not have booked a better place for our time in Sydney!
Perfect location for events at Sydney Olympic Park, very close. Lovely apartment with great facilities. Jennifer was very helpful and easy to communicate with. Would definitely stay here again.
A wonderful short stay. Vibes in this space are very special....both tranquil and and uplifting.

I can only say George is a 5 stars host that I ever met before! A traveler like me, I traveled very often in a year, Airbnb always the best option for me to book for my stay. I traveled 8 countries last year and this year I had been 4 countries up to date! So far non of the host provided such a great service like George. He wrote me daily train schedule, remind me of the road block, changes of the train schedule and even he planned for my itinerary on the daily basic. 

There was this night when we faced a small issue at home! I text him to ask for help! Without asking much, George appeared in the home and help us solve our problems. 

When we running out of idea of places to go. Again he visited us at 10pm plus to discuss with us of his friend (travel agent) day tour packages for us! 

George always very thoughtful towards our stay! He even offered to send our luggages to the train station when we left the place! 

All 13 of us rated his place 5 stars not only for our stay but also because of his warm hospitality! I will definitely recommend all my friends to choose him! Great location, comfortable house,  thoughtful host with very affordable rental!

I had a wonderful stay here for two nights. The place was exactly as it looks in the photos - very modern, clean and comfortable, and is an easy walking distance from Central Station and Surry Hills bars, restaurants and coffee shops.
Excellent 3 bedroom townhouse with plenty of room and having 3 showers to access was great. location was perfect with very short drive or walks to everything you need in Cronulla

I stayed at Hernan's place only one night, but the experience was very nice.  Everything was exactly as described and as told.  The place is conveniently close to the airport and pleasantly close to a lovely beach.  Hernan is a very nice guy, and made me feel at home right away.  He helped me out with my logistics without hesitation.  I would stay there again.
Great stay, lovely apartment with an amazing view of the Sydney harbour bridge

This studio out the back of caths house was a pleasure to stay in. The clever design makes use of a small space and the decore was stylish. Cath treated us with her homemade treats which were a real welcomed surprise.
We enjoyed looking out onto her veggie patch, the morning sun lit upnthe big photo of clouds on the wall and was lovely to wake to every morning.
Highly recommended.
Il faut y aller c est vraiment super

We were looking for a place to stay for my mums birthday weekend. Scrolling through AIRBNB and we found this place. All I can say is amazing. Great mackerel has everything you could want and more. The house and tree house is amazing. The kitchen is perfect and the view is unbelievable. Photos definitely don't do the house justice. Strongly recommend. The hosts are contactable and super pleasant. Easy to deal with and very accommodating. We will be aiming to stay again soon.

Sharon has a lovely home. It's centrally located with buses nearby. Her home is very well presented and clean with plenty of bedrooms and room to move. As a host she went out of her way to ensure we had everything we needed and was very responsive to any questions (even though she was overseas!). We had a great time and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.
Easy place to stay, good transport. Very clean with Friendly people. Proximity to The flight path was a bit of an issue for me but might not be for others.

Absolutely loved our stay at Cheryl’s. The location is amazing and the house is very cosy. We were 5 people staying which was a bit much for this house as the extra bed was more of a day bed. I would absolutely recommend staying here if you’re 4 people or less though. I’m sure I’ll be back!
Susan and Greg were perfect hosts. Their studio is beautifully furnished and had everything we needed for a long weekend getaway. We would love to come stay again!
Lovely, tastefully designed and very clean apartment in a great location. We had high expectations having read the rave reviews and it certainly did not disappoint.
Gavin is a great host. He gave us great ideas (places to see). We enjoyed our stay very much. The location is great; lots of busses and trains within walking distance.

Justine was a great host, her apartment felt very secluded and private although it was only 10 minute walk down to avalon beach and shops. She was very hospitable and had some nice touches she had prepared for us!

Spacious beautiful Australian home. Its location couldn't have been any better; the beach, bus stop, and grocery store were only a short walk away. Cat was very accommodating, had a well kept home, and fast internet. Our only regret was that we couldn't stay longer.
Very pleasant location, spacious apartment, extremely clean bathroom and kitchen. Excellent WiFi reception. Very friendly and helpful host

Great first experience using air bnb!
Nice new apartment, good location and great service!

Thanks Yang
Excellent facilities, comfort, and location
Great location for exploring Sydney. Good value. Mariana is a great host and the little touches made a big difference. The block is a bit noisy so ear plugs are useful! Very comfortable apartment.

Susan was very friendly and helpful to give us a lot of information. 
Location is good for the public transportation (we used a lot) but very noisy due to the plans!
Nice living, had everything in the apartment
Really nice apartment - everything was clean & comfortable!

Great location, right across World Square with Coles Supermarket at the basement. Close walking distance to Darling Harbour, Sydney Tower Eye, Hyde Park and BigBus station. There was 1 night where both lifts are out of service, couldn't get down for dinner, luckily we have some food in the apartment which was meant for next day breakfast. Overall, we enjoyed the stay, massage chair is plus point at the end of the day after more than 15,000 walking steps.
Great location, accessible to Surry Hills and the CBD. Excellent for work or play.  Annie's home is what Airbnb is all about. Thank you!
Gavin's place is near central. It is a perfect situation. His apartment is huge and we had a good bedroom.
Gorgeous little treasure Dangar is! Ann is generous in sharing her little paradise, her amazing knowledge and stories. We will be back.

Jennifer's Balmain house is an absolute delight. A lovingly decorated and comfortable house in a quiet street. Our family had a most enjoyable stay - breakfast in the tree-filled  courtyard, nicely appointed bedrooms with quality linen. We enjoyed spending time in Balmain and imagining how nice it would be to live there.

Quirky artsy apartment in amazing location. 

Alexey was super helpful and responsive and would definitely recommend staying with him if you’re heading to Sydney :D
Great place near the trains! Would stay again
Friendly helpful host nothing too much trouble.  The cabin was lovely, nicely decorated and in a nice quiet area.  The beach across the road was great to be able to go for a walk.

Xiaowen's accommodation offers a clean, modern bedroom & adjoining private bathroom. The room size is on the small side, however, there is excellent storage and the quality of the amenity is very good. The bed is really comfy; the complimentary bath products are of good quality; the privacy of the room is excellent and access is easy; and the neighbourhood is very quiet for relaxing, undisturbed sleeping at night. We used this accommodation as a base when visiting family & friends (so we were out most of the day & into the evening) and it served us very well in that context. Good value for money.
Beautiful and cozy place. Cafes and restaurants are just nearby. Great place to stay:)
Great location in the city, lots of space for everybody& plenty of bathrooms to make your stay easy. Fantastic inner city views. Very clean & comfy beds.

Loved the location and the spacious property.  Easy to get around with ferry close by.  Many restaurants, cafes and supermarket for essentials, all very close.  The beach is literally short stroll away.  Well appointed and tastefully furnished.  We loved our week's stay and would stay again if opportunity arose.  The hosts were also very welcoming and most importantly very responsive.

Love the house it's really decorated nicely with thoughts. Kitchen utensils were equipped would be better to add a bigger pot for large consumptions. We asked for later check out and the host was able to help. Found a dirty underwear in one of the room lol but that's alright.  Overall a pleasant stay easy access to shop for food and drinks and crossing the harbour. The neighbourhood is really beautiful, enjoyed the walk to wharf everyday.
Lovely, very genuine and welcoming people. Clean room with comfortable bed and very convenient location. I am definitely planning on going back!

This was the perfect place for my friend and I for our first trip to Sydney! The place looks exactly like the pictures and was as clean as a hotel room when we arrived! Angela was very accommodating and even provided some basic foodstuffs for us in the fridge when we arrived. 

You could not ask for a better location staying here. It's only a few blocks to Darling Harbour and a short walk to The Rocks and Circular Quay. It was easily accessible and we had no issues throughout our time staying there. I highly recommend this studio and would definitely stay here again!
Belinda was a great host. The place is very clean and location is beautiful, peaceful and very convenient.
This is incredibly well positioned and close to everything! Little bit of noise from construction but that can’t be helped. Clean place and well appointed.

Paul and Judith are lovely people and wonderful hosts. I stayed for a month and they were very kind and helpful and we became good friends. The house is in a great location being near useful bus routes, supermarkets and restaurants. The accommodation is excellent value for money. I would recommend it for any length of stay. Be aware that the bathroom is on the floor below. The room is large  with a bed, reading lights,lots of cupboards and a hanging rail. .The park outside is lovely but occasionally you can get people talking there late into the night, so make sure you have earplugs.
David’s place was very good
Gorgeous place and amazing host!
Lovely little house in a quiet suburb. The house looks directly into their own home which I did not realise when booking. Apartment is small but enough for a 1 night stay.

Simon and Nicole were very helpful throughout our stay. They were on hand to help at all times and addressed our needs without any issues.The apartment was as described, nicely renovated and maintained in a nice, quiet, easy to access building. It had everything we needed and more. Surry Hills is a great area close to all attractions in the city but away from the noise and hustle, cafes and restaurants are a short walking distance making it an area ideal for all purposes.
Nice quiet relaxing home

Great cozy cottage stay! The studio is within a garden which gives a great leafy outlook. Belinda was a very welcoming host. We took her recommendations and went on a beautiful coastal walk- within the Royal National Park. The studio is also walking distance from the beach and the Cronulla ferry.
All in all it was a great get-away!

From the warmest of welcomes and first moment you enter Angela & Geoff’s home, you instantly realise that you are about experience a very unique property and enjoy all the creature comforts that make their home feel as if it is yours. 

Each element of how the property caters for you is well thought out beyond your expectations, notwithstanding how serene its surrounds are and proximity it is to town, beach and coastal views. A return visit is already on the cards!
Jennifer was there to meet us and was very helpful . I loved staying at her house .
Amazing decor

Craige & Leonies place was great - super close to shops and bars and of course the beach! They were great at responding and check in and out was so easy! We had booked thinking we had a whole apartment rather than just one room in a house - but we still had plenty of privacy. Thanks again!

A cozy space situated in the heart of the city, the apartment was a great place to stay in. The apartment was well set up for my four day stay, reasonably quiet, and was close enough to restaurants and public transport.

Mohit ist ein sehr netter Gastgeber, allerdings kamen Antworten auf Fragen zumeist mit einiger Verzögerung. Die Wohnung ist schön gelegen, zwischen Flughafen und Zentrum, so dass beide gut erreichbar waren. Die Wohnung selbst bietet viel Platz, erstreckt sich über 2 Etagen und ist schön und praktisch eingerichtet, mit eigenem Parkplatz. Leider waren die Bäder nicht top sauber. Dennoch empfehlenswert.

Anne was extremely generous and helpful, and a wonderful host.  The apartment is lovely, light and bright with everything I needed, and more, such as a very comfortable bed and a great shower.  Lots of morning sunshine and night-time ocean waves - my favourite go-to-sleep sound!  And exactly as the description says, it's just a few minutes easy stroll to the beach which is fabulous, even in the middle of winter.  The neighbourhood was peaceful with cafes and shops only 5 minutes away.  I absolutely loved my time at Neiafu and Newport, and can't wait to return.  Thank you so much Anne.
The apartment was very nice with an amazing view over north Sydney and the Harbour bridge. The apartment is perfect for 3 or 4 people and has everything you need.
Perfect spot for a getaway. Wouldn't stay elsewhere in Bundeena.

We booked Jeremy's lovely property as an offsite location for a work project. Jeremy was very friendly and professional and also extremely responsive - he replied to all of my messages immediately. This place has a lot of character and is in a great location for anybody visiting Sydney for the first time. Thanks again Jeremy!

Unbelievable location.  Only one block from Hyde Park and close to all public transportation.  The house was modern, clean, and had plenty of space for all six of us.  We really appreciated that each bedroom had their own bathroom.

There are no words to describe how perfect this property was for our needs and for how amazing Heidi was in accommodating our request. Heidi bent over backwards to make the property available to us even though it meant she and her family had to change their plans to vacate the property. 

The location and size of the house plus all the extras were a perfect fit for us. We needed a place where family could come together - from Spain, Bangladesh, Melbourne, Albury, Gundaroo and Canberra - for a funeral and Heidi's place was like coming home. 

On the one night when everyone was staying over, the house easily slept 9 adults and 3 children. It was great having access to 3 bathrooms. Off road parking and great relaxing options both inside and outside. The pool and spa and trampoline and cubby house were the icing on the cake. 

Thank you a million times over for your generosity Heidi - it made a world of difference to all of us.
Would highly recommend, Rob and his place were both Great!
Very spacious apartment with a huge TV in the living room and v comfortable beds :)

Alison immediately replied to my booking request and organised for her hubby to meet me as I was checking in late.

They were very helpful and gave me a bus card to use. The room was very spacious and the house was close to transport and restaurants.

Excellent hosts in an excellent location.

The apartment was lovely, comfortable and quiet. 5 min walk to Mosman village where all the shops/cafes/restaurants are. Beautiful Balmoral is only a 15-20 min walk (5 min drive) and the Sydney CBD is easily accessible by ferry or bus. Communications with Mags was really easy.

This place was in an awesome location and looks just like the pictures!  the kitchen was well equipped and it was great having a washer/dryer too.
We felt very safe there and were within walking distance to everything!
our host made us feel very welcome and we would recommend this to other travelers for sure!

The location of the property was perfect, close to everything and nice quiet area. There is no air-conditioning system in the house, and the host provided fans but that did not do the job as the house got really hot and we all struggled to sleep at night. The 2 occasional chairs in the living room was an interesting design and slants to the front so was very uncomfortable - we were 6 adults and the living room furniture couldn't accommodate was all comfortably.

To future customers you can expect clean towels ready to use, basic toiletries provided, laundry machine and dryer, cutlery, dishwasher and utensils. The hosts are very friendly and attentive to your needs.

Susan was nice and explain the vehicle network in very detail. Although we have not much communication but i can feel Susan is willing to talk. I may visit back to Susan place when i visit Sydney next time.
Impressive old home in a great location. The design of the bathroom, view of the pool and massive art collection was a bit of a luxury for us. The eclectic space made us feel at home.
A great cheap stay for one
房東很親切. 地點方便, 鄰近有很多小商店及餐廳, 近火車站

I have stayed at a lot of Airbnbs over the past year or so, and Naveen's place was definitely the most special. The apartment itself was lovely, modern, great décor, awesome building w/ a pool and gym, etc. The location is also superb, super easy to get to the CBD and plenty of bars and restaurants and shopping close by. Most importantly, Naveen and Tristan are just the loveliest hosts, so gracious and inclusive, and I genuinely felt welcome in their home. Their puppy is really cute too :)
great, stylish little place to wake up in. quiet yet central location in Sydney. :)
there's more place for improvement

It's a very nice apartment. It's in the CBD, so it can be a bit noisy, especially as there's construction on the building over. The host is very timely with communication and actually went above & beyond to help me.

The room was really nice and tidy, and so was the kitchen. It was super convenient to get to the city centre as the trains in Sydney are really frequent and fast! 
Things to improve: I would say the mattress on the floor (3rd bed) got pretty uncomfortable after the 3rd night - especially because the blanket was so thin. The toilet got a bit messy since it was a shared bathroom (but this was due to the fault of the other guests, not the host). 
Overall, however, it was a great stay! We had a lot of fun in Sydney, and the accommodation was good :)

The amenities are excellent and Jenny is a thoughtful, helpful and very welcoming host. There are all the things you needed,  a real home from home, even beach towels, picnic bag and some food in the fridge for tired travellers. The location is excellent - just a couple of minutes from the beach.  Excellent value for money.

Three old friends arrived to share Jennifer's house for 5 days. On arrival Jennifer was there to greet us. She showed us around her beautiful house, had left us information about the local area and lots of travel pamphlets. She also invited us to use anything she had left in the fridge. This was really helpful as when you fly you don't bring any extra food etc. She had also left a bottle of wine and chocolates for us to munch on. The house was immaculately clean and beautifully decorated. The backyard was also great to look out onto and had the weather been better would have been beautiful to sit out in. The house is even better that the great photo's Jennifer has supplied to Air bnb. We spent an entire day exploring the area around Balmain and found lots of interesting places to visit. We felt very safe in that area and on 2 nights we returned to the house quite late after being out exploring all day. I have no hesitation in recommending this beautiful house to anyone and I guarantee you will not be disappointed.
Everything was perfect and clean

Perfect place to rest after a trip to the blue moutains before heading back to
Sydney! It has everything you need from TV, wifi to kitchen and laundry facilities. It's very clean and new and it has got quite enough space to accommodate 2 to 5 people.
This was a great place to stay. We spent a weekend here with two kids (under 12) so we could make an easy day trip to the Blue Mountains. Clean, private and secure.
Great value, nice touches including a beer in the fridge! No hassle stay
Sehr sauber, ruhig und komfortabel. Und nah beim internationalen Flughafenterminal. Ich habe mich wohl gefühlt und war sehr zufrieden.
Great house and great host!

The studio is very comfortable, clean,
private and easy to check in. 

The location is great, an easy walk to Bronte Beach and Vivian even provided beach towels to use. 

It was a great please spend a weekend in Sydney and would happily stay again
Such a nice apartment , great location close to the starion . Great communication with the host .
The place was in a great location and is good value.

Paul was an excellent host who communicated well with us. Unfortunately he is not based in Australia and his local contact Wendy, the cleaner, was unhelpful and caused us to lose the first day of our holiday. The lock on the front door broke on the first afternoon and she originally said she couldn't get someone until after 6pm the following day. Thus we had to babysit the flat all afternoon and evening as we couldn't lock the door. We eventually got in contact with Paul who agreed to call an emergency locksmith. The locksmith didn't arrive until around 7.30pm, and it took until almost 8pm to fix the problem which Wendy was alerted to before 1.30pm. 

Additionally, Wendy agreed to watch the flat for us when the problem first occurred so we could get lunch. We picked up takeaway so as to return quickly but found her walking down the street two blocks away on our way back. The flat had been left unattended, unlocked, and with the door slightly ajar. This was completely unacceptable after having promised to stay and watch our belongings and Paul's flat. 

Overall, the apartment was decent. It is in an excellent location with just a 30 minute walk to the Opera House through the beautiful botanic gardens, and lots of cool cafes and restaurants on the street and nearby. The apartment has the potential to be great however it is not currently being maintained adequately, with some broken window locks, burnt out lights, and mould in the shower. Having had a bad experience with Wendy we did not contact her again during our stay and instead put up with these issues. Again, Paul was very helpful and did everything he could to help us. We did love staying in the area and would do so again, and hope that Paul is able to get a better cleaner/local contact in the future.

Fantastic. The apartment was perfect, so glad we booked this apartment. Bernadette was warm and welcoming having everything set out for us. You can tell that care was taking to have everything clean and ready for our arrival. All the kitchen basics and bathroom essentials like shampoo were provided. Even an extra yummy treat on arrival.  Great relaxing location in a relaxed neighborhood. I'm sure we will be back

The moment you enter this Airbnb you realize this is a host who cares.  Chocolate on the coffee table, cold water in the fridge, cereal on the shelf, and roses in the bedroom greeted us.  Nine floors up you can hear the street noise but the bedroom is surprisingly quiet.  The location is near the metro and walkable to the waterfront.  This home and its location were perfect for our 6 night stay.  Would happily return on our next trip to Sydney.

Very nice place to stay with great equipment like comfy sofa and beds, large TV, climate control etc. It takes some time to the central (20-30min iirc) but otherwise the location is good with a shop close by and bus stations around the block. Late sleepers might get woken up early by the sun if you wake up easily. The welcome was lovely and otherwise the communication was great. We enjoyed the stay!
All rite

Naveen and Tristan were absolutely amazing hosts. Very helpful and understanding, I get my bearings in this new city very quickly thanks to them. Their place is also so nice and next to everything! Not to forget the BBQ we had on the terrace ! I really enjoyed my stay and I wish we'll have the opportunity to meet again !

Couldn't have asked for a better host than Miss D! Friendly, full of information and speedy response all the time.. 

Great place to get a good feel of Newtown.. Super close to the train station and plenty of food... Cafe options around.

Would definitely return to Newtown again! Thanks for everything Miss D :) till next time !

Julia's place sits in a great location with a short walk to everything you'll need. Communication was prompt and the self check in process easy. There was everything I needed for the couple of days I was there and I'd definitely stay there again.
Gayles place is like her, amazing place amazing person. So relaxed and laid back. Thanks
Convenient location to shops. Taronga Zoo and Balmoral Beach are a short drive away. Rachel's pictures are an accurate depiction of the residence. Our family enjoyed our three night stay.

A lovely little home tucked in the bush. This is one place in a battle axe street, meaning there are a couple of houses nestled into a hill in the bush. We stayed within the Avalon beach area, which is literally a three minute drive from the accomodation. There's a fantastic French restaurant and bakery close by and the breath-taking beach with a little ocean pool where you can do laps to burn off the croissants.

The house is well-stocked with tea, vegemite, pots, pans etc. Beds were comfortable and there were bathrobes to strut around in.  

We went at the start of winter and the place had enough heaters to keep it cosy.
The apartment is very well located, you can walk to some main attractions, close to public transport and places to eat. Oliver and Hugo very good hosts.
Amazing stay
Great location and very clean and tidy - probably ready for a kitchen and bathroom upgrade!

The host was very welcoming and communicative during the whole stay. The apartment location was excellent, really close to supermarkets and a train station. There was unfortunately alot of noise (construction), lack of basic toiletries and the spa was closed when we were there.

Jenny was a superb host and everything about the accommodation was excellent.  Situated in a prime beach location ideal for all beach lovers, early morning swims and evening walks are at your doorstep.  

A great comfortable bed, air conditioning and a great fan for warm nights made this stay comfortable.  

The living area is light and spacious, the bedroom was great with storage options, and it has a really good shower within a small bathroom. 

The stay was great and we will be returning in the future.
Great stay, great communication. Very much appreciated guys :)
Location is very convenience. Big dining room. Unfortunately, there isn't internet service.

lovely host, lovely house and lovely puppy~~
great geographic position and adequate sunshine~~

Fantastic apartment, super hosts and very friendly dog. The flat is well positioned for access to the trains and buses making travel to CBD easy yet far enough out of the hussle and noise for a quiet mooch around Darlinghurst and Woolamooloo.
Unbelievable value, great facilities with stunning views to boot.
There’s a short cut to walk from Central Station. Will be good to find the way thru the tunnel of the station

We had one amazing stay at Cathy's. The host is incredibly mindful, making sure everything is available for the guests. Location was super practical, the room was clean and Cathy was lovely! She was very helpful giving us tips on where to go, and made us feel very welcome.

Beautiful house in a great location, easy to walk into city or the light rail is only a five minute walk from the house. Bill was very accommodating as we arrived two hours earlier than expected (party of six). Also let us stay longer than normal checkout time. Everything you need for your stay is detailed in the house manual, bill also took the time to show us around explaining the workings of the house. Only issue for us (Scottish folk) was we couldn’t open any of the windows as no fly screens, maybe not a problem for others though. Would recommend staying here.

the place was so nice with a beautiful view. I did my wedding's Chinese tea ceremony there. Nicole was a great host. Without her understanding and support, wedding wouldn't go as smoothly. I highly recommend the place.:)
We continue to chose to stay here because Susan is so caring and thoughtful. Everything is taken care of and all the extras like the tea selection, the chocolate and the fruit are lovely

Would highly recommend this place!! It’s in the center of Manly, 2 min to the beach, shops and wharf from where you can catch the ferry if you want to go to the city. Very clean as well which is one of the most important things for me. Very nice balcony as well. Thank you, Ziggy!

Tracey’s place is wonderful! It is very modern and stylish yet cozy. Everything was sparkling clean and there was a lovely little selection of tea, coffee, breakfast foods etc. There is even a thoughtful guide with local restaurants and shops. I definitely recommend Tracey’s place and plan to stay there again.
The flat is near KingsCrossStation. Supermarket and Restaurants are near. The Host helps to enjoy the stay.

Brendan's spot is absolutely a DREAM! Just steps away from the beach, 333 bus line that goes to bondi junction toward the city, and tons of hip cafes that Bondi has to offer. Not to mention, Brendan is an extremely kind host. Our schedules didn't match up so I barely saw him, but it was lovely to meet him. Reviews talk about a big hill, which really isn't that big, so don't be deterred because of that. THANK YOU BRENDAN!

Min was quick to respond even though I booked less than 24 hrs ahead. Room was bigger than I expected and clean. Min's parents showed me the room and they were very polite. Overall a very pleasant experience and great value for money.
It was super easy to get to places and we loved walking over the bridge every day.
Really nice place to stay in and also very fast replies from Ali! Thank you for your help!

Thank you Marcella for this lovely home. We so enjoyed our visit. Your description of the house and area was perfect and your attention to detail in all the instructions was outstanding. I would highly recommend your place. Thank you also for being so quick to get back to me each time I contacted you and for your flexibility. A huge thank you again
Great location. Peaceful, perfect for relaxing. Great cafe's and coffee close by. Would definitely return.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I nice tidy unit. However, if travelling in winter, just check if a heater is being provided as it gets very cold.
Also, if you need a car space, maybe ask if one can be blocked off or reserved for you, as the tenants take up all of the visitor spaces.
the appartment was very clean and pretty. Location was absolutely perfect;  not in the center of the city but close enough!

Simone's house was perfect. She was a flexible and excellent host. Super close to town and extensive bus network. I almost didn't want to leave a great review in case other people want to book the place and I can't book it next time I'm in town! Thanks!
Everything is good, but there’s a little bugs in the kitchen. Tam is super nice, maybe next time we visit Sydney will choose the same house again!!

Brendan is very thoughtful and also a great host who cares about your convenience, safety, and basically everything! He provided a lot of travel information and planned an itinerary for my short trip. His house is very clean and tidy! We feel very comfortable during the stay. We have a good talk too! Thanks again Brendan.
Beautiful place and a wonderful host - a home away from home. I've already booked my next stay and now consider myself a regular!
Xiaowen was very accommodating to my request of an early check in. The space is great and everything you need for a short stay.

Great location, close to cool old pubs and bars and you can walk to Darling harbour, etc. 
Nice and new and clean inside, perhaps a bit dark though. 
Comfy bed, we slept well. 
Not much privacy when you open the door/ window for fresh air as you are right on the street, people can see straight in.
You are told to take all your rubbish with you on departure, which is a little inconvenient.
Great Appartement which is good to reach by public transport. We really enjoyed our stay!

Beautiful beachside studio with gorgeous views of Bondi beach.  Steps from icebergs, restaurants, bars, and waves!  Couldn’t have asked for a better stay and would definitely recommend it! Lots of thoughtful little touches by the host, including sunscreen and aloe for those who want to spend a lot of time at the beach!
Perfect in every way. Definitely my favorite place to stay for my regular work trips to Sydney.

Location very close to Central station makes everything in Sydney accessible. The restaurants and bars on crown street were perfect because we could relax close to home after a long day of site seeing. I would recommend this to anyone who likes living in a city and being a little outside of the tourist CBD. The apartment had everything we needed for a week long stay.

The apartment is in the middle of everything in Sydney, full of dining and shopping options, close to transportation and excursion stops. We have small children and they very much enjoyed the area, as well as the apartment itself. The apartment is very clean, pleasant, and amenities for travellars are all ready to be used. Sabrina answered all of our questions promptly. Thanks so much!

Maria and her family are lovely, really like the style of house and bedroom is really comfortable.
Felt right at home.

Hi stayed with Hernan 4 nights. Hernan was an excellent host very friendly and helpful. His home was lovely and good location to chill.  The next time i come to sydney i will definitely contact Hernan to stay again.  Cheers jas from spain

My stay at this beatutiful home was memorable & exactly what I needed. The house reflected the way the pictures looked and the room was spacious and very comfortable & also secure. 
Paddinton was a lovely suburb with friendly people & great shopping, food, cafe's and bars.
Arnie & Lorraine were welcoming & even though I didn't meet Arnie until day 3 I felt at home and welcomed based on the energy & peace in the home.  Thank you!  I will definitely be back again in the future! Tiffany
Great location

Nice appartment and good localisation to visit Sydney.
Good adress to stay.

A very cozy place at a convenient location. Host is very responsive and considerate. We were allowed to check in early and there are helpful tips and travel books in the apartment for guests that are here for sightseeing.

The only thing we struggled a bit was the noise from the main road which could be challenging for light sleepers like myself.

Overall we had a good stay and would like to thank Paul for hosting us.
Hayley & Jack were very welcoming and friendly. The location was great, comfortable room and clean bathroom. Would highly recommend and stay again if we were in Sydney.
Great host in a great location. Sam is extremely kind and hospitable and the house is sparkling clean!

We spent a week in Tamarama and it was wonderful ! The appartment is really nice and ideally located with a stunning view on the ocean. It was so good to wake up in the morning and to hear the swell ! On top of that,  Wayne's organization has been perfect and everything worked well.  If we return to Sydney one day, which I hope, we'll definitely come back to Wayne and Kate's place !

Thanks so much
Pierre
멋진 숙소입니다. 깔끔하고 한적해서 묵기 편했습니다.

Cute little apartment, with a great lounge room to relax in after a long day exploring the city.  Very beautifully decorated. Extremely close to transport links and in easy walking distance to many tourist locations, as well as great bars and restaurants nearby. Everything you could want in a little Sydney apartment!
Amazing central location right near manly wharf. Spacious apartment with lots of facilities including washing machine and dryer. Comfortable beds. Was great base for our stay with a four year old

I love this little sanctuary. This was my second stay and it was just as lovely as the first. Belinda is a friendly and gracious host - easy communication, lovely welcome. The garden studio is delightful - immaculate and beautifully and comfortably furnished, it has everything you could need. Love sitting on the little deck with my book and a glass of wine! 
Great location close to beaches and bush walks. Peaceful, private, secure.

J'ai passé un séjour agréable chez Duncan. La chambre est très confortable et la résidence est proche des transports pour un accès facile au centre-ville. Je n'ai pas passé beaucoup de temps avec les hôtes parce que nous étions tous très occupés mais ce sont des personnes adorables et qui font en sorte de rendre le séjour très agréable. Merci à eux !
Every thing was good, we asked for a latter check out and she had no problem!
Hernan was a great host with a warm and welcoming home. It was a clean and comfortable experience and would recommend to any travelers looking for a place to stay in Sydney. Thanks hernan!
Great location, nicely decorated. Very responsive host. Thank you Paul!
Clean and comfortable and a great host!

For a girls weekend away we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Hilde was very welcoming and obviously takes a lot of pride in providing a place that is comfortable, inviting and clean. She has great attention to detail, the house had everything we needed, good aircon for the summer and a well set up kitchen which made cooking a BBQ easy. Hilde provided us with a lovely breakfast with delicious home made bread, jams, muesli and tea and coffee. The house is in a great location within easy walking distance from the beach and shops. 
Thanks very much for having us Hilde!

Linda's apartment is tidy and located near CBD and transportation to everywhere. Linda is nice and ready to provide help anytime. The apartment provide anything you need during the stay. I will recommend to friends definitely.

This is as advertised, very clean, large, close to bus and with a lovely water view. I especially enjoyed swimming in the free, saltwater rock pool only two minutes away. I even ventured a swim across the bay and back on a calm water day. We both loved listening to the ocean waves for a week!Very quiet neighbourhood as well. Highly recommend this to others. Be advised, it is a 1 hour bus ride to Sydney CBD.
We had a great stay at Mosman, beautiful house, great location, perfect. Thank you, will come again.

This apartment is in a perfect location for exploring Sydney. The place is stylish, decently quiet for the busy location (as mentioned in other reviews), and well equipped. The kitchen was very functional and supermarkets are within a few minutes walk.
Great location, safe, simple but everything you need!
Great communication. Fantastic location. Super easy check in. Old apartment. Good value.

We stayed 1 Night in Miss D.s lovely Appartement. The House is easy to reach and close to the Train Station. The Check in was easy and fast. Our Room was really nice furnished and really comfortable! Unfortunatly the room was a bit noisy at night because the window went towards the street. The shared kitchen and lounge were nice. all in all we had a really nice stay here.

Guests were very satisfied with the home and would stay there again.

Very impressed. Kirsty was very professional. I would recommend her home to anyone.
we LOVE staying at Franca & Alessio's place  - we're repeat customers!!
Awesome location, very clean and very kind host! Definitely recommended.
great space and easily accessible. Couldn't have asked for better after a late night at a wedding.

Interesting location worth exploring, stylish apartment with parking & also easy access to public transport.  Great hosts. 
Longer stay would have been better!
Amazing, brand new stylish studio, has everything you need & only minutes to shops and transport, lots of natural light, very comfy bed, highly recommend this stay.
Cosy room, nice and cool on a hot summer night. Lovely to wake up to the sound of birds. enjoyed the muesli  and yoghurt for breakfast. Plenty of walks around the neighborhood to the water.

It was the 3rd time we stayed at Kerri’s place and it was as perfect as the 1st time.
The room is nicely decorated and big enough for accommodate comfortably 2 people and the bathroom next door was for our private use only. 
Kerri is a very communicative and interesting person, always ready for a chat and a glass of wine on the terrace or in the large living area.
The apartment is well located, on walking distance from Stanmore train station, which is at about 20 min from CBD.
I would recommend this place without hesitation to anyone who is looking for a comfy stay in Sydney.

Great place to stay, great location!!!
The apartment was clean,cozy and had everything needed for a comfortable stay.
Jeremy was a very caring and helpful host.
I recommend Gracious Darlinghurst Terrace as a great place to explore Sydney!
Clean apartment in a great location. Owner was very helpful.
Beautiful, spacious, stylish accommodation. Everything that 5 adults needed in a great location. Perfect for us!

We had a wonderful stay at Elizabeth and Simon's home. Our hosts were most welcoming and helpful.  Their home is modern, stylish and beautifully looked after. Glebe itself is a vibrant place within easy access of the city centre. It has a village feel, with plenty of restaurants and bars (we ate there every night).  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Elizabeth's place and would definitely put it top on our places to stay when in Sydney.
Had a great stay! Thank you Michele

房主凡姐恰如其分的热情,有问必答｡我们到的早,12点不到就到了,应该是下午3点才可以入住,凡姐提前让我们摆放行李｡小黑也特别可爱,大家都抢着要抱他,来了就可以看到可爱的小黑啦!! (Website hidden by Airbnb) 房子的地理位置特别好,去达令港,歌剧院,皮特街都可以步行过去｡想买药妆的话,150米处就有一个,买蜂蜜和羊奶粉要开门就去｡这里的店关门都比较早,需要早点规划好｡想自己吃海鲜可以去鱼市场买了自己做,也可以直接在那里吃｡ 离悉尼大学很近,如果想托运什么到国内的话那边就有快递 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 屋子收拾的整洁干净,在悉尼这个寸土寸金的地方,有这么大的地方,交通便利,价格还这么优惠,真的太难得了!! (Website hidden by Airbnb) 谢谢凡姐请的冰淇淋,太好吃啦!!!
Great place to stay when traveling in Sydney. Convenient, quite,and room is clean.Yang responses very well.
Mohit made communication so easy and we had no problem communicating with him. The place is lovely and the balcony is a fantastic place to chill with friends/family. Will definitely be back again!

Wonderful spot!  You will not regret booking here!
Great host
Had great stay. The apartment is clean and stylish and very close to the beach. Would definitely recommend.
The house is great, easy to get into the city centre, Sydhenam station is just across the road.

Anitta's place was perfect for the 2 of us. Its walking distance to the beach and the tree line outside makes it feel so tropical. It's a close drive shops, beaches and CBD.
This place is highly recommended if you enjoy the beach life.
A very clean place with awesome air conditioning and wonderful location.

We had a fantastic mini break at Serena's apartment. It's a great location, very secure, nicely decorated, clean and very comfortable. Serena (and her mum, who kindly checked us in) was a very welcoming host, who was extremely responsive to any queries before and during our stay. It's right near kings cross, and we were there on the weekend, but no problems with noise, and we slept really well.

We had a great stay at Philips place. So nicely decorated, favourite space was the living and kitchen area. We loved that there was a bathroom with each of the bedrooms, even surprisingly a shower in the attic ! Location was great, surrounded by great food and not a far walk to Sydneys CBD. Philip was very accommodating on arrival and offered us a map with suggestions of things he likes to do around the city. Also very quick with responses with whatever we needed. Would definitely stay there again and recommend to anyone looking to stay somewhere great in Sydney :)
Nice apartment in a great location. Stairs are a bit tricky as place on 4 levels. Very good value though

Very poor condition, it is too old to stay . It is uncomfortable to use the bathroom at all . There r lots of messy stuff to put in the limited space . It was the bad experience to stay . And it is with long distance from railway station. There are too many rules and restrictions in this house . Bad feeling. The couple could not be able to enjoy nice sleeping because the bed made the much  noise .
A wonderful place and host. Cheers.
It’s a fantastic place for living! Not far away from the train station and shopping center. 10 mins from Chinatown.
Eleanor told me that it was a great place!
We loved our stay at Belinda's beautiful beach cottage. We have stayed before and will definitely stay again :) Thank you.
Wendy’s place was immaculate and stylish. Was perfect for a short stay and close to public transport and the city. Wendy’s communication was friendly and prompt. Would highly recommend.
This place was great. Only stayed a night but very clean and had everything I needed. Don was very helpful in showing me everything. Would recommend.
Recommend the place to anyone with large groups.
Great place, lovely hosts and close to Petersham station.

Absolutely fabulous apartment, fabulous location and a fabulous place for the Sydney experience.  Beautifully appointed apartment.  Very comfortable and everything catered for. Looked after extremely well by Luke

Mariana was a lovely host, met me with the keys and took the time to show me around the unit and how everything worked. The unit was sparklingly clean, the kitchen and bathroom are really nicely renovated and set out well. Although i stayed during a heat wave the fans kept me very comfortable. I’d definitely stay again.
Place was great - perfectly located. Would recommend and I will definitely book again
Our stay at Kath's place was wonderful! She was friendly and the room was clean and comfortable. The location was easily accessible to the train station as well.
This is a very cute apartment in a great location. Close to trains and only a 25 minute walk to the Botanic Gardens and the city. Would recommend!
Great house and location highly recommend

I had a great time in the two weeks spent with Konrad and Mish. Felt more like living with housemates than anything else. Konrad took me out on a few mountain bike trails bearing in mind I haven't rode a bike in years but that didn't deter him. Nice location and great company would highly recommend....just don't ask Konrad for his review on your food as you will get the review of an Australia Manu

Ziggy's place was clean, nicely furnished and had all the amenities and services I needed, with plenty of towels, bathroom items etc. The apartment was light and airy, with good facilities and a nice balcony. The location is excellent for everything Manly has to offer. Ziggy was well organised and friendly - an excellent host and I would have no hesitation in stopping here again.

Nicole was a great host. Always prompt with her responses and the apartment as well as the view was excellent. We'd like to thank Nicole for allowing us to stay the night whilst we prepared for the wedding.
Perfect place to stay a couple of days to visit Sydney ! Irene is an amazing host !
Leslie and her family were very welcoming and thoughtful, so many generous offers to ensure our stay was perfect which it was.

Pleasant, comfortable, spacious apartment. Clean and presentable. Bathroom towels are provided, bedrooms are nicely made up. Apartment owner fantastic for communication in the lead up to booking and confirming.  Apartment is welcoming and would recommend. Apartment is on first floor, so there is one flight of stairs to consider. While off-street parking is available, it may be a bit tricky to find as Rose Bay is a very popular area- keep in mind.

Cat's flat was ideal for our needs -- three generations visiting North Bondi together. Two bathrooms felt like luxury (as did the king size bed), and the flat was super convenient to great restaurants (Mamasan and Avila were both tasty in their own ways, and right around the corner) and the beach. Shopping and tasty gelato (our kids were staunch advocates for the Messina Gelato) were only a slight stone's throw further away on Hall St. 

Having coffee available in the morning was a particular treat (thank you again, Cat), and there were ample cookbooks to review if we had had the time to really use the kitchen. Communications with Cat were easy for checking in and out; we didn't need to trouble her during our visit because the replacement light bulbs were easy to find when one fixture burnt out. We would definitely consider staying here again.
Sarah was really nice and very accomodating. She greeted us as soon as we got to the place and gave us a quick tour . The place was really clean and quiet as well. Would recommend to other travelers.

We really enjoyed staying at Susan's. The hut we lived in was really comfortable and very clean. Susan is a very nice person and gave us all kind of information we might have needed for our stay in Sydney. She was very helpful with our other issues. Susan's place made our stay in Sydney a lot more comfortable and enjoyable!

This is our second time using an Airbnb venue.
The first was a brilliant experience and we were keen to try again. 
Unfortunately not so good the second time around.
The property read really well so we went ahead and booked. 
Location is great and we understand you pay a premium price for this.
The positives were that the beds weren’t the worst we have ever slept in.
The apartment is tired generally but as stated by the owner it’s someone’s home so we shouldn’t be too harsh. We do think though that when renting out for significant amounts then the basics of cleanliness and equipment that is not held together with masking tape should be standard.
Thanks anyway but perhaps we will stick to hotels in future so we don’t have to do the washing etc.
The flat is very central - it takes only a few minutes to the central train station! It was very clean and comfortable.

Serena's place is superbly located, pretty much across the road from King's Cross, a short walk into the CBD with easy access to public transport. We stayed for a weekend, and were lucky enough to be able to check in on the Friday morning, as there hadn't been anyone staying in the apartment the night before. Serena greeted us, gave us advice about the area, and had even made us a breakfast hamper complete with home made jam!

The apartment had everything we needed, and was very nicely decorated. The only down side was a fair bit of nighttime noise, as it is located in quite a happening area and we were there over the weekend. Luckily we're not particularly light sleepers so we were still able to sleep.

Overall it was a great weekend, and we would definitely stay there again.
It was a very comfy stay! Will definitely stay here next time.
So close to shopping centre / cheap eats and bus route. Clean; secure and would stay again. Thanks for the hospitality.
I would recommend Carol and Ian’s place to everyone
Couldn't fault this place, amazing location. Would definitely stay here again!

Very nice appartment at Malabar beach! We loved our stay.  The appartment is tidy, spacious and had everything we need for a stay. Nice details our the flowers, wine and TimTams! Communication with Bernadette went very well. I recommend this great place!
Great if you're going to Olympic park for a concert! It's easy to walk to Rhodes Stn or you can even catch a bus there. Lovely and scenic and really modern! Definitely worth the money :)

Perfekt gelegen, in wenigen Minuten zum öffentlichen Nahverkehr, Cafés etc., ruhig und doch mittendrin.
Tolle Tipps von David.
Absolutely stunning location!
Great Location and Amenities. Perfect for families or couples.

Linda's apartment is a cozy place where you feel at home. It has a great location, near train station and close to the city. Unfortunately we were there for only two days, but we would like to stay much more. Linda is very careful, left all instructions and worried about all the details for our comfort. We even had food available in the kitchen, which was extremely important in the early days of adaptation. We can only thanks and recommend Linda's place eyes closed.
Apartment is nice and clean, host is really friendly and helpful, I had a really good time with Hernan!
Super easy and pleasant owner, handy location
The place is perfect for us because it definitely accommodated more than 5 people. The place is clean and well presented. The neighbourhood is quiet too. Host Sarah responded to my enquiries.

Millie was a wonderful host. The studio was super clean and tidy, and had good wifi and a comfortable bed. Best of all, though, was the amazing view to enjoy from the little balcony. I will definitely recommend to friends.

We loved this home - so quiet and family friendly, yet so close to everything. We could walk to all the great beaches - Tamarama, Bronte and Bondi, and enjoyed having great shops and cafes just a couple of minute's walk away. Nicola's home is a lovely way to experience the best of Sydney life and she was great to deal with - super responsive and helpful with local information.
Very good and peaceful stay. Internet  Kitchen was up to the expectation.Thanks for a comfortable stay.

What an amazing spot! A great location, close to all that Bondi has to offer... I was hosting friends visiting from abroad and they'll now leave with some pretty special memories of this part of the world... 
Great communication from Mal made things simple and straight forward and he has plenty of local knowledge for first time visitors...
All in all a great stay...
