Lynne was great host. We locked our keys in and she was so helpful getting us back in. Great location in quiet street yet so close to the hub of bondi.
I really enjoy my stay here. Cindy’s house is really cozy and very comfortable. And both Cindy and Claudio are very nice person. I will live here again the next time I come to Sydney.
Linda is a great host very responsive in answering queries. Place looks tired and more scrubbing is required. Location is good but the neighbourhood is sketchy for family stay
Lovely unit- quiet and clean. Good place to stay to explore the northern beaches from. Had a great stay here and was easy to arrange how to access the place. Thanks for the great weekend!
Rachel's home is beautifully decorated and has a gorgeous outdoor sitting area. Walking distance from Mosman village cafes and restaurants.

Joanna and Ali's place is nicely located in the CBD and close to anything you need. The home is neatly kept and well presented. My interstate guest enjoyed the stay and any issue that came up was quickly looked after.
Clean and comfortable, really solid location, and great beds. What more could you ask for?
Made us very welcome, flexible and attentive,  very well appointed apartment in a fascinating area. Just what we had hoped for!
The place was great and exactly as described.  The location was great and Nicole was helpful in explaing the area upon our arrival. Would definitely stay here again if visiting Sydney again.

The location was great for our interests.  We literally walked everywhere we wanted to go and we got around.  There are so many great things to see near Mezzo's Studio.  Our check-in and check-out were easy and our requests were handled in a helpful and friendly manner.  I highly suggest this location and the price can't be beat!
Great quiet private cottage,in central location.Susan is a great host making our stay very pleasant.We would stay here again.

George and Lucia’s place was fantastic! Very thoughtful hosts, they went above and beyond to ensure my parents stay was enjoyable! The flat was perfect! Clean, actually spotless heaps of added extras! Highly recommend!!
Anita has a wonderful, comfortable place with a beautiful view. Highly recommend!

Nicole was able to meet us at the apartment to show us details about the use of keys and the security system and other provisions in the apartment.
The location was ideal for what we intended to do in Sydney being a short walk to Crown Street and it was near our family who we were visiting.  Transport to The Opera House and The Sydney Theatre Company was also an easy taxi ride.
The living and kitchen area in the apartment was spacious and light and airy, while the bedroom was discretely placed behind a wall divide. Even though the bathroom was on the small side, it was well equipped with hair dryer, soap, shampoo and all you would need for a short or longer stay. (We often want to do washing when we are away,  but not this time). The apartment was clean and tidy with a very comfortable lounge. There was a great deal of cupboard space in the bedroom as well.

Perfect location in a truly special house. The room was lovely and very clean;  and as quiet as confortable. Arnie was very arranging and helpful. We stayed a total of 3 nights. Paddington is a great area of Sydney, very central. You can go anywhere from here, the bus stop was very close.I would highly recommend anybody to stay here.

Vivian’s place was exactly as advertised. Well located, cosy yet spacious, comfortable, and with a lot of thoughtful extra touches. Perfect place to stay when you want to experience the most iconic beaches of Sydney.

Evelyn's place is perfect. The location is stunning, the unit is clean and modern. The pool was beautiful and the area was quiet. Evelyn took us in a short notice without hassle and it was exactly what we were hoping for and more. A beautiful spot with wonderful views. Perfect for a quiet weekend away surrounded by nature. Thanks for having us. Highly recommend.

A cute little get away, very well presented and lovely location. The train is unquie, with great features. Margaret was very hospitable, and thought of all the little touches. 
Thank you very much.

Cathy met us on arrival and made us feel comfortable. As we were arriving back after dark Cathy left an outside light on for us. Decor in the room was tasteful and we had an enjoyable overnight stay.  We really appreciated the very comfortable bed and bedding and the delicious continental breakfast. Car access was great and we parked right next to our room. The room was well fitted out with everything we needed. We will be back.

My wife and I were very fortunate to stay at Helena’s place as our first stop in Australia. Helena is very considerate. She welcomed us with fresh fruits, drinks, and chocolates which gave us a very warm feeling after a long flight from the U.S. The apartment was clean, roomy, and well equipped with all we need for a month’s long stay. Fast Wifi made our work efficient. Helena was extremely informative and responsive. Her place locates at an excellent location, in a quiet and very nice neighborhood. A very short walk to bus-stop and light-rail station took us to anywhere at Sydney. The apartment is within walking distance to lots of nice shops, eateries, water-fronts, Fish Market, Broadway Mall, and the University of Sydney.  We enjoyed the morning walks to the nearby bayside park and Saturday’s interesting Glebe Market. We highly recommend Helena’s place for a business/leisure stay.
Very clean and confortable. Nice view on the bay.
The place is perfectly located. We loved how easy it was to check-in.

Had a very enjoyable five night stay at Hernan's unit while in Sydney for a seminar. The room, while cosy, was well appointed with a queen sized bed, wardrobe, blinds and a chest of drawers and a desk which I appreciated. The unit also has a light living area and kitchen. As a host Hernan, who is Chilean, was well travelled, friendly and a good conversationist with good local knowledge. Coupled with the location near the beach, good restaurants and a bus to the train station the unit is good value for money. Would stay again.
Good place to stay and relax away from the city. The backyard is beautiful.

The house is well situated in a pleasant suburb taking only about 15-20 minutes to walk into Sydney and is also close to major bus routes for exploring further afield, as well as having shops and restaurants nearby. The house is quite spacious, and equipped with all the necessary appliances, including wifi, to make the stay most enjoyable. If the weather had been better during our holiday then we would have made more use of the balconies that provide impressive views of the city. The house was clean and tidy when we arrived and the entry instructions were quite clear. Jeremy was very accommodating by arranging an early check in and  late check out.
Cath's studio is really lovely.  A cozy set-up with everything you need plus some very kind considerations from Cath in the hamper.  I would certainly stay there again.

Staying with Kerri was my first airbnb experience and it could not have been better. Right from the moment I made the reservation, Kerri welcomed me with an offer of directions, which as it turned out I didn't need as her place was very easy to find. The apartment is beautiful and comfortable with much attention to detail. I was given a great bedroom with a very comfy bed and had my own beautifully appointed private bathroom. The place had the feel of a five star hotel, but with the added bonus of Kerri's friendliness. Immediately downstairs is a very cool cafe serving awesome breakfasts, so I ended up passing up the generous continental style breakfast that Kerri had offered me. The apartment location is perfect, as just down the road is the lively area of Newtown with its many bars and restaurants. I highly recommend staying with Kerri and look forward myself to staying there again in the future.
Excellent location. Short walk to beach and cafes/shops. Perfect for a wkd away. Very welcoming hosts.

Very friendly host with a beautiful apartment surrounded by a nice garden and lovely neighborhood. Host even prepared a bottle of wine and some stuff to eat for us! He also has a nice cat! Thanks again!
George and Lucia are great host! everything is perfect and more than we expected
Thanks a ton for a wonderful stay. The amenities you guys offered were amazing. In short, it was a home away from a home!! Highly recommended to everyone!
Great location very comfortable studio apartment with a quality finish.
Athena’s place is great. Very clean and well located. Would return for sure. Check in was a breeze!

Wayne and Kate made us feel incredibly welcome even before we arrived. They were very helpful giving us great advice on surfboard hire and local eateries which were easily accessible in this beautiful neighbourhood. The apartment itself lived up to all our expectations. It was light-filled, clean, warm and welcoming with stunning views and provided ample space for the 6 of us (two grandparents, us and our two kids) to relax. Going to sleep with the sound of the surf was so restful and the beds really comfy. And the chocolates and sparkling were a lovely touch! Thanks Wayne and Kate. We loved our stay and would definitely return.

It's a convenient one bedroom apt for one person, if you don't need wifi (which is rare and unbelievable), neither a long and relaxing hot bath (there's prob with hot water, I kept it low to avoid running out of hot water at the end of my shower), nor a quiet sleep in the morning (massive noise in the neighborhood due to tram construction). This apt is all about location in the city.
A lovely home away from home. Great host. Perfect location.
Friendly host, great location

Great apartment for business travelers. Short walk to where my trade show was being held. I would happily stay here again, Nicole was a helpful and friendly host who even accommodated an early check in.

Great apartment in a fantastic location. Space is ample for three people and is spotlessly clean. Beds comfy with nice linen. Good communication and super easy check in/check out.
Walk to everything - no car necessary.
Would definitely stay here again.

Stayed at Sabrina's place for almost a week.  As I need to checked in early due to young kids, Sabrina was helpful in granting early check-in :) 
The place was neat and clean upon check-in. Initially there was only one heater and request to have extra heaters were met on the same day. Sabrina bought two new heaters and I am very thankful for that.  Another good thing that happened was the new wifi installed ;) 
Location wise is very good. Minutes walk to Darling Harbour and the Central Station Light Rail. Bus 389 is round the corner to take you to the Sydney CBD which is only one stop away. 
Generally we enjoyed Sabrina's place and will go back again.

Das Apartment von Simon und Nicole ist wunderschön eingerichtet und gut gepflegt. Es war sehr sauber und super ausgestattet. Die Lage in Surry Hills, in der Nähe der Central Station, haben wir sehr genossen. Leider haben wir Nicole nicht persönlich zur Schlüsselübergabe antreffen können, sie hat aber eine gute Alternative für uns organisiert. Die Kommunikation mit Nicole verlief einwandfrei und immer sehr schnell. Gerne wieder!

Jeremy’s place was a great stay in the heart of the city. Lovely terrace apartment, easy check in!
Would stay again!

We’re very satistied with Linda’s Apartment. It was clean, with the very complete kitchen tools, utensil, and assorted teas. Linda provide a good goods and services. The apartment is the same as the pictures, within walking distances to the Redfern station, and she is responding very quicky to our questions. Highly recommended for travellers coming to Sydney.

Duncan and Ashlee are perfect AirBnb hosts - their place is lovely and nothing was too much trouble. Their apartment is located very close to the city - just a quick bus trip. Highly recommend staying here if you are in Sydney!
Great house ! highly recommend.

This is a very basic room in the downstairs apartment of a nice home. It's very no-frills, but for the price, hard to beat. When they say walking distance to the airport, they mean it, it's about 15 minutes on mostly bike path and you're at the terminal. I wouldn't spend a long holiday here, but for someone needing a quick, cheap place to lay your head down for an evening before an early flight, it's hard to beat.
Amazing location
Das Zimmer und das Badezimmer waren sauber, auch die Küche sah sehr gepflegt aus. Trotz unserer späten Ankunft hat alles super geklappt

Nice place, very close to Rose Bay (5 mins walk) where you can easily hop on the ferries. You can find some small shops nearby for almost everything you need. Also, Shaun's hospitality was the best and he was more than willing to help and explain how to get around the city!
This is a lovely value for money.Really cozy place to stay at
Great place, stayed several  times now!
Great location, good sized flat & very good host offering clear instructions & help. Would stay again
It was exactly as I'd expected, because I knew the place well. Spotless. Quiet. Nicely decked out.
Wonderful place. Perfect for a stay for large group of people and a nice homely fee. Highly recommend!
Very welcoming, friendly and attentive. Nice neighbourhood quite and very leafy and green. Relaxed environment.
Great little unit. Close to everything.

Had a very comfortable stay at Heidi's place. Good central location, close to some great Lebanese restaurants on Rocky Point Rd and handy to Brighton cafes. Comfortable beds and good linens. Bathrooms are lovely. Would recommend for a family trip and would stay again. Thanks Heidi!
Fantastic place in a great spot. Couldn't recommend more highly.
It was really nice stay. Room was really nice and very cosy. Everything was perfect. Cindy is very friendly and helpful host. Probably, my best experience of AirBnb so far.
perfect host and room for me.

Susan is an awesome host. I had many laughs and stimulating conversations. Her cabin was fantastic value. Her breakfast selection was greatly appreciated. A great neighborhood of Sydney with Norton Street nearby. Thanks Susan !

Très bon logement, tranquille situé juste à côté de l'aéroport 
Très bien
Cool house, good location, nice people, would stay again, thanks!

Kerri’s place and Kerrie are special, even better than the pictures.  I selected Kerri’s accommodation for ease of commuting by train and the beautiful décor.  I balked at the prospect of hauling all my luggage up a slight hill to her place, and Kerri cheerfully was at the Petersham station in 5 minutes on a Saturday afternoon to drive me to her apartment.  I found the Stanmore Station (less than a 15 minute walk past some nice houses) easier, and walked it at night and felt safe.  I was at Kerri’s for a demanding conference, and being at her place was like a relaxing resort.  The home ambiance is so beautiful and the plant and sun make it a very special home away from home.  Some of the memorable touches:  really soft sheets, a well-appointed private bathroom, a friendly cat, the self-serve breakfast of fruit/cereal/yogurt laid out in the morning (one morning she left eggs and a tomato with a pan and spatula too), the plants and view from the veranda where I ate and read, and the lovely decorations from her travels.  There’s also a nice, upscale grocery just down the street.  We didn’t see too much of each other, and the lengthiest time we spent was when Kerri generously took me to my rental car office in Mascot near the airport.   Kerri’s friendly and adaptable when you have odd plans like I did.  It was a treat to stay here!

Millie's place is in a great location close to north Sydney, walking distance to the bridge, with a nice view of the bridge from the balcony. Millie is a thoughtful and generous host who was so easy to communicate with, and I would definitely stay here again.
Great location and lovely hosts.
Great thanks lace close to both beaches good price would stay here again

Excellent location and good value for money. Not the cheapest place but it was well worth the cost - nice little extras eg. milk were waiting for us in the fridge which was a great touch! The balcony and view is lovely!
很干净,结构布局都很喜欢,如果check in的时间能在灵活一点就好了

Hernan was fantastic, he answered any questions I had and gave great advice. Goes out of his way to help you. His home was just as described, perfect!! Great location, 2 minute walk to the bus stop and beach. Thanks for everything Hernan, especially the aquarium!

Jenny is the most ideal host and that's  because she's just a lovely human being. Everything was most ideal. Being completely new to Airbnb myself I felt safe and comfortable. Is there anything more you'd want?
Good places to stay, the one issue that arose was dealt with quickly & effectively. Would stay again.

Our family of 4 had fantastic time staying at Sarah’s stylish place with  harbor view! We could not wish for a better place for New Year’s Eve. 3 minutes walk from the major transport hub, close to the CBD  and Bondi beach. Sarah was a great host who looked after us and made sure we were very comfortable. Super fast communication, clean place, fast WiFi, much more! Thank you Sarah for being our host!  Highly recommended.

Great place, location and room. Fiona was a great host and she also let us use a tv room in the second floor. Room and bathroom were clean and we had everything we needed. She provided guidance on public transport and places to visit. Jackson, her dog, is lovely and very calm. We definitely recommend this. place.
A lovely, clean and conveniently located apartment, well appointed and communication with Max and Su was exceptional. A few broken item items that can be easily fixed would have made my visit 5 star.
Very good location, walking distance to the beach. Great communication with Shiki.

Naveen and Triston were lovely hosts.  Phil and I enjoyed their place and their company, especially dinner at the Metropole.  They are good company and easy conversationalists.  We traded many enjoyable travel stories and their kavoodle "felix" is also a delight.  It took us only 25 minutes to leisurely walk to the City from their apartment.  Our room had a huge window view and own bathroom.  The pool and gym are right next to their apartment - very handy.

Mike is one of the most easy going guys ever and immediately makes you feel at home! He is all to happy to let you into his world and introduce you to the cool places to go, things to see and his love for art, music and culture definitely shines through with the tasteful art-deco furniture he has in his flat. The flat is in a great location to explore Sydney and the Potts Point scene and minutes from Kings X. I had a wonderful time during my stay there and made a friend for life!
Wonderful stay in a beautiful location.  We will definitely be returning thank you Fred & Bernadette xx
房间很好,超级干净｡洗手间也很漂亮｡房东人超nice,送了我们草莓和牛奶｡但是隔音不是很好,而且冬天住的话有点冷,暖气是整个房子的,关上房间门就没有暖气了｡

This is a lovely little place for a night away. The cabin has everything you could possibly  need - a bed, sofa, dining table, tv and shower. All put together in a small but aesthetically pleasing cabin. Really appreciated that fresh milk was provided plus tea and coffee and very tasty muesli. It has very quite location  and perfectly situated  for launching a kayak ( across the road). Also 10 minutes walk from the Clareville kiosk for that special meal.

Angela’s place could not have been more perfect for our stay. Private, quiet, clean and beautiful! The amenities are amazing, everything from bathroom products to beach chairs, towels, and beautiful bread, fruit, cheeses and champagne for our arrival. This place is a rare find in Avalon!

Apartment is in excellent location- 2 min walking distance to Darling harbour and 15min to Opera house.  Gavin was very responsive to our queries. Everything was accurate as advertised. There is also one laminated information sheet in the apartment describing how to use WiFi, etc. That's really nice. I would recommend this place to those who wants to stay heart of CBD. One of two building lifts was not stopping on this apartment's floor.  It was not fixed by building management during our stays (probably due to Christmas holidays).
Epic place

We really enjoyed our stay, thank you. Cosy and homely apartment with very comfortable beds (and fast wifi). We really appreciated the personal touch, toys + kids towels for our son and the homely feel. Bronte is lovely in its own right and it's a good location to explore the rest of Sydney.
Clean,  comfortable amd convenient!  Casey's place fits the bill - as well as being a lovely host :)
A fantastic little apartment in the heart of Potts Point.

We had a lovely 4 day  here. Great apartment, clean and with everything you could need, and in a beautiful part of Sydney. Mags was very patient with my endless emails and very easy to get in touch with.
We will certainly be recommending this place to friends.
Laura and Tim
Great location! Anita always responds straight away. Well equipped apartment and a great balcony! Close to everything!

Paradise Found!  This property is even better than the photos depict -- if you are looking for an idyllic escape in a relaxing atmosphere with fabulous views, this is the place.  Evelyn is a fantastic host who made us feel like locals.  The addition of having your own private, refreshing pool at your doorstep makes Pittwater Paradise an ideal location for a weekend getaway, or a longer stay.  We thoroughly enjoyed our two weeks at Pittwater Paradise.

We loved Paul's apartment! It's right in the middle of Potts Point and is about 5 minutes away from Kings Cross rail station. There's Woolie's a fee minutes away and coffee places all over! Room 10, which is right next door from the back served amazing coffee!

The apartment was very clean and has a lot of character. It certainly felt like we were staying at someone's home and not just a random hotel. We especially loved the book collection!

Overall, it was an awesome experience and we would definitely stay here again if we come back to Sydney.

Nathan was a very helpful and considerate host. The flat is in a fantastic location, full of lovely things and very comfortable. He left us chocolates and some fancy soap which were nice touches. Local transport is really good and the beach is amazing.

It was a great stay and beautiful home. Half our dance crew stayed at Franca and Alessio's place whilst we rehearsed for our upcoming premiere - it was a massive week and we really loved coming back to this gorgeous house.
Claudio and Cindy are a really nice and friendly couple. You can ask them anything. Also the room was very nice and clean. Great place to stay!

Really cool place ! Everything was clean, the two bedrooms + 2 bathrooms was perfect for the 4 of us. She was reactive, fast to respond to our demands like to arrive early and leave later. I higly recommand !
The time spent on a wide deck is a very good memory.

Gavin is a nice guy to make my first Bnb experience fantastic. I appreciate him to host us after his long distance trip with jet lag. We were easy to talk with and get along well with each other. There're all same as describe, even much better than it, special room, comfy bed, clean and well-appointed home, excellent location... My mum and me definitely enjoyed staying at Gavin's place. There's no doubt that I will be there. I highly recommend you to stay at Gavin's place.

Again we had an amazing time. The place was clean, beds were comfortably and checkin was a breeze. The view and backyard down to the beach is what this place is all about!  Bailey is a great host, we will no doubt stay again. Just a note for those that cannot stand heat the place has no air conditioning so it gets very hot during day and night but there are fans and the beach right at the doorstep to cool off.

Staying at Mal's place was an absolute delight.  The photos are true to the decor but cannot begin to properly describe how wonderful it is to be perched up in your "Sydney home" watching the world go by on Bondi Beach. The best location in Sydney by far! And Mal is the perfect host.  So quick to respond to all enquiries and goes above and beyond to make your stay really special.  Thanks for everything  Mal. I am telling all my friends in NZ about your place and coming back for sure.  Mals tip for Jo and Willy Depot Cafe was brilliant. .. Great food.  Great people.  Not touristy. Made you feel like a local.
Very homely convenient and quite location

Die Unterkunft war perfekt. Die Lage unschlagbar und wir hatten nicht mit so einer Ausstattung gerechnet. Deshalb haben wir einige Dinge mitgebracht, die wir aber nicht (Website hidden by Airbnb) war wirklich Alles da. Anita war die perfekte Gastgeberin, die sogar den Kuehlschrank etwas gefuellt hatte, da wir zu den Feiertagen ankamen. Es war sogar frisches Brot da. Den wagen konnten wir bequem unten in der Garage abstellen und mussten nur mit dem Aufzug in unsere Etage fahren. Die Aussicht vom Bett war ein Traum. Alles war sehr sauber und geschmackvoll modern eingerichtet. Das WLAN hat perfekt funktioniert und war schnell genug sogar fuer grosse Dateien. Wir kommen gerne bald wieder. Danke Anita.

Margaret and her husband well very welcoming hosts in making us feel at home . The train carriage was lovely to stay in and amazing nature at which they stay on with some lovely little Bush walks down by the Creek. Would love stay there again with lovely genuine down to earth people ... Who treated us with some home made apple pie before we left .

Natasa's place is very comfortable with a nice big room and great share bathroom. Natasa is very friendly and helpful and I enjoyed my stay very much, over 3 weeks! Very handy to transport, both trains and bus and conveniently between Petersham's Portuguese and Leichhardt's Italian restaurants. Fabulous place to stay!
Wendy is a nice person and this room is quite comfortable and amazing

Hernan was kind enough to accept our booking on very short notice. We arrived in Sydney a day earlier than we had planned and he was able to accommodate us for the night. His place is quiet and cozy, just what we needed. The beach nearby is gorgeous and has a couple good restaurants. All in all a great experience for our first day in Australia!

Clean, modern space with a separate entrance to the main house. The hosts were extremely hospitable. Do note that the room is smaller than it looks in the photo, but that wasn’t a problem at all because it was enough for 2 people to stay for just a night. Overall a lovely stay, and I would book this place again in future.
Great place for a bunch of ppl who love traveling
Really central and close to everything. Great balconies and very clean. Well stocked and we had a great time there!

Tracey's place was really comfortable, clean and stylish. It was also in a great location as we went into Newtown area for a concert and food - we caught the train in and then uber home - both which were super easy to do. Street parking was really easy as well.

Vickie has been such a wonderful host, and the apartment was the perfect space for my weekend escape to Sydney. Super close to the shops, local cafes and also the harbour. What more could one ask for?
Great as always 10/10

Linda's unit is a lovely warm place as is Linda herself.  The unit is well equipped and Linda has thought of everything, there was nothing we needed that was not supplied.  Terrific location and area, excellent value for money.
非常适合度假,周边就是风景,又有超市,生活很方便

Myself, my partner and our two boys (11 and 6 months) stayed for 4 nights at Jared’s apartment.
PROS..
Location is fantastic, close to Circular Quay which was great for us.
Size of the place was very comfortable.
Air conditioning works really well.
Kitchenette is well equipped for a short stay (small fridge, sink, microwave, kettle, toaster)
Beds were comfy and sofa bed had been made up ready for our stay.
WiFi was a great plus, and although we didn’t use it much it was nice to have it.
Check in was easy and the communication was excellent.

CONS..
Condition of the place left a lot to be desired. There was left over dirt on the carpet (bits and pieces, food, pieces of crayon) when we arrived. 
The bathroom needs to be stripped out and replaced, there are tiles missing, the bath tub is in terrible condition, there’s visible mold, the shower screen does nothing and you end up with a completely wet and slippery bathroom floor every time it’s used. 
There’s a bunch of exposed wires that have been carelessly taped to a skirting board in the kitchen area, fun when there’s a crawling baby exploring the place!
Air con, while it worked great, the dial is broken so its hard to know when it’s on or off.

I’d recommend a set of ear plugs for anyone staying here as there’s road works outside at the moment so there’s a bit of noise, as well as the apartment sharing a wall with the elevator shaft and a fair bit of noise coming from the roof (top floor apartment). 

Overall we had a great trip but for the money we spent we could have stayed in a nicer Airbnb (as we have in Sydney before).

First of all, this is a place really makes me feel at home! Aunt Jyoti and and uncle Urtum are very hospitable and kindness. I have to mention when I came back late in one night, they messaged me and confirmed whether I was OK.  Regarding to the house, there is a well decorated and pretty house in a very quite, beautiful and safe neighbor. More importantly, it is so convenient because it only takes less then 5mins to bus station and newington market place.

We stayed at Paul’s place in Manly for three nights. It’s a comfortable, clean two bed apartment with pretty much all the amenities you’d need. The location was perfect - very close to shops, restaurants, the Wharf (where you can catch the ferry to the city) and a short walk to the beach. 

The street the apartment is on was quiet. There is major building works going on next door but it was on the side of the bathroom and kitchen so didn’t bother us too much. Parking on the street can be a bit tricky and as it’s a one way street you can find yourself going round in circles looking for a space.

Paul was quick to respond to all my messages. I was hoping for a bit more flexibility with checking in and out times as we arrived very early to Sydney and had to leave late but there was no negotiating on this. Luckily we had friends in the city who helped us out on both days.

Overall we had a pleasant stay. I would recommend the apartment if you want to stay in a laid back area of Sydney, close to a beach but still with good transportation into the city.
The host canceled this reservation 98 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a great stay at this airbnb. The apartment was easy to access and Michele was very communicative and helpful. The apartment is well situated with close distance to both buses and the train station. Michele also provided some treats for us in the fridge upon arrival, which was very appreciated. However, we want to point out that the apartment is very perceptive. We got kindly told that we were too loud at 10:30 pm, and out of our four mornings we woke up to a screaming child twice. Apart from that we are very happy with this stay.
A lovely, comfortable, room in a very nice house. Everything was clean and it was within walking distance of Macquarie Park and University.
Lovely accommodation and great location.

Fantastic, almost brand-new, nicely decorated, very clean, well-cared for apartment on the 18th floor.  Minutes walk to Olympic Park train station, 10 mins walk to Quodos Arena.  More than enough space for 5 of us.  2 double bedrooms (one ensuite with double shower) and a comfortable sofa bed.  2 bathrooms (one with a large bath).  We were met by Vicky who gave us the keys and entry fob for the carpark.  We didn't meet Nicole, but she was in constant communication during our stay to make sure that all was well.  The apartment has fantastic views and is light and airy. Nice touches were the bowl of fruit, plate of lollies and chocolates, biscuits, milk in the fridge and teabags.  We were really impressed and would certainly recommend a stay here.  Such fantastic value compared to the hotels in the immediate vicinity.

Belinda and Chris have been wonderful hosts! 
We loved our stay at their garden studio. They  thought of everything for our comfort and relaxation even though the temperate outside dropped to 6 degrees we were very comfortable. The location is also excellent being right within Royal National park with magnificent bush walks at your doorstep, thank you very much for having us,

The location of this apartment is amazing, it is right next door to Darling Harbour. So that is the best feature by far! It was clean and had 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. There is a large baby cot in the main bedroom which takes up a lot of space if you are not needing it!
It was clean and well cared for. 
The swimming pool and spa on the roof is fantastic!!
Compared to other places I have stayed in, this one seemed to be pretty basic as there was really no added touches. But it’s functional and a good apartment

A lovely place with a really cute loft bedroom, a comfortable downstairs area and Cath left us various goodies to make our breakfast. Cath has lovely garden spaces with chickens, and an area to sit and soak in the sun. Easy street parking and walking distance to cafes and shops. Throughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend to anyone able to manage the ladder. Would happily stay again.

We were lucky to get the room last minute as we had a change of plans when we arrived in Sydney so it was a perfect place for us to stay for the night. Communication went really well! The room is nice and bathroom is super clean (so important for me:)) Thank you Angela!

Rob's place is situated close to the beach, take away store and a golf club - making it extremely convenient to travel around cronulla. 

There was plenty of space and the place was neat and tidy. The house was a little hot (it was a >30 degree weekend) but Rob did provide a number of fans to ease the heat discomfort.
Great location, very clean, reasonably priced and very good communication.
The position is good to airport and the room is nice. Hernan is friendly.

Helen & Mike are the perfect host. Their home is beautiful, their company fantastic and the overall service is the best I have received in Australia outside of a hotel setting. I honestly can not recommend them higher, they really are great people! Thanks so much, Tom.

We loved our stay in Studio 32.  The decor is very smart and comfortable, the location is handy to shops, restaurants, a cinema, public transport and a couple of nice parks - a tiny one at the bottom of the street and larger, Petersham Park, less than 10 minutes walk away.  Basic provisions, local information, and small, thoughtful extras made it a very comfortable location for our weekend in Sydney.  We'll happily return when next in Sydney!

This accommodation is in a lovely location, quiet close to the beach. There was some miscommunication at the beginning, but Cat was exceptional in communication and sorting matters out straight away. 
The accommodation was very rustic with all mod cons, but in need of some refurbishment with the kitchen, which is due to be done after our visit. 
The location is easy to get into Sydney central with good transport links. It's also close to the stadiums and Bondi Junction shopping centre.
I would recommend this property for a relaxed stay. Thank you Cat!
Summer time facilities

Nicole has an amazing apartment. Well designed, cozy and fully equipped. The bed was very comfortable that we almost didn't want to wake every morning! It's centrally located near the Central station so it's a plus if you are on public transport though the area could get pretty quiet at night. Sweet little touches like a lolly bowl and chocolates near your bedside table made us feel welcome. Nicole was also very prompt in replying our messages. Great host and place!

This place was everything we expected and more! Anthony was an amazing host, accommodating our early check in. The place was left super clean and tidy and had everything we needed not to mention the complimentary wine/chocolate. Location was amazing with a short walk to bondi and 20min Uber to airport (Sunday). The ease of checkin/check out and communication throughout our stay was impeccable. We loved staying at Anthony's place in Bondi and would definitely love to stay again one day
Very clean and comfortable apartment, hosts were very easy to communicate with.
美丽海滩最特别之处
Great location
Can recommend this beautifull and warm home in Bondi to everyone! ❤
Great location! Very central and perfect for us who were spending all our time out and about. Very helpful and quick responses from host.
The landlord is warm and hospitable, introduces us to the scenic route, provides us with cooking tools, a good experience.
We had a lovely time at Julia’s! A quick walk from the train station, convenient to the city, beautiful comfort touches. Stay here :)
Hernan是个非常热情的人,房间非常干净舒服,离机场很近,离海边也很近,交通方便,满分好评!
Spacious, clean, charming apartment with everything you need. All in a good location too. Recommended!

We stayed at Wayne & Kate's for a long weekend and it was amazing !!!
The location was perfect right across the road from the beach easy walk to Bondi or bronte,the apartment was beautifully decorated ,beds were super comfy ,great kitchen.
wayne was a pleasure to communicate with providing easy direction & key info & touched base a day into our trip making sure all was well .
I can't imagine a better place to stay if a beach holiday in the heart of Sydney is what your after
Thanks Wayne & Kate we really appreciated all your efforts
Julie

Cathy was welcoming and polite and even provided a nice and healthy breakfast for me for the next day. The room looked exactly as pictured, I found it to be clean and comfortable.  It was in a quiet neighbourhood, close to Avalon beach and overall a very pleasant stay. Thank you Cathy.
This was a lovely place to stay - great location, great apartment, great hosts.
Great apartment.  George is very responsive and instructions are very clear.
Spacious, clean and quiet appartment. Lina, her husband and her son have been very friendly and helpful. Highly recommanded!

Terrific location - very central to Circular Quay (also very easy walk to Barangaroo Wharf and Wynyard Station), Opera House, art galleries, shopping etc. Convenient stay - property was as I'd expected.

Great spot for a short trip to Sydney. Very close to public transport and great food options all around Darlinghurst and Potts Point. Griffin was an excellent host and we really enjoyed our stay in his nice little apartment.

A stunning apartment with everything that you could need and want. Spotless inside and out. Awesome hosts and very happy with the value!
Thanks so much for hosting!

Edi is a great host - she’s warm and tries to make you feel as comfortable as possible The house is located a 2min walk from the station, however is under a flight path (noting blackout period between 11pm-6am). I enjoyed the stay and would recommend especially for people who are looking for an easy location.

David was very easy to communicate with and he offered information about the area. He left a few things in the fridge for us, which we really appreciated. 
We stayed 3 nights over New Year's Eve and spent much of our time walking and visiting the city so the small apartment was fine for us and our 2 grown daughters. It would be perfect for a couple. It was hot, even with the windows open at night and the ceiling fans running.  Renters should be aware that this is a very noisy neighborhood and there are several "adult" type businesses up the street. Not great if you are travelling with small kids.
We did have trouble sleeping with the street noise.  

I would recommend David's place. It's situated less than 2km from the Circular Quay and Opera House, a perfect distance for a nice walk.
Mohit was so accommodating and we had an excellent stay.

Great central location. So easy to get to. We walked all weekend all around the city. View from balcony seemed even better than the pictures! Good beds , linen & fluffy towels. We wished we had another day so we had time to use the pool, spa & sauna. All in all a great place to stay
Very good stay
Good place. Central. Next to bus stop. Good value for money

Victoria was at the studio apt to greet us, show us where everything was and to give us advice on finding our way around Sydney. She was very pleasant and helpful.  The apt was very clean, had all we needed and was easily accessible to the CBD, the Opera House and harbour. Lots of restaurants, cafes, shops close by plus a food market right across the street.   A very nice and secure building.

Wonderful hosting. Accommodation as advertised - such a lovely part of the world! But the real stand out was the helpfulness and hospitality of hostess. She did everything to make it comfortable and easy with food and nibbles and drinks so that the first night. / morning could be relaxing and worry free.
The place was great and right in center city so walkable to many main areas!
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Su的房子地段很好,central 站出来步行5分钟之内,去市区基本都可以步行到达｡房子内部装修较新,特别要提的是,床垫很舒服｡两房的房型非常适合家庭出游｡房东总是能及时的有问必答,下次来悉尼应该还会预订Su的房子｡
Thanks for letting us stay in your awesome apartment. Mark was great and very helpful.  All in all the apartment was great, it made our time in Sydney amazing. I would recommend your place to anyone.
This is a great place with a wonderful view and within easy reach of a lot of interesting places and things to do.  I highly recommend Ben's place.

A lovely host with great communication.

An excellent inner city location. Close to everything including great restaurants within walking distance.

 Highly recommended.
Beautiful place with a beautiful, accomodating family that made us feel right at home! Will definitely come back if I’m back in the area :)
I had a great stay. I felt safe and comfortable. Located on a beautiful, quiet street - it is easy to forget that King Street is only a minute away!
Fantastic location in beautiful Manly.
Great little spot, close to everything

Thanks for having us Xinhue however I wasn’t really pleased with the stay. There is only 1 bed and a fold out couch that is claimed to be a bed but really isn’t. There’s bugs in the shower and a hotel is cheaper. Wish I had a better experience but I didn’t.. The place is smaller than expected too... Thanks for preparing the rooms though.
Margaret was very easy going and accommodating.
市中心,位置很不错,歌剧院,鱼市场,唐人街半个小时路程就可以走到了｡房子住得很舒适｡
Michelle was really easy to deal with and made an emergency visit to elderly incapacitated parents much less stressful than it otherwise may have been.
Leslie was very accomodating, house was comfortable, clean and spacious. Great value for money. Would recommend.

A very tasteful apartment with a tropical outlook. Everything you would need is supplied and it is a magical location with gorgeous homes along the way when you walk from the ferry and water front.
The most lovely small beach on Camp Cove is also just around the corner. 
This place is an oasis from the hustle and bustle of the city and you just need to jump on the ferry a short walk to reach many of the destinations on offer in Sydney.
Thank you again to both Jane and Neil we appreciated the thoughtful attention to detail  and the privacy you provided with the feeling that you were both very approachable if we needed anything.
Great stay, thanks Rhonda!

Exactly what it said it would be and more. Really lovely private space in the garden of a family home. 10 minutes from the beach (up a steep hill) but a lovely walk and fantastic beach so well worth it. 

Susan and her family were the best Airbnb hosts we've had. Around just enough to give exactly the right amount of support that we needed without being too much. But also going above and beyond the call of duty bringing gorgeous breakfast food and even helping us with a bit of washing for our 8 week old baby which was so so helpful. 

Overall it was a really lovely experience with great people. Highly recommended. We'll be back for sure!

Great location and cozy flat. Parking is a great bonus especially int he city. The apartment was clean and check in was flexible and easy. Would definitely recommend for anyone wanting a place in city that has parking and is close to public transport. Central station is less then a 5 min walk and so many fantastic cafes close to the apartment. Great stay.
very clean.

Awesome terrace! Easy walk to great cafes, eateries and shops!  Awesome views from the terrace balconies. We had 8 guests in total and never felt crowded! 
Easy check in and great communication!

Mal’s place has it all and is a must stay. You are steps away from the beach and all the restaurants/bars/cafe. Clean and has all of the amenities you need if you don’t care to go out. If I come back to the Bondi Beach area, I will be looking to book Mal’s place again.

le taxi a trouvé facilement l'adresse.
La description et les instructions parfaites.
Everything is fine except that electricity is suddenly out at night. It did came back ours later, but I dont't like that experience.

Terry was a fantastic host and very easy to communicate with. Her place was in a great location for Kings Cross / Edgecliff stations (10minutes away) and buses to town / beaches were also just around the corner. Fantastic view of Rushcutters Bay!

Lovely place in a beautiful neighbourhood, close to the waterfront and within a walking distance to most Sydney attractions. Subway is 3 minutes away.
Although I've seen pictures of Suzie's place it surpassed my expectations. Beautiful furniture, a mix of modern and Asian - style. Super clean and with all the conveniences you might think of. Very (!) comfortable bed.
And most important: Suzie, my host. My superhost. I already miss our discussions about Australia, world politics and ... life. I'd like to come back one day.

Unfortunately Isabella was not there so we never actually met, but the room was very cosy and the location beautiful, right in front of a picturesque park in Newtown and a very short walking distance to the main street with an almost endless choice of great bars, restaurants and cafes, would definitly stay here again :)

The apartment was very roomy, great position and comfortable. The new kitchen makes it totally self contained and the sunroom was a delightful bedroom for our daughter.  Lovely decor throughout. Bernadette and Fred were so helpful and willing to please. Short drive to the airport was a bonus for us. Will definitely keep it mind for the future.

Nicole was extremely flexible when it came to check in and out times which we appreciated very much. The apparment was meticulous and well equipped. The view at night was a highlight. It's is surrounded by a multitude of world class stadiums and parks. Public transport at the doorstep and shops/restaurants in abundance.
Hôtes très sympathiques et discrets maison bien pratique
I had a very pleasant stay.

Tiger was a very friendly host, I enjoyed my stay here. I was in Sydney for a conference in Mascot airport, so the location was absolutely perfect for me. The public transport was literally at our doorstep which made getting around very easy for me. Thanks for making my stay in Sydney an enjoyable one Tiger, it was nice to have met you and share life experiences!

A perfect appartment in the center of the city, close by central station and with a very helpfull host.  We had a wonderful time here and if we come back we will definitely hope we we can return to this appartment.

Hernan accepted my last minute request and so, I was saved for Sydney! Easygoing, with a nice flat, very well located, 2 min from the beach, 5 min from shops, I felt immediately at home. Thanks for EVERYTHING Hernan ;).
The place is nice and Sam reacts very quickly which was great!

I spent beautiful and very relaxing 2 weeks in  Davids house. The room with the fantastic terrace ensuite was great. The house had a very positive atmosphereand I felt welcomed..David is a very decent, polite and nice host.
The house is situated in a  small and quiet street which is situated in the heart of beautiful Darlinghurst. A lot of restaurants, cafés and shops around and parks in food distance. I can recommend Davids place 100%!
Thanks one more time David!

Bryan is a really nice host. We can feel his love in the house. There are essential appliance and stuff prepared in the house. So people arrived in a rush can have a rest before buy anything. And the environment is really nice. People can have a walk along the bay. The public transportation is also convenient. The central is about 30 minutes bus away. If I will travel in Sydney again, I may choose Bryan's house again:) My friend and I had a really nice experience here.

Shuang's place was lovely! Great value and conveniently located near the airport. It was very clean and check in was very easy. Even though the stay was just for one night, it felt like home already. Highly recommended and would stay again! Thanks Shuang
We had a great stay at Simon & Nicole's place. Good eating places and train station nearby. Clean, great location and would definitely stay here again next time we come to Sydney.
房子蛮时尚的,但是我一个人住的确有点过大了｡整体还是喜欢的
Was exactly as described. Fantastic place and would stay again.

We had a great long weekend here.  It's a very nice studio but definitely suits a stay during finer weather so that you can take full advantage of the outdoor table and chairs.
Excellent location - close to shops and beach, and easy street parking.
Lovely hosts.  Thank you!
Jess and Matt were great hosts and very responsive. The apartment is centrally located and an easy walk to the train.
Nice house, comfortable and near to everything.  If you have any question Joy will answer ASAP and so kindly. The experience has been a real pleasure!! Thank you once again!!!!

Our stay in Louise's apartment was like a home from home and she was always available, helpful and answered any queries promptly.The bed was very comfortable and our adult son was more than happy on the sofa bed and in front of the TV!
The immediate area was not so good for food shopping but we always managed to get what we needed in the CBD before returning each day. Bus journeys in and out were easily negotiated.
Thank you Louise for making us so welcome!
Hugo's place was perfect for our weekend in Sydney. It was neat and tidy, conveniently located and had everything we needed. Thanks for having us!

A really cool place to stay. Very vibrant neighborhood. Train from airport to Central and then a short walk to apartment. Not huge but way bigger and more comfortable than a hotel room. Hosts were very accommodating and allowed us to leave luggage til mid afternoon on day of departure.  Highly recommend this place.

Excellent location, with great communication from the host and a very easy self check in process. Bed was comfortable, and apartment was warm and nicely decorated. Shower pressure is excellent, but hot/cold taps can be a little tricky to balance for shower temperature. Very good value, highly recommend.

Beautiful home in a great location. 5 minute walk to tons of cafes and restaurants and 5 minute walk to the beach. Family is very nice. They leave the front door totally open a lot of the time so if you are paranoid or untrusting with your things just be aware! But seems like a great neighborhood and we were not worried about our things. Some bugs like cockroaches but apparently this is normal for the area. Room was big and spacious with a tv and lots of closet space! Access to beach chairs was nice. Very good experience with lovely people.
They are real super hosts everything was perfect. We could even leave our bags there before chech in. Food was amazing. So was the space. We are looking forward to staying again soon.

Our stay in David's apartment was perfect in every detail and everything we could possibly want was provided by David right down to greatly appreciated supplies of milk and cereal to start us off. The apartment is superb, as is the situation. Would stay again and recommend to anyone and everyone.  Superb!

The room was bright and airy. The location was only a couple of streets from King St in Newtown and was very close to cafes and train stations. The house was clean and well maintained and the housemates were friendly and welcoming.  All in all a good location and a great little place to stay.

A lovely property in a great location - 1 block to Spit Junction with all the amenities, transport and shops.  Lovely strolling in Mosman shops and the Providores for high end deli, fruit, bread just around the corner.  Fitness First and the Pool also 1 block away.  The property is very comfortable and stylish.  Rachel is a great host.
Awesome position.  Beautifully appointed. One of the nicest Airbnb's we have stayed in.  Close to awesome bars and restuarants as well as the city.  Highly recommended and we will be back.

The Magical Manly Earthquake Experience.
We woke each morning in our comfortable bed singing lines from classic tunes like "Shake, rattle and roll" or "I feel the earth move under my feet".
If you like an early start, vibrating beds, mirrors, windows, loud noise and a front row seat to view earthmoving and construction machines in action then this is the place for you!
Each morning the show begins at 7AM right outside your kitchen and bathroom windows and continues until 4PM. You will see the amazing performance up close. A large sandpit next door with a huge grey silo in the middle vibrating and spewing out cement dust like a beautiful smoke machine. Enjoy watching the excavators, cement trucks and hard hat wearing performers as they do their thing. As you are so close to the action, the sound quality is excellent - it is very loud. You'll need to book soon as work has already started and this experience may only last until 2020.

The manager/owner of the apartment did not warn us about this exciting daily event happening next door. As you can imagine it was a wonderful surprise for our tired family and really lifted our spirits after a long flight, taxi and ferry ride!

On a serious note, you will want to get out of the apartment early each day and start exploring the beautiful area of Manly and other parts of Sydney. It was a real bonus to return each evening to find our apartment building was still standing, had stopped vibrating and the noise had ended.

If you are still reading and are seriously considering staying at this place then there's something wrong with you but please, read on. The sheets and towels seem clean but the cleaners would benefit from attending vacuum, sweeping and dusting courses. The key pickup location is not secure. The apartment was older but spacious with high ceilings and a few cracks in the walls (not sure if this was caused by the current earth works/construction work).
Good times and memories that will last forever!

This apartment was absolutely perfect for a holiday in Sydney. It's a fantastic location-right in the heart of Bondi, 5 minutes away from the beach. Gwen was extremely communicative, and left us some great tips for things to see and do in the area.  I wish we could have stayed longer!
This Granny flat is wonderful.  So many nice amenities are included.  We really enjoyed our 18 days there.  George and Lucia are great hosts.  We give them our highest rating - 5 STARS!

Steven and his family offered a perfect personable getaway in a great location close to Sydney. We loved this little cabin and would definitely stay again, also Steven and his family were extremely friendly and helpful.

Merci pour ce logement avec une situation exceptionnelle.
David a répondu à toutes nos demandes.
Je conseille vivement ce logement.
merci
Very easy to get in and out and close to the airport but about 20 minutes from the city without traffic. Spacious room and nice bathroom

Rhonda was an incredibly kind and thoughtful host. She went the extra mile to ensure I was well looked after and was comfortable with my stay. I had an early departure flight and was up at 4am, but so was Rhonda as there was a power cut in the night in Sydney and she was concerned that my alarm clock may have reset! Very thoughtful.. Her home and the sleep out with great privacy for us guests was nice and spacious, very well maintained, nicely scented and very comfortable. Gymea is a great wee part of Sydney with good vibes, great people and offers a side of Sydney very different if travellers have only encountered the commercialness of the CBD/Darling Harbour etc. This was one of the best Airbnbs I have ever stayed at and will continue to use each time I attend transformative workshops in Gymea - Thanks Rhonda!
Nice little apartment half an hour away from Sydney. It's a good place to stay at if you're in Sydney for longer, but wouldn't recommend it for a shorter time.
Overall a great experience . Was bounced out when touched down , Athena was really helpful in locating another available room on the spot .
Great place, great location and amazing views.
Absolutely gorgeous home. Pictures do no justice.  Balcony views are palm trees and so much greenery!!
Would highly recommend close to town and and nice area to stay. Very clean and tidy and the host is exceptional

Excelente cuarto, tenia todo lo que esperábamos y hasta mas. La ubicación del departamento es excelente, tiene cerca varias paradas de buses y la estación del tren, también esta rodeado de excelente restaurantes y cafés. El departamento es increíble y aunque nos vimos poco con Naveen y Tristan siempre nos hicieron sentir como en casa, Felix salía a despedirnos todos los días y siempre nos recibía de la mejor manera, es un perro muy simpático.
Outstanding location. Was a real treat to experience Bondi Beach this way. Highly recommend.

Bailey was a great host! 
He responded immediately to the reservation and got us out of a sticky situation! 
The house is absolutely amazing! Has beach acess and the best view of Pittwater! We had the best backdrop and wedding photos! 
The house is super clean! Modern and comfortable beds. The 4 levels and total of 14 bedroom just gave everyone that extra room to breath and space to move! 
We will definitely be back!

Wyatt was a friendly, accommodating and generous host, he even helped us with our laundry even though he had many things to do. The small bedroom is a bit tight for a couple but was as described in Wyatt's listing so we expected that, but it had a comfy bed and clean bedding. The house itself is indeed charming and cool, and located in a good, central suburb and you can bus down to CBD within half hour max, so that was great.

We really enjoyed Wyatt's company and found him a great host, thanks Wyatt.
Our stay at Rachel's Mosman home was great.  The location is ideal and the home has a ton of character.  The kitchen is modern.
Excellent location

The unit is immaculately clean and tidy and in a fantastic location - just 8 minutes walk to the ferry at North Sydney or Milson's Point station in the other direction - or you can walk the bridge if the weather is nice.  The unit is small but we LOVED it, and I would definitely recommend it for a couple or two friends.  Millie was great with communication and access to the unit was easy.  Thanks Millie for making our stay so enjoyable and comfortable!
Beautifully setup apartment at the edge of Barangaroo in Sydney. Close to everything, a stylish, calm place to stay.

Excellent experience.
Overall room was very clean, comfy and spacious.
It was an ideal location as we were working at the new Convention & Exhibition Centre in Darling Harbour
We will be back for sure!
Clean and comfortable.  Sarah was lovely.

This a great studio in an excellent location. There is a washer and dryer that's very convenient for travel, and all the basics in the kitchen for cooking. I'd say it's easily big enough for 1-2 people. My fiance and I stayed here for a week together and loved it. We really fell in love with the neighborhood while we were there. Surry Hills is such a cute neighborhood with a bunch of delicious restaurants nearby. This apartment is very close to a couple of great bakeries and a gelato shop that we frequented often. There are also multiple grocery stores of varying sizes within walking distance (5-10 minutes). It's right next to a park that's great to relax at. There are a couple of bus stops that are a 2-5 minute walk away, and Central station (train and bus stop) is only a 10 minute walk away. We didn't have a car and only used the buses to get around, and it worked out really well. It is only about a 15 minute bus ride to the downtown Sydney area with the Opera House, and a very scenic (over the bridge) 45 minute bus ride to the zoo. We really enjoyed our trip to Sydney, and would recommend this apartment to others if they plan to visit.

We had a lovely time staying with Susan and Greg. They made us feel so welcome, introducing the apartment thoroughly and the local area too. They even helped us with local taxis and arranged a travel cot for our little one.

The apartment has great links, with amazing walks to Bronte, Bondi and Coogee. We ate in Susan and Gregs wonderful oasis garden one evening and in local restaurants.

The apartment was very clean, practical and just like the description.

Would definitely recommend this place!
The apartment is near the supermarket and the cafe

Very comfortable room and Cathy had really thought of everything.  The coffee, yoghurt, fruit and fresh cut flowers were lovely.  Cathy was a very welcoming host.  We hope to stay again in the future.

Hernan made sure I could access the keys as he was going out, he was very friendly and welcoming, told me to make a cup of tea if I liked etc. the room was nice and clean, the area is very good, and Hernan seemed like a very nice guy but we were both very busy , so only met briefly twice.  The location is easy walking distance to a lot of nice cafes and restaurants in Brighton, and bus routes to other areas. All up, the room was perfect for my visit.

We really enjoyed our time in Sydney. The accommodation was ideally located and exactly as described. We found the accommodation no problem with a 20 minute ride from the airport. An easy 15 minutes walk to the ferry terminal and The Rocks. Thanks again Oriel!
Ok.

Sabina's place offers a great location for Darling Harbour and other Sydney attractions. The place inself is very well equipped with everything you could need. Great for both couples, and families. We thoughly enjoyed  our stay and service Sabrina supplied.
房东是华人,会说普通话,所以交流很方便,Fen姨很Nice,会给我们指路｡房间设备齐全,地理位置也很好找,出了悉尼机场,延停车场的天桥直走到分岔路口再往右边的路直走就能找到公寓所在的街道,步行路程20分钟｡
Craige and Leonie are great hosts!  The location is excellent!  Walking distance to the beach, restaurants, bus stop!

Susan has a cute little terrace house in a neighbourhood with many Italians in Sydney. We had our own bathroom in the garden studio and it was very clean and comfortable. Susan is a really relaxed host. We were well looked after.

Luke and Paul's flat listing caught my eye instantly, and we eagerly booked it as soon as we found that our desired dates were free. 
The flat looks exactly as it is pictured, and Paul was very responsive to our queries. 
While the neighborhood is quite close to the Kings Cross area (which we were told to be careful of), the Potts Point area where the flat is located is safe, and has a few good restaurants for a quick bite or a full meal. 
Paul had several restaurant recommendations which we tried, and we were not disappointed. 
While it is not entirely Paul's fault nor his liking, the apartment building does not have a lift, which made it hard for us to transfer our heavy luggage. However, the space of the flat itself is just right for three travelers, and we had a comfortable stay. I liked how the kitchen is well equipped as well. There extra towels and linens were a plus too. We stayed over the weekend and was able to catch the weekend market just across the street. We enjoyed that as well. We would definitely stay in Paul's flat again if given the chance.
Hernan was really friendly and made us feel at home right away. He was really informative and had all the information leaflets to hand about excursions and public transport.

My girlfriend has been wanting to stay at Cath's place for quite some time now so she was quite pleased that we were able to book our last few nights in marrickville. Cath is an excellent host and a very thoughtful one as well! She welcomed us with a generous breakfast basket and with freshly baked bread the next morning! She was very organised and had all the need to know information all sorted into a little file with all the maps, delivery menus etc. The location is great just about 15 mins away from the domestic airport and about 25 mins away from the international airport. Our favourite airbnb stay so far!
很好的住宿

it is a very nice place to stay if you are looking for a strategic location, only 5min walks to Queen Victoria Building and 7min walks to Westfield/ Sydney Tower and of course the supermarkets are nearby. The place is really nice and comfortable and also very clean! Overall, it was really great!

Our stay was awesome. Jason's communication was sensational and made checking in quick and easy.

I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in central Sydney at an affordable and efficient location.

Vickie is an amazing host with a beautiful apartment. Location is incredible- right by lovely restaurants and bars, and only a quick ride into the city. The apartment itself was gorgeous- so clean, light and airy. Queen bed is super comfortable as well. I highly recommend this apartment, and would love to stay here again. Perfect Airbnb experience.
Excellent neighbourhood to live like a local and explore the city. Didn't get to meet Miss D but her communication was prompt and that's very important for a traveller.

The Garden Studio is a lovely, comfortable, and beautiful place to stay at, and we would be more than happy to come and stay here again. Cath was very lovely, accommodating, and understanding. We highly recommend her place to everyone. The place was very clean and there were milk, eggs, and a breakfast hamper when we arrived, plus fresh bread in the morning which was a lovely thing to wake up to. The kitchen and bathroom were kitted out with everything that a traveller ever needs plus more. We also loved that it was near a few train stations and bus stops, and it's just a pleasant walk to lively Newtown. Thanks again Cath for having us and for being so understanding! We couldn't rate your place highly enough, if we could give it 10 out of 5 stars we would! :)

Great location!! Well presented with good amenities. It was way closer to everything than expected. We wished we stayed here for our whole stay in Sydney. Beautiful home, very comfortable bed! Alexey was very helpful & prompt with communication. Complimentary wine was a lovely touch, thanks so much. Recommend!

Kath was a very good host, she welcome us at the door show us arround the house, we feel at home, there is tv if you want to watch news or you can watch dvd, nice place to be and easy going to the train station 5mns walk..Thank you Kath
Susan's place is a hidden gem. No pretentious, great price for the location, clean and down to earth comfortable space.

The apartment was very spacious and clean upon arriving. I loved that there were restaurants, convenience stores and public transportation options close by.  Less than 2 km from the Opera House and Circular Quay.  Secure building.  All in all, this is a nice property.  We had a question about the wi-fi and Andrea responded promptly, which we appreciated!

Mohit is a great host, and has a lovely home. It's a nice well furnished 2 story apartment. He even had netflix which helped us while the time at home.
It's a suitable place for couple and families with grown up kids. Not too suitable with families with young kids as the train station was quite a distance away. With 2 young kids and my parents, it proved a bit of a challenge to walk to and fro everyday.
距離標示上建議可以再清楚一點｡希望您未來越來越好~加油!
A brand new room close to Sydney's attractions at an affordable price represents good value for money.

Steve and Carole are very friendly and hospitable. We enjoyed our stay at their place. They let us use the washing machine as we desperately needed it after a week on the road. The bathroom is super clean and spacious. Their place is very close to the bus stops. We also enjoyed a 15 mins walk to Newtown, a very funky neighbourhood with lots of cafes and bars. We would recommend staying at their place.

Staying at the apartment in Surry Hills was such a great experience! It was well stocked with everything you would need, including a great pantry of seasonings! We LOVED having the Nespresso Maker as well!!! The bed was very comfortable and the shower head was like being under a waterfall!!!!!! The building itself was amazing and the rooftop views were beautiful, especially at sunset! Not to mention the awesome pool!!! Everything about the Surry Hills apartment was amazing, from brekkies on the balcony to evenings on the most comfortable couch in the world! Also the little details like the advent calendar with little chocolates in it and the bowl of yummy candies to munch on! Thanks for a great stay Nicole and Simon!
值得推荐｡距离机场很近,房东是中国人,沟通无障碍｡热情好客,房间收拾的很干净

David was a wonderful host. My family and I were welcomed kindly in front of the apartment. The place was extremely clean and had everything we needed. The location was walking distance to many tourist locations or a quick bus/taxi ride away. We'll definitely recommend this location to family and friends who plan to travel to Sydney.
Great location, a quiet and private unit with very good air conditioning

Susan was a lovely host. The cabin is adorable, and nicely separate from the house. There was plenty of fruit, nuts, juice, and tea for breakfast, and although the bread was running low the first morning, Susan was quick to let us know that evening that she'd bought some delicious bread for the next day (without us having to ask or anything). As I was staying with a vegan friend and a gluten-free/lactose-free friend, the food options were really great.

At one point one of my travelling companions had an allergic reaction to her cat, and on the way out, we casually asked if she might have some Telfast or something similar, and she was more than happy to provide that. And in a sudden rainstorm, she equipped us with two umbrellas to ensure that we got to our destination only partially soaking wet.

All in all, we had a lovely stay, and would not hesitate to stay here again.

Great accommodation 
Nice to have experience something a little different 
Dogs are super friendly
Beautiful well equipped room in a separat floor with a stunning view over the beach.
Place is accessible, there are restaurants near-by. Wonderful for big group of friends looking for a place to chill.

A lovely apartment in beautiful Bondi. It matches the new photos and the Bondi beach area is easily walkable. It's a bus ride to downtown Sydney - pretty easy. 

There are a lot of stairs if that bothers you, and no AC. The street is quiet and a very short walk to shops, restaurants, beaches, pools, boutiques and some of the best walking paths (in the world?).

Hernan was a really nice and easy going guy. Arrived around noon and directly got the keys for the front door and apartment, so I was really flexible. The room was exactly like it´s shown on the pictures and in the description. For everyone who needs a room near the airport when just arrived in Sydney I highly recommend this place. Thanks again for your great hospitality Hernan!
A great location if you want to be close to the Eastern beach suburbs. Off street parking is handy and access was quite simple.

Wonderful location close to the city and paddington shops & restaurants. Tams apartment has lots of natural lighting, and is surprisingly quiet given its close proximity to the city.

Tam was easy to deal with and accomodated us last minute, great communicator and made sure we were settled in nicely.
Great flat in the heart of Sydney. Photos and description exactly as advertised, and host communication was second-to-none! Would recommend if you want to be able to walk anywhere centrally
Lovely place! Leigh and Tanya helped me really ease into my first Airbnb!
Great house in a great location. Jeremy was very responsive and helpful.
Cosy cottage with magnificent tranquil views. Right on the beach so immediate access to the water!
Nice room ans freshwater is a great place!!
We really enjoyed our stay here and would definitely recommend to stay here.
A nice and cosy unit, with a great central location along Coogee Bay Road.
Amazing stay and super helpful - best value I have had in Sydney over 3 years of traveling there 10 times a year.

Whilst the flat is even more amazing than the photos portray, it was Anita's welcome, hospitality and attention to detail that really made my stay in Bondi exceptional. I would recommend to all my friends, there is literally everything you would ever need. And the view of the sea is outstanding.

1)위치-매우 훌륭함. Peddy's market, central station, world squre, korean mart (한호마트, 코스코스)와 매우 인접하며 세인트 메리성당까지 10-15분 거리. 2)비행기가 오전 10시 30분 도착이라 체크인 시간 3시까지 짐을 들고 다닐것이 걱정이었으나 친절하게도 10시 30분에 짐을 맡겨놓을 수 있게 해주셔서  편하게 다닐수 있었다 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 3)세탁기 건조기 구비되어 있어서 매우 편리함 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 4)번화가에 위치하나 아파트 주변 조용하고 저녁 8시까지도 근처 coles마트로 장보러 다닐수 있을 정도로 안전함 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 5)전반적으로 청결함 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 6)day tour 만남 장소인 리지스 스퀘어까지 7분 거리.

Eric was a lovely guy he really was BUT house was filthy, room advertised was the wrong room, got there and he hadn't cleaned the room. Had old bedsheets that someone had just slept in. Dust everywhere, toilet was filthy and when I asked where the towels where he said didn't I bring my own. Said I was fussy because I liked things a certain way. My last night bought me a towel but I had already gone and bought one because first night I had to use a hand towel to shower with. It was freezing with no heating. Really disappointed as I needed a place to chill as I had a few busy days of work in sydney but this made me feel really unsettled and yuck. I told him how air bnb works and he didn't see interested and just kept saying I was fussy. I had someone's cup on the bedside table and yeh it just wasn't great at all. But again nice bloke bad host.
Iit wha the best place so far on my  average
Great location, the host is very helpful and responded quick.

This is an amazing place!  LOVED the amenities of coffee, milk, wine bottle, chocolate bar , great TV, lots and lots of towels, and wonderful location.  We didn't use the rooftop pool, but we should have (busy visiting daughter).   Could not have been happier with this choice.  Thank you Desiree.

Beautiful apartment, excellent communication by Jen.
Definitely would recommend and stay again
Thank you for Chloe letting us living your so nice beautiful house!非常感谢房东,非常好的地段距离火车站仅2分钟步行,距离超市也很近
Rob’s Place was great for our group of friends. Walking distance to the beach and close to bars and shops. He was flexible and easy to communicate with. Very accommodating!

It was my first experience with airbnb and I am glad that my host was Jessica, who is a great host! 
And it is true - it is 5 star location place - it is walk away from Hide Park, Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Royal Botanic Garden. I would definitely recommend Jessica´s place.
Great place, awesome location. Clean, cozy and comfortable. would recommend to anyone. Alexey was very communicative and helpful. 10/10
Very nice place for visitors. Fen is very friendly, and the house is the same clean and tidy as hotel, strongly recommend living here if you travel to Sydney.
Great apartment, had everything we needed and more ! Can’t wait to go back ❤️

Great accommodation and lovely hosts. Beautifully appointed and immaculately finished, this cabin was in the perfect location for our holiday. Easy walking distance to transport, shops, pubs, restaurants and our Australian family. Thanks so much, Moira and Graeme.
lovely space,  great location

A pristine and immaculate new apartment with charming hosts, 5 minutes walk from Green Square train station and Woolworths.  Great to have my own private bathroom and room next to it.  Amenities exceeded my expectations.  Felt thoroughly safe with lockable door, secure entrance and internal monitoring by hosts.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
If future travellers wish to stay somewhere stylish, affordable, clean and with fabulous views...then this IS the place in Sydney for you!!

Had a lovely stay at Cath's Garden Studio. We chose the studio following the excellent reviews. The place was very comfortable and suited our needs perfectly. The breakfast was the highlight, including fresh croissants and bread. Would definitely return. Thanks!
The place is exactly as pictures. Comfortable and convenience. Had AC breakdown but other than that, everything was good. Thank you!

This is a wonderful space very well
Appointed easy access comfy bed and great shower and private 
Clean and tidy
Steven is a very amicable host 
There is cool vegan  cafe Nowa in walking distance from Steven and Petas place
Highly recommended
Sam was so lovely. Such a beautiful space, with everything you need.
Very fast response and flexible with arrangements
View of the beach. Right across from Icebergs. Sytlish. Clean. Well-priced. And a wonderful host with Anita. One of my favorite stays in Bondi. Planning to stay here again.

David's place is an adorable fully renovated Victorian double story shop front/terrace with all the mod cons. It is so incredibly central making for a quick walk to all the best Cafes and restaurants in Surry Hills. The location was perfect for me as I was in Sydney on business so was able to schedule a lot of my business meetings over coffee - David's location subsequently made my time very efficient. Upon arrival David provided clear instructions on the house amenities. He graciously provided a bottle of red wine (which I didn't drink but the thought was very much appreciated). We didn't see a lot of each other due to our busy work schedules. I unfortunately left my wallet at David's when I was in  rush to leave so he offered to post this to me in Victoria. 
His house is spotlessly clean and I loved having cable tv available in the room when I just wanted to chill out for a while. The house is located behind busy Taylor square but it get like it was locked away in a private suburb - there was no evidence of any street noise at all. A little oasis in a very busy intersection of Oxford and Flinders st. I look forward to having the chance to stay with David again in future.

Although I didn't meet my host face to face, I immediately felt welcome with instructions for getting into the house and amenities for cooking etc.
