Everything was exactly as advertised. This place is very easy to find in  a lovely neighborhood (yoga studio right around the corner, if you're into that!) and the most convenient walk to the train station. 

It was very clean. If you're looking for a calm, quiet, and easy place to stay, this is it. I'd definitely recommend it.

Home from home, beautifully presented room in a peaceful location. Cathy was a efficient hostess, warm and welcoming. We only got to spend one night here when attending a wedding at Whale beach; just wish we had longer! Thank you for having us!

Amazing place to stay if you are visiting Sydney, the location was amazing and easily accessible. The place was really clean and well taken care of. The host was really friendly and welcoming and attends to your needs
Great position.  clean.
Close to public transport, in a pretty hip neighborhood, very stylish place, great amenities, very nice shower. Also, Mariana is an excellent host! Five stars!
A beautiful place for a weekend getaway. Great communication, close to the shops and beach and really comfy beds! Molly was really accommodating as well, thank you!
Thanks Laura, the apartment is beautiful and very comfortable. I'd stay again if visiting Sydney in the future!
It was quick, easy, simple, nice.... all good

This is a special unit.  The details of rich, beautiful fabrics, cozy blankets, lovely decor, not cluttered and simply stunning. The outdoor space was a great place to eat even though it rained quite a bit.  The heating element outside kept us warm and there are lots of throws and blankets if you need more.  The fridge had champagne, a gorgeous cheese plate, yogurt, fruit, milk (all our choices), crackers and more. This was in the top 2 airbnb's I've stayed in (and I am a veteran!). The walk into Avalon village was easily done via a pathway, just a few minutes away. The unit is quiet with blackout shades on every window. You will be very pleased with your choice.

Bens apartment is in a great location in Sydney close to great restaurants, museums, bars and shopping - Everything you need. Ben was also very friendly,  helpful and communicative. We would highly recommend !
Great experience with Paul's apartment. Everything is nice, available, ready and fit for use. Very good location and easy to access. Highly recommend!
Konrad and Mish are very nice. And their friendly dog is so cute. It is a really nice place. I spent a nice week here.
Great place, highly recommend
Maria communicates well & is easy to deal with

Shuang and Hongfen were gracious and thoughtful hosts. Descriptive instructions made check in easy. The room was clean and comfortable, and very conveniently located near the international airport terminal.
Natasa was a wonderful host! I felt so welcomed. The room was lovely and bright and its a sweet neighbourhood, close to trains, cafes and pubs. Would recommend.

Kassandra's place was perfect and easily slept the 6 of us! It was bigger than the pictures made out! We could easily walk to Newtown and we were a 2 minute drive to the Marrickville metro shopping centre, which made it easy to grocery shop. Kassandra was so lovely and welcoming. Such a lovely spot! I'm jealous!

Place was great but if you need to get a hold of the host for any reason at all you were screwed. Messaged them the first night of my week long trip there and never heard from them. Luckily it wasn’t anything majorly important but had to go buy my own towels.
We had a great stay at Nathan's place. Ideal location and good communication. Would happily stay again

Une vue magnifique, des personnes adorables et réactives, de bons conseils, une belle déco, du confort, parfait ! L'appartement est un peu excentré mais très bien desservi, un avantage pour s'évader de cette grande ville de Sydney dans un cadre super zen. Top !

It was great to meet Angela and be welcomed into her lovely home.  While it's not close to the city center (about 45 mins away via public transit), it's definitely close to the Airport (15 mins away) and the beach (5-10 min walk).  Uber or taxi is definitely the best way to reach this place from the airport though public transit can be an option if you have a lot of time.

Bring your strong arms as you have to take your luggage up to the third floor as they don't have a lift.  But, once you reach to her unit, you'll be rewarded with a great retreat.  The house is very clean and the room was spacious.  There's a big window besides the bed that brings in lots of natural light and there's even a TV in the room! Angela wasn't home the evening we stayed so we weren't able to converse more.  But all in all, my family and I had a very comfortable and enjoyable stay.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location. Great price. Great house. Great hosts. Definitely recommend & would definitely go back. Thanks Steve & Carole
Beautifully clean. Comfortable bed. Great location. Easy access and check in. We will be back

Wyatt is a great host! Always give you some tips about the city and chates with you if you like.
The house is great and you have everything that you need. Bus station is just 1 minute away and you get to the city or to the famous beaches!
When we come back to sydney i stay in that house again!

Great location to stay in Sydney. A few minutes walk to Kings Cross Station which is just 2 stops away from Bondi Junction and Town Hall. Lots of food options around the area. Paul was very prompt and polite to us.
Incredible! Lovely location, and a stylish comfortable apartment
Nice clean apartment in a secure building. Close to the shops and the city. Great for extended stays. Hosts are very responsive and even gave us an early check in.
Lovely spot to stay for a bit. Stayed with a few friends. The balcony is great. Would love to stay again

This is an attractive, comfortable and spacious place, with a welcome outdoor terrace and sitting area. The rooms are large and comfortable, and the breakfast supplies are a bonus. Highly recommended as a base to explore the northern beaches.

We stay in Linda's cosy house for 5 nights! Linda is very kind who prepare many food for our stay! The location of the house is close to Sydney's attractions and only 5 minutes walk to the train station! Linda is helpful to our problems in Wifi and TV! The only things need to concern is you may feel a little bit hot for the third people who sleep on the sofa at night, but you can turn on the fan or cooler if you want! Thanks Linda!
Great location, and works for a group

Chloe's apartment was very convenient for us as it is in a great location. You can easily walk to Circular Quay, The Rocks, Darling Harbour etc if that's what you are in Sydney for. The beds were very comfortable. Chloe was a very good host, very flexible and accomodating. Would highly recommend staying here.
Thank you David for being such a wonderful host. Got me settled in pretty quick and was helpful in answering my queries promptly

Pontos positivos:
Localização excelente no centro, perto de parada de ônibus e de metrô, mercado grande, restaurantes, bares, no centro de Sydney. 
Apartamento grande de um quarto  e tudo novo, com varanda. 
Muito bem equipado (forno, fogão, geladeira, máquina de lavar roupa, máquina de secar, chaleira, torradeira, micro-ondas, mesa na sala com cadeiras, dois sofás, TV, cama muito confortável no quarto, ótimo chuveiro). Comodidades interessantes (shampoo, condicionador, sabonete líquido de banho, papéis higiênicos, detergente, secador, etc). 
Coffee é muito prestativo, responde no chat do airbnb muito rapidamente sempre. Check in e check out ocorreram perfeitamente. 
Pontos a melhorar:
Aquecedor não estava funcionando durante a minha estadia. 
Tampa da banheira era pequena e não segurava a água, portanto não conseguimos utilizar ela. 
Sofá cama para a terceira pessoa é desconfortável, o colchão é bem fino (uns 5cm de altura), fica a sugestão de, futuramente, trocar por um sofá cama mais confortável.

The house is spacious and in a great location. The two terraces are a lovely way to spend an evening with a bottle of wine. Jeremy is a very responsive host and fixed a couple of very minor things (bulbs out) we asked for straight away and with minimal fuss. There is no air con which means the house gets very hot in the warm weather.

Anita was an absolutely wonderful host, and her place is simply beautiful. She has really put some thought into making the place special for her Airbnb guests. Every day I was just delighted to wake up to the cool summer breeze and gorgeous ocean view. You can see a good part of the ocean straight out the window, and it's really nice to see the sun, surf, swimmers and surfers out there having fun. Icebergs is just a couple of steps away and there is the stunning Bondi to Bronte right outside. It would also be a good writers retreat - I finished a first draft of my PhD dissertation here! The apartment has everything you need for a perfect holiday, and lots of thoughtful little touches everywhere. This is absolutely up there with the best Airbnb experience I've ever had. I would recommend it to everyone. I will be coming back as soon as I can!
Good location. Nice accommodation. Hosts were very nice. Would recommend.
Great location for any Olympic Park events. The apartment is spacious and has great views!
Amazing place and host!

Wonderful space in a great location. The apartment was spotlessly clean and very welcoming. Every light welcomed us when we arrived near midnight after an unpleasant flight and roadworks near the airport and it felt like we had found a quiet oasis after a hectic trip.

The supplied croissants, bread, wine, fruit, milk (and other things I have forgotten) were all great and helped us survive our early morning business meeting.

If you are coming to Watson's Bay, this place should definitely be on top of your list. We loved the village feel of the place, even though it is on the edge of Sydney and hosts a fairly major tourist attraction (The Gap). We are more than happy to recommend it.

Highlights:
1.  The food
2.  The garden outlook and sense of privacy
3.  The welcome provided to us by Neil, the host
4.  Proximity to spectacular locations and lovely walks

Problems:
The only thing that we could call a problem was that the Wifi kept dropping out BUT Neil specifically came to tell us about the problem and apologise and to tell us that a technician was coming out the next day to fix it. In other words, whilst the loss of Wifi was a little inconvenient, we cannot fault the response.

You get exactly what it says on the tin - with the addition of a most charming host. Kariem seemed willing to do almost anything to make my stay as perfect as possible. I was even taught how to make barista coffee, a serious bonus! 
I was concerned about the cold - but my room was warm and a wool underlay was provided for my bed (I don't like electric blankets), there was heating in the lounge. The apartment gets a good deal of natural sunlight.
I arrived very early in the morning, Kariem stayed home from work to welcome me and make sure I had everything I needed. He even offered to take me into the CBD when he went in.
I can fully recommend this. It is perfect for one person needing to be in this beautiful part of Sydney.
There is also great storage for your luggage and draws as well as hanging.

Great location, great for family, plenty of amenities and supplies provided and quick helpful host .  Would definitely stay again.
Book about property was great for advice as well as house information and history.
Thanks for a great stay

Cushie was great. Good communication. The place is not the same as in photos. The place was not very well cleaned and the furnitures were old, from the 70s. The location is amazing though - real disconnection from the city. I would not recommend this place if you are after a bit of comfort. Ideal for a yoga retreat.

Thank you for such an amazing stay. We really enjoyed our time and it was everything we expected. Loved the apartment  and swimming pool was a plus. We only just realised a few days in that there was a bus stop right round the corner from us. This came in very handy. Close to the casino, close to shopping malls, close to a supermarket. Even had Netflix which made our time that much more enjoyable during our downtime. 20min walk to cbd and nearest train station. Only thing I could recommend is having a more powerful fan as we ended up sleeping with the sliding door open. I ended up getting bitten a few times. But other then that was an awesome stay. Thank you for being a lovely host.
Overall great value and centrally located
Room was clean, amenities good and reasonably priced. Great for a quick getaway to the northern beaches. Cathy was friendly and helpful.

Really enjoyed our nights stay in the heart of Paddington.  So close to Boutique Shops, Cafes and Iconic Paddington Pubs.  
We were made very welcome and loved the ambience of the quirky decor.
Would definitely stay again.

Katrena and David
The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nicole is a lovely host to deal with, very kind and helpful.  The apartment self is excellent, beautifully decorated and extremely comfortable to live in and the location is brilliant
Great little place. The location is perfect, lots to do near by and the train service at kings Cross is super handy. The hosts are top as well.
Exactly as described host friendly and warming
Had another Host cancel on me one evening and Min was able to confirm my last minute request and have his parents show me around. Much appreciated.

Very nice little studio apartment. Looks exactly like the pictures. We only saw Cath very briefly but she made the whole process very easy. Good selections of breakfast items and a great bathroom, lounge room is small but functional. This studio may not suit you if you're a light sleeper it has a lot of natural morning light and planes flying close by. Location is smack in the middle of 3 train lines all about 15mins walk away.
Not super close to the city center, but good if you have a car to park and don't want to pay.
Thanks for a good stay!
Close to amenities, lovely, clean & good value for money.
Excellent location in a quiet secure building. Enjoyed my stay.

Perfect central apartment, walkable to everything you need and very close to public transportation options as well. Desireé was an absolutely fantastic host, stocking the kitchen with the necessities and even a bottle of wine! She communicated everything up front very clearly and had great recommendations in her guidebook. We were very comfortable in the apartment for our stay and would highly recommend to anyone looking to explore the Sydney area!
lovely place with everything you’d want for a short or longer stay

Beautiful Apartment!!! Super tidy and clean, easy Check-In, awesome location - just a comfortable walk to opera house and CBD. 
A lot of fantastic restaurants in the area. 
Hop-On/Off Tour-Bus has a stop in 3 minutes walking distance to the unit. 
Love this place and would definitely come back !

The place is perfect and is accurately described. We were greeted by Mohit and his fiance upon arrived. They were lovely and welcoming when showing us the apartment and the surroundings. The apartment was clean, stylish and had everything you would need for a comfortable stay. We left a cardigan at the apartment and Mohit kindly offered to mail it back to us. I would highly recommend this place - great value for money!

We really love Linda's apartment and it is really near to the city thus making everything feels convenient. We also enjoyed the facility given at Linda's house and thank you for the timtam! so good we love it!! Definitely a place you want to stay if you are going to sydney :P

Great place to stay! Very good location neat and tidy apartment. Secure parking for the car was a huge bonus. Linda was lovely to deal with and very helpful during all aspects of our stay. Would highly recommend and recommend Linda. Easy to contact before during and after our stay.  Thank u so much once again! If ever revisiting sydney will book again!
Very clean and spacious! Lots of amenities included. Evan is wonderful with communication! Great price! Definitely recommend this place!

Nathan's charming beach-style apartment was perfect for our family weekend get away. It had everything we needed, and Nathan even added little extra touches, like the chocolates and soaps. The bus stop, right out the front, was very convenient, allowing us access to all areas of Sydney. It was also wonderful to spend the day sightseeing, and come back to Maroubra beach to relax. A fantastic spot. Thank you again Nathan, for your hospitality.

Wayne and Kate's apartment is in an amazing position across from Tamarama Beach. It's spacious, clean, airy and peaceful, it was the perfect getaway for my dads 70th. Their instructions were clear and everything was perfect. Thanks so much for making our dad's bday a great one. He had a blast.

We had a lovely stay!! and were pleasantly surprised to find that the studio was just as well presented and cleanly kept as in the photos. Belinda was incredibly welcoming on arrival and very respectful of our privacy during our stay.
Nice place right by the beach and airport. Would recommend
My partner and I had the most amazing time. The studio was lovely and was located in a gorgeous garden. Susan really went to great lengths to ensure we had a pleasant stay.

Very nice place to stay with family. Felt like home environment, neat and clean. Good security system. Liked it very much and enjoyed our stay for 4 days. Very good communication with Mohit and his wife. They are really good and helpful. Definitely suggest you to stay there for holiday.
A great place to stay, clean, in a great location and very comfortable. I really enjoyed my stay and would definitely stay again.

I stayed at Agata’s place for the first three weeks after I moved to Sydney, and I absolutely loved the apartment. It’s a self-contained apartment with a private entrance and a wonderful patio, which is particularly delightful during the Australian summer. The place felt very much like home right away, and it’s close to buses and local shops and restaurants. Buses take less than 30 minutes to the beach and the city, and UNSW and Randwick village are both within walking distance. The bed is comfortable and the TV has Netflix, while both the kitchen and bathroom is equipped with all the basics (such as shampoo, soap, toothpaste, essential toiletries, washing powder, milk, oil, salt, pepper, etc.). Agata was a fabulous host: she was quick to respond to requests (such as replacing the bug spray when it ran out), and kindly received some mail for me too. I couldn’t have wished for a better place to start off my time in Sydney, and I highly recommend Agata’s place!

Cath is a super host and fellow frequent traveler and this is very evident in the garden studio.  There are tons of personal touches and amenities that make you feel like you are staying at a very close friend's place.  If you forgot anything at home, she probably has it neatly tucked away in a corner of the studio.  We had a wonderful stay.

The place is really cozy, clean, and tidy. Self check-in is really easy and convenient. Check in anytime to a bedroom with ensuite and kitchenette was great for our last minute trip to Sydney.
The neighborhood was quiet, we had a good sleep.
ขอบคุณมากๆสำหรับการต้อนรับที่อบอุ่น

Wow. That is what every said when they entered the place - stylish, huge, and can easily take ten people without feeling crowded.  Indeed we had a dinner of 15+ people with takeaway from the local Thai and the rooms had a great vibe for that kind of relaxed get together. We could walk to North Sydney station or down to Mc Masons Point ferry to give lots of flexible access. A very good neighbourhood with good restaurants and walks by the harbour - put the place itself is in a very quiet street.  And Vanessa was wonderfully responsive to any small issues we had or advice that was needed.  A wonderful place for a large group.

Danny's 3 bedroom apartment was as describe on the website.  all of the necessary amenities were set up nicely.  the internet was hard to connect to unless in the bedrooms. but overall it was a great place to stay an in the best location.  Public transportation was very near and many sites to visit were within walking distance or by bus.  We enjoyed the ability to cook or go out to eat.  The apartment was stocked like home.  the availability of a washer and drying made it even more attractive.  Clean and set up great...

Loved our stay and communication with Host Lina... thank you! Very quiet and clean space. The rooms and living area were bigger than expected, which was great. My dad and I stayed for the Ironman in Penrith, we needed and  good kitchen, relaxing space, quiet and clean... ALL were appreciated. Will stay next year :)
This apartment is in an amazing location with amazing views of manly beach. The apartment is spacious and beautifully styled. Would highly recommend

The garden studio was a wonderful little place in Marrickville, close to new cafes popular in Sydney!  Cath was a fantastic host and provided more than we expected. We'd recommend couples to stay for a little hideaway away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

Jared's place is in a great location on the 6th floor of Bridge Street, in the heart of the city. He manages quite a few properties across the world, so we did not get to meet him personally. 

We took the train and got off at Circular Quay and walked about 10 minutes with our luggage. It was a great jump off point to catch the cruise ships, the Royal Botanical Gardens, and the Sydney Opera House. 

Ana, the local agent, had a limited schedule, but dropped off our keys at the apartment and was very communicative throughout the check-in and check-out process. The room was fit to sleep 6 adults and was spacious enough for my family. The place did smell of disinfectant and the carpet showed some signs of wear. 

Keep in mind that you are in the city, so train and traffic noise will be part of the experience. We  really enjoyed being in a centralised location. We would consider this place again for a future stay.

Shuang was on holidays during my trip which was well communicated beforehand, so my check in was with Fen. The place was exactly as described and pictured. It was very clean and has all the necessities for a comfortable stay. Was also conveniently located near Woolworths the supermarket and Wolli Creek train station which is surrounded by a few restaurants, cafe's and other small stores. Would definitely recommend Shuang's place.
Great house and location
Great location, lovely helpful hosts.
위치가 정말 좋아요. 기차역과 시드니 오페라 하우스도 매우 가깝습니다.

Had trouble with the drainage in the shower, but told Jennifer who was quite responsive & cooperative, hopefully it will be fixed by the next occupants stay.
Bed wasn’t too comfortable but the room was nice.

David was a very friendly host. The room suits all our needs: clean, comfortable bed and nice balcony. We recommand this place very much. Nice neighbourhood with lost of good restaurants. Thanks David for your hospitality.
Great apartment in a perfect location

Close to train station, market and some restaurants. Walkable distance to Airport. Neighbors are a bit noisy but we did no better, either, because we can hear almost everything through the thin wall. The host are really nice.

Excellent location for those keen to walk around the local area, and there's plenty of bus routes nearby to get into Bondi junction and/or the city, lovely view and nice big deck.  Kitchen and bathroom could use a bit of updating, but otherwise a great spot.
We had a great stay! Pool is lovely and apt is located in lovely area in northern Sydney. Definitely recommend!

Good communication with our host. Gorgeous dog! Our only real issues were the traffic noise as this location is close to a busy thoroughfare and we stayed during a spell of hot weather and we found the pedestal fan not to be adequate. Good location in terms of close access to public transport.

Susan was a lovely host. Very welcoming and friendly. The house was conveniently located and Susan gave me some great recommendations. The cabin was very comfortable and clean. Would definitely book again.
G & L's place is a perfect place to rest up.

Great stay with DJ! Place was in a great location, cool historic building from 1860's, very clean house, and DJ provided loads of amenities including an entire professional guide to the city, which I took full advantage of & had a blast doing so! Thanks again DJ for hosting in your perfect spot!!
Really close to the Harbour Bridge. Liked the clean and cosy room. Easy checkin/checkout. Would come again!
quite good!

The apartment is just like in the photos and there are 2 great cafes where you can get the famed aussie brekkies. Yums! Location is pretty good but avoid going through King's Cross station if you are coming back late. Instead, there is a bus (311) you can take from Central station that goes right to the door of the apartment. 

Only downside is that the birds/animals? nesting in trees in front of the bedroom can be noisy at night. Haven't figured out what they are since i always thought that birds sleep at night... But all in still a good stay!
Really great place, I would highly recommend staying here. Alexey was a great host very communicative. The apartment had everything you could need and the location was great!

This is a very nice condo, location was awesome.  We walked everywhere and went to some of the restaurants Desiree recommended, we were not disappointed.  Had a great stay and most certainly would love to do it again.
Just be a where it will take you about 1 hr on the bus to get in to the Sydney Opera House
Angela’s place is absolutely wonderful - she has thought of absolutely everything. You are guaranteed a perfect time when you stay here!
Great location. Inna privide many useful information.

The place was close to the airport and the check-in was easy in that you could get in at odd hours. Very convenient if you need to stay the night and need to get to the airport early in the am. 

All the essentials were provided including an iron. You potentially need to share the bathroom and kitchen if there is another tenant in the next room. it didnt matter to me as i only stayed the night. 

Would stay again in the future if i was making a short stop in sydney.

It's a very very good place. The location is so good closed to the airport and there is the IGA supermarket at the door of the apartment. Clean and tidy place. All required equipments are provided including cooking and coffee stuff.

we needed a place to stay nearby due to an ill relative, ended up arriving 5hours after we intended but even at 1am Steven came out to greet us and give any assistance. We just needed a place to crash and it turned out to be quite convenient and close to what we needed access to. Would stay again!
Close to shops, public transport  and eateries!

Review:
Ann was a thoughtful, generous  host with a sense of humour.  We had a freshly painted bedroom with heated king sized waterbed overlooking a marvellous garden by the river.  We stayed in bed until mid-morning. The buffet was enough food for the day!  She had local honey, home-made yoghurt and fruit and herbs fresh from the garden to make teas also top coffee.  Her house is packed with treasures and stories about the island and the Hawkesbury.  We'll be back!!

The place was enermous for the 3 of us, 
It's a new building so everything is clean and tidy
They even have the netflix

Bus station nearby, get to town in approx 20mins - 35mins, by uber to town cost 30aud

Anne's place was perfectly adequate for a one night stay in Newport although the place we stayed in is not the same as the photographs. We were also unsure which of the areas we could access as the flat is attached to the main house. But we appreciated the snacks that were left for us and the apartment was clean and tidy.
很糟糕的入住体验,房间和位置还行,但是房东不负责任,没有及时回应,一共入住4天3晚,第一天买了一袋食物晚上烧,煤气灶头却坏了,跟房东反馈,房东说明天上午来检修,让我们用BBQ炉子,第二天等了一整天,没有任何人联系来修理,房东只说抱歉,却没有任何行动,要等到第三天才来修理,BBQ也没有液化气无法使用!房东也只会说不好意思,很不负责!房间里面 硕大的蟑螂有好几只看见,很可怕!
Pretty much as advertised. Stunning view!! Lovely health cafe at the end of the road. Some nice walks. Just a really nice getaway for us.
Very great location ! Will definitely stay here again!
Jyoti and Uttam were so lovely and accomodating. They were super helpful with travel tips and made me feel very welcome. My highest reccomendations for this Airbnb.
We are regulars and it is always a treat.

We really loved our stay at Cathy's place. Location is very nice, close to everything but in a quiet surrounding. Cathy is a very nice lady who does everything she can to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Everything was very clean and she provided us with stuff for breakfast, towels.. Such a shame we had very bad weather. Perfect excuse to return one time :) We can really recommend Cathy's place! :)
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Long story short: My original place that I booked for my vacation was a noshow so as a last minute booking, I could not have been happier. It is above a shopping complex but you don't get the noise of the shoppers as you're 5 floors up. It is next to a main bus terminal and eventually on a rail line, so you won't be too far from town. 

The hosts were super flexible and were always available, if needed. I know when I return to Sydney, I will be booking this place again.
Nice hosts, great location,

My family and I had a fantastic stay in Rachel's home. The house was beautiful and very clean. I chose this place because the photos looked amazing and it did not disappoint. I got ready for my wedding here and the house provided the perfect backdrop for our photos. 
The 2 main beds upstairs were large and comfortable. Very spacious bedrooms with lots of wardrobe space. The only draw back was that it didn't have enough curtains in one of the rooms so it became really bright and sunny early in the morning when we wanted to sleep in. The single bed downstairs was great. 
It was great having two toilets, one up stairs in the main bathroom and one downstairs in the laundry room next to the single room. That way we didn't have to go up and down the stairs for the toilet. 
Another draw back was that two of the steel chairs on the dining table were missing its seat cushion so I used the bar stool cushions but it may be time to replace them. Also, the 2 single sofa chair cushions were old and worn out. It was covered by a blanket so you couldn't tell, but when you sat on it, the cushion would slide off the sofa with you on it. 
We had everything that we needed like bath towels and extra blankets (the weather was cold during our stay). It was a 5 minute walk to the local shops and restaurants which was super handy. The garage provided was super handy too because street parking in Mosman fills up pretty quickly. 
I did not get to meet Rachel in person but we communicated via mobile phones. Thank you for allowing us to stay at your lovely home.

Sarah's place was perfect for my event & her hospitality was beyond lovely. The neighbour kept leaf blowing which made the pool dirty but without me even asking the entire household went to so much effort to clean it before my guests arrived for the event despite having a broken cleaner! It was so sweet. The only thing that was a little tricky is that I didn't realise the private space did not have a kitchen, and the door kept falling off it's hinges. Luckily Sarah let me do my cooking in her family space so all was well. An amazing happy go-lucky host who deserves more appreciation! thank you so much! I hope to stay again :)
Great unit close to everything. We stayed several times and it’s great value for money in Manly

Baileys house is great there are many areas to have your own space. Beautiful view and decor very relaxing and tasteful. Can’t wait to stay again! Thanks again
Chris & Marcia Allen
Very responsive. Great location

This location can't be beat, especially for the price! About two blocks from the ferries and walking distance to several sites, bars and restaurants. Communication was good also. Would definitely stay here again!

Gabbie helped us with the check-in and everything around the Airbnb. The place is more spacious as expected on the photos and the location is amazing - right by Darling harbour! Gabbie responded to queries very quickly, which was very helpful. Unfortunately the fridge wasn’t working properly, however she managed it super well and even got a new fridge within 1 day of telling her. Very impressed! I would highly recommend this place, the only thing which is a bit of a shame is the lack of natural light (as buildings are built so close to each other in Sydney) and the main bedroom faces the hallway within the building, however if you’re not planning to be indoors all day this is the place for you! Thanks Gabbie

Nice beach escape! Lovely view to wake up to each morning.  Many areas to gather with the family. Might get a little hot in the summer tho, as there is no air-conditioning. But many fans provided. Place needs a little more maintenance but overall still cozy and nice. Good responsive host too.
Lovely host. Thanks for a great stay!

Loved staying at Gwennaelles place! She couldn’t have been more responsive or given more local tips - so helpful! It was a short walk from the beach and I just enjoyed spending my time at Bondi. This area has a great vibe in the summer and has everything you need for a great getaway. The space is exactly as shown, comfortable, and with plenty of space.

A lovely apartment, great location and David and Cassandra made communication  super easy and were extremely prompt with responses.
We would certainly stay there again.
good

A great spot to stay in Central Sydney. 

Ein großartiger Ausgangspunkt, um aus zentraler Lage heraus Sydney zu erkunden. Nette und hilfsbereite Nachbarn, persönlicher Kontakt schnell möglich. Sehr schön und persönlich eingerichtet; man hat das Gefühl, bei Freunden zu Gast zu sein. Die Küche ist komplett eingerichtet, um selber zu kochen und sich wie zu Hause zu fühlen.

Lucy and Ralph were both very friendly, nice and easy to talk to. Such a nice, HUGE place to stay, and absolutely loved all the green in the gardens! Was very relaxing coming home to the waterfall going in the pond. 
Thank you so much for having myself and Jade whilst we were training for work. I highly recommend Lucy and Ralph’s home to anyone!
A nice little place, and a great location! We didn't have any troubles here and thoroughly enjoyed our stay :)
Studio32 was a great Airbnb with everything you needed. It was clean, thoughtful and situated in a quiet alleyway. Highly recommended.
Roberts Place was great for our whole family...house was clean and close enough for a stroll into Cronulla mall for coffee or food. Will defiantly stay again if the family heads back to Cronulla
Perfect location and nice room

Hugo was very friendly, the apartment has a lot of small thought out nice touches to make your stay more convenient.  
The listing is very accurate, what you see on the photo's is what you get. The building is old but not noisy and the bed very comfortable. Good location for getting around Sydney, would recommend staying here to any of our friends!

We stayed in the apartment for an even held at Qudods Bank Arena. It was the perfect location, we were able to duck out for a quick shop to the DFOs and a quick easy walk to our event. 
The apartment was excellent the beds were really comfy and having 2x bathrooms suited us well.

Wayne and Kate were friendly hosts who remained easy to contact throughout our stay. The location of the apartment was fantastic - just across the road from Tamarama beach. You can hear the waves crashing on the beach as you fall asleep. We had some noisy neighbours on the Saturday night (that was obviously no fault of the hosts) but otherwise it was a very enjoyable stay. The kitchen is well equipped for cooking, and the apartment was comfortable for the 6 of us. We were lucky to have warm winter weather when we visited and thoroughly enjoyed the beach track walks to Bondi and Coogee.

Jennifer went over and above the call of duty in making us feel as though we were welcome guests in her beautiful property.  She left us wine, chocolates, milk and other provisions on arrival which were such a treat as we were too tired to go to the shops.  Jenny also took the time to explain the bus and ferry routes and gave us information about where to visit.  The property was most definitely a home and I appreciated that Jenny trusted us to stay in her home and to treat it with respect, which I hope we did.  It is an honour to have someone place so much trust in another person, especially as every item in the property was so obviously a much treasured possession.  I would love to stay at this property again at some time in the future.

Angela and Geoff were wonderful hosts, providing extra touches and attention to our needs. They really went out of their way! The communication was great and everything went smoothly. What a lovely space. The kids loved it. Thank you!

Absolutely loved staying with Naveen! The room was incredible (even better in person), apartment was stunning and she went into every detail to make sure we had everything we could possibly need. Having our own bathroom was so convenient as well and the location was great - everything you could need was close by and the train station was a short walk. Naveen was also great help with transport & places to go and eat. Will definitely be staying again next time I'm in Sydney!

This was my first AIRBNB Experience, I truly enjoyed the creative and functional space. Three balconies were incredible, great city skyline views. Very quiet building. It is close to the train station, but this does quiet down around 11pm every night. 

The place is warm, the heaters are warmer and the two guest bathrooms meant I could enjoy the privacy of my own space and visitors could use the one upstairs. 

The tv didn’t quite work with limited reception; but if you don’t want to watch television or sports the whole time you’re there - head on out and experience SYDNEY night life just a stone throw away and in some cases, right next door! If you want a cheap quick eat - dominos pizza is down stairs; that was great for a sobering up recovery with my parents who visited. 

For my first AIRBNB experience this house was exceptional and Alexey was very hospitable, I had planned on visiting with my partner but they broke up with me before I arrived from Melbourne. Alexey was very sweet leaving a bottle of wine for me and checking in on me to make sure I was okay. 

All in all an amazing experience.

Excellent stay at Bondi. All you can want in closeness to restaurants, the beach, busses and still have a secluded feel to it. The house had everything we needed and it was great for the kids also. We can highly recommend the house and the host Cat.
Beautiful place, perfect view. Richard was v communicative. Had an awesome couple of days with my work colleagues.

We really enjoyed our stay at Don's place. It's such a cozy little studio in a good location. Very quiet and comfortable. Don is a fantastic host who let us stay longer on the check out day as our flight was not until late evening. The place has everything you need and is super clean. Would definitely stay again in the future!
Really nice apartment in a great location close to Avalon beach. Photos don’t do it justice!

The accommodation was in a quiet location close to everything in Newtown. It was more of a hostel than we expected as the other rooms of the town house were also rented out via Airbnb. As we did not spend any time in the house apart from sleeping at night and showering in the mornings we never really met any of the other people staying there. The only negative bit would be that my sister was sleeping on a mattress on the floor and there was no top sheet for her and only bare blankets and no doona. When we asked for a top sheet as it feels fresher miss d said: "why would you need that?". When we arrived to the accommodation there was also an unwashed plate in the kitchen, which we got a message about the next day implying that we had left it. As we never had any breakfast at the accommodation but went out to eat it could not have been us. We did not reply to that message though as we felt it had nothing to do with us, and maybe the guest which left the plate had cleaned up after him or herself. 
I am sorry if we came across as rude guests asking for the top sheet and not replying to the message about the plate. But for guests coming in the future: if there is dishes left by other people, maybe just do them for the sake of peace or tell miss d immediately, and if you are more than two people staying in one room, you can maybe bring a set of travel sheets for the one not sleeping in the bed.
We never met miss d and only communicated via this app. The house was clean and if you just need somewhere close to sleep it is a good place to stay.
Kind regards
Great place to stay and only about a 10 min walk to St Peter’s station, with a king st and Newtown just around the corner!
Fantastic views from this Unit overlooking Darling Harbour. Quick easy lift access. Looking forward to returning

Gavin was a very good host and helped us planning our stay. The room and all the facilities were clean and the bed was very comfortable. The location is a good starting point for the exploration of the whole of Sydney and with the detailed directions from Gavin, it's also easy to find. All in all we can only recommend the stay!
Good location to Featherdale Wildlife Park and Blue Mountain.

10/10. Fantastic apartment located right in the center of Sydney. Amazing views, full service amenities plus more, close to absolutely everything. Hugo was easy to deal with, welcoming, friendly, and very helpful. The listing details and photos are very accurate. The views of Hyde Park, Royal Botanical Gardens and the Sydney Harbour are lovely. The apartment was extremely clean and well kept; it had a cosy, warm, homestyle type of feel. A very refreshing place to retreat to after a day out. I found it much more private and comfortable compared to normal Sydney hotels and apartments. After staying for a few days I almost didn't want to go home. I'd highly recommend this apartment listing to anyone wishing to stay in Sydney whether it's your first time and you want to see all the tourist locations or even if you travel to Sydney regularly and just want a great place to check in to, like a home away from home. I'll definitely look at staying here again on my next trip to Sydney. Thankyou Hugu, your hosting is very much appreciated.

Marcella's place is very big and got lots of book. Near to the beach. But the floor is quite dirty and dust. We even need buy a mop to clean it by our own as we need to stay there for 4 days. Overall is great and nice.

Great position, within walking distance of all the major CBD attractions and inner city suburbs like Darlinghurst, Surry Hills and Woolloomooloo. 

Our host was very friendly and thorough, and easy to deal with. 

The accomodation itself was fine - 5 beds (incl 3 doubles) in 3 bedrooms.  Awesome easterly view from the 13th floor. Perfect for a boys weekend. The fridge didn't work although I can't mark my host down for that as I didn't contact her to give her a chance to fix.

Wow... EXCELLENT indeed. From the moment I stepped in. I felt completely welcomed. The host is excellent, great and very respectful. Really excellent always. The host told me I have unlimited supply to towels. I felt home. I can use everything in the kitchen. Very clean. This is something you will notice. The place is really clean. Clear instruction.  I was offered to use the washing machine. There is a natural feeling of feeling comfy there. The area is great. It is close to Newtown walking distance. Few minutes from train station. 
Train is 5 to 10 minutes from Central station in Sydney. Once you're in Central station you're in the city and you can walk around. 
A++++ Would love to revisit someday. Excellent!
Top spot, and very hospitable hosts! We'll surely be back again
Clean, spacious and comfortable room. Rhonda is a great host.

Absolutely fab location. Very central and a stones throw from darling harbour. Lovely large apartment, comfy beds and plenty of room. Would definitely use the apartment again if we get back to Sydney.
Great location at great price with good communicating host

Thank you so much Belinda for the stay in your lovely cottage. The space is perfect - clean, modern design, peppered with lovely vintage touches. We loved looking out the windows onto your lush garden and it was a treat to be so close to such a stunning beach. It's the ideal home base for exploring the Royal National Park. Hope to be back again!

Duncan’s place offered the perfect family break for us. It’s very accessible from Sydney but gives the feeling of being far away from it all. The location is great being just a short drive from several beaches, shops, cafes etc. The house is incredibly well equipped with everything you can think of and the host went out of their way to provide helpful information and little touches which made us feel very at home. It’s a very sociable home with several eating and entertaining spots in the house: an upper balcony & bbq overlooking the treetops and ocean as well as a lower deck, dining table and bbq area downstairs. The garden is private and the pool area lovely for lounging around under a shady tree. We would have no hesitation recommending Duncan’s place.

A great place to stay and enjoy the beaches and walks available in the Royal National Park. Its private and stylish with easy access to the local beaches and within walking distance to local shops and super market. Highly recommended.
A great place to stay. Ian is lovely and so responsive! The area is awesome and the apartment is lovely.. thanks so much Ian we will be back!!!

The location was perfect for what we needed, with the apartment being clean, tidy and easy to access. 
Apartment came as described and communication with Ana was faultless. 
The mattresses were firmer than our personal taste, but linen and rooms were clean. 
Noise levels can vary, but not something the owner can prevent or control. 

Overall the apartment comes accurately described and located in a great area!
Great place. Stylish, great bathroom and bed and the kitchenette is perfect to make easy meals. A/c in summer a blessing as well.
Susan was a nice host and helpful in helping us with our sight seeing and transport.  The cabin is on it's own in the back yard which was nice for privacy. We were pleased with our stay.

Griffin was an exceptional host with great hospitality. He was very welcoming and experienced with his explanations and tips. Really appreciate the aesthetically designed apartment with complementary condiments provided by Griffin! Overall, extremely pleased with Griffin, the apartment and it’s convenient location (very near the train station and surrounded by lots of food)! (:
Angela's house was very good. The room is clean and nice better than the pictures. And angela and her son were very kind! Nearby here, there is the brighton le sands beach. That was great also.
Had a great stay with DJ even though it was only for a couple of nights, he was a very welcoming and considerate host. Definitely would recommend a stay there.
Excellent location, very comfy bed and Gavin great host, excellent value for money
A great property! The best furniture and layout for a family getaway! The location is awesome too with lots around!
Great location, slightly old carpets and walls... No aircon is the main disadvantage considering the humid climate.
Such a great location for going to events in Olympic Park!

Mal's place in central Bondi was perfect. A great location, just over the road from the beach and close to cafes, restaurants and bars and a clean and comfortable top floor apartment with a great view. Highly recommend.
Jackie is an amazing host! Would definitely stay here again. Beautiful, clean, and walking distance to cafes and shops!
我所说一切属实,纯属个人观点和体会｡

A great place with absolutely amazing hosts! They left us food, directions for the whole house, and gave us rides to the train station. They were extremely welcoming and helpful. The place itself is spacious and comfortable, close by bus stops to all areas of Sydney. Right by a great park. Would recommend to anyone, we loved our stay!

A great place to stay if you are in need of last minute  or budget accommodation. Steve and Jesse are lovely and specifically came to introduce themselves to me after I arrived.  Parking on the street in the evening was fine and the location was convenient for me to get to roads that took me to the CBD, North Sydney and the Airport. 
As I was in Sydney on business, it would not be somewhere I would normally stay, but I found it safe and convenient. 
Thanks Steven and Jesse for your hospitality.

Cath is a superb, warm and friendly host and was quick to respond to any queries we had during the booking process. The studio is just like it is shown in the pics being even better than a hotel stay. It is fully equipped with everything you need and it has everything as described on the Airbnb site. We were blown away with the fresh and tasty eggs Cath provided us from her own chickens on site. Her breakfast hamper has fresh bread, yogurt, muesli, milk and other baked goods that was more than what we needed. Cath is very thoughtful and considerate of her guests and will provide you all the information required to travel, eat and be like a local which is what we wanted to do in our Sydney stay. We also loved her sense of style and the way she has done up the Garden studio. Also there is a lovely vegetable patch with herbs and greens right outside the studio. Very pretty.  The little details matter like the umbrellas, picnic basket, extra blankets, etc that were provided to us. The studio is not located within the CBD area but that was not a problem at all since we were commuting around via trains and buses and did not find any issues doing so. Also it is in a suburb very close to the central area so you are still pretty close. Besides Marickville has some of the best food and coffee options that we explored in our trip. Stay at the Garden studio and you will not be disappointed. We were sad to leave and only wished we could have stayed longer. This has surely been our best AirBnb stay till date. 

P.S. Just make sure you are okay to stay in a loft like bed with a movable ladder to climb up and down which may not suit everyone. That was a highlight for us though and we wanted to experience it :)

We had a great stay in Cathy’s studio - had everything we needed, nicely furnished & a cosy space.
Would recommend & stay again 
Cath was great to deal with

This unit was perfect. Great size, brilliant location,  eateries close by, Darling Harbour just a stroll. Massive amount of storage and space in each room, comfy beds, great view. Would definitely stay there again.

The apartment is confortable, spacious and well decorated. The bed is amazing and I loved the big windows with street views. Victoria was lovely. I was travelling with my husband, arriving from a 20 hour flight from Brazil and she let us check in earlier. We really appreciated it. The neighbourhood is charming and full of nice cafes and restaurants. We had breakfast at Zinc cafe everyday. I highly recommend the property and would definitely stay here again. Thank you, Vickie!
Great stay!

Michele’s place was an awesome stay. It was close enough to Newtown to walk to all the cafes and bars. The room is spacious and very comfortable with amenities to cook small meals if needed. The shower was great and looked very new. The bed was cozy and there was no noise from the street!
I think Michele has really got everything perfected to the last detail. Great value for money and we hope to stay again sometime!
Cathy provided everything we needed for a great stay. It was a lovely room walking distance to the beach. I would definitely recommend!

This terrace was perfect for our party of 3 couples.
The location for cafes pubs or shopping in CBD was awesome not to mention how close it was to Blue start group for City 2 surf .
If you want to be in a safe location close to the action this is a gem.

The apartment is in a great location. It  does not have wifi and as I was spending two week for work it was an inconvenience so do bare this in mind. I tried to contact the hosts about this and did not get a reply from them. After an issue a week later to do with cleanliness Rob their property manager did reply to me and was very kind in offering me a meal for free for the inconvenience and got a cleaner to come in. 
A nice apartment on the whole which  just needs some TLC.

Queen Street is a terrific location with a vibrant village atmosphere, cafes, specialty food stores, boutiques and more. The apartment is full of delightful surprises and charm. So much more than any hotel room. Louise's 5 star hospitality includes sharing her designer furnishings and collectibles with you, the immaculate presentation of the apartment, her warm communication style and her attention to detail to ensure you enjoy every moment of your stay.
Susan was a thoughtful and considerate host.

Wayne and Kate were great hosts from the very first inquiry. Their responses were very timely, in some cases instant, and extremely informative.

Their property is ideal for a relaxed getaway and the views across Tamarama beach from the balcony, study and the main bedroom are stunning... it was very hard to leave! 

Great cafes and parks are within walking distance either way - around to Bondi or Bronte. Bus stops are are five minute walk and in most cases, we could jump on a bus within a few minutes that took us straight to Sydney's CBD. 

Inside the unit Wayne and Kate have thought of everything! We wanted for nothing and could find everything easily. The unit is light and bright and well suited for a family or a group friends.

The champagne on arrival blew us away and the donation from our accommodation fee to the Tamarama Surfing Life Saving Club was so touching, that we all said we would definitely stay there again!

We went to Sydney to participate in the City to Surf fun run and ended up having one of the best long weekends ever!

Thanks Wayne and Kate!

Evelyn and her husband were amazing hosts. Their apartment is clean and spacious. 

We loved having the  pool and the sauna in the apartment and there is an incredible view of the sea.

Our location was perfect with many of the beaches nearby. 

Overall an incredible experience, I would highly recommend Evelyn's apartment to anyone.
A fantastic house in a fantastic location.  Super comfortable place in walking distance to shops, fantastic coffee and the beach.  Treen is a wonderful host and couldn’t be more welcoming.

The apartment is comfortable and roomy. The location is amazing, just a short walk to Kings Cross station and very close to the city. Plenty of lovely cafes and restaurants very close by. Communication with host Naveen is excellent. Concierge service was excellent also.
Excellent communication and location. Would stay here again

We enjoyed our stay at Angela and Geoff's place!! They made us feel very welcome. the communication was great and the apartment was really great with a superb AV installation, this and all other extras made this stay our best Air BnB experience. The apartment is stunning, the space is spotless with absolutely everything that you might need and the location is perfect. if possible we really wou;d like to go back there.

We love Balmain and Jennifer's place is perfect for a quiet house but a short stroll to the centre.  Also the public transport is very accessible from here.  The house is very comfortable and cosy and the garden is very pleasant.

Tracey's place is always an amazing stay as it's cozy and absolutely clean with thoughtful touches. The stylish and trending decor is fantastic! The bed is amazingly comfortable and we love staying here, which is why we keep coming back.
Great communication and easy check in. The house had everything we needed and was clean and comfortable. Having 3 bathrooms was handy for two families.
Palm beach was magical, and Evelyn's place all the more so with fantastic views and wonderful accommodations. A real slice of paradise!

The good thing is location and cleanness. The location is great, near the international airport. A 10-15min walk will get you there. Also, the place was clean, and it was private. 
The downside was the smell. The room was really damp, with a strong smell. It was so strong, that I inly stayed there one night, but it impregnated my cloths. I would suggest increasing the ventilation of the space, or get a dehumidifier.

Fantastic Airbnb stay. Was easy to find, easy check in. Great location and lovely space. Comfy bed and couch, plenty of kitchen utensils, pots etc. for cooking. Avalon is a nice quiet area and very pretty with a charming township.

L’appartement d’Athena a un emplacement exceptionnel. Tous les services sont à proximité ou bien le transport est disponible tous près de l’appartement . Le secteur est très sécuritaire, tout près de Darling Harbour. Plusieurs sympathiques restaurants et cafés .
Nous avons adoré notre séjour.  Le seul élément est le manque d’espace dans la pièce principale. Il n’y a pas de sofa et le coin cuisine est au minimum pour une semaine.
Perfect location for airport. And easy transport into the city. Great apartment
Shuangs place was perfect for an overnight stay before flying out of Sydney.  Really clean and quiet.

I loved the place and the location. Hugo was communicating well before and after my booking. As he was overseas, his friend Oliver took care of the flat. He was very welcoming, solving my luggage problem and hat great tips for dining out. Thank you so much, I will be back.

Bernadette and Freds apartment is stylish and comfortable. 
We were welcomed with a fresh loaf Banana bread and a bottle of wine that set the scene for 10 great days of sunshine and relaxation. 
The apartment is directly across the rd from the beach ,with magnificent views. 
There is an easy walk to the corner cafe that serves great coffee and food., with a fabulous playground across the rd for children or big kids and a golf course at the other end of the rd that has magnificent views  up and down the coast. .
It has easy access into the city with a close bus stop so  we could enjoy the sights around Sydney and  then return to our haven. 
We will be  back ☺
Lovely studio apartment with great views. Neighborhood was nice with great food and a supermarket downstairs. Much better than getting a hotel.
Well appointed place high up in the tree tops with lovely views.
This is a  great spot with great hosts, it was our second stay at Leslie's and we would like to return again :-)
The rooms were fine but the bathroom and kitchen are very dirty and outdated.

DJ was a nice host. He was there upon our arrival. Great location if you want the hustle and bustle of Darlinghurst. House is located in a very quite neighborhood. For two grown adults the room is a little small, plus luggage makes for a tight fit.

Linda is a lovely host...very accomodatiing in answering our queries. Nice and clean place. Near to train station, Redfern and shopping mall, Broadway. Also a wslking distance to Glebe Saturday Market. We had a great time.

Cathy was a friendly and helpful host. The room, bed and bathroom were clean, comfortable and welcoming. The location was a beautiful quiet street. Cathy supplied milk and a great selection of teas. Just what I needed for my stay.  I would definitely go back.
Hi Hernan is the perfect host very polite and thoughtful
The flat would be great for a couple and is well equipped. It is very central and close to everything you need.

Good location next to central station. Fairly spacious unit with lots of amenities. It is particularly suitable for younger people. Alexey is an excellent, caring host. The unit can be hard for taxi or Uber driver to find, but the entrance is just a few meters left of Dominoes Pizza. Light sleepers may have difficulty with light as the blackout curtains do not fully close.
5th time I've stayed. Judy is always very wuick to respond and her easy check in process makes it very flexible when i sometimes have to check in late :)

This place is really good to stay. 
Near the airport, near the city.
Cozy and calm. The Host is very kind. One more thing i liked is i used the laundry and dryer for free.

hugo`s place iTs a great place!!

really nice home and really close to train station, also you can just walk to the best areas in city, 

the house its really full equiped and ready to stay!

we didnt know hugo, but he gave a contact to help us in everything!!! (thanks Oliver you were great!!),

if you are going to Sydney, this house its a must! !

clean and cozy
close to station, city and the university of Sydney
Have three balconies
Convenient for cooking at the unit

It was a wonderful experience! Hernan was so accommodating and kind. We really enjoyed our stay and the apartment was beautifully decorated. I would definitely stay there again next time I'm in Sydney!

Spacious apartment in a very promising location, near to the ferry to circular quay, with beautiful Jacarandas in full view down the streets. However, more pride has to be taken in the maintenance and cleanliness of the apartment.
Excellent host really friendly and accommodating. My girlfriend and I really enjoyed are stay here great location plus it was a nice change to the busy hostel life we are used to

Lovely and very well-kept home. Superb comfort and privacy. Good value and great access via local public transport. Would definitely recommend this place for anyone staying a few days in Sydney, who isn't focused on beaches. Easy 20 mins walk to Newtown and wide selection of eateries, bars and shopping. Can get a bus or train to Sydney centre, beaches or airport with ease. 
Buddy is irresistibly cute and very friendly.
Steve and Carole were very good hosts and very flexible for our needs. 
Highly rated and possibly the best Airbnb experience we had so far in Australia.
apartment styling enpointe for the building era and area very welcoming and relaxing feel whilst in the centre of the city thank you
As picture showed, it is a creative home. Located in eastern sub, easy to access city. The queen size bed is fit for solo traveller more than the couple.
Great place. Highly recommend

I can definitely recommend Ali's place. Beautiful granny flat with all the essentials needed to get by. It is great that there is Netflix and internet included as well as it helps a great deal with entertaining kids now and then when needed. The location is also great with easy access to and from the suburb. 

We really enjoyed our time here.
Victoria was a super host. The place was very clean and looked just like the pictures. It was in prime location. We thoroughly enjoyed staying there.

This is an amazing apartment to stay in. The views are fantastic and Nick’s recommendations on restaurants were spot on. The place is spotless and nice extra touches like meeting me when I arrived even though my timing was out just made my visit more special. Nick is a very thoughtful host and certainly goes that bit extra to make your stay enjoyable. Thanks again Nick
Great stay at Judy’s place. Walking distance to my course and train station. Highly recommended :)
Great central location, close to everything.  The place had everything you needed, may need a little revamp , but definitely will go back.

The apartment is very stylish and lovely. Alexey was very thoughful during our stay. Great location, 1 min walk from central station. We cut short our stay due to unforeseen situation. But overall the stay was wonderful! Thank you Alexey!

Michy's place is in a wonderful location, perfectly located for exploring around Pittwater and the coast. It is quiet and extremely comfortable. With lots of windows, the cottage is light and breezy. Everything we needed was there and it is immaculately presented. Michy and Paul were on hand if we ever needed anything, but they also ensured we had privacy. A perfect mix!  The beach is just a minute away (across the road) and is a lovely spot to sit. Although we had a car, the local bus stop is just across the road. We could not fault Michy's place and look forward to the next trip.
A brilliant, quiet, central location; absolutely perfect. Would definitely stay at your apartment again! Thank you so much.
This is an outstanding place to stay in Sydney with so much to see and do and even just to unwind. Great hosts and will be coming back for sure. Highly recommend
Great location, very close to Darling Harbour. Sadly the neighbours were very noisy the days we were there, but after we had a talk to them it helped. Good space for 3 people.
Friendly host, quiet neighbourhood, comfortable bed.
Everything’s was good

Helena is a charming host, who met me to hand over the keys and show me the unit. 
The studio is bright and compact with a well equipped kitchen, and a comfortable bed. The balcony has a great view!
This is a quiet neighbourhood, only a short walk to shops, cafes and transport.
The waterfront walk to Rozelle or the Fish markets is a bonus.

Had a great stay at David's modern styled and very clean house. He was very flexible in accommodating my very early arrival. The location can't be beat, it's very central and I was able to walk to the meetings I had in Sydney. There is a lot to do nearby but the apartment is a block away from the noise: you'll sleep well! I wish I could have stayed longer!
The apartment is perfect for a Sydney visit - complete with everything you need. A range of tourist information was left fir us which was helpful.
This was probably the most professional Airbnb I've stayed at. The place was great, everything was well organised and thought out. My stay here was perfect.

Fantastic location with beautiful views. Beach and bars a short walk away and a bus stop right outside. The studio is clean and well equipped for all your needs and Anita was a perfect host. We look forward to staying a third time.
I have stayed for one week with Naveen and Tris. The flat is perfectly located and really nice. Naveen and Tris have been really helpful and were great to hang out with.

WOW I cannot recommend these wonderful people enough! The room was spacious and clean, the area was shared but they gave me so much privacy that I would never have a problem :) Ed and his partner gave me a million amazing suggestion on places to go according to what I was interested in and made me feel at home and welcome constantly. Would highly recommend this place! Convenient right into the city yet quiet area :)
Great location and fantastic apartment. I'd definitely stay again
I had a very comfortable stay! The place is in a great location, close to the beach and public transportation. I would definitely recommend his place to anybody looking to stay in Bondi Beach.

Angela and her husband Jeff were so great. Such lovely, kind hosts. Their Airbnb is phenomenal, fresh yoghurt and jam in the fridge, fresh fruit and a gorgeous, spotless apartment. My three friends and I had a blast.
Would absolutely stay again. 
Thanks Angela and Jeff!!
We had a lovely 2 night stay at Simone’s house, within walking distance to shops and a lovely outside area and convenient lock up garage as limited parking out front.

I’m sorry to write a bad review but we are very disappointed about this booking. I’ve sent this comments to the owner but we haven’t received any response or assistance. 

The place was very dirty. It Looks this hasn’t been cleaned to receive people. Actually it looks it has not been cleaned in a while.

There were cockroaches all around the place, mainly in the living room and the kitchen.
 
Bed clothes in the Bedroom were used (you expect clean sheets when you book a place)

Sitting in a sofa so dirty is disgusting. And the tv and electronics were not properly connected to use. Everything is full of dust and dirtiness.
We had to clean the chairs and table to be able to use them. 

The add says “breakfast provided” but that was not been arranged.

The humidity smell is really bad and it should be a comment in the description warning about that before booking.

To sum up, our stay in this place was not pleasant. We came with a lot of expectations to have a good time for new year in Sydney. This is the first time I have a bad experience with Airbnb.

My family want to have a good time and don’t want to waste all our days being uncomfortable. 
They asked me to move to a clean place from the beginning. This was a big problem because booking with no anticipation here, these days is very difficult to find and also is very expensive. I would like to cancel from the first day but we couldn’t find another place until now.

I’m claiming for the full refund plus the cleaning fees since this apartment hasn’t been cleaned for receiving us. I also ask for the service fees to compensate this really bad experience. 

This is the first time I have a bad experience booking a place with Airbnb. I know this is just an isolated case and I trust that the company will resolve my dispute fairly.
Great value
Lovely little place for a quick trip away, concierge were brilliant
Quality location and comfortable accommodation with everything we needed! Thanks
Very clean place and everything you need is in there. He responds really fast and he is willing to help you with anything! Just ask him.

MissD's place is really clean and cosy. Fantastic location in cool Newtown with plenty of bars and restaurants on offer. Super easy to access and MissD was clear with instructions upon arrival. We had everything we needed so didn't need to follow up on anything during our stay. We were sharing with three other guest rooms but the house was cleaned regularly and guests were respectful of each other. Great value and would highly recommend for a stay in Sydney!

Debbie and David have a beautiful house which we enjoyed thoroughly while visiting Sydney.  Plenty of space, fantastic kitchen and lovely pool and garden area for barbecues.  Very close to Manly for ferry trips to Sydney, but Manly itself was a big hit with us.  Definitely best beach according to our girls.  We can't recommend this house highly enough and will definitely be back. Thank you to both.  Great hosts!!
Great location for easy access to the airport

Our stay at Tracy's studio in Narabeen was a delight. We were very comfortable and everything we needed was there. The balcony was a great place to sit and read and listen to the birds. Sari (the dog) was an added bonus. She is such a well behaved dog and I loved it when she appeared to say hello. 

All amenities are close by. Walk to cafes, restaurants and the beach. On my next visit to Sydney I hope Tracy's studio will be available. Tracy is a great host and very accommodating. We felt very "at home" staying there.
Louise and Patrick (Perth)
Bryan was a great host. Excellent communication, a great space a fabulous location. Exactly as promoted: accommodation with soul, close to everything. We'd love to stay again.

Great location. Could travel to Townhall easily by bus and the bus stop is just 5 minutes walk away. The area is generally safe because its located near the main junction and I feel safe walking back home because it's not one of those dark streets that you can see elsewhere. Lots of food located nearby . House is really clean and very comfortable.

Very pleasant stay. Excellent location being so close to restaurants, bars, and the Newtown train station. The Bed and Breakfast was spotlessly clean, had complimentary breakfast, and fast WiFi. My boyfriend and I loved the neighborhood and Mrs. D was extremely helpful with finding us parking for our van. I would highly recommend this place and would love to stay here again.
Very nice place and will stay again.  I stayed in the cottage, which was adequate to my needs.  Hot shower, clean and comfortable bed, good location.  What more does one need?
Amazing, way nicer than it looks. Great little quiet place
Awesome spot, a lot more room than we expected and great location. Really enjoyed our stay, thanks!

Susan was a great host! She was keen to give us great travelling tips and was always happy and pleasure to chat with. She makes sure to give you your space as well and is pleasantly accommodating. The location is superb (quiet neighbourhood) and are in close proximity to public transit - about 10 minutes to central station by bus.
Great place to stay and Paul is amazing to communicate with.
Reliable guy with a great place. I recommend Oliver as a  host!

Great location, just off the M7 but quiet neighbourhood. Private entrance with car park right out the front. Easy checkin, even on Christmas Day. Comfy bed. Old bathroom with European style toilet in shower but worked well enough for us.

This was probably one of our best hosts during our trip around New Zealand and Australia. She was very very helpful, giving us advice and tips about the best way to visit Sydney and their main spots.

The cabin is big, with plenty of space for two people, its own toilette and shower, and even a small living room where rest. 

The situation of the place was very good, with plenty of bus stops to the city and other spots of the city.

She was as kind to let us use her kitchen, and use some of her cooking stuff. 

She was really lovely, a perfect host, and we highly recommend staying with her.

Fantastic! Desireé made the entire stay flawless - sent detailed arrival info days before, had keys waiting for us at the front desk, a bottle of wine waiting upon arrival, and a spotless apartment with all possible amenities. Great home base for a vacation. Public transit just across the street, restaurants are within 10 minutes walk, and a taxi stand is available right next door. Highly recommend.

Wenn ihr nach Sydney reisen wollt und euch wirklich mal in der Fremde zu Hause fühlen wollt, dann wohnt bei Judith und Paul.
Unserer Meinung nach findet ihr hier eine echte AirBnB-Perle. Hier vermietet nicht ein größeres Unternehmen mit einem fingierten Besitzer, sondern hier wohnt ihr bei echten Sydneysidern und habt die Chance bei warmherzigen, wundervollen Menschen einen kleinen Einblick in das Leben in Sydney zu bekommen.

Very lovely, sunny and clean apartment.
Very tastefully furnished.
All equipment available including washing machine and dryer.
Although we did not meet Louise she arranged everything perfectly!
It might be a little noisy because of nearby mainroad.....

Wonderful place.felt at home after 10 min.We did not want to leave.
Great location to explore Sydney
This place is very well located in Bondi. Suits for 4 peoples easy, good value for money. Cassandra is very communicative and will provide what you need. I definitely recommend this place.
Fantastic!

MissD's house is very central in Newtown with good access to public transportation, restaurants and cafes. The house has a lot of character and our room was beautifully decorated. Basic breakfast was provided and we enjoyed having access to a well-stocked kitchen where we could interact with the other guests. We were in the downstairs bedroom and you did hear a bit of noise from upstairs and the front door. But we knew that in advance so it wasn't a problem. 

Street parking is usually 2hrs, however there are some streets in the area with no restrictions.

Overall very good value, a great place to stay in Sydney and we recommend MissD's house.

Communication with Danny was great and we met his brother upon check in. Location is quite favourable to those like to walk everywhere. 20mins walk to fish market, sydney harbour or less than 10 mins walk to the Sydney tower, Westfield, QVB.... slightly outdated with the furnishing however since we only stayed for 2 nights so overall still acceptable.
Robert was a great Host. Communication was great, check in easy. Spare bedding came in handy, and the accommodation was clean, tidy & as described. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend.
Rachel's house was perfect!! Great furnishings, very comfy beds and a brilliant location. Would definitely stay there again. Rachel was very friendly and helpful too!!

Desireé is a wonderful host. She's easy to contact and responds promptly when you send her an email. Her place is very comfortable and clean. She let us arrive early and we had no problem staying an extra night. We really appreciated that!! Transport to the city and surrounding areas are very close to her place. Great place to walk around lots to see and do. I would definitely stay again :)
Awesome host and place that is very clean, comfortable and in a fantastic location. MissD was a fantastic and friendly host, and I'd definitely recommend staying with her.
very stylish place in a nice neighborhood of Sydney. easy to communicate with Nicole. lovely stay all together.
My parents had a lovely stay at Jonnys  flat. Everything was clean and tidy and Jonny is a realy helpful and nice person. My parents would stay again at his place, definitely recommendable!
Fantastic host and house! Our family had a great time and Bryan catered too all our needs. Highly recommend!!

Leena made it a point to immediately answer every queries, and offered any help or services that we might need. And she already replied with action on some minor suggestions for further improvement of the property such as trimming of trees/branches along driveway for easier parking of vehicle, etc. 

Overall, I will recommend this place to my friends/relatives especially for big families like us. 

Thanks Leena for being a nice and great host! God bless always

Jason and David were extremely helpful, attentive hosts however the apartment was a little below our expectations. Quite basic standard and very poor shower. Fine for a brief stay if you’re not spending a lot of time in the place.

Kerri's apartment is in a very handy location to restaurants,shops and trains. Easy to get into the city. Great views from the balcony.  Kerri's hospitality is outstanding . I had a wonderful time . Thank you.
A great place to explore the city from. Less than a 5 minute walk to Redfern station, which gives you easy access to the whole city. Great house and great hostess! Thanks Lilian!
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Conveniently located - Train station just around the corner + the airport within 25 mins by taxi/ car. 

Clean and cosy room + necessary amenities in the house available. 

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay.

Contact the host and make sure the air con and other amenities listed are ACTUALLY working and EXIST as I was fooled about the aircon which was broken and he knew it but didnt inform me. Its very similar to a hotel room structure and he is not leaving in the premises, therefore be aware of likely poor communication as for my time he was overseas and couldnt get to him by phone.
Great private unit with a lovely & thoughtful host
