Ich hatte das Zimmer bei David für eine Woche gebucht.
Alles war wie beschrieben bzw. auf den Fotos abgebildet, sehr schön und sauber. Die Lage ist optimal, um die Stadt zu erkunden, Bushaltestelle gleich ums Haus, dennoch ist das Zimmer selbst ruhig, so dass man gut schlafen kann.
Wer ein Zimmer im CBD sucht, ist hier richtig.
David war bemüht, mir zu helfen, wenn ich eine Frage hatte und sehr höflich.
Danke David!

Fred and Bernadette are very kind people, they made my check in easier even if I arrived earlier due to a flight change. The house has a marvellous view on the ocean, perfect and quiet location.  The house is well furnished and is very, very clean. Recomended!
Enjoyed our stay

I enjoyed my stay at Shaun's place. It had everthing I needed, comfortable bed, nice kitchen, great location, minutes away from bus stops, ferry to the city but most of all Shaun's a helpful, nice and easy going guy. Highly recommended !

A lovely host and lovely apartment - I would highly recommend at stay at Suzie's. The guest facilities are excellent - with a very comfortable bedroom with ample storage, and full bathroom facilities for your private use. Although being in an extremely central location, the noise of the city traffic did not bother me in the slightest (I slept sooo soundly!). The location is excellent, with numerous restaurants/cafes and the Darling Harbour ferry service just a 2 minute stroll away. The nearest train station is only a short walk too. Suzie herself was a very warm and helpful, but also unobtrusive, host - perfect for this fairly independent traveller.
I would certainly seek to stay again at Suzie's for any future visits to Sydney.
This place is in a very good location, the host helped us whenever we needed and it was a really nice stay for all of us. Would highly recommend and book there again :)
Lovely spot and Cathy was very accommodating and responsive. Nice and clean room with personal touches which made the stay more enjoyable.

Pro: Linda is a great host. Communicates well. Amenities in the apartment are good, she provides everything one needs. Plenty of space, two couples could stay comfortably. 

Con: No air conditioning. Most of the year this should be fine but I was here during a heat wave and it made the stay unbearable. Most of the time I wore only shorts and was still sweating like crazy, even with fans on and windows open.

Location, location, location. We are North American residents and stayed two weeks. From Minto Heights, the train station and local mall are only ten minutes away. The train ride to Sydney is only about an hour, the drive to the Blue Mountains about two hours, to Illawarra about an hour-and-a-half, and to Canberra, about two-and-a-half hours. It's a perfect location to see much of the Sydney-Canberra area. Staying in a converted railcar is a unique experience. It is not like a standard apartment and some of the spaces are a little quirky. John and Margaret are excellent hosts and we found nothing wanting. Our stay was both comfortable and pleasurable. We would return in a minute!

Clean, basic accommodation and a convenient base during our stay in the northern beaches district of Sydney. Loved waking up to the sound of the birds! I recommend the short walk down to Paradise beach. Cathy, David and Max were great, and made sure we had everything we needed without making a fuss. Thanks!

Special thanks to Alice & Richard for being a nice host. Both are responsive. The house is near with Beverly Hills train station, located in a quite and beautiful neighbourhood. 

We found that the kitchen utensils were well provided and we got comfort bed and clean bedsheets. The living room was spacious & TV was provided. There was a washing machine, iron with iron board and a cloth hanger in laundry area but it would be great if there is a dryer as well.

Overall I had a nice stay in Alice's place because it is such a cozy and spacious house

Patty’s house was beautiful decorated, nice and close to famous Bondi, remarkably quiet being only meters to all the action. Patty always responded quick and answered all questions I had for her. She was very flexible with check out asking me first what time I would like...
I would recommend to anyone who wants to be amongst the action but can look forward to some peace and quiet 
5 stars ⭐️
該房間的地點非常好,兩位主人也非常貼心,若再次前往雪梨,我們依然會入住
5 star hotel room! Don ' t miss it!
Excellent apartment in the heart of the city. Exceeded expectations as clean, tidy and good value for money.

Enjoyed our weekend in this lovely apartment which had everything we needed including a super location with a lovely sea view. 

The bed was very comfy and apparently the sofa bed was awesome too. Well suited for 2 people.

The place was gorgeous, Tracy was so helpful and brought me down a blanket when I was cold. The area was lovely and in a very safe suburb. Everything you need was there and the bed and couch were super comfy. Thanks Tracy!
WIFi connection is not good.

4 bee hives in the backyard when the host knew we were bringing children was not a good start. House needed a good airing out and kitchen a thorough wipe down. Also tv and dvd not working. Once we had come to terms with these drawbacks, the place was fine but not worth $500 a night in our opinion.

We had a great week at Simone's place in Randwick. The home was very clean, well equipped with everything we needed and exactly as presented in the photos. Public transport and shops were very convenient and it was helpful to have a garage as street parking was a little difficult on some days. Simone was very responsive and we would love to stay here again when in Sydney.
The room was very conveniently located near the airport with the ability to shower and crash into bed after a long flight.

Excellent location - about a 2 min walk from the wharf, shops, restaurants and 5 mins to the main beach. The apartment was clean and beds comfortable. Paul was very quick to respond to any messages. Would highly recommend
Nice place, convenient to get bus or railway.    Mohit is very nice and helps us a lot.
Excellent location, very quiet well maintained space. Appreciated the clear instructions and responses were quick and to the point! Thanks, Min!
This apartment is in an excellent location in the CBD. Jared was quick to respond to all questions and a very easy check in process. The apartment was clean and tidy.

This was an amazing property that impressed all of our guests. The house was very well presented and clean. Everything was provided and much appreciated. We unfortunately had a rainy week but made the most of the spa. The multi levels made for a great way to get some privacy and shift people around for entertaining. We will definitely book again.
This is obviously a great place to stay. Stunning room, comfy bed, convenient location... Naveen is very nice and friendly. The cute doggy Felix makes it even better to stay here. Very recommended !

wir hatten keine genaue Ankunftszeit ausgemacht, da uns gesagt wurde wir können jederzeit am Nachmittag kommen, wenn wir allerdings vor einer gewissen Uhrzeit kommen wäre Francois noch da. Das machte uns nichts aus also kamen wir an und er war noch da. Die Begrüßung war freundlich und zuvorkommend. Er hat uns alles wichtige gezeigt. Einzig komische Sachen, dass wir unser Bett selbst beziehen durften. naja. Darüber sieht man hinweg wenn man das tolle Apartment sieht mit der super Lage!

this is the second time i live here, the best place i've ever lived in Sydney! the room is so clean and comfortable. the house owners are so nice. we even held a little party on the mid-autumn festival. here i feel so at home.

Robert's place was absolutely amazing, it was everything that we imagined. It is in the perfect location for wondering into Cronulla for cafes and shopping, plus only a short walk to the beach. I would highly recommend Roberts home for your next stay.
Natasa’s Place was comfortable and cosy, we shared a wine and had a good chat, perfect place for my work trip.
Beautiful house and gorgeous pool and spa! Perfect for our family with young kids
Terry's place was a great base for our time in Sydney, it's a 10min walk to Kings Cross station. Terry was a fantastic host and made us feel very comfortable.
We have thoroughly enjoyed our second stay with Duncan and Ashlee. They are both lovely hosts and we would recommend to future guests.
Excellent communication from Angela re access to the property. Walking distance to great restaurants, circular quay.

My booking was made at relatively short notice whilst travelling and I was really appreciative that Konrad and Mish were able to accomodate me. The location and accomodation was exactly what I required for my visit to see my mother in Sydney. But Konrad was very organized. Thanks again and if your ever in Canada please don't hesitate to connect with us.  
Kind regards, Tracey and Bob Forster

Desiree is an amazing host and had the perfect space for us! It started from wonderful communication to easy early check in. It continued with an immaculate unit that provided us an oasis from our sight seeing. We use Airbnb quite a bit and especially enjoy being able to have a kitchen area for a quick breakfast or meal and morning coffee. The unit was close to grocery, public transport and amenities were as if I had lived there. We were there to celebrate my spouse's 50th birthday and were pleasantly surprised by the nice and thoughtful birthday card. Thank you again and we had a blast!

While appreciative of last minute availability and sincere efforts of host in transit, my first ever airbnb stay wasn't particularly encouraging. A working key safe is a priority. I put my work colleague under inconvenience in the 3 trips to home it took to get access.
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was our first time using airbnb and it was made so easy with the help of Nathan.  His responses were always so quick and helpful. This was an absolutely lovely property and was everything it said in the listing.  We felt so welcome in this home and thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Maroubra!
Location is second to none and the place is spotless and is equipped with everything you need and more

Séjour très agréable dans cet appartement, aux portes de sydney.
La chambre était fidèle à la description, propre, de bonne qualité (literie ...).
L'ensemble de l'appartement est agréable, propre, les instructions pour les différents services sont très clairs.

Linda’s place was situated in the perfect location and the place was spacious, and provided more than you could ask for with a stay in Sydney!

Linda was a fantastic host who was more than accommodating during my stay. Thanks a bunch!

My partner and I stayed two nights recently and enjoyed our time in the beautiful Northern Beaches. I didn't get to meet Michy personally although my partner did. Communication through messages was always prompt and clear and we arrived late at night with the key left in the door and milk in the fridge for us. The cabin is cosy and had everything we needed. We couldn't get the wifi to connect but it didn't really bother us we were hardly there. I suggest you take your car as the bus only came out the front once an hour. Palm Beach close by is beautiful.

If this Airbnb is available, YOU HAVE TO BOOK IT! There are no words to describe how beautiful and close the beach this apt is. You honestly feel like royalty when you are here. The view is breathtaking- you see Bondi Beach from your bed. At night, you hear the waves crashing against the shore. Perfect location- close to the Bondi strip where all of the cute cafes, shops, restaurants are located. (Also, there is bus stop a block from the apt so you can get to Sydney Harbor/inner city  in 20 min for $3).  Anita does an amazing job at making you feel welcome and accommodated. This Airbnb is spotless, comfortable,  and I would stay here a million more times if I could.
房东和女朋友人特别好,很热心,会尽力帮助别人｡房子很干净,整洁,卧室很舒服｡

Thanks Fred and Bernadette for a very pleasant and comfortable stay! 

The first time we entered the house, it was all OMG-the-house-is-amazing! The inside was 100% as described and pictured in the photos. And the view was so EXTRA! We managed to enjoy beautiful sunrises before we headed out. We definitely made the right choice staying there! 

Not just that, we were welcomed with a pack of Tim Tam, milk and fresh juice on our first day! Talking about the facilities and amenities in the house, they’re all complete. From the shampoos, body wash, to clean towels and hangers. From the variety of cookwares and to coffee powders and a box of teabags. 

Fred and Bernadette were very accommodating too. There was a day where we run out of body wash and told them about it and when we reached home at night, there’s a new one in front of the door. 

We were out of the house early in the morning and only be home at 9/10pm. Sadly we couldnt manage to meet Fred and Bernadette to say how thankful we were for a very nice stay in their Airbnb house. Luckily we bumbed into Fred after his morning jog right before we left to airport! He was curious of whether we enjoyed our stay and asked if there is anything that is lacking. Worry not, it was all perfect. 

Thanks Fred and Bernadette.

Gavin's place is very clean and well laid out and is ideally located close to Central Station. We stayed for four nights over New Years Eve and enjoyed our time immensely!

What we liked the most was the host! He is a very good person, respectful, cordial and polite at all times. He even made time to show us the tourist attractions as well as some of the local hotspots.

We shared some great evenings with Gavin and enjoyed the conversation on a range of interesting topics. During our stay, I also had the chance to introduce him to my favourite European drink "the Hugo" which went down a treat! ;)

We enjoyed staying in Surry Hills and can happily recommend the place and the host, and if given the chance would gladly stay there again.

Stayed with Karen for almost 2 weeks. Where do I begin?  To say she was a fabulous host is an understatement. She was very kind, helpful and took time to write places of interest  to visit. I was made to feel very much at home at put at ease. Couldn't have picked a better place to stay.  I have enjoyed doing yoga with her,going for walks,we even found time to go for dinner one evening. 
I would highly recommend this place to stay as it is so close to the beach and public transport. Would definitely come back!
Fantastic location only a few minutes walk to the beach, cafes and shops. Just note that the house is a little dusty and sandy in parts.

It was so good.
Host was so kind, and very good place

Hernan's place was such a wonderful gem in Monterey! Easy access to bus routes (15-20 min ride to/from the airport via Uber), beautiful views from The Grade Parade (about one block away), plenty of food options AND such an easy going, welcoming and generous host! I highly recommend Hernan's Airbnb if you're staying in Sydney.

All of our queries prior to arrival were happily replied to very promptly. Wayne and Kate emailed us a list of attractions / activities that may have interested us during our stay. On arrival we were presented with a nice bottle of champagne which we certainly appreciated.

Lovely stay at Hugo's cozy apartment. Hugo and his friend Oliver were extremely responsive, helpful, and reassuring. The apartment was exactly as expected based on the listing. My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay and would come back anytime.
很高兴能入住Linda & Linh 的房子,早上飞机到达,很早就入住了｡位置很方便,离市区,唐人街20-25分钟慢悠悠步行可到｡主人关于入住提示很详细,很贴心并回复迅速｡居家用品很齐全｡床上用品很舒服｡很适合短期在悉尼居住｡

We stayed with Sarah for 11 nights while in Sydney for a sporting tournament. The house is in a beautiful area close to where we needed to be everyday. Also close to shops, Food etc. Sarah is such a fantastic host who was always available if we needed anything and was always up for a chat. The room was nice and clean and the pool was the icing on the cake with most days being in the high 30’s low 40’s. We will book again next year and I can’t recommend her enough. Thanks Sarah for a fantastic stay.
Leichhardt is a great location to base yourself. Susan accommodation, is perfect.

I couldn't have asked for a better experience for my stay in Sydney. Dino was a fantastic host, always accessible and helpful and his apartment is perfectly sleek chic, and in a great location.  Many thanks Dino for a very stress free and relaxing stay.

The location is very good.Just only a few minutes to go to anywhere you want.For instance, Daring Harbor ,Coles,shopping (Website hidden by Airbnb) night, it will be a good place to enjoy a part of Sydney's skyline.highly recommend!
Very nice host! Terry is very easy to communicate and offered me seamless checkin and checkout. You can access to town easily from her place. Highly recommended.
Modest home in a great location.
Susan was absolutely gorgeous, so kind, welcoming, and lovely. The studio is fresh and comfortable - amazing really! we loved our stay more than we can say 10/10. Gorgeous area.
Nice place
Great studio near the water. Was perfect for us as we had a wedding in Avalon. Easy check-in and communication with Michy. Definitely recommend!

We had an awesome time at Linda's apartment. Great location, and the apartment had everything we needed. Would definitely stay again! Linda was the perfect host, and was always available when we needed her.
Highly recommended place to stay, lovely hosts and beautiful apartment close to all the beaches

Fantastic location. Close to everything, beautiful walks all around. Great space as well - fantastic for a couple. Very comfortable living room and bed, lots of closet space, cute balcony, very functional kitchen. Would stay here again!
Another awesome stay at Mews. Perfect little apartment for everything I need. Thanks Narelle!
Excellent location near the beach and cafes, pretty comfortable place that can host quite a lot people and nice friendly host.
Great room, always clean - have stayed numerous times.

George’s apartment is an example of what Airbnb should be . 
 George made sure everything is clean and new as well as stylish. 
We found his apartment very comfortable and it was so nice and quiet .
It was pleasure to return to Na’s place again. It’s in every way as advertised, clean, self-contained, near to shops and restaurants.  Easy to get to and near public transport.

Naveen's place is beautiful and very clean. She is very welcoming and was open to all of the questions we had about the city. She also had a little box filled with all sorts of toiletries for us, which we loved! The apartment itself is located near lots of restaurants and bars and it was very easy to get around the city with the train station being close by. I definitely recommend this place!

This is fine if you want a basic place, but it is not as private as the description. We had to walk through the whole house to get there, and then had to go back into the house to find basics like cups and tea bags and milk. There are a lot of mosquitos - we had brought our own mossie spray and I recommend it.
The host canceled this reservation 59 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Wow, stunning area. Can highly recommend Michy’s backyard cabin if you’re keen to chill out for a few days @ Pittwater. The cabin is stylish, private, and functional. In fact, I felt like I was staying at a health retreat!

I found the cabin a convenient short drive to trendy Avalon village with cafes, restaurants, and local shops. It was also great to walk down to the Pittwater and swim in the local’s netted beach area. Can recommend booking with Michy who is a friendly, and easy going host.
Surprises!
Location was great, apartment ordinary. Bathroom was real small for 5 girls to get ready. Serviced us well for our 3 night work stay.

Lindo apto en un lugar ideal, ya que está a unos metros de la estación central, y a pie pudimos recorrer el centro de la ciudad! Recomiendo a los futuros viajeros, destacando la prolijidad del mismo y con todo lo necesario para sentirse como en casa.

The location was very convenient and communication with the host wast fast and easy. We felt very welcome, Ollie was helpful and super accomodating for check in/out. Would book again if visiting the area, thanks Hugo & Ollie for a great stay!

Appartement parfaitement situé, à deux pas de Darling Harbour, quartier en pleine expansion avec beaucoup d’activités. Le cœur de la ville est accessible en 10 min à pied. L’appartement est spacieux et très confortable, très bien équipé. Tous les petits tracas ont été prévu : exemple, le 2 e jour une ampoule a grillé : il y avait dans un placard tout un stock pour en changer facilement. 
L’hote réponds rapidement, avec beaucoup de gentillesse.
Je conseille cet appartement pour découvrir Sydney sans avoir de véhicule

Do not stay here.  EVER. 
The "host" is rude and invades on your privacy as and when she pleases.  The "home" is an ex-hotel room and is one of 40 apartments she owns that have never been lived in. Its dirty, almost everything is broken, the air-conditioning unit leaks, its loud as hell, it cuts out and it looks like it could fall off the ceiling at any point in time.  
This place is a cheap and nasty room used to circumnavigate the standards set by normal accommodations.  Still waiting for Airbnb to fix this problem, have been waiting for them to respond for a month!
STEER CLEAR

Since the moment we arrived at the place Duncan was so kind with us. He was ALWAYS attentive and ready to help us and answer our questions.

We loved our stay.

The place was clean, bright, quiet, 7 minutes walk to a bus stop that you can go everywhere.

The neighborhood is quiet and simple.
great location and lovely place

Vickie was thorough and accommodating with the check in.

The place was small but centrally located and had everything we needed to make it a very comfortable stay.

Thanks, we definitely recommend!
The place is so convenient to amenities, city and shopping. Huy is a very nice person accommodating all the needs. Thank you Huy.
Very nice location! Walking distance to all tourist spots. Will definitely book again with Jared.

Apartment is in a fantastic location with beautiful views. We loved the coastal walk and were lucky enough to see whales. The kitchen is very well equipped. The apartment worked well for an adult group but would also suit a young family. Parking was not a problem in winter. Public transport to city is very easy. Wayne and Kate were very welcoming hosts.
This apartment is in a great location, is secure, private, comfortable, and has access to shops, food, and public transportation. Thank you for this wonderful opportunity!
Fantastic location, cute little place, has everything you need. We spent 2 nice nights in watching DVDs from Millie's large collection! Would definitely recommend.
Awesome room in a great house in the perfect Newtown location. Close to restaurants, bars and train station, check in/out was super easy. Really enjoyed our stay.
Nice flat, great location for getting to the beach and into the city. Comfy bed.
The place was super clean and the guys were perfect hosts. I'd recommend the place to anyone.
Great location. Clean, neat and tidy. Great for families.

Belinda and Chris are lovely people and very welcoming hosts. They were friendly, prompt in their communications, and provided us with a warm, quiet and cosy space for a winter getaway. Their studio is private, very well decked out, and closely situated to the beaches and bushwalks in Bundeena. Thanks for the wonderful weekend away :)
Good location, clean and comfortable
Great location, quick responses and very helpful host. Recommend it if you want to stay close to Eastwood, Epping, parramatta areas.

We enjoyed our stay at this lovely place very much. Susan and Greg are very welcoming hosts and the accommodation exceeded all our expectations. We will certainly recommend it to our friends and would love to come back and stay again soon.
A great comfortable little place right smack bang in the centre of circular quay. Contact with host/s was quick and easy too

We were in Palm beach for a wedding and had an absolutely amazing time at Rudi and Avalon's b&b. The place is situated in the most beautiful area and Rudi and Avalon are very lovely and friendly people, they made us feel very welcome and were simply incredible hosts. The room itself was clean with a comfy bed and a really cute balcony with a lovely sea view. Thanks for such a great stay!
Tim was a great host and his place is well located, accommodating and very convenient to get around in Sydney. Highly recommend!
A wonderful place to stay. Very special! We had a fantastic nightly train ride. Margarete is a perfect host and the communiction was always very easy.
Very private accommodation in a great location. Lovely hosts to deal with. Would definitely return.

Hernan and Koni are a nice couple that know how to make their guests feel comfortable with their warm and easy going attitude. I felt like staying with friends if I could expend my stay I would stayed with them. Thank you guys
Our stay at Gavin's place was very enjoyable. The apartment was always clean and tidy. Gavin is a good bloke who was very easy to stay with.
Perfect location. Apartment was great clean & better than what we expected. Rob the host was relaxed& was a pleasure to deal with. Nothing too much trouble

Had a great stay at Christine and Patrick's when visiting family that lives nearby. Plenty of room for the two of us. My son was lucky enough to score the main room while I was fine on the sofa bed. Easy check in. Secure place, very clean and had everything you need to stay. So grateful for the shampoo in the bathroom as mine had exploded in my suitcase during my flight. These little touches make a difference! Most appreciated the check out time of 12pm!  Very comfortable space we would stay again. I can definitely recommend. Thanks Christine and Patrick:)
Perfect size and location for a family visit to Sydney. Easy walk into CBD/circular quay in 20 mins.

Cat's place is in a really good location, on a nice residential street but very close to the beach, shops, restaurants and public transport.  The house is really homely and comfortable, and the cleanliness couldn't be faulted.
Exactly has described. Would stay again.

El departamento es amplio y es perfecto para 3 personas que estan de vacaciones . La zona esta muy buena ya que hay buenos bares y restaurants. Esta a 15/20 min caminando del centro de la ciudad. Un supermercado esta a 200 metros. Realmente si vuelvo a Sydney, volvería al mismo lugar.

Jo has a lovely place in a beautiful location. close to public transport and easy for us with a car to get around. beaches and shops very close by. Jo was very quick to respond with any questions and very helpful and welcoming. Would gladly stay again.
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Location is A+++; walking distance to world class beach; sunset views across the street.  Quite space with magnificent garden.  Unit itself is much larger then photos suggest.  Great design aesthetic; devoured books on hand.  Neil is a wonderful host:  gracious, helpful.  Unit is fully appointed with all you need to enjoy a long stay in beautiful Watsons Bay.  Best Airbnb stay to date!

Fei's heritage home has grand, high ceilings and spacious rooms with antique art and furnishings. The large, modern kitchen with an elegant dining area attached was great for our family needs. Fei is a very helpful and generous host. An excellent stop-over destination if you find hotels sterile and expensive.
Great Location from everything we needed, would stay here again and highly recommend to friends!
Great location, close to train station. The shared bathrooms shower is really dodgey and needs to be fixed. Also there is abit of road noise in the back rooms. Other then that I enjoyed my stay

It was a very clean apartment. Even the sofa bed was super comfortable and the apartment had everything you needed. The cafe and supermarket is conveniently close with plenty of options for good food around the area.

So glad that our first Airbnb experience was a positive one! Duncan is prompt with his replies on (Hidden by Airbnb) once contact was made. No problems checking in, the apartment is cozy and clean, and well-equipped. Also just 5 mins by bus across the ANZAC bridge into the city. We looked forward to coming 'home' each day after our explorations. Thanks again, Duncan and Ashlee for contributing to our  memorable stay in Sydney!

Tracey’s place is fantastic. We have stayed twice now and it is conveniently located, close to great restaurants and cafes and easy to catch the train. The space, especially the bathroom, is comfortable and plenty big enough for two. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay there again.
Lovely home, great location and amazing home made muffins!
Fantastic host. Great location. Sparkling clean. There were some really thoughtful touches for our little girl. We hope to come back.

We stayed here for three nights as we travelled along the NSW coast.   Belinda and Chris were both helpful and hospitable. 

The studio was comfortable, well-equipped and clean, with a nice covered veranda in the secluded garden.  

It was also just a few minutes walk to the pretty and quiet Jibbon Beach and a short drive to the shops in Bundeena itself.  The more popular beaches at Wattamolla and Garrie are about 20-30 minutes drive away. 

Thanks for allowing us to stay in your place.  We would be very happy to stay there again if we make a return trip. 
Ken and Rosemary

Louise's place was perfect for traveller, work or couple, quiet yet very convenient location with transport at the door to the city in 10 mins, very clean and hospitable hosts, it was a pleasure and I will be returning soon I'm sure

We really liked Lachlan's apartment. Lachlan was very helpful and responsive. The location is about half way between the Rocks and Bondi beach which was nice. The only complaint was we were there in winter and the nights were very cold and there was no central heating and we only had one small space heater to heat four rooms. Otherwise, highly recommended.

Yang and her husband were excellent hosts. Great communication and were well prepared for our checkin. Apartment was very clean, sunny and only a lovely stroll over the bridge to public transportation.

The place was quiet and clean. I just wish  there  was a heating  in the  room as its winter  and the room is very  cold. Lucky i got thick  onesie to sleep on. Plus I suggest  atleast 1 clean towel to use for the  guest  on the duration  of their stay  would be good. I have to buy my own towel somewhere.

Location, location and great view!
All perfect
Lovely location, very well appointed homely feel and great value.

I had a great stay here in my old neighborhood, in the two days before my wedding. 

As a former local I can attest to the convenient location, it's a short walk to the heart of Newtown.

The place was very clean and Michele has thought of everything to ensure a comfortable stay. 

She's a very attentive host, friendly and helpful and respectful of privacy. 

Can highly recommend staying here if you're looking for the inner west experience.
The apartment is near the central station(about 10min (Website hidden by Airbnb) is clean and tidy.

We spent 6 days in Bondie Beach with my husband and 1 year old daughter. We strongly recommend this place - Craige & Leonie are fantastic hosts - they were answering all our questions and recommended great place to see in Sydney. Location of the place is very good - just next to Bondie Beach - very close to all restaurants and shops, but it is quiet at the same time. We really enjoyed our time there and we will recommend it to all our friends!

Christine and Patrick’s place was perfect for our stay. We were there for a week and it had everything we needed! It was very clean, had plenty of amenities, the check in process was simple and the on street parking was easy. We enjoyed our stay and next time we’re back for a week or so we’ll be checking if this place is available!
Nice place in a good location for getting around Sydney.

We had a great stay with Natasa for 28 days. She is a really friendly and helpfully host. The house and bedroom were spacious and the house is really close to the train station for getting around Sydney easily.

Perfect house for our Sydney stay. Great location - easy walk to Bronte beach; baby friendly - stair gates and baby cot and high chair and generally a great space - well equipped kitchen and bbq. We enjoyed ourselves so much we stayed here for an extra few nights. Thanks Will for being so responsive before and during our stay!
Clean, good location, modern and has all the amenities. Double thumbs up
What a great place and a fantastic location!  The fresh banana bread was a great touch! Fred and Bernadette are amazing hosts!
Loved staying at Your place, great location, 20 min walk to Opera House, close to great shopping and dining area...Thank You for the chocolate and the flowers!!!
Il fratello di Danny è stato molto gentile e ospitale, ottima posizione per visitare Sydney. Migliorerei la pulizia. Gentili nel farci mantenere le valigie dopo il check out.

Having to be in Manly for work always lends itself to a stay like this one. Jackie and Martin were wonderful hosts, easy to communicate with and really enjoyable to be hosted by.

Manly is a beautiful suburb, the unit is walking distance to everything and like the area has both charm and history. THe really surprise is inside. The renovation is elegant, tasteful and professional. The room itself has water views and is comfortable and functional.

It’s on my list to revisit next time I back bu the sea!
Fantastic budget accommodation, great location, close to shops and public transport, quiet area, comfy bed , slept well

I had a wonderful stay at Simone's place. The house was clean, modern and stocked with everything we could need, right down to cling wrap and oil and gas for the BBQ. 

The location was fantastic, a lovely walk to the beach and Simone was fantastic in all her correspondences.

The apartment is well positioned right on Hyde Park and 300m from the train. There is a great view over King's Cross including sun and moon rises. Rooms are bright and spacious although only one has cupboard space. Gym, swimming pool, Jacuzzi and sauna are easily accessible. The single bathroom/toilet would make it difficult to accommodate 8 people, even though there are beds for 8.

We had a very pleasant stay in Maree's property. It was clean and spacious. The cooking facilities were slightly limited, but it was very easy to work around! The property was also in a perfect location, right next to the beach and park. Maree and her husband were always on hand to help and very easy to communicate with. Overall, Maree's Airbnb was amazing and I would happily stay there again!
Great experience all round. Thanks for accomodating us.
It's really a good apartment with grat location. Have a good time there.
Great hosts! Warm & welcoming. Such a great roomy space- and with a view too!

We had a lovely stay at this very unique property that is set in a beautiful bushland setting. It is great for anyone wanting to feel immersed in nature but still have the beach and shops just a few minutes away. The design of the home is amazing - with huge windows and all natural materials throughout. Molly was lovely to deal with and made communication easy. Would definitely love to stay again!
Goooood
Maria is a very gracious host and her place is fantastic!  I️ highly recommend it if you want an idyllic setting with unbeatable view and perfect location at Manly Beach.

Hi Jeremy,
Sorry for the late response but we have been busy. Jeremy responded promptly to our request and was helpful with suggestions by email. My wife, myself & my family all enjoyed our stay at this house.. Location could not have been better. We were within walking distance of all we came to do such as go to the theatre, walk in the Botanical Gardens, eat at good restaurants and for some,to visit the shops.We found it is in a great central location. Your accommodation provided for us what we (Website hidden by Airbnb) has a lovely spacious living area, a fully equiped kitchen, good laundry facilities and four (Website hidden by Airbnb) toilets and bathrooms were both more than adequate. We enjoyed the cafe nearby called " The Rusty Rabbit". We would not hesitate to rent your accommodation again. Thank you.
Mark
Check in was very easy, the studio was well maintained (although ceiling heights are low, and the lights are fluorescent). The host was excellent with communication and the location is excellent.

This garden studio is absolutely comfortable  and private but also very clever in the way it uses space. Cath is a generous host providing muesli, home made muffins and fresh eggs from her very own chooks..wow. I was only able to enjoy 2 nights but I hope to stay again soon.

Nicole was an excellent host and the apartment is lovely and actually looks as nice as the photos! The only issues were with the internet not working one day (which should be fine now that NBN has been installed), loud music on the Friday and Saturday nights from neighbours and construction noise from the building works across the road from 7.30am 6 days a week. Overall a lovely apartment and I had a good stay but it may not work for you if you are a light sleeper wanting to sleep in on a holiday!
Strongly recommend! Julie is very nice and friendly. The house is very pretty. Check in and out is easy. Some high quality local cafe nearby. Would definitely visit again next time in Sydney!

One of the best experiences I've had using AirBnB.  Natasa is a gem of a host.  Her place is very well organised and she is super friendly.  Location is right next to station too, which is convenient.  I would highly recommend staying here.

Mags was prompt in communications and she was very flexible to check in and out times which we really appreciated.
The apartment is exactly as seen in the photos and had all the basics that we needed for a short stay in Mosman, it was clean, had a comfy bed and good shower. (though we did notice hot water seemed to run out quickly)
We didn't actually meet Mags and we missed the personal touch you often get when staying in airbnb accomodation.

We had 4 wonderful nights  at Vickie's apartment.  She met us there, showed us around the apartment and recommended several restaurants you can see on the street below.  The view and location is terrific.  It is an easy 5 minute walk to the train station.  The towels and bedding were top notch.  We made use of the chromecast for streaming tv shows.   The indoor plants are a great touch, very impressed to see a healthy fiddle leaf fig, I should have asked Vickie for tips.  There is nowhere to hang clothes up but when I travel I usually just live out of the suitcase anyway.  Definitely recommend staying here!
这是我第一次在BNB上订房,对这次住宿体验十分满意,房间宽敞､明亮､干净,卧室里准备了我们所需的床上用品,卫生间有洗漱用具､毛巾､香薰等,厨房用品里一应俱全,房东考虑的十分周到｡我女儿到新南威尔士大学读书,这里离大学不到5分钟的车程,很方便｡一次愉快的经历｡
Very close to airport, comfortable bed

Had the most restful 5 night’s sleep. Clean and tidy little granny flat set in scenic bush land. Loved being woken up by the Kookaburras every morning. Rhonda and Michael were very welcoming and caring. Home away from home for me. Would definitely recommend Rhonda’s if its a B&B you’re after.
We had such a lovely stay at Susan's cottage. Although she was out of town during our stay, she left us impeccable instructions and we felt cared for. I'd definitely stay here again!
Good location at Sydney CBD, very close to the China town and Darling habor.
Fantastic host and apartment. Perfect location, easy walking to pretty much everything Bondi has to offer.
Perfect apartment to stay at for any events in Sydney Olympic Park. Jennifer's place had no faults and great value for money! City view was also better than expected....would happily stay here again.
If you do not mind with place that needs more than 1km to station, it is a very good place to stay. Very cozy and convinience to stay.
Nice and clean place centrally located in Sydney!
A very accommodating host.
Location was fantastic. We had a wonderful experience at this airbnb. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking to come to Sydney.

Carole and Steve are really nice and often offer suggestions on our plan or when we have some questions. Their house is clean enough and we got surprised when we arrived that it is much better than the photos and is located in a quite convenient place. It took only half an hour to get to the city by train or bus, and so does the airport.  They provide us a living room, a bedroom and also a private bathroom, which made us feel like a home. By the way, their little Buddy is also very cute and always showed friendly to us.

Perfect studio for a beachy getaway. Went away with the girlfriend and was well suited for a couple. The studio had everything you could need. Had foxtel with IQ which was was a supprise. Was close enough to walk to the beach or pub. Quick to respond to questions. Nothing to fault!
New apartment very near to airport. Host is friendly and helpful.

Trent was prompt and clear in his communications. We did a last minute booking and Trent organised the cleaners to ensure a clean apartment with our arrival. The apartment is located on a quiet residential area. One block away to the sea and a short walk to the ferry. It is a peaceful area and there is plenty of space in the apartment. We found it comfortable and homely with lots of plants and a beautiful kitchen. Would recommend!
Nice, quiet place to stay with good amenities.

Kathy and her daughter were such lovely, happy and accomodating laddies handling all added requests we had.

A nice cute hideaway, like a cubby house when you go to the top, so watch your head! Lovely bathroom! 

Overall great experience.
Great spot for 2 couples who want to have a fun night out and not worry about how to get home safely lol
Great host.  Great location

Lovely hosts, beautiful place, perfect stay!
We loved staying with Ashlee and Duncan and really enjoyed chatting with them! They we're so friendly, caring and we felt very welcome!
The guest room is perfectly equipped, the bed so comfortable and we could really feel that they're both experienced travellers and therefore know about travellers' needs: chocolate on the bed, maps and recommendations,  the cleanliness of the whole place and the warm atmosphere, everything just perfect!
The apartment is also located very good, it is quiet, perfect for a relaxing sleep, but at the same time very easy to get around from there and we felt very safe in the nice neighborhood!
Of course communication was very easy too! 
Highly recommended, if we return to Sydney we would love to stay with Ashlee and Duncan again! Thank you so much for everything!!
Had a great stay and will definitely be back. Close to shops, markets and public transport. Very convenient.

It was our first trip to Sydney and we weren't sure what area to stay in. Although due to the rain we ultimately ended up ubering the flat is very conveniently located near several bus stops. It's completely private as well and clean. It's got all the basics needed for a great get away. You can make breakfast in the main house and she's for oatmeas, cereals, teas and coffees to choose from. Although The weather was muggy if you keep the fan on and the windows cracked you can blow most of it out. Susan is also very down to earth and very helpful with directing us with travel! Would definitely recommend.
Amazing location and every little detail in the house has been well thought out. Fantastic for extended families and groups. We can't wait to come back.
Superb location, very quiet, perfect view to the ocean and a garden in front of the balcony full of birds. We were really surprised to hear the call of the kookaburra!
Griffin was a great host! Highly recommend his place!
Amazing apartment in a prime location. Highly recommended.

what a great place. the big front window is fantastic, as is the rest of the cosy, stylish flat. our two kids slept wonderfully on the futon. we really enjoyed potts point and can definitely recommend davids flat and him as a host as he was easy to communicate and really friendly when meeting us. 10 out of 10!

Susan's Bronte cottage was fabulous! So beautiful, light-filled and comfortable. Susan has taken care to make the studio a real home away from home. When staying at an apartment while on a trip it's often the little things you remember the most that help make your trip a special one. There was muesli, milk, juice and fresh fruit waiting upon arrival. How lovely! And the location could not be better--a 10- minute walk to the beach (one of Sydney's most beautiful!), and an even shorter one to the charming main street with cafes and shops. Thanks so much, Susan. Can't wait for the next visit!
The apartment is bright and modern and the views are amazing.  It was lovely to be met personally and taking up to the apartment and shown how everything works.  A very nice touch.

If you’re visiting Sydney, Paul’s place is a wonderful place to still be a tourist and play a local at the same time. It’s situated in a great location - availability to food options, walking distance to the train which was so great and neighborhood feels so safe. 


It’s comfortable for two, maybe three if your other guest is not picky with the sleeping arrangements and Paul covers everything that you’d need. If not, their cleaner Susan is available to help you should you need. Everything that Paul notes in his description is extremely accurate so we appreciated that. 

We definitely enjoyed our stay and trust you will too!

Vickie was a lovely host and did everything she could to help and make our stay enjoyable. The apartment is in an excellent position - close to restaurants and cafes as well as walking distance from the city. The apartment itself is great with a very comfortable bed and has everything you need.

Great apartment in a nice neighborhood. The apartment is nicely maintained and everything was clean. It was the second time we stayed in one of the apartments of Simon & Nicole. We would definitely stay here again on our next visit to Sydney.

We had an amazing stay at Arnie's and Lorraine's home. The house is beautifully decorated, with a really interesting art collection. We also liked a lot the neighborhood, with charming architecture and close to public transport.
Our room was super comfortable, we had to work during our stay and everything work well, wifi connection is good and we enjoyed working by the pool or inside with a hot cup of coffee. 
We also got the chance to meet other guests and have a nice talk with them.

Definetly recommend this place , it's was our first time in Sydney and we loved it. Like other guests mentioned on her review, it makes you want to move there!

So Arnie and Lorraine, thank you!
All good. Beautiful house. Close to the wonderful Globe Point Rd. Comfortable, charming, friendly, perfect.
Paul和Judy,非常友善,也非常樂意幫忙你所需要的問題,Paul會給予很多行程建議,相當有幫助
Great unit in a fantastic location.
Fabulous location and lovely airy space to stay in.
All good.

My siblings and I stayed here for 10 nights. This is one of the best Airbnb places we ever stayed at! The house is just beautiful with a nice garden. It has 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths. Close to public transport and shops. The kitchen is well equipped to cook a full meal. We only cooked once just because there’s so many restaurants in Sydney. Lots of towels, the bed and pillows were comfortable, the bed sheets smelled fresh and there’s even bathrobes for us to use. Wifi was fast. Jennifer was a great host. Highly recommended. Will definitely stay here again!

Great place to stay in a nice area. Our stay was completely hassle-free - something you don't always get with some places. Instructions were thorough and no need for a whole lot of communication throughout our stay, though Jeremy was easily contactable if needed. Overall we had an extremely pleasant stay.

Lizzy's place was perfect for our family - it's open, airy, with a balcony, some toys for the kids, plenty of entertainment options and so close to the parks and beaches. Lizzy was an awesome host with great communication, some really nice touches (amenities and some food items) and we're really grateful that she was able to accommodate an earlier-than-normal checkin time which we appreciated after 30 hours of planes and airports. We could rave on for ages, but quite simply... we'd never stay anywhere else on a trip to Sydney.

Everything perfect
I recommend this place to everyone
Very clean and comfortable
A really handy spot to stay - close to everything and Gavin was very helpful and welcoming.
Very good location and good security apartments. Nice room and very happy. Easy to access to CBD.
Cedric has been a really good host. He always answered quickly if I had any questions. Really a good place to stay.
非常简洁舒爽的房间,安静而且设施齐全｡

We had an amazing stay at Pittwater Paradise! Stunning views from the bed and living room area! Evelyn is a great host - very friendly and easy to talk to. The apartment is full of daylight and very clean. Pittwater paradise is the perfect getaway! We didn't want to leave...
Wonderful place. Highly recommended!
Great location.  Plenty of places for breakfast locally.  Spacious and clean.  Thanks for having us.
The host canceled this reservation 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
This stunning historical train carriage is a unique place to stay, surrounded by the quiet bush, so close yet so far away from suburbia.  Margaret is also an excellent and helpful host.
This is the best it can get on AirB&B

We stayed in Simone's house for a week (two couples with two babies) and had a wonderful time! The house is lovely - beautiful linen and towels provided; well appointed kitchen & laundry, and even a lovely little courtyard with outdoor setting! We loved it and can't recommend it enough. Also so impressed by the professional cleaning service who left the house in pristine condition for us.

This was our first AirBNB experience, so have nothing to compare it to, however, Vickie was very accommodating and we appreciated all the thoughtful touches in the apartment.  The apartment was small (as stated it is a studio - one room and a bathroom), but perfectly suitable for a couple as a base to explore the immediate area. The Kings Cross underground is within a 5 minute walk for locations further afield.  There were a couple of minor things that needed to be fixed for future guests (towel rail and shower head in bathroom), but Vickie said she would get these arranged after we left.  They did not affect our experience in any way, which was very pleasurable.
Good place to stay for a good value
Nice accomodation in superb location! 12 mins ferry to CBD, 30 mins walk to Bondi beach. Shaun is nice host too! We enjoyed our stay 100%
Perfect space for the 10 of us! We had great space and use of the backyard which we all enjoyed, would definitely come back.

Had an excellent stay at Hernan's, which is conveniently close to the airport. Lovely guy, "check in" was extremely easy and the room was lovely. Would definitely stay again if transiting through Sydney!

Hernan was an awesome host - accommodating of my jet lagged early arrival and helpful in getting my luggage up the stairs. His place was clean, close to airport, beach and bus line. The bed was quite comfortable and the fast Internet made me smile after having recently dealt with the Great Firewall of China. So,if getting a straight shooter host who provides everything he said he would provide and even more appeals to you, Hernan is your guy!
Thank you Belinda. Your studio was perfect. What a wonderful weekend!   We had every creature comfort and the location is close to everything yet felt so secluded. We will be back! :)
Perfect location for a stopover near the airport. Not much to choose from within walking distance, but Yan is a great little restaurant. Great find!
Angela is a fantastic Host the hause is incredible!!!

Mariana is the perfect host! Her place is in the ideal location, good surrondings and walking distance to most attractions. She was always kind and helped make our stay as pleasent as possible. I would definetely stay here again. Recommend!

I genuinely enjoyed my one-week-stay at Susan's garden studio. It contains everything you need and if you want to cook your own meal, you can do so at the kitchen in the main house. Breakfast fast excellent, lots of variety. 
Susan herself was very helpful and always up for a nice chat. I received lots of good tips where to go and which busses or trains to use. 
You might consider bringing earplugs with you. Depending on the time of day, weather and/or logistics at the airport you could hear some airplanes. But this didn't bother me much. I would definitely stay at Susan's place again.
Supreme location, fantastic view!
步行就可以到达歌剧院,在阳台就可以看见悉尼塔,步行10分钟就能到达购物中心,非常便利!
Arnie and Lorraine were great hosts who catered to my every needs. The house and location itself were perfect.

Had a wonderful stay at Philip's place in Darlinghurst. The place was very clean, beds were extremely comfortable and it was a Perfect location for anything you want to do in the city. All very close to wonderful bars and restaurants. Be warned though, there are many stairs! Very much recommended as long as you're fit!

Great view of the racecourse and a good place to be away on business. Everything needed to cook a meal was there plus a stash of various sauces, herbs and spices. Mostly very quiet, but expect to hear the clip clop of horses passing by the window in the early morning.

I was given the check in info one day before my stay though Airbnb officially said I would be given all the info three days before my stay. Host did not provide WIFI access though it was mentioned in the AD. Have been provided most of the kitchen ware. Location is very convenient if you got yourself a car. Secure parking space is a plus point. Close to DFO if you like shopping. All in all the whole apartment is fine and worth the money( nearly 300 for 3night).

I booked this apartment for my father when he came to visit, he had a great stay! The location is amazing! It is about as close as you can  get to the beach and Icebergs pool. Great cafe and a convince store right across the road, bus stop to the city right out front, and only minutes to the main shops/cafes of Bondi. Beautiful view too! The whole apartment was spotless and the bathtub was brand new. Anita is helpful and super fast with communication. She has stocked the apartment with tons of amenities from an umbrella, to a beach chair, to sunscreen to a sewing kit, she really has tried to think of everything you need. I highly recommend staying here!

My family and I had a great stay at Bill's Place. The house was roomy, with everything you need, and in  great central location to get around Sydney. Bill was also very responsive and detailed in his communication. Would highly recommend.
Boudine’s apartment is perfect for a Bondi visit- Only a short walk to the beach! Also really nice and modern and super clean!

Paul's place in Sydney was fantastic! Exactly like the pictures. Less than five min walk to king's cross train station. Just what we needed for a few days. The check in was a piece of cake and after traveling far that's always appreciated. We also (embarrassingly) locked our keys in the flat and Paul was very nice about it and accommodating about it.

Jared’s place was in the perfect location. About a 10-15 minute walk to the major sights and attractions. The apartment was a little more run down than I was expecting but overall we had a great experience.

We had a lovely Stay!!! All comments, pictures etc. We're just right! This is the perfect place to stay. We found all we needed for the three off us. Fred and bernadette were really friendly and nice and we loved to be there. Also for citytrips as well as beach vacation perfect destination. U can't find better ( and as we are working in hotel we know what's good

Best spot I have stayed in in Sydney.
Well worth it 5 Star renovated accomodation,
Absolutely stunning. The most amazing get away in the most amazing home! Angela is wonderful!

Location......view.....location.....view .... sums up our stay at Tamarama. The park next door was perfect for the our pet dog, we walked lots as Bondi was very close, lots of eating and shopping options around. Thank you Lizzy, we hope to be back, you are a great host, communication was perfect which made our stay easy and memorable.
It was nice place and near the city. The room I was very clean . Terry is very nice host.

This is great apartment, one of the best I would say, and we have staying in a few different place in Manly over the last 12 months.  The decor is lovely, the rooms are great and beds are all super comfy.  It has a great kitchen and living area as well as a large outdoor seating space where you can see the water.  Fast wifi, Bose Bluetooth, 2 smart TV's with Netflix and Spotify.  In all, it's a great apartment that you could easily feel at home living in for either a short or long stay.
Comfortable room. Good amenities. Great location for Enmore theatre.
The reservation was canceled 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We spent two days at the Garden Studio and were impressed immediately on our arrival. Such warmth and sincere hospitality. Handed a loaf of baked bread straight from the oven within moments was an unexpected delight. The beautifully styled and thoughtfully prepared space is ideal. We felt that the attention to detail was the best we have experienced using AirBNB. From the generously stocked fridge and hamper, bathroom items, games, videos and books and even picnic gear it was clear the stylish owner is well travelled and knows how to make a space a temporary home. The kitchenette has everything you need. In fact the space and the lovely courtyard was so delightful we surprised ourselves by spending the first morning there enjoying a lazy breakfast reading the terrific range of wonderful magazines rather than head out. The location is great. At the end of the street is a lovely park where we were able to fit in a morning run. Very comfy bed, quality linen, a super quiet fan. Great information and maps were a welcome addition. We would love to return here and most likely will. Highly recommended.
Easy to communicate with and tidy place

Andrew's apartment was great and in the middle of a lively neighborhood with many great restaurants & few bars, close to shopping and Central Train station! The apartment was very quiet and we enjoyed our walk around the area as we toured Sydney. I would highly recommend his apartment to anyone visiting Sydney and would come back anytime! Thank You!

linda and linh were super accomodating and allowed an earlier check in as my flight landed early. overalk the place is comfortable and the shower has good pressure and hot water. the place was relatively close to the station and was easy to get around from.
Carole and Steve were very friendly and cooperative. The place is well maintained and centrally located. We had a splendid time!

We booked Hugo' s apartment for the view and it certainly didn't disappoint. Fabulous views over Hyde Park and St Mary's Cathedral out to the Harbour.

The apartment is compact but well appointed and complete. It is clean and well maintained.

Communication with Hugo was excellent throughout and when our travel plans got thrown into disarray, he graciously helped us out.

I stayed here while exhibiting at a nearby trade show.  Arnie's house was just what I needed and it was a pity I didn't have time to 'put up my feet'.  Arnie was interststae for most of my stay so I didn't get much time to chat with him but I enjoyed chatting to the other guests in the evening.  They loved the house and were very interested in its history.
The lack of street parking was the only negative.  There is a small parking area leading to the house, but my parking skills were obviously lacking and I incurred a $1400 damage bill from the car rental firm due to scrapes on the vehicle.  Despite that I would certainly return because the house was well located and much more enjoyable than staying at a hotel.

This is a delightful gem cottage in Balmain with easy access to local cafes and walks, and near the city via bus or ferry. Jennifer had bus & ferry information, spare 'opal' transport cards, brochures and maps for us. Everything is beautifully presented, wonderful breakfast treats & welcome wine and chocolates. Perfect weekender when visiting Sydney.
Very clean and convenient to the airport with a short uber ride.

The room was fantastic, just what we needed for a short stay in the area. We'd love to stay again and explore the area in more detail. Room was just as described and if we needed anything we only had to ask.

Nice place close to Kings street in Newtown.
The house and the bedroom are really nice.
Don't hesitate to spend time in this house.
The house mates are really kind
Anita's place is fabulous!! Great location, very spacious and Anita could not have been a more helpful host. We would certainly recommend it to anyone!
房子很有特色,让我感觉到房东的文化底蕴丰厚｡地理位置十分满意｡房东人很好,我们早上退房下午飞机,就帮我们保管行李,好让我们早上去逛｡
really nicr apartment and near the central station｡ clean and tidy house. enough for four people live

The hosts Elizabeth and Simon are extremely welcoming hosts with lots of helpful tips to get around Sydney. The room was well appointed, very clean and comfortable with a gorgeous private marble bathroom located nearby. There are a few stairs but easily manageable with luggage. Elizabeth provided a concise list of all information making access to the Internet and building really easy. Would highly recommend this location for an awesome holiday experience. The hosts have gone above and beyond to make my holiday wonderful and I thank them again for it.
Thanks Hugo and Ollie - great little apartment in a super location. Ollie was very gracious with my late arrival. A top host!

Very professional and friendly hosts with nice personal touches.

Great location for access to Sydney International Airport

Starting with a warm welcome from Lina's son, our overnight stay was perfect. A very quiet street and a delightful home with every mod con at a reasonable price.
Thank you Lina,
Tina
Rob's house is such a wonderful place, clean, comfortable and we all loved it! Highly recommended:) Rob is a very nice guy, we all like him a lot! we will definitely come back!!!
Very welcoming and super accommodating
位置在中国城后面街区,去中国城很方便,还有小露台可以喝喝茶
We loved the street and location, the house is very well organised and convenient. Miss D kept in touch the whole time, making sure we had everything we needed.
Great spot. The owner was super prompt with replying to emails, accommodating and helpful. Perfect spot.

It was a lovely apartment with a relatively good location. There were numerous buses that could get us to town quickly. The house was very well furnished. The furniture and fittings and kitchenware were all clean and new. The exterior of the building may seem rather run-down but once you enter the apartment, it truly feels like a home away from home. Louise was a great host and we would be happy to return again in the future.
A great hideaway in a quiet and quality area.
非常干净整洁 很好

Great location, can see all of Bondi Beach right from the dining table. 
Very close to public transport, shops & restaurants. 
Mall is very quick to respond to any queries.

Aaron
Susan was so friendly and helpful during our stay making it easy and convenient.  The facilities were great and we felt very welcome!

Susan’s place was everything listed and more! She made sure that we could check in early after our long flight from the States. There were breakfast items in the refrigerator that worked very well for our mornings. She also provided fresh bagels that helped us make it through until lunch that day. The room was very very nice, secluded on the property and very quiet. It had everything that we needed and more. It is located close to a number of great restaurants and the beach! Just all around one of the best stays we had with fantastic hosts!
Lilian and David were very friendly and obliging. Their house is great, in a quiet street yet close to transport. Redfern is a great neighbourhood. Thanks, Lilian and David

We loved staying at Adam's gorgeous apartment - The location is fantastic, right in the middle of Potts Point which has to be one of the best areas around Sydney. The layout of the apartment it great and has been very well put together - fabulous interior style that is all very welcoming. Huge comfy sofa's, great big bed, grand dining table and then there's the terrace with views out to the harbour -  it's a perfect place to lounge and enjoy the outdoors. Thank you for sharing this wonderful space!!
The beach nearby house is as exact as the description, no more than 1 minute to bus station. The hosts is quite warm, and I strongly recommend the house as your best choice in Sydney.
Great place, friendly host! :)
Great Location, easy walking distance to Sydney CBD. I was there on business so worked out perfect for me. Didn't get to meet Hayley but Jack was a great host.
A super friendly welcome to an amazingly clean unit. So close to everything you could need/want.
My partner and I really enjoyed our time at Gavins home. We can highly recommend  to stay with Gavin.

Me and my girlfriend stayed eleven nights at Andreas place and we were really sad to leave. Very good room with a nice own bathroom. Also a nice kitchen with a big living room. We really liked the gym, pool and the sauna because they are very clean and almost always empty. So you can relax really well because you are almost always alone. We used it almost every day!
The location is perfect as it is only 5 minutes by feet to many different bus stops, coles, restaurants and bars. The bus takes you within 10 minutes to the city but you can walk there aswell. 
Andrea is a very friendly person and answered always very fast when we had any questions and her roommates are also very friendly and helpful. 
I have nothing bad to say to the place of Andrea and we wish we stayed longer.

Evelyn's apartment is real oasis of calm and luxury. Absolutely perfect for a relaxing weekend. Evelyn greeted us with all the local tips and a nice bottle of wine! All one really needs to do is open the giant patio doors and sit back to enjoy the stunning views out over the swimming pool to the water and national park beyond - bliss. The apartment is finished to a very high standard and also has a sauna to relax you even further. We had a wonderful day following Evelyn's tips with a walk up to the Barrenjoey lighthouse for breathtaking views, a delicious brunch at The Boat House sat right on the water, a cocktail at Jonah's looking out on the ocean and a gourmet dinner at the Clareville kiosk (only minutes from the apartment). We will be telling all our friends and hopefully will certainly come again soon.
Great host, stilish home in great location, water views . Highly recommended. Great food at brunch. Thank you Ann and Robert. See you again soon. Luca
Great stylish accommodation. Great location. The host was responsive to questions prior to our arrival. I have no hesitation to return to this suite again in the future.

Michy and Paul were warm and welcoming hosts and made us feel right at home in their stylish cabin. It's in a great location with a secluded beach across the road with stunning views of Pittwater and beyond. We really enjoyed our early morning paddle on their two surf skis and some fishing from the nearby wharf. The perfect base for a relaxing getaway - I'm sure we will return.
Lovely apartment, but could do with a little more wardrobe/drawer space.
Paul's place was wonderful! Perfect cosy sunny spot for a weekend winter getaway in Sydney! Location could not have been more central or convenient to everything in Manly!
Best that you could ever asked for
Great convenient location to Sydney. Easy walk to the light rail and Susan was great to get along with.
Simone's house is very well located, spacious and very nice. My grandchildren enjoyed the outside sun-sheltered space.

We had a fantastic time at Susan's place. She was there to greet us when we arrived and showed us to our room. The room was perfect. Extremely jeat and tidy and had absolutely everything we needed. It was quite private amd very close to the beach and shops so getting around was easy from her place. Will definitely be heading back again in the future!

Ben was an amazing host who had everything we needed. 
The apartment has a fantastic view of the city skyline and bridge, as well as everything you out need for a comfortable stay.
Location is great. Hassle free check in and Millie responded quickly to our questions.

Kathy’s place was such a good choice for a family. It was close to a convenient store and bus stop so getting to Coogee beach and cbd was easy and fast. It was also super close to the airport. This could be a perfect location for people who are doing lots of day trips outside the city and who like being central from all tourist attractions. We could tell Kathy thought about great hospitality. There are everything you need in the house. A huge and beautiful park is right in front of the house so you can run and exercise too. It’s great for longer stay too.
Very nice and kind people

Valentine's place was beautiful, super clean and comfortable, and in an amazing location with superb views of bondi beach. Everything in bondi is an easy walk from her place. Valentine and her boyfriend were both very lovely, generous, and helpful. It was wonderful to meet them both.

Elizabeth and Simon were just terrific and greeted us at their beautiful appartment. They were always available if we had any questions during our stay. They cooked a delicious breakfast for us and during our stay they offer us a glass a champagne. The appartment was everything advertised and it was even better than we expected. The room was clean and very confortable with all amenities that you could need. Its easy to travel all around the city and the area is one of the best area in Sydney. Elizabeth and Simon we really enjoyed your kind hospitality.
Fantastic hospitality and lovely, spacious room.
Nice house and great location.
Very clean, nice area with lots of veggie/vegan affordable restaurants and close to the city centre

Amazing location & amazing host!
But not luxury, just reasonable.

Lovely renovated home with separate studio downstairs. We stayed as a family group and enjoyed visiting local beaches and cafes. Walk to beach (although the walk home is tricky for little legs). On street parking is free and easy. Thanks for having us, we would stay again.
Great place to stay, I was in town for work and it was really convenient to the CBD and a very comfortable stay.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Fantastic apartment, perfectly positioned. Loved kings cross and the great market on the weekend across the road.
Fred & Bernadette are great hosts. The size, location and range of facilities within their apartment exceeded our expectations. Would definately recommend staying here.

I needed to find urgent accommodation and this was perfect! Angela was so quick to reply to all my questions and she was very patient and flexible with check-in and check-out. Very very clean place and a cool vibe in the house! It was lovely to meet Angela and her son, as well as getting to know their travel history a little bit. Will definitely be coming back.

Evelyn was a very welcoming and mindful host.  She greeted us with warm hospitality (and even a bottle of wine and some fresh fruit).   Evelyn was very prompt with her communications and flexible with our check-in and check-out times.  The space is the lower level of her home which is completely private with separate access, complete kitchen facilities, ensuite and sauna facilities.  The view of the pool and the water in the background was a beautiful sight to awaken to in the morning.  The surrounding beach areas and points of interest are easily accessible from the property.  Evelyn's place is definitely a piece of paradise - the perfect setting to unwind and relax, which is exactly what we needed.
The host canceled this reservation 38 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Location, location, location.  This apartment is close walking distance to anything you want to do in the city.  The room is high enough in the building that we slept comfortably with the window open without city noise.  The room is spacious, and the bed is very comfortable.  The bath and kitchen are small and dated, but perfectly functional and it was no problem for us.  I think this is a great deal for a fabulous location.  Don't miss the views from the roof.
El lugar se adecua a nuestras necesidades. La ubicación es excelente y no tuvimos ningún problema
Very clean and comfortable. Great location. Host Ziggy was very accommodating. A must stay if staying in Manly

A wonderful home away from home. There was enough space to cater and allow for our family of seven couples with little ones in tow. Beautiful view and location. The kiddies loved having their own private beach and bird visitors of cockatoos, kookaburras and lorikeets every day. Just a note to make sure the fridges are cleared of food prior to the next visitors stay.
Sam is beyond helpful with any questions you have or if you need anything. Extremely friendly and welcoming. We really enjoyed staying here
Oliver was very helpful, friendly and accommodating. Location was fabulous and the apartment was gorgeous, had everything we needed for our stay.

BEAUTIFUL and very easy to use studio in a gorgeous garden!  Everything is done to a really high quality level, from the sheets on the perfectly made bed to the spotless interior and the fantastic breakfast box Cath left for me.  The garden is a wonderful and quiet place to hang out, although it is definitely shared between you and the host.  Privacy feels more private that a room in someone else's house, but probably less than a stand-alone apartment - reasonable since it's a studio in someone's back garden.  The neighborhood is quiet and pretty, with nice cafes and a farmer's market a 15-minute walk.  Getting into and out of other places in the city takes a while; you are not in the center of things, but in a nice neighborhood.  A car or a bike would be more flexible than using transit.  Overall a great place that I would use again!

We stayed just for a short night but enjoyed our stay.
Very clean, tidy and modern apartment. A few minutes from the airport, around 15$ by taxi.
Thanks again
Great experience to live this area which is so convenient to the City. U can get all u wanna. Thanks for professional service, Andrew
Excellent accommodation for a big family or group, Best price. The property had a lot that you need, including a very spacious backyard. We enjoyed our stay very much. Thanks George.
Great place, local to everything you need and very homely. The perfect place for our weekend away.

Nous avons passe presque 3 semaines chez David. Notre chambre était petite mais très confortable, très pratique en rangements, et surtout elle donnait sur une terrasse adorable, ce que nous avons beaucoup apprécié, ainsi que la salle. Bain indépendante. Davis est un hôte charmant, discret, aidant. Nous avons adore ce séjour chez lui.

We found Ali's place to be very comfortable and clean and would recommend to anyone wanting to stay in a nice place. Ali was very friendly and welcoming.
Thank-you Ali

Beautiful cabin. Very comfortable. Very clean. Lovely hosts.
Belinda was an amazing host. I loved my stay here :) Located in a beautiful area, close to beaches, shops etc. Would highly recommend staying here.

Beautifully decorated and immaculately presented apartment, in a quiet block in the hipster Surry Hills. Conveniently located close to Central station. Lots of amazing restaurants nearby. Nicole provides excellent communication and ensures all enquiries and needs are met.
Very comfortable & central location.
Great location, great host! You get the value of your money!

Natasa's place was a great place to stay for me. The house / room is very clean and comfortable and privacy is very good. The house is close to transport, both bus and train are a very short walk. It is a very nice walk to explore the length of Norton St Leichhardt. I would be happy to stay again and recommend the place to anyone.
Great location clean and tidy unit, needs a couple of minor repairs but overall good price, good area close to everything.

Great place to stay if visiting the bars/cafes/restaurants of Cremorne and Neutral Bay. Entry if from a major road which is handy and as it is in battelaxe block it is quiet at night. Would certainly stay there again.

Our stay at Cecilia‘s was very nice.

Nice and cozy place. We enjoyed our stay here.
Arnie was nicely relaxed. Excellent area. Nice and quiet, but plenty of good cafes and bars. We'd definitely stay again.
Beautiful apartment and Ali was more than accommodating. Very cosy.
Lovely place, about an hour train journey to the main parts of the city. Pleasant area and very close to the train station. The house and room is always kept clean and they are lovely people!

Arnie's arty pad was as welcoming as the eclectic images on airbnb. He was very warm, happy to share stories about the unique residence and equally happy to give me complete space to do what I needed whilst I was there. The guest room I was in felt like I had gone completely back in time and the bath (as deep as the ocean), well, that will just have to wait til next time. Arnie's arty home in Paddington is a stones throw away from Oxford st which is super handy. Whether for work or play, in this pad, you must stay. I'll be back for sure! Thanks Arnie.

The place was very clean and close to the beach, just a 5 minutes walk.

Awesome place right on the beach. very happy to recommend to others. Mal was easy to contact and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

Nice place and valuable to leave for travel, not far to airport, also have the metro train to opera, besides has lots of convenient places to go, the most important I should not forget that there has a smart pretty garden.
