Leigh’s place is the perfect spot for a quiet coastal getaway, in the heart of thriving Coogee. He’s a great host who went over and above to make our stay easy and enjoyable. I would highly recommend Leigh’s place for your next beachside holiday.
the accommodation was great. and the hosts were very friendly. hospitality was awesome.
Room is self contained in the garden with a sitting area and en-suite. Very private. Great location and on street parking.

The room was great, clean, airy and bright!  So close to Newtown, King St where there is so much to do.

The house is really nice and on a 'quiet' leafy street.  I experienced a little noise in the evening but not too bad considering proximity to a major city, suburb.

I'd be happy to stay there again.

Thanks to Hugo, and Ollie, who welcomed me and showed me the ropes.  Great location, close to the CBD, the Cross, the train , was comfortable and has everything needed for a busy stay in Sydney.   Cheers Chris
Suzie is a great host, very helpful with directions, her home is enviably tidy and walking distance for everything I wished to visit.
Second time in here. Easy to check in, easy to park car. Will definitely come again next time. A sparkling new TV in my room.

We enjoyed our stay in Buxton house.
- Charles was very efficient in replying and accomodating our request of luggage drop off and early check in.
- Unit was spotlessly clean, strong shower, good quiet AC and has basic utensils needed in the kitchen. 
- Location is perfect for going around as it’s approx 3minutes to the closest bus stop and 20mins to central cbd; woolworths is around the corner for your grocery needs; cafes and pubs within the vicinity.
- The check in was smooth and secure. Even though the house seems fully booked, we can hardly hear any noise in our unit. It’s also secured as CCTV cameras are around the exterior of the apartment.

Mariana's studio is a place where you feel like home. My parents spent 1 month here in Sydney and just loved her studio. New appliances, very clean, great bed and shower... really close to shops, restaurants and train station. Thank you very much, Mariana!
A perfect place for a short stopover!

From the first second on Wayne made our stay as pleasant as possible. He supplied us with loads of informations of what to do and where to go. If he is not busy working, you can have a sophisticated chat with him.
The room was very comfortable and clean. Everything worked although it's a very old house he manages to keep it clean, tidy and working. 
Thanks for the awesome stay and hope to see you again.

Clare is so friendly and a great host, Molly her dog is so lovely!!. The room is nice & clean, the bed is really comfortable and the ceiling fan is perfect for summer. Location is really good if you want to try Sydney’s great train system you get to central station in a few minutes.

Thanks Heidi,
Awesome property! Our family had a lovely time. We had a gorgeous family bbq on sunday where my children and nephew ran around in the 'park' as my nephew called it. We all enjoyed the pool & spa - even our bubbly black lab! Beds super comfy & delightfully decorated. To top it all off - very quite neighbourhood close to all amenities. Thanks Heidi & family for sharing your fab home.

Ben's apartment was perfect for a few days in Sydney - well located, clean, bright and spacious. 
It is quite big for a studio, and the floorplan gives the feel of a separate kitchen, bedroom and living area. 
A great view, well ventilated and bright. 
Ben was a great host, with really good communication. He was very accommodating with check-in and check out times. 
Only downside is that the apartment doesn't have wifi, so perhaps not ideal for business travellers or longer stays.
Amazing location just above the icebergers - 2 minute walk to the pool and beach .  Views out over Bondi beach . Clean and nice apartment in an older style block .
Great location, loved the self checkin and great response from host.
Beautiful, cosy Airbnb. Location is amazing. Thank you Jenny, I loved my stay.

Parfait pour la communication, la localisation de l’appartement et des loisirs offerts sur place. La piscine et la salle de sport sont des vrais atouts pour le séjour. 
A 3 minutes de « Central Station » idéal pour se rendre partout dans la ville. 
Apparemment au calme et Coffee toujours présent pour répondre à nos attentes. 
Ce séjour était tout simplement formidable. 
Très belle expérience.
We had the most incredible stay at Anita’s property in Bondi. Anita is a lovely, helpful and generous host and the apartment was just perfect! Highly recommend!

Amazing location, quick walk to all the shops, cafes, supermarket and beach. Imogen is a wonderful host, she’s incredibly friendly, accommodating and laid back. The apartment itself is beautifully decorated and has such a good vibe. The room is spacious including a desk and large closet. The bed was super comfy with top quality linen. The bedroom was away from the common areas but next to the bathroom which was convenient. Overall the apartment was amazing and clean - highly recommended.

This is a very beautiful home and we felt very comfortable staying here. We met Naveen and Tristan as our paths crossed briefly during our stay, yet this was no hindrance and it was lovely to come and go as we pleased and still feel so welcome. 

Felix is a massive draw card (if you like dogs/animals) and was a delight to come home to each time!

The room is lovely, the bed very comfortable and the amenities well maintained. Overall it is a great example of quality Airbnb accommodation.

Location-wise it is fabulous. Wonderfully close to many of Sydney's highlights and with instant access to great coffee, food and bars. 
It is on a main road and a stone's throw from Kings Cross, so be aware that if you are a light sleeper you will need earplugs to help reduce the noise. However, this doesn't diminish the appeal of the place but rather just something to be prepared for.

We would happily stay here again whenever we are in Sydney and highly recommend it to all fellow Airbnb-ers.
The property is great with a spectacular location.

I stayed at David's lovely apartment for 6 days. Upon my arrival, David showed me around and he had even put together a scrapbook with recommendations on places to eat! The apartment is exactly like what you see in the pictures. It was very clean and everything that you could possibly need to make your stay as comfortable is provided! There are a couple of nice cafés near surry hills and oxford street. It takes just a straight bus to the cbd or to the beach! David is a very nice person and it is safe to stay there for solo travelers. I highly recommend his place! Thank you for making my stay really comfortable and I really felt at home =)
Near to public transport and airport

Great location! A very nice area with lots of bars, shops and restaurants close by and a nice stroll to the city. Clean, modern and comfortable apartment. Very friendly and helpful hosts who were great at communicating and made us feel very welcome. We would definitely stay there again!

Susan provided us with specific information and demonstrated a caring, sharing attitude. The room itself was cosy with a private ensuite. We are familiar with Leichhardt and knew of the plane noise but apart from that, the area was relatively quiet. Thank you Susan!

Tracey’s place was stylishly decorated with lots of thoughtful touches. It was perfect for a special night away for a couple. Close to some great cafes and restaurants and train was a short walk away. Tracey provides lots of info on the local area including maps which was helpful. 
Thanks for having us. It was a perfect weekend.
Nice cosy self contained accommodation

A cosy and quiet apartment within the city fringe, with cafes & convenience store nearby. Walking distance to Red fern train station and we even walk to Sydney Fish Market, although my kids were complaining about it.
The kitchen is stock up with all sort of food and seasoning. 
Thank you, Linda.
Would recommend this place for anyone wanting a weekend away in the city! Close to everything

Good communication and prompt response from the host even though that was a late night check in.

The place is nice and clean.
A really nice space! Very close to the beach too.
Not very clean. not the best position. But cheap.

We had an awesome stay at Paul's place! It was only a few mins walk down to the ferry wharf or to the corso - fantastic location. The apartment was really clean and had all of the amenities you needed. What you see is what you get.

Margaret is a generous host who respects your privacy yet unobtrusively ensures that you have everything that is needed, including generous breakfast provisions.
We stayed several weeks whilst waiting to move into our new home and although the bathroom and kitchen are compact they are functional and we soon adapted to cooking and boiling water for washing up in the indoor/ outdoor kitchen. The shower has plenty of hot water but once again is compact. The bed is comfortable and the living area quite spacious. Train enthusiasts will particularly enjoy checking out the many original artifacts that decorate the spaces. 
The accommodation is located a few kilometres from the train station so a car is recommended. There are some beautiful bushland walks leading to the George's River that are well worth exploring and Sydney is about 50 minutes by train.
We would highly recommend Margaret's place, especially for short stays. We loved the convenience of being close to everything yet being on the edge of bushland and the river. We also enjoyed interacting with Margaret's three dogs that live on the property and look forward to returning when we return to the area.

This is THE garden oasis if you want to stay anywhere near marrickville. Really comfy bed delightful space easy parking plus breakfast. You do need to climb the ladder to bed (and down in the morning) but the space and facilities are superb. A real treasure.
A good stay
It is just the way it is at the picture and felix is the goddest little cute creature.

The place is very lovely. Thank you for welcoming us with flower .. we love it

The place have everything you need and have complete stuff for cook and bbq

Really comfy bed and large space

Michy and Paul are such great hosts. They made feel very welcome as soon as I arrived. The backyard cabin is newly renovated. It is very clean, modern, classy and quiet. It is very close to the beach. I will definitely come back again. Thank you Michy and Paul!
Simone’s place was beautiful, extremely convenient and her hospitality made our stay very easy. Thank you so much for hosting us!
A fabulous location and plenty of space for a small group or family. Lots of natural light and charm. Thanks Rachel!
Great stay - funky space - great to explore the area - very handy to buses etc

This house is so zen. The rooms are gorgeous, it has such a great vibe and set up. The bath tub is awesome, the kitchen has everything you need. The location is perfect, close to everything. Cat is the perfect host, very reliable and flexible. We all had the best time.

Tam's place was perfect, offering everything that I needed in the perfect location. 
Very happy with my stay and Tam's communication. Highly recommended !

Our stay here was so lovely. We will definitely be back! Private, clean, sunny, well equipped, homely and an ideal location to explore the national park. Belinda welcomed us and showed us the ropes and some good walks   We will definitely be back!! Thank you!

Thank you for sharing your beautifully appointment apartment with us Mags. Loved the claw bath and ornate ceilings! The location was perfect and the apartment and had everything we could possibly need. We'd love to stay again next time we are in Sydney.
Excellent host and a spacious room with a great view with the harbour! Convenient to get around with a car too.
Good place, great location!
非常好的民宿,老板热情,民宿位置好,周围有超市和吃饭的地方｡推荐!

We felt so at home at The Garden Studio, it's a pity we didn't have more time to thoroughly enjoy this cosy space. 

We loved the ginger biscuits, & freshly baked bread, that Cath handed to us in the morning, still warm from the oven. Cath was approachable & helpful when we needed info on how to get around, but at the same time, gave us the space we needed. Her chickens too, were rather welcoming! A joy to talk to; we appreciated the short exchanges & enjoyed listening to her share bits about herself :) 

A gem of a place!

Susan and Greg were excellent and inviting hosts.  My stay here was wonderful and over & beyond what I had expected.  Staying at this studio bed and breakfast was a 10/10.  Here you will have peace and quiet with a lush & scenic backdrop.  You will have all the amenities to live comfortably as well as all the amenities needed going to the beach.  They've thought of everything!

It was an absolutely lovely stay with my family at Fred&Bernadette fantastic place. We were so lucky because we've booked at the same morning when we arrived and everything was just perfect even they had guests before.Location is fantastic the bus to the city in front of the door and the flat and Fred&Bernadette are just beautiful.A beach in front of the door what else do u need for an unforgettable stay in Sydney!! You can see the love to the details and will not regret to stay with them.Thanks for that and the tasty welcome gifts.

Such a lovely space that felt very cosy and private. Location is amazing as there are a couple cafes to choose from and a train station 5 min walk away. Steven and his family are beautiful and were very easy to get along with. They keep everything in perfect condition.
Great place to stay
Splendid location, nice flat, near to shops and cafes but away from the heavy tourist traffic. Recommended.

I had an excellent experience staying at Hernan's place. He was very welcoming and friendly, and helped me making taxi arrangements, and made sure I was up early for my taxi to the airport. His apartment was comfortable and clean. Just up the road is a good place to find something to eat. I didn't have time to check out the nearby beach. The place is close to Sydney airport. A taxi ride during peak hour, from the airport to Hernan's, was around $41. It was significantly cheaper in the early morning, going to the airport.
tidy and clean,  within 20mins walk from the airport, very convinient. thanks!
Great place to stay!

The flat location is good in central Sydney and convenient for walking. The flat facilities are basically in ok condition, but more care needs to be taken over plumbing in the bathroom sink and muffling of noise from the street outside, as the bedroom windows look upon the street and one of the windows' latch handles was missing, so it could not be closed (this meant more noise but also a lot of the summer heat entering the flat).
A lovely, modern, beautifully decorated apartment within easy walking distance of North Avalon Beach. Very comfortable bed and gorgeous bathroom(s).
Fabulous!
Great location, but that’s about it. Very overpriced and not clean enough.
Vickie"s Chic Pad is a great location and exactly as advertised.

Nice cosy place, great facilities, coffee shop downstairs, and only a short walk to Darling Harbour and Circular Quay. We stayed with 2 adults, and 3 kids and it worked perfectly for us. Would recommend!

This cosy little cottage is in a fabulous location with so many dining options near by and a short walk to the ferry.  Very quiet street and tastefully decorated throughout. Paul was most welcoming on our arrival and close by should we need anything. Thank you for a great stay.

We really enjoyed our stay at Hugo's apartment. The location was prime as there were so many coffee shops and bars to walk to. Hugo was easy to communicate with and made sure that we felt as comfortable as possible. Thanks Hugo!

Shawn is a great host, he did everything to make our stay confortable and gave us some really nice places to go visit. 
The room is very cosy and just 5 minutes from the ferry wharf to get you to the city center. 
We had a lovely stay there and would definitely go back :)
Shuang's place was great. It had everything I needed for the Stay and was very clean. I had a small problem with the iron but Shuang had it fixed within minutes! Would definitely recommend.
Central location in Circular Quay, great spot to get around from, easy to contact the hosts very friendly people. Had a great time.

A little slice of heaven in one of Sydney’s most beautiful locations. Every aspect exceeded my expectations and I wish I could have stayed longer. The property was spotless, and had everything I needed. I felt right at home straight away.

David's place in wonderful in all aspects. A real oasis in the middle of a busy, beautiful city. We stayed here with our two young daughters who also loved it. There is so much to do here. David is really friendly and helpful. We can definitely recommend it here!
Good

Love the space and privacy of the cabin. It was so comfortable and cosy I took my time to get ready every morning and never left the cabin until 11am. Great for a solo retreat! Susan was a great hostess and I enjoyed my conversation with her.

Once I mastered the bus system, I realized how easy it was to get to Arnie's Victorian home. 
The room assigned to me was spacious; however the bedsprings of the antique bed creaked, and made me paranoid about disturbing the rest of the occupants of the house (and other guests). After a long day exploring the city, the creaking bedsprings did not bother me as much on the second night.
The bathroom is up another set of stairs, but clean and spacious too.
Arnie was very helpful when I discovered I had lost the key to my luggage, and I really appreciated that.
The house itself is filled with Victoriana and of Arnie's large paintings.
The neighborhood of Paddington is very boutiquey and fun to wander through.  There are a number of bookshops (which I love) and many furniture and clothes stores. Went to a couple of cafes for breakfast in the neighborhood; the food was reasonably priced and the coffee was great.
All in all, a different and attractive face to Sydney, than what I was used to. I'm glad I chose this home on this Sydney visit.

Great location in a very old building. The apartment has been renovated but has some problems... The building itself is very old and not nice. And the shower is a bit disappointing... Overall a good stay.
Great view and location, tidy apartment, requires a little maintenance but would stay again...
That’s my second time with Cindy & Claudio and it was great again! :-)

Rob was great to deal with! Very helpful, friendly and timely - nothing is too much trouble.
Clean bedding (like a hotel), towels and clean bathroom.
Photos aren't quite the same as the property. It's quite aged and in need of a good clean or complete renovation.

Where do we begin? Desireé is a wonderfully thoughtful host that made our stay so special. The apartment looks exactly as pictured - modern, comfortable and clean. The location is fabulous and central to everything! This apartment does not disappoint! Our only regret is that we didn't stay for longer. We will certainly be back the next time we are in Sydney! Thank you Desireé!
Dear Rachel, We loved staying in your place, lovely house, great atmosphere and wonderful location .

Sensational weekend at the best end of bondi.  Great views, like having your own home right on the beach. Close to the best cafes, easy to park, easy to get around and Mal was so easy to communicate with.  Best weekend

The Garden Studio has had a Hundred positive reviews and We finally see why! It's all true!
Seriously Cath has provided the most thoughtful services, she even personally got us fresh Bread in the morning and Jam donuts too! The place is filled with everything that we need, more than we even expected.
She has done such amazing work with a small space, it's functional and we just love the layout and modern design aesthetics! Cutest Studio we've ever stayed in!
Thanks Cath!

My parents stayed in this apartment and here is what they had to say: "Our stay in Brendas apartment was terrific! Brenda herself greeted us and gave us helpful hints and a tour of her stylish home. We were impressed by the lovely white towels,  lovely bedlinen and even beachtowels for us to use, very thoughtful as we came all the way from Sweden! We loved the very nice and spacious home, which we quickly felt was cozy and easy to relax in. The apartment is tastefully furnished and decorated with Art Deco from the smallest items, furniture and lamps as well as interesting art. We had breakfast, lunch and dinners on the fantastic green and shaded terrace where we even could catch a glimps of Coogee Beach!
 
Our stay in Sydney after Christmas was terrific, including precious family time with our two sons and their partners, as well as friends who also could stay in the extra bedroom. New Years Eve was celebrated on the terrace where we had a great view of the fireworks in Coogee. We could easily find the shops closeby and nice walks in the surroundings. Buses and subway took us around in Sydney in no time!
 
We are happy to recommend Brenda as a friendly and trusting host and who knows, we might be back again soon!?"

Phillip’s place is beautiful and in the perfect location. It is walking distance to bus and train stations. It location near the grocery store and bottle store. This place is perfect for couples or a group of friends.  We enjoyed cooking a couple of nights and a few night lounging on the large couch and watching local tv shows. If you don’t mind a few stairs... this is the place to stay.

Judy's place is very accurate to the listing. It was sparkling clean and the check-in process was so easy. Very nice location if you want to get away from the city a bit, but still very close to the train station. There are quite a few guests at the place, but they are not intrusive at all. 

Overall, would definitely recommend!
Duncan and Ashlee were excellent hosts. My daughter and I enjoyed staying in their super clean and tasteful home. It is our home away from home! Highly recommended!

I had a lovely time staying with Paul and his family in gorgeous Redfern! The location is fantastic - not too busy but super conveniently located. Paul, Judith, Tim and Nicola treated me like one of the family. Highly recommended.
跟房东沟通顺利,也帮了很大的忙｡房间干净整洁,出行方便,家里人很满意,有机会再来入住｡

very high quality fit out unit, loads of room to spread out, very quiet location, beds were comfortable, the property is elevated so the glorious morning sun revealed an lovely view through the huge windows, great place to enjoy a coffee and breakfast, very easy to get on and off the motorway, this is a very classy place
Paul's place is well designed, cosy and in an excellent location.  We would stay here again

Daniel and Elena are great hosts. Because of some reasons, I booked my stayed at very last minute. They were still able to set up a check in for me tho both were busy. The house is nice and clean. Everyone in the house is also friendly.

Victoria’s place is in a great location. There are plenty of eating places nearby and lots of interesting shops. All of Sydney’s attractions are within walking distance but public transport is good, we got buses into town and got the train and bus to Bondi Beach. We loved having breakfast looking out of the window at the passers by in the street. Great place!

This apartment is in a fantastic location with many local bars and excellent eateries. Walkable to the botanical gardens and central Sydney. The apartment is perfectly equipped and had all the essentials so we were able to cook in our eat out. Highly recommend staying here in a wonderful part of Sydney!

Anita's house is perfect for a lovely getaway at Bondi Beach.  It is opposite the beach with direct access to Icebergs and all that Bondi has to offer.  Quick walk to a local off leash dog park too!  The beach, bars and restaurants are all on your doorstep and the bus stops right out front!  Cannot be beaten for the location!  The place itself is a studio and perfect for a couple.  It is clean and very comfortable with a view of the ocean!  Perfect! Highly recommend!!!
Paul was an amazing host! He was so easy to communicate with and super accommodating, one of the best hosts I've ever come across. The place is super cute and in a perfect location

Thank you Belinda and Chris for making your beautiful garden studio available for stays. Divine! We had a fabulous time. The studio had everything we needed, great kitchen set up so we could prepare two yummy simple meals, and a lovely little verandah into the garden to enjoy our leisurely breakfasts. Your studio in located only a minutes walk to the best little beach and so close to stunning cliff tops walks in the Royal Nat Park. We had absolute privacy for out stay - which was lovely. Thank you for such a welcoming, private and cosy sanctuary.

This place was bigger than expected, had plenty of hot water, fully functional kitchen, and close to 3 grocery stores, lots of places to eat, and transit stops.  David is a great host, left tea, coffee, cereal, dish soap, etc. to use. There is one portable heater so rooms got chilly without the heater but there are extra blankets. Bring slippers. Definitely noisy in the living room at night from people in the corridor downstairs and the queen bed was quite bouncy. However, it was the perfect spot for our stay, we were quite happy.
Great. House in reachable location. Really comfy beds and all needs catered for. Good communication. Very highly recommended.
Very nice home, has all the amenities you need and is in a prime location!!

This space is bright and airy with everything you need. Very secluded, yet Susan is on hand if necessary. Lovely walks to beach and great coffee shops nearby. Public transport close too. Had a lovely stay and enjoyed the breakfasts.

This apartment has so much potential but as it is now just didn’t work for us. We visited during a time where the weather was 90F degrees and the “air conditioning” isn’t air conditioning at all. It is a standing unit where you must keep the sliding door open 8-10 inches all day/night if you want to use it, thus defeating the purpose and letting all the hot air in. It made the loft unbearable. So much so that we had to sleep downstairs on the couch and air mattress. The bathroom was nice and it has a full kitchen and washer. Those are the nice things I can say. Check in was easy and he accommodated us early which we appreciated. David (who we were in contact with) did try to help us but there were just too many problems. The WiFi worked 20% of the time we were present - he blamed it on us using too much bandwidth - we were simply trying to connect an iPhone to the internet and to text - not stream movies or download anything. The beds were uncomfortable but the place would be a good value if the WiFi worked and if it had actual air conditioning as advertised and how the pictures lead you to believe. Because we had to keep the door open (security risk) so many bugs, spiders, etc. came in too. Also the smoke detectors are covered in aluminum foil which is a safety risk. I would not recommend this Airbnb to anyone at its present state but it could be great for the cost and for bigger groups as it sleeps 5-6 somewhat comfortably. Our stay, however, was not pleasant at all and we could not wait to leave.

Simon & Nicole's Airbnb was great! 

Apartment was clean, had an awesome shower, comfy bed, fully equipped kitchen, even had a few little chocolates & snacks scattered thru the house. 

Location was close to shops, cafes restaurants and central station. 

Thanks so much Simon & Nicole for an fab stay in Surry Hills!

Both the host and the apartment were wonderful. The apartment is very clean and well organised, with paintings and decorations around the apartment providing a soothe homely feeling. Inside the room was a wooden stand with towels, books and dvds which added a lot of personality to the apartment. The room had a nice balcony attached to it which provided a nice place to eat and relax. As well as this, the room had 2 powerboards next to the bed so everything can be plugged in and a mini-fridge next to the bed.

The host provided most of the items that you might not remember to bring with you including plates, cups, cutlery, shampoo/body wash and more. The apartment was less than a 2 minute walk from the Redfern Train Station which is just 1 stop away from central, so this was in the perfect location to do sight seeing. 

I would recommend staying at this apartment.
Beautiful premises, wonderful private space & incredible hospitality shown to my pups. I would return without a second thought
Location & price is excellent. Perfect for a family on holiday in the heart of Sydney!

I booked my friends in Mohit’s apartment and Mohit was a delight to deal with, he was responsive and allow us a very early checkin. The checkin and out process was seamless. Apartment is spacious and clean and great location. Highly recommended :) thank you so much, Mohit!

Our employees enjoyed staying at this property.  It was close to where they were working in the area and we would definitely look at booking again if the need arose.  Both Godelieve and Tam were very accommodating when we needed to extend our booking on a couple of occasions so that was very helpful to us.

Great location close to the station and the city center. Quick response and great housemates. The cleanliness of the house was a little relaxed definitively encountered some roaches. But I would come back without a second thought
Excellent apartment in a great location, with a great view
Great location & very clean. Friendly and accomodating - I requested late check out and then also offered to look after my bags for me if I needed. Quick responses for any questions

Great location to reach the ferry to city or walk to beach and military road for great food. Beautiful view. Not big but great for mostly just sleep overnight. Cleanness could be approved. But overall great value!
I stayed at Brock's place for two weeks. It is a nice place with a lot of light, right next to the university and in a good neighbourhood. I really enjoyed my stay!
地理位置不错,走路10分钟到地铁站,房间宽敞,用品齐全,就是设施稍旧一些,房东很周到很好沟通,入住比较温馨,房子整体性价比不错
Jack and Hayley were great hosts! They made everything convenient and were endlessly helpful. Great location, true to advertising, and very affordable. Thank you both!

Absolute gem of an apartment just footsteps to the golden sand and crystal blue surf of Manly Beach. 

Always a pleasure to find a place that is sparkling clean and has the easy style and amenities to make your stay a perfect holiday. 

We loved everything about this apartment and can’t wait for an excuse to come back. 

We really appreciated Anita’s communication as a host too.
Nice location

My friend and I loved staying at MissD’s townhouse for a few nights! It was a lovely house in a perfect location - a short walk to the train station and to the bars and pubs of Newtown. Easy access to everywhere in Sydney. It was the perfect spot to spend a few nights when catching up with friends.
Great central location with plenty of amenities and a helpful host.
Well located & good value

We had a lovely stay, even though only for one night. Very convenient location for everything we had planned for weekend.  House was very clean, spacious, had everything you could possibly need on a trip away and the kitchen was even stocked with extra supplies which was a real bonus!!  Beds were comfortable too.!
Perfect spot for myself and three young children.  Much better value and atmosphere than any hotel. 
We are regular visitors to Sydney and will definitely book this accommodation again. Thank you

Fred is very kind and warm
I love his house 
Everything was clean and tidy
The view from the small room was fantastic seeing the sea
Had a great stay. Was a great spot and the place was clean. Leigh was easy to get in touch with making check-in a breeze.

A peaceful stay in a well equipped garden studio - steps away from Bundeena beautiful beaches and nature walks. Belinda and Chris are hospitable and responsive hosts. We thank them for a peaceful rest in Bundeena

Lovely clean and well decorated large room with fantastic view of blue sea.Is situated between two beaches with lovely walk to both. Shared bathroom and kitchen was easily managed with access to fridge and cooker if you wanted to cook.Maria provided excellent and helpful information and is a wealth of local knowledge.Highly recommend this property and host

Muy buena ubicación! Oriel es muy atento, siempre a disposición, comunicación rápida.
El departamento es muy cómodo y amplio.

Angela and Geoff were fantastic hosts. They were very welcoming, gave us plenty of information and even offered to help us source dinner. The apartment is just stunning. It is beautifully decorated and very comfortable. The beds were really comfortable. The apartment was so well equipped with more than we could possibly need. We really appreciated the fresh bread, fruit and variety of tea available. Angela and Geoff even organised a cot and high chair for my son so I didn't have to bring the portacot or worry about chasing him around to feed him. I wish we needed to stay longer! Highly recommended.

The apartment is a great choice if you would like to stay near the city centre located in a chic neighborhood scattered with nice little cafes.  

Ricky, our host is very friendly and helpful which made our stay very enjoyable!

Michele has thought of everything to make your stay easy and comfortable. Amenities are clean and modern. Close proximity to cafes, park, hospital, university and the city. It’s perfect for all types of trips

There are a lot of amenities there. I really like soap and body balm. I think the room is alittle bit cold but there is a heater, tea and coffee for you.

Regarding the location, it is not far away fron CBD. You have to take a bus or the train. During this period, it has some construction. So, you may use the replacement bus or taxi to Naveen' home.

Last but not least, I am really impress the view of Darlinghurst from our room.
We had a great stay at Fred & bernadette lovely apartment. Would highly recommend. Cheers mark & dean
This is the third time I have stayed in Steven's cabin. It is very comfortable and in a convenient location.
Absolutely loved it. Better than Bondi

After my original accommodation was cancelled 2 days prior to my wedding I urgently needed to find alternate accommodation for my bridal party.
Wayne and Kate made this possible.
Their apartment is clean, tidy and has all of those little bits and pieces that you need for a nice weekend away.
Thanks again guys!

High recommend Jeremy's Airbnb for groups of friends who'd like to explore Sydney! Location was amazing as we were a 10 minute walk away from the city :) The space was clean and larger than I had initially expected with 4 bedrooms with some individual balconies in the terrace house. Would definitely book again for my next Sydney trip!

Our stay with Arnie was a pleasure. He was responsive to our messages before and during our stay. He was home when we arrived and provided great recommendations on places to visit.

The house is very well-located. Paddington is an absolutely delightful neighborhood. We enjoyed exploring the wide-range of cafes, restaurants, and stores (we definitely recommend dinner at Eat Thai). Likewise, we enjoyed having the option of a leisurely stroll down Oxford to the CBD or choosing one of at least three bus lines to whisk us quickly to our destination.

With regards to the house itself, this is certainly a property for anyone with an appreciation for art. Arnie has a well-curated collection, including many of his own works. During our stay, there was a guest in the second bedroom, but we didn't have any issues with the shared bathroom.

Rachel's house is perfectly located in Mosman - close to shops, restaurants and transport. The house was exactly as in the pictures - very stylish, clean, light and airy. The beds were all very comfortable and all mod cons were available for use. Rachel was easy to communicate with and we would highly recommend staying here.

A lovely old house situated in a lovely part of Sydney.  Paul, Judith their dogs and their grownup kids are all wonderful people who were a real pleasure to chat with every morning over breakfast and every evening after a long day of sightseeing.  This is one of the nicest experiences I've ever had with Airbnb, keep up the great work, guys, and continue to be awesome smart classy people.

I really enjoyed my stay at Hernans place. I felt very welcomed and was happy about the relaxed and easy going atmosphere.
The transport was okay, easy to reach with bus or half and hour walk to the next train station. Shoping and eating was near by.
Altogether thanx so much for the wonderful stay Hernan.

Very comfortable home. The best mattress we have had through Airbnb! Great a/c, good kitchen and quality appliances. 
Lina and her family was very friendly. The photos don’t give the apartment justice, it’s actually quite large. Can recommend for short or long stays!
Nice place

Paul is a charming and thoughtful host. He was incredibly kind and helpful and I really enjoyed our little chats. The house is in a great location in Bourke Street so really close to Surrey Hills, Centennial Park and for getting in and out the city. The room is very nice and a little away so you have your own privacy.  I would highly recommend this airbnb.

Location of apartment was fantastic. Walking distance to The Star, Fish Market and Darling Harbour. The apartment was also very organised and clean. Loved that there was ample sunlight that passed through the apartment. Parking space was a little tight. Recommend to get a smaller car if you intend to rent one. There are certain things to take note, response from host was not very prompt. Asked for late check out several times and only managed to receive a reply after 3 texts and emails. Parking garage was renovating the day I arrived but was not informed earlier and had to pay for parking several hours. Overall, a good experience.
Cat was more than accommodating and an excellent communicator. Her house is brilliant with lovely private spaces and a quick walk to Bondi. Highly recommend :)
非常好!房东很贴心!

The location of the house is excellent due to its vicinity to the Maroubra beach and downtown city.  The house is spacious, good enough for a big family or a group of friends.  It's also nice that the house has lots of cooking utensils that allow you to prepare food so we can make our own food sometimes.  The host is also very nice to let us use the seasoning in the kitchen.  

The only comment of the house is a bit older than we expected and we encountered small insects inside.  The repellent that was provided in the house was useful in that case.

Overall speaking, it's a nice stay for my family.

Would use again if we return to Sydney and want that side of town.
Quieter than expected given right on Elizabeth St.

Such a beautiful and cosy apartment with views from the lounge/kitchen that pictures would definitely do no justice. I felt like I was at home. Nick stayed in the front bedroom but it felt like he wasn’t there at all, not until we needed his help with a hiccup trying to get the bathroom door unlocked haha. He is such a beautiful person, and I would without a doubt be recommending his beautiful place to any friends that wish to stay in the city in the future!
Awesome location, very clean and tidy
Place was great. Very good location, nice and easy to access.
Amazing location. Waking up facing Bondi was a great experience. Walking distance to public transport, shops, food and beach.

Best possible location to visit the beaches, Bronte, Tamarama, and Bondi. The City is only a bus ride away.
Jenny is really nice person as well as a very professional host.  You will like this place.
5 minute walk to the beach. Hernan is very friendly and hospitable. I'm going to be staying again before I leave.
Wonderful area, the place was super clean and homely, great court yard for breakfast and the hosts were wonderful, so welcoming. A real treat to stay here.

Great people 
Very friendly
Very clean and tidy

The area is really nice and the premise is very secured. Just in front of the bus stops and near to Top Ryde shopping complex and various food options. 

The accommodation is quite good value for the money and all the amenities are available. Also one very positive thing was not mentioned in the listing that, the apartment have a small, well decorated veranda to spend time smoking, drinking and having fun or enjoying solitary time.

Naby is really warm and welcoming. She is very helpful and spent significant amount of her free time with me (she is a very busy lady with her career). I would like to visit her place again.

Thank you Naby !!! Hope to see you again.
The host canceled this reservation 91 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Fantastic value for the money. A stylish spot in a nice area, close to many restaurants and cafes. A good spot for a solo Traveller.
房東太太人很好,很照顧房客,讓我們提前寄放行李,非常感謝!地點真的很棒!廁所廚房都很乾淨,房間也很整潔!唯獨隔音不太好,會聽到樓上走路的腳步聲｡
Great location, great place, definitely recommend to anyone wanting to stay in Manly!

Angela's place is sparkling clean and very comfortable. It is a quick ride from and to the airport and is well connected to bus stops in case you want to go to the city. Angela is very professional and friendly. Highly recommend it.

Millie was a great host and her apartment was perfect. It was clean, spacious and comfy. We had a little issue the first day when the electric tripped (the fuse box is in the wardrobe) but Millie’s friend Shelly and Millie were both so helpful and attentive it didn’t matter! The bed is super comfy and she has everything you could possibly need.
The view from the balcony really is the same as the pictures- it’s incredible! 
I would highly recommend this apartment and wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again! 
Thank you Millie!
The apartment is really great and has everything we need. The stay is enjoyable. Andrew is a nice host.
Convient acomodation
The house was lovely and comfortable, very close to restaurants etc.

Lägenheten är definitivt inte för 5 personer då det inte finns utrymme för mera än 4 personer.
Vi fick inte information om det inte fanns 5 sängar.
Nödlösningen med en luftmadrass var inte acceptabelt.
Lägenhetens läge var utmärkt 
Heltäckningsmatta i lägenheten är inte bra då den kräver en extremt god städning vilket kan ifrågasättas eftersom det låg så mycket med damm på kylskåpet i köket och köket är helt integrerat med vardagsrummet. De 2 sovrummen var helt ok men det var nästan omöjligt att få utrymme i vardagsrummet med den uppblåsbara luftmadrassen, som inte kan sägas vara en säng utan en NÖDLÖSNING. Lägenheten skall inte hyras ut till 5 personer, för 4 personer är den OK
Really chill place in a great location. Pleasant and scenic walk to the harbor and close radius to lots of good bars/restaurants.

Absolutely fantastic. Couldn't ask for a better location - close to city but fabulous neighbourhood with great cafes and restaurants. Apartment was even better than we expected as with six people having three bathrooms was great. Can't rave enough about this place - a must stay in Sydney.

Great location. Beautiful garden. Easy check in. Lovely neighbourhood. 
Comfy bed. Nice touches like breakfast.
Tim and Liz are very friendly and warm-hearted persons. I felt like I was at home! Highly recommended :-)

Overall the place is amazing value for money. Location is excellent for (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with the hosts is easy.  
If you do decide to stay here make sure you print out the instructions given by the hosts to get into the car park and up to the unit as it is a bit tricky.
I would definitely stay here again.
Wonderful stay. Would recommend for easy access to the Blue Mountains.
The location made it a perfect base to explore the city from. Communication with the owners was great throughout the booking process. Self check-in was easy. We would happily stay here again.
It is very convenient to travel, and you can get to Sydney harbour and the commercial street shopping. The rooms are very comfortable.
Great location, however, house had bugs running through it.

Trent is a really nice guy who will help you in any way he can.
When we arrived the place was a bit dirty but that wasn't Trents fault because he had been awayand his apartment had been out for lease.
And he made a really good job with fixing everything so we could have a happy stay!
And we did:)

The location is great and the apartment is lovely:)
The room is pretty small but it didn't bother us at all.

Can recommend this place to anyone, close to Bondi and to small hidden beautiful beaches around the coastline.
Naveen was a great host and myself and my friends had a great stay at the loft.

I & wife stayed here for the first trip in Sydney.
We really enjoyed days and never forget our memory in here. Room is very clean and all stuff we need are prepared in a room. I think it is ok to bring your personal things like a clothes.

And this room has a very nice view of Bondi beach.

If you want to have a good memory in Bondi beach, I strongly recommend Anita's room. 

Thank you so much for your help, Anita! :)

I loved the apartment from the minute I parked the car in the car park. The entrance has been decorated beautifully and it takes your breath away. The apartment is upstairs and above a retail shop although you wouldn't know it. 
It is incredibly spacious, but cosy at the same time. 
The interior decoration is gorgeous and inviting plus it makes you feel like you are at home. The location is just fabulous and caters for everything. Local cafes for coffee in the morning, restaurants for dinner are walking distance, great retail shopping and local delicatessens. 
Centennial Park which is a great place to relax. 
and finally, when I arrived I found that Louise had left me fresh bread, a bottle of wine and some beautiful flowers. 
I would definitely recommend this property and would stay there again.

Both Hugo and Oliver were very helpful.
The apartment was clean and tidy and had everything we needed for our stay. The location was perfect as it was a short walk from a lot of things. The train station, shops and restaurants were only a few minutes walk away, and it was a 25minute walk from the Botanical Gardens and the Opera House.

This was my first Airbnb experience and it was absolutely perfect! 

A huge thank you to Diana and Jared, who are were excellent hosts - communicative, thoughtful and warm.  I was made to feel incredibly comfortable in their home and I loved every bit of my stay.  Diana gave me clear instructions on how to find the place and communicated really well in the lead up to my arrival, making the transition smooth and stress free. 

I loved the little touches.  There were chocolates and water left out on the bed, milk and juice in the fridge and beautiful candles lit for my arrival.  I immediately felt right at home.  

The unit is modern, comfortable and in a truly amazing location.  The Rouse Hill shopping precinct has every shop you would need and you literally step out the door and you are right in the thick of it.  

The furnishings are modern yet comfortable, and the property is equipped with all the little things that you need for a week away (everything from laundry powder to salt & pepper shakers).  

Thank you so much for your wonderful hospitality guys!

Cathy is a great host, she was very nice and helpful, flexible and always got back to me quickly. 
The place is really nice with lots of little touches, is a great location to beach and shops. Also excellent parking is right out front!
Thanks Cathy
Had a great stay here. Close to city and had everything needed
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Fantastic location, easy to get to the city. The unit is clean, well furnished and perfect for a long weekend couples stay in Sydney
Great location if you are staying to go to a concert, restaurants under the building and can walk to the stadium.  Easy to find.

Susan was very considerate, warm and welcome, so as hubby :) Garden flat is at the rear of lovingly maintained older style house. Room is as you see in the photo and very tastefully done. quality bedding, loved the floor tiles in the bathroom, leafy garden to enjoy quiet time and reading. Friendly cat sits on your lap. Beware of mozzies though. I am usually the last person to get bitten, but I attracted plenty in the garden. The suburb,shops and Tamarama beach has "local" feel and lot less commercial than places like Bondi and Coogee. Easy bus ride to Bondi junction and city. Very nice coastal walk we enjoyed. We had a nice time.
Very nice and clean place with everything you need. Exactly like the photos. Great view and nice neighbourhood with nearby shops. Would defiantly stay again
The accommodation is clean and convenient to discover Sydney city. The house is family friendly, we can find all we need inside the house and the neighbourhood.

The place is described as it is, very nice and homey! Everything was provided for and communication was excellent. The house is just a moments walk away from the beach and the living room view is stunning. Thank you for such a great stay!
My parents stayed here for about a week while visiting me. They had a great time and really enjoyed the house.
Natalia is a great host, I would definitely recommend staying at her place. The unit is very clean, wifi works perfectly. The room is big and the location amazing, walking distance to Coogee Beach.

My guest Nick said:
My stay in Forest Lodge was all smooth sailing. The apartment was clean and had everything you needed. Cedric was quick to respond to messages and happy to help. It was easy walking distance to Suburbs like Chippendale, Glebe and Broadway. And the chocolate croissant from Goose Bakery down the street was worth writing about too.

The house was amazing, even better than the photos make it look. In particular the backyard was very nice and private. The location was also great -  within walking distance of Manly beach and the wharf, making it easy to get into the city via the ferry. The three bathrooms was good to have. It should be noted that as the house has four levels there are quite a few stairs. Helen was very friendly and responsive.

Everything was just great! It is a cozy little apartment near the Sydney center. Clean and you got everything you need for your stay. Public transport is basically in front of your door. Next time we are in Sydney, we would love to come back! Thank you for letting us stay in your home!

Our stay was great! We didn't have any problem and everything was easy for us. 
The location is really comfortable and the apartment is clean and roomy. 
Thank you!

Lachlan is a great host! Easy to contact and quick responses. The apartment is amazing to stay in. Close to all you need and far away to have a peaceful stay. Definitely a recommendation to enjoy your stay in Sydney!

Beautiful townhouse located in the quieter and residential side of Darlinghurst, with walking distance to many resources and tourist destinations. We were wowed the moment we walked in the stylish  and space-savvy apartment, and welcomed warmly by Philip's very kind friends, Trevor and Sally, who also kindly bid us farewell. 

The apartment were well equipped, with everything you need to feel at home. As there was six of us staying here, the bonus were the three showers and bathrooms.

We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Philip's apartment.

Loved this place! Although a little far from the main city area the view was absolutely amazing! The place is extremely quiet, and it has everything you need for a short stay. There is a convenient store downstairs that stays open pretty late, and there is everything in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) include laundry detergent. Jennifer made the check in process super easy, and explained the directions in detail, so I knew where to go! Whenever I had a question she also replied extremely fast!!

My family had a wonderful stay in Vanessa’s house – it was the most charming houses we have ever stayed in! Everything is as depicted in the description and photos – large house with lots of roaming spaces and a well-equipped kitchen. We spent most of our time at home admiring her decoration and her books collection. It’s a lovely, quiet neighbourhood with everything nearby – cafes, restaurants, grocers, liquor shops, pharmacy etc. Short walk to the North Sydney train station, or you can also take the ferry from CBD/Darling Harbour to McMahons Point (then either a short uphill walk to the house, or a 2-min bus ride up to street if you manage to catch the half-hourly bus). Totally fuss-free check-in and check-out. As mentioned by other guests, don’t get too alarmed by the list of instructions – just take your garbage out on time and you should be fine (no pun intended lol). I would highly recommend Vanessa’s home!
Anita's place was great for a short business stay. Would absolutely book again.
This is a great space in Marrickville, I was working in the area and it really suited my needs. I would not hesitate to stay again.
房间跟图片一样,离悉尼机场很近,打的10分钟不用,大约15澳元｡房间整洁干净｡到入住前shuang都给了很多指引｡到达当晚是悉尼时间10点左右,因为不熟悉路,我们是在房子对面下了车｡shuang的妈妈fen来接我们｡如果你需要在悉尼转机,这里是很不错的选择

I had a great stay with Mike! He's very friendly and a wonderful host. Truly a local around Potts Point/Kings Cross neighborhoods and have great recos for food and nightlife - even knows a great $5 pizza spot! 

The apartment is clean and spacious, and the location can't be beat! Super convenient to walk into CBD or up to shops in Paddington. 

I would recommend Mike's place to anyone visiting Sydney!

Convenient location on Curlewis St near the corner with Glenayr Ave.  Close to shops,  restaurants and public transport.  Apartment is located at the rear of the property so relatively quiet.  Easy check-in process.  Did not deal directly with the owner but rather through Airsorted.  A few broken light globes were replaced promptly.  TV reception was inconsistent and needs improving.   Notwithstanding this, this is a nice apartment and we would stay there again.

I recently stayed at Beach House, Great Mackeral with a few friends for a nice chilled out long weekend. The house exceeded all expectations. In an amazing location with a stunning view its was so nice to chill out and enjoy the peace and quiet in such a perfect setting. Clean, tidy and very homely, the house comes with everything you need (and more). Lots of outdoor space to have a bbq and eat with friends which was great. The beds were really comfortable and the tree house is very cool! To open up the doors each morning from there and see the ocean and boats was just lovely. I loved the fact that you had to get a little ferry over and use a wheelbarrow to get your shopping to the house - it all added to a little adventure away for a few days! Would highly recommend a holiday here! I cant wait to go back!
Lots of stairs. No windows but has ample natural skylights.  The neighborhood is trendy with great transportation access.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Perfect location and perfectly furnished, keypad was so handy rather than having a key, quick responses from ken if I ever needed help, very nice and modern would stay here again

We had a long weekend at Bundeena and thoroughly enjoyed it. Hilde went out of her way to make sure that we had everything we needed both for the 6 adults and a young baby.  Very comfortable, well designed and only a short walk to the beach, shops and club. Swimming pool was a great 30 degrees in spite of the unseasonably cold weather.  All in all would recommend it and would love to return.

The White House is a fabulous, chic terrace within walking distance to great restaurants, exclusive shopping as well as so many other culturally enriched experiences. 

Kerry and Adam were the perfect hosts. They met us upon arrival - which made the entry etc effortless. 

The kids loved the outside area - the backyard was a heaven-send considering you’re only 5 mins to the CBD. 

I would recommend to anyone travelling with a family - or who needs to be located close to the CBD for work or an event. 

We will be back soon!!
Amazing stay
Great

As the many attractions of Australia open, this vast apartment will give you a lifetime experience. The building is next door to the harbour and many exquisite restaurants that will light up your visit! If the hot sun bothers you too much, you can easily go to the pool that also gives you a beautiful view of the city. I recommend this homely apartment to everyone and anyone!
Updated apartment with kitchen and big balcony. Good location near the rocks area!

Perfect place for a small group. The house was very comfortable and the balcony was awesome for sunsets - you can see the Opera House and Harbour bridge. You can walk to Bondi beach in 15 and about 20-25 minutes to the heart of area on Hall Street; the walk back is uphill! Communication was great and made for an easy check-in and check-out process.

All goes for show when you read the tittle 'blissful bronte'! Could see the beach from our front door, such a immaculate stylish home cosy feel. Close to all the amazing cafes, 5 min walk to the beach... no worries! Jenny was helpful sweet host and answered questions we had and followed our requests. This is my first airbnb experience also and was def a great one! Would def stay here again if I return to Sydney :)

George is a great host, all the questions i had for him he answered quickly and precisely.

Great stay for the price i paid!
Great property and a great host
Good place to stay in a great neighborhood. Clean flat that was well-presented by the photographs.

Great apartment in the city; we loved the location. The space was clean  and neatly furnished. Parking was better than anticipated as we found a parking spot close by each time. Elise was very friendly and helpful.
Sehr nette Gastgeber.

Loved my stay here. Great location,well secured apartment with a very home-like feel to it. It's super close to the North Sydney Ferry station. Really enjoyed my stay here and definitely recommend this place for your next visit to Sydney.

We had a wonderful stay and the view was most definitely the highlight. What a spectacular aspect this apartment has. Great people watching! We were lucky enough to have wonderful weather for our stay and to sit out on the gorgeous balcony and people watch whilst drinking wine and eating seafood -- well you can't get much better than that! The apartment was very spacious and the kitchen was packed with great cooking materials/utensils etc. It was a comfortable stay and we thoroughly enjoyed it.

Great apartment! Super clean and tidy, comfy bed and overall homey place to stay. Super close to the beach and very easily accessible to the city! Would highly recommend and very much enjoyed my stay there!
We had a lovely stay! Susan was very helpful and kind. She gave us great advice on where to go and the best way to see the NYE fireworks that suited our style. Great, clean, private studio.
Great spot to explore the city. Lovely stylish apartment in a great area. Would highly recommend.
One of the nicest and friendlier places I have stayed, very homey and so good to chill at, will recommend
Really well positioned, cozy, clean and comfortable apartment. Mariana and Don are friendly, helpful and communication was excellent. Would definitely stay again.

Can’t recommend enough, lovely clean space run by lovely people. Very accommodating for our check in/out. Wish this place was available in every city! About 6/7 mins walk from Padstow station which is on the airport line.

This wonderful hideaway in Mount Colah is the perfect place for a work trip with family! A true home away from home. 
Plenty of living area options so that everyone can find their own space. Great kitchen facilities and dining area to feed the whole family. Teenage children and young children are all well catered for with a wonderful secure private outdoor space - all safety concerns taken care of! Local shops, takeaway, wonderful sports grounds, playgrounds and beautiful bush walks just a minute’s drive away. Close to major shopping centres and public transport. An easy commute to the city yet you can wake up in the tree tops with bird song!!! 
Lucy has thought of everything to make your stay a pleasure. We will be back for sure.
Friendly couple who give you your space when required. Very comfortable bed. Close to bus stop and 15 minute walk to Coogee beach. Thank you for a great stay!

George is a great host.  He is very communicative.  He left very good detailed check in instructions and checked in with us the next day to make sure everything went well with check in and everything with the apartment was ok.  His apartment is very nice and very comfortable.  We would definitely stay here again.

Susan was a fantastic host who was very accomodating and willing to provide lots of recommendations. The BNB was very tidy and the bed was super comfy. Proximity to the City was great too and was easy to bike ride into. Highly recommend.
Great location,  lovely place

Kathy and Mary were excellent hosts!  Their  accommodation was perfect for my 2 week stay.  Perfectly presented, clean and very comfortable.  Nice location opposite Centennial Park.  Highly recommended.

I booked this apartment for my stepdaughter and her partner to stay in when they arrived from the UK. It was perfect - private, comfortable, convenient, very close to the beach, friendly hosts who were very accommodating. Would recommend!

It is a perfect place if you want to live near the city and the suburb is also full of cafes & Clubs. Everything was clean and tidy. The best part is it cheap as well. If you are looking for a place just to sleep for few days, this will be perfect.
Great place in the best location if you need to be near the CBD.  Would recommend anytime.

The apartment was very spacious and roomy. 
Everything was very clean and the location is great!

Check in was all too easy and my partner and I really enjoyed coming back to the accommodation after a busy day of sight seeing.  It is very comfortable accommodation and Michele is extremely helpful and makes herself available if need be.  Newtown is a great spot also.
It's a spacious and well equiped apartment for four, much better than I've expected, and the wifi connection is very good. Less than 5 minutes walking distance to the bus stop to get to the city.
Easy to access. Very comfortable stay

It was an amazing place. Very close to station. Close to supermarket and shops.

Clean, quiet and safe place. Well Done Jess for helping me out and my parents for staying there. You made them feel more than like their house.

Would strongly recommend it and i look forward to come back again!!!!
Jennifers place is fantastic, I highly recommend booking it.
Convenient location

A lovely house, stylish and well appointed close to Bondi beach. Perfect for my family to stay, on a business trip with me. 5 stars from us and would absolutely stay again. Treen was an absolute pleasure to communicate with.

We had a great stay in Woolahra. we enjoyed the beautifully designed flat and the convenience of living in walking distance of Queen Street and Centenial Park. Louise was a great host, meeting is on arrival, going through all the practicalities and popping by just when we left as well. The flat is well equipped, clean and comfortable.
A wonderfully clean and comfortable space at a great price! Great deal!
Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt in einer typischen Beach Wohnung. Alles tip top. Nette Cafés in der Nähe, der Bondi Beach direkt vor der Türe. Genial. Thanks to Mal.
Low key and a quick $20 uber from the airport. Was perfect for my one-night stay before a long flight.
We loved spending time here. The private pool is wonderful at the end of a day enjoying the area. The view by itself was worth the money.

We were welcomed by Cath with fresh bread and eggs and a kind, warm hello. The studio was clean and various food was supplied in the fridge and in a basket.  Also an extra mattress was provided for my friend which was so much appreciated.  The neighborhood felt very safe and friendly and some great cafes and restaurants within walking distance.  I would easily return again and would recommend it.
Susan was very hospitable and the cabin was very comfortable.

We had 5 nights at Anita’s place. The location could not have been better, super close to the beach and shops, and walking distance to the Manly yacht club (for the wedding we were there for).

The apartment presented as described, and did not disappoint. 

Communication with Anita was easy and she was prompt coming back to me on queries.

Highly recommend.

Was a pleasure to stay at Matt's house! Really close to the quiet side of King St and the room was everything you could want. Not only that, Matt is a super nice guy and was an excellent host. Matt's dog is beautiful and amazingly cute. Really had a great time and the place comes strongly recommended! For value for money, this is one of best listings in Newtown. Thanks so much for having me! Next time I'm back I would definitely rebook. Stellar!
Steven was extremely helpful and communicative. The space was lovely, with everything you could want for a short stay. Fantastic location and easy to come and go as you pleased.
Great location and view.

Thanks to Laura, a very nice and thoughtful host. My friends & I really enjoyed our stay at  Laura's apartment. Everything was perfect as described, it's stylish, clean, comfortable and much better than we expected which this place makes us feel like home. It is convenient as located few minutes walking distance to Mosman bay (20 minutes to city by ferry. Would definitely recommend this place to my friends if they traveling at Sydney.

We had a lovely time at Ann's place. Ann and her husband are very interesting and considerate hosts. Lots of lively conversation. A lovely brunch.  Both rooms made up for us nicely. Great communication through the booking process.

Ann and her husband met us at the ferry and upon arrival I was presented with a surprise birthday cake! How fabulous. Gluten free too for me - very thoughtful indeed. A lovely birthday card too left on the dresser. It's personal touches like this that make for a great stay.

So nice to know a bit about the history of where you're staying. Ann does a great talk on the history of the island.

If you think you'll need a little sleep in, take earplugs as the local birds get excited in the morning. A wonderful symphony to wake up to, but if you're trying to sleep...  

Dangar Island is just wonderful - we keep coming back. It is a truly special place.

We'll  come again - both to the island and would happily stay here again.
Loved staying at George’s apartment. Amazing location, parking was excellent and the unit itself spacious, clean and stylish.
Pretty nice area to stay. Some improvements needed to verandah space to make it more homely. Great view and ample space.
Great location, clean and tidy place, defiantly worth the money !
The space was very clean and new. It was perfect for our one night stay!
Brilliant location, perfect for a week of exploring Sydney. Lovely host with great knowledge of the area too! Thank you, I would definitely recommend

Dino was out of the country when I arrived so his friend Rick handled check-in and check-out.  All went smoothly.  Rick's a nice guy - very friendly and helpful.

The apartment is excellent.  Spacious, stylish, nice quiet residential block, good location.  A few minutes walk to Macleay Street, pleasant 20 minute walk to the Botanic Gardens and CBD.  

Thanks Dino, I wish I could have stayed longer.

A very well kept house in birchgrove and only a few minutes walk to buses into the city or a slightly longer walk to the ferry. The check in and out process was managed really well. Good size with a nice courtyard space. A pleasure to stay there.

The location for this property is ideal for enjoying many of Sydney's popular attractions.   You can easily walk to the harbor bridge, opera house, and circular quay.  The Rocks area where the unit is located has a vibrant community and lots of cute shops, cafes, and restaurants.  

This property would be well suited for a group of adults who are comfortable sharing space.  Two of the bedrooms must access their room by walking through an adjoining bedroom.   The common sitting area and the upstairs bath are quite small.   The bedrooms are all a nice size as is the dining area, kitchen, and downstairs bath.

Suzanna was very kind and responsive to all of our inquiries and booking was easy.  We required an early check-in and it was not a problem.  Check out was also very easy.
Well kept apartment in a great central location. Hosts made stay easy.
Good location...

This apartment is just perfect!  It's clean, spacious, in a good location -  close to public transport, grocery stores and heaps of great cafe's.  I didn't get to meet Nicole but she is very responsive, flexible and friendly, her mindfulness is evident in the attention to detail everywhere in the apartment. 
I'm so glad I booked for December too - can't wait to get back!
Thanks Nicole, see you in a couple of months!
Bryan was very helpful and eager to please. It's a great location in historic Glebe close to the Light Rail which gets you to Darling Harbour in 5 minutes.
The place is outdated, and gets very hot, no AC
Great place to stay with a homely feel.
there was a lot of noise from roadworks outside the bedroom windows all through the night.

Great location and communication was great! I appreciate that they let us check-in early, and it was nice of them to offer to make the sofabed ready prior to our arrival. I was never offered that at other places before. Maybe a bit pricey considering space, but probably it's partially due to the sofabed being open. Many restaurants and stores nearby. We didn't cook, but wish there was a coffee maker. Overall, a great stay!

We enjoyed our stay at Tracy's house. It was spotlessly clean, and we loved swimming in her lovely pool.
It is located close to the beach, lakes and parks. So perfect for people who want to chill out and relax.
We also made a new friend with her Hungarian Vizsla dog.
Thank you for having us.
Excellent location!

Rhonda was hospitality was outstanding! She is so lovely and attentive! Everything an air bnb host should be! the room was wonderful! Private with everything you needed at your fingertips!!! 11/10! No hesitation about staying here again! Thanks so much for having me! It was perfect!
A perfect place for our needs. Great location, perfectly clean and tidy and very stylish. Nathan was very accommodating, easy to communicate with,  and reply’s were very prompt. Highly recommended

Nice place with lots of sleeping arrangements. Also big TV with Netflix and Xbox. Not having a sink in the main room can be a little inconvenient for cooking. Cats were a bonus too one of whom is friendly. Nice neighborhood convenient for Norwest Business Park.

The apartment was in a great location, cheap parking only a 5 minute walk away, close to broadway shopping centre and central train station. The whole apartment was clean, tidy and had everything you needed including the little extras such as shampoo, body wash, linens etc. I couldn’t fault this apartment at all and the host was extremely good at communicating and ensuring that you were having a good experience.
Great location, right in the middle of Surry Hills with cafes and restaurants within walking distance. Parking spot in the garage was great and seems to be a rarity in this location.

Paul’s apartment is in a fantastic  location if you’re wanting easy access to everything Manly has to offer, as well as public transport to other areas of Sydney whilst still being far enough away from the hustle and bustle to enjoy some peace.

Apartment suitable for a family or two couples with two separate bedrooms.

An older style apartment but very clean and comfortable. Great value for money.
Great location and close to cafes, restaurants etc.
非常美的住宅｡你需要自备洗漱用品,吹风机｡

Great apartment in Central Sydney. We stayed in the apartment for almost all of July. We were able to walk almost everywhere we wanted to go (although we did make use of our Opal card ... Wynyard station is 2 blocks away).  Both Darling Harbour and Circular Quay are within easy walking distance. We very much enjoyed the gym, pool, and spa pool. Tam was the most responsive host we have encountered in our Airbnb stays: she usually responded within 5 minutes to any questions we had. We had one minor issue which Tam immediately resolved. The huge balcony has partial views of Darling Harbour. We will undoubtedly work  with Tam when we return to Sydney and highly recommend this apartment.

We've stayed at a few AirBNB places now and this has been the best so far. Everything was as promised and more. The cabin is a renovated artist's studio at the back of the garden, secluded and private behind trees. Belinda, the host, was lovely and welcoming and gave us some advice for how to best take advantage of the natural surrounds and events that were on in town.

The amenities were clean and exactly like the photos. We were impressed with the host's taste in DVDs and books provided for our use. 

We caught the ferry to Cronulla for the day ($12.60 return for an adult, must have cash to pay on the boat - a bit steep but worth it) and had a wonderful time enjoying the spring fair.

All in all, the host's made our stay extremely comfortable and gave us the privacy we needed to fully enjoy our stay.

Thank you Belinda and Chris!
What a wonderful place to stay. Jackie and Martin’s hospitality was definitely a highlight and their cosy fireplace a pure delight. Highly recommended.

Perfect host! Naveen&Tristan were awesome!They were always very friendly and helpful. The apartment located in a great neighborhood. Lots of cafes,bars,supermarket are nearby. Walking distance to the train station, very convenient to everywhere. Their dog felix is a cute friend, love to play with new guests. Hope to see Naveen&Tristan again in Beijing.
Fantastic spot, convenient location, lots of hidden treasures all around. Worth the stay!

Het is een top locatie als je naar Sydney wilt dicht bij openbaar vervoer en strand. De woning is geschikt voor 4 personen. Niet overdreven luxe maar een goede basis woning. Wij hebben genoten de drie oma's.
Linda was extremely helpful with check in and available for other enquiries. The location is super close to great cafes and restaurants. Great place to stay if you plan on going out a lot.
Great location!! Short walk to Glebe shops, bus and restaurant. Second bedroom is for a child, not suitable for an adult.
Great convenient location, close to everything
Close to beach, shops with outside space, clean, friendly and welcoming host. Great for families and kids ( there are stairs) but didn't affect us. All round 5 stars
Can't go wrong. Nice and central with what you need. Basic setup, but nice and clean. Great price for a great location.

Great location. 
20 mins to Bondi 
20 mins to airport 
5 mins to closest train station 
10 mins to city shops 

Lots of food places around / lots of options on uber eats. 


Very clean place and great fit for 1-4 people.

Cath's place was a great location for our short stay in Sydney, nice quiet street, close drive or taxi ride to the city and walking distance to shops and public transport and plenty of on street (free) parking. 

Cath was a great host welcoming us with a clean place, plenty of refreshments and snacks/breakfast upon arrival. Her place had everything we needed to make our stay more comfortable.

Highly recommend!
10/10 for service everything was perfect Kathy was so helpful. Will definitely be returning in the future.

We had a nice room in the perfect location to explore Sydney and surroundings. We had a good bed and shared the fine shower and kitchen with our host Gavin.
Gavin was very friendly, and let us come and go whenever we wanted. We didn't see him a lot, but when we did he always had time for a chat. There was some confusion about the dishes, unfortunately, but this was our first AirBnB experience and we weren't sure about the house rules.

Rob was friendly and so welcoming when we arrived! He gave us tips about the local places to eat and explained everything well.

His place was immaculate and spacious for our family. It's central to a lot of good spots in Cronulla and easily found. No problem getting meals delivered there. 

We'd happily stay again!
Great location near cafes, restaurants, train and ferries. Ample space in quirky home with loads of sitting areas.
地段交通非常方便,离达令港和水族馆超近,以后去悉尼还会优先考虑
one of the best Airbnb's I've ever stayed at. Tess was very welcoming and the location was perfect for a weekend away.
A large and comfortable room separate from the rest of the house. Rhonda and Michael could not be more accommodating and helpful hosts!!
Everything we expected, beautiful location! Great host! Would recommend for anyone looking for a quiet escape from busy Sydney city! Perfect stay for our first airbnb!
Really nice location of the apartment!
Great apartment, Well located. Apartment had everything I needed.
Great location, clean and comfortable home, accurate listing, accommodating hosts.  You can't go wrong staying at Wayne and Kate's place.
Cozy little space with lots of inclusions and views of the bridge.  Walking distance to North Sydney train station, cafes and restaurants.
Great location, very clean and tidy, good value

Excellent. Very clean and comfortable. Very quiet. Great air conditioning, linen and amenities. Very comfortable main bed. Easy check in and check out. Felt very safe by myself. Very happy with my stay. Thank you

Perfect Location, close to the beach with a great Golf club across the road. The accommodation is very comfortable and very spacious and nicely decorated. It was great to have a secure garage for parking too.  It fulfilled our expectations and the owner is a great guy. We highly recommend this listing....
Kerrie is a wonderful host, could not have asked for better. Beautiful apartment, very clean and great to have your own ensuite. Would love to come and stay again one day!

Ali and Maryam were great communicators. 
thankyou for your excellent service.

Close to the heart of things in Manly (although a wee bit of a steep walk back up to apartment). Jackie was happy to go above & beyond to ensure a lovely stay - beautiful apartment! Very friendly & welcoming. Comfy & very peaceful with beautiful view!
Lovely place 5mins walk from beach..lots of shops + bars closeby.buses to city within 5mins walk.really comfy cosy apartment.
Really nice oasis in Manly with all the necessary amenities. Lauren was lightning fast in replying to any questions. Can highly recommend and when we are back we will try to stay here again!

Amazing location in a nice and comfortable unit, equipped with everything you need for a great time in Sydney.
