Would recommend the unit for anyone looking for a great time in Sydney at a very central location.

We found this apartment to be really wonderful to stay in! The view is amazing (although not the water view shown in the photo, which must have been taken from the south side of the building). But wonderful all the same. The apartment faces north You can see a little bit of ocean in the distance ,beyond Manly I guess.  We looked forward to coming home to the apartment every day. So comfortable. It helps to pull the curtains a bit going out for the day so it doesn’t get too hot. There is a great cafe with friendly staff, and good coffee and food in the courtyard below.  It’s called Springtime. There is a bus-stop to shoot into town in about 7 minutes almost directly across the road. Lots of restaurants nearby including a very colourful Mexican one. 
The directions  to get in if   you are driving, need to be clearer. And it helps to know that it is on level 11  and that the attachment on the key needs to be held near a small box to make the lift go to your level. 
All in all a magnificent and thoroughly enjoyable stay, and really comfortable beds.

Amazing Apartment!
You just have to check into this amazing apartment, with fantastic hosts, a real treasure find and such a great location. Convenient to buses, trains, shops etc.

Beautiful place close to public transport, restaurants, shops and cafes.
Perfect for a group of friends to stay together, with room for some privacy as well.
Great location, neat studio apartment with all the necessary amenities. Highly recommend.
Cozy apartment in a great location - thanks Paul for hosting me

Awesome stay! This little suite is perfect for two. Plenty of space to spread out and lots of amenities. Very clean, and hosts are super responsive and helpful. Found the walk over to Redfern quick and easy to the shops and restaurants and about a 12 min walk to the trains...bus was very efficient too. Love it!
Really great location nearby main attractions.

It was just PERFECT place to stay! 
better than picture; SUPER CLEAN! 5G wifi, great amenity, awesome facility(fridge, smart tv, fan, air con, microwave), large space, free coffee coupon!
Don is really kind and nice. 
It is absolutely much better than hotel! amazing experience. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

I would definitely recommend this to everyone who still has doubts and is looking through the reviews. There are so many good experiences that I don’t even know where to start. But let’s start with Charles, he is super accommodating and friendly. The communication with Charles is very warm and efficient, and he is also a responsible host who really cares. And the location of the house is very convenient. It’s close to everything I need plus, so many good restaurants and pubs  which I don’t really need during weekdays, but if you are a foodie, then......The house itself is clean, tidy and comfortable to stay at. I would say it feels like home, apart from my home is never this clean... All in all, I would come back again if I have the opportunity.

The apartment is located in a great area that’s quite during the night but very convenient for us to explore Sydney. However, as we were three people we used the air mattress but it got flat quite easily and wasn’t so comfortable. Would highly recommend this apartment for two or single travelers!
It was amazing time staying at your home
A good couple of days.
Nice apartment in easy location between the airport and CBD (tourist areas). Hosts were good with communications and the place was clean.
Donna and Matt are very gracious and accommodating hosts. They are good communicators and take great pride in maintaining the integrity of their heritage cottage.
Very convenient and homely space. Nice touches like free use of the excellent kitchen garden. Leslie also communicates very well!

We are group of 10 and have a great stay in Marcelle's place. Everything is as described. The house is close to the beach, transport and daily shoppings. Instructions for running the house are clear. Thanks and recommended.

We had a great stay at Leslie's place. The apartment had everything you could possibly need and was conveniently located to public transportation, supermarkets and restaurants. It slept four adults and a small child comfortably. Leslie was an excellent host and a great resource for places to go and things to see. Communication was prompt and spot on. Highly recommended!
Perfect location, fantastic clean large house! Easy check in/ check out! 10/10

Arnie and Lorraine are super sweet and hospitable. Arnie, always up for a chat and has a great knowledge of Sydney if you're a first timer or even a regular visitor looking to have some different experiences. 

The house very unique and easy to get visually lost in. It's also clean, spacious and located perfectly for those wanting to feel central to the city and not too far away from the eastern beaches for summer visitors.
Great setup. Will use again when flying overseas

Dj was very helpful and kind. Het made me feel very welcome. There was a welcome bottleneck of wine and information about the neighbourhood. The room was exactly as described with a comfortable bed and netflix. I had a great stay and would absolutely book here again!

We absolutely loved our stay at Paul's place. Great location opposite the park and weekend markets. Delicious pizza joint called Pizza Boccone around the corner. We found it within walking distance of most places, or ease of access to public transport. Very clean and well presented apartment. Building is older but has character. Thanks again Paul for being a great host and for the ease of communication and check-in process.
Great place, in a great location across from the beach. The rooftop was great too.

Apartment in fantastic location, only 7 mins walk to opera house. Chloe was a wonderful host; very accommodating. We greatly appreciated the help she gave us to & from the station. A very thoughtful host.

The place has a great view over the river and parklands. It was great for a short stay and super clean. There is dedicated underground parking and a beautiful rooftop area. It was an easy walk to the ferry wharf and rhodes shopping mall. Thank you
Nice room with spectacular view. You get what you see from the photos. Cute dog - Felix.
Susan's place had on street parking and was very handy to the places I needed. It was clean and comfortable. Susan is a very pleasant host.
Really enjoyed my stay and I am looking forward in staying again, it's clean, great location for my needs .. Prefect and great wonderful hospitality best regards
We only stayed for a night at Joseph's place but we found the apartment spacious and comfortable. It was also nice to be within walking distances to the major stadiums.

Kathy and her daughter were so friendly and warm
Their home was immaculately clean, larger than you think. All the amenities are offered and goodies in the pantry and fridge. 
Nothing was missing.
Very well decorated and styled
An absolute pleasure being there, felt comfortable in every way. recommend this place to anyone thinking of staying in the eastern suburbs of Sydney.
Thank you again 
Hope to see you again soon!

When I go back to Sydney, I will definitely stay at 41 Roscoe Street, Bondi again. It is an inviting and warm environment, and my hosts, Craige & Leonie were absolutely respectful of my privacy but on hand for anything I needed. It was a really a beautiful experience to be so far from home (Italy), and yet to feel so safely contained in this quiet, convenient, and beautiful house. The amenities in both room and kitchen were outstanding.  There’s an overall feeling of soft and peaceful accommodation. Just around the corner there are plenty of great places to eat or have a coffee. Bondi Beach is less than 5 minutes walk away and the scenery is hard to beat.
I can’t really find any flaws at all!  Adriano, Italy
It was just a bed for the night for me and was perfect for that. Great value.
beautiful place, I enjoyed my stay there alot! lovely how high the ceilings are, looks very spacious and cool!
Bailey is very responsive. Beautiful place and awesome location. Highly recommend!
Casey and Larry made us feel very welcome and at home. The attic room is large and spacious with a great ensuite. A lovely area of Sydney to stay, not too far from the CBD and attractions.

This is a cute little cottage in the heart of Surry Hills close to Oxford Street and Central Station 
Hosts were friendly and made me feel very welcome with brekky provided in the mornings 
All necessary info was given to me before hand and  any questions I had were promptly answered
Arrangements were made to provide a key for my arrival when they could not make themselves available

Isabelle's place is cosy and in a great location with leafy Rushcutter's Bay Park on one side and bustling King's Cross on the other. There are lots of places to eat nearby and the two major supermarkets are not too far away. It's nicely decorated, airy, the bathroom is relatively new and the internet is really quick.

Millie's place was so pretty and cosy. It's got everything you need. The apartment is also located in a very nice area close to the city and amenities. Every morning you wake up to the harbor bridge view! 
Millie was also very helpful and flexible to accommodate our needs. She was very easy to talk to and help us feel like home. Definitely a nice place to stay when traveling in Sydney.
The apartment was clean and tidy, beds were comfortable, everything was there, and the location was perfect! Could not ask for more. Will definitely stay there again!

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay with Susan. The cabin is clean and private, with plenty of space to relax and watch a bit of TV or read a book. It's also great to have your own clean bathroom and shower. Susan is a lovely host and I would definitely stay with her again.
Great location!
Great location and value for money. Chloe was pleasant to deal with and was happy to accommodate us dropping our bags off early. Will definitely stay here again on our next trip to Sydney.

I booked the place for my parents and they loved it. 
the hosts helped them alot and the place was clean amd comfy. 
a great place for refreshing for tourists who have walked all day.
We had s great stay! Craige was so friendly and lovely. Would stay again! Highly recommend- awesome location

Clean, cosy, comfortable! Quiet neighbourhood (we are not home most of the time lol). Spacious shower room is a plus. Nice to hang out together for TV time in the living room and a game of chess. Thumbs up!

Eine sehr Zentrum nah gelegene Wohnung. Absolut empfehlenswert um Sydney zu entdecken. Man kann optimal zu Fuß in die Innenstadt und läuft nur kurz durch den Hyde Park. Zum Flughafen sind es auch nur 15 Minuten.

Had a great stay at Jennifer’s apartment whilst attending concert at Qudos Arena. Fantastic secure location with amazing views. Included parking was a great bonus. Good communication with host and comfortable bed. Would definitely stay again if going to the Stadium or Arena.
The place was super convenient for me, especially since I booked last minute, but it felt a bit neglected. Could use some shine!
OK
Cathy is a wonderful host. She is very kind and hospitable. She made sure I got what I need. The place is as described. I was able to relax and enjoy the beaches (Paradise, Palm Beach, Avalon).
Maryam and Ali were very friendly and helpful hosts who responded very quickly to our requests.  The venue was very clean and comfortable. We'll definitely stay there again.

Joanne and Sean are so welcoming and we had a truly wonderful stay in their lovely home.  

It was well located for visits to Cronulla and the lovely beaches all around and also not far from the station to make travelling into Sydney city centre easy and convenient.  Not to mention the free bus service from Woolooware station to the local rugby games at Cronulla Sharks!

The house is modern, light and airy and so very spacious - that even with 3 grandchildren and their 2 cousins who live in Caringbah  - we all enjoyed the space without falling over each other.  The pool, trampoline and play room were a big hit with the children.

It was spotless, tastefully decorated and with all amenities including a barbecue and downstairs shower room and utility room. The kitchen was well equipped - which made mealtimes a pleasure.  There were also lots of personal towels and beach towels.

A great place to stay in a quiet residential area - highly recommended.
The place was very nice and clean. I recommend this place if you have an early start to the airport.
This property was exactly as I expected. Simple with some nice touches and the price was perfect.
Excellent location with main attractions minutes away. Good security as well and easy to find
房主非常热情友好,位置交通非常便利,值得再次入住
To say the place was clean is just simply an understatement. Check in and check out was easy as.
We had a lovely time! Belinda was warm and welcoming. The studio was very clean and quiet, and we enjoyed the peacefulness. It was jut what we needed. We hope to be back soon!
Trent is a great host. Very friendly and communication was easy. His place is just as described, clean, bright, airy and located in a beautiful area. Thanks Trent. Highly recommend!
ABSOLUTELY AWESOME LOCATION!

Great location in Darlinghurst. Super close to Kings Cross station. Didn't get a chance to meet Naveen as we were hardly around but she was really helpful via message beforehand. Everything was in place for us. Felix is a total sweetheart and we miss him already! Will definitely stay again when in Sydney.
Cath was fantastic and the accommodation was exactly as described. Great location in a quiet street. Breaky pack was great and fresh eggs from the chickens. Thanks Cath
Pauls apartment is devine. Great location, clean and fun. Just if you have a baby get a lighter pram as you are on the top floor .

Jeremy is one of the most helpful and responsive host you can have. One of our heaters was down and he brought a new one to replace the very evening after we left a message! Apart from the low water pressure on 2nd floor, everything else plus the convenient location makes the trip a notch better than it already is:)

Cute apartment, exactly like the pictures. The location was great - close to Circular Quay but also had a few cafes and a convenience store right on the same street. Very clean and convenient for anyone who wants to be in The Rocks/Circular Quay area.
Great stay, will be back in the future
Great stay in a lovely home and location. Rachel is a fab host.
I had lovely stay. All was perfect.

Modern apartment in good location for access to Mossman and Balmoral.
recommended.
Beautiful and clean place. And close to the train station. You can walk.

Clean , Spacious and comfortable room.
Very close to staion and up and comming REDFERN CAFES .
Great communication and flxible peerson .

Freat host and Room

Super great location, very close to a range of great restaurants and bars. The apartment is quiet and old worldly but with character and modern comforts. It was the perfect combination of peace and privacy in amongst a bustling area with great nightlife

Our host made us feel very welcome. There was a bottle of wine in the fridge and a carton of milk, to get us started. The apartment located in a fabulous area...2 minute walk to a street full of great restaurants, short walk to Coogee Beach and to UNSW. The apartment is on the older side...very funky and extremely clean! Beds were comfortable and kitchen had everything we needed. There are laundry facilities as well which was very helpful for us. Only negative is that only one window had a screen on it so it didn't feel comfortable to us to sleep with them open, both from a bug angle and a safety angle since the front bedroom is right on the street. There is an air conditioner in the living room but it does not work well so it was a bit warm in the apartment. Other than that, a great experience!!
This place is beautiful. The deck’s view is breathtaking and it’s a short walk to the beach. Great value for money

I'll be back here again and again! It's an awesome retreat or gorgoeus alternative to another boring work hotel! Louise goes out of her way to Ensure a beautifully decorate, luxury oasis awaits all her guests with scrumptious snacks, breakfast, and all the mod cons you could want. Don't miss your chance to stay!

This is the second time I've stayed at Kerri's place.  Kerri is a friendly and generous host who takes great care with the appearance of her beautiful home.  Easy to organise a check-in time.  Handy location only a 5 minute walk to Petersham station.   Good value.
Great location, nice and clean, looks exactly like the pictures.
Perfect view for watching sunrise.
Super convenient and comfortable place for solo travellers or couples. Easy walking distance to Redfern and Surry Hills.

If you’re looking for a great accomodation with spectacular service, look no further. This place is amazing for a short and long stay. I highly recommend it to everyone including pregnant women (as I am) who may feel starving in the middle of the night as there is a private kitchen that you can use at any time.

The house is in a great location, central to exploring many parts of Sydney. The house has everything you need to feel at home while away from home. There is plenty of equipment to cook up a meal and even laundry machines for your use. There are many great places within walking distance including eateries, shops and a great wine store. Its easy to get to the beach and to the city within a short period of time from the cottage. The cottage is cosy, and I think its notable that only one of the three bedrooms, has a door that closes. Lastly, as mentioned in another review the stairs are very narrow to get to the second and third floor, so be aware of you physical capabilities when staying here. We enjoyed our trip to Sydney very much.

This was my first experience of staying in an Airbnb & Yvonne has certainly set the bar extremely high!
We had a wonderful stay in this beautiful  house which was situated in a great location (10 min walk to Bondi) with friendly & attentive hosts who went out of their way to make us feel welcome (including driving us to our friends wedding to save us getting a taxi!) 
We had initial reservations of sharing a house rather than get an Airbnb to ourselves but these were diminished as soon as we walked in, with the hosts giving us the right balance of privacy whilst also being able to have some lovely chats (mostly when gathered around the amazing coffee machine!) 
Would thoroughly recommend to everyone & look forward to returning again soon.

The accommodation of Michele is very clean and very practical! The bedding is really very comfortable. Michele is an attentive host and very attentive. I highly recommend this accommodation. Also the area is great close to everything but very quiet.

Excellent host! Very responsive and helpful prior to booking. Also available to assist during stay if required (though in our case not required). Apartment very well presented and clean. Excellent location for the Kensington area and also for commuting to city; public transport very easy to manage and close by. Thank you very much. Would definitely book again.

15 mins from train, good size room for someone looking for a single or few days rest.  

Host is easy to get along with and very helpful.

A very bright, modern and exceptionally clean home. Fabulous views of Manly and the Heads from your room and the living room.  The walk up from Manly Ferry is scenic but steep. ....great exercise.. the hosts Jackie and Martin are very helpful and considerate.  It is a shared bathroom and all other facilities with the hosts but wasnt a problem for us for the two nights. Would recommend this little Gem of quiet and handy location.

We had a fantastic stay with the mysterious DJ Walker, who is always impeccable with his sense of timing!  He is well organized, well groomed, clean and tidy with a readiness to be available over the mobile.  The place is clean, minimalist yet spacious with a splendid layout of equipment tucked away in mystical drawers and doors in neat little compartments. The design of the place is quite enchanting, and we are tempted to ask if the man himself had designed the place?!

Lovely neighborhood that is easy with get around, strong WiFi signal, with nice brekkie eateries and convenient access to public transport.  Suitably enchanted for our 8 days stay here, and proud to say that we love to call it our home, albeit a short while.  Will definitely ask to come back again if we were to visit Sydney!  GOD bless!
Small, basic apartment in a great location. OK for short stays.
Everything was perfect. Marcella was very accommodating of our requests. Would definitely stay again.
Good value and good location.  Happy to recommend.

This is a beautiful 2 bedroom granny flat, really well presented, amazing view of the sunset.  Hosts were great communicators.  Everything was documented and really easy. Location perfect for castle hill, norwest or seven hills.  A steep driveway and a few steps to navigate but this was also made clear.  Thanks Ali and Maryam.
My partner and I loved our stay. Check in and out was easy and Paul got back to us straight away when we had questions. Great location. We would definitely stay here again :)

Private balcony, aircon, Fox, Apple TV
Quality linen and lush towels
Very close to Oxford Street and public transport 
David is friendly and a very food host.
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Excellent logement mais attention, difficile accees aux chambres par des escaliers étroites

Val & Jack's place is awesome. The location couldn't be better with the most incredible views of Bondi and beyond, and they were always very generous, kind and accomodating. It's a lovely apartment with a comfy bed, decent sized room and lovely bathroom – plus a balcony made for whale & dolphin watching. Very sweet folk in a top-drawer place.

Couldn't recommend this property more highly. Hosts were attentive, lovely and on the ball. Apartment was light, spacious even for two adults and three big boys! The absolute highlight though was the view of breathtaking Tamarama and being able to step across the road and into Sydneys' incredible beach culture. We felt like locals and will be back for sure.
Jenny was a great host, super friendly. Property was very clean & tidy. Great location with everything you want in walking distance
We had a wonderful stay at Cat's place

Great little apartment for our family. Close to public transport and funky cafes. We also loved the swimming pool facilities. Wendy replies to all messages so incredibly fast as well. We loved Sydney - thank you

Belinda did not disappoint...Bundeena a snails pace away from the more raving Cronulla. Stay and renergise as you explore Jibbon and the National Park. It is  a secluded little garden paradise and as restful as you wish to make it. Perfect for a getaway.

Marcella was a wonderful host who was very accommodating to our needs and always tried to be flexible with check-in and check-out. The place is lovely, it was perfect for our big group and we all had a wonderful time there. And so close to the beach! We felt very welcome during our stay and would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a place for a group in Sydney.

Perfect location very close to the beach. House & bathroom was spotlessly clean. Coming from Cairns I didn't think I would need an air conditioned room. Unfortunately my week of stay was during a heatwave in Sydney so the room was very hot to sleep in, but comfortable nevertheless

Danny's place is very close to Darling Harbour and about 10-15 minutes walk to China town. There are a few convenience shops nearby and supermarkets are within 5-10 minutes walk. Food is not a problem at all as Nando's is right opposite of the road and there are cafes within 1-2 minutes walk. Despite being in a prime location, this apartment is located on a quiet street so sleep is not much of a problem. We are a family of 6 adults and 1 toddler and everyone enjoyed the stay.
We found the place very clean and communication was very prompt for us to take quick decisions on the last moment.
Great Location, close to all the arenas and easy walk to restuarants etc. Found the apartment clean and tidy, will stay again if we need to be out there again.
Great knowledge of the Sydney area. Was very helpful for first time timers in Australia.
Fantastic location with a great view of the city. Easy check-in with a very responsive host. A spacious apartment with a large bedroom and comfortable bed. We would be happy to stay here again.

What a gem! From the minute we arrived, Susan makes us feel very welcomed. 
Loved everything about the place. Susan is the perfect host, everything is well thought of - the good food guide books to the beautiful tea cups, really make you feel right at home. 
Highly recommended.
Stylish apartment with a lovely dog. This place is awesome and it is super clean and convenient. Highly recommend everyone to consider this place when browsing in Airbnb.

The place is well located, close to food and amenities, and within a short walking distance to the quay.  Jared responded very quickly and key collection was easy and efficient. 

Only issue we had was noise.  The pub opposite was blasting loud music, especially on Saturday night, till 12:30am.  Street noise starts in the mornings.  

The facilities in the apartment are complete and comfortable.

This is the second time I've booked Jeremy's place. He is punctual in responding to queries and always so helpful and polite.
The area is perfect and the house clean, spacious and has pretty much everything you need. My family loved staying here. Great coffees at the Rusty Rabbit on the corner too!
Id book again in a heart beat.
Thanks again Jeremy.
Good apartment in a great location

Kath was a fantastic host! The room was well prepared with lots of nice little touches (balcony was a treat). Very well located next to the station and really easy to get around. All-in-all a home away from home!
Cozy little place literally right next to Central Station.  Alexey was quick at responding and the early check in was also so helpful. Loved the balcony!
Great place, thanks
Thank you Paul, perfect position, short walk  to the wharf and beach . Lovely flat with everything we needed and felt very safe and at home .

Location is perfect, super close to public transportation, restaurants and bars. It is right in the city so at times it can be a little noisy. But that’s to be expected in any city!Studio was clean and had everything we needed for our stay. Host let us check in a little earlier as well, thank you! I’d definitely book again!
一次非常不错的体验,房子的地点很好,干净,整洁,房东Andrew人很好,虽然未曾谋面,但仍能感受到他的热情｡这是一次值得回味的体验!
great place for a family visiting with great location. would definately book agan !

This is the second time we have stayed in one of Christine and Patrick’s Airbnb’s and we loved it. Comfortable, clean and close to great things around the inner west. 

Thank you! We will be back. 

Trish
This place is in a great location with everything you could want or need near by..

It is a really stylist loft apartment in a great location. just less than 5 mins walk to central station and supermarket. 
The check in is easy, and Lucy and David are great responsive host. 

Recommended

I would firstly recommend all future guest to contact Jennifer 24hrs prior to discuss your arrival time and access. We contacted host 2hrs prior without response (all available forms) until we contacted Airbnb (1hr) to support. This left is suspecting we may need an alternate location, which I’m sure was never the case (got hold 20 minutes before checkin). It would have been the hosts normal style (my perception). The access to the apartment using the instructions we were provided which were on a weekend, meant we needed to follow someone else in to gain access to the security building (hint you can walk through the Vietnamese restaurant if it is open). Also the instruction to get the key were insufficient as there was no information about where the letterboxes are (hint they are located in the middle of the entire building hint which is outside the gym) also to find the key once you locate the letterboxes (hint the key was attached to sticky tape inside the locked letterbox). This treasure hunt is fun if you enjoy puzzles. However If it is raining and you’re in a rush, this is not desirable. The place is in a great location and proximity to events and the views are certainly amazing. The pictures of the spaces are not current and some wear and tear (expected from time to time) is evident (texta marks on tv cabinet which sadly I suspect are from previous guests with kids). The couch has been torn (again sadly for host, probably from a prior guest). The shower required more effort cleaning (visible module in grout) and the drainage is poor as it filled the shower area which overflows into the main bathroom area. For any future guests who choose to stay here for any length of stay, I would recommend that you bring your own things like dishwasher tablets etc. I am confident if these few things are reviewed by the host, this place would receive more favourable reviews and increase its utilisation / price.
Great spot if you have an early plane ride to catch! 10/10 would stay there again

Lovely apartment, in a stunning seaside location. Home from home, with everything you need. Bernadette's home baked biscuit's on arrival! Fresh orange and complementary tea, coffee and breakfast cereal, little touches like this make such a difference! Fantastic little beach cafe minutes from apartment is a must! Great find and if we are lucky enough to visit Australia again would definately book in future as we ran out of time to see all that Sydney has to offer!!!
Location was perfect for what we needed.  Nice neighborhood away from the main city.  Walking distance from the harbor which took us to and from Circular Quay.

Lovely place in a central location. Room is lovely with a really comfortable bed. Would recommend staying here in Sydney too anyone, great value for money as well! Host even dropped us to airport on return flight for cheap fee!
Good place near the beach
Great location, in the heart of Rosebay. Clean and spacious two bedroom apartment within a lovely Artdeco building. Good value for money. Easy communication with Trent. Would stay again.
Great location. Comfortable beds. Quiet for middle of the city. Chloe was very easy to contact and was prompt I. Responding to our requests.

This flat is perfectly located for an early swim in the morning. Your literally on bondi beach within seconds. Everything is just around the corner. Nice place just in the middle of ‚where the magic happens‘...
Very stylish apartment in fantastic location.
Coffees place is in a great location.the apartment is very secure and comfortable.coffee was very quick to respond to any questions

Great place and Konrad was really flexible and accommodating when I had to check in late. Even fed me dinner upon my late arrival! Really thankful for the room on such short notice. Just what I needed. Would recommend konrads place and would happily stay again!

I couldn't rate this place highly enough. Elizabeth and Simon were wonderful hosts, there were extremely accommodating, making me feel very much at home. The house is lovely, it's a comfortable bed and the room is accompanied by an amazing shower. I'd definitely stay here again. Best airbnb stay I've had to date.

Fantastic accomodation. A home away from home and much better than we expected, with lovely thoughtful touches on arrival. Both Lucy and Ralph are fine people. Very warm, friendly and hospitable. Highly recommend.

Steven and his family were so accommodating and made us feel so welcome. We had an amazing stay in their cabin! Everything about the place was perfect, from the location, the space, the view, and all the amenities included. It was overall a very laid back and relaxing experience. Highly recommend, and hope to be back again one day soon!

Chloe was a great host, answered all of my questions promptly and very generously allowed us an early check-in and late check-out (mainly for bag storage).  The apartment was very quiet, rarely heard any traffic or other people.  As per pics it was nicely decorated.  There is a small but nice rooftop pool which got a little busy with children (ours included) in the afternoon.  There was also a rooftop BBQ together with stunning views would be a nice way to spend the evening if desired. It was extremely convenient to all modes of transport and many Sydney sights. All in all, I would highly recommend this apartment and Chloe as a host and we look forward to returning to Chloe's apartment next year.
Rooms are extremely small, the photos on the listing are a little deceiving. The place is fairly close to a few little shops. It is newly renovated and modern but overall the stay was fairly average.
Tolle Lage ! Zum weiterempfehlen!!
Beautifully appointed accommodation and close to all that Bronte offers.
wonderful place.Good location.
A great stay, in a beautiful part of the world! Thanks so much for your hospitality Belinda. The studio was perfect, fitted with all the mod-cons to make for a comfortable stay.
Comfortable, sparkling clean, thoughtfully decorated, small but perfectly formed with lots of appreciated added touches.

Very easy to find house with easy access to beach and nearby amenities. 
Keys provided so we were able to  move in without any hassle. all bedding was clean. 
i was concerned about 10 adults all staying on one place, the bedroom space was excellent with everyone having enough room at night, however the living space is small and we were not able to sit together anywhere in one room which was a shame as it was a special family get together - i recommend not too many adults because of this. - dining space max 6 people. limited outdoor space to sit and eat. 
besides this, it was a great opportunity to have time with people we hadn't seen for a very long time and this made up for it all
thanks

Belinda and her husband were warm and friendly hosts during our stay and the clean, beautifully designed and cosey but spacious studio was everything we could have wanted for a quiet weekend away. We enjoyed watching the sunset at Port Hacking, a lovely dock across the road from Belinda's home and driving further south through the National Park. Highly Recommended for a relaxing weekend trip just an hour away from Sydney.

I had a great stay at Konrad and Mish places. They're lovely and friendly people and gave me plenty of advice on what to see and do in and around Sydney. The place is like advertised, so comfy room , nice bathroom and great kitchen.

I would suggest to have a car , as the transit system in this particular area is not great. Also be aware that the room can be really hot on warm days!

But it's still a great place to stay ;)

A lovely apartment in a great location, Anthony's place was perfect for me. Tucked away in a lovely quiet part of Bondi, it's a 15-minute walk to the beach and seconds to the bus stop to head into the city. The apartment is clean, modern and well maintained. I had a fantastic stay at Anthony's place in Bondi.

Everything was very nice. Its super easy to get to the airport and the beach is very close. There is also a kiosk nearby.
I would definetly stay here again, when Im in Sydney. Cause Hernan was a great host.
Just GREAT!~

We had a wonderful stay in Charles & Gioia´s very nice and convenient apartment. Cleanness at arrival and equipment as described made life easy, also in respect of near shops, restaurants and bus stops to reach Manly. Communication with Charles was easy too and we would highly recommend that flat, even if its actualized daily rates may appear to be slightly too high for Fairlight.
Great as always, it was our second time stay at Shuang’s place. Close to Sydney Airport. We will be back
We had a great time. Location was fantastic close to beach and ferries. Very family friendly. We had everything we needed for a stress free stay close to all the highlights of Sydney.

It is a wonderful place to stay in Sydney. We found all we needed to feel “at home” during our stay. 
 
George and Lucia were very helpful with any questions and made it a wonderful experience.
They were wonderful hosts, easy to communicate with and always happy to offer help or assistance!
Their granny flat is very private and a little oasis in Sydney, with shops, trains and facilities a quick walk away! Perfect for any travellers needs! 

We really enjoyed staying there!
Very happy, good communication. However did smell like cigarette when we walked in.
Great location, total privacy respected. Very clean, stylish apartment in a lovely quiet area. Thoroughly recommended.
Great location, great balcony, nice apartment and comfy bed! Gwennaelle gave us a lot of god info on what to do and where to eat.
This place is great, so clean, private highly recommend.
非常棒的房子!绝对给你惊喜!

Our stay was fantastic! Great and fun neighbourhood with a grocery store just one block away (great for when you want to cook your own food) but also lots of restaurants to choose from (even farmers market on the weekend). The accommodation was spotless and perfect for two people!
I thoroughly enjoyed staying at this property. It is close to many excellent places to eat and walking distance to do many landmarks meant that it was perfect for us. Thanks Eleni!
Gorgeous little studio set in amazing gardens. Bronte beach and some lovely cafes are only a short walk away. Susan and her husband were great hosts, making us feel very at home!
Fantastic hosts, beautiful clean room, hidden gem, many thanks!
Clean, homely and the owners were extremely nice and helpful. Would recommend.

We loved our stay in Paul's apartment and found it a great base to explore the galleries of Sydney. The apartment is just as described and the neighbourhood is perfect if u enjoy great food and interesting people. We would definitely book in again!

I had my family stay here for 4 days due to my wedding. Location is great and the place is a good size for a large group.

When we arrived the place smelled of mould/mildew and very stuffy. It needed to be aired out for 2 days to be acceptable. There were dehumidifiers (3) in the rooms running when we arrived to remove moisture I assume. 

I opted not to stay there on the eve of my wedding (which I planned to) due to the mildew smell but they coped with it (being  from interstate ) and it was ok half way through their stay after they left the doors and windows open for 2 days. 

The host was very understanding, sent a property manager to inspect and offered me a partial refund however this ultimately isn’t a solution and it was too hard to move everyone.

Rachel's home was certainly "Idyllic". 4 of us were accommodated most comfortably across the two large bedrooms upstairs and one single downstairs. The walking proximity to Military Road shops and laneway cafe's was very convenient. We even popped in to the free public Mosman Art Gallery at the end of the street. We chose Rachel's home for its location - close to the Georges Head venue of a family wedding, accessible to the City and easy driving to and from the airport. We had a car, so the off street parking was welcome - parking on the street was at a premium. The home was represented accurately in all photo's and the description. I also enjoyed tickling the ivories of the baby grand! Although we didn't meet Rachel, she was a great communicator and all the arrangements she made for our arrival and during the stay went off without a hitch. Thanks. We would choose this place again if we find ourselves on the North side of Sydney.
Great space and host. Loved our greeting from Sari on arrival. Will definitely stay again

Very interesting home. Lots of books. Bedding was excellent. Great value and convenient. Great communication and patience from host as I had a few issues setting up with Airbnb. Once that was sorted everything went smoothly and Marcella was very accommodating with any requests I had. Thanks heaps Marcella.
This is the most perfect Bondi location. A great spacious home with a garden and exceptional kitchen space.  Great feel and so close to shops, restaurants and the beach.
Beautifully decorated and trendy designed house. The royal botanic garden located in walking distance. Everything is okay and convenient. Thanks Paul.

Thanks Margaret for the amazing time we had over your property , enjoyed the stay even though it was only for a day . It was a surprise for my wife's birthday and she was delighted . Has all the amenities that you need . Peaceful stay and will not forget the fresh strawberries
Wir hatten eine super Zeit in Sydney, das Apartment hat eine großartige Aussicht und liegt perfekt, so dass man wenn man will alles zu Fuß erreichen kann.
The reservation was canceled 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Margaret had the carriage warm and ready for us with lovely supplies for breakfast and more. Although it took some juggling to prepare our meal the first evening we got into the swing of it and indoor-outdoor was part of its charm. We loved the bush surrounds (how could it be near suburbia?), the fire pit on our last night and the warmth of hospitality and conversations. Margaret went out of her way to care for our needs while respecting our privacy and space. We definitely recommend the Carriage and all the location has to offer.
My colleagues Stefan and Mandie enjoyed the abundance space and location of this place. They assured me they will definitely be back.
Perfect location, perfect host, recommend highly.  Thanks MissD, we loved it.
This is great value and you can cook your own food with all plates etc provided. If I get more work at the same place I would really like to stay here again.
Excellent studio apartment to stay in.
Beautiful home set in a wonderful location. Everything that you could ask for and so much more. Thank you Rachel for being a tremendous host.

Host was very accomodating, meeting us early to let us into the apartment after arriving from the airport. The photos don't do the apartments justice, it was very clean and the dining area over looking the street and fountain was great. The area itself has good local ammenities and some nice restraunts near by. We read on other reviews the area was quite noisy at night but we didn't find a problem with the noise, even on a friday night. Within reasonable walking distance to the botanical gardens, from which you can cut through to the opera house. All in all a great stay and would recommend to anybody looking to visit the city.
Very nice room..clean and furnished! In a good queiet position!..and Cathy is a very good person! Recommended!!

We were welcomed with a lovely bottle of wine and Evelyn came to meet us our first evening and gave us lots of useful information about the area.
The apartment was as described and provided every comfort we needed.
We loved the local area, lots going on in Avalon which was an easy walk away. 
The beaches are stunning and we enjoyed visits to Cottage Point and Palm Beach.
A thoroughly enjoyable holiday. Thank you.
My friends and I are totally enjoying a great time at the house. It is super nice with the trees all around~ enjoy one night stay at the lovely house
Phantastic location,  great host, stunning view on bondi, bright room.  Sincerely recommended

Having travelled from the UK the house was a major disappointment in so many ways.  The cleanliness for a start particularly in the kitchen was quite disgusting, which probably is why we had visitors from lots of cockroaches each night!  The house had defiantly not been fumigated!  The third bedroom and ensuite bathroom should not be described as a third bedroom and the bathroom is very much a utility room with a sink and toilet.  The linen was put on the beds un-ironed and the towels were even presented to us with stains on.  The threadbare furniture in the lounge was a disgrace as was the debris in the garden.  Not an enjoyable experience at all, we couldn't wait to leave and it has defiantly put me off renting on Air B & B again.
Bryan is very hospitable.The house is very clean.The location is near Glebe tram station about 5minutes by walk.

Chloe was a great host and the location is fabulous. We loved our weekend in the city - close to public transport and easy walking distance to circular quay. We were 3 adults and it was just enough room for us.
very nice and clean place, close to the airport. Easy to self check in. washing machine is available.

My stay in Bondi Beach with Leonie and Craige was perfect! The house is as described, very spacious and in a great location. Only a few meters to cafés, restaurants and supermarkets. You can use the kitchen and the beautiful garden. 
Having my own bathroom was fantastic, it's pretty new, with a bathtub. 
Very good WiFi in the entire house. 

Leonie and Craige are wonderful hosts. Prompt communication, easygoing, helpful and also very open! I'm happy I got to know them. 

Thank you very much!
Bring a pedestal fan if its hot (or particlarly humid) as the aircon has a code protected minimum of 23 deg c, and make sure not to accidentally leave anything as you wont get it back.
It was good experience. Thank you.
Fantastic as always... highest recommendation...
Great location

super sauber, Lage top, mit dem Bus in die City in 30 Minuten, Haltestelle unweit der Unterkunft, Strände Curl Curl und Dee Why um die Ecke. Jederzeit wieder! Wir können die Unterkunft auf jeden Fall weiter empfehlen!
Suitable for my needs.
geweldig compleet. prima huis met veel privacy. Alle voorzieningen aanwezig.
A really lovely place to stay.
10/10 - Ruby was an extremely accommodating host. A great stay all round for my first experience with Air bnb, my friends and myself thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Bronte at Ruby's apartment :)
房子位置很好,离悉尼歌剧院很近｡步行15分钟｡超市也很便利｡唯一不足的是房间的沙发床,大宝睡的时候有一条缝,不舒服｡毛巾虽然有准备,但不适合洗刷使用｡最好用白色毛巾｡只是一点建议而已｡淋浴房很小,老人不方便｡其他的都还可以｡物业管理人员安娜非常好!
Very clean, great location!
Great position,great host we will definitely return to this apartment
This location is hard to beat, with trendy spots and the main attractions all within easy walking distance. Adrian & crew are super friendly and have great tips for how to get a local experience.
Wonderful place, location so nice... Central station only 3-5 min reached. Surrounded by cafe and coffees store...and affordable too

Michele immediately responded to our request to stay at her place. Her place is very clean, comfortable and safe. The location is quite and relaxing, but also a few streets away busy with restaurants and plenty of coffee shops. Michele made us feel welcome. Thank you, Michele.

The apartment is in a good location, close to the airport ($15.00 Uber) and within walking distance to eateries.  Breakfast at Grandmas 5 minutes down the road was excellent.  The Cannery is also within walking distance where you can get a bite to eat or coffee.  
I found the bed too hard but that may be personal preference whereas my husband likes hard beds.
We were unable to get the TV to work at all as there two remotes to the TV set up and looked everywhere for instructions but there wasn't any.  Eventually I called Wendy for instructions which we followed and still nothing so contacted her again, same thing, so I contacted her again and eventually she said she would send someone the next day as she thought it was too late but we said it was okay and someone came within 25 minutes.  Wendy's communication was good however she should have known about the new TV set up.  The only access to the TV was through UTube.   We were disappointed with the lack of utensils.  There was a wok to cook in and no saucepans or frypan. There no salad servers or spatula, basically just basic.  I looked in the drawers for clean tea towels and found two small cloth placemats which I used as a tea towel.  There were no sponges or dishwasher tablets.  I did find a used tea towel in the laundry but did not want to use it.  The only thing in the apartment was some tea bags which I am sure was left by the previous tenants. Every Airbnb we have stayed at has been great and provided basic cooking provisions such as oil, salt and pepper, coffee, tea, condiments etc and some hosts have been very generous and left fresh bread, fruit and other lovely delights. Not that we expect that this is what every host should provide but the basics I think is not asking too much Every Airbnb we have stayed at has provided either a Nespresso machine/ plunger or both. 2 bath towels and hand towels were provided but there was no bath mat.  It would have been nice to be provided with pool towels as we did use the pool and luckily it was hot enough on the balcony for the bath towels to dry.  Be prepared for loud bangs as tenants in the building would often let their doors bang.  It is a lovely apartment and I would stay again provided essentials etc as mentioned above were provided.
Super Zimmer und Haus, nur 1 Minute von der U-Bahn entfernt. Sehr freundliche Kommunikation mit Natasa. Alles sauber und angenehm. Würde wieder hier wohnen wollen! Danke!

Characterful, clean and friendly AirBnB in a cool and designer part of Sydney. Easy to access the CBD or beaches and great set up in the room.

Nice touch with the provision of good coffee and breakfast as well

Staying in this house is like staying at a private resort. The location in the quiet street with the bush right behind the house is wonderful as is the huge private deck with dining table and two beach umbrellas which protect you from the sun at any time of day. We had a lot of fun and relaxation in the lovely pool and spa. Having 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms was perfect for 2 married couples. The zoned air conditioning was very much appreciated. We also appreciated the  well-stocked kitchen which had lots of crockery, cutlery and food-prep equipment. The lounge room chairs were ultra-comfortable. Ruth left useful notes  e.g. how to work the spa. Would love to stay here again.
Stayed with Linda's for 2 days. Location is brilliant and the house is equipped with all required amenities. Would recommend it for both short and long term stays.
Kasey was quick and helpful with all our communications. Her place is just as lovely as the photos and in a perfect location for a beach holiday. Would definitely love to stay again.

It is just a perfect place to stay for your trip at the right location. 
You can enjoy the cafe, restaurant and Saturday market around, all perfect & lovely. 
It is also very strategically located for travelling around by train, bus & on foot. 
Just relax and enjoy ~~

I loved my stay at Jenny's. In addition to the flat being as shown in the pictures and lovely, it is a short walk to the beach - a bit uphill on the way back. Jenny has thought of everything you could need to stay there and extra touches like sunscreen were much appreciated. 

Jenny always responded quickly to any messages I sent. She was flexible with my check in time as I arrived early after a long flight. 

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a place to stay in Sydney.
Highly recommended:)

what a lovely space. Quiet location away from City hustle and bustle. Close to lake, beach and restaurants. Tracy , thank you. You have a delightful place. Nice getaway pad. Great bed, a TV that actually works. Tracy was wonderfully chatty and friendly, a great hostess. Love the gorgeous puppy Sari- very friendly.
Highly recommend !!
Everything is what you expect and satisfactory but the tv was not working for my whole stay of four nights. I’m sure they will resolve it but it did have a negative impact on my stay.

Great place well furnished with a lovely look out.  Ian was a wonderful host.  All the small and big details catered for.  The pictures don’t do this place justice!  Perfect for couples and weekend stays.

Fabulous to communicate with, everything was exactly as shown/described 
We would definitely stay again!!
Very nice and gentle host, nice Bedroom, great view on the balcony and very close to the beach and Costal Walkway. Excellent value for the money.

David’s Airbnb was awesome! Super close to the Sydney CBD action, our weekend was made great by having literally everything at the doorstep. David was really hospitable and welcoming, and even let us stay a little longer knowing we’d be out late celebrating Mardi Gras. Honestly wonderful, and would happily stay again!

A perfect location, central to beach, shops and eateries.
A little loud at nights with some traffic but very comfortable stay with it been clean and tidy and well looked after.

Great neighbourhood close to transport and easy to walk to places too. 
Room was nice and very clean, with character. 
Natasa wasn't around much and neither was I but she was lovely and helpful.

This was my firs time booking via Airbnb, and thoroughly enjoyed my stay.

The place was clean, roomy, ideally situated, and with a fantastic view of the Sydney CBD and the harbour itself.

Everything great. Very clean room, bathroom & kitchen, kitchen with everything needed.. no communication needed because of the code, so that check-in can be done at any time without bothering anybody.
Kasey's apartment is beautiful! Right on the beach (yet away from the road so less noisy), and beautifully finished. Our stay was like staying in a hotel. Highly recommended.
Julia’s flat was perfect to discover Sydney in 2 days, located in a lovely neighbourhood, close to everything by foot and so well equiped and decorated. Will come back without any hesitation.
the appartement is very well located. the area was a bit noisy, but very close to train and bus station

Great place and Great host... 
Marcella offered us early check-in which saved my day and we could see the New year firewokrs...! Thanks heaps ....
Really Enjoyed our stay and we ended up wanting to extend our stay . 
Great place and great location. I am willing to book again if i am here in near future.

Tam’s apartment has everything you could possibly need to make your stay in Sydney feel like you’re staying in your own home. All aspects of the apartment are clean and functional, and there are special touches all over the place that elevate the experience. The location is amazing, so make sure you wander down Stanley street and check out the bars and restaurants while you’re there! 5 stars all the way ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
he is so nice and share everything with us.you can choice his house.
Naveen is friendly and professional. The room is private and the location is great for exploring Sydney. I would recommend it.
Large apartment in a perfect location right in the CBD
Was really nice. All you could wish for
Suzie was a great host.  She has a beautiful apartment in Sydney and was very close to everything I needed.  Wish I could've stayed longer.
Worth every penny

Shuang's place is very clean and organized. We didnt meet him during the stay, but he responded our inquiry in time. The place is walkable to train station where you can find a shopping centre with lots of restaurants and shops. We only need 10 min to reach international airport by car.

We had a lovely time during our stay in Sydney in Dino's apartment. It's a great location with a view through the trees on the harbour from the 5th floor. The area is superb with restaurants, bars and a grocery store in walking distance. The apartment itself was super modern and stylish - just what you expect from an architect - and looks just like in the pictures. We were welcomed by Rick, a friend of Dino, who is taken care of the apartment when he is away. Communication was great from both of them and we felt well taken care of. Definitely would recommend the place :)
Great time here, very nice self contained flat out the back, clean etc.

Hernan's house is real close to the airport and beach. I have stay there for 1 night with my boy friend and we find the house is very nice looking and clean. Hernan also very kind and help us to book the taxi for next day, we enjoy to chit chat with him and he willing to share information with us. 
Just a little inconvenient at night because there are noises from the road traffic.

A tidy, modern apartment in a very convenient spot in Neutral Bay, close to shops, banks, a post office and several restaurants and cafes. We enjoyed our stay very much and would have loved to stay longer.

Beautiful apartment in excellent location. Faultless presentation. Anita is an excellent host & very quick to communicate when required. We had a    great weekend & would be happy to return. Can highly recommend.
Best location! In Sydney CBD, close to everywhere. Very convenient and safe!

Stayed 2 nights in July 2017.  This lovely 1 bedder is handy to everything and was extremely neat, clean and presented beautifully.  Bedding, linen etc were beautiful and everything you could possible need in the kitchen.  Will definitely book again next time I'm in Sydney.  The hosts were great communicators and obtaining access to the accommodation was no trouble.  Parking in side street only a few meters away.
Good place

Cozy place to stay for a few days. We had a minor issue in the apartment and Victoria was quick to respond and provided a quick fix. The location is  walking distance to the botanical garden with access to grocery store across the street and good restaurants along the street.  Would stay again if we return for a visit in the future.

Quedarme en el departamento de Suzie, durante mi primer fin de semana en Sydney, fue perfecto! 

Suzie me mandó con tiempo las indicaciones adecuadas para llegar a su departamento y estuvo atenta a mi llegada. Me enseñó todo lo necesario para sentirme cómoda en el edificio y me ayudó en la elección de los horarios y recorridos de los buses, del tren y de los ferrys. Fue una gran ayuda al organizar mis paseos. 

El departamento está a un paso de Darling Harbour, con restaurantes, cafés y varias atracciones. Una estación del ferry está a 5 minutos. Es un barrio muy central y accesible, muy cerca del metro y buses. 

El departamento es precioso. La pieza es tal como la muestra en su aviso y llegar a descansar a esa cama después de 8 horas de caminar por Sydney, fue el broche de oro de unos días geniales! 

Volvería feliz a Sydney y de todas maneras a ese "lovely room"! 

Gracias Suzie!
Great place to stay when flying out the international airport. Great price, easy to get to airport ($12 uber). Highly recommend.

This was our second stay at the Garden Studio and we were again made most welcome and comfortable.
 The studio is well equipped, spotlessly clean and Cath is a most thoughtful host.

The rail car was the perfect get-away after four bustling days in Sydney. Margaret and John were lovely hosts -- welcoming and attentive, not a bit intrusive. Wifi was on the blink when we arrived, but my husband (on working holiday) survived the brief disconnect and I enjoyed the added serenity! Highlights of our stay included bush walks, " brekkie with the lot" using the fresh ingredients Margaret provided, and a relaxing day trip to the New South Wales Rail Transport Museum (Thirlmere) and Australian Botanic Garden (Mt Annan). Would love to stay again!

Narelle was a fabulous host, always responding quickly and made check in and check out easy.
Narelle's place was lovely. It was small, but had everything you need if you're on your own or with someone. It is close to trains and buses which take you straight into the city centre. The door blocked out most of the noise and there was a fan and air-conditioning, so if you can't handle the noise and it's hot, you can close the doors and still be cool. 
I would definitely stay again and would recommend it to anyone else travelling to Sydney.

David was really welcoming and the room is well appointed. The property is well renovated and designed with downstairs guest bathroom a massive bonus. 
Location is unbeatable, and I've decided to stay again.
Conveniently located in the city

The washing machine is fantastic... Best we've experienced in over 10 Airbnb stays in Australia. Disappointed that the apartment has no microwave.  Lack of basic amenities such as paper towels, facial tissues, and wash cloths.
Well appointed, clean and tastefully decorated. Friendly and accomodating host, the complementary breakfast and wine were a bonus. Highly recommended.

Kasey been a amazing host! Location was perfect, right across the street from Bondi Beach. Check on us regularly about our stay and constantly offering help if we need any. Thank you again Kasey for being such a good host!

Cat's place out the back of North Bondi is literally around the corner from a hip local scene with good grocers, bar and cafe action. The house is spectacular - classy and comfortable and in excellent taste. Cat is a genuine host and communicates extremely well. If this is the size and location you need, you'll not find better.
Sarah was a wonderful host.
This was the second time my friend Dain stayed here and he absolutely loved it! Great location; great space; great hosts!!

George and Lucia's Granny Flat was a great place to stay. Its new, clean and easy to reach. They were very responsive and welcoming and cared about our needs. George even gave us suggestions on how to spend our time in Sydney and took us to a shopping mall on his day off. Their place is indeed cosy and quiet and it is beautifully designed as well. I was very satisfied with my stay and I highly suggest this place if you are looking for a place in the area! 
I wish the best for this kind family hope to see them someday in my home country , Iran.
Jennifer’s place is a lovely period house in the center of Balmain. Fantastic host!

The house is extremely close to redfern Station - just less than 5 minutes walk! Very convenient , there are nice cafes and a supermarket on the walk to the redfern train station.

The house is neat and clean , well maintained , with a big doggie. Milk, bread are provided for breakfast. Utensils are free to use. Kath would tell me how to keep the kitchen and bathroom clean after use.
Can sit at the sofa in the living room and watch TV while having breakfast. 

The bedroom is well decorated and with a relaxing balcony. The room is nice scented and has a Comfy atmosphere . 

Can use the washing machine and dryer so long stay tourists need not worry about running out of clothes to wear.

However, future residents have to consider that Kath has to work and has to stay at home for Check in at evening to night on your day of arrival. 
It is not convenient for her if I change my check in time (eg postpone the check in time ) on the day of arrival.
Sometimes, there may be problems in finding the transportation and arrive later than expected , then Kath has to stay at home and wait. 
Especially for those arrived at morning / early afternoon at Sydney - have to find a locker somewhere first to store the luggage first then do some sightseeing  , or maybe is not so familiar with the new environment so a bit difficult to find the right restaurant to eat - may not arrive on time at Kath’s house.

Kath will brief me on every important points of living in her house and she respected residents’ privacy well. She is of reach by using Airbnb messages. She answers promptly and instruct clearly on the check out details.

By the way, Rusky the dog is not very active and usually lies on carpet and sofa, having his own good time ~ : )

Great location.
Lots of room.
Very clean and well presented.

Mike is an awesome host: very hospitable, warm, knowledgeable about his city and neighbourhood (he could wven advise on yoga classes;-) The apartment is beautiful and comfy, in the Manhattan if Sydney. I had to change the dates of my stay and he was ever so generous and understanding.

Ziggy's place was exactly as advertised, along with a great orientation from Ziggy on our arrival.  Everything in the studio was of an excellent standard and the great location of one block off the Manly Corso and Manly surf beach was perfect.  Excellent value for money and we will book again for Manly/Sydney visits. A super host.  Peter
a good place ,so near to the central . but MY room is to close to the street

My best friend and I stayed here for three nights over the weekend and absolutely adored this Art Deco apartment. It was clean and beautiful. The location is outstanding, close to markets, theatre and shops as well as a 5 min walk to the station. Mariana greeted us and was lovely. Already have recommended this place to family and friends.
Amazing experience. Very clean, great communication and very close to public transport. Strongly recommend it. Thank you Bryan!

It was my first ever experience to get a house through airbnb.com. It was awesome, house was very clean and tidy and the LINA herself she's really a nice lady, she helped me and my son to pick up the luggage to the hose. She's always there for your help. 
Whenever I visit NSW I will definitely go for this house.
Great apartment, good location close to the City.
Always a pleasure to stay, check in and out is so easy, brilliant location, clean, fresh and my new home away from home.
A beautiful guest house in the perfect location. Everything you need across the street from the water and very short drive to the main town with shops and restaurants
Wonderful spacious cabin in a beautiful part of the world!

It would be hard to find a more convenient space to stay, two minutes from buses, ferry and beaches in fabulous Manly.  Everything you need for a comfortable stay is provided and cafes, coffee shops and restaurants surround you as well as stunning walks.  Would return in a heart beat.  Thank you, Paul.
This flat is very good with a great location!

Danny and his brother's communication was perfect from the get-go ensuring my friends and I were able to check in very late at night. They were very attentive and helpful hosts. The apartment was HUGE!!! photos don't do it justice. Easily hosted a group of 7 guys with ease, with heaps of room to move around. Place was clean and we'll equipped, and made me forget that I was staying at an apartment and not a hotel. The location was also top notch, and a short walk to the ivy. For the price, location and the ability to sleep 8 comfortably, this place is a godsend!!!! Thanks Danny, will definitely be coming back.
Nice place to stay. Highly recommended!
A great apartment ! Confortable with good location !

We stayed for at Leslie's for 7 nights and it was perfect. The location was great & the home had a beautiful view! The room was spacious, bright & clean & had everything we needed. Perfect for the 2 of us as well as a 5 year old. Leslie was so accommodating and she was a great host! Perfect location & we look forward to staying here again soon!

I really enjoyed my few days stay here, recovering from jet lag so I could start work refreshed and ready to go. I was made very welcome and had everything I needed in the studio. 
The bit I enjoyed most was sitting out on the deck at night on the warm evenings listening to the 'strange' wildlife. 
The beaches are a couple of minutes in either direction and local amenities a 5 minute walk.
Hard to believe I was only an hour away from Sydney airport, it seemed a million miles away.
Lovely large bedrooms. Kitchen is well appointed. Bathroom is lovely and modern. Very clean and tidy

Kathy and Mary were lovely hosts, They were very accommodating! Their place is beautiful and has everything you need. The shower was amazing and it was a very comfortable place to stay. If your on the tall side you wil have to watch your head upstairs but i loved the space and the layout.
It's always convenient to stay in this apartment.

Nice location, nice property, supermarket, local market, transport, restaurants, you name it. Very very nice and cozy stay, awesome detailing of the place, warm and welcoming. Hope to come back sometime soon!
Check in was easy and great communication. Apartment is as described. Location is great, lovely quiet area but very easy to get around.

George and Lucia went above and beyond our expectations. It was truely the best experience that we could have had.

They were such genuine and gracious hosts which made our very first Air bnb experience one that has set high standards.

We will certainly turn to them again for accomodation for our next visit to Sydney.

I highly recommend that you experience their ‘Cozy Granny Flat’, but not so much so that we can’t get a spot in there again haha. (I’m joking of course).

But in all seriousness, the standards are that of a 5 star hotel.
Great location , large roomy spaces with eclectic furnishings and artwork to enjoy . A great house with easy walking to local restaurants and city ferry
Comfortable and good location.  Communication was excellent.

good location (Near the Darling habour & light rail station)
Large square, enough for 4 people
Also the host is friendly
Perfect location and very comfortable
Clean and comfortable room, renovated apartment in modern style, excellent balcony space.
Cat was extremely attentive in providing for my families needs. She was flexible with check in times and the house was well presented and very much as described. A lovely experience.
Great location, near the central station. Large space and easy to get access to everything you need.

A serviceable place to spend the night, but overall very average.  We wished the ventilation was better - the night we stayed it was a little hot.  We had a small fan, but we never got comfortable.  Daniel seemed like a good guy, but he rushed through the walkthrough of the space.  The neighborhood was fine, and it was quiet at night.

Lina was an amazing host. She provided excellent communication and everything was super smooth from check in to checkout. She even gave us some cherry tomatoes from her garden. She is a very sweet woman and an amazing host. Highly recommend.

It is obvious that the owner has put in much love and style into their apartment and we are fortunate to be able to share it at peak times of the holiday season. The location is so convenient with the beach right across the road.
Great place. Very clean, easy checkin and out, walked to and from airport. Couldn't ask for anything  more for me 24 hour stay in Sydney.

Mags was very efficient in her communications and made accessing the apartment smooth and easy. Location is lovely and quiet, close to shops and restaurants, as well as scenic strolls around Sirius Cove. Apartment is nicely decorated and has everything you need. Bed is especially comfy. Just one note of caution - it can be quite cold on overcast winter days, as there is only one small heater in lounge room. Otherwise, we really enjoyed our stay.
Had an awesome stay, perfect location for a weekend getaway. I would highly recommend!
