Excellent location for a great price - thanks Alexey:)

Way better than the photos! So clean and well decorated. We wanted to stay a lot longer. Belinda is lovely. The linen was top quality and everything was immaculate. There was even ground coffee and a plunger. Lovely garden. We did get woken up a bit by possums galloping on the roof but that's hard to control this close to. National park!
We walked 11km to Wattamalla beach and back again, and saw Wedding Cake rock and fish jumping at the beach. Also the IGA sells liquor and isn't far away.

Nice , tidy House , well located to the shops and the bus stop . 
Great room and good wifi ! 
Thanks for the stay !
Clean, comfortable and in a convenient location. Thank you Hugo for the wonderful stay!
Sarah was a very easy host to stay with. she was great at communicating and was very mindful about helping me whenever possible!
Great location and fantastic rooftop garden/pool area. Very secure and accessible. Not far from all the main attractions and a ver comfortable apartment. Would defibitley recommend to couples.
Great apartment with all you need, great close nearby amenities easy access to public transport and Uber/taxi pick up/drop off points.

We had a great stay at Cats Bondi house. The house is very stylish and had everything we needed. We loved  all the tea and Nespresso machine. The house is close to the beach about a 5 or so minute walk. Close to bars and restaurants. Would definitely stay here again.

The Garden Flat is quite unique hidden away as it is in a wonderful jungle-like garden with many interesting features. There is a feeling of being away from the bustle of the town yet it is actually near the beach, ocean pool and the Strand.
Joseph has made the flat very comfortable with some nice extra touches to welcome travellers on arrival. We loved tucking into the local fruit.
It was so relaxing to sit eating breakfast on the deck while looking out at the garden and identifying the local bird life.
We thoroughly recommend the Garden Flat for a delightful stay in Dee Why,
great

Terry was a lovely host and her flat is in a great location with all the amenities you need. She's incredibly friendly and it was lovely to spend some time with her in the evenings watching movies. The traffic can be a bit loud but earplugs sorted that, and her boyfriend was pretty loud the last night with his mates waking me up and keeping me awake in the middle of the night, but Terry was very apologetic for this so shouldn't happen again! Apart from the last night it was a great stay with a lovely host.

Everything described in previous reviews is absolutely true. 
Warm welcome by Jennifer, charming house in a quiet neighborhood, very accessible to public transport to the georgeous city .
Thank you so much Jennifer, to have made our stay so easy and agreable.
Very beautiful house, suitable for family or group, nice owner.
Great location, really clean, funky apartment. Good for one or two travellers. Generous supplies and easy communication. Highly recommended!
The room was good for the price.
Great stay, apartment was clean and the photos were very accurate. Location was superb, and communication was outstanding. Definitely recommend staying here!
Great stop when we needed a place by the airport.  We were able to check in early and it was so helpful for our short trip!  Clean and great instructions.

Bright and airy Accommodation,10in walk to main central station ( links airports, blue mountains and more).  Used lock box to access property, details were emailed time prior to stay. Would be more than happy to stay at Andrews place again when I return to Sydney.

Edi made my stay in Sydney so nice... it was wonderful to chat with her and hear about her adventures. She gave me really good tips for exploring Sydney (which was very easy from the location) and it was a pleasure to stay at her place! I definitely recommend to stay with her as she is such a welcoming and caring person! Thanks so much Edi!
Felicity was communicative and pleasant, the room was clean, quiet and comfortable. I would recommend to other guests.

Angela's place lives up to all your expectations.  It is beautifully and tastefully furnished and spotlessly clean and all the added extras were absolutely fantastic.  We will most definitely be back.

very beautiful and tidy house. Thanks for David give us a beautiful memory of Sydney. the house is better than the picture show.David is so kind that introduce for us allthings in house. although it's a little noisy at night . but I will choose stay here second time
We had a really nice stay at Cathy's place. It was pleasant, convenient and had everything we needed. We had a lovely breakfast there too. It was overall really enjoyable.
I had booked Shuang’s place for my cousins and they found the place very clean, with good amenities and convenient location.
Great location. Very clean and nice layout. Quick communication with host.
It's great to stay again in this garden studio. Belinda and Chris have kept this place at the highest standards.  We can't wait to be back.
A lovely warm house, host is very welcoming and helpful. Treetop room is perfect and as described. Enjoyed my stay and would say again.
Great location and customer service from Robert! Lovely place with all the perks, easy to stay 8 without any issues.
地理位置非常好,可以走路去中国城吃饭,也可以走路去歌剧院区域(大约3公里)｡从机场出来如果超过2人可以直接打车到这个小房子,澳币40-50刀｡因为房子是木质结构且有点年头了,隔音真的不算太好,楼上邻居的每个脚步都可以听到更不用说他邀请朋友以及放歌唱歌｡房子临街在一条还算车多的主道旁边｡Elisa回应问题非常迅速,是个蛮好的房东｡
The place is a brand new apartment.  There is a portable A/C in room which is perfect for summer heat in Sydney.

Beautiful and super clean place across the road from a beautiful park and beach. Fred and Bernadette are super helpful. Loved the welcome cake and juice upon arrival which was a really nice touch! Thank you for a lovely weekend stay.
Thea's place is perfect for one - clean, safe and conveniently located. Thea and her sister made communication really easy. Thanks again!

The house is in great location. The house is also very clean and tidy and exactly the same as described in the photos. The host is very friendly and easygoing. All the utilities are functioning well. Recommended to those who plan to hang out with friends in a quiet and private house.

First time using airbnb and Marcella's place has exceeded my expectations. Ideally located, it was quiet, yet close to everything. There was a great fenced park 2 min walk away for the kids. Well appointed, warm and homely with a fantastic library (which time did not permit me to enjoy). Would definitely recommend this place to a group of several families or friends.
Amazing place, perfect for two of us. Clean, beautiful and easy location (close to shops). Great air conditioning in the 40degree heat. Highly recommend!
A great apartment in a great location. It is within walking distance of the harbour and also very close to Kings Cross station. The rooms were comfortable.

What a magical spot! Everything was perfect (except the weather!) ☔️
Lovely informative welcome - the studio was spotlessly clean with fresh flowers from the garden & a fridge full of goodies. 
Great location with nearby cafés & the beach a short walk away. 
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay & would highly recommend to others visiting Sydney. 
Thanks again
This place and it's hosts were absolutely incredible. Amazing house; kind, accommodating, generous hosts; comfortable beds and great location. Thoroughly enjoyed staying here and would return again.
Terrific place/excellent host.
房间厨房用品齐全,房间很干净｡位置很好,距离大部分景点都能步行到达｡
非常开心的旅程,谢谢Lina and Zhou.推荐家庭入住｡

Cat made us feel really welcome, the house was clean and tidy, great facilities and great location, close to the beach but not on a busy road.  The house was ideal for us, two families and our mother in the 'annex'. We would definitely recommend the property and would return.
Lovely space and buses very close by. Relaxed environment and other places just a short bus ride away. Great for our short weekend getaway!
It was a great time as the host was really kind and helpful. My two boys loved there, they wanted to stay longer but we had to go. Thank you Jason, we hope your always happy. Bye~

Perfect unit, clean, cosy and so handy to all north Sydney has to offer. Millie is a great host, communication was excellent. Definitely recommend and will definitely re-book on my next trip to city. Excellent value
Really well located in CBD, close to everything we wanted to see and do and easy flexible arrangements for arrival and departure.
We had a great stay and the apartment was self contained,  spacious and very comfortable. Thank you!

Paul's place was in a fantastic location, very walkable to everything! The apartment was clean and well presented and we appreciated the snacks that were left for us when we were in need!! Paul was very helpful and communicated quickly and clearly. Would stay there again for sure!

The location is nice and close to Avalon, but it is a  pretty small place and wouldn't recommend it for 4 adults as it only has one bedroom and two single beds in the living room (not as pictured). The photos make it look nicer than it is, it's dark and pretty run down and there were a fair few bugs inside. The place is private which was nice and very green.
Great location for our short stay in Sydney at a very reasonable price! Apartment had plenty of space and was clean, lots of extra blankets and pillows
Very clean and tidy, the only inconvenience is that the toilet and shower is way outside the room.
位置很棒｡厨房设施齐全｡房东非常好,给我们很多建议和帮助｡由于晚上的飞机,还主动帮我们寄存行李,非常贴心的体验｡感谢~
Wonderful host Mohit is :) i would highly recommend him. You won't be disappointed and the apartment was very good :) looking forward to my next visit!
Nice & clean, great location with easy walking access to the city, harbour & train station. Thanks again.

Great location - stayed a week for a family holiday! Easy walk to train/bus stations and plenty of good restaurants around. The apartment was clean, cozy and right for what we needed. We even had extra guests come and go, Phan was more than helpful with that! Would highly recommend :)
Really nice apartment! Clean and well organised. Just five minute walk to the train station, very convenient! Air conditioner works perfectly! Also, good conversation with Andrew. Amazing experience!

Fabulous location, very comfortable, clean and enjoyable apartment. Everything has been thought of and we enjoyed the fully equipped kitchen, hot shower and comfortable bed. Stairs are not a problem, they have handrails and even with luggage, very manageable. Great base for exploring Sydney as public transport is at the door, highly recommended.

This spacious property is truly amazing with stunning features and beautiful views on every level. Bailey's hospitality was exceptional. I would highly recommend this property for a relaxing holiday, especially for large groups of 6 or more.
awesome place in central Manly location! highly recommended

My husband and I stayed at Susan's and Greg's studio over three days in early November.  When walking through the back garden towards a small building at the back, we were stunned by the subtropical beauty of its setting, with a huge purple jacaranda tree and flowering hedges.  The view from the inside towards a private outdoor dining space was no less spectacular.  

The photos of the interior were very accurate: a light, very nicely decorated and comfortable room, with a well supplied kitchenette (the bar fridge thoughtfully hidden in a cupboard blocking out any possible noise), and an en suite  bathroom. 

Both, Susan and Greg replied to our messages promptly before our arrival and were very welcoming when we got there.  At the same time, while available if needed, they left us to ourselves respecting our privacy, which was greatly appreciated.  

Susan was very generous, supplying not only maps and guides to the area, as well as her personal recommendations regarding local cafés, but leaving ample gourmet breakfast provisions in the fridge, and a surprise basket with fresh bagels, organic butter and Yarra Valley jam on our doorstep the next morning.

Its location was our original reason for choosing the studio: in the heart of stunning Bronte, within easy walk to the beaches and the annual Sculpture by the Sea exhibits along the shore between Tamarama and Bondi.  What a treat!

Herman and Conny are super nice! They are helpful all the time and made me feel at home. I didn't plan my trip in Sydney much. They recommended me a lot fun places to visit and I had a blast. I wish I could have more time talking with them. Thank you so much for your wonderful host. I will come back!

This is a great spot to stay, super centrally located with easy access to all you could need on holidays. Host Paul is great at communicating and keeping in touch, and we would definitely stay here again.

A fantastic studio, in a great location. In a  quiet and peaceful garden setting, a few minutes from Bronte’s best coffee shops and bakery. This studio is only 8ish minutes from the beach and he coastal walks to either Bondi or Coogee.
Highly recommend at stay in this studio.
Such a great place in a great location. Ollie is a really great guy and easy to get ahold of if need be.
Lovely house owned by delightful people in an interesting location
The apartment was exactly like it was shown on the picture. Very nice and clean. It was easy to find and is well located.

My friend and I felt so welcome. We were so excited about being at the other side of the world and kev and Ellie took good care of us and gave us good tips what to do and where to go! I can totally recommend this air bnb.
super clean flat and Andrew is alwaus answering your questions very fast. the location is perfect to discover the city

Natasa is a super lovely and nice host:D The room is all the same as the pictures shown on this page, and all the things are clean! Only 2 minutes walk to train station and bus stops, easy to travel anywhere!

This is a lovely room with everything we need. We had a really great time in the city and the house. 

The place is clean and tidy, Brendan also well prepared in details, like the heater and chocolates. He also showed us around and gave us useful tips, even plans for days! 

The place is close to the beach, you can have a great view from the balcony. The place is also close to the bus, which can directly to Bondi Junction, and transfer to everywhere else. 

The kitchen is also welcome to use, also provides milk and bottled water.

Overall, it is a really nice place and we really enjoyed it! Highly recommend it✪ω✪

Lizzy’s Place is fab! Amazing location with a really fab view. So easy to walk down to beach and close walk to both Bronte and Bondi. You feel like a local in this relaxing and spacious apartment. We loved it!
What a stunning studio. Tracy has thought of everything. I loved my stay and hope to return

Susan has a vast knowledge of Sydney and was always willing to chat to us and offer advice as to things to do or the best transport links. The accommodation was clean and exactly as advertised. With breakfast provided too, our trip was very enjoyable.

An excellent stay in Surry Hills. The location was perfect, close (and far enough away) from the train station, and buses. The studio unit was equipped with all the necessities for a great stay. Don was a superb host - nice to be met on arrival, and he gave some great local food and coffee suggestions.
A very special place, set in an Australian bush setting and a unique and interesting experience spending the night in a converted train carriage.
Perfect location right next to train station and lovely host with excellent communication!

I think it’s a decent stay just outside of the CBD, I think it can be a perfect stay if Ian and Kelvin could make a few changes. But apart from those both the guys have been really nice and humble and quick in communication. Check in was pretty straight forward and instructions were perfect.

We loved the Potts Point neighborhood and this apartment. Perfect for the two of us, and my niece stayed with us one night so the air mattress and extra bedding was perfect for her. Hot water shower. Foodie area, with visits to the bakery, coffee shop a few doors down, and Saturday farmers market right across the street. Buses and cabs are right in front, convenience store across the street. Hosts were out of town but extremely responsive, and Wendy who cares for the apartment was fantastic - friendly, prompt, and flexible. We would visit again and recommend!

Apartment was exactly how described & the extra information given re: keys / directions to the apartment  etc was very helpful. 
Only complaint (it's a very small one) would be the lack of towels in the room. 
Good price. Good location. Clean & - lovely host! Will defo be back & have already recommended to friends & family

Fantastic apartment with a great location, a very helpful host, and everything was provided. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Very good communication with the host, house was sparkling clean and accurately listed. My whole family was very pleased!

Lovely stay at Cindy and Micky's place, the location is quite convenient, although space of the room is a bit small. But it is so nice that Cindy provide me with fans in this hot weather! Rooms are also clean and elegant.
Great location and beautiful home.

Dino's flat is amazingly beautiful. It's minimalist on it's best. Fully equipped, everything you absolutely need. Kitchen is also fully equipped. It's located in the beautiful Elisabeth Bay neighbourhood, you can pretty much walk to everywhere from there... full of cafes and nice restaurant.

Brand new and spotlessly clean. Very comfy bed and no traffic noise!!!

I will stay here again.
Thanks Jonny, we had an awesome time at your flat. There was nothing missing and we felt more than welcome.

Marcella's home is a great for a group of 10-11 people. It was great to find a home that could accommodate a big group and still provide single bed options. The house was nice and cosy, had good sized living spaces and is so close to Maroubra beach, cafes, restaurants and shops. 

Parking is competitive but thankfully Marcella has a drive-way that you can park the car in.  The electric blankets were a nice touch for those who may stay during winter. 

Our group was comfortable and had plenty of space - thanks for the great stay!

We have appreciated calm and serenity during our stay  the cosiness of our room and the total comfort we were expecting . B sure we keep an excellent souvenir of this pleasant stay and that we will be good ambassadors .You can rely on us for good publicity of your hospitality among all our relations and contacts.

Jennifer's unit is close to public transport, restaurants, and the Sydney Olympic Showgrounds. It's nicely proportioned, thoughtfully organised and the views are amazing, daytime and particularly the nightscape - evening drinks on the patio were memorable.

Beautiful home, great location, very comfortable, great host.
Thanks for a perfect stay Bill.
We felt very lucky to enjoy your beautiful home.
Robyn
Great place to stay with everything you might need. Location was pretty good. Easy to get buses everywhere.
Very clean and brilliantly located. Very cool neighbourhood.
Everything was perfect
Everything was lovely & we had a great stay
This was a good stay! Hernan is a friendly and helpful host and his place is clean and had everything you need. Would recommend!

What an amazing place! Highly recommend. Even nicer than the photos. We were left a welcome fruit bowl and so forth. Couldnt have asked for more. ! Would definitely stay here, (i'm glad we didnt book the Hughenden nearby, as for the same price this place was incredible) . The spare sunroom with its own bed for one was perfect for the 2rd person staying, and the fact there was wifi, a balcony, amazing location , what more could one ask for. Thanks Louise!
Beautifully appointed studio with everything you need to enjoy your time in Sydney set in a lush and inviting garden.

We stayed at Shobna’s place for a week. 
Pros: inside the apartment is nice, newly renovated and modern; location is near to a good pub, bus stop and coffee shop; Shobna was open to a late check out. Cons: the block is a bit run down and has a resident horder on the ground floor, the underground car park does not fit a small van, the hot water runs out quickly in the shower, the bed stoops down in the middle, we were only provided with one front door key (and asked to pay $120 for a second key) which made it difficult given there were two of us; no iron.

Galvin was accommodating as I arrived early on a Sunday morning. The location near the central train station was fantastic for me to arrive and depart by the airport and also to go visit friends in Paramatta. The built in bench in the bedroom was very convenient for spreading out my stuff.   I liked having some good places to eat nearby. The Shakespere over on Devonshire had great food at a cheap price. If you want a great location for seeing Sydney and the surrounding neighborhoods this is the place to be.

We had a wonderful stay and the flat was everything we had hoped for. The extra help with cot, pram and even toys for our 15-month old made it so easy. And the flat was in a great area with a few brunch places and restaurants nearby as well as Bondi Junction just a short bus ride away. Overall we'd highly recommend staying here. Thanks Moira!

Wake up to the kookaburra's in this bush surrounded apartment. Would be good for those who seek the recycled look and feel.  Access not suitable for small children or us (70yo). Nice area and excellent check in communication and service. Caring owner was concerned for our car in hail storm and moved it to neighbours garage.
Lovely place. Very cool space. Everything you need to be comfortable. Very handy location for eating, shops and transport

My wife and I had a great weekend in Sydney. Yoco was very welcoming and a real nice guy. The position was great.. a short walk to Central station made it really easy to get around town and back again. I would definately stay here again. Thanks Yoco.

Dannys apartment was in the perfect location. Everything on your doorstep. Very spacious apartment, great for girls weekend with 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and lots of wardrobe space. The apartment is a bit tired and could do with some improvements in some places but overall great. Danny was an excellent host. Any queries were answered and dealt with immediately. He also allowed us a late check out. So thank you Danny and see you next time!!
super easy check in and a really nice spot and location, highly recommended!!

This house is in a perfect location for cafes, shops and restaurants as well as wedding venues and ferry and buses to beach and city. While in a private courtyard the noise from the road was more than expected.

I had an absolutely lovely stay at Cath's Garden Studio. Such an easy location and I was amazed by how much thought and care was put into looking after her guest's needs. The fresh croissant for breakfast was one of my favourite parts of my stay. The chooks were very cute, as was Chips. Cath is very helpful while still being respectful of your privacy. I would definitely stay here again!

Beautiful apartment with stunning views. Evelyn was very welcoming and helpful. The apartment had all the amenities we needed, location was perfect. Beautiful walks near by. We would definitely return and highly recommend to others.
Great place to stay! Clean and tidy place with all the utilities provided. Such an awesome experience staying in this place with full satisfaction.

Very clean and comfortable. Spacious well thought out, everything you need for a comfortable stay. Close to shops and cafes 
Light rail. Child friendly (I had my 2 grandsons). Would stay again. 
Sue

Alexey 's house located next to the Central Station which is very convenient for all travellers. The house is clean, stylish design, with a lovely balcony, all amenities are provided. However there were little problem about the shower tap and aircon, but Alexy responded quickly and promised to fix it. So the house still highly recommended.

Very spacious, convenient and a creative place to stay.  Easy commute and great local restaurants and cafe just a minute away.  Perfect for groups or large families wanting to stay in a stylish city pad.

Lilian's house is a perfect place. Great location, 5 minutes walk to the Redfern train station or bus station, which can take you to almost everywhere in Sydney.  Many good restaurants and bars in 10 minutes walking distance. 
The house is super clean, tidy and stylish. The guest bedroom is very quiet, bright with natural light. The bed is also very comfortable. 
Lilian and Dave are very nice hosts, they are thoughtful, caring and easy-going.  They made me felt like being home on the first day. They are also very generous, did everything to help me when I stayed in their place. I highly recommend Lilian's place.

The most perfect cottage! I needed somewhere quiet to do some exam study, and Belinda and Chris's place was the perfect hideaway amid lush monsteras (while being close to the ferry and shops!). It's so lovely being able to wake up and stumble into Royal National Park – a five-minute walk down the road. The space itself is tastefully decorated, private and cosy with a well-equipped kitchen. I would love to visit again! Thanks so much.
호스트의 친절함과 빠른답변이 좋았고, 문제발생을 고려한 배려가 편하고 좋았다. 수영장 헬스장을 마음껏 이용할수 있어서 좋고, 에어컨도 시원하고 좋았다.  또 시드니 갈때 이용할수 있겠으나, 마트가 1키로를 넘게가는것은 알아둬야할 사항.^^
A very tidy quiet apartment,ideally suited for a couple. Good location to shops and cafe. Very handy location for any events in Sydney Olympic Park.

Alert! We give honest reviews!!! This place was booked because of the location and other reviews. We came to Australia to celebrity our 25 th wedding anniversary, trip of our life!  We were checked in with Steve who was very accommodating and pleasant. He pointed out that the carpet is old but clean. It really does have ripples in it from being so old. I thought, no biggie, we can live with that. Over the course of the first 24 hours of our stay many more red flags surfaced. You cannot turn on the hot water in the kitchen if anyone is using the shower- immediately it goes cold. The oven is weird, no directions on how to use it either. The kitchen floor is not tacked down! Looks lovely in the pictures but it is just splashed down. I walked on it in my bare feet and it came up! Underneath is disgusting!  The carpet in the bedroom has a big burn mark in it, which was covered by a bath mat. The bed is hard, not comfortable at all. There was an air mattress on top of the cabinet in the bedroom but it’s too small for the bed. The couch is good looking but has painful springs poking up in 2 cushions. One odd thing is in the bedroom there are side table on either side of the bed, which is nice. The dresser is tucked into the corner, but the side table makes it impossible to open the bottom drawers of the dresser. Awkward!  The kitchen utensils were disgusting and we had to wash everything before we used it.  The cabinet under the sink is awful as well. We hope this place improves because the location is wonderful.

Our stay at this charming cottage in Bronte was very pleasant.
The place was spotless with very nice hosts that went out their way to make us welcome.
we would stay here next time and recommend it to friends.

This Airbnb is akin to a good hotel suite, very clean and nicely appointed. Darlinghurst is magic and this apartment puts you in the heart of it. Quiet but super central at the same time. Fabulous host, highly recommended!

It has been a great experience staying at Wendy’s place. Checkin and checkout has been smooth. You will have the entire apartment on your own, highly recommended for budget travellers with family, there is a nice balcony too, and a swimming pool in the building (though I dont have time to try it out).

I am quite satisfied with the overall cleanliness of the space, bathroom water was warm and confortable. 

Location wise, its just a few minutes walk to bus stops which can take you to CBD area directly. 3 supermarkets nearby are just 2 busstops away too.
AMAZING! The apartment made my trip to Sydney- such a chic space in an awesome neighborhood. Am already planning my trip back!
I'm very glad we stayed here. Close to the airport. Very clean, great hosts.

A wonderful spot! We had 10 adults and 5 children in our group and we all had a wonderful time! There were lots of living areas so everyone could have their own space. The private beach was a hit with the kids and adults alike. Amazing sunsets, and we kept warm with the log fire. The kitchen was on the small size for the size of the house - in saying that, I would happily return!

Ruby's apartment is all about the location - great view and terrace, a short walk from the Bondi to Bronte coast walk and Bondi / Tamarama / Bronte beaches. The apartment itself is pretty tired, but if you're more into the beach than interior design, I'm sure you'll love it.
Good location and nice flat, there is a building site and a motor garage next door which is worth mentioning as it can be noisy.
Location was great as it was near city and chinatown. However, the floor was not very clean but overall a value for money stay.

We had a great stay here. Griffin is an awesome and genuine host - very helpful and attentive! It was the perfect location for us as we spent a lot of time walking and exploring all surrounding areas. It’s a compact space which Griffin has done a very good job of making very effective and had everything we could have needed. And a very comfortable bed and pillows ! Plus very good wifi
Amazing apartment and Victoria is so helpful. The area is very cool - cafes galore and some incredible restaurants. I'll be back!

Excellent location.  5 minutes walk to Circular Quay and 10 minutes to the Opera House with cafes and restaurants all over.  20 minutes to airport and Jared and Ana looked after our bags for the day so we could go round Sydney for the day.  Cost $8 per bag - well worth it! They also arranged a lift to the airport.  Very prompt and efficient.
Apartment was comfortable and well- equipped.  All good and will definitely stay again. 
Many thanks to Jared, Ana, Jeff and Francisco!

DJ was a delightful host.  His place is amazing.  It's clean, modern and much better than staying in a hotel.  Its tastefully appointed and has all the conveniences that a traveler could want, at an affordable price.  His place is ideally located on the boundaries of Surrey Hills and Darlinghurst with a bus stop just steps away.  You have access to a sunny balcony from your bedroom and the bed is quite comfortable.  DJ will give you your privacy if you want but is also quite friendly and willing to help with suggestions for meals or things to do.  I will definitely stay here again if I have the chance to return to Sydney.
Comfortable. Kind hosts. Had a good stay.
thank you so much for the stay, it was absolutely lovely! you have a great response time and your tips on eats are spot on.

We stayed Edi's place to go to the airport next day early morning. location was very good to go to the airport as well as station. House is old style but nothing made us uncomfortable. Her cat, Jet was so adorable and friendly. recommend!
Hugo is easy going, really flexible to arrange check in and check out. The place is great, good location and clean. We really liked our stay. We recommend it!
The reservation was canceled 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Herman was a nice and easy person and his place is very welcoming. Nice and clean, you fill at home from the first moment. I would personally recommend to anyone.

Thank you very much. 
We really enjoyed and this was absolutely great  & fantastic place for us.

Recommended!

The apartment was exactly as described. It is quiet, comfortable and relaxing and right next to the sea and right on a direct bus route to the city.
Fred and Bernadette provided some nice basics - milk, juice and more on arrival and a very comprehensive guide to the area and the city.
We would definitely make a return visit.
Great place! If you have kids, this is the place : The kids room is fantastic.
This house is amazing!
Great break with the parents.

I have stayed at many air bnbs and this is definitely one of the best I have been in. The accomodation has all the facilities needed and very close to great Shops and restaurants. The attention to detail in property like the quality of duvets, towels etc is super and they kindly helped us with our very late check in! Perfect place to stay!

Out-of-towners and Sydney residents alike loved this apartment and its location. I don't think anyone took their eyes off the ocean. We even had a whale watching session one afternoon, counting about 4 or 5 humpbacks making their way back down the coast for summer.

It's an easy walk to Bronte and Bondi, but with Tamarama beach right out front you don't feel like you're missing out on anything. I was coping with some jetlag, but the others were keen to explore. The apartment proved to be a valuable centre point as people did what they wished and then met up again.

The apartment itself is clean and well appointed. Definitely somewhere I'd like to spend a lot more time. We had a family gathering for my 30th birthday one night and hired a chef. He was able to deliver a number of courses from the kitchen without any worry.

We were a little worried about finding parking, but I don't think we ever failed to find a spot out front.

Perfect is the only appropriate word to describe this place! The design of Cath's little studio/loft is exceptional, we genuinely did not want to leave. Great central location in a beautiful leafy suburb, plenty of parking and an incredible host. Cath was so kind and helpful and her Labrador Hazelnut was just adorable. This is perfect place to base yourself to enjoy the best of Sydney - we will be back! 10/10!
Perfect place to stay. Amazing host and a more than ideal location.
A fantastic house in a great location. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again in the future!
This was a great place to stay, so central and close to amenities. The apartment itself was spacious and comfortable.

Had a great stay at Jess’ place. Jess was very responsive at all hours of the day and Was extremely hospitable.  Very close to transport, parks, cafes and the CBD. Would recommend to anyone looking to stay in the Redfern or Alexandria area.
Amazing place, amazing people!

Paul's place is in a fantastic spot right near the wharf, beach and shops. It was perfect for us to use as a base to explore the area, and to jump on a ferry for trips to the city, the zoo and more. Our bed was very comfy and - despite being in the heart of Manly - we slept without an issue. Our kids (8 and 11) were happy to share the other bed and had great sleeps too. Thanks Paul for the prompt communications and the lovely little place.

Belinda was warm and helpful and made my stay very easy. The description details were accurate. It was a lovely idyllic setting in the garden with a side entrance for guests. I loved everything about the place. The studio was decorated in a soothing and artistic way with Belinda's beautiful art works and tasteful furniture and other touches.   I felt like I was in a perfect forest retreat. At night I could hear frogs and crickets and then morning birds and it was lovely to sit on the verandah with tea and walk down to Jibbon Beach nearby. Simply a lovely break. Thank you!
房屋干净整洁舒适,房东非常热情,还有各种吃食

Jyoti and Uttam's home is a lovely home in a quiet, friendly neighbourhood. Before I even reached the house, locals in the street gave me warm hellos! I had a car and parking on the street was no problem. A lovely location near Olympic Park, super close to Newington shops, cafes, restaurants. 
My room and bathroom were very very generous and homely and my stay was perfect and relaxing. I am really happy to have stayed with some a warm, welcoming family. A wonderful AirBnb experience!

Perfect for a weekend in the Royal National Park! The studio is 100m from a private beach, close to the ferry and has everything you need for a few nights away from home. 

Belinda and Chris were lovely hosts - they were very helpful and offered us good local food and whale watching tips.

The photos of Paul's place don't do it justice. It's bigger and nicer than it looks and right in the heart of Manly (with beach views from the kitchen). We couldn't fault a single thing. Just a heads up, parking can be tricky but Paul provides his permit and it is on the third floor which wasn't a problem for us or our three young kids but may be if you are injured or have mobility issues. We loved our stay though.
it was nice stay at vanessa s place. really convient and close to everywhere.
This place is great location wise and is within walking distance of Sydney’s most popular attractions of Darling Harbour.
A great little find for a one night stay. Clean, tidy and in a quiet neighbourhood. Michy is a fantastic host- clear, helpful and kind.

The apartment was very spacious and in a great location to walk to both the beach and the wharf. Paul was very swift with communication however we would have appreciated a heads up about the building work next door. Great value for such a central location - the bathroom and kitchen are very outdated but work just fine

Awesome location with hosts who offer excellent hospitality. They are generous with their efforts in comfort and companionship if you want it, and they have excellent knowledge on Sydney plus locations around the world. A top little find!
Great centrally locate apartment, with a super yummy patisserie at the bottom and loads at cafes and restaurants in the immediate vicinity. Host Paul was very accommodating.
Stylish and beautifully clean. Everything I needed and a great location. Cath is lovely and helpful.
The apartment is very  pretty and is very properly placed. Thank you a lot. I advise this apartment for holydays in Sydney.

Our stay was absolutely wonderful!
The view from the top bedroom is amazing, overlooking the city. 

The house is very clean and tidy! The rooms are spacious and stylish. It has everything you need and we felt extremely spoilt on our weekend away.

Jeremy is a great host, easy to contact, accommodating and always gave a quick response to my queries. Thanks again!

The terrace is very well located, close to everything, in the heart of Darlinghurst. 

Thank you Jeremy for everything, we hope to be back soon.

Amazing experience in Sydney, with so many things to do and enjoy. The apartment is located in a nice area to get to the center and to the airport and other parts. It's very cozy and beautiful. 

It was very sunny these days but there is a fan to solve it. It's a noisy street but you can close the windows. And don't worry about strange people walking around, they don't cause problems

Thea was an amazing host, quick communicater and we felt welcome from the second my partner and I met her. Her place is super cosy and is incredible, as well as super close to lots of shops, restaurants and public transport. Would 110% recommend staying here; she is incredibly hospitable and nice.
An excellent experience,  in a well maintained beautiful property , great location and management .

First of all, i wanted to talk about Annandale Village. My wife and i loved the place. It's a very quiet village with friendly people and lots of options for food and coffee. It is not too far from CBD and if you want a quiet/peaceful environment, Annandale is the perfect location.

Wyatt's place- we loved staying at Wyatt's home. We didn't get to meet Wyatt and Julie as they were travelling during our stay. Erika hosted us instead. She was very helpful and accomodating. The house is literally less than a minute to the bus stop (470 to the City and 370 to Cogee Beach).  The location is just 15 to 20 minutes to the City. Very convenient. We enjoyed our stay at Wyatt's place. There's a rustic, homey feel to it. The room, although small is just about right for my wife and myself. We even spent 1 day just being lazy in the room and drinking coffee in the balcony.  I will not hesitate booking the same room on our next visit to Sydney. I recommend Wyatt's place and please read his instructions first so you would know what to expect. All in all, we had a great stay in Sydney and our trip was made even more memorable by staying in Annandal and Wyatt's place. We miss it already. Hope to be back soon!
Michy is a wonderful host with a great little backyard shack in a beautiful location. Highly recommended.

Cecilia's place is extra-ordinary, she makes the house feel very peaceful and chilled! Having great interesting guests where interaction is relaxed and enjoyable! 

I would stay again where ever your next home is. Thanks very much, Kevin

After a long day of sightseeing in Sydney it was time to check in this lovely 1BR apartment. 

What a comfort that everything has been taken care of. The cleanliness and comfort to an apartment ready for your arrival. 

Spent the last 3 nights and I could simply call it my second home. 

Wendy has been very accommodating and is happy to help with any questions you may have in relation to the apartment to the area! 

Certainly one apartment not to overlook with a indoor swimming pool, spa and sauna!

Will book here again when I come back to Sydney!

This apartment was in a fantastic location. You really could not get any closer to the beautiful beach. The bus system was also very easy with a convenient stop right outside of the apartment. Maroubra is such a cute little beach subarb that I’d love to visit again.

Nice lady, open minded and very easy going.
Her son is well behaved. A good kid. 
Clean house/room.
20/10

Great apartment with a great host. Mal met us on day one & went out of his way to ensure we were happy guests. New kitchen & bathroom added to the value of the apartment with the incredible location & views. We felt right at home in Bondi, immediately. 

Having 3 kids of his own, Mal was extra helpful with the loan of a cot, high chair, stroller & dvd's which made travelling with our own little one that much easier. 

I'll be booking with Mal again when next in Sydney.
An excellent apartment, great location near train station, bars and restaurants. Would stay again.

This delightful unit is in a fantastic location at Manly, only metres from The Corso. The unit was clean and very welcoming. Both beds were comfortable and there was an abundance of bed linen and blankets. Communication with Paul was prompt and the possession of the unit key was easy. It was a pleasure to stay here and we look forward to a return visit.

The place was really well maintained. All necessary amenities were provided by Carole and Steve. The room and extra lounge was really helpful. The place that you have for yourself is private and you have plenty of space for yourself with the lounge room. Carole and Steve were always around for any requirement we had. Sweet place :)

Additionally note, The cute doggo 'buddy' was is super friendly and had his own boundary but was always happy to play with you :)

Definitely pick this place if an opportunity presented itself.

Absolutely lovely stay! Very clean and comfortable, in a wonderfully quiet area. 
Location was perfect and access to public transport was a breeze. Hosts were friendly and accommodating - I will definitely be staying again. Thanks so much! :)

Belinda was a perfect host and made it really easy to check in and settle in her home. The house and garden are lovely and the garden studio very comfortable. The area is very quiet and close to lovely beaches. We enjoyed our stay  and felt right at home. Thanks for giving us a great Christmas break on the Beaches !
Fantastic space at Don's apartment. A delight to stay in and I will be back for sure.
Great location and communication.
Fantastic location, stunning finishes and great attention to detail and outstandingly clean

I loved staying at David's house as it was the perfect place for my trip when I went to Sydney for a conference.

1- The location is very convenient (close to business district but in a quiet and nice area). There were also many food places around. I found a good grocery store and a fine pizza restaurant near the house, which was one David's recommendations. 

2- David was very helpful and welcoming. He was kind enough to let me check in early and check out late on Sundays. 

3- The house is very clean and modern. The bedroom is comfortable and it has a nice terrace. What I loved the most about my experience is that although I had tons of work to do during my stay, David's place allowed me to do so with tranquility and convenience.

I highly recommend this place to people who needs tranquility, comfort and convenience. I will definitely recommend it to my friends, and will check it out again when I will return to Australia.

We had a great time at Naveen and Tristan's place! We arrived in the morning, and they had already left for work by the time we got to their place, but the concierge knew we were coming and everything worked out very smoothly. The room has a gorgeous view, and we woke up to a beautiful sunrise each morning. Naveen and Tristan were very friendly and gave us lots of good information about the area. Our room was well-stocked with all supplies we needed during the stay, which was very useful. It was my first Airbnb experience and it was definitely a good one! Oh, and their dog, Felix, is an awesome little buddy who loves to just sit next to you and snuggle.

We knew there were many beautiful places to visit in the area but the apartment and it's aspect were so stunning we spent almost all our time there enjoying the view and the pool. 

It was only a short walk to an intimate little Greek restaurant, a bottle store and a grocers shop  - and to the most aptly named Paradise Beach. Couldn't have wished for better. Superb. 

Our expectations were high. They were exceeded. 
We're already planning a return trip.

This is a good place to stay, all amenities that we needed, very clean and modern with Ali being a great host, very helpful  to every queries. We stayed in his luxurious granny flat for 10 days. I would recommend his place.

Great place for a stay, ideally located in Elizabeth Bay, 10 min walk to King Kross and shops. Sarah is very reactive and nice. The room is light, very comfortable and clean. 
I recommend it.
Location is great. Very close to central but if you're a light sleeper than avoid it because of the main road next to the apartment. Lots of noise at night
What a lovely clean and comfortable place to stay while in Sydney. We were very happy staying in such a lovely place completed our grt weekend in Sydney.  See you next yr.
A little oasis in Sydney's West. For the cost, the space was incredible. Spotless. Easily accessible by car. Tonnes of off the street parking. Highly recommended.
Lovely place in a perfect location. Great interior! Might get a little noisy if you let the window open at night and a little warm if you don’t use the fans. Other than that we had a great stay!
Great host, showednusbaround when we got there and was very respectful of our privacy during the weekend.
Lovely little apartment, close to the heart of the city. Walking distance to several attractions and located in a nice neighbourhood. Would highly recommend!

Great one bedroom pad in Sydney with easy access to public transport, cafes, restaurants and bars. Also had a fold out couch which meant my Mum could stay the weekend. Highly recommend - we had a great time!!

Good location and cleaning linens. Ana was the one for communication and she has done a brilliant job. The kettle wasn’t working and the shower drain was blocked upon arrival, but Ana managed to get everything fixed within hours of notice. Highly recommend!

A fantastic property that is within walking distance of the CBD. It is surrounded by cafes, restaurants, and watering holes. I would highly recommend this property to anyone wanting to experience the true Sydney lifestyle.

This is a fantastic central location, with loads of shops/  restaurants/ bars/ pubs within a 5 minute radius. The room I stayed in was ample for one person and the shared bathroom is amazing - both are large and kept very clean. Arnie and Lorraine are both lovely and I really enjoyed my stay. Would definitely recommend this accommodation to others looking to stay in Paddington.

Ian and Dorota were a great host, we really enjoyed our stay, outstanding view in a nice peaceful area. We were made to feel very welcome, the room itself was very spacious and had everything you needed for a short stay. 
Would definitely comeback if we’re in the area. Thank you Ian and Dorota.

The cabin is cosy and private and just how it looks in the pictures. We were very comfortable and happy with our stay. Easy driving access to the city and inner west, as well as being a great spot to walk to cafes and transport etc. Susan is generous and friendly. We will be back!

Incredibly convenient! Lovely house. Clean and inviting. Everything in good working order.

Enjoyed a lovely weekend with my guests from out of town (8 in total) and had a great time. Jeremy has been a pleasure to deal with- prompt responses and made an effort to be helpful and accommodating. Would definitely stay here again.
Parking can be a bit tricky but is possible. This is obviously the pay-off for staying in such a central location.
A very private part of the house. It was very quiet, good for study. There was table space and a fridge which I obviously didn't read about because I was so excited to see that.

Joseph and Judy’s place is just what we needed for our stay at Olympic Park. It is so clean and comfortable and everything we needed was there . Even after a mix up with the keys , they were so understanding but please make sure you listen carefully to their instructions and don’t make the same mistake we did  We hope to be back soon

Room and apartment well kept  and clean. Hernan was a lovely host. room is located so  close to everything yet the noise  doesn't travel through for a good nights  sleep. plenty  of linen,  towels etc provided. 10/10

Hernan was very good responding to messages straight away.Good location near the airport. Listing as per description. We didn't end up staying as we managed to get an earlier flight but would recommend this host as he is very helpful.

Victoria's apartment was perfect for exploring Sydney for the weekend. It's comfortable, well equipped and super convenient to everything Potts Point has to offer. Victoria was a great host too, meeting me on check in and showing me where everything was in the apartment. I'll be back if I need to stay in the area again :)
Shaun is a really nice and helpful guy, but the place was just dirty. I am really sorry to say that, but unfortunately it is true.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

WOW. This was by far the most outstanding AirBnB experience I have had to date. Susan's place itself is perfectly located a short walk from Bronte beach and is a gorgeous garden hideaway under the shade of a mulberry tree, that we loved coming "home" to each day. The space is tastefully designed and decorated and the thoughtful touches went above and beyond ... from delicious gluten-free muesli, to the high quality tea selection, and natural and high quality soaps, high-speed WiFi. Our hosts were easy-going, kind and friendly, we felt immediately at home and were only sorry we didn't have more time to spend with them. Thank you!
Nice and helpful owners.

We loved staying in this house. We had 4 sisters and our mother for a relaxing 5 night stay. There were two bathrooms which was perfect and the house was cosy and clean. Great little backyard for a few wines in the sun. Thank you.
Can not recommend this airbnb highly enough! The hosts are stellar. The accomodation is great and the location is an easy walk from the ferry and beach. Highly recommend
We had a great weekend at Marcella's. Great location, close to beach, cafes etc. House was perfect in terms of space, interesting decor etc. Marcella made us feel very welcome! Thank you :)
Terry was an awesome host, always making sure we're feeling comfortoable. The appartment is very nice and has everything you need and an amazing view. We had a great stay!
Jadon and davids olace was awesome.theyre hospitality is secomd to none.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

What a great place! fantastic area with easy access to the city and walking distance to great cafés. Susan is amazing, she is very sweet and kind so much so I believe I will remain friends with her. The room is lovely with heaps of space and a comfortable queen.
Het is een ruime kamer vlakbij een gezellig strandje. Hernan is een gezellige man en je voelt je direct thuis in zijn huis!

My experience at Rhonda's place was amazing.  Rhonda is super nice, friendly, kind and easy going.  She will do anything for you and can provide heaps of insider knowledge on Sydney and surrounds.  The granny flat style accommodation is perfect, chocolates on arrival, little sops and shampoo to use, super comfy bed, nice sheets, everything you could ask for.  Miranda is a lovely suburb that is very safe and family friendly, nice big trees with lots of birds, close to transport and shops and not far from the beach either if you have a car.  I could not recommend highly enough for anyone visiting Sydney to stay at Rhonda's house, you won't regret it!
Great location. Comfortable Bed. Will stay again.
Neat spot with cute aesthetics.
房子离机场有四公里左右,周围都是住宅区,坐公交门口走几步就有比较方便,但是地铁站比较远,晚上到达建议还是住机场附近就好,机场离市区比较近｡房间适合两人入住,多了睡沙发但是沙发不太舒服,厨房配备和墨尔本住的一些房子比起来确实要差许多,但是毕竟悉尼住房本身就贵些,感觉还是住机场的酒店公寓更划算方便一些｡
Great pad. Good space. Informative host. Terrific location.
The apartment was as expected. No problems except the noise at night time from the light rail construction.
A great stay as always...thank you
Thank you Gayle, I enjoyed my stay at your place. Excellent communication too
Beautiful views, a very special place to stay. Richard was an excellent host. Great walks, kayaking and swimming in Mackerel Beach.

The value for this place was outstanding. 
There was no couch & no TV. However, the location, the apartment, amenities in the apartment & Linda ( lovely hostess ) were outstanding. 
The place was very clean, bed was very comfortable. 

Lots of windows that could be opened. The place has air conditioner, however I prefer fresh air & there was plenty of it. It was hot in Sydney but I never once had the aircon on. 

Views were lovely. Woolworth just down the road, very close & lots of great places to eat. The area & apartments around look amazing I wish ADELAIDE would take note!!

No more than 10 mins from Central Station. Apart from no couch & tv which didn't bother me that much as this place had so much to offer. The value was exceptional ! 

Definitely would stay again when visiting & definitely would recommend 

THANK YOU Linda :))

Mike was very nice and helpful to us. We stayed at Mike's place for 10 days and really felt at home. The appartment is spacious, conveniently located and the view from the rooftop is certainly one of the best you can get in Sydney. Potts Point is furthermore a very nice area with a wide choice of restaurants and bars. We would love to come back!

Artistic, inspirational space ideal for big group who drives (especially if tourists); who are punctual (cleaners do show up on the dot on the hour of your checkout); well prepared (remember to BYO amenities like hair dryers, body wash, tea/coffee); responsible (read the manual and follow all to-dos). Since we were such a group we had a lovely stay! Don't miss amazing view of harbour bridge from the end of Blue Points Road!

A very comfortable home in an amazing location. The perfect place for anyone that needs to switch off for a few days.

Communication with Richard was great. He did everything he could to make our stay enjoyable including having the construction workers next door turn their radio down. 

The kiddies loved the easy access to the beach and also spent lots of time playing the many games that are available.

We didn’t want for anything.
I chose this accomodation for cook and it had been fully equipped for cooking. I also felt cozy atmosphere and comfortable.
Ali's place is clean and modern. It's in a quiet location and was close to the suburbs we were visiting. Ali was very available and responsive. We would definitely stay here again.
Great location, the host was easy to get in touch with!

Elise was prompt with communication and the apartment was as described and spotless! The location is super convenient. The street it’s on is pretty busy, but that was easily accounted for with earplugs!

The place is really nice and clean! It kept 7 of us warmed at night And there’s a good number of amenities available from kitchen appliances to laundry and shower amenities. Comfy beds too!

Upon arrival, Sacha was quick to respond with check-in details and kindly guided us virtually through the house. 

Highly recommended!
Lovely apartment in a great location. Perfect for attending (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with the host was great. Would definitely stay again.

It was great pleasureto stay with Kerry.We felt as we were in our home.Kerry was supportive,friendly,kind and lovely.Her home was not less than what has been shown in the pics.You get all appliances and amenities without trouble.We loved our stay too much amd highly recommend it to anyone.A+++++:)
The house is beautiful and lovely. There are a lot of stores nearby. The beach is only 50 meters faraway. There are a rock swimming pool nearby that I love the best.
quite comfortable

We had a super lovely time at Michy's beach cabin. Location was perfect, just across the road for some lovely quiet beaches on Pittwaters, the interior design of the cabin was spotless and classy and we had all we need to spend a very comfortable week in paradise.
Michy and her partner have been amazing hosts, always very kind and happy to have a chat, but also absolutely respectful of our privacy.
We would love to stay there again soon!
Had an wonderful stay, the place is great and Brian is a very accommodating host. Hope to return.
Excellent value for money .Sarah is a lovely host .We were made to feel very welcome

Great place to stay, everything worked smoothly with key pick-up and good communication. It's a quiet street so a good night's sleep, yet just a short walk to some great places for breakfast. Really convenient for getting everywhere with the train station just 5 mins away too.
We had a lovely brief stay with Hernan, just one night . Close to the airport and easy to find. Hernan made the arrival process smooth and easy. Thanks
Apartment was perfect for a short family stay in Sydney for two adults and two young children.
Hernan's place is close to the airport.

We stayed at Philip's house for 6 nights. We were so impressed with the house and the location. Chris was a wonderful host and made sure we had everything we needed. Everything we needed was within walking distance. Would definitely stay there again. Very happy with our stay!

Devina was a very helpful and responsive host. Once i booked my accomodation, she contacted me directly asap. She was very detailed and we are able to locate the house quickly. The room was clean as shown in the photo. Thanks Devina!

Kath is a great host. She is nice and very accommodating. She welcome us when we arrived and explain how everything worked out in the apartment. The apartment is clean and well organized. The room is nice and comfy, just exactly like what it was described. And of course, as shared by previous guests, there are tim tam, fruits and bread with jams provided for us. For location.., it is great! Close to the Redfern station, need only few minutes to reach the city. Thanks Kath!

We really enjoyed our stay at backyard cabin by Pittwater.  Michy was the most hospitable host who was eager to help us in any way.  We would definitely recommend staying there.  I would also recommend having your own transport as it can be difficult to get taxi service in the area. Thank you Michy once again!
Amazing apartment, very close to USyd! We loved staying there and don't even want to leave, Casey and Larry are just lovely!

We stayed 1 night. Even if we didn't see Hernan a lot, he was very welcoming and friendly, and helpful.
The accommodation is great : good bed, every room in the apartment is clean, and a useful kitchen.
It is good located, we only paid around $25 for taxi transfer from and to airport. Coles is closed as well.
We recommend Hernan's accommodation for your stay

Evelyn was a fantastic host. From first contact, Evelyn was super friendly and welcoming. My partner and I stayed at Pittwater Paradise over our wedding weekend and Evelyn went out of her way to make sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed. All previous comments about the amazing views, great location and excellent host are fully justified. On our wedding night we were very touched to come home to a chilled bottle of bubbly. Hope to return one day! Thank you Evelyn and A!
Had an enjoyable stay at Andrei's place - comfortable, spacious and convenient location :)
Cool place, excellent host!
I found Belinda's studio a delightful place for my weekend retreat.  It is quiet, comfortable and attractive.  Great access to beautiful beaches and the Royal National Park.
The house is near the Bondi Beach,about 15minutes drive to City｡Nice house…
Fantastic location, close to beach, park and some great restaurants. The place was very well presented, clean and owner very responsive to questions.

The location is fantastic! Morning tea on the balcony over looking the beach couldn't be beat. Only ten minute walk to the main Manly strip and a fabulous cafe and restaurant only one block away.  I highly recommend!
This apartment is amazing has everything you need and more. Fully equipped and close to restaurants. The hosts are amazing. Highly recommend.
Clean, convenient stay, close to international airport.
Lovely apartment. Everything was as described and very helpful, friendly host.
Well appointed apartment in a great location for any events in Olympic Park.
Great spot, good location and the family is very nice easy to communicate.
.Appartement bien situé
Nice little place in a handy spot
Sehr gut gelegen und nicht weit vom Strand. Nette WG Gemeinschaft.Beim öffnen der Türschloss hatte ich Probleme...aber nicht schlimm nette Wohngemeinschaft :-)

We were attending a conference at Technology Park in Redfern, we walked their every day, we were only 5 minutes walk to an amazing array of eateries, Paul's house is a beautiful old terrace in an historic area and as hosts, he and Judith treated us like old friends. Just be aware the room is on the third floor and the stairs are steep. Would highly recommend
Top spot

Lovely, serene location accentuated by the fresh smell of eucalyptus trees, sounds of the birds and nature trails. Good access to public transport, shopping centre with Woolworths, banks, variety of restaurants and cafes within 5 minute walking radius. Room is spacious and home is cosy and comfortable. Jyoti and her family are calm natured, easy going and so helpful with orientating me to the area. I could not have had a more comfortable stay. Thank you Jyoti and family:)
This is a wonderful place to get some rest and explore the great Newtown area. Very clean and a great kitchennette.  Communication was also fast and clear! Great place!

Mags was friendly and communicative in her Emails but we had no personal contact. In fact ,we had become used to some personal touches from our airbnb hosts and this was somehow lacking.After a few days we grew more used to the apartment and could appreciate the  functional new kitchen and bathroom. Even though the photos do show the apartment correctly, the actual feel of the place was very different to what we had imagined.In our opinion a few improvements would make a lot of difference.Stepping in and out of the bath for the shower could be a problem for someone with limited mobility.
Mosman is a fantastic area to be in, beautiful tree lined streets with wonderful houses, shops and restaurants and the apartment is situated well for transport once you work out the bus and ferry connections.

In this amazing granny you will find the maximum comfort and the stay in a highly prepared place ,very clean and healthy with all types of facilities that let you keep coming again and again.
George is a perfect host , so nice that change you from a guest to a friend level.
Extraordinary place and such kind hosts!

Stayed here for one night as we had friends over from England and wanted to show them Manly and have a few drinks. Can’t fault it in anyway at all. Location was perfect, right in the centre of the high street, clean, tidy and the beds were very comfy. Couldn’t have been happier with the value for money and Paul was very quick at responding and keeping us updated. Would definitely stay again!

The location is very easy to access since Arncliff station is just next to the apartment and Wolli Creek station within 15 min walk!! A Uber only cost about $18 to the airport (Same as the train but much better). 
       The apartment is very clean and lovely decorated. I loved the clean bathroom and the spacious living room. Tim & Liz kindly used very clear and specific sticky note to help familiarize everything. (Website hidden by Airbnb) I did enjoy the short stay and recommend it to the other travelers . :))
Great and comfortable stay. Close to everything. Good restaurants and coffee shops within a block. 20 minute walk to Opera House, etc. Vickie was the perfect host.

Me and my friend had a week in Sydney over New Years. It was very hard to find a place to stay, but DJ was quick and easy to communicate with! We enjoyed the location of the house because it's walking distance to the inner city and has easy access to beaches by buss. David is very kind and helpful, and he has made a great guide for what you can do in Sydney and some popular bars/restaurants. Our experience of the city and the house was good, although it rained a lot... We don't know what we would have done without the huge umbrellas you provided haha. Would definitely stay at your place again if I'm ever in Sydney again. 

Thank you for your hospitality.

Jason's place was exceptional! Our hosts were able to meet us at check-in, and getting to know them briefly was fantastic. Their home is welcoming, as is Bondi Beach. The flat is walking distance from groceries, restaurants, and of course, the bus. We were comfortable with the assurance that when coming home after long days in the city, we would have anything we needed and a quiet place to rest up for the next big day out. Bondi is a wonderful community - staying here, I think we saw the best side of Sydney.
It is a beautiful place to stay, very clean, comfortable and in a great location.

Quirky place in nice location. Noisy - particularly if you're not from a big city. Standoffish host. 

Incident where I was shouted at and accused of trying to watch her do her feet. W hen actually as I was walking to the bathroom, the host was holding her foot up - very much like patients, in my profession - do to show me their injury/ailment/complaint. Therefore, I paused momentarily - about to ask if everything was alright. Got shouted at - totally uncalled for.
Awesome place!! very clean and tidy. Mohit is an awesome host!!
Everything you need in a great location. Oriel couldn’t have been more helpful.
Rachel is an amazing host, quick clear communication and a wonderful place to stay
地方很好找,而且附近走下有这个小的商业区,里面有餐饮,也有适合的商店可以购买商品邮寄,铁路口附近有个woolworths购买东西也很方便,房间内很干净,也贴心的准备了去机场的路线,推荐要赶早班飞机的亲!
Lovely and clean, awesome location and Miss D bought us soy milk especially  - loved it thank you
Great location. Excellent host. Amazing place to stay!
Love this place, perfect escapism

We love this apartment. The location is amazing, near to main train station and we can even walk to harbour area. There’s great eating places and supermarkets nearby, around 5-10 mins walk. Even a shopping mall 15-20 mins walk. The apartment is very clean, comfortable  and comes with all the amenities needed for our stay. The wifi is strong and was great for us. Andrew is a great host and we had no problems at all checking in and out . He gives very clear information. He’s even left some tips on some great places to eat and buy stuffs. Thanks so much Andrew !
Perfect space, thank you!
great place. great location

Great place to stay close to the beach.
Lots of choices for dining and a local market is only a short walk away.
Bottle shop( liquor store) is close as well.

Craige and Lee are awesome!
Invited me to join them for a barbecue.

It was great time at Cat's place. Very close to bondi beach about 5 mins walk. And quiet and relax beautiful place. I love to stay again when my next visit. My family was happy too:)
Thanks again Cat:)

Clean and charmingly decorated. Neighbourhood was quiet, pretty and close to bay. Easy to walk to wharf and catch a ferry over to Circular Quay.

Did not meet Trent but communication was quick and easy. 

Parking available on street for free but can be busy so be prepared that you might have to park further away. We were only there for a night so didn’t have much luggage, but might need to factor that in if you do have a lot of luggage. Posting does mention a private parking space, not sure if there is a separate space other than street or if this just refers to the street but we utilised street.


Towels provided. No toiletries so best to pack some.

Tip: we found it difficult to unlock the main door by mailbox but there is another door around the other side that was much easier to open with the key.

Wifi only worked for about an hour and then we had no wifi at all. Other than that, it’s a great unit in a nice neighbourhood and would recommend.

We had a very comfortable stay at Patrick and Christine’s place. The location is great, close to bus and tram public transport, along with a good selection of GoGet vehicles. There are some great shops, pubs and places to eat nearby, with every cuisine catered for.

The house itself is well appointed, modern and clean with everything you expect and need for a comfortable stay. Patrick and Christine responded quickly to all communication and the 12pm checkout was fantastic. 10am is such a hideously early checkout time. I’d definitely stay here again.
Enjoyed our stay. Thanks Paul
The location is excellent, the place is clean, modern and had everything you could need. Phan was an absolute pleasure to deal with. 100% recommend!

Alexey is really nice and kind. He replied quickly and let us early check-in without any fee. The apartment is very clean and all things needed are well prepared. It got a super good location, just two-minute walk to Central Station with a beautiful view of the city through the window. Self check-in is really easy. Highly recommend!!

Cathy is a lovely host that is providing a nice and cosy room in a quiet and relaxing area of Avalon Beach above Sydney.  A really comfortable stay, a short trip away to some amazing beaches!  Cathy provided plenty of useful local tips during our stay including helping us figure out our plans on NYE in Sydney relating to public transport.

Cat's place suited our needs perfectly. It was clean, comfortable, had plenty of amenities and was close to bars, cafes and the beach. Communication was really easy and Cat responded to any of my questions within minutes. We would not hesitate to stay there again.
Clean, good location and you won't regret on booking a stay at this place.

Stor och trivsam lägenhet. Dock störande oljud från ventilationen i fastigheten nattetid. Trevligt område med flera restauranger och pubar i närheten. Enkelt att ta sig de centrala delarna av Sydney till fots.

Susan would be an excellent host for a couple looking for a personal and caring bed and breakfast experience.  We were disappointed in the size of the facility (plenty of room outdoors in the garden - but that was spoilt by mosquitoes).  The breakfast offerings were high quality and unusual but limited in choice and very much a DIY experience.
The house was clean, beautiful and had a lot of character. Steph is warm and professional, and we had no issues with any of the amenities or access during our short stay. Highly recommend this place!
Apartment has an amazing view and was a good place to stay in overnight after an event at spotless Stadium.
Nice place, plenty of space and comfortable. Great communication.
Great place, very close to the heart of the CBD, quick replies from the host and the whole experience was as easy as I could’ve hoped for.
Sally's house is in a perfect location.
We had a fabulous stay at Trent's place. Conveniently located to cafe's, shops, beaches, transport and parks. Would definitely stay there again. Thanks for a lovely stay!

This is a perfect Avalon escape, walking distance to the beach and immaculately presented. Angela has considered every detail, from fresh bread, kids toys because we needed them, and Champagne. There’s a perfect green lawn for kids or sunbathing, and shaded outdoor dining. 
The kitchen is well appointed, the fridge full size, the aircon works well. 
Loved our stay!! We’ll be back!

this host are not able to contant. phone number was wrong and not answering my message though the airbnb app.
therefore i wasted my time and cash i couldnt even checkin
Very comfortable, close to beach and shops and entertainment. Had a very enjoyable stay and Robert was very helpful and flexible host.

Sehr schöne Wohnung in Top-Lage, Restaurants und Shopping in der Nähe, sehr gutes Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Victoria ist super nette Gastgeberin. Die Kommunikation mit ihr im Vorfeld sowie bei Check-in und Check-out war perfekt!

We stayed in a separate part of the house which had a bedroom, bathroom, and living room.  It was clean and tidy, very cosy, and comfortable.  There were magnificent views of the sea upstairs in the kitchen.  The hosts (Fred and Bernadette) were friendly and made us feel welcome.  We will definitely be coming back if we are in the area again!
Room is clean and comfortable, has independent entrance for it, you can have good privacy.

Robyn’s place is to n a wonderful location , a gorgeous house in Mosman close to everything! The room is very nice & the bed very comfortable 
Robyn & Ken are wonderful hosts & make you feel completely at home !!
Nice house & good location.
Best experience ever, quiet and nice. Fantastic hosts with high detail explaination for every thing you need and two lovely dogs always waitting for you. Go there without any second doubt.
Good location and facility! Need some improvement
Appartement spacieux et trės fonctionnel. Comme nous étions 3, le recoin avec le lit supplémentaire fut des plus agréable.

The place is central to many landmarks. Town Hall station is just 5 minutes walk away. The place itself is very clean and well-maintained. If you have nothing to do at night because Sydney shops close after 5pm, there is Grace Hotel nearby which includes an Irish pub. There is also a post office just a couple of doors from the Airbnb if you ever need to ship things home. Danny was also very responsive in all our communications which was really comforting.

Mal's apartment is incredible, such a wonderful spot. Mal was a great host, really accommodating and generous with his time. 

Highly recommended.
Anita is great host. The building is under refurbishment so there is a lot of noise and ugly scaffolding infront of window so you won't get sea views.
We were very well at David's house. The apartment in old style is furnished very well and located a very lively neighborhood, close to all the comforts.

The listing description was accurate. The house was clean and had lovely accommodations. We loved the location. The neighborhood was off a busy street where we could easily catch a cab or take a bus. Also had cute boutiques, restaurants and pubs on the side streets. The location definitely made us want to come back and be able to explore Paddington more.
Great little spot, good location and nice check-in experience.

This safe and beautiful tree-lined suburb, with easy access by foot or very regular public transport to the Airport, Sydney city and surrounds, made a stay in Glebe perfect.  Every type of restaurant, cafe, store etc are just around the corner. The room and spacious bathroom were immaculately clean, and our hosts Elizabeth and Simon made us feel incredibly welcome - almost part of the family.  We look forward to returning again, and recommend Elizabeth and Simon's beautiful home to anyone looking for a relaxing stay in Sydney, with the chance to meet two fantastic new friends.
Great location in the CBD, close to Circular Quay. Apartment was as described. Check in was easy, and on time. Overall great location to stay.
Apartment located near the train and several restaurants. It is clean and well equipped.
对面就是曼丽海滩,房间整洁,房东细心,交流顺畅,适合家庭居住｡

This is an amazing gem at Drummoyne. The house is spectacular and has all the essentials for a big group of people. Franca and Alessio are very accommodating and great people. They were able to accomodate us on Boxing Day as we had two last minute cancellations. I can’t recommend them enough. I will definitely be back.
Would highly recommend this place, couldnt ask for more from an airbnb, great location and room. The hosts were so helpful and friendly.

Why would you stay in a hotel when you could stay in this compact but all-you-need apartment in a perfect location just on the north side of the bridge in Sydney?  There are great eateries near by (our favourite - takeaway gourmet burgers overlooking the Opera House and harbour), and train and ferry only a few minutes away. Eleanor was very flexible and everything went very smoothly, and her provision of breakfast food and staples was very helpful.
Recommended.
This is the place I have been 3 times.

The room was very clean and tidy, the only problem I had was that the shower gets cold after 5 minutes, as I've got long hair it's almost impossible to take such a quick shower, and I wasn't waiting for that, because I didn't know.
非常棒的airbnb体验,房子的整洁和细节都让我们非常惊讶｡感谢房东提供这么优秀的房子｡很期待下一次还有机会去Rhodes旅行｡强烈推荐给大家｡
Great location. Wonderful basement room. Nice kitchen! Fast and efficient check in. Great “after sales” service. This was the best.
Central location, large apartment, would particularly suit a family or group of people.

I'd be very happy to recommend Terry and Craig to potential guests.  The apartment is spacious, full of light and air and very well located in the midst of all that the eastern suburbs have to offer.  The hosts are very welcoming and keen to make your stay relaxed and fun.

Cathy thought of everything.  It is a beautiful, clean room in a lovely setting.  Cathy was there if we needed anything and still respected our privacy.  
The room was very comfortable and spotlessly clean.  Excellent value for money. 
I would highly recommend.
