Suzie is such a friendly and attentive host. Makes you feel welcome in her immaculate place. Was a great stay - super handy to the conference center!
Very nice, clean place right on the front at Bondi. Kasey's very helpful & quick with responses.

Kath's place is clean and very near to the Redfern station. Community is quite safe at night as the building is along the main road from the train station. Near to supermarket as well. Check in time is not exactly flexible as the host is only available early in the morning or in the evening. However, Kath did adjust check in time to 2:30pm to accommodate us. We greatly appreciate that. Generally we did have a very pleasant stay at Kath's place. Her dog is very cute too.

The apartment is in a great location - under 10 mins walk from Redfern station. 

Central air conditioning is a big plus especially in winter.

The IGA over the road is very handy.

Good hosts who communicated well with us throughout our stay.

Check in and check out is simple and easy.

Welcoming, easy going, great communication. Clean and private accommodation. Great location, great value. This is what Air B&B is about.
See you again.

What a beautiful house in a beautiful area. Jennifer was a gracious host who left us a lot of information and chocolates, apples and flowers! The house is in a convenient location with Woolworths nearby which made simple food preparation a breeze after a long day.

We had a wonderful stay at Paul's place. It's within easy walking distance of The Corso, the beach and the ferry. The house is lovely and open with lots of natural light. The beds are comfortable, we got a great nights sleep! The kitchen is old but has everything you need. Our nearly 2 year old is pretty busy and was interested in everything at her eye level, we brought some of our own toys and the tv was great for distraction! There are some great playgrounds nearby and the beach is great for the little ones. 
Paul is very easy to communicate with and replies quickly with any questions. Would recommend to couples or small families with slightly older children than ours.

Great location if needing an early flight from Sydney airport or arriving from a late flight.
In residential area, huge Woolworths and Dan Murphy's liquor store only few hundred metres. Bed reasonably comfortable, office desk and plenty of charge points for devices.
Excellent instructions provided, able to gain keys and entry without any assistance which was fantastic.
3km to nearby bay St and plenty of restaurants 
Bathroom well equipped, excellent shower pressure and heat, washing machine also available.
You do share shower & kitchen/small living area with another guest if both rooms booked.
Could have used a vacuum prior to stay, hairs on floors.
Otherwise felt clean, smell and feel though almost like little too much product!
Kitchenette, small hot plate, fridge, jug and toaster.

Such a great location and the photos don't do the fabulous view justice. Positive prompt hosting and a good folio of info and tips on site. This is an excellent value, convenient apartment for a Sydney stay.
Shuang was very helpful and was very quick with his responses to any questions i had. Was clean and had all the things i needed to have a comfortable stay.

I would really recommend this place as it is close to the public transport and it's affordable. Very clean and comfortable room. Edi is really friendly and kind, she gave us many tips where to go in Sydney and was ready to help anytime. The planes weren't an issue, we could sleep without any disturbing.
Lovely accomodation, quiet an relaxing near great restaurants. Pity was fully booked for my next visit to Sydney..

Susan's place is perfect for a weekend near the beach. Set in a beautiful backyard she has thought of everything, including breakfast, which is often overlooked with BnB. This was one of our best experiences staying at an Airbnb and we would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a 5 star experience of Sydney.

Very nice house built in the 1920's located in the Drummoyne neighborhood.  This is a close-in suburb to Sydney - only a few miles, but about 30-45 minutes by car, depending on traffic.  There is on-site parking for 2+ cars, which is really nice, although street parking was easy to find in the neighborhood as well.  Close to cycling/walking paths that run all over the area.  The house is in great shape and has a very nice outdoor living area that we enjoyed.  There were a lot of board games in a closet, which was a plus for our kids.  I'd definitely stay here again.
The apartment was modern and in a very convenient location. The view was fantastic!

A lovely apartment with great views over the wetlands and the parramatta river. There is so much construction going on in the neighbourhood that its full of bustling activity. No noise at all up on the 18th floor! 

Would definitely stay again.

Great location spacious accomodation 
Great views
Perfect home, perfect location, perfect hosts resulting in the most magical, memorable family moments ... we loved every minute of our 4 day stay at this beautiful Randwick home!!!
The apartment was absolutely as expected. Clean and modern. Lots of great restaurants and shopping close by.
Our stay at Stevens place was great! We were a last minuet booking and everything was organised very quickly :) Comfy bed, close to everything,  and a delicious mango from their garden! Thanks guys

Victoria's apartment was a short walk to King's Cross station, and well located to travel to the main attractions. The apartment is located in an upscale local neighbourhood with plenty of eateries in the area and a supermarket and deli right opposite. The apartment itself was spotless and very clean. It had everything we needed - toiletries, towels, a small kitchen and coffee. Victoria was lovely and we had a wonderful stay here.

I have to say i am a little baffled at how positive the reviews are for the place we arrived at, and I completely agree with Binna's review below mine. I didn't see any 'drug addicts' around the apartment areas and the area has all the shops and takeaways you could need. We also felt safe in the area, and didn't run into any problems. However, On arrival, We were met by the cleaner who showed us to our apartment. The apartment itself is in a dilapidated building with marks, chips and wallpaper coming off which obviously isn't advertised. It seriously needs renovating as it's in a bad state. 

For £550 over a week, and the fact that the cleaner had asked us to come back in 30 minutes when she had finished cleaning (after check in time), the floor was still covered in dust which we found attached to the suitcases as we had to put them in the lounge area due to no room for them in the bedroom, and the couch is also pretty stained (also not in the pictures). I advise you to not look under the couch... as it needs a clean before anyone does... and finally the bathroom is covered in Mould (also not in the pictures). Bath also needs a good clean, as neither myself or my parter were interested in one. Could also do with sorting out the rusty drains in the bathroom too.

You will also need to bring earplugs as an essential item, it took us 3 nights to get an 'ok' sleep due to the noise, over the weekdays too as the walls are paper thin. We live on a busy main road at home, but I can't emphasis enough that the road outside the apartment is seriously loud, don't underestimate it as it does sound like you are outside. I had to buy -85 decibel silicon earplugs for my partner just so she could sleep.

The guide to the area was good and the amenities were too, except for the towels, as we were given 2 towels between the 2 of us for a week's stay. The shower was powerful enough and didn't run out of hot water which was great. 

I also contacted Paul and asked about the internet issue on arrival, as the wifi is particularly slow. I understand Australia doesn't have the greatest network, but 2mbps isn't usable, so bring a 4G data package with you for your mobile. 

I understand that I could of emailed Paul and complained about the bathroom, towels, noise, internet, cleanliness, etc.. But I have never had to do this before or do I really feel I should need to. Previous places I have stayed have been great with air bnb, but there is a difference when unsatisfied and paying £550 for a week for the above. Believe me, I am usually pretty chilled out with accommodations, but this one really needs a thorough clean and some sound proofing.
Central location.

A charming peaceful place with a lovely owner!
The comfortable granny flat is independent, in a nice garden, feeling like in the forest, a beautiful natural environment.
Rhonda is amazingly welcoming, easy going, knowledgeable and full of kindness.
I felt like in a pleasant family.
5 stars are not enough!
房间非常的干净,设备齐全,就是初到澳洲,英语不行,也没跟房东多交流交流,总体不错,好评!

This was the perfect place to stay for us. It was close to public transport for business purposes and close to shops, restaurants, and parks for our little one.
Steven and his family were extremely welcoming and helpful.
The cabin was beautiful. Clean and light. The air con was a bonus as it was quite warm in Sydney at the time of our stay. They provided a porta cot for our baby which was an added bonus.
It was very quiet and peaceful. 
Steven and his family kept to themselves, but were lovely to talk to on the odd occasion we bumped into them on the way out the door.
We would highly recommend this place to stay. Thanks for having us guys

So good place to stay, near to airport for take an uber not very expensive. Good details in amenities and everything that you could need (as umbrella for rainy day in sydney, for example). Everything nice and clean.

Neil’s place was absolutely beautiful and Neil was a great host. I had some questions early on that he addressed quickly and made our international trip much easier. We will stay here again if we are back in the Sydney area!
There’s many facilities especially messaging chair which is the best relaxing thing after travelling.

Angela's house was a lovely place to stay during my short trip to Sydney. Her house is spotless and neat, with everything you could possibly need to feel at home. In particular, the tissue box and folder of nearby restaurant pamphlets on the desk were thoughtful touches! 
The bed itself was comfy to sleep in and the room receives plenty of natural light. 
Breakfast and towels were all provided, and Angela and Coby are kind and considerate of their guests.  
Just a tip to keep in mind how big your luggage will be as there is no lift and you'll have to climb a few flights of stairs to reach her house. 
Overall a great experience that exceeded my expectations!
Its a great unit with a beautiful view where you can stay comfortably while exploring all over Sydney.  The unit is beautiful and has everything you need and more!

As many have said before us, the photos really do not do this place justice. The accommodation is a very generous space, full of natural light, a beautiful setting high in the trees with a peaceful outlook.

Great deck / balcony for lunch or a drink in the afternoon. Some very nice homely touches with tea, coffee, a few basics and some absolutely cracking c coconut biscuits :)

Would definitely visit again.
Nice place and very accessible to the  City!

Neil's place was everything and more. A great location for getting around Sydney but located in a beautiful & peaceful location with great walks and beaches nearby. The accommodation itself was excellent, well thought out with good touches from breakfast and toiletries to the layout of the apartment. Would most definitely recommend and only wish I could have stayed longer.

This was a great place to stay for a nice getaway weekend.
The area is fantastic, with the beaches a short drive away, and some benches for a chill by the water only 5 minutes walkaway.
Michy was great, nothing was too much, and the stay was everything we expected and more!

Hi Gregoire, 
It's absolutely a fortune to stay in your lovely place! It was just a great experience for me and my girlfriend to spent our vacation. The location is fabulous, it actually makes me very wanna move to somewhere nearby And also Fabio is just a great person for providing all the info and support. Love the deco in your apartment especially the lightening and balcony. Big thank you again and I will definitely choose your place for the next journey.

Our stay was good, close to cafes and train. Big room, 2 bathrooms to share with other guest in the house. A bit noisy in the evening and night as a room a right above it and it's very  sensitive. Early check in was possible. Otherwise I can recommend the room.

Patrick and Christine's place is well located, close to food options and public transport. We enjoyed a delicious dinner and breakfast based on their recommendations, and found our way quickly into the city via the light rail.

Cathy was absolutely lovely. She made us feel welcome and completely at home! The room was immaculate - so clean and comfortable and plenty of space too. I loved the seperate entry to the room and so convenient being able to keep our car close by. Cathy looked after us so well, we are very grateful and look forward to returning some time soon!
Great inner city location with shops, transport and cafes handy.
Every detail was thought of. The place was super clean, really luxurious and had such beautiful views.

Lovely spacious apartment in the trees. 10 minutes walk to the beach.  Justine was a very generous host.  Thank you for the cereal, fruit and chocolates.  Highly recommended and will be back.  Thank you Justine.
Nice and clean, very friendly hosts
Great location with great views. Joseph was quick to respond to any questions.
Gregoire's place is spacious, quite, nicely designed, very convenient and you can expect a quality stay and enjoy great stay

Frances is an exceptional host, she takes great care of her guest, make sure everything is going well and enjoy conversation. She is always helpful if you needed anything. Her house is beautiful with a wonderful garden, very cosy, clean and close to the city (20 min walking distance to Hyde Park) in a  very nice neighborhood with restaurants, galleries and shops. It is a very good spirit house. 
I felt very comfortable and I am very thankful!a
Near (Website hidden by Airbnb) and considerate~~
Awesome location and well fitted out. Thanks Ziggy.
Desiree and Julian were wonderful hosts. The listing was beautifully decorated. Would absolutely love to stay here again during our next trip to Sydney.

We loved our stay here in Pott's Point! It is walking distance to King's Cross station and very accessible to the city center. Mariana's apartment is clean, well-equipped, and elegant. Best for couples as it might be a little tight for a family!

I stayed at Sarah's apartment for approx. 3 weeks and highly recommend it to others...  it's a really clean n tidy place... very spacious and a 2 minute walk from the beach...  The host was very helpful with getting back to me quickly when I needed her help a few times..  Many thanks Sarah !!

The Bream Penthouse was perfect for our mini-break. Close to the beach, restaurants, bars and cafes but far enough away to be nice and quiet. And luxury at such an affordable price!!!  Thank you guys for a fabulous stay. Will be back for sure.
非常愉快的旅行,房子可以看到海德公园,景色很好,楼下有便利店非常方便,距离悉尼的景点也可以走路到达,距离超市也很近,推荐

We really enjoyed our stay at Tracy's studio - it was very clean and comfortable, and we particularly appreciated having such a well equipped kitchen. Tracy's place is only a minute's walk to Narrabeen Lake, and also very close to local shops. A perfect place to stay to explore the northern beaches, or just to relax. Thanks again Tracy!

Susan is the perfect host..warm and friendly but unobtrusive. The cabin is private and comfortable, good shower and has easy access to all Sydney has to offer. Public transport is efficient and accessible. The aircraft noise varies so it's easy to ignore it. 
Leichhardt is an interesting area with plenty of restaurants and services. I would  certainly stay here again.
Michele has a beautiful, clean and tidy room for couple or friends to stay. The room located in a quiet, safe and convenient place. She offered a lot help during our stay. Very recommended~
Stylish, well-equipped apartment in great location. We really enjoyed the private balcony. Highly recommended.

A stunning granny annex that is a short distance from all the amenities that is needed in a busy city. The annex is spacious, light, modern and well presented. It only took 10 min to get to the train station and a further 20 min to get into the centre of the city. George and lucias granny flat felt private, secure and like a little retreat! We highly recommend staying here with or without children.
Spacious, comfortable apartment with everything you need for a relaxing time in Sydney. Having your own transport is an advantage.
great unit. clean and tidy

Terrific hosts! Very helpful and down to earth. Lovely apartment! Top location! Great parking space, and no noise apartment, peaceful throughout the day/night. Everything is there that you need. Would definitely stay again.
It was great to stay in this place. It was easy communicating with Lina and the neighbors are OK.
It was a pleasant stay at Kath’s place. Near to train station, not too far from town.
Staying at Jyoti's home was like staying in the home of an old friend. She and her family were welcoming, the accommodation was delightful and the neighbourhood was quiet and friendly.

Cathy's place was perfect for our stay in Avalon, just a short distance from all the restaurants and beaches we wanted to visit. The place was very clean and checking in/communicating with Cathy was made very easy. She even provided breakfast bits in the fridge for us which was a lovely touch. Highly recommend for a weekend stay!

Excellent location - perfect to enjoy a bit of "local" flavor but also only a short walk to the train station to explore more of Sydney. Also has a supermarket exactly opposite so extremely convenient. Vickie kept in touch with us and arranged to have the internet fixed very quickly when it failed even though she was not in Sydney at the time.

Simon and Nicole's apartment has everything you need and in a great location. Just a few minutes walk to Crown Street with loads of dining options and only 5 minutes or so walk to  Central Station. The Surry Hills is the best location to stay in Sydney. Definitely recommend staying in Simon and Nicole's apartment.
Nice spot would stay again

Jarmos apartment is fantastic, it was our 2nd stay here.
The communication and checkin is great
Apartment is clean, nice and fresh, everything you need and the view is amazing.the location is perfect, right next to the corso and beach.
Great place!

I feel like I truly have a second home in Sydney, Joyti and Uttam are such a nice couple, they treated me like their daughter, they walked me to the market place, which is super convenient from their place,  even drove me to the place I need to go, and we had such an amazing conversation:D; also grandma is really nice, she reminds me my own grandma, she truly cares about me if I have enough to eat, if the quilt is warm enough, etc. I am really grateful for what they did for me, and it is my privilege to stay in this house! Thank you, Joyti, Uttam and grandma, looking forward to visit you again!
I had my own toilet and bedroom, which is great!
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Neiafu! It was exactly what we were after. Peaceful, clean, quiet, and close to everything we needed. Will definitely stay here again if we're ever in Newport. :)

Angela and Geoff were very fast to respond to messages and check in was smooth. The space itself is very well appointed and spacious. We stayed here for our wedding accommodation and there were so many small details that made our stay really special. From the delicious bottle of french champagne, farmers market strawberries, bowl of fruit and yogurt, to the beautiful smelling fresh garden roses placed through out the property.
If you like a good bath then you will love this one, the outlook is onto a little tropical garden area and it was raining when I had mine and the sound of the raindrops on the leaves outside the window was so relaxing.
Overall our experience was perfect - this would have to be our favourite airbnb stay to date.
Thanks for making it so special Angela and Geoff!
Great location for airport travellers.

Nicely furnished little apartment with everything you need for a stay. Great kitchen facilities and well kitted out. For those that do not like noise, this is not the best option as it is a noisy street.

We really enjoyed our stay at Paul’s apartment! The space is very clean with a comfortable bed - exactly what we needed after long days of sightseeing in Sydney. It was very easy to access public transportation from Paul’s place, but if you’re up for a walk, it’s not far from downtown. Potts Point is a fun neighborhood and we’re glad we stayed here. We highly recommend Paul’s place if you’re traveling through Sydney!

My daughter and I loved staying at this gorgeous little apartment.  Although the space is small, the furniture and lay out work really well and the place was very tidy.  We felt comfortable in the space, especially because our host went out of her way to make sure we felt welcome. The location is fabulous - close to the train or ferry and within walking distance of the harbour bridge, Luna park, Kirabilli and Wendy's secret garden.  The view from the balcony is gorgeous and we were lucky enough to see fireworks on Saturday night and have some native birds come and visit us in the morning.  Thank you Millie! This is why I love airbnb!
Awesome location, great apartment with everything you need and a short walk to the ferry - Thanks Trent!
Great place to stay
Great location and very welcoming host.

Richard’s place was great and accomodated 7 of us very comfortably. Location is perfect near fish market darling harbour beautiful walk to the rocks and circular quay. I could live there forever. Thanks for having the pantry full with useful items and the fridge had a chocolate bar yum. I highly recommend this accommodation 
Liz

We had a wonderful week in Pittwater. The view from the unit is brilliant- and the presentation and comfort provided within the accommodation is excellent.Evelyn was a warm host, and her local knowledge very helpful. 
Thanks for a lovely holiday!

The host is super helpful and the house is immaculate.
Plenty of personality and cute finishing touches around the apartment ☺️
I definitely recommend,Thank you
Very clean

Gwen is very sweet! met with her briefly and she gave me good tips. The flat was cozy and clean, 5 mins walk to the beach and amazing restaurants: I loved BrownSugar right in front of their place. Staying here depends on what you are doing in Bondi. If it's to party and enjoy the nearby festivities until the wee hours of the night then this is perfect for you. I have to say that this place was a little too loud for my taste. Loud music from neighbors late at night and the busy street wasn't all that fun for an early sleeper like myself dealing with jet lag but it's out of Gwen's control so I just put my earplugs in and hoped for the best. Other than that, their place is perfectly located in safe area, and very close to the beach. Like I said it all depends on what you want out of your stay!
Fantastic apartment! Great location and amenities (with many thoughtful touches) Julia was a wonderful host, incredibly prompt and very helpful. Would highly recommend staying here.
Great location, clean and comfortable. Narelle was a fantastic host and very easy to communicate with and very helpful. Would highly recommend!
Beautiful place within walking distance of surfing in the heart of Manly Beach. Great for 1 - 2 people, you cannot go wrong!

Lovely little place.
Susan was a thoughtful and accommodating host.

The place is simply amazing, cozy and in a very modern area just above the shopping town center.
I highly recommend staying at Jared & Diana’s as they are wonderful hosts.

Carole and Steve's house comes highly recommended! The perfect place to stay when in Sydney! The check in was smooth and Steve was very helpful and friendly! We were also allowed to leave our bags in the house while we explore Sydney on our last day and pick it up just before our evening flight. Location is great!! Located near Newtown which is a very nice and cool place to explore. It is also located very near to a bus and train that leads you straight to anywhere you would like to explore in Sydney. The house is also such a treat to return to after a long busy day out. You will have a nice big bed to sleep in and a big bathroom all to yourself. Additionally, there is also a lounge that we were allowed to use all to ourself to make coffee or tea. Overall, very thankful to Steve and Carole and will definetely be back here if ever in Sydney :)

Fred and Bernadette's home is beautifully located right on the Bay.  We enjoyed warm weather which made morning walks a delight. Unfortunately, we did not meed Bernadette, though Fred greeted us warmly and we very much appreciated the vase of flowers, chocolate and fresh juice.

The home itself was immaculate and I appreciated the quality linen and towels.

We were offered a later check out if we would like it, which was very much appreciated.

My Mum, sister and myself had a wonderful time in Sydney enjoying Vivid, the theatre and an NRL game,  It was an extra bonus to get a bus directly to Circular Quay on the doorstep.

I would definitely stay here again, thanks Fred and Bernadette for a terrific break.
Nice and quiet neighborhood, pretty close to Bondi Beach by walk. The landlord is a very social and kind person.

Bailey’s home on Whale Beach is gorgeous. Palatial and nuzzled into a hill, it is essentially a vertical house with many bedrooms and lots of different common areas to relax, including three decks. The home is extremely comfortable and I highly recommend it. Plus, Bailey was incredibly nice and communicative while planning our stay. Overall a 10 out of 10!
Charming little space with modern touches within walking distance off all the beaches. Great host, even shared a Christmas gift as we stayed through the holiday! Would recommend.

I stayed with Cindy while working at the University in Sydney for few days. The apartment is cosy, tidy and comfortable, well located close to everything (including the uni, Coogee beach, restaurants, cafes, supermarket, and a short bus ride to the city centre). Cindy and Claudio are a very welcoming couple, smart and friendly.
The description was accurate and lovely location. We would definitely use this location and appartment again.
Great location!

Linda's place is lovely and have all the items that we will need to make ourselves comfortable. Linda is very responsive and easy to contact even though we never get to meet her. The only slight problem is that we need to climb a flight of stairs to get to the apartment so will need to carry the luggage. But other than that l, it was a nice stay.
My stay at Tota's house was Amazing! She is a really kind host with a beautiful family. Highly recommended!
Great spot, great location but also great value
The host canceled this reservation 81 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Julia’s flat is beautiful and perfectly functional for short or long stays. We enjoyed the outstanding location near Kings Cross, the kitchen/bathroom amenities, and the extra comfy bed!
Lovely place! Very convenient to central area (10 mins bus ride), safe place. Will definitely come back again
离机场近,入住顺利｡

Fantastic spot although the weather was not on our side!

I arrived late on the weekend, so Wayne and Kate were super accommodating with my friend John. Place is very secure, has an amazing outlook over the beach. Café’s and restaurants are a short walk away, and transport easily accessible. 

Great experience and would love to stay there again!

Maria's and Jerry's place is a real gem!! I've Airbnb-ed a lot in the past months here in Sydney and I must say this place was my absolute favourite of all :) It's a cosy piece of paradise with the most beautiful view, directly above the ocean, super huge bedroom that feels like its own little apartment, incredibly cute decorations, a super comfy huge bed, extremely lovely hosts and a neighbourhood and area that is truly feeling like a millionaires paradise :) Sitting in the pillows at the huge window, or hearing the ocean in bed and having a coffee, ocean breeze or swim right below the apartment felt like the ultimate vacation, I can't recommend it enough!! :) Thank you to both of you for sharing your little paradise :)
Outstanding residence. Perfect location. Stylish. Spotless. Bradley is communicative and easy going. Definitely consider staying again when I'm back in Sydney.
Great, neat flat with everything you need in a beautiful pocket of Sydney.
Marcella's welcome was very enthusiastic and warm. Her home is in a very quiet, safe area and very well positioned to the beach, corner shops, cafes and restaurants.

Sam is such a great host who went above and beyond to help make sure my needs are accommodated. That does not mean travelers can be demanding of her. Be nice to this charming lady! Lol! The place is also very convenient with a nearby mall and bus station. Suitable for single or couples traveler.
Great value for what you pay!
great stay, great location, excellent host

Mike is a friendly and great guy. The apartment is clean and in a great location. Lots of nice cafes and restaurants near by. Room isn't great with sound proof against the street noise and the place does not look as new as the pictures but overall good value.
位置好,房内各种设备齐全,房东热情回应迅速,有可能还会再住｡

We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Tamarama from the spectacular view to the furnishings of the apartment which made our stay so special. We were greeted by yummy bread, fruit and other essentials which was greatly appreciated. The location was ideal for exploring Sydney with many great walks and beaches close by. Lizzie was a delightful host and we are already thinking about our next visit .

Mariana's apartment is wonderful. Not only for it's location, really close to many of the most important amenities of Sydney but also for the great job that Mariana did with it. It has absolutely everything that you can imagine or you may need. The design is wonderful and beautiful and all the appliances are brand new and the best quality.
We would definitely go back and stay there again and again.

What a perfect introduction to air bnb. Susan is the most welcoming host and from the moment we arrived we felt at home. The immaculate studio is set in a beautiful garden in your own private oasis. Susan could not do enough for us and her attention to detail made our experience flawless.  The fresh flowers on the bedside, the organic range of breakfast treats & crisp comfortable linen made it hard to leave. The location is an easy walk to the local cafés, transport & beach. Everything is at your finger tips. We cannot thank Susan enough for making our stay the perfect few days away, we look forward to coming back.

Linda left us the keys in the letter box for us to checked ourselves in.  It is a lovely place and it's same as the pictures posted. Quiet area, only few minutes walk from the train station! There's also a garage for our rented car, which makes it so convenient for us. Linda's place have basically everything, from laundry liquid to heater. The lovely note and OZ's all time favorite TimTam was a great bonus! Clean and nice place to live in!

It goes without saying, Gavin was a great host and guide. We stayed with him for two weeks, and couldn't have asked for a better place. His home is lovely, clean and there was always plenty of fresh fruits for breakfast. The bed was really comfortable and the room was quite  convenient. Upon our arrival, after 30+ hours of flights and airport, a great home cooked meal and a bottle of wine was waiting for us. With all his great tips about Sydney and the area (he would sometimes plan a great day trip for us), he really made us feel at home and welcomed! Si vous passez par Sydney, vous devez absolument passez chez Gavin. Son accueil et la connaissance de sa ville native, font de lui un hôte extraordinaire! 
Gavin, best wishes, if your ever pass by Montreal, you are more than welcome to come see us!
Gabriel & Ngoc-An
Anytime you can access this apartment do it, especially for longer stays ideal for the city and further afield
Shuang's place was super clean and convenience to go to airport.
good place
Nice place would go there again
Nice place, beautifully renovated. Handy to down town Manly and the ferry. My room even had a desk which was perfect for catching up with some work.
A really lovely room hosted by a great couple. Good location just a couple of bus stops away from darling harbour. The apartment is really cosy with some lovely cosy touches.

Ben’s place is in a lively, busy Sydney neighbourhood. There’s always lots going on and plenty of great places to eat, drink and socialise. We recommend Messina for amazing ice cream and Bourke St Bakery - both within walking distance.
The apartment itself is cosy, compact and ideal for solo travellers or couples who don’t need too much space. It’s bright, stylishly decorated and has all the amenities you’ll need for a few days in the city.
Nice apartment to stay for a few nights. own bathroom and plenty of room with amazing views. Terry was great. Very easy to be picked up from the airport and dropped back. Would stay again.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a fantastic time at Angela’s. Travelling with our 22-month old toddler, we appreciated the extra amenities - toys, travel cot, high chair and a stocked pantry. Angela even bought bread, milk and yogurt for us before we arrived. How thoughtful! 

The apartment itself was very clean, tastefully furnished and well cared for. Both the outdoor and indoor space was toddler-friendly. Our son could easily occupy himself minutes on end in the garden! We also enjoyed putting some beautiful, fresh produce on the barbie. Dinner sorted! (The apartment has a small open kitchen. The stove is too small for any serious cooking so bbq is the easier option.)

In terms of location, the house is walking distance from the beach. The road is not flat though and there are a few steps of stairs to access the beach. One can walk to the town centre via the beach but we always drove as we would often come back with shopping.

All in all, we’d highly recommend Angela’s apartment to any couple or small family travelling to Sydney in the summer.

Great master bedroom with in built bathroom.
I’d recommend to anyone visiting Epping for a stay.
The host canceled this reservation 182 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
This is a great place with plenty of space. If you had a family then this would be awesome

Oliver’s apartment is conveniently located and has good quality equipment. He is also very responsive. However it appears that he has not paid attention to the cleanliness aspect and we found the place to be quite unclean with used unwashed bed sheets and covers and smelly towels. The supplies were also running low and we had to replenish them (though he did reimburse us). The trash can had something sticky and gooey in it so we just used trash bags without the dustbin. The tea supplies were past expiry date. All in all an unpleasant experience - wouldn’t go there again. Oliver says his cleaners let him down! Anyway, he refunded the cleaning fees, but frankly I expected a clean place to begin with with a so called “5 Star” host. Spoiled our trip. Never again!
Lilian and her Mum were very accommodating allowing me to check-in early. Her place was clean, tidy and close to transport - very convenient!
Paul and Judith were very welcoming. Always happy to help. They even lend us their opal cards for public transportation. A really nice place to stay  when you go visit Sydney for a couple of days.
Great location!!! Was close to everything we needed but still felt quiet and private. The upstairs deck was the cherry on top!
Great place and Jenny is a lovely host. We had a great time in Sydney!

This was by far one of my favourite AirBnbs. It is central, lively and has everything you could need all in a cosy and open little apartment. Thanks so much for letting me stay. I will definitely be looking for this place next time I'm in Sydney.

Awesome apartment with everything needed.  The apartment is nicely decorated, very comfortable bed, well equipped kitchen and a nice shower.  Great neighborhood and great location for exploring Sydney.

Mariana, the host, was very responsive and helpful during my stay.   I highly recommend Mariana's apartment.
Super host very good! Her house wonderful and location.

I stayed at Brendan's place and had a wonderful stay. Brendan is very helpful, responsive and even took me to the tour around the neighborhood to familiar myself with the location. The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood but it is  just behind the main road leading to the beach, offering variety of cafes, bars and restaurants.  All you need to do is simply take a leisure walk. In terms of public transportation, there is a nearby bus stop at the main road that can connect you to the Bondi Train Station, and from here you can take train ride to the city. All in all, it is a convenient place for me!

You will never get a reply on time from the host.!!
He is very laid back in replying to messages and unresponsive to any problems you face.
He will always find a way to avoid answering you to your problems by replying irrelevant answers.!!
Good location.

An apartment with stunning views within easy reach of Darling Harbour, Circular key and the main shopping areas. Close to train stations and local buses. The apartment was clean and tidy with everything you need for a short break. The only downside for us was how noisy it could be from the street level through the night, considering you were 34 floors up. The whole building was very quiet internally.

Truly excellent value and convenient access to airport. Was <$10 Uber to International airport, and at 1/3 the price of airport hotel. Shuang was great at communicating and the check-in/check-out process was very simple. House is clean and pretty, with big front yard and gate. While short walk from/to bus station to airport, if coming/leaving at night, do not take the bus (a bit too long of a walk at night in unfamiliar neighborhood). Apartment was very clean and tidy, but gaps in the door led to two cockroaches. Ultimately very worth the price we paid.

Amazing place was spacious and great value. Close to shops and transport. 

Only one thing negative; the traffic could be heard from the bedrooms even with ear plugs on.
Great apartment, nice and clean, in a great location.  Instructions and communication for checkin were great, making our stay a breeze.

We had a great stay during NYE at Eduardo’s place. Nice apartment with all the facilities needed. Bus stop very close. The bus brings you to Bondi Junction, from which you can come everywhere in the city. Would recommend.
Danny’s place suited our needs really well.

Location perfect, very convenient.  Coffee shops and stores available as needed. Flat beautifully furnished with artistic design. Thoughtful snacks, cereal, coffee and tea provided. Washer and dryer simplified visit. Top notch security. Friendly welcome and check out. Would love to stay every year.
Great place to stay, especially if you have kids.
Travelled solo to sydney and it was nice to have a great cosy place to stay in!!! The place is super clean and the hosts are so welcoming!!! Cant wait to be back the next trip ^^

Perfect if you enjoy your own company which I do.  Ideally situated for my shopping trip to Ikea.  Really comfy bed. Couple of minutes walk to King Street for shops, bars , restaurants.  On street parking was a bit of a mission later in the evening due to diners but earlier on its a breeze.
Was a great stay at this little beach pad. We had all we needed well located to the best end of the beach. Simple clean private access made it more like a beach house
Rob's place is definitely a awesome gem! Great location and an even better host. Will definitely recommend Rob's place for others to visit. Thank you for making our visit to Sydney an awesome one.

Margaret & John’s hospitality was wonderful & the two dogs as welcoming committee! The outdoor kitchen, fireplace and the train itself are beautiful and the photos don’t do it justice. I’m hoping to send through some new photos we took of the train to further show what’s on offer. Only a short walk away is a river for swimming and there’s a few paths for short bush walks. Anyone interested in the local history will get a kick out of some of the ‘Easter eggs’ around the train- with commemorative photos. Definitely recommend getting the fire going and cooking outdoors- bring bug spray! Would recommend to anyone- and looking forward to staying again.
Neat, tidy, stylish and convenient. A great place with a equally great host.

Great host to stay with. Very private place with lovely views over the water.

Easy to access and great location.

A lovely comfortable and clean room was so nice to be in. The house is great. Got to chat with other guests and really handy to the yummy restaurants and transport. Reasonable price. Would not hesitate to recommend to others.
Great location in Manly, lovely and clean and Ziggy was very easy to deal with. Loved it and would certainly come back!

Very spacious - our family of four with two grown up kids really stretched out. The apartment was nice and clean, with good amenities, and at the fourteenth floor, we had gorgeous views. The location was truly awesome as well - we could walk to most of the local attractions. The apartment was a bit pricey, but well worth the money. We would stay there again!
Great location,  clean and hosts very friendly.
Fabulous private apartment.
Shuang房子離Wolli creek station 其實不算遠,回家前重可以去market shop ,房子潔静每曰都打掃公用地方､日後再到訪悉尼一定先book shuang 房子,房子很熱賣不一定有空房
A great apartment - clean, modern, central and with a gre

This studio apartment is very practical. In the main space there's a bed, sofa, plus table and two chairs, and there's also a kitchen and bathroom. The kitchen is modern and well-designed, and is fully-supplied with equipment, utensils, crockery, cutlery, tea and coffee, spices, etc. The bathroom is unrenovated but the shower is hot with good pressure, and the space works well. The bed was comfortable.

This top-floor apartment is not overlooked, and has a pleasant urban outlook. The location is supremely convenient to Uni of Sydney, and just far enough from Parramatta Road that noise is not a problem. There are frequent buses nearby, on several routes. Next time I won't bring a car. There are only a few on-site parking spaces, and when these are taken or reserved you may need to park some distance away if you need unrestricted parking.
Kate was extremely helpful and the location was amazing. Highly recommend.

Susan and Greg's place was perfect for our stay. It was cozy and warm, and private. Greg greeted us when we arrived, and provided a map of local options, and even some breakfast foods and snacks for us while we stayed at the studio -- so sweet! We love Bronte and would absolutely stay here again.
Hugo's is a great space, everything you could possibly need for 1-2 people, amazing location with everything at your fingertips and amenable hosts. I had a great stay and would recommend to others!
Herman is a warm and friendly host, I enjoyed staying with him:-) cosey apartment, close to beach and restaurants...super spot
Wonderful location and responsive hosts!!
Hernan was extremely quick to respond to my messages and was extremely hospitable. $20aud Uber ride from the airport - perfect spot for flying in/out of Sydney. Would highly recommend!
Good experience!
Beautiful little cottage in a great location near secluded beaches

Location was perfect as it's 5 mins walk away from Redfern Station which has trains to many lines. Lots of university students walking around so it's more lively, though the street it's on is peaceful. 5 mins walk another way brings you to lovely cafes (Cafe Ella was my fav for coffee and pastries). Inside the home, it's spacious and cosy with full amenities. Appreciated the electric heated bed during winter. Linda has also been very helpful and responsive when I've got questions on the fly. Thank you!
Beautiful little studio. Loved it. Would definitely use again
Great location and cool house

This is my 2nd time stayed there, and this apt is still amazingly wonderful. The view is really good, nice ambiance, clean and quiet. It's really family friendly.

The host also very kind, they prepared everything nicely before we came to the apt. They really cooperative and helpful.

Last time i came, they even put welcoming fresh fruits & milk.

Definitely will be back there again when i come to Syd!

The room is really tidy and comfortable. The location is perfect, very near to the central station. Gavin is a nice person, very warmhearted and considerate. We will definitely choose there again when next time we come to Sydney!
Excellent location with a short stroll to the circular quay and the opera house. Also thanks to the great host - I left something in the fridge after checking out and Ellie
Ben人非常好,提供了很好的帮助｡房间明亮整洁舒适,在市中心位置,去哪里都可以步行｡乘坐公共交通也很方便｡
The house was amazing, as were the views. A really lovey weekend with friends. Wish we could have stayed longer.

Susan was very welcoming and allow us to check-up earlier in the morning as the room wasn't occupied the day before. The only cons is that the flat is in the Sydney Airport way. So it van be noisy 1 or 2 days per weeks (Noice sharing, the airport way s changing every 2 days). Thank you Susan, I recommand this place.

David is a great host. Wish i had more time to get to know him :) Apartment was spec and just as shown in the pictures. GREAT location. David also was very helpful and always attended to anything i asked for. Overall a great experience.

Nicole had fantastic communication leading up to and during our stay. The apartment was much bigger than represented in the photos and was in a perfect location accessing event venues around Olympic Park. Would easily recommend and stay again... Thanks for making our trip so easy Nicole !!

Wir haben die letzten Tage unserer Australienreise bei Craige und Leonie verbracht und hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in Sydney. Die Unterkunft ist super gelegen und ein guter Ausgangspunkt, um Sydney zu erkunden. Man kann den tollen Bondi to bronte walk machen oder von Rose bay aus mit der Fähre nach Central Sydney. Craige und Leonie waren super gastfreundlich und haben viele wertvolle Tipps gegeben. Wir haben uns sehr wohl in ihrem großen schönen Haus gefühlt und wären viel zu gerne länger geblieben! Vielen Dank nochmal!

Wow! What a lovely house! Freshly painted, beautiful old floorboards, ( they are floorboards so a bit squeaky!)  clean minimalist furnishings, and in a QUIET area of Randwick about 17 minutes from the airport, and straight down Coogee Bay Rd  to the ocean. You have the SPOT around the corner, and the best Japanese, on Belmore Rd ( TEN). Best of all there is a garage, because parking in this area is a big problem.  Thank you so much Simone and John for your kindness in accommodating us. We had a lovely stay.

This is a great, well presented apartment. It is located in the heart of Sydney within easy walking distance of everything. Gavin is a great host keeping in really good communication all the time. He was very flexible and allowed us to have a great relaxing stay. Highly recommended.

Amazing view, location & setup!

Perfect little beach getaway & so close to Bondi beach & restaurants. 
Would stay there again in a heartbeat!
Thanks for the hospitality

A gorgeous apartment in the perfect location. Quiet and scenic, right on the beach, but just a minutes walk to all of great restaurants, cafes and shops that Bondi has to offer. Also super-handy to public transport which made it easy to explore wider Sydney from this location.

Un appartement idéal placé et très bien décoré. Très agréable à vivre !
Le seul bémol : le manque d'isolation vis à vis du bruit dans le couloir et des voisins.

This is a great little place. We spent 3 nights here and loved it. It's situated in a suburban area, about 10 minutes walk down the hill to Bronte beach and to the path which is part of the sublime Coastal Walk which runs from Coogee to Bondi. Its also about 200m easy walk to the local shops where there are several great restaurants, a fabulous sourdough bakery, a pharmacy and delicious coffee. This is also where you catch the bus which runs very regularly and goes into the city and to Central via Bondi Junction. We just left our car parked outside the house and used the bus during our stay which we found very easy and convenient.
The accommodation is a small separate studio tucked up the back of Susan and Greg's beautiful garden. It has a generous paved area outside with seating which is under a beautiful big old tree which must be gorgeous in summer. 
The position of the studio creates a sense of space and privacy. The studio itself is small but roomy. It is fresh, modern, tastefully decorated, exceptionally clean and very comfortable. Every detail has been thought of, from the shampoo and conditioner supplied, to the iron and mini ironing board, the spare towels, the beach towels, tissues, crockery and cutlery, to the lovely simple breakfast, coffee, and herbal teas. There is a reverse cycle A/C, TV and radio. The bed was very comfortable and the shower was great.
Susan was lovely to deal with, friendly and helpful, and very quick to respond. She and Greg were very welcoming and helpful but then left us to ourselves which is what we like. The studio feels private and separate from the house and is very quiet. We would highly recommend this studio and would be more than happy to stay here again.

Location: It is very good location only a few minutes from Kings Cross station, so you can go everywhere in a couple of minutes. 
Apartment: Clean, comfy and has everything that you can need.
Owner: Very friendly,  has a helpful attitude and assists you in whatever you need.
So triple check = 100% recommended
Clean trendy apartment, great location with amazing local tips on local eateries and attractions. Hosts are very quick to respond and more than accommodating.

Simon and Nicole's place is tiny and clean.

They are easy to communicate with. Although we haven't meet them, but they have responded to every message and provides us some suggestions.

The location is great, 5-10 minutes walk from central station, and 5-10 minutes walk to Crown Street, where the pubs, bars and cafes is located in.
Their guidebook is awesome as well.

If I come to Sydney next time, I will stay in Simon and Nicole's place again.

We enjoyed our stay at this lovely property. Quiet location with a nice private outdoor area adjacent to the garden. Facilities were excellent and the hostess was great to deal with. We would definitely stay here again.
Very nice air B and B.  Would recommend
The location was perfect for us. The view was awesome and Yang was generous and considerate. We would stay again!
Paul's place is very central to the Ferry, shops and cafes. The heater was cosy and beds & pillows very comfortable. Would recommend anyone going to Manly to look at Pauls place

Great place right on Tamara Beach. Very cosy and great host who kept in contact prior and through our visit making it very comfortable for us. Easy check in, nice walking areas & very close to cafe's Bondi and surrounding beaches, Bondi Junction for shopping and an easy drive to City. Big spacious apartment with beautiful views and good entertaining areas. And a nice day bed (boat) overlooking beach for the perfect afternoon nap.

The bedrooms were comfortable with lots of storage and air conditioning. The bathroom was clean and for longer stays there is a washing machine. The lounge and kitchen and spacious offering a great area to entertain. We made good use of the BBQ too.

The kitchen is well stocked with herbs and spices and all cooking equipment which we had access to.

Treen was fully accommodating with arrival times and any questions we had.

A great stay had by all!
cool place to stay and near everything.

I went to Sydney on a business trip and decided I wanted to get a taste of the coast rather than city. Best decision I ever made. The property is right on Tamarama beach, walking distance from Bondi and Bronte and 20 mins from the city center. The property itself was immaculate and very tasteful. Highly recommend.
Great place! Super close to the airport and great hospitality!
A nice, modern apartment, great view of the beautiful Hills suburb. It suited our family of five perfectly and we enjoyed our stay.
Very thoughtful host - providing both a porta-cot and a high chair for my little one...made the stay all that more simpler and easier.

A welcoming touch was some fresh fruit and a jug of milk in the fridge. A quiet tree-lined street, with a few planes flying over in the evenings (not-too-loud). An easy walk to the restaurants of King Street. We'll stay again.

The apartment is located near Bondi beach, bus services into the city and as stated has good views. Fans were provided to accommodate for no air conditioning. Generally okay and provided a base and adequate. We did find a number of shortcomings which, from a basic starting point left us disappointed. A bottle of wine and some biscuits were there to welcome us.

The place listed a single bed that converted into a king size bed. It doesn't and is more of a child bed. Not great for our adult son who stayed with us. Rather a long list of do & don'ts (don't wear shoes, don't open certain windows, do put on humidifier, do open doors,  caution with worktops etc) suggested a higher standard of apartment than  it turned out to be. The cooker and facilities were not brilliant and no seating on the balcony as shown in the photos).

While not bad it is basic and we were very put off cooking when we found rotting food in the microwave. No TV unless you have iphone. Can be noisy if windows left open. We paid a high price, accepting it was over New Year, it was not the standard we thought we had booked.
Amazing location!

The apartment was lovely and had a lot of privacy. Love that the view from the bed was the garden itself and there are tables outside you can have breakfast at. Amenities were provided and Susan even stocked the fridge with breakfast. Susan was very helpful and even remembered to book a cab for me to the airport when I completely forgot. Neighbourbood is wonderful and safe. Location is near the beach (only 5min walk) and walking distance to the supermarket, restaurants and cafe. Great stay and a highlight during my trip to Australia. Bronte and Susan's apartment is highly recommended!

Simon & Nicole's place is perfect for a couple or individual traveler heading to Sydney. GREAT location, super clean place, lovely terrace for breakfast. The WiFi is great, perfect for a working holiday. Nicole and Simon were both so helpful with local tips as well as making sure we had all of the amenities we could ask for. Another perfect Airbnb belonging to likeminded lovers of travel that reminds you why you're a part of this community in the first place.
Great location but a car is necessary for most travellers.

What an awesome place. View. Location. Just perfect.  Hugo and Pam excel in their service to their guests. From communication and directions to on the spot support for any unforseen help needed. They were great. Steve Jackson
Felix’s place was great and family friendly!
great place. quiet neighborhood an easy train from the airport with easy access to downtown or anywhere you want to go via a few different bus options

It is my first time been to Sydney. Everything just wonderful really good start from this apt, just my journey really comfortable and really just like wifi name there is no place like home ,the renovation is totally my dish. It's just so good , and so many nice details , opal cards  food and travel guide tea coffee shampoo everything I need here , and when I was in the name. Navieen walks like a cat try not make any noises on the staircase  which it's really make me feel touched. Love it. Was going to book another 3days when I back in Sydney , but all booked out this month. But when I have a chance. I need to go back here play with Felix have a nice sleep!
房间厨具齐全,客厅超大,有间卧室有些味道

Our stay at Wyatt and Julie 's home was fantastic. The house is clean and cosy, it feel's like home! It is close to the city (15min by bus) but you can spend a real quite and relaxing night.
We Had the chance to spend some time with Julie and she is such à nice person! "Don't be afraid to ask" that' s what she taught us. And indeed, she does her best to Help, provides pieces of advise .. she now is more than a host, but a friend ! We did not see Wyatt much, but he was very welcoming and cheerful! 
If you are planning a trip to Sydney you should definitely stop at their lovely house !

Fantastic apartment, fantastic location, fantastic hosts! Everything was thought of for us and we had a wonderful stay. The best equipped apartment we have ever stayed in...enough of everything, and more!
 thanks guys!  xx

This was my first Airbnb stay, and what a great start. No nasty surprises, the accommodation was just as described, comfy, clean, great almost inner city location and affordable. The information sheet provided with the accommodation was perfectly understandable & helpful for anyone who is not a Sydney local, like me. And the little touches that make it special were unexpected but lovely...the Lindor Balls, the Frangipani toiletries, all add to a relaxing experience.Duncan and Ashlee were fabulous hosts who are happy to be as involved as you want them to be and have a wealth of info on many things, as well as the odd anecdote or two. Very easygoing and personable, couldn't fault them! Couldn't be happier with my first visit, and hopefully I will have the opportunity to stay with them again in the future, now that I've fallen in love with Rozelle just a little bit more.
Good location. Cozy and Warm house.

Victoria was a wonderful host, so hospitable and kindly anticipated our needs while in Sydney. The apartment was beautifully well kept and the location was perfect - quaint locale with convenient shops, cafes and restaurants a stone's throw away without having that crowded or city-like feel.  Zinc, across the street, was our favorite breakfast spot during the visit.  Would definitely choose to stay again on any future visits!

Sam & Penny (His wife) are so gracious and generous with their time & hospitality. The room was as described, very comfortable space to stay in, all shared zones are clean & tidy. This place is the definition of bang for your buck, and you'll make two lovely friends along the way too.
全程自住住宿离开,非常自由,就是宿舍隔音有些差,能听到隔壁说话声,总体感觉非常好!
It was truely wonderful to stay at Frances&Brunos. The house is really beautiful and they put a big effort in being the perfect hosts. Would recommend it anytime for a stay in Sydney.
非常棒的地理位置,可以直接走着去机场｡房间也非常干净,一尘不染｡shuang的妈妈会流利的中文,交流方便｡推荐!

It was good to stay
Thanks
Excellent base to explore Sydney and surrounding areas.

Our stay was absolutely wonderful. The beds were very comfortable, there we snack on the table for us when we arrived and a note with suggested places to eat around the area. George and Lucia were very responsive and I would strongly recommend booking if in the area :)
너무 좋았고 다음에 또 오고 싶습니다

Comfy bed, grey shower 
Really close to Newton main shops. 
Enjoyed our stay
Thanks Michelle

Fantastic apartment in a fabulous location. Beware there are no fly screens on any window and given the location in the bush, with a pond outside one main window, mosquitoes were fierce. It was also disappointing that there was no hot water.

Michy’s place is a real gem in a secluded and peaceful spot.
Right across the road is Pittwater for a swim and around the corner is Forage for a great coffee! 
Michy is an amazing host and was so hospitable and kind! A great place to stay we couldn’t recommend more!
Great location. Clean and affordable. Host very prompt with replying and accomodating for requests. Would highly recommend

Great apartment.  We were amazed at what Jenny provided. It was not only a generously sized, lovely decorated and sparkling apartment with great aircon and perfect location to beach and public transport but Jenny was professional and  charming. From brand new beach towels to beautiful soft and large bathroom towels and crisp, ironed lovely bed linen to a fridge with essentials and a larder with coffee, tea, biscuits it felt like a home away from home.  The price service ratio is phenomenal. No wonder she’s booked well in advance.  We already recommended her to friends from overseas.
Great little place in central location. Helpful hosts. Thank you!

I travelled with 7 companions and we thoroughly enjoyed staying at this property.
Location trumps everything - especially in a city like Sydney - and this house is perfectly situated and really good value for money.
Supermarkets, pubs, restaurants, night life, the CBD, opera house and harbour are only a short walk away.
The views from the east facing bedrooms are spectacular, both with good sized private balconies to enjoy.
Jeremy is a delightful and responsive host.  He was always quick to respond to messages and to answer any questions. 
I was worried about parking because this house doesn't have a carport or driveway. But Jeremy has an arrangement with a nearby car wash that charges only $20 a day.  It was convenient and hassle-free.   When comparing other options for a group of 8 or so, this house is excellent value for money.  At around $60 a head per night, you won't find anything in Sydney for that price - let alone a gorgeous house like this!

Appartement idéalement situé à a peine 5min à pied de la station king cross. Parfait pour rayonner dans la ville en utilisant les transports en communs. Sinon, à pied, il faut compter 30min pour rejoindre le CBD, ce qui est plutôt cool ! 
Contrairement à ce que certaines personnes m'avaient dit, le quartier de king cross ne craint pas. Je ne me suis jamais sentie en insécurité, même tard le soir.
L'appartement est très sympa, lit confortable, grande cuisine, télévision, machine à laver pour 3$ au Rez de chaussé. Le seul inconvénient est la baignoire qui commence à être vieille et rouillée, mais cela reste amplement suffisant pour prendre une douche. 
L'hôte est très sympathique et attentionné, donne de bonnes recommandations et s'assure que tout se passe bien et que l'on ne manque de rien par message. 
Je recommande ce logement !

Wayne and Kate were really nice and available to answer all our questions within minutes of asking them. The apartment is basic, but it had everything we needed, was clean and the location and views were amazing!
Great place would highly recommend

What a gem!! Perfect accommodation for our weekend in Sydney. Cabin was spotlessly clean and Steven and his little family made us feel very welcome. Location perfect, within walking distance from great cafes and the train station.

Blissful Bronte was such a beautiful place to say. Only a 5 minute walk to beautiful Bronte beach. Jenny was so lovely and helpful. There was nice touches to the place - including some milk and English muffins which was so nice considering we didn't get there until late. The place/amenties/furniture were all lovely and immacutely clean. A walk from bronte  to bondi is must. Jenny recommended having lunch at the Bondi icebergs (casual bistro area) which we did. We are so glad she told us about it as we had no idea you could eat there and it was lovely with a beautiful view! It is also super easy to get transport from the street or beach. Will definitely be recommending blissful bronte to friends and family!
Really nice little place, and Kristin was really friendly and helpful. I had a problem with the wifi and they got it fixed straight away. Good communication, too.

Just like home!
Linda's apartment is perfect in every sense. Is close to train station, markets and coffee shops in a lovely neighborhood. Beside that, the house have everything we need, from laundry, kitchen, living to an amazing bed.
I stayed one night long at this place. The host is very supportive, takes care about all requests, the communication was very good! Thank you again for letting me stay at your place!

Can't say enough good things about our stay at Susan's guesthouse! The place is beautifully decorated and was very clean when we arrived. Everything we could think of was provided, including a map of the area & info on restaurants  (5 minute walk to restaurants and the coast!). Susan was always easy to get in touch with & quick to respond when we had any questions. Above all else, Susan & Greg's hospitality was what stood out the most. They were so thoughtful (bringing us bagels one morning, lending us peroxide when my husband came down with an ear infection). I don't think we've had a more pleasant Airbnb experience. Highly recommend staying here!

Angela was a fantastic host! She was very friendly and responded to any questions that I had.

The apartment was nice, clean, and most of all comfortable! It had all the amenities that I needed. Wifi worked perfectly. Great location as it was within walking distance to many sights such as the Rocks, Opera House, Harbor Bridge, Darling Harbor, and George Street (shopping district). It was also conveniently located near the train station if I needed to head someplace far and to the ferries (that I took to Taronga Zoo and Manly Beach).

Would highly recommend Angela as a host and her apartment to others!

This place was lovely and was great for our family with young kids.  It would also be a fabulous entertaining space out the back decking and backyard for entertaining a group.  The house has two living areas, the front room and back deck which is well contained and warm for day to day meals and living also.  Both the caretakers and owners were very attentive to our requests and communication.  This place has everything you need to be very comfortable.  The place was super clean and tidy, everything as the pictures show.  We loved our stay, thank you!
Loved it. Such a great location. Highly recommended. Great host.
I didn't see too much of Cindy or Miki, but they were both lovely! Great apartment, super comfy bed and spotlessly clean. Thanks guys!
Everything was great. Clean, convenient, good communication. Everything you could need and all for a great price.

We'd like to thank our hosts for a wonderful stay!  The apartment was as beautiful as advertised, and just as private as we'd hoped.  The sauna worked wonderfully, and the beach towels were huge and thick! Don't underestimate the value of the birds and the books!  We definitely recommend this place.  Pittwater paradise indeed.  :)

Karl and Nicole

We felt very welcomed by Susan, especially since we weren't sure what time we were arriving. She was very accomodating to all of our needs. We decided to leave early due to personal responsibilities but we enjoyed our stay nonetheless :).

The house was in a perfect location, super close, and walkable to everything. Suzanna was really nice and easy to work with. She gave us a lot of helpful local suggestions and let us check in really early. The house was really clean and all the bathrooms have been remodeled. It's an older home that has very steep stairs and some creaky doors but overall a great place for a large group!
Don was friendly and helpful, would highly recommend...
We had a fantastic time in Cath's beautiful Garden Studio.  Cath's freshly baked bread was amazing & the freshly laid eggs superb! Highly recommended.

Millie's apartment is just as advertised. Very clean and tidy but it got a bit cold at night due to no heating system. Millie was prepared though and supplied two thick blankets which made up for it. Overall great experience and very close to the opera house and bridge.

Our stay at Dino's apartment was fantastic. The lead-up was straightforward with clear communication between Dino and us. The apartment is very well appointed, with more than meets the eye . The main bed was the most comfortable we have slept in! Location is brilliant with coffee shops, markets and transport close by. Great walks in the early morning around Rushcutters Bay and one morning we walked into the CBD via Wooloomooloo, the gardens and the Opera House. Rick managed our arrival and departure in a friendly and welcoming manner, and I would have no hesitation in recommending this apartment - I am sure we will stay there again.
Hernan was a great host..we didn't cross paths all that much during my stay however everything I needed was there.Thank you mate! Highly recommend a great place to stay!
Great location, great host!

Posto fantastico per chi viaggia  , chi Cerca una vera casa. Comodo, pulito, molto famigliare. Agata e Jason sempre la pronti per dare una mano in qualsiasi momento. Posizione no ne centrale, ma con centinaia di pullman si muove bene dappertutto. Questa zona “Asiatica” come negozi e locali maggior parte ci sono solo loro. 4 banche 2 minuti da casa. Centro circa 20 min in pullman. Le spiagge 15, 20 ,30 minuti: scegli dove vai ogni giorno ( una nuova).Aeroporto vicino( ma nessun fastidio ,o rumore forte) . Letto comodo , tutto molto bello. Gatto e cane sono simpatici.  Grazie Agata e Jason per tutto! Sono stata bene ! Nataliya
Absolutely loved this place, perfect for what we needed. Cozy little place and close to shops and beach.
It was very clean nice location and easy to find would recommend this place to anyone thank you
Cheryl’s place is wonderful, we had a great time. Communication with her is very easy. Would recommend the place to anyone looking for a peaceful weekend in lovely Bundeena

Great location and home. You're walking distance to everything in Bondi and near the bus. They have a huge backyard and a large kitchen, giving you plenty of space to cook what you want. One night Lee and Craige brought us bowling which was really fun!! Highly recommend

Suzanna was very responsive, the terrace’s location is very convenient to the city, close to some great pubs. The house was very clean and accommodated 7 adults and a toddler, will definitely consider rebooking.
帮朋友订的,朋友说房东人超好,很热情,棒棒哒!!

The flat was very clean and I appreciated the tea and breakfast materials Allen left for me. The bedroom was nice and clean and the bed was very comfortable, plus there was a heater as it was quite cold in Sydney! The flat is about a 12 minute walk from Bondi Junction, which is great for shopping and transport connections. It's a nice quiet home in a safe neighbourhood.

Although comfortable for my stay, the room pictured isn't entirely accurate - there was natural light from the skylight but the window itself actually looks out onto a grey brick wall about 6 inches away - not the pretty view pictured. 

The flat has a well equipped kitchen and amenities you'd need for a leisure or business stay (ironing, wifi, table).
Loved staying here! It was such a beautiful place! Can't wait to visit again
We really enjoyed our stay. Amazing views all the way out to the ocean. Pamela and Hugo were very quick to respond and very accomodating when it came to checking in early.
Overall nice place and good host

It was a pleasure to be a host at Adrian’s house. The house is located in the city center close to everything, including the opera house by 10 minutes walking. Great public transport. The roomates were very friendly. The room has a great balcony for summer and everything you might need. Thank-you guys for hosting me. I miss you.

I stayed with Jonny for 3 weeks while I was waiting for my new apartment to become available. He is a great host and, more importantly, an extremely friendly and fun guy to hang out with! The place is clean and tidy and very well located to enjoy everything that Manly has to offer.
Handy location for walks and short drive to avalon shops.

Staying at Ben's place was fantastic! The view was perfect and the apartment itself was great. It was right in the middle of everything and was full of awesome geeky paraphernalia. Ben's guidebook was also very useful and I greatly appreciated having it. I would definitely choose this as a place to stay again if I get a chance to return to Sydney.

Location and view can't be beat. It's across the street from Bondi beach, right next to all the restaurants and bars you could want. The view from the flat is amazing, and you can watch the sunrise from the unit. Despite being a studio, the flat felt much bigger. Check-in was easy, and it had everything you need for a great trip. Would love to stay here again!

Evans’s place is nice and clean and
Beautiful!
Has everything you need I stood there 
With my friend she had her space and I had mine two beds and two bathroom

Appartement bien situé proche de Wynyard station et à cinq min à pied de Darling Harbour. Le logement est très propre et fonctionnel avec une belle vue sur la ville. Nous avons apprécié la piscine pour se relaxer et le calme de la résidence. Nous recommandons.

My host was asleep when I arrived but that didn't matter - they had covered all the important bits and I fell into a nice big bed. 
I met Lorraine in the morning for a cup-o-tea.

Neil and Jane's place is absolutely lovely on every level!  The neighborhood is wonderful and provides a nice break from the bustle of Sydney, yet is easily accessible to all the great spots by ferry.   The apartment is beautifully appointed and affords plenty of privacy.  The breakfast and wine provided were delicious.  Neil and Jane were exceptionally responsive and helpful prior to, and throughout, our stay.  We truly enjoyed meeting them and can't wait to return!  Highly recommend staying here!
Place to go!!!
Our stay was only short, but Tracey's place is great! It is clean and cozy, and has everything you need. Good location too. We'll definitely be back! Thanks for having us.
Perfectly located, bright, airy and stylishly decorated. Griffin was a very helpful host and we had a lovely stay here.
Great place to stay when I am in Sydney....
Great location! Nice place. Would recommend

Anita's appartment is very clean, very well furnished with the eye for detail and peaceful. The partial view on bondi beach is a bit disappointing but since everything else is almost perfect, this view is definitively secondary. Would warmly recommend Anita's appartment
Club Cliff was an exceptional property. Great for a family stay in Manly
Great place and value for money, Alexey was super helpful and easy to communicate with
I stayed at Sabrina's house with my girlfriend, sister and brother-in-law. Her apartment was spacious, modern and in a great location! Would highly recommend to anybody.

It was great time to stay in Fred & Bernadette places.
Most of all, house is located in near beach side and beach swimming pool. - This can explain about the best benefits for choosing this house!!
In addition, House is really clean, tidy and spacious.
It is easy to park the car near the house, so no need to worry about the car park.
Fred is a nice and kind host that you don't worry about asking him

It is a good experience to stay in this AirBnB in Syd

Joseph had an appointment, however, his mom came for check in and she did the follow ups. She is so friendly and welcoming. The unit is modern and comfortable. Spectacular view and great location. Close to ANZ stadium and public transportation. I totally recommend Joseph’ Place.

Handy location for Olympic Park venues.  Easy to find, walking distance to everything, restaurants/cafes nearby.  Check-in process was seamless and Nicole was fantastic communicating prior and after arrival.  Thanks for a great stay!
Secluded spot in the trees, steep access, small but comfortable, nice bathroom, a lovely quiet weekender.

Fantastic location with super easy access to public transport (we travelled via Kings Cross station every day). Communal areas on interior of building in need of brightening but sort of adds to the charm as is. Apt is small but comfortably accommodated 2 adults and our daughter on a blow up mattress and had everything we needed. Stairs are a but of a hike with heavy suitcases but nothing we haven't encountered frequently in our travels o/s. Paul and Mary (house cleaner) were very responsive to any communication and kindly accommodated us when we needed to checkin early and to store luggage before departure flight. Night crowd outside a little loud at times but it didnt stop us sleeping. Colourful and cool area - would definitely stay again.  (Recommend Beer & Dumplings for take away, pastry shop below for delicious treats, and weekend market for great healthy interesting food)

Our stay at Simone's home was everything we expected and more. Great location, within walking distance from shops and beaches. Short cab ride to Allianz football stadium and Randwick race course which was perfect for our weekend plans. The house was very comfortable and had everything you would need. The off street parking was an added bonus. Would definitely recommend Simone house to anyone wishing to stay in the Randwick area. I know we will be back!

House and location excellent. Across from Hyde Park, 10 mins from botanic gardens and Darling Harbour. My family of 6 had an wonderful time in Sydney. Staying in Philips house was perfect. Had everything we needed and more. Host very attentive.  Would highly recommend. xx :)
A convenient place, not much space but an interesting house with so many gadgets.  Always a prompt reply.  Thank you George.
Amazing host. Lovely place, 100% would go back!
Great location, very spacious, loved the welcome tips.
Very comfortable

About daniels, i couldn't give any comment, its Just inna who meet us when arriving n communicate with us along our stay,inna stand by to help if you asking..the location is very good, real middle at the city

Paul is a great host, quick to reply and easy to talk to. His place is clean and spacious and right near the main strip in Manly. Food and shops are close by and I didn't have any difficulty figuring out places to eat. It's proximity to the beach is great too!
Everything as described and much more, perfect holiday stay for six of us.

Our very first ever AirBnB transaction.  

Very adequate and as described. 
Great location-short walk to transit and area shops, cafes, restaurants, grocery store. 
Area can be noisy, but apartment is very quiet once balcony door is closed-no issues when sleeping
Building itself was clean and very quiet-rarely did we see anyone else. 
Ian was generally quick to respond but not always as helpful as expected in resolving issues
Amenities were provided but minimal/sparse
TV (one of our requirements) was problematic and was never really got resolved to our satisfaction. 
Apartment was generally clean but some areas could use additional attention.
