We were thinking of renting a car but didn’t. In hindsight it was a good move as street parking while available, free spaces weren’t plentiful.  Again, public transit was nearby and more than adequate. 

Nothing major that would prevent us recommending staying here to others.

A lovely and central apartment. Comfortable and well equipped. Loved the very cute bedroom nook. I was warned beforehand that the bath was leaking, but all the rest worked fine. The place is dark, but the bed is next to a big window so you don't suffer from it.

Super chill vibe, adorable dog and great location. Only a 5 min walk to Train Station which makes getting around super easy. Also a 5 min walk to bus to Coogee, which is an amazing beach. House is neat and has a lovely atmosphere which is nice to come home too. I'd stay here again!

Beautiful location , beautiful house. 
Thank you Rachel.
Great place. Great location.
It was really good to stay in Linda's place, perfectly communicated, close to everything! Great experience there, hope to come back again :)
Always feel home when I stay with Tota’s family

Central accomodation in Manly in a modern style. The apartment is on the top floor and you have a little bit of ocean view. It is very gut supplied with kitchen affairs and also different sorts of cappuccino and tea are available. All the furniture is in white and in the bed you can sleep very well. We loved it and would come here again!
A beautiful spacious 1 bedroom apartment with amazing views, close to many amenities.
What an amazing house! Beautiful rambling lovely old place in a brilliant neighbourhood in Surry Hills. Just a few minutes walk to cafes, pubs etc...wpuld definitely come back!
Great area to stay in Sydney! Loved the open windows in the bedroom.

Very friendly hosts with a wonderful home. The location and surroundings are lush and very accessible. The hosts responded quickly to any of our inquiries. The home was clean and spacious. Would definitely recommend staying here.

Angela and Geoff were wonderful hosts. From the minute we arrived, they warmly welcomed us into their beautiful home. If you're after a relaxing weekend away, you cannot beat this property and location.

I had a fantastic stay at Tims house 
Very clean, very warm and friendly atmosphere 
Right beside train line in quiet cul de sac street 
I will definitely return to Tims when I am in Sydney again

It was a great and pleasant one-week stay in Hernan's place. He welcomed us with warm regards and treated us very well. He concerned about our needs during the stay in Sydney and provided useful tips for traveling around. A nice place to recommend!
Nice appartment, perfectly suitable for 2, but for a short stay also possible for 4. Perfect location near Circular Bay. All necessary amenities available. In total, a clear recommendation.
Amazing stay!
Great location, friendly hosts. Definitely recommended!

My husband and I had an amazing stay here. It was near the Central station and there was a small supermarket nearby which closed late, there was also lots of food around and was nearby the famed Bourke Street Bakery. The place was clean and the amenities were amazing, we could see that every thought was put into the decoration and we could find everything we needed. Everything was great and we will be back again!
quite near to city center. house is good for large group.

Oliver’s place is exactly as described but better. Great location for local food and parks and great access to public transport to the city. Highly recommend and will be looking to stay again on my next business trip.
Super endroit bien placé
Suzanna give us some great tips about local attractions and bars and she's very hospitality. Great experience. Thanks
Very handy and spacious

Great place to stay! Surrounded by public transport options and a wide variety of eating places. Sally’s place is Exceptionally clean, comfortable and well presented. Also loved the access to the pool, spa and gym. Sally’s communication with us was fabulous. Looking forward to coming back!

I stayed in Don's apartment for a week. It's a large studio, nice and private, and very comfortable. It's a short walk to all that Surrey Hills has to offer. (And that's a lot!) I'd definitely stay here again.

I would recommend Omio's place to anyone!
The views are breathtaking.. You can see Sydney harbour, the bridge, and the opera house on the skyline, as well as the sea. The pictures don't do it justice!
The bedroom is super clean and comfortable, the bathroom (private) is fab
You can walk to Bondi or go into the city in just 15-20 mins.. Perfect!
Omio was an excellent host, he was very accomdating, we even stayed an extra night
thanks again!
Great location and a very nicely presented apartment.

Naveen is so considerate and helpful. It is really a nice experience while staying here,enjoying the lifestyle of them. The room is tiny n clean,and what surprised us most is the puppy FELIX! Love here and I will be sure of coming back again
Steven’s place is lovely - a really well designed space with great facilities in a good location.
Quite a small studio, comfortable enough for 2 but 4 is quite a squeeze as the pull out lounge bed is quite small.
So helpful and made us feel very welcome.

The backyard cabin was like a secluded writer's retreat! So peaceful and homely, well stocked mini-kitchen too and a beautiful balinese style bed. There's very close by access to an almost private beach and jetty/swimming area, good place to watch the sunset and sip some BYO champers!
Michy was a fabulous host, warm and friendly, and not only did she let us check in early, but also gave us a lift to Jonah's for lunch as it's a little difficult to get a taxi in the area. Highly recommend staying here for a romantic getaway from the city!

Craige & Leonie's home is very spacious and they are a very relaxed couple.
The bed was very comfy.
The location is ideal for visiting Bondi and surrounding area.
The local bus stop is 2 mins away and there is a big choice of eateries in the area.
About 5 mins walk from Newtown Stn and it's a nice, cozy place!

This beautiful tastefully decorated home offers supreme comfort and terrific location. The garden in the backyard is an oasis of beautiful and healthy plants. A very quiet location with on street parking that was never a problem. The house is full of charm and Jennifer's bedding and towels are of the highest quality and cleanliness. Jennifer was so generous and welcoming, giving us a walk through of all that we would need to know to make our stay as comfortable as possible. The kitchen was fully stocked for our use and Jennifer had thoughtfully provided breakfast provisions for us  - which we gratefully used - enjoying a leisurely start to the day and breakfast and coffee in the garden. Position of the house is excellent - walking distance to the shopping centre, ferry and bus transport, not to mention how easy it was to access the house with the help of (Hidden by Airbnb) maps. My friends and I can not recommended this property highly enough!

My partner and I spent two nights in Paul and Luke's lovely apartment. This place is a gorgeous little base for exploring Sydney! Paul and Luke have provided a wonderful guide for the Pott's Point area and we thoroughly enjoyed exploring their recommendations (mostly the food ones!). The bakery downstairs is a real winner! Really glad we chose to spend our long weekend here, it made for such a cosy retreat. Thanks guys!
Great place to stay at!! The house is clean and it is around 10 minutes walk from train station.
Great stay
Kerri is a fantastic host and I truly enjoyed my visit. I would recommend Kerri and her apartment to anyone.
Good place to say.  Bungalow is private.

Excellent location! Wonderful views of Bondi. 
The apartment was very clean, comfortable and Valentine is a lovely hostess. Would highly recommend staying here if in Sydney!
Nice apartment just three step from the road in a quite area
responses quickly and very hospitable

Louise’s place was really nice. The rooms and beds were as described and nice and clean. The only downside was that the parking was really inconvenient. There wasn’t parking guaranteed for us, and the back streets weren’t clean whether it was one way or not, so it was a bit dangerous. There was only two visitor spots that could only fit small cars, not recommended for big cars. 
Other than that, everything else was awesome. Was a very homey and cute place with heating and a nice TV.

Cath's beautiful little studio was the perfect place to visit Sydney and the local neighborhood of Merrickville. She provided a wonderful array of breakfast treats as well as fabulous teas! The place was clean, private, and had all the amenities we could need. Thanks for a great visit, Cath!

Suzanna and her husband were incredible helpful for all aspects of our stay.  Her unit is in the Rocks which makes it incredibly convenient to restaurants, Circular Quay, the Bridge and all else that Sydney offers.  The unit is newly remodeled and extremely clean.  Check in and check out was a breeze.

We stayed at Clare’s place for 4 nights in Sydney. Everything about it was amazing. Great central location, with the public transportation leaving from just a few minutes by walk. Newtown itself is a vibrant neighborhood with lots of nice bars and restaurants, but Clare’s place is secluded and very silent. Clare provided us with some useful local tips, and is really friendly. The room is spacious with a nice bed, and Mollie is the cutest puppy dog you will get to meet!! Will definitely recommend the place, we will come back here once again in Sydney!

l'host è stato molto accogliente, mi ha dato pure un mano con la valigia che pesava ben 25 kili!! è stato molto cordiale, e molto disponibile a qualsiasi domanda.
inoltre è davvero silenzioso!
Wonderful host. The backyard studio is very comfortable.
Very easy to communicate, a good location, all amenities, fully equipped kitchen. It might be a bit noisy but it is a good place overall.

Thanks boys!
Very cute apartment and photos don't do it justice 
Very convenient and you were very accommodating
Appreciate the last minute booking and enjoyed our stay! 
Sylvia and Gabe x

Cathy is a wonderful host, the room was lovely with a fabulously comfortable bed and, unexpectedly, an espresso maker!
Cathy was brilliant on being touch and available if needed, everything was very clear and straightforward on arrival.
Would recommend highly and stay here again.
Very handy for the Forage, a great coffee shop.
Thanks Cathy.
Beautiful apartment, great location

Where do i start. 
This is a fantastic location, right beside Central train station. If you wanted to walk the town, you had great access to walk to Circular Quay, Paddy's Market  or Darling Harbour.  Your were pretty well within walking distance to grocery stores, restaurants and liquorland to name a few.  The apt is kept in great condition and had comfortable beds.  The balcony was a great place to wind down for the evening.  WiFi is provided and was pretty solid. 
Our host, Alexey, was always on top of things.  He met us upon our arrival and was always just an email away with quick responses to any questions i had. If you want a host that is looking out for your best interests, and is a great communicator Alexey fits the bill.
Thanks for a great week Alexey!
The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Really good quality apartment for the price per night
Bryan is very helpful and kind. The house is lovely and very close to the Harbour. It has everything we need and is just few minutes to CBD by tram. It was a pretty nice experience:).

We had a fantastic stay with plenty of room for a family of 3 teenage boys.  The location was ideal (a quick stroll down to the rockpool and beach each morning for a swim before breakfast) and the views from the balcony are breathtaking.  We sipped drinks watching the sunset and city lights begin to twinkle. The apartment seems practically brand new and is perfectly equipped with everything you need.  Thanks for a lovely Coogee holiday - we'll definitely be back.
The place is super enough, bus rides right at doorstep, amazing urban living pad with selective European cafes just a few footsteps away. Great service and feels saturated for Sydney touring.

Although we didnt have a chance to meet in person (just via txt msgs), Hernan was a wonderful host and helped me out with everything I needed. The place was nice too and I was very happy to stay there. It was a pleasure! Thank you so much!
Very easy to communicate to. Nice place and location
非常好客,会给很多当地游玩的建议,期待下次见面

Thanks bailey! Your home is beautiful myself and my guests enjoyed every hour of our stay. There were so many rooms and levels that we could just have our time if we needed. Everything about the trip was perfect I would defidefinely come back, perhaps in summer this time!

Linda was a lovely host and has a very lovely home. Which is close to restaurants, public transport and all other things you could need. It was very easy getting around the city and surrounding areas thanks to the comprehensive information provided to us upon arrival. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would recommend staying at Linda's apartment to anyone looking for accommodation.
Set between Bondi beach and Bronte beach which are easy to walk to. Superb local beach for family and easy to grab an uber to the city. really enjoyed the location and weather.

Family of five (including 2 small kids) came to stay at Max's place. Max was such a generous and accommodating host and allowed us to check-in earlier upon our request. Fantastic location near Central train station and bus stops, and easy walk to Paddy's Market/ Chinatown/ Powerhouse Museum. Apartment is clean, spacious, and has all the amenities travelers could possibly need (i.e. cooking utensils, plenty of dishes and cutlery, dishwasher, full-length mirrors on the closet doors, built-in wardrobes with hangers, airconditioning, washer/dryer). Would definitely recommend this home to families with kids or up to 6 adults.
My husband and I just returned from Evelyn's place over the Oct long weekend. We had such a wonderful stay and didn't want to leave. Evelyn and her husband were so welcoming and we felt right at home
This is a nice apartment, it’s well located, and has loads of restaurants nearby to suit a variety of budgets.

We had a great stay at Linda's lovely home. The apartment is located in a nice neighbourhood, close to public transport and perfect to explore the city. Linda was a great host and the communication was smooth. The apartment is clean, cozy and furnished with everything we needed. I would definitely stay here again!
该房子地理位置太棒了,市区繁华地带都可步行到达
Good for the price
We really like this apartment! Clean and bright, same as in the photo! Mr Andrew is easy to communicate. Highly recommended!

We could not have been happier with our stay in Avalon!!!! The house was everything described and more!!! Angela had added so many personal touches such as flowers and fruit, fresh bread and other bits and pieces in the fridge  .... 
The house was immaculate and had everything we could have wanted!!
We cannot recommend Angela and Geoff's house enough and hope to be able to come back again one day ...
Great location
I’ve used bnb a couple of times, and Neil’s place is the best.  Very comfortable, clean and equipped with everything we can ask for.  Most of all I love bbq in the garden.  Will definitely come back.
Bright, tidy, clean and very near bus station. The host is friendly and thoughtful
Fantastic relaxing, quiet location.

Yang's apartment is about 45 minutes by train and bus from central station. Bus stop is in front of the apartment. The Sydney Olympic Park Wharf and Rhodes train station are within 5 minutes by bus.

It's a nice one bedroom apartment overlooking Parramatta river.

Michele is an amazing host, thoughtful, considerate, she made sure from the start we'd have a great stay at her place.
Don't think twice, just book it!

Thanks again Michele :)
Secluded place but right in the city. Nice place to stay. Stairs were hard to go up and down, but manageable.

Loved this apartment.  It is located across from beautiful Hyde Park.  You can easily walk to the botanical gardens, many museums and art galleries, the opera house and much more.  The apartment itself is beautiful, nicely furnished, has all the amenities you would want including coffee, tea, milk, cookies, fruit and more.  There is a convenience store right next to it.  Desiree could not have been warmer or more helpful. She was available any time we had a question.  We already asked to book another stay and we will recommend her place to friends.
Great place for a weekend !
Good location. +1 for massage chair. Showerhead can be better
Great location and good value for money.
Great city escape!! So central! Very stlylish and homely apartment! ❤️
A charming B&B with lots of history and character. Ann took care of us and spoilt us with a lovely breakfast each morning. Not great for young families, but lovely for a couple.
A great room in a nice neighborhood. Great host who provided all the required amenities and who was very helpful when needed

This small apartment is really well located above Bronte beach, with a longish but attractive walk to the beach. The outlook was through trees with bird song and lovely sunrises. There is a nice big private car park and everything we needed was there. No aircon but a good fan made sleeping easy and the bed was comfortable. We found it hard to manage the TV and more instructions would be helpful. Anitta answered us on email when necessary and we enjoyed our stay. We would stay there again.
Within walking distance to the beach, this sparkling clean studio was perfect for our stay in Bronte.

The apartment is really well located, a stunning view from the rooftop pool on the Anzac Memorial and the Sydney eye tower. Desireé is helpful and kind! 
A really good address!
loved the historical value of the cottage

We stayed at Mal's place right on Bondi Beach for four days and it was HUGE! For a family of four, it was really great because we could spread out. The kitchen was also great and had full sized appliances. The beds were dreamy and the location, if you like to be ocean front, was amazing. We rented a car which now in hindsight was only good for heading out to the zoo or back to the airport because parking around there was awful. And really, there was enough to do right around there so we barely used the car anyway. Mal came over and met us and showed us around the apartment a bit. He actually brought us bread, milk, butter and orange juice, which we were not expecting at all. Plus, he gave us a bit of history on the place, the neighborhood, and a bit on Sydney which was great. He was very friendly and we enjoyed talking with a local. Internet was good and there was a washer and dryer on the roof, too, which was convenient. Just get some coins for it. Highly recommend. I am thankful for AirBNB reviews bc we have stayed in some awesome places over our travels!

The listing was as described. Didn't get to meet Miss D, all queries we responded to very promptly either by SMS or email.

All instructions were clearly provided. 

Miss D assisted us with our arrival and departure times.

The bed was very comfortable, the pillows were too big (though this is a personal choice) so would have been good if other options were available. Was a little put off to see hairs in the bed ( just hoping it was from the person changing the sheets).

The room was clean as well as the bathroom and kitchen.

It would have been good to have a television either in the room or the lounge area.

Also first impressions, would be great to see the front garden looking a bit more loved.

Location is very convenient and I would stay again.

Thank you Miss D
A beatifully designed studio apartment, well connected for city. Great hosts.

Great apartment. So close to the city yet in a quiet neighbourhood to get away from the hustle and bustle. And an amazing dinner venue Olvolo 1888 just around the corner. Recommend and will be staying again.

Where do I start? The neighbourhood is first class. During our seven day stay, we had brunch in one of Surry hills many quaint little cafes every morning, each no farther than a 5 minute walk. The food was incredible as was the coffee. You're two minutes away from an awesome little wine bar on crown street. Bus stops are a short walk away which take you to Bondi Beach in minutes and Central Station is a ten minute walk where we took an train to the Blue Mountains  (recommend that). The apartment itself is excellent. Really cosy, clean and tidy (with Netflix too if you've had an active day). I'm really pleased with our stay and would thoroughly recommend  it! Look no further!!

Would recommend if you need a place to crash and experience Sydney. Checking out the buses to the Manly Wharf and the Ferry to the CBD was a thrilling experience. No need for a car to drive around. 
There are nearby restaurants and Supermarkets for convenience as well as a lovely complementary breakfast provided by the host.
Elizabeth y Simon son grandes anfitriones, con una casa muy bonita y confortable para alojarse, su hospitalidad y el lugar son recomendados.
Leslie's place is great

Desireé and Julian’s apartment was a perfect place to explore Sydney from - and delicious Darlinghurst restaurants nearby. They had thought of everything, and we really appreciated the homely touches. The bed is very comfy, there is plenty of wardrobe space, and a comfy couch when a night in is in order. Despite the location right near Hyde Park, it is very quiet and we were not bothered by any noise during our stay. Desireé and Julian were lovely hosts and we appreciated the clear directions and easy check-in and check-out. We would love to stay here again when we’re in Sydney again!
Laura’s apartment was great - fantastic location with amazing views, clean and comfortable. We particularly liked the large kitchen, air conditioner and iron and ironing board. Thanks Laura!

We spend a great time at Austin’s house. He is a really friendly,  always helpful and great host we received always a promptly answers when we had questions. The house is very pretty we enjoyed a pool, a wonderful open kitchen, a beautiful barbecue area everything is very clean. The house is close to the city just a short walk to the train and 20min drive. We would absolutely recommend this room and would come back if we are visiting Sydney again. 
Lisa & Timon
Cute place. Super comfy bed... Not well lit at night if arriving late.
离歌剧院很近

The whole experience had been amazing. Linda is very friendly, responsive, took time to check in with us during our stay to make sure we are good and accommodating. A pity we didn't meet her during our stay. But her attention to details and making sure her guests are well taken care of is remarkable. 

On the apartment, it was fantastic. Location was awesome and it has everything we need. Feels like home, would certainly come back again if we visit Sydney :)

Susan and her husband Greg were great! They gave us great advice on the area, did a load of laundry, and had yummy treats for us to eat.The studio was so comfortable, clean, and i loved how open it was. Thank you!
You won't be disappointed
Nice place!!

Duncan and Ashlee were fantastic hosts making us feel welcome and at home right from the get go. They are both really lovely, laid back and have a great attitude towards Airbnb. The property itself was exactly as described, very clean and in an awesome location. The prepaid opal cards were a huge help and all the advice to help with our trip was very appreciated. Our first trip to Sydney and it couldn't have been better. We would definitely stay here again and really recommend it! You will really struggle to find better value on Airbnb let alone in Sydney! Thanks again guys!!
luxury stylish home to live in. Loved it!

Right from when I put in the request for a booking Belinda responded straight away and was constantly in touch with me to provide detailed information about our visit. The studio was very clean and comfortable, and every detail had been thought of, which made our visit very easy and relaxing. Perfect size for a couple!
The location of the studio was perfect for us too, a couple of minutes walk to a beautiful beach and close to the entry into the National Park, yet really peaceful.
We really enjoyed our weekend away, and would highly recommend the studio for a peaceful and relaxing getaway.

Tim’s place has great access to public transport and is a quick uber ride to the airport. Comfy bed and very clean - would highly recommend to anyone with an early flight or in need of a place to stay for a night!

Tim & Mel’s place was phenomenal! Great location as it was less than a 5 minute walk from Green Square Station. Sparkling clean and bright room. Modern and bright. I would recommend anyone staying in Sydney to stay with Tim and Mel. They offered tips for local places and were extremely welcoming and accommodating.
Great room and great facilities. Incredibly close to everything you need in Newtown and only a few minutes to the train station. House felt clean and secure. Thank you !

Mal was great- very helpful, lots of tips and quick to respond. The flat was just as you see in the photos, amazing location right opposite the beach and within easy walking distance of anything you could want to do in Bondi. The rooftop is the cherry on top and the perfect spot to kick back after a day on the beach. Everything worked, the place was clean and we loved it. Would definitely come back!
Awesome location. Lots of sleeping room. So close to everything in the city!

Would definitely recommend! Excellent location, lovely, light-filled space, super clean apartment including the linen, comfy beds, well-equipped kitchen, and street parking available not too far away. Paul responds to messages really quickly too. Thank you!
Just what we needed for a one night stay. Cathy was lovely and everything was so clean. Thanks again

Superbe petite maison qui permet d'accueillir jusqu'à 4 personnes (1 chambre avec lit double et canapé/lit double dans le salon)
Quartier très calme et agréable. 
10 min à pied de la station de train Dulwich Hill et du Light Train (tram) permettant d'accéder rapidement à l'aéroport et au centre. 
Lignes de bus proche. 
Nous avons adoré notre petit séjour et nous reviendrons lors de notre prochaine visite à Sydney.
The place was really lovely and Franca & Alessio responded to everything we asked extremely fast!
Great location - short walking distance to Circular Quay and CBD.

This unit was perfect for my husband and I and our two young girls. The unit was very spacious and nice and bright. The unit was close to public transport and some amazing restaurants. I would def stay here again!

Kerri was very welcoming for minute one,the apartment is lovely & nothing is to much for kerri,she always helps & advises which is a great help,kerri joined me & my family for dinner out one evening which says how easy a person she is to get on with,I fully recommend a stay here & will defiantly stay here again when I come back to Sydney
Great being back in Annandale at Wyatts place and visiting old friends and making new ones.

Lina was a fantastic host. She was always prompt with her communications, and went out of her way to facilitate our request for an early check in. Anyone looking for a base when visiting the local hospital, or exploring the Penrith area would appreciate this flat.
房東非常的有耐心和友善,家裡非常乾淨,窗外也有很美的景色,最棒的是位置在市中心很方便,非常推薦大家入住!

It was really a wonderful experience staying with Jyothi and her family . Guys...You won't miss your home.... nice couple.. I prefer to stay here again ... this place is really quiet and convenient ... really a good residential area ..house is very clean and well equiped ...Thanks Jyothi and Family and I really enjoyed staying at your property ... Thanks for the wonderful experience
Great place to stay. Jack was very helpful and gave clear instructions. Bed very comfortable. Great location.

This is the best location you can ask for. You're in the center of everything. Apartment is nicer than what you would get in a hotel room. They're doing construction a street over for a light rail, so ear plugs are necessary. But if you're looking for something that's affordable and in an unbeatable location, then you won't be disappointed.

We had a great experience at the Garden Studio. It was so clean and comfortable with every need provided for. I had wondered about the ladder to the bed as in my 60s with a not good knee but it was fine and the bed was exceptionally comfortable. We loved the shower and bathroom provisions and the kitchen was great. We had delicious breakfast every morning with everything provided by Cath and only needed to purchase yoghurt.We had a weekly travel pass and there was a short walk to regular buses and the new Dulwich to Central light rail line which we used daily in combination with rail. Highly recommended .

The landlord is very enthusiastic. We have informed them all the matters needing attention before we go, so we can check in very quickly and conveniently when we arrive. The house is located in the downtown area. It is easy to get to the downtown attractions. There is a central railway station nearby and it is convenient to go farther.

Steven & Peta have a very comfortable, private, secure and modern unit at the back of their property.  We have enjoyed many visits over the past years.  They are friendly hosts who respond to any requests immediately.  The location is perfect - walking distance to Petersham train station, bus stops and the town centre including restaurants and shops.  It is quiet, has a TV, reverse cycle aircon, a lounge, iron and a kitchenette - everything you need for a comfortable stay.  We wouldn't hesitate to recommend their place.

Amazing! We used Jeremy’s place as our base for a team business trip to Sydney. Jeremy was extremely responsive and did what he could to accomodate us dropping bags off early - breezy as checkin process. 

What we loved about this house was everything. There are 4 bedrooms, 3 which each have their own balcony. The top rooms balcony has views of the city and the sunsets are STUNNING. Great place for evening wines. (It would be great if there were some fairy lights here is a small lantern).

The kitchen has everything you could need, so would be very comfortable for families or long stays. 

The neighbourhood is safe and easy to explore. There are many great cafes within walking distance.

Lookout for the Neighbours friendly cat, Fudge. 

We will stay here again in a heartbeat!

Marcella is a great individual. She was more than happy for us to check in earlier. The location is really nice, only 2 min walk to a beautiful beach and also there are many great cafes around. However house was a bit dusty and older than we were thinking. There were some insects and cockroaches around. It wasn't big enough for 10 adults specially if you are traveling with family as there wasn't enough space in the living room for late night gatherings!

This two bedroom apt. Has a nice partial view of water and boats. However, it only sleeps four adults comfortably unless you can sleep in a children’s metal cot with a thin foam pad, both of which were broken when we got there. It took several   texts, frustration and waiting, but we did get a functional cot that night. Having only two nights in Sydney, we didn’t need the aggravation. Also, we were really grossed out by the black mold in the bathroom shower grout lines.
Great little place! Good spot to explore Sydney from. Paul’s communication was great, and he was very helpful. Would recommend!

Bill很贴心的提醒我们一点钟可以提前入住了｡对于凌晨七点到达的一大家子早休息一个小时很重要,关键是感觉到了切实的关心｡
距离鱼市场步行十分钟,然后从鱼市场距离daring harbor十分钟,中间经过一个儿童乐园不错｡继续步行十分钟就到了海德公园,然后一路沿着公园走到皇家公园｡临近海边看当地人锻炼身体,读书,几个朋友喝啤酒都十分惬意｡
悉尼核心区步行一个半小时够了｡带着孩子们走走停停,步行是最好的选择｡
感谢Bill准备的旅游建议｡桌子上放了一大本书｡各种电器使用说明,到远近的商店信息｡很用心的人｡屋里各地带回来的艺术品｡泰国的,中国的元素不少｡推荐大家来悉尼住在Bill家｡再次感谢

This property is exactly as pictured, which does not do justice to how good this place is. 

Spotless and everything is in great condition, bathrooms are clean and the outdoor area is the perfect spot to spend an afternoon overlooking the water. 

Plenty of space and great contact from the host make this the perfect place to stay. Hope to be back!!!
房子虽然不在市中心,但出门走1､2分钟就有公交到central station,所以出行还是很方便｡如果自驾来,街边都可免费停车｡附近也有一个超市可以买到日常要用的东西｡有独立的房间,共用客厅､厨房和卫生间等公共空间,因为房东很好相处,所以也很自由方便｡另外小宋和Julie 还提供了许多关于旅行､出租等等信息的帮助｡总之,值得推荐｡
Great place and a fantastic location if you're in the CBD for work
the place was very clean, close to the transportations, and same as what we expect it, Cecilia respond very fast when I need help from her, thanks a lot

Rachel met me on the morning of my arrival and showed me round the house.  The house was exactly as described, the beds were very comfortable and everything was of a high quality.  I preferred living in Mosman to the centre of Sydney.  It has a lovely community feeling but the city is easily accessible by bus or ferry.  We ate breakfast and dinner within a very short distance of the house and there was a large range of places to choose from, all providing excellent food.  Balmoral beach was also a short walk away which I think is the most perfect beach in Sydney.
Great place to stay. Would stay again
Paul’s place is in the perfect location. Walking distance to the wharf, restaurants, shops and beach. Good size apartment and met all of our needs.

After 10 days in such a fantastic terrace, I can say that Natasa is simply the perfect host, and even better person! Friendly, funny and flexible, she is always ready to help, to have a conversation and she makes you feel like at home as you enter the house. The house is clean and tidy, and the kitchen and living room are spacious and with all you may need. The room itself, with double bed, is a perfect and very comfortable place to relax as at home. The house is perfectly located 1 minute (or even less) form Petersham train station, from where you get to the city in a 10 minutes ride. There is also a supermarket and shops nearby, which make it easy to get provisions. Of course, the house has Wifi connection, which is fast and reliable.
This has been the first time I book a room through Airbnb and it has been such a fantastic experience that I will definitely consider Airbnb for further stays, and if in Sydney, at Natasa’s place for sure!

My girlfriend and I had a delightful stay with Belinda, the place was in a quiet and relaxing location with perfect access to a nice quiet beach for some snorkelling. The property was well equipped (we made great use of the extensive kitchen utensils as there was few eating out options in the town) and beautifully laid out - the photos on the walls were stunning. The veranda was a nice place to sit and chill out and was nicely enclosed by the garden so it was peaceful and nicely separated from the house. Belinda was very welcoming and accommodating.
Fabulous apartment & fabulous hosts! Look forward to staying here again!!!
Amazing Communication, Friendly and Helpful. Good Location for western Sydney amenities.
깨끗하고 친절하고 공항 가깝고 다 좋습니다 주변에 해변있고 레스토랑도 많아요! 약간 개선점이라면 방에 에어컨 없는거ㅜㅠ 좀 더울 수도 있어요

Sensational!!!  Beautiful views and location, gorgeous apartment and fantastic hosts.  Was just the perfect location for our family weekend.  We all felt comfortable and really enjoyed ourselves.  We highly recommend this accommodation, you will not be disappointed:).
Great little studio in a good spot in Leichhardt. Very comfortable and stylish. We would definitely stay again.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Angela’s - a fantastic place to spend a few nights in Sydney’s Northern Beaches, either to explore or just relax. The property is located in a quiet, residential area but in walking distance of Avalon beach, and all local amenities. The space is beautifully decorated and maintained, with lots of space for 4 adults to share and enjoy. Angela was an extremely thoughtful host (extra thanks for the wonderful food and drink supplies that welcomed us on arrival) and easy to contact throughout. Would highly recommend staying here, wish we could have stayed longer!
I can fully recommend this stay. Susan and Greg are great hosts. The studio is fully self contained, quiet and private. Bronte is a terrific location, particularly if you like the beach.
Bryan's place in Glebe offer great value for money. Transportation connectivity is excellent
Great view and location
Terrific location! We were very comfortable here in our week long stay in Sydney.

Beautiful home on a nice quiet street just around the corner from shops and restaurants. Walking distance to Coogee beach. The garage is very useful and the house itself is lovely. Thanks for the bottle of wine cooling on arrival, it was a really nice stay. Zero complaints!

The apartment is in a good location, only a very short walk from public transport and with a glimpse of the Harbour Bridge. 

Unfortunately the cleanliness and general  kit out of the place was below expectations. Basic things such as utensils were missing and the light in the main room wasn’t working, just to name a few issues.
Lina's accomodation is clean and comfortable. Much roomier than you would imagine and modern for the area. Lina is happy to help with advice. Really enjoyed our accomodation.
It was great Cedric was responsive and the place is great

Staying in this lovely place was truly an amazing experience! Yes the pictures are accurate and the place is located in the perfect spot 2 min walk from the bus stop, nice/safe area and the chance to do lots of shopping. Arnie and his partner were more then welcoming and if you get the chance why not have a look at Arnie's great art work. 
The bed was soft and comfy wasn't much noise at all. I also want to say thank-you for dealing with my last minute booking. I highly recommend anyone to stay at this listing you will not regret it I promise. I can't wait to stay again!!

Execellent apartment in a great location, shops, trains etc all located within 5 minutes walk. Train only 8-10 minutes to city centre and all the main spots.
Uber cheap to any beaches - bondi/coogee or even to cbd. 
Apartment was immaculate with everything you would need. Much better than any hotel.
Any advice or help Evan had replied within minutes.
Excellent stay, didn’t want to leave so got our own apartment across the road!

What can I say about the hosts Lee & Craige. What a lovely genuine couple and nothing was too much for them. They let us check in early as our flight got in st 7am and usually check in is at 2pm. They left some hints and suggestions of what to do in the room with contact details and everything we needed to know about the area, where to get public transport, eat and go out. They even lent us beach towels. Lee lent me her straightener. WiFi too. Bathroom was super clean with a great shower. They got us a cab when an uber let us down. It was like being at home abroad. Very casual down to earth couple. In an ideal location near Bondi Beach. Just a 5 min walk but yet away from the hustle & bustle of the parade opposite beach. First time booking an Airbnb and so glad it was such a happy experience.

Cozy studio that is very clean and comfortable.  Location is *fantastic* -- we walked to everything we wanted to see in Sydney and there is easy access to groceries/food, if you prefer to eat in.

Mariana and Don are amazing hosts-- they were accessible for anything we needed and very easy to communicate with ahead of time.

One blip: the neighboring apartment was very loud in the middle of the night (twice), but we let Mariana know and I suspect any issue will be resolved.

Natasa was a great host. All arrangements  to arrive and access the property  were d xcellent. We sat and chatted, she made me  feel  very welcome.  Petersham is a good area with transport and  restaurants  nearby.

Annie was a fantastic host to deal with - super responsive and flexible - she even left us a bottle of bubbly to start our NYE celebrations early (thanks!) Easy check in and check out, nice, cosy and compact apartment in a good location with plenty of cafes, convenience stores and other eating options nearby. We walked down to Circular Quay and covered other parts of the city by foot which was pretty easy, though there seemed to be lots of buses nearby. Close enough to the CBD without being right in the thick of things. Thanks for having us :-)

Avalon Beach is a very scenic destination, not far from Palm Beach. Cathy's cosy room was as expected. Great to walk down to nearby Paradise and Clareville Beaches and watch the water craft on beautiful Pittwater. There was a warm welcome from Cathy, very helpful with everything. Hopefully I will return for another stay ...

Lovely friendly warm couple who went out of their way to help us find our way around Sydney :) suggested us places to go and even let us use their public transportation cards and wrote down the bus routes for is in detail so we wouldn't get lost!!! Clean and pretty house. We were very comfortable and had nice chats with them :) we would definitely recommend staying there! Plus their dogs are so friendly :D Thank you Judith and Paul :)
Clean and tidy very accessible for us we would recommend it to friends Thank you Leena

Danny was great in accommodating to poor organiseation on my part and allowing us to drop our bags off early, and we were greeted by his brother. Danny's place was super convenient for a few of us staying in the city, however it is in a serious state of disrepair, including bathroom tap, shower doors, wardrobe doors, balcony doors etc. we're all broken in some way. Furniture was of low quality you could feel it, especially the beds. Just seemed like basic cheap furniture, compared to other Airbnbs I have stayed at, the quality of this was poor. Despite the great location and affordable price, myself and the other guests probably would not stay there again.

Les PLUS : Agréable studio, lumineux, pratique, bien desservi par les bus, lit très confortable, petite cuisine équipée.

Les MOINS : Le bruit des voisins (aucune insonorisation), la douche et le lavabo qui coulent et gouttent en continu, la TV qui ne fonctionne pas, aucun échange ou entrevue avec l'hôte.
The apartment was well situated. It was a very comfortable place with everything we needed. I highly recommend it.
Great atmosphere. Kind. Friendly. I loved peole there.
Great space

Chloe has been a fantastic host and quick to respond to our needs. The apartment is just next to a train station, CBD shopping areas & tourist attraction, and not to mention a convenient store which makes it a very ideal apartment for a small family to stay. Will definitely love to stay at the apartment again in our next trip to Sydney.

We enjoyed our stay at Charles place in Redfern.  Unit is in a great location for both Sydney CBD, Redfern, Surry Hills, Waterloo and access to the Airport.  

Unit was spotlessly clean throughout and communication from Charles was excellent at all times.  Keyless access system works well and provides great security.

Although a comfortable stay, the unit is small with no seating area other than 2 small stools in the kitchen, this wasn't a surprise to us as its clearly shown and stated in the listing but could pose problems for longer stays or days where the weather dictates you need to be inside!

Would stay again for 1 or 2 nights when in Sydney.
It was a great experience so modern, clean, neat, perfect stay with friends!

This place was amazing!

Not only was Hilde one of the best Airbnb hosts we have encountered (attentive, informative, helpful and reachable, when we needed her), the place was fantastically prepared. We stayed in the apartment with our 1-year-old and immediately after our arrival it became apparent that a lot of love and a well-developed attention to detail went into making this place as comfortable as possible. The beds were great, the pool was immaculately maintained (no chlorine = great for kids), the kitchen was well-outfitted with all the essentials and the bathroom stocked with towels. Hilde even went to the trouble of providing our daughter with some toys, which came in very handy.

All in all, Hilde's "Bundeena Base" was a great launchpad for us to have some family downtime outside of Sydney. A real gem of a region, which is quite reachable by train/ferry as well as car from the city.
Great place, with wonderful hospitality and conveniently close to the airport!
Clean and comfy and within walking distance to everything in Bondi.lived it

LOCATION was great, walking distance from Darling Harbor, close easy 12 min walk with luggage from Wynyard Station.  Can get the ferry to Circular Quay and Taronga Zoo, Luna Park, Seaworld, Madame Tussaud and Wildlife Zoo is very close by, everything is walking distance from this apartment.  Reception was prompt and friendly, room was tidy with all you need, washing machine and dryer if needed. It is small, but for a traveler or long stay more than what you will need, 4 people can sleep comfortable.

It was a pleasure staying with Natasa! Even if she's a really busy person, she made everything possible, that my stay at her place was very enjoyable and comfortable. The place is great and very well located.Petersham Train station just 100meter from house, Sydney International Airport just 15-20 minutes, we using Uber as per suggested by Natasa and costly around 20 Aud from airport to Natasa House,I'd definitely go there again when I come back to Sydney. Thank you!
We had a comfortable stay at Ali's place! The place was equipped with all that we needed for our stay.

Beautiful apartment, very central location (I walked to the city one day) in fabulous Potts Point. The apartment had everything I needed (including a bathtub!) and the host was delightful. Highly recommended and I would definitely come back here.

Fantastic family apartment! It is great to have a break away and be able to have a separate room from the kids. 
Sara went above and beyond providing a high chair, port a cot and sharing her daughters toys; our boys loved it.
The view and location was amazing, the apartment clean and stylish. 

We would really like to stay again next time we are in Sydney.

Yang’s place is awesome, great location for exploring outer sydney but close enough to get to CBS easily. The apartment is beautiful, clean and had amazing views. As hosts they were outstanding, meeting us a lot later than planned after we hit traffic, showing us to the apartment and helping us get parked. Overall a great property and great hosts.
Chocolates, croissants, fruit, eggs, drinks and spreads, dvd's, books, maps, games, all very comfortable and an easy walk to the beach and shops in a nice street with trees. We loved it.

We had such a relaxing time- the garden outlook was beautiful and it was like being in the country in the middle of Sydney! The bed was lush and room cozy (we needed the heater as it was freezing in Sydney this weekend!)
Susan was such a lovely host- she was very welcoming, provided us with great tips for local eateries and everything was within walking distance. We would definitely visit again.... Thank you Susan.
非常好的民俗 房主非常热情 房间非常干净 由于我们的疏忽把钥匙拉房间了 房主深夜过来为我们开房间 下次有机会还会再来

Justine's place was everything what we can ask for and more, the place is just beautiful and Justine is a great host, she was very attentive to our needs all the time and she care that we could have a great time. Thank you Justine.

Quiet and well furnished room, really close to the beach.
Since I arrived late and left early I didn't get to meet Hernan but he left me the keys in the mailbox and everything worked out perfectly.

Athena’s apartment is very nice and facilities are excellent. It is very well located close to Sydney CBD and train and ferry stations. It is also very quiet. Check in was easy and Athena answered my questions quickly. For two people, I recommend the place and would return if I had to stay in Sydney CBD.

Lovely Australian home with real character. Beautiful details and high ceilings. Good to have private outside space. Well appointed galley kitchen. Transport (buses and trains) close by and easy to use. Very comfortable and relaxing space to relax in after busy days in Sydney. We had a lovely time.

Great location, close to everything downtown. Could use a bit of a thorough cleaning and some extra utensils, however, it was close enough to walk pretty much everywhere you wanted to go down by the CBD, so it was a hit with our group!

The apartment is in a good location, close to town hall and big shopping centers in Sydney. But it’s much smaller than I imagined, quit narrow for 3 people to live there. And it’s very hard to contact with the host when we found there is no quilt cover for the sofa bed.

Architecturally this is a fabulous building and well located for Mosman. Rachel provided excellent instructions on accessing the property. Unfortunately we did not meet Rachel in person during our stay.

Narelles Airbnb was the perfect little home away from home! The location was absolutely perfect for us as it was central to everything and had a train station less then a 5 minute walk away. Would highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone :)

Excellent spot and a great space to spend a week, with easy access to downtown Sydney (and anywhere else via the train).

Alexey was an extremely responsive host, both leading up to and during our stay. Could not have asked to for better from him.

I’d really recommend this place if you’re seeing a show or sporting event at Olympic Park. It’s very handy and a just short walk from the stadium/arena, along brightly lit streets. 
Very comfortable and with two bedrooms and bathrooms would suit either families, friends or colleagues who need a place to stay.

We loved staying here - great location, easy transport into city and 20 min walk to Newtown which was great. Steven was friendly while also giving us space. The room was as described, not fancy but has everything you need and lots of space, it was perfect for us. Thank you we would definitely stay again!
The apartment has easy access to public transport and the Darling Harbour is only walking distance away.

Louise's flat is a great, centrally located space with tons of beautiful natural light, easy access to public transportation and across-the-street proximity to a wonderful Sydney public park! Louise went out of her way to welcome us to her flat and go over local eateries, beaches and transportation for our trip. The flat was a great start to our Aussie adventures!
Wonderful studio in a great location, everything you need inside. Very comfortable bed & lovely and quiet. Key exchange was easy and Belinda was a great host with good communication.
Clean,  tidy with a lot of extra care. Highly recommended
It was such a pleasure staying with Jake! He is a wonderful host! The apartment is perfektly located and very clean. We felt like being at home.

Perfect escape to paradise. Peaceful with the only sounds being the birds. Close to the water, walks along the beach, fishing, great restaurants. Michy was a wonderful hostess. Wished we could stay longer.

Great location walking distance to the beach, bars, restaurants and shops. Expect a little noise at night from nearby bars.  Beautiful cute clean space with wonderful local tips from Gwen and great communication throughout our stay.

Wish we could’ve spent more time here! 

Thank you!

Whitney and Jamie

Cathy was a lovely host and her attention to small details made the stay most enjoyable. An affordable price and not a single thing that I could think off that Cathy didn’t provide us with. Would stay there again without a doubt and would definitely recommend it to others.

Wayne was in constant communication to make sure our arrival was seamless his service was excellent, also the listing description was spot on and the area is  pure gold one of the nicest places you will ever visit.
Lovely apartment with views of the harbour and the bridge.  Down the road to the ferry and short distance to trains.  Great location.  Definitely recommend.

Really lovely apartment in a really convenient location. The apartment was really well equipped and beautifully maintained. Probably one of the best Airbnb locations we have ever stayed in…thank you so much for everything Desiree!!
It was nicw staying at this place. everything was nice and clean outstanding our expectations

Cheryl’s beach house is absolutely stunning! You can hear the waves while you sit and enjoy breakfast on the deck. My friends and I had a wonderful stay. Cheryl was a very accommodating host, making check in/check out very easy. We would definitely come back!

We are just back from our two week vacation in NSW. We had the good fortune to run across Rachels gorgeous home on Air bnb. 
This place was amazing.  We were here visiting relatives and sight seeing from the USA.  Its wonderful to hear the kookaburras right in the city and all the beautiful birds. This place is like a garden oasis. Rachel was so lovely and gave us all the information we needed to make  this trip perfect. Our family of four was very comfortable and we felt very at home here. My daughter is studying music and played Rachels gorgeous piano while we were there which was an added plus.  This home is in the most perfect place. Military road is two minutes walking distance from the house and there are plenty of buses if you do not have a car. We parked on the street because we had a very large mini van and it was just easier. Plenty of parking in the surrounding streets if you need to but there is a private garage there as well for your use. 
 There are wonderful cafe's everywhere and you are very close to Raglan street which takes you down to Balmoral beach. 
I cannot say enough wonderful things about this home but my kids and husband and I were sad to leave our home away from home. Thank you so much Rachel for sharing your lovely place with us. Hopefully we will be back again.
Un appartement bien situé qui permet d'être dans le centre très facilement. Julie et Wyatt sont des hôtes très sympathiques. La chambre était conforme à nos attentes.

Irene and Glenn were the perfect hosts, period. Their home was perfect, they made us feel welcome every step of the way and even for NYE standards, our stay was absolutely worth the money. Definitely recommend to other guests! Thank you!

The apartment is almost new. Everything works perfect. It is nice, confortable, and very well equipped. So the stay is very cozy. We really enjoyed the time there. 
It is close to the airport and to the Mascot train station so you are in very few minutes to the city and to the airport. It gives you plenty of freedom to move. In 10 minutes you are in Circular Quay or in less than an hour in Bondi Beach.
The apartment was so clean and tidy. Very helpful, we did get a little lost, made contact and all sorted. Overall it was a great stay, great apartment in a great location.
Casey is an excellent host. The room is large and very comfortable. We highly recommend Casey’s Airbnb.
One holiday with two stays here! Fabulous place would return again!
It's a very convenient place, close to transport and shopping center. David is very nice and helpful.

Gavin's place was cosy, well-kept and really clean! Conveniently located near Sydney's Central train station, with the CBD just a further 5 mins walk...Gavin was a great host too - recommending food places, places of interest and even taking time at the end of a long day at work to chat with us and share on the history of Sydney :)  Wouldn't have made much sense out of random chalk marks on the pavement otherwise..!

Would definitely recommend Gavin's to anyone, and stay there again on our next visit!
Stylish, modern and very convenient apartment in the heart of Sydney. Within walking distance to a bunch of amazing cafes at Surry Hills. Fantastic.

房间非常漂亮,位置虽然不是CBD但是交通也算方便｡
房间对于8人来说非常宽裕｡
但是房东的各项要求非常严格,退房时间也非常早,而且在最后一天(当天是中国农历新年第一天)离开时无法寄存行李,导致我们一行人无奈只能拖着行李箱在市内玩了一天,非常疲惫｡

We had a wonderful staying at Ben’s place.  It is such an awesome (Website hidden by Airbnb) two year old absolutely loves boats and imagine his excitement waking up to boats and ferries everyday!  It was such a treat for us to get into town using the ferry; we took the ferry to Barangaroo and Watson Bay for lunch and my son was over the moon.

Ben was also great organising things we needed for our baby, like a cot and baby booster seat, and provided little touches like toys, hair dryer, candles, heater in the bathroom etc.  (winter when we were there). It was also great that he stocked up! We arrived so late and were so hungry the first night we were grateful there were lots to eat in the fridge and snacks too!

The entertainment in this place is awesome, also large sofas great for entertaining if you have people over.  I love this location with options of cafes, restaurants, parks and the ferry close by.  We treated ourselves to Catalina on the last night and it was so romantic.  The only thing I wished for is a coffee machine for some good coffee.
 
We slept fine through the night, but for light sleepers the slight traffic noise is not ideal.  

All in all a great stay!
we felt comfy in the studio,we ,my husband was building cubby house so it was great we were able to be close to my daughter's house which was worksite,privacy was good,pubs,clubs light rail close.

We really enjoyed our stay with Duncan and Ashlee. They're a very friendly couple and were great to chat to over the course of our stay! The room and apartment was in impeccable condition and, whilst we didn't need to use them, the pre-loaded Opal cards were a wonderful gesture! It was great to get to know both of them; absolutely great people to have the pleasure of meeting.

A lovely cottage that feels a world away from Sydney although only an hour out of town. Short walk to both the beach and cafes / shops of Bundeena and perfect for exploring the Royal National Park. We stayed during winter so were grateful for the heater and electric blankets. Would definitely recommend.

It is quite apparent as to why Susan has the title super host!Our stay was one of the most pleasurable we have ever experienced in Sydney and we look forward to staying with Susa again pending availability.
Had a great and convenient stay at Chathy's. Super laid back and easy going. We would stay again! Thank you Cathy for your hospitality.

This is near of airport, and Hernan taught me how to go house from airport.
This host is very kind,I wanted to stay more.
Fantastic room. Fantastic location. Although I never got to meet Maria who was away, Jerry was a fantastic host. A not to be missed room and location.

Stayed here over New Years and it was great. Close to public transport, shops and the airport. Also, the place feels modern and had everything we needed. Would recommend.
Cheers, Oliver

Just completed a very enjoyable 3 week stay at Michy's cabin, while visiting family nearby. 
The cabin is opposite Michy and Paul’s home, but feels private. The property is in a beautiful location right on Pittwater, with good on road parking. The quiet reserve just across the road has lovely views along Pittwater to Lion Island. 
The cabin itself is compact, stylishly presented, very comfortable and well organised. The decking is a peaceful and shady place to relax during the heat of the day. We found we had everything we needed for an extended stay. 
Michy was a fab host throughout - always warm & friendly, respectful of privacy but quick to offer help when contacted. We enjoyed meeting her husband Paul and felt honoured when invited to the neighbours pre Christmas get together on the reserve. We had a super time with you Michy, thanks so much!
Highly recommend staying here.
House was exactly what we were after, perfect for a group of friends clean & great location
Clean, modern, comfortable, lots to see and do in the area. It was a get away from the holidays for me and I loved the change of scenery and alone time.

Beautiful place, full of amenities like Brand New mini body wash, shampoo, lotion etc. 

There were also board games and the place was extremely clean and a fantastic place to unwind. 

Check in was smooth and have absolutely no complaints!
Excellent downtown location, beautiful view, apartment well stocked, highly recommended

Thoughtfully set out, immaculately clean and amazingly peaceful - given that it's right on Enmore Road in what is now the epicentre of Sydney's night life. I wanted some space for reading and reflection and it was just perfect.

Clean, tidy 2-bed granny flat type place which you get one of the rooms of (separate keys). Super close to the airport that means walking is easy (assuming no big cases), but not under the flight path. The Train is less than 15 mins walk and has regular services straight into town.  Good cooking facilities and a nice bathroom. No AC if that matters to you, but does have a fan. Would be perfect for a city break or business meeting stay over.

I stayed in Sydney for a working weekend and I just needed a quite place for my self, I didn't wanted to share room or bathroom. This place is good for that. And I knew I wouldn't had the time to cook, so it didn't bother me to share kitchen. Susan is really helpful. The house is easy to get to/from the CBD.
Just be aware of the noise of the airplanes... 
I think is good value.
Very very good accomodation. The Landlords were very nice. Totally worth it for this price.
We had a very enjoyable stay at Susan's studio. The studio was extremely comfortable, private and in a great location. We would be happy to stay again
The host canceled this reservation 278 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jackie with her husband were very helpful, They gave us the map with the local stuff to do, also They recommend us the local restaurants. We could stay longer in the appartment before our flight. The flat is Beautiful and amazig. We really would like to return one day :)

The Bundeena Garden Studio was a delight to stay in. The place was spotless and had everything we needed for our 3 day getaway.  We were able to cook some meals, as well as eat out on two occasions. The studio is a minute from beautiful beaches and from the Royal National Park walks. Belinda was very welcoming while also leaving us to do our own thing.
Very quiet area, great for a short getaway to Sydney. Sarah is friendly and helpful.
Comfortable stay and good location
Close to shops and public transport, great kitchen, neat and clean, great communication.
Had a lovely stay at Jared SSP's place, so close to everything you need. Enjoyed a lovely dinner seafood cruise, walk around the Rocks, lovely meal at Cockles Bay and shopping at Darling Harbour.
We really enjoyed the our stay at Cat's in Bondi. The location was great, and the home itself was a good fit for the two families of 4 who stayed there for a couple nights.
Marcella's place was beautiful! Close to the shops and the beautiful beach. Thanks so much Marcella!
The hosts are helpful and interested in making they visitors feel comfortable. The apartment is clean and very well presented and there are a few nice ‘treats’ to make you feel at home ❤️

This space is cozy and really well designed. Materials used were great so gave a really solid and homey feel to it. Amenities were great. The space was used really well so while it looked minimal when we first came in, all the stuff we needed was in the cupboards. Love this place.

Linda left a variety of foods for us at her apartment - breakfast things, and a variety of teas. Tim tams too! The wifi worked well as did the utility room's white goods that we used. The parking space was really useful. 

We were travelling with our 9 month old son. Linda provided us with a cot for him to use (for free) which was terrific. We had some queries and Linda got back to us immediately with answers to our questions. We liked the "manual" she left for the Redfern area which highlighted activities we might otherwise not have done like visiting the local weekend market.

The Redfern neighbourhood is a bit of a hipsters area. There's a good (bike) coffee shop opposite and we had a ridiculously good Sunday lunch at the pub next door. The very well connected underground station is a short walk away. The area felt very safe.

The house is in a great location only a couple of hundred metres from Tailor Square. Its walking distance from all the entertainment and dining options on Oxford Street, Victoria Road and Kings Cross.

The bedroom was nice but a little small for a male-male couple with luggage. The bathroom is nice but it's a little awkward walking up and down the stairs to get between the bedroom and the bathroom. If you're not worried about privacy this is just an inconvenience. The bathroom's location next to the living area is also a little embarrassing when you have those noisy moments.

Location was good, 2 minutes walk to the train station, 2 supermarkets which were each 5 minutes away. The weekend market was so interesting and the food sold was great. The studio was well-equipped and saw to all our needs. There were many eateries around, a police station nearby. It's safe, well furnished. It's a 10-15 min ride to the city which makes it very convenient. Jenny, our host, was prompt in her responses and made sure we were comfortable throughout.
Ann was a gracious host and a fantastic cook. She was very good company and her place is ideally located - very near the wharf, cafe, and bowling club as well as just a short walk to the beach.

Both Casey and Larry are sooooo warm and sweet! The location here is very convenient. Their house is very particular. 
We had a very nice day in Sydney.
Handy spot centrally located. Suit a big group. Can walk everywhere.

The Apartment is clean and modern, well equipped with nice linen and very centrally located in the heart of Manly. 
Ziggy welcomed us warmly when we arrived and was available to contact if needed. The location was perfect for us as it was easy to just walk to cafes or shops or the beach. We would definitely stay here again.
地段非常好,闹中取静,去主要景点都是步行的距离,距离机场十五分钟地铁｡房子装修得很有品味,电器厨卫品质非常高｡唯一的缺点是卫生间有点小通风不够好,没办法,老房子的通病｡由于我们来得晚走得早,没能见到Chris,有点遗憾,但是入住和退房他都安排妥当,非常感谢!

Nice apartment, loved the decor, very clean. In a great spot.
Communication was quick.
Positive experience ❤

A lovely family,  very friendly and welcoming. We felt comfortable as being in our home. Excellent location with good transport connections. City centre and Airport 15 minutes faraway. Wonderful dogs, we loved stay with them because they are easygoing and affectionate

Vickie’s apartment is exactly as the photos show! It is a fantastic place. Big room and really good sunlight coming into the apartment. The bed was comfortable and I liked that the showers had really hot water! There is a woolsworth just opposite the apartment! Will not hesitate staying at this place again when I’m in Sydney!
We stayed for a night at Min’s place. Great location, nice and clean. We would happily stay again. Thanks.
I don’t wanna say anything. I was expelled.
Super clean, modern and conveniently located. Bath amenities were really nice too. Above a great restaurant too (don't worry, you don't get any noise).
Great location. Clean. Cosy. Comfortable.  Close to cafes and Kings  cross. I would definately stay here again.

Awesome place to stay, especially if you’re into an artsy setting!
The garden is beautiful, filled with surprises! I thought it was cozy, though generous in space & nothing beats great hospitality, Steven looks after you. It was really nice!

Very clean and tidy place, fabulous location near gold club and beach. Amazing coffee/breakfast spot at elouera SLSC 
Rob was a very relaxed and friendly host. 
No breakfast or tea/coffee supplied. 
Thanks rob.
A great place and we had a great stay. The hostess is very friendly and very quick to respond to our request. In addition, the apartment is clean and meets the pictures. A definite recommendation!
Great location. very clean, and reasonably priced. wole definitely stay again.
Andrew的房子地理位置很好,在UTS附近,第一个路口下去就有一个大商场,里面有Woolworth超市,离central station也很近,直走大约几分钟,Chinatown､darling harbour､QVB等都在步行范围｡入住也很方便,房间里很干净｡只是临街,晚上车经过声音很大,没有空调,只有空调扇,2月的天气还是蛮热的｡其它都挺好的,Andrew回复消息很快,谢谢｡
This is the second time we’ve stayed at this lovely, leafy, private spot. We love how close it is to everything, yet nestled in the trees it feels like miles from the hustle of Sydney life.

We only stayed one night but it was a lovely clean and comfortable studio. tucked away at the end of the garden it was quiet and private. Everything was provided that we needed. The Nespresso was great when we didn't want to go out for coffee! The studio is easy walking distance to Bronte beach, pubs and restaurants. We didn't actually get to meet susan, her daughter checked us in. but communication with her via Air BnB was easy. I would definitely stay again if I go back to this area.
Herman was responsive, helpful,  quick replies and had amazing travel stories and helped me find my way. I felt very at home. Thanks Herman

Such a lovely place with such lovely people! Very warm and welcoming to me and my Film crew. It is definitely a place I would love to come back, but next time will be for a vacation for sure! Thank you so much for your warm and kind service you have shown us on the day!

A perfect retreat with perfect view! We were a big group and yet didn’t feel on top of each other. The outdoor hot spa with view over Pittwater was definitely a highlight. The direct access to the beach was a great bonus. Bailey was a fab host, very responsive and accommodating. Some of the cabinets and drawers could be more tidy and the bbq wasn’t cleaned properly, but we had a fab stay overall and would recommend the house to other travellers. We’ll definitely love to stay again.
Ven's place is nice and clean. Ven is very welcoming host. Property is in quiet area in walking distance to supermarket and restaurants. I definitely recommend!!!
What a Nice stay in Sydney ! Great place close to Sydney City. Near the bus and all facilities around. Stylish brand new bedroom and bathroom ! We recommand !
Aussie living exp.

The studio is lovely space and convenient; small kitchen with almost everything, confortable beds, outside table, TV and WiFi service. We found many kind of cereal, jams, fresh eggs, fruits, chocolate, and etc. in the kitchen.  Cath gave us a freshly-baked bread in the first morning, and we could enjoy breakfast with the table in the garden.
There is a park near here and it is quiet area.
Cath is very friendly and a kindly person.
   裏庭にある素敵な可愛いｽﾍﾟｰｽです｡庭のﾃｰﾌﾞﾙで朝食を取りながらゆったり楽しみました｡ｵｰﾅｰに気兼ねなく過ごせるのですが､Cathさんは親切な方で､市内の情報を色々と教えてくれます｡最初の朝に大きな焼きたてﾊﾟﾝをいただき､2日間楽しみました｡
Great place, great host!
The location is very good
Marcella is a great communicator and her place was super for our three families of adults and children. Close to the beach, restaurants and a super playground. Thanks Marcella.

Such a great little place! Perfect location, legit two minute walk from the train station and amazing restaurants/shops. Griffin was an amazing host, such quick communication with great responses. My only suggestion would be to get a microwave. ;)
Great place to stay !

Great stay at Kath's place. Excellent location and Kath's apartment is clean, comfortable with all amenities needed for a relaxing and homely stay. Kath is also extremely friendly and helpful! Thanks for a great stay :)
If you don’t feel disturbed by very simple furniture and quiet noisy sleeping rooms you can book it. If you expect a flat on a high floor with Harbour view this is not the right place.

Jenny's home is in the most idealic picturesque coastline of Australia. You are also a stone's throw away from Tamarama or Bronte beach. Upon arrival, there was snacks, fruit and breakfast goodies for our stay and also celebratory champagne for our honeymoon. The furnishing was gorgeous, the aircon was amazing after a sunny day on the beach and communication was superb if we ever needed a thing. We cannot wait to return! Thank you so so much
Anita was a great host and the apartment was very clean and in a awesome location will definitely be back
Bill’s place is fantastic and fantastically located. He was also a very attentive host providing lots of helpful info and responding quickly. Thanks Bill!

Rachel was very easy deal to with, nothing was a problem.  Very accommodating in our arrival time and departure.  House is in a fantastic location, very close to everything you could need.  The beds are very comfortable, was a great place to base ourselves with our two small children.  We would definitely stay there again.

George was very accommodating to our large group of 13 , had fans running to chill the rooms before we arrived and had more than enough room for everybody, he responds fast when you need to ask questions.

Karen was a very nice and good host. She answered quickely and give information and tips for nice places to eat, to visit and how to travel. The room and the bathroom were clean and very comfortable and the kitchen and livingroom were als nice to use. It is a very attractively house with garden and I felt really home. The location is very good, because close to beaches and to a bus/train station.

Great location for exploring Sydney but the apartment could use a little TLC to make your stay a little more comfortable. Host instructions were excellent and when we had to change the date of the booking it was made very easy, thanks

Staying at Kerri's was my first experience with Airbnb. It completely exceeded my expectations! I had such a fabulous experience thanks to Kerri. Her home is beautifully decorated and quite comfortable. I immediately felt right at home. Kerri couldn't have been more gracious. She is a very bright, fun-loving person and she made my stay in Sydney very special. I highly recommend staying at Kerri's place!

We had a lovely time at David's place, it is in a fantastic location, right by the subway station so it's easy to connect with the rest of Sydney. The apartment is clean and comfortable and has everything you could need. David was very welcoming and friendly, and gave us helpful advice about the area, and left us plenty of maps and information. If I ever come back to Sydney, I will hopefully stay here again!
Harry Seidler architectural masterpiece. Great light and inspiring place. Excellent location in Elizabeth Bay/Rushcutters Bay. Very well equipped and maintained. Sydney as its best!
The apartment is very well located and the kitchen has everything from dishwasher to washingmachine. Mags provided us with the basics we needed for breakfast. OK for a short stay.

Jack and Hayley have a wonderfully located, comfortable apartment right in the middle of the city. I was able to walk almost anywhere and when that wasn't an option Jack was available to give me some tips on how to reach where I wanted to go (Bus and Train Stations are close by). The place itself is very clean and would definitely stay there and/or recommend it to other people staying in Sydney.
Enjoyable repeat stay.

Maria's hospitality is amazing and makes her guests feel most welcome. We arrived a little later in the evening, and she had all our needs taken care of. Her apartment is in an amazing location, 10min walk to the centre of Manly, and overlooks the ocean. It was a pleasure to stay with Maria and would like to return to experience the location again.

Kelvin & Kate are wonderful hosts, and the apartment is lovely! Very clean, bright, and well-organised, and very close to Coles and other shops. A bit of a walk from the train station, but easy to find if you are using Uber or taxi. They always replied to any communication within seconds, and I greatly appreciated them as hosts! highly recommended.
Lovely 2 bedroom separate home, comfortable beds, spotless, full kitchen facilities, great place to stay.

Fantastic on all fronts. True home away from home and met all of my needs (and more!) for the 3wks I stayed. The location is perfect for accessing shops (literally on top of them!) and the bus stop is a 3min walk away for easy travel to the city. The apartment is as beautiful as pictures show, has washer/dryer!, parking was easy, and Diana/Jared were wonderful to work with. They were so friendly and checked in with me to make sure all was going well and to see if I needed anything. Will definitely stay here again in the future! Thank you!

You can't beat this location. We stayed for almost a week and walked or took a very convenient train everywhere that we cared to go. The size of the apartment was adequate and comfortable but not terribly large. It was reasonably clean and put together but not luxurious. The hosts were very kind to allow us to check in several hours early and we never actually meet anyone in person as the key was conveniently in a lock box. Overall it was consistent with the description and our expectations. I would recommend this for others particularly given the convenient location.

Great location, 2 minute walk to maroubra beach, local cafes and places within walking distance. The beach is beautiful and the area is not so far from the airport. Around 15-20 minute drive. The neighbourhood is quiet, and peaceful. Cleanliness of the place could have been better, with it being abit dusty and a few cockroaches here and there. Other than that, the hosts are quite friendly, easy to communicate with and easy going.
Really lovely space, nice and close to transport and shops. Sam was really helpful and quick to respond.
Beautiful clean home and in an excellent spot. Host was very quick to respond and helpful. Would recommend this place.

Had a great stay! Fitted our extended family very comfortably and we loved the location and the balcony view. The inclinator made things easy for our elderly guests as the house goes over several levels. Bailey was a great communicator and Paradise Beach is a quiet place to swim and full of character!
Lovely apartment right opposite the sea . We really enjoyed the stay , thank you .
Great location. Very central. Really spacious apt

Location: Absolutely fantastic, next to beach (less than one minute) Cafe's, Restaurants and Coles (10 minutes - you don't feel this walk as walking next to beach is itself a pleasure) Bus stand (one minute).  The apartment has quite peaceful surroundings. 
Room: Has everything that you would need during your stay and the entire apartment is absolutely neat and clean. Also there are cereals available for you, which is a great plus.  
Host: Glad that I met Angela, clear instructions and clear communication made the stay as one of my best.

Michele was incredibly welcoming and kind, helping us with any request or question. The apartment has a very comfy bed and a superb bathroom, and was neat and clean when we entered. The neighborhood is very quiet, although it is only a short walking distance (about 8 minutes) from the train station, several pubs and coffee places and lots of restaurants. The only drawback is having a central air conditioning system, controlled from Michele's part of the house right next to the partition, though whenever heating was needed she quickly turned it on (responding in just a minute or two).

Overall, this is an excellent value for your money's worth, and I highly recommend it.
