Great location, great little apartment and amazing view
Beautiful location, so close to beaches and the National Park. Great little studio with everything you need.

A lovely apartment with everything you could need. The location was also great - just five minutes walk from Kings Cross Station and lots of great restaurants even closer. The Saturday morning market in the square outside was also a nice surprise.

Paul's place is as good as how he described it. The unit is in a very good location. We were able to walk around the neighbourhood as well as commute to other parts of Sydney by bus or train with ease. It was an added bonus that when we requested Paul if we could have another heater (there were 3 of us) since one was not enough for both the bedroom and living room, he readily provided. Though we were out most of the time, we appreciated the fact that Paul's unit is a very beautiful and well-appointed one. It was nice going back to the unit after a long day of going out and seeing the sights. We highly recommend this place to anyone travelling to Sydney. Lastly, although Paul was away on a trip, he was very accommodating in terms of communicating with us during our stay and it certainly made it easier for us to get settled in and get the most of our stay in Sydney.
我们短暂停留了两天,因为回国时间较早,这里离机场很近,拎着两个大箱子走路也就30分钟,房间十分干净,是自助入住,房东人很亲切,房东妈妈也很热心地为我们指路,周围很安静,可以走路到附近的便利店和超市,入住体验非常好｡

It was a very good stay at Angela's place. Angela was responsive and very kind to guide me the way to get to location. Place is at a good peaceful location yet with some very good views across the road. Overall a good stay!

Cath is one of those lovely people that make everything lovely. She's clearly got an eye for design because this place has been so cleverly done. 
She left me beautiful homemade jam, fresh eggs from her gorgeous chickens, a chocolate eater egg, milk, a very generous selection of cereals ... she really knows how to make you feel welcome. 
The cottage is very comfortable and it's completely private, fully equipped, comfortable bed, close to transport. There is nothing at all to fault. I really appreciate it so thanks Cath for a fantastic stay!

Great spot - 5 mins walk to Kings Cross station, buses, 20 minute walk to City.  

Restaurants, cafes, bars all in close proximity. Lachlan the host, was obliging, friendly, helpful and checking in was easy

Was a little bit of noise from Main Street late at night (but you have to expect that in a central location) and from 7am onwards due to construction works (guess this is temporary). 

Overall enjoyed our stay and great value for money
Great location and great restaurants surrounding Millie’s place!

We had a wonderful stay with Naveen and Tristan. They were terrific hosts and made us feel very welcome - providing lots of great tips on nearby cafes and bars, and even bathrobes. The bedroom had an amazing view and was large and spotless. The apartment is in a fantastic location - close to the city and lots of great places to eat and shop - and is really comfortable and super stylish. Definitely would stay with Naveen and Tristan again!

Paul, Judith and Tim were welcoming, friendly and completely lovely. They allowed me the space I needed yet were open to a nice chat each evening too. I highly recommend this AirBnB. It's delightful and so are the hosts.

Michele was a great host, with clear, easy communication and lovely small touches (fresh fruit in the fridge was great!)
The place is in a perfect location, close to King Street and Newtown train station. 
Great secluded room with private entrance, exactly what we wanted! 
Thanks Michele :)

Amazing location steps away from a beautiful sandy beach.  Brightly lit living space with a large comfortable bed.  TV Chanel selection was great, I was able to watch the NFL games and they had Netflix.  Neil was great answering questions and pointed us out to some amazing restaurants within walking distance.

I enjoyed my stay at Ben's place. Perfect location for public transport either to city (5 mins) or Bondi or Coogee beaches.
Small but has everything you need to explore Sydney with and best of all, great city views!
Great convenient location, right in the centre of Coogee. Nice roomy apartment. Would stay again.
Fei and Suzanne were lovely hosts! Their house was amazing, so appreciative of them trying to restore this historical house!  Will stay again

정말 훌륭합니다.
신축이라 시멘트가 조금 떨어지기도 하는데 
아주 깔끔하고 편리한 숙소였습니다
Clean, comfortable and chic space with gorgeous views. My boyfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Thank you for having us.

Second time staying at this fantastic apartment. Julia is an amazing host, with great knowledge about the local area with a functional apartment in a great location. Will certainly stay here again - 10/10 accom!
It was close to the airport and very clean. Highly recommended
房子整理的很整齊但是不知道為什麼很多蟑螂.....如果你不討厭蟑螂的話可以參考ˊㄜㄗ
Great location and good value.

Anita’s place is exactly as the photos!! It is cute, stylish and a great space to relax in. The best part is you can look at the views of bondi from bed!! Anita went over and beyond with little finishing touches that we really appreciated. 
We would definitely stay again :)

En fantastisk värd som välkomnade oss och hjälpte oss med väskor och introducerade lägenheten och området för oss. Lägenheten var underbar och var nog bättre än beskrivningen. En klar överraskning. Området var perfekt om du vill ta dig runt i Sidney. Nära till tåg och buss.
Un joli appartement très bien situé si vous souhaiter sortir. Logement spacieux et  accueillant. David a été charmant et réactif tout au long de nôtre séjour. Je recommande grandement l endroit!

Margaret and John are absolutely sterling hosts!  

What a unique and restful experience this was!  In the midst of a peaceful Australian forest, you will find a private, refurbished railway carriage with so many true to period furnishing for you to enjoy a lovely yesteryear ambiance.

Margaret provided fresh fruit, vegetables, breakfast makings and beverages.  A very generous food offering.

I highly recommend this venue.

You will particularly enjoy the experience if you have an appreciation for historical railway memorabilia, and days gone by!
It was a great place to stay, awesome location for a good price, and it was a good size for the four of us for four nights. Nice view out the window of the city too

Susan’s studio is bright, clean and wonderfully located in Bronte. The beach, a fab bakery, and great cafes and restaurants are all a short walk away. Susan was a wonderful host and the little touches and local knowledge made our trip extra special.
Sally was excellent to deal with, location of house was perfect for seeing Sydney handy to both ferries and buses.  Very Homely

The place was as small as shown in the pictures, and still equipped with  everything one may need, including everything for cooking in the tiny kitchen. Cath was attentive and generous in house supplies.
It was central and perfect for our stay

Great value for money.   Was a great place for our family of 5 to stay for our trip.  Close to public transport to the City.  Our kids loved that there was a pool.  Sarah was very friendly,  happy to answer any questions that we had and made us feel right at home.  Would recommend to anybody looking for somewhere to stay outside of the City Centre.
Clean, neat and helpful. Thank you

Lovely little secluded cottage well worth a weekend away at this destination.

Can't fault it.

A botiuge place to stay, a little sparse in furnishings and would be a little cold in winter, lots of concrete. 
In general a nice place to stay and very convenient to restaurants and the city of Sydney. A short walk to the bottom of the hill and you are at the waterfront looking at the Opera House, Harbour Bridge and Luna Park.
Great location for getting about that part of town. Excellent value.

Modern apartment with excellent amenities, lots of natural light and a lovely cool breeze when you open the sliding doors. Only a short walk to the shops, park and train station in a quiet neighborhood. Easy check-in/out and excellent communication!
The apartment was very nice, in a great location and the check-in process was quick and easy. Had a very nice stay in Sydney for the cricket!

Eleni's place is situated in a fantastic spot in Sydney. Right amongst it. The unit is clean, chic and well decorated. A comfortable bed takes up just about all the space in the bedroom and a comfortable pullout sofa can be used  as a second bed. All in all thoroughly recommended. Cheers Paul
This place exceeded our expectation and we are so happy we chose this place to stay. Everything was easy to use and we were amazed at the great features in your home. Thank you so much!
A beautiful studio to stay in, the place was super clean and had everything we needed. Steven was quick to respond to messages and the checkin process was very easy. Would absolutely stay here again!

Natasa was a friendly and communicative host. She was always very busy but took her time to provide us with useful information about places to go, things to see and how to get there. We had chosen her place to organize the further months of our stay in Sydney and booked the accommodation before our arrival in Australia. The house is located in a side road to Petersham rail station - a perfect location to get into the heard of Sydney quick and easy. The room, bathroom and kitchen were equipped with everything you need. We enjoyed stayting at Natasas home!

Karen is a wonderful host.
I really enjoyed her place and her company. Her place is clean comfortable and close to all (2 min walk to the beach)
Karen guided me through all my stay and thanks to her my 4 days visit was a filled up with the right activities.
Thanks you karen for being such a great host I hope one day to come back.

Great centrally located apartment. I loved the balcony - it's a real suntrap and a lovely place for an afternoon drink. The bed was comfortable and it's great there are two bathrooms - one on the living/dining level and another off the bedroom. 

It's opposite central station, so it's really easy to get everywhere via train. 

Just note there is some construction going on - firstly on the road outside (it's literally all ripped up) so you need to catch a Uber from the road around the corner. Secondly the building is under maintenance (roof terraces being are renovated) - but it didn't concern me at all. 

Wifi was good and quick. 

Overall I'd happily stay there again and really enjoyed my stay.

We had a wonderful month at the Idyllic Sanctuary on moving to Sydney. Stayed there with my wife and two young children who had a great time.

Accommodation was as advertised and host was easily contactable and very accommodating. Location is extremely convenient for everything from shops to public transport to parks.

The third room provides options for an extra person but it is significantly smaller than the two main rooms which are very spacious and have built in cupboards.
Very very very goooooodd

Everything was perfect! The couple is very nice and the house is in a perfect spot,very clean and the atmosphere was perfect for the christmas period :)

thank you very much ragazzi!!!:)

Paul's place is right in the heart of the action in Potts Point, just down the road from King's Cross. It's a great central location for exploring inner Sydney. Communication was great and checkin was easy. While it's technically one bedroom, our four year old was very happy on a mattress in the study nook which has its own door and effectively becomes a small second bedroom.
Great space and location. Great value. I will definitely stay again.

Fantastic host.  Very prompt responses and highly attentive to the incoming heatwave --- Linda went out of her way to get a misting fan to help our little one adjust to the hotter climate 

Would definitely stay again of back in Sydney

David was kind enough to greet us in person and to show us around. The apartment was superb. It's BIG! The beds and sofa are super comfy and the large windows gives a perfect natural lighting to the whole room (LOVE IT!). The location was perfect, too. Kings cross station is just around the corner, tons of restaurants and cafes on the Macleay st as well.

I'd definitely recommend David's place to all my friends who's going to visit Sydney.
Okey. Average. Standard
Loved staying at Michy’s place. Would highly recommend.

Angela's place is very lovely and cozy, everything is clean and I feel like I'm in home as I can find everything that I needed. Moreover the beach is just a minute walk from her place! Will certainly come back and recommend this place!
Very unique house! Enjoyed my stat

It is lovely neighborhood, very easy access to all the buses to the city center. The host adam has been helpful and was generous to let me use his living room for my work. The first night the room floor was dusty but was happy it was thoroughly cleaned on the second day. The only concern I had was the room has no lock, given I was the only female guest in the house and did not know any of other (male) guests on the first day of arrival, I was slightly nervous in the first night until I met other guests who were very kind and friendly.

We had an awesome stay at Naveen and Tristians. It was really easy to get to, excellent access to public transport, all the city sights and places we wanted to go. There is a wealth of good cafe and bars in the area and we were given excellent tips on which ones to go to. Friendly, clean, welcoming great amenities and views! lots of personal space or good chats.

We have enjoyed our stay at Louise's flat. It is modern and spacious, and full of sun light. All the appliances are new and working excellently. The little herb garden was useful in cooking with fresh herbs. Louise is very considerate and friendly. I would very much recommend the flat for a comfortable unforgotten stay.

The two upstairs bedrooms are large and well lit. Very comfortable. The third bedroom is more of a maid's quarters (with attached laundry room). If you plan to have a relative stay in that room, prepare for some feedback.

My only real issue with the home is the vehicle traffic. Do not understand how a narrow suburban road that is only 3 blocks long can support so much traffic starting at 6am, continuing to 10pm. Plus one day there were some early major deliveries to the facility across the street. [Not sure why this did not appear in other reviews. After my visit I rechecked the reviews. Traffic mentioned on page 3. Deeper than I usually look.]  Don't plan to sleep in.

Perhaps this was the price to pay for convenience to Mosman village. Walked there for breakfast, lunch, dinner, shopping, wandering. Very convenient. Very friendly.
It's very comfortable to live in this place.The bed is soft and clean.Shuang is a very kind and helpful person and i really appreaciate all his help for us.
Great location, good access and plenty of parking.

Had a wonderful few days in a comfortable, clean and refreshing environment.  As I was travelling on my own I  appreciated the pickup and drop off for the ferry.  Hope to get back one day with my husband, as was our original plan.
Great location
Great Location. Clean and Tidy inside. Marcella was great to deal with.

The place scores 4/5
It was good in all terms
Train station was however a good 15 - 20 minutes walk
It's centrally located for all the action in Bondi Beach area.  Heaps of great restaurants, cafes, shops.  Very close to beach. The parking space was GOLD.
Very charming, relaxing and memorable accommodation. Picturesque location and very friendly hosts. Highly recommended!

Simon and Nicole were very welcoming hosts. They greeted me on arrival and went through house details. They had prepared a handy book for guests with lists of their favourite restaurants and the locations. 

The kitchen was fully stocked with spices, tea flavours and an Nespresso machine. The bathroom had lovely toiletries and supplies.

Overall I had a lovely stay. Simon and Nicole were very accommodating hosts. The area is in a great location with easy access to public transport.

A most stylish house to spend the few days prior to our daughters wedding.  Great for photos.  Feel like we were living in a classy antique warehouse with all the mod cons that were needed!  Great location too.

Very cute, but small place.  Paul was very quick to respond when i had a question.  Keep in mind that you must climb 2 sets of stairs to get to the apartment and the shower was very tiny.  It was still comfortable and i loved the bakery downstairs.
I love this house!!! Bed is comfortable and near more coffee shop

Mal is a very nice  host, he always solve my problems and all questions related to the apartment settings on time. Apartment is very clean. the Actual sea view is not bad, same as the picture shown on the website. it is a fantastic place to enjoy your holiday time.
Excellent rapport qualité prix pour ce logement très agréable malgré le bruit. Nous avons passé une très bonne semaine.
Great location but expensive for what is a tired granny flat.

Nice host  Beautiful flat. Convenient  transportation. Good location 
Everything was perfect so my friends and I had great time:)
we loved our stay in avalon. place was amazing. views were great and the community was just lovely
很好的房东,周边生活很方便,房子很干净,很有本地生活的味道,推荐!
Sabrina's place was quite clean, spacious, and well-equipped. We had a nice stay there!

Great location, 2 minutes from cafe's and the waterfront. Ideal for larger groups and families. The house was clean and tidy. Marcella is quick to respond to enquiries and made the check in process easy. I would recommend staying here.

Great location!  Close to transit, restaurants, pubs, shops, everything you need.  The apartment is spacious and beautifully decorated creating a very comfortable atmosphere.  Host responded to our needs very quickly.  The concierge staff at the front door were all very friendly and welcoming.
A fabulous small and compact studio in a great location for the eastern superb beach life

Stayed for my second time with Naveen, this time shorter but just as lovely as the first!

We first visited her for the location and keep going back for the amazing vibe and also Felix. Looking forward to future visits too!
Casey was a lovely host!   The room is comfortable and very convenient to Sydney University and surrounds.   I had a problem-free stay :)

Lovely apartment beautifully kept and modestly decorated.  Location of mosman very pretty with all amenities close by.  Lovely ferry ride to get to Sydney main area - would certainly return to this address if in mosman again.
Perfect location and very cosy place.

I stayed here for a second time, collectively in the last month I have spent about 5 hours looking over accommodation in Sydney (which I know pretty well) and Fei's place is definitely the nicest and most competitively prices. I would highly recommend.

The location is great as you can easily get to many points of interest. We were unlucky as there was a lot of construction work directly around the building the whole day and night during our stay. Jared gave us finally a refund for this, so we are okay with that. The apartment has not so much light as the pictures indicate but this is not a blocking point for visiting Sydney. Check In worked easily.
Angela is very nice host. She could give us lots of information about the beautiful local place around her guest house.
This is such a great querky cottage to stay in.  Lovely location, comfortable and has eveyrthing you need for a city stay.  Many thanks Bryan!

Our host Linda made us very welcome, provided more items  e.g. food/washing powder, umbrellas which we needed.  Other items beyond our expectations.  The apartment was exactly as shown on the website. Very clean, comfortable bed, bathroom perfect. She provided us with information with regard transport, local shopping and places to eat.  The off street parking was very accessible and secure. The instructions were well set out.  We liked the area. She was very interested to make sure we were comfortable. We would strongly  recommended to couples like us.

very nice place. clean and well kept. access to public transport is not an issue. hernan gave very clear instruction and provided assistance in whatever the guest needs. i highly recommend his place if you want to travel to sydney.

The apartment is located in the heart of Sydney and importantly near to many attractions. 
We find that the apartment is suitable for a group of 6, and with sufficient necessities provided by the host. 
The process for check-in and check-out is easy with the detailed instructions provided by the host.
陽台好舒適,環境也很整潔,房東家的兩隻狗狗也超溫馴好可愛

Our stay at Leslie's place was great and all we needed.
The room has all the necessities we needed and all was as described.
We ended up being on the go most of the time and for that it was a perfect place for us to stay: close to the bus stop and the ferry station in manly as well.
Would stay again!

Highly recommend this beautiful place. We booked for a girls' weekend, and we were really happy. The place is very clean, and just perfect for a relaxing holiday near the beach. Cat is a wonderful host and easy to deal with. Plenty to see and do, great access to public transport, and the shower is amazing! Would definitely stay there again. :-)
A lovely apartment - modern with convenient location and wonderful views. Definitely recommended.
El apartamento es amplio y está muy bien ubicado ya que está en el centro, además tiene una parada de tren a 3 minutos caminando.

The house was beautiful. Very clean with lots of fresh bed linen and towels. The kitchen facilities were excellent and the house had lots of cooking essentials that I would not have expected. I would highly recommend a stay at this property

We very much enjoyed staying in Millie's lovely and very well presented apartment. It's very easy to get to from the airport/city and in a part of town that's a delight to wander (if you can tear yourself away from the balcony with its view of the Harbour Bridge).
Great location, nice folks, more than adequate lodging.  Sean & Nadia very helpful.

Mohit has a nice place. It was big enough to host the 7 of us. There were 4 adults and 3 children. We stayed for 4 nights and we did enjoy our stay. The place is very secured but I found having one key was problematic when you have 7 people stay in the apartment. Also, there is only one undercover parking spot and finding a parking around the area was very hard. There was also no iron in the apartment. Apart from that, the place is clean, is in a very good location, close to everything and close to the airport. It was what I expected!

This is a very good location to the beach and near to CBD. The property is comfortable however it's quite dusty on the second floor and there's a lot of mosquitoes around the house. Some of us got bitten quite badly but owner did provide insect repellent. Bad luck for us on power failure on the 2nd day but owner got it fixed so no complaint on that, although update can be more prompt to remove the anxiety we faced when approaching the night time with the problem still outstanding.

Totally unsuitable for older people, dingy, messy garden, description does not say there were 5 people sharing one bathroom - the other shower is downstairs and reached by going outside! There is a cat not mentioned in description. Natasha gave someone our beer which she replaced. it may be cheap to Sydney and convenient for the station but it was very disappointing. Had it not been convenient for our family nearby we would have left on day one. towels not changed on a 10 day visit and we had to request bedding change. It was very hot despite a fan in the room. security is poor with only one locked gate protecting us and no locks on bedroom doors. Not recommended even for backpackers.
It is one of the most beautiful parts of Australia. Not for sleeping in. Get out and enjoy the day.

Very good folks. Smooth & responsive communication. They made accommodations for me to check-in the early morning given my 7am-hour flight arrival. They had a welcome package waiting for me. Great location in Bondi -- 'not even a 5 minute walk to the beach. Even offered to provide information on local activities that I might be interested in. Great experience.
The position and access to shops and restaurants was a little stroll from Susan's place, but was perfect because once eaten you could walk off the meal on your way back to Susan's

David’s unit was in a great location and just looking out the windows at life on the streets was a great pastime. The unit was perfect for our purpose as a base for our sightseeing trip to Sydney. Checkin went smoothly, the unit was clean and provided everything that we needed to make our stay relaxed and comfortable
This is a lovely little apartment in a good location - plenty of restaurants &   Cafes & within easy reach of the clean & efficient train network.  Well equipped, comfortable beds &. Strong  wifi.

The location of this apartment is prime! Easy walking distance to all the inner city attractions and as this apartment shares the building with a hotel, you feel safe coming and going as you please. 

There are currently major roadworks going on on George street (the street the apartment overlooks) which is really loud at night time as they work throughout the night. If you're sensitive to sound while sleeping, ask the host if they're still working or bring a good set of ear plugs ;)

Hernan's place was clean and comfortable. It's close to the airport which was perfect for our last night in Australia. He is very quick to respond and help with any questions you may have - including my many inquiries about how to take the local pic lib transit. 

Thank you!

This apartment is stunning, well equipped, - stones throw away from the beach, shops and restaurants. Anita is a great host and will accommodate where possible and makes you feel very welcome. It was perfect for our stay in Manly and felt like home from home. Would definitely recommend a stay there if you are looking for a place close to the beach with everything you could wish for when on holiday!
Perfect host! Lovely neighborhood
Close to everything we needed with private setting.
Great place and fairly convenient location close to the supermarket n small eateries. Host is communicative n accommodating
Great location, very modern, awesome host. 10/10
My wife and 4 kids had a great week in the house. Location and house were both great and Bailey sorted out everything we needed. Highly recommended!
Suzie was an amazing host. The listing accurately describes the property. Suzie was extremely organised and made the check-in and arrival process a breeze. Highly recommended!

Krythia's apartment was clean, quiet and comfortable and close to beautiful Balmoral.  Krythia was very understanding about our late arrival into Sydney and ensured we could access the property in her absence.  Krythia ensured we had everything we needed to make ourselves comfortable for our brief stay (tea, coffee) and was a generous host.
Vivian’s place was lovely and cosy! Only a short walk down to Bronte beach!  She was a great host with quick responses and very helpful.

Hosts could not have been more welcoming from the goodies to the lovely bottle of champagne which was a lovely surprise after such a long journey they were also most accommodating with the key pick up location could not have been more perfect we all loved it the perfect hosts and perfect location hopefully we will make it back sometime

All 4 of us had a wonderful time! Hilde also gave us bread and muesli for our stay. Very close to the beach and the shops! Kitchen was very well stocked. The outdoor dining area was a nice treat to watch the sunset over the water.
Very neat and tidy granny flat. Will definitely be using again.
Well equipped apartment, good communication from our host, well managed property in a truly convenient location
Second stay with Rhonda, always the perfect host who makes sure her guests are well looked after. Great host.

Susan's studio is in a good location for transport links to the city. The studio is clean and comfortable with facilities to have drinks and heat snacks. Susan is helpful and accommodating.

We did have issues with the busy flight path on certain mornings. Make sure you get an opal card before you use any local transport and watch out for expensive taxis from the airport.
Linda is very responsive and considerate. Easy access to CBD and Sydney university. We really enjoyed the stay at her place
Magnifique endroit et vue de la chambre ! Accueil très chaleureux ! Tout était parfait ! N'hésitez pas !
房东姑娘回复很快,性格很好｡房子空间设计很合理,周围很安静,走路去海鲜市场和悉尼大学都挺方便的｡

My family of 5 had a wonderful time in Sydney.  Gavin's apartment was bright, spacious and had all of the amenities that we needed in a central Sydney location.  Gavin was responsive and accommodating to a couple queries that we had.  We would recommend this apartment to family and friends.
I can highly recommend this property. Great location. Very clean. The host Mona was awesome, very helpful and great communication. Thank you

Ellie's place is perfectly described - well appointed bedroom and bathroom (which is shared but didn't feel like it - really I had it all to myself for my brief stay!). Her home is very close to transport yet very leafy and quiet.  Ellie was flexible with my arrival time, and helpful with parking, making a cup of tea, explaining wi fi etc. Enjoyed my stay - highly recommend.

Linda was a great host.  Although we couldn't meet her, she did everything that we asked for and made sure we were comfortable.  The listing was accurate and the neighbouhood was quiet and calm even though the place was very close to the city.

She also provided us with milk, bread, yoghurt and cereal for breakfast.

I would recommend staying here to anyone who is going to Sydney.

The place was amazing. Located on the top floor of an apartment complex in Surry Hills it was central yet quiet. Train station a five minute walk will get you anywhere and some nice local pubs and places to eat close by also. 
The space itself it awesome. Has everything you need and the cable TV caused us to stay inside a little more than we probably should have. 
Pool and gym located in the building as well as a roof top tennis court none of which seem to get overly busy which is good.

Nicole and Simon were a pleasure to deal with and flexible with us as guests. Would recommend to anyone and would return when next in Sydney.

Thanks again Nicole and Simon.
Great place to stay. I wish I had planned to stay longer..
Small but clean and modern space in great location.
Fantastic apartment! We loved our stay here, it’s set up beautifully and the location is fantastic. We’ll be back!
All good

Bryan made us feel very welcome. The house had everything that we needed from milk in the fridge, chilled bottle of wine, transit cards and maps. Loved the house, neighbourhood and proximity to public transport. We had a fantastic time!!!
Sarah was very accommodating and has a great place. She has thought of everything to make your stay comfortable.
Quaint and pretty cottage in a wonderfully quiet location . Very close to the wonderful shops and amenities of the Paddington. A lovely home for a romantic weekend get away . Great host in every way.
Adrians place is dope!  Lovely chill housemates

I had a wonderful stay at David's home. What an incredible location literally on the doorstep of Flinders St and Oxford St (including many of the most well-known gay bars/clubs), and yet so quiet. From there you can also pretty much get yourself anywhere in Sydney really easily and quickly. The property is exactly as described, and if anything, had a few pleasant surprises in terms of the various things he provided. Oh, and the bed is super comfy. I didn't have much opportunity to interact with David (as I was mainly seeing friends and attending a wedding), but he provided everything I needed and was really nice and flexible. I would very happily stay with David again the next time I'm in Sydney.

Kath is a very accommodating and friendly host. I arrived late on the day and she waited patiently for me to check in. She lives at a super convenient location - 10 minutes train ride to city, apple store, China town etc. Would definitely stay again next time I'm in Sydney!!
Perfect base for exploring the city and very well equipped.

Brilliant location and house is spacious and very well thought out. Bailey is always around to help out if you have any questions.
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Great place, great location - beautiful home with everything you would need.

The journey was very nice. The location of the house is perfect, near a bus stop and you can walk into the city easily. The house was clean. We felt like home!
thank you again.

Steven and Peta’s AirBnB is a gorgeous example of inner city life in Sydney. The area is full of great restaurants and cafes, shady tree-lined streets, and friendly locals. The cabin itself is a cosy, immaculately clean, comfortable and thoughtfully appointed. We also had the pleasure of meeting Steven. A truly great stay - would recommend without hesitation.

Perfectly understand why Sam is a super host. Sam's place is by far the best place I have ever stayed in terms of bnb. The place is well managed. Everything is very clean and well designed. Had a really pleasant stay there. Highly recommended!!!!

We were only at Cathy's place for one night but it was really lovely - spotlessly clean, comfy with a great selection of tea/coffee. Cathy was kind enough to pick us up from the bus stop, and was very helpful throughout our stay.

Great place, ideal location for exploring Sydney. Excellent saturday market and local coffee shop. Plenty of choice for restaurants and cafes. We were lucky enough to be in Sydney for Vivid festival which was amazing. The building corridors etc could do with a spruce up and the apartment wasn't as clean as it could be but nothing major. One slight gripe was we were hoping that the spare bed would be a single blow up not a double as it would have fitted in the little dressing room and given that guest a bit of privacy and we did have to move some furniture to place the air bed in an area where we wouldn't trip over it when getting up in the night. Overall really pleased with our choice, thank you Paul. Communication and check in was very smooth
Nice and clean family home, has all amenities that we needed. Had no issues whatsoever. Warm and kind hosts Maryam and Ali. Will definitely stay again if need be.

This is a lovely place to stay. It's a very quick walk to darling harbour, either walk up the hill and across, or through the parking structure down the road and cross at the tram crossing and it takes about two or three minutes!
It was very comfortable, two full bathrooms, a full kitchen two bedrooms, could comfortably fit four people. Great area, close to grocery stores, restaurants, pubs, public transport!

I felt very at home here. Arnie and Lorraine are warm and relaxed. The bed was super comfortable and it was quiet at night. The location was perfect- my favourite part of Sydney. Loved being surrounded by all the art.

Wonderful host! Natasa was warm and welcoming and kindly organised Uber transport to get us to a show on time within half an hour of arrival!! Perfect location for inner city venues. The room was excellent- clean, comfortable and with lovely homely touches. Highly recommended stay. We will be back when back in Sydney.
My wife and I loved this apartment. Very clean, with a lovely homely feel. Lots of little extras similar to a 5 star hotel. Quiet neighbourhood with great views. Would stay again.

We had an amazing time in this lovely studio!
2 min walk from the beach, 
the studio got a lot of charm with white ceiling an lots of light and peaceful garden around it.

I will be back!

I loved staying at this adorable apartment. 
The location is amazing, literally metres to the beach and handy to everything. The apartment is modern, clean and very well equipped, I had everything I needed for a perfect getaway in Bondi.
The bed was super comfortable and the kitchen and bathroom are immaculate.
But the best part was waking up, walking outside and having gorgeous Bondi Beach at my doorstep.
Heavenly! Thank you Natasha, I will be back.

A great place to stay. Close to everything in Olympic Park (including being around the corner from the train station), and a phenomenal view. From the lounge room as well as both bedrooms and balcony you can clearly see every major sporting venue. And what's better is it's only roughly a 10 min walk to any one of them, making it incredibly easy to access any one of them with ease. 

The apartment itself was very clean, with a modern look and feel, and had everything we needed. And whilst we didn't actually meet Nicole, her communication was excellent and she was very accommodating when we had a couple of extra guests show up at late notice wanting to stay, and she allowed us to have a late checkout.

All of this for a great price.

Thanks Nicole. I would definitely stay there again.

Leigh's place was perfect for our family of 5.  A 2 min walk to the beach, 30 seconds to cafe's and 2 mins to the Supermarket.   Buses to take us into the city were available at the end of the street.  The place was spotless, comfortable and had everything we needed.  The kids loved the Netflix and playing trivia on the (Hidden by Airbnb) smart speaker.   A highly recommended place to stay.

The apartment location and amenities are great, the host is quick to reply and help, the car park, main entry doors and lifts can be abit confusing but once your in, you will be in the best spot and apartment for all the attractions nearby.
Nice cosy apartment style home close to ships and transport

A beautiful and relaxed place to stay. Very comfortable and Godelieve is a very welcoming, generous and kind host. The view from the balcony is beautiful & although the pool is shared & Godelieve lives upstairs it feels very private. Godelieve was very kind lending us toys for our 3 young boys and trying to get us a wooden cot for our ongoing stay in Sydney to take with us. Would recommend as a great and relaxing  place to stay and explore the northern beaches.

Gute Beschreibung wie man zur Unterkunft kommt; ich habe alles so vorgefunden wie in der email beschrieben;
ich kann diese Unterkunft nur sehr emofehlen!

Gavin's a very nice host,he'll basically try his best to answer your questions happily and talks with you easily. He allows his guest to fully utilize his accommodation which we appreciate very much. He made an effort to stock up his kitchen with full of foods upon our arrival. 

The location is amazing with free shuttle bus and central station (train) around the corner. His place is clean,tidy and big enough to accommodate quite a number of people in fact. 

The setback is there's no air conditioned which was what he'd mentioned. It gets quiet at night that we felt insecure while on the way back but so far,it's fine for us.

Overall, it's a good stay for us!

Hugo and Pamela went out of their way to help us. Hugo went to the apartment to meet us so we could park our car and unload our luggage before returning the rental car to the airport so we didn't have to drag it through the city. They also let us stay on the day of check out in the apartment longer since we had a late flight. 
The view of the city is beautiful and the apartment is located close to all transportation. It is very basic, clean apartment conveniently located. They even provided milk and a bottle of water in the refrigerator to get you started. Nice flat screen TV in family room with excellent sound system.

A perfect home in an ideal location, very convenient to UNSW where we were attending a conference. House was exactly as described, and had been well maintained and cleaned. The bedrooms are large and beds comfy. Courtyard is perfect for a relaxed BBQ, with outdoor couches and fresh herbs. We will definitely stay here again when next in town.

Our stay in Jared's apartment was exactly what we needed. It's a very comfortable space for two people. There is a big window that provides a nice view of the surroundings and a lovely breeze. We didn't use the rooftop pool (too cold) but it was gorgeous! The kitchen is very small but it's well set out so there is still plenty of bench space. Being on a high floor the hot water doesn't run for particularly long but it's fine if you leave a bit of time between showers. Checking in and out was super easy! The building is in a wonderful location, we walked easily to Haymarket, Darling Harbour, the Rocks, and Circular Quay. TIP: If you are driving into the city, this is not the place to stay. Parking was a nightmare. Jared does warn that parking is expensive (he mentions $69 in the apartment description) but what I didn't realise is it's not just a $69 flat rate for more than three hours, it's $69 the first day, $50 overnight, then $69 for the next day. In the end we just gave up trying to find cheaper parking and paid. Other than that our stay was wonderful. Thank you Jared for being a wonderful host!
When you wake up in the morning, you can see beautiful sunrise. Very nice ocean view in cozy house.
Ang was a fantastic host, easy to communicate with, and very accommodating. The place is equally as fantastic.

This apartment was everything that I needed, nice and quiet and close to public transport (a short walk to Milson's Point or Ferry). Stephen was awesome and communication was quick and efficient, great value for money as well.
Carol and Ian were lovely hosts who went to great trouble to ensure I had a good stay, including a local area guide,  a heater and bathroom toiletries.
Very affordable place to stay and this unit is very unique
My second stay was as good as the first. Just overnight, but I arrived earlier and was able to catch up with a bit of TV news and then do internet and chat with some good music background.
Oriel’s place is just as expected, and had everything you could need for a night away!
I loved our stay at Hilde's place.  Ocean views, and bush meets the sea.  The kids loved the pool and would have been perfectly happy staying put the whole time just to swim.
Fabulous place to stay. Views and close to everything. Highly recommend and will be back next time I’m in Sydney
The accommodation is close to where I was working, great bathroom and kitchen, laundry. Made life very easy for me.
房间很棒很干净,卫生间也很大,还有冰箱和厨台,下次还会住的

Mals place was amazing and Mal is an awesome host, very welcoming and willing to help. The apartment is in a ridiculous location and it is actually more impressive than the photos. If your going to stay in Bondi, always check if Mals is available, you will love it.
We had a lovely time here. It was a large room. Breakfast was lovely. Fantastic location, short walk from restaurants and cafes. Great hosts!
Terrific stay at Stevens, good location to the main street in Newtown and lovely self contained place for a stop over in Sydney!

This place was perfect for me while I was traveling solo in Sydney. It's close to buses, a bit of a walk to train stations, and close to a supermarket and lots of cafes.

It can be a little loud in the area - mainly birds and dogs which I'm not used to - and you can hear the garage door opening when the car is driven in and out, but it didn't bother me at all. 

Perfect little place for one person.

This was a great place. Very big by Sydney standards and amazing location. We really enjoyed the short walk to Bondi Beach every day.

A few maintenance issues here and there from previous tenants however Hannah was very responsive and helpful when these were raised.

Very good experience staying at Lucy’s spacious apartment. There space is clean and tidy with all the necessities we need for a comfortable 16 nights stay. And Lucy and her husband are very nice and considerate, they went extra miles to make us feel at home and comfortable. I recommend her place for future airbnbers.

A clean and very spacious apartment with tons of storage. The Bosch washer / dryer is a great addition although an iron would also be useful for business travelers like myself. Xinhui is friendly and accommodating. Check in is super easy with keys in a combination locked box and the apartment is quiet but well located for the city.
Was great to come back to after a busy day! Thoughtful touches and great amenities.
Great place! Really enjoyed the stay! Can be a bit noisy on the street at times

The accommodation was comfortable and clean, with all essentials provided ... and very conveniently located near the airport, where I needed to be early next day.
Communication was via AirBnB / SMS ... but Shuang was always available to contact and always responded promptly.   Self check-in and check-out instructions were very clear and very easy to follow.
Highly recommended - especially if you are travelling to or from Sydney Airport.

Exactly as described. The apartment is spacious, bright with great views and with all amenities. There is a supermarket very close to the apartment and also restaurants and cafes. Will definitely stay here again whenever I'm back in Sydney.

Richard's place is exceptionally beautiful. It's chic and in a truly excellent location. Perfect for a little getaway. Richard was lovely to deal with, generous with his home and the home was thoughtfully stocked with everything you might require. We had an excellent little holiday.
Great location! I was here for 3 weeks and it was close to beach and public transport. Perfect apartment

It was a beautiful stay in this lovely studio, we enjoyed the time there.
And Millie is a great host, the conversation was really good!
Thanks very much!!

Great place to spend your vacations at Sydney!... even though is not close to the city center it has an excellent location, the bus stop is right outside the apartment and you can easily go to the downtown using the public transportation (very efficient by the way). You can enjoy amazing views of Bondi Beach which is just a block away and do some surfing while you are there... I highly recommend Anita and this beautiful and cozy apartment for your next holiday at Sydney :)

The location is about 5 EASY minutes from international airport. Easy parking in private road.  Access clear amd simple,  Spacious bedroom, modern bathroom with AWESOME shower.  Kitchenette well equipped for simple needs.  Wifi excellent.   The bedroom door could be locked.  Great communication.  No traffic or aircraft noise - located in cul-de-sac.  Separate entrance to main house.  Have booked to return  for our next early flight.  Simple and great value
It is nice place for a family with 4, near by the markets,  public transportation and easy to move.

Great communication, accurate description of the space, perfect location and full of character. Overall an amazing experience and highly recommended. I will definitely be staying here again when I'm back in Sydney.
My daughter and her friends stayed at Danny's place. Great location, easy check in and check out. Spacious for the group of friends!

Michele was a wonderful host and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Her place is central and comfortable, close to restaurants and the train station. She responded to any queries quickly and helped make our stay as comfortable as possible. 
Thank you Michele.
Lovely little unit, feels homely, spacious and luxurious all at once. Very tidy and modern. I wish I could live there permanently!
Thanks kindly for hosting us, we had a nice stay. Very convenient location for events/concerts at Olympic Park
A great location for a quick stop over in Sydney before an international flight. An easy check in and check out that accommodated my super early morning check out time. And a great shower. Thanks!

Sarah was an amazing welcoming, supportive, understanding and culturally sensitive host. The place is exactly as described.

In spite of being quite far from the CBD, all the buses and expresses were less than 9 mns walking time. We could go everywhere in Sydney relying on the nearby public transportation network. We even didn’t need to hire a car as planned; due to the availability of all buses lines near Sarah’s place.

Sarah was reachable all the time, gave us a lot of tips about different things. My wife and I liked talking with her. She payed attention to the special things we needed as Muslims (We were surprised, she already aware of our religious needs!)

Very clean and modern. Bed very comfortable. Free parking on street. Only took 20 min to get to opera house by train. Lots of restaurants and grocery store within walking distance. Only negative was that you are able to hear the planes taking off in the early am
Great location! Host was easy to contact. We had trouble using the stove but host arranged for immediate repairs.

Hildes place is great we had everything we needed. She has it set up perfectly.  Very friendly host I feel she went beyond our expectations.  I would certainly recommend her place and we would love to go back. Thank you Hilde
A great place to stay close to the city

What a great find! We loved our stay here. Angela's place is exactly as it looks in the photos! Self check-in was a breeze and communication with Angela was excellent. The location was perfect and easy to find. Angela went above and beyond to make sure our stay was comfortable and the information pamphlet she sent was very thorough. The apartment is also close to Avalon beach and the supermarkets/shopping strip which was very convenient. I would recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a beach getaway :)

Jenny was very nice and sweet, we felt welcomed once we arrived. When me and my boyfriend lost our wallets at Bondi Beach, we were offered to help with money and were also allowed to rearrange with the check out time. The apartment is perfect for couple, compact but has everything you need and is well decorated. Lots of good cafes around the area, Kings Cross station is only 5 mins away. Good experience :)
An amazing time sums it all up! David's place is way better than the pictures! It is convenient and close to the trains and is really pretty! Theres weekend markets just outside!

Terry's house is very nice. The best part is the kitchen. It's very tidy and full of different cooking tools and spices. And there were a teddy bear sitting on our bed to welcome us. It's really surprise us. We have a really nice time here.Thanks Terry.
I always stay with Ali when in Bella Vista. Beautiful clean accommodation. Always a pleasure

Susan is a fabulous host, she did everything to  help my European guest welcome and able to enjoy his stay. He loved staying with Susan and  is very keen to come back to Bronte....organic chocolate, beers, fresh bagels....comfy bed, fab location, warm and helpful host, what more could you want?
erica

The apartment exceeded expectations.  
First, the location was incredible.  Literally overlooking the Tamarama beach and a beautifull balcany to sit on and watch the world go by.  
Secondly, the apartment itself was perfect.  It is clean, with great entertaining spaces and very welcoming.  You don't feel like your invading another persons home but it still feels homely - if that makes sense!  The beds, couch and linen were all clean, fresh and comfortable.
Third, it's only a 10 min walk to Bondi!
Finally, Wayne is lovely and immediately responded to all my questions.  We only booked the apartment a few days before, and it was my first time dealing with airbnb, so we really appreciated the quick responses.  Also, we had a bottle of champagne and chocolates on arrival which was a lovely surprise!
I would highly recommend this apartment.  It is the perfect place for people who want to hang out, relax and and enjoy one of Sydney's premier beach locations.  
I will definitely go back if I need a place in Sydney.
Great location for Olympic Park events

Great apartment - lovely and airy. Cindy and Claudio are calm and peaceful, and the decor reflects their personalities. The bedroom faces a main road, but it is surprisingly quiet at night and didn't bother me. The location is great - you can walk to Coogee beach, the racecourse, the university; and the restaurants/supermarkets are very close. Randwick is a really cool suburb for travellers in Sydney to visit, so I'd definitely recommend a few nights in this BnB.

This was a great house in a very cool area. It is in a super convenient location - trains and buses, grocery stores, cafes and restaurants all within 2 minutes walk from the house. The house is new and tidy, and full of plants and colour - it was a really nice atmosphere. The host was very helpful and made sure I had everything I needed, she even left me a little gift! The housemates were also really nice, they were friendly but did their own thing mainly, and that was fine with me. Overall an excellent airbnb experience. I would totally recommend it.

Great place to stay - close to the heart of Sydney.  We didn't get to meet Min, but the place was clean, well organised and was everything we needed.  Should point out that the entry system is a fully electronic from the front door, through the elevator to the apartment door  - no need to walk past an inquisitive receptionist, etc.
Judy was great to communicate with and easy to reach via email and messages!  Took care of issues quickly when we accidentally locked our keys in our room.
Location and apartment are fantastic. Everything was clean, tidy and ready for us. Paul is a great host. Would highly recommend staying here if in the Manly area.

Wir haben uns bei Ashlee und Duncan sehr wohl gefühlt. Das AirBnB hat eine gute Lage und war stets sauber.  Die beiden sind tolle Gastgeber, die uns unsere Zeit in Sydney durch Tipps und spontane Aktivitäten unvergesslich gemacht haben. Hoffentlich sehen wir uns irgendwann mal wieder! :)
Great little place, very close to the track and beaches. Definitely recommend it.
Great stay, handy spot! Nice space and everything you need. Super close to bus stops and restaurants/cafes.
The studio was exactly as advertised. Checking in/ out was a breeze. Though the studio isn’t the largest, it is extremely cosy and homely. Would definitely recommend it!
Very nice and clean apartment. Very nice and lovely hostess.
could not complain

Omio is really a lovely host that made us feel welcome from the first day on. He had so many recommendations for the neighbourhood and was also in for some activities to do together! His home is very clean, and the rooftop view is just amazing. I couldn't wish for more than this AirBnB stay, thank you so much Omio for your hospitality and kindness.

Cat was great! The place was welcoming and homey. We felt right at home. Definitely recommend. This was perfect for my family of four. We were able to cuddle up in the comfy couch after a day on the beach. 

We are especially grateful for our experience here because we had to cancel our previous place at the rocks.  The host there was unaffected with our concerns. All of which were half heartedly addressed, if at all.  The house at the rocks where we stayed had a terrible mold problem. My poor son was having asthma attacks. 

Luckily, Cat was able to accommodate last minute and she was sure to deal with any concerns we had right away. But we didn’t have any. Everything was great, you won’t be disappointed.
Neighbourhood was peaceful and we really enjoyed our time in there.
We enjoyed our stay with Krythia. The accommodation was very clean, comfortable and spacious, especially with the little outdoor terrace. Krythia made us feel most welcome.
Good value and close to the airport! Very clean and modern. Will stay again

Fabulous house in great location, easy check,host very quick with enquiries, had all that we needed!!
Our party of 6 adults and 3 children fitted perfectly into 4 bedroom two bathroom house, just make sure that is what you are getting!!

Deb
Great spot super close to restaurants and bars.
A great place in a great location.  Tim was very hospitable and provided us with local tips, breakfast and use of his apartment.  I would definitely recommend staying with Tim!
Great location. Large, stylish studio apartment with all the necessities. Nicole is wonderful to work with. I would stay here again.
The kitchen was great to cook in and was stocked well with the small things that one can sometimes forget when traveling like cooking oil, salt n pepper
Jack was helpful, friendly and responsive. I would highly recommend staying at his place in surrey hills. It's in a great location with a ton of restaurants nearby.
Great space, modern kitchen and bathroom, fast wifi. Everything as described, good communication.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here and although I did not meet Hugo, Ollie was amazing in every way.  He went above and  beyond to provide me with information and suggestions and help me in every way he could.  I gained a new friend in the process too.  
The apartment is very conveniently located and the bed really comfortable.  I walked to most places and took the bus or train at other times.  This was my first visit in Sydney and it was a blast.  Thank you, guys.

Great location.
Walk to everywhere necessary for a great break but close enough to enjoy the city by public transport.
Hernan was very attentive to my needs. We kept in touch during my stay. The surroundings were lovely with the beach next door

location is absolutely great! walking distance to city centre and chinatown public transport is less than 5 mins away. Phillip is a wonderful host, he will response to your message quickly. Will definitely come back the next time Im in sydney

The location was perfect with amazing Bondi beach views. Mal is an attentive Host.
Good accommadation but not luxury.
A hole in ceiling that needed to be fixed with a bowl to catch the drips in the sunroom area and no wifi for our stay which was disappointing.
Great cafes, bars, outdoor entertainment.
Modern space close to transport and shops. Excellent communication from Yang made the stay smooth and enjoyable. Would definitely book again
Amazing space, lots of light and the best views of the beach. Wayne is a great host and we would definitely stay again.
全五星好评!一尘不染,非常的干净整洁｡街区也很安静,适合短期或长期居住,强烈推荐!

Good location if you're looking for proximity to Balmain & transport to city. 

Good kids room downstairs.  A selection of toys too.  No problems with communication etc.

Currently no curtains on the windows in the main bedroom which meant we didn't sleep well, hopefully the owner will remedy this.
Great location & view Very convenient for events & activities at Olympic Park & surrounding district.
The apartment is small but in a great location. Good value.

Good accommodation!
Near bus stop and coles
Very convenient!
Perfect, affordable and private for a young couple. Feel like we were really catered to. Michele has excellent attention to detail. We had a really nice time. Thanks again!

We had a lovely time staying at Belinda's garden studio. The studio is lovely and cosy, and very peaceful. The location was great too, as right near the ocean, start of a great walk through the national park and not far to the shops. We would highly recommend staying here if you love walking and would like a great place to relax after.

Lovely quirky cottage in handy position to reach Darling Harbour and nearby Glebe. Comfy beds. Nice gesture of welcome pack on arrival. Only criticism is extractor fan broken in bathroom which caused humidity and difficult to keep clean. The host is very helpful and keeen to share local knowledge and wants to help you have a great time.
깨끗하고 위치좋은 숙소입니다. 호스트분이 커뮤니케이션이 잘 되고 친절합니다. 기차역, CBD와 가까우며 근처에 큰 마트, 식당 등 편의시설이 많습니다. 특히, 걸어서 10분 정도 거리에 한인타운이 있기때문에, 특별히 한국분들에게 추천하고 싶은 숙소입니다.
位置很好!出行方便!沟通及时!设施齐全!
old house with much amenities and great location if you are driving.
Friendly,  Spotless. and very helpful
We had an amazing time at Bens place! Great location and communication with Ben was on point. Would highly recommend this place and would definitely come back :)
Awesome location. Great service from host. Great accommodation
Check everything before stay..make sure is working everything
房子周边很安静,道路两边都可以停车｡屋内设施齐全,厨房用具都很干净｡会推荐朋友们也来选择此房源｡

PROS: Fantastic location in one of our favorite neighborhoods in Sydney, clean flat, not cluttered.

CONS:

This was a last minute booking, booked on the day as we had enquired about checking in the following day but as it was sitting empty we decided we may as well go ahead and switch rather than extend our current place as we had to check out the next day when the owner was returning period since the flat was sitting empty, as hosts ourselves, we figured they would probably be glad to get an extra night stay and additional money, but instead she acted as if she was doing us a favour.

We had requested to leave our bags with the cleaner as we were checking out at 11am from our current flat at the time - knowing the cleaner would be at this flat prior to 3 preparing it for us (we wanted to put perishables in the refrigerator). We were told no, that we could not drop our bags, for the cleaners safety. This was very strange since we have hundreds of reviews, have been hosting an Airbnb in Manhattan and other cities for nearly 10 years, are superhosts (not to mention one of us is an NYC attorney, weighs 93 lbs/42 kilos and only owns 5 inch plus heels and dresses and such and looks quite dressed up and out of place in Sydney to begin with, I only wear fitted trousers and loafers, so neither of us exactly look like the sort that would be intimidating any cleaners), and since we are Airbnb hosts/guests. 
She stated that clearly we must understand this ourselves, so we replied that we absolutely always (at no additional charge) do our best to accommodate guests checking in early or checking out late, and that even on same day turns, we do this, and we absolutely always allow people to drop off their bags even before the cleaner has cleaned or if she is there so that they don’t have to carry them around with them and may enjoy their limited time in the cities in which we host (mind you on two continents).

She continued to state that surely we understand, which obviously we made clear that we did not, but okay, we will drop our bags at the 3 pm check-in time and sit around with them nearby until then.

We then checked in and realized no fans were provided. There is a ceiling fan in the bedroom but the living room gets no circulation at all (faces a wall), so on hot days and nights it gets very stuffy. Also, it is a pocket wifi, not a proper modem, so do not expect great wifi. We continually received error pages, directing us to the internet providers information site (ie the sort you get if you haven’t paid your bill or have run out of data). Annie states in her informational section in the flat and on Airbnb the Wi-Fi is quite poor in Australia and Sydney, but we visit Sydney every year and usually rent a townhouse in Paddington (unfortunately has been sold since last year and this was a very last minute New Year’s Eve trip), and obviously had switched from another flat which was just a five minute walk away, and have never had any issues with Wi-Fi previously.
The host did send us a partial refund for this, upon a few reminders (I should add that she had stated when we checked in that we could extend a day, as they had an empty day before their next booking, but then after we had complained about the Wi-Fi and she offered us ~US$35 as a credit, she stated that we could not extend a day, and that is when we again reminded her about the WiFi credit extended, as we had planned to put it towards our additional day). 

The roof is not really usable, as it is so small with a giant laundry hanging rack that fills the majority of it and the rest is filled with a table, so the one time we tried to use it, it was pretty awkward as if anyone else is up there, not only is all the space taken but it’s kind of awkward to have to say sorry and turn right back around as you basically walk right into them. Plus they’re over your head (the flat is on the top floor), so you hear them walking around and moving the table and such, but obviously sound isn’t a huge issue coming from Manhattan. 
There isn’t a view by any means, so we really missed the roof we’d moved from. 

Finally, Annie, the manager, messaged us the day prior to leaving just to remind us we had to be out by 10am. Sorry, but not only is 10am early (which didn’t matter as we had a flight to catch anyway), but messaging on your final day kind of puts you in a bad mood telling you to be out so early (and not politely either). As hosts, we always message the morning of check out, so as to respect the fact that guests might be trying to enjoy their final day and don’t want to sour any final time.  

Its a shame other hosts can be so rigid and inhospitable, in so many ways.
A great little cabin. Very convenient to shops and train, and hosts are very welcoming.

A convenient location to Manly .
A good idea to bring milk, snacks etc as these are not provided
Beautiful, very good, perfect, clean. 5 stars!!!

Fantastic location! Very easy access to both ferry and train. Shops 5min walk away.  Clean and tidy place,  perfect for a couple or single.  The breakfast basket was much appreciated! Thanks again for having us stay.

David’s place is wonderful, and he is a very gracious host. One of the very best places we have visited and one of the very best experiences we’ve had. He is thoughtful and meticulous. We had a great time!

We were visiting our daughter in Sydney and we enjoyed our 16 day’s stay at Fred & Bernadette's place very much. The unit is fully self contained, clean and has everything you need (including wifi, Netflix and laundry possibilities). Malabar is a lovely town with a nice quiet beach, great ocean pool, restaurant overlooking the water (open from Wednesday till Sunday) and a beach cafe (open till 15.30 on Friday and Saturday till 20.30). The bus 399, takes 45 minutes to Central Quay, stops in front of the house and in the evening at a 2 minutes walk. For the bigger shopping centers, as detailed in the welcome book, you can better use a car, smaller shops are on a 10 to 15 minutes walk. Fred & Bernadette were very helpful, thanks for using the opal cards. I highly recommend this place.
Stayed at Yoco's house for a week and a half and it was great. Ideal location close to the city and good value. Robbie was a great host! Will definitely be booking it again next time I'm in Sydney.

Goed bereikbaar met bus 400 vanaf international airport. Lopend had ook zeker gekund qua afstand en als je overdag aankomt. Huis is goed te vinden door de beschrijving van verhuurder. Het is een prima kamer, licht, schoon en comfortabel bed. Badkamer ruim met fohn en wasmachine, gedeeld met 1 ander persoon. Ging bij mij erg goed.
Hernan was a great host!! He told us how to get around the city and recommended good websites to get jobs. Very nice guy, we'd stay again!!

This place is great, close to everything - transportation, Coles, cafes and restaurants. I loved the wooden floor and interior, it's very cozy and I loved it. Oliver and Hugo responses very quickly, there was no communication problem. The only downside was bugs - cockroaches. So we sprayed insecticide, like every morning before we left.

Desireé the host was very friendly and replied quickly to any questions. The apartment was a little noisy from the road outside but it wasn't a big issue. It has obviously been recently renovated and is very clean. There was tea/coffee and milk which was a convenient touch. I would recommend this Airbnb.
Sofar my best experience with AirBNB in Australia! A fantastic flat with everything you need in there, close to the station. George and Lucia are very nice.

Great location, really clean and convenient! The place is really close to the airport. We arrived at the domestic airport with the bus 400 and then left by the international airport by walking 20 minutes. We also went to Sydney on the evening with the T4 at Wolli Creek (10 minutes walk) for only 6$ for a return ticket :) we were really satisfied with our stay!
시티중심에서 위치해서 이동이 편리했습니다.
A great position very central  to transport markets Circular Quay and Darling Harbour.
For somewhere very central this accomodation ticks the box particularly if you need 3 bedrooms which is quite hard to find.

Well located. 
Some unavoidable noise from the large construction site next door.
Once again great to be there.
Place is in an amazing location. Clean and nice decor. Host was very responsive.

We had a lovely stay at Linda's, the place was tidy and clean, beds were comfortable. It was in a convenient  location and communication and check-in with Linda was easy- she was very accommodating! Thank you for a lovely stay! It is a great place and I would recommend it!

This is an amazing place to stay! Very impressed with the presentation and the special touches Wendy has added to make the stay perfect. This is great place and you will not regret the choice. Wendy was attentive and helpful... and  Wow what a bed!! We feel asleep to it’s soothing massages! Will stay here again in a heartbeat. Thanks so much
The host canceled this reservation 51 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great little home nice, neat and cozy. Wendy the cleaner was an absolute gem! Thank you for letting us call your home ours for the 5days Paul! Cheers
Lovely clean apartment ideal as a base and perfect for attending functions at Olympic park. Would come again.
A fab home, 2 minutes walk to a spectacular beach. Local shop close by too. We loved our getaway
A lovely place to stay. Easy parking and Tracy has thought of everything.
What a wonderful place to start the new year. Located right across from the flags in the beach at North steyne.  Great flat , with an even better view and  very  close to restaurants . Thank you .
A wonderful little apartment. We had a great time in Sydney and this apartment was cosy and had a great feel about it. A great place to relax after each long day exploring Sydney.

Jeremy's Darlinghurst house is a beautiful property and was a perfect base for several of our family members (including a couple of small children) who came to visit Sydney for the week. They really loved all the cool decks attached to the bedrooms - the city views are brilliant.

Jeremy himself is a very helpful and welcoming host. I'd highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to do the inner-city experience and not skimp on comfort!

This was an exceptionally great central apartment within easy walking distance to all of the iconic Sydney landmarks. We had very good communication with our host Gavin who was very accommodating as he allowed us to leave our luggage at the appartment so as we could enjoy our last day without having to carry heavy baggage around with us. The apartment was to a high standard and very clean. We would highly recommend this appartment to anyone with children, groups or just couples as it will meet everyones needs. Thank you so much Gavin for your hospitality.

Kath's apartment was a great way to start our vacation. We stayed in the room with the balcony and had plenty of room. Kath supplied bread, fruit and other breakfast items. We also enjoyed the many bakeries that are close to the apartment. Kath thought of everything from a fridge in the room, big bath towels, washer and dryer, to Tim Tam cookies. We enjoyed pleasant conversations and Kath was a great asset in dealing with our little emergency.  Kath was willing for us to check in early in the morning after flying in from the US. The only drawback was sharing the small bathroom with the other Airbnb guests who were staying there, but this was just a minor inconvenience.

Wayne and Kate's place is everything that we imagined. We stayed there for 5 nights and wished we could have extended our trip! 

First of all, Wayne and Kate are wonderful hosts. They were very responsive and was happy to answer all of our questions. They were also very accommodating and allowed us to check-in earlier and check-out later to match our flight schedules. Checking in and out was super convenient as they left us with very clear instructions. A manual regarding the apartment was also given to make navigating around the place easier. They even left us coffee and a bottle of bubbles to welcome us! 

Their apartment is right on Tamarama Beach (2 mins walking), and about 15-20 mins walk from Bondi Beach making it very convenient to go shopping, have a coffee or breakfast! 

The apartment itself was very clean, and all toilet amenities (including shampoo, conditioner, hairdryer, clean towels etc) were provided. 

Even though they didn't have air conditioners, they provided us with huge fans that kept us cool throughout our stay. 

I highly recommend their place, can't wait to visit again!

Bills's Place is exactly as described and with 4 bedrooms certainly has plenty of space. 
We loved the little courtyard in the back with the fishpond. 
The beautiful antique furniture and deco was a nice touch to a classic terrace house in contrast to the modern kitchen and bathroom.
The house manual was very helpful in explaining everything to do with the house.
Location is perfect, just 2 minutes walk to the light rail and 2 minutes to shops and restaurants. 
Bill was very helpful with our request to extend our stay a couple of hours so we didn't need to wait at the airport.  We would definitely like to stay again.
Nice room with full amenities! Recommend to those who need to catch a flight in the morning
Our second stay at Rachel's house and hopefully not the last. Absolutely fantastic place with great amenities and a gracious host. Thanks Rachel.

We absolutely loved our stay at Michy's lovely cabin on Pittwater. It is even more beautiful in real life than the photos show. Michy went out of her way to accommodate us and make us feel at home, and was also very respectful of our privacy. The cabin is a delight, and full of lovely touches that made us completely spoiled. It's literally right on the water too. It rained the whole time we were there but we were so cosy in our beautiful cabin and enjoying cups of tea on the verandah that we didn't care at all. The Yoda Food restaurant in Avalon just 5 mins away is delicious too! Thank you Michy for a wonderful and much needed rest in your delightful cabin xx

Richard's cottage is definitely an even better experience than the pictures suggest, very scenic views and lots of comfort. We used the cottage as a unique location for a film production. Richard was extremely helpful in providing local knowledge for ease of logistical preparations. The one trouble my team experienced was unrelated to the location, however, a result of the location's remoteness (only accessible by water). That problem was that the Barge Service cancelled on us due to unexpectedly rough (unsafe) water and wind conditions, which affected schedule on our bump in. You also must not forget anything as it is not practical to run errands if you forget to bring anything with you. Other than this, the film shoot went very well and everyone was excited by the cottage and its views. On another note: the neighbours were incredibly friendly and helpful. It was very easy to make contact with them, liaise with them leading up to the shoot and on the day they were very cooperative on a few requests of ours. The water taxi and barge service operators were also friendly, punctual and cooperative. I would recommend this place and hope to someday return for a weekend holiday to this paradise corner - it really is a hidden gem of Sydney.
Really is a great location & perfect for families, especially with older kids, would highly recommend

Fantastic experience at Greg's place! I highly recommend
Thanks

Great host, hospitality and place to stay at. We had a group of 5 and there was plenty of room. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking to visit Sydney and the eastern beaches.
Thanks Lizzy!
Tess and Rod a great hosts with a lovely home in a great location for what I needed. Good, honest accomodation.
David is nice, the house is well located,15 mins walk to Chinatown and hydepark. I will choose next time.

Great place and great host - as simple as that.
PS: a tennis court and pool on the roof (!!!)
Great location, right by the beach. The place is cosy and furnished quite nicely. Bedrooms are large and comfortable. Definitely recommended.

Simon and Nicole's spacious apartment is nestled amongst the leafy streets of Surry Hills, only a few minutes walk from funky Crown St and to Central Station. The space is warm and comfortable with a well stocked kitchen and a feeling of being at home. 

We were able to arrive late on a Sunday night and Nicole made sure our arrival was problem free. This was a fantastic place to stay and I could not fault it!
This is a beautiful room with great amenities and wonderfully provate! Michele was great at staying in contact and made me feel really welcome. I'd recommend her place to anyone!
Great place to stay whilst I acclimatised to Sydney.  Great host too, made me feel welcome and provided all the info I needed to know the area.

Mike is respectful, friendly, accommodating and easy going.  The location of the flat is great and the views from the roof are spectacular.  Within walking distance to Kings Cross, the CBD and major tourist attractions.  I would gladly stay with Mike again in the future.
Shuang's place was neat, clean and tidy. Fabulous for those early morning take offs from the airport.
Good place to stay
Awesome spot in the city easy to walk to great sites, restaurants and malls. Cosy vibe and spacious.
Beautiful space. Maria is very communicative and helpful. The location is prime!
Really nice apartment, very clean and had everything we needed plus much more. The street is very quiet and theres alot to see and do nearby. A perfect stay!

this is a top of the range airbnb stay 
and guests won't be disappointed or have anything to complain about - 
it ticks all the boxes 
nick is  also up there when it comes to hosts 
nick is a kind friendly and runs his airbnb in a professional way and this place ticks all the boxes

Die Wohnung ist einfach klasse!
Liegt direkt vor dem Hauptbahnhof von wo aus man im minutentakt in alle Richtungen fahren kann.
Mit der Bahn ist man in 10 Minuten am circular quay und es gibt auch eine direkte Verbindung zu den Blue Mountains!

Alexey ist ein toller Gastgeber!
Er hilft bei allen Problemen, gibt dir Tipps und fährt einen sogar zu orten zu denen man möchte :)

Die Wohnung an sich ist super!
Sehr viele Küchenutensilien, Shampoo und der Rest ist alles vorhanden!

Wir würden sofort wieder diese Wohnung nehmen, wenn wir nach Sydney kommen!
Such a delightful studio close to the beach we thoroughly enjoyed the space, the location and the peaceful surroundings x
Highly recommended. No problems at all .
Stylish unit in fabulous central location in fantastic Coogee. Leigh was very responsive to messages and extremely helpful. Thank you.
Well located and comfortable place. Generous host. Clear communication. Comfortable bed and pillows. Great shower. All good! Highly recommended.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
