We had a fabulous stay here for two nights, but could easily stay more. The accomodation is very well appointed with everything you need. If you want to cook and eat-in, the kitchen had everything. But Bundeena shops and restaurants are only a few minutes walk. The studio is in a secluded private location. We would happily stay here again.

Belinda was a great host and her studio was perfect for a couple's weekend getaway. Belinda was very quick to respond to all my queries before I arrived, and also have clear instructions to arrive. The studio itself is so nice, quaint, secluded and surrounded by nature. It's sits inter back yard of the main house but we were not disturbed at all. All the final touches were included in the studio and there was a really nice designer yet homely feel to the place. The bed was so comfortable :)A very short walk to the water too. Highly recommended :)
Gorgeous spot. Waking up with the kookaburra's was delightful. Have to get my darling back next time
Great place and fast response!

Perfect location for our trip to Sydney. Not too far from Museum train station for trip from airport (~$18) and also just a short walk uphill to bus stop to Bondi Beach ($3.66!). Numerous restaurants, cafés, and shops both uphill and down.  Washer and dryer were nice to have and full kitchen too. Bed and sofa bed were very comfortable. Easy access in and out.
Awesome little hideaway in the midst of the urban sprawl.  Was only there for the night.  Cool little pad.  Everything was as described.

Fantastic stay. Hospitality was great. Linda was very responsive and ensured that we were happy. Place is in a really nice neighbourhood,  close to the city and Redfern station (never waited more than 5 mins for a train).

We didn’t have a very good stay here unfortunately. The place was tidy we just think the cleaning of the place needed improvement. There were makeup stains and grubby marks on the pillows and doona cover, little spiders on the ceiling throughout the house, hair on the pillows, doona cover and throughout the bathroom on the shower walls and on the toilet. It was very uncomfortable and we were glad we only booked one night. If it was cleaned properly it would have been a great place to stay.

Great place in excellent location. So close to the beautiful beach and bus stop right by the apartment made everything easy.

There was a small issue, but the excellent communication of the owners contacted us straight away and sorted it out promptly.

Thanks for the lovely stay.
Mohit made communication so easy and we had no problem communicating with him. The place is lovely and the balcony is a fantastic place to chill with friends/family. Will definitely be back again!

Warm, light filled studio, compact but has everything you need. View from the loo window is pretty cool. 
An abundance of eating & drinking places all within an easy walk, (recommend the 'Shakespeare pub' 200 Devonshire st, for their Thursday night fish and chip special).
Again handy location for the single or couple travellers, easy key pickup and great communication with Ben.
非常好
房子地理位置很好,附近生活相当便利｡房间内设施也十分齐全,而且有两个卫生间,对于一家五口出行的很方便｡

Susan was very welcoming! She picked me up from the station on my arrival day! My first day it rained hard all day so I stayed at the house and caught up using wifi!  Susan kindly invited me to go to her swimming club with her which I enjoyed , the exercise was good!
Susan encourages use of kitchen and is not 'precious' about her stuff. She provides a nice breakfast of cereals , some fruit, juice and toast :-)

I really appreciate for their house and kindness. Thank you.
I couldn't forget memory in Sydney.

Thank you for everything. Ashley and Duncan took turns to chat with us, though all of us was in and out quite alot. 
Glad we had time to hang out briefly. 
All as described- clean and crisp, and felt truly welcome.

Great host! Place was very clean and perfect location for catching bus into Sydney which we did often.  And of course it was great to have a view and beautiful breezes. Grateful for the tips on eateries and Anita's quick responses.  Lovely stay!  Highly recommend.
Michele’s place is wonderful. It’s in a nice quiet street but is close to everything in Newtown! We had a great time and will definitely be back!

The unit was very clean, well designed and remarkably quiet while being at the heart of Newtown. It is close to public transport and all the amenities of Newtown. Narelle was a very responsive host, she replied to emails promptly and checked with us that all was well during our stay. The self check-in instructions were clear and easy to follow. Narelle had provided a short list of things to do in Newtown. We know Newtown well having visited a couple of times before, so my only suggestion for improvement would be some more comprehensive information about Sydney. Otherwise I wholeheartedly recommend this unit to other travellers and would definitely stay here again.
Clean, convenient location. Easy to access. Comfortable
Great location, very clean and comfortable stay!

Perfert!!
Good location, Nice house
We really had a good time in house.
Great location to be in Darling Harbor. Very modern and exceptionally clean.
Great value for money! Easy communication and great location

お部屋もきれいで快適でした｡
ここにしてよかったです!

Davids place was in an excellent location - easily accessible by underground and quick to the airport. Check in was made easy and his communication was excellent with us. Good value for money. Lots of nice little cafes and juice bars nearby.
Vickie is a very helpful and gracious host. Will definitely come again. Thanks so much!!
This is ideal accommodation for a couple or a single traveller who wants to be near the city and on the Airport route.  Lovely modern clean functional accommodation and welcoming hosts.

Good location, walking distance to China Town, Sydney Opera House, Darling Harbour. Host is nice and helpful. But unfortunately the air conditioner, oven and parts of the stove not work during our stay. Hope host can fix them soon as to bring the best experience to guests. Not bad experience at all.
We stayed for 3 night here, Sally's place is so close to everything. Fast responses to questions. I would definitely recommend this apartment.

Cat's house was in the best location. Just around the corner from great coffee shops and just a short walk to Bondi Beach. Bondi Beach itself is still only a 15 minute car ride to the city so it was terrific. The place was lovely and clean and beds very comfortable.
This place is a knockout ... stylishly decorated really well located ... short walk to anything you need in upscale area ... just perfect no complaints will return
Epic view!!!  Love this place
Pleasant people and lovely bushland

This place suited me perfectly. I’m not sure if it’s the same for everyone but it was for me. Very clean and functional. Small but enough for my use. Vicinity to Rose Bay wharf is unbelievably close. 

I would come back here if I needed to stay in the vicinity.
Great if you need an overnight stay for an event around the rocks or Opera House

Our stay was truly lovely! We were welcomed by freshly made banana bread and some groceries to get us started. The location is near the ocean, beach, rock pool and golf courses. Great with kids or if you want your peace :) Having a car is more comfortable but there is a bus too.
Perfect location for a beach holiday and lovely place to stay.
We had a lovely stay here - just one night. Quiet, relaxing, a lovely second floor room and picturesque backyard.

They're really nice host. Fred welcome us into his apt when we arrive & help us out with the foldable sofa. It was pouring on that day so he lend us umbrellas as well. Apt was neat,tidy & clean. They have juice &water in the fridge as well as brownies as a welcome gesture. We enjoyed 2 days of stay there. They also have an awesome view of the sea just outside the house which we really like.  Would love to stay there again if I vist again. 

Thanks for having us Fred & Bernadette :)
David was a great host. Everything need was provided. Room was clean and cosy all bars were in walking distance. I had a great time in Sydney. I can highly recommend his place. Thumbs up!

Thanks to Pamela and Hugo for being a great host! We arrived a few hours earlier after a long journey from Canada. Pamela and Hugo managed to get us in right away. The place has great view of the Royal Botanic Garden area and the ocean. It is very clean and safe. Pamela and Hugo provide a lot of stuff, including tea, milk, and etc. for guests to do simple cooking, to keep clean, and to enjoy the life in Sydney! The location is really central, 2 minutes walk to Town Hall Station, Woolworths supermarket, Queen Victoria Building; and only 25 minutes walk to the Opera House; very convenient to tourists. We love the host and the place!
중앙역과 가까워 교통이 편리하고 걸어서 주변을 관광하기에 좋았음
Stylish place, great bedroom, nice bathroom. Super easy check in. 15min walk from train station, quiet street.

We had a impressive experience in our stay. It’s a safe, clean and really stylish room. The hosts are very nice and sweet who would prepare some snacks for us in case we will feel hungry anytime. Beside, the place is so convenient that we can easily access to everywhere in this city we want to go. Really recommend it to you.

Paul's place in Potts Point was perfect for our two week stay in Sydney. Location wise it was spot on with the station just a couple of minutes away, buses on our doorstep and just walks away restaurants, coffee shops and more. Paul was an absolute pleasure to liaise with. He would respond so quickly, answering any questions we had. We can't thank him enough for letting us stay in his lovely apartment. 
If I had to choose one con, it would be the noise from the street below. We struggled with it one night out of our 12 so it wasn't too bad for us but if you're a lightsleeper, you may need earplugs.

This is a lovely space! Stylish, not too big or too small. We would even have had room for a 3rd visitor, if our plans had not changed. We could hear the fountain across the street flowing all night, which acted as white noise to help us sleep. The location is perfect, a short walk to the train station. If you're in the mood for a slightly longer walk, you could walk all the way to the Australian Museum, which is what my boyfriend & I did after a lovely breakfast at Marcelle (just next door). :)

시티에서 조금 떨어져있는 거리지만
시티까지 가는 버스가 도보2분 거리에 있고
중대형 마트가 집앞에 바로 있어서 편했어요! 실내는 정말 깨끗하고 잘 정돈되어 있었고 햇빛도 정말 잘 들어옵니다!

This apartment was one of the best experiences I have had on Air B&B. Anita has a tidy, organized and comfortable home with the most spectacular views. The apartment sits on the south end of Bondi with direct access to the beach. The building is a little older, but that does not matter when you have a home in such a magical place. Anita is a wonderful host, taking the time to share local information, being always readily available and just a lovely, kind person. The access to the city is super easy, with the bus directly outside the front door. I would never stay in a hotel in Bondi again, as this place is far better value.
It’s a granny flat and the aircon doesn’t reach the bedroom so was hot. Peter was nice but the price for the place that we were provided was poor
Lovely apartment in the heart of the city with view towards Darling Harbour, well presented and clean

Mariana is an excellent host. She will communicate almost everything you need to know about the apartment when you check in. I especially appreciated the road maps and travel guides in the apartment. I knew I had found a truly Airbnb wonderful host when she recommended I take an "apple cider vinegar and baking soda" bath after my long 24-hour flight from Germany. The bath was nice!
Lower your expectation! :)
Easy comfortable and convenient stay. Highly recommend

Rachel gave us excellent instructions on how to find her home and upon arrival we couldn't have wished for anything more.

 The beds were outrageously comfortable, the neighbourhood was quiet with a village like atmosphere and the house itself was well equipped with all the things one needs to make a visit memorable.... and then there was the spa bath!!
Suzie is lovely, the apartment is immaculate and the interior is beautiful. As for location you couldn't get much better, next to Darling Harbour with amazing places to eat and the CBD so close.
Stunning location . Lovely place
Lovely fitout in a very convenient location

Spent 7 nights at Manly Beach and loved every minute of it. The location is great - quick walk to the Corso, the beach or the ferry. There is a lot to explore just walking around. From the outside, the building could use some TLC but Ziggy’s Place is well cared for, bright and airy. The bed is comfortable, bathroom spacious and the place is clean. Lots of towels and toiletries provided, including beach towels. Enjoyed the balcony although the views aren’t that great, there isn’t much foot traffic below, except when the cafe is open but that isn’t a bother. It’s great for bird watching and we were lucky to have cockatoos and lorikeets and noisy miners come to our balcony. Enjoyed the whirlpool and did use the BBQ. Did not use the laundry $6 to wash and dry a load. Neighbors are quiet. Most of all, loved going into the city but coming back to Manly.
My partner and I had a wonderful stay at Krythia's place. Spotlessly clean, easy to access and very comfortable. Krythia is a great host.

This cozy apartment is conveniently located near the train (Kings Cross Station) and the weekend market in the park. 
WiFi is strong and lots of hangers! Nice to have travel books and maps available also. 
Excellent and a good price.
Lovely loft to stay :)

Thank you Trent for your prompt replies to all our enquiries before and during our 3 week stay at your home.  We were very comfortable there.  It was ideal for visiting our family and would definitely stay there again on future visits, if we had the opportunity.  Location was excellent with shops close by for every day needs and with public transport – buses and ferry - at the end of the street.

We didn't meet Nicole and Simon when we arrived yet Nicole was very responsive with our inquiry and sent us the details of key pick up location. The check in process were seamless and we found the parking easily.

The apartment has a great location, only minutes away from great restaurants and I found a great hairdresser just 5 minutes away who knows my hairdresser in Canberra. What a small world!

I like the toiletries provided in the apartment. Normally I use Aesop products and the Brown Alchemist products were very similar to what I normally used. 

I also like the way they provided everything that we might need in a trip such as umbrella, hair dryer, even Opal cards (we have our own but it must be really handy for someone new to Sydney). We walked to central station and enjoying the gigs and shows at Sydney Festival. The Uber charge from the city was less than $10. 

Thanks Nicole and Simon for sharing your nice place with us. We'll stay again if we are going to Sydney next time :)

If you are seeking a charmingly rustic, secluded getaway to a cottage located twenty metres from a stunning protected beach; look no further.

Getting to the house is a boating adventure directly from Palm Beach (either by the ferry, the friendly local boat house, or the water taxi). Not being able to drive to the house is a nice removal from the mundane, however make sure you pack accordingly.

The main sandstone cottage is designed to effortlessly entertain large or small groups of people. The generous outdoor setting is nicely accompanied by extra deck chairs and umbrellas.

Richard and Claudia have very tastefully arranged the homely living interiors and bedrooms. The tree-house (bedroom and bathroom), removed from the main cottage, is fantastic and you are treated to a stunning elevated view to the East. Watching sunrise over the ocean from the comfort of  bed is pretty special.

The quiet location means sleeping with the doors open to the sound of gentle waves is a must, and the house is well stocked with mosquito coils to make the pests don't interrupt.

The recently renovated kitchen contains everything needed for cooking, and is complemented by the large BBQ outside.

There are walking trails nearby which can take you to the West Head lookout, Aboriginal Archaeological sites, and tiny beaches dotted around the headland.

All-in-all, a very pleasant stay, and we look forward to any opportunity to return.

Excellent apartment loved the space.
So close to Ferry and trains beautiful spot, would recommend

Treen’s place is fantastic, and suited our family of 6 perfectly. It’s spacious, modern and bright, and she was kind enough to leave toys and books for our kids, which was incredibly helpful. The location is ideal, just 3 minutes walk to the trendy cafes on Hall St and 5 minutes walk to the beach. Treen was a fantastic host - very helpful and accommodating before our arrival, and available during our stay - though we didn’t need her, since the place was so great. Her home is perfect for families or a group of 6 looking for a charming house in the heart of one of Sydney’s best neighborhoods.

I just keep coming back. My favourite of all times. Lucy provides a superb air bnb experience. The peace  privacy and tranquillity combined with an incredibly comfortable and well appointed accommodation makes this feel like your second home.

Terrific in every way!  Susan was an amazing host.  Upon my arrival, she warmly greeted me like I was a long lost friend. The space is beautiful and shows such attention to detail. It could be featured in a home design magazine. Delicious yogurt, fresh fruit, and granola plus teas and coffees were provided. The linens were so cozy, I slept like a baby. The place had every special touch you can imagine. Susan gave great recommendations and was so helpful.  The location is ideal.  It's a short walk to a small grocer, pharmacy, and coffee shops and cafes, plus a most amazing bakery. You must eat breakfast at Three Blue Ducks. A little beyond the shops lies the big, blue sea that can be enjoyed by walking the coastal trail or from one of the local beaches. Bronte and Bondi beaches are easily accessible on foot.

This place was great. Much more spacious than I expected for a one bedroom unit (long hallway, big kitchen, lounge room and bedroom). The place was absolutely spotless when we arrived, especially the bathroom, which is always so important (hate when the bathroom is dirty!) Patrick and Christine were so accommodating when we had a last minute change of plans and asked if we could check in early to get ready for an event that afternoon. I will definitely stay here again!

Kate was a great host and had an exceptional apartment. Kate was amazing to deal with through her quick responses and friendly attitude. We had a wonderful time in Manly in her apartment. The apartment itself was stylish, clean, had great facilities and offered exceptional beachfront views. The garage offered safe and easy parking for our stay in Manly and the secondary car park in front of the garage was an added bonus. With the apartment being a walking distance to all main attractions, it made the apartment location a perfect stay for us.

We left Kate’s apartment with a better stay then expected, we loved the apartment and our stay in Manly. We highly recommend Kate and her apartment!

Our 11 days stay was great, Ali was very helpful when messaged her questions about the area and bus routes. Was a perfect location for what we were doing Australia, Hillsong Church/College is a 10 minute bus ride! Thanks for everything, I’m sure we will stay again next year when we go visit our daughter at the college!

Griffin's met us for check in which was super nice as we arrived quite late, he had also got us some fresh fruit. The place is in the perfect location for transport around the city. It is a pretty busy area at night on the weekends but this isn't an issue in the apartment. Everything was as we expected, lovely and clean. This place is perfect for a trip to Sydney.

Jonny was a lovely guy that made us feel very comfortable in his home. The apartment is fresh and clean with a comfortable bed, it is in a great location with just a few minutes walk to the centre of Manly and the Wharf to get a ferry to the city.
Edi was very welcoming to her home.  She was very quick and responsive on taking us in on the very last minute. Thank you for your help.
Nice apartment & convenient location
Amazing shower room. Excellent accommodation, and sparkling clean xx

Serena's apartment is centrally-located and near a lot of great restaurants and bars. The coffee shop next door was really nice. Serena was a great host and greeted us with a tasty breakfast basket. The apartment itself was nice and clean although somewhat dark and the main window faced a lightly frequented alleyway so we generally kept the blinds shut. That said, it was a good place for the price and I would recommend it.

Nothing is too much trouble for MissD. I had literally booked the day before. We arrived early and MissD's friendly husband was extremely helpful and accommodating preparing the room in no time and then by chance securing a perfect, handy parking space for us. Great atmosphere, locality very clean and well kept. Quality linen and fluffy thick towels. We would love to stay again.

Great directions. I am directionally challenged and I found this easily. Super clean, great bed, little bit of road noise but I slept very well. One hop and skip from the airport, we took the bus and it was cheap and easy. Thanks Hernan!
This place was close to Balmoral beach and nice places to eat. Having a car spot was handy to travel to the northern beaches of Sydney. Lots of hills in the area too. Krythia was a pleasant host.
Good space for who looks for location near Central station.
Great space and would recommend

My wife and I spent 5 comfortable nights here. We were completely satisfied with the studio's location, security, cleanliness, spaciousness, and amenities, including the WiFi connection. Andrea communicated well with us, and kindly left us a few food items in the refrigerator.

We had a great stay here during our first two days in Sydney. The apartment is even better than in the photos, and we absolutely loved the dining area overlooking the fountain and street below! Location is perfect, walking distance to Kings Cross Station, supermarkets, CBD, SOH, and Royal Botanic Gardens. Also very clean and well-equipped, and David left us things for breakfast too which was really appreciated. David was an amazing host, and we highly recommend this place!
Scher schönes Apartment und viele gut durchdachte Details. Sehr stylisch und mit allem eingerichtet, was man so braucht. Habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt.
Another awesome stay with Natasa at what i feel is already my home in Sydney :)

Great location and beautiful house. On the quieter side of town, just a walk across the road and through a path to the beach, this beach house is beautifully decorated and comfortable. Plenty of space for people in the large dining kitchen and the two bedrooms are apart enough to suit two couples. The surrounds, even in our wet weather, were breathtaking. Great escape from reality with little 3G/4G reception and no wifi!

I had such a wonderful stay at Charlie & Gioia's apartment. They gave me all the instructions I needed to get around the flat and even left a bottle of red wine. While it's a bit of a hike to get up there, Fairlight is beautiful and quiet and the walk to Manly and all the beautiful places to see around is totally worth it. The apartment is super clean and nicely decorated, I definitely felt at home. Thanks a lot for the warm welcome :)
Paul was super friendly and the flat was great in an awesome location and he met us and made it easy to get in with a great packet for us with tons of info about the flat and neighborhood.
마트나 패스트푸트가 가까이에 있어서 좋았어요 집에도 필요한 물건들이 다 있어서 불편한 점 없이 잘 지냈어요
Such a lovely few days with Belinda in the beautiful Bundeena - well worth a visit! Everything was perfect, thank you again Belinda, we will definitely be back.
It is clean, not far from the city, close to train station. Comfortable room with nice people. A lady who also stays in the house is very nice, so friendly and took care of us a lot.
very nice
Perfect for a quick business trip to Sydney!

Thank you for reply quickly.
l enjoyed art and fashion book:)

Very nice place.
The room is pretty clean.The location is convenient as it is only a few minutes away from Newtown Station. It can get a bit noisy though due to planes and traffic.
The home is in a fantastic location and Paul + family are wonderful! Great stay in Sydney.
Nice person& clean area, we are so appreciate for your welcoming.

Shuang’s place is sparkling clean and has all amenities that you would have. Check in is super easy without bothering the host or other guests. The suburbs is quiet and close to the airport (10mins walking to the railway station then only one stop from there.. should be cheaper taking Uber to get there).
Thanks Shuang for hosting me! Would love to stay at your place next time!
Beautiful leafy suburb close to the city. Gracious and friendly hosts.

What a gem! Great little hideaway in a fantastic location. Michele was an incredible host and communication was excellent. Do yourself a favour and book Michele's gorgeous place next time you're in Newtown/Camperdown.

This was one of our favorite Airbnb experiences and after traveling for 7 months straight have stayed in A LOT. The interior is stunning, clean, and makes great use of a small space. We had everything we needed and then some to cook meals in as well. The bathroom was very clean and spacious and there is a washer which came in handy. Would stay again!
Greg is so helpful all through our stay. They are how the perfect hosts should be.
Fantastic location + great host = wonderful stay..
Steven has 2 lovely cats. :)
Great location :)
Steven was very welcoming. Bed was very comfortable. Lovely little place.

My first Air bnb (being the sceptic who is used to the luxury of 5 stars hotel) and it blew me off. In love with Dino place and all his collections/ taste. Regretted not booking a longer stay. Would love to be able to visit Dino's place in Lucca one day. 
Already singing praises about Dino' s place to friends and will have no second thought about staying there again.
Thank you Dino & Rick.
Excellent location good size,made feel very welcome

The studio's location is very accessible. Its a few minutes walk from both Wynyard and Circular Quay train stations. That was a major win for us. We were able to visit one place in the morning, then return and feed the kids and visit another place in the evening/night. Jared provided us plenty of everything described in the listing.

You can even see Sydney Eye Tower from one of the windows. No balcony though.
Hernan is great and this was a super convenient place to stay for me.

The room looked exactly like the photos. It even had its own door for private entrance which was nice. It would not have been a convenient location to get to without a car but we knew that prior to booking because our friend was able to drive us around. The neighborhood is very safe and xiaowei was very nice upon arrival Everything was great for our 2 night stay!
I like this house very much
Absolutely wonderful place! So perfectly located in Surry Hills! It was fun walking around the area but also it was in the perfect place to catch a train!

We had a really great stay at Simon and Nicole's place. Check in and communication was quick and easy (many thanks Nicole!), the apartment itself is very spacious and comfortable with all the amenities you could wish for, and the location was excellent. Would definitely book again, highly recommended - thanks Simon and Nicole!
The place is nice and clean. Definitely  stay again.
Our stay at Craig & Leonie’s place was lovely, perfect for experience the Bondi’s lifestyle, 5min to the beach, 1 min to the restaurants and cafes. The garden is really nice. Thank you
Hernan is a warm, friendly and accommodating person.
Lovely place in a great location within walking distance of Newtown train station and shops and restaurants. Great host. Beautiful bathroom!
Lovely and central place to stay in Sydney.
Lovely studio in north Sydney.

오페라하우스 근처라 야경보러 가기 좋고
5-10분 거리에 큰 마트 2개나 있어 좋았어요
근데 먼지라던지 곰팡이가 있어서 아쉬웠고 4일동안 인당 수곤 하나라 매일 빨아써야하는 것이 불편했어요 그래도 응답도 빠른 편이었고 괜찮았어요

David was a lovely host. My check in plans kept changing on my behalf and he remained super flexible. The location is unbeatable - super close to shops, cafes and safely located to walk to and from. The private tv and netflix was a real treat - I may have binge watched a night or two free from judgement. David was a lovely warm host throughout my 4night stay. 110% recommended :)
It was a lovely stay, from how beautiful the place is to how amazing Angela was with making me welcome and comfortable. Everything was worlds above average.
可能是墨尔本的房东太周到了,到了悉尼就感觉到落差了,房子很宽敞,位置也很好找,只是交通不是很方便,周围只有巴士站,最近的火车站走路过去要15min钟,吃东西也不是很方便,附近只有一家便利店｡因为uber故障,所以打车也不是很好打,而且卧室的枕头里面不知道装的什么,沙沙响,不是很舒适｡细节还是有很多可以改进的,希望Wendy把民宿越做越好｡

The accommodation is within close proximity to Arncliffe rail station and very near taxi ride to the airport which is very handy. 
The premises and fixture and amenities are very clean and tidy and I would recommend this for anyone travelling thru. Very quite Street away from traffic noise.
Regards
Vince (Newcastle)
Great house, only issue was I didn't realise there was no air con and the weather was pretty hot
As others have said this is one of the best air bnb places I have stayed at - the place is gorgeous and private yet conveniently located and has such a wonderful feel. I would highly recommend it.

Very clean & comfortable apartment. 
Close to all amenities.
Host was very accommodating.
Highly recommended accommodation, we will be back.

Hugo was out of town so arranged a friend to meet us at the apartment when we arrived. It was very easy to get to (we walked from St. James station) and in a nice neighbourhood. The building/apartment is very secure and in a good central location.  Good places to eat close by, Bloody Mary's for breakfast was a great spot.
Also probably the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in!

Great location, easy to find, nice neighborhood, self check in super convenient and efficient, place is clean and nicely decorated with everything you need, except coffee. Walls are thin so you can hear people talk or walk by but not a big issue for me as at night when you sleep it is quiet. What bothers me is the second night it was very windy after the thunderstorm, something kept banging  on the window periodically and woke me up at 5am. Unsure how often it gets windy or is it just me who’s unlucky.
Beautiful and spacious place in a great location.
Johannes was a pleasure to communicate with. I booked on behalf of a colleague who had an excellent stay.

Phoebe is a great host who respond very quickly. Her apartment is beautifully decorated and it is very clean. She also provide generously and we enjoy strolling down the shops. The provision of carpark space is a great plus. We will recommend the place to anyone. Thanks
My Daughter and her friends stayed  one night  at Dannys place, they like it. The place is clean, located in a good area.

Superhosts for a reason! Flat was located better than expected, only short walk to bus stop from which frequent buses need 5 mins to CBD.
We even got something priceless from Duncan (no further details to avoid everyone expecting this)
Tidy apartment close to University of Sydney and short distance from CBD
Great little appartment, very clean and tidy! Laura was easy to communicate with. Comfortable beds too :)

This is a great little self contained unit. It was super clean, looked very new and modern. Private entry was great and check-in and out was a super easy and smooth process with all details sent through the day before. The shops and public transport a super close, an easy walk away. Cannot fault it, was a lovely place to stay for a long weekend, close to family living in the area. Thanks.
Good location and communication with the host.
The room is exactly like the pictures and the balcony is very nice. It was really close to the train station and you are very fast in the city.

It absolutely is a good accommodation in Sydney. The house is large and the facilities in house is complete. However, the shower water is too cold. Maybe it will be better if it has a calorifier. Anyways, the house is in the city centre and house price is quite cheap. It is high performance cost ratio.

We found our heaven at Richard and Claudia's place at Mackerel. It was an ideal home and location for our family and the holiday we wanted.
Richard's communication was always prompt and helpful, and he and Claudia went out of their way to assist us with several aspects of our stay.

I was in Sydney with my family for a holiday and we've had a lovely stay at this new granny flat. It was above and beyond our expectations. If I could rate it, it would be an easy 10/10. This place was way better than a 5-star hotel. This was my first Airbnb experience and they have set the bar so high. From day one, George and Lucia had been nothing but helpful, attentive and on the ball of everything. There was so much thought given to every little detail of the house. The house was super clean and it always had an amazing scent. Fresh linen and towels were provided, and the bed was amazingly comfortable. The kitchen was fully equipped and everything needed to cook was there, including the recipe books. Commuting was rather easy. We took the train most of the time to travel to the city. The nearest train station is Kingsgrove Station which is about 10-15 minutes walking distance. Opal cards can be purchased from a convenience store at the station. We also downloaded the "Opal Travel" app to check on the train times and fare estimate. The nearest supermarket is Woolworths which is only 2 min walk from the train station. There are many restaurants around the train station too. This place has truly made us feel like home and there is absolutely nothing better than returning to a cozy house after a really long day in the city. George and Lucia were the best host we could ever ask for. We will definitely stay here again if we return to Sydney :)

I booked Marcella's place on behalf of family and she was extremely communicative in making sure their needs were met and that getting in was trouble-free. I would recommend dealing with Marcella without hesitation!

Cindy is kind, lovely and easy going. Her house is nice,clean and also  quite at night. There are many buses  around there and restaurants just in walkable distance.  I stayed there during my final exam period, and I felt like at home. Nice to stay at Cindy's place !

My spouse and I spent our first days honeymoon at Susan’s place.
The studio is so lovely (we both agreed it was our best Airbnb experience in the last 5years), comfy, calm, perfectly located (very close from the beach and good restaurants). 
Susan and her husband are very good and caring host.
Fully recommend the place !
Thank you Susan :)
Great little cabin. Private, warm and cosy with everything you need. Susan is a lovely and thoughtful host. Recommended to anyone

Jyoti's home was clean, tidy and comfortable. Jyoti and her husband were warm and friendly and made me feel very much at home. Their home is conveniently located 20 mins walk from Olympic Park and 5 mins walk from the shops.

Highly recommended to stay in such a convenient location. A short walk to Enmore Theatre for those seeking an easy overnight stay. Great communication form the host, lovely atmosphere and well priced for the area.
Great place to stay with a comfortable bed. Air conditioning works well on hot days. Great views of Sydney cbd and the Harbour Bridge.
Loved the location (5 mins walk and your in Circular Quay) and the apartments high ceilings (its top floor). Was also surprised to find a small but lovely pool area on the roof.

This apartment is very interesting on 3 levels so make sure you can handle stairs;)
I found the location fascinating. Directly opposite the railway station and work going on putting in the light rail but it did not impact in the evening at all. 
Loved sitting on the balcony with generous bottle of supplied Chardonnay,  people and train watching. And the lovely city lights beyond. Though the trains seem to go through the night ( I looked if I got up) I did not hear (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable mattress (on floor as in photos) and lounge to relax on after a long day out and about. 
I wish I’d had time to read some of those great looking books!
Very homey and comfy and great location to get to anywhere!

Excellent place to stay.  Yvonne and Carey's house is beautiful and extremely clean.  We felt very welcomed and they went out of their way to be gracious hosts.  Wonderful to talk to and great communicators.
Great place to stay if visiting sydney, close to everything, much more private than you'd think and check in was a breeze!
Place is clean and location is quiet. All good.

If you would prefer a place in Sydney to use as a base, this is it. Perfectly positioned amongst everything Sydney-ish. A good space to lightly relax with another couple after a concert or night out on the town. Maybe not a place you would chill in for a weekend to 'get away from it all'.
Good beds, although light buffer to noise on Bridge St & George St, and air con in slightly larger room.
Bathroom tricky to feel comfortable in, but clean, as for kitchen.
Very reliable communication with check-in etc.
Easy, has the basics for what you need and notes well communicated in explanatory information.

My husband and I stayed here for a week. The place is great, it had everything we needed.

We checked in on a Saturday (race day) and got to watch some of the horses race by from the balcony...with a glass of wine! I also enjoyed watching the horses being trained/walked early in the mornings. 

The TV was huge and we enjoyed watching Netflix/Stan. Having WiFi was also a bonus.

We would definitely recommend friends/family to stay here. We would stay again.

Thanks Oliver!

I really enjoyed my stay at Jamie's , the view from the balcony is amazing, had my morning cup of tea and glass of wine in the evening sitting there.  Found it close to shops and restaurants. Very clean and spacious. I would love to stay again some day

This is a great holiday house to stay in.  We are a family of 5 and were very comfortable in the space.  The flat was nice and clean with all the kitchen essentials, plenty of seating and an outside area which we used a lot too.  The area is great, the shops are close enough to walk to and just up the road there are lots of different restaurants and a fantastic patisserie.  The bus services are excellent with buses every few minutes into the city and down to Coogee Beach... Look out for the family funday sunday tickets at $2.50 per person for full day travel on buses, trains and ferries (if you are travelling with kids)!

Had such a lovely stay.  Location is very near cafes and newtown station,  about 5mins walk, 
very near the bus stop - 2mins walk .  Ms. D is very responsive with quiries.  Thank you!

Incredible place and incredible host...even was super flexible when I accidentally told her the wrong time of our arrival (oops). The place is gorgeous and makes you feel like a local while being an easy train ride or walk to all the tourist places. Highly recommend it.

The place is very large, with very big common areas that could accommodate everyone twice over. The location is great with transport connections from the airport bring very simple with short walk and train ride. The surrounding cafes and parks. Given the look in photos I was concerned that my 1 and 3 year old might reek havoc this was not the case. The little outdoor areas and the nearby playground were great for them. Supermarket  cafes, pubs are 5mins walk away. Vanessa was helpful and quick to respond.

The apartment is exceptionally clean, comfortable and perfectly presented. Oliver is extremely hospitable and lightning fast with communication and thoughtfulness. He went above and beyond letting me drop off some luggage early. Easy check-in/ out and perfectly located for quietness, yet close to anything you need. Everything was much better than expected, don't hesitate to book this place because I will next time I have the opportunity. The view of the race track while having coffee each morning was pretty cool too!

The wonderful expenrience has made our tour Sydney a memorable one. Not only the amazing appearance of the modern apartment but also the cozy home-like atmosphere make it suitable for tourists travelling in this city. It's been surprising to find very single that may be needed durig the stay are provided and placed in immediate reach. Thanks to Naveen to make it nicely. I bet this is exactly the  accomadation everyone is looking for!

Treen's place is perfect for families. It's excellently located in close proximity to restaurants, Harris farm and other markets, excellent coffee, and many other shops, and is of course an easy stroll to the beach. Treen is very responsive to any needs or concerns. The place is well stocked with kitchen supplies and condiments, and baby toys for the bath. We would love to stay again in the future and recommend to others.

Julia and her sister Adelle are friendly and helpful, they always respond to my enquiry within a day. When we reached their place after a tiring flight, Adelle gave us a warm welcome and they even prepared some snacks for us. That was very thoughtful.. The unit is clean and tidy, with a big bedroom and a cute kitchen. It's located at a great neighborhood, convenient and quiet. The unit is within walking distance to ferry and bus stop. We stayed for two months and spent a really great time there. PS, do try the pizza shop nearby, you won't be disappointed!

The place is exactly as presented in the pictures. Its clean, well stocked and the location is perfect for getting around all the sites while still enjoying a good nights sleep. 

Jeremy is easy to communicate with and generously accommodating. 

If you stay, try the Rusty Rabbit cafe just a block away.

Fiona was a great hostess. I was able to come and go as needed. The dog was no problem, in fact quite friendly. The bed was very comfortable and tastefully furnished. The bathroom was clean and for my own use. Overall recommend for short stay visitors to the area.
沙发有些脏

Beautiful comfortable space that has great attention to detail - amazing, caring & attentive host.
I highly recommend this for great inner city getaway - quiet and safe too. Amazing comfortable bed and lounge. Kitchen has everything you need in terms of pots and pans.
Conveniently located for cruises & provided needed amenities

Duncan and Ashley are wonderful hosts. They have been very kind to me. The place is nice and cosy, though if you are a couple it might be a little small (I was by myself so the place was perfect). Very convenient to catch buses to the city also.

We have stayed at Susan's place several times so this is a place we like very much. The house has a great location, close to public transport and restuarants, and the garden is very exsotic. Susan and Greg are excellent hosts. Very friendly, almost like 'old friends'. This place is highly recommeded.
Perfect location!  Spotlessly clean apartment.  Would definitely recommend!

We’ve stayed at The McCallister’s regularly and always recommend it to others wanting a quick getaway. The house is perfect. The beach is paradise and the view is spectacular. Great hosts and wouldn’t want to stay anywhere else in the Pittwater region.
A lovely house just a few blocks from shops and restaurants as well as the bus line. We loved everything about it.
D
Great location if you are attending anything in the Olympic Park area. Easy access, and plenty of food options nearby.
Michele's place is centrally located close to the newtown vibe. We'll equipped and comfortable. Great communication.
Very nice appartment !

We absolutely loved our stay at the garden studio - the only bad thing was having to leave! It's the perfect base for solo travellers or couples to explore Sydney and is definitely the best equipped Air BnB we've stayed in to date. The breakfast basket was fab, as were the delicious cookies we found on our doorstep when we arrived home  on our last night. Cath was super helpful and friendly (as was Hazelnut the adorable pup!). Highly recommend and would definitely stay again.
Fantastic townhouse just off Mosman village, perfect launching pad to explore Sydney. Perfect accommodation, well presented and Rachel is very welcoming. This place is fantastic, highly recommended.
Stunning location.
交通便利 房間乾淨

Great place to stay! Very conveniently located within a short walk to the Central train station and Surry Hills. The room was huge and had all the amenities you would need. Very clean bathroom with your own drawer to house your toiletries. Yoco wasn't in town but was easy to communicate with. He had everything set upon my arrival. I would stay here again.
A lovely BnB with everything that is required for a great stay at Olympic Park.  Close to Rhodes - IKEA, DFO. Sydney Markets and so much more.  A wonderful place to stay in Sydney
Great neighbourhood. Stylish and expansive accommodation option that it close to nearby private hospital. Very clean and sophisticated accommodation. Would thoroughly recommend.
很好的地段｡去环形码头､歌剧院､皇家植物园､博物馆均只需要步行｡饭店､酒吧､超市也很近｡房间里的电器一应俱全,餐具也准备的很齐全｡居然还有筷子｡总之,体验不错｡推荐

This is very nice place to stay for a short trip to Sydney! You can cross the Harbor Bridge by foot, train or bus. There is also a ferry terminal nearby but you need to check the schedule first. 
Thank you Stephen for opening up your place on Airbnb.

Sarah is a very warm and welcoming person, and the accommodation was very clean and comfortable. I highly recommend staying at Sarah's place if you want somewhere that is comfortable and a very gracious host.
Coral
Richard was amazing to deal with. He was great at communication and helping us know how to make the most of our time at this wonderful place. It truly is a special place and well worth a visit.
Fantastic accomodation,good Value for money,great location.super tidy with a homely feel.Thankyou.

Great artistic house in a fantastic neighborhood ! Nearby very nice restaurants, bars and shops but still quiet ! Walking distance for train and bus station. Room is beautiful and clean as the bathroom . The only missing would be aircon...
Lorraine gave us a warm welkome !
To recommand !
Mike is such a great guy and made my stay so easy. Great apartment which is clean and the area has everything you need. Make sure you check out the view from the roof. Cheers Mike..

It’s a lovely house in a fabulous spot only a minute’s walk from the beach. Very peaceful with a lovely breezy deck, perfect to enjoy a glass of wine while our son ran about. We had a very relaxing long weekend and would definitely come again!
Edi welcomed us into her lovely home. She is great for a chat (honestly we could have stayed talking all day) and has loads of travel tips. Thank you!

We had some wonderful days in Adam Roberts apartment . The apartment is centrally located in a nice part of town close to much. It has a nice big terrace and private exit to the house
pool and great views over the rooftops and the sea.

Very nice place to stay on your trip to Sydney. Great location! Close to the train station, it’s just a short walk. The bedroom and restroom were nice and clean. 
We’ve enjoyed our stay.

Gavin's place is extremely convenient & a short walk to some of the greatest meals on earth. I'll definitely be back the next time I'm in Sydney! The best part is that Gavin is always up for a conversation about anything (thanks for the insight into Australian politics!). Anyone who wants to experience the beautiful Surry Hills neighbourhood should stay here. It really is incredible.
Great location, stunning views, lovely ambience and amenity.

Gavin was a very nice and friendly host - I enjoyed a lot talking to Gavin about australian society, politics, aussie football and so on.
Gavin's appartment is very well located - just a few step further and you are in Central Station - in a cool and trendy neighbourhood.
About the room - it has been renovated, spacious and the matress is awesome :) 
Thanks Gavin and see you soon in Portugal or France!
good location and apartment. Help us enjoy our trip very much
Pleasure to stay with Sarah after arriving from Ireland to begin my move to Sydney.  Really nice apartment, great service, helpful tips & friendly demeanour. Would highly recommend.

Great location with pretty well all the amenities provided. It has been several years since I'd last spent time in Chippendale, and what's been done with the old brewery site is fantastic. Some really good restaurants to explore!

This is a very convenient, cosy and perfect appartment in the center of a lot of action: Central station is 8 minutes to walk and then your are close to all attractions in Sydney. The neighbourhood us lovely, typical Sydney townhouses with a great pub on the other side of Abecrombie Street. It is 6 minutes walk to the train station Redfern.
The appartment has all you need and the shopping for these needs is at Redfern station.
Linda is a very helpful host, always available by sms if you need advice.
This unit is very recomendable for 2 or 4 people. Have fun! Thank you Linda!
Michael Wendt - Germany
A clean and comfortable place with ex-ordinary hospitality.

Everything was perfect !
Ideally located,nice appartement & view.
Hosts very nice, helpful, discreet and welcoming !!

Place was lovely with everything you would need for a night or two away. Can highly recommend a pre-dinner drink across the road at a little private beach followed by dinner at the Clareville kiosk which is only a few minutes drive from here.
Couldn't get a better deal! Well worth a try. (We got the spider man bed linen!)

외국인들 후기에 베리 클린, 클린이라은 얘기가 많아서 깨끗한 줄 알았는데 아니에욥^*^ 생각보다 낡았고 못 쓸 정도는 아니었는데 와!!!깨끗!! 이정도는 아니었지만 뭐,,, 쓸만하네,,, 정도였어요
위치는 뮤지엄역에서 5분, 센트럴에서 5분 정도로 엄청 좋아요
근처에 12시까지 하는 coles도 있어요
가격 대비 가성비는 굳!
전반적으로 만족하지만 화장실이 호텔급으로 깨끗했으면 하면 별로일 거 같아요
Great location, can be noisy on weekends as busy street. Gwen is lovely though.

I had a great stay at Yoco's, it reminds me a lot the movie Auberge Espagnole with mostly europeans roommates. I didn't have the chance to meet everyone because I was very busy but I would definitely stay again at his place. Yoco was also really flexible regarding the check-in time, I was able to drop my luggage early in the morning even though the room wasn't ready yet because an another guest hadn't checked out yet, that was really convenient after a long flight from USA.

Also if you're a light sleeper, it can be loud, it's not really well soundproofing. I'm heavy sleeper it didn't disturb me.

We absolutely loved our stay in Bronte. I would highly recommend staying here for a perfect weekend away. Susan and Greg were lovely. They greeted on arrival and made sure we were comfortable. Susan left me her umbrella as it was raining the day we arrived. They provided us with great tips on what to do and where to go in the area. The studio is beautiful. We were provided with tea, coffee, orange juice, chocolate and other breakfast treats. Fresh bagels were delivered to our door on the first morning. The studio is very private  and comfortable- it has everything you need and more. The wifi works well, which was important as I worked on the first day we arrived. The location is perfect. It was a lovely short walk to local cafes and to beautiful Bronte beach. We walked to Bondi along coastal walk one morning and to Coogee one evening. It was a short uber to Bondi and Coogee for a night out. I would recommend for anyone to stay here and I am now completely in love with the Bronte neighbourhood. Stay here and you'll feel like a local!
We had a great experience at Tracy's place in Narrabeen. The apartment was a great size and located just off of Narrabeen lake. We would definitely recommend staying here and would do so again!
Great apartment with amazing views. Much better value than staying at a hotel. Highly recommended.

We had a lovely stay. The house was just like in the photos. Confortable bedding and a cute courtyard where thé kids could go outside. Situated on a main road so maybe a bit noisy because of vehicles at times. Very clean. Duplex.

Steven is an excellent host, very friendly and supportive. Location is very clean, full of light, simple and nicely equipped, for both, work and relaxation. Unless bothered by some transient airplanes flying over Petersham, which you can get used easily, then the place is also very quiet.

Thank you Ian & Carol for your hospitality and hosting. Thoroughly enjoyed our time in Sydney and felt very comfortable in your home. Want to mention how convenient the location was and how helpful you were in getting us around town & picking up from the train too! If we come to Sydney together I’d like to stay there again! Thank you so much!
Great stay in a great home. Would recommend!
Lovely apartment and location. A friend of Dino meet me to let me in and the place was perfectly clean and welcoming.

Our stay in Bronte was lovely. Communication with Susan was easy and clear. Susan and Greg were welcoming and very respectful if our space and privacy. We knew they were around if needed though felt we had our own space too. A great little pad in the gorgeous Bronte. Highly recommended . Thank you
Very good value for location, nice apartment with a great view!

Absolutely great place to stay and a wonderful experience. The apartment itself is very nice and very comfortable; it is light, airy, relaxing - all the things a beachside apartment should be. And the location just can't be beat. It is right on the beach and right next to everything you want to be near, while retaining the laid-back 'neighbourhood' vibe that the best parts of Bondi seem to manage. The views are, needless to say, spectacular. 

Mal was very friendly, offering us some local insights into places we might want to check out (or avoid) and although we didn't call him again after we checked in, he was sure to let us know we could call if we needed anything. In short, the perfect place to stay in Sydney. Would go back again in a second.
This is an amazing place to stay. Close to the wonderful Centennial Parklands and the apartment was immaculate- there is nothing I could fault about this place or the host.
Great place, great neighborhood, great host! We stayed for 10 days and felt right at home.
Lovely place, beautifully furnished and set amongst the trees. Effortless check-in and great experience overall. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
The host canceled this reservation 55 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Phan's place was very comfortable for our group of 5. The apartment was clean and was convenient and easy to locate. Phan was great at responding and was always happy to help. A great stay overall!
Great place for a weekend getaway in Newport. Tessa is a wonderul host.

Location fantastic, accommodation fantastic, hosts fantastic!

We really enjoyed our stay. The place is as advertised. Conveniently situated for leisurely shopping, with great selection of restaurants and a cinema all within walking distance!

Thumbs up!

We stayed at Aquila House over Xmas and NY in 2013 and had a spectacular time.  The house is stylish and simple, with impressive water views and only a short walk to the beach.  It managed to take 2 adults + 2 children + various other family members and friends with kids for BBQs without seeming crowded.  My sons were amazed to hear kookaburras and have a couple of parakeets come down to join us on the terrace at breakfast.  Susie the owner was very straightforward to deal with and added some really thoughtful touches to welcome us (Xmas tree, hamper, list of best cafés and restaurants in the village).  Just be aware that you should rent a car to get around, same need if you stay anywhere  outside of the very centre of Sydney to be honest.  I highly recommend Aquila House for a genuine summer break.
Enjoyed my stay. Was exactly what I needed.

Vanessa was extremely prompt in returning all emails.  The location was brilliant and close to many great places to eat, catch a ferry and public transport.  The kitchen was great with all you needed to make a great meal and serve.  I would definitely stay here again.
Paul's place was absolutely fantastic! perfect for a few days exploring the city and so easy to get everywhere from. Was met by Susan their cleaner who was absolutely fantastic and so helpful!

We attempted to stay here on business trip to Sydney. The apartment was not at all what we expected, there were blood stains on the sheets, hair left in the sink, grim on the shower floor and the toilets were dirty. Naveen was very unprofessional in her response to this and we ended up leaving because we felt very uncomfortable.

We really enjoyed our time at Davids House. It is perfectly located - very close to transport, Cafés, Shops and you can easily reach a lot of sights by relatively Short walks (Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Darling Harbour, ...)

The House/Room is very clean and Looks exactly like the pictures. Very nice room with balcony, TV, comfortable Bed and a Lot of Space to store your belongings. The bathroom also is very clean and Even bigger than expected.

David is very nice and helpfull - he can help you Out in almost every Situation. David even created a booklet, which recommends some nice Bars, Restaurants and Breakfast-Offers.

Thanks for everything, David. We really enjoyed staying with you/at your beautiful place.

We can totally recommend David and his House/Room

If the property still has a king sized bed and a queen sized bed in the description and this is important to you then you may wish to get an explicitly acknowledgement that this is the size of the beds at the property as when we stayed the sizes were double and double.
Jennifer met us at the house when we arrived and made us feel at home. The house looked just as we had viewed on the website and fulfilled our expectations. We loved the private outdoor area.

J ai passé trois jours très agréables dans le studio du jardin de Susan. C est un studio très confortable, très pratique dans lequel on se sent comme chez soi. Le quartier est très calme avec toutes les facilités des transports en commun. Susan m'a très bien acceuillie. C'est une hôtesse serviable et joyeuse.
Très bon souvenir !
so comfortable room and so kind host! I wanna stay again.
The excelent place to stay at least one night, close to all, and with a natural ambient that help you stay relax and confortable.
Great place good host

A perfect dream escape for one or many. We were a group of old friends catching up and this was perfect to swim, cook and sit together. Richard is a perfect considerate host and Great Mackerel is a place of beauty.
The view from the apartment is beautiful and it's got everything you need in it. Location is perfect and I'd definitely stay here again the next time we visit Sydney

Had a wonderful time at Jeremy's house. The kids especially loved the stairs and the loft bedroom.  The views from the balconies a must see. 

Located very close to Sydney cbd. Local buses just a street away, 5 minute dawdle. It is possible to walk into / from the city which we found after the bus left us behind and no taxi would take us because they didn't have a baby seat. 

We were a family group of 7 so we caught a mini bus from the airport which cost us approx $60. Soo much easier than catching then train and walking with 7 + bags. 

Would love to stay again.
One of the best apartments within the 3 apartment buildings around Olympic Park. Ticks all the boxes.
The massage chair is fantastic and the location couldn't be better.  As I said the only thing I would change would be the towels.
Very comfortable house with every appliances well equipped. We had very nice time there. Strongly recommend to couples.
位置非常好,步行30min左右可以到达海德公园､植物园､歌剧院､海港大桥､市政厅等地方｡唯一的就是没有空调,夏天可能会热吧……
A clean, smart and spacious apartment with view of the beach... watched the moon and sun rise from the bed! One minute to the bus stop and 4 minutes to the beach. Couldn’t have asked for more.

Oh my goodness, what an amazing stay we had. 
Perfectly presented home with wonderful touches throughout.
Will stay again and again when we are in the area!
Everything you need in a compact unit. Quiet street. Great hosts. Perfect for a base as we were out often visiting cousins and sightseeing.  Very happy!
Shaun is a great host, the flat is conveniently located near public transportation and a short walk away from Bondi Beach.

Amazing hospitality,excellent accomodation with all the home away from home amenities, definitely recommend  George and Lucia Cozy Granny flat.
It was a lovely apartment to stay at for a weekend getaway, it was clean and homely. Kelvin and Kate also really look after their guests and home, checking in on our stay from first to last day.
Pleasant stay. Hosts were engaging and made sure I was enjoying my stay. Wifi is very good and fast!

Brendan is a great host. His place is very clean and neat. He was very helpful explaining the public transportation and spots around Sydney. I would def stay here again and the location to Bondi Beach is only a 3 minute walk! Cheers Brendan!

Jyoti is very friendly and made us feel at home during our stay.
She is very helpful, gave lots of local information and places we could visit during our stay in Sydney.

Would definitely love to stay here again.

The location can't be beaten. Close to everything. Suzanna is fabulous to deal with and very helpful. I would reiterate the point about the stairs being very steep and perhaps unsuitable for very young children or people with mobility issues. Other than that, I would highly recommend!

This is a beautiful comfortable home, within easy walking distance of a gorgeous beach, the famous aboriginal carvings, ferry to Cronulla, shops and cafes. Definitely recommend for a relaxing stay, in the National Park, well away from Sydney hustle and bustle.

The place was lovely and cosy! Just as described. It was in such a great location - close to the beach, shops and tennis courts! Highly recommend for weekend getaway! Anne was so sweet and even left us chocolates, snacks and breakfast. Thank you!

Highly enjoyed our stay. The photos don’t do the place justice - very spacious for 2 people, well decorated and the leafy views from the balcony make you feel you’re far, far away from Sydney! 5 min drive to Avalon Beach and shops, so very handy. Justine also supplies bread, milk, cereal and fruit for brekkie, which is a lovely touch.

Heidi's house is clean and comfortable. My kids loves her back garden very much. It's a mini playground for them. 
It's easy to reach the shopping center and airport. 
We enjoyed every minutes here in her house.
Linda's b&b is fantastic. She bought fruits and wine for me, I was so impressed. Exept it, there were so many things to eat. And everything is clean, closed to the city. Thank you, Linda!
Great place for travel. Nice View.
A very nice place and helpful host.
It's good to stay at Paul's place.
Very good location and very clean, comfortable!
Great quiet spot - walking distance to chatswood. Lovely little granny flat with everything you need. Clean and tidy. Friendly hosts.
Awesome

시드니 시티에서 멀지 않은 곳에 조용하고 편안하게 잠을 잘 수 있었다.
방 사진보다 더 깨끗했고 깔끔했다.
주인 부부도 친절했고 다음에 또 가고싶다.

Michele was a fantastic host and always willing to help out with requests! The place itself is exactly as pictured, if not better as the sofa bed has been upgraded to a real bed. It is clean and the kitchenette is well stocked. Would definitely recommend staying here to my friends and would consider staying here again next time. It is a short 10min walk to Newtown station which is a few stops from the city centre which is really convenient.
Great experience. Really nice room, really convenient for what I needed. Hernan is a good guy, made my stay very comfortable and got on with our own thing. Definitely recommend staying.

This room and apartment are a great little find - in a lovely quiet area in Rozelle with great transport links into the city via bus and walking distance to some awesome pubs & into Balmain. You could also walk into the CBD in 40 mins (which we did a few times across the Anzac Bridge).
We stayed with Duncan and Ashlee for three weeks and they are perfect hosts - gave us space to do our own thing but always there if we needed advice on Sydney (it was our first time to the city) and generally great company.
The room itself is spacious and well furnished with plenty of space for storage, the bed was really comfy with an electric blanket for when the nights got a little chilly, and Duncan's information sheet in the bedroom was a great reference point. Kitchen, Living Room and Bathroom are ample sized and well equipped. There is nothing I can fault this property on nor the hosts - a great first experience of Airbnb and Sydney for us. Thank you so much guys!
Good location for going to the beach and not far away from the Airport.

Great location , nice sized unit and great host.We met Mal when we arrived and he was on hand to help with anything we needed..Perfect size for a couple or with 1 child. Will definitely stay there next time we are back in Sydney.
Great stay. Place is bright, comfortable and clean. Excellent location and surprisingly quiet at night.

Shuang and his mum are super friendly, helpful and very responsive to every enquiries. The house is super clean and tidy! Really enjoy my stay in here. Although the house a little bit far away from wolli creek station, it still a good choice to stay in shuang's house as it is located in a quiet neighbour . It takes around 5 mins walk to get to the supermarket to get what all you need. Thank you Shuang and your mum! I will defintely stay in your place again in the near future ! Cheers!

Angela人很好,很周到和細心,有彈性的check in 時間同check out左之後都讓我們放行李在她家和使用客廳等待上機,回覆訊息時間迅速,兒子Coby怕羞安靜但很可愛｡房子十分漂亮,很有格調和溫暖,如果我一個人再次之往澳洲旅行,會到再次居住Angela的家｡樓下的鄰居亦很友善｡真實的房間同屋比照片還漂亮｡房間十分乾淨,我們check out完看見Angela立刻更換床單,被子等,清潔度滿分｡有張書桌可以用作辦公,很方便｡附近有一個海灘,走1分鐘有個巴士站可以到地鐵｡

Perfect getaway weekend! Bundeena is a lovely place and Belinda's cabine is very well located, comfortable and clean! She gave us all the tips we needed to fully enjoy our stay - we'll definitely be back soon!!
The location for us was perfect . It is close to shops restaurants and public transport. The house had everything we needed.
Lovely spot. Great host.
Excellent location in the heart of Kings Cross, very clean and wonderful breakfast options. Cosy place with the weekend market right at the door. Quiet and safe in the evening, lively during the day.
Conveniently located and private. Communication with Ali always exceeds expectations; excellent response rate. Great place for a quick getaway.

Sarah was very lovely. Helpful and always easy to contact if needed. The place was clean and comfy. Location was perfect for when we visited my church at Hillsong -Hills campus. Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend Sarah's place :)
I always appreciate staying at Hugo's apartment.
A fab little apartment in the heart of everything - definitely can’t fault the location!
Clean, full apartment with friendly, cosy atmosphere but laid back, not too fussy. 15 minute walk from King St Shops. Good value.

We had a very comfortable stay in this beautiful apartment within walking distance to the Woolloomooloo Wharf. The space is large and nicely furnished, beds comfortable, and fantastic views! We walked to many of the local sights and especially enjoyed VIVID which we were not aware was happening when we booked our trip. We would love to stay here again if we come back to Sydney. Thank you for your easy communication throughout.
Everything was great! They took care of each detail and made us feel like being at home!
Great location, great host!

Cat was a great host and catered for our large family group really well!
The place itself is very charming and its proximity to the weekend market, the shops and the beach is pretty unbeatable.

Highly recommend Cat, and highly recommend the place!
Thanks!

Jared was not there himself to handover the apartment but was very thorough in organizing somebody else to meet us there. Loved how clean and airy the apartment felt. And the location was fantastic. Would definitely stay here again!
Amazing place and amazing host!!

The apartment had an outstanding location. It is very closed to World Square with shops and Coles supermarket. It is closed to train stations as well (Town Hall station and Museum station). The house is very clean when we checked in. It has everything that we need. The host is very careful, actively contacted me for the check in, check out, and when I asked. Very quick response. 
My family love the massage chair. It works well. 
Just 1 small thing is about the bathrooms. The glass doors cannot be shut properly so water comes out to the floor while showering.
Great appartment in an amazing location
Stayed 1 night it was fine .
Great location with a fantastatic host
Really nice place with big private space and great location.
All expectations of our accomodation were exceeded .

It is a small room, and you have to watch you don't hit your head on the staircase.  However, it was beautifully set out with a very comfortable bed, lovely homey touches and beautiful aromas, sparkling clean.  It was very convenient for us and within walking distance of where we needed to go.  Cathy is a lovely host and all went smoothly, it was just what we wanted.
Great room, great location and great price- very friendly host. Will stay again if in area.
Very good staying! Highly recommend!

The apartment was perfect for our overnight stay. Communication was excellent throughout, and place was in a great spot - not even five minutes drive from Avalon shops and the beach. Beds were really comfy, the apartment was equipped with everything we needed, and it was so lovely waking up surrounded by the bush. Would definitely stay again!

This accommodation was amazing! The apartment was spacious, with great views, a peaceful neighbourhood and close to shops and restaurants! The host, Purple was very welcoming  and made us feel at home! We were sad to leave and highly recommend this apartment!!
Perfect location, comfortable, clean. A great little place to stay in the heart of Manly. I will definately like to stay again in the future.

Suzie's appartments is very central, beautifully furnished and homely. The bedroom is generous and guests have their own bathroom. Everything was spotless. Suzie is very friendly, caring and easy to connect with. It was lovely to stay with her and will definitely come back again some time in the future.
Excellent stay, comfortable & cosy
Great location close to the international airport, and wonderful room to stay.
Very clean and well arranged.when we arrived lina's husband was there.he was very helpful.good for families.

It was the perfect place. Very near to many tourist spot.
I will definitely chose this place again if I have the opportunity to come again to Sydney.
The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A beautiful house. Very large and comfortable, with ample inside and outside spaces. We chose this address to prepare for a wedding. It was perfect. Cat was always available and attended to every need.

My wife & I would like to thank Yang for a wonderful & enjoyable 2 night stay. The communication was great and very friendly. The apartment was fantastic with great views and we loved the rooftop terrace with 360 degree views. We loved getting out on our bikes with many bike tracks in the area, and in less than 5 mins walk we were catching a rivercat to Sydney. The location is brilliant with so much to do in the area. Thanks again
Strategic location and fast response host
It is a great place to stay in a city and enjoy Sydney.

Hernan was not around much but was well organised and  made sure I had access when I needed it. When I did see him Hernan was friendly and engaging. The apartment has all that you need and is very well located to explore the suburb with all its restaurants and walks along the beach.
Beautiful and clean space, great for a quick Sydney trip.

We loved staying here for the weekend! Something to note, the apartment doesn’t have AC and there is only one fan so it can get quite hot in the rooms. 
The location was just close enough to easily get to and from all the Sydney hotspots!

The Host was very accommodating, the property was spacious for the 3 of us, and close to all that we needed on this visit.  We would certainly recommend this  accommodation all who are looking for a stay in Sydney..

We would like to thank Mags for her hospitality.   The apartment was  in a lovely neighborhood not far from Military Road.  It was a about a 10-15 minute walk to Spit Junction where you can catch a bus  into the city.  We will refer others who visit Mosman and hope if/when we are able to return Mags' place will be available.
A great wee place in Pitts Point, walking distance to Cirrular Quay, the Botanical Gardens and lots of great cafes and resturants, the kings cross tube is also only 5 minutes walk away. Just perfect
The house is amazing. Miss D is so nice. And it is closed to the bus station and the train station. Good experience in Sydney.Thank you.
Great location! As stated by the host, it is very close to Central Station which made traveling around Sydney an ease. Will consider staying here again if I return to Sydney!
房子很好,适合家庭或者情侣入住｡
Ali’s place is exactly what you hope for in a residential area of Bella Vista.

Hugo's place was lovely! Exactly as he described and a great size for the two of us. It's far enough out of the city so you don't have the noise and traffic but still in close enough distance to public transport, supermarkets, and tourist attractions. It's also an easy walking distance to the city which we loved. I would highly recommend this place to people who are planning on getting out of their accommodation and exploring Sydney because for me it was a small space to be in for long periods of time. Having said that though, it was very liveable and comfortable! Thanks again to Hugo, and thanks to Oliver for being very hospitable on our arrival.
Had a lovely stay at Millie's.  Only a 15-20 minute walk to Circular Quay over the Sydney Harbour Bridge.  Very convenient.  Many thanks

Shuang's place is ideal for a layover in Sydney.  It is within walking distance to the international terminal at the airport as well as close to shopping and transit. Very clean unit and comfortable bed.

Super efficient with check in and ensured everything was up to standard for our overnight stay. The space was small but the decor placement was utilised so well the area felt so much greater. Super stylish and accomodating with tea, coffee and small breakfast needs like cereal and milk.
Location wise was perfect for us, closest train station was a couple minute drive away! Will definitely stay here again

Very clean and lovely place. Convenient location. Close to train station, supermarkets and restaurants. Shuang was very helpful and is a very good host. I would love to stay here again next time when I visit Sydney!

Great location right on Bondi Beach with spectacular views, only a short stroll the beach front shops. Mal made check in easy for us and was helpful with any questions that we had. The only downside is that there is no free parking available anywhere nearby and we had a vehicle.
Highly recommended

Yoco is really friendly and his place is very well kept. It is really close to central and easy to get anywhere. The kitchen, bathroom, and room all were really clean. All of the others in the house were super friendly and it was a very positive, welcoming environment.

Steven's place it utterly gorgeous. It is fantastic for a stay in Sydney and in a beautiful suburb close to lovely eateries. Steven and his family are friendly and helpful and we will definitely be returning!
Nice and central. Amongst the student accommodation.

We really enjoyed our stay in Cathy’s room! It offers privacy, is spacious and has a very comfy bed. There is tea and coffee provided, as well as a toaster and some fruits, yoghurt, milk, and muesli for breakfast. 

Cathy was a great host, and even picked us up from the nearest bus stop on our arrival! There are plenty of beaches, shops and restaurants around. Great place!

Let's be clear - this is an incredible space. The Airbnb is bigger than it appears in the pictures, and the views far more stunning. The neighborhood is also so charming and underrated - so many excellent cafes and restaurants, and yet still so quiet. You will not find a better Airbnb in Sydney for this value - period. Jeremy was also a delight to facilitate this process - organized, quickly responsive, and willing to go that extra bit to accommodate your needs. Being a frequent Airbnb host myself, I was so impressed. 

I would recommend this property to anyone I know visiting Sydney, and can't wait to hopefully stay here again! Thanks again, Jeremy!

Hands down the cutest little secret spot in Bondi!! 
Right on the beach front, brand new apartment, not to mention done up so well! 
If you don't book this place, you're missing out big time! 
THANKS SO MUCH KASEY :)
Lovely 7 minute walk to the beach and 2 minutes from the bus stop. Great dining areas both indoor and out! Kitchen perfect for cooking!
Awesome location!!  Everything you need and more!!  Great communication from Sabrina and nice that we were met at the door. Would definitely stay again if I returned.

We had a great time at Wyatts place! His house is just so nice and comfy and we especially enjoyed having dinner outside at his small porch. The location is also great, very close to Uni and everything you need for everyday life... Wyatt is a very carring host and we'll definitely recommend his place!
Great central spot with 3 large rooms , no parking in the apartment complex but there's public parking just down the road.

Lovely cottage, we felt like locals living there, everything Sydney has to offer nearby, very helpful host
Recommended

The Apartment is wonderful. We have been there for our last week in Australia and it was a great time. Everything you need is there. The Location is perfect (near trains, buses and ferry) and a short walk from the Harbor Bridge. We would definitely choose the Apartment again, when we come back to Sydney once a time.
The most beautiful apartment. Such a nice pool and good gym. Very happy i choose this place.

Susan and Greg are some of the most caring, welcoming and thoughtful hosts I have met. Their studio is the perfect place to stay near Bronte beach - light, airy, very clean and well appointed with a super comfortable bed, roomy bathroom and the comforts of home. I awoke every morning to the sound of birds and an ocean breeze, and loved relaxing in the beautiful garden space which they have lovingly created.
