It offers the quintessential Bronte neighborhood experience - 10 mins stroll to the beach, close to the best restaurants and is located in a lovely street full of native flora.

But what makes this home really special are the hosts' thoughtful gestures - everything from the breakfast items they left me, through to local tips and suggestions, as well as an invitation to join them for festive celebrations. They are both natural hosts - available if you need assistance but also offer guests privacy and personal space.

This is the perfect place to stay at one of Sydney's best beaches (as a single or couple). I look forward to enjoying Susan and Greg's hospitality and friendship again very soon!

Tengo que poner un 10 al apartamento, a la zona y a Dino. Todo han sido facilidades y la comunicación abierta en todo momento. El apartamento tiene de todo. DE TODO. Es muy cómodo, con mucha luz que le hace muy agradable y la decoración y el cuidado con que están escogidos los detalles le dan aún más valor. La zona me ha encantado también. A unos 10-15 minutos de una estación de tren y el autobus al lado del edificio. Lo recomiendo sin ninguna duda. No tiene ninguna pega.
Great place to stay

The place is immaculate ,spacious,comfortable  mordern,clean and right in the heart of rousehill shopping centre yet you dont feel like it is .Jared and Diana are such amazin hosts and they look after you well and youll be spoilt by their thoughtfullness. We will be back!!

We absolutely loved Fred & Bernadette's place and I'm already planning to return soon! 
The unit is fully self contained, clean and has everything you need (including wifi, Netflix and coffee)!
Malabar is a lovely town with a nice quiet beach, great ocean pool, restaurant overlooking the water and a great beach cafe (which does fantastic pizza!).
I highly recommend this place, it's great. I'm looking forward to returning soon.

I stayed in room 2 and it was very pleasant. The room was quite roomy, bed was super comfy, had basic kitchenette facilities and bathroom was noce and clean! Had a great stay there and Fen was very welcoming. Shuang was friendly and prompt to reply to queries. Definitely would stay here again. Thank you!
Great location.
Clean and tidy, within easy reach of buses to the centre.  Everything we could need was provided.
Paul's place is in a super location near the ferry and the corso. It was perfect for our requirements  and I highly recommend.  Thx Paul
Very good located and a good price for such an apartment. Would book it again!
edi is a wonderful person, kind and hospitable. the experience in this house has been excellent. will definitely

We (myself and 2 of my young sons) stayed a week at George's. All good. Place was very clean and tidy when we arrived at around 9am. The place is small but sufficient for our needs, as we spent most of our time out-and-about. Great location, just a 2 minute walk to Bondi Road.

If you rent a car then plan to spend 5 minutes looking for a parking place along Penkivil St, and perhaps walk a few hundred yards to the building. We had no problems parking in the building's driveway to load/unload luggage.

I met George just once during the stay, when we locked ourselves out. He immediately responded to my message and I went to get spares from him. Worked out fine and we lost only the time it took me to drive to his work and back - around a half hour.

All my communications with George were very quick. Everything he told us was true and I would recommend staying at his place. Enjoy!

Simone’s place was fantastic! We stayed for 4 nights with 3 adults, two babies and two kids and there was plenty of room for all of us. Simone left us a portacot and high chair, both of which were very useful. 
The location was fantastic, we walked, and on occasion took the bus, to the beach. And the proximity to The Spot was great for dinners and early breakfast at the bakery!
We would definitely stay here again.
Very friendly and helpful.
Five star location right in the heart of the CBD. Clean, convenient and great value. Will book again.
As expected, right price for the room. Easy check-in. Good location, very close to circular quay
Nataša is a perfect host offering a cozy, clean and comfortable place to stay.
Great location and accommodating hosts!
Tracy and her husband were very welcoming and the room was very comfortable.
Chloe was a ray of sunshine and went out of her way to meet us early.

Ziggy's apartment was exactly as described/represented in the pictures. Ziggy was very easy to deal with and he was very accomodating when we needed to make an amendment to our booking. The apartment was modern and very clean and the location was extremely convenient. 2min walk to the beach, 5min to the wharf and surrounded by shops. I would highly recommend this listing for a couple wanting to stay in Manly.
Fantastic value and so central. Chole is a great host and very accommodating and great communicator. Will definitely stay again.

What a fantastic apartment right next to Central Station. This opens up the entire city to you through the trains, buses and light rail. Use the Opal card to save on costs. The living room is well laid out and the couch is well built and comfortable. The TV is run through the Internet so there are many options to chose from. The closest market is downstairs and a small Woolworth a block away. The unit is in a secure building and on the top floor for great views. If you like trains, you will love it more! The kitchen has everything to make your own meals, which we did. When we arrived Alexey and Olga had a lovely bottle of wine waiting for us. Very thoughtful and considerate host. The bed was very comfortable. We used the downstairs bathroom with the large tub and shower, so convenient. The stairs are easily manageable but not for wheelchair users. The bathroom upstairs has a shower and the washer and dryer. That is such a plus for travelers. I would say we were able to enjoy our week in Sydney so much more because we rented this apartment. This is the very best value to be found and we're thankful we booked it. Highly recommend and would book it again if in Sydney.

Anita and Peter are fantastic hosts. The apartment was beautifully decorated and immaculate. Beds are exceptionally comfortable. The location in Manly was perfect, you can see the beach from the balcony, less than 10min stroll to the corso, and less than 20min to Manly Wharf. Loved our stay here and wish we could have moved in permanently!
Rhonda was very friendly and helpful.

Everything is more than satisfied and amazing in Naveen and Tristan' s apartment! Me and my sister have spent three nights in their lovely home, they have prepared everything we need in our specious room as well as the private bathroom. We enjoy all the details and atmosphere, it is exactly looks the same as the photos.
The gym and swimming pool just 3 seconds from home, super convenient. There are lots of designable café and bar on the street nearby, train station just 5mins walk.
It definitely is the best choice for everyone who have a plan to stay in Sydney. Highly recommended.
Naveen's place was clean and nice, conviently located near the train station. Naveen and Tristan were lovely hosts and their dog, Felix, is a delight too. Great stay!

Sara was a lovely host, she had great communication and was extremely helpful. Her apartment is located in a prime area of Glebe; directly adjacent to the main street, which has many cafes and restaurants. The place is very tidy and cosy with a stunning balcony view.

We loved staying in this cosy flat, it’s so charming and it felt like home right away. The location is great – close to all the action but on a quiet street and everything just felt fun and easy. Thank you for sharing your beautiful home with us!
Nice, stylish apartment with a comfortable bed! Easy communication. Area is a bit rough, former red light district, but house felt really safe.
Excellent location

The location is absolutely perfect!

Other great things about this place:
> The shower had excellent water pressure
> The views were outstanding, we especially enjoyed watching the surfers and waves while eating breakfast in the study nook.
> The location was perfect for easy access to the beach and to coastal morning runs. 
> The kitchen was well stocked with all the equipment one needed.
> The bed was very comfortable, and we enjoyed waking up to the sound of waves.

I highly recommend Gregoire's place in Sydney it's the perfect size for a couple staying in Sydney. Very close to the city cbd with Museum station around the corner to take you anywhere. Lost of nice bars and coffee shops around the corner. Great host that is very prepared with a house manual presenting all transport options and places to stay and eat. We had a fantastic time.
Great place - everything we needed. Would recommend.
We had a good stay.

I had a fantastic stay at The Yoco House. Big thanks to everyone for making me feel welcome. Communication and check in was easy. The room is large with a comfortable bed, WiFi is good and kitchen is well equipped. I had a car and could park it on the street on the weekend for free. Lots of good cafes and restaurants to explore in the surrounding streets.

Its neighbourhoods like this that make me want to move to Sydney! The location was perfect, being between the city and Bondi with a great variety up-market of shops and boutiques. Arnie and his wife are both intelligent and friendly. I stumbled to make eye contact with them at times because I trying to take in the collective of interesting artworks. My only regret is that I didn't book another night. Thanks for having me. I would love to stay again.
Perfect stay!
Nice spacious house, quiet area that's within walking distance to the hustle and bustle of the city. Nice and clean. Could see myself settling there

I can highly recommend Carole and Steve’s place  - what a lovely, light, spacious and spotlessly clean home! If you get a chance to rent the entire house, go for it. We stayed in the front two rooms of the house, in our own fairly separate area, and had sole use of a beautiful, spacious bathroom.  There are no kitchen facilities in this part of the house (as made clear in the ad) but there is a small fridge, kettle and toaster, as well as cutlery and crockery for guests to use. Meals are easy to find in any case as the house is close to some fantastic cafes, bars, pubs and restaurants – a real taste of Sydney’s cosmopolitan inner west. The house is in a peaceful, quiet, tree-lined street. Parking, if you need it, is easy to find nearby, or even out the front if you're lucky (check the parking signs to be sure though). Public transport – buses, trains –  in easy walking distance. Carole and Steve and Snoop dog were perfect AirBnB hosts, very friendly and considerate, without being intrusive. We were lucky to have found them! Absolutely recommended.
A great place, clean, stylish and convenient. The bird sound in the early morning may be a nuisance to somebody want to get up late.

Irresponsible lowest host.
"We will now be away for the weekend so unfortunately will not get to meet you! "
She sent me this message the day before the afternoon of check-in date, no sorry, no apology, nothing. When the day before I made a final confirmation about check-in, she did not mention anything, I don't know why. I didn't check my e-mail after leaving my home, so I first realized this after arriving at her house. I felt very uneasy, I had to find all things myself.
If you need to get away from home, okay, but you should let the guest know at least a few days ago, you are too irresponsible.
Also where was "Nutribullet and breakfast essentials"? I didn't see anything, I had only tea and coffee.
Also, I left the house before the checkout time, but after that I got a message about checkout.
Lowest host.
We had a nice stay in Sydney. The room was no frills which suited us fine and we had a great chat with Gavin. We recommend staying here if you are looking for a simple room with good company.

Great location and fantastic value for money. Nicole was very accomodating and easy to communicate with. Apartment was well equipped with everything you need. Fantastic location if attending ANZ stadium and close to cafes and bars and DFO.
Really nice house, great location. Would definitely visit his house again.

Linda's house is nice. It is plain and not large. However, it is quite and clean. You can find everything you need. The most important is that the location is very closed to stations and you also can easy walk to city. It is also a safe location too. Just good for 3 of us to stay in. We are enjoy the stay there. 
Lin Li

Really nice house, simple room, unfortunately we weren't able to be super social as we had a very short busy stay, but the time we had with Daniel and Elena was very short but they were both very friendly and approachable, would totally stay again!
Excellent location.

Had a lovely single night stay here whilst in the area for a wedding. 
Room was comfortable, bed fantastic and breakfast (muesli, yogurt, fruit) fresh & delicious. 
Cathy was flexible with both check-in and check-out times. 
Couldn't have asked for more.

Wonderful person, cozy and clean apartment, top-notch hospitality. Thank you very much Hernan, for making me feel at home! 

Elena

My production company booked Jason's home to shoot the second series of our online show, A Shared House and we had an incredible time.

In the months leading up to our booking Jason made himself available to assist us with any questions or queries we had about our time in the house.

Jason was flexible with our schedule and did everything he could to make our stay as perfect and problem free as it could be.
The home is immaculately kept and in great condition.  Close to public transport and near by shops. 

By the end of the two weeks, Jason's home felt like home to our cast and crew. Both Jason and his partner are so welcoming and accomodating - We have now become great friends!!

It's really great! Thank you Bernadette, me and my mother had a good time in Sydney. The house is nice which has desperate living room and door for the guest. There is a nice cafe nearby. thanks again~
Great cosy apartment. Home owners were great to communicate with and were attentive with our requests. Would recommend to anyone wanting to stay close to the city.
Was a great stay and the host made it all very smooth and easy
A lovely house and in a very convenient location. Close to public transport, very clean and Min's mother is such a lovely person. Highly recommended.

Bradley's cottage is absolutely gorgeous. The location in Paddington is fantastic for walking. The cottage is beautifully presented with the most amazing linen! Bradley was so helpful, we would stay here again in a heart beat, Many thanks.
Great apartment. Very clean and spacious for my partner and I. Location was excellent, close to the arena and train station. Check in process was easy. Would recommend !
A great place to stay in Sydney.
Most Outstandig Experience
Reasonable place in epping

We had a brilliant long weekend in Manly and absolutely loved the apartment - very spacious, clean and we loved the older style feel to it. As I am sure everyone is aware, the location is perfect to enjoy all of Manly's many highlights  and could not recommend higher!

Yvonne was the perfect host; she provided us with an Opal card each, as well as breakfast goods to keep us going through the week. The house and location are absolutely superb and it was one of the nicest places we have ever stayed. Special mention has to go for the bed, which was something out of heaven, the comfiest thing we have ever experienced in our entire lives! Thank you so much for such a lovely stay.
Lovely stay, close to train station in Green Square, very responsive to my messages and communicated everything well to us. Would definitely stay again. :)

It's really great experience to stay at your place.
We live in Sydney, so definitely we are coming again.
Really appreciate it .

Great place in a perfect location. Exactly as described. Spacious and cute decor. Would recommend staying here. Just two things that were not perfect: The wifi was too slow to use and the aircon unit is a big mobile unit but requires the window to be open which on a hot day does not quite work. Other than that a beautiful apartment to explore Sydney.

Thea’s place was perfectly located. A great space which was well maintained and exceptionally clean. Thea was an excellent communicator and was in touch very promptly to reply to all of my questions. Staying there during summer, the studio was very cool during the day. It is well located close to public transport and major shopping centres. There are many great cafes in the area, and a very welcoming and diverse neighborhood. Definitely good value for money.
I was greeted by a lovely warm welcoming smile, the price the location he huge private granny flat and the wildlife nestled background :)

Ruby is an excellent host, but the photos don't show with accuracy all spaces. A lot of dust everywhere and a little bit dirty in the balcony. The building is in remodelation process and there is an scaffold in the main access and block the view as well. We didn't be warned in that issue.
Jess was extremely helpful & a great host. Lovely apartment close to public transport, lots of restaurants & bars close by.
Wir kamen sehr spät am Abend an. Wir fuhren mit dem Taxi zur Adresse und haben Ihm geschrieben, dass wir unten stehen. In ca 2 Minuten war er schon unten=)

We had a great stay at Ben’s place. The location is perfect for exploring Sydney and the apartment had all the amenities we needed, including a well equipped kitchen. We’d definitely stay here again. Ben was quick to respond and he kindly left us some ice lollies, as we had hot weather the first few day!
Beautiful studio with thoughtful touches! Very central to multiple beautiful beaches! We enjoyed our relaxing weekend on the coast and Viv was a great host!

Very convenient to Maroubra beach, easy walk to so many great cafes and restaurants. 
The hosts go the extra mile with hotel style toiletries , chocolates and tea.
Very clean and comfortable.
Very relaxing environment.

My daughter and I stayed at Louise's apartment. It is absolutely fantastic. Great location, nice little cafes and most of what you could need. Perfectly clean and comfortable. A beautiful shaded veranda great bathroom and kitchen. I would recommend this apartment to anyone.
Great location only few minutes from Kings Cross station yet quiet and peaceful. Coffee shop few doors up the street is also worthwhile.

Cy was an amazing host who was super understanding when our flight was delayed and we couldn’t check in till 4pm. The location of the place was outstanding with it only being a 10min walk to darling harbour and a 10 minute train ride into the CBD! 10/10 would recommend and stay again!

Jenny could not have been more accommodating or helpful.  The apartment was even nicer than the photos suggest.  Everything has been finished to a very high standard.  The area is vibrant and convenient.

Mariana is a lovely host, easy to get a hold of and happy to help out if you need anything. Having never been to Sydney before I wasn’t sure what was a good area to stay in. I was so happy with the location - Woolworths just across the road, 30 mins walk to circular quay, lots of lovely restaurants and cafes and I didn’t feel worried walking around at night alone so can’t ask for better! 
The flat was lovely. Really clean and tidy with a heater and fans so easy to keep warm or cool depending on the weather. Fantastic rain shower as well! 
I stayed here for a little over a month and the only thing I missed was having an oven. There’s a microwave and hobs so easy to manage without. 
Mariana had fly screens in place to keep the room ventilated which was lovely but it was very noisy the first night where we could hear the next door neighbours conversations and music! No problem to take some of them down and no problems with noise once we could close the windows. 
The internet did drop in and out a little in the evenings but always sorted itself out so again not really a problem. 
All in all it is a really lovely flat where I felt safe and comfortable in a new city on the other side of the world! Mariana was a great host and I wouldn’t hesitate to stay again.

I booked this AirBnB for my parents who were visiting me nearby. The place is lovely, spacious and well appointed, and not far from the bustling Dulwich Hill shops. The bed was very comfortable and my parents enjoyed their stay here.

Extremely well-located, Griffin’s place is ideal for either lone travellers or a couple. Also to note the area felt safe and the studio apartment was beautifully decorated and the bed extremely comfortable and the place very clean. Would recommend!

Perfect location at Manly with a stunning view.  An easy stroll to Manly and the wharf with breathtaking views along the way.  Maria and Jerry were charming and friendly and willing to share their knowledge of the local area.  So much to see on the beach side of Sydney and away from the crowds of the city.  Highly recommend.
Beautiful period house. Very spacious and tidy. Amazing location so close to transport and city. Made to feel very welcome by our host. An absolute pleasure. Would choose to stay here again.
This was fantastic value for a super quick stay in Miranda. Great privacy, easy to get to and Rhonda was fantastic to communicate with. Would recommend. :)

The place is perfect if you have to pick up an early flight. Just like 10 minutes drive from/to the airport, both international & domestic terminals, a taxi is around $24. They have all you need and the place is pretty independent.

Wonderful location,  but on an unexpectedly noisy street, so take ear plugs for sleeping! 
Stylish decor. Very welcoming host.
Excellent location, plenty of space and perfect for a large group.  11 of us stayed and it was great.

We had a lovely stay at cathy's place to get away from sydney. The place was cute and cozy. Cathy provided all the amenities we required for a comfortable  stay. She was always prompt and helpful in her communications.

We really enjoyed our stay at the apartment. The location was fantastic and made getting around in Sydney very easy. We have very young children who were waking very early due to the light in the bedrooms (thin blinds) but otherwise it was great.
Susan has a caring and lovely character. I will give her 10 stars or even more for the service and everything provided.
Great place! Very cosy, just a reminder that there are only tea towels so you have to bring your own towels but other than that everything was good :)

The hosts are definitely nice people, and have taken great care of me over the 19days that I stayed with the family. Both Auntie Yang and her husband are great people, who often asked me if I had my dinner, and invited me when they have their family dinner. Really thoughful of them. The house is big, and the room is clean! Hope to be back again!

We had a great time staying with Naveen and Tristan. Their place is in a great location to eat or drink in Darlinghurst or to explore the city. They gave us great recommendations on ways to get around, where to eat and to shop. We would definitely stay with them again!
Great place! Clean, roomy and comfortable.
Unit as described. Great location. Amazing views.
Great cosy house to stay in! Sarah is really friendly too.

great location for our family to explore inner sydney plenty of room for us and our three kids. pool and spa down stairs was great option for them swell to burn some energy. few nigly things wifi did not work in lounge area and tv reception average at times. other wise great option for big family of group of friends. good fridge, oven, microwave and washer.
lovely very easy to deal with thank you
Nice place
This was perfect for me. I loved the Bluetooth speaker so I could access all my audio on my iPhone. Strawberries in the fridge. Air conditioning was great on the cold night.

The apartment is in a good area with lots of good Thai and Chinese restaurants and about a 10 minute walk to the Central Station. The flat is rather basic and a bit dated and could use a bit of renovations and a deep cleaning. The kitchen amenities are sparse and not really adequate for a long term stay. The bed was comfortable, but the sofa was not. We were there for only 5 days which was OK. It is pretty much as advertised, but nothing really special. It was reasonably priced for what it was. 
Thanks Coffee
Great location, terrific facilities and so helpful with our requirements. Just a high five all round !
Elise was quick to reply and helpful with any questions we had! Beautiful and clean place, short walk to shops and take away places. Very kid friendly and fitted all our needs as a family of 5 :)

Great comfortable bed and great touches such as a beach bag and towels! The studio is very modern and has a great shower also. The keyless entry was very easy to use and made the check in process very stress free. Would stay again.

Don's place is in a fantastic location in surry hills. Close to the best cafes and restaurants Sydney has to offer. The apartment is spacious, clean and has all the amenties for a comfortable stay in Sydney
Great location with full facilities
Nice place very convenient to the airport.
Excellent location in a quiet leafy suburb. Within walking distance to many good eateries and shops. Great place for exploring Sydney.

We had a wonderful stay at Ruth’s home! It felt like arriving in a resort and was so wonderful to be able to live in the house as though it was our own. The bed in the main bedroom was amazingly comfortable!

Fantastic place has a base camp for Western Sydney however it is more suitable for business trips or for short stays due to the limit space. House is located in an ideal spot close to major highways and local shopping centre but nested inside the suburbs so you escape the noise pollution.

Terry's place has a beautiful view of the city and was easy to get to and from throughout the day. It was a bit difficult for Uber drivers to find us, but using the hotel across the street as a pick-up spot fixed that problem easily!
Nice place
Great as it was previously thank you
Highly recommend MissD's place. My stay was incredibly enjoyable with no drama or confusion. Hands down the most comfortable AirBnB bed I've ever slept in.

Stayed for 3 nights in Jennifer's beautiful Balmain terrace. The kitchen was well stocked. We had a great stay in this beautiful house, no issues at all. I would note that the stairs are steep, which is typical for this type of house. If you have small children  staying (as we had) or people with mobility issues, you would need to take extra care.
The house was really nice and spacious. I liked the two storied house. Two bathrooms were clean and nice. The location was also very nice but little bit noisy at night
Stunning home in a great location

We had a great time at David place in Pott's Point. The location was very good, we could do a lot of things walking from here. The place itself was fine, nice and clean, only the noises from the street were a little bit disturbing.
Apartment was great. Very well equipped. Great stay.

Really lovely home and cosy seperate cabin in backyard with own bathroom. Very easy to find and parking was good. I love this part of Sydney and Susan was very friendly and easy to talk with. Offer of a lovely breakfast but I went down the road to a lovely little square with a few cafes. Friendly and easy stay.

The apartment was very clean and had everything i required for a short stay. Bed was a great size and very comfortable. Really liked the couch, great for relaxing on. Excellent sound system. Louise was very helpful. Everything was as shown in pictures if not better.

The studio was really lovely. It was very clean, well equipped and pretty spacious. Everything was as how it looks in the pictures. We liked how the studio was designed, it gave us a very comfortable homely feel. Cath was patient and helpful with our questions, and she gave us our privacy, only popped in to give us some baked goodies and fresh towels. Overall we enjoyed our stay there and we would definitely recommend it to our friends.
Great location and very responsive host. Highly recommend.
Great location - close to pretty much anything you could need.

Mal's apartment was great and he was a helpful and responsive host. The apartment was as described and right on the beach and public transport straight across the street. Close proximity to great bars and restaurants. We had a really wonderful time. I'd suggest if someone is sleeping in the sun room that you pack a sleeping mask as the street lights are a little bright. Would 100% recommend this place to stay. Will be back!

This apartment is very well equiped and easy to live. There is one detail we did appreciate: there are USB plugs available! It may be a detail but we’re French and we need adaptors for all our devices. With USB plugs things were easier for us. 
This shows the nice attitude towards people who stay at this apartment. 
It is very well located also. Close to bars, restaurants and food shops. 
We loved staying there. 
And on the top of that we loved meeting Ollie we were talking with. He was here to warmly welcome us when we arrived. He was very reactive with messages and helped us with information about things to do (special thanks for the markets Ollie ). He also booked a taxi for us. 
And we had conversations through Airbnb chat about our days. That was so nice! Thank you very much Ollie

Cathy's place was a great choice. It is well located, not far from public transport, sparkling clean and quite cozy.
She gave us quite a few tips on how to get around as well as to what to do and see.
The breakfast provided is good an simple.
Even though it is rightly described as  pint sized we felt comfortable and didn't miss anything. 
Cathy was happy to help whenever we need it.

Great value for money. Highly recommended.
Thank you !!!Thank you for your patience, thank you for providing us with such a warm environment!!

Simon and Nicole's apartment was an absolute delight! 
It is very conveniently located near the Central train station stop-which is the perfect place to be if you are going to the Blue Mountains, beaches, anywhere really- from Sydney. This stop is only minutes from Circle Quay which is the stop for the wharf and all ferry transfers, the Rocks, Sydney Opera House, etc. With the Central Station so near we felt truly like we were in the perfect location.
The apartment itself is very clean, cozy, and has everything you need to feel right at home. Kitchen is well stocked with necessary items for  light cooking, but there are also many cafés and coffee houses near by. Staying here made us feel like we had a home ( or at least an apartment) away from home right in Sydney. 
We would definitely stay there again on future visits to this beautiful city!
It was an absolute perfect place for us to stay on our first visit to Sydney! We would highly recommend this apartment to anyone!
Great location and a lovely apartment with fantastic views. Recommend staying here

I booked this room because my flight was in the morning and Shuang's house is super close to the Sydney airport. All full stars, pretty clean, tidy, quiet! Good mattress hotel level bed sheet set. Even the shampoo and body wash product are of good  quality. The room is as  good as the picture shows.
Good value for money, would rent again
Michele was very helpful host who communicated well. The room was very comfortable for our couple. It is located near Newtown stn, 10 mins walking distance. Would stay here again!

I had a very comfortable stay here. Kath is a great host, and her dog Ruski is very friendly. The room was clean, and the place is very close to a train station (just one stop to the city center). The neighborhood is a bit quiet with not many people around, but doesn't feel unsafe. Thanks Kath!
Cath has really thought of everything to make your stay comfortable.  The amenities in the apartment are above and beyond anything I expected.  We had a lovely stay and would certainly return.

We stayed here overnight to go to a concert and the apartment couldn’t have been more perfect for what we needed. Ideally located, secure, private, superbly maintained, and easy for a visitor to navigate. The sofa bed was prepared for our arrival as requested. There were towels and sheets from previous guests on a rack in the lounge room, but they were kept out of the way and didn’t intrude on our enjoyment of the apartment at all. Thank you very much, we highly recommend it.

Mohit and his fiancée, Priya were very friendly and welcoming. My relatives who stayed at their apartment to attend my daughter's wedding were very happy with everything. Although they couldn't find the password for the wifi but it didn't bother them because they were out most the time anyway. I could've contacted him and asked him about the password but I was so busy myself with my other relatives so I am very happy that my relatives were happy too. The location was very ideal for people who want to go sightseeing around the city area or to go to train station and bus stop. It's very closed to The Grounds of Alexandria where my daughter's wedding reception was. I can highly recommend their apartment and him and Priya who were very professional, friendly and approachable.

Mohit and Priya, thank you very much for being amazing hosts and kindness and everything.

I can only say nice things about the apartment and the hosts. It's very easy to communicate with them too.

We were so happy with Cath's Garden Studio. Everything was clean and looked just like the photos. We felt very comfortable, safe, and right at home. Cath was so sweet to bring us fresh eggs, fresh bread and warm croissants in the morning. She was very kind and helpful whenever we had questions. The fresh towels smelled so good and the bed was super comfortable (we didn't want to get out of bed!) This space is perfect for one or two people. Thank you, Cath!!! :)
This place is amazing. Perfect location and great modern facilities. Phillip is a great host, quick response and friendly. Would stay here again for sure.
Overall a pretty good place
Great, comfortable stay. Very convenient location close to everything in Bondi.
great location and great view from the apartment

Very enjoyable and warm reception.  The unit has automatic booking, so Arnie was unaware of us coming, thus we only gained access around 3:30.  Thus, suggest you call ahead to ensure all are aware.

Lovely interesting house, I will attempt to return on my next visit.
A great to stay! Highly recommended!
A lovely cottage room and ensuite in the heart of beautiful Newtown. Close to the shopping strip, 10 minutes from buses and trains, and Michele is lovely!
The place was perfect for our family, a good place to stay while visiting nearby family. Lina was great to deal with. We'd come back next time.

We arrived early from interstate and the apartment was ready for us, Fred was on hand to explain everything and give us some tips on catching the bus.   The apartment was exactly as described and the location was fabulous.  The beach and sea pool were much utilised as the temperature climbed to 42 degrees, even beach towels were provided, in fact we had everything we needed for an enjoyable stay.  Although we travelled to Sydney to see the touristy sites, we found it hard to leave Malabar, the cafe a few minutes up the street and the golf club restaurant meant easy access to good quality meals and coffee.  A thoroughly enjoyable stay, thanks Fred and Bernadette
Nice space and easy enough to get to. The coffee machine and selection of teas was a lovely touch.

Great location, with a lovely big balcony.  

Host was extremely helpful & accommodating, especially as we only booked at very short notice.
Wonderful, centrally-located amazing studio!

Perfect location. We really like the view from the apt exactly what u c in the pictures. The surrounding was nice with pathways to the ferry wharf n nearby park. We saw people running up n down the hills right in front of the apt. Parking is easy.
Had a a great stay, the location is perfect. Quick response to emails.
Great location near the harbour. Great value

This is a great spot to stay as a launch into all directions of the greater Sydney area!  
All public transport options are available very close by, we took the ferry into the city, it was a really nice trip and if you don't have an Opal card, it's very quick and easy to buy one at the convenience store downstairs.
The floor to ceiling windows are pretty amazing and the breeze that comes through at that height was all we needed to keep the apartment at a comfortable temperature. The sunset view is beautiful.
The estate has other buildings and common areas being worked on, but it doesn't effect your stay - just great for people watching when you sit at the dining table! :)  There's a convenience store downstairs, there's an IGA about a 2 minute walk away, as well as a coffee place, medical centre, chemist, vet, nail bar and more that looks to open soon!  Then in the other direction, in the same estate, not sure how long it would take to walk (maybe about 5-10 minutes), but there's a few restaurants there.  You could also walk over the pedestrian bridge to a large shopping centre in Rhodes, it has everything you need there!
The hosts were lovely, while we didn't need to call on them during our stay, they seem like they'd do anything to try and help make your stay the best possible.

Thanks Adrian and Rhys for an awesome stay! I loved the location - very close to public transport and a 15/20 minute walk to Sydney Opera House. Both guys were super friendly and offered recommendations for the area.

One of the best location. infront of central train station. this place have everything you need. quick to response to inquiry. and going over and beyond with the personal touch of a welcome wine . If you are looking for a place to stay, do not hesitate to book this awesome apt. great place and great host!
It’s an amazing apartment! The couch turns into a sofa bed and there’s air conditioners on the roof. I would recommend this apartment to many people!

We had a great stay at the apartment! It was very clean and the hosts were very friendly and did everything to ensure we had what we needed including a crib and highchair. It was very handy to beach and shops which was very handy with bubs!

The apartment is really lovely and clean and even close to the beach!
Hernan is a very nice, friendly and open-minded guy -and now a good friend :D 

Had a nice time with him: We did some barbecue and went to down town, etc -I'm very happy that I chose to stay at his place and that I met him!

May good times continue, THANKS Hernan
Cat’s place was a pleasure to stay at. I would definitely recommend this home and will stay there again when the opportunity arises!

Our stay in Sydney in Victoria's apartment was great. It is nicely and conveniently located in the beautiful Elizabeth Bay area. Public transport can be reached easily and even a walk to the Opera House is easily possible. The apartment is small but equipped with everything that two people need. Even breakfast and coffee was there. We would stay here again!

Chloe was really helpful with check in and check out on a busy public holiday weekend. The apartment really worked for us. 2 couples with 2 toddlers under 2. There is enough room in both bedrooms for a travel cot and all your luggage. Really central location. It is right at Wynyard station and is a 5 minute walk to Circular Quay, 7 minutes to Barangaroo, 10 minutes to Pitt St mall and a 20-25 minute walk to darling harbour. Plenty of parking around (Sydney CBD prices).
Marcella is a welcoming host providing all the details that we needed about the house and the place.  It was close to the beach and shops and just a 15-20 minutes drive to the city.
Recommendable
Very warm welcome. Property and location both excellent.
Good.

Stunning place to relax in a beautiful part of Sydney! Michele could not have done more to make us feel welcome! Fantastic communication, easy to find and little extras like beautiful fresh fruit for an early breakfast made our stay extra special. Loved it! Thank you!
Well worth checking out Sam's place, simple, clean and good location
Perfect !!

Krythia's place is central to Sydney and close to some beautiful beaches. The room is soacuous and the courtyard offers a nice private area to chill out. Krythia was a great host and very accommodating.
Nice host, quick respond, good location near to train station.
Great place. Great location. Fantastic for price range

Perfect experience! The location, the room, the view, the cereal, the xbox, everything is great! I'll definitely recommend to a friend or book again next time if I'm going to Sydney again. Thank you Millie!
Just a lovely welcoming little BNB.

The place was exactly as described. Large front room with heaps of natural light. Fantastic location. Although it's a room in a house with other travellers, it was so quiet I felt like I was there alone. Recommended for a stay in a great neighbourhood of Sydney.
A great experience.  Paul and Dianne were very attentive and charming hosts.   The cottage was thoughtfully appointed and was very comfortable  Balmain, an easy commute to the city and a quiet area.
Very lovely home with a beautiful view of the harbour . Would recommend to anyone visiting sydney.
Smack in the middle of Newtown, yet quiet and modern. Everything we were looking for.
Location, Location. Annie's place was stylish and comfortable and close to all the inner city action. Annie was a great host.
Great location, great for overnight, easy to find, great communication via txt.
Beautiful place, very central location, anything you need is nearby with few minutes walking distance! Would defo recommend to anyone considering their stay at Sydney!
Good stays and just walk a bit to darling street with many bars and restaurants as well as woolworth if you want buy stuffs for preparing your meal

Great location with a nice view. Clean and central to Bondi. It is a part of a complex where other air bnb people rent, and some of the guests were noisy, especially late at night. The walls were super thin. Very comfy bed and big window that allows fresh air in all night!
This such a great place to stay. Situated so close to everything. This is the second time I’ve stayed here and am sure we will be back next year. Thank you Paul
excellent cosy stay, class to station and airport. very hospitable family who have been hosting for a while so they know how too give you space or interact with you.

Great location, nice and quiet with wonderful views.  Within walking distance of bus into City., a local cafe and we even had a swim in the  outdoor pool.  Warm, friendly hosts and lovely homely touches .. all you could need.
Cosy studio exactly as described, perfectly located near the beach and national park. Belinda was extremely helpful and kind. Loved the stay!
Clean and nice place. Good hosts. Very close to the beach. All you need really
One of the best place i've ever stayed! Beautiful apartment with great location. Very thoughtful on all the small details, will stay again!
A little far to Katoomba (blue mountains) and jenolan cave....

You can't really beat Belinda's place in terms of location and experience. I had a friend visiting from overseas and we had a lovely time in this little laid back beach town. Belinda's place is a cute little place where you can hear the birds sing in the morning and the waves crashing on the shores as you sleep. 

Just lovely and I couldn't be more happy to recommend it to anyone looking to get out of Sydney for a few days!

We had a great time at Simon & Nicole’s apartment. It was very clean and was situated in the very popular area of Surry Hills, where there are plenty of bars and places to eat. Would definitely recommend!
Very nice place to stay at :)

Stylish apartment in trendy, convenient location with everything you need. There's a huge variety of dining and nightlife options on the doorstep. Great value for money. Paul and Luke were fantastic to deal with; extremely flexible and hospitable hosts!
Nice little place, fairly handy to shops and restaurants, and approx 10 minutes to the tram. Bryan also comes recommended as a great host -- happily pointed us tourists in the right direction.

I couldn't be happier with Fei's place.  We arrived earlier than expected and Fei's father showed us around. Fei arrived and welcomed us.  Fei's son opened a bottle of wine and  cut up a mango. He chatted with us.  We had separate sleeping rooms and our own refrigerator.  Groceries and pub within walking distance.  Very safe neighborhood.  Fei even gave my travel partner some tea to take home with him.  I highly recommend staying here.
I really enjoyed my stay. The apartment had lots of space, was very clean and was beautifully decorated. I would definitely stay here again.
The property was nice and clean. Great location and value for money. Host was super quick in communicating and also provided airport pick up and drop service for a good deal. Cheers
Ann is a very special person and you will learn a lot about the Island from her. She makes us feel like home. Her garden is also excellent.
Great house, great location. Just a few minutes walk to the beautiful bondi beach!
Needed a place to stay just for the night close to the airport, only $14 taxi ride. Perfect just for the one night quick stay, really clean and comfortable.

Jenny was a gracious host. She made sure we had everything that we needed. She even left some bread, butter and jams. The house was stocked with milk and tea as well. Very comfortable bed. Clean spacious living area. Beautiful view. The experience was wonderful. I would definitely stay there again.

3rd time I've stayed here says it all.

Now with a microwave - thanks Hugo!

We found it a great location for exploring Sydney, right next to central station. We thought it could use a little TLC to fix a few little things, and found the main bedroom a bit noisy from the traffic at night. Andrew was very easy to communicate with throughout. No major issues overall but felt the photos made the flat appear better than it was in person.
Perfect place to stay. Lovely apartment - highly recommended. Extremely helpful and responsive hosts.
Great place. A bit noisy when a train goes pass

The location is absolutely incredible! We were able to walk to a number of coffee shops and eateries right below the apartment and hop on the train just two minutes away to get anywhere else! The apartment was exactly what we were hoping for as far as location! The apartment is old and it's in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) it's a bit dirty and loud at night! All in all, it was exactly what we were looking for, just didn't expect to be woken up so often throughout the night! :)
Perfect, very clean, suitable for family live, kitchen have all things needed. Beach is very closed, woolworths is about 7 min walk. Our family like this house very much.
Great location and great house! Richard was a very relaxed host and made us feel at home. We had use of the pool which made our stay even more special. Would definitely recommend.
Great place to stay in central Sydney. Loved our stay!

The perfect location.  Close to bus and rail stops. Many local resturaunts. Jeremy is very responsive to any issue and responsibly accommodates his guests. He communicates quickly and is any amazing guy. The Gracious Darlinghurst  Terrace accommodates up to 8 people comfortably. All bedrooms are upstairs and the City lights view is worth every step. Thanks Jeremy. We will definite return for our next visit to Sydney.

We had a good time at this place. The location is perfect for a visit to Sydney - all major sights are more or less in walking distance. Jeremy was very helpful and accessible, and he responded immediately in case of concerns or problems. The house is very spacious and easily accommodates a group the size of ours (8 adults), it just could do with some TLC. We had the 'Big Wet' (non-stop rain for four days in a row!) so unfortunately we could not enjoy the decks and balconies.

Simon and Nicole were wonderful hosts. Very polite and helpful. Their place was very clean,spotles, close to transport and in walking distance to cafe and restaurants. I would recommend this place to my family and friends. Thankyou for having us there.
Great little apartment in an excellent location. Mariana was efficient and friendly. Great!

MissD's Appartement ist sehr schön und zentral gelegen und alles war so, wie auf den Bildern gezeigt und wie es beschrieben wurde. Erwähnen sollte man jedoch für lärmempfindliche Menschen die Einflugschneise des Flughafens direkt über dem Appartement. Wenn man länger als eine Nacht dort bleibt, sollte man sich eventuell überlegen, ob man sich nicht etwas Ruhigeres suchen sollte.
MissD ist sehr hilfsbereit und jederzeit schnell zu erreichen, egal, um welche Frage es sich handelte. Auch die Informationen, die im Zimmer aushängen, sind sehr hilfreich.

Our stay in Philip's house was excellent.  We were welcomed by Oliver who was very responsive to every request we subsequently had.  The location is great, just 5 mins walk from Hyde Park and the CBD.  The house is very cool, with multiple levels and is well equipped.  Would definitely stay again if in Sydney with the family.

Loved staying at Narelle's place. The location is unbeatable, the triple glazed balcony door really does keep out all the street noise. Lots of thoughtful touches like a well stocked kitchen and bathroom, and little things you might not have with you such as spare Opal cards and an umbrella. Self check in/out made everything easy. Also a very stylishly decorated and clean place, it was a very enjoyable stay.

Overall, we have a pleasant stay. 
Convenient and easy to travel around in Sydney via buses and train. 
Near to Airport.
Well equipped kitchen.
Great location and view, clean and tidy room and had everything we needed. Would definitely stay again :)

Jessica very kindly accepted our last minute booking - she was very welcoming and her flat is a lovely little place tucked away in Paddington, which has some greats shops and bars and a market and is very well-connected with the CBD.
However, we did have some trouble sleeping due to construction noise and paint smells coming through the floorboards, as there was a shop being fitted on the floor below. Jessica had said there might be mess downstairs at the entrance to the flat, but didn't mention that the work had been continuing late into the night. We raised the issue with Jessica during our stay, and hoped she would be understanding when we requested a partial refund after our departure. Unfortunately, this wasn't the case and we had to work with airbnb to resolve the issue.
Third stay at Shuang's place. As always, easy 20-min walk from the International terminal (with luggage), smooth check-in, clean, and quiet. Cookies are a very nice touch! Thanks again!!
very nice clean tidy house felt like My own house close to market and of course station wow  will love to book it again on my next trip thanks guys

This was the perfect location for a relaxed stay in Sydney; located right on  the water, and the local saltwater pool was gorgeous. The   picnic area at the beach includes a large covered play area for the kids and was the perfect back drop for a family catch up. And 10-15 minutes drive form everything in town. I loved it.  Fred and Bernadette provided a very welcoming and comfortable space; and have thought of every detail. It felt like a home away from home. Thank you. Kim.

An excellent recommendation from friends.The accommodation was great with all that you could want and spacious,set in a lovely garden.The location was ideal for the beach at Bronte and walks to nearby beaches.The buses to central Sydney were ideal with only a short journey time.If we ever return to Sydney we would definitely use again
性价比较高

A nice location near Narrabeen Lagoon. There is a lovely path through the forest along the lake to the Sydney Academy of Sport where I attended a few days of training as part of an aikido winter school.
Tracy made us (including wife and three-year-old daughter) feel right at home. She was also kind enough to lend me one of her bicycles for the time we spent there.

I can highly recommend staying with Valentine.Her place is just beautiful, overlooking Bondi Beach. I really enjoyed my time there. You are so close to everything and it is quiet too. Valentine and her boyfriend are very friendly and nice to talk with.

Duncan and Ashlee were the perfect hosts for our first experience with Airbnb in Sydney. From the first moment they let us feel home and give us the feeling of being very warm welcome. It was a pleasure to stay at their very cozy, clean and beautiful home! Thank you so much!!

Location is good. Very close to King Cross station. Host very responsive. A lot of restaurants nearby. Bedroom is facing the road though and might be a little too noisy at night. Not for light sleepers. But overall a very good and comfortable stay.

Tolles Haus mit großer Terasse und schönen hellen Räumen im Obergeschoss in einem netten Stadtviertel, das sich sehr gut eignet, wenn man ein bisschen Ruhe sucht in Sydney und in Strandnähe wohnen möchte. Am Bronte Beach gibt es einen großartigen öffentlichen Pool mit Meerwasser direkt am Strand. William war immer erreichbar und sehr hilfsbereit.

Absolutely lovely stay in the small cosy apartment. Walkable distance to the bus stops and beach nearby. The apartment itself was clean and tidy, and Hernan + his girlfriend was a polite host. Highly recommended. Cheers. :)

This is my first Airbnb experience.  The location of the room is excellent with everything you want in Newtown and Sydney at the door-step.  The room is comfortable and spacious.  The host is quick to communicate with the guests. However, the cleanliness of the house needs to be improved.  The bathroom was not cleaned during the entire stay unfortunately.  We ran out of toilet paper every second day.  This room is on the ground floor right by the stairs and also facing the street so it is quite noisy as the window is not fully sealed.  The listing was a little misleading as the host does not live in the house.

Fantastic.! Victoria was a great host and met us in the lobby on arrival and was very friendly and gave us
some great suggestions. It is a small studio apartment which looked exactly like on the website and is perfect for two people. Location was perfect for exploring the city and walkable to restaurants and Kings Cross station. There was a small kitchen with a hotplate, toaster, kettle and fridge - was perfect for our stay. Great area, great location and would definitely book again and highly recommend!
Wonderful stay!! Belinda was really nice and helpful with suggestions. The house is spacious and well equipped. We highly recommend this place!
Another great staying, the host is awesome! Well done!

My parents, both in their seventies, stayed in the apartment for eleven nights.  They were very satisfied and found it to be very comfortable and well furnished.  They did suggest that it would have been helpful if the equipment, e.g. washing machine and coffee machine, had simple instructions on their use.  Also, there was very little cutlery - especially a shortage of spoons.

They did appreciate the surrounding quiet environment.
Danke Bryan für dein gemütliches cottage. Wir haben es sehr genossen in Glebe zu wohnen. Ein tolles Viertel mit vielen Restaurants und Cafés.

Wir haben die Zeit bei DJ sehr genossen. Das Haus ist perfekt gelegen - ganz in der Nähe von Cafés, Geschäften und man kommt sogar zu Fuß in die Stadt/zur Oper (oder mit einem der unzähligen Busse). Das Haus/Zimmer ist sehr sauber und sieht genauso aus wie auf den Bildern. DJ ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit, wenn wir ihn gebraucht haben, war er jederzeit da, ohne dass man zu sehr aufeinander sitzt.  Danke für alles!
We really enjoyed our time at DJs House. It is perfectly located - very close to transport, Cafés, Shops and you can easily reach a lot of sights by relatively short walks. The house/room is very clean and looks exactly like the pictures. DJ is a very nice and helpfull guy and helped us when ever needed! Thanks for all!
Very convenient, clean and well presented. I would definitely stay here again.

Thank you for having us stay in your amazing apartment, we felt most welcome and at home there. The apartment is beautifully decorated, very comfortable and was just perfect for us. We look forward to visiting again.

Leslie was very accommodating and provided all the information needed. The room was nice and cozy. Towels, toiletries, etc. were provided. The room had it's own bathroom and washing machine. The room also had its own entrance. Their home was also a few steps away from the Manly Scenic walk which was great. It was also near the bus stop. We would highly recommend Leslie's place.
The room is very clean and tidy. The house is so quiet and Robbie is very polite.
Great location and everything was as it reads and looks in the ad. Easy check in and helpful communication for a first time Airbnb user.
Great studio in a great location
The Flat is really good located and wonderful! Clean, quiet. Really easy to communicate with David, nice stay in nice place! Thank you.

Kathy is an excellent host! She has thought of everything you could need! It really is like a home away from home if you are a solo traveller, 2 couples or a family of 4. Very close to Randwick Racecourse, Coogee beach and shops. I will definitely stay here again if I’m in the same area of Sydney.

Highly recommended. Griffin is a great host and very helpful to any questions! We love the location of it, very close to Kingscross Station. The studio is lovely with everything I need for a weekend, i.e a big comfy bed by windows. The apartment is a few storey up in the building which requires a few staircase walking. Mindful if you have mobility issues.
The hosts are very friendly and helpful. Great location and a real stunning room!
It was a great stay!
Helpful host as they lend us their storage for us to put our luggage after check up. Much appreciated!
Flexible check in time, really appreciate that Oriel let us leave our luggage in the apartment before the checkin time.

Kevin and Ian are really great hosts! 

Communication with them was clear, quick and concise.

They were so hospitable, they even checked up on us for last minute requests before our check-in.  

Also, they provided us with detailed instructions which made check-in & out  a breeze.

The apartment was immaculate. Exactly what we thought it would be.  Extra towels, linen and the little details such as name tagging the drawers made it extra special. 

The location of the apartment is amazing. Other than being relatively close to the city, it also has a mid sized shopping centre close by and public transport is everywhere.

We will definitely book this place again.

Fun-tas-tic! We had a great stay.
The house is fully equipped as you would a vacation home and is tastefully done. Comfortable bed linens & mattresses. TV with good sound system. Only wish is to have a speedier broadband internet for the Apple TV as it hangs frequently.
Very centrally located. Close to all transportations, restaurants, grocers, drinks, park & CBD. 
Hosts kept us updated on coming stay. Thanks to Phillip & Matthew.

Hernan was a *lifesaver* for my time in Sydney. When my plans fell through, I needed a place to stay in a hurry before leaving super early for the airport. Hernan's place was a 15min taxi ride away and he gave me the number of a local firm. Air bnb's app was causing some issues and Hernan was so patient and kind with my many messages and took the time to really help me. I was sorry I didn't get to meet him personally to thank him, but I really appreciated all he went through to help me book the room. The bed was so comfortable and the room was super spacious and clean. Hernan's place was easy to get to by bus or train, next time I'd love to stay longer, its right next to a beach! Thanks for everything Hernan, you're awesome!

Lizzy was a fantastic host and we absolutely loved her Tamarama penthouse, it really exceeded our expectations. Here apartment was clean, fully stocked with everything we needed and more and the location was amazing, close to the beach and a quick walk or bus ride to Bondi Beach. Lizzy went above and beyond to accommodate us and made us feel so welcome, she was wonderful. We have 3 small children and the apartment was perfect for our family, safe, clean and had plenty of toys and other amenities for the kids. We can't say enough great things about our stay.

Fantastic location. Redfern and Central station are both an easy walk away. Many good bars and restaurants nearby. Unfortunately the WiFi in flat 3 doesn’t work. Otherwise excellent. Charles is a quick responder to any queries.

The pefect weekend get away.
Friendly and accomadating  host
Close to the Avolon eateries.
We will definitely be returning.
We had a great stay !  Close to transit and the room was very clean and lovely.  Would definitely come back
Spacious, value for money. Beautiful area. If you're looking for somewhere modern, beautiful and well maintained, then I highly recommend. Exactly what we were looking for.
Sam and Penny were gracious hosts and made castle hill feel very homey!

Cathy was a very attentive host, taking care of everything to make us feel at home and our stay more comfortable. Unfortunately we didn't get to meet Cathy but communication was excellent before and throughout our stay. I would highly recommend staying here if you're ever in the area.

Jason is very friendly and helpful! This apartment is in an excellent location with very quiet neighbors. This was a perfect stay for my business trip. The apartment had ample room and great facilities, yet was also very comfortable and relaxing. I would recommend this stay to anyone visiting Surry Hills looking for somewhere quiet to stay.

The apartment is great - airy and tidy.  Redfurn is an area being redeveloped so not full of eateries so you might need to travel.  The check in procedure (lock box) needs to be sorted out as at present it's not really safe to arrive a night.

Marcella is a great host and available to contact as required. as this is a used house (not just rental space) the house is full of useful kitchen/living items to make the stay more user-friendly, although some may feel it is somewhat "busy". There is an extensive library for anyone with time to explore. The property is ideal for exploring Maroubra and the beach. 
Internally it feels a little dark without lights on- possibly due to proximity of other buildings and mature vegetation at the rear.  Heat at the time meant we needed fans in every room which were provided. Overall a great site and well located.
Great place, central location and very welcome setting. Chloe is a great host and easy to get in touch with. Our check in and stay was very smooth, thank you very much!

Lovely apartment to stay in , great facilities , awesome views of the city and surroundings .

Only downfall was having the train run past quiet often and is quiet noisy when trying to sleep at night .

Great location. Short walking distance to the ferry terminal (circular quay), Sydney Harbour Bridge & Opera House. Apartment is little on the smaller side but perfect for a weekend stay. Prompt response from host also. Would definitely stay again.

Natasa was a perfect host! From the moment I arrived at the airport she gave me clear instructions as to how to locate her place via the train. The room was amazing - spacious and clean. The location was great too as I was commuting each day and would only have to leave 5 minutes before to catch the train into the city which would only take 15 minutes. Natasa was always willing to offer advice on places to go and eat too and made me feel really welcome. I would fully recommend staying at Natasa's place and cannot wait to stay again next time I visit Sydney!!! Thanks again for everything :)
Very clean and comfy. The cottage is in a fantastic location right near Glebe Point Road and the light rail. Water views from the terrace too. Would definitely stay again.
Great place to stay. Very close to the airport.

Wendy’s place is very nice. Modern and new unit with clean amenities. Very short walk to bus stop (bus no. 343) which can directly take you to the heart of the city near Westfield/Eye tower. Did not get a chance to use the pool and gym but looked really good. Wendy is a very good host, very understanding and accommodating. Will definitely book this place again. Thanks Wendy :)
The room was good! Not much mirror space for a lot of girls getting ready at the same time! But it was greaaatttt!!
Great space

Nice apartment obviously purpose built for Airbnb.  Looks good and is clean but it’s insulated with paper.  You can hear conversations, every footstep from above and road noise.  The neighbours above were up late which meant didn’t sleep until they stopped moving...

Susan was a superb host. Her communication prior to arrival was excellent. The studio was clean, very comfortable and modern. Her place is within walking distance of cafes and the beach and very quiet. Highly recommended.
Great location! Jonathen was always nice.
all good

The location of this place can’t be beat. The main level is very stylish and roomy. Bedrooms require either a walk down a narrow spiral staircase or a walk up some steep stairs. There is no door on the downstairs bathroom. The owner, Philip, is very responsive and accommodating.

Rachel's house is so beautiful. the garden is sunlit and magical and the details of the home are wonderful. Some of the vintage furniture is aged but to me this only adds to the beauty of the house. The sofa,  beds, linens etc are fresh, clean and comfortable. If you appreciate a period house this place is a delight.

We stayed at Hernan's place for give days and enjoyed every single of them. Such a nice atmosphere with Herman and Connie. They gave us good advices and made an awesome BBQ last night. Hopefully see you again guys.

Overall, I rate Tim's place 5 stars. Its a great place to stay for sight seeing. Its very close to the train station, city and airport. The place was clean and had a large clean shower. He was easy to talk to. I would stay again.

We stayed here while visiting Sydney for a family function and found the house large enough and very comfortable for the 7 of us. The kitchen is well equipped and Jeremy was very accommodating of our requests for a cot and high chair for our daughter. He was also very responsive throughout our stay and responded quickly to our questions. The house is located in a lovely neighbourhood, with many food and entertainment options nearby. Only downside is the upstairs room did get rather hot, but fans are provided. Overall it provided for a clean, comfortable stay.
A beautiful stay was had at Cath's gorgeous cottage. She is a most gracious host, having made me delicious bread and a brownie for my birthday!
Arnie and Lorraine are friendly and accommodating, the house is spacious with everything you'd need and it's close to public transport
good
Very nice place, great communication,great location, highly recommend, thanks so much!

I highly recommend this place. This is one of the most well organised airbnb I have ever stayed in. I did not get to see Shuang but the instructions given were clear, the room and the facilities are well maintained, and the house is only 12 minutes walk from the train station, shops, restaurant and supermarket.
Great hospitality!!!! My mother is a hard person and she is very happy !!!!!!

Had a great time at Marcella's place. Walking distance to the beach and food places. Transport into the city was also easily accessible with multiple routes to take. Would highly recommend this place for any group that is going to Sydney.
Accurate information. Relaxing stay, quiet/relaxed location. Hosts were reliable and prompt with communication. Cosy and fresh space, cute for a weekend away
Really convenient apartment which close to the central station.

Cathy was a wonderful host, the room was perfect- very clean, quiet and private, comfortable and great location. Cathy was super flexible when it came to check in time and her communication was excellent. The breakfast was a lovely touch and there are even beach towels included. An amazing place to stay if visiting Avalon and surrounding areas. Thanks again!
Shuang's place was convenient, clean and tidy. We enjoyed our stay. Thanks, Shuang!

This property is exactly what you see, a relaxed, wonderful property in a fantastic location. A little warm during Sydney's heat wave with no aircon, but fans in every room helped get the air flowing. There was plenty of room for the large group of us, all adults, and it was a very comfortable and homey. Beds were comfy, and everything provided as stated, and lovely and clean. Easy check-in/check out process. Would definitely recommend this property to everyone!
Herman is a very considerate host.

My boyfriend and me are a young french couple who stayed 1 week in the lovely Cath's studio. We really enjoyed this staying for our first booking on airbnb. Cath is a very smiling and nice person. The studio is fully adjust to feel like home.
The basket for breakfast is really complete and everything is thinked that we lacked nothing. Moreover it was a pleasure to be able to taste the delicious biscuits and bread, all home made by Cath. The bus stations and shops are close and there are only 15 minutes walking to go to the station Petersham.
I really recommend Cath's studio !
This place is true to its word of the gorgeous and amazing view from the room! Cleanliness is A Plus and complete amenities!
Thanks Edi for the amazing stay and being so flexible with my timings! Really made the house feel like a home while I moved into something more permanent in Sydney.

Millie's place is just as described. We had a wonderful view from the balcony that we enjoyed having our dinner and breakfast to. Location is great too as it is so near the train station and Milson's point for ferry rides. Definitely happy we made the right choice :)
Comfortable space in the back yard of the property. Functional and ok for short stays. Some aircraft noise unavoidable being close to the airport. City buses about a 5-10 minute walk.
Hi! It has been an awesome stay in Paul's place. There was a lot of recommendations by them and we certainly felt at home with their hospitality
great house,clean,good location

Lovely compact apartment in a convenient location. Close to nice restaurants in Kirribilli and Milson's point train station. Also a two minute walk from the ferry. Everything we needed was in the apartment and Eleanor quickly sorted out any minor problems we had.

The location is amazing. Right off the Harbour, and close to a lot of restaurants. The building is also nice with a pool and hot tub. The amazing kids playground at darling quarter is one kt a km away. The apartment is spacious and clean. Great host and very quick to respond. Highly recommended.
Our stay was amazing. Everything about Angela's accomodation was exceptional. Beautiful decor, calm and serene.
Excellent location

Very cute little room. Perfect for a nights stay or weekend away. Had all the basics you need to keep your things and rest between enjoying Palm Beach/Avalon! Cathy was very communicative and helpful, but also gave us privacy which meant it felt like we were alone on a couples holiday.

Terrific place in a perfect location :) 
As the description says this is a room (& seperate bathroom) within a house - the area is partitioned from the rest of the house and has it's own door to the street, so it works. The room itself is terrific - Michele has made a lot of thoughtful touches (coffee, fresh milk etc) and it's very-clean. The area is perfect for exploring the inner-west of Sydney. Michele is a very responsive and generous host (inc kindly allowing us a later check-out due to our flights) - thank you!!

Great, unique experience. Very welcoming. Excellent instructions made it easy to find. Authentic train, beautifully restored. Made extra special by lots of little extras and the added benefit of a beautiful log fire.

What a lovely welcoming apartment 
Great location overlooking the beach
Champagne on arrival and lovely touches like coffee machine were an added bonus
Loved going to sleep hearing the roar of the ocean and enjoying the sea breeze
Would definately stay again

Beautiful home, the pictures don't do this place justice. The spa overlooking the water at sunset - absolutely perfect. Very spacious, amazing views of the water from all the rooms. Close to the supermarket, restaurants, bottle-o. Great location. Perfect size for 10 guests, and would comfortably accommodate 14. Bailey was great with communication. Can't wait to plan another stay, will definitely recommend to friends and family.

Thanks for a great stay, I have stayed here on three occasions, and have been welcomed by a very considerate host each time. The property is located close to shops restaurants and the gym. I would highly recommend this property and am looking forward to my next visit
Cheers
Elise
The apartment is modern and beautiful, with  a balcony that receives plenty of sun.  I really enjoyed my time staying here, and the location is perfect!  The hassle free check-in is also a plus.
Good house for a stay in the shire

Nice apartment located in Darlinghurst. Central to many touristic places. Close to little Italy. 
Many cafes and restaurants around. 
The place was clean and good for a family of four. Second bed is a convertible that is ok for young kids if to be shared. 
Easy to check in and check out. Andrea is very helpful and available. Communication by email only.
Super easy, replied quickly & great location.

Jessica était à Paris mais très bon accueil avec sa maman, des cookies chauds, et un chat adorable. Très bon emplacement au coeur de Paddington.
La porte ouverte toute la nuit pourrait peut être être remplacée par une chatière en hiver ? Wifi un peu inconstant.
On recommande ce logement.

Simon and Nicole's place is a great little place for a short or extended stay in Sydney. It is close to public transport and amenities. Unfortunately there was a party of one night of our stay at a neighbouring property that went well into the early hours of the morning. Otherwise it was a lovely, quiet location. Thanks Simon and Nicole.
Long story short, with no doubt a five star place. Great location, quiet, clean, store literally across the street... perfect. Will be back!

I didn't really want to leave! This is a great place. The location is fantastic, 10 mins to beach, 5 mins to shops and bus stops directly outside the building. Couldn't ask for better. There is only one negative I can think of and even this is minor, no offer of teas or coffees for the morning. But that really doesn't take away from how much I enjoyed my stay! The bedroom was pretty much perfect, very comfortable. Bed was amazing! The apartment itself is very clean and tidy. And Cindy the host was great too! So friendly and welcoming. There is no doubt that I would definitely go back to this AirBnB room. Big thanks to Cindy for having me.
Krythia room was just what we looked for. Quiet location. Great price. Easy walking to places. Kriathia was a gracious host.  All was as we hoped.

Great location! In the middle of everything, so there is a little bit of noise but nothing too bad. Lots of cafes and restaurants all around plus the train just up the road. Miss D communicated everything well. The house as clean and taken care of.

Judy was lovely and very welcoming and the communication was great! 

Fab, clean, well-presented apartment with a great view in a handy location. 

Good value for money.

I stayed here for 5 nights. Glenn and Irene were really friendly and accommodating. I was running a little  late with check-in but Irene kindly waited for me. The bedroom and private bathroom were spotless and comfortable. The room itself was also very quiet. The location is very convenient, about 7 mins walk to Redfern station. Overall, highly recommended. Thanks for the stay!

A super place to stay - well appointed, beautifully furnished with great facilities within the building. Going to Sydney contact Desiree.

Sue Hillman
Spacious. Great location with the city, piers, services and sights all in walking distance.

What a great one-bed room apartment right in the middle of the CBD!! Full amenities, clean and really stylish. thoroughly enjoyed my stay! Johannes is very responsible and responsive. Excellent stay, highly recommended.

Great apartment in a very secure building in an upscale neighborhood on the water.  Tons of cafe options, some really good restaurants with diverse cuisine, and parks with a lot of green and great views. Dino and Rick are very friendly and helpful. Wonderful experience.

The house was easy to find with the instructions we were given. It was true to the images displayed. The kitchen was well equiped and the house was very central to everything we required such as public transport, shops, restaurants and a local beach. There was an art gallery and large oval at the end of the street. The bedding was of a high standard.
They were awesome and very accomodating.  Highly recommended
Very comfortable accommodation. Helpful friendly hosts. Nice view. All contributed to a great weekend.
Really awesome stay. Highly recommend. Very comfortable room, clean and nice shower. Friendly dog and great location

Such a cute one bedroom apartment in the perfect location. It’s small but packs a lot in and all the action is on your doorstep. Gorgeous renovation and super easy to communicate with. I would stay here again and again.

Fantastic stay. Brenda's flat is cosy and perfectly equiped for a several nights stay. Brenda is a very kind host and Coogee is a convenient location to explore SYdney without the hustle and bustle of the city. The beach is 7mn down the road and we enjoyed combining visits in Sydney and relaxing on the beach and in cafes in Coogee. There's a bit of traffic on the street so if you shouldn't be too fussy about noise. But for urban dwellers like us that was nothing compared to the quality of the stay. Thanks!

Great location!!!! 10min walk to Pitt at and 10min walk to circular quay. Great little apartment, especially if you're staying in Sydney for more then a weekend! Has a washing machine/drier, which was super convenient. Also a little kitchenette so we could have breakfast etc in. Also Angela left us a cute little gift on arrival, which was the sweetest touch. Definitely will be staying here again next time and recommending it to friends. 
Thank you!!!!
Hayley and Jacks place is great! It's clean and quiet, and simple. Would definitely recommend.

Feel like living in owb own home. Amazing house with beautiful garden.
Close to Darling Harbour, about 20 minutes walk. Close to restaurants and supermarket.
The host was very supportive and quick response for any querry or issue.
