Absolutely will come back if travelling to Sydney.

The apartment was wonderful and just what we needed for two people. It was super clean and conveniently located near local cafes, convenience stores and a newsagent. It's a bit of a hike uphill to the shops but well worth it and the ferry terminal is just at the bottom of the street. Can't wait to come back again!

Shuang's place is spotless and amazingly resembles a high end hotel. Just amazing. We never met him but were give very simple instructions and help on getting there. We would definitely recommend him to anybody. Thank you for everything Shuang best of luck with everything.

Cheers, 
Danijel & Natalia
The host canceled this reservation 255 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The accomodation was functional and provided everything I needed for my stay. Sam is a super friendly host and always responds quickly with a friendly reply.

We were very pleased with Danny's place. A super convenient location and very comfortable for six adults. It was tidy and spacious and had everything we needed. We'll ceratinly be back. Thanks for having us, Danny!
Great location, clean and great host.

My family loved staying at Erin's place. The place is beautifully styled, pristine clean, and in short proximity to Wanda beach and the sand dunes. Perfect for a beach get away. Couldn't recommend Erin's place highly enough! 5 stars!
We stayed here for 6 nights during the Christmas period and had an amazing time. The apartment is very central and the view from the balcony overlooking the city is incredible.

I had a great stay! Alison was very efficient with my booking and advised me Adam would look after me on arrival. Adam was a great host, carried my case upstairs and even invited me to the pub. The room comfortable and had a great view. The bus around the corner was very convenient for me to get into the city. Thanks for having me!

Landlord and housemates are all friendly, house is always clean & tidy, 10 min walk to the nearest train station with heaps of groceries and restaurants. Highly recommended to all and will definitely stay here again.
Anita is a pleaser. She will do all she can to make your stay in her perfectly situated flat on bondi beach. If you search for a spot in Bondi, here it is ! Highly recommanded
Great apartment. Great location. Perfect stay
Great place and I Definitly highly recommend and I will came back !
Maria is a great host made us feel at home straight away. The room is amazing and makes relaxing a breeze.

靠路边有点吵,特别到了凌晨6点的时候摩托车的声音就像在房子里面,其他设施还不错,例如有各种炊具和碗碟｡离超市也很近｡
距离旅游景点都需要步行7-20分钟｡如果你能走路的话,这里还不错

Really suited what we needed during our stay in Sydney. Shame we didn't have time to enjoy the local beach. Felt really at home with the top floor at our disposal, to chill and unwind after a day out and about.

Great place, looks exactly like in the pictures and it's very close to Central Station and right across the street from University of Sydney. Quiet are and nice neighborhood with plenty of parks, coffees and restaurants. Cedric was always available, supportive and was flexible to accommodate to our check in time.
The studio was lovely and clean with comfortable bedding. The location was perfect for enjoying the national park and beaches. The host was helpful and friendly and gave us good local information.
David is a nice host reactive and easy communication. His appartement is well located and have a ancient touch.
Totally hip neighborhood and convenient to great food, bars and sights. Ben is very nice and helpful. The apartment comfortable and homey.

Shuang’s place is really close to the airport so that makes it easy to catch an early morning flight.  Everything is nice and clean.  Walking distance to restaurants and the supermarket.  I would stay here again next time!
Nice and quiet, beautiful little spot with lovely views and a beautiful clean home. Will be back again!

Margaret was the perfect host. The carriage is beautiful and Margaret and John have done an incredible job at restoring / keeping in great condition! It feels like a piece of history. I took my partner here as a birthday gift and it was better than could have been expected... We felt so welcomed, and there was such attention to detail and we even had fresh coffee and a bowl of blueberries and strawberries! The area is also beautiful and great for walking. Would definitely recommend and it would make a great gift.
George is lovely.

Amazing place with a great balcony and views of the ocean. In a very convenient location and could easily walk to the beach and Bondi. Ruby was a really easy to deal with host and everything went according to plan!

Tam was excellent with her communication with me. She responded immediately and contacted me multiple times to check how my stay was.
The apartment is beautifully decorated. The balcony is huge and perfect to spend time in. Location was great and walkable to all the places including Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Eye Tower etc

Lachlan's place is great. It's in King's Cross, which used to be the area to go out clubbing, but is now getting to be a bit more relaxed. The apartment itself is really nice, clean, and fairly large. Lachlan was extremely quick and helpful with his responses. Check in and check out were a breeze. Everything was great, except for the dryer in the apartment. If you do laundry, I recommend hanging the clothes out on the line on the roof.
Thanks for having us. Wonderful place with great location.
Quick responses, easy to contact if ever needed. Plenty of towels and spots to sleep.

Oliver's apartment is in a great location. 100m walk if you need to catch public transport or comes with a dedicated underground car spot if you  it.

Well fitted out with everything that I needed for my stay. Clean, fast wifi, netflix, comfy bed, view over Randwick racetrack, good cooking facilities and bathroom.

Oliver was quick to respond to any communication. Thanks Oliver for the stay.

Anita’s place is the perfect location for anyone who wants the beachside holiday. Located right across from the famous Bondi Icebergs, you can easily get to Bondi Beach and walk the coastal walk to many of the other beaches. The apartment itself is sparking clean, beautifully decorated and has everything you’d need for a great stay. Anita was there to help with anything I needed and gave me a tour around the area showing me the pools and restaurants nearby and the shortcuts on how to get there. Anita was very sweet and extremely helpful going above and beyond to help with both check in and check out. Would highly recommend staying here!

My experience at Naveen's place was the best I've had with Airbnb, from making the booking to checking out! The place was clean, spacious and tidy, provided with more than just the essentials! The location was amazing with everything you need at your doorstep from grocers to cafes, bakeries, restaurants and more.
Not only was Naveen well organised but her communication was flawless which made the whole experience easy, comfortable and memorable. We initially booked for Saturday to Monday but ended up extending another night and checking out Tuesday evening. She was really accommodating considering my friend had a late flight and even let us check out at a time suitable to us even upon a late request. Checking in and out was a breeze! We had no issues with anything whatsoever!
Being able to catch Naveen and Tristan, though briefly as they are very busy, made it even more pleasurable! I highly recommend this place and will definitely book again!

Very close to the airport, so if you've got a flight the next morning it's great. Far from the city center, I took a cab to Surry Hills for about 30 AUD, so not where you wanna stay unless you wanna take buses or cabs everywhere.

Belinda's cabin is very clean and comfortable, and spacious for two. The sun hits the porch in the morning so it's the perfect spot for a quiet coffee to start the day. Super close to beautiful Jibbon beach but everything in town is within walking distance anyway. We would definitely recommend.
Convenient, clean and spacious.

The place was more or less as advertised, however, it was clear that the host did not make a lot of effort to prepare the place for a guest. Everything, from the refirgerator to the bathroom closet was full of her belongings.
A lovely place and location. The apartment is really great with a beautiful view. Anita as a host? Can’t think about a better one. She is so thoughtful and welcoming!
Great location and well set up. Thanks.

I really enjoyed my stay at Leena's place. She is very friendly and accomodating, so communication was effortless.

The place is very clean and well equipped. There is a huge backyard with a variety of flowers that attract colourful birds. I really enjoyed watching the sunset sitting in the huge entertainment deck.

There is easy access to the Sydney CBD via M7/M2. Shops, cafes and takeaway restaurants are just a few minutes walk away.

I stayed at David's place for 4 nights while I was in Sydney for a friend's birthday. His place was exactly as it looks in the photos.  It was secure, well appointed, spotlessly clean and despite it's proximity to Darlinghurst's nightlife, it was very quiet.

The room had everything you could want, a comfy bed, plenty of storage, aircon, TV with Foxtel and direct access to a sunny deck.  The private bathroom was also modern and  luxurious.

David was a thoughtful and considerate host and made me feel completely welcome.  The booklet he had compiled of the many great cafes, bars and restaurants in the area was also very useful, and I sampled many of them. 

The location is superb, with so much within walking distance, buses practically on the doorstep and trains just a short stroll away. 

I would definitely stay at David's place if I was in Sydney again and highly recommend it to anyone heading to Sydney. 

This was my first experience with AirBnB.  I don't think I'll ever stay in a Hotel again!

Thanks for a great stay, David!

Just spent a lovely weekend with my mom in Cath's Garden Studio. The studio's gorgeous and equipped with everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The area is quiet and pretty interesting too - enjoyed my Sunday morning run in the diverse surrounding neighbourhoods :-) Cath is lovely too and very helpful - will definitely be back the next time we are in Sydney.

Hernan was very open and welcoming. The proximity to the airport was a huge bonus as well.
Thanks for making it a relaxed and comfortable stay.

The place was exactly what we were after - a bit of space and all the amenities of home. The apartment was also extremely clean, beautifully presented with lots of character and was well stocked with the basics.
The location is perfect - A short walk to military rd (fantastic cafes and shops), public transport (buses and ferry) and Balmoral (my favourite place on earth).
Whilst we had limited contact with our host, Mags, she was very accommodating of us (travelling with an infant), proactive in contacting us a few time ahead of arrival to make sure we had the information we needed, and knowledgeable of the local area. 
In summary, we had a great time, loved the place and would definitely stay there again.

Annie was a fantastic host. Very responsive and welcoming! The flat is gorgeous. Very modern and comfortable! The flat is in the best location in Sydney. Walking distance everything. Pick any direction and you'll find great cafes, bars, and restaurants. All of Annie's food suggestions turned out to be fantastic as well! Would definitely recommend this place!
Great place , very modern, clean , easy to communicate with the hosts , definitely worth a stay
Perfect place to stay in Sydney.  Lovely apt with all you need and a great value.  Mariana's delightful!

From the moment that I booked with Carole and Steve I was made to feel welcome.  They are a friendly and helpful couple that went out of their way to ensure that I felt comfortable in their home.  Nothing was too much trouble and the accommodation was excellent.  I was more than happy with the lovely bedroom, the well set up sitting room and the light and airy private bathroom.  I would not hesitate to recommend their establishment for a place to stay in Sydney.  Their house is well situated to bus and train transport and there is local shopping available just down the street.

Awesome place. We book the apartment on a last minute basis and still we get a friendly welcome and help from the the host and her husband!!!
Place look clean and awesome as well. 10/10 will come again if we r visiting sydney!

Super logement sur Sydney : a 20min a pied de Coogee beach, très bien relié au centre et a l'aéroport avec un arret de bus face à l'appartement, commerces à proximité, jolie deco et surtout l'accueil  de Cindy et Claudio était adorable  ! Merci encore, Je recommande !
My husband and I had a wonderful time staying in Desireé's beautiful apartment. Would definitely stay again.
Truly unique experience, excellent host, very pleased with the booking
Absolutely the cleanest, best equipped accommodation with gracious hosts.   We will definitely stay here on our next trip to Sydney.

Great stay 
Fabulous location 
Would definately stay again 
Homely 
Clean 
Everything we needed and some! 
Thank you Cat!
Everything you could possibly want is available. Access to Balmain shops/restaurants is 5 min walk. Easy access to city

Bryan was a great host, very prompt and thorough when answering any questions both before and during the stay. 

Great location, Glebe on your doorstep and Darling Harbour is a 20 minute walk or short train journey away. 

The cottage is exactly as described, and was spotlessly clean when we arrived. Fabulous balcony with a lovely view, perfect to enjoy your morning coffee or relax with a book.  Comfortable beds and living areas, and the extras left by the host, including travel cards, made everything really easy. 

If I'm lucky enough to return to Sydney I would love to stay here again.
地理位置非常棒,房间设施新,东西全,整洁干净｡

I stayed here for 2 nights in March in Evelyn's place. It's a beautiful self-contained apartment and pool with amazing views over Pittwater. It's in such a peaceful location and is within 5min walking distance to Paradise beach, the local corner store and restaurants. You are also a 2min car ride away from Avalon - which has a stack of cafes, restaurants, banks, gift stores and a big supermarket.

The rooms were a great size and the place was super clean. Evelyn personally greeted me upon arrival and had many recommendations for local restaurants and things to do. There was also a nice bottle of wine waiting for us to make us feel extra welcome.

Evelyn's place is the perfect place to hang out and relax or to use as a base to explore all the spectacular northern beaches (e.g. Palm Beach, Whale Beach, Avalon Beach, Newport Beach). I would recommend Evelyn's place to any couples looking for a relaxing bush and beach retreat. My only regret is not staying there for longer.
Great, cozy stay! Highly recommended

This is a great house in a fantastic location in Mosman. The rooms upstairs are lovely old bedrooms with timber floors and spacious high ceilings. So close to cafes and everything you need on Military Rd. Parking was easy and convenient too! Thanks Rachel for a lovely stay.

This is a great location,  an easy 20 minute walk to the international airport along a safe walkway.  The room is clean and comfortable with a great shower and wifi.  The bathroom is shared between two rooms, but this was no problem.  I felt very safe here.  There is a big supermarket 10 or so minutes walk away, so is a great place to stay coming from or heading off on an international flight.   Would recommend to others.  Thank-you.
Nice place
Place was very convenient to Olympic Park with great cafes and restaurants on the street. Great hosts with quick response times

Absolutely perfect in every way. I could not have chosen better! 

Thank you Cathy for making me so welcome in your home from the moment I arrived.

 The accommodation is beautiful, the bed was really comfortable with high quality organic bed linen. It was great to have a fridge in the room and delicious breakfast supplies provided. The area of Avalon beach is stunning. I cannot wait to come back!
The studio was so beautiful! Amazing design and so clean! Everything was perfect, Anita is very kind and everything that we needed she answered us! Thank you so muchh

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Andrea's place. The location was just great, we walked to lots of restaurants and cafes,  centenial park, into the city and across to circular quay. The apartment itself was just as pictured, very spacious with a great view.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Treen's beautiful house at Bondi :) the location was fantastic we could easily walk to cafes, restaurants, grocery shopping and of course the beach! 
The atmosphere of the house was lovely, it really did have a beautiful positive feel to the property. 
I would definitely stay here again :)
Thank you Treen

Gavin was by far the best host I had in Oz. (the others were good too) He was there when I arrived, nice, a good conversationalist, good tips, and shared with me his honemade cooking.

His place is just a few minutes walking from Central, the main train stationin town. Plus, it was a 3 minute walk to my favorite coffee shop, Di Bella, that he told me about.

Mari's home is a lovely family home that is looked after very well.

Location is great being such a short drive to various beaches, there's also bus stops a short walk away, as is the local shopping mall.

The house itself has everything you need, beautiful well kept gardens, a brilliant sheltered BBQ space complete with ceiling fan and speakers to hook music up to, lovely kitchen area, modern bathroom and main ensuite, plenty of towels, aircon works well on hot summer days!

Finally, Mari was very easy to deal with, quick to respond to messages and happy to help where she can. I do not have a single bad thing to say about this home and my family would gladly stay here again!
Lovely apartment! We look forward to staying again.
Shuang的房间非常干净整洁,靠近悉尼机场,去市内也蛮方便,性价比不错,非常抢手的一个房源,房东也很贴心,推荐｡

apartment (number 42) is managed by an agent - Sydney Holiday Rentals. It is clean, nicely furnished and decorated, has a well equipped kitchen and is  located in a quiet area of north Sydney.  It is in an oldish block and is as described on the air bnb site, except for  parking. On phoning the agent to arrange a time to be met at the apartment, we were advised there had recently been difficulties with other residents parking in space 42. So, surprise, surprise when we arrived, yes there was a car in space 42. The agent insisted we park in space 43 instead which belonged to another apartment that sydney holiday rentals also manage.  This was not a full size spot and we had great difficulty fitting our Subaru into the spot. After scraping the side of the car on the adjacent concrete pillar it was obvious this spot was next to useless for all but micro cars. After asking the agent 3 times to contact the building manager in order to locate the owner of the car in spot 42 ( which was a standard sized spot) she very reluctantly went away and made a phone call. Miraculously, the owner materialised within less than 5 minutes and begrudgingly moved her ‘illegally’ parked car.  The agent’s insistence we park elsewhere on the property and her resistance to call the building manger, made us wonder whether apartment 42 does not, despite the literature provided for arrival and the advertising, actually come with parking space 42. So, if you need parking, we suggest you find another apartment.

At no point did the agent apologise, either for not being able to deliver on the parking space, nor for arriving 30 minutes late to meet us at the department despite insisting we arrive no later than 4.00.  

Unfortunately this experience spoilt our stay.
David's place is awesome, amazing location and I loved my little morning routine of doing yoga in the sun on the patio outside my room. David was lovely and very easy going, he is a gentlemen.
Really recommended this place. It was a really unexpected experience
Amazing house..Very quite and peace and definitely relaxing place..Worth spending your money..Almost all the necessary stuff is 5mins close to you..Overall rating in one word would be "Phenomenal"

Susan was great, we talked before my arrival, she met me at the door when I arrived. The location was perfect for me, It beats any hotel that I have ever stayed in.
Great value for money, and just really pleasant.
Thanks
Location and price were wonderful. Be prepared for a very small studio, but the accommodations are very comfortable for a few days.
It was a beautiful stay, 5 min to the beach and really nice people!
Very comfortable room and great location!

I felt so lucky to have been able to stay at this wonderful place.  In an incredible little corner of the world, this calming and well-appointed space was the perfect HQ for a few days of exploring the stunning Australian coast.  Belinda was a gracious and accommodating host, and I appreciate the great taste with which she fashioned this simple studio.

Tracy's place s in a lovely area , close to the lake and a couple of blocks from the beach .The unit was really comfortable and had everything needed for a quick getaway . Tracy and her husband were very accomodating and it was lovely to meet them both. 
Thanks for a great stay 
Jodie :)
Great accommodation, easy to follow instructions and fantastic location. Everything you needed right at your doorstep.  Great host too.
Millie's apartment is really nice. It's neat and tidy, and while small, is well laid out and comfortable. The view from the balcony is quite pretty, as you can see the top of the Harbour Bridge.
Fantastic location!
Good space!

This home stay ticked all the boxes for us. Terry was very helpful and friendly. Arrangements were easy to make before our visit. She met us at the airport and took us back two days later in her car for a small charge. This was very convenient for us. The apartment is spacious and well appointed. It is in a very good location and convenient for the city. Lots of good places to eat within walking distance.
Great spot to experience suburban Sydney.
I would highly recommend a stay at this apartment. Great location - right next to Central Station. Gavin is a fantastic host and really helped me out during my stay.

Eleanor was kind to let us check in early.
House manual was comprehensive. Little disappointed with little fridge space for 6 nights stay.  Small area to prepare meals. About shower leakage was told on the day. Mould around screen from wet floor was unhygienic.

Great apartment in a perfect location for CBD, the harbour and other central sites. Excellent communication with Jack throughout (he was away for most of my stay) ...... free WiFi and access to coffee machine .... would happily book again - great value for money.
Confy place really well located.

Yvonne’s home is amazing and she is a fantastic host. We found the room and adjacent bathroom perfect for our needs, a really lovely space. We were in town for a wedding in Watson’s Bay and it was very easy to get the ferry up and then uber back. The house is ideally located only a 15 min walk to Rose Bay and 20mins to Bondi Beach.

El departamento estaba muy bien ubicado. A una sola cuadra de la playa y del puerto. Manly es un hermoso lugar para conocer. Y el alojamiento de Jonny tenía todo lo necesario para complementar la experiencia. Es súper lindo y limpio. Sobre jonny es una persona súper agradable, compartimos viendo una película y nos dio algunos consejos donde ir . También cuido de algunas cosas que se me quedaron. Totalmente recomendado .
I very enjoyed Louise's flat. It gave a very good experience of what it feels like to live in a modern flat in Sydney.

The house was in a fantastically convenient location and easily accomodated all 8 of us. House is situated very close to bus lines that go to the city or Bondi Beach, kings cross and all the darlinghurst cafe's and night life is minutes away/

Jeremy attended to any issues we had straight away and was a pleasure to deal with. highly recommend the house and Jeremy as its host.

Essentially its Kings Cross, a suburb that bears no resemblance to the one of my youth. 
Paul & Lukes apartment is centrally located in a inner suburb that is blessed by trees, exceptional Thai Takeaway and great restaurants. Walking is a breeze. Close to the city. Probably not a great place for light sleepers, with Macleay Street never sleeps. A great classic 1930’s period apartment in character filled neighbourhood

Anita was thoughtful and thorough during check-in to ensure I had everything I needed. The view is spectacular! I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to enjoy Bondi and everything it has to offer.
The host canceled this reservation 232 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was a perfect location for our stay in Sydney. A five minute walk to the harbour bridge and lots of restaurants within minutes of the apartment. Millie was an excellent host and very willing to offer anything we needed. I'd definitely recommend this place to anyone.
Great Location, large, clean Master bed room with great ensuite
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great communication.
모든게 완벽한 숙소였습니다. 위치가 정말 좋았고 뷰도 아름다웠습니다. 깔끔한 인테리어와 편안한 잠자리, 그리고 주방에 필요한건 거의다 갖춰져있어서 식사를 챙겨 먹기에 부족함이 없었습니다. 체크인아웃도 편리했습니다. 최고의 숙소였습니다.
A clean private room very close to CBD, darling harbour and museums. The road noise at night may be a tad loud for some.
Nice stay, hosts were lovely, bit out the way for the city and surround area, would be best for though with a car.
Great apartment, great location for events at Olympic park! Easy check-in and communication with host. We will definitely stay again!

This is my second stay at this amazing apartment in Potts Point and I will most certainly be staying here every time that I am in Sydney.  Paul and Luke are excellent hosts and very friendly and knowledgeable about the area. The apartment is beautifully decorated and the book collection is 'to die for'. Is very clean and the linen is beautiful.  Perfect location for that get away in the heart of Sydney. I highly recommend that this is the best destination for your Sydney stay.
Great location, spacious rooms, rear lane garage and friendly neighbourhood. Nice and solid with polished floors but a little musty so keep those windows open!

Host was great, I just had to text when our flight landed and we were able to check in at 12 which was really handy. 
Excellent location. We just needed somewhere to shower and sleep so it fit the bill.

The most ideal location if you are looking for quiet and peaceful. We enjoyed with our 2 children aged 2 and 4 and my husbands parents. The house is beautiful and is equipped with everything you might need. Steps from the house take you straight onto Mackerel Beach....bliss.
Great view great hospitallity...
Anton's place is clean and comfortable and the location is great for exploring the city. 10/10, would recommend!

This welcoming private colourful terrace is a haven in Newtown. Filled with art and colour. Way better than a sterile apartment! Kassandra was so welcoming and explained the house quirks. She is super fast to respond to messages. Beds were comfy and warm. It’s a short stroll to Newtown and you can get a direct train to Circular Quay. The house is leafy inside and out. Shower pressure was heavenly and kitchen has all you needed. The house is just so atmospheric and eclectic - a beautiful experience more than a place to stay. We loved Marrickville markets and Sydney Park.  Loads of great coffee nearby, the best gelato and great organic and health food shops. Totally recommend.

The apartment was perfect!!!
So much space!!!
Definitely a place to recommend.
Julia & Adele were so helpful.
The bus to the city was a couple of blocks away and to get to Bondi Beach was also pretty close.
Being 2 blocks from the Bay made the trip to Manly so nice!!!!!
100% recommended.
Warm, comfortable, great location and great communication from Greg and Maggie.

Such a beautiful apartment, photos are the exact same. Mohit was very quick in responses and quick to accommodate my request! Such a great location and very stylish apartment, and also includes a parking space which is great! 5/5.
Great location near Kong’s cross with plenty of places to eat nearby. I felt like I was able to escape the city and relax without really leaving the city.

Trent was a great host. The apartment is situated in a beautiful, quiet and peaceful part of Rose Bay. The apartment was extremely clean. We felt right at home and even shared a glass of red with our friendly host. Highly recommend.
Everything is very good

The apartment was very well maintained and clean. It is located in a fabulous and secluded area of Sydney. Catching the ferry to the city, and discovering the rowing club (for drinks) were highlights. Late afternoon visits by the cockatoos was a treat too. You will need to have a car to visit the local shops for groceries.
Great location and caters for a big group.
Great place to stay, would definitely go back. convenient location with everything you need

We had a great stay at Evelyn's place. The place is just as by the pictures, the view is very impressive and the swimming pool, completely private for us, although quite cold at that time of the year, was worth a dive in! Evelyn did all to make our stay very confortable, and accomodate the place for our ten month old!

Au top!
Super accueil, appartement vraiment joli et cosy, très bien situé, tout à proximité pharmacie, commerces, bus...etc
An excellent, clean and cute place to stay in Sydney! Wonderful cafes and stores just around the corner and only a 20 minute walk to darling harbour! Highly recommend this beautiful home.

This is best place to stay in Sydney! Just few steps to the Hyde Park. Right in the central area which is easy to travel,exploring and food hunting.
When we arrived this beautiful apartment. Everything you see make you feel like home. Because we were there for the Sydney gay and lesbian mardi gras. You can watch the parade at the balcony (Best view ever).
And we thank you for the host making our trip in Sydney unforgettable.
The place was beautiful, clean and in the perfect location for all things bondi.

11 out of ten
Great value and comfortable environment. Rhonda is an amazing host :)
Nice thoughtful touches
Its a nice experience that i first time visit Sydney.

Sam is a wonderful host. The apartment was very clean and tidy. All the necessary facilities and amenities are provided. Being so close to a shopping centre also is a huge plus. I will definitely stay at this apartment in the future. I highly recommend it if you are looking for good accommodation.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Amazing views of the beach and really easy to get to other local beaches. Would definitely stay again!
Casey is a warm and friendly host making sure we had everything we needed. The room is spacious and warm with lots of welcoming extras and homely touches. We will definitely be back. Thanks Casey.
沟通很及时,地点也很方便,强烈推荐

Close to beach. 
Very unclean - floors, sand in beds, cockroach in kitchen. 
Lack of cooking equipment - we had to go and purchase a frying pan.

Nick is an excellent host and his place is 5 star standard. Great central location, beautifully furnished, spotlessly clean, good amenities, you can't ask for more. Check in and check out was easy and Nick is a great host. I highly recommend staying with Nick and I would definitely stay again!

We stayed at Cathy's place for a friends wedding over the weekend and absolutely loved it! It was perfect for a comfortable nights sleep, very clean, nice and modern. Cathy was lovely, making sure we had everything we needed and then leaving us to it. We were running a little late so had to rush in and get ready before taking off to the wedding!
The area is perfect too, just down the road from the shops and not too far to the beach. We will definitely be staying there again in the future if we are up that way and recommending to our friends. Thanks Cathy!

Gavin's apartment is really well organised and certainly lacks nothing. The location is great too, very close to local amenities, good cafes and restaurant (I highly recommend next door Italian cafe, the food is superb and the staff are friendly too). Gavin's instruction is also very clear.

Our stay at Cathy’s was good. It had a cool vibe, for the space available, Cathy has made it look great with some cool artwork, books layed out in a funky way on the shelf, wooden features etc. Bed was comfy, shower was good (doesn’t just dribble water) and it’s in a good location. Just around the corner from redfern station, which makes getting into the city centre super easy. The nearby surrounding area is alright, few shops and bars nearby. Cathy is very attentative, too. She replies to your messages as quick as you would reply to a text. So if you need anything, you’ll get an answer pretty quick.
Excellent apartment with all the facilities a visitor would need. We had an excellent stay.
We loved our stay in Michy’s cabin, it felt very homely, a lovely get away! Michy was a great host, and very responsive to messages.
The place is easy to find, great location, very close to westfield and supermarket coles. But there is no shampoo and shower gel in the apartment.

Lovely studio with all the homely features. Sam was outstanding with communication and responding. She was very accomodating and flexible to make sure our stay was fantastic! Highly recommend this beautiful place :)

Cath's studio was a delight. It was all the little extras like a slice of cake waiting for you upon returning back for the evening, home made jam, biscuits, gourmet butter for eggs on toast, chocolate, trail mix... that make it so much more personable and enjoyable than a hotel.  It has to be one of the best and most authentic airbnb places I have stayed in. 
Cath has thought of everything! Comfy bed, choice of pillows, great shower and super clean. It is also close to the airport and train stations to easily get into the heart of the city. Highly recommended!

It is actually our first time on air bnb and the first experience with this place was an awesome one, the place is very clean, tidy and George actually went on the extra mile by providing us with some toys, knowing that we have our son with us as well. George has been very helpful and we look forward to staying in this place in the near future

Natasa's house is just by the train station, which is very convenient. We asked her opinions on where to go for new years's eve and she and her friend provided lots of very useful suggestions. She's the best host ever!
We had a great stay at Tracey's.

Belinda's stay was immaculate and she really has thought about all the details! Location is great, within walking distance to trails and local amenities, with being peaceful and pleasant at the same time.
Clean and plenty of room. Good value.

Fantastic location, great place, a few bumps. The apartment was very clean, very comfortable, in a great neighborhood.  Javier was not in town but contacted me via email to make sure all was ok when I arrived.  I had originally booked a different place but it was cancelled last minute so I was lucky to find Javier's place.  Unfortunately, I was driving and did not have time to verify the parking situation.  Javier tried to offer ideas, but in reality I was stuck paying for parking whenever I was at the apartment on either a 1-hour or 2-hour meter.  Pricey and inconvenient!  If you are not driving, you'll really enjoy the chill apartment and great neighborhood.

Millie's "shoebox" (as she calls it) is an adorable little corner of North Sydney with easy access to trains and buses. Plenty of nearby food and drink, and her recommendations will definitely enhance your stay. Check in/out was easy as could be. Would stay again!
嗯,这是一次愉快的旅途｡very nice room!

My family and I very much enjoyed our stay in Sydney largely due to Bryan and his lovely house. We were traveling with a 16 month old so the pram, portable high-chair and other baby/kid amenities were a major plus for us. Bryan even offered to come over and install a baby gate for us in the house! 

Everything in the house was clean when we arrived and there were multiples of all the basics such as towels, toilet paper, etc. We have stayed other places where only 1 towel per person is provided. Bryan even dropped off extra pillowcases and toilet paper during our stay =) Bryan was also more than accommodating to our travel schedule and even offered to let us check out later. 

The house is close to public transit so it's really easy to get to places. The house even has OPAL cards to you to use during your stay. There is an abundance of eclectic foods to choose from only a block or two away. 

We really enjoyed our stay in Glebe and will definately look to stay here next time we are in Sydney.

A bright and spacious loft apartment. The decoration, styling was stunning. The bedrooms are awesome for the views and the comfort. The location is so user friendly, close to everything from great cafes for the morning brunch. To an array of restaurants for dinner. And easy access to the city. Best for people arriving via public transport. Puppy friendly, which meant our cavoodle was safe and comfortable too.

Close to public transport, 10 mins walk to Museum station. A lot of places to go eat around the area and grocery stores if you plan to do shopping for regular food. 
The apartment itself is really cozy and quiet, no noise from the outside. Annie was a great host, great communication. Overall a great place to stay and would definitely book again!
Chloe was a great host. Very easy to get in touch with and was really understanding and accommodating when our travel plans went slightly awry. Apartment is perfectly positioned to explore Sydney .

Kassandra’s place is an unrestored Victorian two storey terrace, a short walk to King St shops. It has comfortable shabby chic furniture and lots of cool and quirky art installations. Sweet Shala the cat will welcome you on arrival.

Great Location near Circular Quay.  Home was suppose to have WiFi but host said company was having problems so no WiFi during our stay.  Washer Dryer is located in the shower. Washer discharges onto the shower floor. If shower is left on more that one minute, it overflows onto bathroom floor.
It was a very nice visit to Natasa’s place and definetely recommend it to everyone.
very nice view from the apartment!

Such a tranquil location with stunning views everywhere you look. The house is perfect for a large group and communication with Bailey has been fantastic, he has been very quick to respond. A little car juggling may be required however a small price to pay for this top location.
Great location, excellent communication. We enjoyed our family stay here.

I had an amazing tine staying at Daniel and Elenas and would recommend it to anyone! If you are looking to stay in Sydney. Choose this beautiful place! A special thank you to the host Lynne! She was amazing, thoughtful, kind and caring. She looked after me like I was a member of the family! Thank you so much to you all for taking so good care of me :) (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

TLDR:  We had a pleasant stay as a family of 5, with kids ages 8-13.  It was clean and as described.  Some things were annoying but we slept well and loved the accessibility.  

Sally's place has a GREAT location for public transit. Legit <10 min walk (kid-pace) to the central train station, once we figured out the fastest route.  We used the trains and buses and also walked to many central destinations.  Perfect for our needs.  

Don't be put off by the odd configuration.  The lounge room with beds is spacious and comfortable.  We used it both for kids' bedroom and eating.  Didn't spend a lot of time in the apartment otherwise so that was just fine.  The only issue was eating over carpet; we had to vacuum to manage crumbs between meals.  

The biggest drawback here was in the bathroom.  The toilet is LOUD when it's refilling--kind of a squealing sound as if the shower is on.  Made us not want to flush after anyone went to bed.  And speaking of the shower, it was one of the worst I've encountered!!  Low pressure and the temperature would change randomly from cold to scalding hot (and NOT while anything else was using water in the apartment.) My family was amused by my yelps as I got hit by hotter water than I could stand, but I wasn't!  A bath was more pleasant, and perfect for the kids, but be aware that the tub is an odd shape.  It narrows at the upper end and anyone larger than my US-size-10 bottom can expect not to be able to sit in it for a soak.  

Kitchen is clean and minimally-adequately-equipped.  There are just enough pots & pans to do some basic cooking, but only one huge awkward knife.  I've suggested they get a better set!  There was a dishwasher but not much detergent so we mostly washed by hand.  I wish there had been a teapot--I made tea in a saucepan.  You'll find some very basic supplies (salt/pepper/sugar/tea) but otherwise pretty much bare cupboards--this isn't one of those places where you'll find some edibles left from previous guests.   That's fine; some people really prefer it that way.  Just be aware you'll need to supply most all condiments, oils etc.  if you plan to cook.  

We liked having the clothes washer and some detergent was provided.  

The shades are good in the bedroom but in the lounge/bedroom there's a slight bay window that can't be darkened as fully.  Thankfully the kids were jet-lagged enough to sleep well anyway.  

One thing that gave me a weird feeling were all sorts of ominous signs and letters to residents posted in the lobby and elevators--it sounds like the building is recently under new management and getting its financial affairs in order?  Also lots of rules about visitors and not letting people in or loaning out your key, which made me wonder if they've had problems with objectionable people?  We didn't encounter anything untoward, but it doesn't create a great atmosphere.
위치가 정말 좋고 침구류가 엄청 푹신합니다 두분이서 지내기 정말 좋아요. 숙소 창이 커서 해도 잘 들어오고 쾌적합니다. 주인하고 소통도 잘 돼요. 일층에 리셉션같이 항상 상주하시는 분들도 있어서 보안에도 안심되구요. 다음에 와도 또 여기서 지낼 것 같아요.

Great stylish place!
Would definitely come again.

Enjoyed our stay at Franca and Alessios place. Apartment was as described on the listing and in the pictures and location is close to Redfern and Surry Hills and within easy reach to the city. Check in was very smooth and great instructions were provided and response to emails was swift. Would recommend.

The place was great, spacious and roomy. We were attending ANZ for a conference and whilst it was only me who stayed there, you could easily accomodate 5-6 adults comfortably. Two bathrooms is also great when trying to get ready. Great views from the balcony and air con and blinds made more a comfortable stay.
The kitchen space was great but you will need to take your own milk, tea/coffee and breakfast items if wanting to use them. There is a convenience store downstairs and just outside but beware it is quite expensive too so only purchase limited items there. A few restaurants etc also down there with variety of cuisine too.

Great apartment in an awesome part of Sydney. Nicole met us and showed us around - she was fantastic and really friendly. Great restaurant recommendations too. The apartment has everything you could need, as well as a rooftop pool and tennis court. Would highly recommend for a bit of indulgence in Sydney.

Cathy made us feel very welcome and went out of her way to help us on two occasions.

Avalon was beautiful. We discovered the street we where on is not only close to avalon beach but also a stone through away from paradice beach - which is a small beach on the pittwater side of avalon. Stunning! 

Thank you Cathy 
We loved our stay!!

We had a great stay at Clare's place while we were in town to see if we would like to move Sydney. Clarw was really flexible and responsive to our very last minute arrangements and even let us leave our bags on the last day, which was really helpful. The room was great and excellent location to see Newtown and the rest of the city via the train! Thanks for a great stay

Naveen and Tristan were absolutely wonderful hosts (as was Felix - who is adorable and cuddly).  The room and amenities were even better than I expected, and I would whole-heartedly recommend this listing.  The location was perfect for quickly getting to Sydney's hot spots, and the local restaurants and coffee shops were a delight to wake up to every day.  Even the concierge/doorman went out of his way to be accommodating in any way possible.  If you are considering staying with Naveen, book it now.  You won't regret it.

We had a fantastic stay. The property is lovely, has everything you need. It was very clean and tidy. Very close to the beach, great walks. Incredibly peaceful. We liked it so much we stayed an extra night. 

Belinda was accommodating and a pleasure to rent from.  

I would recommend it to any friend.

I booked for an extended stay at Angela's apartment and it was everything I could hope for in an Airbnb stay and more! The apartment was extremely clean and well-kept with all the amenities included.  I loved the beautiful marble bathroom and the spacious living space.  The kitchen included a stove top, microwave, toaster and kettle so I was able to easily prepare simple meals and breakfast.  The neighborhood is quiet, safe, and there are various cafes and restaurants just around the corner.  It is also within a short walk to Wynyard station and major shopping spots.  This apartment was perfect for my stay in Sydney and I highly recommend it to everyone looking for a home away from home :)
Great location, great staff and service.
Jyoti and her husband were very welcoming, kind and considerate hosts. Jyoti made me feel very comfortable and she was always willing to help and assist with questions. A pleasure to be in their home

My daughter and I had a wonderful stay at Oliver's place at 'The Stables'.  It is new, fresh, comfortable with everything you need and a beautiful balcony opening up to the breeze. We really enjoyed the view overlooking the racecourse, and loved watching the horses getting walked past the apartment. We needed to stay close to the Prince of Wales hospital and I particularly liked that there was a secure car parking space for our car.

We absolutely loved our stay at Angela and Geoff's place!! They made us feel so welcome, communication was fantastic and there were so many thoughtful little touches and extras that made this stay our best Air BnB experience. The apartment is stunning, the space is spotless with absolutely everything that you might need and the location is perfect. We can't wait to go back!!!
Nice and convenient 10-15 minute walk from international airport.
Lovely place, great location
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The small room with the balcony is very nice. In general the house is in a very good area and close to the CBD. 
Staying at Adrian’s House for 6 month was great and a real Australian experience. All housemates (Adrian, Conor, Rhys and Alessandro) integrated me into their circle of friends and took me to cool places. 
Thanks for becoming good friends and for the amazing times. I’ll miss you and visit you soon. :-)

Leena was an extremely warm and delightful host! The place was wonderfully spacious, tranquil, clean and well equiped for our stay. The personal touches on arrival made us feel very welcome and I would not hesitate to book this place again and again, absolutely loved our stay!
Perfect spot! Easy accessible location, close to Darling Harbour and cafes. It was very clean and had amazing views! Was a wonderful weekend!!! Thank you for letting us stay!
Great place to stay, the hosts are wonderful friendly people with a lovely home
This was a great place. Highly recommended based on location and quality of the accommodation and value for money
The room was very nice and clean, the location is perfect very quiet everything is near. Duncan was very helpful , we recommend this place !
great space in a great location.

amazing location. very clean and secure. 
communication fantastic and easy check in and checkout. 
definitely on my list each time I go to Sydney  thanks Sally.

Wayne and Kate's place is ideally located with views over Tamarama beach. Very comfortable space and beds.  Quiet despite so close to everything.  Bus is 150m down the street. Very enjoyable long weekend stay. Excellent hosts with great and prompt communication

Very clean and good place for rest
Near the beach just 1min and 3mins to the supermarket and everything is good 
Very Kind host!!!!
We had great time
A must stay if you’re in the area!

The apartment is conveniently located in Sydney's CBD near Darling Harbour and just a short walk to trains, Martin Place, etc. Sydney is a very walkable city and this apartment is in the middle of the city, so the location is tops. For the price, it would not be possible to find a better place. Clean linens and towels were provided. The apartment has a dish washing machine in the kitchen and a washer & dryer for laundry. They all worked fine. The host even left a box of welcome chocolates which was a nice touch.
We stayed during an unusually hot week. As the aircon is in the main room and not the bedroom, this did mean the bedroom was quite warm. It was not a deal breaker for us.
Clean, the apartment is not brand new, but for the rate absolutely acceptable. I would recommend the apartment.
I booked Linda's place for my Dad who was visiting Sydney. He really enjoyed his stay. It was walking distance to everything and Linda was very thoughtful in how she prepared the place for visitors.

My wife and I needed a room near the airport because we had a morning flight the next day. This room had a perfect location, was within walking distance to the train station/grocery, and was very clean. The aesthetics of the room and bathroom were modern. Basic "hotel" amenities were provided. Shuang's instructions were very clear and everything worked as expected. Great price for a great room.

Kasey’s place is the best place to stay in Bondi. You can literally walk out of the apartment and right onto the beach. She was such a fantastic host, extremely responsive and accommodating, and we will certainly be back one day!

very clean and the host is very kind 
if i have a chance i will visit again
Nice place !!

Helen and Mike were great hosts, very friendly, kind and relaxed. I was in the area for some archaeology work, and would often come back to the spotless house covered in dust and mud, but they never complained. The house is in a quiet location but only a short drive to the supermarkets.
Intimate apartment on Bondi Beach. Kasey kept in touch and provided all the information required for an easy stay. Thanks
Beautiful home, had everything we needed and we never wanted to leave. Would definitely hire this home again anytime we visit the area. Highly recommend this place!!
Was really great

Min’s place was a great spacious apartment for the 5 of us that stayed there. It’s right in the middle of the city area and close to so many restaurants and shops. She was lovely to communicate with and we had a great time. The massage chair was an extra bonus and we all loved it.

We absolutely loved our stay at Bronte B&B Studio! Susan was so accommodating and the studio was clean and fresh and tastefully decorated. We loved all the extra touches - fresh fruit and yogurt in the fridge, lovely organic teas! It's a nice short walk to the beach and there are lovely cafes and restaurants nearby. We will definitely be recommending the studio to our friends and would stay there again when we are next in Sydney.
Wendy’s place was stylish and immaculate. Luxurious features with a reasonable price. It’s a little bit out of the city but I would recommend staying here. Thanks again Wendy.

Very easy access to Internal airport!
Highly recommend!
Jess's place was perfect for our weekend stay in Sydney! Just a five minute walk to the train station, some nice coffee shops nearby and the apartment itself was exactly as described. Thanks Jess!
The accommodation was clean and tidy. Close to transport and walking distance. Close to shops.

Overall a good stay, just small issues with cleanliness but otherwise a great location, easy access to transport and main attractions. Cute cottage with character. Flexible early check in and late check out.

Very clean and tidy place, restaurants nearby, bus stop is at the front of the building, train station is just walking distance.
Very easy checking in and out, Nicole is available for contact any time and always helpful, it is value for money, will definitely stay there again.
have a dark room ,means ones bedroom without window

This place was so good to stay.
I 'd arraived there at 4-5pm
Room mood was cute and kind. I couldn't see him but he txt to me directly. Inside wasn't cold. Quiet warm. really thanks to him to know this place.
We loved the accommodation with everything we needed for a comfortable stay.

Super easy access to the beautiful home he has created. Great to talk with the entire family. It was one of the best experiences I've had with airbnb. I was even lucky enough to have a "long black" or as I would call it an Americano
Naveen apartment is very nice! Very well decorated and walking distance from everything. They have been very gentle and helpful to us. We miss Felix a lot!!! He is a very friendly and beautiful dog!

Perfect unit for the Olympic precinct.  Nicole was a great communication and facilitated early check-in.

The perfect host
Stylish and roomy apartment with amazing restaurants on your doorstep.
Really comfy place.. We didnt get the chance to meet miss D though. Excellent bathroom, it was very near to the train station, not to mention alot of good restaurant around the area. Tq!
Excellent location. I haven't seen Shaun as I was always visiting the city when he was home but all the communication was great before and during our stay

Julia’s place was exactly as pictured and described! Very well put together house, we joked that we wanted to decorate our apartment like it when we got back. The amenities Julia kindly left us were a very nice touch and much appreciated! Everything about Julia’s airb&b is very cozy, from the towels to the bedding. The location is unbeatable with the opera house only 20 minutes away! A very nicely located apartment. If you get the chance I would 100% recommend!

you couldn't find a much better location for seeing what Sydney has to offer! 
bed was comfortable and a lot of toiletries and cleaning products left so you don't need to worry about buying things.

Annie’s place showed much better in person. The decor was cute and definitely reflected Surrey hills trendy vibe. There was so much to explore in the area and was perfect walking distance to anything. The bed was super comfy and the place was quiet after a long day out. I would definitely recommend this place to others.
Great location re the beach, great host who communicated well and was friendly and helpful, only negative was that street is a little busy.
Such a gorgeous oasis. The photos in the listing don't do it justice. It was such an enjoyable stay.

The house was lovely, clean and very comfortable. All amenities were there. It was peaceful and quiet. Overall we really enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it for anyone wanting to stay in the area.

Good value for money - location was an excellent base for exploring Sydney, being so close to Central Station. 

Fitted out with all the basics - kitchen had cooking utensils, but the microwave/oven is a bit confusing and we couldn't find any instructions. 

The sofa-bed was more comfortable than the mattress and there was plenty of space in the studio apartment.

Belinda is great , friendly host, she saved our lives with her supplies 
( as IGA was closed on Good Friday).The accommodation is lovely, private and has everything what you may need. We really enjoyed our stay in Garden Studio and hope to be back! Thank you! Ula & Pete

The advertised #8 room is a great spot for the business traveller who has work in the area. Public transport (bus) easily accessible. Eastwood shops and train only brisk walk away.

The rooms is good sized and is private, with separate entry. Has heating to (albeit a little noisy) ward off the winter chill. The shared bathroom is kept really clean and tidy. The non-stop hot water in the shower is fabulous with excellent pressure. It is quiet as a mouse at night. Wifi is excellent. Coffee/tea making facilities - cooking if you’re inclined and even a washing machine to use.

Please remember this is someone’s home and therefore no frills like a hotel - the hosts are warm, generous and happy people. 

Excellent value for money!!!
Good location, clean, cozy. Like our own little home in Sydney. It had everything we were looking for in a Airbnb! Cathy was very nice as well, thanks again
This place is great. Excellent location and well-presented.

this home was big and very spacius.can easly stay upto 8 peoples.pool was plus and childrreb likes it.
home have enough aminties and OK wifi.
bugs and flies are only downside but it  its ok if you are not staying long in kitchen.

Good place to stay near airport, had good experience.
Newly built facility, with all the required amenities would love to use again.

The apartment is clean, well equipped, new, safe and quiet. It has an underground carpark. it's perfect for those have a good rest and visit the surroundings of Sydney. Very convenient: the supermarket is just at the corner of the street. there are many other shops around, even fashion/sport outlets not far away (130, Botany rd; NB sports). shopping center with Coles is 1 mile away. Overall, it was a great stay.

Thank you Susan for this wonderful stay! 
The accomondation was very cosy and the breakfast was delicious, especially the home grown passion fruits!

Jeremy's place was great.  There is plenty of room for guests as the 4 bedrooms can accommodate many. Three different terraces to sit out and enjoy as well as the back yard.  The real advantage is how close it is to shops and sights.  A short walk to hyde park, oxford street and kings cross. Walk a bit more and you are at the royal botanical gardens and the opera house.  Big kitchen and dining table so everyone can sit and eat together. Washrooms were smaller then expected and a few more stairs then we thought but we would highly recommend staying here if you are in Sydney and want to be near the CBD and some of the tourists sights.

Very clean, Stylish decoration, Easy access to Central Main staion, Excellent communication, Good matress for traveler, My family had really good time in this double floored apartment. The building is the best for traveler by train and also could be used for ones who wants walking along to the City, Hyde park. Addiotnally, the nice cafe and restraunt in SurryHills are recommnedable.

Susan has a small cottage at her home in the backyard. Perfect for one or two people. I stayed there 3 nights and really enjoyed my time there. The cottage comes with everything you need including your own bathroom. Susan is a very gracious and polite host. She took the time to explain the best way to travel in and out of the city. Took only 20-30 minutes to be right in the middle of Sydney. Such a beautiful city!! Wish I could have stayed longer. Enjoyed my time at the cottage.

We felt perfectly welcome and warmly invited stepping off the boat and walking up to the beach house.  Everything we needed was there, and even more!  The beach house was exactly as described, and even more beautiful than the pictures.  Everything worked, and the tree house was a great treat too.  Thank you for a great long weekend and we look forward to visiting again!

We had a great stay at Shaun's place. The area is great, with a beach, buses and stores/restaurant nearby.
The bed was very confortable and the kitchen well equiped. Shaun was a very nice host, the quality/price  ratio is really good, I recommend the place!

It's a given that the location was the best part about it. It was very clean and Philip was very attentive and explained everything for us in person which was a nice touch. The downstairs "wine cellar" was a bit scary at first, but it made things interesting. The second bedroom was perfect in the sense that it had a good mix of a specious bedroom and best bathroom of the house. The top floor bedroom's bathroom was very tight and the downstairs bathroom seemed to get soaked everywhere when you showered. Overall, it was a very neat place to stay. It was a lot of fun to hang out at the house. Somewhere you can feel relaxed and really feel "at home."
This is the perfect house for two couples. Very well equiped and location is close to shops and train station. Highly recomended

We had a marvelous stay at Susan's beautiful cottage. The attention to detail, tasteful decor, gorgeous garden and warmth of our hosts was very much apprecited. Beats a hotel room! Wonderful location and very convenient to the best of Sydney's eastern beaches. Susan and Greg - you are a super Super hosts! Look forward to returning soon. Catherine
Very nice apartment in a good area with lots of cafes and restaurants, close to the CBD as well.
I loved my stay here. The back patio, surrounded by plants, is perfect for breakfast . Robyn is a thoughtful and caring host.
really good location in Potts point close to everything. Host suggestions  were great and was really helpful. I'd recommend this apartment had all the essentials. small and cosy.

This location is great. Walking distance from the Central railway station as well as close to food and shops. Phan is an excellent host. We arrived in Sydney at 630 am and Phan allowed us to drop our bags off around 10 am so we could get started on our day . The apartment is very clean and secure. It was perfect for a group of 4 .
it was just great, the location and the house are perfect and the hosts are very friendly
A very nice place, very clean and nice location. The host is nice too. Me and my family have had a very good time ^^

Anita’s place is very well decorated and perfectly located right near Bondi beach. Wow, the view! There were little touches like the basic food and shower products provided which is great for the light traveler. Anita was very helpful and hospitable, and gave some great tips for things to do in the area. Comfortable bed and very clean. Very highly recommend!

This place was AMAZING!! 1 bed and 1 sofa bed and 1 rolling bed. The unit is self was clean and 100% as expected. 

Location Location Location!!! This place is 8 feet from the ocean. It was beautiful to walk outside and go snorkeling with minutes of waking up. Perfect to watch the sunrise with a cup of coffee. 

On top of that the walk along the ocean to the downtown area was stunning. Seeing the surfers and waves roll in on the walk was nice. It is only a 8 min walk to the main downtown of manly. 

Rod was awesome and very helpful. He even had a free for our car. 

100% will rent again.
This was a perfect getaway from the city.  A beautiful little apartment with the comfiest bed and best shower ever! I will be going back :)

Overall we had a comfortable stay at Franca & Alessio's  apartment. Redfern Station is only a 5 min walk away and convenient stores & several food joints are in close proximity - making the apartment conveniently located.
A little more attention to the cleanliness and functioning of kitchen appliances would have made our stay more pleasant.
Great people, great service, can be a little noisy if you are a light sleeper, Overall we’re very accomodating
Great place to stay if you plan on staying a night or two. A little farther than I expected to the opera house. Had to Uber

Most beautiful apartment iv stayed in, amazing area and very comfortable, house was extremely tidy and smelt amazing , host was so kind and was very quick with response and made sure we had everything we needed for our stay! Will defiantly be staying there again! Absolutely beautiful
Amazing location and host! Would definitely stay here again
Great location, very comfortable and convenient to transport, walking paths, supermarkets, restaurants etc

Property was great. Linda most helpful. Didn't actually meet her but she was  always available on the phone if needed. Arrived to find a box of chocolates set aside for us and a freshly stocked fridge for breakfast. A very easy experience all round. Late checkout greatly appreciated.

Naveen and Tristan have a stylish and cozy apartment in a cool neighborhood. They are very nice and make u feel like home. Always ready to give me travel tips. Love their dog Felix! Plenty restaurants, bars selection around and 5 mins away from train station, bus station, 2 mins to supermarket. And thanks for Naveen's recommendation of gelato which were really good! Great stay. Hope go back one day to play with Felix again. :)

great quiet location
well equipped private studio
Delicious breakfast
short walk to cafes and public transport 
close to amazing Bronte to Bondi walk
Susan is a very helpful and accommodating  host

We had a wonderful stay! Millie's studio is really cosy and was perfect for 2 of us. It also has a great view of the Harbour Bridge and was close to public transport. Checking in and out was also really easy. Would recommend and stay again.
Sarah was a great host. Very helpful and welcoming. The accommodation was neat and tidy and suited us perfectly for our short trip to Sydney.

This is my second time staying at Nicole and Simon's beautiful bright, spacious apartment.  The  apartment is within walking distance of everything - transport, grocery stores and an abundance of cafes, restaurants and bars.  There is NOTHING that Nicole hasn't thought of!  Nicole is an absolute pleasure who goes above and beyond to ensure her guests wellbeing.  We will be back :-)

Hernan is a great host. Cooperative, friendly and accomodating. The place is just as advertised. Neat, organised and all amenities properly provided. The location is wonderful with the beachy winds and easy access to bus and train. Being close to the airport helps for new comers. Hernan respects privacy and tidiness and was kind enough to offer any help when needed like a ride to the station in the rain or things like bank, train, buses or eating his delicious food. I would stay again and recommend him as  terrific host.
I love the place! It's warm and at grate location! The place feel like home:)

Anne is a genuinely lovely lady and a great host. Very generous with her time and local knowledge.  We were travelling with our young son and she had a cot and high chair, as well as a basket of toys which made all the difference!

The flat is really well located near to Newport Beach and we were able to borrow a sun umbrella and boogie board. 

It’s quite compact but perfect for one or two people wanting to get away from the city for a few days. We were able to get there by bus directly from Sydney.
Very cute tiny home! Close to train station and great little neighbourhood with great portugese chicken and thai food!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Kerri's place. She is a wonderful host and very welcoming. There was a delicious cooked dinner on my arrival and a lovely Breakfast laid out for me to help myself in the morning. I enjoyed sitting on the spacious balcony looking back towards Sydney. The whole place is very clean. The bedroom is spacious and the bed very comfortable. I enjoyed my own bathroom with plenty of fresh towels. Kerry's place is a lovely peaceful home away from home.  I would come back anytime I am in Sydney. Thank you very much Kerri.

The apartment is ideally located in a cool suburb of the city with plenty of bars and cafes nearby (we recommend the Dove & Olive!) The room was basic but clean, and Gavin kindly provided us with towels. 

Gavin was welcoming and helpful and able to offer local tips and travel information.

Great location, close to the beaches and all amenities. Cozy and beautiful one bedroom apartment for great value. My dad felt like at home and Sandra's hospitality and communication is top notch. There is not be a better place to stay for my family! Thank you Sandra!
Ian's place was very nice, in a good location and had everything we needed.

Andrew's place was perfect for a group of 4 traveling to Sydney. There were so many great places to eat like Spice Alley and countless cafes for breakfast or lunch. The proximity to the Central Park Mall and the Central station was so convenient. The local tips were great. We already want to plan a trip back to Sydney!
It was a really great experience to stay, perfect location and place. Hosts were really nice and helpful.

Great place to stay with a comfortable bed, great amenities and conveniently located. I really appreciated having breakfast readily available every morning before heading off for my day. Michele was really easy to communicate with too. Would definitely recommend!

Wow! Fei’s house was magical!! Loved our stay there – large palatial rooms, interesting decor and comfortable beds. We were welcomed by Fei’s helpful and friendly son who offered us drinks and snacks and sorted us out with some local knowledge for things to do nearby. Great place, we look forward to staying again.
Clean and neat, in a good location close to good coffee and transport into CBD.
Leslie and her family were very welcoming and the accomodation was perfect for me. I stayed 2 nights on business and would happily stay again.
Cathy has done well to transform a basement area into a bedroom and lovely ensuite, but I think it needs a little more work as it was a bit musty when we were there, in very wet Sydney weather.

This is our second time here and it is just great.  You can really relax when you know everything is perfect, not only the location but everything is clean, functional and practical, and on top of that so many nice touches like the Tim Tams in the fridge and the lovely organic shower wash and apple shampoo.  Every time I see a green apple I will think of Portobello!  With 4 teenagers, it is just the best place.  I appreciated the garage and the extra parking spots as my kids have their own cars now and we all come together at Manly.  We are making lovely memories and are already planning our next stay.  Anita is an exceptional host, super prompt replies and so helpful and friendly. Everything is just so fantastic, come and see for yourself and stay as long as you can.
Very clean and stylish. The stay was super comfortable

Fast becoming a regular visitor to the Little Albion! A sparkling clean room with detailed amenities, and a friendly stylish ground floor area to do a little work over breakfast before going round the corner to enjoy Surry Hills. Really lovely to spend time with Wendy again, and the fact that everyone knows your name is charming. Looking forward to coming back again soon!

Place was as per picture! Really awesome place to stay in, we wished we had the chance to stay longer! Surrounding area is still under some construction, but it wasn’t any major issue. Place is very accessible; only 5mins from the airport and cost between $15-$18 by Uber. There is also a petrol kiosk abt 2-3mins walk with a 24hr convenience store which was good if you need to get stuff urgently. Mascot train station is barely 5mins walk from the apartment and it takes you everywhere into the city which is abt 3 stops away. There are plenty of eateries outside the train station you can choose from, and there’s a Halal Thai eatery serving good food as well as a Kebab store and also an Indian cuisine place, to name a few, which was a plus for us considering we are Muslim. There’s also a big Woolsworth for you to shop across the station. Evan’s place is huge, very comfortable and very clean! Great to relax after a long day out on the huge and comfy sofa! Thank you Evan!
My partner and I were in Sydney and stayed at Hugo's place.  Great apartment centrally located.

Hernan hosted me 2 nights on weekdays. He has to work, so we have not much time together. But he is a very kind person and easy to get along with him. He gave me an extra key which I really appreciate. You have also free WiFi. I would definitely recommend Hernan and his flat.

Fabulous apartment, central location, great facilities and million dollar views!
Within walking distance to a fabulous array of dining experiences plus the pubs of both Kirribilli and North Sydney! What more could you ask for!

We loved staying here!  I never met Michy, but my husband said she was just the sweetest woman ever!  She brought us greek yogurt and granola for breakfast which was very sweet.  It is across the street from the bay and we even took out their surf skis briefly.  We loved being so close to Avalon Beach!  Great restaurants and beach nearby.

Neat clean good location 
Near new facilities
Very convenient! The place is lovely and very clean.
Another enjoyable stay. All aspects exceeded my expectations. Will be a regular visitor for work trips and highly recommend for it’s location, fresh modern decor and special touches.

Quite enjoyed my stay at Nataša's. The room was nice, the bathroom large and well stocked, and the overall hospitality was excellent.

The house happens to be a short walk from a strip of great brunch and coffee places. The closest establishment, West Village -a gastropub, for a lack of a better term- is 100 metres away from the house. (It's great for lunch and I instantly fell in love with it for its aesthetic, food offerings, and tap list.)

Nataša was a helpful and fun host. We ended up running into each other at pizzeria (Gigi) one evening and enjoying schooners at a brewery (Batch) on another evening. Our casual chats were delightful and full of insight.

Not a single complaint.

Yoco's share house is a great little alternative abode a stones-throw from the heart of Sydney. He was prompt to reply to any of my queries and was more than accommodating. Great value for money as well and definitely recommend to anyone needing a friendly place to stay.
Wonderful base for my visiting parents. Desireé was so helpful and conscientious and I can’t recommend her apartment enough.

It is our first trip to Sydney, with my family including our 1-year-old, and all thanks to Linda, this was an amazing trip. Especially, my 1-year-old enjoyed it a lot. The property is very very close to Redfern (5 min walk) which means going to anywhere in the CBD is very very easy. There are a good cafe and a pub just in front of the property, which means you are covered if you are too lazy :-).

We chose to cook most of the days, as Linda ensured all cooking amenities are readily available for the guests. I could reach out to her and ask her any question and always got a prompt response. Overall, I highly recommend this property to anyone, especially anyone with kid(s).
Very friendly host, great location. affordable price. Highly recommended!!!

This is a lovely garden & art focussed place to stay, very quirky and fun.  It is so central to everything, easy walk to both King Street & Enmore Road.  It's nice staying somewhere a little more personal, and Kassandra was just SO welcoming.  Highly recommended!

Danny’s apartment is nice and the location is very convenient. However there can be noise from the apartment next door if there are noisy guests staying in there. If you can sleep through the noise, then it’s a great place to stay.

I very much appreciate staying at David's place. He is a wonderful host. Any question I had, if he didn't know he'd look it up on his i-pad...even, 'what time does the sun rise?' His place is clean and attractive. I loved the little balcony off of my room. I ate most of my meals out there. I hgihly recommend his place. Thank you, David.
Great place with amazing hospitality, and it is only located 1 stop away from the city! Duncan and Ashlee are amazing and have some great tips to share.

Fabulous location and lovely living and dining area, big enough for our group of 8, however there wasn’t 8 adult beds. Probably should be advertised as 6 adults 2 children, the 2 trundle beds were smaller than a single bed an our 5 ft 2 inch companions feet hung off end.

Very generous with late check out.

Definitely would stay there again.
Great location, very close to the beach. Gwen and Jim were very helpful.

A beautiful house in a quiet upmarket location. Nice touches from Richard with some groceries and toothbrushes. We found it convenient for access to Manly and the ferry terminal. I recommend getting the App Ride plus who for $3.10 per person will pick you up from the door to any location in the catchment area. You can book a time slot in advance, Monday to Friday only up to 9.30 pm. Otherwise a frequent bus service just down the road number136. Parking in Manly car parks is free for 2 hours but expensive thereafter. So best to leave the car behind if going into Sydney CBD. North Curl Curl beach is just down the road. Distant views of Sydney from the front of the house.
Comfortable & private

I have stayed at Desiree’s place twice now as I travel for work and it’s one of my favourite Sydney accomodation venues. It’s is absolutely spotless, secure, quiet and the most convenient location. Desiree is an excellent and attentive host - this place deserves every great review it gets and more

Wayne and Kate were wonderful hosts. The apartment was clean and as the pictures depict.  The location was phenomenal and the bottle of champagne a delightful bonus...The amount of thought that has gone into making guests welcome and having all things available was very much noted and appreciated.
very nice location

Sarah’s place is in a very nice area, super convenient/ walking distance to the CBD. Lots of restaurants in close proximity. We mostly did our own thing, but Sarah also invited me to a dinner, which was thoughtful. We had a couple of miscommunications, but all worked out in the end. I probably had way too much baggage to stay here (including dive gear), but Sarah was accommodating, and this wouldn’t be an issue if you were traveling light (which I rarely do, due to the nature of my work).
The apartment has all you need and the location is very good.
Cindy has an unbeatable location and is one of the friendliest, most organised hosts I've stayed with :)

Richards house at Mackeral Beach was amazing and Richard was a responsive and helpful guest. Despite the initial trouble locating the property in the dark and rain with three children in tow, we were thrilled to arrive and settle in to the small but very well appointed and beautifully decorated cottage. Absolutely everything you could need for a comfortable stay was at your fingertips, not to mention the beach, view, sunrises and an amazing garden, and our family of 5 had a very memorable and unique long weekend there.
