The only thing worth noting for families with young kids is to be aware that the 'tree house', whilst stunning, is probably not suitable for children under the age of 8-10 if sleeping alone. Despite this we would return in a heartbeat and recommend to all! Thank you Richard!

We absolutely loved staying here. Fantastic bridge views. Amazing breakfast hamper.  Brilliant guide / tips book. Can walk, bus or catch ttain or ferry to the city. Quiet street. Fantastic apartment in great central location.  Good night life in Kirribilli.  LOVED IT.  Only slight glitch is that the bathroom is an en suite bathroom so if 2 people stay bear in mind you have to walk through bedroom to access shower & toilet and whether you are okay with that.

Ideal for golfers and beach in walking distance. 
Did not have a car and used an opal card on the buses /trains  easy to get everywhere on them 
We are a retired couple over sixty.
Wendy was easy to reach and check in was straightforward. Loved the amenities, excellent location and plenty of street parking available.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Hugo's apartment. The location is absolutely ideal and the apartment is well outfitted for a comfortable stay in Sydney. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this place.

Sarah was a very helpful host who was there when we needed her and who we otherwise didn't see. The room is nicely furnished and quite comfortable. The bathroom is shared with the host's laundry and has a separate entrance as stated in the description. The bed was good (soft) and there were basic kitchen amenities which was very handy. This was an excellent place to use as a base while visiting the area. Thank you for your hospitality.
The host canceled this reservation 76 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Such a beautiful spot! Shame it was raining and we couldn't enjoy the beach over the road. Thanks so much!
Great place & great location!
Angela's place was exactly as pictured in a nice and secure building. I enjoyed the quietness, and she was very respectful of my needs and privacy. I'd return to her place next time I visit Sydney!

Hernan의 집은 시드니에서 좋은 추억을 만들어주는데 결정적이었습니다. 바쁜 시드니 도심에서 벗어나 바로 앞에 해변가와 한적한 동네분위기, 그리고 아기자기한 소품들이 가득한 이쁜 집은 아직도 생각이 나네요. 또한 hernan은 여행자들을 대화하는것을 좋아하는 쿨가이로 자유로운 분위기에서 살아볼수있도록 배려해주었습니다. 이용하신다면 방에만 있는것이 아닌 친구가 되어보세요.
Great location with a very accommodating host

The location is good, close to public transport and centrally located to visit Sydney, the car park is very convenient as well. We didn't meet Linda in person but the communication went great, she was very responsive. Cleaning to be improved.

Wonderful cottage. Two problems - on the main flight path for Sydney Airport, but tolerable. Make sure you ask Sue if the hot water booster button has been pushed, otherwise you may not get hot enough water in the shower.

This is a lovely home in a very central part of Sydney. The home has lots of personality and is beautiful. The only downside was that I left my Kindle behind by accident, and because I don't live in Sydney, and the owner lives overseas it wasn't very easy to organise to have it collected within the timeslots allocated to me by the owner. That can't be helped though. It was my own fault for forgetting it and the owner did the best she could.

Lilian made the stay lovely, the place was extremely clean. Lilian went out of her way to organise an iron when I needed one which was a huge help. She also wrote me a lovely list of places to eat around the location and they were awesome suggestions!

My partner and I enjoyed our short stay at Andi's Neiafu unit 2.  It was clean, well set-up, comfortable and welcoming unit.  Kitchen is fully stocked and lounge area downstairs had all that we needed. The queen size bed was comfortable and bathroom (shower) is located upstairs. The bathroom is on the smaller size but works for the place. Perfect for a couple or a single traveler who wants to chill out. There are also some lovely places to sit outside and it has a tropical beach feel about it. Additionally, it was a pleasant surprise to have little treats and breakfast items left for us in their kitchen area. We wished we had more time to explore the area as our stay was a short one. Bottom line, I recommend this place and hope to stay here in the future again.
Very responsive, smooth checkin/checkout, some unexpected little niceties, and a very interesting house.

Paul's flat is located in Potts Point where there are many nice cozy, fancy shops nearby. Also walking distance to Opera House, Botanical Garden so it was nice to walk around. 

However, it is also close to Kings Cross station and it could be little dangerous at night. I saw many drug addicts on the street and felt insecure. 

I am not expecting 5 star hotel when choosing Airbnb but I would expect more when I am still paying quite amount for the service. My biggest concern was the bathroom, not about the size but level of hygiene in it. I could see black mould from ceiling and wall, shower curtain was small and it kept sticking onto me when taking a shower and bathroom drain was rusty. I originally booked 6 nights but was provided 3 towels and no extra. It could be nice if extra towels can be provided for longer term stay. 

It would be also nice if the cleaner can clean the flat more thoroughly. I still saw the hairs here and there on the floor (of course) and on the couch, not to mention underneath the bed, couch..

Understand that there are bars, lounges nearby but the noises were quite disturbing as there were no proper soundproof. I was up until 2-3am for outside to be quiet enough so I could fully rest. 

Despite its great advantage of its location, I could not stand the bathroom and dusts in the house, I decided to move out on Sunday which basically I stayed for 2 nights only. This may be suitable for a single, couple, friends or family without child.
Phan was a very nice host. She was always concern in making us to feel at home. Everything was clean an tidy. The apartment is perfect for a big family or group. The location is very good.

My partner and I had an amazing experience a Daniel's place! The house and room were both clean and comfortable. Laura (his housemate) and him made sure we had everything we needed, respecting our privacy and being very open during encounters. They are both very laid back and enjoyable. We stayed there for a month and ended up becoming great friends, they are very lovely!
What a nice space to spend holiday in Sydney. Neat and clean, huge space, amazing central location in Sydney. Everything is in walking distance. I felt that I am staying at home.
Feel very private for a private room Airbnb. Clean and everything as described. Will definitely return :)

I stayed at Nicole's place for my graduation. My parents were with me. We found the place quiet, neat and tidy. It's super convenient (museum station was a 10 min walk) and there are heaps of buses to various beaches. It's also close to shops and convenient stores. Nicole wasn't in town during our stay but she put me in touch with her friend who was very helpful during our stay. We highly recommend this place!

The manly escape is exactly as pictured, a very clean compact apartment. Ziggy greeted me on arrival and showed me around the building, its in a great location in Manly. I have mobility issues but i was able to walk everywhere i needed to, its minutes from the wharf and the local Hop on Hop off bus which is something i used everyday. Manly escape was the perfect base, tea and coffee were provided as well as basic pantry staples. In the bathroom Ziggy is very generous with the white fluffy towels and bathroom staples. Thank you so much for a lovely secure place to stay, loved the view from the balcony too!!
It was a nice place to stay
Very clean and warm place. We really enjoyed staying there.

This was our first stay with Airbnb and we could not have been happier. Belinda was an excellent host, her garden studio is just as it looks in the photo, spotlessly clean and we especially loved sitting on the verandah soaking up the peace and quiet. Belinda was kind enough to pick us up at the ferry when it was raining on our arrival and had even provided milk in the fridge, tea, salt, pepper etc. Her thoughtfulness was most appreciated. Thanks Belinda, you have set the bar very high for our future Airbnb stays.
Convenient location. Very close to the airport and just $10 uber ride. The key got stucked the first time I used and the host help us to get it asap. It was lovely to have a short stay here.
Jennifer was a very generous host and we were very appreciative of her lovely home. Great location in a quiet area but close to everything we needed.
Nothing but good things to say. Super friendly and helpful. Good yarns and super super respectful. Wish I could have stayed longer!
Great stay in a very central location. Nice apartment with everything you need. Andrei was very easy to communicate with.
Great location, beautiful apartment.
Great location, friendly hosts. Highly recommend
Tyst och lugnt och nära till vandringsleder och strand. Fint hus och fantastisk trädgård.

Anita’s place made for a wonderful weekend away with our grandson!  A perfect location, lovely flat, great view, and up to date and really comfortable. Anita was a pleasure to meet and deal with. She made everything easy!  We loved our stay and can recommend Anita’s place unreservedly!  Thank you Anita!

Price and position were ideal for my trip. Place was clean and organized. If you’re a light and early sleeper be mindful of the noise from upstairs - just TV, walking etc. Otherwise all good, thanks Sam.
Very clean and comfortable. 5 stars!

I am still under a great impression from my stay at Suzie's place: I enjoyed it a lot! She is the most caring host: pro-active, kind and welcoming. The real life experience exceeded far beyond my expectations. The place is located in the heart of Sydney: in the safe, clean and beautiful neighborhood, right next to the Harbor. The room is light, spacious, clean, and well-decorated.  I'd like to thank Suzie for her hospitality, it was a lovely stay! Thanks!
A terrific stay in a lovely house near the beach. Host was always ready to respond and let us have an early check in if possible.
Super expérience chez un hôte très sympathique ! Accueil sans aucun problème et ambiance chaleureuse pendant ces 2 jours, à refaire avec grand plaisir ! :)

Friendly hosts, clean and well appointed apartment. soundproofed from traffic ten floors below, comfortable beds, shampoo, conditioner and body wash products in the bathroom, good strong stream shower. Good view of part of Sydney from the windows, handy access to bus and train.
Eleni’s home is beautiful and clean and welcoming for our weekend in Sydney.
Very comfortable and clean, fabulous views, a rare find!
We had a great stay at Micheles. Lovely new bathroom, the rest of the facilites suited us for our stay

I stayed at Hugo's with my Dad while we were travelling through on a road trip up the East Coast.  My Dad was in the bedroom and I was on the inflatable in the living room. There was more than enough space for the 2 of us and Hugo's home was exactly as expected.  Beautiful, homely and fantastically positioned close to the centre of Sydney.  

We loved the art deco style of the building and how Hugo had furnished the apartment.  Hugo's communication was excellent through out the whole process and checking in and out was made seamless and flexible. The weather was terrible during our stay but fortunately there was huge range of fantastic cafes, restaurants and bars in the immediate area. Great location!

To summarise, I would absolutely recommend Hugo's place to anyone visiting Sydney and we're sure to be back in touch next time we're in town :)

Thanks for everything!
Was a great stay ! Great view toward the city (can see harbour bridge). Clean and tidy room with great access to public transport

We arrived to Susan's place a little tired from a long travel day, but we were so relieved to arrive to Susan's Bronte Studio - a relaxing getaway! The pictures portray the little studio perfectly. Plus, the little yard and garden area makes the cottage even more quaint. I highly recommend the Bronte studio if you want to easily access Bronte beach and also Bondi! We went surfing and swimming at Icebergs (only 10 minutes away!) Don't hesitate. Book it! (If it's available.) :)

Studio32 is a great little spot, close to a supermarket and a station. It only took about 45 minutes to get to the airport via public transport which was really handy! 
The bed is really comfy too. Perfect spot for a short stay, had all basic kitchen appliances but no cooker so mightn’t be ideal if you are wanting to cook. 
But for us it was great and more than we needed :)

Lovely, homey little place. Beautiful location. You can see the water from the front door. 

We really enjoyed our short stay. Jenny the host was very friendly and helpful but left us to do our thing which we liked.

The bed is super comfy too. 

(Also thanks for breakfast Jenny! )
Great location, spacious, nice/comfy furniture, very nice hosts and support crew. Very efficient check in and out process. We hope to stay again soon
Venez y habiter sans hésitation. C’est près des coins les plus visités de la ville. En plus volet qualité prix vous en trouverez plus que vous n’attendez

Nice touches with fresh fruit, porridge and sweets.  Not set up with cooking ingredients or milk etc.  Lovely modern unit, far better than staying at one of the nearby expensive hotels.  Lots of restaurants in walking distance.  Host was easily contactable and understanding when we left the key in the wrong mailbox.

This place is perfect for few families and those with children! Plenty of space and not to mention many interest art pieces. Very Walkable to Luna Park, harbour bridge plus North Sydney train station and Greenwood plaza for all your grocery needs. Highly recommend for short or even long stay. :) do bring a clothes rack along if you have plenty of washing to do. Thank you Venessa!!!

As Phillip was out of town, his friends, Sally and Trevor hosted us during our stay. And they will fantastic! Upon arriving at the house, they showed us every single room and where certain appliances are. The house was just a 5 minutes walk to the Museum Station and maybe 3, to the bus stop on Oxford Street. It was only a few minutes walk to the 'Cafe Street' aka Crown Street and maybe 15-20 minutes walk to Haymarket. Our group truly enjoyed ourselves in the house, the filtered water hose was a huge plus!

My husband, baby and I had a wonderful time staying at the cottage. All the baby equipment at the cottage really made our stay so much easier. We loved the easy access to restaurants and often strolled around the waterfront and darling harbor.  Bryan and his daughter are such great hosts!
Muy lindo el departamento, perfecto para una pareja. Muy buena ubicación.
Stylish, safe and quiet apartment in the heart of the city. Thankyou for your incredible hospitality. I will definitely be staying here again for future trips to Sydney.

I was in Sydney for a week for conferences at the ICC in Darling Harbour. Helena's place was a great choice for this -- easy to get around on the light rail, nice neighbourhood, and had everything I needed.
整套房间设计的简直太棒了!洗漱用品和厨房用品非常齐全.太喜欢了

Staying in Caths cosy little Garden Studio was absolutely wonderful. The Garden Studio is decorated with much love for details, clean, comfy and very charming. Cath was great host. I was totally surprised to see that she prepared a breakfast basket for us with self-made jam and eggs from her three hens. I would definitely stay there again if I ever have the chance to visit Sydney again!

Ellie and Kevin's home is fantastic and they are a very welcoming couple. The location is close to transport, shops and restaurants. I was very happy here as their apartment was really beautiful, very clean and the room I stayed in very comfortable. I could highly recommend anyone to stay there
Comfortable apartment in a quiet and cool spot close to the Sydney CBD,  with excellent transport access, great facilities and thoughtful touches. Had a very relaxing time during my stay!

Annie's apartment is a beautiful loft in a perfect location to explore Sydney. Annie is also a great host -- she was completely accommodating with check-in and came all the way down from Manly to greet us at the apartment. She also gave great recommendations for spots to check out in the neighborhood. Highly recommended!
Such a fantastic place, wonderful host and amazing location- highly recommend!

We had a great stay with Hernan and his partner, he was very welcoming and let us use his place while away. The room is exactly as described and what the photos show. Within walking distance of train station and all conveniences. We would definitely stay with Hernan again and would recommend his home to anyone travelling to Sydney.
Such a lovely stay - perfect location with a delicious bakery right below the apartment ;) Very clean with chic decorations, we felt very welcomed and comfortable!
真的像自己家一样,设备全,特别是厨房用品,适合家庭出行｡位置也好,旁边就是大超市和公交站｡房东给的游玩等建议也很棒,写在入住的小册子里｡最主要是窗外风景,每天早上对着这样的景色吃早餐,太舒服了,不想走｡
Excellent location, lovely space for 4-5 friends, accessible to anywhere that’s worth going to in Sydney!

I came here with my two American buds, and we had a great time. Linda was very prompt is any request/questions I had. The place was great, beautiful balconies, and location was perfect. Right next to the train station. Would highly recommend this place for travelers.

Emplacement parfait calme et proche du centre. Chambre propre et appartement très sympathique. Wyatt est incroyablement accueillant très ouvert et on peut voir que c'est quelqu'un qui à lui même voyagé et qui sait donc exactement ce que un voyageur recherche durant son voyage. Malgré le fait que c'est une chambre dans un appartement on se sent tranquille et on à pas l'impression de faire intrusion dans la vie de l'hôte ni de se marcher sur les pieds. Thanks a lot! Samuel & Karolina

Michele place is perfect in every way. Michele provides every thing you would need and has created a space that feels homely. 
The bathroom is INCREDIBLE! Wish i had that at my house and the bed is extremely comfortable. 
Plus great location!
Would highly recommend this to everyone.

Nice and clean, well equiped room and kitchen, shared bathroom, very easy check-in, check-out, great communication with host. Roughly 15-20 mins walking to and from the airport, less than 15 mins to trains to the central Sydney. All well! Recommended! :-)
We stayed at Wyatt’s old villa over the weekend. It's located in a great place close to City. It was a great value for money.
Great kitchen! Close to where I needed to be. Would stay again

I enjoyed my stay at the Avalon apartment amongst the trees, check in and check out was smooth, and communication overall was appreciated. The location was great and especially for the summer time of year. The only critique was the front door and maybe being a bit sturdier, and that the surrounding area was a lot busier than anticipated however it was still a lovely stay.
Excellent stay as per usual thanks again
Great apartment close to lovely beach and easy access to Sydney.  Neil is great host and would definitely recommend.

Cosy and great location , easy walk to some good restaurants. 10 minutes drive to Crows Nest which made getting to my work location convenient. Clean ! Great extras provided and very much appreciated after a long drive.
Will be back highly recommend!
Thanks Greg and Maggie for you quick responses and hospitality

The place is really nice and clean! 

It was just what we needed for our last night in Sydney. 

The area seemed also quiet and relaxing! 

It is a very good option for you! 

The contact and checkin with shuang was really easy and they were really helpful. 

We do recommend the place!

We stayed at Millie's place four nights and congratulated ourselves on a good choice, mainly because of the location. It is in North Sydney which puts it into a lower price bracket, but it is a 5-10 minute walk to the North Sydney ferry which takes you right to Circular Quay, which is the public transportation hub and next to the opera house. You can even buy your public transport pass at the little store next to Millie's. Also, the apartment has a balcony with a stunning view of the Sydney Harbour bridge and skyline. These things compensate for the apartment's tiny size and lack of air conditioning. Millie left us with a lot of breakfast food plus coffee and milk. The kitchen was clean and well equipped. The bed converts from a day bed to a double, and even if we had done it correctly it would have required strength and lifting. If you are not young and strong get her to leave the bed set up for you. The apartment is charming and clean but the public areas of the building, including the laundry room, could use freshening, but don't let that put you off. We would stay there again.
Great place in a great location. Very spacious and very quiet!
Great location, apartment & value. Just confirm that the elevator is operating when you book.
Amazing place, and even more amazing host. The place was ready earlier than expected. Great value
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great views of Sydney and the hosts were so responsive to our requests to arrive early
We enjoyed a fantastic stay at Mackerel Beach with our friends and family. The house is small but beautifully appointed with everything you need. So very relaxing. Thank you Ruchard!
Great location and perfect little house from which to experience Newtown living! We had a great time and loved Kassandra's tips for local cafes etc. Recommended.

We had a wonderful relaxing vacation at Kate’s apartment. We didn’t have  a car and didn’t need one. The beautiful beach is across the street. We walked to supermarkets, restaurants and shopping. The bedding is amazing. It is one of the most comfortable beds I’ve slept in. 
Kate was really patient with all of my questions and always responded quickly.
Thanks Kate!
Thanks for all. Your home is very nice and welcoming. Good location for traveller close to airport.
Agata was a great host, with very quick responses, nothing was too much trouble. Well worth it.

Naveen and Tristan have a great airbnb setup perfect for someone who just needs a place to stay close to the city. They prefer guests don't use the public spaces or kitchen which is fine however wasn't mentioned before booking. 
They've thought of everything else one might need, we appreciated the beach bag tremendously! 
Would definitely recommend for people who travel independently.
Sarah was a lovely host and we had a great stay!

Location was very close to the airport and Hernan was able to provide information on how to get to his home by public transport. Took me only around 30mins by bus. Took me a some time to locate his apartment, might be a bit confusing for the first time. Location was near lots of food choices and the beach is just a 3min walk away. Bed was comfortable but pillows were a bit too soft for my liking. Host was very easy going and gave me my space at the same time was there when you needed some information. 
Really enjoyed my stay with Hernan! Would recommend it to anyone who wants to visit Sydney.
Great place to stay and easy access to the shops❤️

The house is near Padstow station which is very convenient to get around and easy to find. The space was clean, tidy and organized. There was a heater in the room. The hosts were very responsive to messages and happy to help. A couple who stayed in the room next door were so nice and friendly. They also suggested some great places to visit. Would highly recommend.
Rhonda was amazing! Honestly can't fault my stay at all.

I stayed here for a birthday weekend getaway. It was my first experience with Airbnb which went smoothly. The communication was timely and helpful throughout the stay. The phone reception /wifi was a bit patchy & there were a few creepy-crawlies which kept my friends up for a portion of the night (didn’t really bother me). Otherwise, we had a relaxing time; the space is cosy and beautiful as pictured, well-equipped, with comfy beds, in a peaceful location. We also enjoyed visiting the cafes and beaches nearby.

Overall our stay was good, and the apartment is as it is represented except for the view has been totally blocked out. On my booking I requested the sofa bed but that was not organised, but the manager was good to fix we just had to wait till later in the afternoon and they charged extra. The wifi didn’t work and I had no response when I asked for it to be looked at. And on check out , the care taker came in before 10am asking when we will be out. I said sorry running a little late and the response was we have to charge you for 30min!! Unfortunately this was a terrible way to end the stay and also does not represent Airbnb’s hosting model.
Handy location for travelling the city. Paul was efficient with communication and always willing to help solve the problem! Good stay!

Excellent communication and kind gestures such as leaving Cadbury easter eggs for us in the kitchen one morning. Location is in a cool, young, hipsterish neighborhood 3 minute walk from Newtown Station, which was super convenient. The room is perfectly clean, The apartment itself has a lot of fun character and the owner has decorated in great taste that enhances the stay. Bed was large and VERY comfortable. I wasn't able to meet the owner, but briefly met the husband as he stopped by to welcome us. Seemed very kind. My girlfriend and I agreed that we have no choice but to stay here again if we ever visit Sydney again. We LOVED it!
The place is in the best location, close to everything. Very clean and spacious
Classic beach house at a great beach!  Beach is 1 block away.  Clean inside.
Nice apartment and conveniently located for my requirements ... modern, clean and comfortable.
I borrowed it to spend the same time with many friends. Families with children also enjoyed it.    Thank you very much.
This sunny one bed apartment is in a fabulous location .

The apartment was as descibed, Alexey was a responsive host. 

There was something happening at Central Station in the wee hours that meant sirens were going off all night, and the construction in Chalmers St was noisy, but that didn't start til 9 am. The first night was totally fine, slept like logs.

You need to be ok with stairs and the mattress is on the floor. The mattress is a good one. The apartment has everything you could want, great kitchen and bathroom. It was handy having two bathrooms.

Being right near Central is great for transport, we got to town late and were still able to get the train to Circular Quay in time for the show.

The best choice if you travel in Sydney first time.Very good location and you can walk to Sydney maybe 40 minutes. Clean room and we slept tight. You can cook Chinese food since there is Chinese soy sauce.
DJ was a fantastic host.  everything was as advertised, lived up to the other reviews, and he couldnt be more helpful.  I would absolutely stay with him again.
Great apartment, great location. Easy to get anywhere by foot or public transport. Incredible view from room or rooftop pool. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Great location , great place to live. Thank you!

Vivian's loft apartment is perfectly located, close to great coffee spots and transport. Ten minutes from the beach and the stunning Bronte to Bondi coastal walk- not to be missed. The apartment has beautiful fixtures, a fantastic bed and a great shower. We would definitely stay at Viv's again, she was a generous and helpful host.

The Apartment is clean neat, exactly match with the photo. and the view from living room is so beautiful~ but in the evening there is a little bit noise. And the location is very inconvenience!!!! close to Museum Station ( the train to airport ), walk to Darling Harbor 10mins, china town 10 mins, circular quay 20mins.

Immaculate apartment, spacious, clean, pretty outlook. Lucy has thought of every thing. Very well equipped kitchen if you want to cook and a dinning area inside and out. Lovely outdoor area. Comfortable bed.
Good location... Clean..

We had a really lovely stay at this bungalow in Clareville. 
It's generous, light and well-ventilated, with many highly appreciated details, including a delicious breakfast, kitchenette at our disposal and kookaburra visitors. 

Michy is a warm and generous host. We stayed for a long weekend, most of which was spent at the wedding of friends nearby (or associated events), so we didn't get to take her up on her offer of the use of some watercraft, but did get across the road to the beach a couple of times. 

The area too is worth a scout - a couple of early morning walks gave us a great survey of the widest variety of housing I've seen in one location, set amidst lush greenness and against spectacular views. 

We'd love to come back some time. The experience left us feeling very spoilt.

We recently spent two nights in Michy's backyard cabin and absolutely loved it. It is spacious and beautiful and decorated with love. the bed is  so comfy. Heaven! And the location and the area are unbeatable. Only a short drive to great restaurants too. water just across the road. I'm definitely hoping to stay here again.

Comfortable and everything you will need for a short stay. Little beach opposite is walking  distance and very nice. 
The cabin faces the host’ s house and that makes privacy difficult.

Lovely apartment with the perfect location (only 2 mn walk to Kings Cross station), there's also a very nice walk to do from Potts Point to the Opera house through the Royal Botanical Gardens. Will definitely be back again!

Pros: Excellent location, clean and comfortable. Cons: A little bit of noise with the nearby construction during the day. No dishwasher if you plan to eat in. Shower would be tight for bigger people.
We enjoyed our stay and felt this place was good value.

The location was perfect for our needs and the apartment was quiet.  The check in did not go well as we weren't told which apartment it was and the key had to be collected from another location over 1km away which we didn't know either until we got there, and had sent the uber off.  The listing says there is a key safe but they didn't use it for us.  The host wasn't contactable either despite calling the 24 hr number a couple of times and leaving messages, so the whole process took about an hour and a half.  The apartment is tiny and is more of a bedsit rather than having a separate bedroom.  This also made me wonder about the very expensive $170 cleaning fee.

Had a wonderful stay at Angela’s !
Can’t wait to return 
Beautiful home with lovely relaxing feel 
Future guest will not be disappointed
Jason's accommodation is in a very good location.  However it had a shabby feel to it, mainly due to the poor workmanship of the building.

Great accommodation! Very clean, well-kept, and atmospheric. MissD's husband was so gracious in giving us travel tips for our stay in Sydney. Would easily recommend this place for a pleasant, welcoming stay.

We had a very good stay at Natasa's home. Her house is lovely, the bedroom is spacious and very clean. Natasa is a perfect host, she welcomed us very well and she is very generous. The house is very well located, next to public transport, we were 20 minutes from the city centre. So, it's a perfect location to stay in Sydney, thanks again !

This location is amazing, just 300m to the Kings Cross train station, and within short walking distance to pubs, cafes, and grocery mart.  The place was very functional, perfect for cooking my own meals at times during my 15 night stay.  The shower's water pressure was very strong and the hot water almost instantaneous (having a bathtub was a nice bonus).  The bed was very comfy with extra linens at hand, including plenty of large bath towels.  The oven didn't work nor was there a freezer as (both) stated in the printed instructions, but that didn't deter me from creating nice meals during my visit.  The portable space heater worked in a pinch when temperatures dropped a bit during the winter nights.  The unit backs onto a alleyway so not much natural light, but the interior lighting flooded the apartment nicely.  The apartment was very quiet, and very peaceful, just perfect after a busy day or night about town.  Check-in was a breeze, Ollie readily accommodated my early arrival and arrived seconds within my announced arrival on-site.  Ollie was very helpful, provided guide books in the unit and provided me with his own travel insight on places to visit in the local area.  Ollie was also quick to inquire about linen changes mid week, their laundering, including for bath towels.  Ollie was always just a text message away to offer any assistance when needed.  In summary, this place and Ollie as a host, made for a lovely hassle free 15 night stay in Sydney.  I definitely recommend this charming little place and I would return again.

Wayne and Kate's house was everything we'd hoped for, and a lot more. The view is simply spectacular, the house itself tastefully decorated comfortable, and the little touches that make all the difference put the icing on the cake. You must stay here if you're looking for a little hidden beach oasis in Sydney's eastern suburbs.
Vivian’s place is a homely beautifully styled studio and I couldn’t have felt more comfortable. She is super easy to get in touch with and happy to help anyway she can. Highly recommend her place!

We loved the apartment and would love to stay there again in the future. The location was great to get to the centre of Sydney and also the ferry system. The view from the balcony was amazing and the apartment was well equipped (even catering for emergency amenities). Millie was always on hand and very quick to reply to our messages. Thanks for being a great host.

Beautifully furnished, spacious and well equipped house within easy walking distance of the stylish shopping and eating amenities of Mosman village. Well placed for ferry and bus transport to Sydney Harbour area.

Although Rachel was not able to meet us, she answered any questions w had very fully and helpfully by text message.
Sparkling clean and good shower

I love staying in this apartment, it really is the perfect position in Sydney, its always spotless and beautifully presented. 
I almost don't want to share a review, just in case its not available in the future..

The house is next to Hyde park. The location is very good. The landlord gives us wine and receives us very well. There was a supermarket nearby, and we also cooked food, which was a good choice for family travel.
Na looked after us amazingly. Made it so easy to stay here and at the same time completley private. We loved it.
We have just had a fabulous few days in Darlinghurst.  Philip's place was amazing - so well thought out.  Very very cool and stylish. Fabulous location!

It was a great experience staying at Judy’s. The arrangements were just perfect. The room was spacious with ensuite bathroom and had all quick needed facilities in the room. Best thing was it is a laptop friendly place. The room was attached to a porch which again was very pleasant and relaxing. The kitchen amenities were great too. All utilities were rightly labelled. The entire house and the kitchen were clean. I enjoyed my privacy here. Also, this place is pretty close to the train station which saved me from long walks.

Judy was very prompt with her responses whenever I tried getting in touch with her. I would definitely opt for this place again for my next visit to Sydney.
Beautiful little place with great amenities and Cath was a wonderful host.

Erin was such a good host, easy check in and provided lots of little extras. Good location close to beach and shops. Immaculately presented with super comfy beds and great entertainment such as Netflix and wifi. I would Highly recommend The Tides Beach apartment

Thank you Angela for amazing accomodation. Beautiful North Avalon Apartment exceeded all expectations. Sparkling clean, very stylish, and comfortable accomodation. Best Airbnb experience. I can't wait to come back to this place for another weekend away. Highly recommended.

It was such a pleasure to stay at Jackie’s apartment! It’s super beautiful, very clean and full of light ;) It is located in this quiet area of Manly and you have to walk a little bit up the hill , but the bay views from the bedroom are totally worth it ! Jackie and Matt are great hosts, very helpful and responsive. They made this long list with recommended places for coffee, lunch, dinner and things to do, see. I felt very welcome at their place and at the same time I had my own space. All in all, it was a great experience , I would totally recommend Jackie’s place to anyone who wants to explore Manly !

Beautiful living room and kitchen, comfortable bedroom, cabinets and fridge prepared a lot food, you can cook youself, very convenient, very beautiful sea at the door, every afternoon with my girlfriend went to the beach walk. Fred&Bernadette very nice and friendly. Beautiful journey. We are very happy lived there.
Definitely worth the stay!

Lovely apartment, we stayed with a family of four. The apartment was clean and tidy. Great location only 5 min walk to beach, ferry, shops and restaurant. Monica was very responsive when we were having problems with the internet. Would recommend this place.
Wonderful apartment and extremely responsive hosts. Wish I were back on the beach!

The apartment was fantastic- exactly as described and checking in and out processes were both straightforward and easy. It's a lovely, peaceful place; incredible given how central and ideal the location is ! The area is the best in Sydney, just minutes from the best restaurants and cafes, situated right between Elizabeth Bay and Rushcutters Bay- perfect for pleasant walks along the marina. We loved it and would love to stay in Dino's place again.

The Apartment is in a great location, close to shops, and eateries. If you don't mind a downhill walk it is also very handy to the Ferry from Mosman. A small, comfortable apartment to stay in and well appointed. ( no microwave if that bothers you) . We loved our stay and it suited our needs perfectly. It was easy to organize with Mags.
Xiaowen is very nice to welcome us. The location is very quiet and suitable for someone who travel in Sydney.
Good value.
Great place to stay.  Everything was perfect. Very friendly. Highly recommend staying there.
Very clean and comfortable,
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had an unforgettable time in Sydney. Staying at Tiger's place is such a joy and extra point to that. The place is right above the station, u don't even need to think about miss the direction. Taking the train from airport just 2 stops (I remember is 5 mins?), and walk downstairs to catch the train to city, circular quay, Hyde Park, Western area or north part of Sydney, and anywhere, you can't think of any more convenient. Woolworth is just opposite of the road, lots of cafe and restaurants just downstairs, which the place is located on a quite street. I'm very glad I didn't choose another place which looks also close and similar but is on a noise street.  Tiger's place is spacious, clean, modern and well organized. There are some flight noises in the morning but I didn't even notice. The most comfortable bed I have ever had when traveling overseas, of course my own bed at home is the best. :)
Tiger is a friendly funny man, he helped a lot while I'm staying at this beautiful. Thanks again, I'll come back again. Highly recommended.

A perfect location for visiting family or friends in the Inner West.
My relatives were absolutely delighted - and told me to keep this address in mind for any future visits :-)
Top score in every respect, thank you Patrick and Christine.
Amazing location and apartment. 10/10.
交通不太方便,除了步行或叫UBER去就近市中心購物就有点麻煩,希望地鐵快D建做好,但環境是非常舒適及寧靜,而房東就非常親切,回覆亦很快｡
Great spot in the city. Functional, everything you need for short stay. Good communication.

Duncan and Ashlee's flat is in a lovely area of Sydney.  It is close to some lovely parklands going down to the waterfront, near the shops at Rozelle, the amazing Orange Grove market on a Saturday and has good links into the City Centre.  The room for one or two people is of a good size, the bed is comfy and the whole flat spotlessly tidy and clean.  I thoroughly recommend Duncan and Ashlee - they are great hosts.
Wonderful location, spectacular views.
Very convenient to city south, the rocks, Wynyard and circular quay. 2 supermarkets within 2 minutes walk. Plenty of food options.
Annie was a great host, easy communication and check in/out. Would recommend this apartment, perfect for single or couple and great location!

Simone has been a wonderful and attentive host. Her property was brilliant for our family stay in Sydney. The location offers great strategic access to both Coogee / Randwick life and transport links to city centre attractions. A great place to stay to base yourself in Sydney.

The location is fantastic. Walking distance to the beach yet far from the crowds, loads of coffee shops and stores nearby.
The house itself has a great feel to it. Hope to come back some day.
Sams place is really nice and cozy.. was perfect for my family.. quite nice and central as well. Would be happy to stay here again..

What a fabulous space. This was a great warehouse conversion home. Victoria was great and communicated well. I stayed here with some work colleagues and it was a perfect space for us to have our own space and also socialise. Everyone said their beds and stay was good, there were just a couple of things that they were uncomfortable with and that's a couple of open windows and see-through curtains that looked straight onto the street, one of the rooms was clearly damp and the person who stayed there was sensitive to damp and mould, unfortunately. The common share bathroom facilities didn't have a lock on the door and the toilet door didn't have a separate lock so a few were uncomfortable with that.

Hugo & Ollie's place is just perfectly located for exploring Sydney with the bustling Kings Cross just around the corner and lots of food and party options. And to top it all off, they are just the perfect hosts with great local tips and they make you feel really welcome. And definite recommendation for your stay in Sydney
Compact and well located. A great place for a short stay in Sydney.

Anat was a fantastic host from the very beginning. She was very responsive during the booking process and flexible with my family's arrival, which helped us greatly arriving in a new country. 

The house is a beautifully renovated 3 bedroom in South Coogee with tons of natural light and outdoor lounge space. The kitchen was well supplied for us to cook and bake, and we were surprised to see the BBQ was hooked up to the main gas line. Very cool!

We drove most of the trip, but there are also nearby bus lines that take you into Sydney proper in 45 mins or so. I highly recommend this BnB and am excited for all that have the opportunity to stay here :).

Comfortable and clean apartment, with easy access to famous spots in downtown.  although couldn't see Sydney theatre from the balcony, it's quite near. 

Looking forward to come back to Danny 's place again.

Hubby and I loved our stay at Greg and Susan's B & B.  The cottage is private and surrounded by lovely gardens. Light breakfast provided was just right, delicious and healthy.  We really enjoyed being able to walk to beaches and great cafes.  Thank you Greg and Susan for your hospitality and the unexpected little touches that made our experience so enjoyable.
Ziggy was responsive and very helpful. He greeted me with keys and showed me how everything worked. The apartment was very clean and in a great location.

We had a pleasant stay in David's appartment and it is a great location for exploring the city. The surroundings are very cozy with a lot of restaurants and cafe's nearby. The room was fine and clean and we especially enjoyed the adjacent balcony. David was very helpfull host when needed. We would definetly recommend the place to others. Lone & Birger

Margaret and John are the nicest and most helpful hosts I met so far.
Since I didn't have a car Margaret offered me several times to take me to town. She also helped me move all my belongings on the the day I moved into my new home. John and Margaret also took me out for dinner with their friends, which was a really lovely evening.
The property is very beautiful, there is trees everywhere and a lot of nice sitting opportunities to hang out. You can go for walks and do bicycle tours in the surrounding forest, there is also a river not to far away.
The carriage is a very special place to stay. There are so many unique, beautiful and old details and everything works very well (lights, shower, wifi...).
The kitchen is equipped with everything you need and Margaret had set fruits and filled up the fridge.
The bed is super comfy and even got warm heating blankets.
I would love to return to the carriage which was my nest for about a week. 
Thank you so much Margaret and John!

We had a great stay at Simone's lovely house. It is very spacious, the bedrooms all a nice size, living room, breakfast room and kitchen all easy to be in. The area out the back is also a nice little escape. We appreciated the complimentary bottle of wine and the equipment in the kitchen, which we used each night. The location is very handy, 20 minute walk to to Coogee beach for a swim, or bus stops so close for a ride into the city. Simone was also very flexible with the check in and the check out which made things very easy for us. So all good!
Close to CBD, very clean,very informative

Annie's place was in an excellent location. It was really easy to check in and she was very quick to reply. The building itself is secure and right in the middle of Surry Hills so as other's mentioned - lots of restaurants and bars. We walked most places and were able to catch the train and also the bus several times. The apartment did have most everything we needed. The only disappointing part was the noise. The building was going through renovations so they started working around 6:30a during the week and we could hear jackhammers. Also, the apartment is right across the elevator. Overall, we enjoyed our stay - just wish we could have slept in some days.
Great location in Dee Why. Slow communication before check in resulted in the cleaners being there when we arrived, but that wasn't a big problem.
Linda is a Good host!
Such a cute place to stay at!
A wonderful cottage with plenty of room and amenities. Close to  what Sydney has to offer and with a homeliness feel for an extended stay.

The location is superb !! The heart of Sydney!! Just 5 mins walk to Circular Quay Opera house. Many good restaurants around. it’s like a NY style apartment, lovely, sweet and quiet. Perfect for couple. Loved it! Will definitely visit again.

The Sandstone Cottage in Mackerel Beach is just absolutely stunning. The architecture of the house, the choice of furniture, the high quality linen and towels around the house, the handmade ceramics, the collection of art and objects around the house, the outside shower, the list goes on and on. The house has absolutely everything you could possibly wish for. 
It's one of the most beautiful houses we have ever been in. It makes you feel like you have arrived in paradise. 
I can recommend this as a serious experience if you wanna have a teste of heaven. :)

Great place.  Nice walk to many places around.  If you want to walk to the city, it's only a 30 minute walk.  Very safe at night.  If you are a late sleeper, worry about construction waking you up about 8am.  Washer/dryer are great!  The shower head is awesome! And free parking!
Mal was a great host. Everything was ready and available in the apartment. Mal was also accommodating when I stayed an extra day

Easy access and exit, room ok, clean etc. Probably would have put small tv in each room rather than large one in kitchen as chairs in kitchen not comfortable to sit on to watch tv. This would allow for different guests to watch there own programs. Otherwise, not bad.

Fantastic location with everything you need for a home away from home. We walked everywhere. 15-20 min Uber from airport. Philip was waiting for us and easy to reach if needed. Would go back in a heartbeat

We had a great stay in Wendy’s apartment! She was very helpful and was always contactable when needed. The apartment was clean and spacious and was perfect for four adults. Definitely would recommend to anyone visiting Sydney!!
Enjoyed our stay second time that we have stayed here. Great location and the apartment is very nice.

Ben’s place is even better than in the photos, amazing views straight over bay and marina. Beds very comfy, lots of hot water and good heating. Apartment is homely with books and plenty of games for our kids. Ben was quick to respond and gave local tips for cafes and getting about. Had a wonderful stay.
Great, friendly and kind hosts! Made it feel like home :) quick response  every time.
So delightful to communicate with. Even had some laughs. The place is awesome. Up to date & contemporary with plenty of room to just relax. It's so close to everything.
Jessica is a nice person! She gave us a lot of useful suggestion! Cats are quiet and cute. Thanks!

Alexey was amazing to work with. He worked to make our check in/check out times best to fit our schedule. He had wine waiting for us, which was a nice personal touch. Everything with keys exchanging went very smooth. He kept great contact throughout the stay. The area is right by the train station, at the moment there was some construction so parking would be very difficult to find. There is a cafe/pizza place and servo on the bottom floor which was very convenient. The apartment itself is very trendy, with a small lounge are, but bring DVDs to watch! The balconies were lovely, and caught the sun all day.
Vickie is an amazing host and the apartment is exactly as depicted - beautiful, central, well appointed and excellent value for money.
This is a beautiful flat in Barangaroo and easy walking to cool restaurants and cafes on Darling Harbour.  Would definitely stay here again!

We stayed one night only - in at 8:00pm and out again early in the morning.  We had 3  adults and it was ideal for us.  It is a new separate unit behind the owner's house, away from the street.  Everything was easy with the owner.  We enjoyed our stay.
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We had a pleasant stay at Franca and Alessio’s place. Location is decent and the hosts were very easy to communicate with.

Very stylish apartment in an excellent location close to all amenities.
Our host was helpful and flexible with check in and check out times which was great.
Near to public transport and airport. And Edi is really friendly and warm person. Thank you very much :)

Communication with Paul was great. He was very flexible with check-in/out. We arrived late in the night and was checked in by Wendy. Communication with Wendy was great too. She is responsive and friendly. Location of the apartment is fantastic - 5 minutes walk to King Cross station, 30 minutes walk to the Royal Botanic Gardens and lots of food option around the apartment. The only issue we had was the cleanliness of the apartment.

David's apartment is very convenient to the very center of sydney city, we can just go sightseeing by walking of 25 minutes. David is very helpful and easygoing, he reply me promtly after I text him, It's a preasure to stay in potts point, Thank you!

Small and cosy studio very well maintained and very convenient for people looking accommodation close to the University of Sydney. Well connected by public transportation. Small problem with WIFI the first day, but quickly and efficiently solved by Cedric.
Great place to stay at. Neat and tidy and not far from the city.

Mariana's place is in a beautiful and central location. The botanical garden and art museum are only about a 15-20 min walk away. There is a grocery store down the street and lots of good restaurants close by. It is a great option for a solo traveller or a couple who want to explore this amazing city!
Very satisfied, everything was as expected, very good location, excelent host...

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The studio was such a smart use of space; easy to move around and access everything we needed. Spotlessly clean, gorgeous decor, and very modern too.

Breakfast provisions were scrumptious and generous. All the little extra touches such as the magazines and DVDs made our stay and we wish we could have stayed on longer just to relax a bit more. 

Will consider again for our next trip to Sydney.
Everything was just fine! Hayley and Jack were great hosts. Very helpful and responsive. Thank you once again for the nice stay!

The cabin was clean and cosy and the bed is very comfortable. Very clean and new bathroom. I didn't get to meet Michy in person but she seems lovely online and is great with communication. Only thing is the wifi was pretty much non existent.

perfect house, good location, nice and warm reply with reasonable price, Xinhui is a good host with a wonderful accommodation. 
Recommend to everybody.
Hernan was a very friendly and helpful host. Thanks to him and Conny my three night stay was very pleasant. I would fully recommend them!
Excellent host !!
Wonderful spot gorgeous view and very relaxing
Highly recommended, very clear and comfortable, hospitality is great, worth every penny
A lovely little gem right by the sea

Un séjour parfait chez Suzie !
L'appartement est très joli et très bien situé à 2 pas de Darling Harbour.
J'ai également été très bien accueilli par Suzie !
Elle a été aux petits soins pour moi, et m'a indiquée avec précision et enthousiasme les lieux à voir de Sydney.
Bref un hôte à recommender si vous voulez visiter Sydney !!!
주택가여서 조용했어요. 너무 한가롭게 지냈어요. 페리 타는 곳과 가까워서 편했습니다. 친절하게 작성한 안내북이 있어서 많은 도움이 되었습니다.

Our last minute stay at #84 was a delight, the experience was super easy from beginning to end and Sarah very responsive and welcoming. The very tasteful apartment was spotless and cosy at the same time, a real home from home. Woollahra we discovered is a neighbourhood filled with great shops, eateries and it also proved to be a super convenient part of town - for the CBD, the bays and also the beaches. Highly recommended!

What a great apartment in an amazing location. With views of Darling Harbour and Sydney city, this little gem is a great priced apartment in Sydney city. The hosts were lovely and responded quickly to any requests we had. Highly recommended.

Easily the best Airbnb I've stayed in. Booked based on previous reviews and we can only agree. 
Plenty of wonderful touches, homemade produce, fridge and cupboards stacked with all the things you could need. 
Comfy bed and lovely rainfall shower. Clean and tidy. No faults at all. 
Thank you for a lovely stay Cath!

Really lovely little apartment.  Bright and cheerful, cozy and warm.  Very central with everything you need at hand but set back slightly so you don't have to feel in the middle of everything if you don't want to.  Sarah has thought of everything to welcome you during your stay.  I loved the colourful plastic cups, bowls and plates for my lil girl.  Lovely kitchen to work in and great shower too.  Loved our stay here.
Fantastic house, great location very comfortable and our host made everything so easy.
Was a cosy little place for us for the night and easy to walk to the train to get to the city! Was lovey and clean and the bed was super comfortable!
It was great to stay with Tota’s family. Definitely will come back again

Fantastic apartment in a great location. 

We would love to stay again if we are ever in Manly.
great apartment
A great little home, has everything you need for a short stay. Steve was very polite and hospitable. Would highly recommend!

We stayed at Teri’s place with our 2 young kids - perfect place for families. Pool right out the patio. 2 minute walk to lagoon and kayak hire, 4 minute walk to beach. No need for a car (plenty of buses and easy to walk everywhere on the scenic walk path). Lots of good food options / cafes within a 4 minute walk.  Lots of toys /plates / cups for the kids made the stay great for our family.

We immediately felt relaxed & welcome when greeted by Tessa, and sampled some of her amazing home-made jam & muffins. Accomodation was very spacious & had everything we needed, 300m walk down to the Newport Arms for dinner, we had a great stay thanks Tessa & Rod

Sara was a fantastic host.  Prior to our stay she was easy to communicate with, responded quickly and with no fuss.  Sara met us on the grounds of her apartment and showed us around on arrival.  The apartment was clean and tidy and in a great location.  We enjoyed our stay.

Amazing location, snorkelling, surfing & gorgeous shelley beach right on your doorstep. Loved coffee at the boathouse and falling asleep to the sound of the ocean. Maria & Jerry are great hosts,very friendly and helpful. Their apartment is in a worldclass location. Stunning. Felt priviliged to stay there.I had a great time. Thanks guys,will see u all soon! X

Mags' Mosman home is absolutely gorgeous. As a family of three is had everything we could possibly need. We were very comfortable and really settled in for a few months. This place is really more equipped for shortterm stays however.

The big, soaking tub was really lovely and the leafy, breezy outlet was beautiful. The proximity to the local shops, park and waterfront at Mosman Bay made life really easy. The ferry wharves nearby were easy to walk to and connections very frequent for Sydney. The bus was harder to get- but by no means impossible.

Balmoral beach is very close and we spent lots of time there. The bus stop to get the bus to the beach is a fair walk away- but worth it to avoid the nightmare parking situation in summer! Mind you- the drive isn't far at all, so if you get lucky that is the easiest option.

The walk down to Sirius Cove dog beach is lovely and the swimming there is not bad either. You can continue your walk along the headline all the way around to Athol Bay for even better swimming or Taronga Zoo entry.

We only had trouble finding a street parking spot maybe twice in almost three months- so that was pretty manageable I'd say.

The Orpheum Theatre is delightful and the shopping on Military Road east was great.

Beware there is no wifi, microwave or toaster! It's a bit like taking a step back in time. But we loved it all the same.
Cindy is a wonderful host, I had an awesome time during my stay in Sydney! The place is close to Randwick and public transport and not far from the city by bus.

Ann is a great host. We felt welcome. She is a local historian and gave us a great insight into the island. 
The place and location are good. We felt at home. We were very warm at night and it was quite romantic for us. 
We were on the island for other reasons and would recommend it to others, although I would say that it is fully priced.
The host canceled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Margaret was exceptionally helpful from when we first booked our trip! Even though she was away the weekend we were staying she organised for a friend to meet us and gave us all the information we needed before we arrived. She also left us fresh fruit and vegetables, as well as food for breakfast which was a lovely surprise! 

The railway carriage itself is a wonderful space and full of historical touches. It is easy to see that a lot of love and work has gone into the carriage and it truly felt like a home away from home. It was very relaxing waking up right next to the bush, and located a short drive away from shops and other bushwalks. We also loved getting to meet Margaret's dog and puppies! 

We look forward to hopefully staying at the railway carriage again in the future - perfect for a weekend escape from the city!

Various of people are together in her house. 
You can talk and have dinner with them without something wall.
Cecilia will teaches us about permaculture if you want.
'Cause she is crazy about it.
For me the story was very interesting.
Ian's place was amazing! Great neighbourhood with walking distance to shopping mall! Great host that gave clear and easy instructions! Highly reccomend!

I enjoyed the stay in Bondi! The location was perfect and super close to the beach and all the restaurants in the area. The tips and information provided was super helpful! The conversations were lovely as well! He only things I was surprised by was that It wasn’t as clean as I thought it would be based on reviews and ratings. I also wasn’t expecting to have additional Craig and Leonie which I would have appreciated being disclosed ahead of time or in the description. Otherwise if you’re looking for a low key, relaxed time then this is a great option!

Excellent location. Just a very short walk from the beach and cafes.
Easy communication with the host. Excellent layout of the accomodation giving everyone ample space if they need it.

A great place to stay.
Good location, close to everything.

Where do I begin? Wyatt is the perfect host.  Super friendly and down to earth, Wyatt really made me feel at home.  Not only did he have many recommendations for things to do in the city, he also showed me around some of Sydney's landmarks.  Traveling alone and this being the first time I visited this city, it was nice to have a locals perspective and insight to getting around town.  When I look back on my trip and stay in Sydney, I smile... Thanks to Wyatt for making it such an amazing and enjoyable visit.  WHEN I come back, I will definitely stay at Wyatt's place :)
Thanks for a great stay Bailey! The house was amazing and miss waking up to that incredible view! Would definitely stay here again.

Staying at Gavin's place was our first airbnb experience and he made it very easy for us to feel at home... We really enjoyed our stay at his apartment. Gavin was always very helpful, gave us some advice what to see and where to go in Sydney and was always open for a nice chat at home. We even stayed at his place a 2nd time on the way back to Germany and it felt like coming home for us... :) If we should ever come back to Sydney, we would also be checking in for a 3rd time if Gavin is fine with it! :)
Jack and Hayley were very accommodating, friendly and easy going. Loved the location and the room was just lovely!
A lovely, comfortable, well decorated apartment in a great location. Very friendly host. I can't wait to stay again.
Spent a lovely weekend at Justine's place and couldn't be happier, it was very cosy and beautiful, surrounded by nature. she also left nice treats and breakfast ready for me. Thanks so much Justine!

Great apartment - spacious and close to the beach + transport to get into the city. Great selection of Cafes within 2 minutes walk and plenty of places for dinner, drinks etc. Top place to stay in Coogee
Our stay at Daniels and Elenas house was very good. Everything was clean, both were supernice and welcoming and we also enjoyed meeting the other guests that stayed there. Can recommend it!

This is our second time staying at Wayne and Kate’s place and once again it was a wonderful stay. The house is in a great location and wonderfully equipped. You can’t complain waking up to views of Tamarama beach! Beautiful! 
Their communication is second to none. They provide full information on check in /the house, how to use everything and are quick to respond to any questions! 5 stars!!
一百刀一晚,最多能住五个人,性价比超级高｡离Randwick主街步行十分钟,安静的不能再安静｡家边有一个快餐店,早六晚八,不能再好吃｡房主人在伦敦,但有求必应｡体验不能再好｡

Awesome spot with a host who is quick to reply and easy going. The location is the key here, it is literally right off the beach. It gets a little warm at night (we were in the peak of summer) but Mal had a few fans that were easy to plug in, which helped a good deal. Bondi is simply the best and this one wins with location.
The bungalow is great. The areoplanes do start early
Very convenient for a short stay.
A great place! Very clean and the host is nice and caring.

Great clean space in a super convenient location with central station and great cafes at walking distance. Nicole was there to show us in, and was kind enough to allow us an earlier check in time. Recommended.

The place was clean and stylish and conveniently located for us - although it is in the 'red light' district, it didn't bother us - and if you turn out left of the apartment you get to some really lovely shops, restaurants and bars. Walkable to the botanical gardens, Opera House and the CBD.
Amazing property, great host & perfect location!

Great location 
Great host
Great town

Jeremy was an excellent host, and his terrace was absolutely beautiful. Check in was a breeze, and Jeremy provided lots of tips and information for our stay. Communication was very easy and quick. The terrace was very clean with a lot of character. You’ll find two balconies in this home with extraordinary views of the city. Furthermore, you’re only a stroll away from great cafes, restaurants, shops, and bars. My stay was with 5 other adults, but there would be enough space to accommodate 2 more very comfortably. We all had a wonderful experience at this gorgeous terrace.
Linda was very welcoming, made us feel at home in her lovely home.  Great location, secure parking, will definately stay again.

Great location - pub literally 20 metres away.  Petersham station a further 20 metres.  Lovely clean room, great shared facilities, very quiet house.  Nat was very accommodating with being there to let me in and show me around. 3 or 4 people live here but you would hardly know it.

Evelyn's apartment is just perfect , its clean and tidy and nicely decorated. It is very easy to get about the Northern beaches from where the apartment is. The views from the balcony are beautiful and its wonderful to wake up each morning to such a gorgeous view. Evelyn is a fabulous host and she will go out of her way to help you make the most of your time in her apartment. Its easy to get around but its better to hire a car as it takes about 30 mins to walk into Avalon but once there, its a lovely little place to wonder round and to have a nice meal (we highly recommend Yoda if you like Thai food) there is a little bar called The Mill which is nice to have a few drinks in (Happy hour is 5-6pm). All in all we had a fabulous time and we defineltly will be going back .

The apartment is exactly as described and pictured. Check in and check out was simple and all communications were clear. The bed is very comfortable and the apartment is quiet and fully equipped with all you would need. It sits 5 floors above the shops, which means it only take a couple of minutes to get to either Coles or Woolworths and there are also a great cross section of restaurants and take aways if you don't feel like cooking. Secure car park is handy also.

Hernan's place is perfect if you are arriving in Sydney or if you are about to leave. 
Really nice host. You  will enjoy your time here talking with Hernan !

Coffee’s space was nice and clean. It was nice to have a full living room, bedroom with a king bed, bathroom, kitchen and balcony. There is also air conditioning and an indoor pool in the building. Coffee was a very nice host and very accommodating and quick to respond. We felt very welcome. There is a washing machine and dryer in the apartment but during our stay the dryer wasn’t working, not the host’s fault. We didn’t mind but asked for extra towels and sheets since we wouldn’t be able to dry ours. She only brought extra towels. The only negatives were that we had to buy some of our own supplies that we thought would have been provided. There were only two rolls of toilet paper provided for our 8-night stay. We also bought our own paper towels, dish sponge, hand soap (bathroom and kitchen hand soaps were only half full), trash bags, and salt and pepper for our food. Even though it didn’t cost much to buy these extra things, we felt they should have been provided for the price we paid.  Overall it was a good space and we enjoyed our stay.

Paul and Judith's house is amazing and comfortable, the bedroom is quiet and charming. They were helpful with everything that I needed. The house is very well located. One of the best airbnb experiences I've had so far, I totally recommend it!

This was the first time I had ever used air bnb. Overall the apartment was great. Location was perfect with great views of Bondi beach. It is on the third floor, so consider this if you have a lot of luggage. Apartment could have been a bit tidier, but I think the turnaround was a little rushed - I assume that for the most part things are all ship shape. Our host left us alone, which was fine but a check in text asking if everything was OK would have been appreciated and thoughtful.

I spent a night in Newtown during Easter. Walked into a neat and tidy room with welcoming bunny easter chocolate on the table. What a delight! Room was spacious. Very comfortable (and fluffy) bed! 

Although D was not there during my stay, she was very quick with replies and made sure I had no trouble getting in to the house. Self check in and check out system very efficient and flexible. 

Newtown is a lively suburb by day. Cannot stress more on the extremely strategic location of this listing. 4km / 15 minutes drive into CBD. Walking distance to famous cafes (Blackstar pastry 5 minutes walk) and there's a map to nearby cafes and eateries in our room! Street parking was free on designated hours, no issues at all. 

In general, very happy with the stay.

Host was very helpful in finding the place, when I couldn't work out directions; room adequate; bathroom clean and pleasant, although shared; house has steep stairs without handrail in one section; great location, close to everything, public transport short walk away

A beautiful house with beautiful paintings. Arnie's family is very kind, the accomodation is confortable, clean and located in a preatty and quite roundabout. The center is 30 minutes walk away and the bus to downtown stops closed to the house.

한적하고 조용한 공간
깨끗하게 정리되고 모든 것을 갖춘 공간
즉각적인 호스트의 대응과 따뜻함이 있는
이 공간을 추천합니다

ps 시티로 나가는 길이 조금 멀지만(40분) 
시티 외곽이나 시드니 북쪽 관광을 생각한다면 위치도 지리적으로도 나쁘지 않음
가격대비 흘륭한 숙소

Great location of this art deco apt building close to transit trains and buses patisserie market on Saturday right across the street But there was an odour and dirty in the foyer and stairwell of the common areas of the building While we were there the apt had 3 cockroaches and there was a sign to say the exterminators were scheduled for the building The apt towels and linens were great And the apt was clean and tidy except for dust in the corners A small fridge but very functional Thanks Luke and Paul we enjoyed many evenings at your well situated apt
Great place for a larger group
Great house. Very neat and organised. Absolutely enjoyed my stay here. Will stay again if I come to Sydney again.
The best place I have stayed
Mohit’s place was wonderful to stay at. Good location, spacious and clean. Mohit was very accessible and responded to queries very quickly. Would recommend for a group accommodation!
Very professional Airbnb host. Recommend!
A lovely calm, quiet space to chillout. Great amenities, kitchen, bathroom. A great stay

Kathy is a wonderful hostess! She is very helpful, provided an easy check in/check out, and easy to reach with any questions. Her space is beautiful! Very stylish, clean, and had everything we needed. Even better than the photos! We truly enjoyed our stay.
Hayley and Jack made me feel very welcome. Everything about the listing was accurate and it was a great location and neighbourhood.
David was a very nice and hepful host, we loved it to stay in his Apartment :) it was always clean and tidy.
Anitta was warm and welcoming with fantastic instructions on getting the most from the house and surrounding area.
Very friendly owner......very new n nice place
Just do not believe the photos.

Marcelle's house is clean, big and comfortably accommodates 8 adults. If you love reading, there are plenty of books in the living area and kitchen.  The beach is 2 minutes walk from the house and a grocery shop nearby. On the day of arrival, Marcelle was at the house to welcome her guests.  My fellow Rotarians enjoyed their stay.  I never got to meet Marcelle but our communication was easy and reliable.  She even rearranged the bedrooms to meet our specifications. The WIFI at the house functions perfectly well and I was enable to keep in touch with our team in Maroubra while in San Souci.  One can easily access the CBD by a short bus ride to the train station. I would highly recommend a stay at Marcelle's residence to Sydney visitors looking for a beach-side house in a quite neighborhood.

Excellent location close to the train station, only a couple of stop to the city centre, supermarket and cafe nearby, room and bathroom was clean, street parking nearby. Overall we had a good stay at Tim & Mel's. Highly recommended!

David's place is a perfect place with privacy and the amenities needed to make it feel like home. The restaurants and cafes are wonderful. The Saturday market was a nice surprise and experience. The location is very close to the Kings Cross Train station, making it a perfect launching place for a car free, public transit based urban vacation. The train station area is a little on the sketchy side with some hang-over adult entertainment businesses still present. But a short block away, the neighborhood turns into a rather hip, locals-only restaurant filled area that was nice to spend time in.

Let's start with the positives - this house was in a great location, close to pubs, restaurants, shops and amenities. And the beds were comfy. Now for the negatives - and there are a few. First, the house needs a thorough clean and paint: the walls are dirty, the carpets are dirty, the kitchen needs a scrub. There's no air-con, and when the heat reaches 39 degrees as it did when we were there, that was an issue. Yes, we knew that when we made the booking, but at least provide decent fans that don't sound like a jet engine taking off. The downstairs shower leaked every time it was used; the upstairs bathroom was ancient and needs replacing, and the bathroom itself had saloon doors - privacy be damned. The sofas in the lounge need replacing: one was worn, the other like sitting on a rock. The dining table and chairs were passable. The four bedrooms felt grimy; only three had doors, the fourth wide open at the top of a staircase - far from ideal. The towels were threadbare. Plus, with 8 of staying, I would expect at least 8 of everything: cutlery, wine glasses, plates, water glasses, mugs - there were not. We arrived an hour early and the house was still dirty from the previous tennants, with towels on the floor, rubbish in the property. When we came back two hours later, it still wasn't ready. The spare keys were not where they should have been. Jeremy showed up the following day with flowers as an apology and spare keys - but we had no vase to put the flowers in. This house COULD be great - it has the space for 8, two lovely balconies, comfy beds, great location. But it was far from great for us, and I'd say, until it's cleaned and refurbed and some of the money the owner is making is ploughed back into the property, you'd be better off booking elsewhere.

Ann's place is unique, historical and a memorable place to stay.  We enjoyed the history of the house, the stories told by Ann and the very genuine concern for our comfort on what was a 41 degree day.  Breakfast was delicious and tailored to our needs.  Thanks Ann for a lovely stay.
The listing description was accurate, the location was great. However the apartment was lacking character, the kitchen was a little bit dirty - needs a good clean
Lovely apartment in a great position. Hosts Tessa and Rod are delightful and a pleasure to deal with.

We had a great stay in Avalon. Justine’s place was great, it was the perfect size for two people. Clean, comfortable and very close to the beach and shops. Justine was also really helpful! We will definitely be back again.

Rachels place was perfect for accommodating various family members who came to Sydney for my daughters wedding. The bridal party readied themselves there and the decor enhanced the vibe. Locale handy although we did not really do any touristy things. Thanks Rachel for the beautiful flowers.
The house is near Central train station and provides all amenities you might need. However, the room seemed not to be cleaned before we checked in. And the sound insulation was poor.
Easy, stylish space and Host was very reliable

Our host, Linda was extremely helpful and helped to sort little issues that we had on arrival.   We suggested a minor improvement to her and she was happy to take our feedback on board.  The area was a little off putting at first however, once we got to know it and also appreciate the proximity to the CBD and the train station and also a very good pub across the road, we were very happy.   The accommodation provided all that we needed but to be honest we felt it was a squeeze for 4 adults.   Much more comfortable for just two.  Ideally located for walkers and very secure.  Internet access was good.  Linda provided excellent information about Sydney with lots of tour information, sight-seeing blurb and also lots of maps.  Once a booking had been confirmed, Linda provided excellent information for us to read in advance of our stay and all very helpful to make our arrival problem free.
Narelle was very helpful. The apartment was clean, compact and had everything we needed to enjoy our stssy.
Great location, close to whole food grocery, cafes and grocery stores. Jack was very helpful and gave clear instructions. Clean place.
The place was spotless, well set out, comfy and had everything I needed
Very good location - easy to access everything & good host - easy to communicate with Chloe.
Victoria was a very welcoming host. Her place is excellently located
Chez Paul vous serez reçu comme si vous faisiez partie de la famille tout en respectant votre intimité. C'est une fabuleuse expérience d'intégration.
Edi is very welcoming and I was very comfortable staying at her place. Interesting and easy to talk to with a very clean homely feel. Thanks for the stay!

The location was great for us as it is easy walking distance to Sutherland shops and station. It is easy to find and there is adequate parking. The price is fine for what you get. The house is quaint but rather cramped for space especially with full furniture and a tiny bathroom/laundry used by the hosts and sharing guests.

Paul and Luke were very responsive host's and the apartment is in a very handy location with so many great cafes and restaurants nearby.  The Kings Cross train station is only a few minutes walk away and its an easy walk to Hyde Park and the city.

Thank you for consistent communication and reliable contact. 
The presentation and location of this property is excellent.
