This is very nice place to stay. close to Sydney international airport. Clean room. highly recommend to stay.

Millie's place was as she described it and we found it quite comfortable, everything we needed, a cute little place!  The situation is very convenient, the walk to Kirribilli shops, Milson's Point station and the Nth Sydney ferry was only minutes.  It was wonderful looking at the view over to the Harbour Bridge.  Millie met us on arrival and explained details of her place which was very helpful.
Clean, big comfy room. Walking distance from station. Loved our stay here.

Lizzy was the best host, and we fell in love with her beautiful home in the best spot in Sydney.  
Her home is beautifully equipped with everything you need for a beach holiday, and Lizzy is just downstairs if you need anything. Tamarama beach is literally a 2 minute walk, and our kids spent a lot of time playing in the grassy patch if they weren't catching waves! We have had the best holiday and will definitely be back.
Très bonne localisation ! Appartement propre et équipé du nécessaire.
Excellent!
Even I spent few time with Hernan, I had a very pleasant stay. The room is clean and very comfortable. Hernan is a very nice guy and qu definitely recommend him. Thank you Hernan :)
Apartment was amazing, exactly what's needed for a few friends or a family. Location was great as we did not want to be directly in the cbd and cleanliness spotless, would definitely stay again.

Overall a very good house, the location amazing, 5 minute walk to the beach along with several cafés and a pub. Quite comfortable for up to 10-12 guests, would be very cramped with 15 although it could be done! 

Very cozy, would definitely recommend to others!

This place is amazing. It's just 1 minute walk to the bay and 500m from the very nice restaurants at Lyons Road.
We had a wonderful time there with our family. The backyard with a spacious wooden deck and very green lawn were perfect for having a bbq and enjoy the weekend in Sydney.
We had a wonderful time, the place was stunning in terms of the decor, the facilities and the view, we loved it

Great place to stay. Paul and Judith were very kind and helpful. It is a perfect place to stay if you want to know an Australian family. The breakfast was very good, the house was clean... good shower and a comfortable bed. Highly recommended!!

Great pad. Fantastic location. Thanks for the local tips 
Blanca was a surprise packet and just love North Bondi fish
Sweet little place, good location, within walking distance to great bars, coffee and restaurants. Definitely recommend!!!

A great stay! Duncan and Ashlee are friendly, down to earth and full of good tips for the area. The room itself is comfortable, and not too far away from the city. 

Duncan and Ashlee are very welcoming and fantastic across the whole stay
Great location, easy walk to cafes and the beach!

Ali’s place is in such a great place, super close to Norwest business park, supermarket and shops.
So quiet at night, which was great. Everything you need to cook a meal and relax after a long day.

My friends and I had a very pleasant stay! Linda was very helpful and easy to contact. She answered all our queries promptly. Great location, nice cosy apartment.. Couldn't recommend it more! Would definitely be back!

Nice apartment everything as per described. Just a few things to note, I did experience a late check-in, waited an hour plus, for the host's Friend to pass us the keys to the apartment. Also pls remember to park in the designated lot for the unit. Roads can be quite dark at night, But other than those above, it was a very nice apartment to stay in. We enjoyed it very much.

房間很乾淨明亮!也很安靜
屋主媽媽人非常親切､我們到達時都已晚上11點多
還是親自來迎接
非常好的一個停留!謝謝

Such a great place to stay. Super stylish, spacious and in a great location. It was so easy to  get around by walking or public transport & Jan was so helpful with local tips. I wish we had more time to try them all. I would highly recommend Jan's place.
María and Jerome where the greatest anfitrions we could have hoped for. The room Is just as seen in the pictures, very spacious and an incredible view.
Nice tidy apartment in a great area.
Awesome central location close to everything. Despite being in the thick of it the residence is still quiet and getting a good nights sleep is a breeze. Thoroughly recommended.

Amazing view of the Sydney skyline, quiet location, fast wifi & beautiful area!
Helena is a very nice and caring host. Eventhough I was late upon my arrival she changed her plans and came to me personally to hand in the keys.
The view from the balcony is amazing and the area is perfect for a walk or jogging.
Helena's apartment is highly recommended for business and / or leisure guests.
A great place close to the airport, perfect for a quick stay over or for a couple of nights.

Oliver's place is really lovely in views of location, amenities, convenience, and enjoying horse races during the three Saturday evening was an extra! The place is much more beautiful than that described in the photos.
Apartment was advertised.  The instructions were very easy to follow. Unbeatable location .
房间位置非常好,交通方便,离central火车站走路10分钟就能到,周边商场超市餐饮也很齐全｡对面Queen St左侧除8点半到17点之外时间可以免费停车,路边也有免费分时停车位
Lovely place to live! Warm and comfy apartment with everything we need. Locating at the place close to station therefore easy travel everywhere. Highly recommended!
Perfect location and perfect flat. Looks much better than the pictures and has a really nice rooftop pool. Highly recommended ! Annie was also very helpful
Great location but not ideal for a family. 1 small wardrobe, no cooker and very tired and outdated. Needs a good clean and fresh paint.

The apartment is located in a great neighborhood, very close to the train station. The separately balcony is really great and a nice place to spend time on a sunny day or warm night. Kath was a very welcoming host and her dog was very friendly as well! There were a few slight inconveniences, like not being able to use the bathroom from 8-10am while the cleaner was there on Saturday morning and sharing the bathroom with another set of guests, but overall I would definitely recommend the apartment!
There was unpleasant gas smell in the house but Millie tried to solve the issue.
房子位于悉尼市中心,去购物只要走几分钟就到了,去机场有T8二十分钟就可以到达｡建议住两家人比较合适,地下一楼洗澡没有隔间相对会比较潮湿｡房子装修很时尚,设备很全｡住了三个晚上很愉快｡楼梯是真的很陡,要小心慢慢走｡总之是个时尚便利的房子,负一楼很安静,二楼可以听到外面的声音,给大家做个参考｡
Great host and a great location.
Fantastic position in manly - super clean and have everything we needed. Comfy beds and plenty of room for my husband and I and 2 teenage girls! Will definitely stay again!

Fabulous apartment in the centre of Sydney, we'll appointed and great facilities, pool, gym and pay laundry downstairs. Apartment is just like the photos. Communication with Desiree was fabulous and nothing was a problem. Nice personal touches when we arrived. A great place to stay
Very comfortable room with all you could need. Close to transport and restaurants. Susan is a lovely host, friendly, helpful and always ready to have a chat. I would definitely come back again.

The whole apartment had such a good vibe and Imogen has a wonderful personality - I enjoyed my week at this beautiful apartment and there was absolutely nothing that I could complain about. I’m already planning on coming back soon! Loved it! :)
Very nice. Comfortable. Close to the light rail.
good experience
Very well located and in a nice neighborhood. The apartment is comfortable, although it has its quirks.
Stunning location, very clean and tidy and excellent value for money

The house is an older style, full of character and art, and Chinese (Website hidden by Airbnb) has spacious bedrooms and modern kitchen equipped with all the appliances,however we found the living area a bit dark, with no sunlight during the day. Another con would be only one toilet for the whole house.

The host is very responsive and happy to assist anytime.
Overall a nice stay, and would recommend it to the fellow travellers.
absolutely amazing little space so close to everything. can’t wait to return in the future!
Location is excellent for an inner-city-kind of experience. Only a five-minute walk to the light rail. Home was charming, with gorgeous wood floors, updated bath and kitchen.
T
Great location close to Bondi, perfect for us and our puppy. The hosts were wonderful.

I arranged this Airbnb for my parents to come visit Sydney and Victoria was more than happy to help them with instructions and personal requests! Will definitely stay again. My parents thought the place was beautiful and were so excited they kept sending me photos of their stay! Well done Victoria! Thank you so much.
Great
Great loco and space, thanks!
Highly recommend. Great location for events at Sydney Olympic Park. Modern, clean apartment.

Great value for money. Friendly host.
Would definitely stay again if needed.

Judy's place is a Boarding house with many bedrooms. We had the bedroom with the on-suite. There was no-body to greet us and another tenant helped us. We called to get two towels for us and then for toilet paper but found that the TV did not work and we could not make contact the third time. The cupboard with the towels looked a mess just chucked in. The fridge was full of food and some looked as if it had been there for quite some time. The kitchen floor tiles are cracked and dirty, the rubbish bin is open and we found some cockroaches in our bedroom. No one there to organise the house in general. We had better value.

Natasha was extremely helpful and responsive to any communication. 
When we arrived there were thoughtful touches such as fresh flowers and a lovely bottle of chilled wine.
The apartment had everything we needed and was comfortable and very clean.
Natasha offered good advice about the area and local amenities and restaurants. 
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and found the apartment to be in an excellent position for visiting Bondi, catching buses and eating out.
The only slight negative about our stay was the noise from traffic and other residents chatting in the corridor early in the mornings which made earplugs necessary- however we realise you can’t have the convenience of being near to a bus stop and amenities without hearing the traffic noise!

I would highly recommend Fred and Bernadette's apartment, it is in a fantastic location with great views of the ocean and inlet. Lovely and clean with homemade treats and orange juice and milk in the fridge on arrivalwhich makes things that much more easier.
I was staying for work so i didnt get a chance to relax that much, but i would love to go back with my wife and take in all that Malaba has to offer.
Convenient, reasonably priced unit. Nice host.

The place was very clean and well stocked with a few personal touches.  The pool is amazing to have, especially with children.  Bright and airy with the doors and windows open and beds were pretty comfortable.

Cedric was extremely friendly and easy to communicate with. He even checked in on me on the second day to make sure everything was ok. The apartment was clean and was stocked with all the basic household essentials to be able to drop my luggage and relax for a few hours before heading to the closet shopping centre, Broadway. Close to public transport and the city, i would recommend Cedric's apartment to any solo or couple coming into Sydney.

Hernan gave instructions where to locate the key.  He made sure I was inside with no issues.  He planned to work late and told me so. Unfortunately we were never able to meet as he came home quite late while I slept. I woke up early to call Uber to get to the Airport.  Hernan did send an apology indicating he was sorry not to have been able to meet me.  I'm quite sad as I know we would have hit it off and had quite a bit in common.  Spice and Culture Foods!  And good Bier!  Lolololol. Cheers Mate!

Gayle is the best host you ever can imagine. She is incredibly kind, caring and easy going person who makes you feel like home. The apartment is nice, clean and tidy, and just a few minutes from the city centre. I would highly recommend Gayle's place for everyone!

A fantastically located and beautifully renovated apartment close to the beach in Manly.  Vary spacious with all the amenities that are needed for a relaxing stay for our family of five.  Large garage and off street parking was a real bonus. Anita was a fantastic host, excellent communication and offered flexibility with our arrival.  I have no hesitation in recommending this great apartment and will definitely stay again on our next trip to Manly.  Thanks, Anita.

Lovely cosy place, perfect as a start point to the Coastal Walk. Scott was extremely friendly and helpful.

Private accommodation, with a separate entrance and great independent back garden.
Accueil discret du propriétaire qui nous a laissés nous installer et aller et venir comme nous le souhaitions. Arnie est une personne serviable.
A great apartment ideal location, very clean and everything perfect
Had a lovely stay. So peaceful, homely and comfortable. Michy and Paul were excellent hosts - lovely people who were only too happy to help but also respected privacy. Highly recommended!
Great apartment in Potts Point, close to everything and great value for place to stay! David was super friendly and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended!
Great place for travel in Sydney~
Great place. Great location. Fantastic people to deal with. Highly recommend!
非常好了

This is an amazing apartment in a great location! Entering the property the first time can be a bit tricky, and if the cleaners can up their game slightly, the experience at this apartment would have met our expectations and more.
Great little apartment with everything you need in the perfect location.  Communication with Paul was easy and quick.

Our stay at the Garden Studio was perfect! Cath baked fresh bread and we had breakfast everyday with all the cereals, eggs, vegemite, nutella, etc. she also provided. The studio is small but cozy and she has taken care of all kind of details, we found anything we needed!
Cath also was very nice helping us with some directions and printing maps for us, thank you for a very nice stay!

Susan has such a lovely calm oasis studio in the bottom on her garden in Bronte.  It was a wonderful place to stay for 3 days. Very clean, quiet and excellent location near lots of cafes, bronte beach and buses to Bondi and beyond.  We had a great stay with Susan and her partner Greg who were both very accommodating.  We would absolutely recommend her place in Bronte and we will be staying here again on our next visit to Sydney for sure!

Marissa's place is lovely. I was delighted to discover that there is a sea view from the main bedroom balcony and a great coffee shop and restaurants across the road. There is lots of space and great for a big family. It is walking distance to the beach. I would recommend this house highly.
Lovely host with great communication. Clean, comfortable and central apartment.

Belinda was very welcoming.
The Garden Studio is very quiet and private in a lovely neighbourhood.

The beachside apartment turned out to be a great choice for us. Bernadette and Fred were a delight to deal with. The apartment was lovely and beautifully sited next to the beach and brilliant for getting into Sydney as the bus stops literally outside the door. This gave us a great start to our Australian holiday and we would recommend it 100%. Thanks Bernadette and Fred!
The Worthington family, Harrogate UK.
Lovely clean apartment with lovely views of the harbour bridge!  Close to the Ferry and walking distance from the shops on Military Road. I’d definitely recommend this apartment to friends
Amazing tree-tops style home, had a fantastic stay. Fresh bread, fruit and coffee on arrival made for a perfect breakfast. Stunning views from the deck. Perfect host.

Brenda's place is wonderfully furnished and gives off a very homely vibe. The beds were comfortable and all the amenities were working well. The place is located in a nice suburb very near to coogee beach. Supermarkets, convenience stores and eating places were also within walking distance.

It's also a convenient location to stay in as many buses around the area bring you to the city center and other explore-worthy suburbs such as Surry Hills.

Brenda was very communicative since the time booking was made till we checked in and the days we were there. She is a very hospitable host and me and my group of friends really enjoyed staying there.

Would not hesitate to recommend!
Great location and great host

Nice and quiet neighbourhood. Extremely close to Maroubra Beach and several cafes and restaurants. House has a lived in, comfy feel with dozens if not hundreds of books on several bookshelves. Access was quick and easy and Marcella was easily contactable for all our questions. Internet is not blazingly fast but was more than sufficient for our needs.
在邦迪海滩结束了澳洲行,非常愉快,感谢Mal,房中的景色特别好,邦迪沿岸的行走更是令人叫绝,遗憾的是没有全部走完｡从这里去city也很方便,买张公交卡坐333,380直接去｡特别感谢的是Mal为我们延长了最后一天下午的停留时间｡这是一次非常棒的体验!
Jonny was super friendly and welcoming and made Alex and I feel very comfortable. We felt very at home in this apartment that is in an amazing location for exploring the north shore and Sydney.
Spotlessly clean and modern accommodation not far from the beach. Quiet location and ideal for getting away from the hustle and bustle but only a short drive to shops and cafes etc.

We enjoyed the fact that the apartment was close to everything that we needed and public transportation. Max responded to all of our requests really promptly and even gave us extra service by transferring our bags to one of his other properties so that we could stay an extra night.

Disfrutamos de una agradable estadía en lo de Jonny principalmente gracias a la calidez que recibimos de su parte. Jonny es una persona amable y divertida, siempre abierta a conversar y reirse. El departamento está muy bien ubicado a corta distancia del Corso y las mejores playas de Manly pero se mantiene en una zona tranquila, lo cual es muy bueno. Quedamos totalmente satisfechos y lo recomendamos!

Mohit’s apartment is stylish, spacious and clean. He is approachable and replies fast. The location is perfect, there’s a grocery downstairs and it’s very accessible to bus stops which made our trip easier. The kitchen is complete with appliances and utensils. The only thing we noticed during our stay was whenever we enter the apartment, there’s an unfamiliar smell. I would recommend an aircon in the bedrooms since the living room is the only room that has an aircon especially during the summer days. All in all, our stay was great. And we will definitely recommend it to others.
Ziggy’s place was great! Very clean, quiet and fantastic location right in the center of town and minutes walk to the beach. Would stay again.

I couldn't have dreamed of a better place for my stay in Sydney. The room is exactly as described, spacious and clean. The shared space is also clean and convenient. The kitchen is very well equiped and there is a charming terrace to chill out. Natasa, the host, is a wonderful person: kind, always helpful and very funny. I had a great stay in this place! Thanks Natasa and see you soon.

Simone was extremely helpful and thoughtful.
It was so good to not have to move out until Sunday afternoon when our flights left.
The accommodation was very clean and spacious just perfect for the 4 of us plus a baby. It was so good to have a garage too.
It was perfect location to walk to bus transport and cafes and supermarkets.
We would stay there again.
Gavin is a very helpfull and great host! The location is perfect -> directly near central and Crown street! Thx for everything!!
Great accomodation in a great quiet location
Lovely stay within Francoise's place - would recommend.
Tracey's place was fantastic. It's a very spacious and beautiful home.

Cat's place was great. Pictures just as it was in reality. Also very repponsive and felxible in terms of numbers of people that we were being charged for, even reducing the original price we paid because 1 person couldn't come. Also allowed flexible check in and out times which was very helpful.
Great space and great location for driving through Sydney.
Nice place, super convenient to the airport.

Loved the place and loved Clare too! Lovely house, Molly the dog is lovely too (hide your socks though she likes to take em haha). The location was great, Clare was great, she let us check in at 8 in the morning as we had an overnight bus from Melbourne! Stay was above and beyond our already high expectations :).

Spontaneously, I arranged for a dear friend who was visiting from NZ to stay on a Saturday afternoon to stay at Michy's cabin on Sunday night! It was smooth and simple and my friend had a glorious time and now I can't wait to try it!! Must book again so I can experience it for myself. Thanks for being so flexible and spontaneous with us xx
Convenient location, tidy and comfortable apartment.

Location was brilliant, parking easy, undercover and secure. The balcony is large. We really could have used an air-con during our stay and the place does not have one. It has 2 portable fans, but that was not enough to beat Sydney's summer heat. For everything else the place was OK.
Will and Rachel were amazing. So helpful when we lost our car keys. We didn’t have kids but this is the best place for kids under 6.

What a lovely, stylish space.
Spotlessly clean, stylishly appointed with modern appliances.
Ample space, bathroom a little tight but totally satisfactory and shower i (Website hidden by Airbnb) quite roomy which is the main factor. 
The BB is elevated with screened windows that can open to let the sea breeze and the partial sea views in.
Excellent location, few minutes walk to Bronte or Tamarama Beach, (personally our pick of the Sydney beaches).
Jenny is a wonderful host, and  has taken great pride in the way she has set up her BB.
Happy to help though never intrusive.
Would we return?
In an instant!
It was a pleasure to meet you Jenny.
Thanks for providing a lovely and much needed break.
cheers,
Mark and Leigh.
it's an awesome experience. Min's parents ar adorable and they are really nice and respectful :) Train and bus station are nearby, that helps a lot. it's an awesome place to be.

Although I have arrived later than I initially confirmed, Jonny kindly left keys for me to get into the accommodation without any hassle. The house was tidy and comfy. Also the best location if you want to enjoy Manly beach.

I had stayed at this place for three weeks for work. This is a great place to stay short term. David and Jason are very responsive and make checking in and checking out easy. However, I would not recommend staying here long term during the summer. There is not a fully installed aircon- it is a portable fan/aircon which doesn't really cool the place too well, especially on the warmer days. Jason did purchase and install two fans for me during my stay though, which I greatly appreciated.
Also, the shower head does not really work and sprays out minimal water. Otherwise this is a good  place to stay at during the winter or cooler days for a weekend. The place is nicely decorated and comfortable and is in a great location.
Lovely host , great position , very clean , convenient and as described .
Jared & Diana were fantastic to deal with and accommodating with our request.  The location is central to everything you need at Rouse Hill.  A very pleasant experience.

We had a great stay at Vickie’s apartment. The location is central and there are plenty of nice places to eat and also a supermarket across the road. Vickie was very helpful in messages as unfortunately we didn’t get a chance to meet. I would definitely stay again!
Perfect location for Manly. Very comfortable and Anita was very accommodating. Highly recommended.
good:)

Simply amazing hosts. Every question was attentive and every request was accommodated. Cannot speak more highly of Wayne and Kate. We would rent from Wayne and Kate again in a heartbeat and would host them anytime, simply a delight to deal with. High quality, top shelf people. Cheers Wayne and Kate!

Cindy is extremely helpful and friendly. 
The place is lovely and cozy. 
and very clean & tidy.
There is close to bus stops & beach
So easy to go where you want.
There is perfect room for single travellers
I hope to stay here when i come to Australia again .
Thank you  again to Cindy & Miki :)

This was a sensational experience from start to finish. Desireé was exceptionally communicative and helpful, across arrival instructions and helpful hints, to being extremely flexible with my check in and departure times from the property. She was wonderfully generous with items left in the fridge for me to help myself to, and even some lovely fresh flowers for me on arrival. It's a gorgeous apartment right in the hub of the city BUT with the bedroom double glazed I had some of the best nights sleeps here I've had in ages. Terrific stay. Best part? Uber wide screen Tv and free NETFLIX! I loved this apartment. Don't hesitate to book.

We had a great stay at George's place. He was very prompt in his responses. Loved his tips for good restaurants and bars in the neighbourhood. The apt is very cosy, clean and comfortable. It's perfectly located in the central with easy access to the metro. Total value for money.
Marcella’s home is lovely. Our social group have now stayed there twice and very much enjoyed it. Everything is so convenient and the location is brilliant.
Way better than staying in a hotel. Dj's apartment is clean, modern and welcoming not to mention its central location, Loved my stay
Naveen's place was awesome. Near Kings Cross and in 20 min walking distance to the CBD. Having a little dog in the apartment was a nice plus :) .
Perfect location in Bondi, close to everything! Excellent communication from Sarah and overall great weekend holiday spot.
Amazing place! Perfect location and very clean and modern place!

Excellent location and only one stop from central train station. One thing to note is that the front door of the flat is permanently left open, only secured by a mesh security gate which poses a slight security risk. This is due to the kitchen, living room or bathroom not having any windows, and needing additional circulation. Check in only offered before 8am or after 6pm which was inconvenient.
Compact, well-appointed and equipped flat in top location, near public transport and shops. Eleanor is a very responsive and helpful host too.

We stayed at Gavins Place for some days.. It was very nice, Great Location and Gavin was a Great Host!! We had a wonderful Time.. You can walk everywhere from the Appartement. We had Really good conversations with Gavin and Would Love to go there again :)
Jessica has a funky Paddo pad in the middle of everything Sydney has to offer. Perfect Sydney stay.

Loved Linda's apartment! Linda provided all the information before hand so checking in was a breeze, and she even let me in early after a long haul flight, infinitely appreciated! The location is amazing, there's some lovely cafes just across the road and the train station a small walk away. The apartment was really quiet at night and felt very safe. Would definitely recommend and would stay here again!

Lina and her family were incredibly helpful and friendly. The unit was spotless and all the facilities were excellent. I had my 18 month old daughter with me and it was ideal for our week long visit to Sydney. I would definitely stay here again. Thank you Lina for your hospitality.
Our stay was fabulous. Location is great, near everything. The apt is clean and exactly as described. Unfortunately the pool was being worked on the 6 weeks we were there   Would highly recommend it!

Fred was nice enough to give me a quick tour of the unit and was very friendly and helpful.  The apartment was nicely appointed, very spacious, very comfortable, and the kitchen is literally brand new.  There is a gorgeous sitting area in the front of the apartment with views of Long Bay that is drenched in morning sunlight.  

The bed and linens were all clean and very comfortable and generous amounts of soap and towels (as well as beach towels) were provided.  Malabar is a fantastic quiet community out of the hustle and bustle of Sydney that I spent the most time in and enjoyed the most.  I highly recommend checking out Little Bay as well as a fantastic swimming or snorkeling place.

Can't say enough good things about the hosts, property, or location.  Would stay again without reservation!

The apartment was exactly as described. Very near to train stations. Main attraction were easily accessed by one or two stops on the train. It is walkable if you can handle a walk in the heat. The bed was super comfy. Nice small clean kitchen. Free wifi with good signal strength could stream Netflix to the TV. Iron, hairdryer towels were all supplied. Even toiletries and some food items were provided. Helpful instructions on the local area and tips on where to go. First time air bnb and was very impressed.
房间较小,办公楼隔断而成,主卧与客厅厨房链接,墙体无法封闭,与客厅相通,私密空间较差｡
Would without a doubt stay again if travelling with a group.
Recommended for family stay and great location for sydney visit

This is by far the best location spot and great value for what you pay for! The host pick us up from the seperate car park and drove us to the apartment and back the next day, also pick me up and drove me back to grab my wallet that ive forgot which he didnt need to do. Best host in the area and definitly would come back. He has gone above and beyond what we expected and pay for the worth.
Lovely place and outdoor area
Great place to stay, close to the shops, city and all the attractions around Sydney..

Just spent a comfortable couple of nights at Louise's spotlessly clean, modern apartment. Everything was exactly as described, the TV is huge, the bed is extremely comfortable and the kitchen has everything you could need to whip up any sort of meal. I hired a car and was able to park easily close by, but the busses are also frequent. The bathroom has a great shower head, and there is a washing machine if you need to do any washing. Louise responded promptly to any messages, and was friendly and helpful. It is on the third floor, so there are stairs to climb, but it does mean that the flat gets a lovely breeze. A 100% positive experience. Thanks again Louise

Conveniently located and the host was impeccable. Couldn't have found a more accommodating person if I tried too. Comfortable living space and had some good snoozes while on holiday. Thank you again, A! :)
Well valued, clean and tidy.

The alpha and omega of m
My Air B&B
great place to stay, right in the heart of Sydney.
Perfect location

Helena's place was absolutely lovely! The apartment is basically fully equipped with whatever needed, nice view of sydney skyline, close to bus station,plenty of restaurants nearby and fast wifi. Communication with Helena was fast, she replied most of my messages almost instantly and she's kind enough to meet me earlier for me to check-in. A place I would definitely recommend to others if you would like to have a complete home away from home experience.

Paul's place was very convenient for getting us around Sydney.  He and his wife were happy to speak with us and help us out as needed, including use of their washer which was much appreciated.  We highly recommend staying with them.  

Only issue that jumps out for folks to be aware of is that the room is up two flights of stairs, so if that might be a problem for you, be aware.  This wasn't a problem for us.
A bright, fresh and spacious apartment, perfect for our family of 5. The location is brilliant,  very close to everything, and surprisingly quiet.

Mosman is a lovely part of Sydney.  The CBD is easily accessable by public transport and beautiful Balmoral Beach is not far away.  There are many wonderful scenic walks in the area.  Krythia is a kind and helpful. host.  Comfortable bed and great private bathroom.
Great central studio!
Yoco's place is close to the Central station which is very convenient.
We've stayed in a lot of airbnbs and this was a top for us. Great location, really well stocked and clean and great hosts. Thanks!

Ee really enjoyed our stayed in yamgs apartment ehich eas clean tody with everything ee needed! Great views, aircons on all the rooms  great kichen bathroom and bedroom eith views. Views all around the house! So convient since we wanted to go to anz stadiun where we eere i a couple of minutes. Great host grrat communicative skills and helpful. Thanks again!
Cool space, great art.
Loved this modern accomodation! Open space great for weekend getaway. Close to shops and cute cafes. Very easy to communicate with owner. Was given a detailed document upon arrival and great tips!

Victoria's Chic City Pad was an an excellent stay!! She made my friend and I feel really welcomed from the start! She communicated clearly about the arrival time and gave us great advice about the city. She also checked in regularly to ensure we were enjoying our stay. The neighbourhood is very posh, a less than 30 minute walk from the Opera House and Harbour Bridge, as well as the Botanical Gardens. It was easy to find from Kings Cross train station and we loved the modern feel and look of the flat.
Very comfortable stay. Great amenities. Easy check in. Will book again
great location in sydneys hipster area. close to bars and restaurants. feels a bit more like a hostel, with anonymous check in/out and almost no direct face to face contact.

It is my first time to use Airbnb, finally I figure how to handle, craige & leonie they are super friendly, we had a good experience, the house is located at a very good location, just walk few minutes then you are at the beach and also close to restaurant and cafe, clean and privacy, the garden is nice. Generally everything is nice

This was my first AirBnB experience and I am glad it was a good one. I couldn't have picked a better host and apartment.
Tracy and her family are great hosts. 
The space was as described - the bed was comfy and the pool area was very relaxing. Could have stayed by the pool all day! 
There was a lovely selection of teas and some Orange Juice and fruit. While I didn't use much of the kitchen utensils - looked like there was everything you needed to make a nice meal if you were staying longer or wanted to cook.
The location is beautiful - easy to walk by Narrabeen lake. Tracy was very flexible and welcoming and easy to communicate with. A very easy experience overall.

Great location, great studio and unique atmosphere with views over the horse race track! I would definitely stay there again. Oliver is a great guy and it was a breeze to communicate with him! I had an awesome stay!

Great spot but a bit basic in facilities and furnishings, but that's reflected in the price compared to the updated rooms offered by the resort. Could do with some updating of the property, paint, flooring etc and décor.
The property was clean and the host was nice and easy to communicate with.
Probably not for me next time but if you don`t mind it a bit "rough around the edges" then you cant beat the location.

We had a fantastic family reunion trip staying at Heidi's home. She was extremely accommodating letting us stay at the last minute and also letting us extend our check-out when some family members took ill. 
Heidi has a very welcoming and comfortable house which is obviously a well-loved family home. The pool and back garden were amazing. Towels, linen and all appliances etc. were all in great condition. 
We really couldn't have asked for any more! Thank you so much, Heidi
Homey and clean.
Room located in a nice suburb, easily accessible to beaches and the airport

Rhonda welcomed me into her home with open arms from the very start. She went above and beyond to make my stay with her truly an unforgettable one. I felt like I found a home away from home when staying in her granny flat. She is a very kind woman who will make you feel comfortable and at peace when staying at her home, giving you a chance to really experience what Australian hospitality is truly like. She was helpful in guiding me towards the shopping center as well as highlighting the bus schedule for me, which definitely came in hand. I can't say enough about her and the willingness of help she gives. Whether it's locating sights to see, helping with jobs, or just making you feel safe and at home while staying with her you cannot go wrong choosing Rhonda when looking for accommodation. The area is pleasant, quite, and beautiful. It's very close to the shops and train station, there is also a bus stop outside the house across the street. Not only is Rhonda a gem but her son is very kind and helpful as well. Honestly if you're going to stay in the Shire of Sydney, Australia and you want to save cash doing so while getting a remarkable aweinspiring experience Rhonda's lovely granny flat is the way to go. Trust me you will not be disappointed.
Great location and good value for money. Paul’s an awesome host and communicates quickly about anything you might need. One of our fav Manly stays

Rachel的房子很漂亮,很有艺术感,我们一家五个人入住,房间分配刚刚好,需要的生活用品很齐全,冰箱里还贴心地放了牛奶､鸡蛋､肉饼､各种酱料等等;客厅里有个大电视,我先生和儿子每晚可以看世界杯;我女儿很喜欢那架钢琴,每天都去弹奏,只是建议需要调音;冬夜挺冷,暖气让我们很舒适;街边的车位很充足,我们每天都能顺利找到车位;交通也很便利,到哪里都很快;只是卫生真的需要改进,很多角落不干净;我们入住期间碰上雨天,衣服一定要烘干,烘干机可以用但动力不足,每次洗完衣服都要分两次烘干｡最后,真的非常感谢Rachel提供这么好的房子,我女儿还说好喜欢,真舍不得离开呢!这是一个非常适合体验当地生活的好房子!

We had a great time here. It is far closer to the CBD than we anticipated so being able to walk to the Opera House on our first night in Sydney was an added bonus. If you're up for the walk Paul knows a lot about the city and gives great advice on how to get about.

I had an absolutely lovely week staying at Bj's comfortable home. The room itself was nicely equipped, with a comfortable bed, and plenty of space. I really enjoyed the little balcony too. I LOVED the neighborhood of Surry Hills too - so many cute shops and restaurants a hop away. Bj was super responsive and accommodating. I highly recommend a stay at Bj's home!

Cute traditional Sydney house, in a super location- away from the crazy touristy parts of Bondi, but close to the beach and in the more charming part of this ever-vibrant part of Sydney.
Equipped with everything you need, and close to plenty of good bus routes.
A bit chilly in this very cold spell of winter, but there are a couple of portable heaters.

Kathy's place is nice and clean as described.  Well located to a few things if you are ok with taking uber rides then shouldn't be an issue.  Provided some snacks and drinks which was a really nice touch.  Never had any issues.
Great Glebe location, close to restaurants, shops and recreation, plus walking distance to the Darling Harbour!

I had an amazing Airbnb experience at Jyoti' house! Her family welcomed me with an open heart. Not only they picked me up from the station and invited me for dinners, they truly cared about me. I felt like home! The room is bigger than the picture looks, the house is located 3 mins walking distance from the market place and bus stop. I basically had the guest bathroom to myself, I certainly had a lot of privacy. It was such an amazing experience! I highly recommend this place for both a short and long term stay near by Olympic park.
Ver clean and comfortable room. Kitchen great as is modern bathroom. Great location for access to the airport. Highly recommend.

Perfect accommodation in one of the best locations. We feel very lucky to have come across such a beautiful spot like this one and at such a decent price. My husband and I always stay in Potts Point/Elizabeth Bay when in Sydney but always spend more money than we'd like on accommodation. Mariana's spot will definitely be our go-to for future trips: it has everything you need and was incredibly clean. The bed was so comfortable and my husband couldn't stop commenting on how great the shower was! "That was one of the best showers I've ever had. I think it's the shower heads. We need to look into shower heads like these..." 

For those who have never been to Sydney, the accommodation is close by Kings Cross station which will take you anywhere you need to go in the city, but there are TONS of great coffee shops and wine bars right outside your front door. Elizabeth Bay is beautiful, a short walk away, which is worth a visit. Perfect place to sit with your morning coffee. My husband and I had a great time.

Checking in was seamless. Mariana was the perfect host and very kind. She let us know about something we left behind which was sentimental and made plans to get it back to us. This thoughtful gesture proves what a caring host she is! We can't recommend this place enough!
Clean and stylish place.  Very comfortable stay!  Wendy was terrific in her communication and check-in.  We stayed here at the end of our trip, and it was very convenient to the airport.

As description by Cath in her profile, everything is what you see in the picture and the place is amazing clean, neat and tidy. Was pleased to find that the place very cosy and quiet which is a plus point to me. 

Not forgetting her lovely pet dog, he was super friendly and obedient which i enjoyed so much playing with him even though he has enter the room without notice. :) 

It's a shame Cath place was taken up when i return to Sydney but will surely choose over her place if i ever return to Sydney for holiday. 

Thanks for the host Cath.

Tam's apartment is in a great central location close to everything.  He obviously really cares about the aesthetics of his home and everything was clean, in good condition and I felt very comfortable.  Great communication too, made my trip a breeze.  Thank you, will come again.
This is a great location (very central) and the room was clean and tidy.
really nice place

I have stayed in many Airbnbs before and always rented the whole apartment or house. This was the first time that I stayed in a place where, from the sheer amount of personal belongings, I had the impression that the apartment is inhabited when not rented out. The result of this is that every cupboard, wardrobe and drawer is full of personal stuff. Not really what I wanted or expected. I do not have a problem with this but it would have been good to know. The photos do paint a good picture of the apartment but what they don't show, and the listing does not clarify, is that this is a ground floor apartment in an old building, with no blinds/curtains, that backs onto an alley way (with bright street lighting) that forms an entrance way into the high school next door. On weekdays, it can be noisy as the kids arrive/depart the school as well as during the break times. 

On a positive note, Tam is a great host and very communicative. He immediately worked to darken the bedroom for me (thanks Tam!) and is very conscientious that his guests are comfortable. The bed is extremely comfortable, towels are soft and fluffy and the location is second to none. The shower is also very good. 

Value for money? This is Sydney and an awesome location but it felt somewhat overpriced.

Cons:
Cluttered, no blinds on windows, ground floor apartment that backs on to school entrance way, pricey

Pros:
Great mattress, shower and towels. Amazing location
The cabin was absolutely fantastic and very comfortable. Loved the bed and we both had the best nights sleep. The location is nice and quiet, perfect for a stay on the beaches.

Natasha was a great host. She stayed up extra late on Friday evening to greet us on arrival from the airport and to show us around the apartment.  Was happy to give us some local info before arriving and put us in contact with hair dressers etc for a wedding. Also loved the wine and food left for us on arrival. Also the biggest sell point is the LOCATION. 1 minute from the beach. 10/10 would recommend and stay again!
A quiet and spacious room. Thank you Sarah
Best Host ever... left my electric toothbrush and they delivered it to where I was staying next in another area.. nothing but Love.
Great place, nice and close to nearby restaurants and cafes. Quick enough to get a ride into the city to go out. Apartment was excellent, very clean, and the bed super comfortable

Location, location, location!

In the heart of the city, close to transport, close to cafes and restaurants and walking distance to CBD.

Hotels are good, Airbnb’s are great!
Nice, clean, compact space in the heart of Kings Cross. Bread, butter, jam, tea or coffee things were left for us which was a lovely touch. Thanks Julia!
Modern room with awesome views, great location with big supermarket in walking distance.
Great value. Everything was really good! No complaints.  Highly recommend to others.
This was booked on behalf of my colleagues and they really enjoyed their stay. Thanks Heidi
This was a third and final time with Daniel and Elena. Great hosts, would highly recommend, very friendly and always up for a chat. Thanks for having us!!

The place is amazing, with everything you need. The location closed to most of the sightseeing places and 2 train station. Mike always response within 10mins and give valuable response. We definitely will reserve here again when we visit Sydney again.
Excellent location. Great hosts

We had a nice stay in Vickies apartment, which is located in a cool suburb with lots of Cafés and Restaurants. It's a small but optimal used room.
Vickie was very friendly and easy to contact,Check-In and Out was very easy as well!

Alexey was a great host, very quick to communicate and has a lovely, small but split level apartment in an excellent location. It worked perfectly for us with a small child, we could put him to sleep and still stay up without waking him. We went to the park and the pool, very easily got around to the rest of the city.

What a fantastic spot- so close the circular quay and the rest of the city. Everything was super comfortable, plus nice and clean. We had a great stay and would definitely come back next time we go to Sydney

This was a return visit as I loved staying at the Studio a few months ago. An excellent place to stay in Bundeena as it has a great location, ambience, amenities, privacy - all at a very reasonable rate. The hosts are very considerate.

Great location with cafes, bars & restaurants right on your doorstep. Very convenient apartment with room & bathroom next to each other. Arriving late was no problem and convenient access via concierge. Highly recommend for a business traveller. Felix the friendly dog came to say hello in the morning which was a nice reminder of home.

I spent a week at David's house. I must say this is by far and away the best place I have ever stayed. His house is very nice, modern decoration, very clean, close to bus stops, cafés, restaurants and a walking distance from CBD. The room is clean and spacious with a very comfortable bed, cable tv, air conditioner, a large balcony. The bathroom is very clean and the shower is perfect. Adapters for Australian plug is available in the room (although I had mine, I think it was very kind of him for supplying it to guests). David was very kind. I give this a mark of 10 out of 10. I would definitely stay at David's house again. Thank you very much.

I told Suzie that this is prob my best Airbnb experience. Generally I had busy schedule in Sydney so I didnt spend a lot of time staying in the apartment. However every pieces of the furniture is absolutely amazing and they make the place so unique I think. Also I love the little budda in her balcony. My bedroom is very comfy and I have own private restroom!!! Suzie is a super nice host and I told her that I will def call her next time when I visit Sydney. Thank you so much Suzie
Super clean and close to the train station. Even though, Allen was overseas for the duration of the stay, there wasn't a single problem with check-in or communication. Highly recommend.
Clean and fuss free. Hospitable stay.

Awesome place!
Unfortunately I couldn't meet Jason. He was on vacation, so his friend Stu hosted us. He was just on time when we checked in & out, and very friendly. 
House is just like in the pictures. Nice living room with wide open terrace. The one of the best thing is there is a small park where you can oversee the Bondi beach in just 50m away. Also around 5min walking distance to beach.
The main room has double bed and empty drawers to keep things. And second room has 2 bed and 1 bed-like shelf.
There is no A/C (small room has small one, bue can cover the whole house), but in day you can open window. there is breeze so it is not so hot. In night, each room has fan, so no need for AC.
There is laundry room with laundry machine and dryer. Bondi beach is quite more humid than Sydney. so it was very convenient.
I'll definitely visit again with my family someday. This is perfect place for family. I so envy Jason to live this house:)

It’s not the ritz but it’s cozy and comfortable. Perfect for those of us that can’t afford the moon. Shaun was super helpful with suggesting places to see and is very kind hearted. Also the bed is very comfy! I had the best night sleep!
Very nice and clean room/flat. Close to public transport.
I really enjoyed my stay at Angela's. Would strongly recommend.

My wife and I loved Oliver's studio! Very clean and modern with beautiful views of Royal Randwick Racecourse. You get to see the trainers take their gorgeous horses for their afternoon stroll as you relax out on the balcony overlooking a plant nursery and the racetrack. The amenities were great and Oliver was very quick to respond to any enquiries. The studio is located in very close proximity to a lot of great restaurants. We were very happy with our stay.
Great little 'treehouse' and not too far from the main town. Lovely little beach just a short walk away too to go and watch the sunset.
This is a lovely, clean & comfortable ‘all of house’ accommodation. Everything that is stated on the information for this place is accurate. The hosts were quick to respond to any queries we had.

Dear Arnie and Lorraine, thank you so much for having us at your wonderful place. It was a really nice and homy place for us. Love the room, the cozy bed and also the fresh air that comes from our 2 windows. The house has a good natural light, a wonderful kitchen, and a stunning bathroom. I also give Arnie a lot of credits for his artworks that filled most of the entire house. He is truly a fine artist. Lorraine was also a good host to us, very friendly and has a lovely smile. Thanks for the wonderful experience and sharing your lovely place for us.

I enjoyed my stay here, I stayed here to give myself a break from the traveling back and forth from home during my time of my placement at the nearby hospital. There is no negative feedback that I can think of. I didn't see Hernan that much due my early starts and early nights, but in between when I saw him he was really nice. I will defiantly be back if I ever need to stay in the area again.
Easy stay with excellent bus connection to the city. Shower was my favourite at this place, besides of that I had a good sleep in the comfy bed.
Very nice place!

Hey, for me  -perfect- close to ferry to city ( walkable) if you stay late in the city ferry close at 9pm. I don’t cook means I don’t know about kitchen, Room is small but enough to sleep the nite and go, place is great value for me.
Spectacular place on the colonial side, fantastic area with true Sydney spirit, nice and helpful host. Rather quiet, no street traffic could be heard. Good value. Highly recommended.

Tracey’s place was fantastic! A home away from home. All the little touches such as breakfast and tea / coffee making facilities, decor, tv and the bathroom were great. It was close to the shops and the bus, so easy to get about. Would recommend to anyone. Will be coming back!
Arrange for transportation, my Uber App would not work so I payed $50 one way into Sydney.  That is not Shaun"s fault.
It was a stylish comfortable room - Ian was wonderful to deal with

The host is very kind, the house is very comfortable, modern and well-eqipped, the area is beautiful. We enjoyed the wonderful beach and the walks in the nearby National Park. We hope we can stay again some time. :)
I love Tracey’s place!

Charming accommodation 
With everything you could possibly need to make for a perfect holiday
Walking distance to great shops and restaurants and a short stroll to the ferry
Lovely outdoor sitting areas
Jennifer was a very welcoming and accommodating host
Would definitely  recommend

Loved this place amongst the trees. Felt like we were up in the mountains in Bali. Had everything we needed and the place has some lovely warm touches. If you’re scared of creepy crawlies it may not be your best option, but we loved it nonetheless. Hosts were really responsive and helpful. Would definitely come back here if we are looking for a quick getaway from Sydney by the beach.

The place was really convenient since it's just 10-12 mins walk from the restos, wollies and wolli creek station.  The room was relaxing, toilet and bath are well maintained and the kitchenette was good as well.
Great private place and private bathroom. It was very clean.

Location. 
Size of unit could certainly be good for families too. 
Building facilities.

Griffin was a lovely host who helped us out with everything we needed for our stay in Sydney. His apartment was cute and clean and perfect for our long weekend away. Good location near a supermarket, lots of cafes/restaurants and the train station. Thanks Griffin!
最好的房东 很细心的给了很多信息 非常感谢 住过那么多Airbnb George 是我碰到的最好房东 没有之一
Great location and easy to find. Car space is an added bonus

FIVE STARS!
Hosts were great communicators and very responsive. Place is stylish, clean, well appointed and very centrally located. We loved it!
Great value for money. Very clean and in a nice suburb close to everything.

Oriel was so helpful and always prompt with his responses. 
The building was very secure and the apartment was just as described. Lovely view of darling harbour and an even better short stroll to enjoy the great restaurants and bars there. Looking forward to coming back to Sydney and will definitely stay here again. 
Great little pizza/pasta place just next door with beautiful, friendly staff.

Jenny was an amazing host who provided our stay with all the necessities for us and my daughter. She was thoughtful to even provide toys for my daughter and ensured we were comfortable. The location was a huge win as we had to walk down the streets and we were at the beach. Definitely recommend this place to anyone who is visiting Bronte

The place was very cosy and clean. The view from the balcony was awesome. It was a bit noisy at night as there were people driving with very loud engine nearby. Overall, my baby and I had great time in the apartment. Thank you Eduardo & Yvonne!
A great location in the Sydney CBD, particularly to access Darling Harbour and Harbour Cruises. Comfortable apartment for 4 guests.

A lovely comfortable and private home, that we found very practical for 5 adults. Neat, clean and thoughtfully presented, this really made our guests first nights in Australia  a most pleasant "home away from home".
Very good host, I recommend her.
The apartment is well represented on the listing.  The area is absolutely charming and Vickie is a great host. Would definitely stay there again!
Great spot, very convenient for the train

We were received by Ricky, which was dog-sitting for Naveen, and he was always happy to help. 
The place is gorgeous and exactly as displayed in the pictures. Really close to King's Cross Station, where it was easy to take a train to go anywhere.
Hope we will be able to meet Naveen the next time we will be in Sydney!
excellent value

I stayed in Wyatt's house with my girlfriend for 4 nights. Wyatt is really nice host. This was my second time in Sydney and he recommended me good spots to visit which I hadn't seen in my first trip. He has a big painting along the wall in the hall of the house so we were asked to paint something in there. We really enjoyed it and we thought it was a really good idea. Regarding the room, it is really small, so there was space just for us and our small bags. Anyway our stay was short so we didn't spend much time in the house. For sleeping 4 nights it was good and I consider a great value for money. It is a better choice instead of backpackers. The house is cozy and well equipped in all areas. The toilet is shared and it could be a bit cleaner. Anyway it is enough for a short stay.
Susan was a brilliant host and the little touches in the room (e.g. Fresh flowers) made all the difference.
Lovely studio apartment with a very welcoming host, who ensured all the comforts of home were taken care of, as well as extras such as toiletries and brekky.
房间很干净舒服,但是整体尤其是卫生间没有图片看起来那么大｡四个chen成人入住会略有点挤｡热水够热,但是多人使用的话间隔要开一些,不然会不够热水｡
This is a fabulous area to stay in and we enjoyed  the atmoshere and vibe.
A great location, very clean bright space - perfect for a weekend getaway in Sydney!

Leslie's home is definitely one that my family and I would love to revisit! It was perfect for an intimate quality time spent with family in the basement studio. While noises of upstairs and neighbour's dogs was audible on occasion, it did not affect our stay. Beds were comfortable and we still got a good night's rest.  The TV entertainment and wifi access was helpful and the stunning views overlooking the sails is second to none!! Leslie's complimentary breakfast was exceptional and her and her family made our stay feel like home - if not, better than our home in fact! Thank you again!
Hernan is a friendly and easy-going person and the room is clean and tidy!     It was definitely a wonderful experience for living here! :)

Paul was a great host. Great communication. The unit was ideally located close to wharf and beach. We travelled with 2 small kids. No mention of the flat being on the 2nd floor. A bit tricky with the kids getting up and down. The apartment was cosy and well suited to small kids to crawl around. However a bit dusty on the floors and carpets for the baby who was crawling all over the place. If it's a pad near the wharf of manly you are after this is it.

A great place to stay with very homely feel and room for a large family or group. Catered very well for our large group at great value. Host was very informative and provided good timely communication.
Easy check in and check out with no hassles.
Would stay here again.

Enjoyed our stay at Yvonne and Edu's apartment. Excellent position within easy walking distance of Bondi junction and the train. The apartment was very clean and airy and we enjoyed the views. We found the bedroom a little noisy especially when the window was open. Great to have visitor parking in the basement and very convenient to drive into the CBD or to the beaches. Eduardo and Yvonne were easy to deal with and Edu met us on arrival and helped us up with our bags.

the apartment is spacious and very clean quite location which is nice, the only down for is the bathrooms too small and needs air-cons in the spare rooms. 
We had a lovely time and Anita is a great host. We would stay again.

Wonderful apartment with a well-equipped kitchen! The apartment is close to public transportation so it is easy to get around. Hernan seem like a really nice and likeable guy, didn't meet him that much but he definitely had a good vibe.

Good place to stay, I recommend it!

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay, Bailey was a fantastic host, extremely accommodating. The property and location was better than we expected.
Bailey had stocked the fridge and pantry with a few of the essentials for our arrival, a very welcoming touch. Bedrooms and living areas were large and very comfortable. Tranquil location, with beautiful views of Pittwater.
Looking forward to our next stay at Bailey's place.
An amazing location with beautifully furnished clean living area. Big, well equipped kitchen and clean bathroom. Will be definitely coming  back!
Great stay! Had a great time

Stay here when you go to Manly!! Jackie and Martin were the most amazing hosts. The place is very easy to access. Their home is a dream to be in. Would recommend their place to anyone first before staying anywhere.  They’re the best couple. Jackie even made me a tea brew when I wasn’t feeling well. Thanks again for an amazing stay!

We loved staying at this home the night before and night of our wedding- it was spacious, well appointed and beautiful! The host Rachel goes out of her way to help you and ensure you have everything you need.

Would highly recommend- thanks!
Bright and modern house in a great location. Close to shops and parks. Perfect for a family get away.

Stanmore great. Good parking. Station close. Great coffee at the Mule. 
Very comfortable and clean 
Aircon or a fan. Sitting room with tea and coffee great.

房东人非常热情!很健谈,就是我们自己英语单词量有限,所以能聊的不多……但是房东真的非常热络,性格开放的小伙伴一定聊得来!房子出行挺方便的,离CBD什么的还是挺近,在厨房就可以看看一个海港,风景真的很棒!不过房子临街,晚上还是挺吵的,对隔音要求高的感觉会……失眠……然后厕所没有通风设施?(肉眼看着有很厚的灰然后找不到按钮),我们是秋冬来的,不知道夏天有没有影响……最后房东人很好,订她的优步接送机很方便!
Gran ubicación en Sydney
Kasey’s place is really nice! Location is perfect! I will definitely come back!

Breandas  House was great, amazing artwork, clean and with everything you could ever need. We truly enjoyed that amazing Terrace and view.I would recommend Brenda's place for anyone  visiting  Coogee beach.
A lovely place to stay and wonderful hospitality! Thank you Tessa and Rod!
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It's really clean and nice! Perfect for a night's stay if you get stuck at the airport and really close to the airport. No complaints and I'm usually able to find something. Would definitely stay there again.
Great stay.  Apartment is very central to everything, clean and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay.
The only thing we were unhappy about was not staying longer!
Great everytime!

My Family and I stayed at Linda's apartment the last two weeks of December 2015.  From the time the booking was made Linda has been in contact with me, about the apartment the area and things to do in and around Sydney, thank you Linda!!
The apartment it self is as listed on Airbnb. It's comfortable cosy and everything a traveller or holiday makers requires. My family and I also loved the area it was a nice quiet and safe area. 

If ever I return to Sydney I would hope to return to Linda's apartment. Thank you Linda for everything!
Angela was very friendly and welcoming, I had a wonderful stay in her warm house, couldn't have asked for more. Thanks Angela

Cindy and Claudio were both amazing hosts! Their apartment is very clean, cosy, and comfy. The location is great, next to many shops and Coogee Beach. Would definitely recommend for someone who needs a quick stay near UNSW or someone who is new to Sydney.

Perfect location close to everything, train station just few minutes walking, very big, modern and clean place perfect for a good rest after a long day in Sydney. Everything you need, free coffee and tea, nice balcony, very comfortable beds. We would definitely recommend this place and come back again. Thanks Andrew.
Stop your search. Stay here.
Good emplacement.
房东准备了巧克力,很友好｡自助入住很方便｡但是预定前没有相告,隔壁几米的地方在施工,每天早餐7点开始吵的无法睡觉｡走路去City基本不可能,太远了｡入住当天被告知洗衣机坏了不能用｡整体来说,体验一般,简单的过渡入住两天可以,但不要预期有度假休闲的期待｡
Very close to Circular Quay station & The rock.
Everything was well set up for our group of 11.  A great location and a comfortable base for our weekend in Sydney.  The kids really enjoyed the beach.
Amazing location to get the best out of Sydney, very friendly hosts who made the process very easy . Thanks Hayley and Jack!
The room was private,clean and comfortable. Cathy responded to all our queries promptly and made us feel very welcome.

This was a great place and great location! Had everything we needed, in the kitchen, bathroom and even had cheap laundry! Stephen was an awesome host! Met us and did a walk through, explained everything and was super easy to get a hold of for anything! Definitely recommend staying here :)
Lovely and clean studio, the host was great - very fast in response and friendly. Would definitely recommend to stay :)
Enjoyed our stay rob was a such an accomodating host and the pictures don’t do the accommodation justice. A really fantastic stay we hope to come back.

Really good place , a wonderfull welcome . 
I recommend
Great host, great house, comfortable room. Perfect stay!

This place is awesome! Me and my wife stayed here for nearly 2 weeks and we felt so comfortable and welcome. Natasa is such an amazing person, so friendly, easy-going, helpful, open-minded and funny. It is so easy to talk to Natasa. She gave us a lot of advices and very good ideas during our stay in Sydney. The location is great if you want to explore Sydney. The train station is very close and it makes it so easy to reach all the places. Natasa's home is very clean and so cozy. Our room was fantastic and very comfortable. We felt like home at Natasa's place and we would stay there again. We highly recommend this place!

Edi was an incredible host. She was super friendly and helped us with anything we needed. She showed us around her home and gave us suggestions of where to eat, drink and do our shopping! The house was super clean, and our room was great (bed was super comfy) lots of space to put your belongings and Jet (the cat) was super cute! We ended up staying longer than originally planned because we felt so at home at Edi's. The house itself was only a 3 minute walk to the train station where you can easily access trains to central etc. I would recommend anyone to stay here and I would to stay again! Can't thank you enough Edi :) *****
A beautiful apartment overlooking Pittwater. Paradise. Everything is so close. With you’re own pool and sauna. Highly recommend. Loved our stay
Studio 32 is spotless, very comfortable, private and has all the amenities you could want for an overnight or longer stay.

Chloe was very responsive to us prior to our stay. Chloe and her husband were great hosts and very pleasant to deal with and understanding. We were three adults and two toddlers and she had a baby cot and baby bath ready for us. The kitchen was also well-equipped. The apartment is neat and clean and very centrally located, some few hundred metres from the train station.
We were very comfortable at the apartment.
Note: One keycard to get into apartment so we had to coordinate a few times when doing different activities during the day/night, but it didn't really matter to us.

This beautiful home is perfect for larger groups. The living and dining area is spacious and comfortable. We had a group of 6 and really enjoyed the private decks and outdoor area. Wonderful location, so close to everything you would want for a Sydney stay.

It was really a nice and pleasant stay. The place is very neat and tidy and its exactly in the pictures! Dj was very accommodating and very flexible with the check in time as well. I appreciate it. Thank you for letting me stay David!
The apartment is in GREAT location (just a five-minute walk to the Central Station) and you can easily find some good Vietnamese and Thai restaurants in the area.

A great little place and ideally located. Has everything you need and suited us brilliantly as a family of four adults. The city is about 30-40 minutes away by bus which between 7am and 7pm stops right outside the apartment. A welcome pack including fresh jam was very much appreciated. Fred and Bernadette respected our privacy but were there if needed. Thank you both.

Naveen & Tristan were awesome, 
they were such great host's. 
it was our first Airbnb & recommend this for sure, you have your own  space with bedroom and bathroom, so cool!!  
loved it.
Ash&Jas
非常完美的体验!住了一周时间,很周到专业,下次还去!
Mal is a great host who responds to my text really fast. Overall, it's a good apartment very near to the beach.

Vickie's apartment was perfect for a 1 night stay in town. The location is so central and although the room is small it offers great value. The double glazing on the windows meant that we had a great sleep.
Many thanks again Vickie for a seamless checkin.

Cathy was a perfect host.  We had strawberries, muslie, yogurt and milk in the fridge on arrival.  The room and bathroom were lovely and clean, with a very comfortable bed.

Cathy has considered everything in the room, my mum and I were very comfortable there.

The location is also perfect, the area is very peaceful and would highly recommend staying with Cathy.

Thanks Cathy for a memorable stay!

We had a group of 13 and all had a great time there. The house was clean and well equipped from the bathrooms to the kitchen. The house was spacious and having 4 bathrooms between a large group was definitely handy. A few items including milk and soft drinks were supplied and left in the fridge which was a nice touch. Can't fault this house. We all had a fun and memorable stay!

The hosts went above and beyond our expectations in every respect. The place is immaculate and beautifully furnished, the location is perfect. Very close to shops, beaches, the national park etc. and with a nice view. I loved listening to the sound of the waves at night.  The swimming pool was a hit with my kids, especially the cupboard full of toys they could play with in the water. We were provided bathrobes, towels, extra towels for the swimming pool - felt really spoilt. We were a party of 2 adults and 2 children, but the place could conveniently accommodate 6 people. Hilde baked bread for us: what a welcome.  We could bring a dog, and were provided with both practical advice and everything our doggie may need. We had a wonderful stay, my children did not want to go home! Thank you Hilde and hubby for your hospitality.
A fantastic place to explore Sydney from with a really helpful host.

We arrived and were pleased to see the house was on a good street with lovely gardens. We were welcomed warmly by Greg. The studio was warm, clean, with lovely provisions. In the morning I found fresh bagels and jam on the step so I could relax and not have to go to the shop!  Walking to Clovelly and Bronte was a delight. We enjoyed breakfast in the Garden. Thanks for a lovely stay. Regards Anne and Rodger

Really a comfortable house for the family. Very convenient traffic to the city and community nearby. Only 4 minutes' walk to Marrickville train station. The house is federation style with beautiful high ceiling, the landlord has excellent taste for selection of pictures, such as oil painting, Chinese painting, scenery pictures, make the house vivid, I like them very much! The facilities in the kitchen are all ready. The landlord is very communicative, thoughtful. The car can be parked alongside the street freely. By the way, there is a very good Chinese restaurant supplying Canton breakfast, tasteful and original, just by 10 minutes' walk.
Super comfortable bed and Krythia is very friendly and welcoming.
Good spot at a great location, next to train station and a few bus stops, great restaurants and bars, 20 minutes away from the CBD.

Valentine et Jack sont des hôtes très agréables, avenants, arrangeants sur les horaires si possible, ouverts à la discussion et désireux de partager leurs connaissances des lieux à visiter aux alentours
L'appartement est parfaitement entretenu, décoré avec goûts, et surtout avec une vue magnifique sur Bondi Beach
C'était LA réservation à faire!
Easy to get to, good value for money and great communication.
Really good place to live in!

Thanks for the wonderful time in your apartment. Was a wonderful time and we felt like home. There was even stuff in the fridge and all basic items you need. When we come back to Sydney we will for sure come back. The beach is really around the corner and the connection to the city is perfect and easy. Thanks for the perfect time!
Great location. Spacious apartment that was clean and comfy.
Very close to everything. Lovely couple and amazing views m.
Sarah is a really nice host. Support our need such as cook tools and storage. We had a great experience in this house.

my stay there was pretty good and they helped me a lot.
They are very kind and patient.
Awesome location . Great communication

I stayed at Serena's flat for two weeks in July, it's a cosy little place, perfectly located to discover the city and the thriving night life around Kings Cross and Surry Hills. Getting around from here is also quite easy - the train station of Kings Cross is just across Williams St and you have buses all around you. The flat is in the basement so no views and it can be a bit dark in winter, but in summer it won't get so hot. The kitchen has all the basic facilities you would need for a holiday stay, the bathroom is neat and everything was tidy.
Contact and Check-in/Check-out was easy and prompt, with complementary fruit, bread rolls, jam and milk to start off my stay. There is an ATM right next to the entrance and a bakery across the street, so all very handy.

George and Lucia's Granny Flat was amazing. It was clean, convenient and a nice home away from home. They were great and following up with us to make sure we were ok and nice and settled. I would definitely stay here again and recommend others to stay as well.
Super clean, spacious, good internet and perfect position to transfer at the terminal 1
Place just as described. Good small room.

우리 부부는 Jared&Diana의 아파트에서 5박 6일을 머물렀습니다. 
체크인 하루 전에 주소와  파킹 정보까지  상세한 정보를 보내주셨고, 저희가 늦은 체크인을 했는데도 반갑게 맞아주시고 집안 구석구석  친절히 설명해주셨습니다. 은은한 향초의 향기와  센스있는 인테리어 덕분에 집안에 들어서는 순간  기분이 좋아졌고,  주방기구  세탁기 건조기 등 모든 것이 갖춰져 있는 곳이라  내 집처럼 편안했습니다. 또한 오트밀과 꿀 차등도  준비해주셔서 머무는 내내 든든한 아침 식사도 했구요. 주변에 호수 공원이 있어 저희는 매일 아침 산책하고 힐링했습니다. 커피를 좋아하는 저에겐 커피 머쉰이 없다는 것이 살짝 아쉽긴 했지만 길건너 커피숍이 있어 괜찮았습니다. 조용하고 한적한 곳이지만 Rouse hill town center내에 위치한 곳이라  woolworths나 레스토랑 등 편의시설이 모두 가까워서 편리했습니다. 아파트 자체가  완벽한 보안이 되는 곳이고  rousehill town center 자체적으로 24시간 순찰을 하며 보안에 신경을 쓰는 곳이라ㅇ 안전하고

The apartment in reality looks even better than on the photos. It is very spacious, so it felt really good to rest there after entire day in an office. I especially enjoyed all the comfort furniture: sofa in the living room, couch and armchairs on the balcony. It is very clean and elegant. It has many different sized lamps, so it is easy to make it well lit in the evenings, whatever's your preference. Especially worth mentioning is the balcony. Even though there is no view to speak of, because the neighbouring buildings block it off as it is only 2nd floor, sitting on the balcony during the weekend or in the evenings was surprisingly relaxing. It is probably due to combination of the facts that the balcony is big, the chairs are very comfortable and the sound of the city is somehow dimmed after everyone left the city center. Speaking of which, the location is absolutely great, it is close to everything I wanted to see in Sydney: Opera House, Ice Cream, Restaurants, Offices, Cafes. And if you want to go there in a fresh shirt, there are very well working appliances in the apartment: washing machine, dryer, and a huge ironing board and a very good iron. I wish I had such in my home. Overall, I highly recommend the apartment.
David was an excellent host. Very helpful and respectful. The location was great and the home was welcoming and tidy. Couldn't be happier with the experience and service provided.
干净整洁,房东热心
This listing is a great location to explore many of Sydney CBDs attractions. Communication was easy & the place is clean with well appointed furnishings.
位置很好

The room is clean with beautiful sunrooms. Close to bus station and national park. 
However, i am very disappointed about what happened here. After I went back to my home. The house ownner emailed me about several questions need me to pay. He mentioned about stains on the rug in the living room and damage to the rug. (I strongly doubt this point) and also mentioned the flat was not left very clean (We washed all dished, throwed all wastes and cleaned living room). We are still discussing about the repaire fee. Please everyone, be caution.

Donna is a super host, helpful, friendly and the communication is fantastic! The house is a work of art, the room beautifully decorated and the bed very comfortable. I’ve stayed before and will definitely stay again - a home away from home. A++
We had an absolutely delightful stay; so much better than staying in a hotel or B &B. Highly recommended.
Angela let us in herself, showed us around and made us feel at home straight away. We stayed only the one night, but her room was just what we needed for an 18 hour layover.
What a stunning environment and the accommodation felt luxurious and amazing. The photos don’t do it justice and we loved everything they have done to make it such a heavenly space.

Good location and nice house but not 5 star. Needed a good clean and there is no parking within the property. The adjoining property was being renovated, so we had to leave the house most mornings due to the excessive noise from a jackhammer. House had all the amenities most people would need and was very secure. Nice front and back outdoor areas.

The apartment was neat and spacious, with lots of great food places nearby. I walked to the city and the new convention centre easily.

Wifi was solid, the coffee machine simple and the amenities were excellent.
Great central  location for a Sydney holiday.
Central location, clean, comfy and easy to access! Chloe was very easy to reach and very accomodating with everything!
Perfect place to stay for a few days to explore Sydney. Short walk to Milsons Point train station and stunning walk over the harbour bridge. Amazing balcony views, would highly recommend.

Great cabin for exploring Bundeena and the surrounding walks. 

The cabin is in the back of Belinda's property. It's private and has a useful kitchen.

Belinda provided the information we needed about traveling to Bundeena.

Paul and his family were incredibly welcoming, hospitable and really helpful as I started to find my feet in Sydney. The room was lovely and spacious with a very comfy bed. The family were always happy to chat and share a meal but likewise you could have your own space if needed. I cannot recommend this Airbnb more highly.
Karen is an amazing person! Big heart and a master cook chef, if you like heath food! The bedroom is bigger than in the pictures! Loved my stay!

Cost little apartment in Randwick, great location for us as we were visiting family nearby. It's also right beside lots of nice shops, restaurants and bars. Perfect for a couple or one individual staying for a couple of days. Shobhna was very good at keeping in touch and responding to my queries before the booking.
Thank you so much for me a great experience.
Great location, spacious and excellent communication by Oriel

The villa was exactly as advertised and very comfortable, clean tidy and well located.
The check in instructions were very helpful as were the brochures and local information

FANTASTIC position. Such a short stroll to Circular Quay. George St road works a bit annoying but any accomodation in the area would have the same problem at the moment. Will definitely stay again next time we are in Sydney. Thanks for having us.

Hugo's apartment is in a great location, walking distance from kings cross station, cafes and restaurants.
