The apartment itself is small and basic, a perfect crash pad if you plan to explore sydney and it's food and bar scene, but not a place you would want to spend relaxation time in. Hugo was very friendly and accommodating.

Suzie is a great hostess, very pleasant and ready to assist you if you need any help. Her apartment is extremely well located, within walking distance to the city as well as public transportation if needed. It is also lovely furnished and the room in question is very comfortable and spacious. I highly recommend it!

This small apartment is centrally located to everything we wanted to do.  With 3 of us, the apartment was filled but we weren't in Sydney to hang around the apartment!  With Woolies just down the street, we were able to get heat 'em and eat 'em food that worked great in the kitchen.  The downside was the 24 hour construction on the rail system on the street below.  Incredibly noisy, so if you are coming in the next few months bring earplugs.  The rail system will be great once completed though!
Great location, and good local amenities
Nice space, really well located, Tim was a really easy to communicate with host. Thanks very much

The apartment looked exactly like the photos and was kept very clean. Location was great especially since it was close to 2 stations. The hosts replies where quick and helpful. Would recommend to anyone that wants an Airbnb in the CBD.
Location is ok, hygiene is very poor, quilt is very thin, very cold, air conditioning only refrigeration, there is an electric heating, no use.

Miss D was very nice and professional. The room was lovely, simple and clean. I really loved the small things to make the stay more enjoyable and welcoming. Top Place to stay. And excellent location for something outside the city center.
Amazing garden, wonderful location close to the beach, yummy welcome package, great people. Highly recommended for a relaxing retreat in Sydney!
The flat is perfect and very well located.  We enjoy the lovely king cross market recommended by Hugo. We really enjoy our week in this suburb.
性价比很高,自由,不用跟别人共用房间和设备,安全,比住酒店划算｡
Central location - perfect. Spacious and clean. Entry info well detailed. Welcome manual very useful. Host is easy to communicate with. Perfect for a weekend getaway.
Really enjoyed my stay, great location and lovely bedroom, would definitely recommend!
非常棒的地理位置,窗外就是海德公园｡房东很贴心,消息回复很及时｡非常棒的入住,强烈推荐!
Awesome host. Highly recommended
Great stay

We had no problems finding our beautiful well appointed house we were given plenty tips from our frienly host Ollie I would recommend this very central home to anyone keenfor a Sydney city break, the cafe next door do great breakfasts and the staff are very friendly. We will definitely be back.
very close to the sea. I enjoyed swimming and walking. I felt comfortable like staying my home

Evelyn was very welcoming, helpful and insightful should we need to know anything about the local area. The location was perfect, peaceful and everything was just great for a quick break away from the hustle and bustle of Sydney!
Mark's place was in a fantastic location, right on the beach front. He was really easy to communicate with and we enjoyed our stay.
Easy check in, ali was very helpful on arrival and friendly. Plenty of space and our own path to and from studio to the car. Shops wernt too far away either!

The house was a treasure trove of colour and art. The location was easy to get to by bus. 
The bedroom was clean and fresh.
Entry and exit and wandering around the neighborhood was safe and simple.
Arnie and his partner were both easy going, polite and made the this first time using airbnb a pleasure.
Thanks guys. Highly recommend this place.
Everything is exactly same as the description and pictures. The garden studio is a small cozy space in lovely neighborhood.
Nice place to stay in Sydney, close to attractions.

It's a great experience living at Naveen' s cozy apartment. Everything is as satisfying as the description and the pictures, the neighborhood, the good location and the nice apartment. Naveen and Tristan prepared some useful maps, guides and even a photography album of Kings Cross ;-) All of those what they have provided are thoughtful and sweet. And their doggy Felix is so lovely! Wish we could visit her place again.

Awesome position, nice place and everything you need at your doorstep 
Thanks for having us
Very warm and welcoming hosts. Lovely spot in a terrific neighbourhood.
A+

Great location, very clean. Rob was a great host - very flexible and accommodating. Thanks for a great saty!
Clean, convenient and Jeremy was excellent to deal with. Will stay here again!
Great location- close to the rocks and circular quay, Pitt st mall 5 min walk. Great communication, clean and tidy place. Definately would recommend.
Our stay with Susan was perfect. It was relaxing and inviting. The accomidation is great with everything you need and private. We would recommend it to anyone. Thanks Susan for your hospitality. :-)
Perfect location for Bondi Beach. Great view. You can walk everywhere. Quick Uber to the wharf.

Staying at Craige's and Leonie's place was a great experience. The description was accurate and the rooms were clean and tidy. The appartment is very nice and just a five minute walk from the beach with heaps of nice restaurants just around the corner. Craige and Leonie are very friendly and nice people that provided excellent advise and support. I hope that I will have the chance to stay at their place  when I visit Sydney again.
Everything was great, I really enjoyed my stay in Sydney. Thank so much to Isabelle.
Susan was a very obliging host and made us very welcome. The cabin was everything we required and was well presented. Would definitely stay again.

This place was adorable.  I️t was perfectly located and has everything you could want.  The outside balcony was really nice to wake up to and read.  I couldn’t have asked for a better experience!!  The hosts were also very responsive at all times, which was key.
Inna is a very nice host and provides a lot useful information. My family do enjoy the stay. BTW, the sky bus to airport is really good thanks to Inna.

Thank you George and Lucia for a wonderful stay in your amazing granny flat.  You have thought of everything for a very comfortable stay.  We were in Sydney visiting family and the location was perfect   
Wendy & Colin
Such a gorgeous house and so spacious for the location! Would stay again!!
I really enjoyed my three-nights stayed in Cindy's apartment. It's clean, quite, comfortable and has a good location.
Thank you so much, your accomodation was perfect!! I just had a three day stay at your home, but I felt like I was at home! Amazing :) Hope we will see us again when I`m coming back to Sydney!!

Michele gave us a warm welcome and explained the suite to us on arrival. Place is handy to Newtown and public transport. Sofa bed was comfortable, and has a little kitchenette which is ideal for staying a few nights. Bathroom is brand new and very functional given the size. I would certainly recommend Michelle's place to other travellers.

The location is close to airport(15 mins in car) and 20 min bus to Central Station, so not too bad, value for money. we noticed some bugs and notified Felix to take care of it in future. Also notified of noise making fans (there is no A/C). The bus stop to Central station is just outside apt, so convenient. The Woolworths is also close by, that was helpful to us as well. Not too fancy a place, but good value for money (except for the bugs and dust) for a night or two.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great place great location, would recommend

We're local to the area and were looking for somewhere for our visiting in-laws to stay (as our place is just to tiny to fit everyone).

We booked Mags' place and liked it so much we booked again a few weeks later.

Mags was terrific to deal with. Great communication. Very accommodating. An altogether terrific host. We'll definitely be booking again for their next visit and would highly recommend Mags' place to anyone else.

Thanks again Mags

Jillian & Jesse.

I stayed at Annie's apartment for 10 days and it could not have been more perfect. It was in a great location, walking distance to cool shops, cafe's and restaurants. The apartment was fully equipped and I never felt like I didn't have what I needed. Annie was a great host and was very accommodating when I decided to extend my trip twice. I would highly recommend Annie's apartment for your stay in Sydney!
Lovely place deserved to stay!
Great room in a great location, can't recommend this highly enough. Naveen and Tristan were fantastic hosts. I would recommend you book with them.

We enjoyed our relaxed weekend away
Great peaceful location 
We loved the gorgeous round window

We had an amazing stay at Paul’s place in Potts Point. The apartment was centrally located, and overlooked a beautiful pot with a fountain. The best part about this place is we were able to walk almost everywhere we wanted to go, and Kings Cross station was so very close for our farther exploration trips.  Paul’s place had everything we needed for our stay, and more, including a small desk work space! Everything was just as pictured. The full kitchen had everything we could ask for, and we were able to save a few dollars by cooking in - although the nearby amazing restaurants and cafes definitely drew us in!!! As some others mentioned, the street is a bit noisy, but it honestly did not affect our sleep at all! We were comfortable and thankful for such a beautiful recharging spot before our days exploring Sydney. Thank you, Paul!

Very nice place, cozy and well-equipped. The apartment is close to shopping mall, Royal Botanic Garden, Sydney Opera House, Harbour Bridge, etc. We had a great time there, and we'll recommend it to friends.
Good location, small but comfortable and clean.

Anita was lovely and she really made every effort to provide everything and anything I needed for my stay. The place was lovely and the location was excellent! Maybe could have done with some blackout blinds but it was lovely to hear the sea every morning! Thanks Anita- great place xxx
Very nice experience
The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great place in the heart of Potts Point.

True to the pictures. The space was huge and more than enough for our family of seven. We loved that we could dine together when we liked in the roomy dining area. It was also a short walk down to a lovely Thai restaurant (Chet Thai), a little playground for kids, a small grocery store, and if you have time, walk down to the ferry point and you will be struck awe by the view of the harbour.
Our stay at Michy’s cute cabin was fantastic. Beautiful, quiet, picturesque location; easy communication; great space with thoughtful touches. Best sleep I’ve had in ages! Would definitely recommend
Nice place for living, quiet and peaceful
A perfect little hideaway amidst a beautiful garden & thoughtful host.

Susan is friendly and helpful and the backyard cabin is clean, well-equipped and has a comfortable bed. The planes can be loud and frequent at times, but were not so bothersome that we needed to close the window, and there is a curfew so it doesn't go all night. Angelo the cat is sweet.
Close to Train. Great price. Not a lot of utensils but quite enough for what we needed for our stay.  Would strongly recommend staying at Alice's place as it is nice and simple and clean.

We absolutely loved our time at Leah’s! The location was amazing, super close to the train station so it was a breeze getting around. The place itself was modern, very clean, spacious, had all the amenities you need and more! Would recommend to anyone, thanks again :)

Great week in Eleanor’s comfortable well furnished and welcoming apartment  (accurately presented ) - lots of wonderful little touches -including a generous and well thought out breakfast basket.  
Eleanor was a first class and friendly host  and her information book was a great help .Location was perfect -an easy 5 minute walk to North Sydney wharf - with easy access to Circular Quay and the rest of Sydney
The balcony with a view of Sydney Harbour Bridge, was a great and well used bonus for us 
All in all a great experience for us

We stayed 3 nights at Gavin's flat; it was really convenient because next to the Central station, CBD, Chinatown etc (the place for cheap food).
About the home, the living room and the kitchen form especially a nice and spacious open-space.
We could finally book one more night at the last minute.
Thanks again Gavin for your welcoming and all the lovely "gift" foods, we rediscovered the peanut better thanks to you!
Good size, modern apartment, in a great location and with a helpful host

Great location but do your research first when walking as  (Hidden by Airbnb) maps sent us a very long way round a few times.

Central to great amenities and nice to have use of the pool.

The apartment exceeds the description, perfectly located, clean, well equiped , Linda could not have been more helpful. Redfern is a cool place to stay lots of great and interesting places to eat at and very easy to travel round from. Highly recommend!!
Michele was a lovely host & has a terrific space:)

Wow! Susan and Greg, thank you for being such wonderful hosts in Sydney! We truly felt welcomed and at home in Bronte Beach-- and would recommend your place to anyone visiting-- hands down! The cottage was incredibly comfortable and was the most magnificent starting point for jogs along the beach, brunch at the beach, and short rides into Surry Hills/downtown Sydney for sightseeing and evenings out. Thank you both for the tips and the wonderful hospitality!!
Great apartment.  Great location.  I would highly recommend staying here.

Victoria è un Host perfetto. Ci siamo sentiti molto spesso per cordinare il viaggio. La casa è molto vicina al centro molto pulita e graziosa.  Se dovessi tornare a Sydney sicuramente sceglierò nuovamente questo appartamento.

It was wonderful to be based in such a fantastic location for a long weekend of sunshine in Sydney! Cat was very responsive and helpful with all our requests. The house is clean, very well equipped and suited our family holiday of 3 generations perfectly. We would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a beachside place to stay.

The home was presented to us in a clean & immaculate state, the rooms were very comfortable, the area was quiet so made a sleep in possible. The home is very convenient to the Caringbah Railway Station & the travel time into Sydney was less than an hour.
Also very convenient to the beautiful precinct of Cronulla where you have some wonderful eating places & a lovely beach we did not get to use. This was due to our stay was not a holiday but a visit to a eye surgeon for our daughter.
Couldn't fault the home at all, would go back if required.

We spent à nice stay in Hugo and Pamela's apartment. The apartment well located was comfortable and pleasant with a beautiful view. The host Hugo was very attentive to all our questions and our well being during the stay and very available when needed. Thanks a lot Hugo !!

This place is not at all what we were expecting from the advertising.

It was so unclean (filthy stained carpet and sofa bed, didn't smell nice and obviously previously used bed linen for the spare beds) and small that we had to find alternate accommodation.
I'm certainly not a snob and I'm happy to camp but not one of us could bring ourselves to sleep there even just for one night.  So disappointed!  I have used Airbnb previously and was extremely happy with our choice.

Only positive was the great location but even that couldn't keep us there.

RIchard's house is a pure gem! There is no word to describe how amazing and amazingly located it is! Sleep with the sound of the waves, wake up to an amazing sunrise, go down a few steps and go for a swim, sit down at the front of the house and take in the beautiful scenery... The house itslef is very cute and cosy, the kitchen is very well equiped and the tree house is charming. Mackerel Beach is a wonderful place, and the best is it's only 1 hour from Sydney! Oh I wish I could be there every weekend! Richard is easy to communicate with and arranging, and everything was perfect :)
Amazing location close to the beach and restaurants at Bondi. Apartment is cosy and comfortable.
Would stay again!! Perfect location

Thank you to Yang for letting us stay in your apartment! The location was great for us, 5-10 minute walk to ferry and train which we used everyday. The apartment is just as amazing as the photos indicate! We enjoyed the beautiful scenes of the city lighting up at night time via the roof top garden area! Yang was always available via phone when we needed to communicate and responded quickly. Thoroughly impressed with the apartment and location which we recommend to anyone looking for convince to the city but still far enough away from all the noise.

Suzie’s appartement is really great. It’s clean and very well located. 
Suzie is nice, reactive and will answer to all your questions.
The place was good close to everything,Host was great,iwill come back again.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Susan's for a weekend. The studio was beautifully decorated and had everything we could need for a perfect trip. They had a lovely garden and a beautiful outdoor setting for us to enjoy. Susan and Greg were very welcoming and gave us plenty of advice on the local area. We hope to come back soon because staying here made the trip so much more special.

This is a high quality, furnished apartment about 5-10 minutes walk from some lovely beaches which are often deserted. The top-floor apartment itself is well kitted-out and clean and very quiet. Maree and her husband, who live downstairs, are very welcoming and kind. There is a bus very close to the apartment which takes just under an hour to get into the centre. There is a convenience store down the road.

On the downside, the kitchen is quite small and any cooking is based around plug-in hobs and woks which means that cooking for two was a bit of a challenge, but not impossible by any means. The pool is a reasonable size (not for lengths but for dipping in) but unfortunately was unusable for much of our stay. This was a bit of a disappointment, but the sea is not far away!

All in all, this was a nice stay with lovely hosts and I would recommend it to others.
Great communication again
house is clean and comfortable ,host always be warm welcome and friendly ｡New town is really a wonderful place to enjoy
Always a great stay.
Great place in a fantastic location!
Very good
Fantastic location, great host and spotless apartment.   Perfect

Mohit and his fiance were very gracious hosts. Phone number was provided for easy communication which was highly appreciated. We were a group of three ladies and were very comfortable in the apartment which was clean, modern, airy and close to public transport. And the extra bonus was the pool which we all enjoyed. Glad to recommend and would be most happy to return in the future. Thankyou Mohit.
Wonderful view to wake up to and excellent local knowledge of great restaurants and things to do.

If you're looking for a great place to stay while in Sydney, look no further. We spent a wonderful 10 days at Susan and Greg's place, they're friendly hosts who are available when you need them. Everything has been thought of at this lovely studio, all amenities are there. Just a short stroll from Bronte Beach and the local shopping strip with a couple of great restaurants. A special mention here for Moxhe, try it out if you can. Public transport to Bondi Junction and the city can be found just around the corner.
All in all this place is worth the money and we should like to come back in the future.
Emplacement parfait

Been visiting Sydney for a week's conference in Sydney. Found Gregoire place in strategic CBD location (one step away from Hyde Park and Museum Station) The size of apartment is humongous eventhough the building is kinda old but the Gregoire's unit is modern. The door in shoes room is kinda stuck and cannot be closed. If you are visiting Sydney for leisure or business trip, staying at Gregoire is recommended.
Bell’alloggio in una posizione eccezionale per visitare Sydney

The apartment is great and ideal for a couple.  We spent three nights there and it was ideal because of it's location - huge vibe in King Street - and proximity to public transport. Would definetly stay again.  Thank you Narelle.

Wonderful stay for a large group. Highly recommended.
Thank you

This this home  is located very good area close to everything the home is large, well organized .  The walls could  have been done a bit more in my room but I'm not looking for perfection. I enjoyed myself there.
Great location, close to public transport and comfortable apartment. Millie was a great and welcoming host.

We didn't get to meet Anitta but she answered all our questions before we arrived. The apartment had two comfortable beds and was very quiet at night. We loved the neighbourhood and found it to be delightful. It was easy to take a bus from the airport and into the city. We had a great stay.
Amazing place for a vacation in Sydney! Great location
和善的房东,环境好,位置方便,走路去悉尼国际机场20分钟左右｡
Fei’s Place is a beautiful Victorian stately home in an excellent location, with a modern, well appointed kitchen and Fei is the perfect host.

I had a great time staying at Paul & Judith’s place!  They are very nice and fun to be with. The house and the room  are both clean and filled with character, meaning very comfortable. It’s also close to quite a few restaurants and bus lines. You can make a turn or two and walk for 30 minutes or so and be at the Opera House!  I recommend it highly.

Wonderful space. Self-contained, completely private, simple & stylish, very clean and only a 5 minute walk to the bus which will get you into the heart of the city in 20 minutes. I will definitely try to book here again next time I visit Sydney.
Good communication, lovely view and clean homey apartment !

We checked in for 2 nights stay at Belinda's Cabin and had the most relaxing time. The beaches are within close walking distance and the RSL Club is just a few hundred metres away. The Cabin was extremely clean and comfortable, adequately equipped kitchen and well stocked with books, dvd’s and multimedia equipment for a good quiet weekend and high degree of privacy. A true hidden gem indeed and would definitely recommend for those looking for a quiet and relaxing getaway.
Super helpful, super nice! Have had an exceptionally great time at her place! Thanks for everything.

Although I did not meet Tam, she is an excellent and proactive communicator.  Because of this, our self-sufficient check in went smoothly and we felt supported, although she was remote.  The space is clean, ideal for it's balcony and proximity to Barangaroo, CBC, The Rocks & Circular Quay.  Our stay was comfortable and enjoyable.  Many thanks, Tam!
Great place with easy access to transport and the city. Quiet neighborhood. Wendy is spot on with prompt communcation. TV remote wasnt working proper but I am sure Wendy will sort it out
the location of the apartment is really convenient! Next to the central station. really nice to stay 8 days here! !

If you are wanting to experience living in arguably Sydney’s best neighborhood, look no further than one of Don’s perfectly appointed apartments in Surrey Hills.  Located in a terrace house playfully and surprisingly accurately named after Barbary Lane, the multistory (and multi-storied) complex in Armistead Maupin’s Tales Of The City, you can easily blend into the vibrant local scene.  Shops, restaurants, and nightlife are all within the surrounding blocks; while the major attractions like the opera house and Harbour Bridge are either a short ride or slightly longer walk away.  Both apartments feature outdoor space; well-equipped kitchens and bathrooms; washer/dryer; air conditioning; and designated living, dining & sleeping areas.  Everything was spotless; the mattress was comfortable; and the towels were soft and fluffy. 

Don was the perfect host — excellent communication, there whenever you needed him and yet invisible if want/need privacy.  He even offered to take me and my rather cumbersome bike box to the airport.  On a national holiday, no less!  I would happily stay here again during future trips to Sydney.

What you see is basically what you get.  It is comfortable historic but not luxurious (heritage listing prevents that).  Donna was very hospitable and I had a welcoming cup of tea soon after arrival.  I would happily stay with her again.
Third time we’ve stayed, and enjoyed it again. The kids loved the pool. Check in and check out and communication very easy. Would definitely stay again.

Kate's place was great! I'd definitely stay again.  It was very clean and her roommates are wonderful--very chill and easy to live with.Kate was very considerate of any concerns I had as well and do all she could to ensure I was comfortable.

Mariana's place is a charming Art Deco studio apartment with a lovely mix of restored original features alongside modern, quality comforts. The bed was very comfortable, and the bathroom and kitchen both clean and well equipped.  The apartment is situated in a fantastic location; surrounded by shops, cafes and walks with Kings Cross Station a short walk away. I would highly recommended Mariana's apartment, and would definitely stay again.
Great location, very central. Suzanna was fantastic at giving us some great local knowledge and was very helpful.

Three reasons why you should definitely stay here:
- Perfect location: in a quiet street and yet close to both the city centre and gastronomic paradise Surry Hills. Very well served by public transport too.
- The house itself is smartly renovated, the room and your bed comfortable, and you have your own bathroom and even a terrace!
- You stay with a very attentive host. He seems to be online all the time, replying instantly, which is really practical for bookings or any further questions. And he has just thought of everything, including a charming welcoming package and a booklet with the best local spots to have breakfast, lunch, dinner, a drink...

This has been my first experience with airbnb, and a real good one!

Joseph is a great host.
I had a wonderful stay - 10/10.
Great spot, superb location, super friendly courteous landlord.
I was here in Sydney on work and it honestly felt like an amazing holiday.
Will be back soon
We loved Wendy’s place! Is so comfy and clean, close to everything! 100% you should stay here. Everything what we needed was there. Thank you Wendy for your hospitality, we will definitely come back!
Great stay in the perfect location!

Alice and Richard are very sweet hosts. They were in touch with me from the moment I booked the AirBNB to when we checked out of their place. They welcomed us with a little gift basket of food and kept a little note to make us feel at home. Their hospitality was excellent! I’d highly recommend their Home to anyone!
Great location, excellent kitchen. Bathroom could be improved but otherwise well worthwhile and fair value. Millie is a very good host.

Cath was very warm and welcoming, as were her 3 chickens! The accomodation had everything we could possibly need, even opal cards to use. Fresh bread was waiting at the door on Sunday morning which went down a treat. The studio was snug and warm and I'd like to build one myself, it was very cool! 
5 stars :)
Great location and fair price.

Very convenient location within easy walking distance to the train station and handy to the city.  

Tidy and functional accommodation, good value for money.

Steven was friendly and easygoing and communication was good.

Thanks for having me to stay.

A lovely little place in a great location. We could walk or catch the bus into the city centre very quickly, and buses run to the main beaches from basically outside the door. 

Special thanks for the local tips!
Had a great stay!
Sam's place is close to public transport and Sam was very quick to reply to any questions. The place was clean and cosy.

The house is clean enough and has enough space.  The kitchenware and dishes are dirty and need to be cleaned for a long time. The washing machines always suck with the dust, washing powder... 
The parking area is extremely hard to find and have to use around 10 mins to find the area in the car park. However, the view is perfect which can see the river without blocking.

This is a lovely apartment, in a hotel/serviced apartment building.  For once the pictures really don't do it justice.  The hotel rooms get marked down for being dated in reviews on hotel sites, but this apartment certainly isn't.  It's centrally located: it has Darlinghurst's little strip of restaurants just around the corner, and central Sydney equally close in the other direction.  I was here for a week in March and it (unusually) rained every day, so the 60" UHD Samsung smart TV with Netflix and Stan (Aussie streaming), as well as Apple TV, was particularly welcome, as was the small gym on the roof.  The pool was less useful, but would be great normally.  Desireé is a very friendly host too.  Highly recommended.

This my second time staying at Tim and Mel’s and it was just as awesome as the first time! I had an evening flight and Tim arranged for me to keep my luggage in the apartment until I went to the airport.

Perfectly positioned apartment at the quiet end of Manly beach but still close to everything. We loved spending time on the generous balcony taking in the beautiful view. The two car spaces were super-convenient and the friendly host was easy to deal with. Loved the decor too!
Would book again!

Great Studio, perfect location, had everything we needed. Tracy was lovely, really welcoming. The directions were great, it was easy to find. Would certainly look to book if we ever needed to stay in the area again.

Fantastic location - a beautiful walk along the water to the Opera House and Bridge, countless cafes and restaurants at your doorstep, and a superb Saturday market just across the road, plus only a short walk to the train station to go further afield. We loved the apartment itself too and will definitely return one day!

Millie was a lovely host, super friendly and great at communicating in the lead up to our stay. The studio is really cute, compact and well designed with some nice touches - coffee machine, emergency toiletries. A great stay, thanks!
I had my privacy, quietness, clean and good surrounding area to be in.

とても素敵なお部屋でした!
ｼｬﾝﾌﾟｰなどもあり助かりました!
I truly recommend this place.

We made a last minute booking and although Mal was out of town,  he responded quickly and gave clear direction on how to access the apartment. He was also flexible on check in and out times. The view is amazing, exactly as portrayed in the pictures. We didn't spend much time in the apartment but it is clean and has everything you need to enjoy your stay.  So much to do and great places within walking distance to eat and drink. Only warning would be for those with physical challenges- apartment is on the 3rd floor with no lift.
Great host, fast respond. Place very near Redfern station. House very tidy and comfort.
Beautiful home and Rachel was an excellent host.

Our family group stayed at Heidi's back in 2016 and we all loved it. One of the kids, aged 8, who has travelled the world and stayed in many fabulous places, declared "Oh, I LOVE that house" when he heard we were returning this year. And once again it lived up to his expectations and surpassed ours. The five bedrooms are stunning and the mattresses to die for on the comfort front. The three bathrooms are the epitome of luxury - they have all been completely made over since our last visit and are both beautiful and functional. The pool, the spa, the cubby house, the hammocks, the undercover outdoor area ... the list of features goes on. And to complete the package is Heidi - the most responsive, flexible host you could hope to meet. If you are looking for a space to share and create memories this is it. Book it now. You won't regret it.
Good experience in Sydney, convenient location to the Bondi Beach
Incredible house. Incredible stay! :)
Highly recommended! Great hosts, wonderful light filled property with every little detail considered. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and look forward to the next visit.
Excellent location to cafes, beaches and parks. Very quiet. Only thing when hot or air needed not many of the windows open, there are fans in bedrooms which help. Thanks for the stay.
Great apartment to stay in when attending events at Olympic Park. Plenty of places to eat in the area and quick responses from the host when needed.

This lovely and warm house is excellent ... beachfront, warm home feel, bright, clean, public bus stop is just a minute away. 

The beach is a beautiful one with an ocean pool. So not only dip into it and kids may find it interesting as well.

Kitchen is fully equipped with everything a family may need. 

The host is a kind couple. We were welcome warmly and of course, hope that you are lucky enough like us with a banana cake treat !
Amazing place in a great location. Highly recommend
Great location.  Clean apartment with all the extra things you need in the kitchen, bath, and laundry.  Nice stay.
Clean, cozy and convenient place to stay. Helena is a nice and friendly host.

Bundeena is beautiful. The perfect spot for an easy weekend away from the constant noise of the city. And Belinda and Chris' Garden cottage is a fantastic place to spend time. Stones throw from the beach and beautiful coastal walks, but completely private in a little garden oasis. Birds everywhere. The cottage is fitted out beautifully, with thoughtfulness and great taste. We would love to return. And next time we're hoping for better luck spotting whales!

This place was charming, well kept and spacious with the most scenic views. Wayne and Kate were very accommodating and had thought about all the finer details to ensure we had a lovely visit. 
Would definitely recommend to others.
Good location. Good if you just want someone to sleep.

Great location, tidy and clean modern apartment, very easy access to Darling Harbour area and the inner city. Treat yourselves to lunch at Machiavelli in Clarence street, a three minute walk. Having two separate bathrooms was bonus and view of the harbour from the bedrooms and the living room was lovely. Oriel was excellent with his communication and his check in instructions and the three of us really enjoyed our stay. Thank you!

Stunning! Relaxing, charming, private, secluded and stunning again. A sanctuary. We loved being there and so will you. Although don't go! We'd hate to think it will get booked out. We want to go back! Thanks for having us, Richard. You were a helpful and kind host and we hope to deal with you again. You have a wonderful place!
很好的居住体验,我很喜欢地理位置

Alexey’s place is very nice & clean. I love his two storey place which is close to everywhere. Close to many different kinds of restaurants. I love it coz it’s walkable to China town where you can buy cheap different kinds of souvenirs from Australia. Alexey was very helpful & upfront in answering our queries. Very good host who was very easy to reach out when we have questions. 

Definitely recommendable 100% & definitely will stay again when we decided to go back to Sydney.
Very nice, spacious place close to the beach!  Also very convenient to the bus which we used to travel to the SCG.

A beautiful apartment in a magical setting
If you are thinking of visiting Sydney then Bronte is to be highly recommended as a place to base yourselves and the only place to stay in Bronte is in Susan and Gregg’s stylish and comfortable apartment. 
The room is thoughtfully decorated in a simple modern style and has a great shower room included. It sits within their lovely shady garden and is a hidden gem. 
Great hosts supplying knowledgeable tips for trips and eating - don’t miss Three Blue Ducks or UYen Vietnamese restaurant; Char Rotisserie and Iggy’s Bakery in Bronte nearby. 
Bronte is on the Bondi to Coogee cliff walk and is one of the most beautiful bays - only a short walk from the apartment - though a steep climb back!
A hire car is useful though buses trains and especially the Rose Bay Ferry are easily found. Opal cards give hassle free access to these public transport options to the City - but take the ferry for the best views and experience. 
Your hosts will deliver fresh bedding and often bagels as well as jam and honey for breakfast - though gong out for breakfast and brunch is clearly a Sydney institution given the quality and choice available - Shuk or Lox Stock and Barrel both in North Bondi and Three Blue Ducks in Bronte.

What an incredible sanctuary! We had the best time staying at Angela's beautiful home. Every detail had been thought of to make our stay enjoyable. Angela was a fantastic host and the home was very relaxing in its beautiful surrounds and lovely furnishings.

Anita is a lovely person.  She was very accommodating with check in and check out.  It's quite a challenge with long overseas flights that do not necessarily land or depart at convenient times.  Anita was quick to respond, very helpful in showing me around the neighborhood. The place is sparkling clean and has a brilliant view of the beach. Very comfortable and spacious study in an iconic location.  And a thoughtful host who will help you with anything you need!

Extremely clean apartment inside& out. The hosts Lucy &Ralph are very welcoming.
Beautifully decorated.  A lot of thought has been put into the finer details. There is wifi& (Website hidden by Airbnb) abundance of extra Manchester. Aircon. Anything you need is definitely there. A lovely kitchen with excellent cooking facilities.
The host canceled this reservation 87 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is a very small, private space perfect for one or two people in a secluded, residential area. It is a bit far from public transport as the bus stop is a bit of an uphill walk, but very much doable nonetheless! Xiaowen is great at communication and is fast with responses to any messages or inquiries. I loved that I had my own entrance and bathroom as well as a lot of closet space and great, modern aesthetics. My only things to specify are that guests should bring their own bath towels, and when I first booked this space it was listed as a private unit but it is actually on the side of the house and connected to the main house within the room by a locked door — I could easily hear noise from the kitchen during the morning and day, and the family also occasionally will play a piano that is located very close to the door. Other than that everything was very clean and check-in/out was very easy and convenient!
Great location! Enjoyed our visit.
The host canceled this reservation 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We found the hosts, Wayne & Kate very accommodating.  They were always very quick to respond to our queries and the unit was as described.  Very good position, spacious and comfortable.  The extra touch of a bottle of champagne was a very thoughtful gesture.  Street parking was not a problem.  There is a cafe directly opposite on Tamarama Beach or a short walk through the park to a strip of cafes at Bronte Beach.  Also a nice 15 min walk around the coast to Bondi.
Great place to stay in Sydney at Kings Cross

House is in a stunning location nestled in the hills of Bilgola. 

Really enjoyed the privacy ,light filled rooms and stunning views. 

Would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of Sydney while still being in a central location to access some of Sydney's best beaches.

If you're looking for your own little place while away, this is the place for you. The Garden Studio had all the little things you'd need on a weekend away: a lounge area, a nice little kitchen and bench, a great bathroom and a very comfortable loft.

Being out the back of the house, separated by the courtyard, and accessible through path along the side of the house (bordered by a chicken coup) it  is in a very private location.

Cath was great too! She was there to greet us and left us a hamper to snack on. I would highly recommend this place to anyone!

Everything went smoothly and Wayne and Kate were very easy to deal with. The apartment is stunning, wonderful views of the beach, and although I only spent the afternoon there, my Mum and her friends who stayed over found everything they needed and were raving about the location. I'll be back! :)
Very cosy apartment! Perfect for one or two people for trips! Victoria was a great host and made it super easy to get in contact with!
Great host, charming accommodation and fantastic location close to transport, local shops and many restaurants and cafes. Really quite perfect for couples or single traveller. Highly recommend.
This place is very special and you will never stay anywhere quite so unique. The hosts were so lovely I would recommend this place to anyone
Gavin's house is at the best location of Sydney, close to every thing. Gavin is a really nice guy.

I booked the room from my account for one of my friends and this is his view: 
Actually, I was lucky that I spent my first days in Sydney in Natasa' lovely house. I spent more than two weeks there. As other people here mentioned, you feel that you are in your own house and have freedom for yourself. Alot of movies are provided in living room that you can select among them and watch. Also you can enjoy the lovely kitchen and the terrace. Being completely close to trian station, it is perfect for new arrivals like me. Also, the area is completely close to city center. When Natasa is at home you can enjoy talking with her. Unfortunately, we could not see each other so much since most of that time she was on a business trip. However among afew talks that we had, I enjoyed her manner and kindness. Beside your room, there are two other bedrooms in the first floor that you should share bathroom with them. It was ok and we had no problem. Also because the weather at most time was mild, the lack of airconditioning did not cause a problem. 
Finally, thanks again Natasa

Diese Unterkunft können wir nur bestens empfehlen
Schönes Appartement in einer sehr guten Lage, drumherum sind viele Restaurants und Cafés mit gutem Essen
We really enjoyed our stay at Robert’s beach house. Near beach, comfortable and a gracious very helpful host. We will certainly return for more boogie boarding and swims in the ocean pool.
This apartment is perfectly located and has everything to make a stay comfortable. I loved my time here.
Great location. Lovely hosts. Great accommodation in a lovely character home.
Great location. Good little place

The room is clean, close to the airport, and  to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) has a big bed and is just like its description.
Hernan is a great host, helps you with information about the area, and queries you may have about Sydney.

Millie was a fantastic host! 

The studio located in the perfect spot - super close to the CBD, but not too close from the hustle and bustle as well. It's only a short 5-10 walk from the train station to the apartment, and the streets are well lit at night so it's safe. Studio itself was clean, neat and comfortable.

Will be staying here again if I find myself in Sydney again!
The place is amazing and quite convenient for us. Great hospitality. Quick to respond. Overall, just great.
This is a sweet little central apartment. Great access to transport, entertainment and food!

Great location, great hosts, great apartment. I have nothing less to say than simply great!! about my pleasent stay and warm hospitality by a lovely couple. 
Thank you
Roomy & well equipped studio apartment. Great location! Very close to the Opera House & downtown! Very good contact with host!
Good location. Clean space and comfy for four people.
Lovely apartment in the most convenient location in Sydney.

Neil’s place in Watson’s Bay, is the perfect location for a get away in Sydney. He is easy to communicate with and very accommodating, providing beautiful fresh produce for our stay. 

The house is beautifully furnished, it feels like you are in your own little tropical oasis and then as soon as you step out the front door you are a minute away from the lovely camp cove beach and a couple of minutes walk to Watson’s Bay hotel and the famous Doyle’s restaurant. There are also so many lovely walking tracks along the foreshore that provide you with spectacular views of the city. 

My husband and I had a fabulous time and would highly recommend Neil’s place!

The place was great; clean and quiet with modern and tasteful appointments. Large living/dining space. The location fantastic. Nicole was only a call away and always happy to offer advice when needed. Would definitely be back.
Narelle was a great host

Second time we’ve stayed here, we love this place. Has such a warm and cosy feel. It’s so clean, modern and on trend. beautiful thoughtful touches from Angela the host. Such a gorgeous place, highly recommended.

Really awesome location in the city and super convenient to get everywhere from (it’s minutes walk from Kings Cross Station). There was some noise from construction but as we were out all day it didn’t bother us. Would definitely recommend!
Great spot, amazing location. Craig and Leonie are very nice and very accommodating, make great recommendations.

Apartment is conveniently located within a short walk from Circular Quay. Baggage storage company just down 2 blocks away. Open from 8am - 5pm at a cost of $13. This was handy as we arrived early in the morning and wanted to go to the zoo for the day before checking in the late afternoon. Communication with our host was prompt and they were flexible with check in time. 
The apartment was exactly what I expected.  Very spacious for central Sydney. Opening window to let in fresh breeze. The most comfortable bed I have ever slept in . Better than most hotels.
Absolutely amazing space; close to transport and other services, very clean and comforting. Would stay again and again and again!
Very beautiful garden; nice balance of good hospitality and  privacy as you need. Location is divine. Near beach but away from tourists as you are able to hang out at local strip. Would stay again!

This is my second stay at Mews in Newtown now, first in 14 & this time 7. Both stays have been amazing. Apartment is beautiful, central, walkable to anythign you need and the host wonderful. I stayed for business, and will try and book this apartment as often as I can. Everything I need so conveniently located. Thanks Narelle for having me again!
This is a lovely 2 bedroom apartment on the 11th floor overlooking Sydney's Olympic Park. Plenty of room and nice amenities.

Richard's Mackeral Beach property is a gem! A perfect escape from the city for a weekend. Good for groups, with a well appointed kitchen. Richard was an excellent host keeping in touch regularly and taking great care to ensure we had a great relaxing time at Mackeral.

This property makes no excuses for the fact that it is someone's home in original condition, not a private property dressed up as an alternative to a hotel. Be sure your expectations are clear.

Would not recommend as a three/four bed arrangement but perfectly comfortable as a two bed deal.

Kassandra' communication was timely and clear. The location is good, particularly for vintage clothes and variety of food, and the street is quiet. The back yard is a sanctuary.

Had a wonderful time staying with Hernan and would definitely recommend it to anyone! He's a super friendly, fun  and welcoming guy, going out of his way to help me find the nearest bus and train stations. 

The apartment was spacious and comfortable, and seriously the perfect location! So close to the beach, airport and city. If you're visiting Sydney I would absolutely recommend staying here!

Erika and I had a lovely time staying with Susan (and Angelo the cat) in Sydney. The room itself is quite spacious and very private, being tucked away in the backyard. Susan was generous enough to provide us with a selection of delicious free breakfast options, which was much appreciated, especially by those travelling on a tight budget! There is plenty of free parking in the street and public transport close by. We would definitely stay here again!

David's place was fine.  It was easy to get to from the airport by bus, which stops right outside the cafe shown in the pictures.  As expected, the place has all the basic amenities one needs, and there are lots of restaurants in the area as well as a supermarket.
Absolutely amazing. It was my first time using Airbnb and Cathy made it a wonderful experience. The place was so fresh and tidy. Will definitely stay there again.
Great location and the apartment was perfect for my short stay. Would definitely recommend.

Thanks Philip for providing a really nice design house in a convenient location, we do have a great time. The host is nice and always helpful. The location is really close to CBD and any public transportation. Highly recommend to friends who travel to Sydney with a group of people.

I really enjoyed my stay at Hugo’s apartment. His friend Oliver was incredibly helpful and held our luggage till the apartment was available as well as holding it until we flew out after check-out. The apartment is perfectly located and walking distance to most areas as well as public transport. It is an easy walk to the CBD as well as Oxford St and many restaurants. The fridge was broken however that was not really an issue for us. Would definitely stay at Hugo’s again.

From our initial communication to the day we checked out, we could not fault our stay here.  Nicole was super-efficient with communication, the apartment was perfect for our two week stay and we can't recommend this place highly enough.
The location is perfect, just a five minute walk to the "Central" rail station which is a twelve minute ride from the airport.
Surry Hills is a vibrant neighborhood, with a range of restaurants from coffee and cake to fine dining and everything in between.
Bondi beach is a fifteen minute drive and Circular Quay (for the Opera House and Bridge) just four stops on the train.
Great location and really clean apartment. Paul was a lovely host, met us at check in and was available on the mobile if we ever needed anything. Would recommend it!
Amazing house in a beautiful area of Sydney - thanks so much
House is in a great location and Jeremy very easy to deal with and most helpful. Property could do with a bit of an update although very clean but decor looking tired.
Amazing spot, fun area, fresh space, what a great place to call home for the weekend!
Great location and amenities for a short stay very close to central Sydney. Easy check in and out plus great local shops and eateries

Paul's place is furnished beautifully, clean and looks exactly like in the pictures. And although, we couldn't meet Paul in person, he was a pleasure to interact with over the phone. He was accommodative of our late check out and had a well curated brochure explaining the basics and more of the house and a bit of Sydney.
Located quite ideally to look around Sydney, we enjoyed our stay and would definitely come again.

Susan's cottage is so sweet, compact but with everything you need and nothing you don't need. She is so kind and friendly. We loved staying at her cottage and will miss the birds singing every morning. If you want to be near Bronte Beach, it's just wonderful.
Great place! Great location!
What a fantastic place! Excellent communication and check-in arrangements. Sparkling clean, beautiful and large space, fantastic location, warm and we'll equipped. A++++++
A great place to stay the night. We were on our way from Victoria to Queensland, and Sarah's room was just right for our family. Lots of sleeping options and a great pool for the kids to splash in.

Naveen’s place was amazing and we truly enjoyed her place! We were rarely in the apartment as we were out sightseeing, but definitely a great spot to relax and enjoy the views! Will return again soon!

We had a beautiful time at Angela’s apartment. Everything was exactly as described and Angela went out of her way to provide thoughtful touches including ammenities for the beach and gorgeous fresh fruit, bread and other snacks. The apartment is in a great spot and very easy to get in to Avalon town with many great restaurants and things to do. I would highly recommend this place to anyone!
We loved staying at Lizzy’s place!  The location was fantastic!  The view from the apartment was spectacular!  Super cool Home and we especially loved the boat “couch” in the living room!

Great location with choices for everything you might need (cafes, restaurants, supermarket, transport (bus, rail to CBD), within easy reach.  For walkers, wending your way down to Woolloomooloo, Mrs Macquarie's Chair & Botanical Gardens is a treat.  Vickie's city pad is a comfortable, tidy, pleasant retreat with a lovely view.  The immediate surroundings are excellent, as is the building in which the apartment is situated.

Nice little place, very comfy bed and good shower.  Good job there's air con as it would be very hot without it! Short walk to Petersham station, the Oxford tavern, Nowa cafe which is excellent.  My only complaint would be the triangular window lets in quite a lot of light in the morning and it woke me up! Other than that it's a nice little place.

Perfect location which close to the train station with nice cafe and bar nearby.

Both Neveen and Tristan are very friendly and willing to give useful advise for us when to travel around.

We would love to stay here again whenever we are in Sydney and highly recommend it to all of you.

My partner and I had the most amazing stay at Blissful Bronte, it’s a stunning, sparkling clean and spacious apartment minutes walk from incredible beaches and cafes. The apartment is very private and comfortable and has everything anyone would need.  
It’s close to everything, we walked to both Bondi beach and Bondi junction. 
Iv stayed in many air Bnbs in Sydney and this will be the only one we will book from now on.
Can’t wait to return!! Thanks Jenny :)
Nearby to airport (we were able to walk to the international), clean and tidy and flexibility with checkin
It’s really near China town!Good location!

Lovely clean apartment a few mins walk from beach. However the owners are there all the time, sleeping in room next door. If you want a private getaway, perhaps not the best place as there is no opportunity for privacy at all. Bring your eye mask unless you like waking up with birds as the room is full of light with no curtains.

Susan was extremely hospitable welcoming Katie and myself to her beautiful B&B studio. We enjoyed  breakfast in the sunny private garden and the recommended cafes and restaurants in Bronte and close by Coogee. Our stay was topped off with the fantastic costal walk through to Bondi beach. 

Would highly recommend.

Thanks a bunch Susan!

Graige & Leonie gave us a friendly reception and accommodated our early arrival. They are excellent hosts and make you feel welcome and relaxed.  The place is in a superb location being only few minutes walk to Bondi Beach which is well serviced with transport to Sydney every 10 minutes. 
We loved having breakfast in their peaceful backyard listening to the bird-life in the mornings. The area is nice and quiet considering its handy locality to everything Bondi offers. Overall an excellent stay with a good sized bedroom and own bathroom. Highly recommend ! Judy & Lawrie (NZ)

The unit is exactly as described and it is excellent. In the heart of Newtown but still really quiet inside and very comfortable. The apartment was very well maintained and we really enjoyed staying there. Thank you.

Fantastic apartment! 
Clean and tidy, good price, great communication from host and within walking distance to Anz Stadium and Quodos Bank Arena...
Highly recommend Nicole’s place! Will stay again without any hesitations
Great location, extremely clean and easy check-in. Highly recommend
It was really nice.
If you have a big family, it’ll be great value for money.
Great as always! A++

We stayed with Michele for one night in September 2018. The room is within their home, but has its own private entrance and bathroom. The guest area is only separated from the hosts home by a curtain (there are doors on both the bedroom& bathroom!) although it is still very quiet and private. Michele is a great host and has set the space up well with a comfortable bed, nice towels & linen and tea and breakfast cereal provided. The location is great - a very quiet back street but only a few minutes walk to the bars and restaurants of Newtown.
It was nice to stay
Very clean room in a convenient location. Thanks for the tips on how to get to the quay!

L'appartement de Linda est parfait, très bien situé et au calme dans un beau quartier de Sydney avec tout ce dont on peut avoir besoin à proximité : métro, restaurants, supermarchés, jardins. L'appartement lui-même est grand et agréable avec plusieurs balcons... Tout est comme sur les photos. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Linda mais elle a répondu rapidement à toutes nos questions et a fait de son mieux pour rendre notre séjour encore meilleur. 
Sydney est une grande et belle ville et ce lieu est un point de chute idéal pour la visiter.
Was a very enjoyable experience. I felt very at home in the house. Will stay there again.
Xiaowen was very prompt with her responses and was very friendly! Would recommend!
Stayed here with work colleagues as we all got our own rooms and bathrooms. Would highly recommend as its in a great location, clean and as described. Thanks!

We had the most amazing time at the lovely home of Javier! They made us feel like we were just at home and it was so central we could reach everything in 5 minutes. Eventhough we were a little late you guys were so laid back and easy going that we experienced the surfinglife exactly like it is. Thank you guys so much for everything! It  was such a blast to stay at yours!!!!

Good location, easy to find, just 20min driving to the rocks, the house is clean and comfortable, Rachel always give me very clear and detail answer to all my questions, all my friends enjoy staying in Rachel's house very much, thanks a lot for everything you do for us

Steven was lovely from the start & helped me bring my bags in and offered me some fresh strawberries from his garden which I thought was quite nice! The place was quite spacious and on a hot day it still felt cool inside. There was beautiful art around and the location was central. It was easy for me to find a parking spot as well. Even though it was at the back of Steven's place, I still feel like I had a lot of privacy. It was easy to catch a $20 uber into the city (although the train station is close if that's what you prefer). I'd definitely recommend staying here!
Very well located and Yoco was  answering and available if you needed something.

Thankyou so much for having us! The place was beautiful and clean! Also, the host was so lovely and friendly :) This apartment was also so close to everything you need. I will definitely be staying here everything I come to Sydney!

Amazing appartment with a stunning view. The pictures on the profile are accurate, you cant stay much closer to the beach than this. 
The appartment is well equipped, spacious, clean and his free WIFI.
There is a bus stop just outside the door which makes it really easy to commute to the city and back. 
Though Bondi can be really busy at the weekends the appartment is not in the middle of the "party section" which gives you peace and quiet when needed. 
Mal was the perfect host who was always quick to reply via messages or App to any questions we had. It was even possible to have a later check out as we were flying out late. 
We had an amazing stay and couldnt have asked for more !! Highly recommended to anyone !!!

Absolutely brilliant experience from the second I arrived to the second I left.
The apartment is beautiful and immaculately clean.
Suzie met me upon arrival around 7am and was so helpful in orientation and advice of the area.
The location is ideal- 5 minutes to the centre of the CBD.
This is my favorite Airbnb house and host so far and would absolutely return to stay again on my next trip to Sydney!!
Thank you Suzie!!
Amazing apartment and close to everything. 15 min walk to Darling harbour and 20 mins to the local Ferry. Great location.

Very Clean and tidy place. 
Great communication. 
Will use again and again.
Great place to stay! Clean, modern, comfortable bed, Netflix included. Perfect stay. Thanks again!

I really enjoyed my stay at Don's well appointed, comfortable and quiet inner city pied a terre. Really great location and had everything I needed. Don was a courteous and pleasant host. I would definitely stay again!
Beautiful space, stylish and great location. Awesome hosts always quick to respond and happy to help
Very lovely host and well equipped studio, only 10 min drive from Manly

The perfect experience for our first Airbnb stay!  Friendly and effortless welcome with all of the info we would need to immediately feel right-at-home.  Secure parking right outside our door and beautifully private.  The room and facilities were immaculate and very well appointed, conducive to a very relaxed two weeks which my wife and I thoroughly enjoyed.  Our host was always available for queries and a chat but never obtrusive.

Avalon should be on your to-do list when visiting Sydney with world-class beaches on one hand, beautiful Pittwater on the other and  boutique shopping and all the facilities one could require in between.  Conveniently situated within easy reach of all of these, Cathy's cosy room is an ideal retreat, cool and quiet on a hot afternoon with the sound of birds and the breeze in the tall gum-trees to enjoy as you unwind.

We look forward to another visit in the not-too-distant future, knowing that our stay would be just as pleasant and fulfilling as the time we have already enjoyed there!
Gregoire' apartment is very well located and clean.  Excellent place to stay for a few nights.  Highly Recommended.
The location is excellent - so close to the wharf and the beach. The apartment is comfortable and quiet and has everything that you need.
We were very impressed with the hospitality and homely feel of this lovely little studio.
This listing is very spacious and a walkable distance from Broadway Shopping centre. Communication with Elise was fantastic and she was fast to respond. Overall this listing setved its purpose well.
We had a wonderful stay and will hopefully be back soon.
Leslie was zeer behulpzaam en erg vriendelijk, locatie is fantastisch met een prachtig uitzicht op de haven....

Great place in a great location. 
Messaging chair is definitely a big plus, especially after long walk in the city
非常好的房东 在门口迎接我们 介绍了房子的所有功能 用品 房子简直就是一个小别墅 一层厨房 二三层 地下一层各有一个房间和一个卫生间
Hands down the best air B and B I've stayed in highly recommend to anyone great location next to the park easy to get to the city. Clean and comfortable as well

Nice littke spot close to cafes and CBD.  Jack and Hayley were very accomodating and the coffee machine was a god send force army morning starts.  Don't need a car when staying here at all.  Great location.

An inviting space in a central location. Millie's apartment was bright, airy and eclectic. With views of the city overlooking the harbour bridge, it was in close proximity to Kirribilli shops, Milsons Point Station and North Sydney wharf. Would definitely recommend for tourists seeking a base to explore Sydney or locals for a weekend away :)

We had a great stay in the house and it’s in a great location. We had a car and found parking on the street easy and the house is just a short 5min walk to the beach. Our 17 month old loved the park by the beach and the playground. The house itself is very modern and the bedrooms are filled with light but they also have good blackout blinds which we appreciated. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a beachside escape in Sydney.
The house is very close to CBD and darling harbour and is very quiet. The house was sparkling clean and duncan and ashlee are very amicable

We had an event with 20 people out on the patio during the day  and then in then stayed in the train overnight afterwards. 
Such a great day! So much history and train has been beautifully restored! Such a lovely place!

The flat is nice and matches the photographs perfectly with everything one might need. The awesome extra is the pool and hot tub which really help you unwind at the end of the day. The hosts, while never met personally, were organised and clearly take their 'job' to heart.

Hi! The stay at Wyatt's house was amazing (: I had such a lovely time there with my boyfriend, he's helpful and provide tips and where to go. The room are very comfortable and it's the best place to stay if you're looking for something cozy, definitely will choose this place again the next time!

Bill is nice and patient. He made a very useful information booklet for all customers, including all kinds of travel information you need!
The house is more amazing than the photos on website. You won't be disappointed!

My mom and I had a fantastic time.  Cath is an absolutely wonderful host and the place is lovely, super clean, relaxing and you get your privacy.  Street parking is free!  Do note that climbing the ladder might be slightly tricky, specially if you are slightly tipsy.  Ha ha.  Very happy with my stay and highly recommend the cute garden studio.  

Both my mom and I had a great time in Sydney.
I had a great experience! I found the place very easily, and Hernan was very nice and helpful! I really recommend this place!

The property was exactly as presented, immaculately clean and relaxing upon arrival. Beautiful open space and only a short walk from the main road. Little extras like quality bathroom products and comfortable beds made a huge difference. We will definitely be back.

멋진 장소입니다. 멋진 시드니의 경치를 경험하세요. 아침과 저녁 페리를 타고 다니는 경험 또한 놀라운 경험입니다.
다만 가방이 무거운 사람들은 조금 힘들수가 있어요. 페리에서 내려서 언덕과 계단을 올라가야 하고, 아파트 계단을 올라야 합니다. 짐이 많은 사람들은 체크인과 체크아웃을 할때 우버를 이용하심이 좋겠네요.
Our second stay with friends such a great location . Nice large ,roomy and well set out Terrace house . Thanks again Jeremy
是一次很好的住宿体验,全新的高层公寓楼｡环境优美,也非常的干净｡爸爸妈妈来悉尼这几天住的很舒适｡

사진보다 실제 공간이 더 넓은느낌이어서 예상보다 좋았습니다. 쇼파베드도 생각보다 편해 큰 불편함이 없었습니다. 주변에 괜찮은 식당도 많고 나쁘지않은 숙소입니다. 단점이라면 수압이 약해서 샤워할때 조금 불편했어요.  There was a problem(it's not Eleni's fault) and she try her best to solve it. She is kind host:) The house is lovely, and there are lots of fancy restaurants around this place. Moreover, the house is bigger than I expect.
It couldn't be better located. Bars, restaurant, shops surround the place. And 20 min walking distance from Opera House. It's very convenient. I had an amazing stay !!!
Wonderful hosts that went out of their way to make our stay a good (Website hidden by Airbnb) of the best Airbnb experiences ive ever had

We have great  time in Sydney, this accomodation is very well located.
I'll recommand it to my friends.
Thank you.

Nice location and very close to the bus station,  ten mins to CBD. We was really enjoying our stay. The house is so cool ! Especially it's fantastic interior design. The room was super comfortable! We love everything here!  Definitely will book again!!!

This apartment was in an amazing location with beautiful views. It was as described, had everything we needed and was nice and spacious. Everything was so close by, with so many lovely beaches to visit and a pool to swim in when we just felt like lazing about.

Evelyn was a great host. Her family lived upstairs, but you wouldn't even know they were there. Thank you for having us, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Great unit in a fantastic location. Was EXACTLY what we had hoped for and Ziggy was flexible in meeting us to let us check-in a few minutes early.  Wonderful stay and highly recommend!

Susan made us feel at home with plenty of information about the area and we had a few lovely chats under the mulberry tree. We really appreciated the breakfast spread! The apartment is great for exploring the Bondi-Coogee coast and provides a tranquil space close to the beach and related activities.
Nice cool place for summer and very clean

Michele's place was as described, very clean, great that it had its own kitchenette for coffees and cereals/fruit provided which was a lovely touch. Wads a great location for us and private access to the street. Would recommend this air bnb to others.  A++
The host canceled this reservation 65 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Perfect location, postcard view, and a great feel to the place. Mal's communication was spot on, we would definately come back again. Marc, Hamish and Sophie

Thank you for having us. 
Will definitely recommend and stay again
Very basic but great value for money if you spend most of your time out and about. Host was lovely and accomodating.
Ich hatte eine feste Buchung diese wurde aber am Abend vorher grundlos storniert
The premise was clean and well maintained and is located in a very strategic area near to Sydney tower eye. Give you a flavor of 'living in an apartment of Sydney CBD'. Highly recommended.
PEICE AN OUITE IHOPE DEVELOPERS NEVER FIND TH IS PART OF GODS COUNTRY
Great location. Amazing host. Made my trip perfect!
the house is clean and well stocked with furniture plenty of beds and seating.

We thoroughly enjoyed Sarah's accommodation.   We were made to feel very welcome.  The room was very clean, spacious and we enjoyed the doors opening out to the pool.  Was nice to be away from the busy city but only a 15min drive from restaurants and shopping in Parramatta.

Very nice and clean place with all the facilities...very kind hosts...10 min walk from  redfern station and wil hav to climb stairs( no lift) ...loved staying at ur place and definitely would like to be back again
No comment
Anitta was great host. Very accomodating and helpful. Her place was very quaint and ideal for couples.
Lovely atmosphere amongst the trees. Quiet and peaceful while close to most things. Will definitely keep this one in mind for next visit.
Looking for a cheap, clean, central place to stay? This is the one for you. Gregiore’s team will help you with anything you need. Keep up the good work guys :)
The apartament is located in a quiet neighbourhood next to the city center and Elise take care of her guest perfectly.
Apartment was clean, well equipped and in a good location with bus stops nearby and a 8min walk to the pier.

What a great place to stay and explore Avalon. The apartment was very welcoming, even better than the photos, with every little consideration covered. 

The outdoor patio was perfect to sit and relax with a cheese plate and wine. 

Angela and Geoff made us feel very at home, and allowed us the privacy to enjoy the weekend away with our kids. Angela also made the extra effort for our kids to enjoy the break - plenty of toys and books and even offered a cot and highchair.

We will be back!

Billie and Molly have a great apartment with a cosy feel. Located in a very quiet spot and only 5 min drive from Avalon beach. Close to the shops and everything you need. Thanks for having us! 

Alex & Jo
Cedric was a great host. Easy to deal with. The accommodation was enjoyable as per expectation. Will book again when back in town.
Great and comfortable stay!
Directions how to get to the apartment were good and check-in was easy. Great location.

I would highly recommend booking this house for a group of people. All the amenities you could possibly need, seperate bungalow out the back and fantastic location. Cat was very happy to answer any questions you need and quickly aswell.
Great experience, friendly hosts, lovely part of North Bondi

Besides the location is very convent not only near the city center but also surrounded by 2 Coles market. This is the most fantastic and lovely experience I ever had.
Paul and his family are very good at taking care of their guests, they prepare milk, honey, orange, cereal for us. During the 2 weeks, they just treat us as same as a part of the family, inviting us to their festival dinner, introducing us to their best friends. Every morning they would ask if it was a good sleep. Every evening, they would say good night before we go back to the room. 
If ever I will go back to Sydney again, this would be my only choice. 

这是我在Airbnb中最最满意的一次住宿体验｡
不仅仅这个地理位置很好,去市中心,悉尼歌剧院,门口的公交车直达｡而且周围的配套设施齐全,十分方便｡
Paul一家人待客非常之好,如若对待家人｡一直给我们买牛奶,橙汁,谷物,蜂蜜等等｡尽可能地提供信息帮助我们｡
只要去悉尼,对于住处,这永远会是我的第一,也是唯一的选择｡
Leena’s a great host, she replied very quickly and the house can accomodate up to 6 people comfortably.
Great place, easy to find and very central

Great place to stay - Casandra and David had everything organised for us and communicated everything very well. Very easy check-in and check out. Central to shopping centres, restaurants and public transport. Uber into town approx $20, which was very easy.
I like the neighborhood and the house is very comfortable to stay in. will definitely recommend my friends to stay in.
A quiet, comfortable apartment. Ian responds immediately to contact which I found very helpful.
Great location. Apartment exactly like pictures. Perfect for two people and nice and clean. Great communication.
Very clean house on leafy quiet street, a few minutes walk from many shops and restaurants
Great place to stay when I come to Sydney

I just love Gail’s place and Malabar is such a relaxed part of the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney ... 
The perfect spot to stay in every way.
Wonderful location , hassle free check in and check out :(

A good few days once we arrived although we dealt with Chen and the phone number on the listing does not relate. A bit dated but provided everything described. My husband was getting spiked by the couch in the living area but just had to be careful. It is in walking distance to the Wharfs and the city bus tour bus stop is close by with tickets being purchased on the wharf
Extremely good location and very friendly responsive host. Very tidy apartment. Parking space on the street can be hard to find but a Wilson carpark is almost next door.

Location and the appartments foyer was the highlight. The apartment itself was a little older than expected, the city views were not as shown.
Hosts communication was friendly and check in was painless.
Great place & good hospitality

We very much enjoyed Susan and Greg's Bronte B&B.  The location was ideal for beaches and the coastal walk.  There were also neighborhood shops and restaurants within an easy walk.  We appreciated that beach towels and breakfast were provided.  We also appreciated their flexibility about check out when our plans changed.  The studio is just like it looks in the pictures and the garden is a very peaceful place to wake up in.  We recommend to anyone looking for some quiet, peaceful time in a great area.

The airBNB place was a great find. It was really clean, comfortable, quiet & very convenient for the training location (Addison Street Community Centre). Steve, the host, knew the local area well and recommended a number of shops/cafes in the area.

This was my first airbnb and I can hardly put this property into words. The place was clean and comfortable and the view from the balcony was amazing. Waking up in the morning and hearing the horses clip clopping around Randwick racecourse was special and unique. Oliver was super accomodating and he was a great host. I was only there for a night but will definitely stay again!
Great place & location

We loved our stay here.  The flat is very comfortable and the location, perfect.  The web photos don't do it justice.  The street itself is extremely quiet yet within a short walking distance to shops, restaurants and good public transport.  We also found the place had an ideal weather aspect and always attracted a nice breeze.  Mags was a very efficient host from start to finish.  We were sorry to leave and look forward to a return visit.

Sam‘s place was very close to the CBD, all the famous place, like Darling Harbour ,Sydney Opera House, 5 or 15 minuets can be arrived by walking. And Sam was a very nice host, all the things was very clean. Thanks very much, it’s a very nice traveling in Sydney.

Cathy was a very nice and communicative host that helped us with some awesome and important tips and had many things to recommend in the area. Her place was only a 10 min. walk away from Avalon beach and an 15 min. drive to the gorgeous palm beach. The room was beautifully decorated and clean.

Our experience staying at Lina's Kingswood property was very positive. The newly-built house is well-appointed and true to the online listing. Lina and her family are friendly welcoming hosts who were eager to help make our stay as comfortable as possible. I would readily stay here again in future.

Judith an Paul are awesome hosts. We deeply appreciated they stay in there charming and pretty well maintained house. They served fresh baked bread every morning and we celebrated our coffee at the cosy terrace. Judith and Paul are quit entertaining and warmhearted people. We highly recommend to stay with them. JUST GREAT!

The apartment is very well-located, comfortable, cool and well-equipped. Narelle ensures everything runs smoothly and easily. I stayed five nights, and the apartment is equally well-suited to shorter or longer stays, with everything guests might need. The local neighbourhood is terrific. The apartment is located on a busy road in a bustling area, but the sound-proofing is excellent, so you have the benefit of being in the middle of a lively local scene while the apartment is calm and quiet. Recommended.

I needed a house for 6 of my operators as we were working nights at the Sydney Airport. We booked with Marcella as the location was perfect, we had a few hiccups with our start date on the run way and Marcella was nothing but a delight to deal with, she accommodated us the best she could and it is very much appreciated. We needed to add additional nights onto our stay and this was not a problem. Marcella is a amazing and from the feedback from my operators (6 men) the house is fantastic.
We as a company and myself as an individual will defiantly book with Marcella at the City Surf Sun & Sand again.
It's always a pleasure staying with Hernan, he welcomes his place with open arms. I have stayed here a few times now. Will defiantly come back when I need to.
This apartment is fantastic. Great host, great location, we will definitely be back!

Shaun is a really Nice guy, me and my girlfriend are pleased To meet him, he is obliging.
Nice first impression of australia.

il parle aussi très bien français pour aider les frenchies a leur arrivé. vous ne pouvez rêvé meilleur hôte !
The house was really new and very nicely decorated. Everything was there, and the location was convenient for shopping and transportation as well. The host was really informative and helpful.
