House was neat. 'Pet Friendly' only means animals are allowed outside, not inside. Made things difficult, and I had known this, I would have booked elsewhere.

The apartment was great, just like the photos. It was lovely to have the balcony too - it gave a sense of space. Furnishings were very comfortable. We cooked most nights and the kitchen had everything we needed but we were very central to many restaurants if we wanted. Highly recommend.

We loved staying for a few days at Rachel's exquisite home.  It is in such a great location, with a excellent providore up the road, and a 3 minute walk to the Military Road to catch a 15 minute bus ride into the CBD.  The house was clean and tidy and spacious for 5 of us. Rachel was very helpful, especially in giving directions and quick in her replies.
Great location! A short walk from the Opera House. Clean, easy check-in and great communiation. Too easy

Great place in a very handy spot. 
Paul made things very easy in terms of checking in etc. 
I’d recommend this place to a friend.

Amazing location and stay. Better than the pictures. Really nice sunny backyard and very private. Inside furnishings and bed were five star and super close to cafe and headland walk. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and our the owners were lovely. Highly recommended!!!!

Received by Lea at the house. Guided us well. Very Friendly Host.
Made us fell at home during entire stay. Craige has excellent sense of humour.  Very considerate as well. Could not have been better

I stayed for DJ for 2 and a half weeks.
The pics are accurate, the place is immaculate and clean and quiet, the location is incredible, and DJ was very helpful. I must admit found the layout of the guest bathroom odd...you have to walk down the stairs and kind of go through the lounge to get to it. Some people may be comfortable with that. I wasn't. 
One negative, and it was a big shock with me being from London, was that I came home one day and there were tons of tiny spiders on the wall of my room, that must have come in from the patio. I managed to spray as many as I could, but I must have missed a few as the following few days I kept seeing bigger and bigger spiders in the room. I told DJ about it and he cleaned the dead spiders and spray off the walls, but really what should have happened is that the room should have been fumigated the next day, or I should have recieved some kind of compensation.
I guess spiders are not seen as a big deal in Australia. 
So overall good, except for the spiders.
The host canceled this reservation 137 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great Place and Great Host!
Definitely recommend staying here!
10/10!

Laura was an incredibly helpful host, While i was staying there the power went out and she kept in contact with me throughout the day with updates on when it would be back on. 
The apartment was really clean and spacious. I will defiantly stay here again if im ever in need of a place to stay in Mosman.

Thank you for sharing your home. The privacy was outstanding with check in greating only but available if needed.
We loved your towels and linen, they were a very nice touch.
Your view was priceless and the atmosphere was very relaxing with a touch of luxury.

I stayed in Millie's place with my wife through our short visit to Sydney, and it was a delight. The place is a walking distance to the restaurants and cafes in Kirribilli, and a one train station away from the city. The station is almost 7-minute walk from the building. Millie did her best to make us feel at home. She provided us with many goodies for breakfast, and made sure we get entertained through her movie and game collection.

I would definitely recommend Millie's place for anyone visiting Sydney, and I would check it out for availability next time I'm planning to visit.
Fabulous, big and stylish apartment with nice furnishings and great view. Nicole was very easy to deal with and very quick to respond to any queries. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Great location, clean and cosy. Super amenitiies, highly recommended.

Great location to live the Newtown lifestyle. Just 5 min away from all type of services, train station is just 10 min away, and just 4 stops to get to downtown Sydney. If more than 4 people, and someone has to sleep in the coach, the cat can be a bit annoying during the night, she will wake you up when hungry ;). We had a great stat though.

We loved the place, it has everything.
The walk to the beach was 10 minutes and we didn’t have a problem with that except that it was hard going up the hill for my mother on the way back to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) mother just turned 90 and it would help if we knew about this in advance. We got a car from a relative and we solved the problem.
Thank you Sacha, you were a great host and we enjoyed our stay very much
It's clean , close to everything ,best place to stay and highly recommend  it to anyone visit in Sydney  :)
Thanks Michelle. Your home is beautiful. Love the new bathroom. Very comfortable bed. Really enjoyed the coffee/ tea and breakfast. A wonderful gem. I hope to come back.
Meillä oli erinomainen viikko Sydneyssä. Kohde oli hyvällä sijainnilla ja trendikäs.

I was in Sydney for 5d4n with my family and stayed at Gavin's apartment. Gavin was very helpful in replying all my messages as when I required his assistance. The check in process was rather easy and straight forward if you follow the steps in his message accordingly. 

The apartment ticked all the basic requirements in terms of comfort and amenities. It was such a hot period whilst we were in Sydney and the strong air conditioning unit and the stand fan in the apartment was a total life saver! However I must give a thumbs up to the location as it was walking distance to the Darling Harbour, QVB, Pitt street mall, Martin place and also just less than 10 minutes walk to Wynyard train station. Gavin allowed us to check in early and also leave our baggages after check out time which was really helpful as we would not need to carry our luggages every where we go.

My family which consist of 4 over 50 year olds has no complain whatsoever on the apartment. It's their words that "the apartment is good."

Overall, I must say, I would totally recommend Gavin's apartment. It has ticked all my requirement boxes when it comes to finding a place with good location and comfort :)
Superb location, funky artistic unique huge space...  makes you want to come back... again and again..

Wonderful home and lovely hosts! A beautiful location near to the hospital, beach and airport. Many restaurants within a 10minute stroll. Will definitely be staying with Ang and Coby next time I'm in Sydney!!

Mike was friendly, very helpful and easy to communicate with. The apartment is such perfect location for whoever wants to spend a bit of time visiting Sydney - with a awesome view up there! We had a lovely weekend, and now are in love with Potts Point :)

Everything was perfect and also the host was really really nice
They had everything prepared. I recommend others this place :)
Great to place to explore sydney. Very close to Circular quay and all major sites. Nice and clean appartment
Amazing place, great location, perfect weekend getaway spot. Great hosts!

I had the most delightful holiday thanks to Jenny. She really did make the difference, and went above & beyond the call of duty to ensure I was comfortable & happy.She was helpful without being intrusive, and by far exceeded any experience I’ve had with any other Airbnb Host’s I have met/ dealt with to date. The place itself is very comfortable and certainly exceeded my expectations.I would quite happily stay at Blissful Bronte again . Thanks again for your amazing hospitality Jenny.

Warm regards,

Harrison

Don’t book this house. It is incredibly dirty full of insects all over the bedrooms, kitchen, and toiltet. My family and me are VERY dissatisfied with this house. Really bad. We tried to contact the owner but they are not polite at all
Very comfortable bed, great hosts, private room in a great house
Great place with a nice vibe. Loved the location.
Good place to stay and booking. Very neat and tidy.
Very cozy room. 5 minutes walk to the train station and 3 minutes walk to bus stop. The King st is a perfect place for shopping. We had a good time here. Thank you Miss D.
great location, nice bedroom, quick response

It was an awesome stay. The place is beautifully decorated and it looked totally the same in the photos. It was clean, neat and nice hospitallity by David. The place is very near town, walking to the stations was so easy.  Overall I love the stay and thank you for the stay and holding you up on the first night : ) Awesome! I will come back again.

The apartment is nice and perfect for city stays. 

My disappointment came when my 70yr old parents we kept awake all night from major reconstruction. Bins are also collected at 130am from outside the apartment. We were not told this was happening.

My mum recleaned on moving in. The dust on top of units and cupboard and under the bed was terrible. Expect a light clean and sheet change on arrival

My parents left 4 nights early and i moved onto my couch. 

No response when feedback was given after stay. 

I would recommend the apartment when Sydney tram works is complete in 2018.
Great location with warm host!

Susan was very hospitable even before we arrived at her place.  She was very thoughtful to contact us to provide information needed to get to her place.  Susan also provided suggestions for dinners and cafes to hang out around the Bronte area.  She even provided options for vegetarian!   The studio is exactly what you see in the pictures with a lovely garden.  While we had to walk pass the main house to get to the studio, it was very private at the back of the house and even your own garden.  My only regret was the weather, that it was too cold on the days we were there for us to hang out in the garden to enjoy our wines :)

Great location - really close to the beach & bus. Clean, tidy, great decor & Fresh flowers were a great touch.

Brendan was a gracious host and fun to chat with. Made my stay very comfortable.
Excellent property! We loved how central it was. Perfect for a family getaway. Can’t wait to come back! Matt and Philip are fantastic hosts
La vista desde el balcon es espectacular. Muy buena ubicacion
Clean and modern home with wonderful communication. Thanks

Thankyou Eleni for providing such a wonderful unit.  It was perfect for our requirements, exactly as the photos showed,  in a very good location and the construction noise that you advised us of was minimal and did not impact our stay at all.  Many thanks.

Really great host, very informative about local restaurants etc. 
The apartment is close to Kings Cross train station, and a walkable
distance to the CBD. 
It is as described, small but clean, comfortable and has everything you need for a base whilst traveling around Sydney.

they are really good host who cares guest. Carol and Ian, they always cares about you 

The location is perfect to go anywhere in sydney. Hype park, surry hills, town hall, and so on. 

Plus, the apartment area is quite queit at night. so no worry about noisy sounds! 
I definitely recommend this house for all people :)
Clean and quiet place as described.
Ian was a very good hostess. Her apartment is really nice. The neighborhood is safe and beuty.

Everything is well prepared, comfortable beds, functional kitchen, tiny bathroom, air-conditioner and TV provided. Just a little noisy when cars pass. Checking in is easy. Good location for walking to fish market and Chinatown.

Annie’s apartment was fantastically well located in a hip and central region of Sydney, walkable to most major attractions and public transit to those beyond walkability. Additionally, it was clean, well-stocked, and Annie was an affable host who met us on arrival to help us get settled and remained in contact and nearby had any issues arose. Thanks for a great stay- would be happy to stay again in the future!

Casey and Larry immediately made me feel at home. They are warm, generous and kind.  The room is private, spacious and clean and well located.  Whether you have either a busy or relaxing trip planned you are able to enjoy it at your own pace. Time spent with Casey and Larry is also a delight.
We had a fabulous stay and Gavin was extremely accommodating and made our visit extra easy for us. Thanks so much Gavin!
This is a perfect getaway beach house. The beach is right below the house and at night there is a warm jacuzzi to relax. Highly recommend to stay at this house if with a huge family!
Cassandra and David’s place was super nice! So clean and modern, great location and they were very swift with their responses to me.

A lovely apartment in a great location for easy walking access to the main harbour sites and good public transport links to other areas. Comfortable for the 3 of us with a sunny kitchen area. Really enjoyed our stay here.

Staying with Susan was lovely, she was incredibly helpful. The room was very tidy, gave us our own space and had everything we needed. Public transport links and nice cafes were all only 5mins walk away. Thank you Susan!
Nice house
This place was brilliant- lovely hosts and a great little pad to escape. Definitely will stay again
Great location with many attractions within a walkable distance. Well organised and responsive host.
Listing and photos accurate. Clean.

Duncan is a great host, although we didn't meet, he made sure that everything was alright.
The apartment is very clean and lovely, as in the photos! 
Thank you Duncan!

By the bay is a fantastic place in a beautiful location. Maree is a great host and we loved our stay from day 1. 

Ps: There is a great Cafe 200m down the road.

We really enjoyed our recent stay at Newtown Mews. Great location, very clean, several clever uses of space, and nice amenities. We loved the neighborhood and the apartment and would highly recommend to others!

This is my second ten-day stay with Krythia.  The space is
very comfortable  with great private bathroom and the
area is lovel.y within walking distance of excellent public transport to the city and also  beautiful Balmoral Beach.  Krythia is always most helpful & accommodating. Highly re ommend.
Great location, neat, tidy and extremely comfortable. Top spot!

Location of the apartment is a short walk to Central Station. The accessibility saves us a great deal of travelling time. 

David was quick to response to my queries and I really appreciate that. Instructions from the host was very clear and checking in was a breeze. 

We had a great stay.

My experience was great! Karen is too hospitality and the best yoga teacher I ever had. The flat clean and ordered, really close to Bondi beach and others points of interest. Surely I'll know where to go when I'll come again in Sydney.
Thank you Karen for the beatiful experience.
Great location, very easy to navigate and perfect for a couple. Thanks for a great stay.
Believe all the positive reviews, great place to stay and check out Oliver's recommendation for Chester white!

The weekend away was amazing. The accommodation transported us back in time,  the whole carriage is fascinating. Outside, the walking tracks and friendly dogs were a highlight. Margaret's tips on bushwalks and local spots added to the perfect weekend getaway.
Lovely little place, all the amenities you need and a very cute, friendly cat :) Susan was very accomodating and great communicator!

Kasey is a great host and the apartment is everything we imagined,location is brilliant and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it to anyone 
Malcolm
Great studio, great location

I spent five out of ten days in Sydney staying at Hernan's comfortable apartment at Monterey (which is really within Brighton le Sands).

The Apartment :  Comfortable size for two bedrooms, bathroom, living/dining area, kitchen and balcony.   Hernan is very neat and organised, so that added to the comfort level.

The Bedroom :  Has a queen-sized bed, bedside table, small wardrobe, chest of drawers, writing desk.   More than adequate for a single traveller, though room size may be a little compact for two pax ... but there's always the living room and balcony area to chill in.

Transportation :  Not a problem because I had a car.   Public transport within walking distance.   Even if it is not smack in the city area, I have always encouraged travellers to experience the beautiful suburbs of Sydney.  Time permitting, travelling by bus (as opposed to trains) will allow you to see a lot more.

Surrounds :   Nice restaurants/eateries and a couple of large supermarkets are all within easy walking distance.   I managed to stock up on some groceries and had a few meals at "home".   The lovely beach is just a few minutes' walk away.   I would encourage guests who drive to explore other beaches and nooks to get a good feel of the district.

Thank you, Hernan, for your warm hospitality and being such a gracious and kind host.   I definitely recommend a stay at this apartment.
Great place for a group - six of us fit very comfortably. Very well appointed apartment close to the center of the city. Communication was quick, friendly and very helpful.

Maria and Jerome are such lovely hosts. They really know how to give you your privacy for your holiday (which I very much appreciate), but they are always there when you need them via text/call/Airbnb message, which is greatly assuring. They have awesome recommendations on local places (including places with local deals) and the room does not let your expectations down. The view is absolutely amazing, no matter the weather. The room and amenities are very clean, with extra towels and sheets in the cupboard, should you need them. I was worried about heating since it's winter and the listing didn't have heating ticked, but they provided a thermostat heater that kept us nice and cosy. Another cute thing to note was the deco. There's an adorable kiwi bird toy and some binoculars that we took advantage of with the great view from the window. Also, go up to the terrace! You definitely won't be disappointed at Maria's :)
Great one night stay for next day early departure to the airport
The best location. So close to everything that Sydney has to offer!
Good location. Friendly and thoughtful. Thank you for everything help and queries that I kept asking.
Great place, perfect location.
You can access this property if you arrive later in the evening as there is separate access which makes it convenient.  Clean, Tidy.
Everything was perfect.  A great base for exploring Sydney or just to stay in and chill if you need a break from the road.  I would definitely stay here again!

A lovely little apartment! Comfy bed and everything that we needed for our stay in Sydney. This isn't flash - staying here is about location, not amenities. Super close (walking distance) to everything you might want to visit. Some slight issues with the shower and a little cramped - this is a place for two people for a couple of days maximum! We didn't meet Joanne and Ali but they were great arranging flexible options for our stay.
房子处于生活小镇区域,离高速很近,房主非常热情响应很快｡
Lovely couple who make you feel at home.  Perfect place for what I was looking for. Clean, close to the uni and lots of shops around.

Such a lovely space! And such a great host! The beds were comfortable, the outdoor living space was convenient and the location was perfect! We had five people in the space and were very comfortable and well cared for! I highly recommend and look forward to visiting again myself!

Wonderful experience staying at Jyoti's place which is only 3-5 min drive from Sydney Olympic Park and only a short walk to the Newington marketplace where there are restaurants, cafes and a supermarket. Also a short 5-7 min drive to the Sydney Olympic wharf where you can enjoy a 1 hour ferry ride into Circular Quay.  Very comfortable bed and private bathroom for our use.  Jyoti & her family were very hospitable and friendly - we loved conversing with them - just like talking to like-minded old friends.

For a family of 5 the apartment was excellent with a fantastic view.   Everything you need is supplied and Nicole is a perfect host.  It is close to restaurants, public transport and sporting events. Highly recommend.

Staying at Alice is the good choice i have made. The response is very fast. Very helpful event in the last minutes. You will not regret choosing this place to stay..A very quiet place, good area, near to train station and mini mart.. everything is GOOD.. Thanks Alice :)
Lovely house and good value. Laura was good with communication and very helpful.

We all enjoyed this beautiful home providing the perfect space for our family reunion!!! McMahons Point is also a great location for sightseeing Sydney. We loved the friendly atmosphere and variety of local cafes/restaurants too.

Linda's house is clean and comfortable (makes me feel at home) though sometimes it can be hot cuz I visit Sydney during summer. Other than that, I love that it is near the MRT- took me only few minutes to walk and Central Park Mall and SPAR Redfern that are nearby are awesome- lots of food and fresh food to buy and great atmosphere.
Lovely space, well appointed, great location

Highly recommend staying here
Modern, clean & comfortable

Great hosts who go out of their way to make sure you have the best time! The place is lovely, stilish, cozy, spacious and so well located! Wouldn't consider staying anywhere else in Avalon! Thanks Angela and Geoff for sharing your beautiful house with us, we've had special holidays!
It was wonderful stay.

Had a great stay at Alex and Kristina's lovely place . Parking was great and everything wonderful Balmain had to offer was within walking distance . 
Thank you Alex and Kristina for allowing us to stay . 

Regards Nicole
Fantastic location, fantastic home, fantastic host.

Lovely bedroom and comfortable bed. The property is very conveniently located for the city as the train station is five minutes walk and one stop from Central Station. 
We were happy to be left to ourselves as Kath was out at work from early morning but we're a bit disappointed that breakfast items weren't replenished over the three days we were there and there were no 'ordinary' tea bags or cereal after first night.
However, we wouldn't, necessarily, let this put us off as the accommodation, itself is good.

Agata's place was very nice and cozy. It had its own private entrance and we were able to use a parking spot in the driveway. We visited Sydney in the winter, so the temperatures were a bit cool, but there was a little electric heater that was sufficient to keep us warm. We also appreciated the nice roomy bath tub which can be very convenient after a cool day outside. The kitchen provided everything we needed. Agata even left a tube of Vegemite in the kitchen cabinet, so guests can try this Australian speciality even if they are afraid to buy the whole thing for themselves. We would definitely recommend this place!

Anita was a great host and her place was very stylish and located right next to the beach and the bus stop with a beautiful view of Bondi Beach, and also with plenty of space - perfect for a couple. Anita was extremely thoughtful and even put some food in the fridge for us as we were arriving too late to make it out to eat or shopping. Thanks again!!
This is a fantastic place to stay, close to public transport, great walks close by, peaceful and very thoughtful touches made by the hosts. Would highly recommend this place to a solo traveller.

Gavin's apartment in Kent St is located in a great central location of Sydney, is clean and fitted the 5 of us. It has a kitchen fir those that want to cook and a balcony too. Check in was easy and we had no issues during our stay. I would definitely recommend it to others and would be happy to stay again. Booking and contact with Gavin was easy too.
Just do it, stop looking and do what you have to do

David's flat was very unique, cosy and clean. We feeled like home. You find here everything you need for an unforgettable trip to Sydney. We loved to have our breakfast with a view to the El-Alamein Fountain. David was always reachable and helped us with everything. Thanks for hosting uns David.
Very good location. Close to every thing you need for a great vacation.

We had a great stay at David's place! The location is perfect...on a quiet street but only a block or so from tons of cafes, bars, shops, and restaurants. David also had some great food recommendations. Everything in the house was new and kept very clean & tidy. The terrace off of the bedroom is very nice. I definitely recommend staying here.
Charming place with a charming host. We enjoyed meeting Donna and some of her family, and staying in her delightful chique cottage.
Absolutely loved this space. It’s in the perfect area and just a walk away from Surry Hills. Kristin was a great host!
Susan was very helpful, friendly and accommodating of my needs. The studio was lovely and I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. Thanks Susan!

My stay was in one word: Perfect. 
Booking and communications were nice, quick and easy. 
The room was super clean and comfortable and I had my own bathroom. 
Angela is a very nice and helpful person. Meeting her was a good start in Australia. (And lets me forget the „Taxi driver“ who ripped me off ;) )
Going to the center is easy and quick,  just a few bus stops to the next train station.

Naveen and Tris are great hosts! We felt welcome right from the minute we entered the door! 
The room is clean, modern and has a great view! 
We went out for dinner together in Kings Cross and enjoyed the nice atmosphere a lot! 
All in all once can say that this is a perfect place to stay, even the location of the flat is excellent!

Leena has a huge house and backyard too . But there is no hot water 24X7 . It comes at very odd hours . The bathrooms don’t have locks so it is a little problem if you are staying with your family . We had a good time but he house needs to be modernised .
Super location and love the massage chair
The location is great and walking to distance to central station, Chinatown and CBD. House is clean. Only one negative point is microwave is not available on site.
Wonderful stay and lovely people.
Fantastic host and house in a great location, super close to beach and cafes. Would highly recommend for a short or longer term stay.

We love staying at Ruth's house. The setting is beautiful in a very quiet street with bush behind. A breeze comes up the valley and kookaburras visit. The deck is perfect for relaxing on with the pool and hot tub and there are maket umbrellas for shade. The air conditioning is great and the kitchen has everything. With two bathrooms the house works well for two couples. Drive to St Ives Shopping Village for supplies or to the station for the train to the city.
Lovely spot & easy to get to the city by Bus and Train if you need.

Trents apartment is in a beautiful street, short walk to the ferry terminal where we were able to take a quick 10 minute trip to Circular Quay to spend our day. The apartment itself was comfortable and as described. Minimal to zero noise from neighbours or cars. TV is amazing ! Thanks for having us :)

Beautiful beachside location. Really comfortable apartment. Very clean. 
Some lovely touches with a bottle of wine, orange juice, biscuits and basics in the cupboard. 
The apartment keeps cool without the need for air conditioning. 
Direct, punctual bus service into the city and links to elsewhere. 
Highly recommended.

Great place and very close to the harbour.
Great location

We loved our stay here. Just like the pictures - maybe better! Very clean with excellent amenities. Very convenient location. Joy was a joy to deal with. Would happily recommend & will be staying again.

It was great view, quiet and safe, close to public transportation, great value. The owners are very thoughtful, care about details, provide transportation cards, milk & sugar for coffee, I highly recommend it
Good location nice clean apartment

Simon and Nicole's place was very comfortable and perfectly situated for a few days exploring Sydney! It was quiet, the bed and linens soft, and included amenities that were very helpful (washer/dryer with detergent, all toiletries, good wifi, a bit of cable TV, good selection of kitchen tools, etc.). We walked everywhere, including the Central Business District, Paddington, Bronte, and a ton of other places. Simon and Nicole were very responsive and made our stay there a breeze!
Great location short walk to train station
This is an amazing place to escape the bustle of Sydney. Comfortable, and close to everything you'd need and nestled in beautiful canopy. Highly recommend.

We enjoyed our stay and Michy's place lived up to expectations it is a beautiful garden studio in a very beautiful part of the world. Nice place to slow down and get away from it all. Michy was fantastic with communications and making sure we had everything we needed to make our stay successful. Highly recommend

Had a lovely stay with Naveen et all. The perfect spot for access to the City, the cross and New Town. Easy to find, easy to access via the concierge service and exactly as described

Great bars and restaurants nearby and fantastic recommendations from Naveen! Both Naveen and Tristan were very welcoming and helpful from start to finish
Thanks Steven for your cosy abode, will recommend to my friends if they need a place to stay near the theatre.
An absolutely delightful apartment. It's cosy, but the attention to detail and renovation make it a lovely place to hang out in! Highly recommended :)

This is simply the best airb&b in the locale. It has fantastic walks, restaurants, swimming and golf all nearby. The beach is right out front. Bernadette and Fred have prepared a  
very comprehensive guest book which answers nearly all questions you might have. The apartment has everything  most people would need, but we really appreciated the little extras, like Netflix- so we could keep up with our favourite shows while the rain teemed down outside. The bus to the city passes by right outside  the unit and there is easy street parking right out front. Negatives? None that we could think of. We wish Bernadette could control the weather!

This was my first airbnb and I think I struck gold. Robyn and Ken were the perfect hosts and made me feel at home from the time I first arrived to the time I left.
I would recommend this airbnb to anyone who wants the perfect hosts in a very convenient location.

Very beautiful, stylish and comfortable apartment. Everything you need is here and the location is very convenient. 
Host very responsive and helpful. 
If you like to sleep in a dark, quiet room, I advise you to have an eye mask and ear plugs. It is light outside and the blinds don't quite shut it all out.

Jennifer has been a great host! We have enjoyed our stay at Jennifer's house for the past 7 nights. The kitchen is well equipped with utensils and other supplies like bread, milk and eggs. The interiors are based on traditional English design and we felt peaceful, warm and cosy in the house.
Highly recommended!

Sara was just lovely. She was very quick and accurate in her communication and the apartment is just perfect. You fee that the people living there really love living there, as we did. The view is to die for. Our kids loved all the toys they could play with.
Great central place to stay in the city.

I stayed here for twelve days, as I had various business meetings in the city. It was a perfect location. A great little neighbourhood with good transport links to get around Sydney.  Linda was a great host and was very flexible with check-in and check-out times. The apartment was clean and comfortable and was equipped with basic equipment. It was perfect for me on my own and for putting up a friend overnight on the sofa bed. Good value for money.

Great comfortable little apartment for a business trip.  Full size ironing board and good quality iron was nice.  Later check in meant I had to get the keys from another location which was easy enough, just a little annoying.

Charming obliging and gracious hosts, generous and accommodating. The room is pleasant and well-furnished, with a large comfortable bed. Small thing missing, I'd have liked a bedside table. Bathroom perfect. Would certainly recommend to anyone, and I'll check if the room is available next time I'm in that part of the world.
This place is so convenient! My parents enjoyed the stay! Great place and really nice host
The apartment is so wonderful for traveler to stay.
Beautiful and airy space, close to the beach and all the cafes and restaurants. Very clean and wonderfully presented.
Clean room, friendly host and super cheap too what more is there to ask for?

Mariana was an amazing host. She let me check in very early due to my red-eye flight and she also let me check out very late due to my late evening flight home. The place was beautiful, spotlessly clean and is in a prime Potts point / Elizabeth Bay location. Thank you so much for making my stay in Sydney so enjoyable.

Tolles Zimmer mit einem sehr sauberen Bad in unmittelbarer Umgebung zum Coogee Beach. Zu Fuß ist dieser in 10 Minuten zu erreichen. Cindy und ihr Mann sind jederzeit für Fragen zu erreichen und ein super Gastgeber. Ein Zimmer welches ich sofort weiterempfehlen kann, hier bist du für einen Aufenthalt in Sydney perfekt aufgehoben.
Well positioned for our purpose, but there were some issues with the upstairs bathroom.
I really enjoyed my stay. The location was very handy for me. The house is fantastic and a bit of a gem. My room and bathroom were very comfortable. Arnie and his family are lovely.
Good value,  close to local cafes and  transport. Nice to have room for 3 couples to feel at home an not in a hotel.
The host canceled this reservation 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Rachel's house is lovely. We were a family of 5 in Sydney for my son's wedding at Balmoral and this spot was perfect for very easy access to Mosman shopping centre, buses to the city and Balmoral Beach. We parked the car and basically didn't use it again the entire weekend.
There is only one full bathroom however so if you don't like sharing then maybe not for you. We had no problem as it is a huge bathroom and there is another toilet in the laundry/3rd bedroom.
The house is spacious with lots of places to 'escape' for quiet time

I have so many great things to say about my 4 week stay with Natasa that I don't know where to start!  Natasa is very welcoming, and she made me feel right at home from the moment I got there.  She is generous and flexible--and one of the happiest people to be around.  Natasa always had the perfect suggestion of where to go, what to do or the best way to get there.  She knows the city really well, and is always happy to give suggestions (or show you herself!).  Natasa will talk with you as much or as little as you want, but we had a great time hanging out downstairs--I never felt like I needed to be in my room.  She even invited me to her famous pizza night with her friends--yum!

As for the house/room--it was great.  The location is amazing--so close to both the Petersham train station and a short walk to all of the Parramatta Rd buses.  Everything you need will be close by or short walk away.  The house is great--clean, homely and has everything you need! The green room was perfect--great hard wood floors, comfortable bed, plenty of space for my things--as advertised.  Even with 3 or 4 of us in the house, I never had to wait for the bathroom--everyone had such different schedules that it always seemed to work out.  I did laundry quite a few times while I was there, which was no problem at all--there is a dryer or clothes line.  

I would not hesitate for a second to book this house again!  It made my time working away from home so much better by being around lovely people in a very nice home.  I loved it and I hope I get the chance to visit Natasa in Petersham again soon!
Great location, great view, nice and clean place. Valentine was very friendly.
Great location, spacious well appointed apartment.  Top host, looking forward to returning one day.

Nice place, only downside noisy traffic, no air-con and blinds in bedrooms
Rob is a fantastic bloke and really enjoyed our stay very accomdating
The location was perfect because everything that you would need is within walking distance.  Eleni was a great host and was very response when we had question.  We will definitely stay here again.

Amazing find on airbnb! Close to public transport, food, woolworths, a few bars! Perfect size for two people and the apartment was very neat with a stylish touch! I loved every bit about staying in this apartment!! Thankyou :)
Nice house near to SYD CBD area. Car is not recommended as the parking fee is expensive. Public transport and MRT can be accessed easily. No concern in getting nice food nearly.

Hernans place was perfect for a solo traveler staying near the airport! I was able to visit the city, you just have to get to the train station which Hernan kindly took me to! He was a great host and very easy to talk to!
Robyn and Ken were the perfect hosts. Went way beyond normal host efforts to ensure our comfort of needs. Delightful experience and we will be back.
Great place and very accommodation to our requests.
Fantastic location, 5 min walk to city and surrounded by cafes, restaurants and such. Apartment fit out was very new and nice.

Cathy's airbnb is just perfect for a couple or solo traveler looking for privacy in a peaceful setting. With your own entrance, ensuite bathroom and the extra touches of soda water in the fridge, nespesso coffee machine, fruit yogurt and muesli for breakie and beach towels for use, it was a treat. The room was spotless, with modern bathroom and decorated beautifully. Cathy was even helpful enough to arrange a fan in the room for us prior to arrival as we had been having some very hot weather of late. Just fantastic!
Well equipped and spacious for our family to stay and enjoy Maroubra. Great spot. Close to beach and shops.
We had a great long weekend at this place. Would highly recommended it.

The house is a lot more run down than it looks on the photographs provided. Beds were dusty which resulted in my developing hives on my first night there. Air-conditioning is only available in the kitchen and in one of the toilets. There is a step near the kitchen which can be quite dangerous because its not clearly marked. Both my grandparents missed the step and they nearly fell. Do be prepared to walk uphill from the train station to the home.

ｾﾝﾄﾗﾙ駅徒歩5分｡ﾊﾞｽ乗り場も近く､どこに行くにも便利な立地｡

子供2人の家族4人で滞在｡ｷｯﾁﾝはｷﾚｲで冷蔵庫も大きく1週間ほどの滞在に最適でした｡洗濯機､乾燥機あり｡物干し台も有ります｡

室内も清潔ですごしやすいです｡できればﾄｲﾚが2つあればもっと良かったです!

ありがとうございました!

This bring my first AirBnB experience, it was definitely better than most of my hotel stays. Place is situated at a very convenient location with easy access to public transport. Linda is very reaponsive and very genuine and accomodating to all the requests. Overall, a very positive experience. Thank you so much! Highly recommend this place for a pleasant and comfortable stay!! :)

We were lucky to have booked Dino's place last minute as we decided to stay longer in Sydney. The appt is quite popular and there are good reasons for that!

Communication & Check in
Fast feedback and smooth communication although Dino was in a different timezone when we booked. Rick helped us to check in and was real friendly and showed us around in the house.

Location
Was just perfect. Quite central and can walk to all the major popular area's. Also very close to King's cross and Wooloomooloo but the street is nice and quite. Also within 5-min walking distance to good super market and upscale dining. 

The appartment
We are also really big on modern interirors and designs. Dino's the place was a real gem. You cann see that he has invested substantial enegery and money to decorate but also to maintain the place. Top quality materials everywhere, but also top quality amenities. Dino really cares. Everything is custom made and built in, which made the appartment feel real spacious without compromising on the number of facilities. We were with the two of us, but the sofa bed in the study room can cater for another 2 if needed.

Facilities
Everything worked perfectly, but we really loved the floor heating in the bathroom as spring was just starting and Sydney was still quite chilly. Dino also had his own parking space, which was a real plus as parking can get quite pricey in Sydney. 

The bed was comfy and Dino had a nice selection of books and cd's which made the stay really enjoyable as well.

Absolutely new apartment. Very clean, has big living room and a parking space. Lina and her husband Tony were very friendly and always willing to help. Before we leave Tony even gave us a bucket of homegrown tomatoes, which were very delicious!
Great house to stay in, very conveniently located with bus stop two mins away, beds very comfy and was provided with everything we needed! Hidden gem!

This place is amazing. As soon as I walked into the apartment I knew I was going to love every moment of staying here. The place is decorated so nicely and thoughtfully. Very nice neighborhood with a small venue of food places and groceries 5 min walk.  The views from the apartment are lovely and the host is extremely nice and always replies to questions quickly.  Riding the ferry into town is a treat but there is also a train for quicker service.  Would definitely stay again.
We had a lovely overnight stay. Very comfortable and well equipped room which included terrific breakfast. Clareville shopping centre only a short walk away for a great cup of coffee
A good experience in Sydney. The house is clean and the location is outstanding.
Good price for enough room! Could walk around the beach and see airplanes. You can take a bus to the shopping mall near by. Hernan is really friendly and kind! Thanks.

Karen was a fantastic host throughout our stay, she made us feel welcome and did everything she could to help us. The home has a lot of character and is in a great location, half way between Waverley and Bondi Junction so getting around was simple.
We were delighted with the property. It is very clean and private  and has all the amenities one would desire. Communications from Steven was excellent. We would happily return.
Great spot. Close to shops. Close to beach. Plenty of room. Pet friendly! Clean! Gwennaelle was a great host! We would stay again!

El alojamiento esta muy Bien ubicado, muy cerca de la estación de tren , la zona de restaurantes y bares pero la casa es muy tranquila y puedes descansar. Todo estuvo acorde a lo ofrecido , la habitación muy limpia , comoda , baño compartido pero muy limpio así como la cocina. Viaje con mi esposo e hijo y fue buena experiencia Recomiendo al máximo a Miss D!!
The host canceled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The previous reviews this location are mostly accurate but we did want to point out a few details. Pros: The location of the apartment is excellent. Easy access to the train, taxis, as well as the ability to walk to just about anywhere in town. We had a lovely stroll from the apartment to the Sydney Bridge, Darling Harbour, and Circular Quay. There are many local restaurants and pubs to visit, we did not go hungry! The house manual has many wonderful suggestions. Cons: We recognize that these may be exclusive to our experience only. While communication with Paul and Luke was great, we did have some hiccups. As international travelers, we had been using WiFi wherever available so as to not incur any additional charges. We set up a time for Wendy (the housekeeper), to meet us to drop off the key. We waited 20 minutes until having to turn on our phones to try to sort out where Wendy was. After texting Wendy 3 times, she responded that she had left he key with a local business owner. It was frustrating that the plan had changed, that we weren’t notified immediately, and that we had to find this out after having to incur international phone charges. The apartment itself is as advertised. Cozy, lovely style, mostly well maintained. The double bed is a bit lumpy for our taste. The washroom/toilet is a bit dated, and could use a deep clean. The tub is rounded at the bottom so you could never stand with flat feet, it was quite slippery. While the tub is large, note that the shower is rather small and the shower head does not move. You are restricted to a small, rather tight area, as the shower curtain only encloses a small circular space around the shower head. Neither of us could close the curtain fully around us. The water pressure and hot water is outstanding. As pointed out, the street in which the apartment is located is quite noisy with bright street lights gleaming in that the blinds don’t fully block out, so lite sleepers beware, but that is a part of the city experience. Also note that the building is older. The entrance way is dark and has a musty smell. There were plenty of stairs to walk up, so if you have heavy luggage, beware. Online, the check-out time states 10am, though the manual at the apartment states 11am. Having thought the checkout time was at 11am, we were finishing packing and showering when Wendy, knocked at a bit past 10am. She was extremely abrupt, to the point of being rude. She insisted that the check out time was 10am, and suggested twice that we should have ‘checked our email’. She also brought a tradesman with her and was wanting to come in with him to start cleaning. I told her that my husband was in the shower and I did not feel comfortable having her and another person inside the apartment...

Maison très bien située pour Sidney (10 mn Central station / 40mn à pied ou 10 mn par train à partir de Central  pour aller à Circular quay  )
Rapport qualité/prix très bon. La maison est très propre. 
Bruyant si vous êtes dans la chambre du bas située côté route.
C'est un backpaker et non une chambre chez l'habitant.
Staying here was a real pleasure, like a little home away from home.

The view and location are fantastic.
The apartment is on the 3rd floor and there is no lift, but it was not a problem for us.
The apartment was excellent value for three people.
The washing machine and dryer are not located in the apartment, once again not really a problem to go up to the next level.
The leaking ceiling and mould is a major problem.  We didn't get a lot of rain, but the floor around the sunroom bed was very wet.  Not sure what happens in winter?
The toilet seems to have been "broken" for weeks.  Hopefully, fixed the day we left.
Mal was excellent, responded quickly and helped with any problems.
Description of the property was spot on, Sarah and her Family were great hosts, the pool was a bonus thoroughly enjoyed our 9 days there, highly recommended.
Loved our stay in lovely AirBNB located in the central, delightful  suburb of Balgowlah. Views beautiful, bed very comfortable & bus stop very handy.

Marcella was fantastic. She was more than happy to help and assist us in our needs. The location was great, close to the beach and neat little cafe's and convenience stores. The Maroubra "Seals Club" near by offered a venue which could easily cater for our large group providing great meals at cheap prices.

We had a wonderful stay. It was quiet, relaxing and very comfortable. Belinda and Chris are great hosts. The cabin is set in leafy garden minutes from the beach and it has a private entrance. The kitchen is well-equipped.

Die Unterkunft liegt ca. 20min zu Fuß vom Zentrum entfernt. Der Check- in verlief unkompliziert, Viktoria war vor Ort und hat uns viele gute Tipps für Sydney gegeben.  Es gibt sehr viele gute Restaurants und Cafe's in der Nähe. 
Das Appartement war 
sehr sauber, ausreichend groß und das ausklappbare Bett war sehr bequem. Eine kleine Küchennische war ebenfalls vorhanden, wo man alles für ein kleines Frühstück finden konnte. 
Wir würden auf jeden Fall diese Unterkunft noch einmal wählen!
Very tidy and well-mannered.
Shuang and family provide kind direction, timely communication, and very considerate. Room is clean and cozy, walking distance to int’l airport.

A fantastic place to stay away from the hustle and bustle of Sydney but still close to all of the action. Soaking up the morning sun with a cup of tea, a croissant and a good book - pure bliss. Cath sure knows how to make you feel at home, with fresh bread and a well-stocked kitchen. Oh, and a very comfortable bed! Pop down the road to Cornersmith Cafe for a delicious breakfast or read a book under the big trees in the park at the end of the street. I wish I could have stayed longer - I definitely plan to come back!

Lovely space with a beautiful outlook. Close to everything in Bundeena, with the feeling of a quiet retreat. Great facilities - Hilde has been very thoughtful about the things you need for a relaxing time away.

This is a charming apartment in a great location. Easy walking distance to many places and just a block from the train if using public transportation.  Unfortunately our TV did not work (not that we were using it much) to Su's credit, it was changed the next day. However, the wifi then broke, which left us a drift as we did not have a local phone and could only communicate via texting. Overall, lovely apartment. If you plan to cook any meals, be warned the kitchen is not well stocked. bring your own French press if you can't wait to visit one of the wonderful cafe's near by. Overall , good value with. A few glitches to be worked out.
Great location! Within walking distance to the Manly harbour ferry. The place was very clean and the bed was comfy.

Pictures don't do it justice; a really beautiful space with your own private entrance and all the touches of home comforts! Could not recommend Vivian and Patrick more- easy instructions and lots of privacy.  You will not be disappointed!!
Beautiful location, close to beach and very clean place

A great space in the heart of Manly, one of the best suburbs in Sydney. While it is an older style apartment it  very spacious, comfortable  and has all the facilities you will need for a short or even long term stay. We've stayed in a few air bnb apartments in Europe and this one is certainly up to standard. Recommended!

Cathys place in Avalon is beautifully furnished with a huge very very comfortable bed. Cathy is a warm and welcoming host who made our stay very lovely. I would highly recommend staying here to explore the beautiful area.
Really nice stay, the apartment is close to everything that you'll need and Paul is more than willing to help.
Prefer not to write a review, sorry
This is the 2nd time I stay at Andrew’s place, it fits my purpose of stay. The neighbourhood is convenient and safe to travel around.
The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I had a great stay at Suzie's place. The apartment was beautiful and well located and Suzie was a gracious and helpful host!

Great place to stay. Cathy was warm, welcoming, helpful and a wonderful host, happy to assist you with what you need. The room is exactly as described. It was clean, comfortable, practical and beautifully decorated. Bed was cosy and neatly arranged. You have everything you need: clean and private bathroom ensuite, wall-mounted TV and a delicious and healthy breakfast, which you can enjoy on a nice table outside the room. I would highly recommend this place to everyone staying in Avalon as it is perfectly located and well priced. We would love to go back to this quiet and lovely place soon.

Great apartment in an excellent locations, close to public transportation and countless cafes and dinner spots. Desiree was always super quick to reply and available at all times to meet our requests. We would definitely stay here again if returning to Sydney!

Hernan and Connie are a very nice couple. We had a very good time at their apartment. They are generous, relax andd very sympathetic. The expression " mi casa es su casa" comes alive! Perfect room. Recommended!
Stylish and comfortable space in a great location
Mel was a great host. Location was ideal and close to everything you'll need while at Bondi.

Cindy's place was comfortable, clean and quiet. Cindy was easy to comunicate with. The apartment included a comfy bed, a good shower, well equiped kitchen in a convenient location with a bus stop out the front door. 

Thank you, Cameron

Fred and Bernadette were perfect hosts, extremely friendly, warm hearted and interesting to talk to, we only wish we could have had the time to speak more. The apartment was very spacious and spotlessly clean on arrival and has absolutely everything you need for a home from home experience and more, which helps when travelling with small children. We could not have wanted a more perfect place to stay with our little boy and with such amazing views. This is by far the best airbnb we have ever stayed in over all our experiences throughout the world. Thank you.

This is a lovely apartment for a couple. Well fitted out, a few essentials for eating in and decorated with a very tasteful African theme. During the cool winter evenings, the reverse cycle heaters were fantastic. Traffic noise was well muted by the double glass in the bedroom. Desireé was very communicative through our stay and had provided lots of info about Sydney and what to do, where to eat, etc.

Lovely private little cabin in the back garden with en suite. Susan is a friendly and helpful host. Angelo the cat is also friendly. Close to Norton Street where there are lots of cafes and restaurants. Public transport is also close for a 30 min ride into the city.

We really enjoyed our stay at Vanessa's place! Such a great space - spacious, clean, close to public transport, great communication.
Highly recommended.

Funky place within 15 minutes walk to the city.  Has everything needed for your stay.

Only real downside was local parking was a bit painful

A beautiful peaceful garden studio with everything required for a relaxing weekend away. Some captivating pieces of artwork and a great selection of books and music. Belinda was very helpful and accommodating, a great host.
The room was lovely and very nicely decorated. Location was great! Off street parking is not directly in front of the entry way, but just a quick 1min walk away! Will recommend

We had such a wonderful stay here in this gorgeous apartment with my husband and his parents. It really does feel like a tropical retreat away from it all! 
Thank you to Angela for making our stay so special. Every little detail had been thought about and Angela went above and beyond to make us feel so comfortable.
It is stunning accommodation like this and wonderful hosts that make a getaway so perfect and memorable.

Thank you! xo

Nicole met us at the loft and went over the TV, Wifi, etc., - we were totally impressed as this did not happen at the places we stayed in  Cairns & the Brisbane area (those hosts were only available by email/phone/text which was welcomed).
We loved this loft which was perfect for our 6 nights in Sydney. 
Nicole had thought of everything and supplied it which was wonderful, location is perfect for public transport, restaurants, sight-seeing, etc.,
The only negative was the work going on outside from around 7:30 - 4pm - demolishing of a building opposite the loft - it was pretty noisy at times.  
Nicole mentioned it was temporary and she apologized that it was happening (she shared that she had just  found out about the demolition recently). 
We would defintely stay here again when in Sydney - it was the best place we have stayed in during our 3 week travel across Australia.
We will definitely encourage friends to stay here too if they travel to Sydney.
Highly recommended! Convenient location, beautiful place, hospitable host!
Fantastic location. Perfect walking distance to everything in Paddington. Our privacy was respected & the owner very kind.

Well located but terribly run.
The keys were given to me 4h late.
The entire place was very dirty.
Not even vacuumed.
No Space for hanging or even shelf’s for personal staff ,all full of hosts things like if they were living there.
Floor in the living area full of plastic toys,which were always in the way.
Kitchen sticky, the walls and all.
Pantry full of half started smelly ingredients.
Under the sofas and the rest of furniture dust,dirt,lost items including old passport,combs etc.
Dryer in the laundry with dirt from weeks and weeks.
Balcon-more of the same -dirt and storage for the host .
I have pictures to show.
Never will I look at this place again and I would not recommend it to anyone who doesn’t like filth.

Great place to stay. Safe neighbourhood that isn't far from the station (10 minute walk) along pretty tree lined streets with late Victorian houses, many with iron lacework balconies. The main room was very clean, airy and the bed was comfortable. Loved the over head fan which kept me nice and cool. The bathroom was equally very clean and the shower worked well. Good coffee making facilities and well equipped kitchenette.
This was our 2nd time staying at this great property.  It has everything you need to relax and unwind. Beaches just there,  beautiful tropical surroundings and friendly hosts!
房子床可以住六个人,非常宽敞
Excellent communications with Mona, however we didn't need much as everything in the accomodation was provided and perfect
Really nice apartment within walking distance from the train station, and the apartment is quite spacious and clean.
Great location. Great room to stay. Friendly hosts.
Vanessa very helpful, a great spot!

Very good location, just a few minutes walk to the Harbour Bridge, The Rocks, as well as view of the Sydney Opera House. Suzanna was also lightning fast in replying, and is very patient and helpful with all my queries. We had a very pleasant stay in the clean house. Check-in was also a breeze with the hosts contacting us to make sure we had no issues, and they were also flexible when we requested for late check-out.
Cecilia家位于静街很安静  位置便利  入住和退房都相当方便   房间干净整洁  生活必须品齐全  还有小阳台可以晒衣服  浴室很新很干净  房东回消息都特别快  好评!

Linda's communication was very fast, booking and check in was simple. Linda arranged to meet us at a set time near the apartment. Apartment is in a new building, however for our visit it hadn't been thoroughly cleaned. Photos on listing didn't seem to match exactly with actual apartment. Good location near Surry Hills and Ultimo.

Angela and Geoff are warm, lovely hosts. We have never had such a well-stocked larder and fridge in any other Airbnb we have stayed at! The flat is beautifully appointed and the quality of amenities is superb. There are all comforts one could possibly wish for and the garden is a delight. You can walk to the beach in less than 5 minutes and to Avalon village in less than 10. We will definitely be back.
Had a great time, very personable and offered great advice on where to go, and what to do. Great location with good access to central station for trains/busses. I would totally stay with Gavin again!
Grate place for a visit to Sydney
Gd stay!! Value bnb:) highly recommended
Heel leuk huisje, voldoende dichtbij centrum Sydney en stranden. Winkels op wandelafstand.
Clean, cozy and private. Susan was a great host. I would choose to stay there again in the future.

Angela and Geoff made us feel so welcome! Their property is stunning and they don't miss a single detail - everything is beautiful, right down to the hand soap and shampoo. I can't recommend this property enough to anyone looking at staying in the northern beaches. Amazing!

A very comfortable and spacious Apartment close to restaurants and other amenities... Lovely views from the large living room and a lovely little balcony to sit and enjoy a coffee or a wine .... Interesting things to discover within walking distance... The Apartment suited the purpose of our stay in Sydney for our long weekend...

Location! 5-10 mins walking distance to everything you would want to see in the CBD! Very accessible to attractions, public transportation and shopping. The studio is a little tight but completely doable for four adults.

The description is accurate and Station street is veryt quiet at night. Miss D is really nice beacuse she let us check in early in the morning. The room is tidy and clean, which is just like the picture. Good place to stay. :)

The home is just lovely. Very comfortable and gorgeous design. Everything you would need is provided. Great location. Beautiful bedroom with sound blocking Windows and a very comfortable bed. Can't recommend the property highly enough. Try it out!! Eliza

Loved the eclectic style and additional room outside.  Very open feeling and well stocked
With everything you need, including beach towels.  Turn right out of the driveway and the organic coffee a shop is at the next corner, which is great for coffee and breakfast.
Great location, close to everything. Parking difficult but if you can snag a park, Paul helps out with a permit. Clean and tidy, lovely little place.
Great apartment in an amazing location with a very helpful host

The Bronte Studio was Great. Susen and Greg were excellent hosts. They made us feel very welcome. 
The Beach is only a short walk away and the Main Street Provides everything from coffee places to Restaurants. 
We would definitively stay there again.

The apartment was great. It was decorated very lovely and everything you need for a stay in Sydney is there. Besides this the apartment is very clean und you feel home very easily. It is close to the city center and easy to walk to all important places in Sydney. I would recommend this place for everybody.
What a great experience - thanks Carol and Ian for your warm and welcoming hospitality. I had a wonderfully easy and relaxing stay. I look forward to seeing you both again.

Great place to stay, great host, clean house, lots of options.
Would love to be there next time!
Recommended.

Naveen was a lovely host and her puppy was adorable! The room has a stunning view, the facilities were clean, easy check in/out, great location and overall I was super happy. Can't wait to come back again :)

Hi linda, this is marie and thierry. We have just finish our trip in sydney and blue mountains. Back to work tomorrow ! We enjoy the city and you appartment in redfern. Everything was ok. Quiet area and not too far from the center of sydney. We rent bikes at town pikes.Thanks for your advices and all the rest. Sorry for my english we are not used to travel so much out of french countries and my lessons from school begins to be very far
Good place to stay! Cosy and modern. I'd come back
Oliver was very helpful and responded to messages timely. The place was clean and has great amenities I needed, close to Unsw and nice restaurants in the area. Highly recommended
It's a lovely place in a great location.  The hosts are very friendly and helpful.

The location of the house is indeed situated near to Newtown Station and a few bus stops. Check in and check out were a breeze, and the rooms looked exactly like that in the photos. Instructions and help were readily available at any time.

Breakfast and necessities were refilled very frequently and we never had to worry about running out of food or necessities. 

Miss D and her husband were extremely helpful and provided us with some really great recommendations for food places! We would definitely recommend Miss D's place to anyone looking to stay in the area and we cant wait to come back again. :)

Just a tip for lone travellers - it does get quite dark at night on the street leading to the apartment, so best if you get back to the apartment before nightfall or just carry a flashlight with you.
Had an amazing stay, the place was lovely, clean and such an easy stay.

With good communication from the start, Linda made the process easy. She gave clear instructions to pick up the key, use the wifi and left maps with advice on places to visit. The location was perfect for us; near family and the railway station.  We hired bikes from over the road ($20 for half day) and cycled to Balmain. Great cycling along the river but busy roads. You can walk to the city centre- we walked offroad through parks to Darling Harbour and the botanical gardens. Comfy big bed with good quality bedding and loads of hot water. Everything else was a bonus. Glad there was a heater as our first evenings were chilly and a television to watch the Olympics. The wifi was welcome. The Eveleigh Hotel opposite had good meals but we mainly shopped at Coles in Broadway and Spar opposite the station. We thought of hiring a car so the car parking space was a plus but actually travelled everywhere by the excellent public transport. The Opal app was really helpful; we already had Opal cards. It's a modern block that looks a little prison-like compared to the cute houses in the rest of the street but is big enough and well-equipped. 
There's a big sofa which converts into a big sofa bed. The upstairs bedroom has no door, it's a railing but a good size and watching tv on low downstairs was ok and didn't disturb the sleeper. I would stay there again.

Had a wonderful stay, Cath was the perfect host, a well thought out space with everything you need. 
Catch let us do laundry and was very attentive and friendly .

Thank you :)
Wonderful experience at Edi's place! Nice and clean house, bed and room really confortable! And pretty well located next to subway and bus stations and Sydney central area! Tottaly recommended!!
Clean, central apartment. Perfect place to sleep while you’re out and about. Thanks for everything.
Amazing large apartment in a terrific location
Great convenient place in the heart of the action at a reasonable price

A very convenient apartment, with Bondi beach literally steps away from the front door. Beautiful views! 

A word or warning: if you're driving parking is all metered at a rate of $7 an hour so it works out very expensive if you're not planning to drive around whilst you're staying. 

Mal was a great host and very accommodating - some great suggestions for dining and drinking in the local area. 

Wifi was very handy to look up places to visit. Would definitely recommend this place to others!
Doris is a great host. She went out of her way to make sure we were comfortable and our stay was enjoyable. We liked it so much we are staying again next week.
They have a super host literally. The room was cozy and sparkling clean! The mattress is awesome I went to sleep soon as my head hit the pillow.

We had a great experience in Sandra's place! It was wonderful being just a few minutes away from the beach and heart of Bondi, and Sandra's place was very clean and well kept. In addition, we appreciated her thorough directions, great food/drink recommendations, quick response times, and hospitality all the way through.  We would definitely stay here again!
Perfectly clean, modern facilities, ocean view, great access to public transport, quiet neighbourhood. As a young couple, Jenny’s space was perfect for our weekend getaway!

It was a great time at Tigers place. His flat is clean and beautiful and directly over the train station. 
Tiger is very helpful and makes your time in Sydney more comfortable.

A gorgeous townhouse, with old world charm and modern features. The location is great, really central with yummy cafes within walking distance. Parking was easy too. The furnishings were all lovely and the kitchen is a great size and well equipped.

The bedroom was cosy with a sunroom at the front which was great to relax in, have a chat or read a book with a glass of wine. 

We'd definitely look to stay again next time we're visiting Sydney.
We had just a perfect time in susan and gregs garden. They are so helpful an welcoming.

Thank you for hosting us MissD! Quick and helpful in responses to queries and on matters of check-in, settling in and check-in! A pleasant stay with clean linen and fresh towels arranged asap in order with our check-in. The room and common areas were kept spick & span and decorated to give a homey feeling. Host and her husband were friendly and did their utmost to make all occupants happy with their stay!

Lilian is a good host. She has welcomed me with a smile and made sure I know everything about my accommodation. Her communication is very good and made sure she managed every small thing. Will stay with her again. Lilian's location is very close to Redfern train station and it saved me a lot of time.
Very clean and nice room!

Nice and clean studio, everything as described. The bathroom is very modern and very clean. Bedsheets and towels as well as milk, coffee and cereals provided.

But keep in mind: If you are looking for a perfectly private accommodation this isn't it. You have your own room with your own front door. However, to get to your bathroom you need to use the hall the family also uses. There is a six-foot high partition in the hall but of course you can be heard/can hear when entering the bathroom etc.. Also not having a sink in your room can be a little awkward - although Michele offers to do your dishes if you send her an e-mail and leave the stuff by the partition. It's kind of like sharing a flat without talking to each other but hearing there is someone next door. Still, the family is very quite so if you don't mind that, it's fine.

Newtown is the perfect location to discover Sidney, many botique shops and hip restaurants - it costs around 3 Aus $ to get to city centre by train; 10 mins walk to the station.

Hernan was a lovely host. His apartment was the perfect place to recover after my long flight. The beach is a very short walk away and perfect for a nice walk or a swim. There are also good restaurants and cafes a short walk away! 10/10 would stay again

Dangar Island has a special quality of itself, and there is probably nowhere better to experience it than Ann's home. With a style and atmosphere that is warm and inviting, overlooking the beautiful Hawkesbury this is a great place to just watch to boats go by from the balcony or, if you like, get the lowdown on the history of the island or a tour of the garden. Thanks Ann also for going to so much trouble to accommodate for my vegan dietary requirements!
Overall great accommodation in a lovely location and a hospitable host.

We had a pleasant stay at Cathy’s place. The room is quite narrow but clean and well located at convenient distance from the beach and a couple of cafes. Cathy gave us a very warm welcome at our arrival which was great.

Unfortunately my stay with Don was cut short as he changed his mind about allowing my dog to stay with me, but other than this the apartment is perfect in every way. It’s a great area and well equipped, and I’d definitely recommend it especially for shorter stays. While I was disappointed in my stay - I understand it was a very particular situation that will probably not apply to future guests as I imagine Don will now implement a strict no-pets policy.

This is simply the best possible location if you’re planning a trip to Coogee. The apartment was immaculately clean and Leigh was super helpful and responsive with check-in/out. The apartment has high ceilings and an abundance of natural light. We’ll be back.

Spotless Sydney apartment for a decent price, that hidden gem that we are all secretly looking for. There are few things better than having breakfast on the balcony, on a sunny day, and stalking parrots from nearby trees. Louise was a great host and cared to our every need.
A lovely place in great location with a true quintessential B&B experience including home made muffins and jams.  Very hospitable, flexible and responsive hosts.

George and Lucia’s home was beyond wonderful! A beautifully relaxing stay with everything and anything you could need! They were wonderful hosts, very thoughtful, easy to communicate with, and always happy to offer help or assistance! Their granny flat is very private and a cozy little oasis away from the hustle and bustle of Sydney, but with shops, trains and facilities a quick walk away! Perfect for any travellers needs!
Can’t express how wonderful their Airbnb really is!
Nice place :)

What a great place!!! Location was brilliant! So close to the beach & cafe's 
The house fit is very comfortably! Everything you need is there. Just add food! Great first experience! Thanks so much
It’s wonderful place. Very close to station

The apartment is conveniently located in a quiet suburban Bondi street but close enough to walk to the  beach and local cafes, so it's very handy. A clean and comfortable home away from home. Anthony is an awesome host who is very responsive to questions and give lots of useful local tips. Will definitely recommend it for a pleasant stay in Bondi Beach. Nice welcome touch on self-check in :-)
Lovely room, good setting, good communication. Many thanks

This property is in a fantastic location so central to the city. Jeremy is a fantastic host who went out of his way to ensure our stay was hassle free. Exceptional communication replying swiftly to any messages. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and loved that our whole extended family could be together. Would definitely stay at this property again and would recommend it to others needing a central location.
Great location and very clean. Amazing

The house is really cool just like a art gallery.And it is very regrettable that we did not meet the host because we only stay for one night.But I think they must be very nice because our plane arrived late and the host left a lot of sticky note to help us know more about the house.That is really very sweet!

This was a quiet, extremely clean, and cozy place to stay after a 11 hr. flight, and was only 10 min. away from the Sydney airport (about $18 taxi fair). I found everything I needed from internet code printed with local maps. I had to wait for my ride to arrive and I was able to wait in the common room and was even given coffee. I highly recommend this very nice and private granny flat. Thank you for the welcoming hospitality! I will stay again if come back to NSW, Australia.
Well setup space for the size. Had everything I needed for my work trip. Would stay here again.
Natasa is one of the nicest people you’ll come across! Her home is lovely and cozy and close to public transport stops
Great location. Good value for money
Great location. Bed was broken, but other than that was good.
Exactly what you need for a short stay.

This appartment is in a fabulous location everything is so close and easy to get to, we had 2 teenage kids with us and all felt safe in the appartment and out on the street, there are fantastic restaurants and market food, bars everywhere it's a lovely short walk to the opera house area the botanical gardens and the city shopping. It was clean and bright with a nice pool on the roof, the only let down was the bathroom is very small and the little things that you expect would to be provided such as salt pepper a roll of toilet paper, sponges an extra tea towel etc are not 
However there are plenty of quality towels and spare linen provided 
The appartment has a very good air conditioning system and the beds are very comfortable
The apartment is in a great location in Potts Point.  There are many restaurants, cafes, and markets right outside the door.  We really enjoyed our time!

The place was really excellent.  We were 5 women having a night in Sydney for a show and finding somewhere for 5 single people to sleep was amazing.  We could quite comfortable have been a family of 7 as 2 of the beds were queens.  The location was great. It is very central and convenient.  We could walk easily to the shops, restaurants and Town Hall station.  The beds were all comfortable as were the couches in the living room.  It was very clean with plenty of nice toiletries.  Danny is a wonderful host and the price was very reasonable.  I would highly recommend this place.

It was our first time staying with airbnb and we couldn't have wished for a better start.
Their place is very nice, clean and comfortable. Ashlee and Duncan were nice hosts and we enjoyed the conversations which were quite entertaining as well not to forget the nice self made honey we had! :)
It was handy to be so close to the city and it was easy to get there as it's just one bus stop.

Thanks for accommodation us.
Cheers,
Mathilda and Kim
Dino's apartment is just perfect. Beautiful, very well equipped in a dream neighbourhood for foodies. Dino is also the perfect host. Thank you.

This place is amazing!! The house and views are better than expected and everything is provided so all you have to do is relax or for those that’s up for adventure there’s so much happening around the area. Bailey has been great and we have already booked to stay again during the new year weekend!
Awesome host, very friendly and helpful. Highy recomend!
Great location and a great appartment in general. Places like these are why I prefer AirBnb above hotels.

Great little place to stay for a couple, excellent location, just a street up from the train station, Holey Moley and restaurants and coles. We felt very safe around the area, considering the bad reputation Kings Cross has, and being told we were next to a Gentlemen’s Club. Would recommend, perfect for a couple.
Susan was friendly and helpful.

Great place to stay, the apartment has everything you could ask for. 

Jenny is very accommodating.

It was just like staying in a hotel. 

I'd recommend staying if you are after an alternative to a hotel suite. 

I would stay again.

The location of Paul's apartment is perfect. It's extremely close to the Manly Wharf and a smaller beach which was great for the kids. Paul was very responsive and helpful. We had a great holiday and were really happy we chose Paul's apartment for our stay.

Hernan and Connie were wonderful and friendly hosts. Their appartment has a great vibe and is a short walk from the Bay Street shops and restaurants. Their place was an ideal place for me while I was attending a conference at the Brighton le sands Novotel.. Thanks again!
굿

Very good. Came to this place on short notice (1 hour) after talking to the host. There are a number of wifi networks in the unit but the host made sure I could connect easily and everything went well. Host left fruit and chocolate too which I didn't eat but was very thoughtful! Top marks!
房东实在太好了,不光给了我们各种当地的出行建议,还配合我们的行程给予了不少方便,让我们可以放心去玩,不需要担心行李问题,特别友好贴心｡更给力的是,当天晚上我们离开,叫不到的士,房东二话不说帮我们沟通并让我们成功顺利坐上了的士｡感激不尽,在异国他乡,有这么乐于助人,友好的同胞｡下次如果再去悉尼,也会选择这里｡
整个入住体验很舒服,位置很赞,日出第一束光照进房间,让我一天的心情大好｡房东非常热心｡感谢对我的帮助｡
De locatie is perfect, op loopafstand van het strand. Je krijgt veel lokale tips en je kunt in het huis overal gebruik van maken. Zelfs kaartjes voor openbaar vervoer liggen klaar.

I had such a great time at Adrian’s house !
Very central location with a quiet room and super fun hosts, it s the perfect place to get social, 
Miss you already guys, I ll be back !

It was a really nice stay! The location is perfect, and everything you might need is just within walking distance or a short drive. Everything in the house is well signed and it just took us a sec to find the things we needed. Jeremy is a awesome host! Big thanks from my families and me!
Ollie is a fantastic host! The place is perfect and located centrally to near everything by either walking or transit.
