The place was great - exactly what was on the description. Lovely room with lots of light, clean and cosy.

Beautiful place, good value, great location and close to North Sydney station, very clean! Thank you Victoria. Warm reminder for next guests- please bring your own shampoo, conditioner, body wash, dish washer tablets.

Easy and welcoming communication before we arrived.Arriving late at night was no problem at all.The place was spotless,well equipped,comfortable and beautiful (Website hidden by Airbnb) not expect to have fresh fruit,coffee,tea,shampoo etc. provided,awesome!The place was an entirely private section of a family home,perfectly cool on a hot summer day and very close to all great things in Newtown.Would certainly stay there again!

Didn't had the chance to meet our host, but she was extremely helpful and provide us great suggestion on places to go and how to get around.

Went the extra mile by providing us some basic groceries as we had an extended stay. Which was a pleasant surprise :) highly recommend 

Place was very clean :)

Mal was very nice and arrived with some groceries and fresh flowers a few hours into my stay and also shared with me some favorite spots to visit in the neighborhood! 

Overall, a really nice place to stay - great location in North Bondi, easy check-in process, good communication leading up to the stay, and it felt very safe (for a solo woman). Mal was great with offering to let me check out later on Sunday if it was better for my flight schedule.

I would not describe the apartment as "luxury" as the post does, but it could be there with some minor improvements. I did love the natural light and high ceilings! 

The apartment building was quite loud many of the nights (thurs/fri/sat), but that's no fault to Mal of course, just the neighbors. They typically quieted down by around midnight or one - and it is Bondi after all - nothing that wasn't solved with a pair of earplugs.

My partner and I were really happy with our stay! Gorgeous home, full of character and even lovelier hosts~
We definitely reccomend~

Our stay at Beach Escape was terrific. The location is incredible and although it doesn't have it's own private jetty, there is a public one 100m away. We spent the days boating on beautiful Pittwater and at the basin and retreated back to the house at dusk. Bailey's house in fabulous, with incredible views across Pittwater. Each level has a lounge room and private space for guests. We certainly would love to come back and stay at the Beach Escape.

The location was perfect for us, very close to both Central Station (and therefore the airport), and cafes and shops around Surry Hills and Oxford Street. The apartment is larger than we expected and was nice and clean. Having an additional set of keys readily available for larger groups of people would be good to save some hassles.

Michy is a gorgeous host, willing to help in thoughtful ways to make her guests feel welcome and comfortable. The space is lovely. Quiet neighbourhood very close to the water with good coffee at a nearby restaurant. Other features of the area accessible by bus or car. I didn't want to leave and hope to return another time.

Perfectly ok for the business trip I used it for. It is obviously a former hotel. its a little tired but comfortable enough. It's on the fringe of the city rather than central cbd but train station fairly close. Lots of cooking smells from adjoining apartments which was a bit annoying. It has a good gym with equipment that seems pretty  much brand new. I didn't use the pool but it looked good.

It’s an awesome place more than our expectations. The hospitality, warmth and passion from Lucy and Ralphs impressed us a lot. Frankly speaking, Lucy and Ralphs are the best householder we met in the world. We will choose the same place without any hesitation if we come back to Sydney next time!

I enjoyed every moment of my stay in this house - full of light, style, harmony and fresh smell of flowers. But the most important that due to my stay in Cecilia's house, I found my own people, who are searching for something more and strive for bigger in their lives. I loved this experience of sharing, learning and living together like a family. Definitely, my time in Sydney was so amazing thanks to this exceptional chance to live in this lovely house.
Paul, Judith and Tim were really friendly and welcoming and I felt at home immediately. The house is so well situated for travelling to city or beaches, its a great place to stay in Sydney.
Juliette's house was amazing and beautiful. I love the city view from her dining room. her childrens are very lovely. Thankyou for the place :)

Natasa was absolutely lovely. She described how to get to her place in great detail and even helped me put with my Uber on the last day.
Her place was cosy and she even took me out around Sydney!
Her place is literally next to the train station which works great if you don't drive in Sydney.
She had a dozen types of teas for me to select from and also gave me recommendations for things to visit.
I felt very welcomed and at home - as though I had been living there for months!
Would definitely stay there again and hang out with Natasa. :)

We were very happy with our stay at the cottage. It is in a great location for public transport including buses, light rail & rail. The local shops at Dulwich Hill have all your grocery needs with lots of great cafes & bars to choose from. The internet was great & Netflix was a nice bonus. Patrick & Christine responded immediately to nay issues or queries we had. The appliances were modern & worked well. Bedding was of a high quality & the bed very comfortable. Everything was as listed on the amenities site. The pantry items & consumables supplied were a lovely bonus. The only downside was that the 2 radiators were inadequate for the area to be heated. We would recommend this cottage.

Great apartment in a quiet complex. 

Mohit was a great host and very responsive to questions and assisting with check in and check out.

Would highly recommend and would stay again

Hilde's place is lovely and she has provided the personal touch.
She is quick to respond to any needs and goes out of her way to make your stay as easy as possible. Her accommodation is clean, warm and inviting. She really has furnished the place with style and thoughtfulness. We loved our stay!
Evelyn's place is exactly as in the pictures. Very clean and stylish! Great views and close to everything.

위치가 정말 좋았다. 근처에 있는 카페에 그냥 들렀는데 퀄리티 좋은 식사를 했고, 버스와 트레인 등 교통에 대한 접근성이 정말 좋은 위치였다. 

화장실이 다소 물조절하는 방식이 낯설고 옛날 방식인 것과 와이파이가 ADSL이라 느린점을 제외하고는 정말 만족했다.
Susan again made our Sydney stay memorable.We can't recommend her highly enough.she is a deserved Super Host!

Hong is a lively and wonderful lady. She has a heart of gold. She kept us very comfortable and treated just like her own family. Provided us with the privacy we wanted. The place was wonderful. House was cosy and the room was sparkling clean and bed was very much comfortable.  She also provided us the crib for our toddler. She has a lovely and friendly dog. She went out of the way to provide us comfort. Also she hosted a wonderful New year day lunch for guests. The room also had an AC which was much needed in warm nights of December. Highly recommend to everyone.
Great bnb, convenient, super clean and great extras, loved the chocolate cake.

Great house with an amazing view over Manly Harbour, lovely room and Leslie and her family made us feel at home. They gave us everything we needed including the Opal cards.
A bit far from the city but was worth it for the quality and price!
Really loved the place, warm and cosy and close to king cross station. Great place for a few days in Sydney! Value for money in the CBD area.:)

A fantastic clean space right in the heart of Newtown/ Camperdown. Comply bed, sparkling new bathroom. 
Loved it

Wonderfully clean and stylish apartment steps from the beach - I even considered missing my flight home to stay longer! Kasey is an amazing and responsive host, could not recommend the apartment more highly!
great location. very close to beach. The check in procedure was easy and smooth. The house itself was clean and cosy. will definitely come back again! Thank you Marcella

This place was in a fantastic location and we could walk or catch transport to most places.
The reviews did not make it clear that there are 2 separate apartments within the property and we had the studio.
It was very small but adequate for the two of us and we were out most of the time. Great shower. Would recommend for short stays.
Great neat and tidy place, modern and in a very good neighbourhood. Easy street parking .
Small, cozy, and very stylish place! Will definitely come back!

Anita was a fantastic host and went above and beyond. This was my second time in Bondi Beach and next time I visit I’ll be staying here again. 5 stars! The location is central to all the Bondi has to offer. It’s near a busy street but with the windows closed you don’t hear much.
Great place for a big group! Very clean and easy to get to.

Rachel was super! Everything was found as described and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at her lovely house in Mossman! It was perfect for us as we had a wedding to attend at Balmoral Beach which is not too far away.
Great location, close to services, spacious room and made to feel very welcome.

This was our first time using Airbnb and we had a really positive experience.  Nathan was very quick to respond to our messages and was very easy to deal with.  We appreciated Nathan and April's recommendations, which were very helpful.  The apartment was exactly as described.  It has been set up really nicely and is light and airy, clean and comfortable.  The kids' room in particular is great.  The apartment is in a perfect location, being just across from the beach but still quiet at night.  We really enjoyed our stay here.  Highly recommended!
A great place to stay, would definitely recommend. a wonderful location with a nice modern feel, only issue is the host took multiple messages to reply.
Very easy, smooth communication, makes you feel like it's your own place.

Was awesome! Couldn't have asked fora better stay! The room was neat and tidy with everything you could want available!! Plenty of parking and the bus stop that takes you to Sydney center is right on the corner! Thoroughly enjoyed my stay!

Annie's place was incredible - smack bang in the middle of everything but the apartment itself seemed secluded from the noise of the streets below. Walking distance to oxford street and all the call bars in Surry Hills, really couldn't ask for a better location! Annie's apartment had everything you could think of and more, and Annie was accommodating and a pleasure to deal with :) We couldn't recommend Annie's apartment highly enough!
Its very close to everything and Ann was very nice! Highly recommended!
Good location . Cleaness

The location of this property was central to transport - an easy train ride in from the airport and short walk from museum station

Lots of communication from the host.

The property was nothing special - served its purpose - wouldn't rush back in a hurry - hosts could do a lot more to make the property more accommodating for business guests
I had a great stay, lovely place and even lovelier host.

Anitta's apartment is perfect for solo travelers or couples. It is easy to find, close to public transportation, in a safe and quiet area. Anitta's directions were flawless and incredibly helpful making check-in a breeze. This apartment is close public transportation and it is easy to get anywhere in Sydeny. This unit felt very private even with lots of windows and natural light. We loved it!
Everthing was perfect!

What a cool house!  A great way to stimulate the creative mind while staying in comfort. The bedroom was very comfortable and the hosts were really nice. Great historic area with cafes and little specialty shops just around the corner. This quickly became my favorite airbnb place.

My partner and I stayed here for our babymoon and it was magnificent. Beautiful space, really friendly hosts and fantastic location. Has everything you need (loved the Foxtel and bath!) and Avalon is such a great location year round with fantastic restaurants and great walks/beach. We had the best time. Highly recommend.

Evelyn and Anthony are wonderful hosts. Always available and approachable while at the same time totally respecting one's privacy. Helpful with tips on local to dos, very hospitable, flexible and proactive (e.g. towel and linen change during our 10 days stay).

The place itself is a great choice as well: stunning views over Pittwater Bay, fully equipped and tastefully furnished. It is located in absolute proximity to two beaches; Avalon with the ocean beach, its shops and good restaurants is in walking distance. 

To sum it up: highly recommended, we would visit again anytime.

Good host who was easy to communicate with :) place was nice and clean with all necessary amenities. Location was as stated, located 10mins walk from Newtown station which is super handy and close to all the shops, food and bar. Overall, lovely, 10/10!
Great host! Made us feel very welcome. Would be happy to stay there again when in Sydney

We spent a very enjoyable six nights at this property, it is in great location within walking distance of the Rocks,Barangaroo and Cockle bay which has many lively bars and restaurants. The apartment building is modern and very safe with a 24/7 concierge. You should be aware that there is major development in this area for the next few years and that it can be noisy with construction work during the day, this was not a major issue for us. The apartment is well furnished and is as it appears in the photos it is up to the standard of a good four star hotel. We found the check in to be a little irksome and the apartment a little lacking in what we would consider to be expectations in a top end property such as additional towels and sufficient toilet rolls for a weeks stay. We also felt there should be a house handbook which is particularly important for overseas visitors not familiar with how the air con and appliances worked as well as providing emergency numbers and location of the local hospital.Whilst none of this spoilt our stay we have passed our comments onto the owners who’ve responded positively.

Ann was the perfect host.  From the welcome smile, to the beautiful breakfast and the awesome surroundings, we were not disappointed.  Dangar island is beautiful and the weekend was made even more special by how well Ann looked after us.  Everything was as described and this place is full of history.  Definitely worth a visit

Brenda has a beautiful home. It is a perfect place for a quiet, relaxing stay close to all the Too spots in the area. We were visiting our Mum in hospital and we couldn't have found a better place. Brenda is a wonderful and welcoming host and I highly recommend her place to anyone. 
Regards, Mary

A great apartment! Fantastic view of the ocean, spacious apartment with great outdoor space. Easy and quick walk to Bronte beach and Bondi. All amenities provided and superb communication from Ruby. Highly recommended and would definitely stay again.

Amazing hosts

Help was always a phone call away.
5 min walk to metro, great cafes nearby. Thank you Franca&Alessio
So close to Bondi beach, cafes and the nightlife. A comfy bed and all the things you need for a great getaway.
Clean, well-organised, new and easy to find your way around the neighbourhood.
What a house !! Exactly the pictures ! An artist home where you never get rid of exploring the decoration !

Great location, well set up, helpful hostess. Very comfortable beds, even the couches. You do have to feed the cat but that's known at the start and no imposition. The stairs are most steep so beware if that's an issue. We would stay again.

An incredible stay at this warm, cottage with excellent facilities! I recommend Belinda's hospitality highly. She provided us with comprehensive information of the local region. The decor of the space was very comfortable; a wonderful get-away!

Hugo place was lovely , very clean and comfortable . Gorgeous Art Deco building, location was amazing 
. Walking distance to all big attractions and city . Hugo was very helpful and flexible with all requests and even though he was out of the city his friend Oliver met me and was very welcoming and accomodating . 
Seriously a great host and place to stay , I'll be back
Sherrie

Don's flat is spacious and cozy and it has everything you need to enjoy a great stay, including a nice little garden and a fully equipped kitchen.

The flat is very quite but it's just around the  corner from so many superb cafes and restaurants. The area, Surry Hills, is in my opinion the most vibrant and interesting in Sydney and Don's place is right in its heart.

Don is a fantastic host and a very nice person: communication was great from the moment I booked to when I checked out and during my 9-day stay he constantly made sure I was enjoying my staying. And I certainly did: I hope I'll have the chance to travel again to Sydney and stay at Don's flat once more
We had an excellent time staying in Maroubra. Marcella was extremely welcoming to our group and was more than happy to tell us about the area. We look forward to returning one year
Wendy's place is very stylish. She communicates very fast and gives excellent directions for checking in and finding her place. The apartment has special touches to make you feel at home.
Great place, so close to everything. Enjoyed my stay thoroughly. Highly recommended for other guests for future bookings.

Paul and Diannes place really feels like a home away from home. Such a perfect spot and parking in the street is easy and accessible. I love staying at this very homely and cosy cottage. Paul and Dianne are lovely hosts and extremely welcoming .

Although based on a main road we were able to find parking easily and the traffic noise was not too distracting. We were able to create a cosy space with the heaters and fantastic bedding and appreciated the local menus left - highly recommend Zeus for souvlaki! The wooden floors next door meant the noise carried through however this wouldn't stop me staying here again. Fantastic check in process and such lovely, warm attentive hosts.

Loved this apartment in Avalon. Beautifully styled and finished with a cool, sophisticated beachy aesthetic and a lovely outlook into the garden. Angela was a great host, and went over and above to make sure we had everything we needed and more - she even provided fresh, organic fruit and croissants.

Highly recommend this place
Good solid place.  Cheers Jeremy

Suzie was great. I had great communication with her from the start. She was also very flexible with my check in time. Her place is located near everything I wanted to see during my brief time in Sydney. It was also clean and I had my own bathroom. I would definitely stay here again.

Rhonda is a "super host" in every sense of the word. Welcoming, thoughtful, relaxed and has great taste in music & movies! I was able to cook myself a meal in her kitchen, even though Rhonda was in the midst of cooking for herself and her son ...... nothing was too much trouble. Then after we'd eaten, we settled in to her warm cosy loungeroom to watch a movie. There's a nice sunny outdoor table and chairs to eat breakfast at and the sparkling clean bathroom & toilet were easy to access from the unit, even in the middle of the night. A 5-star experience at a very reasonable rate!
What a find! Just minutes from Kingsford Smith makes this a great place to launch from if you have an early flight, or need a sleep after a late arrival.

Five Stars!!!! Amazing host who is super professional and attentive. This was my favorite Airbnb rental ever and I have rented quite a few.  Amazing space that is clean, modern, and nestled in the best neighborhood. The space boast all the comforts you should expect on vacation and many more. I highly recommend this space and I can’t wait to return to Sydney to stay again.

Hernan was a great host. He was timely on his communications and provided great advice on the things I wanted to visit in Sydney.  We did not chat a lot as I was hardly in the house. Cheers Hernan. Thanks for the stay.
Hoa
The unit is very well located and great value. Sally is an excellent host
Great location and lovely room
Mariana was so accommodating with our late flight arrival. Great, clean and perfectly located studio. Perfect for the weekend away. Quiet and really comfy bed. Thanks Mariana!
What an amazing place! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and we hope to be back soon!

We had a fantastic time staying at this amazing place. Our hosts were cordial, communicative, amicable and made our stay really pleasant. We would highly recommend this cozy house for anybody who wishes to explore Mt Gambier and surrounds.
응답이 빨라서 좋았어요. 앤틱한 감성이라면 추천이지만, 현대식 시설을 원하시면 만족하지 못 할수도 있어요.
Sarah went above and beyond to ensure our stay was the best that it could be. Would definitely come back.
We enjoyed our stay in Chippendale, it's very central and the apartment is quite large. Phans communication was also great and the place is excellent value for money.
Good value, comfortable accommodation.  Some aircraft noise at night but bearable. Take own extras to go with cereal if wanted. Handy to rail station and wide range of shops.

It was nice to be in a convenient location, because the room is fashionable, very close from the main station.

主要な駅からとても近く､すごく便利な場所でした!部屋もおしゃれで素敵でした｡
Had a great stay, would definitely stay again!
Short easy walk to stadium. Great restaurants and cafes downstairs. Loved the apartment. Will definitely stay here again.
This place is very well located in Neutral Bay.  Nice restaurants, Pilates studio around and beautiful places for walking.

Location of this place is really convenient,quiet to relax and only less than 10 minutes of walking to major markets,shopping mall. Lots of cute restaurants,cafes in narrow streets nearby which make strolling very agreeable. Four big bedrooms make life easier for our group of 7. The place is super clean and well stock of kitchen utensils,plates,cutlery,coffee maker. Jeremy emailed us in advance the instruction to get in the place also. Would definitely recommend this place to everyone .

Our stay was quite good. It was fairly close to the city which is what we needed, with cafes etc nearby. There were 4 of us so we could have a bedroom each. Price was very reasonable and it suited our purpose. It was well stocked. Unfortunately the stairs presented problems for some of us who have joint issues.
Arnie's house is beautiful, it's in a great location and both him and Lorraine were very welcoming. Possibly the comfiest bed I stayed in during my time away! Highly recommend staying here.
Very nice private place and wonderful neighborhood.
Very convenient, cute apt. Great looking bathroom.

Hemos estado muy a gusto en casa de Jarmo. Desde el primer momento fue un detalle que nos esperase su hijo para explicarnos todo lo referente a la casa. La comunicación con el ha sido muy buena siempre y eso se agradece. La casa muy limpia y con todo lo necesario, incluso mas, como el aparato de música, la cama muy cómoda y la cocina aunque pequeña con bastantes utensilios.
La casa es igual que en las fotos, no decepciona en absoluto. Las vistas son increibles. Y esta en pleno centro de Manly y a dos pasos de su fantástica playa.
Ha ido una buena semana en Sydney!
La recomiendo totalmente!
What a cute little house! Would definitely stay there again. Had everything we needed and the location was amazing.
Loved Leena's place.  Will definitely recommend this property to others.
I'm really glad I choose Miss D's house. She is very organize and thoughtful, so I can just relax and enjoy holidays. Thank you for everything!

CRAIG&LEONIE are two amazing host! They pefectly welcome us and made us feeling really confortable for our stay. 
The home is exactly as expected, beautiful, clean and warm ! The room is also cosy and quiet, everything to have a lovely life.
Really easy to communicate with them and they don't hesitate to share their australian experience which is really enjoyable :) 
As many things which made our travel unforgettable !
Great apartment in a good location with good shops and restaurants. Wonderful view of harbour. Well equipped and spacious. Easy walk to ferry.
Everything was Great
Great place to stay if you wanna be close to the airport. We walked there without any problems. Highly recommended.
l'appartement ressemble aux photos sur le site, très bien situé en centre ville très calme et propre; je recommande vivement l'appartement de Hugo et Pamela

Great apartment, clean and spacious.
Communication and check-in was very easy.
Location is good - 5 min walk to king cross station.
Thank you David for your great hospitality!
Had a great stay .Close to beach and cafes.Nice (Website hidden by Airbnb) was really cute.

Great place, clean and tidy room
Comfortable location !!!
kind and friendly

Nous vous remercions de votre hospitalité, de votre disponibilité et de votre accueil, et du très bon entretien de votre appartement. Nous recommandons vivement cette appartement. Nous avons apprecier davoir le minimum de nourriture disponible à notre arriver.

This is a great place to stay.  $15 Uber from airport recommended as a lot of road works happening but if no luggage Mascot is a 5 min walk. The apartment is very well appointed and if it hadn't rained so much the deck would have been brilliant. Easiest check in ever, very well appointed and Evan responded  immediately to any query. Highly recommended and I'm hard to please!
Great venue, comfortable, well resourced and handy for travel amd food.
It was one of the best places that I have stayed in and I couldn't have asked for a better place and shuang was a wonderful host

Comfortable, clean modern  and private; they thought of it all - the house had everything we needed. The furniture is modern and comfortable! A great place to stay would book again without hesitation. Thank you to George great hospitality.

BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT!!! The host, Lucy was so hospitable and thoughtful, although this time we only had a short meet up.  The place is extremely clean and comfortable.  Highly recommend to all of you wanna explore another side of Sydney.
Great location, clean and tidy, easy communication with host. We loved it!

Louise's apartment was very clean and tidy. We were greeted by her partner in the afternoon and he showed us where everything was. 
Was so close to public transport, shops and restaurants. We had the best time and would recommend this place to anyone.

I've stayed with Cath before and I would stay again. 
Cath is a professional at this business without the boring-ness of a hotel. She's lovely, her studio is lovely and the location is great.

Lovely apartment, close to darling harbour and the CBD! We walked everywhere which was great. 
Apartment was clean and great size!  
Was a tad bit noisy at night time from people walking around the building/apartments but didn’t fase us at all! 
Great stay, would recommended!!
Good Value for money, In a nice location for exploring.

The view from the Beach House is a stunner - unspoilt panoramic views across the pittwater - it's truely unique and one of our favourites.  We had a wonderful family holiday our children loved the outdoor spaces and had loads of freedom within earshot of us. The house is well appointed and the kitchen has everything you need and more. Richard was a great host and easy to get in touch with. We stayed for 2 weeks and the weather overall was fantastic. We were thankful for this as the main house is small for two families (particularly when it's raining and you can't get outside). One small gripe was the main bathroom which is really in need of an update. The shower drain blocked a couple of times which we had to pump out. There were ants at night coming through the cracks in the wall. It was all pretty basic. The house is not cheap over the school holidays and at the rate we were paying we would have expected this to be in better condition. Overall we had a great stay. PS we thankfully didn't see the 1.5m goana roaming the property, just possums and wallabies!
This place is amazing! Simone is a great host, replying very quickly to my queries. The house is very welcoming, comfortable and perfectly located. Would love to stay here again!

Goodness. An air bnb host with both a great sense of style AND with relaxed insight into what makes for guests feeling really welcome and comfortable.  The linen was yummy to sleep in and the plethora of breakfast and snack offerings in the basket and fridge were also a great treat.  We could walk to more in the area than we even managed to do in the 3 days we were there (so there is no shortage of great food or entertainment). Even with an air mattress on the downstairs floor my friend and I felt we had plenty of room.  We'd stay there again in a flash. Next time we'll bring our nona trolleys, and cooler bags and shop up on goodies from the Greek deli and places on illawarra rd.
很小,卧室是用木板隔开来的.没有窗户,很闷.当我打开被子,床上还有两只蟑螂,住得很不愉快

Nice snd confy 1 night stay.
Good option for a quick night accomodation.
David es un excelente anfitrión. La casa es muy recomendable y su situación inmejorable
Very good location!
Justine & Sam were very communicative and accomodating and helpful. We had a great stay in this quiet leafy retreat.

We were very please with the apartment and its location. Unfortunately, we did not meet Nicole in person, but Donna was very kind to wait for us and give us the key. The unit is very well appointed and comfortable. Nice partial view of the Sydney skyline from the rooftop area. We were lucky to be in town for Vivid Sydney.
A great appartment with amazing views. Lots of restaurants within walking distance. I recommend this appartment if you are attending any functions in Olympic Park.
great location, omio was very nice and accomodating
Very good
Perfect place to stay.  Comfortable and immaculate presentation. Close to the beach.  Jenny is just lovely and very hospitable.  Thoroughly recommend this lovely house and location.
Our stay with Gavin was perfect, his apartment is fantastic and he was an excellent host. I would recommend that anyone coming to Sydney stay here.
Amazing pool. So nice to go for a dip on a hot Sydney day. Sarah went above and beyond to get everything ready for my arrival.
挺好的房间

Everything about my stay with Cindy and Claudio had been lovely. Their cozy apartment was the perfect place to go home to after a day spent out exploring Sydney. The room was so comfortable, their place was accessible to everywhere quite easily and I had a totally wonderful experience altogether. My brief encounter with them also showed how friendly they are. This place is definitely recommended and I wouldnt hesitate to stay here again if I'm back in Sydney. Cheers. :)

Had a great week in Karen's lovely apartment. The room was clean, light and spacious. Karen's a great host and went out of her way to make sure I was happy. 
Great location few minutes walk to the beach, restaurants and cafe's and easy access to public transport. Would definitely recommend for anyone visiting Bondi!
The proximity to the airport made our life real easy...
All was good and came in very handy thank you
Erin’s Airbnb is exactly like the photos it’s clean and stylish and so easy to check in. Such a beautiful Airbnb if you’re looking for a home away from home this Airbnb is the one you’d want to book!
Isabelle was extremely communicative throughout the entire stay. The location and space was great and I thoroughly enjoyed my time there. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking at booking.

Tam was super accessible, we never felt like we were a hassle if we needed to ask a question. It's a lovely spot, surrounded by a part of Sydney we'd not explored yet. Very comfy bed, spacious bathroom, perfect for a cosy stay or a place to come home to in Sydney. We loved the balcony in particular. A great central home, hosted very well.
Great place, good location, consideration given to the finer touches. Recommend!
Convenient location to Olympic park activities and train station.  Great cafes and restaurants within walking distance.
Very nice apartment in a great location right by Barangaroo with a great balcony. Everything was spotless and the bathroom was one of the highlights. Would definitely recommend in the future!
Nice clean apartment, close to Darling Harbour & tourist destinations of Sydney. Comfy bed & good amenities
Good location and access to public transport. Host Heidi was helpful and communicative. Nice walks around the area. OK value. Need to like cats.
Great location, Great place! have stayed here before and will stay again! Thank you!
Great location, quick and easy communication.

I really enjoyed the stay. Yasmin is very easy going, thoughtful and friendly. She prepared us some chocolate and wine as it was my boyfriends birthday.  
The house is amazin with grate design. Walking distance to bus to the city. Our room is very comfy with ensuite and aircon. Definitely recommend!

Again, our stay with Fei was like wonderland. Its a dream-world. 
I hope to make it my second home in Sydney : )
Good property, well maintained, clean and warm

Tracy and Rod were brilliant hosts and pre-trip and during my stay made sure I had everything I needed. The apartment was fantastic and had everything I needed. Wonderful location and completely private. Would stay there again!
Worth place to stay

Location, location, location.  This place is an attached, two-story condo on the beach block. It's walking distance to the train into Sydney and downtown Cronulla. The neighborhood is safe and the "take-away" place across the street does great "long black" coffee.  

Robert, a great host, welcomed me, my husband and 3 small daughters warmly and we had a WONDERFUL time.

This private & quiet retreat offered a pleasurable solace, but so well situated being a short walk to the beach, golf course & local cafes.
Gail & Kim were delightful hosts, & very accommodating. 
Highly recommended!
the apartment is near the train station. Convenient and clean. everything we needed are all provided.

Great space in the perfect location. The space is lovely and big, with separate tv room, big bedroom and a lovely patio with fountain. There is onsite parking and the location is only 4 mins walk to the stylish Newport hotel and 15 mins walk to shops and cafes and the beach. 
Great location and Tessa and Rod were very friendly! Will def come back!
Chloe was slow to respond, and didn't respond to messages sometimes. Otherwise a great stay! Great location.

We would not recommend staying here at all. For just $10 more you could stay at the Marriott across the road and enjoy a clean room. The apartment was not properly cleaned: gaps between cabinets and white appliances showed piles of dust and dirt; tiles missing on shower exposed mold; stains were all over the walls and there was an intense chemical smell throughout the apartment. The location was perfect, but it seemed obvious the host was cutting corners to produce a profit. We love staying with Airbnb all around the world, but the lack of care and attention to detail in this unit is unacceptable.

For sure the biggest value added of this house is the location, just 5 minutes from Bondi Beach. Another plus is the bus stop just right in the corner that bring you to Bondi Junction where you can get the tube. The check in isn’t the easiest one whereas there are instruction (mostly if done in late evening). The flat is perfect up to 2 persons and is quite clean, even if something more could be done. At the end, considering the general picture, I’d suggest this accommodation to another guest.
Just perfect!  Facilities were all well working and location was great. You can walk to many tourist spot.

Contact et entrée facile, très proche de l'aéroport, quartier calme et appartement propre
Parfait pour une nuit avant ou après un vol!
房屋离公交站走一个路口,厨房可以简单煮个鸡蛋,很干净,可以洗衣烘干
The house is in a great location for access to Bondi Beach.  It is on a quiet street and away from the noise of Bondi.  The house would be suitable for families.

Perfect location!  Couldn’t have been easier to see the sites. The apartment had nice amenities and was comfortably cozy. Chloe was easily accessible and responsive. 

Do Consider adding an extra day for luggage storage. Arriving from Dallas on a 6 am flight doesn’t provide many options. We ended up storing luggage at smarte carte in the Rocks which worked out ok.  

We will be back again!

Evelyn's place was the perfect spot for our relaxed weekend away by the water.
The views was stunning and we loved the sauna and the pool too.
Nice interior design and great location. We easily walked to Avalon as well as the nearby Paradise beach.
Thanks Evelyn for having us!

We are also Air B&B hosts with lots of our own travels to compare.
Angela & her accommodation offer are commendable.
Great location with easy commute from Sydney Airport, very short walk to beach & photos are an honest reflection of her space.
Angela has been more that helpful & is very good as a host.
I’d come back here without hesitation. Thanks Angela

A beautiful location and Michy and Paul were kind hosts. The only issue was the lawnmower man coming through the backyard at 9am. There for some peace and a sleep in but our luck brought the mower man too. Great place though.

We stayed at Paul’s place for 3 nights. The location is great, a 20-minute walk from the opera, surrounded by shops and restaurants. The flat was clean and very pleasant to stay in. I would totally highly recommend it for a stay in Sydney !

Diana welcomed us at the apartment, showed us how to enter and leave the complex. Garage underneath and shops also under the apartments easily accessible. Apartment was as described. We were entirely satisfied and would return .Apartment itself very clean with all facilities you would require.
This could was ok could be better looked after and maintain better

Cath was incredibly accommodating and her place is perfect for a getaway for two! Cath's little flat is modern and clean and sleek with a fun loft bed that helped you feel hidden away from the world. The area is great if you want to be a little ways from the busyness of the city but not too far to travel either. Cath provided us with fresh bread and croissants for breakfast which was just the cherry on top of a wonderful stay. Cath is a friendly host who will assist you with anything you need. If you're looking for a calm stay outside the city then this is the place for you! Would definitely stay their again. Thanks Cath!

I can not speak highly enough of Louise's apartment. If you are after the quintessential eastern suburbs stay and experience- this is it. Fabulous, roomy apartment in great location. Louise went out of her way to accomodate us at last minute and made us feel very welcome. Loved it. Robyn

My partner and I was happy staying at Tam's beautiful apartment in Darlinghurst. Tam's description of the space is accurate, and the apartment is, if anything, more beautiful than the photos might suggest. The house was immaculately cleaned and maintained, well equipped in a lovely neighborhood. The location is amazing; Hyde Park is literally 1 min walk from the apt, close to good restaurants, coffee shops, and convenient store. The setting is perfect for a weekend or holiday getaway. Perfect for tourists or when you're on a business trip. 

I didn't get to meet Tam as he was away for holiday. But things were easy! Tam was a terrific host; he responded promptly to my initial query, and once we were there, it seemed that he'd thought of everything. Highly recommended!

Our stay at Paul’s place was really great. The location is great to spend time in Darlinghurst or near Circular Quay, and still amazing if you don’t mind a bit of a walk to Darling Harbour and Barangaroo. His book of local recommendations was a life saver, and he was great with communication overall. The place is basic but stylish and contains everything you need.
Cathy is a wonderful host

I would happily live in this apartment as it is. The view is spectacular and the apartment is very comfortable with a very well equiped kitchen good internet and all the comforts of home including a nice bed. I love this location, close to the train and direct access to the city but in a lovely neighbourhood again with unbeatable views of the harbour. Everything is good quality and the inclusions well thought out to make things easy for your stay. I have rented Airbnb properties all over the world, this is one of the first ones that I sent links to my friends. You won't be disappointed.
Lovely place, modern and clean and the size perfect for 2 people.
Sarah is a fantastic host! Very helpful and friendly! The room was extremely clean. Highly recommended!

We had a wonderful time at Adams place. The Flat was clean and hab everything you could need. 5 mins to KingsCross
Alex
Fantastic

Anitta's place was in a fab location just a short walk from the beach. It was a great base for us as we explored Sydney and the Eastern suburbs. It was a bit cold, because it was winter, but Anitta told us where to find extra blankets and provided a heater. And although she was overseas was really quick to respond to any queries we had. We had a really lovely time.

to get to your room or to the kitchen you have to go through the room where the host is sleeping .you have to share the same toilet with him.
the location is very central and for that usually possibly very silent (during my booking unfortunately there was construction work next door going on).
the house  has also a very nice roofgarden (in case you are smoker)
Hernan is very friendly,you will feel comfortable staying (Website hidden by Airbnb) close to the airport,5 mins walk to the beach,but a little noise.
We loved the 18th floor privacy, views and security. Very clean with everything we needed. Our host did everything to make our stay easy and enjoyable. We would stay here again.

Appartement charmant, calme et bien équipé. Les instructions de Linda ainsi que les informations et documentations sur le quartier, les moyens de transport, les endroits à  visiter etc parfaitement claires et utiles. Situation idéale pour visiter Sydney, tout près de la station de train/metro Redfern, ou même à pied à 15 mn de la gare centrale. ...Séjour parfait. J'y reviendrais sans hésitation. Thank you Linda.

This is a fantastic family home in a beautiful part of Sydney. Great views, excellent outdoor decks and the perfect size pool.  Beds were very comfortable and the linen was of a good quality.  Plenty of a space for a family or in our case multi generational family.  
Great coffee shop and local shops nearby although I would suggest you need a car to access restaurants and major shops.
Kitchen is well stocked with everything you need.
Very comfortable family home.
Un petit coin sympa, avec des balades au bord de mer toute proche, la vue de la maison est superbe, la chambre à tous se qu'il faut.

The Garden Studio is lovely and Cath friendly and very helpful. We really enjoyed our stay with a yummy breakfast of cereal or fresh eggs (from the three beautiful chickens) and plenty of things to do. The apartment is perfect, short walk to the train or bus, and close to shops and restaurants. Highly recommended! Thanks Cath for a great stay!

Location is great and the pool and tennis court are a bonus.  The apartment was quiet and the host easy to communicate with.  I would happily recommend this apartment for anyone wanting to explore Sydney.
Wonderful place. Beautifully decorated with thoughtful extra touches.

We booked on short notice, we found Wendy's accommodation excellent.  Responses were prompt and helpful. We were flying to Canada because of a sick grandchild, the hassle free night at Wendy's was a good start to a long journey.
Great apartment, great location and great hosts. We would definitely stay here again!
Nice clean tidy place I would highly recommend it to anyone.

Belinda is SUPER! She's kind, lovely and, for sure, a SUPER HOST. She did everything for us to feel at home. The studio is super clean, the bed is soft and the trees around made us feel comfortable and in peace.

There are some stairs in the backyard in your way to the house, so consider that if you are bringing many bags to carry.

We spent 3 days with her and had a great time in Bundenna. The beaches are THE BEST! If you like flat beaches, you will love it. Ask for the Ferry beach and Wattamolla. Super!

Well, super guest Belinda, amazing place to stay.. We strongly recomend it :) Thanks, thanks, thanks!
Nice location, close to UNSW and Coogee beach. Cindy and Claudio were very hospitable. The place was very clean. I would not hesitate to stay with them again.

Location was good if you were attending a concert at Sydney Olympic Park/Qudos Bank Arena, as is only a $12 taxi ride away. It was a 22 degrees winters day in Sydney, however when entering the apartment it was stifling hot, even with all windows open. We closed all windows and blinds and put the air con on and it took forever to cool down the apartment as it has floor to ceiling length windows. I would hate to imagine what it would be like on a 35+ degrees day in Sydney's summer. The bed was rock hard and the pillows offered no support, so I would suggest bringing your own pillow. The total cost was $186.56 AUD for a one night stay on a Monday night, when booking more than five months in advance. $65 of this was a cleaning fee, which I find excessive as to have the bins emptied, sheets changed and a quick vacuum would not take very long. There were a couple of convenience stores nearby. We walked over the foot bridge to find somewhere for lunch but both places were closed, so other than one small cafe nearby there was nowhere within walking distance to eat out.

I had such a great stay with Duncan and Ashley.  Their little apartment was very inviting and had everything I needed. It was clean and tidy and nicely presented with bunches of flowers which were replaced/refreshed during my stay. More little touches such as the brand new white fluffy towels rolled on the end of my bed and topped with Lindt Chocolates made this stay a really pleasant experience. 
And as for Duncan and Ashley.....these are two super friendly, interesting and generous people. I had a great chat with Duncan when I arrived and he invited me to come on his boat... and then chatting to Ashley on the last night she offered to come along with me to a gallery the following day.  These two go out of their way to include you in Sydney.  I could not recommend this AirBnB enough.
A lovely room! Had a great stay at Kath's, she provided plenty of advice about Sydney, the dog was a gigantic cutie, and the balcony made the place an absolute stand out :)
Perfect location in newtown! We had a great stay. We had an early check in so that was very Nice.
Great place to stay in Sydney, location was perfect for us and the accommodation was 5 star. Helen and Alice
Strategic location and fast response host

We had a wonderful stay in the apartment.  Thank you Oriel for being so patient with us and our paddling group.  We would love to come back again and when next in Sydney will definitely try to book with you again.
Clean, confortable place in an outstanding location.

Brilliant 2 bedroom place perfect for a short stay in Balmain. The house is close to Darling street shops and there is a bus stop about 5 mins walk that goes directly into CBD. Theres also a ferry stop which is about 10mins walk and we used that once for an alternative route into town. Theres a pleasant park down the road with fantastic views onto harbour bridge from Birchgrove.

The house itself is high spec with everything we needed and we loved using the courtyard for breakfast. 
Host was excellent and they installed an air con in the living room which worked out really well given the hot summer in Sydney at the time. 

Couldn't fault the place- highly recommended.

Thank you for a such a nice place. It is central and close to many things. We can walk to the museum, parks and shops.
We love the wide window with a lot of sunlight.
You are a very good host, David.
Your communication is great. Thank you for letting us check in early and check out late.

Carole's home was lovely! Everything was as described, and she was very responsive by phone to answer questions. Her partner Steve was home during most of our stay and readily available to answer any questions as well while Carole was working. Their dog Buddy is the cutest. The location is near a really cool part of town called Newtown. Highly recommend checking it out!
抱歉評論晚了,Host阿姨人非常地好 那是我到Sydney的第一天,隔壁住了一對夫妻 非常熱心 給我喝了他們的咖啡 還帶我去了火車站,他們家的房子很大很漂亮 廚房和洗手間都很乾淨,總之是一次很愉快的住宿｡
Good place. Easy access to shops.

We loved our time in Bryan’s accommodation! 
The cottage is very cozy, comfortable and perfectly located - close to the center and a just 3 minutes walk to the park. The park is perfect for jogging, skating, walks and provides an incredible view of the Anzac and Harbour Bridge! If you want to have another amazing view, you just need to go the cottage’s balcony and enjoy the sundown with a glass of good wine. 

We had an amazing time while we visited Sydney. If you search for a cozy home, close to the city, but a in quiet neighbourhood, the Glebe and Bryan’s cottage is perfect for you!!

The appartment is very easy to reach by train or bus. It is not big but big enough (and cute) as you will be out most of the time to explore Sydney. Millie is very accurate with response, tries to help the best she can with all kind of tips. The elevator in the appartment building was most convenient with our heavy suitcases..... :). Thanks again Millie.

The convenience of this apartment is fantastic, a short walk to the ferry, buses and trains which all lead to the City, the Stadium, Cafes and more. The hosts are wonderful and the apartment is well maintained.

Great location right on the beach. Champagne and chocolates on arrival a surprising touch. Fantastic sharp knives in the well equiped kitchen with a Nespresso and a good supply of pods to keep us caffeinated!
Parking on the street only an issue during the day in the busy summer holiday period but ample spots after hours.

Leslie and Eric's place is very nice and in a great location. We found buses and ferry's a plenty and really loved the apartment and all it's conveniences. Thanks To Leslie and Eric for a great stay..

Very modern, one year old, two story house. Tota and family are great hosts always attentive and helpful to our needs. Room with private bathroom was fantastic. Very neat clean, tidy and very spacious with lots of room and great open planning. Recommended as a very good airbnb house and hosts.

Tessa are wonderful hosts who care a great deal about their guests comfort and have all the  personal touches to make you feel at home. Even delicious homemade muffins and marmalade. It is central but very quiet. I hope to return.
An excellent place to stay, especially if you are driving. Very new, well thought out private unit with all mod cons. Small but great for one or two. I would definitely stay there again.

We arrive late (after 8pm)  Philip was there to meet us and go over the home.  You talk about Location it was the best location, walking to everything was right.  The home was clean and ready for us.  If we needed anything or questions Philip was just a phone call away and willing to help.  Thanks Philip if we come back to Sydney I would love to stay at your place again.
it's a nice and tidy place around 7 minutes from the station which is not bad. good value for money.
Richard is quick and helpful when responding to my numerous questions. The place was even more beautiful than i had imagined and there was beyond the necessary supplied for us.
This place is stunning.  Location superb and an amazing lifestyle.

This property is in a stunning location with easy access to the city (albeit by Ferry 1 hr or train 10min walk and 25 min train). Free car parking, awesome cooking facilities and an amazing IGA supermarket within 2 minute walk. The setup for families was good (room for parents, roll out for kids). Communication from Yang was great. Thank you
location quite strategic,  overall  satisfied.
Great, clean place! Susan was pleasant even for my short stay!

This is a beautiful, well-equipped and comfortable home full of eclectic decor and in a great location, close to transport, cafes, restaurants, interesting shops and markets. The stairs to the top bedroom are steep and the only bathroom is on the ground floor, so not suitable for anyone with disabilities or young children, but perfect for those who appreciate beauty and art and good living and prefer to be in an area that is lively and hip during the day but quiet at night. The sunny courtyard is a bonus, as are the friendly neighbours.

Phan is such a great host who is very friendly and helpful. Her place is clean and everything is handy. The location is very convenient which is just next to the central station. Highly recommend this place for families and friends!
Amazing place and convenient location. Wendy is very accommodating and responsive to messages.
Very convenient.  Close to all major attractions

That this was my third stay at this lovely place should tell you everything you need to know! It is a delightful getaway in a beautiful location. Can't recommend highly enough even if it means booking my fourth stay will probably be harder!
Nice clean place. Major problem was no towells which Wendy was not able to rectify. To her credit she did everything in her power to make up for it.
性价比很高的住宿,周边道路都可以免费停车,设备齐全,主人很善于沟通,位置比较好找｡没有看到蟑螂｡适合自驾旅行｡

Fabulous apartment . Spacious and stylish. 
Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Sydney. 
A tip! Visit Spice Alley for food. Only a few minutes walk.
This place was amazing, deceptively large floor plan, two balcony (city view, harbor view) just fantastic! Would look to book here again when next in Sydney.

Really cool place in a great part of town. The space is ideal for small groups. Really comfy sofas and beds. You are also in a cool part of town v close to the northern working district, and also to nature - go for a morning jog along the coast!! Also recommend the great little deli on Union St just a stone's through away. Sydney living at its best!

David's place is a gem in the whole city of Sydney. It's close to public transit, the place had a charm few other places have. Its placement, so close to the parklet of Potts Point, really make you feel like you're a world away. The stay was great thanks to David's little personal touches.

I arrived at Kerri's place, and thought, Hmmm...when can I move in? This is a fabulous apartment, and Kerri is a generous, thoughtful host who contributed a great deal to making my stay in Sydney very enjoyable indeed. Plus, we had a lot in common, which made for some lovely conversations! I would heartily recommend this place to travelers seeking a fine welcome in a beautiful apartment. Only word of note: if you're someone who needs absolute quiet, it's a bit noisy on weekday mornings (not weekends, which are much quieter).
Thanks Angela, I will come again and again

Griffin is a great host; friendly, flexible and kind. We were confronted with bad weather conditions in Sydney (our flight was cancelled) and he gracefully let us stay longer to accomodate alternative travel. Also Griffin answered  quickly and accurately to all our questions. 

The appartment is near Kings Cross Station and is easy to get to by tube from the airport and city center. You can walk from the city center, it is not far but you have to like climbing like I do! 

The building is an oldie but goodie. It is functional, nice and light. 
The appartment is on the 5th floor so I was greatful that Griffin could get my suitcase upstairs. I would never have been able to do it on my own.

The place consists of 3 spaces: a bedroom with a confy bed, table and a closet,  a bathroom with a bathtub and connecting this a small kitchen where  you can cook.
Griffin left for us water and some stuff in the kitchen which was very kind and handy for the first day.

There are 2 big supermarkets 2 minutes away.

There is an baggage airbnb nearby if you need to store your luggage. Very easy and good.
Good memories of Sydney couse by Sam'house.
Jared’s AirBnb was amazing. Super safe and great location- walking distance to everything! Check-in process was very easy and communication was quick. Highly recommend.

I stayed at Louise apartment for 2 weeks cause it is close to UNSW. It is convenient to visit my son who studies there. The apartment is same as the pictures shown in website, it is very clean with well equipped kitchen. I feel like at home and both me and my husband are satisfied staying here.
Very good place to live, house is really clean, giving you foods suggestion:)
Great place to stay with air con! Location and value was great. Definitely recommend!
Clean and fast responses from host. Great stay!
Exceptionally smooth, prompt and helpful communication from Angela, and a very comfortable and convenient place to stay.
房间不错,很安全｡厨房设施齐全｡

Although in a very busy location this apartment is very quiet ... very clean and hosted by an owner who communicates promptly. As there were three of us we appreciated two bedrooms with individual ensuites.
Well placed apartment for the area, clean and tidy. Had everything we needed.

Cath appartment is a wonderful place to stay when visiting Sydney.  The garden appartment is in a quite neighborhood but offers everything in close vincinity (shops, grocery stores, restaurants) and with the 2 Opal cards Cath provides you are perfectly equipped to use busses and trains to explore Sydney. 
I really enjoyed my stay and was treated like a king.

Great location! Easy to get to from central station and plenty of buses around the corner too. Bed was really comfy. Hosts were super friendly and flexible with our checkout - Thanks guys it was great.

Lovely place. Great experience. The views, the furniture, the deco, the convenience. Excellent! Would LOVE to rent again! And for those who say the parking is challenging or confusing, we disagree. It was really easy for us, just have to remember all the lefts and rights :)
Good location.

Thank you Tracy.  We had a most enjoyable stay. You live in a beautiful area with great access to the lake, the surf, public transport and all the wonderful facilities of Narrabeen.  The apartment is neat, clean and well appointed . We especially enjoyed eating our breakfast on the balcony while enjoying views of the lake and the beautiful tropical garden.  A great stay, thank you
You have a nice room, comfortable bed and a great view to the wharf from your room. Jackie and Martin are helpful and very kindly person. We highly recommended this room in Manly.
My husband and I stayed for 3 nights. It was a happy stay at Kath's home! It was clean and comfy. It was just like friend's house! Thanks for Kath!!!
Nice room in great location. Perfect for a return stay in my old stomping ground.

Wyatt is nice and very informative, gave us a lot of ideas where to go and how to go...
A convenience place to stay, only a min walk to bus stop from his place and 15 mins to Chinatown by bus Restaurants, convenience store and supermarket can easily reach by foot 
Thank you for your advice and caring msg, Wyatt 
All the best
Wendy and her mummy

I visit Sydney for work a few times a year and previously have stayed in motels. It is extremely difficult and expensive to find anything close to the city. So I thought I'd give airbnb a try and Kerri's place looked and sounded great. 

I was really pleased to have found Kerri's lovely apartment. Very comfortable and well designed and Kerri is the perfect host: even cooked me a lovely meal when I arrived and provided secure parking for my car. Kerri is very friendly and easy-going and you quickly feel like you're staying at an old friends house.

Thanks Kerri. I'm sure I'll be looking to stay again on future trips to Sydney
Loverly place. Very quite inside even though in busy area of Newtown. Great help with checkin and out
We had a lovely weekend at Susan's studio. Great location for exploring Bondi, Bronte, Clovelly and Coogee. Very clean, warm and comfortable and looks exactly as pictured.

Linda is really kind. She checked in on us on the day when we arrive and her apartment is 5 mins of walking to Redfern station and about 10 mins to Central station. Could not have ask for more and I really love the quietness of the apartment within the residential area.

It was a great experience staying there! Like what Gavin has said, it was really a few mins walk from central station. If you need to have air con in your room, then this will not be the place for you. And yes, the toilet door has been fixed! Do note that it will be a shared toilet with the host. Satisfied with my stay, if you're looking at a place just to wash up and sleep while on holiday in Sydney, this is the place for you.
Very quick responses and great communication. Nice residential quiet area with cafes and restaurants within walking distance.
Great accomodation. Clean and had everything you needed. The location is amazing right at Bondi, it can be quite noisy at night time though. Thanks for a great stay Matt!
Good location, hard building to identify and once there difficult to locate front door.

We had a great stay at Susan's place. The cottage is as good as the pictures. Susan is a great host and help us with lots of informations before and during our stay. We highly recommend her place. Many thanks Susan.We loved Sydney and had a nice weekend in Australia. The place is very central and very close to the city centre. Buses was easy to catch even on Sunday and public holiday. We will definitely love to stay again at Susans in the future :-)
can recommend this place.  But you need your own transport
This was the perfect place to stay. Quiet, clean, close to public transport and the city. The apartment was lovely and very comfortable. Definitely stay again next time.

Nous avons passé un tres bon séjour chez Bryan. La maison est bien adapté pour 5 adultes. Nous sommes accueilli avec, dans le frigo, jus d'orange, bière et bouteille d'eau! Bryan est tres disponible. Il répond toujours présent à chaque demande. L'arrêt de bus est à 5 minutes à pieds. Ensuite il faut compter 25 minutes pour atteindre le centre.
Pour finir, merci à Bryan pour ce séjour!!!
Good location. Value for money if you're staying for at least 2 nights.

I really enjoyed this unit. It was probably the most functional space anyone could have created for a studio. It has everything you need and more. A workplace, living area, kitchen, washer/dryer, balcony, nice bathroom, and plenty of storage space throughout. The only downside is the unit is not equipped with AC. Fortunately they provided two fans which were very helpful and needed. Everything else was perfect and the host did an excellent job communicating and assuring I had a great stay. The location of the unit is within the Darling Harbour area and only a ten-fifteen minute walk from the Central business district. Near a park and many businesses and restaurants. Would recommend it to a couple or single person.

The studio was perfect for me! I needed a quiet, private space to get my work done. Susan was extremely welcoming and also left me alone which I appreciated. The space was sparkling clean and the bed was fab with snuggly sheets! Thanks Susan

I chose Fiona’s place because it was near Randwick Golf Course .
Steve and Fiona where helpful and accommodating with you feeling obliged to continuously chat.
They left us to the upstairs area with privacy yet with the added benefit of being able to reach out downstairs to them when needed
Hernan is very nice

Great Apartment in a silent neighborhood. But everything is easy to reach by ferry or car.
We really enjoyed our stay there! Would definitely stay there again

Saying at Hernan's place was great, we spent just one night because we were looking for a place to spend our last night in Sydney before leaving the country so we needed to stay not far from the airport. The apartment is 5 mins walking distance from the bus that takes you in the city. Everything was clean and tidy, communication was excellent, happy to recommend it to anyone :)

I stayed at Naveen's place for three nights in December, one for work and two for pleasure and it was great! Excellent location, lovely host who was extremely helpful and welcoming. I wanted to stay away from a hotel and have a less solitary experience and I couldn't have asked for a better place. The room is a little noisy on a weekend night which is to be expected for the area and I didn't realise there was air con which probably made it a little worse with the windows open. Otherwise it was perfect, clean, well maintained, stylish and with a personal bathroom. I look forward to returning!
Phan 非常的nice,带着她的小狗狗迎接我们入住｡房子交通非常便利,走到中央车站南广场只要三分钟｡去任何地方都很方便｡厨房设施比较齐全,唯一不足的是我们一行九个人,入住还是有点挤,五六个人比较合适｡在市中心算是性价比比较高的地方｡

The flat was very modern and we'll equipped, I only stayed for one night but it was a pleasant experience. Only downside was the bathroom wasn't that clean, maybe due to sharing with another airbnb guest, because the room was spotless. Thanks for having me to stay!
非常棒,很喜欢的房子

Kerri's was a lovely place to stay and she was both friendly and helpful too. It was only a short 15 minute train ride to the centre of Sydney so with a my multipass it was easy.

Listen to kerri's hints and tips as Watson's bay was truly fabulous.

We loved our stay at North Avalon Beach Apartments. Hosts Angela & Jeff were both very friendly, welcoming & helpful during our stay picking us up from the ferry & offering to drive us anywhere during our stay. Although they are living up stairs the downstairs apartment is extremely private, quiet & separate to up stairs. It feels as if there is no one else around. This neighbour hood is filled with many other beautiful beach houses and feels very safe and welcoming. We will definitely be back to stay at the North Avalon Beach apartments again. Thank you!

A lovely, spacious, and neat home with all the accommodations a family of four would want, one half block from the bus line going right into Sydney CBD and Central Station. The host was communicative and helped us make arrangements as needed during our stay. We highly recommend this rental unit.

This room was lovely! I bring my cup of coffee to the balcony every morning and do a bit of light reading because the balcony is just perfect for that.
Kath was generous with amenities, a lot of pillows, a lot of towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, all at our disposal. Coffee, milk, tea and bread on the house.
Fan is available too. Initially wanted to let the cool air in, but cars keep passing by so best to get that glass door shut to keep the noise out.
If the two rooms are rented, bathroom time can be tricky in the morning so best to get up early, i guess. (Ask whether the other room will be rented on your dates!)
Location is very ideal, a few steps away from Redfern station, one stop away from Central and easily accessible to everywhere. Did not get to try the bus from here, as trains got us everywhere anyway.
Uber to airport was $29.

Susan's cottage was everything I had imagined from the photos. She was welcoming and accommodating - I needed to work from the studio so she set up a desk for me. She is easy going and incredibly interesting. 

An added bonus was the wonderful atmosphere she created -  the other guests, Susan and I had a wonderful meal together and shared stories. 

I definitely will be returning. Thanks Susan.
I had a great stay at Angela’s place. Listing was accurately described and great value, highly recommended for travellers looking to stay near Sydney Airport.
La stanza era molto pulita, ma la foto su airbnb non corrispondeva alla stanza in cui abbiamo soggiornato, nella foto sembrava molto più spaziosa.

I had a lovely 4 weeks in Natasa's place. She's super helpful and knowledgeable about the area and shows you everything you need. She even took me to the shops on day one!  The house is fabulously close to the station.. about 2 minutes and well looked after. The room was bright, spacious and exactly what I was after.  The kitchen is tidy and super well equipped. Even though we had a full house at times, I never had any issues getting access to the bathroom or washing machines. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay with Natasa and can only highly recommend her place if you are looking for that balance between having your independence ( I was working so many night were spend on marking..) and socialising; we had some pleasant evenings catching up with all house mates and a beautiful glass of wine! Thanks Natasa for making me feel so welcome and being such a great host... I'll be back that's for sure!
We had a great stay inNicole's apartment. Great for when attending any sporting event at SOPAC.
Great apartment in a great location.  Clean and tidy.

Alexey's place is an excellent apartment opposite Central Railway Station and had us fascinated watching trains coming and going all day.  Ideal for getting public transport to anywhere in Sydney and beyond.  Two bathrooms and great cooking facilities. Washing machine, dryer, and dishwasher all there.
We love the studio. Very comfortable, clean and convenient to major tourist locations. Isabelle answers all questions promptly and is very accommodating. We highly recommend stating here.
The place is perfect. Everything is provided. We highly recommend Hernan's place.
Shaun house is great choice to stay in . It is very clean. Shaun was very helpful.
Very good! Totally recommend for eveyone
Great place, convenient to the bus into town. Appreciated the condiments etc. Would stay again.

This stunning place is definately the best accommodation we've had in australia! They make one feel very at home and let you take part on the good vibes ! It's tidy and very comfi.. I really recomend this place for everyone who likes to be surrounded by good people! 
thanks
Fab apartment! Great location and Anita had been very accommodating.
Julia's place was really nice, well set out, light and was really comfortable. Special touches around. Would have been even better with aircon, however we survived with the fans :)

I stayed in Kathy’s place for three weeks and the overall experience was wonderful. Kathy is super friendly and thoughtful. She always responds to questions and needs timely, but you also have enough privacy as you have your own entrance. The place has all the basic kitchen stuff, so it’s ideal for people who’d like to cook themselves. The location is unbeatable as well. I would definitely recommend this place.

The apartment was in such a fantastic location! Easy to join the Bondi to Coogee coastal walk and what an amazing walk it is! 
Loved sitting out on the 'generous' balcony and enjoying the view down to Tamarama Beach SLSC. 
Thank you so much Ruby for this little 'oasis' in a beautiful part of the world!
Very accommodating host, terrific location within walking distance of Clareville Beach and a short drive to Palm Beach. Highly recommended and would stay again.

Good location to take train at Redfern Station, nice host to clearly deliver message and guidance. Two rooms are set for Airbnb which means we will share bathroom with the other guests. Both are polite. In all, it is convenient and comfortable stay.
The place is perfect for a big family getaway! Spacious, convenient, equipped, nice and comfy.
A lovely apartment with beautiful views. Very clean & tidy. A great location on the north shore & wonderful hosts who went out of their way to be helpful. Thanks for a great stay!
A terrific location close to everything Bondi has to offer.  Fantastic communication from the host Niki.

A fantastic experience - a beautiful home with amazing hosts. Our little family loved the place and we were able to access public transport, playing spaces and public facilities such as cafes and supermarkets very easily. Alice and Richard ensured our stay was comfortable and enjoyable and were very easy to communicate with. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Nathan’s place is stunning; the perfect beachside getaway for a couple or young family to enjoy long-term or for a long weekend. We loved our stay and after two months we were very sad to leave what felt like home. Nathan and his wife and kids are simply lovely, kind people who didn’t hesitate to help us with any issues or queries. I’m still blown away that after messaging Nathan with news that the dryer had broken, he replied right away and we had a replacement THE NEXT DAY. Our baby son loved all the little hiding spots around the house. We were impressed with the style of the place, plus the HUGE amount of storage available. But our favourite part? The ocean is so close you can hear it from anywhere in the house. Thank you for a truly wonderful and memorable stay!
This 2 bedroom apartment is in a great location, handy to shops, cafes, ferry, etc. Clean & tidy with large screen TV. Good value & we would stay here again!

Located right in the heart of Manly, this immaculate, nicely appointed apartment is suited to all kinds of travellers and presents great value for money. Very short walk to ferry, the beach, restaurants & bars yet surprisingly quiet. Fitted with nice, modern furnishings & conveniences, this was perfect for our 5-day stay. Ziggy was a great host with fantastic, prompt communication. Thank you for hosting us!
Fantastic location, incredible views, and very comfortable accomodation for a short or long stay break.
Great location, friendly host, lovely room and adorable cats ❤️
I booked Simon and Nicole’s place for my parents. They both commented on the great location, and the clean, comfortable space, as well as Simon and Nicole’s hospitality.
Great communication from the host, and surprisingly quiet given it's position in the city.

We enjoyed our stay at Gavin's place! He's a nice host who recommended some nice beaches and helped to plan our days in the lovely city of Sydney. This apartment is super clean and has nicely aired room. Will come back if we get the chance to revisit this wonderful country!
Great location, comfortable home

the apartment is perfectly located. It is located within walking distance of the city center. public transport is also very close to the apartment. everything that was needed was a in the equipment flat. everything was very well organized. I would heartily recommend!

This was our first time using Air BnB and we couldn't have wished for a better experience.   The apartment was all that was promised, small but beautifully appointed and there was plenty of room for the three of us.  The location was fabulous, we just walked out the door and hopped on a bus to the city or Chinatown.  The train was only a short stroll away.  We had no trouble getting around.  Not that you needed to go far.....there were plenty of delicious places to eat and wonderful farmer's markets directly opposite on Saturday morning.   The best treat was lying in the very comfortable bed, snuggled under the feather doona and just melting with the aromas of freshly baking bread wafting up from the French patisserie below....heaven.  Paul was a most gracious host...friendly, informative and everything was super organised.  We had a fabulous time and will most definitely stay again. Thanks, Paul!
A lovely clean and comfortable cabin in a safe and convenient location.
the apartment was such as chloe showed in her photographs, everything was  clean and right.the best was the location

We enjoyed the time in the apartment very much. David's communication was always promptly and detailed. He gave us a warm welcome and already awaited us upon our arrival. The apartment itself was exactly as described. Only the noises from the adjacent apartment surprised us. The connection to public transport with Kings Cross Station is perfect. Within 30 minutes you can get to Bondi Beach, Airport or any other well known place in central Sydney. This is the perfect location for a couple to stay in Sydney.

This was my first time using AirBnB and it was really easy.  Gavin was a great host - very prompt response to the initial booking, clear and easy instructions to get to the apartment.  He was also friendly and helpful with recommendations for restaurants, activities, and even some interesting books!  The location was great - really handy to the train station for coming in from the airport, and close to the CBD, Paddington and Surry Hills for shopping.  The room was simple but spacious and nice and clean.  Highly recommended.
Great cabin! Parents really enjoyed it. It was very convenient and michy was very accommodating to our needs. Cheers!
Fantastic -thanks for having us.

Maria and Jerry are incredible hosts - super kind and helpful.  And the view from the clean simple beachy room is one of the best in the world! (if you love oceans and beaches and things that are amazing)

Jackie has created a beautiful space in this airy and spacious apartment. The room was perfectly clean, with an extremely comfortable bed, and a great view over Manly at sunrise. Jackie is a very accommodating host and I’d recommend this place to anyone travelling to Manly.
The host canceled this reservation 186 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Linda is a great host and provided assistance to me on arrival and to her guests departing, to accomodate everyone s preferences. The property is very cool. Dont want to tell everyone incase its busy when I need it.. shhhh

We stayed here for a few nights with our 3 month old and the in-laws. 

We had everything we needed for our stay and the location is brilliant. Redfern station is such a short walk and the location made it easy to navigate around Sydney with a young baby. 

The hosts communicated well and quickly before and during our stay and allowed a late check out which was great as the weather took a bad turn and we had a later flight booked.

I would recommend staying here.
Really good staying in Oliver's apartment. Nice view and quiet. Close to public transportation. Would love to stay next time!
The room is super spacious with room to cook and Sam is a super generous and kind host.
Perfect! Always a delight to return to Studio 32.

Bronte Studio is a wonderful place to stay. The studio is bright and beautifully presented with everything we needed. The yummy fresh breakfast was an added bonus, not to mention the chocolate. Susan and Greg are lovely hosts and were there to help with any questions. The location is fantastic, we love bronte.

Living with Tiger was a great experience!
Alltough we booked just one day before,Tiger prepared everything and made us feel very welcome everytime! (He also took pictures from the complex,the street,his flat to explain how we can find everything and to make sure,that we can't get lost- so cute :D )
His flat is so lovely and very clean.
Tiger had to work during our stay,but he offered help anytime. Thank you again! :)
We had space and much time on our own,he really cared about us.
Thank you for everything Tiger!
