Hopefully we can return some day,because we couldn't say goodbye :(
All the best for you!
Marianna&Fabiola

Wayne and Kate's apartment is a fantastic place to stay, in so many ways. 
The location is second to none...right across from the beach, good coffee nearby and bondi beach is a short stroll away. Parking looks like it might be tricky, but we never had a problem. There is one flight of stairs to walk up, but even my bad knees coped and it's worth it for the view anyway!
The apartment itself is gorgeous. Beautiful views, comfy beds, a well appointed 'library',  a selection of toiletries, lovely lamps, vibrant art and everything easy to find and operate thanks to a small information leaflet, or even a quick phone call...Wayne and Kate were both readily contactable and quick to help when we got a bit stuck at check-in!
The apartment is very clean...and I'm pretty fussy when it comes to accommodation cleanliness. The linen is fresh, there are towels aplenty, blankets, pillows, complete kitchen...everything you need to be comfortable. 
I would highly recommend this apartment for up to 6 (Website hidden by Airbnb) a gem.
The place was great, better than describes. Very impressive place and will definitely look at going back. Ace!
Easy to find, great location, easy parking and a lovely clean, fresh and tidy place to stay. The bathroom was spotless!!

Thank you, Richard, for a wonderful house and experience on a lovely beach. The house is right on the beach. It is charming and thoughtfully decorated. The lizards/goannas can be a bit alarming but it's all part of the experience. The kitchen and linen cupboards are well supplied. And the fishing is excellent :)

Cath was the perfect host! She provided everything we needed from universal adapters to fresh eggs from her chickens. Cath even provides a binder full of information about the area (nearby hospitals, cute coffee places, things to do). The Garden Studio itself is very cute and stylish. My boyfriend and I stayed here for several weeks, and it had everything we needed. We couldn’t have asked for a better host or a better space for our stay in Sydney.
Lovely apartment that was clean and tidy. Min was very quick to answer questions. Overall a very pleasant experience.

Everything it promises and more. The views are incredible, the apartment is immaculate. So walkable - 10 minutes from everywhere (25 to Mrs Macs chair), depending how fast you walk, obviously.
Pamela & Hugo have presented a lovely apartment, with perfectly sized furniture to make it comfortable without being crowded. The full kitchen was amazing to have access to as someone with dietary restrictions. Being 2 blocks from a full supermarket made life so easy.
Our only almost-negative was the neighbour playing super loud music when we got in at 10pm, but the doors are incredible noise barriers, and once indoors, the ambient road noise covered it.
The views are amazing. The public transport in the immediate vicinity life changing. If we lived in Sydney, this is where we would want to be.

What a great time! We will definitely be back. We stayed over with 5 families and each of us had our own space to hang out and relax. The property is very family-friendly and even our dogs had a fantastic time frolicking on the beach. The beds were super comfy and our host Bailey was available at any time to answer any queries promptly. Thanks Bailey, looking forward to the next trip. Highly recommended!

Wonderful and lightful home, amazing hospitality, very quiet and big room with direct access to the backyard, the other guests were very kind and friendly. Sam and his wife are the best hosts I have ever met: thoughtful, helpful, always smiling and peaceful.
Next time in Sydney will be surely at Sam's.
Great location, smooth check in & excellent communication. Loved the Xmas tree :) Thank you Sandra for having us at your place.

Best value for the money!  Great location - walking distance to many of Sydneys best attractions. We loved the fitness center in this building!
Very easy check in/out process- pick up key, and leave key!

We stayed at Lucy and Ralph's for a couple if nights with our 2 teenage boys.  The unit was fresh and clean and the beds were amazingly comfortable.   Beautiful garden bush setting and all the amenities were wonderful.   Lucy and Ralph were warm and friendly and extremely helpful.  Thank you

Blissful Bronte is an excellent choice if you want to stay in a well-equipped apartment, a lovely host and stunning nature close by! 
Public transport (bus stop) is very close by, and the city centre and the airport easy ro reach. A small shop just across the street provides you with basics, but Jenny even ensured that the fridge was not empty upon arrival.

The apartment is cosy, and you‘ll find everything you need. Wifi was stable, which is always important, if you also have to work. Cars can be parked on the streets for free. 

Bronte beach is a 5 minutes walk away, and less crowded (and thus more lovely) as Bondi. But the Coastal walk connects all Eastern suburb beaches, which is really great and nice hike. At Bronte you‘ll find nice cafés for having a coffee or great breakfast.

I would definitely recommend Jenny‘s apartment, and actually I already did! 
Thanks again, Jenny!
I stayed for one night only - place is well located and is a lovely clean apt. Room doesn’t have a lot of space but overall I enjoyed my stay and would stay again.
Very clean and well set out, you dont need to bring anything. A good location only minutes from eating places.
Anita is a rockstarshe will go the extra mile for you

I had a short stay at Leena's place, but I'm really looking forward to a longer stay with a big group. There are facilities to accommodate up to a dozen people.

I was impressed with the immaculate presentation. It is very clean and nicely decorated. The well-lit kitchen has all the facilities that one requires for cooking. Just outside the kitchen is a huge entertainment deck for family get-togethers.

The place is located in a quiet, leafy street, where there is local traffic only and heaps of free parking. 

Within 5 minutes walking distance, off James Cook Drive, is the Kings Langley shopping centre with Coles, Woolies, boutique shops, restaurants, cafes and takeaways.

Just 3 minutes walk in the opposite direction, off Sunnyholt Road, are fast-food restaurants and specialty shops.

Vardy's T-Way bus stop is a 3-minute walk away with direct buses to Parramatta, Blacktown, Castle Hill, Hillsong Church and Rouse Hill.

Less than 2 minutes drive away is M7. For Canberra, go west and bypass the city. Drive east to quickly get to Sydney CBD via M2 in an hour.
Stephen is such an amazing host. Promt and extremely hemohim . The property is everything you want and need!

We had a Fantastic stay at Georgia appartement that was very well furniture and lot of space and great kitchen.

The place is also quite and you are just wake up by birds.

The location is perfect in the middle of COOGEE, with walking distance to beach and randwick for shopping and great cafes.

Georgia is a great host and we'r looking forward to visit again.

Merci et à Bientôt 

CECILE & OLIVIER

The appartment was nice and we enjoyed taking the breakfast on the little balcony. Kath also provided us breakfast, saved us the first morning :)
We liked staying there, the room was nice and cosy and we had everything we needed. Her dog is a big relaxed one:)

Great location and a large house able to accomodate a few families or separate individuals, each room is individually lockable. Very handy to all events or places in the Eastern suburbs. Great communication from the host, Marcella

This is a very nice apartment at 7 min. walking distance from restaurants. It is ideal for a short stay. A small breakfast is included (cereals, few fruits, coffee) and should be eaten on the old chest while be sat on the sofa. Air conditioning is central, so don't expect it to have necessarily a cool temperature. The bathroom is outside the apartment, but close to the room. So you need to get out in a short passage that would normally goes the other apartment, but that is closed with a panel, to enter the bathroom. Because the top of the passage is open, when getting to the bathroom, you need to be quiet to ensure not disturbing the other people. Because that the only water point is at the bathroom, it's a bit complicated to wash the dishes, but Michele offers to wash it with her dishwasher. Communication with Michele is smooth and easy, and overall, it's a good quality for the price.

Belinda's place was perfect for a weekend escape! The apartment is extremely well equip with everything you would need. Belinda was a great host explaining the local walks and beautiful places to visit.
We look forward to visiting again!
This is the 2nd time we have stayed at Millie and it was great. Will stay again

We had great time in our stay. This unit is very clear and stylish. Window view is amazing make us so relax when sitting in. Many top best cafés in this area. David is very friendly and helping us a lot. Perfect for a small family like us.

An incredible apartment. Imacculately presented, with stunning furniture and design throughout. A welcome pack including fridge essentials and fresh bread was provided, as well as bathroom shampoo, soap etc. Beautifully light-filled, my bridesmaids and I felt like royalty getting ready and the photos are sure to be amazing. Thanks for your hospitality, would recommend to any visitors to Sydney!!

Annie's place was all in all excellent. I would recommend staying here in Surry Hills rather than the busy CBD which is still only a nice 15 min stroll away. Recommended for anyone looking for a place in Sydney.

It was my first Airbnb experience and an absolute pleasure. Lina was flexible with arival and departure times and respected our privacy with minimal contact. Although she was very kind and I'm sure she would have helped with any requirements.
溝通上可能有點問題,位置是真的方便,但房東請人打掃當天才講這點讓人很不舒服,因該提早講才對｡
Was as advertised. Gave shampoo upon request
Ven were very kind,we enjoy stayed there,the house very clean and comfortable with a complete kitchen tools,thanks Ven
My mother stayed at Wyatt's place for ten days during her visit in Sydney. She really enjoyed both the accomodation and Annandale. We will certainly consider Wyatt for her next visit.

The accommodation was ideal for myself and my family. The pool was lovely and a great way to freshen up at the end of a long day. Sarah was a wonderful host, kept us informed throughout our stay and was available should she be needed. Thoroughly recommend.
Magnificent space, great location, host couldn't have been better. Highly recommended if you want a place anywhere around Surry Hills.

Jenny is a great host: super kind, quick replies and so easy do get along with - thanks for that!
The apartment look like on the fotos. It is pretty small but clean and cute, with everything you may need.
The only negative thing was the house itself, which looks old and a bit dirty. But I’ll be clear here: this is nothing what Jenny could change.
So, thanks a lot for your help and your recommendations! I really enjoyed Sydney and especially staying in your beautiful little studio apartment.
This is a very spacious apartment with a good view. Good for eating in or dining out at the local restaurants. A great base for exploring the city.
Nice place

As we were at Maroubra for a  surf competition. The location was perfect opposite the beach. Bus stop right out the front and a quick walk to shops & restaurants. The unit was clean, tidy & had everything we needed. Would definitely stay again. Nathan was very helpful.

This place is the perfect quiet retreat, nestled in a beautiful garden setting. 
The studio is clean, cosy and modern, and Susan and Greg are very thoughtful, friendly hosts.
It’s within walking distance to plenty of good places to get a cuppa or a meal, and of course the beach. 
And if you want to go further afield there’s a bus just down the road.

Paul's place overall was great. It was located in a great place with enough privacy. It was just enough room for the 3 of us. The only thing I can say we weren't the happiest about was that we were using the blow up mattress and there were two fitted sheets (single) that didn't fit the queen single.
Lovely place and Richard is very helpful.
I enjoyed stay in miss D house. She is very considerable and very kind. :) Thank you
Better than a Hotel Room :)

A beautiful space with a lovely view in one of the best locations for exploring the city. Located in a vibrant area with  a wide variety of interesting shops and excellent restaurants within walking distance. Clean, comfortable, and well equipped. Our host David is an excellent communicator, pays attention to detail, and made every effort to help us enjoy our stay. Highly recommended.

My first ever airbnb and Bryan made it stress free. Bryan was very hospitable  and accommodating during our stay. This little place is perfect for families. Everything was provided for little kids including a portacot, toys, plastic cups and plates. A little kitchen to make breakfast for the hungry tummies and if you feel like cooking everything is provided to make a proper meal. We didn't cook while we were there as there were plenty of restaurants and cafes on Glebe point road just 5 minute walk around the corner. Shops including bakers delight, a corner store, fruit and veggies and a butchers! Light rail (tram) was just a 5 minute walk away. Great location and perfect little home away from home. Definitely recommend!
Great
Great location, clean apartment, amazing host. Definitely recommend
Herman was a great host, very welcoming, helpful, very friendly and a great location! Thank you.
Same as description. Nice house and react very quickly.
We loved staying in Phillips house. More than enough room for a family of 5. Fantastic central location to some of the best areas of Sydney. The house was very clean and had everything we needed.
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Perfectly located home for our group of 11. Right next to the beach, shops, cafes and restaurants. Good communication with the host. Great layout for social settings in the lounge room.

Great property. Super close to everything, so could walk everywhere. Beds were comfy, was nice to have kitchen and washing/dryer facilities. Apartment complex was quiet and street was reasonably quiet at night. We really enjoyed our stay here. Just be aware of the spring loaded bathroom window, it tried to take my finger!  Would definitely stay here again.

Maryam and Ali are friendly hosts. Nice apartment and very clean. We really enjoyed our stay.

Highly recommend!
Muy céntrico. Poco limpio.
Clean and comfortable lodgings, the hosts made me feel welcome. It's a relaxed household and I'm a returning guest. My preferred place to stay in Surry Hills.

Fei and David are hospitable and friendly hosts who have such a beautiful home. The location is very central and close to shops and food as well as very accessible. The house is absolutely one of a kind and gorgeously vintage. Definitely worth a stay!
It was a pleasant stay at Yoco's house. He has the kept the house quite well. Its close to CBD and central station.

Desiree's place was beyond our expectations!! The interior of the home was very clean and modern. The location was perfect for exploring the city, and communication with Desiree was always very clear with quick response. If we ever go back to Sydney we will definitely book with her again!!
thanks for facilitation
Stevens cabin is stunning and filled with light so you will have a cheerful relaxing experience. Definitely recommend it!
nice location, close to the beach and airport. Warm-hearted host and sweet room.
Just as described and great value. Everything you need and clean with very comfy beds!
Great place to stay, very close to beautiful beach and snorkeling spot. Wonderful host.
Great - I would go back

Duncan and Ashlee's place is very close to the city. The kitchen the bathroom and bedroom everything you want in a home and very clean and tidied up! It really is a "home a way from home". 
Duncan and Ashlee are very friendly kind people. Even though this was our first airbnb with staying with the host, we never felt uncomfortable! 
These two lovely people will help you out with anything!
Thank you very much!!!
Great place to stay. Location close to transportation, restaurants and a grocery across the street. Very quiet. Amenities were excellent and able to cook and do laundry

Lovely traditional house very close to Balmain centre.

September evenings were quite cold so had to use heating.

In summer would be perfect.

Jennifer is the perfect host. Many Thanks.
Wir waren für 3 Nächte in Pauls Apartment und sie war perfekt für uns, um die Stadt zu erkunden.

The room was very nice and enough space for two people and all their stuff. The room was very clean. We had many blankets and towels. Hernan is a very nice host and we had a lot of privacy. We really enjoyed our stay at Hernans home and can recommend it to everyone.
Just steps from the Darling Harbour this is the perfect location to stay while visiting Sydney. This apartment was tidy clean and equipped with everything we could possibly need.

Fantastic central location with good food/Cafes and an EzyMart close by, nice and roomy and with water views. Excellent communication by host and we were even able to leave our bags upon arrival, prior to checking in.

Clean and decent place. Newly renovated bedroom and bathroom with comfortable bed. Easy communication. Krythia is a nice host who can give you all the useful information around the city. We really enjoy our stay with her!

Excellent and cheap accomodation! The best Thing is that you can take all the buses and it is just 1 busstop to the CBD!
Duncan is very very friendly and funny.
The room is tidy, good bed, there is enough space (also in the kitchen) and it is a calm place. 
I really recommend this apartment! :-)
The apartment was fairly central. Bit noisy near the bridge. If you are looking for a studio apartment close to town and don't mind a bit of occasional noise then this should be fine.

Maria & Jerry were great hosts & very welcoming. The room was clean & had a beautiful view of the ocean. Would recommend this place to anyone looking for scenic views or looking to be close to the sensational beaches of manly.
Arnie & his daughter were both very friendly and welcoming.  The listing was as it's described on Airbnb.  The house is in a great location in Paddington.

The most beautiful souls inside and out — I had a wonderful stay here. Aside from the accommodations being immaculate (great location, cozy, clean, and everything you need) Shirley is absolutely fantastic. I would be so happy to stay again!
Great location. Glebe is lovely.
Coffee’s place is in a great location, and good value. Excellent communication.
Great place to stay and Hernan is very informative and welcoming!
Great location and weekend market in. park across the road is great on Saturdays
Lovely host & accommodation

We loved staying at David's place - a fantastic apartment, well equipped and in a great location. The apartment has lovely high ceilings and was cool even in heatwave temperatures. David had left tea, coffee, milk and, especially welcome after a long journey, cool water in the fridge. Potts Point is lively and full of great restaurants and coffee shops. Local amenities are great and it's really easy to get around by walking or by public transport with the train station just 2 or 3 minutes walk away. Fitzroy Square with the fountain is a great place to sit and watch the world go by. We'd love to return
Great location 3 blocks from Circular Quay. Clean and comfort.
A great place to stay, everything at your doorstep... Michele is a lovely host with a great property, the rooms were exceptionally clean and very well appointed, we were happy little campers indeed
Great place, lovely location, super stay ... We really do recommend both Bundeena and Belinda's place to visit. We had a great time.
Gavin was a great host, very friendly and helpful. The apartment was very clean and spacious, an awesome place to stay in the city!

Great location, greats hosts, very comfortable place to stay.

The house is absolutely fantastic to admire. You really get a sense of how it may have been back when it was first built. So much for your eye to see! 

No you’re standard air bnb that’s for sure! 

Fei and his wife are very friendly and accommodating. Basics for breakfast are provided. Highly recommend!
One of the best homestay I have experienced. Friendly & very helpful host who makes you feel at home.

Cath and the garden studio are just amazing and I thank her for the effort that went into making her studio have all the small items needed to make time away spent comfortably.. I have been left with lasting experience that i shared with my friends and family I don't think I need to say much more.. Thanks Cath and Hazel
Great place and location but needs fixing up. Thankfully Cat was very helpful and responsive to our request.
Fantastic location4 bedrooms close to shops. Close to Kings cross and not to expensive in taxi if you want to head to circular quay. Great Host
Simply one of the best place, well equipped, in a nice quiet neighborhood. Close to Manly Wharf. We loved the stay a lot.
clean, cheap, good house

We've stayed at Davids place for 7 days and it was as beautiful as in the pictures. Although we didn't see David a lot, he was a great host and provided everything we needed. 
The location is amazing; Darlinghurst is a very lively neighbourhood, though the house' location is very peaceful. Within 200 meters is a busstop that brings you to Bondi beach or the Sydney Harbour both within 15 minutes. 
Also nice is Surry Hills, a lovely neighbourhood to go out for dinner or a drink, which is located within a 10 minute walk from the residence.
We surely recommend this place!

Great location :) and the apartment was very well set up and stylish with a homely touch. The host were very understanding and rapid in reply as I requested to check our late due to unforeseen circumstances. Will definitely stay again.
We had a wonderful time at the Cov, a great place to stay & location was tops. Thanks for everything Joy!
Wonderful location. The views are spectacular. Very relaxing. Evelyn and Anthony lovely hosts and allow you plenty of privacy.
Greatest beach mate of all time.

We really enjoy our stay in Shaun's flat. Shaun is a real nice host, very helpfull. We had interessant discussions. The flat is located in a nice area, 10 minutes from the town center by ferry. We recommand his Airbnb !
Very central location. The place is not big, but cosy for 2 people. Host is a bit hard to reach, but the check-in is easy enough.

The house is a big house shared by usually long term tenants (months to years). All of them have been lovely and made me feel very welcome even if I was there for a short amount of time. 
The room was immense and everything was super clean. 
The location is perfect for access to Coogee beach and multiple food options. Many buses options also to go to CBD.
All in all probably one of the best air BnB I've been to.
Excellent location in the centre of Manly. Walking distance to the beach and other main attractions. Spacious and comfortable apartment. Paul was very friendly and helpful.
The place is easy to everywhere,and the owner prepared everything for the guests

This apartment is in a great location in Sydney and has all the conveniences of home.  We were able to walk to either Darling Harbor, Wynard Station or the QVB building quite easily.  We enjoyed our time and having a great place to stay made it that much better.  Karen
Really good bedroom, the bed is confortable and the room is clean!
It was nice stay. If Aircon/ heater did work well, it would be much better.
房东是一个很热心,nice的人｡给了许多旅游建议｡公交也很方便,从central station 坐470,15分钟左右到,家门口就是站台｡好评指数五颗星希望有机会再次入住^_^
Great spot and really cozy stylish place.
很不错的房间 很好的房东

Evelyn was the perfect host, she responded very quickly and made her place available at very short notice. I would highly recommend staying at this place, it’s stylish, has a fantastic view and is very close to the town centre. Thanks Evelyn :)

Krythia is a very thoughtful, unobtrusive hostess of a very sparking clean and stylish apartment.  It was marvelous to come back after every rainy day to a warm, welcoming bedroom and the steady, hot water of the shower of a beautifully designed bathroom.  It suited our needs exactly.  I have no hesitation in recommending Krythia and her place!
Good location.

Nice welcome, quiet neighbourhood. For most people a car would be necessary. In my case I enjoyed the 2k walk down to the cafes and shops at Avalon. Cathy was a nice host and any requests were quickly attended to.
Immaculate, every detailed considered, beautiful quality furnishings, great hospitality and peaceful environment. Definitely returning!
Belinda's place was in an excellent location, so close to the beach! It was spotless and had everything you need to cook. Really relaxing, perfect for a quiet getaway.
Ali was a professional and respectful host who dealt with an issue (out of his control) we had very quickly and efficiently. He was a great host and I would recommend his lovely granny flat!
Thanks Mohit - nice and convenient stay for us. I appreciate your communication and flexibility.

The Bundeena garden studio was a delight to stay at. Beautifully renovated, it is light and spacious. It has a very comfy bed in a peaceful environment. A lovely place to wake up to. 
Belinda is lovely and friendly and made the stay easy and comfortable.
An easy place to holiday and one we will be recommending to our Bundeena-bound friends!
I look forward to returning one day soon.

Fantastic.  The accommodation was very comfortable,  clean, well decorated and a well stocked kitchen. Close to the beach and shops.  We were made to feel very welcome and Belinda is a great host.  We will be back.
房东非常热情,房间非常非常干净,舒服,离海边很近,非常好,Very gool.
Really nice place with great view. Would love to stay again!
Perfect location close to Darling Harbour and an easy walk to Circular Quey and Chinatown. The apartment is spacious and has everything needed for a trip to Sydney. Would definitely stay again!

If you are looking for something comfortable, great, near the beach, with tranquility, with excellent hosts, a nice house, private bathroom, large kitchen and also with yard where you can rest and even a barbecue, no doubt this is the best where can you be !!!

Good communication & friendly host. Apartment is in good proximity to the city and sights. Very easy to get around if you have a car, with the host allowing you to park out the front for free. The apartment had everything we needed but unfortunately needed a thorough clean. With a good clean this apartment would be a great place to Base yourself whilst exploring Sydney.
Great location, off street parking, large space. Recommend!

We had an absolutely amazing time at this beautiful home.  It really is a sanctuary.  Beautiful linen, big bath, lovely patios and big old fashioned verandahs with comfy lounges you can curl up in and read with leafy surrounds.  Shops with a village atmosphere and ***** dining.  Balmoral beach and sea pool.  A 10 minute bus ride to town.  Trully the best place to stay in all of Sydney with a great host!
Beautiful garden to sit in for meals. Robyn makes sure you want for nothing.  A most pleasurable stay. Thankyou. Ann
Good location, room, and good communication.

The room was incredible. The wall to wall glass panorama view of Darlinghurst was beyond compare and looking out at that view each night before bed was a joy beyond compare. I really appreciated having a bathroom to myself and the amenities provided by the hosts were perfect. I especially appreciated the filtered water in the room after a long afternoon walking around the city. The room was large and spacious and access to wifi, fresh towels, cups and a pedestal fan for when the room got too hot really made it feel like home and made it easy to settle in. Overall, this was an amazing place to stay. I have no complaints.

A lovely stay here at a stylish place. Good location for cafes nearby, Greek food delivered for dinner. All the things you need for a nice stay plus a bonus little sun room. Bed comfortable. Bathroom is gorgeous and new. Above all that, Patrick and Christine kindly accommodated me and our schedule for check-in which was much appreciated. Thanks again. Anna and Ash

We had a short stayed in Simone beautiful family friendly home. The house is very warm and cosy central to surrounding coffee shops and petrol station. We all enjoyed our stay and will be booking our next trip soon with Simone.
Sadly, never got to meet Hernan. His pad is pretty cool tho, bed comfy, comm's were superb.  6 km's to Int 'airport.

We loved our stay in Linda's place. We've stayed in nicer places in better locations but in Linda's apartment, you'll feel at home. I won't repeat the positive and accurate descriptions below, except to emphasize that it is accurately described, in a safe and interesting area, and close to all major tourist sites. Linda had stocked her place so well that we didn't need to dash to the store when we arrived. This generosity is a reflection of your host who loves travel and those who do. Thanks, Linda. Book it.

Sam place is really well located to visit Sydney ! Don’t take your car if ypu have one and jump in the public transports ! Easy to take and really near the airbnb ! And whenever you need tips or help Sam and her boyfriend are really helpful for it ! The area around is nice and quiet perfect after daily trips in the city to breath out ! And plus I really enjoy doing my yoga every morning outside with the singing parots around ! Will recomend it even more for couple to stay in but no problem if you are comfy about sharing the bedroom/living room with your friends or family as we did with my mum ! Come there and enjoy your stay !

Großes Haus in einer ruhigen Umgebung. Alles was man braucht ist leicht zu Fuß zu erreichen. Um in die Innenstadt zu kommen muss man allerdings etwas zeit einplanen. Aber insgesamt eine schöne Unterkunft mit sehr freundlichen Gastgebern!

Not only was this apartment an absolute dream, but Annie went above and beyond as a host. She was extremely responsive, helpful, and made sure we had everything we needed. The apartment is in an awesome, very happening area with tons of vintage shops and cafes right on the block. The apartment itself was gorgeous, well-designed, and very homey feeling. We had an incredible experience here! Highly recommend :)
Neil was a super host. The accommodation was fantastic and so well located to walks around the harbour. We will definitely stay here again.

Had a great stay here, it was clean and spacious and had everything I needed. The location was perfect with Surry Hills and the CBD only a short walk away. If you're new to Sydney, there's plenty of advice where to go and what to see too. I highly recommend it.

Desiree's Airbnb was perfectly appointed. The space is incredibly clean and welcoming. She had everything I needed for work and relaxation. She also provided helpful instructions and was easy to contact for whatever I needed. The location is great - coffee, grocery, dry cleaning, bars, shopping all within minutes. Love this location!
A great location and a clean place to stay

Great flat in a perfect spot. Close to Bondi Junction for travel, easy access to busses that take you either to Bondi beach ( if you don't want to walk down the hill) or into the city on either the 333 or 380. 

Flat is exactly as described and the hosts were in constant contact leading up to the arrival to make sure we had everything sorted. 

Great place would easily stay there again. 

Mark
Good experience at Jared place
We saw them briefly, but Elena tried to help us. Thanks.
a perfect place to stay
Great host and great place.  Good communication and accepting of our last minute reservation.

Thank you Helen! We had a lovely time over new year at your gorgeous place. The house was so homey which was much needed for us during or travels. The place was spotless for our arrival and Helen kindly left us a welcome gift and also allowed us to help ourselves to things from the fridge and pantry. She was very easy to contact and get hold of both prior to and during our stay. Thank you so much! Happy New Year :)
We enjoyed our experience there. And the location was good. We love the decoration in the room.
Great cosy spot near one of Sydney’s great beaches.

What a gem! just a few minutes from the beach and a short walk to the shops. Cathy pulls out all the stops in terms of hospitality, providing us with breakfast and even a coffee pod machine. There were even beach towels and a cute little bag to take with us to the beach. She even provided the much-needed and often impossible to pack pair of scissors, which came in handy for 2 people who had flown in. 
The room has everything you could need, a comfy bed and pillows, a fan, a TV and a fridge. The bathroom also has a large shower. 
All in all, a great place!

Chris greeted us on arrival, no probs finding the place. Great drive to Bundeena, cottage is in a top spot close to everything. Belinda has made the cottage inside near perfect, 99/100. Everything is as it should be, comfortable, cosy, clean, private, just lovely, good supply of the essentials including some food items. We loved the organised disorder  of the gardens with all the eclectic bits and piece. Also the birds and possums did not disappoint. Lovely ferry ride to Cronulla. We highly recommend Belindas cottage for a relaxing stay. Cheers Alf & Polly.

It was an awesome stay at Yoco's place. The location of the house is just fabulous. The house is exactly the way it is  described. I got to meet some really nice people during my stay. Although I didn't get chance to meet Yoco in person he was just a call away.  Specially when my room door got auto locked, he helped me in every possible way and made sure to call the locksmith and solve the issue. I must recommend this property specially if you are looking to stay around the city.

This apartment is perfectly located. We had such a great time and Paul is a wonderful host. We got quite attached to our little home away from home for the week we were there. Would definitely recommend and would definitely stay again.

Michele's place was conveniently located close to King street. The bathroom was clean and relatively new. 
It was not that difficult to find parking around in the area (over the weekend) and Michele was kind enough to provide visitor parking vouchers just in case we needed them.

The large studio room has a door which isolated us from the rest of the house and we had our own bathroom. 

Tips
Where to eat: Cookoo Calley (near the Newtown station)
Cairo Take away
The rising sun 
Messina for desserts
Earl's Jukebox for drinks (slightly expensive but great atmosphere)
Blood wood for dinner

Nice place to stay for the weekend
Evan's place is fabulous, the apartment is exactly same as pictures as prefect as clean. It's worth to choose Evan's place, my parents and I are love it.
挺不错的,推荐哦
Beautiful and stylish home with excellent amenities and in a great location. Will absolutely stay again.

Imogen’s place was absolutely great. It was very clean and the room was large and away from the common spaces. She is friendly, and super accommodating. Her Bondi Beach location couldn’t be better. It’s just a few minutes walk from the beach and right in the middle of many cafes/shops/grocery stores. The location is quiet and felt safe at all times. Would definitely stay again and recommend it!

Clean, private, comfortable - everything we needed. The location was beautiful with easy walking access to great beaches and national park trails. Belinda was available if we needed anything, but the cabin was so well set up that we were comfy in a world of our own.
Definitely recommend this accommodation. Enjoyed my stay. Thank you

What a perfect stay in Sydney. The "Sudan" is ideal for staying near UNSW, the beautiful Coogee Beach and close to transportation into Sydney. The semi is spacious, comfortable and well appointed. The back area is a bonus for barbecuing, and relaxing in the open-air.

We had a perfect stay in Malabar with Fred and Bernadette. It's a wonderful space with everything you need. We shall miss having our breakfast in the sunshine with such a great view of the ocean. We were visiting family and it was wonderful to be so near to the beach.

Ann is a gracious and generous host, with a charming house uniquely positioned to enjoy a trip to Dangar Island. Close to the wharf, the cafe/shop and the Bowling Club, we chose to stay with Ann after a day on the water and thoroughly enjoyed it. Ann's knowledge of the Island's history is second-to-none and her hospitality is amazing - putting on a delicious breakfast for us in the morning.

We absolutely loved staying at Bailey's amazing beach palace. You couldn't have asked for a better location overlooking the water. The layout of the house is unique and the styling is chic. We thank you bailey for your hospitality.

It was an awesome experience staying at Arnie's place. Located at centre of Paddington great food and neighbourhood. 15 walking distance to CBD, if you want somewhere with great characters, please book this place. Bring your running shoes,  centennial parklands just 2 minutes away great running track.

Location is excellent.  We walked everywhere with no problems.  Nice well stocked kitchen, close to restaurants.  Clever check in with the lock box which we found with no problem.  View in inward to large office buildings. Not the most private location but we were in the heart of Sydney.  We felt safe and comfortable.  Thanks for a great stay.
Apartment was as advertised and have great facilities like a gym and pool. The location is great because it's a walking distance to the shops and cafes.

Very modern and cosy easy to find it was the perfect place for me wife and the two kids to live in comfortably for 2 weeks while we got set up for our adventure in Australia would recommend definitely
nice

We loved our stay at Jan’s house. Its deseptively spacious and very confortable. The courtyard would be beautiful to use during the warmer months.
I have sometimes found Sydney a bit overwhelming, but Erskinville is a calm pocket. Thank you again
Gavin was a great host, very friendly and reliable. Great location within close proximity to public transport and cafes/restaurants. I would highly recommend staying at Gavin's apartment.
Steven couple is a very friendly, beautiful and clean house, is highly recommended to everyone, I hope there is a chance to return here.

Dear George and Lucia - we had a great stay at your beautiful cozy property. You have created a wonderful environment for travellers  to stay and feel ‘at home’.  We were visiting our family who live about 10 minutes away from the Granny Flat so great location and very peaceful and quiet given it is no distance from some main roads.  The granny flat is beautifully maintained and sparkling clean. It offers all the creature comforts, including full kitchen amenities and if you just want to watch TV, Netflix is at your disposal.   George and Lucia are the perfect hosts, always there if you need them:). Thank you for the chocolates  -
Very nice place, super clean and cozy! Great location right next to the beach and rock pools. Plenty of space for a large group! 10/10

Sarah family is very friendly and nice. We have dinner together and chat everything. It is nice to stay at her place as it is clean and tidy. Sarah even text me whether want to have some orange juice for my kids as the weather is very hot during our stay. Will definitely recommend staying at their place.
Nice clean apartment with wifi and big TV!
This is a wonderful home and I've enjoyed my multiple stays here. Hosts have been attentive and great at communicating, making for an easy and wonderful stay.

Natasha was an incredible host. Her apartment sits in the heart of Bondi, its walking distance to the beach, shops and restaurants. Not only that the hospitality provided by Natasha was outstanding. The room was spotless clean and we were gifted a bottle of champagne upon arrival. Natasha even bought our fur baby a chew toy for his stay. I highly recommend airbnbing with Natasha she’s wonderful.

Just returned from a 2 night stay at this property and we could not fault it. House has plenty of space for 6 adults. Perfect location as it is close to everything. 
Communication with Cat was above and beyond amazing as she was always so efficient with replies and helpful with anything I needed. 

I Would definitely recommend this property for anyone looking for a great place, great location and great surroundings.

Had a great stay! Right across Bondi beach. Very clean and Kasey was lovely to deal with!

This is very convenient location for the airport and, with Wolli Creek station only a 10 minute walk away, the city too. Comfortable bed, great shower, (and washing machine if needed). Perfect for my overnight stay. Thanks Schuang and see you on a future visit

Im so appreciative of the time that Michele took out of her schedule to give me advice on where I could take my girlfriend for brekky and a massage, she went above and beyond, being helpful is a rare quality these days! The room had nice wooden floors, a high ceiling, comfy bed, was very well equipped and was private. The bathroom was super clean and modern. It was a quiet street but within walking distance of lots of cafes, pubs, restaurants, shops. I wont hesitate to stay again or to recommend to family and friends. Thanks for a great stay. Cheers, Rob and Sal

Angela was extremely easy to deal with and was wonderful in going above and beyond to ensure we had a comfortable stay. Her communication was amazing and the overall experience was very positive. 

We felt very welcomed and can't speak highly enough of her kindness and professionalism.

The property is located in an excellent spot - very safe and super close to Darling Harbour, Circular Quay and the CBD (all within 5-10 mins walk).

The building has excellent facilities and the apartment is very clean. This was our first Airbnb experience and most definitely will not be our last.

We highly recommend Angela and the apartment. Thank you so much again for everything :)
Location is brilliant!!!!! So close to everything. Direct train to airport so no hassle. Everything is as same as the pictures shown and the detailed description. Very nice experience there!!
Outstanding location. So close to the airport and close to the city!  It was exactly what we needed for the night. Felix was great to deal with and had great and easy check in instructions.
Lovely place in an really good location
All good, comfy bed, adequate amenities just as described, extremely helpful host(s), just a bit difficult to find in the dark, re house numbers and access to the rear of the property.

David's place is perfectly located if you want to enjoy the city. It's also very tastefully designed. We found everything we needed. 
The place was clean and quiet. 
David is a true gentleman. We had some scheduling problems and had no place to stay, he took us in with really little notice and saved our trip.

Sacha’s place was easily the best AirBnB that I have had the pleasure of staying at in Sydney. 

Sparkling clean, stylish interior, excellent location (5min walk from the beach); this AirBnB has it all.

Sacha himself was also the best AirBnB host that I have had in Australia. Incredibly accomodating, instant responses and just a very friendly guy overall.

Highly recommend the place to anyone going to Sydney!
Lovely room/s. Great shower very quiet location great if you need to sleep.

This place is a must. So close to Bondi Beach and many fantastic restaurants. A 1/2 hour walk to the Rose Bay Ferry which is the way to travel to Sydney and the other water side communities. The outdoor space was a haven after a full day of touring!
Fantastic location and check in was easy as, no dramas
Had a great stay in Paul's apartment. It was perfect for our stay and in a great location. Excellent value, will recommend to anyone coming to Sydney

As advertised, the location is great! The host is very considerate and flexible to let us check in early so we were able to unload the luggage and start touring the beautiful city right away! Highly recommended!
Great value!
Great place. Place was very neat and tidy. Everything you need was available and supermarket was 5mins walking distance. Would definitely stay here again.
Great central spot. Short walk to the fish markets, Casino and Darling Harbour. Everything is at your doorstep.

Hotel like concierge services, great Dalinghurst location. 
Pictures of accomodation are accurate.
Could be a little cleaner, however nothing bad. Would recommend & would stay here again.

Excellent location right above icebergs and walking distance to everything in Bondi.  Good views, super clean with lots of little extras, quiet and comfortable. Anita is quick to respond to all communications. Wifi and Netflix available also.
Great house. Good privacy, barely saw anyone during my stay. Master room is well equipped for a comfortable stay. Not far from Macquarie Park Station.

A wonderful large room and spotless bathroom.   And QUIET!  Casey and Larry are superb hosts. Happy to chat,  gave me some great tips on what to do whilst respecting my privacy.   Good location.  Highly recommended.
This is a small sweet vintage apartment in a fantastic location. Super comfy, great value. Host is very helpful and responsive and great. I will stay again if I can next time I'm in Sydney!

My parents loved Desirée's flat. She had left a hand written note and ferrero rocher as well as beautiful, fresh flowers to make it a special welcome. A perfectly stocked kitchen and tasty tea made it really homely. It was also spotless clean and the African styled furnishings gave it a memorable touch. The house has friendly reception staff and they were helpful with giving directions. The location is sublime as it overlooks Hyde Park which is really close to both parts of the city centre. We highly recommend the flat and would happily stay again in the future. Thanks!
非常好的位置,走路到邦迪海滩或者波特郎海滩15-25分钟,房间里面各种炊具和调料很齐全,不过如果是晚上到的话建议先吃完饭再过来,离最近的超市和餐馆也要走路15分钟｡做饭很方便,房东小帅哥很帅!

I absolutely loved my stay at Kaseys beautiful flat! The furnishings and attention to detail made me feel right at home. Kasey herself was an absolute brilliant host, very attentive, lovely and so super quick with responding to anything and everything. Last but definitely not least....location, location, location. Kaseys flat really is located at the heart of Bondi which is just awesome and leaves you with endless possibilities to explore and enjoy your days! I‘ll definitely was sad to be leaving and will return for sure! Thank you Kasey!!!

Hugo's place was great! Spacious and modern for two people, comfy bed, cute location, walkable to central or to bus transportation to the beach, close to a grocery store, had power adapters for us to use, check-in was very easy (with Oliver), WIFI, even had an umbrella we could use in the rain! I would highly recommend staying here. :)

Marcella's home is in the best location and extremely suitable for a large group.  Rooms and living area have ample space.  I found it easy and a pleasure to deal with Marcella.  Thanks again for sharing your home with me and my friends.
The house is very clean, day and night scenery is very beautiful
Fabulous location, great sized apartment with all mod cons, good value for money

Thanks Judy for being a great host. It was one my most comfortable stay in Sydney. I liked the room, cleanliness, privacy, and location. In future, your place would always be in my first preference list.

Daniel and Elena's place was lovely. Perfect for what we needed, outside of the city, away from all the traffic. Their home is set in a quiet residential area with easy walking distance to Woolworths and plenty of eateries. Daniel & Elena are wonderful hosts who make you feel at home. Prompt communication and they allowed us to check in at 11am which was very helpful. Would definitely recommend staying here if your looking for something a bit cheaper than Sydney prices.
Anton’s place is centrally located. Quick turnaround for communications as we coordinated early check in. Recommend!
Great spot and cool apartment. Would not hesitate to recommend it.
Great location, clean, great value. Highly recommend

Karen is the perfect flatmate for me. 
Quiet, clean, respectful, nice. I had a great time with her. She is also considerate to her guests, trying to help me to find some shops or stuff like that. 
The bedroom is sunny, clean and cosy. The bed is comfortable and is bigger than he looks on the picture. The Appartement is also more beautiful than on the picture. The kitchen is very well equipped. What else to say. The location of the flat is vey close to the beach not even 5 limited walk.
I had a great time in this Appartement and will definitely come back there if I visit Sydney again.
Great and convenient spot to Crows Nest, North Sydney and the Mater Hospital. Clean apartment and comfortable beds.
The studio is comfortable and convenient enough that I stayed twice when I was in town. Tracey was even nice enough to help me when I was too tired and silly to open the door. Definitely recommend.
Terrific value. Fantastic location, quiet but close to the action and transport. Clean, comfortable and well appointed ...All you need for a comfortable stay.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Such a gorgeous apartment, Mags made the whole stay hassle free and very straight forward. Mosman is lovely, we stayed there for a wedding just down the road at Seargents Mess, Chowder Bay. An easy walk to the shops and restaurants of Mosman, quiet street. The apartment is immaculate, just lovely, thank you Mags.

Amazing experience with Vickie, even though she was unable to be there when we arrived she made the process a breeze and phoned us to make sure we had everything we needed. Vickie was quick to respond to messages and any problems we had. She also provided chocolates, milk and coffee for us until we were able to get to the shops (which is only across the road). The appartment is super close to everything! takes about 25 minute walk to the cbd, and 10 mins to kings cross station which was perfect for us. I would  100% recommend Vickie to anyone who needs a place to stay in Sydney. Thank you again!!

Comfortable and clean studio, really handy for a short stay in Sydney! Walking to the beach and shops is so easy from here and it really helped having aircon. Would definitely stay here again. Vivian was a great host and really easy to get hold of for any queries we had :)
second time we have stayed here. Excellent location and lovely home. Jeremy allowed us to leave our bags there as our flight was later in the day. Will definitely use again and highly recommended

The location is perfect as well as quiet, mere minutes from the beach and all of Bondi's bar and restaurants. Perfect for single or couples traveling that want all Bondi has to offer but also a good nights sleep. All of the shared amenities offered give it that 'at home' feeling and the availability laundry in the house is a life saver after beach days. The back garden and hot tub is a added luscious luxury and I always felt I could partake if I wanted.
Craig and Lee are very friendly and extremely helpful and the fellow travelers that share the house are ideal house mates. 
One of the best Air BnB's I've stayed in. Will 100% book again.

Great Host
Great house 
Enough said

Nothing but praise for this wonderfully located, spotless and comfortable apartment in Bronte. Jenny is a warm, friendly and accommodating host with prompt communication; nothing was too much trouble. The apartment is adjoined to the main house,  but with your own front door and a completely self contained living space with kitchen, large lounge room, separate bedroom and bathroom, as well as respectful hosts, the space feels entirely your own. Five minutes walk to the beach and with a bus stop out the front, it’s a quiet spot but not too far from the action. A really great base for a relaxing stay in Sydney.

Absolutely loved this place! The location can’t be beat. Very nice beds/linens and nice separation of rooms. The air conditioning kept the place comfortable and the spacious living room with the large TV was a great place to hang out. Would highly recommend to anyone. Look forward to returning in the future.

Nice location, host where amazing and very forth coming on messages back and forth with us during the whole stay. Good overall and recommend it because it was a nice apartment with good security to get in and also had the necessary stuff you needed.

This was my first Airbnb experience and I couldn't ask for a better one. First of all, the location is very convenient and the neighborhood is quiet and safe. The apartment is clean, has everything you need, and dare I say, more than you can ask for. Linda wants you to feel at home and she succeeds  : we really felt at home. 
I went to Sydney with my parents (60 and 70yo) and therefore I had some concerns regarding their comfort. As a matter of fact, they loved the place ! They were really happy about the whole experience and this is the most important for me. Linda is really helpful, attentive and  flexible. We were welcome by a lovely note and some Tim Tam and we loved this attention. 
No matter how much I think about it, I cannot fault the accommodation, nor the host. I am really glad to have had Linda for my first experience, but the downside is that she has raised the bar for the next one ! :-)

Basic room but has a cool and calm feel to it. Plenty big enough, bed is comfy and enough power points. Wifi works well. Can be a little traffic about in the morning but nothing too bad. Bring a washer and thongs for bathroom and outside as there are more room rented. Can recommend. Great coffee shops close by and young henry's brewery in the street! Check it out!

Simone thank you for your wonderful house for us to stay! We loved it! It was perfect, warm and welcoming. 
Our family loved it too. The little outdoor garden was beautiful for our champagne breakfast. 
The house is large, nice big bedrooms and plenty of space. 

We would highly recommend to anyone wanting to stay. Very cleAn, very comfortable

Home, sweet home, we arrived late, George had turned on the lights & music for us. The house is in great location, easy drive to Blue Mountain, direct train to town with only AUD2.70 on Sunday, free parking at the train station. Slightly far from city but we live like local, driving around the township is a great experience. George is extremely friendly & helpful, very informative. Jetstar lost our luggage when we returned from Melbourne, George helped us to keep the luggage as we were not around when Jetstar returned our luggage. Great host, great stay, we enjoy our stay.
Clean n spacious, close to tourist attractions, v convenient
This place was in a fantastic location. The house was large and very tidy. Cat was very easy to communicate with. Highly recommend for a comfortable stay.

The apartment is very stylish and clean. Though there 's a tiny problem that a room is in lack of conditioning since we are staying in summer of Sydney. All is all, a nice place to stay and only minutes walk to china town which need not worry to find good food to eat.
Nice place, better than the photos.

Thank you Erin for an absolutely incredible stay! We loved your place, it was very modern, stylish, impeccably clean.  We were very comfortable and felt we had privacy too. The apartment had all the facilities we needed. Thank you again for the nice additional touches. We loved staying, it was very convenient and if there is ever another opportunity to come back to Cronulla in the future we would stay again. Highly recommend.

Great host and very comfortable space,  would arrive again with Angela anytime!

Todo ha sido perfecto! La comodidad del apartamento es aún mejor en vivo que en las fotos. Los detalles y amabilidad de Desiree son grandiosos. Sin duda aconsejo por ubicación y comodidades este apartamento para conocer la preciosa Sydney es perfecto!
Allen is a perfect host. Really enjoyed my stay there.

This was a great place to stay for a couple of days chilling in Manly. Clean and comfortable with everything we needed. The location is fantastic - very close to the beach, restaurants and shops but still nice and quiet for a good night's sleep. Would recommend.

Had a great time, close to beach 
Loved it

The apartment is in a small, modern complex, very close to a bus route direct to the centre of Sydney (10 minutes). Shops and beach are close but a LONG walk.
The bedroom is A-C, very private with very comfortable bed.

This AirBnB is not to be missed! Home was very clean and there were thoughtful touches upon check in. I arrived very late at night and the check in process was quick and easy. The host had amazing and quick responses during my stay - great communication. The apartment has 2 balconies which allow loads of sunlight into the space when the curtains are pulled back. Great location for Ubers, Taxis, walks in the park. I stayed for business and I walked to the CBD within 15 minutes - easy. I will definitely stay again!

The apartment was very nice & clean, had everything we needed! Close walk to the Harbour Bridge & the Botanical Gardens which was great. I definitely highly recommend my stay here and thank Vickie very much for having myself & my partner and for informing us about the area :)
很漂亮的一栋粉色小楼,房间很干净,房东的回复也很及时｡不错的体验
Angela is very accommodating and her place is very fresh and clean. A great location for getting to the airport.

Mohit was a great host, very cooperative and easy to deal with. He was great in communication and quickly responded to any question or query before check in until check out. Location is great to any one interested in eastern suburbs or to be near the airport. No much attraction within walking distance for visitors or tourists. Although bus services and green square station is near by and can move you to the city or else where. Will defenetly recommend Mohit and his place.

Arnie was the best host ever! His house was amazing and not only did he open up his house to us but was also kind enough to introduce us to some of his amazing friends when we had an awesome mexican night with lots of food and cocktails galore. It was an incredible experience and I can't wait to go back again soon!

Thanks Linda. This apartment was pretty good for me to stay. The host: Linda was so kind and the response was very quick. Thanks to Linda, I really enjoyed the trip in Sydney. I definitely recommend everyone to chose this apartment.

Perfect Airbnb experience, with a host who knows exactly what her guests need.  I never met Miss D, but she gave specific instructions for arrival, and everything was in place and labelled, she had great recommendations to make any visit to Sydney comfortable. The room was beautiful. The house was quiet (I never saw anyone else). I would definitely stay again.
Chloe’s place was fantastic for 2 girls on a reunion weekend could walk everywhere , circular quay rocks markets shopping everywhere just great

Located in the heart of Sydney, this beautiful apartment is perfect for a family or friends getaway! Phan answers all questions almost instantly and is an overall amazing host! Thank you for making our trip memorable!

Couldn't recommend Craige and Leonie's place highly enough! The house is lovely, everyone was very welcoming and fun to be around. Bondi was everything we had hoped for! The area is great for food with lots of very reasonably priced places which would cater to everyone. Craige recommended a fantastic Thai restaurant called Bangkok Bites which we ended up visiting twice in our five days there. Would also highly recommend the coastal walk from Bondi to Coogee as a must-do activity. Getting into Sydney town centre was super easy, there are multiple ways to do it but we enjoyed catching a ferry which gives you views of the opera house and harbour bridge.
Great spot! thoughtful directions.
Nice apartment in the heart of Manly. Just 3 minutes walk from the ferry and a couple of minutes walk to beaches and shops. Definitely would recommend a stay!
Great property and quiet location.

Yvonne and Cari were fabulous hosts and made my month’s stay in Sydney very special with their warm generosity and beautiful accommodation. I cannot fault anything. They were there when I needed local information but never intruded in my personal space. I would thoroughly recommend this Airbnb in a heartbeat!

Very happy with my stay @Sam's place.  Cute apartment feel with modern touch and privacy. All the basics were provided. Well maintained and kept. Sam had a info booklet, which helped me alot with my stay and exploring the area- really liked that. 

Will surely come and stay here again. Highly recommend it.

Staying at Susan's was absolutely fabulous. The place is immaculate, really comfortable and the linen is spectacular. The place has really nice towels ( including great beach towels)
Susan also provides you a very nice Organic Breakfast, yogurt and really good muesli. 

All in all this is a 5 star stay. Susan is very welcoming and the room has all the privacy and quietness in the world. Very recommended.

It's my first time to rent house on Airbnb . Fortunately , I choose Willyan's house . Willyan is very friendly people . It's very tidy and clean . If you like surfing , you can't miss this house , just walk 1 min than you can arrive beach , everynight you can hear sea sound from beach , it's very comfortable .
Had a great time at our reunion because Cat's place lived up to the photos and description and was just perfect for us.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND: If you are tossing up between places and Kath's apartment is in your saved lists - look no further, pick her place! The bedroom is HUGE with its on private balcony with chairs etc, and  your own fridge. The kitchen was well resourced with all the utensils you need. Great water pressure in the shower + dryer / washer for you to use. My FAV part of my stay was ofcourse Ruski. He is a gentle giant who loves a pat and will melt your heart.

The studio was clean and nicely furnish. The sofa and bed are comfortable, and the apartment has a ledge by the window with chairs to people-watch in the day. It has everything necessary for a short term and long term stay. There is a big TV with chromecast that was so useful when my partner and I simply hung in the apartment after a day of exploring.

Victoria was prompt in responses and prepare materials abt the area and the facilities that were very useful. Check-in process was very easy. 

Highly recommended, and will be very happy to be hosted by her again when I visit Sydney.

Great place to stay! Amazing view. Clean, tidy and well equipped. Very comfortable bed which always makes a great difference.

Jennifer was lovely to deal with. I won't be looking any further for my next stay in Sydney.

Private bush garden setting, perfume of frangipani, easy walk to a swim, or a coffee shop.
Fun to arrive by train and ferry.
Duncan & Ashlee's place made our stay in Sydney really convenient. Friendly people, very clean place, very close to Sydney (one bus stop to city), nice recommendations

The apartment is ideally situated for public transport to all of the major attractions. Equally, many places of interest are only a pleasant stroll away. Vickie is an excellent host who fully informed us about the apartment and the locality on arrival. Lots of good local restaurants and a supermarket is just across the road. A great stay and we highly recommend this apartment.
The room and location were stunning. So comfy.

Wow! What a beautiful little studio. We loved it. 

Myself and my girlfriend stayed here for two nights and it was perfect for us. There was enough room for two of us to stay but cosy enough to make it feel comfortable. Being in Marrickville, it is so handy to where we wanted to be. 

The breakfast Cath provided was amazing, such great hospitality. My girlfriend says Cath really knows the way to a girl's heart as there were plenty of amenities included with the stay, even a hairdryer and shampoo/conditioner, not to mention the fully stocked kitchen. 

Cannot recommend enough for either singles or couples. Cath made us feel very welcome yet with enough privacy that we felt comfortable.
Mal was very accommodating and super friendly. We had a fabulous time at his place!

Angela was a very welcoming host. She was available via txt msg to communicate about arrival any time. Fresh towels etc we're prepared, besides a key, local info etc. The room and whole flat were very tidy and clean. Angela was a nice host, would recommend staying here. The flat is good to reach with public transport.
Andrews place was great, superb location and lovely apartment. Would very much recommend for anyone in staying in Sydney for break!
House is run down needs maintenance spa didn’t work deck rotten next to spa kids foot nearly went through. House cleanliness not to satisfaction
We very much enjoyed our stay. Very comfortable, the host is very accommodating and caring. Peaceful location and very short walk to public transport. Would gladly return again!

Nice and clean place to stay int he middle of the city
Really recommended!
Very well located apartment. A little dated. Some minor easily solved cleanliness issues but overall would recommend for a short break.

Trents place is an awesome experience while staying in Sydney. Its tidy, organised and just a short walk to the beach and the ferry. Trent is super cool and makes sure you will have an awesome time. His place is located in a quite neighbourhood. Definitely recommend this place! :)
Great location, and Jack's communication and recommendations were spot on. Would stay again when I'm next in Sydney.

I enjoyed my stay with Arnie, Lorraine and Arabella. Arnie was very welcoming and it was a delight to get to know Lorraine. The house is amazing - very creative space, as you would expect with Arnie being an artist. The location is superb - very exclusive and trendy Paddington with lots of designer shops in the side streets as well as Oxford Street. Very handy to city and transport. Thanks for your hospitality.
位置离机场很近,很方便走过去即可｡房东热情周到耐心｡去市中心歌剧院都很方便｡房间整洁东西齐全,性价比高｡非常赞

Great location however photos were slightly misleading. There was no photo showing the bed in the dining room with the sofa bed. There was also some hair still left on the bed linen, sheets, and pillows.

The apartment is minutes away from the train station. It has a lockable from door to the building so very safe for solo travellers. 
It’s in an older building but maintained and all part of the Art Deco charm. Was very quiet at night. I’d stay again.

Bundeena Base was the perfect place for a low key long weekend. We all especially enjoyed the kitchen, bbq, pool and fluffy robes. The house is close to the shops, multiple beaches and the national park so we always had something explore. 

Hilde went above and beyond our expectations, meeting us at the ferry to help with luggage and providing not only a portacot with bedding but also a change table, baby bath, bouncer and play mat. Our 3 month old baby had the best time. 

We hope to make it back there someday!
Fantastic position - close to everything.

Elise's place is in a fantastic neighborhood and just a short and easy walk to public transit to the center of town. There are lots of cool bars and restaurants in the immediate area. The only real down side is that if guests are not used to city noise, they might find it a bit loud.  (I also live in a city, and didn't find it problematic at all.) I recommend this for a couple or a single guest who wants a cool Urban neighborhood close to the center

Great house- it had everything we needed for a great stay with two kids, the car park was wonderfully handy, perfect location for all Randwick and Coogee had to offer, quiet, clean, comfortable! We would definitely stay again if visiting Sydney.

A tranquil and calming space, up high with beautiful natural light.

A great space with our own private bathroom and amenities. Perfect while while in Sydney for work.

Casey and Larry were warm and welcoming. I would definitely stay here again.
Great location. Walking distance to bondi beach, shops and transport.
Great communication! Great location with great price! Thank you Nicole and Vicky!
A great location for seeing family and also only a short walk to places like King Street in Newtown and the train station. Comfy accomodation and just as described, thanks Michele.

I found George’s house to be impeccably clean and orderly. George made an effort to make sure the house was aired and cool. When we arrived George had turned on misting fans/normal fans in each bedroom and had turned on air conditioning in the main area. There was also nice music playing in one of the living areas. The linen was clean and fresh and plenty of towels were provided. There was an ashtray and bench seat in the backyard provided for smokers as well as a pleasant outdoor alfresco area. George had coke, water, beer and noodles stocked in the cupboards and fridge with a piggy bank system where you left money for what you had taken. We were very pleased with this and brought some coke as we hadn’t packed any drinks with us for our travels. Another thing I was impressed with was the quality hand washes/body washes and shampoo and conditioner that George had generously provided. This property is great for families with children as there was a cot provide in one of the rooms if you should have need of it. We were all very pleased with this property and will be staying here again if we need to stay in the area again. Thanks George for making sure we had an enjoyable and pleasant place to stay in.

My experience at Lorraine and Arnie's home was below average. When I first walked into the house to drop off my luggage, Arnie opened the doors and quickly walked away making me feel like an inconvenience.
The room that was given unfortunately looked nothing like the room that was in the photos. The house felt very cold, dark, and lifeless. The house also probably needed a proper clean, it smelt very dusty. The bathroom doors despite no opened windows would occasionally just open itself which was annoying when you're in the shower or on the toilet. I used the scales on the ground that I found and leaned them on the door so that my time in the bathroom wasn't interrupted. 
The wifi also did not connect if you were upstairs, which meant you were not able to use the internet in your own room. The pool could've used a clean, looked like nobody had swam in there for a few years. Lorraine also made a point that we weren't allowed to walk up the stairs in our shoes which is fair enough, however the manner in which she did it was like a parent lecturing a child which I thought was unnecessary. 

A highlight of our stay was Arnie's daughter Arabella, she was very well-mannered and welcoming.

We loved the accommodation, Angela's hospitality and all the added extras (Bread, milk, yogurt and fruit in the fridge, hairdryer and straightener in the bathroom, along with beach towels, sun umbrella and beach chairs to take to the beach). 
Angela is a fabulous host. She greeted us on arrival and provided information on facilities, she was more than happy to assist during our stay and accommodate our requests. A guide was available on local restaurants etc. The apartment is a beautifully decorated, quiet and relaxing home away from home and only minutes from the beach. Top rate accommodation we would not hesitate in recommending. Loved it.

Where do I start? The apartment was just lovely and the pictures really don't do it justice. Very spacious, plenty of luxurious little extras, spotlessly clean, comfy lounge and bed, great leafy secure courtyard with parking and a private sunny balcony. We had absolutely everything there that we could possibly want and really felt completely at home... which is saying a lot coming from a couple of fussy individuals like us. In addition, the thoughtful food items waiting for us was a pleasure and Louise's communication and consideration for us was really appreciated. It is just so nice to deal with someone that is so well organised and on top of things. Lastly, the location was just great. So surprisingly quiet... and we found some lovely restaurants and boutiques at our doorstep. I would love to come back sometime and stay a week to just relax and enjoy exploring the neighbourhood. Thanks Louise :)

We really enjoyed our stay in the Garden studio. It was excellently located and within walking distance of the light rail. The studio was well appointed and comfortable. Susan was welcoming and very helpful.

A great experience the first time live at home locals, owner of the house is very intimate, all kinds of problems can patiently answer. The house is very comfortable, the family can barbecue, appliances complete, the location is great, go out to take a bus into the city center, if you look at Sydney's New Year's fireworks, it would be a good choice, you can see the panoramic view, if you come to Sydney This would be an excellent choice.
Great place for an overnight stopover. Good bed and pillows and a nice apartment.

Thea’s place was lovely, a couple of details like she could maybe add more utensils (pans, cups, glasses) in the kitchen and the hot water in the shower wears out too soon. She doesn’t have WiFi so check the ad before booking! She’s very sweet and  responsive. I really enjoyed the private and quietness of this place in my first days in Sydney! Thanks for everything ;)
The apartment is well located in Bondi with sensational views over the beach. Check in process was easy and Mal was easy to communicate with. No issue whatsoever and a very comfortable stay.

Annie was so sweet and helpful, even she was tired she still waited for me at her place , showed me around and gave me suggestions. This was the best location, easy to everywhere, and the apartment was super cozy and fashionable . I was so happy that I could spend these days at Annie’s place, this was an amazing traveling, hope I could come once more.

Nice comfy place in the middle of the city. Close to Darling Harbour, and close to 2 train stations. Many good eating place just downstairs or next door, including several Asian food places. Or you can cook too as there are utensils for cooking, including a rice cooker. It's nice to be able to 'go home'and rest a little bit before going out to explore the city again. Friendly and fast responding host.
Great intro place to Sydney.
Nice and friendly host with quick response as she lives upstairs.

I enjoy the overall experience. - Cindy is very nice, thoughtful and willing to help and her husband is friendly. -The bedroom was clean and cosy. -It's convenient to go to the City and Coogee beach by bus.
Nice large well decorated room in a very convenient location just a moments walk from Newtown’s main high street.
Jo’s house is absolutely stunning. The view over Clareville is gorgeous and the house is very well equipped, comfortable and immaculately clean. We would definitely stay again.

Cedric' apartment was really relaxing. I felt safe and secure and loved the sunsets out of the big windows. It was a perfect little sanctuary to come home to in the evenings after study days.  

There's a great little supermarket 10mins walk away on Missenden Rd which had everything I needed including a great healthy organic section. 

The bed was really comfortable. The wifi fast and the Netflix and coffee machine a bonus. 

Thanks Cedric.
We had a fabulous stay in Homebush, thanks to the location and convenience of this fantastic property, which was an easy walk to ANZ Stadium, restaurants and other amenities:)
离机场近,也很好找,为赶早班飞机住这里还不错,但房间较小,只有一个小窗,相对来说性价比就不是那么高｡

We had a lovely stay at Bronte B&B and Greg and Susan were very helpful hosts. It is a little haven of quiet and not far from the beach and great cafes. 
Thanks to our hosts! 
Sarah

Anita’s place is amazing. You have a great view of the beach and the sunrise from her view is to die for. Anita’s nice enough to walk you through and kind of break things down for you. What convenient stores are cheaper rather then you just walk into any store and spend a lot of money. If it’s your first time which it was for me. She is kind enough to give you a list of things you can check out while you are there staying at Bondi or Sydney in general. Overall you won’t be regretting anything staying at this location.

Incredible location, cute little unit. Perfect for our needs for the evening and a close walk to the best restaurants. Waking up to see the markets across the road was a highlight. Be warned though, the mattress is a double only so if there are two you’ll be close!
Great style, great location, excellent host
Great little place. Host was very responsive and the bed was comfy.

Stayed for 5 nights at Paul's, was very friendly from the beginning. Apartment is at a perfect location, close to the train station and a walking distance to Sydney's Botanic Gardens. Lots of shops and places to eat around aswell, a supermarket just a few minutes down the road was also comfortable. The apartment is at quite an old building but is kept up and clean. The climb to the second store with the luggage was a challenge but manageable. The place itself was perfect for us and had all the things we needed. Overall great value for money, perfect location and great communication.

Wendy’s place was just what we needed for our one night, post wedding stay. It was in a great spot, leafy suburb and close enough to local shops. The place was very clean and very cool on a hot summers night. Would definitely stay again!

Kathy's place locates at the heart of the city, we are close to everything from restaurants, parks to the famous tourist spots. The house is new, clean, well equipped. We get everything we need. It is so comfortable that we feel like being home during our stay. 

Kathy and Mary are great hosts. They helped us everything we asked for and gave us timely response. They are warm hearted and helpful which makes the whole experience so much nicer and memorable. 

Whenever we have the chance to come back we will book Kathy's place again, for sure.

Hi Belinda, I'd like to thank you allowing us to stay in your beautiful studio. It had all the necessities and was in an amazing location near the beach. Just perfect for our little weekend away! Your artwork is very fascinating as well, I will get in touch with you about those shortly :) thanks again and hopefully we will come back again in the future!

My group of 5 guests had an enjoyable and comfortable time at Sarah's cozy home. It is conveniently located between nature to the east and landmarks to the west. We're also very appreciative that Sarah was willing to go out of her way to accommodate our living requirements
