Jackie and Martin were amazing and went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and comfortable for the entire trip.  Check in was very easy and there were no issues whatsoever during our stay.
Wonderfully modular pied-à-terre that truly felt like home for my 2 months there. Recommend!
Great location
Great place, super central, everything just about 100 m away ! Also very Nice furniture etc.
Very tidy and clean apartment, helpful host

What a fabulous space which Philip offers. The place is simply divine; so well laded out with quality furniture, bedding and fittings. I cannot speak highly enough of the place. To complement the apartment is its location on the edge of the wonderful Hyde Park. The place ticks every box and I cannot recommend it highly enough. From the first communications with Philip till our checkout, this was a first class experience. Thanks to Philip for allowing me the privilege of sharing this great piece of Sydney.
Fab few days in manly. Ziggy was super responsive and helpful, location was amazing. Apartment had everything you could want for a few days

Hernan was a great host, he welcomed me warmly and helped me a lot to get started in Australia.
Even after my stay I can consult him if I need help with something. 
Highly recommended!
Sara was welcoming and the flat was tidy and ready for our stay

Bigger than expected, this apartment provided the perfect stay for us in Sydney. Handy to everything, lovely outlook to the water and nice and tidy. Oriel responded quickly to any queries and provided a smooth check in/out process. Will be back!

Matt’s place really is a gem, it was exactly what I wanted… Clean, Tidy & Spacious. Matt was a great host, really flexible on my check in and out and great to chat to. Location wise it was great giving quick access to the city and walking distance to the bars in Newtown. Totally Recommended.

An awesome location and place to stay! Lynne is an awesome host, she was very helpful and flexible with early check in and late check out. 
The apartment was spotless and very spacious. The home is exactly as shown on the listing, close to the beach, restaurants, shops and transport.  Will definitely come back and stay here again! I highly recommend to anyone. Loved it! Thanks Lynne!
Angela was fantastic. I was able to book at short notice. The appartment is close to the airport.  The room is very comfotable. Everything was great. Thank you angela
Close to plenty of dining options and a short walk to the train. A Comfortable place to stay.
Cozy apartment and nice host. Everything was so comportable. Location is also convenient to access everywhere.

The studio is great! Belinda was not home when I stayed, but my partner and I were welcomed by her husband Chris.  He was also kind enough to drop us near the ferry on a rainy day when we departed, as we were bogged down by luggage.

The garden is in a serene location with a lovely view of a garden.  Plenty of subtropical birds can be heard which adds to the ambiance.  Along with the tranquility of the studio itself, my favourite part was the walking distance to nearby beaches and Royal National Park.  Both of us ended up at the beach during the morning, day and night!  All in all, the stay was well worth every penny.

The house was quirky with lots of lovely artwork, as well as being very large easily accommodating 6 adults. The house was fully equipped with anything you can imagine - and if there is anything you need, it is central to both North Sydney train station and Mcmahons Point ferry terminal.  Lots of local restaurants, pubs, shops (IGA, Aldi and Coles as well as the fantastic Mcmahons Grocers).  Vanessa was very quick with responses and accommodating us after some previous accommodation with another host ended up being double booked.  Her information and instructions were well written and documented.  The house was very quiet and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and didn't want to leave.
Good stay,thanks.
Staying at Brendan’s was great. Wonderful flat, lovely town, easy to get downtown. Brendan is a great host.
Lovely stay in a unique little spot
The place was very beautiful, stylish, clean and very comfortable. Carole and her husband were very welcoming and hospitable people. We loved staying at their house.
Highly recommend lovely host who makes you feel at home and very welcome on her amazing studio!
This is a great place to stay and will make you feel to stay longer.  Nice place and amenities, close to everywhere.

We stayed for two weeks at Eduardo and Yvonne's great apartment.   They were very communicative and helpful, and set the place up to be very welcoming to our family. The apartment is very clean with beautiful views of the ocean and Sydney. The location is great! It is directly across the street from Waverley Park, which quickly became our kids favorite hang out spot. It was great for my husband and I too, because we were able to get coffee and great quality breakfast at the kiosk there. We were also walking distance to the shopping center, grocery shopping, and restaurants. It is also in the delivery zone of some really great restaurants. Bondi Beach is close and was a total hit with the kids. Having laundry in the unit was very helpful for us for our long stay. In addition to television options, there were also many movies including movies for our kids to watch, which was helpful.

The location is great, and doesn't require the use of a car to get around. If bringing a car, it is helpful to know that the parking on the premises is labeled as visitor parking with a four hour time limit during the day. It seems like it isn't really enforced and we had no trouble parking there for longer. There is also street parking on the block, which can be crowded during some hours of the day, but parking generally is pretty easy to find either on site or close to it. 

When we first arrived, the elevator was broken and we had to take the stairs up the apartment. Eduardo and Yvonne were very communicative regarding this issue, which ended up being resolved very quickly and was not an issue at all for rest of our stay. It seems that Eduardo and Yvonne are very responsive to guest issues as they arise.

Overall, our stay in Sydney was a great experience, and I think that Eduardo and Yvonne's apartment was a great base from which to explore the city.

Cath is an excellent communicator and an outstanding host. Her studio is perfect, spotlessly clean and everything one could possibly need is  supplied. Even games, umbrellas, egg poacher and toiletries. Her array of tea has widened my tea drinking repertoire enormously. A folder was available outlining all the local cafes, restaurants, hairdressers and any other professional you might need. Before we arrived Cath contacted us to ensure her breakfast hamper contained things we liked. In additional to the hamper, each day we were treated to a range of treats including fresh eggs, delicious cakes or freshly baked bread. Even the paper was delivered most days courtesy of Chips the guide dog in training. After eight days we rolled out of the Garden Studio wishing we could stay indefinitely. This standard was maintained with Cath being extremely busy with an enormous photo shoot as well as her impending wedding this weekend. What a wonderful find. We would definitely recommend Cath to our family and friends and in fact have done so,

Really cute apartment. Mal was very responsive and kind, moreover the apartment is extremely well located. Great to live in it but not exactly up to the expectations for general maintenance of the house. There is a big mold stain caused by a leak in the roof and a pot on the floor to catch the drips. The windows could have been a bit cleaner and there were other signs of mold in a few spots.

My husband and son stayed at Michelle's Air bnb and said it was very clean, comfortable and central.  Michele went out of her way to make their stay comfortable and she was a great communicator.  Thanks Michele.  we will certainly keep your place in mind for future stays.

The house was exactly as described and in a fantastic location, communication was exceptionally fast, friendly and helpful.
Would definitely recommend!

Susan is an incredibly intelligent and warm person. Her welcome was planned for in advance, as she tends to be quite busy herself. 
On my first day, I was given the rundown on the breakfast options, free wifi, chats with her pets, and the security of the household. The cabin was spacious, kitted out with a book selection, a digital TV, kettle and heater, pretty much everything. The place was pristine and my nights were very peaceful. My plans are to stay there for a retreat every now and then. Thanks very much Susan, for being so flexible and knowledgeable :)

What a fabulous little apartment in Mosman! We were down for a wedding and catch ups with friends and Mags' place was perfect.  Check in and check out was simple.  A bus stop, shops and cafes were a very short walk away and the apartment itself had everything you needed. Someone else mentioned that it was a bit cold with only a lounge room heater but there was actually an extra mobile heater when we stayed so we used it to warm up the room before bed and we felt really cosy.
I would definitely recommend this apartment to family and friends and I wouldn't hesitate in considering staying there again for another Sydney trip!
Excellent in every respect. I can’t fault the place or the host, Rhonda. Very happy with my stay. Thank you.
Great host, location and apartment. David was very hospitable and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Sydney. Thanks again
Absolutely love this place ! Highly recommended
Amazon location and an even better host!

I don't think the description for this place does justice to the incredible location or quality of this home. SO central. Beautiful inside and out. Well equipped and comfortable. Fantastic hosts. The two mums that went on our trip were a little concerned that the stairs aren't overly child friendly (narrow and steep), but luckily for this fact, we'd left our children at home. Parking was a breeze! I might never stay anywhere else when travelling to Sydney.

We loved the vibe of the house, it was comfortable, had a great atmosphere and suited us perfectly. The neighbourhood is full of character and laid back, near the beach and shops, all round great for us.

Daniel y Elena fueron muy acogedores, siempre dispuestos a ayudar. 
La casa está bien equipada, tiene buena ubicación, a menos de 10 minutos caminando a Padstow station, a una hora de CBD aprox en tren.
Very accommodating host. Easy to communicate with. Would stay again.
Very close to airport and clean.  Great value.
We highly recommend Nicole's apartment and her hospitality is second to none.

What a place!! What a host!! It s a dream, watching the beach earing the see lying on a dayboat bed. The place is huge and very close to amazing beaches and beautiful costal promenades... lizzie was a super host, very helpfull and carefull about us having a good time. 
The terrasse is superb
This place is marvellous!! We had a fantastic family time there we wont forgett

I stayed at Suzie's for 4 nights on a business trip. It was very convenient to coffee places and harbour views. As others have mentioned, the ear plugs came conveniently as the apartment is close to traffic. Bed is super comfortable and the fan worked well at cooling down the room at night (it was very hot in Sydney that week). Access to the fridge allowed me to make my own breakfast in the morning. Bathroom is not connected to the bedroom but Suzie was rarely in the path in between so was not an issue at all. Apartment is in a very secured complex and close to the Wynyard Station to get to the airport in 30 min. Suzie also gave me lots of local recommendations. Recommended for business trips where you spend little time in the apartment.

Wendy (Host) provided excellent communication while staying at her apartment in Roseberry. The apartment is very new and features all the modern touches expected in such a new development. We were both very impressed with the double bed (adjustable back and foot positions with variable massage settings) and felt the on-site fitness and swimming complex was a cut above the norm. A big thank you must also go out to the host as we left some clothing behind which was posted the very next day, does not sound very much however we are based in New Zealand so I put this down as very much going the extra mile.

What a cleverly designed apartment! They've made such great use of the space, everything you could possibly need is ticked into clever cupboards - it's as if Tony Stark designed a studio apartment. Great location a few blocks from all the fun of Glebe's main drag, and we walked into the city most days. Great value, easy check in, would 100% stay here again.
Great stay here. Really excellent wifi, better than anywhere else in the country. Close to the bus stop, comfortable bed, nice tv with Netflix! Would stay again.
Nice cozy stay at Rhonda's place, I would recommend it to future travelers to that area.

Greg & Maggie were the best hosts one could ask for. Their space was a home away from home peaceful, clean, comfortable and welcoming. Situated close to shops, public transport and just enough distance from the bustling city. We will be back for sure!
We would love to come back. Sparkling clean, good location, free parking, easy communication, could not be better.

Would be an ideal one or two night stop over. Lovely beds/sofa and toys for kids. Very little space if you wish to unpack any clothes (even if just one person) not much kitchen ware if you want to prepare meals. So I wouldn't recommend for longer stays although our family of 5 managed for a week.
房源地点不错,就在中央火车站附近,去其他地方都很方便｡
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Edouard’s place. Everything was perfect and Edouard always maintained excellent communication. Highly recommended!

The best location. An awesome couple. And even if you don't like dogs, their dog is beautiful, friendly. Great location. Fantastic room and gorgeou
views of the ocean. Highly recommended. 11/10 can't wait to return and visit.... Thank you so much for a home away from home...
Clean neat space, ideal for people wanting to be close to the city, but not in amongst the hustle and bustle. Bed was comfy! Pull out soda was good too. Thanks!

I really enjoyed my stay at this Bronte home.  It was exactly as described - only better.  It was a safe haven - and easy walking to the best bakery (Iggy's) I've been to, as well as a juice bar, coffee shop and a couple of great restaurants.  Also not such an easy stroll to the paths along the coast (just because of the hills!) but no distance at all.  Highly recommended.

Highly recommended for location, cleanliness, friendliness, helpfulness and space. This place would suit families or couples looking for beach, cafe and restaurant break. Had everything we needed including secure parking that we can't usually get when we come to manly. Would stay again.

Le logement est parfait pour 2 familles, nous étions 2 couples avec 4 enfants et l'espace était assez grand pour tout le monde et bien pensé (1 chambre en bungalow en extérieur avec douche/toilette).
Le logement était propre (intérieur/extérieur), tout était prêt pour notre arrivée (hiver à Sydney) couettes sur les lits, bouillottes, radiateurs à disposition et la cheminée feu de bois ! génial ! (vraiment appréciable pour la saison). 
Le logement est vraiment joli, coquet. On s'y sent bien. C'est confortable (lit douillet) et bien aménagé.
Les enfants ont appréciés l'espace extérieur, le bassin à poissons.
La communication avec l'hôte a été bien organisé, aucun problème pour récupérer les clés. 
Le logement est extrèmement bien situé, c'est résidentiel, calme dans le sens ou se sont surtout des familles qui y vivent, c'est près mais aussi loin de l'agitation des bars et restos...branchés de Bondi.
Endroit très près de la plage et de l'arrêt de bus (1 min à pieds), très pratique lorsque l'on est avec des enfants. 
Sympa d'être juste à côté du marché de Bondi du samedi dimanche.
Juste le seul point qui peut être un inconvénient pour certains : l'isolation, ce n'est pas bien isolé pour l'hiver mais c'est partout pareil dans les maisons en Australie (cela doit être appréciable en été !), et pour le bruit de la route (camion poubelle) et des passants (le week end, la nuit)  aussi, la buanderie des voisins est collée à la chambre/bungalow extérieur, mais cela ne nous a pas plus dérangé, c'était vivable. 
Nous recommandons vivement se logement aux familles, groupe d'amis qui souhaitent séjourner sur Sydney et plus particulièrement sur Bondi.
Merci à l'hôte Cat, pour nous avoir permis de passer un agréable séjour dans une maison à Bondi.
The only difference between it and a queenbed room in a 3-star hotel is, the price :)

The apartment was perfectly located and very lovely.  It's just as nice as the pics, and Desiree was the perfect host.  The neighborhood is wonderful, and the guidebook Desiree provided was very useful.  Definitely go to Messina at least once for gelato (we went twice).  We also loved the ARTERY gallery, and bought some nice gifts for friends back home and even a cool painting that I could carry on to the plane.  Overall a great experience and a perfect spot to end our trip to Australia in style.
Paul was very nice and helpful, providing us all the information we needed to know. We loved staying in the apartment, especially the location, and its interior. We would definitely stay there again!
Fantastic stay, superb accommodation and hosts par excellence!
Great place, we will definitely stay there again.

The one bedroom apartment was bright, clean, quiet, close to public transport, and minutes away from many cafes, restaurants and shops. The bed was comfortable, living space lovely and well appointed. The washer and dryer came in very handy. Narelle was welcoming, kind, easily accessible and responsive. Everything you need or want is just minutes away on King street. Will definitely stay there again on my next trip. Thank you Narelle!

Great place. Perfect for families or adult groups for that matter. 
Great location. Across road from beach, cafe next door. 
Great host. Couldn't be more helpful.
Great location! Cleanliness wasn’t great - had to throw lots of food out from previous people. Inside wardrobes were dirty.
I can only join the other positive reviews. The room is lovely and has everything you could ask for. Hernan and Chanique are great hosts, interested and caring. I can definitely recommend this place!
The house is large and first bedroom very nice. Second bedroom nowhere near as described. If they say it's a two bedroom vacancy, unfortunately my advice is not to believe them
Have a beachy holiday in Sydney at Leslie's lovely place. A beautiful walk to the ferry along the bay or a handy bus just down the road make this a great base. We slept well here in the lovely place.

Great location, accommodation and hospitality.
Very friendly family and cute dog.  Hosts were helpful
but not intrusive and made me feel very welcome in
their home.
I stayed in a lovely, bright bedroom, which was quiet with
a very comfortable bed and good amenities.
I had a very enjoyable stay and it was a pleasure to meet this host family.

Paul was very welcoming and helpful.
Description was spot on. Its in right in the heart of Potts Point and Kings Cross. Very cute area, bit noisy on a Friday night but you can walk to the city, beach, through the beautiful streets of Potts point.

We were welcomed by Felix when we arrived, check-in was easy as key was left with the concierge and Naveen was very flexible with the check in timing :)

Home is just a stone's throw away from King Cross Station, which made it very easy for us since we were departing Sydney from Naveen's place. King Cross is on a line that links to many places you'd wanna visit when in Sydney. There are also many cafes + Coles near Naveen's apartment so that's where we settled most of our breakfast + groceries.

Room + Home looked exactly like the pictures, tastefully decorated. Bed was indeed super comfortable & hard to get out of every morning.

Naveen left us with our own little space (room + bathroom) which gave us enough privacy but also helped us when we approached her for suggestions on things to do /places to visit in Sydney. 

Overall a great host & we would highly recommend this place especially for its location when you're visiting Sydney. Thanks again Naveen :)
Angela was very supportive, prompt, the room and amenities were very clean. Thanks for your hospitality Angela.

A group of 11 of us (all adults) stayed at Bailey's place last weekend for a wedding, and it was amazing! I would highly recommend staying here. The place is exactly as described, check in was super easy and Bailey was very responsive and chilled out. The views were breath-taking, we had plenty of space (most couples had own bathrooms or shared between 2), and the beds were really comfy too. Pretty much had our own private beach as well! All in all, a very relaxing stay and perfect place to escape and unwind. Thanks for a great stay Bailey :)

If you are looking for a please to stay close to the airport this place is fantastic! Everything was immaculate in the room and bathroom. I'm so happy that I choose this apartment to stay. Definitely recommended!

Sabrina's place is well located  for Darling Harbour functions. The beds are comfy and the apartment is well represented in the photos. There is a fair amount of construction going on in the building so check with Sabrina first. It was great to have a garage but be aware that only a small car will fit. Our CX5 was quite a struggle to fit in. Overall a good place to stay in the city.

Kerri is a wonderful host, she made me feel very welcome and comfortable in her beautifully decorated and clean apartment. 
Kerri is very accommodating and thoughtful and would totally recommend staying at her lovely home.
非常棒的房东房子很大很美!喜欢民国风的一定要来看看!房东很热情!还给我们准备面包牛奶,根本没想到会这么贴心周到!很感谢!☺️☺️☺️
Yang's place has a 360 degree bird eye view from 18th floor, the view is just awesome and location is stone throw away from ferry and rhodes shopping mall. Thank you for having us!
Beautiful space and great hospitality!

The apartment is in a great location - on a quiet street within an easy walk through the Botanic gardens to the centre of town. Buses and trains can be caught just a few minutes walk away, and there are all the shops you would need to stock up also within walking distance.
The accommodation was very clean, well equipped, stylish, comfortable and spacious. The kitchen had everything you might need - including a coffee machine and pods and dish washer! The key collection/drop off  process  was easy, and the building secure. It was one of the few places we found with two separate double bedrooms.
We didn't see the pool because the weather wasn't really great, but we did spend some time sitting on the balcony enjoying the trees and the birds. 
All in all it was a lovely few days and for a very reasonable cost, thoroughly recommended!
Great place. Great location. Very clean.

We did not meet the host but she did text to see how things were and if we had any problems.

The neighbourhood was residential and quiet

Had a fantastic weekend at Annie's apartment.  She met us at the apartment and had a quick chat about what was in the surrounding areas.  Apartment is clean, just like the photos and close proximity to a lot of cool lunch spots and nightlife.
Would definitely recommend staying here.

Ferntrees is one of the best Airbnb's I have ever had the pleasure to stay at.
Lucy and Ralph were the perfect hosts, friendly and most welcoming.
The apartment was spotless and such a lovely space to stay. Everything I needed was there and loved the yard with the waterfall and visiting birds.
Would highly recommend Ferntrees and will certainly return for future visits.
Thank you Lucy and Ralph and all my best to you both.

Wonderful property that feels like a home away from home. Well stocked with everything you need to be fully relaxed, comfortable and self cater. Beautifully appointed and lots of space as well as privacy if needed. We stayed in the outside cabin - wonderful experience waking up each day to the sunrise and view - the room bathed in sun during the morning. 
Perfect beach location, amazing views and the sights and sounds of nature on your doorstep. 
Richard was very communicative, accommodating and helpful all the way through our stay.  
Will definitely stay again.
We had a fantastic stay at Naveen's place. Everything was exactly as described and communication was very easy. Close to everything in the city and a great view from the room.

Ali is very friendly, the place is clean and tidy. 
Is a wonderful place and great value!
Great spot!

L'hôte est disponible et hyper rapide pour répondre à nos nombreuses questions. L'endroit est plus que parfait pour un transit près de l'aéroport. La chambre et les lieux sont d'une propreté irréprochable. L'équipement de base pour cuisiner est bien pensé. Un grand merci aux parents de l'hôte qui sont venus nous aider. Un grand merci pour tout !

This was our favorite of all the places we stayed on our two week visit to New Zealand and Australia.  George was a great communicator, before our stay, during and after.  His house is such fun.  There was plenty of sleeping arrangements for 10 people; in fact, we did not use all of the beds.  We all loved the furnishings, which are eclectic, interesting and fun.  I highly recommend this airbnb.
Great location ... close to Circular Quay and a short distance to The Rocks !
I had a really great time at Tim’s place. Clean and tidy room. Close to the train station and not too far from the CBD.
The room was pleasant, spacious, well appointed comfortable and private. Casey & Larry were welcoming and I enjoyed chatting.
It's a convenient and pretty place.

Cet appartement est très bien situé à Surry Hills, un quartier très agréable , plein de petites boutiques, restaurants et cafés super sympas, et pas du tout touristique ce que j’adore.
L’équipement de l’appartement est parfait, la literie très bonne, tous les produits pour la salle de bain sont d’excellente qualité. Il y a un cours de tennis et une piscine sur le toit, et une petite salle de sport bien équipée.
Simon et Nicole mettent à disposition tout plein de petites choses qui font que l’on se sent comme à la maison ( serviettes de plage, raquettes de tennis, crème solaire, guides de Sydney, livres, bonbons...)
C’était parfait, encore un grand merci à Nicole et Simon!!!
Heritage house with a lovely host!
Very central to light rail,to Leichhardt ,privacy is great,susan will make people's stay pleasant,I would go there again
A great location for events at Olympic Park
Gorgeous space, perfect for an escape from the city. Would recommend to anyone looking a place within range of quiet but also cafes and things to do.

We enjoyed our stay with Susan. We were very comfy and warm in the cabin. 
It had everything we needed and if we needed anything more Susan was very obliging. We look forward to staying there again in the future.
Great place in a great location!
Great space, and location

Leslie's place was very nice, spacious, and clean! The whole bottom floor made it feel as if it were our own place, and it was nice to meet others from Texas while traveling. Would highly recommend if in the north!
Great location - diagonally opposite Golf Club. Only about 1k to Cronulla Leagues Club in one direction and Main Street of Cronulla in the other direction. Nice clean unit with everything you need.
Great place right next the station and its clean

Very clean and tidy apartment. Just opposite Centennial Park. Few minutes from the bus station departing to all major stops.  7-8 mins to grocery (a bit expensive but serves your need). The flat is on the second/third floor (stairs no lift). WIFI, TV, Cooking, Heating all facilities available. Highly recommended.

I enjoyed the time at Brendan’s apartment. It was my best experience in Sydney. The apartment and room is clean and cozy. Very good located. And the view from the balcony during morning coffee or afternoon drink is amazing.
Brandan is a very good host, and a great person.
A great apartment and brilliant location. We had such a relaxing time and would definitely return.

We loved our stay at Maria's. You could not get any closer to the water and her and her hubby were super friendly and welcoming.

We will be back!

We loved everything about our stay!
Great location and super cute apartment

Fantastic place to stay. All the needed bits and pieces throughout the apartment and all the local shops give plenty of variety and quality when it comes to food choices.
Super easy check in and great communication with Leigh and his team 
Thanks Again!

Ziggy place was in the best location, 150m from the beach and the corso, 500m to Manly wharf, access is on a mall so no traffic noise and so convenient. The place was well equipt, clean and professionally handled. Totally recommend it.

Alice house is humbly described in the BnB. The house has provided me everything I need as a traveller, didn’t expect so much. I really appreciate the way she and her husband handle the power outage problem, thanks so much.
Great location, Haymarket is right in the city. Nice clean apartment.
The place was an AMAZING location! Natasha gave some great local tips and made check in/checkout seamless. Would HIGHLY recommend.
you could not find a better place so clean and lovely and very close to air port i will stay there every time i go to sydney i can not phraise it enough  david

Gavin is a good host, he had recommended some restaurant to us and he allow us to have late check out as our flight is at night time. It is very good to us as no need carrying suitcase to shopping before we go airport. Also, the house was in a perfect location to Darling Harbour and easy access to all areas of CBD. We would recommend to to our friend.

Very short walk to shops, restaurants, cafes (great coffee) and Coles. Being from the country, I was surprised at how quiet the streets was at night. I enjoyed the walk (12mins) to the station and getting the train into town.
The apartment is within walking distance to Circular Quay, place was clean and tidy and the host communicate everything clearly. We enjoyed our stay and have no issue. Recommendable.

Great. Beautiful apartment at a second floor (no elevator) in a excellent location, near a train station and in a zone full of places to go.
Paul was great responding very quickly our questions. 
No complains, we would stay there again.
Everything was good. He’s quiet and really nice!

The room was so clean and cozy and it was pretty big space for a person 
they were really thoughtful , polite and friendly 
i didn't have to wait to use a bathroom 
i'd love to go there again

Gavin is definitely a great host, he is so nice and always there when u'be got any questions. His place is amazing, clean, quite, convenient to anywhere u wanna go. I spent 3 days in Sydney and every time went out just rely on walking. Next time when I go back to Sydney, will definitely choose to stay with Gavin again.
This apartment is in an excellent location to see Sydney and enjoy the area of Surry Hills. A cosy and compact apartment providing everything you need. Ben was very easy to contact and accommodating.
So nice to have a home to go to! We settled straight in. Thanks for having us Richard!
good cheap and clean place to live ! with really good host.  Really friendly, will visit them if i have the occasion for sure !
It is very comfortable and lovely.

Great, very kid friendly (lots of toys and space to play), lovely decorated home! It’s not super close to the beach, especially with a stroller it’s a bit of a hike up the hill, but not too bad. Kids absolutely loved it and didn’t want to leave!
Great location close to Beach and Newport centre!

Nice and clean house. Linda is a very responsible host and she responded quickly. 10 min walk from Redfern train station and you can go anywhere in the city. Only shortcoming is there are quite many ants in the house.
Nice place, good to stay a couple days. Thanks

Highly recommend Place for short term or long term visiting in Sydney. The location is very good, just 10mins walk distance to the wolicreek train station. Close to central and airport as well. The house is very clean. I didn't get chance to meet Shuang, but as we text ms, he is very kind and welcome person. Hope you guys can enjoin in his house as I do.
George was a very good host. He responded to our queries on time. The house was clean and the beds were so comfy. Its so homey and welcoming. Thank you so much.

Thanks Allen for the stay! That was really nice from the host that he provided a lot info in advance and local hints as well. Breakfast is not provided, just some cereals and milk (and leftovers from previous guests) and the room is really tiny, already full with the host’s stuffs. Hard to find place for your own baggage. The location is okay, few minutes walk from stations, beach is cca 20 minutes by bus.

Nida’s place was great for my 7 days in Sydney. It was really clean, 10 mins away from the train station and 5mins to the nearest mall (Target/KMart for shopping, Coles/Woolworth for groceries and the mall also has its own foodcourt and restaurants). Nida also was very accomodating and made us feel at home. We managed to really enjoy our stay in Sydney because of her! Her home was actually one of the memorable parts of sydney because of how comfortable we were staying at her place! Highly recommended and thanks again Nida!
Charming apartment a 20-minute ferry ride away from Central Quay. Okay for a short stay.
Shuang's flat was great. very conformable and good location near to airport. He was very communicative and helpful.

경치가 환상적이고 집도 깔끔합니다. 
개인실이지만 평일 낮시간에 호스트는 직장 근무로 비교적 자유로운 생활이 가능한 점도 장점입니다. 
Thanks for your host during my stay Valentine!
Lovely place, great location. Would stay again

Great location, within walking distance to the beaches. Stylish place with house inspo with the finishing touches to their styling. Easy self check in which was convenient after getting delayed coming in. Recommend Vivian’s place for a weekend get away!
We received a lovely welcome, everything was as described and perfect for our requirements. Thanks so much Krythia, for sharing your home with us.

Fantastic location, great place just around the corner from King St. Very clean, 2 bathrooms which helps with a house full of travelers, good kitchen facilities although no microwave and no TV in the lounge but great WiFi. Downstairs front bedroom was lovely with a beautiful fireplace, hairdryer, mirror and lots of nice touches such as plants and ornaments. All bedrooms are lockable.

Rochelle was excellent from the very beginning till the end! She was quick to reply, and very flexible in arranging to meet us when we first arrive. 

The apartment was lovely and looked exactly the same as the pictures on the listing. It was very neat, clean and spacious. It is in a fantastic location, with yummy Black Star Pastry just around the corner. The apartment block is very quiet and private.  We rented a car during our stay , and the private car space was a great thing to have! 

I left some of my clothing there accidentally (silly me!) and Rochelle was nice enough to offer to post it back to me. I would highly recommend Rochelle's apartment to everyone!

Linda’s place is very central and well connected to public transport and close to good cafes and restaurants. Our only issue was with the toilet cleanliness, which Linda promptly took care off. Apart from that everything else was good.
Lilian's place is in a quiet street with excellent access to train and food places.    Clean. Secure comfortable. Lilian is friendly and helpfu.
Wayne and Kate were very helpful hosts, and their apartment is in the best spot! Great holiday location, highly recommended.
Great communication and responds well and quick. Room is clean and set out well. Would visit again.

Simon and Nicole's apartment was just perfect. The location and free parking was a must for us. Fully equipped kitchen and lovely decoration. Plus the bed was extra comfy!! 
Nicole was very quick to answer and check in was easily done. I recommend this place without hesitation. 

Thanks again!
Quick reply from the host. Easy to communicates. A very nice place to stay for family or friends.

Extended our stay, great location all as discribed, great host happy to answer any questions, great place for family or couples with everything you need for a perfect home away from home, highly recommend this as a base to explore the northern beaches..... if you can pull yourself away from the pool :)
Cutest apartment, perfect area, great amenities and a wonderfully helpful host. Can't recommend Millie enough.

Fantastic location - short walk to the beach and not much further to the shops and many restaurants. Comfortable and clean with a good array of kitchen equipment if you do want to cook. Very comfortable beds. Perfect for a short stay. Railway station within walking distance too.

Stayed at Susan's lovely cabin for a couple of nights on a brief trip to Sydney. Susan was very welcoming, helpful and everything was as described. Easy walk to the cafes and restaurants of Leichhardt and a very handy nearby bus stop. I would definitely stay here again.
Fantastic to deal with, lovely place.
Joseph"s apartment was amazing. Everything you need is there

Thank you so much (: 
I really enjoyed it
Great place to stay in cronulla.

A perfect location to enjoy everything Bundeena has to offer. The cottage was private, quiet and with a lovely aspect over the garden which can be enjoyed from the deck. We strongly agree with an earlier comment the cottage is very comfortable and well equipped with books, cds and dvds.

We stayed for 4 dayds over Christmas and found it very relaxing and plan to return.
Great clean apartment in a prime location in the heart of Sydney. Thanks for having us Min.
Lovely place, perfect place to lay our head for the night with all that you need.

Great communication with Naveen beforehand, felt very welcome & good quality inclusions with our stay!!! Fantastic neighbourhood, cafes galore at our doorstep & reasonably priced parking nearby. Good private room & bathroom with toiletries supplied & Naveen was very friendly. 
We come from the country so the road noise of the inner city was noticeable but if you are used to a bit of city buzz noise at night it's fine!!
Great weekend away
Good
Jessica is so amazing ! She is so sweet and it is in a great location
Very quiet and convenient location, Teri was very quick and smooth in communications.  Loves to go back.

Great! Such a lovely location, with the most amazing view out of the window. Try and be up for sunrise, it's a special time of day, the locals are in the sea before the sun even comes up! You can't help but feel relaxed watching the ocean and wandering along the walking track. There's also loads of good places to eat! You're only a 15 minute walk to Manly Wharf, then half hour straight into Circular Quay on the ferry. The commuters obviously take it for granted, but it's such an amazing ferry ride! Last but not least, Maria and Jerome are both lovely and very hospitable. Loved it!

Great cozy apartment. Just as described.  Quiet neighborhood, or at least where this place is was quiet.  A short walk to the Kings Cross subway station so it is well situated.  The staff at the Regent Court where you pick up the keys was super friendly and helpful and very responsive via email.  I would absolutely recommend to others or stay there again myself the next time I'm in Sydney.
Everything is clean, the location is great. Angela is very considerate and helpful. The perfect place to stay.
So lucky for us.We changed hotel before we arrived one week ago.The apartment is in a good location,near the central station and city.
Vivian’s place was modern, well furnished and clean! Great location, thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

Laura's place was lovely and immaculate. The proximity of her listing to the ferry and the available parking spot made it easy to commute around Sydney. The only drawback was the flight of stairs leading up to the apartment, but this was easily outweighed by the views outside once you arrive.
Brilliant location. So close to beach and cafes. Lovely relaxing time and spacious enough for 7

We had a nice stay, and were really blessed with great weather.  If it was hard to be outside, it might have been a little "cozy" for staying inside with 5 of us, but a smaller party would manage fairly well.  Beautiful area and view and Leslie was super helpful and answered questions quickly.

Great location. Flexible check-in which we appreciated. Pull out couch bed was made up perfectly when we arrived. The place is as in the photos, but feels quite plain when inside, bare minimum and nothing on the walls. If you're just using it for sleeping though I'm sure it would be fine. Needs more lights, not very well illuminated - not a big issue though. Best part is the location!!!

The location is great. Coles is right next to the place which opens till 12am everyday. If you walk out to Surry, you will find nice restaurants and bars. 

The place is cute and quite spacious for two people. It looks exactly same as the pictures on the website. However, the entire building is quite old, which makes sense that the place cannot be completely free from cockroaches and other bugs. 

There is a rule that you should use one towel per person over your stay, otherwise you are expected to leave a few towels for the next guests.
Apartment was very well appointed as described. Neighbourhood busy but not too noisy.
Sara was an excellent host, very responsive to questions and made check in easy. Place was clean, comfortable, as described with beautiful view and a great location. Would happily book again.
A warming and cleaning house, it is convenient for walking to city. Andrew is a friendly guy as well.
地理位置绝对优势,达令港,唐人街,维多利亚女王大厦等,玩,购基本步行解决,附近超市,商场很多｡主人家很热情,友好｡一发现厨房没有汤锅,不方便煮面,跟主人反应后,主人马上送过来｡住宿地方干净,整洁,客厅沙发够大,可以铺成双人床,最爱的是按摩椅,每天玩累了回来都要按一下｡完美的住宿,期待下次有机会还能入住

The house was big and very nice, very comfy and Cousy.
We really enjoyed our stay and had a lovely time at the home. It was very central to where we had to go.

Perfect location. 
Great, clean and well equipped house.
Absolutely perfect!

Beautiful apartment with an ultimate clean design in a quiet part of Elizabeth Bay. Excellent cafes, restaurants and everything else you need close by. Dino is a wonderful host, communication, check-in and check-out were straight forward and everything worked out perfectly. His tips for cafes/restaurants were very good. His place is fully equipped. 
Apartment comes with a parking space, which is very convenient since parking in Sydney is either tough or unbelievably expensive. Recommend to walk as much as possible, since both public transportation and self driving are not much fun in Sydney. 
Should we be in Lucca in the future, we will try to book Dino's place there as well.

Evelyn was a wonderful host. The location was beautiful and we had a wonderful stay. The internet and phone reception is a bit patchy which may be a problem for guests who need to keep in touch with work. Otherwise, everything was perfect!

Beautiful house - the photos do not do it justice, and Heidi was absolutely lovely to deal with and was ready to help with any issues that arose during our stay, literally coming to the house in the rain to fix the spa!

A lovely weekend overall, in a lovely house with a lovely owner. Would definitely stay again.

The studio apartment was what we expected and exactly enough for two people, the bathroom though was kinda small. The television was connected to Chrome Cast so I enjoyed that. The location was near the bus stop and a 10-15 minute walk from the train station which is King's Cross. If you're a tourist, you'll probably want to walk around the city center, which is Town Hall (two stops from King's Cross Station). It is very convenient.
Great place and hospitality, we had a short stay but it left a great impression!

The place was neat and the pool was lovely. Beds were very comfortable with plush pillows and linen. We had internet access and brought our own devices as no TV for evening movies. Did share the unit with a few 8 legged friends but to be expected as this is Australia. A short walk or drive to the beach and restaurants. Godelieve was kind and as she shares the pool and lives upstairs, she was respectful of our privacy.  Thank you for our lovely stay at your place.
Really lovely home. Cozy, clean, quiet neighbours. Easy to navigate to and from, already had all the necessities in the house. Will definitely look to stay here again in the future

I stayed at David's place for 11 nights and loved it. It was exactly like on the pictures and very clean. unfortunately I wasn't around a lot, but when we had a chance to chat, David was a helpfull and very pleasant host.
The place is only a few minutes away from the bus stops at Oxford Street and shops and restaurants/cafés are practically around the corner, still the area was very nice and quiet. I certainly would stay at David's place again.

Sacha's place is in a great Bronte location, a short walk to both Tamarama and Bronte beaches. The house was well equipped for self-catering, and the host was quick to respond to any queries we had during our stay. Recommended!
Cath’s Garden Studio was the perfect place for me to stay while visiting my friends who live in the area! Would definitely stay again. Breakfast provided was a very nice touch too!

We had a very nice stay at Susan's home. The cabin is adequately sized and comfortable. The neighborhood's commercial area has great dining options and lots of shops. The location is nicely situated for commutes to the city, airport or country. We'd highly recommend a stay at Susan's.
Great place to stay.... as always.

Beautiful apartment. Great location. I would love to rent this place again!
Thanks for everything Jarmo!
Noah

Great location for locals, think of it as a break from the busy city. Great location for other travellers if they want to stay in an apartment with amazing views. Lovely, quiet area with plenty of friendly dogs around. Really enjoyed walks down the river and really winding down at the local café (Left of Field is the best spot across the bridge).

Tracey is an amazing host, she is very helpful with directions and respond promptly. My partner and I love her place as it’s close to restaurants, shops and public transport. The place is a modern studio on top of a garage which was very tidy, relaxing and quiet. Would love to come back again for our next trip! :)

Jeremy is great!  Very nice and accommodating.  We didn't have much interaction but when I called or emailed he was right on it.  And helped me deliver a box to his place.   We were out of the apt most of the time so I can't comment much on the place but it had all the basics of what you would need.  Darlinghurst is nice and quiet, great little breakfast spots.

This was my 2nd stay at Angela's place.  She and Geoff are excellent hosts who really go out of their way to make sure that you're comfortable and enjoy your stay/holiday! 

They remembered that my son (5) liked a particular type of milk and ensured that this was the brand stocked in the fridge when we arrived.  There were also lots of fresh fruits and delicious fresh bread from a local patisserie.  

We brought pop up soccer goals and a ball for my son to play a bit in the back garden and they didn't mind at all.

There are beach chairs, a beach umbrella and little extras left for you to use during your stay that makes the whole experience special and easy.  They've really tried to think of everything that you might need during your stay.

The house is a 5 minute walk to the beach and a short walk to town.  As I was with a little one I drove more than I walked and Palm and Whale Beach are also a short drive away.

I have recommended many of my friends to stay here and I will certainly be staying here again soon!  Thanks again for making our summer holiday in Avalon the best!

Thanks to Hugo and Oliver, we really had a good time in Sydney.The apartment is not only clean and tidy, but also in perfect location. It took us 5 minutes to walk to the train station and nearly 20 minutes to reach most of the places we want to visit. My friend and I love the apartment very much. We will recommend it to our friends.
As advertised. Clean and good value for money.

Paul was extremely easy to get in touch with, flexible, and kind.

The apartment was just as described, and the neighborhood was incredible. Public transit in the area was easy for bus or train access as well. 

Overall, we had a perfect stay and would absolutely return to this spot!

I had a fantastic stay at Naveed's home. The room was exactly as it looks on the picture, with a stunning view. Very comfortable bed. The location is excellent as well and allows you to explore the inner city of Sydney by foot.
Nice clean studio apartment in a fantastic location. Enjoyed our stay.
PERFECT!! I couldn't ask for anything more. The space is decorated really nicely, location is awesome and Anthony is a thoughtful host. I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone.
Tracey’s place is really stylish and comfortable!

What an amazing place to stay in one of the most beautiful areas of Sydney. Right from the start I was greeted with amazing hospitality, an extremely clean (and new) space, and every little touch you could imagine already accounted for. Vivian was so responsive and even checked in to make sure things were fine. The place was very comfortable (for two), well laid out and in a location that couldn't be any better if you like heading out to the beach and the surrounding areas. I primarily travelled with Uber Pool, but it was also very close in terms of public transportation options. Loved the beach towels and beach bag and the brand new shower. Air conditioner worked fantastic. Wi-Fi and internet was great. Overall would stay here again in a heart beat, thanks for the great stay!
Definitely Recommend
Brendan is a fantastic host. Place is in a great location just minutes walk from Bondi Beach. Place is spotless. Bed is really comfortable. Great value. Definitely recommended.
Mark and Sarah are nice and welcoming people. Again, Thanks a lot for everything !

My family and I stayed for 4 days. The apartment is in a fantastic location, just a short work from Central Station. The apartment was clean and had a great view of Elizabeth Street. No issues with the check-in and we were greeted and shown the facilities at the commencement of our stay.

As my previous stay, I had a very comfortable stay at Cindy's place. The room is spacious, clean and very comfortable! Only a few minutes walk to the major shops and restaurants and the public bus stop is just at the door. Highly recommended!

I reccommend this apartment. I stayed 27 days and had no problem. The host, Mohit and his girlfriend are really kind and warm hearted. safe area and easy access to city
I'll stay this apt. if I have one more chance to visit Sydney.
We have stayed here a number of times and always good.  Great communication from Jennifer and when we had a small problem, she managed to get it fixed as quickly as possible.

Perfect host
Perfect aparment
Perfect location
Perfect everything

Carol and Ian's place is perfect. Location on Oxford Street is central to the city, trains, and great restaurants. The apartment is neat and modern, with fantastic views of the city. The hosts are lovely people that are great to talk to but also respect your privacy. I'd stay at Carol and Ian's place again.

I couldn't recommend staying at this cabin enough.  It was beautiful and clean.  It's close to public transport and places to eat, but most importantly, the hosts, Steven and Peta were friendly and helpful.  Communication prior to arriving was clear and accurate.  They ensured our stay was comfortable, but also went out of their way with little extras things such as turning the aircon on before we arrived so our cabin was cool when Sydney was in the midst of a heat wave.  
Great hosts, and a great place.
Griffin's place was clean and conveniently located. And the bed was super comfortable. Griffin was also very accommodating with our early check-in time. Great stay overall!
Fantastic place everything you want and more.. we enjoyed our time at cats bondi home entirely...!!
It's a great, stylish place, with quick access to the city and trendy local areas. We loved it and would recommend.
Own bathroon was wonderful. Room was clean and comfortable and as described. Only issue for me was that the A/C is very loud hard to sleep when its on.

If you choose airbnb to meet nice and friendly people, you are at the good place. The flat has a very good location. The heart of Sydney is served by regular buses. The neighborhood is great and quiet. Duncan and Ashley gave us a lot of advices. We had access to the kitchen. The flat is clean, the bedroom has a lot of storage and is very comfortable. It was a great stay. You can book without hesitation !

Great place with restaurants and fabulous coffee shop in the immediate vicinity.  We had an early arrival into Sydney and were met by Cathy at 9.30am which was really appreciated.

Everything was as expected from the photos with breakfast bits and bobs and great extra.

Would not hesitate to recommend and will definitely hope to stay there again on our next visit to Sydney.
I really enjoyed my stay! Very welcoming and inclusive. The house is super central to everything in Sydney. I couldn’t recommend it more

Fred was a very nice man. He helped a lot while me and my family staying. Especially, their dog was so cute. The house was in a perfect condition as the picture. The view from the house is fabulous. We love to stay longer if we could.
All good

We had a returning guests we couldn't accommodate for their requested period. After getting in touch with Ziggy we were very happy with communication, the guests gave good feedback about the property, we will be thinking of Ziggy's apartment whenever we can help a guest. 
Thanks Ziggy!
very convenient to public transport as well to the Olympic park. Enjoyed staying  here.

Mal's place in Bondi was just perfect for our quick weekend getaway to a wedding in Bondi. We enjoyed all the benefits of the beachfront location with the comfort of a nearby clean, quiet and cosy space to escape back to.

Really lovely apartment in a fantastic location. The double glazing in the bedroom and super comfy bed meant we slept like a log, and the rest of the apartment is stylish and very comfortable. As per previous reviews, Desiree's thoughtful touches, excellent communication and brilliant local recommendations really shines and elevates the whole experience to something very special. We stayed with our toddler, and the building/apartment has excellent pram accessibility.
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jessica is a great host! Amazing location of the place, wonderful accommodations. Seriously, if you're visiting Sydney I highly recommend staying with Jessica. In between the city and the beach. Amazing!
Jeremy was very accommodating and provided friendly prompt communication and assistance. Highly recommended.

It was such a lovely stay. Stayed over New Years and Linda allowed us an early check on which helped us so much. The location is perfect close enough to the city and the little touches around the house made us feel so welcome. Thanks Linda!

We were delighted to have booked this centrally located apartment hosted by Sam and Gavin. They have been most helpful during our trip allowing us to check in the apartment earlier than the usual check in time, as our flight arrived at 11:30 am. The apartment is walking distance to most tourist spots and restaurants which saves us a lot of trouble having to travel around during this period. It was disappointing to find several items not working in the apartment during our stay, though we know that Sam & Gavin were not able to help as it was Christmas period :( the Aircon broke down on first night; tap in the basin was flowing continuously hence we had to turn on n off the mains each time we use; freezer in fridge was not working either. However, cos it was Xmas period, there was no handyman working :( 

Sam & Gavin were helpful to allow us to check out at 11 am instead, as we rushed to do our last errands. Thanks! 

What we loved:
- location location location! What more can you ask for, than an apartment 8 min from Darling Harbour and Townhall? :) 
- strong wifi in the apartment 
- plenty of extra towels and extra bed available 
- shampoo and body wash provided 
- fully equipped kitchen
- Chromecast TV!
- Fully equipped Gym and a lap pool in the building.

What we didn't 
- Aircon broke down on first night :( 
- there's only a fan in the living room, no aircon in bedroom
- the tap that flows continuously and having the trouble to turn on n off the mains. :(
- the fridge that couldn't make ice. 

We know that all these issues would have been fixed by now, so there wouldn't be much issues for future tenants :)
Schönes, gut ausgestattetes Appartment in ruhiger Umgebung. Im Viertel sind einige Restaurants und coole Bars, die gut zu Fuss zu erreichen sind. Don war ein sehr aufmerksamer Gastgeber.

We had a great stay at Will's place in Bronte! The house was super clean, spacious and had really comfortable beds. The location was also brilliant, with a short 10 minute walk to Bronte beach. We would definitely stay here again and thanks again to Will for being a great host - also for the late checkout due to our night flight, which was really appreciated!

A stylish and comfortable apartment in an excellent location for our two-night stay in Sydney. Paul was super-responsive, provided excellent restaurant recommendations (we tried three of them) and had we had more time we might have even made it the end of Macleay St without getting distracted by another cute coffee shop. Bed was excellent, as was shower. Be warned that if you are a light sleeper this is in an older building in a lively neighbourhood - so it was pretty noisy out there on Saturday night. Thanks Paul and Luke (and Wendy who let us in as the hosts were travelling themselves).

We had a great stay at the apartment. It is located in a beautiful spot, ten minutes walking distance to Paradise Beach. Fully equipped. Molly was very helpful and made our stay so easy. Totally recommendable.
I had a great stay. Everything was good, friendly atmosphere and nice location. Highly recommended!

What a delight it was to stay in this very cute apartment. The location is an ideal place to launch daily adventures all over Sydney. Immaculately clean, comfortable, and convenient. Also, Wendy who cleans the place helped us with our bag drop and getting the keys. She is a total gem!

Studio 32 is a great place to stay...near enough to Sydney CBD with great local amenities. Buses are nearby and frequent. The room is immaculate, comfortable and stylish...I hope to be back on my next trip in 3-4 months. Tracey was welcoming and responded quickly to any emails. Certainly a credit to the Airbnb community

Small studio in nice building in one of the best parts of Sydney, close to many good restaurants and bars, not to mention several shops, walking distance (20/30 mins) to the CBD and very good connections with public transportation. Laundry options available on each floor of the building. Victoria was a great host, very friendly and gave us lots of informations. Definitely recommended for anyone spending a weekend in Sydney, or as part of a longer trip as in our case.
Hugo's place is in a great location to were I needed to be and perfect for my needs. Recommended to anyone wanting to be be in the centre of the city experience.

This apartment was modern and tastefully decorated.  The location is excellent, with a lovely outlook over the fountain at Kings Cross.  Walking distance from the Botanic Gardens, Opera House and Circular Key, Rushcutters Bay and shopping centres.  
Plenty of restaurants within 5 minutes walk, as well as grocery shopping a Harris Farm Market and Woolworths.
The Kings Cross Train Station is only 5 minutes walk and taxi rank and bus stop outside.  The kitchen needs more utensils and baking dish to use in the oven, but was otherwise well equipped.  It was nice to have tea and coffee provided, as well as basics such as dishwashing liquid.
David was prompt in his communications with me and very helpful.
Lovely, modern, cosy apartment. Friendly hosts, easy to communicate with! Good value for money!

This was a fantastic find , especially if you’re looking for a quiet place, out of the way but near enough to get to other amenities . We thougherly enjoyed our stay and wouldn’t hesitate to come again if the opportunity presented itself.
Danny's place is really nice and bigger than I expected for a city apartment. It was a great location and close to Darling Harbour. Would recommend to stay here.

Cedric's place is near the city, a very convenient location to all the attractions. This place is great for someone who would like to cook while they stay, having all the kitchen appliances that you need.

Oriel’s spacious apartment is in a terrific location, just a short walk to Darling Harbour restaurants, harbour tours and water taxis. Plenty of shopping close by at King and George and we found the distance to the Circular Quay area (Sydney Opera House, The Rocks, Botanical Gardens, Sydney Bridge) very walkable. The apartment kitchen had all the amenities we needed and more! I’d recommend Oriel’s place as a great base for touring Sydney. He was very kind to allow us to store our luggage before check-in, which was a huge help. This was our first visit to Sydney, we would definitely come back. :)

What a fantastic apartment - spacious and well laid out. One of the really great things was the fresh linen along with a very comfy bed and towels. 
There was really great facilities including a gym which was empty every time we went! 
The location was perfect for our stay close to some awesome cafes, bars and shops and public transport, with central station only a short stroll away. 
We needed a slightly later checkout and Nicole was very accommodating of this.

Location location location.  Close to the beach and cafes,  this was a great house for our family.  Very comfortable and clean, and communication with Catherine was so fast and easy.  Thanks for your hospitality!

The apartment was spotlessly clean and had all the things we needed e.g extra towels, blanket, kitchen amenities, hair drier, as well as some extras we weren't expecting e.g. plunger coffee, tea & milk, chocolates.   The location is in a lovely area with several nice cafes and restaurants only a short walk away.  There's also a supermarket across the road which is so handy. The outlook from the window was delightful - warm sun, beautiful trees and great to just watch people strolling by!  Victoria is very friendly and helpful (thank you!) and provided us with tips on where to eat and visit -  including the market near the El Alamein Fountain on Saturday morning.  You won't be disappointed.

The apartment is very conveniently located, very close to the opera, the transport hub at at Circular Key, shopping streets, dining area in the Darling Harbour. The place is cosy and clean, equipped with everything we needed.
Clean and tidy place. Handy location. Friendly host. Would stay again
Six stars. Great place, private and quiet. Close to airport, local shops and a fantastic beach. I'm looking forward to staying with these friendly hosts again.

I enjoyed my stay at Hugo’s place. It is exactly as pictured and situated in a great neighborhood surrounded by countless shops and restaurants, even a glorious supermarket that’s worth a visit just to browse. It’s easily accessible from the airport by subway train, just 3 or 4 blocks from where you get off. I was given excellent directions to the apartment, which is in a very secure building, up one flight of stairs. The unit was very clean, the water instantly hot and the strongest water pressure I’ve ever seen. The large desk and ample countertop made it really handy to spread things out, set up the laptop, etc. The wifi was fast. I didn’t watch any TV but there’s a huge one in front of a comfy sofa. The bedroom isn’t overly spacious but it has a large, comfortable bed and was more than adequate for me. I especially appreciated the room-darkening draperies in the bedroom. The place is quite quiet for being so close to the action outdoors. 

Ollie was a great host. He gave me a Sydney guidebook and pointed out places of interest, which was especially appreciated given that I hadn’t planned much in advance. He lives just a couple of doors down, so he’s at your service whenever needed. When I foolishly locked myself out, he was promptly there to let me back in. 

I highly recommend Hugo’s place to anyone. You could pay a lot more and stay at a place like the Waldorf Astoria. But I don’t like to pay a fortune for lodging when I can get a perfectly suitable place like this for a reasonable price.
Great place to stay, nice quiet house close to everything. Nice, friendly, welcoming hosts.
Agnes was a great and very friendly host. The apartment was nice and comfortable, and had a perfect location in Redfern.

Delightful find
Lovely thoughtful accomodation
Only downside for those seeking it  is that there are no grand views rather an intimate garden setting
We loved the little beach for a morning dip across the road
Robert was an excellent host and the apartment was lovely. Loved the sunny balcony. Nearest station was North Sydney which was a few stations to almost everything.
Tim & Mel were great hosts! The house was very clean and neat, and location is great too! Tim also responded very quickly to my messages. Thanks for the snacks, it's such a thoughtful addition! :)
The place was exactly what we were after. The location was excellent and Kirrilly was great to deal with.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Cath's Garden Studio and we're already looking forward to a return visit. The studio itself is light and bright, as well as clean and comfortable. Cath was a welcoming and attentive hostess who was not only knowledgeable and helpful with all our queries, but provided a wonderful breakfast hamper with home made goodies that really made us feel welcome. The garden setting and chooks only added to our experience. We loved the location and enjoyed exploring the adjoining areas such as Newtown and Surry Hills.
Thoroughly recommended.

Robert is a great host - super friendly and accommodating.  His house is perfect  for a large group - lots of beds, bathrooms and living space and really close to the beach and Cronulla shopping centre, restauraunts, train etc.

Would highly recommend and if we're back in Sydney, we'll be looking Robert up!

Thanks Robert for a lovely stay!
Tim went out of his way to help me out during my stay. He is unbelievably generous and accommodating. Neat little set up. Perfect location to the airport.

The garden studio was the perfect spot to enjoy a weekend for two in Bundeena. Beautifully appointed, with many much appreciated extras, and a very helpful but unobtrusive host I couldn't speak too highly of it. I'm sure we'll be back.

The rental lives up to its pictures.
Brand new, spacious and well equipped.
Very responsive host. Conveniently situated. Good value in an expensive city.
Nothing less than 5 stars!

Suzie’s space is awesome for going to barangaloo, which is hot spot for trendy people.

The house is, of course, very clean and has spacious room for the guest. It was impressive for the amenities as like the hotel. She offers enough towels, so don’t worry about the thing you didn’t bring.

Anout the host, Suzie is also very warm and not intrusive as other people’s comment below. In other words, you can have enough time to relax your minds. 

One thing you be noticed is suzie’s location from the Museum station has a bit slope. (weak though) So it’s better to take an escalator near David Jones. :) it will help you a lot.

Well designed house with two seperate rooms(one bed room and one living room) that you can stay in. Everything is clean and make you feel at home. Reasonable price and absolutely better than my imagination.   I highly recommend here as a place for short stay! Thank you Carole and Steve

Fantastic spot in Bundeena, virtually on top of a beach that I’d call paradise. Jibbon and the walks around the heads are magnificent. 
Belinda’s cabin is private even though you’re in her back garden. A very comfortable nook! 
Thanks for accommodating our early bag drop too.

'' Eagle's Nest " is the perfect name for such a great position in central Sydney. The views to die for and so handy to bus ,train and a 20 minutes walk through the gardens to Circular Quay. The best shopping in Sydney QVB and David (Website hidden by Airbnb)  perhaps too close ! Handy supermarket n an attractive pool on the roof . Very kind generous host and hostess.
Great location, great host

If you are heading to Sydney and want a FANTASTIC place that is central and within walking distance to everywhere, especially Darling Harbour, then please stay at Desiree's apartment.  There is everything you could want close by, especially restaurants and public transport, the airport train is just a few meters away. The apartment has everything you could possibly need and more. Desiree's interest and love of people shines through in everything she does; she goes way beyond being a superhost.  Thank you Desiree for making our stay so special and we can't wait to come back, hopefully when the weather is a little kinder.

The apartment is close to some nice restaurants and about 30 mins walk from many main attractions. Very easy to access from the train station. 

Johannes is quick to respond to questions. 

I would recommend his place to travelers who wish to see Sydney but not stay in the busy central city.

Ons verblijf in Maroubra Beach was zeer goed. Het huis ligt ideaal op slechts twee minuten lopen vanaf het strand. De baai is mooi, met veel surfers en een groot breed strand. Met het openbaar vervoer is de trip naar Sydney centrum goed te doen. Met twee kleine kinderen was de afstand misschien iets te groot (zo'n 45 min tot aan Circular Quay) maar als volwassene is het prima. 
Het huis hadden we helemaal voor onszelf en ideaal was de tuin aan de achterkant. Iedere avond hebben we hier de bbq aangestoken en heerlijk gegeten. Al met al was het een zeer goed verblijf.

Convenient location for concert-goers, easy transport to and from Qudos Bank arena. 
Lovely apartment with great views.
Such a beautiful flat and in the perfect location. The flat was light and airy and decorated in a modern style. We were sad to leave!
Cecilia很nice,房源位置很方便,房间也很不错

We had a great stay! Sarah is a really friendly host and was very willing to answer any queries we had. Room is very clean and has everything you need particularly if you just need a place to stay for just a few nights! Comfortable and felt private and quiet.
Near hurstville train station

A great place to stay for a weekend trip. Clean, comfortable and a great location, close to public transport, shops and restaurants. Miss D was a responsive and attentive host.

The only downside was that we were sharing the house with others and, as our room was near the front door, we heard everyone coming and going. But a minor downside to a great stay.
房间干净宽敞,听房东说现在是悉尼最冷的时候,但我们晚上没开电热毯也睡得很舒服｡房东人很好,知道我们第二天六点要出发去机场赶飞机,夫妇俩人开车送我们去了机场,从住处到国际机场很近｡另外,房东是中国人哦,所以我们沟通起来比较方便｡下次去悉尼,还会选择入住的｡
The place was beautiful, spacious, and close to the venue. Sarah was also such a great host!

I stayed in Nicole's amazing Warehouse apartment for 8 days and had the pleasure of meeting Nicole on check in. Everything was very easy and Nicole did everything possible to make my stay as comfortable as possible. 

On entering the apartment I had two thoughts. 1- this apartment looks better than the photos. 2- this place actually feels like home. Nicole has gone to great efforts to make this apartment really feel like it's home. Everything from the Nespresso coffee to the lollies and little extras in the fridge for arrival. I was so thankful for all of this. 

The amenities are great and a perfect, quiet location that is next to the city and so close to everything you need in Sydney. I would honestly say that this would be the most comfortable Air BnB that I have stayed in. 

The only real thing that I would say about this apartment would be that it is more like a studio apartment, as opposed to a 1 bedroom apartment. The bed is elevated in comparison to the rest of the living space and private thanks to half height walls, though all the actual  walls are common in the apartment which I was surprised about when I arrived. I do believe that 1 bedroom would be classed as a bedroom being completely separated from the rest of the living space, also something that I look for when staying away from home. In saying that, it's still one of the best Air BnB's that I've stayed in.

Definitely recommended!

Thanks Nicole!
Excellent location, great house and fabulous hosts. Cant wait to come back.
Great location within walking distance to circular quay which is very handy! Great communication with Suzanna, she was very helpful and efficient with checking in etc and suggestions for the area!

We really enjoyed our stay in Tracey's flat. It's compact and very well designed.  The quiet air-conditioner helped us effectively through a couple of hot days/nights.  The apartment is very well equipped. Even though centrally located (minutes' walk from bus stops and train stations) it was very quiet.  Occasional aircraft noise did not bother us.
Amazing host and place! Absolutely loved our stay, would definitely recommend.

I booked this studio for my cousin and daughter on holiday from NZ and they loved it. Looked fantastic just liked the images and was very modern, clean and had everything you need. Definitely would book again.

Great overnight stay! Mal was very hospitable with excellent communication and was flexible with check-in/check-out times. Quaint space with lots of light and very comfortable. Thanks so much adding to a lovely weekend away!

Hugo's place is perfectly located for getting around Sydney, but equally for staying in the area; so many bars and restaurants and shops, you won't need to leave. The Opera House is only a 30 minute walk away - or 5 minutes by train! Bondi beach is 2 stops away by train.

The apartment is lovely; especially for single travelers. The bed is really comfy, it's got everything you need, and check in and out was easy-peasy.

I would recommend Hugo's place to anyone!

Tim and his wife are very nice. They not only give us so many advice about our travel but also make our travel happy and convinient. When we want to go out,he will take us to the train with his car. More then that,he took us to the sydney beach by car and introduce Austrailian food in woolwoth in detail to us. And even having dinner with us together with delicious food. Thank Tim and his wife very well and if I come back to sydney again,I’ll choose Tim’s house absolutely!
Great location; great facilities; great value.
We can’t thank Tessa enough for her hospitality. From freshly baked cakes, to useful local knowledge. We were so comfortable for our stay, could have easily extended!! Thanks for having us

Everything was as pictured and explained. The beaches, shops and cafes are all within walking distance so we didn't need to move the car at all. Check in/out was easy and Belinda is super accommodating and genuinely lovely. The cooking facilities were handy, we took pre prepared meals and 'zapped' them but also made popcorn in the electric frypan and Bbq'd too. We loved that there was some DVD's and books and games.
It is a clean, quiet place and also has a beautiful view. Terry is a super nice host, and I really enjoyed staying there.
Great apartment in a fab location only slight downside the tv had no reception

We very much enjoyed our stay at Fei's house.  It was quite an experience. As soon we arived we were greated and welcomed like family.  Fei and his wife made our stay very pleasend and gave us a lot of information on what to do around Petersham. They supplied food and drinks and checked on us every day if we need anything else.  Thank you so much.  We will be back.
Great spot. Very clean and cozy. Great location to local cafes and in a cool and safe neighborhood.
Thanks Angela for having me. Happy to stay again next time
Clean central great little townhouse will everything you need
Great Host, great house, great location which is near to a beautiful national park. You will not go wrong with this Airbnb.
Thanks you. Just no WiFi in apartment and the kitchen was no equipped ( no casserole, salad bowl...)

I loved my stay at Imogen's place. Location was perfect - minutes away from Bondi Beach and lots of amazing restaurants and cafes. The room was large, with tons of storage and natural light. Imogen was the perfect host; super sweet and helpful. I would stay again and  I highly recommend it.

Gregoire was very quick to communicate and his instructions were very thorough.  The apartment was in a great location, very easy to get the bus to many tourist places in the city.  There was a grocery store nearby and many restaurants.  Don't be put off by the hallway as it was a bit shabby but the apartment itself was lovely.  It was well equipped and very comfortable.  Would definitely recommend.
Clean and nice

Room was comfortable.  Put suitcase on floor and sleep well. Cool nightlight and nice breeze. Cute kitty cat will try to come in, but you can simply close door. I was here 3 days and saw roommates a few times. So glad they didnt party there. I had peaceful Christmas and that is what I wanted. Fair price and good location.
A fantastic stay. Min's place was perfect.

We had a great stay here. Hayley was very easy to communicate with prior to our arrival. The room was spotless and comfortable and the breakfast/coffee was very much appreciated. The central location was perfect for our weekend in the city.
We had an amazing time in Malabar. The appartment is fantastic and Bernadette and Fred are lovely people. They are very helpfull and they made us feel very welcome

What a great stay - location is amazing!!! Everything is at your door step and the house is very stylish and clean. The room is a great size with comfy bed. Imogen was an excellent host and is super easy going. Her tips on things to do in Bondi really made my trip. Highly recommend.
Paul's place was great and very clean. Their help was highly appreciated. We would recommend their place to anyone visiting the area!
Great location for family holidays.
The place is very cozy and in great location. Chloe is super friendly and helpful. A recommended place to stay with family. ❤️

This was our first experience with Airbnb and We had really very good time at Miss D's house. The location is superb, the house is nice and clean.
