We could not get a chance to meet Miss D but she was always available on the phone or message and I really appreciate this. I would love to stay again on our next visit and recommend to my other friends as well.
Close to everything. Good launching point.
Communication was very difficult because she only can speak Chinese and doesn't understand english. The kitchen was very dirty, e.g. the dishes or the microwave. There was no oven.

A magic place, a very unique experience. Staying in a museum. Everything just perfect.
And Margaret and her husband such lovely people.
My best Airbnb experience ever

Anita’s beautiful apartment is perfect place to stay in Bondi. Location is perfect,  the apartment was spotless and everything was catered for. I can’t fault it. Anita communicates everything very clearly and it makes it so so easy.

늦은 체크인을 부탁하였으나 연락이되지않아 새벽 두시 넘어서까지 기다리다가 다른호텔에 숙박하여야했습니다. 컨디션이 좋지않던 저희 엄마는 이일로 인해 시드니 여행내내 약을 달고 사셔야 했습니다. 호스트와는 결국 연락이 되어 호텔비와 숙박비를 돌려받긴 하였으나, 시드니 도착날과 그 다음날 컨디션과 기분이 엉망이 되어버렸습니다. 예약한 다음날 숙소에 들어와보니 건조기안에는 세탁물이 가득했으며, 부엌선반의 기름은 유통기한이 지난것이 었습니다. 변기도 더러웠으며 ,커피머신의 캡슐은 커피머신과 맞지않는것이었습니다. 숙소바로앞 죠지스트리는 한참 트램공사중이라 시끄럽습니다. 침대는 편했습니다.

The apartment was in a very good area of Manly. Very close to all the action happening on the main street with all the markets and the restaurants. The apartment was close to the beach but  also very quiet. Great spot.
Convenient location, very clean and good size rooms. Highly recommended.
Amazing place in brilliant location

Staying at Jessica's was great value for money and in a top location! A clean and tidy place and Jessica was lovely.
Thanks for having us!
Staying with Natasa was great, lovely house and lovely host. Would definitely stay here again.

I had a nice stay at Cindy's place. Cindy and Claudio are very friendly. The room is spacious, clean and comfortable. The location is great, with only a short walk to restaurants, shops and supermarkets. It is also very easy to get into the city center as the bus stop is just in front of the house. I would love to come back  when I visit Sydney next time.
Exactly as described-will return!  Thank you!

Great apartment I’m a great location. Was just a bit disappointed at the lack of utensils in the kitchen and also we clearly stated that we needed a 3rd mattress however although being told there was one there it wasn’t anywhere to be found. Our 4th guest had to sleep on a cot mattress for 2 nights.

The apartment was cosy for myself as I was travelling alone and stayed for 3 nights. It would fit a couple perfect. There is a double bed with nice quilts, it was comfortable for me. Good lightings, internet and TV were all working well during my stay. What you see in the picture, is exactly how it is. The Location is very safe, especially since it is very nearby UTS where u have lots of students roaming around. The location is excellent, very near Central Mall and HayMarket. I could even walk to the Fish Market and Darling Harbor in 15 mins.  I highly recommend the apartment by Xinhui. He made renting very easy and was very very quick in responding if you needed any information.
A fantastic find in a perfect location. Don's communication made the stay easy. A perfect, affordable space for a couple to explore the city.

Fantastic, beautifully appointed home in an amazing Northern Beaches location - better than the photos if that's possible!  Angela was the perfect host, made us feel right at home and so many nice touches!  Thanks!

Kath and her dog Ruski welcomed us into their very clean and well maintained home.  When we arrived earlier than check in, she offered us luggage drop off and even a shower. Kath has a fantastic location.  Only a 5 minute walk to the train station and 10 minute ride to downtown Sydney.  Our favorite coffee is the The Urban Piccolo (1 block) (Say Hi to Lucas) and The Tudor Pub for a beer and a bite.  Kath had breakfast items and was always willing to answer question in person or by email.  Thanks Kath and Ruski. We highly recommend your place   --  Cheers  Barb and Chris

Nick's apartment is well appointed and well located. The room is tastefully decorated with plenty of space and a private bathroom. I enjoyed staying with Nick, who was very friendly and hospitable. I felt very welcome and at home.
Wonderful place to stay, beautiful room & Cathy was so helpful. Perfect for a weekend away!
We cannot recommend this property enough. Great host, sparkling cleaning, safe parking spot and neighbor hood. Great value of money, perfect for short stay.

David’s place was a great find for our pre-cruise stay in Sydney.  Our flight from California arrived at 6:00 am, and we were able to check in early.  We texted David to let him know we were on our way, and he met us once we got off the train.  He took us right to the apartment.  

The apartment was clean and described just as the photos in the listing.  It’s a short walk to public transportation and centrally located to all the sites.  Lots of great little restaurants in the area and a wonderful market on Saturday morning.  

David was a very gratious host, and we wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again for our next visit to Sydney.
Great location, amazing value. Linda was very accomodating and a great host. Would use again  for def.
We so enjoyed this apartment and fell in love with Bronte. Verycomfortable, private, peaceful and very convenient for the beach and cafes. We didn't want to leave! Thank you so much.

Wayne and Kate are wonderful hosts and extremely welcoming from the very beginning!  Place was immaculate and wine and chocolates were waiting on our arrival.  Our holiday started off perfectly!  

Then Mother Nature showed up.  Unfortunately, we happened to visit Sydney during "the wettest April in 26 years" according to news reports.  Winds were howling and there was even a hail storm.  Exciting, but not what anyone wants of plans for on vacation.  And nothing anyone could control.  

Wayne and Kate went out of their way to make sure we were safe and comfortable.  They checked in on us several times.  Made sure we had food (there were weather advisories, trees were down, Uber was overwhelmed, and we didn't have a car).  Loaned us their rain gear.  Even dropped off pastries.  No one could have predicted such wild weather conditions.  But we were determined to see Sydney and they were determined to make sure we were comfortable, dry, and safe.  Wayne and Kate went above and beyond to help make our holiday a resounding success even in the midst of a wild storm.  

Their spot in Tamarama is iddlic!  They have thought of everything.  Kitchen was well equipped and there was lots of reading available for those rainy days.  The views are more amazing in person.  The storm was fascinating to watch and the little beach cafe/park across the street is delightful.  Their apartment is on the coastal walk from Bondi to Coogee - loved this walk!  Fairly easy walk to Bondi (maybe not for a 3 year old or the elderly, but for most adults).  

As stated, weather can't be controlled of predicted.  But these two really went all out for us.  Their care and concern help make our trip so much more enjoyable.  I feel like we not only had a great vacation, but we made some friends.

I would definitely recommend this apartment and these hosts!
Great host. Good spot
condition is not bad just some cockroach position quite good ez to the ferry and to qvb just 15 min walk.Owner pretty good.

Place is in a great location near the trains and with a solid balcony view, the house was clean and Wendy was really solid with communicating making sure we where on the same page for check in and check out times and we had no problems getting in. Was a super enjoyable stay.

Just an all-around great experience.  Ali was very quick to respond with every question I had from booking to departure.  Their place was beautiful, clean, great location and excellent value-I highly recommend!
Susan was a wonderful host her little villa was so cute and just what I needed for a great getaway.

Great location!  David's place was really well set up and he provided us with helpful information to explore the local area.  The place helped to make our stay in Sydney relaxing and fun. We would definitely stay there again.
Great location and value. Spotlessly clean and great communication.

Had a really great stay at Serena's apartment.  The location was great - we arrived at Sydney airport at 9pm, by 9.30, we were meeting Serena at the apartment and by 10pm we were meeting friends at the Kings Cross Hotel down the street.  Very convenient!

The apartment was thoughtfully decorated, the breakfast was simple and nice, the bed was comfy, the bathroom clean.  No complaints!  Surprisingly quiet for the middle of the city.  Would definitely recommend!

Well,
I felt very comfortable in my room and the 
living area "warmly atmosphere ".  Karen is a really pretty person she's always up for a friendly conversation ready and gives good tips for everything! 
The location is perfect, close the City and to the beaches:) 
I'll never forget the time with Karen here, and can only recommend this accommodation. Peace & love Florian

Belinda & Chris were amazing hosts who were quick to respond to questions: provided much privacy; and were lovely enough to allow a late check out. Belinda has great attention to detail and a creative talent shown through the decor of her spacey studio. It felt more like a quaint cottage with a self-sufficient kitchen and patio, where we spent much of our time relaxing.  Their place is surrounded by beautiful plants and trees, and their location is so close to all the beaches and walking trails.  Thank you Belinda and Chris for a lovely stay! We will definitely be back soon :)
Perfect distance from the wharf and awesome place to stay

Hernan is an extraordinary individual and it was my absolute pleasure to have stayed at this lovely room.  Hernan helped me with so many things, i am absolutely grateful for everything. The place was heaven for me, walking distance to a peaceful beach, and convenient to get to the city and the airport. The area had everything i needed and i am so glad i have stayed here, wish it was more days :)
Great little place,  nice quite neighbourhood, a little out of the city so not too busy, clean and suited what we needed :)

Our host Sarah is very accommodative and hospital. A pity is that we happened to be there during a particular hot period, and there was no air con in the unit so could be a little stuffy. But other than this minor point, Sarah’s place has adequate provisions to make it a pleasant stay.

Alice's place was exactly as advertised. Great space for great value. The location was also fantastic in that everywhere we had to go was within an hour. We especially loved the personal touch like the box of chocolates that greeted us on arrival. Very happy with everything including comms with Alice.
地方很好,主人也很热情很好,性价比賊高｡挺好的｡

I had a wonderful stay in Glebe with wonderful friendly hosts, a lovely room, comfortable bed, clean bathroom and peaceful location.  Thank you to you both for sharing your home with me, it was lovely to meet you and I will hope to stay with you again in the future when I'm back in Sydney.

She is a very zealous hostess, offering us so many useful tips on our trip. The house is quiet, clean and tidy, a really good place for rest! Also, the house locates in a beautiful town which is near the center of Sydney, so it's really convenient to have a meal or take a bus.
Great location close to shops and public transport. Clean and  spacious for the two of us. Even had some basics in the cupboard which was very welcome. Easy to follow instructions and house rules.

Nice place, close to Redfern station. Listing description is accurate, and guidance instruction is super clear.
Place is well supplied with basic needs (i.e. Towels, shampoo, soap, laundry detergent, extra beddings, teas, etc.).
Linda is very responsive and welcoming.
Really nice, clean and comfortable.
The room is good value, clean, with access to a good shower and close to public transport. It would be excelent if it there was a bed under the mattess :) Lilian is lovely and makes you feel at home

What a cute little apartment. Great views from the balconies. Clean tidy and spacious. red fern is a coll area there is food options nearby and coffee across the road. Train station is very close. Linda was easy to deal with friendly and answered all questions promptly. Thanks for having me stay.
房间可以,地理位置也好,离AIRPORT不远｡

We didn't meet Simone but she was very responsive to messages and made it easy to get into the house. The house was pleasant and close to shops and the beach. Simone had left a bottle of wine in the fridge, which we appreciated!  A nice place to stay in the beach suburb of Coogee.
The apartment was in an excellent location with amazing views of Bondi beach. Mal was very helpful with our late check out request.

This is a good option for a cheap place to stay, but only if you plan to be out doing things during the day; the space is very small, not a problem if you make the most of your time in the city.
      The wifi is great, very helpful for trip planning etc. Kitchen and fridge is small; I spent most nights out with friends so this wasn't an issue.
      David was very communicative and fast to be so. I didn't have phone access until the day I was to arrive at his place and he was available for info and plannin (Website hidden by Airbnb) Not a far walk from king street and some other cool suburbs, and its a half hour metro ride to be at the opera house for reference (Even closer to the airport so its a good middle point). Overall a good cheap place to stay for non fussy travelers intending on seeing Sydney whilst saving some money.
Very affordable, lovely view, great place to stay if there's an event nearby at Olympic Park you might want to see

The room is part of a 4 rooms lovely house in a very quiet street of Newton very close to King St. with all of its bars and restaurants. Everything is exactly as in the pictures. 
This place is also a good way to meet people as the whole house is for Airbnb travelers.
Last, Miss D was very reactive, flexible and helpful to make my stay as good as possible!

Linda has been gracious and wonderful, catering to our every need including an early check in and a slightly later check out when hearing of our fight timings. Very helpful, helping us with figuring out navigation and how to get an opal card. 

House is exactly as shown in photos, and everything was very easy. Very near to Redfern station, and my friends and i enjoyed our stay there!

Belinda was quick to respond and very accommodating during our stay at her garden studio. The garden studio itself was much larger than we expected, well-furnished, well-equipped and immaculate. Location-wise, Bundeena is a relatively close to the city but is a charming suburb that feels like something more akin to a 2-3 hour drive from Sydney. We had a great time :)

The place was even better from what we expected. Nice and big and really clean. Everything you need for a short or a little bit longer stay in Sydney. We really recomend the place and for sure we are going to choose it for our next trip in Sydney. Thank you...
All good and I have my privacy on the stay..
Fantastic property and host.  Beautiful part of Sydney.

Very nice and clean self-contained cabin. 
The bed is comfy. Noise from plane is acceptable. 
Susan is a welcoming host. She prepared fruits and breakfast for us. She is very helpful to suggest us what to do during heavy rain in Sydney. Finally we got to go swimming in Olympic park. 
Highly recommend Susan's place.
Very welcoming holiday stay in Bronte. Susan and Greg's little oasis at the bottom of their garden gave us privacy and allowed us to relax. Very comfortable studio unit.
A place that makes you feel welcome in which you can relax and enjoy your stay.

I had a great experience staying at Hernan's place. The place was easy to find; with a less than 5 minutes walk to the bus stop and the beautiful beach nearby. 

Despite I was out and about most of the time during my trip in Sydney, Hernan ensured he had provided everything I needed in the room and made me felt safe and comfortable during my stay. It was great to meet someone who's so easy-going and passionate about people! :)
Great spot

What an absolutely fantastic apartment and view! The hosts were fantastic to deal with and gave quick and very helpful replies! The apartment had everything we could need for a girly weekend away. Thanks so much, we all had a ball =)
깔끔하고 아늑한 집이었습니다. 브론테비치와 걸어서 10분거리에 있어서 산책하기에도 좋은 위치에 있습니다. 5분정도 거리의 버스정류장에서 본다이정션까지  바로가는 버스도 있습니다.

Sarah made sure everything was ok for our three night stay.  The room has aircon for heating with two double beds, and one single (as a top bunk) in a single large room at ground level. Access is easy and the house is in a very quiet neighbourhood. Don't plan to cook there, but there are many good restaurants not far away.
Great space and wonderful host
Great location, so convenient for us as we were seeing a show at the Opera House. Loved it thank you

The property is in prime location for access to the airport. It's very private, newly renovated and spacious. Shuang responded quickly to any communication and was very accommodating of my late check in. I appreciated how he went out of his way to make sure I had a smooth arrival.

Griffin's place was perfect for our 3 day stay in Sydney. The location was very close to the train station and also a reasonable walk to the harbor. The place was also well decorated and we had no problems checking in and out! Would definitely recommend for anyone visiting.

It was absolutely wonderful: Valentine is a very friendly person and gave us a warm welcome and so many informations even it was very late at night when we arrived. The view from the appartement above bondi beach is amazing. We would definetly come back!

Absolutely beautiful place. I was only there for a couple of days mid-week however would of loved to have stayed a little longer, dive into some of the books and enjoy the remainder of the awesome food hamper. Everything you need for a home away form home with a great host to match.
Honestly, THE VIEW IS AMAZING!! A home away from home. Everything you need is nearby! Very clean ^__^

Wayne and Katie's place is amazing, perfect location on Tamarama beach with the Bonding to Coogee clifftop walk right on your doorstep. Wayne and Kate were perfect hosts, very easy to deal with and clearly are thoughtful and generous people. If we come back to Sydney we will have no hesitation in staying there again.
Highly recommend! Gregoire is an excellent host.
Great place for a quick stay if you aren’t planning on being in the place for a long time. Appreciate the stay. Thanks
An amazing unique experience, with great hosts who thought of everything. We will be back to enjoy the beautiful scenery. It is a very special place!
Margaret’s train carriage is a hidden gem in a beautiful location. Margaret and John are wonderful hosts and made our stay perfect. We would definitely come back again. Loved it!

What a wonderful house to stay in - it is as described 3 excellent bedrooms with very comfortable beds, plenty of space for us to sit in the lounge, dining room or the lovely outdoor shaded area. Simone responded quickly to all enquiries & organisiational points with the key being very easy to access. We really appreciated the extra unexpected touches i.e. complimentary wine  & milk in the fridge as well as sauces etc in the pantry. The location is fabulous .... not a long walk to the beach or the wedding we attended, it is a quiet neighbourhood with shops nearby. The house is spotlessly clean. Having a garage was very important so we could leave the car there for the duration. Thank you Simone we'd love to come back.

The location is superb, the apartment is clean and has all u need for a short stay. We stayed for two nights and walked to all the touristic places.
Gavin is responding very fast and you can easily reach him. 
The oven was not working at the time of our stay.

Fantastic, modern apartment in a very central location. Nicole was there to meet me on arrival which was terrific and hugely helpful. Would recommend this listing highly and hope to be back some day soon.
It was great stay! Quiet and clean!

Très bon séjour chez Griffin qui m'a très gentiment accueillie et renseigné sur les sorties possibles dans le week-end. L'appartement était propre, bien équipé avec une vraie petite cuisine et quelques ingrédients de base. Une corbeille de fruits était également à disposition. J'ai particulièrement apprécié la Wi-Fi portative !

These guys were amazing and the house was amazing. There was nothing we did not need that was there. It was close to the city, and the house was bright modern and perfectly equipped. Have already recommended to others and would stay again

Great large room, with two very comfortable beds. One single and one queen, perfect for the two of us on a work trip. 
Loads of shelving to unpack into, with a small bar fridge for left overs. A desk in the room was fantastic as a computer desk for our stay. 
Juliette invited us to use anything in he kitchen for cooking, as well as provided us with delicious filtered water and space in her family fridge.
The bathroom was clean and sizeable, private and accessible, just across from where the room was. 
Access to the patio and garden through the room too! 
Lovely family and supportive vibe in the house, I’ll certainly be back next time I’m in town! 
Thanks again Juliette!
Everything is perfect, I have to say thanks to the host.

This little studio space is absolutely lovely! Had a great stay. Was delighted to find fresh raspberries in the fridge for a yummy cereal breakfast. Great off-street parking and in an amazing tranquil location just up the road from the cafes and shops at Avalon. Thanks to the exceptional host for such a wonderful stay!

Notre séjour de 3 nuits pour 2 amies étaient parfait. Le lit est super confortable, Charles répond rapidement à ses messages et lorsqu'il manquait quelque chose, nous l'avions le jour même. Un bel endroit tranquille et bien situé pour visiter Sydney :) merci encore Charles!
Very good locacation! clean and comfortable! good communication with Victoria.

A very clean and neat apartment, provided by a fantastic host who communicates promptly, was happy to accommodate my very late arrival time, and provided a number of thoughtful touches like a bottle of wine on arrival. Proximity to Central station is great, meaning access to the CBD is very simple, and the background noise is not disruptive (and ends completely in the later evening anyway). A great place to stay for solo or couple travellers looking to get out and explore, or a business person (as in my case) who need quick access to the CBD paired with a clean, safe place to come home to each night.

Had a great 4 night stay at Hugo and Pamela's apartment. The description and photos are accurate and the view is just as amazing as it looks. The check in process was simple and Hugo checked to make sure everything was fine once we arrived. The location is perfect, multiple train stations nearby and buses right outside. I'd recommend this apartment to anyone and would stay again if in Sydney.

The neighbourhood very quiet and everyone we meet were extremely friendly.
Anne went out of her way to leave lots of goodies which were much appreciated.
Hernans place is great and he is a great bloke. Exactly like the photos. Looking forward to staying there again.
离国际机场非常近,我今天跟着谷歌地图走了22分钟就到了,非常适合早班飞机,房间设施齐全,整洁干净,房东人也不错,回复及时｡

We used this magnificent house as a our base for a family trip to Sydney and loved the experience. It is a mansion, with beautiful furnishings and large comfortable rooms. Fei and family provided all we needed , including a nice welcome, fruit, facilities, and access to parking on the property. This is not your typical Airbnb, as it is a huge historic house, but we had all the privacy, convenience and comfort that we could ask for in luxurious surroundings. We will definitely stay here when we come back to Sydney.

This was such a beautiful experience so clean and fresh the bed is the most comfortable bed I have ever slept on! We are investing in a new bed and sheridan sheets doona etc now!
I loved the balcony and would have my coffee there in the morning while reading my book. The location was perfect for us and Nicole went the extra mile to get us the milk froth machine to form part of our coffee experience. The hand and shampoo products were so lovely.

THanks so much Nicole we will be back! The smarties at the bed side table were a nice touch and the umbrella which we needed so thank you!!

This apartment has an excellent location, great access to shops, transit, 
restaurants. The unit was clean and the bed was very comfortable. Loved Sydney and A's place.

Staying at Hernan's was a pleasure. Although only for two nights and due to Australia Day we didn't interact very much, he was very kind and helpful with directions and public transport. He makes you feel at home very quickly. His apartment is very clean and tidy and situated in a great area. Just walk out the street to the beach, lots of shops and places to eat and drink, very close to the airport. At the beach you can see the planes arrive and depart and ships sail into Botany Bay. The only thing one should consider is that his apartment is on the second floor, no elevator, so if you are not travelling light, then you need to be fit.
I had a great stay and hope to chat a bit more next time.
Everything was great.  Great location.  Great place.  Would highly recommend it.
Great location, lovely space and close to everything.

Everything was absolutely beautiful. Self check-in was perfect for our circumstances. The treehouse was idyllic and all of the amenities were beautiful. Communication with the host was outstanding. Would stay here again!
Felt very welcome and Belinda accommodated both my late arrival and (slightly) late departure! The description is spot on and a lovely quiet spot in Bundeena...

Fiquei hospedada nessa casa por 14 dias juntamente com minha mãe e tudo foi muito bom! Casa limpa, toalhas e lençóis limpos e à disposição. Quando tivemos alga dúvida ou problema foi logo resolvido pela querida Natasa! Localização excelente perto da estação de metrô e a uma caminhada não muito longa dos ônibus e supermercados. Indico essa casa para quem quiser ficar em Sydney por um valor bom e localização boa.

Tout était parfait !

Si vous cherchez un super spot pour rester à Bondi, ne cherchez pas d'avantage, ici c'est le top.

This place was just perfect for our stay. We are locals that needed a "staycation" so we know the area well, and it is in the loveliest location. Beautifully styled and safe for my 3 kids. Would definitely stay there again (even though we live only a few minutes away)!! Actually, I will definitely be calling Anita again when I have guests in town that need accommodation.

Susan's kindness and careful consideration to accommodate to my needs began before I had even arrived at her beautiful little cabin. 
I was made to feel comfortable, warm, and well looked after. The cabin stay was just the perfect size for 2 or 3 guests. 
I enjoyed the bathroom fascilitiles also, as they were a good size. There are 2 mirrors, one in bedroom/living room, and 1 in the bathroom, which was perfect. 
We were also able to spend time in the kitchen and living areas inside the main house. 
Affordable, comfortable, close to beautiful Italian quisine, close to bus stops for transport into the city. 
Thank you for such a wonderful stay in an architecturally stunning suburb such as leichhardt. 
I will definitely consider staying again if I was to be in the area. 
Emily.

We had the most amazing time. The house was perfect in every way to accommodate our large family. The location is central to everything and right on the beach. It was also perfectly for the children.
The water views were stunning, the living space was beautiful with the open fire place and the beds were really comfortable.
We can't wait to return and stay there again, it was truly the most perfect place.

Good location and tidy place. Worth to stayed for 2 nights and we definitely love to enjoy the night view of Bondi beach from balcony. The host Brendan is very friendly to share place includes everything in Kitchen. It’s very helpful for us with 2 years old child. Also, Brendan spent time to drive us around the town and even to airport when we leave! It’s unexpected to have such a amazing guide.

We were made us feel very welcome. Lovely studio at the bottom of the garden with a very comfy queen bed. 
Would happily stay there again when were next Sydney bound.

What a perfect place to stay in Sydney. The room is exactly how it's pictured, so funky and modern. My partner and I stayed for two nights and we had a great time, Naveen, Tristan and Felix are very accommodating and the room is perfectly located. Will be back for sure.
Beautiful tropical surrounds. Pretty and private space and very well appointed. Has everything you need for a great stay. Nice and quiet and close enough to walk to main centre.
Apartment is wonderful, and in great location - easy to get to the city and the west. Very close to the water and a great walking path nearby.  Quiet location. Undercover parking is very handy.
Was a great apartment, modern and clean in an amazing location. Would definitely recommend

This is my fifth or sixth times I stayed with Airbnb, and all I can say is this is the best experience I’ve ever had! Tracey is a very nice and caring owner, she always answer to my questions in a short period of time, very responsive. The apartment is very clean and new, with a modern interior and stylish decorations. The location is convenient, only 10 -15 mins driving distance to the city. If I ever go back to Sydney I would definitely stay there again, highly recommended.
Rhonda’s place is welcoming and it’s easy to relax. The best place.
Charles’ place is clean and location is fantastic! Parking on street is available as well, highly recommended for any travelers

Michele’s B&B is wonderfully located near cosmopolitan Newtown. 10 minute walk to Newtown Station while also being in a quiet area. Lovely presented room, spotlessly clean and comfortable . Perfect for a Sydney visit.
This is such a perfect self contained unit for a solo traveller. Gail is such a generous host and the room was beautiful and sparkling clean. I loved my stay here and look forward to my next visit .

We cannot wait to return to this charming apartment!  Nathan and April go above and beyond as hosts.  Great location, easy public transport and excellent value. Amazing beach across the street, great for families and or couple retreat. Cafes galore, tics all the boxes for a great getaway.

Dino's apartment is great. It's in a neighborhood that is "real" (changing for the better with few tourists) with plenty of great restaurants (we recommend Cho Cho San and Ms G's - both easy walks). His style is appealing, quite minimalist with no handles showing, all white and mirrors, and easy furniture. We appreciated having a balcony to sit on with a glass of wine after sightseeing. Even though we didn't meet Dino himself, communications were easy and efficient and he arranged for us to arrive early after our 17 hour flight from the US (6 AM arrival at SYD). Public transport is very convenient, both bus and train. We walked to Circular Quay to start our first day. We highly recommend a stay at Ithaca Gardens! Thank you, Dino.

Just checked out after another 2 week stay in Lea's fantastic apartment. Both Lea and Rohan are great to deal with and nothing was ever an issue. This was my 3rd stay for work at their beautiful apartment. Only downside over the 2 weeks was the weather but good as the guys are, even that was beyond their control. 
Thanks a million for everything, Lea - don't expect to be back any time soon but if I do will certainly get in touch. 
Cheers,
Brian

We had great holidays at Hanna's house. The place is beautiful and very comfortable. Specially the kitchen and the garden.  The location is perfect. Hanna was a very good host, very helpful and kind with small details. Highly recommendable to spend holidays with the family!
It was nice to stay here. A bit dirty inside though. Very close to everything you need. Close to Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge. Lovely staff.

Great experience. Rachel sent detailed instructions for finding and getting access to the flat. The flat was very clean and comfortable. Easy 2 minutes walk to military rd with lots of shops and cafes or a 15 minute walk to the ferry. Great place I'll definitely recommend

the stay was okay with a great and friendly host.
it would be better if there is a heater in the room as it was freezing cold in the night. otherwise there was no any other problems.

This apartment is run (and owned?) by a management company. It clearly isn't actually anyone's home and has the clinical, impersonal feel of a hotel. But it's well equipped for a stay in the centre of Sydney and the location is very convenient for Darling Harbour. I never met the named host; I was 'checked in' (their words) by someone else who was clearly in a tearing hurry. Beforehand I was just told I would be met, I didn't know where this would be but I couldn't get into the building and had to wait outside in the street. 
There is no hairdryer or air conditioning (this will make it v hot in the height of summer) and the oven is complicated to work. The design of the building means the apartment overlooks and is overlooked by other apartments and there was some noise at night from neighbours as the units are close together. There is also traffic noise. We were only given one set of keys which was extremely inconvenient. On the plus side the apartment building has a small pool and gym.
Walking distance to Green Square station.
All very good once again

Clean comfortable room with bathroom right beside it for your private use. Friendly hostess who has provides a pleasant staying experience. Walking distance to transport shops restaurants and the beach.
Mohit's communication was excellent, a great location and good value for money.
Great location, easily accessible to Olympic park. Great communication, reliable.  Great facilities and love the extra little touches.

Danny's apartment was good value - located just a short walk to Darling Harbour and with great views.  It was clean, comfortable and just what we needed for our quick visit to Sydney.  Danny was helpful and communicative from the very beginning of our booking. Many thanks!

This apartment is in the perfect location in Sydney: 5 mins walk to Circular Quay, Botanical Gardens and the Opera House. This was perfect for our short stay as we got to see a lot of Sydney in a short time and felt like we were right in the middle of everything. The flat is nice and clean and big enough for the five of us ( all adults) to comfortably sleep at night, maybe not so much for families with small children who want to spend a lot of time in the flat - but who would want that, it's Sydney and there's so much to see. Thanks for a great stay!
Great location, nice apartment and good communication. Thanks for having us Nathan
Given the location, it was good value for the cost. We had issues with the elevator, but that can't be fixed by the host.

I had the privilege to stay at Carole and Steeve's house for a night. I was also disappointed cause I had to leave Sydney earlier than I expected.
this couple made me feel really confortable. I really enjoyed my stay in their house. And I've been touched by the fact they proposed me to  eat together, the first evening. They are really open minded and kind persons. The bed was confortable. The bathroom is really big. Even if they start on airbnb, they behave like they're on many years ago, because they are travelers. So they're curious and they know what you need. 
You'll feel at home. Rent it; that's an order :) (french joke)

Beds were hard , pillows were as flat as pancakes , with no spares . Never once saw the host .
You can’t wheel your suitcase up to the unit as it’s paved with pebbles .
Living area and bedrooms was clean. No fresh ice in the freezer
Awesome place. The view was incredible and the apartment just perfect. Strongly recommend

Rachel's house was perfect for us - it's just as  shown on the photographs and close to transport and shopping.  We were flying in early in the morning and Rachel was very accommodating allowing us to access the property early.  We were there for 9 nights in preparation for my daughter's wedding and it really felt like home from home.  We didn't  meet Rachel but did contact her a couple of times and she always respond quickly.
Great place to stay and very handy to all locations, we very much enjoyed our stay thank you Anita
The host canceled this reservation 212 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Beautiful independent studio, easy access to transport, to the beach, and the Bronte shops. We had a lovely stay, the hosts were very welcoming and friendly. The studio is very quiet, at the back of Susan's lovely property, with its private entrance at the back of the garden . It is nicely furbished, and with all amenities, and lovely touches such as fresh fruits, fresh flowers, and good products for breakfast (and no problem with accomodating for dietary requirements). A great place to stay!
Great location for work or holiday, clean, lots to explore in the neighborhood, a stress free stay, thanks Ben

Perfect location, close enough to walk into town and to walk to the start of the National Park trails. Two beaches right across the road, perfect for sunset and swimming. The cottage had everything we needed and was very clean and tidy. Belinda was a wonderful host
Good place to stay, I will return
Evan’s is a great host. Easy to contact and has a clean apartment to stay.

A beautiful apartment in a beautiful part of the world! Evelyn was vey helpful and responsive, willing to help us anyway she could to ensure an enjoyable stay. When we arrived, she gave us a quick tour and then left us to make ourselves at home, but was just a quick call away if needed. A bowl of Fresh Fruit, Tea & Coffee, Yoghurts in the Fridge and a bottle of Australian Red wine (which didn't last long) were left to welcome us. The area is very peaceful, but only a 20 minute walk to the shops, cafes & beach of Avalon, from where you can catch a bus for the short trip up to Palm beach. I strongly recommend taking the walk up the Barrenjoey Headland. The views up by the lighthouse are spectacular and made for the ideal setting for my marriage proposal..... and she said YES!!! The perfect end to a perfect weekend away. We will be back!
Thank you Evelyn x
Very cute one bedder and wonderfully close to Mosman Ferry for a glorious trip into the city.
Wendy was a fantastic host, such a stylish and cozy apartment that was extremely modern and amazing to stay on, would definitely be back
What a great space! Walking distance to Newtown for dinner a big plus. A bit of noise from the nearby Westconnex works.
Great service, beautiful place, fantastic value and close too olympic park. Extremely happy an will be back again.
A very modern and cosy but truly historical house! Parks, supermarkets, public transport within walking distance. The library is fantastic!
Great location in a stylish space
Clean and convenient. Millie is also quick to response to any of our enquiries. Highly recommended.

Ruby's place was perfect
Would recommend to anyone

Luke and paul's apartment is fantastically central, literally a stone's throw from a number of hip cafes and restaurants, and Kings Cross station. Very stylish. The corridors and staircases are charmingly old world...
I highly recommend this place! We had an amazing time in Sydney, especially Lucia’s and George’s hospitality was incredible! Thank you!
Very convenient location for airport. Easy to access from cbd. Excellent communication and help with public transport. Great place to stay

Andrew's place was perfect for our two night stay. We were in Sydney for a short trip and found Andrew's apartment to be in an excellent location, well presented and furnished with everything we needed. We particularly enjoyed dinner down Spice Alley and it was handy to have coffee, public transport and the supermarket all within a 3 minute walk.

非常非常棒的房东,有事与她联系,都会悉心解答,因为都是年纪比较大的阿姨伯伯,又不会英文,遇到了很多问题,还好有Linda帮忙,都一一解决了｡非常赞\(≧▽≦)/!

Very, very good landlord.
older aunts and uncles cannot speak English, they have many problems. Fortunately, Linda has helped them.Thank you so much.
This is a very comfortable house to live in.and very clean and tidy.I hope to live in your house next time I come to Australia...
We needed a base in Sydney for two weeks work and Louise & John's place worked perfectly. It was probably a little better equipped than described: always great to get back to.
Had a lovely short stay at Susan's place. She even took the trouble to forward my forgotten phone charger to me!  Thanks Susan
Michy's backyard cabin was brilliant.  It was  wonderful to be able to walk across the road and launch our kayaks for a morning paddle on the Pittwater. Thank you for making us feel so welcome.

Really recommend Hugo's place. It's in the best location, and had all the things we needed for a short stay. Really clean and couldn't fault anything. Great communication with both Hugo and Oliver.  One of the best value places I've stayed in Sydney.
Although it was a short business trip, I couldn't have picked a better place. The house is great with every aspect. Very nice, quite neighborhood. Thanks Bernadette for your kindness and everything.

We had such a lovely time at this super location right opposite the water. The unit is well-appointed, with quality furnishings & linen. It was nice to have a sweet home-baked slice on our arrival. Hope to be back again soon :-)
Our second visit to Bronte and to this studio. We do love it. Thank you for everything you do to make our stay so lovely.
Great location.

The view from the apartment is spectacular and it is really well located. Convenient bus from Strathfield station stops at the door.  Only negative was I had asthma while (Website hidden by Airbnb) idea why and I havent had it for years.  Maybe dust or an air-freshener. Thanks Jennifer everything else was perfect

Nice place, very neat in a great location, Eric is respectful, great company and makes you feel at home. It was a pleasure to stay here.

A great spot in the heart of manly beach- close to the Main Street and a block off the beach. 
Ziggy’s place is spotlessly clean and he is a very attentive & accommodating host.

The only negative is that the sofa bed is not too comfortable- (mattress is thin and sags in the middle) but probably fine for a small child. 

I highly recommend this place.
Excellent location and great communication very clean and lovely apartment thank you we would stay again
Great location
Nice place to stay.
Great stay at Anthony’s place. Lovely apartment and really nice welcoming gift.  We’ve been able to enjoy Bondi. Thanks a lot Anthony!
Lina is a wonderful Host! Her Airbnb is fabulous. Great bed and fridge :) The washing machine is a big plus. Amazing cute little house.
Beautiful place in a great location
Extremely cute and comfortable apartment! Tim & Mel were great hosts, always available for questions and recommendations. Would definitely stay again!
This was such an amazing place to stay. Our hosts went above and beyond. Thank you so much for making our special day magical
Can’t pick out anything bad about our stay at studio 32. Very comfortable, stylish and homely apartment

This apartment was ideally situated for darling harbour just a very short walk away. The apartment was clean and tidy and the bed was comfy. Even the sofa bed was comfy. It had all the amenities needed. For an excellent stay in the city x.

A great place to experience Potts Point. The flat was. comfortable and stylish. A great restaurant to one side of the front and a patisserie to the other. The bedroom looks out into the tree canopy. Noise no great problem.

Great location, nice space for our group of 8. Full kitchen and four bedrooms each with double beds. Note the upstairs bathroom has only louvred doors (not entirely private when there are a load of people in the place) and the downstairs bathroom has the nicer shower, but is located in the utility room next to the washer and dryer. Jeremy was great in responding quickly to some very minor issues  such as burned-out light bulbs.

it's been such a wonderful experience staying at Korad and Michelle's. They were very lovely so does their fluffy family member, Morpheus:)) 

It's a very clean and tidy homely place, very peaceful and quiet at night. The best part I loved is the view you have when you look out to the window from the room, it was AMAZING!!! It's the backyard but it's not just a backyard, it's a great piece of beauty whenever you look at it, so peaceful!!

Our first Air BnB did not disappoint. The apartment was clean & homely. It was in walking distance from the beach and restaurants in a quiet street. It was the perfect size for the amount of guests we had! 
It was hard to leave the place!

Paul’s space was cute, and the location could not have been more perfect. I was able to take the train(very safe and clean) to and from the airport and towards Bondi Junction. The walk to the harbor takes 20-30 minutes through the Botanical Gardens and was one of my favorite parts of the stay. Potts Point also has some lovely restaurants that I wish I was able to explore. Paul is so responsive and has some great advice for visitors to the area. Just one little watch out—don’t pack too much since there are two flights of stairs to climb.
Fantastic host, great communication and very attentive. Perfect central location! Clean and practical apartment.
Susan's place is perfect. The studio is very comfortable and private, and Susan was a great host. Location is great, just a short walk to the beach. Will definitely stay again!
good location, clean rooms, kind host. Everything is perfect!

What an absolute pleasure it has been staying with Helen and her husband (Mike). Helen and Mike had gone above and beyond to ensure I was both comfortable and felt at home. You could not ask for better hosts! My room and bed were comfortable and all other needs were met. Anyone looking to stay in and around the Hills District look no further! 5*****

Myself and two friends stayed at Simone's lovely home in Randwick for a little under a week.  The home was extremely neat and clean and she was kind enough to leave us a bottle of wine in the fridge too!  It was absolutely perfect for our needs during our trip since we had a car, it made transportation easy however, I saw many bus stops in the area.  We had a really fantastic time exploring Sydney and having Simone's home as our base.  It was a quiet and peaceful neighborhood and the home was really charming :)
Annie was very helpful throughout the stay. The apartment was comfortable. Easy walk into the city. Plenty of restaurants nearby
Desireé’s place is extremely well located, superbly comfortable and sparklingly clean. We would love to stay here on every future visit to Sydney.
It will be a pity to miss that apart. It has comfy and clean furniture and living environment. The host couple are approachable and nice. Highly recommend!

The train carriage was exactly the place I wanted for a relaxing weekend getaway. The accommodation was amazing in that it was quiet, uniquely designed and surrounded by nature. Margaret was very welcoming and baked us cakes which was delicious. Overall, it was a enjoyable stay and we're planning to go back.
A bit noisy due to the George St road works and buskers that set up in the alley behind the accommodation, but it is an inner city apartment, so to be expected.
Great space, great location, what more could you want!

We had a lovely stay in Mags' Mosman apartment. It was exactly as the photos depict and absolutely spotless. The local area is residential with lots of lovely shops and cafés up on Military road. Balmoral beach was a 20 min walk away and circular quay a short ferry ride from south Mosman (the main Mosman ferry wharf was under re construction in September 2014 so was closed). Thanks Mags.

Tracy is a great host, very accomodating and friendly! This place is amazing, your own one bedroom apartment, right across from Narrabeen lake and 10 minute walk to Narrabeen beach and shops. It has everything you need to stay in with a kitchenette, lounge area, heater and extra blankets, even wifi and foxtel! Thanks for having us, we really enjoyed your place. It's perfection :)
Very good choice I made! So lovely!  Thanks a lot!

Great location, beyond clean & a cosy place to stay.
Michele was such a great host, and was quick to help with anything.
Highly recommended!

What a great first experience with Airbnb! The apartment was great and well cleaned. All communication with Helena was positive and fast. The Glebe area is great with lots of restaurant. I definitely recommend this place and I would stay again :)
Such a lovely and charming home, you made our stay so comfortable, thank you!

Great location and comfortable and clean. Everything you would want for 2 couples or family.  Good kitchen facilities and loved the fact that here was ice in the freezer.  Host made us very welcome and looked after us well.

L'appartement est très bien. Le transport en commun est près mais pour aller en ville, il faut planifier environ 1 heure. Le Wifi n'est pas régulier et donc le signal est souvent faible.

The apartment was really fine. The commune transport took us an hour to go to the city and the wifi was not regular, but it’s quite usual in Australia.

In the end, it’s a REALLY good value and the host were easy to contact.
Thanks a lot!
Yes all very good. Bit far from shops. Large Woolworths ,10 min walk.
Really nice place and location!
Gavin is a very friendly, welcoming and helpful Host. His appartement is very central and is in the perfect area to explore the city by foot. I would really recommend staying in his appartement.
Had a great stay with Cindy and Claudio. Highly recommend to anyone looking for somewhere in the Randwick/Coogee area.

An amazing experience 
Place looks even better in real life
Best Airbnb hosts I've ever had 
view is magical and house is perfectly equipped
Really Nice studio close to the city!
Jennifer's apartment was very clean and has amazing views! I think it's one of the best airbnb apartments I've stayed in.
The host canceled this reservation 125 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I'm so glad I booked this beautiful studio. It was clean, well stocked and quiet. Belinda's attention to detail was apparent as she supplies the studio with everything you'll need, with a nice collection of books, movies and music for you to enjoy, and even sensor lights that make sure you don't trip on a stone at night.

The studio is also a short walk to several beautiful beaches as well as the neighbourhood supermarket.

If you're going to Bundeena, this is the place to stay.

Lovely, warm and welcoming hosts. Very clean. The only downside was the window between my room and the bathroom. You can't see through but if someone is using the toilet at night, my room was bright. Great Neighbourhood, especially for Asian food :).
Always a pleasure to stay at Don's lovely apartment. It's a home away from home.

The apartment was really nice, and the location was even better! It was clean, and there was all the essentials like soap, towels and sheets. The check in was easy and quick. We enjoyed our stay and can recommend it to others!

Leslie is such a warm lovely person who welcomed us readily and offered earlier check in to suit our needs and was beyond helpful. The space was perfect size cosy but not at all cramped and she went out of her way to make it easy and provide everything you could possibly need. Definitely worth a visit :)
Highly recommend, very comfortable space in walking proximity to beach, cafes and stones throw to city. Host was very accommodating and communication was very easy.
We had a fantastic time, great location and easy walk to beaches and transport. A lovely basket of breakfast goodies was left at the door to enjoy. Highly recommended.

Susan’s studio is a wonderful space: stylish, sparkling clean, quiet, close to the beach and a very quick bus trip to Bondi Junction, and set within beautiful gardens. Susan added some thoughtful, unexpected extras, was very accommodating of our flight delay and provided excellent dining recommendations. We would happily stay again.
Great Location. Lovely place and superb hosts.

The place is amazing.  Great location for morning walks. Very friendly neighbourhood. The house is very clean and the swimming pool is just way too relaxing. I honestly enjoyed my stay for 5 nights. The place is very spacious and I could not look for any place better than this.

Leigh's apartment is superbly located, close to the amazing Maloney's grocer and some fabulous restaurants and cafes but most importantly only a short walk to the amazing Coogee beach. The apartment is clean and comfortable, especially the beds! Quiet as it faces away from the street. We had a fantastic stay!
房东是一个艺术家,我们交流的很开心｡

The view from this place is truly beautiful! The kitchen is well equipped. This place could be used just as easily for a long stay as it was for our shorter one. We were there for three days. Leslie was a very thoughtful host, leaving wine and chocolates in the fridge, and even brought by Band-Aids for me when I got a really bad blister from my new shoes. 

DOWNSIDES:
As mentioned in previous reviews, the basement holds moisture. As long as you keep using the de-humidifier, you’ll be okay. 

A major problem we had was Sydney’s inconsistent public transit, more specifically the buses. If you’re used to relying on transit, look for a place that is closer to the central parts of town. I think of all the buses we took, we had ONE arrive on time. Some showed up 10 minutes after the scheduled time, and one didn’t even show up at all. So, look for something nearer the main harbour or CBD, or you can do like we did a lot of the time: walk down to the Manly Wharf (about 25 min walk) and take the ferry to the main harbour, and only stick to the areas that are closest. Honestly, take the ferries as much as possible. The views are phenomenal. They absolutely -made- the trip for us!

Ali and Maryam. My wife and I can't thank you guys enough for the place. Your granny flat was beyond our expectations in many ways. It was very clean and the accessories in rooms, kitchen and bathroom were more than adequate. The furniture was very comfortable and everyone had a very warm and comfortable sleep. The price we paid was far less than what I would have been willing to pay. The layout of the granny flat was well thought through to guarantee full privacy. Definitely well recommended with no hesitation :) :)

Lina’s place is easy to access and has all the things you need to look after the family while away. The flat is spacious and clean and communication with Lina is excellent. I will definitely use this space again when I’m in Penrith again.

Clean and good location!! Comfortable place to stay at!
Value for money!
House is very clean, and just walk 5 mins you can to train station!

Even thought I barely met Naveen, Tris, her partner, was very kind and helpful showing me around their place and giving me advices about the neighborhood. The room has a great view, and their place was clean, organized and very well decorated. I really felt comfortable and well hosted. The location is also very nice with good restaurants, bars and cafes just around the corner. Would definitely go back if I had the chance.

AMAZING, couldn't ask for a better place
1min from beach
Amazing view
Super sleek studio
Great kitchen & cooking facilities
Nice living area to hangout 
Extremely clean
Lovely toiletries (shampoo etc)
Secure parking
Great communication
Easy 24hr access & checkin 
Would recommend staying & I will definitely age my stay here again!
Thanks so much Anita, great apartment

Elizabeth Bay is a pretty and convenient location. Mariana’s flat is small but has everything one could need and has been recently redecorated. It was also surprisingly quiet. Some of the best restaurants in Sydney are nearby. If you like to run the Domain and Botanical Gardens are close, as is the Boy Charlton pool. Harbour beaches, Circular Quay, and the CBD are a bus or short train ride away. Highly recommended.
Beautifully renovated Art Deco apartment in great location. Very clean. Would stay here again.

Arnie and Lorraine's Artists Home in Paddington is a true gem. Wonderful and warm hosts with a truly unique and interesting house in the best location in Sydney. They were kind and relaxed, the place was comfortable, you didn't want for anything and though I didn't have time on this trip you could easily spend some wonderful hours in the eclectic decor of the really fantastic bohemian style lounge. The surrounding area is teaming with cafes - The Bonython is literally next door - The Alimentari down the road and tonnes of great restaurants - a few minutes to Oxford St via William St - minutes form regular buses and taxis. Paddington is a great area of Sydney. Historically, culinary and fashion wise with a market on Saturday. Believe me - a fine way to experience Sydney as a visitor. If you are a solo traveler or a pair looking for old Artistic Sydney charm on a realistic budget then this is the place. Wish I could have got to know the hosts better. Can't wait to go back. Great people doing a great thing.

First time staying at airbnb. I got off at the wrong bus stop, Shuang's parents fetched me to their home. The room is as showed. Cozy room. Comfy bed.
Walking distance to Sydney airport.
Millie was a wonderful host - the apartment was clean, well equipped, really cute and well located; Millie communicated well and was flexible with my late check in.

Staying with Rhonda was brilliant, I honestly couldn't have asked for more. She was always really welcoming and I felt really comfortable staying there. The room I stayed in was great, I had my own little area which I really appreciated. Everything felt really homely which I really liked. I would definitely recommend to anyone wanting to stay in the south Sydney area.

My husband & I spent an enjoyable 4 nights recently at this property which is well presented & spacious with self catering facilities. Our lovely hostess Bernadette presented us with a plate of yummy chocolate slice, juice, milk & fresh flowers. Excellent location with great views of the water. A short walk to the rock pools, bus stop (bus goes to Circular Quay every 1/2 hr) & the Beach cafe which serves reasonably priced delicious meals!

This house is shared house, host doesnt live here or I havnt met her during my stay of 6 days, only available through emails. Room was good but Shower was bit clogged n had hairs when asked to clean no answer. Same thing was with bed linen, was used before, host didnt change even when asked.  
Kichen was mess at times as it is shared house.

Staying with Susan and Greg was the perfect airbnb experience. They checked on us on our way in to Sydney to make sure we knew where to come, met us on arrival with maps and great local knowledge about the best things to do in Bronte and surrounds and provided a tranquil beautiful sanctuary with amazing provisions. We almost ran out of fridge space! :-) the garden is gorgeous and a beautiful place to sit and the bed was the best we've slept in since leaving home months ago. Greg and Susan even did our laundry for us! Way above and beyond ... All I have left to say is stop web searching and stay here. You wont find better.

Elise’s apartment was central and spacious and in combination with her prompt response, my family’s time in Sydney was wonderful. There was a slight hiccup with the cleaning when first checking in but Elise arranged for cleaning staff to come immediately and that matter was rectified. Would highly recommend her place!
这是一个十分友善贴心的房东,对住户需求响应十分迅速,住宿体验很棒

Lina is a very warming host. She was there when we arriving and kindly showing to us the entire place. The house itself is very convenient for a family to stay couple of night. Very clean house! It's located in about an hour from CBD which is provide us with quiet environment. Nice place to stay.

Great place and excellent position in the centre of Sydney.
BAthroom is on the small size, but otherwise flat is excellent.
Amazing communication with Hugo and easy to arrange different times to check in/leave.
Would recommend +++

Perfect place with stunning views. Lovely waking up to the waves every morning.
Will be back.

Phan was a great host, always responding quickly and answering any questions. Stayed with a group of 7 people and there was plenty of room for all of us. Location is great, everything we needed was within walking distance.

David's house is really nice and the location is awesome. I strolled along the area and let myself getting lost in the city and exposed to so many cool areas in Sydney like the famous Oxford St, Hyde Park,  Surry Hills, Kings Cross and Victoria St.  
The bed in my bedroom is so comfy, I had a hard time every morning to leave the bed.  It is just too comfortable.  

I just love how David prepares all the helpful Sydney Guide and various board games he has in the guest room. 

Definitely a place to stay if you're after a nice and cozy place in Sydney.

Nice and quiet place to stay!
Simple nice place :)
I worried redfern is dangerous. But it is safety.
Great opportunity to stay in a special part of Sydney in comfortable accommodation within reasonable distance of public transport and eating places.

Tracey’s apartment was a joy to stay in. It is a beautiful, sparking clean apartment, and is in an excellent location close to a big shopping centre. The checkin and out was so simple, and the thoughtful touches really bought the experience to a new level. I would recommend anyone to stay here !!
Craige & leonie have a lovely home which is located great at bondi beach.

Room as per listing. Good location with walking distance (10-15mins) to Eastwood centre and train station. Min's parent is so lovely and thoughtful. There's a day which I had bad headache and couldn't go out to grab food, Min's mother prepare me lunch and dinner on that day. Quiet and clean, easy check in, i'll come back for sure.
Loved our stay at Judy's place! She gave great advice on where to visit and her home is beautiful! We are hoping to come back one day!
Very friendly hosts.
A very comfortable and well located apartment with everything you would need to have an enjoyable stay!

Cathy’s place is lovely. 
A nice private space with EVERYTHING you could need for a stay in the Northern Beaches.
Cathy is EXTREMELY hospitable and took extra steps to make our stay wonderful.
So easy to get around with public transport a short walk away, the apartment was really clean & comfy, the view was amazing, Millie was easy to communicate with, I would definitely stay here again.

This was the best air bnb I’ve ever stayed in! Book it and experience beautiful, relaxing Watson’s Bay! Neil and Jane were great hosts and our entire stay was exceptional! I’ve already recommended to family and friends and I’ll be looking to stay again in the near future. Thanks Neil and Jane!!
Rhonda and Michael, Thank you very much for your hospitality. You made me feel welcome at your house.
Was a great stay at Evelyn’s place, would definitely recommend.
A truly wonderful experience. The home is so lovely and in a fantastic location. Rachel is a great host and very helpful and attentive. Would recommend staying here to anyone.

View is amazing, location is perfect. Unfortunately it was very windy while we there and the windows rattled quite loudly. Also, neighbors decided to have a large party and noise went on until early in the morning.

This is  the sort of place one wants to remain secret--but the joy of discovering it is too great not to share the surprise! Wonderful  tranquil surrounds coupled with loving attention to simple warm design that welcomes.  Perfect.

What a find! Bronte B&B surpassed our expectations. It was relaxing, comfortable and had everything we wanted and more! Susan and Greg were delightful, giving us our own space but there when we needed anything. If we ever return to Sydney we will know where to stay!
Thanks for being a wonderful host. Great place and so central in the city. Eleni was so quick to respond to queries and made sure the stay was as enjoyable. Would happily stay again.
An amazing man with a wonderful flat which is good location,  clean & tidy! I love to communicate with the owner who always have a lot of imagination.

Great place, superb value! I highly recommend that you go visit the rooftop terrace of the place, as it's lovely up there and exposing yourself to the sunlight (with proper precautions like 50+ Australian Cancer Council sun cream, a broad-brimmed hat, and some water) will help you get over your jet lag. Having the washing machine and drying racks for laundry is especially helpful for the compact traveller who doesn't bring much but does have to wash clothing often enough. I also loved the little terrace off the condo unit, where I had my breakfast every day. So wonderful! Give it a go! It's a great listing!!
Great place, great host
The host canceled this reservation 57 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jackie was an amazing host! Her apartment is as cute as the pictures. She provided a space heater when it was cold, made me tea, and even gave me her bananas when I came home starving! Staying here was the best, I would recommend it to anyone.
The reservation was canceled 84 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very nice apartment, close to everything. Would stay here again
Cath's place is perfect for a little Sydney getaway. The thought to detail is outstanding, and Cath is a lovely and welcoming host. The garden shed has everything you need and more. You have to stay!

Much more than we expected, it was clean, tidy, and had everything we needed. The host was really kind and helpful, event after going trough any host's nightmare, a group of 20 year old that didn't leave on time and trashed the place. It doesn't have a kitchen, but you can easily prepare a meal, and eat at a 10 seat dinning table. We defenetly recommend to familys or any other kind of group! Thanks again

What an excellent stay! The views from the apartment are stunning and the location couldn't be more central. Really easy to get to from the airport and an excellent base for exploring Sydney. Great communication from Hugo before we arrived with areanging early check in and late depaeture, and during our stay when i managed to (temporarily) misplace the key card... thanks for your help Hugo and sorry for the inconvenience!

We loved our stay at Pamela and Hugo's. The apartment is in a great location, very close to several train stops and is a short walk to some of the best parts of the city. The apartment was spacious and clean, and had amazing views. Hugo was a fantastic host, very quick to respond to questions and was very accommodating and flexible in our arrival and departure. He even left us beer in the fridge! We would gladly stay here the next time we are in Sydney.
It was a great cosy place to leave at King Cross area. Train station was in walking distance. Area is close to plenty interesting cafes. Room is clean.

Tracy's little apartment is a lovely place to stay if you're looking for some peace and relaxation but also not far away from the hustle and bustle. We enjoyed walking and riding around to explore the lake, coffee shops and speciality stores. If you're around on a Friday pop over to the markets - you won't be disappointed.

Room is clean and decent though not fancy. Fantastic location. I had to check out in the morning but Agnes kindly accommodated me to leave my luggage in the apartment until the evening as my flight out was late. Great communication.
Super friendly and easygoing! Place was absolutely spotless and the apartment was lovely!
Nice apartment and as it appears in photos. Flat was clean and conveniently located near bondi beach. Recommended!

This is a lovely house in a great location. Close to great restaurants and not far to the train station. Very quiet at night and very comfortable. Kassandra has lots of interesting artwork on the walls and it feels very homely. One thing to note is the stairs to the upper floor are very steep as they are in these kind of houses, could be difficult to navigate if you have mobility issues.

Our stay at this lovely cabin was made even more memorable by the hospitality of Michy and Paul. Clean and attractively decorated the cabin was very private and a perfect place to rest after a day of sightseeing around the fabulous Pittwater area. Would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable stay.
Great location. Nice stay.

Aimee & Dan's place is located in a vibrant part of the city. A walk or short bike or bus ride to many of the attractions on offer. Particularly good for attending any concert or sporting event at Alliance or Sydney Cricket ground.  The apartment is stylish providing all the comforts of home. The facilities are amazing with a gym and pool in the complex and many restaurants & cafes just downstairs. Thank you for sharing your home Aimee & Dan.
best host, best price

Shuang is a very organised and helpful host. all our questions had been answered quickly and accurate before our arrival. the room was spacious and clean with all the needs for our short stay. 
the location is near the airport and took us about 25min to walk there with heavy backpacks - easy!

definitely recommend Shuang!

Unhappy experience with this room, because the room is not tidy and clean. Finally, I gave up to live in this room (Website hidden by Airbnb) Anyway, I hope the landlord  can clean room  carefully, and don’t let the following customers feel down. And Cecilia apologized about this experience for me
Five star host offering a great apartment with amazing views. Thank you Anita!
The place is the same as shown in photos. Laura is very responsible and very responsive to messages.
Kerri was very nice and accommodating. Unfortunately I was unable to stay last omits but she was a pleasure to communicate with and will definitely be a place for next time! Thanks Kerri!

Another lovely stay. Thanks Louise.
Great location and great apartment
Great location close to Sydney uni and bus stop into the city. Place was very cosy and hosts were easy to communicate with. Would recommend Brock’s house =)
Great stay.

Michele was  very accommodating, all communication was quick and clear. The studio accommodation was super conveniently placed (Walking distance to Enmore Theatre/Newtown), immaculately clean and cosy. Lovely inclusions such as breakfast cereal, tea, coffee and milk. Would thoroughly recommend. Thank you again Michele.

This apartment is a wonderful place to stay in Sydney. It is very stylish and comfortable. The location is near transport, shops, cafes and restaurants. Having access to a kitchen also gave me the option of cooking a light meal if I didn't feel like going out.
We spend  4 perfect days ! Helpfull and guestfull !  I recommande !

We felt comfortable and at home the moment we walked in. It was perfect for our family of four! Tidy, clean, cosy and quality. And what topped it off was Kirsty’s caring contact and responses ensuring we had a great stay. 

Thank you.

Natasa's place is conveniently located a minute away from Petersham station which makes it super easy to get around Sydney. Her house is quite cosy although it can be a bit cold during winter, but the blankets in the room are definitely enough to keep you warm at night. I only met Natasa on the last day of my trip as she was away but she was lovely, as were her housemates. Would definitely recommend!
Mags' Mosman apartment was lovely and had everything we needed. It was comfortable and cosy and quiet from city noise. It was within walking distance to a few little shops and takeaways.
Location is amazing although a busy noisy street all night but hey your in the center of it all and it’s expected.

Paul's place is centrally located and very close to the CBD area. If you're looking for a place to stay that's close to the center of the city, a stones throw away from the bus stops, close to a couple of restaurants and a place that says 'You are welcome to stay with us in our house, please make yourselves comfortable' then this is the place to be. Both Paul and Judith go the extra mile and help you get around the city with Opal cards and with suggestions on what you can probably do with your day. We had a lovely time staying at their place and certainly enjoyed their hospitality.

Bailey’s place is exceptional and comfortably fits 14 people without feeling like you’re living on top of each other. There are spacious rooms on each floor and views from every level. We absolutely loved staying here and thoroughly recommend it to anyone.

Spectacular views! Gorgeous beach front cottage that is stylish and comfortable and very well equipped with all you need to make your stay a delight. Our kids loved the freedom of exploring on their own and the surrounding bushwalks and beaches were stunning.  Sleeping to the lull of the ocean was beautiful and the sun rises were incredible.  You feel a million miles away yet only a 10 min ferry ride from Palm Beach.  Such a great spot we cant wait to visit again.  Richard was a great host - communicative and responsive.
Really nice apt. Convenient location for traveling to Sydney. Fantastic place.
Good location.

Mi evaluación es excelente, La ubicación es estratégica, a pocos metros de la bahia de Darling y de la zona de negocios Pitt street . Llegas caminando a la Opera en minutos .las vistas del departamento impresionante, el departamento está muy bien equipado 
La cama matrimonial no era la mas cómoda en la que he dormido pero fue lo suficiente para tener muy buen descanso.
Beatuful house,kind host and convenient location. Near bus stop, supermarket and restaurants.
Very close to city centre!

One of the most beautiful places I have been to. The house is lovely, in perfect location, quite and peaceful, very well maintained, just a flight of stairs down to the beach, stunning ocean view from the patio. The host Richard is very helpful. 100% recommendable.

Paul and Judith are the best hosts and the loveliest couple! Of course we enjoyed the private room at the loft, the comfortable bed, the private bathroom with hot shower, the kitchen and the lovely garden for meals and a beer - but not as much as the heartwarming hospitality by Paul, Judith and their 2 adorable dogs! Everything made us fell like home in Redfern, a lively yet peaceful neighbourhood with lots of wonderful eateries in Surry Hills. One not to be missed is Bourke Street Bakery. Coles supermarket is at doorsteps and Sydney CBD is easily accessible by bus in around 20min. No doubt we will choose to come back there whenever we visit Sydney again.
Thank you Arnie and Lorraine for letting me stay in your very interesting home. Also appreciate you accommodating me a such short notice. Will be back :) much appreciated Michele

Shaun is a very kind and helpful person. He is also very flexible in terms of check-in and check-out time if no one is coming to the room that day. The place in located just nearby Rose Bay Wharf and a ferry would take you to the central (near Harbour Bridge/Opera House) in 12 minutes. It was a good stay at Shaun's place. :-)
We had a great stay, such a great location! Johannes was very helpful and a wonderful host.
Nice central place to stay in Sydney!!
Great location,near public transport restaurants and supermarkets.Agata is really kind and hospitable,everything we need was provided,highly recommend this apartment.
Perfect location. Next to Kings Cross station and a lovely stroll to circular quay.
时尚的家居,很好的位置,附近披萨不错,也有餐厅及小超市,离轮渡大约步行10分钟,很方便｡
Very convenient accommodation for our trip. Very neat and tidy and well equipped.
Great host, always helpful. Min's parents are great.
I recently travelled to Sydney for work and enjoyed a pleasant stay at Allen’s.

This is a good spot if you want to be out of the hustle and bustle of the city but close enough to walk to it. The Air Con only goes down to 18 degrees celsius and mostly directs to the living room not the bed room so if you sleep hot be warned. 

Sweet place!

The apartment is very comfortable, well maintained and supplied with all the basics in both kitchen and bathroom.  We really enjoyed the outside deck area for a morning coffee or evening cocktails! The building complex also offers a well equipped gym and swimming pool which was a great way to unwind after a busy day.  The location was excellent for both touring the historical Rocks area or enjoying the shops and restaurants of bustling Bangaroo.   We could not have picked a better location.

Great central location, a bit noisy at night but Jared is a good host and accommodated us :)

Thanks again!!

Nice peaceful location, would recommend to someone looking to spend a lot of time doing outdoor activities and enjoying the area. The space is underneath the main house however privacy was not an issue.

I had a lovely 7 night stay in this accommodation while visiting with my sister and friend. The location was perfect, a short walk from the centre and close to the train for other trips. The amenities in the apartment were all in working order and included a washer and dryer. The jacuzzi bath was particularly luxurious. We would definitely return. Max and Anton were the perfect hosts.

What Cecilia has created in the Inner West of Sydney is nothing short of amazing! The house is quite magical and the garden likewise with chooks and wonderful plants providing a restful experience after a long day of work. What a pity I was the last guest. Please look out for what Cecilia does next though. I have no doubt it will be onward and upward!
A warm greeting by Cecilia and a gorgeous haven away from the hustle and bustle.  With possibly the comfiest bed around!  Thank you Cecilia, we will definitely book again!
Lovely place! High recommend
都很棒 感谢

Es war unser erster Airbnb Aufenthalt: 
wir haben uns bei Cath sehr wohl gefühlt.
Das Garden Studio war für uns perfekt: es liegt zwar etwas außerhalb, es ist aber durch diverse Bus-  und S-Bahnlinien sehr gut an die Innenstadt angeschlossen. 
Das Studio war sehr sauber und ist sehr gut ausgestattet. 
Es gab eine Mappe mit wichtigen Infos über Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Cafés und Restaurants in der Nähe, was sehr hilfreich war.
Cath war so nett und hat sogar auf meine Allergien ( Tierhaare, Nahrungsmittel etc.) Rücksicht genommen, was ich wirklich klasse fand. Es gab sogar extra nussfreie Kekse für mich. Toll!
Vielen Dank Cath für den schönen Aufenthalt bei Dir!

Even better than in photos! It feels very stylish and spacious but homely at the same time. It had everything we needed (it even has a walk-in wardrobe!).
