The hosts were very nice and attentive and the place is super well located (you can even walk to the Opera House like we did). Really recommended!!

Susan's Bronte B&B is absolutely perfect! Susan and her husband were extremely welcoming and lovely people to have a chat with. Her room in Bronte is located at the end of their beautiful backyard, separate from their house and is precisely as described on Air BnB. The room is bright, spacious, super clean and has all the amenities that one could possibly need whilst away, with a big comfortable bed to boot! Susan had thought of everything for the room, from an iron, insect repellent to breakfast, a fruit bowl, tea, coffee (real coffee) and chocolate!! They are a short walk from cafes and restaurants and Bronte beach and a longer walk to Bondi. Highly recommended host!

Had a great stay with Kerry who is a wonderful host. The location is excellent, just a short walk to Stanmore or Petersham stations with quick trips to the city and airport. 
Kerry's home is very clean and well laid out with plenty of privacy and your own bathroom. A great video and book library, beautiful deck area for meals and just relaxing...what more could you need? 
Breakfast was laid out and Kerry even cooked me a meal on arrival and picked me up from my daughters place. A wonderful host, beautiful home..... I'll be back!   Thank you so much Kerry
Thanks for this first night in Sydney. The Bed is very comfortable and Hernan and Connie are very nice people.

I stayed with Elizabeth and Simon for around 2 weeks and it was like being at home. They are really nice people and treated me like a family. 

Elizabeth went out of her way to accommodate me and i still miss Simons cooking and spending time with me. 

I could not speak any more highly of them that i do and would definitely live with them if ever needed.  They are like family.
Perfect place for group tour. Very clean and tidy studio. Nice owner respond fast.
Great location, everything you need for a short stay. Very responsive hosts & great value for money!

Paul and Judith offered very helpful recommendations throughout our trip and gave us helpful tips for getting downtown, as well as finding great restaurants. The kitchen cart for guests was very convenient, with tea, coffee, chocolate, and muesli included, as well as use of a mini fridge and dishes. I especially enjoyed the muesli! Meals out in Sydney can be quite expensive, so it was nice to be able to prepare lunches in the morning and set out for the day. Paul and Judith’s is conveniently located near two grocery stores, several coffee shops, and numerous pubs and restaurants. It usually took us 30-45 minutes to walk to Hyde Park. We felt that the walk to and from downtown was manageable, though public transit is an option, too. Lastly, the room is very cozy with a wonderful down blanket that’s perfect for chilly, rainy nights. We loved our time in Redfern! Thank you both!
Paul was very friendly and helpful.  The apartment was lovely, very neat and clean with the added bonus of being located conveniently to public transport and amenities.
Great host... Very helpful and welcoming... Makes you feel at home.... Will stay again..

Perfect place for a peaceful getaway!  
We loved the apartment. The light-filled space was clean, beautifully well-equipped with great amenities and plenty of space to relax.  We really enjoyed our time there and would definitely stay again. Thanks Lucy for your hospitality.

Such a wonderful stay! Lizzy’s apartment is the best place to  stay in the Eastern Suburbs. Convenient, very clean, perfect for families and just above the beach! Last but not least, Lizzy is a great host, making sure we had all what we needed and very responsive. Thank you again for a wonderful stay!

Thank you Jared & Diana for the warm welcome and generous hospitality. We had a wonderful week in your immaculate apartment with all the comforts of home and the added bonus of an abundance of natural light throughout each room! The location is ideal and made every aspect of our holiday a breeze from the parking of our car, to walking to all the local amenities - shops, restaurants and entertainment. We highly recommend your apartment and thanks again for being such friendly, thoughtful hosts that go the extra mile...
Close to everything, nice apartment!
Nice place and good location. We stayed with our family. I recommend to stay:-)
A nice homely unit. Close to everything you need in Olympic park.

The location for this listing was a godsend - it’s right smack in the middle of pretty much every iconic spot to visit in Sydney - so walking is always doable and Uber rides are short. The apartment itself is in great condition and comfortable and clean to live in. Sam is also a very responsive host and gets back with info fast.

Great apartment, just in the middle of everything! Really close to the main attractions of the city
The kitchen is very good equipped and the bed is huge and comfortable! 
The communication with Johannes was perfect, really fast and nice
Highly recomendable!!
Great place for a weekend away with great private views!

This little apartment is lovey inside, though the building it's in is a little creepy. Everything went smoothly, although this apartment is right on a busy street with many loud cars and people passing by at night. Other than that though, this is in a prime spot. Literally right in front of a BigBug tour stop if that's your thing.

This place was a great location if you want a simple place to sleep. The place overall was a bit run-down compared to the photos, but was the perfect location if you are interested in walking to the water such as Darling Harbour. Andrea was a very responsive host. Our only complaints were some bathroom bugs and hearing the elevator operating throughout the night since we were right next door.
Great spot and great apartment
Justine's place was great - the photos don't do it justice. Its super spacious, the balcony is brilliant and looks out to leafy bush, and is easy to get to even without a car.

Margaret and John were welcoming hosts. The train carriage was lovely with everything you need including quality linen and comfortable bed. The bush setting was a delight to wake up to with easy access bush walks. I would definitely recommend.
A lovely home full of character and great for our family trip.
Lovely

Ellie’s place is as clean, reachable and well-equipped as you imagine. Living area is very nice with a lot of amenities making your stay enjoyable and easy. Private room is well-lit and spacious with much comfort. The house sits in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood. Shopping facilities and train station is just 5 mins walk away. City center is only 15 mins train ride, or you can go to Chatswood, the local Centre with huge shopping malls and fancy restaurants, which is just one stop away. This is an ideal place for both business and leisure travelers come to visit Sydney.
Good location & quick response!
its good to book in advance and nice place to stay
Lovely private space, perfect for relaxing or exploring the area. Would definitely recommend this place for families or medium groups.

Mariana is such a great host..welcomes and bids goodbye to her guest personally. She responds quickly and has created a comfortable & beautiful abode for guest. Her flat is close to Kings cross station, bus stops and hop on/off stop. Close to grocery, market, restaurants and bars...including ice cream shops :). Her apartment is very reflective of Sydney...its a combination of a sense of culture & vintage with the comforts of whats new & functional. I LOVE the fact that we come home to a very comfy bed and bath tub + epsom salt after a very tiring touristy walking day. :)
Heidi's house was absolutely perfect for our stay. Immaculately presented and with all the necessary amenities. Plenty of space too--excellent host!

Great little place! Sam communicated very well with us before and throughout our stay. Very well equipped place; we found it perfect for our needs. Parks and shopping centre within walking distance. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay again!
Yes
This is a great spot in a very convenient location. I would definitely stay here again if I was visiting Sydney. Ilhwan was very prompt to respond to messages as well.

Min was a very accommodating host. We were in Sydney for an appointment that ran longer than expected so our check in changed a few times and Min was very understanding. Any questions I had were answered quickly and the units location is very convenient. It is a 10 minute walk from Central station, across the road from World Square (restaurants, cafes and Coles), 5 minutes to Museum Station and China town is very close too. The unit was clean, having two bathrooms was very convenient, the massage chair is wonderful and there is a nice view from the balcony. The only suggestion I would have is some more pillows on the bed, but this is a personal preference. I would definitely look to stay here again while in Sydney.

The house is perfect for our stay. It's 10mins walking distance to UNSW and a few mins away from supermarket and eateries. The house and rooms are very clean and our stay made pleasant with the amenities provided in the house like washer and dryer, a big kitchen with a separate dining and living room.
great people, great place and one very spoiled super friendly doggie

第一次使用airbnb,这个平台确实不错｡很方便｡租到很不错的房间｡交通交通十分方便｡地处热闹街区里面的安静｡市中心,繁华热闹,5分钟到达繁华的大型豪华商场,超市,购物生活方便｡5分钟可以到达中央火车站｡十分钟左右可以散步情人港广场,10分钟左右,可以步行去享受唐人街中餐美味｡西餐当然遍地都是,15分钟以内可以漫步海德公园｡30分钟步行,可以到达悉尼歌剧院｡屋子干净整洁,设施齐全,你也可以自己做饭,因为厨房设施齐全｡房东沟通方便,中文,粤语,英文都可以与之交流｡耐心热情,服务周到｡又问必答,还可以给出不错的建议｡总之,家庭旅游,商务出差,短中期的居住,都是不错的选择｡很好的平台,很好的房东,值得选择｡以后还会有机会来的

Me and my friend loved staying with him. He was very friendly and we couldn‘t have asked for a better host! 
The room was very clean and he gave us some great tips!

Oliver was really great and flexible in checking me in. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) . Helped me hold on to my bags during my last day before going to the airport. Apartment was spacious with a nice kitchenette and seating area. Near to kings cross transit.
Lovely place. Close to circular quay
An excellent room at an excellent location. Just a short walk down to the Newport Mirage and local pub. The location is quiet with Tessa and Rod the perfect hosts for the stay.
Super handy location to beautiful Maroubra beach.  Able to accomodate our large group and very responsive to communication.

We spent a wonderful 8 days at Susan's flat at the bottom of the garden.  It's like a fairy bower with a large mulberry tree and a small terrace for outdoor eating.  The accommodation is small but immaculate and stylish, with a terrific shower head, quite the largest we have ever seen.  All mod cons, even a hair straightener so we wanted for nothing.  Susan and Greg are the most charming and considerate hosts.  Their hospitality is outstanding as are the fabulous surroundings of Bronte Beach nearby.  We would return in a heartbeat.

Bundeena Base was perfect for our family of 5 for a long weekend getaway. The wifi and Foxtel were hits with the kids, the pool was perfect after a walk or time at the beach, the air con on muggy summer nights was great too. Everything Bundeena has to offer us an easy stroll away. We highly recommend Hilde and Bundeena Base and hope to be back in the future!
Beautiful and clean. Fit 2 couples and a child easily. Great location to Circular Quay and the Opera House. Would stay again.
Great location, close to ferry. Very clean and Laura was a great host!

Wendy is a very kind and welcoming host. Good communication and easy check in.

Her apartment is very modern and stylish and in a nice neighborhood.  The massage bed is great ;-). 

Happy to come back next time we are down under.
Angela’s house is beautiful. We enjoy our short stay. It is a real superhost!
Great space. Close to public transport to get into the CBD. Clean and tidy. Lots of privacy.
Enjoyable stay.  Great central location.  Easy to communicate with host.  Awesome wifi.  Would recommend.
Great location. Close to public transport and a small walk to Darling Habour. Host was very accomodating.
My visit to Sydney was pretty hectic, so I only saw David once during my stay, at the start of the trip - but he was friendly and helpful, and his house is lovely and in a great location.

A great apartment in a central location, close to shops, nightlife and walking distance or quick cab to Cirqular Quay and Darling Harbour. The pictures don't do enough justice - the apartment is really spacious with the added bonus of three bathrooms, which is great for a group! Danny was a very accommodating host and I would definitely recommend this as a great place to stay.
坐地铁可以去悉尼市中心｡
perfect

Suzie was a brilliant host. Her apartment is well situated providing walking access to most CBD locations. Her apartment is tastefully furnished, clean and tidy. The added bonus for me was internet access included. David

Large apartment in Central Sydney with full kitchen, washing machine, dryer and separate main bedroom with a fan and air con unit. Only thing missing was a large umbrella which we had to buy due to some heavy downpours so we left it for use of other guests! Although we didn't meet Gavin he was quick to respond to all emails and very helpful.

We had such a wonderful time at Bundeena Garden Studio. Belinda made everything so easy for us; she was incredibly accommodating.

The studio itself is fantastic. It's clean, comfortable and beautifully designed (Belinda's artwork hangs on the walls). Literally moments from the beach and a short walk to the shops. 

I can't recommend this accommodation enough! We will definitely be visiting again.

I had an amazing time at Elizabeth and Simons home in Sydney. They're so lovely! Couldn't have asked for a better place to stay. They cooked me breakfast, dinner and every night we had a glas of wine together. I will definitely come back and stay with these incredible people again.

Our crew stayed here for a business trip for Supanova Popculture event. It was great, spacious and walking distance to everything. Parking was a breeze, restaurants around the area and a convenience store. You even get 10% off at the restaurants when you mention your a resident.

This Garden studio is  a home sweet home away from your home:) I know you just don't get it from what I have just said.
Okay here it is and I am gonna make it short .
The studio has got all the essentials you need which  is being mentioned in the house manual.
We just loved staying at the garden studio for almost two weeks .
I highly recommend this place for a peaceful and enjoyable stay.

Lucile and Francois were very good hosts. The apartment is stylish, well furnished and with a big balcony. Its only a few minutes walking from Bondi Beach and close to many restaurants. We had a fantastic time and I would definitely come back. Thanks a lot.

Paul is a great host which always attend to all our queries in a positive manner. He even reminded us when the check in time was near. 
The place is artistic and you can feel a designer touch in the house. The hot water run well and the kitchen is fully equipped.
The kings cross train station is just around the corner makes you travel easily around the city. Special appreciation to the shopkeeper inside the station that help us buying our first opal card.
Special thanks to the cleaner that enthusiastic welcome us and help with the trash bin.
Lovely room, good location, and friendly hosts.

Linda's place is just lovely and very close to Redfern train station. The house is clean and neat. Superb value with garage parking. We rent a car for two days and that was very convenient with no trouble to find parking spot. Highly recommend and definitely will return in the future. Give mine appreciation for hosting a great place.
Ben's place is in the perfect location. Had a lot of fun staying there.
Great host. The apartment was clean and well presented. Highly recommended.

Agata was very responsive and provided all info we needed about access to / getting settled into the unit both ahead of our stay and during it.

The unit was basic however had everything we needed for our trip to Sydney, since we didn’t spend a lot of time at the unit. We had clean towels and sheets provided, and the bathroom had everything we needed. 
It was clean but it was an older unit, which I think people can sometimes mistake for dirty (based on previous reviews I read).

We were able to park our car on one half of the shared driveway, being sure to leave the other half of the driveway for Agata and her family to access their garage + home (which backs into to the unit and the garage provides their access to their home). There was also street parking though. We had a brief interaction with Agata and her family by chance as we were heading out one day, which was very pleasant. Agata was very kind and hospitable, however was sure not to be a presence during our stay.

Since our stay fell on a warm time of the year, it did get quite hot inside in the afternoon and evening. There is no air con, just a pedestal fan which was in the bedroom. Which could be moved about if you needed it in the lounge room. However I feel in summer it would get super hot inside.

Our two dogs felt right at home there - there is a good outdoor space perfect for dogs (secure gate and fences, small grass patches with trees, and a large secure deck area).  There is also a park about a 10 minute walk away from the unit which was great!!

Thank you for welcoming us and our two dogs into your home Agata. We had a great trip and appreciated the convenient location & solid base for our time in Sydney.

We were very happy with our stay at Garden Cabin. It was nice and private, located in the rear garden. The cabin is within walking distance to great cafes in the very cosmopolitan Norton St area and we found it very easy to visit the city via the Light Rail which is located nearby. Susan is very friendly and helped us willingly with our travel needs. There was a very generous selection available for breakfast and the bed was comfy. The flights overhead were a bit noisy the day we were there, but we expected that after reading other reviews. We would be very happy to stay with Susan again.
It was a great place to stay for an early flight! Excellent value for money, and lovely place.
Great space. Made our weekend getaway super special.

Imogen’s place is just perfect. In the heart of Bondi, it’s close to everything you need. It’s light and sun-filled, and spotlessly clean. She is incredibly gracious, with on-the-money local’s recommendations. The bathroom was gorgeous. The whole place was beyond relaxing. Loved, too, having such a big space to myself - the room is lovely and oversized, with a desk and a massive mirror. Wish I could live there!

Cat's house was great - exactly as described, awesome location close to everything! The house was clean, and the space worked really well - especially since we had 3 kids with us, who were able to spread out and play without getting under our feet! Cat was a very accomodating host, great communication and we felt really comfortable. The little extra touches like extra blankets and towels, and lovely soaps / shampoos in the bathrooms just topped it off! I would highly recommend staying at Cat's place.

The house was great. Very roomy considering there are just 2 proper bedrooms.  The decor was beautiful, the place was clean and the beds were very comfy. Plenty of crockery and cutlery, and lots of bath towels. Good location for reaching city and the Northern Beaches. It was a pleasure staying there.

This was a wonderful place to make our temporary home in Sydney. Only downside is we were only able to stay a few nights - wish we could have stayed longer.

The location is incredibly convenient to the Sydney museum, airport (short taxi ride or train ride), local eateries and bars, and sightseeing bus stops. Check-in was a breeze, as we were met by Matthew despite having a late arrival. He showed us where everything was located, and was friendly and welcoming.

Inside, the apartment is filled with amenities and welcoming touches that made us feel right at home. It's very clean and well-decorated. 

We would agree with other reviewers that said the stairs are a bit steep and narrow. It was absolutely no problem for us to navigate, but I would not recommend it for the elderly or those with disabilities, as there are no bedrooms on the entry floor.

Overall, 5-star place that we would absolutely choose again.

If you are looking for a place for five or six people to stay in Sydney, this is the perfect accommodation. Very well furnished, three bedrooms and bath. More than enough room for diner and relax. Fully equiped with special attention at arrival. Perfect location nearby city, bus and train. Also parking for one car available.

I had a great stay at Helenas apartment. Helena was a great host and very quick to respond whenever I had any questions. The apartment was very clean upon arrival (and the complimentary fruits and drinks was a nice touch!) and has all the things you need to have a comfortable stay. I think the one thing I missed was a drier to dry my clothes/sheets/etc. in after washing them, but that didn't become a problem either since you can easily dry the clothes on the balcony or indoors. The apartment is situated in a nice and quite area in Glebe, and within walking distance to bus stops, shops and restaurants, the harbour and so on. I can truly recommend Helenas apartment for single travelers or couples looking for a nice apartment for longer or shorter stays in Glebe/Sydney.

The garden bungalow is amazing, a little oasis.  Super cute and very comfortable and stocked with everything you need.

Susan is a great host.  She was awesome about letting us drop our bags off early, and even offered to help, if our daughter who is studying abroad for a semester  in Sydney, needed anything.  Highly recommended.
Great location to manly night life

This house is very nice especially suitable for family with young kids. Our kids love the trampoline very much. We love the outdoor living space, this area is excellent and out of our expectation. We enjoyed staying there for meal and entertainment. It is very good to have a heater there, very comfortable! The spa in the outdoor area is also good for us to relax. The location is convenient , only a few minutes walk to take ferry. Everything is true as they described. 
Only thing was that the dishwasher was out of order and reported on the second day of our stay. Although we were kept inform that they were trying to fix it, it was not fixed at the end of our nine days stay. It was quite inconvenient for us as we cooked everyday and we have 8 people to dine. 
Anyway would recommend.

Lovely appartment, very close to Darling harbour (walkable-5 mins). Appartment is well equipped and spacious. Appartment building is not that well kept, however once you are in the appartment you won't feel that.

Thank you for giving us such a warm house. Although getting along with two days, we feelt your warm and careful. You provide us with the site and the train route made us to the Sydney opera house easily. When we booked room difficulties, and help us to solve the problem. Thank you again, wish you have a long career.
感谢你为我们提供了如此温馨的房屋｡ 我们相处虽然两天,但感到了你的热情和细致｡你为我们提供的火车站点和路线让我们顺利到了悉尼歌剧院｡当我们订房间困难时,又帮助我们解决了问题｡再次感谢,祝你事业顺利｡
Second week in Sydney for business, and enjoyed staying in this lovely home. The neighbourhood is just gorgeous and a calming respite after a busy day!
Lovely clean and comfortable place. Close to transport and very well equipped.

This was a great location next to the beach with plenty of room for a family of four and a great view of the beach.  Mal was very responsive and provided restaurant recommendations.  We enjoyed our stay on Bondi Beach!

Well located, well decorated and well equipped, a very good option to stay in Sydney. A few things could be improved on the cleaning side but sure that Eleni as a great host she is will take care of it.
My wife had a nice stay here.....great views. Host was a little hard to contact re checkin but otherwise all good

This was our first Airbnb experience and I choose it first on the location close to Palm Beach and also the price when scrolling through. The scroll through price was $110 p/n but there were extras of $35 for cleaning and a $22.15 service fee. These may well be standard Airbnb extras but on a one night stay I guess the cleaning fee to cost of stay ratio seemed a bit high. I knew the total fee before finalising the booking but I guess I would have liked the pricing better if it was all inclusive at $165 and not the $110 plus, plus .... one good flip side is when I shared a screenshot of where we were staying and a few commented that it seemed like great value at $110. The place is very nice and neat. We arrived at night and the host had left the garage lights on so we could see along the narrow path to the shack at the back. Later the lights were off and getting another load from the car was tricky although a flashlight was left on the kitchen table for this purpose. We never met the host but that was maybe due to our late arrival ...but I’m also ok with this as I’m a bit shy and I knew we could contact them easily if needed. It’s an awesome spot very close to a nice dock and a little beach as well as a swimming area. Well recommended!
Great apartment, super spacious, and in a great location. Definitely recommend Nicole & Simon's apartment. They were quick to reply with any questions and provided everything we needed for our stay.

Louise's place is fantastically airy and inviting, with big open windows that view out onto the Sydney skyline. The space was plenty big for my girlfriend and I for 4 weeks after we relocated our lives from London to Sydney. The kitchen has everything you need to prepare meals and everything is of top notch quality (we even bought the same kettle after using the one in Louise's kitchen!). The bedroom has the most comfortable bed ever and tons of wardrobe space to store your stuff. Massive TV in the lounge room and the dining table allowed us to work during the day and have full meals of an evening. Buses to the city are right out on Alison Rd and it only takes 20 min to be in the heart of Sydney. Quiet neighbourhood, close to shops in Kensington and a short drive from Randwick/Waterloo for more shopping. Centennial Park across the road is great for weekend walks too.

Cosey little apartment, so close to anything you want or need!! For a little space it has everything, incredibly well done - could have slept in the dream bed all weekend and not gone out and been happy!! All it’s missing is a view but you step outside and your in the heart of Potts Point - perfect!!

We really enjoyed our stay in Dino's beautiful apartment in Elizabeth Bay and it was very difficult to leave. Dino is a great host and communication is prompt and easy. The apartment is well situated close to great cafes, restaurants, lovely parks and stunning views of the Bay's along the many wonderful walks we enjoyed and not far from the many wonderful sights and venues that Sydney has to offer. We are very fussy with our bedding and Dino's bed is extremely comfortable. I recommend Lizzies next door for fresh delicious food if you want to eat in and Fratelli Paradiso on Challis Ave for great coffee. Our stay at Dino's lovely apartment was wonderful and we hope we will be able to visit again.  We have also enjoyed a stay in Dino's apartment in Lucca Italy last year, both places are beautifully styled (a testament to Dino's good taste and flare for design).  We thank you Dino for allowing us to stay in both places and your apartment in Elizabeth Bay was wonderful.

The whole family loved our beach holiday at Nathans place - it is literally only steps away to the beach!  If you prefer ocean baths to the beach, these are only a short walk away as well. The apartment is not large, however it is very well set up to maximise the space available. Nathan was great to communicate with, and provided lots of suggestions about places to eat and things to see.  We loved El Tora Pizza and Tapa for dinner and Crazy Rays for a morning coffee.  Parking on the street was not difficult -  even on busy days it on took 5 minutes to find a spot.  We are looking forward to visiting again.

Daniel heeft ons erg gastvrij ontvangen. De kamer is ruim en het bed is erg goed, ook voor lange mensen. Het station is op loopafstand en met de trein ben je in een half uurtje in hartje Sydney. Met een auto ben je snel in de natuurgebieden rondom de stad.
De badkamer en keuken hadden iets schoner gemogen, maar dat kwam misschien omdat Elena er niet was en Daniel erg veel moest werken.
Great location and excellent communication with host.
Kasey was a fantastic host with great communication. Her apartment is beautiful with so many cozy touches. Her place is right in the heart of Bondi with everything you need right outside the door!
Great!

Paul’s place was beautiful and in the perfect location and up until early check in things were perfect. Unfortunately he kept quiet about the fact that earth moving works were performed right in front our window Mon-Fri 7:30am4:00pm. The house was shaking and you could not understand your own words.
He gave us one night free, but we would have appreciated honesty instead. It was not a relaxing stay.
Welcoming hosts who are very thoughtful.
The reservation was canceled 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

From the first email to Nicole, it felt like I was talking to a friend. She was so welcoming and helpful, and responded quickly to every request. On arrival I was met at the elevator with a big smile and the key. My surprise when I walked in the door was immense! The apartment is beautifully appointed, fresh spotless linen, a bowl of fruit, chocolates, and even an array of teabags and biscuits to have with my coffee. Such a lovely surprise. It's a spacious apartment with two beautiful bathrooms and amazing views. Even a large balcony with deck chairs. This apartment truly had everything we needed. There was a chemist near the ground floor doors, and a convenience store as well; coffee shops and cafes are nearby, and an excellent DFO shopping centre nearby (within walking distance; 1.3km I think).  I recommend this apartment to you without hesitation. Thanks Nicole! We'll be back!

Had a wonderful long weekend at Balmain Cottage. Jennifer was very welcoming and left us breakfast, wine and chocolates. The cottage is beautiful, clean and the beds very comfortable.
There's only a five minute walk to Balmain village with many great restaurants to choose from.
Would highly recommend.
Good communication although cancelled stay
Clean apartment in a quiet street
Hassle-free and homely touches. We had a great stay and our only regret is not staying longer!

The house is an old house in both good and bad, but we found it very comfortable and kids just loved having a garden to play in. Windows and balcony doors are a bit leaky, especially on stormy weather, but putting a piece of paper between the window will do the job. Public transportation was much better than expected, with M30 getting us fast to any place near the CBD. There are many grocery stores to pick from, and plenty of other small shops too. The square next to Mosman Council is quite lively on both mornings and evenings. Could've definitely stayed here longer!
Evelyn is a great host. I look forward to spending time once again at her little getaway .
Great location, clean, modern and fully equipped
Perfect spot, spotless, easy check in and a block from the beach. Will definitely be back!
Naveen's place is in an amazing location, and was great value for money. She was communicative and very helpful.
house is so so so…lovely and Jason and his wife are friendly!
Oliver's place is spot on.  It's easy to see why he receives such great reviews. Would recommend & will stay with Oliver again for sure.

It was lovely to meet Jessica, she was an amazing host! The apartment was clean and comfortable. The location was great, with Paddington's amazing restaurants and shops just on our doorstep. Jessica was very friendly and helpful and we're definitely planning on staying here again next time we're in Sydney!
Agnes is a very well travelled, polite and informative host. Excellent all round Airbnb expert.
This is a lovely stylish apartment. Great location near cafes, bars theater and transport connections. Suzie is a great host. One of the joys of airbnb is meeting interesting people like Suzie.
Good location
A really good spot, close to Potts Point nightlife with excellent transport links to the rest of Sydney. Well furnished with a nice kitchen too.

You have a beautiful place, Cheryl, with excellent finishing touches. We loved staying here and loved the round window. Easy walking to the beach, cafes, tennis, Aboriginal rock engravings, local cluba and IGA. Very relaxing  We look forward to coming again!
Olympic park apt has a nice view and has a quiet surrounding with some eateries just below the apt. Would recommend to people who prefers to stay away from the busy city.  Overall experience is good.

This apartment/room is a great place to stay in Sydney for the solo traveler or for couples.  It's a 5 min walk from the Kings Cross subway station.  The neighborhood has a bunch of great bars and restaurants.  It's centrally located and you can easily walk to many parts of the city.  If you are a light sleeper (I am not) then the street noise could be a bit bothersome on a Friday or Saturday night because the windows are single-paned (I did not have any problems with the street noise), but otherwise the accommodations are exactly as described and shown.  Comfortable bed, private bathroom, workout room and pool on the same floor.  Staying at this place felt like staying at a nice hotel in many ways.  Naveen and Tristan's wifi signal is strong and fast.  They provide soap, tea and fresh towels in your room should you need those things.  You can come and go as you please and Naveen and Tristan are a wonderful couple and excellent hosts.  They are easy to talk to and they offered many good suggestions about restaurants, bars, and sites to see (thank you for the Lil' Darling and ferry to Manly Beach recommendations!).  Naveen even graciously invited me to dinner with her friends; who were just as enjoyable to talk to as N & T.  And for dog lovers, little Felix will warm your heart.  I would absolutely recommend this room to a friend or any person looking to stay in the heart of Sydney with three wonderful and interesting hosts.

Was a lovely bedroom we stayed down stairs the room was spacious but the only downfall was we could hear every1s foot steps from upstairs. The Hosts were both really helpful to my early check in and check out. Both bathrooms were great, overall we would definitely stay here again
Shuangs place was very nice. A bit of noise from the people in the room next to us and the beds. But extremely close to the airport and would recommend! Thanks!

Steve and Jessie's beautiful Bondi home is emblematic of what Airbnb is all about: experiencing a location through the lens and comfort of a local. Clean, spacious, and comfortable, their house felt like home within minutes of arriving. They even left us a Sydney guidebook and a fridge with all the essentials! The location is excellent - near lots of shops and restaurants, and just a 10-minute walk from the beach. Even their neighbors were friendly, popping by to make sure we had everything we needed. We had a truly magical time in Sydney, much of which we attribute to our amazing accommodations. Thank you Jessie and Steve!
Excellent value for money.. cant get anything else at this price.

Coffee's place is extremely clean and looks just like the photos! She is an amazing host that communicates quickly and efficiently. The check-in process was very simple and quick. Her apartment is in an ideal spot within the CBD and i highly recommend staying at her place for short/ long stays!

Everything was neat and tidy. I liked the airy style of the loft a lot. Close to the city, close to the airport, trainstation nearby. A lot of working process in this area, it is not silent there! Keep this in mind. But after all, it’s a great apartment and Evan is a perfect host. Would like to stay here again if I am ever been to Sydney again :)

The location can't be better. Bus/train stations are within walking distance and Coles is literally 10 meters away. Huys families were very friendly. Private bathroom was definitely a big bonus for this price!
Perfect location. Few minutes walk to Darling Harbour where Madam Tassaud, Sea Life and Safari is located. Sydney Tower is just around the corner. Loads of shopping places.
Beautiful house!
The apartment is in a great location, very clean and excellent value. Thank you Cindy and Claudio!
Awesome place! Great location!
This is a clean and lovely apartment, really cozy  and makes me feel at home

From first contact through to departure, this was one of the best AirBnB experiences I've had.

Narelle was warm and welcoming with all communication & went above & beyond for a request I had on our check out day - which both myself & my friend (travelling with me) very much appreciated.

The apartment was in a fantastic location within walking distance of everywhere in Newtown & in very close proximity to public transport.
It was also very clean, extremely well-maintained & cozy - just perfect for our visit to Sydney. 

Thank you Narelle for being such a welcoming host - we really enjoyed this visit to Sydney even more so because of this wonderful accommodation & we'll definitely look this apartment up again for our next visit.

All the best,
Matt
Rhonda is a welcoming host. You’ll feel at home in a comfortable space in anyvery pleasant neighbourhood

Elise is a very profesional person who provide all information for a great stay at Glebe.
The place is small, modern and cozy apartment with excellent location, also you can always find a free car park for two hours on the street.
I highly recommend it.
Thanks Elise for your lovely hospitality.

Kind regards,

Arminda
房东人特别好

This space is surely value for money and the check in process is smooth. Sarah is kind to cook up the eggs for us as I overlooked as there’s no kitchen. :) We are also well informed about the roaches and was given pesticides too. The room can fit our family of 6+1 but it can be a little squeezy and stuffy at night. The pool was a great addition too, my Niece and Husband enjoyed it. Cheers

We really enjoyed staying here. Great location, the room has all that we needed, including great shower and beds. 

Susan is lovely, helped us a lot in any kind of information we needed. 

Would surely have came back there next time we in Sydney (but afraid it will be in few years at least...)
Great place to stay with close to all amenities.

Philip was very flexible about check-in and check-out arrangements. He could not have been more accommodating & friendly. The property was great although the stairs would be an issue for children and anyone with mobility problems. A fantastic location with all the sights & great shopping easily accessible on foot. We found the train link direct from the airport & nearby Museum station an added advantage. Would stay here again & recommend to anyone staying in Sydney. So great to be able to get a load of washing done before moving on as well!

The Garden Studio was wonderful. It had everything we needed (and more!) and it is a beautiful space. Cath has thought of everything, from a change of towels mid-week to shampoo, cereal choices, and even a homemade loaf of bread for our 6-night stay. We felt truly spoilt. Marrickville is being hailed as the "new Surry Hills" and at the number of quality cafes and food stores nearby was just astounding. We rented a car, and we were really happy with the easy (and free) parking on the street too.
great location,  walking distance to everything near Bondi. Excellent restaurants and drinks very close to apt.
This accommodation is just great for a night in the city or if you just need somewhere to sleep after sightseeing and dining out. Close to transport, dining and shopping areas

What an extraordinary home! I had a delightful stay in the green room. Arnie and Lorraine were everything you would want from hosts - welcoming, friendly and inclusive and happy to leave you to it also. I highly recommend their home plus it is in a great location, easy to get to the beach and city.
The children enjoyed it with a wide deck.

This is a great studio guest house. It is exactly as pictured. Susan and her husband were great hosts. The help arrange my early arrival and very early departure (booking a taxi for me). You really have a private space and gardens which makes for a nice quiet stay. I appreciate the espresso machine and coffee packs, also the milk, yogurt, juice, fruits, berries and granola. I would definitely stay again. It is in walking distance to great restaurant and coffee shops, and Bronte Beach.

Paul's place is very nice, well situated near all the shops, restaurants, sites and bay on Macleay street. Easy to get to from the airport. Good bed and kitchen, nice cooking facilities. Thanks again Paul.
David

We headed to Great Mackeral for a spontaneous weekend away.  The beach house is idyllic - the location is spectacular, and the house is perfect.  Beachy, comfortable and has everything you need!    

We swam, lazed and read on the deck lounges, played Jenga, Uno & Scrabble, and cooked up an absolute feast in the well equipped kitchen.  Aside from all that the house has to offer, we also explored a little further afield with trail runs and bush walks in the surrounding areas.  

We also loved the remote feel of the location - we basically had the beach to ourselves, but it took us just under an hour to get there from Sydney, including the very quick ferry ride. 

We have all returned to the city refreshed, and vowing to get back here as soon as we can.  Richard and Claudia were very responsive, and provided clear instructions on all logistics involved.  

Thank you!

Perfect location, beautiful house. Highly recommend this place! Very close to the beach and main streets and the house has everything you would need and more. The garden is beautiful and it even has a BBQ. We enjoyed it very much.
The place was very clean. Michele was very nice and accommodating. We would recommend this place to anybody.

Kerri was such a welcoming and friendly host who went out of her way to ensure my stay was comfortable. The apartment was immaculate, the bedroom spacious and the facilities modern. The location was perfect, with everything I needed within walking distance. For my first airbnb experience it was perfect, would highly recommend and will be staying there again!

Fantastic apartment! Great location, 5 minute walk to Bondi Beach, no hesitation in recommending this place to stay! Really nice modern feel to the apartment as well, felt right at home! Top it off with great views looking across Sydney from the Balcony! We'll be back for sure :)

This is a wonderful place to stay comfortable and clean easy access and very close to Museum Station and  beautiful Hyde Park. The host is marvelous and provided us with so many wonderful amenities. We would definitely stay here again .
I had a great stay at Tim’s place, very convenient to shops and airport.
The apartment is in an unbeatable location - close to the action and public transport. Communication with Paul was prompt and easy.
The house was perfect for what we were after with a number of us travelling to Sydney for an event. Location  could not have been better and facilities were great.
Susan's place was charming and delightful. Just what I needed and as advertised. An excellent host
Lovely apartment great location Irene was very friendly definitely would recommend

If you need to get to concord hospital this is a great place to stay! Everything is walkable and it’s convenient enough to get an uber if you’d like one. The walk bridge is very close by and easy to get across to concord and Rhodes. Tidy fully equipped apartment to stay in - thank you!
房子位置不错,离各大景点都挺近,去哪里步行坐车都可以,出行是很方便的｡只是房子本身有点旧,有看到蜘蛛网和小蜘蛛,厨房有很多工具都没有,切菜刀都没有一把只有一把小刀,做饭不是很方便,也没有洗碗机可用,有红酒杯却没有开瓶器,冰箱坏了,在入住期间漏了一地水,窗帘也坏了｡入住建议问清楚房东是否已解决以上问题｡
amazing area, lovely home, Tessa and Rod were welcoming. Charlie was adorable. I will definitely be back!!

This is a great apartment, highly recommended. Situated in the heart of the city yet quiet, be assured of a good nights sleep in the super comfortable beds.
Good communication with an efficient checking in system. 
The apartment is spotlessly clean with everything one could possibly want supplied.
We had a very pleasant stay, Thank you Jared.

Very convenient to the airport and a vibrant local community, Cath and her place were very accommodating and friendly and the bungalow is to be recommended for short stays. Its small and gets some aircraft noise but its also well maintained, clean, very comfortable and Cath provided a bunch of great breakfasty snacks - I was lucky enough to get some freshly baked muffins also!
Bundeena Base is lovely, well located and well fitted out with everything you need. The view is beautiful and just a short walk to the beaches, bush walks and shops. Highly recommended.

The granny flat was modern and clean as depicted in the photographs. 
Ali was also super friendly and available at all times for us to contact him. Would definitely love to stay here again!
Was a great apartment for my friends and myself. The apartment had a great rooftop pool and the location was close to everything.

Evelyn was great about communicating with me. Everything was like the pictures, if not better. The open, airy feeling of the place was more than a photo could capture. It was quiet and serene. We slept well and enjoyed the peaceful environment. Avalon is a quaint town with much to offer in dining and shopping. Evelyn was very helpful in recommending lovely dining experiences, including a splurge at Jonah's Whale Beach. Go there, even if only to have a drink and take in the view! We will definitely rebook with Evelyn, as it was a perfect getaway.

Susan's house was a very comfortable place to stay. The little house in the garden is more than just a private room; it has chairs and a private bathroom with toilet! 

Susan was also a great host and very helpful anytime. I would definitely recommend this place.

Thank you susan!!!!
Very helpful and quick response for a last minute need for accom for one of my employees. I was also told they were friendly and very helpful on arrival.

The location was great, comfortable bed, close to nice cafes and restaurants, easy walk into the city and to central station.  The only issue was the parking, however we parked in a secure car park which was only a 10min walk from the accommodation.  Would definitely stay again.  Thank you Hayley.

Everything was exactly as advertised and fantastic. Great location (10 min to rail station, 1 min to bus, 30 min walk to Circular Quay, and loads of places to eat and drink v nearby), comfy bed in nice little house with good storage space, sofas, wifi, and breakfast essentials and tea/coffee provided... and Hayley & Jack were great hosts and I enjoyed meeting them. Would definitely stay again!
The place has all the things you need, host was very thoughtful in having suitable accessories. The place was well clean and tidy!

This home in Potts Point was an amazing place to stay! It is especially close to the city and only a short walk to the Botanical Park! The apartment is very cute too and the main bedroom looks over the busy street of Darlinghurt and the public garden! 
It was additionally easy to get in contact with Paul and he always replied back to any questions I had super quickly! 
I'd definitely recommend this place to anyone wanting to experience Sydney and all its quirks!
Hi
This was the perfect place for us. It was our first Airbnb experience and we loved it. A couple of the mattresses are a little hard but everything else was exceptional.   Thanks Lina!

Danny was a very good communicator who ensured our needs were met.

His accommodation was in a fantastic location, very accessible to Darling Harbour.

Our family loved Sydney and Danny’s apartment location made it very easy to see all of the iconic spots offered along Darling Harbour and Circular Quay.
Suzie's place was excellent and the hospitality great. Would stay again :)

The ferry wharf and all of the sights were just a short walk from the apartment. Anita's place was really big, clean, and comfortable and had everything we needed, including an abundance of linen, wifi, Netflix, and complimentary Tim Tams in the fridge.
Excellent apartment in great location, clean, tidy and a very friendly host. Highly recommend.

Lovely house & well maintained. 

Everything you could need for a comfortable stay is provided. There were 4 adults & 2 children in our party, and there was more than enough space.
Pool is a very welcome addition- especially to escape the Sydney heat!
Wouldn’t think twice about rebooking if we’re ever fortunate to be in Sydney again!
Chloe was very accommodating especially as we had a very late arrival and we required late checkout. The location is ideal.
Very handy to get the airport within 20minutes walking. Dot have to worry about the traffic or anything jamed on the road. Independent room and good privacy. Thanks again.
A definite consideration if u want to be in Bronte it’s got all you need

Sarah's apartment was fantastic and one of the best airbnb's we've stayed in. Beautiful apartment in a great location. Sarah was very communicative and our check-in/out was very easy. Breakfast groceries on a arrival was a really nice touch.

It was a great experience staying at this awesome victorian old house. Bryan is a fantastic host and we were able to feel the great care and effort he had put in to make our stay nice and cozy. We only have good things to say about Bryan and his lovely spot.

Maria's place is just as it is described. The most beautiful place to wake up in Manly. Maria and Jerry are very friendly hosts. It was a bit wierd for me sharing a kitchen and bathroom with them but everything is clean and tidy so it really is a nice place to stay.
Great room Tx Hernan
A clean and well decorated modern flat.
an excellent garden studio.   Under the flight path, but fortunately there is a curfew and one did get used to the planes after 24 hours.

Check-in was breezy, the house is so beautiful inside and out, very cosy and clean. Maryam & Ali are very friendly and welcoming. You have complete privacy. Check-out is easy. Overall, it was a very nice night and I will definitely stay here again in the future! :)
公寓位于这座美丽城市的中心地带, 距离达令港和悉尼国际会议中心 ､悉尼大桥､歌剧院､植物园､当代艺术博物馆 等著名景点都不远,地理位置优越

This compact apartment had all we needed, including an extremely comfortable bed, great shower with plenty of hot water, lovely art deco furnishings and all you needed to cook up a meal if you wished. Locally there are many good restaurants, a train station and a supermarket all within easy walking distance.

Hi Marissa and Damien, thanks so much for the wonderful stay.  Your home was spacious and the times we had 12 people there - it never felt crowded.  The kitchen was well equipped and swimming pool  / trampoline kept the kids entertained.
The house was perfect  - we had family from Brisbane and Darwin for a very special and rare Christmas and New Year.
The location was perfect, nice and close to beach, an easy walk to movies and local shopping centre.

PS: The ocean views from balcony are stunning, and there is nothing better than lying in bed listening to the sounds of the ocean.

Once again - thanks so much - Julie and Terry

Kate and Waybe were extremely accommodating and very responsive to my emails. The location is excellent literally the road between you and the beach. A lovely beach stay that I would highly recommend to others.
Great location and communication from the host. Check in was Smooth and apartment is exactly what we expected. Loved the books and art around the apartment
Had an amazing getaway! Cheryl's house couldn't get any better, loved it !
Hernan was great. He left the keys for me and everything was set up nicely. The room had everything you need for a short stay.
Modern bathroom and kitchen. Convenience place.
Susan's accommodation was clean and comfy and I recommend it as a nice place to stay. Susan is friendly and could not do enough to ensure our comfort.
Nice home in good location.  Worth a visit.
Lovely little studio!

Maria and her partner Gerry were warm, quiet and friendly. I was made welcome and provided with plenty of directions to find the beautiful space which was shared with me... The bay window photo says it all about the iconic building and the sensational location. For me , real is what I love to experience, and real is what I got... The location and neighbourhood  make this a perfect relaxation point... Older style building with charm and character and great food and coffee right under the window and 5 mins oceanside walk into Manly...

It is a great stay in Hugo’s place.
The location is perfect and Ollie is very nice. 

Will definitely stay here again :)

Excellent location, walking distance to Elouera Beach and a short stroll to Cronulla shops.  Convenience of milk bar, take away food and golf club bistro just across the road. 

Very tidy and functional house, great for families or group.  

Rob is a friendly host who is quick to respond to questions.

Great. Linda was very helpful in the lead up to our guest arriving.
Our guest felt very welcome. There were some issues with the wifi at the beginning of our guests stay - but Linda quickly rectified it. Our guest was most happy with his accommodation.

Great apartment in a great location! I would definitely recommend Andrew's apartment to anyone visiting Sydney. The space is large and clean and walking distance to Central station. There are taxis always passing outside and it Uber's arrived very quickly also. You are always getting two bedrooms which is very good value. Andrew is extremely responsive and provides all the information that you will require. I wouldn't hesitate to stay again. Thanks Andrew!
We enjoyed our stay at Mel's Bondi apartment. It had a great view and was in a perfect location for enjoying Bondi. Mel was quick to respond and a great host.

O espaço era bom, mas o terceiro hospede dormiu num colchao no chao, nao havia cama. Nao havia lencol de cobrir para os hospedes. Na casa sao 4 quartos e 2 banheiros compartilhados, que sao limpos somente 2 vezes por semana, entao os banheiros nao estavam suficientemente limpos quando chegamos. E so foram limpos 3 dias depois.

We had a great stay, the house is family friendly and in an excellent location!
Joy was very accommodating and responsive to all of our questions.
We had a very nice little journey by train into the city each day and much preferred staying in a nearby suburb compared with the city center. Would recommend this house to anyone.

Thanks again 

Ben and family
great place, great location !!

Angela was a terrific host!  Great communication and the condo was exactly as described...clean, great location and easy in & out.  We stayed for a week and a half and really appreciated the close acces to public transportation as we explored Sydney.  Highly recommended!!

Jennifer's house is comfortable, spacious and graceful, the fully-equipped kitchen and beautiful garden are our favorite sections. Jennifer is very friendly, charming and she prepared many flesh foods for us, introduced us the information about supermarkets, restaurants and transportation. During our stay, we embarked on a ferry and enjoyed the landscape in the harbor district, then returned to the tranquil Balmain Village, which has become our important memory of Sydney.

This place is amazing in Manly. I have friends who live in the area and commented about how central this place was. Ziggy was great with check-in, the apartment itself was super nice and clean. I told Ziggy, the only thing is the pull out mattress is uncomfortable so if staying with more than 2 people, you might need a mattress pad. He said he was going to look into it. It really is a beautiful spot. Would stay again.
Great place with amazing view!

This apartment is a very nice good place to stay, its in a secure building, The apartment is spotless clean and very well maintained, very comfortable, kitchen is well prepared with stove, oven, fridge, microwave, coffeemaker, watercooker, dishwasser, enough pots and pans etc. Livingroom has a comfortable sofa, salon table, mega big TV with many channels, dining table with 6 chairs, extra lounger, two small balconies, one which has 2 chairs and a table. Bedroom with large bed, desk and big closet, bathroom with sink, shower and toilet. The host had many soaps, shampoos, drinks, coffee, wine and bottled water available for us to use, which was very kind and nice ( Im not sure if this is always there) The host replied always quick to any questions we had. We stayed 8 nights and we will return! Thanks Desiree and Julian!

This  place is absolutely stunning.  Anita was such a brilliant host. She greeted me and gave me a tour around the apartment and building facilities which made me comfortable staying here. The apartment was very clean and has amazing views of the beach. Recommend this property for anyone wanting to be closer to the beach be it a holiday or even a staycation!

Gail’s Guest House is a hidden gem in a beautiful garden setting. The space is brand new and was immaculately presented, with a lot of attention to detail. Gail and Kim were very accommodating and Gale baked fresh bread, which was a nice surprise. 
The location is great, close to the airport and only 5mins walk to some really nice beaches.
I would highly recommend this place for a weekend getaway or longer.

The most amazing host and home I have ever had the pleasure of visiting! We used Heidis lovely home for a film shoot and could not have found a more idillic location. 
The entire crew wanted throughout the day to jump in the pool and go for a swim it was that inviting.
Heidi is also the perfect host, nothing is too hard or can't be done, she even sourced another dining room table for us!

I would recommend Heidi and hour home to anyone who would listen. Now I want to go back and stay there with my family!
Great for a quick stop, friendly hosts & good walking to restaurants & beaches
Great location a few mins walk from the beach. Convenient for large groups. Communicative host with fast responses.

10/10
Thank you for your help
Perfect location, the bus to CBD is less than 5 min walk away. The place is clean and cozy. I would go back!

Upon disembarking the adorable wooden ferry on Dangar Island, the charm of the island operates… boat shacks and pontoons line the shore, houses hide away among the luxuriant greenery… We are met by wonderful Ann at the cafe, and while she takes us to the house telling us all about the island, we already feel looked after and start winding down. The heritage house, very well loved by the owners, is all at once comfortable/cosy, charming and full of wonders… some delicious like: fresh herbs, lemon/orange trees growing in the garden. The'Platypus" bedroom with its timber walls, vintage lacy mosquito net, clean bed linen & soft towels, made us feel very snug. Ann had even placed some fresh lavender stems on our pillows! We explored the island during the day, hanged at the beach… It felt like the time had stopped for a while. Then, coming back to the house, we were welcomed at night by Ann cooking up a FEAST, literally. She put so much thoughts into the menu and what would please us! The dinner with Ann and her husband was lovely and very much fun. Needless to say that we slept like babies. The next day morning brunch was another delicious meal served on the sunny balcony overlooking the vegetation and the river. We left shortly after and felt we could have stayed for a few more days of true pampering!
It is really a nice room,very good location

This place was in the perfect location - just steps from the Darling Harbor.  We enjoyed it very much.  Security at the building was a bonus and made us feel very comfortable.  Place is as described.  Thanks for having us!
Amazing location and very comfortable - bring some ear plugs though if you want to sleep - or have quite a few drinks like I did :)
Very comfortable cottage in fantastic location.  Everything you need for a relaxing beach holiday
This is my second visit with Daniel and Elena.  Great place and great value.  I recommend it to everyone.
Great location obliging host
perfect location! apartment manager could provide airport pick up and drop off service, charge reasonable price,  that is very convenient for international family tourists, very recommend!
Very comfortable bed, lovely bathroom. Krythia very welcoming.

I will keep my stay with in Sydney and in Bondi / Bronte in a very good memory and it also made a significant contribution to staying in a holiday apartment where I felt so much at home. Jenny welcomed me warmly and provided me with all kinds of useful information and was always available to answer my questions.
Thank you very much, Jenny!
Fantastic accommodation, very spacious bedroom, comfortable bed, clean bathroom, amenities close by, lovely neighbourhood, great hosts. I highly recommend.
very nice place  ! Ali and Maryam are super hosts and i  highly recommend their place!

I loved my stay at Jyoti and Uttam's place. They are a lovely couple and made every effort to make sure I had a pleasant and comfortable stay. The house is at a very nice and safe neighborhood. Room was very comfortable. I would definitely recommend anyone to stay there.

Great location especially if you are headed to a concert etc.  Fantastic cafe downstairs for breakfast and convenient store close by.  Amazing view from the balcony.  Would stay here again. Joseph was a great host and was quick to respond to my queries.
We had a great few days in Bondi. The house is gorgeous. Everyone was lovely and the location was fantastic.

Decoration is just like what shown in the pictures. View is great but the cleaning fee of $65 is too much given the cleanliness/condition of the flat. 

Parking is not straightforward. Recommend to check on the details with the host prior to arrival.
Paul's apartment is conveniently located. It is cosy and overlooks a small park. Paul is readily contactable and accommodating.
非常好,市中心,步行很方便,房东也很好

Susan was a fabulous hostess. She offered advice on many things to do and see in Sydney. We loved her place - it was private, charming and sparkling clean. The garden outside was beautiful. Lastly - we could walk to the beach!
Great place to stay in a really interesting suburb I wish I had more time to explore.....

Interesting Chinese home filled with eclectic art works and furniture. Kitchen available and juice milk etc provided. Reasonably close to city but check out whether trains actually running. Very comfortable room for three.

Thank for Lorraine give us free parking! You were patient waiting us late arrival. Sorry about this. The house looks like an art gallery full of artistic atmosphere. All of indoor equipment are historic and modern too. It was only a night for our staying that hadn't used the amazing kitchen. I hope I can visit the house again.
这座房子座落在一个很有历史感的安静的街区,附近都是维多利亚式建筑,建议对于澳洲近代历史感兴趣的人士前往入住,你可以看到房主的收藏以及日常使用的设施(例如家具或水龙头)都体现了近代澳洲殷实之家的生活特色｡买点小酒,饮品和甜品在这房子的餐室､泳池边或者套房里的阳台消磨几小时都是不错的选择

This house was so beautiful! The location was breath-taking and the house was a delight. The house plan is very well thought through, clean and homely. Our group loved the weekend away, would highly recommend. The host was also very accommodating :D
Thanks so much Ann for being such a perfect hostess - I loved your cooking and was inspired by your garden. Maree

First of all, the location was very nice.
(Walk 3-4 minutes from Green Square Station or bus stop)
The cleanliness of the room, living room, and bathroom were also very satisfactory.
There were washing machines and dryers, so it was convenient.
the check-in process was satisfactory.
Above all, Tim was very kind. 
If I visit Sydney again, I want to stay here.
Elise’s home is very close to the cutest eateries and not far from the main city at all. Couldn’t have chosen a better place to stay for New Years!
My stay at Karen's place went according to plan. Super A+ host and would gladly come back again!

We had a great stay at Michele’s place. The location was in a quiet area but just a couple of minutes walk to the centre of Newtown, which was lively and full of restaurants and bars. It was very easy to get in and out of the centre of Sydney on the train. The studio itself was very clean and had everything we needed for our stay. We wouldn’t hesitate to recommend staying here!

Nous avons passé nos 2 premières nuits à Sydney chez Wyatt, et nous ne le regrettons pas ! Discret et disponible, Wyatt respecte très bien les valeurs du Bed and Breakfast. Il a de plus été précieux dans ses conseils sur Sydney, les endroits à découvrir, ou sortir, les balades à faire, les bon restaurants etc... On peut dire que Wyatt a été notre guide touristique pendant notre séjour !

L'appartement est au pied des transports en commun, et tout proche des commerces. La chambre et l'appartement sont très agréables, et la petite terrasse donnant sur le jardin donne un coté rustique à cette maison de Sydney.

Vous le constaterez par vous même, on est très bien chez Wyatt !

Michy made as very welcome,the property was as we expected.
Every thing we needed was proved ( so clean ).
Location was great and Michy told us about great walks near by.
Although it may be classed as a back yard cabin it was cute comfortable and furnished with a romantic feel

Staying in this beautiful train carriage is one of the nicest Airbnb experiences I've ever had. Everything was delightful - from the wonderfully preserved vintage interiors, to the thoughtful modern upgrades, to the beautiful bush setting. Best of all was the kindness of the hosts - Margaret not only came to pick me up from the station, but also stocked the train carriage with simple, delicious supplies (sourdough bread, tomatoes, eggs, fresh basil etc) so I could make my own meals in the tiny kitchen. Other highlights include the hammock/day-bed which was perfect for reading in the sun, and the three gorgeous dogs who were endlessly playful and amusing. I would recommend this place to railway enthusiasts, vintage lovers, and anyone who wants to immerse themselves in nature. I hope to stay in this beautiful place again!

Bundeena base is a very special place, with it's pool and easy access to three different beaches. Hilde is clearly experienced from the hotel industry, and a very professional host, with an eye for detail, like the bathrobes and the welcome package. We felt so at home in this clean and impeccable apartment, we thought we might never want to leave.
A beautiful studio set in a gorgeous garden with all the little thoughtful touches needed to make a truly special stay. Thank you again.

I spent a wonderful week at this great apartment in Glebe in the heart of Sydney.  The apartment is very clean and tidy, very spacious and the host's niece made me very welcome. My large room had an extremely comfortable double bed and I slept soundly every night. There was plenty of storage and wardrobe space to hang my clothes. I had my own bathroom with a walk in shower that was amazingly hot and powerful.  There is WiFi throughout, a kitchen for cooking meals and a lovely lounge area to relax in and watch TV. The apartment itself is situated just off Glebe Point Road with at least 3 buses running directly to the city centre and beaches. Get an Opal card and use the buses which stop at the end of the road. The apartment was really quiet with no outside noise. The hosts were in contact throughout if I needed help or advice and provided travel books and handy tourist information that I used to get about. I loved the location best of all and would recommend walking three blocks down to the waters edge where there is a beautiful park  that is a hidden gem.
Perfect location! Mal's cafe and dining suggestions are spot on !
Huy's place is one of the best Airbnb experience I have had. The location is central, the host is super friendly, and the kids are adorable. I would highly recommend this place.

Best place in Bondi for stay and top host.
Will stay again.
Would stay again
Très bon appartement, cadre idéal. Bernadette et Fred sont des personnes formidables

Bernadette, Fred and Bilbo were great hosts, very welcoming and very helpful to try and make our stay as enjoyable as possible.  Malabar is quiet with almost a village atmosphere and the house is beautifully situated close to the beach, ocean pool, golf club and the beach cafe.  The accommodation was clean, comfortable and easy to access.  We very much enjoyed our stay and Bilbo (the dog) definitely won my daughter's hearts!  Thanks Bernadette and Fred!

Host was very attentive, quick and helpful with responses. Amenities were great and easy to access. Kitchen was underwhelming and fairly empty (cups, plates etc.). Overall a good and cost efficient stay.

I agree with positive things that were written in other reviews about the location, view from balcony (I was happy to see a friendly colorful bird visit), nice host with good communication skills and the wifi connection.  I also feel the bathroom should be remodeled.

This is an absolutely fantastic airbnb destination. The hosts are fantastic. The location is perfect. The actual apartment is REALLY nice  (much better than the photos let on) and spacious. 

We will definately be coming back. Neil & Jane are the best.
The host is very helpful with directions for getting to the city, and is very flexible with check in time.

This definitely falls into the 'must stay' category! Not only was the room and accommodation well above expectations, but the neighborhood is great and very good for walking around to enjoy everything including the opera house, botanical gardens, and great restaurants. Naveen and Tristan were perfect hosts and it was a real treat talking to them and sharing in a great dinner Naveen made.
Can't go wrong here

This was my first trip to Australia and I must say I couldn’t have asked for better hosts and location. 

Check in was seamless as I arrived early in the morning on Easter Sunday. 

They gave me tips on transportation and how to get around in the neighborhood. 

The room has a nice view of the park and bay across the street. 

They both are very easy to chat with and very open to answer any questions you may have. 

For being so far away from home, it definitely felt like a home away from home.

Great accommodation. Everything was clean and tidy. Shuang communicated well and the check in instructions were very clear and easy to follow. It was very easy to get to from the airport. I highly recommend and would stay again.

Highly recommended 11/10. Great location, comfortable and clean property with gracious hosts. One of our many highlights would be enjoying the spectacular sunsets overlooking the pool and bay while bbq’ing fresh fish and enjoying a glass of wine while our kids played in the garden. We hope to return soon!

Flying in from interstate, Marcella was flexible with arrival and departure times. House was very clean and in ideal location for beach and cafes. Felt very welcome with tea, coffee, cereal, milk etc.  Marcella supplied beach towels for us all on request.  All 9 of us really enjoyed our stay and would loved to have stayed much longer.
Very serviceable accomodation. Great area.
I just keep on coming back. Always a pleasure to stay. My favourite home away from home.

Just stayed there for 3 months! Had a really great time, the apartment has everything you need Jenny and Simon are just great! They helped me on everything I needed! This is the place to go, for sure!

Mags's apartment was spacious, tidy, and beautifully presented. Everything you need is there. Check-in & check-out & dealing with Mags was easy.

Location is perfect. The street is lovely & great for walking around. Breakfast place & shops just around the corner. Balmoral beach is a 30min. walk. 

I would stay here again & would highly recommend it to anyone.

다음날 일찍 비행기를 타야 해서 공항 근처에 하룻동안 예약한 숙소였는데 가격은 제가 묵었던 다른 에어비앤비와 비교해 조금 높았지만 그만큼 값어치를 하는 숙소였어요! 공항까지 캐리어 들고 걷는건 좀 부담스러워서 기차로 이동했는데 아침 9시 비행기여서 6시 남짓에 이동했음에도 불구하고 공항까지 가는 기차가 운행해서 너무 좋았구요! 주로 중국인들이 많이 거주하는 아파트 지역에 위치한 조용한 주택인데 집 자체도 너무 예쁘고 에어비앤비용 숙소도 정말 깨끗하고 잘 관리해놓으신것 같아 편안하게 묵을 수 있었습니다! 제가 묵은 에어비앤비중에 방도 가장 넓고 시설도 정말 좋았어요. 방, 화장실, 공용공간 등 모든게 완벽하게 구비되어 있었고 콘센트, 샤워기, 냉장고, TV까지 사소한것들을 잘 제공해주신 것 또한 큰 배려심을 느꼈습니다. 시내까지 접근하기는 조금 부적당한 위치이지만 공항 근처에 숙소 잡으실 일이 있으면 꼭 이 곳을 추천드립니다!!

Perfect location to approach Airport and it was a best place between my Airbnbs in Sydney. All furnitures were well-prepared and clean. I think the host is always very careful about his airbnb. Highly recommended!

Hands down one of the nicest places i've ever stayed in. Beautifully perched up on the hill it gives an amazing view out to pittwater & across to palm beach. The interior is chic & understated with a perfect combination of beach retreat & stylish home. The house is nestled in the bush with frangipani trees everywhere & plenty of ample space to relax or entertain guests. I'll be back for sure!
fantastic place. thanks so much
We had a fantastic time at luke and paul's. The apartment is very clean and well located, in a very vibrant area a short walk away from the rocks. It's stylish but cozy, it felt like being at home!

Emma is a wonderful host. The house and area were great - a perfect place to stay for a family. Upon arrival, Emma welcomed us into her home and made sure that we had everything we needed. After a very long flight from Europe, we were grateful and soon found (with three children) that we couldn't have made a better choice. 
The house was very comfortable. Whilst we had a car, it would have all worked fairly well without one too. Having had several airbnb experiences to date, this by far was one of the best!
Thank you for hosting me for yet another week :-)
This was our first airBNB booking, so we weren't really sure what to expect. We were very pleased. The room was good. Craige made us very welcome and explained the setup very well.
Great location and value! Much recommended to everyone traveling in Sydney. Max is a great host.
Fei夫妻俩非常的好客,准备了早餐的食材给我们,新鲜的水果任吃,厨房的用具和调料都很齐,方便我们自己做早餐,晚餐｡而且房子的位置也不错哦,步行几分钟就能到达petersham train station,出行也很方便｡但因为我们在悉尼的时间太赶了,所以没能好好的参观Fei的大房子!的确是很特别的一次入住体验!
Great little apartment. Super convenient.

Staying with Mike is like staying with an old friend, very easy to communicate and to live with. It is the first time I share a place with somebody and it was very pleasant, thanks to Mike. Actually he is never home, you will miss him! Great location, very easy to reach the city or the train station in Kings Cross. Highly recommended.
Great house and location really close to the beach and walking distance to the shops and cafes. Rob was a great host.

You can expect a modern comfortable apartment under the hosts home. The apartment is in a quiet street in leafy Mt Colah.
Well supplied with linen, utensils and cutlery. 
The hosts are always available but are happy to leave guests alone if that’s your preference.
Enjoyed my stay!
Great studio apartment in central location near public transport in Sydney. Sparkling clean on arrival and thoughtful touches.

Me and my boyfriend stayed for 3 nights in the Bronte studio and absolutely loved it! The self-contained studio is at the back of the main house in the beautiful garden and Susan has really thought of everything you could possibly need. Susan and Greg were lovely hosts with lots of helpful advice and information about the local area (we loved Clovelly Bowls Club situated on top of a cliff where you can visit as a guest for a few very reasonably priced drinks). The neighbourhood is beautiful, with some nice local eateries where we had one of the best (and cheapest) steaks we've ever had at Eugene's! Bronte beach is only a 10 minute walk away, and other beaches (including Bondi) can be reached via a gorgeous coastal walkway. Sydney city centre is easily accessible via the local bus stop at the end of the street. We would love to return and stay with Susan and Greg again, and cannot recommend their beautiful studio enough! Thanks again :).
Very clean, good position and responses are swift. Very helpful host.

1.房間無對外窗有點悶熱,跟房東借電風扇有所改善,但夏季可能會非常熱
2.有天窗可以引進自然光,因此白天光線很好,當然也不可能睡太晚｡
3.因為直接睡在房東原本的房間,因此房東會睡在客廳的沙發,所謂會提供的洗衣機等配備都不方便使用,連晚上上廁所都要擔心吵到房東｡
4.wifi連線很順暢
5.住宿的幾天附近都有人在施工,因此有點吵｡
6.餐廳有貓飼料等,因此有蠻明顯的貓味道｡
7.距離paddington Saturday market很近
8.房間衣櫃不能使用,且空間小,行李箱一打開就沒有空間可行走
9.有蟑螂

Great place. Great host. Place was clean and spot on with its description. Great communication with Jennifer. It was my first time to use AirBnb, got lots of questions and Jennifer was always there to assist. A+++++++!!!!

Had a great stay at this place, hosts very friendly as the place was spacious and comfortable, Tessa also baked some great cakes and had fruit and juice and other food/snacks ready to go! Will be back

Simones place was very well maintained and clean. It was perfect for our young family and the kids loved the place. Simones place was so close to the local shops and beach which made staying there very convenient.
Very helpful and warm-hearted hosts. Very good journey in Sydney with the perfect accommodation they have provided.

Great if you don’t like the city but still want to be super close to shops and things to do. As mentioned you can hear some footsteps from the home above however Sam and everyone that lived there were courteous and there was no extreme noise or anything like that. I’d stay again!

Great location and is a short walk to North Avalon Beach. The space itself was exquisite and everything catered for. Angela is an amazing host and very accomodating. We would not hesitate staying again or recommending to our friends
Very clean and nice accommodation. Convenient location to the airport and Wolli Creek train station. Would highly recommend!
Had a lovely 2 night stay at Cathy’s flat, warm, clean with everything and more that we needed. Thanks
Good place to stay if you’re looking for one near the city.

Perfect place to explore Bundeena! Belinda met us on arrival to give us the run down of the place, which was  pleasant, private and fully equipped for a weekend away. Minutes walk from the beach, we were able to easily explore the aboriginal rock carvings. The local IGA was open till 8pm every night for our food needs too.

Wow! Talk about a super host... It only begins to describe Andi's hospitality.

From the minute I arrived she made me feel like I belonged. The apartment has everything you would ever need plus plus plus!

A 2 minute walk to the beach... 5 minute walk to some fabulous cafes and restaurants... you couldn't get more central.

The bed was one of the most comfortable beds I have ever slept in and the pillows were great!  I could just have easily stayed in bed all weekend if the weather wasn't so lovely.

I will definitely be back!
