Nice place. Great host. Terrific location. Near what remains of Sydney nightlife as well as great places to dine out and breakfast.

Gavin's apartment is located in the heart of the city, not far from the Central station, at the same time the street is very quiet and peaceful.
The apartment is very clean, well-organized and balanced. We had a feeling that we were at our own home (also we cannot forget the incredibly delicious ice cream - Gavin certainly knows the simple pleasures of life and doesn't mind sharing them with the guests).
The guest bedroom is quite spacious and comfortable, with pillows of 2 different heights to choose from (not a frequent option in B&Bs).
Gavin is a nice person, and knows a lot about his country and city. His travel suggestions for our further trip in Australia have helped us a lot.
Very good place, excellent host.

We just spent a weekend at this wonderful home! Lovely presented 3 bedroom home with amble room for added comfort! Comfy beds fantastic outdoor area which included a  grassed area and a wonderful in ground pool! We couldn't have asked for a better location or home highly recommend this central home!

Hugo was a great host, very flexible with check-out and readily available by text to answer questions.  The apartment location is ideal for exploring the entire city; it's an easy walk to shopping, the ferries at circular quay, the opera house, the botanic garden as well as to great restaurants in CBD/Hyde Park as well as Surry Hills.
Beautiful home, cute little room perfect for resting your head for the night while traveling. Only $8 Uber ride from here to the airport.

Linda's apartment is cosy but very comfortable. She really thought of everything. She is always reachable and helpful.
I can only recommend her.
Would definitely stay here again it was lovely and clean and close to everything we needed. The beds are comfortable and the view is amazing. Joseph was very accommodating and friendly. Great place!

This apartment was in an excellent location for what we needed. The space was stylish, modern and clean. I loved the attention to detail, including chemical free soaps, shampoos etc. Communication was easy and Oliver was a great host. Thank you!
A really interesting period apartment.
Perfect studio apartment in Pyrmont in Sydney. A short walk from the CBD and the fish market. Very clean and comfortable. One queen/full bed and one sofa bed that sleeps two.

The bathroom and toilet are all dirty and the carpet smells old. The house was old as a whole and the rusty tables and chairs were seen first.
Our family arrived at this place and booked another place in 5 minutes. It's too low a quality for the price.

I'm a regular visitor to Sydney and a regular at Hugo's, too.  It's one of the first places I look up when I'm planning a trip.  
This time full marks for bending over backwards to help me check in conveniently.
Easy checkin, and great communication from Paul.   Cute apartment in a great location.  Only letdown was the place needed a solid clean.
Ideal location and lovely host who kept us fully informed
Lovely clean and quiet little space. Michele's communication was excellent. Would love to stay again.

A fabulous property with a fabulous host.

This is a great place in a great part of a great city. Jeremy really is a generous and considerate host who goes out of his way to make available a beautiful and comfortable home.

We really couldn't recommend more highly.
El departamento es tal cual se ve, muy bien ubicado y Jarmo es un gran anfitrion. Muy recomendable
great experience!

I only stayed at Michele's for one night but I'll definitely be back next time that I'm in Sydney! The accomodation was perfect, so close to the main streets of Newtown and public transport whilst also being secluded enough that I was able to relax and wind down during the night. The room had everything I could have asked for and even felt like my own little hotel suite. Michele was nothing but accomodating throughout my entire stay and I'd definitely recommend staying here to anybody thinking about it.
Stress free check in. Excellent communication. Wonderful space. Definitely 5 star!
Paul was very helpful and his place is in a great location, perfect for exploring Manly and Sydney.
Great central location would stay again
Always feel home when I stay with Tota’s family
Lovely get away!

Great place to stay 
Affordable 
Quite
Cute little place with everything you need for a short stay over.  Apple TV and all
Great place and location is convenient.
This is a fantastic place to stay! There was lots of room and it has a fantastic location. The view from the balcony is also fabulous and a perfect place to hang out on a warm night.

Victoria's apartment is in a great location. We enjoyed the Saturday market followed by a nice walk to the Royal Botanic Gardens and harbor.  Dinner downstairs at Billy Kwong was delicious. Victoria is quick to respond to questions and provides helpful suggestions for exploring the neighborhood.
Loved the place! Amazing location! Had a lovely time here, and Philip was a great host.

The apartment was very clean and the Organisation between the other guests was good. The location it’s a little bit to far from the CBD. The train station was out of order for the time and we should take all the time the bus. The station for the bus was close to the apartment.
很不错的小房间,干净整洁,不小心反锁了,房东夜里过来给我开门,很感动
Listing as described. Walking distance to public transport and some really nice restaurants.

Jenny's apartment is the perfect place to have everything you need while getting to know Sydney. It is close to public transport which makes everything easier, but it is also close to the city so if your in the mood to walk it would be perfect! Communication was great and Jenny is a very nice host! Made my stay really good.

had a great stay t Pauls apartment. Very close to the Corso and the Wharf.  very clean, plenty of towels, pillows etc    great seperate lounge room  very quiet street and just perfect for a week away in Manly
Kath was a great host, everything was well prepared when we arrived.
Clean stylish place in a great location. Neil was an excellent host throughout  the stay. I will definitely be back. Thanks Neil.
Clean and really stylish places! Wendy is being so helpful through out our journey with quick response!
Amazing house, it has everything you need and a great location.

Great location, near to Rail station and with plenty of shops and cafes.    The shared area in the block is very dilapidated, but Paul’s apartment is stylish and well appointed.   Arrangements for arrival were perfect.   Yes, the road is a little noisy, but it didn’t stop me sleeping.   The flat had everything I needed for a week in Sydney.  Thank you.

We enjoyed our four night stay, thanks to Pamela and Hugo, having everything we needed and of course we loved the great views and location. Check-in was easy due to Hugo’s clear instructions. Yes there’s some traffic noise being mid-city but earplugs at night helped and it didn’t worry us much at all. We would stay again. Highly recommended.

This place is pretty awesome. It is pretty close to anything you would really need. Within about a 1.5 mile radius (35 min walk) we could really get to any part of town of interest, and anything else uber is always convenient. The place is small and cozy, nothing more you need for your stay. The TV is a smart TV with the youtube app which (we didnt realize till after staying in our other airbnb's without it) was awesome! 

The only thing is, the bed and the couch kind of sunk in. So we ended up sleeping on the ground. Which honestly isnt bad at all, and made my back feel muuuch better the next day. Honestly didnt detract from the experience at all.

Thank you Tam, Your room was just as described, I flew in Early and responded right away to my sms about the key location and he made it a hassle free situation. 
Great location for my needs this time in Sydney, walking distance to various neighbourhoods and the city, I didn't need to get one cab in the 3 days there. 
Thanks for a hassle free stay, will look you up again on my next business trip to Sydney.
This house is fantastic, run to it!!

This is a gem, and we will most definitely return in future. Not the cheapest accomodation by a long shot, but considering the class and character of the reconditioned railway carriage (actually suprisingly spacious, except for the kitchenette), the beautiful forest location - its a good deal. Margaret and her husband is a friendly and engaging couple, provided quality breakfast ingredients and just took great care of us. We particularly enjoyed inviting 9 people over and entertaining them at the pavillion !

i really enjoyed 4 nights in Sydney and in Hugo's apt! Fantastic view through window that we can see sea and Hyde Park and Sydney Tower. Hugo is very kind who answered our message even in the evening. The apt has a really good location, 200m from Town Hall, 100m from Woolworths and Chemist Warehouse, just in the very Sydney CBD. We walked to anywhere. Thank you Hugo and if I have another journey to Sydney, I will first choose your comfortable apt to sleep.
As always, a great stay at Don's beautiful apartment.

Amelia and myself had a lovely stay with Duncan and Ashlee. Their place is conveniently located 1 bus stop away from Sydney CBD. They were both welcoming and accommodating and we would definitely recommend  them to future guests.

I was thoroughly disappointed in this apartment, on arrival we were told we had been moved to a different room. 
The Room we received had no view, no oven, no dryer, the bathroom was disgusting and had to be cleaned by us on arrival.
The walls were covered in marks, we paid for a queen bed, sofa bed and a single bed, however we recieved a double and two singles. 
The Room key didn't even have the correct room number on it, the fridge had milk stains and none of the cutlery matched..
The wine in the room was a nice touch and it was in a great location..
Andrew's apartment is very nice and close to everything!
this place is in an excellent location.

Belinda and her husband were both very kind and helpful, they were informative but gave us space and privacy too. The property was clean, well equipped with quality towels and linen, kitchen had everything we needed (BBQ was great) and had a nice little supply of pantry items. It was perfect for a relaxing getaway! Had a fantastic time many thanks :)

Staying with Terry was really quite nice. I stayed 12 days and I highly recommend it. The location is really nice. There's a park nearby and it isn't hard to get to any places. The building is a high rise apartment and the view is really nice - as is the comfortable bed and bathroom to yourself. Terry is flexible with check-ins and helped me with my luggage. I loved it!
Paul was very helpful and response my questions quickly. His apartment is clean and tidy. We had good time at his place.

We had a wonderful time at Susan's. She was really welcoming. It was one of our best AirBNB experiences so far. The included breakfast is a hit, always fresh fruits, nuts and cereals. We would definitely recommend Susan.

Mohit was a wonderful host.  Met us personally to show us the place and give us the key.  Everything was great, and close to the airport which is what we were looking for.  A couple of good places to eat within walking distance was perfect for our one night stay.

We really enjoyed our stay at Daniel & Elena 's ! the house is really great, with everything you could need, the room is perfect and the bathroom as well ! Close to the train station to the city and the airport
We really recommend this place
Comfortable and lovely home. Flexible time to check in and out.
Very tidy apartment in one of the suburbs of Sydney. I will come back!
Great location and apartment. Has everything you need
A lovely clean place to stay with a wonderful host.

Carole and her husband are welcoming and have a plethora of knowledge about Sydney that they are eager to share with their guests! The bedroom is comfy and that bathroom is luxurious. Highly recommended.

From the first contact with Wayne and Kate my first experience using AirBNB has been fabulous! Their regular and thoughtful communication was perfect and we were so excited to stay at their beautiful apartment overlooking Tamarama Beach. We arrived to find cold bubbles in the fridge, a block of chocolate and a 'house and area manual' to assist use with everything we needed to know during our stay. The apartment was perfect! Great size for a larger group and it was so nice to have the home comforts right at our fingertips. I cannot recommend this experience enough and look forward to staying at Wayne and Kate's apartment again in the near future!
Great bolt hole in the inner west. We'd stay again.
Great location, very clean, good check in. Thx b much

We stayed here for several weeks during a gap between leases. This is a lovely quiet apartment situated close to public transport (buses and ferries) connecting you to the city. The apartment was clean and spacious with all mod cons available. Julia was excellent to deal with, and was very responsive to any queries that we had.

I'd recommend this apartment to anyone looking to stay in Sydney.
le logement est parfait,très propre bien situé dans un très beau quartier. Paul était là pour nous accueillir et repondre à  nos questions .Une petite plaque de cuisson serait un plus pour cuisiner .

Omio is so awesome! His place is super modern with great view of all of downtown Sydney. The location at Bondi Junction was so convenient to get to so many fun things to do, and he recommended stuff to do that was more of local areas, not just the touristy stuff. I loved the flexibility in checking in, as it was easy to work with him when arriving at our 6am flight, and he even made us coffee and offered us beer! By far one of our favorite places we've ever stayed :)

Staying at the mansion was really interesting.  It is like it says, a historic mansion in the heart of Petersham.  The building has lots of strange quirks that are reflective of it's history.  Fei and his family and guests were hospitable and really made their house available to us.

A great little place in a great location. Didn’t see the hosts much as was out exploring all day, but they were most helpful on check in and through email. The welcome from the cats was an added bonus. I would say that if the plane noise would really be an issue for you, this isn’t ideal, but thanks to the accurate description we went into this well aware of it and it wasn’t bothersome. 

Overall, a great stay in a lovely cabin in a very convenient location.
Great , very Nice people , all shop in padstow , 30 minutes to cbd
Thank you so much Evan, you were an excellent host, always helpful and quick to reply, your apartment is wonderful (facilities and location)!
Great location near the train station.
Great location, close to beach, restaurants, Rose and Watson Bay.  Cat was very responsive and helpful.  Great local cafe less than 100 metres walk on the corner.

Could not ask for a better location. Right on the water, cafe next door, parking and 10 minute walk to Manly Corso and ferry. 
Rod’s hospitality was fabulous. The room itself is nothing flash, but great value for money and has everything you need. 
Will definitely be back!
Great place! Beautiful apartment and close to most things (walking distance & close to public transport). Victoria was very helpful and friendly!

Andy's place is really lovely, check-in was simple and is a good proximity to Sydney CBD an as well as some lovely bay walks. Housemates are super welcoming and the kitchen is equipped with basic necessities to cook in the kitchen. The room is a little bit warm in the summer due to being on the top floor but Andy has provided a fan. The room was very clean and spacious with comfy pillows and nice bedding. Highly recommend!

Awesome apartment, location and host. Can’t recommend highly enough, and we will definitely be back. The home has been furnished with much love and the extra touches are so appreciated and go above and beyond 
Easily one of the best bnb we have enjoyed! Thanks Jenny
Super comfy bed and lovely linen. Very clean with everything you need. Great location.
The apartment is great, very spacious, comfortable and in a great location for tourism or business.

The apartment is in an amazing location with great views over Bondi. It was the perfect pad for my parents to stay in while visiting from the UK and they would love to sta there again. Mal was really responsive to all of our questions and great to deal with. Thanks Mal!
Wonderful hosts, thoughtful and nice place with great location. Will stay again next time
The room was nicely maintained and designed. All the required household were present which made our stay comfortable. Thanks.
Fantastic centrally located apartment. Hosts takes a lot of pride in their accommodation. Loved it!

Na's  place was convenient for our visit in Sydney and very comfortable. She was super accommodating and helpful. Parking was no problem.  Communication was absolutely outstanding as Na is a very responsive host.  Plenty of towels are provided, lovely soaps and shampoo.  I would definitely visit again!

Nice, tidy, comfortable place for stopping. Friendly householders.
The fastest respond for request!
Great stay, spotless clean, comfy bed you don’t wanna get out of. Great privacy tv in the room for you to enjoy in the evening while relaxing.
Host make access to the property simple. Spacious room & communal lounge. Off street parking was a big bonus. Thank you Miss D. Lyn

I didn't meet Natasa but she sent me comprehensive messages about her house & how to access it, my room and the other guests.  As a result my stay went smoothly and comfortably.

The guest room in which I stayed was large & comfortable, with a large window that made the room bright & airy.  There was some aircraft noise but not sufficient to disturb me.

The other rooms of the house that I used, the bathroom & kitchen, were also comfortable with appliances working smoothly.

The house is conveniently located close to the railway station, with a pub opposite & a good cafe 5 minutes walk around the block.

I would heartily recommend Natasa's house.

Susan’s garden studio was lovely and spacious with a good size bathroom. Susan was friendly and helpful and really went the extra mile to make our stay pleasant. Excellent transport links into Sydney city centre, very easy to get in and out of the centre.
Louise is such a nice host. She answered my every single question patiently and gave us thorough instructions. She's really thoughtful and she prepares everything that you can think of in the house.
Best host! So lovely! And the house was perfect and very close to the beach ...
Clean accommodation with great value!
Super charming little house mere steps from Redfern Sta. Lilian and her housemates are great hosts who made me feel very welcome. Highly recommended.

Shuang’s place is very convenient for international travellers as it is only a casual 20 minute walk to the Sydney International terminal and an easy walk from Wolli Creek train station with our luggage to get to .There were food shops close and we would definitely stay again when travelling overseas.

Lovely clean and well presented accommodation. Not quite as private as the pictures depict. Children running in courtyard outside bedroom. Lack of air conditioning in Sydney summer heat was a big negative. A very large house fully booked made it quite noisy.
Great location and facilities, short walk everywhere. Lift a bonus. Would stay again
Nice and clean!
Had a pleasant stay at this apartment. Did not get to meet Annie personally but she was easily contactable and was very helpful with any questions or enquiries. Overall a good experience.

Perfect for my overnight stay close to work, and free parking along the street!
Very polite and respectful.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Beautiful and modern decor and we felt very at home. We loved how personalised they made they experience (instead of just stating 'dear guest') and suggested local cafes and restaurants to try. Great location with public transport a short distance away.

Nicole's place was wonderful - we were in Sydney for a conference and coming home to the apartment was perfect! Comfortable, clean, modern, spacious & a great view! Will definitely be staying here again :)
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Evelyn’s apartment - in addition to having its own pool and incredible view - is a short walk from a gentle and quiet sea pool and an organic cafe. We spent a lovely few days in a very picturesque location...

The stay at David’s Place was perfect.  David met us on the street and stored our luggage before check in because we arrived early before check in time.  He also briefed us on the apartment and how to get around the area, and gave us the keys.  We had lunch right across the street while we waited for check in.  His apartment couldn’t have been more enjoyable, and convenient.

Sabrina was responsive to our questions and very helpful when we met; tea, coffee and milk had been made available on our arrival which was a really nice touch
We arrived by car and they have a private parking bay underneath the apartments which was invaluable and made things so easy 
This is a great location and the description of the apartment and amenities are very accurate and of high quality and we could not fault anything
When next in Sydney I will look to see if this apartment is available as a first choice
Good Location. Fair price. Full of amenities and facilities. The place is clean and well furnished with style. Check in and check out is easy. Would definitely stay here again for next Sydney trip
Nice bedroom and bathroom.
Fabulous location. Great room. Will definitely be back.
Kristin and Nichola’s place was such a lovely space. Thoughtfully designed, stylish and a great location. Communication was great. Would definitely stay again and would recommend to friends.
Nice n cosy house. Near to shops, near to city. Good stay!
Warm friendly hosts. Made us feel very welcome. Room was very nice and comfortable. Not too far to walk to the city.
happy

Suzie was a great host and she gave great advice on a quick tour around the local area on my arrival. Although she went to work on the day I was leaving she managed to accommodate a reasonable check-out time for which I was grateful for. 

The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures. There are a number of ornaments, paintings, books etc which add character to the place. The bed was comfortable and spacious with plenty of closet space. Although not an en-suite the private toilet/shower was also very clean and large with toiletries provided. There is a decent balcony area and large lounge/dining section, though I spent most of my time in my room so cannot really comment on this. As mentioned elsewhere, the bedroom is close to a busy highway and so traffic can be heard when the window is left open, and also a little noise can be heard at night when the window is shut...but I managed to sleep through this without an issue.

The apartment is in Darling Harbour and a few minutes from the ferry stop which can be used to get good views of the Harbour Bridge/Opera House. There are many restaurants/bars/clubs a short walk from the apartment and the main city centre where all the shops are is about a 10-15 minute walk away. After visiting Sydney I personally thought that Darling Harbour was the best location to stay in and would not hesitate to recommend  Suzie's apartment to anyone!

Mitul

We had a wonderful stay at Ziggy’s place! Everything was spotless and Ziggy has thought of everything.

The bed was super comfortable, the appliances and furnishings were modern and every other mod con was accounted for - even a blender <3 

We already knew the pool and hot tub weren’t the star of the show, but that’s a-okay, because you are a stone’s throw from the refreshing and exciting Manly Beach!

We were really sad to be leaving and hope to be back soon
Clean place. Great location, very near to airport. It was exactly what I needed for my stay. Host communicated well and I found a street parking spot almost immediately.

This was my third stay with Krythia.  She is an easy
and very helpful host.  Highly recommend.

A very cosy place and Cedric was really helpful when we needed him. 
The place is perfect for 2 people and very clean. 
I will suggest this place for next time....
Great location, great value for 2 bedrooms in the city
Hernan 's place is perfect ! Room and flat clean and very cute ! Hernan is very friendly and helpfully ! I recommended it absolutely !

The massage chair is one of sydney's hidden gems. We had a great time at Min's apartment - Great location, easy access to transport, food, and attractions. Would definitely recommend for your next stay!
We had a great time in Sydney staying at Vickie's lovely flat. The location was perfect, the flat was well furnished, and Vickie gave us a great welcome. Thanks for letting us stay.

The sheet is kind of old and holes on it, so If you’re a highly required person, it’s not a place for you. But the place is near central and got everything you need in the area, near bus stops and train stations.
A comfortable apartment

We really enjoyed staying here! Easy to find, super close to the shops and a great location! The place was very clean, homely, beautifully decorated and very comfortable. 

Miss D made it very efficient and was very friendly when we planned to stay the night. We will definitely be booking again! Thanks so much :)
Beautiful, modern space. All the amenities we needed. Very nice balcony for sitting outside.

Susan was very lovely. She is a good host! The room was nice but it always smells very bad.. When we opened the Windows the Amts were going everywhere! Thats why we opened to Windows  rarely.. But we had Amts anyway.
Was very considerate in hard circumstances
Good cost value
Millie's place is perfect for a stay in Sydney.  We walked to Ferry's loved the restaurants in KIRRIBILLI,  really enjoyed our short stay.
Schönes Doppelzimmer, saubere Wohnung. Gastgeber gibt sich große Mühe mit der Wegbeschreibung. Allerdings ist der Verkehrslärm ziemlich laut und die Lage nicht gerade zentral.
Simple apartment with everything you need.

This cosy unit is suitable for 2 people, 3 at a pinch. It is clean, comfortable and close to Circular Quay.
We didn't cook in the kitchen, only prepared cereal for b'fast, and made tea and coffee.
Being winter, we made use of the convection heater when we returned from an evening outing.
The bed was very comfortable,  and the bathroom quite modern and sufficient.

It was an absolutely great stay; Mohit was super quick to book us in which was a God send and really helpful in getting us settled in, answering our queries within minutes. Being close to public transport & in a quiet location it was perfect, the space was super nice and modern but above all clean and accurate to the photos. I couldn't recommend it more highly :)

Suzie's apartment was a great stay! Everything was clean and the bed was comfortable. There is some noise at night from the road but it wasn't a problem for me. She has ear plugs if you are noise sensitive. Her place is a great location to explore the city by foot, ferry, or bus. Suzie was a reliable communicator and even let me check in early due to my flight arriving in the morning. She was very knowledgable about the area and answered any questions I had.
Beautiful place in a beautiful part of the northern beaches. Richard went out of his way to assist with everything.

This place is a gem. Maria is super friendly and generous with her time and pantry supplies. The water really is that close!! The location spectacular to look at and snorkel or just chill out with a coffee on the walkway. The room is very spacious and the window seat just makes you want to connect with your inner cat. We had an amazing time and can't wait to plan another trip to Sydney.

We had an extremely comfortable stay at Jared’s. The hip apartment is spacious for 2 and we particularly liked the pull-out sofa that became a comfy day bed after a long day of walking around. The area is right across CBD, well connected but still pretty quiet. Great bedding in the master room and overall super clean and well-maintained, with all amenities provided. Gabbie, our point of contact, was always reachable and very helpful and friendly. It was all the little touches like a personal note, a coffee machine, indoor plants and soft rugs that made it a homely experience. Thank you!

Wonderful place! Very clean and comfortable. Easy communication and check in. The amenities were very thoughtful. Grateful for a hairdryer! And lovely breakfast :) 

Cathy's place is about 15 mins walk to Avalon town centre and beach, which is beautiful!

We would highly recommend staying here. Thank you!

The studio was beautifully set up and very comfortable.  Susan and Greg were very accommodating and looked after me really well.  The neighourhood was in a great location, close to the beach, shops and public transport. I would return in a heartbeat!
Kath is a nice guy ~ She provide nice breakfast. She have a dog , so cute ~ The room is very comfortable~
Great room at a great price!

The unit was very easy to find in a lovely part of Mosman. Mags gave great instructions, always got back to us very quickly answering any questions that we had. Her place was true to the photos, it was very cute, clean and tidy and felt quite secluded. It was exactly what we were after and everything we needed was provided. We were in Mosman attending a  wedding at Gunners Barracks, so we were very close to the venue. The unit is walking distance from lovely cafes on Avenue Road and we had a fantastic meal at Radio Cairo in Cremorne. The ferry is also walking distance but it is a bit of a hike up the hill, but great views on the way! All in all a very positive experience and very good value for money for accommodation in Sydney!

Franca & Alessio,

My friends and I stay at Sydney for 8 nights in your apartment. The location is very convenient. We can visit any places in a very short time. Your place is very fancy and comfortable.
We would like to stay at your place next time if we come back to Sydney again!
Thank you so much!

Pan

Best location, the apartment was lovely and super close to the beach, shops and restaurants. Would recommend  Gwen's apartment to anyone and everyone that's wanting to go somewhere funky and fun! Gwen was super helpful with places to go, things to do and with questions and communication was great. Thanks Gwen for the best weekend!
Good spot

The location of this apartment cannot be beat - if you are looking for a central place to base out of for touring Sydney's beautiful attractions, I highly recommend this location. The responsiveness of the hostess, Chloe, was terrific! All and all, a very pleasant experience.
Great location. Very helpful and communicative hosts.
lovely place.

Had an excellent weekend in Belinda's garden studio. The room is very cosy and clean and Belinda has cleary gone to great length to ensure that all the little things you'd want are there. I hope to stay here again.
Localisation exceptionnelle, parfait pour famille avec deux enfants, seul bémol, bruyant la nuit car travaux sur rue adjacente.
Very close to the airport, nice clear accommodations...and Angela is a wonderful hostess!

Great place, great location, great host! 
The place was incredibly comfortable and very well positioned to get to beaches! The host was helpful with any questions and really quick to reply. Would stay again in a heart beat!
Michele was very quick to respond to enquiry, nice clean room in a quiet street, only stayed one night but would be a great place to stay for a longer trip
Great location , nice view !
Great location within 10 minutes walk of family in Bella Vista.  Ali was extremely helpful.
This place is amazing ! Perfect location, lovely apartment with everything you need. Communication with Kasey is very easy ! I strongly recommend

We had such a wonderful time at this beautiful Bondi home. It is clean, bright, stylish and perfectly located close to great restaurants, cafes, shops and of course- Bondi beach. It was so hard to leave as it felt like home! 
We will be back!

Anita, your hospitality and your apartment were beyond our expectations of what an Airbnb could be. Every day, we discovered new things tucked away in drawers that made our stay so easy and feel like a home away from home. Whether it was fresh water in the fridge when we arrived or the sun screen, goggles, moisturiser, short bread cookies, olive oil, instant cappuccino (and the list goes on...), we had more than we needed. 

Not to mention the view and the light. I'm not sure we can stay anywhere else in Bondi without thinking of your home. Thank you again for your warmth! We look forward to staying in your apartment again -- and recommending it to our friends.
We had a great time at Hugo's place. The apartment is central and has everything you need. The communication with Hugo was perfect. Would def go back!
Nicoles place was nice and roomy - lots of seating and even a little desk. Views were great - can get hot if you don't turn on the a/c or open the windows. Great location and very comfy beds

Thanks Tiger! Your place was just great for what I needed - spotlessly clean, the bed the height of comfort and the location near the airport excellent. Your communication and welcome made me feel very at home! This was a really great stay.
 I suggest using the bus to and from airport. It's quicker, cheaper (A$2.10 and avoids the unjust cost of the train (A$9.20 to travel 2 stations!). The bus is about 100 metres away.

The house was big and spacious enough to accommodate the 7 of us! Furnitures are a bit old, but the location of the house was quite centralized. It is 10-15mins walk from King's Cross station. Overall, we had a wonderful stay there and Jeremy has been very helpful in answering our enquiries.
Wonderful apartment, great location @ Olympic Park, easy access, great views & thoughtful extras. Will make your Sydney stay memorable

The apartment exceeded our expectation with its view and its modernity, its within walking distance from central station, Chinatown, 10mins walk to Pyrmont bay, and tram stop to fish market. The host replies rather quickly to any request or simply any questions. Most housing appliances were provided. Highly recommended

We absolutely love Bronte B&B!!!
We couldn't have found a better place to stay, hidden in Susan and Gregs lovely green garden, you feel very private. You have an area of the garden to your self. The studio have all your need for a perfect stay. The soap is lovely (Susan helped us buy some, to take home). The beakfast all organic, lovely mangos, avocado, lovely bread, everyting tasted amazinig. The area has some nice restaurants and coffee shops, bronte beach is lovely to.
You will use a bit of time in public transportation going to Bondi junction. to connect with the train and other busses. You can do amazing walks close to the ocean, and make sure to go to Coogee Beach too.
Susan was a lovely host and took very good care of us and was very helpfull, very easy to communicate with. This is such a lovely place stay and we couldn't have hoped for any better. We hope will have the opportunuty to go back.
Anders & Christina, Copenhagen, DK
Nice and clean, great location.
A neat and clean place in a great location
Peaceful, spotless and close to everything

Great host, great time!! We really enjoyed our stay in Petersham, we discovered Sydney by train and bus - erverything close by. Kerry gave us a lot of brilliant tips and made us feeling like home. Thanks for everything, looking foreward to see you again, Thomas and Margarteha from Germany

So lovely to wake up to water views and a sense of space. Fred & Bernadette took the time to provide lots of little items that really made the accomodation feel like a mates home where you drop by - just bring your clothes and relax. 

Mum (77) found her bed so comfortable she slept through which she doesn't at home. Our hosts were very polite, always responsive in a timely way.

We wish we had more time to enjoy the place and the saltwater ocean pool across the road. Yes we would stay again and look forward to enjoying the delicious slice Bernadette took the time to bake and welcome us with. Thank you for a lovely first AirBnB experience.

Highly recommended! Stephanie was a gracious host and her home was an inner city delight. Great location within walking distance to Sydney Uni and the restaurants and bars of Glebe, her home was comfortable and well appointed. A great experience!

I Loved Bernadettes home. It is a stunning house in a beautiful location. The views are amazing and the room was top notch...a great bed, bathroom and sitting area. Bernadette and Fred were very welcoming and friendly
I really enjoyed my weekend in Malabar and will be back..

Dank Wyatts offenheit und Gastfreundschaft haben wir uns gleich sehr wohl gefühlt. Das teilen der Küche und des Badezimmers hat gut geklappt. Die Wohnung ist mit dem Bus gut verhältnissmäßig schnell zu erreichen.
Best Location and the Suite is Spacious  ❤️
Nice apartment very close to Museum Station for convenient travel throughout the area.
Perfect place for pet lovers and was really good place...
Lovely house
Great location. Close to amazing cafes and short walk to beach and Main Street. Great communication.

Marcella is an incredibly helpful guest. When we requested if we could check in early after a long flight from the USA she went out of her way to insure the cleaners came early, which we were most thankful for, after a long flight
Room is sooo clean. He is very nice and good location. Perfect airbnb!!

The aparment is well located, near the university but far from de downtown... howbut there is a good public transportation. I had a problem with wi-fi but Cedric could fix it quickly. Itis a good option in a quite place!
Shuang's home is very beautiful. The international terminal is in walking distance. We didn't meet the host but the communication was perfect. We can totally recommend the room :)
Perfect accommodation, love to stay again
Very nice and clean place. The room comes with cable TV. Truly hotel standard! Lots of nice cafes within walking distance. It was a really pleasant stay.
Steven's place was excellent - exactly as described, great location, close to public transit, clean, and just wonderful. Would definitely stay there again!
Linda’s place was great. Close to great coffee shop/pub, Redfern train station, city and many other amenities. The apartment has lots of convienences which made our stay very accommodating.
Clean place. Great, central location.
Great!

We were blown away by Richards place at Mackarel Beach. A short ferry ride from Palm Beach and you feel instantly on holidays and relaxed. The house is right on the beach and has a fantastic view. You'll spend most of your time admiring it. Do yourself a favour and stay
Greta location

Nous avons séjourné une semaine chez Ben qui a pris soin de nous accueillir et de nous renseigner très chaleureusement. L’appartement est très agréable et la vue très belle, avec des facilités de stationnement. Je vous le recommande vivement.

We really enjoyed our stay at Victoria's place. It was a beautiful apartment in a fantastic location; close to all shops and amenities. Kings cross is only a short walk away but most days we walked through the beautiful botanic gardens to Central Quays. 
We really appreciated being able to stay until after lunch on our leaving day. The apartment was beautifully clean and although cosy had everything we needed.
Vickie was an excellent host and responded to any queries very promptly despite being away at the time.
I would definitely stay at this apartment again if visiting Sydney.
This apartment is beautiful, from the decorations to the spectacular view from the balcony. You will feel right at home
Great apartment, walking distance to pretty much most places in the CBD. Host was very welcoming and helpful. Would stay again.

Our stay with Natasa was really wonderful. She welcomed us with such warmth and made us feel at home. She would readily help you with all your queries and also offers great tips about the local sightseeing. 

The room was as good as depicted in the pictures and you can use all the amenities right from the kitchen to laundry. The bathroom was also clean  with good standards of hygiene. The house is really close to petersham metro station and has easy accessibility from the airport. It's also not too far from the city that saves a lot of commuting time. There are a lot of breakfast options available and you can also cook food if you like.  

It was a pleasure meeting Natasa. Cheerful and kind hearted that she is she made our stay really worthwhile.

I love the communication with Terry.she was very patient with me. 
She gave me tips for my trip.
And..... the bed is so,so,so confortable!!!!!! You could stay in, all day long! 

Thank you terry and see you!
Charming quirky space. Lots of towels, shampoo and conditioner. Condiments in the fridge. Good coffee maker. Bring ear plugs for the night because you can hear the trains.
Krythia is a friendly host, and the apartment is very close to the bus line directly to the city centre.

Fantastic location and easy to access. Stephen is a professional and knows how to meet expectations. This unit is basic - but this is clearly described in the advertisement so we knew what to expect. Very clean and very quiet. Firm but comfortable mattress. This is our second stay with Stephen - we are in Sydney regularly and will only book through him. Many thanks

Maria was off jetsetting when I came to stay ( half her luck ! ), but ensured that I was in good hands with the charming Jerome - well, he's French, so charming of course ; )

It's difficult to think of a more stunning spot in Sydney than this iconic building, above the cafe along the Shelley Beach board walk - tranquility itself, no matter the weather.

Thank you so much guys - I'll certainly stay again.

Great place in a great area. Had a weekend with some mates watching the cricket. 10 minute Uber or 30 minute walk from the SCG. 

Nice modern apartment that sleep 8 full grown men.
A fine host in a comfortable and stylish house in quiet location yet close to transport, food and nightlife.

Comfortable apartment right next to a beautiful park. Sits in one of the major traffic hub in eastern Sydney with buses to take you into City and south eastern suburbs conveniently.
Helpful and friendly hosts too!

Das Apartment liegt an perfekter Lage, um Sydney zu erkunden. Es gibt sehr gute Bus- und Lightrailverbindungen ins Zentrum (ca. 15 min) und in Glebe selber gibt es viele schöne Restaurants, Cafés und Läden. Das Apartment selber ist sehr schön und sauber, Bad und Küche sind etwas älteren Datums aber völlig in Ordnung. Wir haben hier zwei Wochen gewohnt und würden jederzeit wieder hierher kommen. Helena ist eine sehr nette und zuvorkommenden Gastgeberin, der Kontakt mit ihr war sehr einfach.
屋子里居然没有空调 因为在一楼 开着窗s很吵很吵 难以想象 也许晚上外面很凉快 但是为了隐私又必须拉上窗帘 接着就是开电扇 很热很热 如果屋子配有空调就完美了 装修很好 位置一般 出行必须打车 价格昂贵

Millie's place is a nice small studio, perfect for 1 person or a couple. It is in a nice neighbourhood, and very well communicated. The apartment was tidy and clean, with spare drawers and part of the closet, so you feel like home. The desk gives an extra space, very useful if you are staying for work. I will definitely stay again here next time I need a place in Sydney.
Brilliant place on a quiet street, everything we needed was there
New apartment close to the city center. The hosts are responsive through the app.

Jesse and Steve's home is located on a quiet cul-de-sac in a vibrant and convenient neighborhood. Good food, coffee, workout opportunities, the beach - all within walking distance. Loved that. The house was spotless and very comfortable. Great living/entertainment area. Jesse and Steve were exceptionally welcoming: we were greeted with flowers, and they called to see we were comfortably settled. Overall, a very positive experience.
Lovely quiet neighbourhood. Decent space for a small family. Nice and neat home. Will stay again!

Fantastic place, Lachlan (the host) is a top bloke, very helpful and accommodating. Have an awesome time

Cheers mate! :-)
Everything is as shown on the website.  Susie is a great host - very friendly but not at all intrusive.  Excellent security.  Easy instructions, good communication.

The place was a perfect size room about a 15 minute drive from the airport and about 45 minutes to Sydney by train. We had a blast. The place was clean and had everything we needed. The only downside was no air conditioning but there was a fan in the room so we hardly noticed. I can't wait to go back. I would definitely recommend!!

Very pleasant stay, however, a few cockroaches and spiders that visited that made it a tad unpleasant. Host did have bug spray which was great. And host was a great communicator and had other people to contact in her absence. Lovely and thoughtful touches and very convenient location. And, the cleaners were very lovely as well. Thanks Eleni.
Great apartment for business or pleasure. Great location and view.

This was our second stay at Rachel's place. The location of this property is brilliant. Right in the heart of affluent and central suburb Mosman, loads of things for kids to do close by - amazing pizza, oval, park, shops, public pool. Perfect. All you need is in walking distance. The accommodation itself is lovely and everything you could want for a family stay.
Fantastic location. Close to bus and trains. Nice french pastiserie nearby.
Host didn’t respond and could check in, finally got told at 8:30 pm to find somewhere else to stay. Terrible host!

Enjoyed the few days I spent at this property. Was not familiar with the Malabar area although I have lived in the Sydney eastern suburbs for many years. Quite a discovery! Being in Sydney but feeling like being on a weekend on the South Coast. Lovely. The apartment is very nice with all facilities and very comfortable. Very welcoming thoughtful attentions.
Great place in an awesome location. Good value for money.
This place checked all the boxes for me: flexible checkin/out, great AC, great location, responsive hosts and a clean space. Bonus! It was cute. Will definitely be back.
A lovely, relaxing place on the river. Shirley is a great, thoughtful host.

My family of 6 stayed recently for 4 nights leading towards the new year. Sam was very friendly and his responses to fixing issues we had were prompt - very easy to talk to. The fridge was replaced with a new one and works very well! The aircon in the living room and bedroom was a huge plus! We stayed very comfortably :) Thank you!

Edi is a wonderfull person and a great host. She was so friendly and helpful and didn't hesitate to show us around. The room (very clean) and the location (really close to the station) are perfect. Totally recommended! Thank you Edi!
It is a nice place with every necessities. Close to the train station, only 2 minutes walk. Easy to get to the city, only 10-15 min. Fully-equipped kitchen. Everything is clean and tidy.

Perfect! Perfect! Perfect! From the time you walk up the stairs to this beautiful, fully stocked terrace you feel right at home! The pictures can't even begin to describe the warmth and and comfort of this immaculately furnished, fully equipped 2 bedroom apartment! With on site parking, a laundry, the most comfortable bedding I have ever slept in, an amazingly sunlight filled kitchen and in one of Sydney cutest suburbs this place was perfect for anyone wanting to visit Sydney! Close to shops, cafés and restaurants and only minutes drive from the cbd staying here was one of the best decisions I have made when visiting Sydney! Louise is wonderful and caters to your every need and is easy to contact! I highly recommend staying here to anyone who is wanting to visit Sydney for any period of time!! :)

Cindy's place is a small, clean and cosy room to explore Sydney. Cindy and Mikki are friendly and helpful and gave me my own space. It is near Coogee beach but I missed a chance to go to the beach due to the rain while I was there. It is near several buses to get into town and also near cafes, restaurants and shops.

Very glad we chose this place. Three good size bedrooms, 2 living areas and separate well appointed kitchen/dining, private courtyard - all we could have hoped for. Our friendly and obliging host, Jennifer, met us on arrival and showed us round, clearly explaining the features of the property.  Parking outside, quiet street yet close to the main drag of Balmain makes it an excellent location.
Great space in an excellent location.

A wonderful placd to stay , very clean and modrn apartment with a convenience store about 50 meteres away on ground level its worth a stay and a very quiet area too. If i get the chance i would return
Angela's place was lovely, clean and welcoming. The room was exactly as described, the bed was comfortable and the shower was hot. Angela and Coby were lovely, friendly hosts.

L'endroit est tout simplement extraordinaire, quant à la vue depuis la chambre et bien c'est magique. C'est idéal pour sortir de son quotidien. Maria est très sympathique , bref j'adore et j'aurais aimé rester plus de temps.

Paul and Judith were incredibly kind hosts who made me and my partner feel incredibly welcome during our stay in their beautiful home. They helped us tremendously in finding our way around Sydney and offered wonderful suggestions for us to do. 
The room itself was lovely and spacious, and the house is located in such a great neighbourhood, chock full of great shops and restaurants. I'm so happy to have come across this true find and I highly recommend staying here!
A great, cosy place to stay. Very stylish and clean with all the basics that you need.

This was the first Air bnb booking I have done and I was a bit nervous.  It was the best experience ever.  Cat is an extremely gracious hostess.  Very friendly, great communication and really thoughtful, unexpectedly offering us early check in and late check out because it was possible. 

The house has a lovely friendly feel to it, and is as amazing as the pictures look, they are accurate.   Loved sitting in the beautiful courtyard, sipping champagne and enjoying the fish.

So many small attentions to detail.... having champagne stoppers, insect repellant and a really helpful guide to the house and how to navigate the surrounding areas. Lovely toiletries and an amazing open fire - yes I had the fire going, not because it was really cold, but because I love an open fire and this was one of the reasons I chose the property.  Cat was very accommodating with this and we had plenty of firewood. The fire burnt and drew well.

Great location. The house is a very easy walk to Bondi Beach, even for unfit me, and an even shorter walk to groceries, bottle shop, cafe and restaurants.

Parking is the only thing that is a bit awkward.  The listing description is accurate in this regard.  If you have a regular size car you will not be able to get into the driveway, which is such a shame.  We were able to get longer stay parking in other streets, but this obviously wasn't as convenient. It was doable though.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and intend to stay there again.

Angela & Geoff’s place is beyond exceptional. My husband and I and our 2 young children spent 2 very enjoyable and comfortable nights there. The apartment is private, really quiet and beautifully stylish. The beds are the most comfortable I’ve ever slept in. Angela made sure there were toys and a travel cot for my 2 year old and responded so quickly to any questions I had. Fantastic stay, loved it!!!

The Balmain Garden Home was perfect, the home is comfortable and beautifully decorated, it has all the amenities and very close proximity to public transport, restaurants and shops and a quick Bus or Ferry ride into the CBD. Jennifer is a wonderful host and very responsive and it was a pleasure to meet here. We hope to be able to stay here again sometime in the future. Very highly recommended.
Very nice place to stay.. definitely gonna stay again next trip
地點好,而且有附小廚房很方便,房間整體很舒服,房東回覆迅速讓人很安心｡不過感覺很像小旅館,不太像一般的家｡

A great location if you wish to stay on the Northern Beaches. Very comfortable accommodation and you can park off the street.  The unit was clean and comfortable. Access to cafes and the beach just down the road.
We were made to feel very welcome by David and Fei. Thanks so much for having us!

Anita was easy to contact and quick to respond to all our requests. The apartment was everything it is advertised to be and more. It was extremely clean and had everything we needed to make our stay feel homely and very comfortable. We look forward to staying here next time. 
Thanks Anita
很好的房东

The location is very central with public transport and places of interest at walking distance.
The apartment itself is very comfortable for 4 people with large living space.
Great location and great amenities! Communication was very prompt and thorough.
Tims place is sensational if you want an easy walk to the airport through the park.  No taxi,  no bus,  no train needed. Bloody great!!

Overall experience was below expectation. The photos were all modern and new looking, however, the house itself said it the other way.

Saw two cockroaches in the bathroom, floor full of hair (nasty!), loud noises at night (party and chit chat next door until 2am), overall cleanliness is about  a C-
A great place to stay!
I enjoyed my stay Tota is friendly and helpful  the House is very clean as well

Our stay was awesome. The location is amazing. Literally a walk away to all the local tourist spots. Very close to the aquarium which we loved. The apartment was spacious, clean and packed with everything we could gave possibly need. Apartment manual had clear instructions that were very easy to follow. Gavin was quick to respond to any queries we had. It also had a great view of Syd buildings which we loved. Thanks again Gavin! Would definitely stay again and will recommend to friends & family.
Very comfortable bed, the ‘partial’ view of the beach is great. Anita is a lovely and generous host, who made us feel welcome. We enjoyed our stay very much. Thank you!
Good
Ven's place was good for our purpose.
Great spot and cute house with all the essentials.
It was a good spot to stay for exploring the Manly & Northern Beaches area. Our hosts were very friendly and helpful, and it's obvious they enjoy the company of others.

Walking distance to Newtown, comfortable and had a nice feel. 
Not on a busy street. 
No aircon, but wasn't an issue for us. We stayed on a hot night and it was fine! 
Small space but has everything you need.

Our trip was improved tenfold by the friendliness and hospitality of Hugo & Oliver. 
The space is beautifully decorated and conveniently located near hubs of cafe's, shops and transport. 

The hosts went above and beyond to ensure our stay was as comfortable and easy as possible. We cannot speak highly enough of our experience.
Perfect location and clean. Wendy is a great host. I'd love to come back.

Perfect beach location with classic Bondi Beach views from the apartment and rooftop terrace.

A really good sized studio space, It was super clean and well presented - just like the photos. 

Anita is an outstanding host, very responsive, helpful and friendly.

We very much enjoyed our stay in Susan's little cabin. Susan was a very warm and welcoming host, who was extremely helpful with bus schedules and so on. The cabin was depicted very accurately in her pictures. We would definitely stay with Susan again.
A lovely host who is happy to help. A nice little house. Thanks for having us!

It was a nice apartment to stay in and it is worth the price. 
The only problem in the area is parking, as it is challenging to find a free spot- since we owned a car. There are also planes flying over the complexes, therefore there will be some noise, but not often- it wasn’t as noticeable for us. 
Otherwise it was a nice stay with all appliances and necessities provided- also Hafid was fast to respond to our messages. Recommend.
Great value, comfortable place, easy walk to trains, cafes, restaurants, pubs, etc.  Would stay here again.

Leslie's family home is close to the bus line and ferry; an hour ride from the airport and a thirty minute commute to Sydney Harbor.   The room has plenty of sleeping quarters, the bathroom is stocked with all essentials (shampoo, conditioner, body  wash, hair dryer), and  breakfasts are light and delicious.   Having a refrigerator, microwave,tea and coffee pot are helpful; and a washing machine within the unit is terrific.  The family accommodated all are requests; we traveled some days as two persons and some days we had three persons.  Leslie helped us with restaurant suggestions and paths to walk.

Amazing house. Beautifully decorated, quiet, relaxing. So close to public transport, restaurants and shops. Tea, coffee and condiments included.Full laundry and fully equipped kitchen. Delightful outdoor areas. Plenty of information about the area. Better than the best hotel. True luxury. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Really enjoyed our stay here! Clean apartment and amazing views, especially at sunset. Parking was a bit confusing, but Edward was helpful in resolving that issue. Other than that, everything was great!! :)

This is perfect for a weekend getaway. It has everything you need, and Cathy is a very friendly host who is excellent at communicating regarding the booking. I would highly recommend this property and would stay there again.
localização bem central em Sydney. Dá para ir a pé à maioria das atrações turísticas e fica perto da estação de metrô. O apartamento tem tudo, confortável. Recomendo.
Cindy is very welcoming and her place is very sweet, clean, has everything you would need and close to both the beach and shops

The host Hilde was incredibly hospitable and communicative which made our stay really enjoyable.
The place was immaculate and the location is fantastic! Would highly recommend!

Very. Easy communications to let me book in and find his house. And when Wyatt was away, his sister popped around to make sure that I had everything I needed.  The bed was comfortable, the kitchen and sitting room spacious and everything I needed was available, right down to some tourist brochures and transport timetables on the area.  It soon felt like living in ones own home.  But ones action say more than words.  I have booked to extend my current visit here and also booked a return visit on my way back through Sydney in a weeks time. Thank you Wyatt, great place.
Everything's good except the shower head is not working properly.

Each AirBNB is as distinctive as a  finger print or DNA! Another worthwhile experience, another highly acceptable accommodation. The hosts are creative and cosmopolitan people, offering space for guests is a natural extension of their love for travel and interesting places and people. They were helpful and welcoming. Check in and out was hassle-free and straightforward. St Peters is a growing artistic hub in Sydney and this listing captures that ethos .Convenient to transport, 10 minutes by train from the CBD, comfortable, well equipped, the spaciousness of this listing is a real stand out feature and  3 people could fit in here. Read the description, the owners are accurate in their outline of the space, but nothing could be faulted in cleanliness, comfort and the facilities provided, would be happy to retur
A wonderful relaxing stay in beautiful Manly. PERFECT location, appartment and host. 5 stars!!!!
Wayne and Kate are truly super hosts and the view from the apartment speaks for itself.

The room and the house were so cute! Very well designed! I really enjoyed the little garden (I had my breakfast there, just perfect!) Lilian and her fried are really friendly and lovely! Gave me advices ect... 
Can not expected better! Next time I sydney i already know where I will stay!
Thank you so much Lilian! Was perfect !
Xxx

This apartment is as described. It is air conditioned, clean and well presented, close to transport, and with dedicated parking should you require it. It is also convenient walking distance to a wide variety of restaurants and close to the East Village shopping centre. We would happily return when next we are visiting Sydney.

This was my first experience using airbnb, and I gotta say I'm really glad i did it. The apartment was just as described and very clean. Duncan and his girlfriend was the perfect hosts, they will gladly help you with whatever you ask them, and Duncan even drove me to my next accommodation when my stay was over. I give Duncan and his apartment my highest recommendation. Enjoy your stay! :)

At first I was a bit taken back due to the age of the apartment compared to what I am used to for that price.  But after settling in found it homely and very comfortable.  Ruby was great with communication and the location is outstanding and stones throw away from beautiful beach.  Thank you so much for opening your home I really did enjoy our time there.   Definitely love tamarama.
Don was a really helpful host who responded straight away to all our questions. The apartment itself is very nice and also located in a great area. Would definitely stay here again!

Super vintage style house. Really love it and we had a very good time here. Arnie and Lorrine are very helpful and gave us some suggestions as well. Thank you so much and we would definitely highly recommend this place.
Great location, short walk to the ferry and local eats. Prompt communication and a wonderful apartment. The car park was very convenient also, would highly recommend this stay.

We stayed two nights in Max's apartment. Host is very considerate and warm-hearted. Ready to serve and answer your need and questions. Room is pretty clean and tidy, also located just near central station. Had great time there. Thanks.

Very nice people are Craige and Leonne.
Most helpful and friendly.  Made us feel welcome and  'at home' during our brief stay.  Great location in the heart of Bondi, very close o everything needed on holiday.

The host did make us feel very welcome and the Air bnb was amazing - exactly like the pictures. The hosts were very quick to answer any questions we had with helpful suggestions. The space was very comfortable and clean, however, we did not have access to the pool during our stay. 
The location was very convenient and we were able to access central station easily. We also found the suggestions for places to eat in the booklet provided very helpful. 
A highly recommended stay!
Great place in a nice and quite neighborhood. We stayed just one night in Ali's place and for us it was a great stopover.
Cozy and clean!Great!Near to the supermarket
It's overall nice time to stay there... i just there for couple of hours thats why couldn't talk to much with the owner..
Fantastic place to stay, great location and very close to Kings Cross station.
The location is okay and safe.

My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights for a kid free getaway! We loved the Stylish little apartment in a charming old block in Mosman. Beautiful balmoral beach is. 20 minute walk away - it's a good walk (not one you'd want to do with kids though) Balmoral is a stunning place to relax and swim! The apartment is a 5 minute walk to some great local food options and shops. Lovely quiet area but so close to everything makes is a perfect option!
Modern clean and great location
Great location. Great market across the street on the weekends  with lots of great food and drinks. Would highly recommend
房东很热情,给我们很多建议,搭车还帮我砍价~房间很干净,离市中心真的很近,全城走路去哪里都很方便,离woolworths也特别近｡很感谢房东的热情款待｡下次一定会推荐朋友再来｡
Clean and Comfortable great location, suited our requirements.  Thanks for having us.
Perfect location and so easy to get to Bondi. Great value for money!
Perfect host and great place - thanks Alexey!

Lovely, airy, clean, modern and comfortable space. Steven and Peta were great hosts, very responsive when we had questions and extremely pleasant to chat with.  They gave great tips on the neighborhood cafes and restaurants and there are several nearby that were our favorites. Highly recommended!

I loved staying at Bronte B&B Studio. Such a peaceful spot where the loudest noises are those of glorious bird-calls. The bed was very comfortable. The provided breakfast food delicious. Susan was prompt in replying to queries before my stay and then on the day was really terrific helping out with a rushed task that was well above the expected. I would recommend Bronte B&B unreservedly.
Wendy looked after me and my partner. Place is clean, well maintained and has everything you need. Thanks again Wendy for being so hospitable.

What a lovely stay! The apartment is spotlessly clean, and the bed is very comfortable. It is a 20 minute walk to Coogee Beach, but several supermarkets and a fitness centre are less than 10 minutes walk away.
Perfect location, good value, safe, everything you need.
Bel appartement, bien équipé. L’immeuble est doté d’une piscine, un jacuzzi, un sauna et une salle de musculation. Nous avons passé un bon séjour. Je recommande.
This is a beautiful house that is a pleasure to be in. Fei was unstintingly generous in providing assistance and making us feel comfortable. We wholeheartedly recommend it.
Great location, nice host and good looking apartment!

Suzie was a fantastic host. She methodically introduced me to all the details of the space, ensuring I had everything I needed. The apartment was exceptionally clean and stylishly decorated. Above and beyond, Suzie was very warm and welcoming. Ready and willing to provide local recommendations, but also respecting when to give privacy. Very enjoyable stay.
All great there!! Perfect place!!
This place is super modern and has a great bathroom. And the location is great as well!
What a comfortable place for a gateway weekend. Strategic location, cooking friendly. We really enjoy our stay at Ziggy's :)
very good  place

Such a nice experience! The house is clean and the beds are comfortable. Good location if you enjoy a small walk to the city and darling harbor (not super close). It is close to China Town and Fish market as well. Elisa is a great host. Very professional and always available.

Appartement très bien situé et chaleureux. Hugo est très accueillant et prêt à vous conseiller sur votre séjour à Sydney. Le quartier est vivant mais l’appartement est calme et permet de se reposer après des journées bien remplies.
great location and nice apartment!
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I LOVED Annie’s space. Bright, stylish and such a good location - I will definitely look to come back and try out the roof top pool!
Great modern apartment in the heart of bondi! Good value and walking distance to everything you need. Lynne was a great host and very helpful if we had any queries. Would stay here again!
Great location - very short walk to kings cross station. Apartment is fully furnished - nothing fancy but all you really need.

It's the second time I've had the pleasure to stay at Dino's apartment. It feels like home. Great location. Great amenities.  Super clean. Great Wifi. Great host. There's no better place to stay in Sydney. Thanks Dino! Hope to be back soon.
Nice clean place was perfect place to rest after several trips to the beach. Nice place perfectly suited to my family of 4 (my two kids are still haps to share a bed).

Great location! Very central, animated and lively part of the city. We had a very pleasant stay and we thanks Oliver for his warm welcome and good advices. There is a great spot to buy ice cream around the corner. Don't miss it!

I booked Victoria’s place for my parents to stay while they were visiting Syndey for two nights. They had a great trip and loved Victoria’s place. I knew it would be perfect for them as they aren’t well travelled and didn’t know Sydney at all. Victoria was the perfect and host and checked them in early and helped with anything they needed. If I make it to Sydney I will definitely be checking this place for availability. Thanks again Vickie!

We had our second stay at Caths Garden Studio and it was again perfect for our needs. We got up early and ate the breakfAst provided before heading out, but a pleasant spot to relax too. Every need met. We'll be back!

My stay here was great! Awesome location and the hosts go above and beyond. There was milk and bread left for us to eat/drink and they were available for any questions offering perfect suggestions. Would recommend to a friend
This place is excellent! We had the best stay, it was so close to everything! Communication with host was great, very comfortable for 6 adults. Would definitely stay again!

My partner and I stayed here for 5 nights. This is a lovely small apartment, that had everything we needed. It was very clean and modern. In the perfect location if you are looking to explore the city, kings cross station is just a 10 minute walk away. The streets surrounding he apartment are full of small business shops and there is a convenience store right across the road. We would definitely rebook if we were travelling here again. Unfortunately we didn’t get a chance to meet Victoria, due to our arrival time. However she responded fast to messages and was very helpful.
Most amazing room ever! Cosy bed, awesome furniture and lovely host! Highly recommend this place !

Hernan was a delightful gentleman and incredibly helpful and accommodating with checkin and my stay.  His place was a charming little unit and more than comfortable for my needs ... would happily stay again should I be in the neighbourhood

We were made o feel very welcome by Shuang and his family. The room was quite spacious and very well fitted out. We were overnighting to pick up an international flight out of Sydney and found the location to the airport very handy.

I booked this room for a colleague who was visiting on a secondment, and he was very happy with the stay. A great way to wow visitors from London - access to one of our most iconic beaches. He said it was very convenient, well-appointment, comfortable and well-stocked with thoughtful additions, which was really useful to him. It's very likely we will be booking again.

Anthony's place was just as described. Great location, very clean, walking distance to everywhere. 10 minutes to the beach and even closer to cafes and shops.I would definitely stay there again and recommend it when staying in bondi
Nice and close to UNSW, clean, great communication, good wifi. Overall excellent.

Great location however hosts were unfriendly, late on arrival and the sheets were not changed, sex stain on the Doona! Discussing!! My wife felt sick! 
Also the apartment needed a good clean. This was our first experience with a air BnB and although the location was great and the apartments views were fantastic the hygiene was appalling

Centrally located close to Town Hall Station, this place is my new favorite in Sydney. The views.were.absolutely.amazing.mind blowing. 
The TV was left off, there is enough entertainment sitting in the couch looking out the big windows in front. This apartment has everything what you need for a convenient stay. I will definitely book again!
If you drive with your own car to Sydney, the best carpark would be the one in Sussex street (Wilson)- 20 dollars a day for a bay

Vivian's place was perfect for my parents stay in Bronte. It was beautifully presented, very clean and in a great location for exploring the beaches. The use of space and private entrance were great. I would highly recommend this air bnb.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice place near airport

Diana was so welcoming. She added little touches like Irish teabag and milk and chocolate to mention a few. She thought of everything.  Such a fantastic host. Always at the end of the phone if you needed her. Definitely would stay again.

I have to say it was tough to be in the apartment with only a small fan during this heat, but perhaps the apartment would be quite comfortable for guests during other seasons. Some areas of the apartment don’t match the current photos anymore, such as the bathroom and the living room. Unfortunately, we also had to deal with several cockroaches (live and dead) in the apartment during our one week stay here. That being said, I thank the host(s) for being accommodating with our late check in request for the first night. Also, the location of the apartment is great, with close walking distance to king’s cross station which can conveniently get you anywhere. Cute brunch spots on the next street. Thanks.

This apartment was a perfect getaway. It had everything you need. It was walking distance from shops and restaurants and a bus stop a stones throw away. Anita was super helpful and very hospitable making our stay that little bit better.

A lovely rustic beach house with good sized beds and great spots for family entertaining.  Added extras were a box of toys for the grandkids, nice products in bathroom and plenty of plates/cutlery/saucepans etc.  cat was very welcoming and provided plenty of information to help us with our stay.  Thank you Cat for your hospitality

Allison was EXTREMELY helpful and accommodative. Lovely girl, and so are the other 2 ladies. Comfortable bed, plenty of space in the wardrobe.  Newtown is a fantastic location, a couple minute walk to the train station and a 10minute train into Circular Quay.

Best location in Sydney!! Really quiet area! Enjoy the time in Duncan and Ashlee's House. Both of them are so lovely and like the nature so much! Also they are a great designer of their house! The photos hanging in the room are the great proof! Next time if I have a long term vacation, I'll still choose to live here! Thank you, Duncan and Ashlee! Best experience in Sydney.

Great host, offered us with late check out, and late check in 1000pm, very professional, easy going and flexible, great location, 10mins to 20 mins walking distance to fish market, darling harbour, China town, with free parking onsite. Highly recommend and will be returned for our next trip to Sydney.

Christine and Patrick were amazing hosts! Their beautiful one bedder is modern, stylish and extremely clean. The house is just a short walk to the train station and main street. Thank you again for a fantastic stay!

Simon & Nicole's place is very close to central station and hence very easy to access the CBD. The neighbourhood has some good restaurants and trendy stores. The flat itself is spacious and clean. Simon & Nicole also put in those little extras which make your stay a special one! Thank you Simone & Nicole!
This place was much larger than expected. great for backpackers and small families. Grest location in a nice clean area. paid parking near by.
Nice, clean room. Nice small kitchen en bathroom. Just everything you need for a citytrip in Sydney. Great communication, good price, PERFECT location.

Wyatt has been a really great host! The place was comfy and the toilet was kept clean all the time. The place was also very convenient and easily accessible to all the attractions like Sydney Opera House, Darling Habour, Chinatown and the City. I really enjoyed my stay there and look forward to renting the place again if I go back to sydney.
ticks all boxes host was kind and friendly

Sam needs to sharpen up and do some renovations and replace or repair his Ac. Ear plugs are a necessity especially, with the constant construction noise across to road, if you are to expect a good nights sleep.
Nice local area, bedroom is self contained, shower & toilet are situated in the shared family laundry. Sarah was a helpful host.

Enjoyed my stay in Sydney at Griffin’s place.  Although small, it worked perfectly for me.  Great location and very clean with lots of charm.  Griffin met me as planned and let me in.  Great communication from booking until check out.
Great unit in the heart of Manly.

Greg and Maggie are great, they were super chill and their space was amazing. The studio was really clean and had everything I needed for the weekend. Will definitely stay again on my next trip to Sydney.

Had a fantastiic stay at Wayne and Kate's place. 

We arrived on Friday night in windy and rainy conditions, but were soon cosy in the apartment with the girls snuggled in the provided blankets, and with the heaters on!

Everything that we needed was provided for and the hosts quickly answered a couple of texts I sent with questions about the apartment. 

Waking up to blue skies and the sight of the ocean on the Saturday morning was awesome. 

Would love to come back and experience the place is summer! 

Thanks to the hosts

Rachel's place is an amazing house within a perfect location. It is situated within walking distance of most things and the house itself is amazing! 5 of us were very comfortable in the house for a long weekend.

Very comfy home. 
Great location for restaurants, and walking distance to the beach.
Cristy has been a good host providing us with information about tranaportation and restaurants in the neighborhood. the location was quiet and convenient.

I was an AIRBNB virgin  and I found my first  experience overwhelmingly positive.

The garden pavilion behind a typical Sydney historic cottage was cute, clean, compact but above all comfortable.
With an ensuite bathroom, heating, microwave, hot water jug I had everything I needed for a business, conference and research related trip.
Wonderful gourmet café style breakfast options and a generous and considerate host enhanced the experience even further.
The position  is ideal for Sydney busses with several options for the Unviersity of Sydney, University of New South Wales, Central Station and the CBD. Parramatta Rd is about 10/12 mins walk away
The district is cosmopolitan and convenient with many reasonably priced restaurants, cafes, pubs and a supermarket again about 5-10 minutes walk away. I found it safe and quiet, ideal for either business or the non-extreme traveller
Like most of historic inner west/southwest Sydney, jet aircraft fly remarkably close above one's head in this suburb on occasions 
I can not praise this  facility too much and  if all AIRBNB's are like this  ... well.. viva la revolucion

Susan and Greg provide a beautiful space which misses nothing a hotel provides (ok maybe room service but I didn't want that) yet with extras such as privacy, quietude and a beautiful garden setting.  I also really appreciated Susans timely responses made in a very professional yet greatly warm way. Highly recommended  ("

Thanks for a good stay! Room was big and clean - only issue was the shared kitchen space could get a little messy and there were ants in the bathroom but not a major issue! Heater worked well, bathroom big and clean, very close to big shopping mall with restaurants and close to the train line! Simple but good!
