Only addition I would include would be a mini fridge in the bedroom - there’s space for it and would make it a more private space without the hassle of a shared kitchen - especially as I was visiting on a work trip and had to leave very early in the morning and was worried I’d disturb other guests.
Joseph was a great host and was very accommodating. Thankyou for letting us stay in your lovely apartment!  Was exactly what we were needing

Great location! Very clean double story apartment , full furnished, very comfortable. It’s so convenient to go anywhere in Sydney CBD with walking.  Woolworth just 3 minutes away. The host is very friendly and helpful. All good!Phan very responsive to any questions you may have about the place. I will definitely stay again
Had a great stay in the Backyard Cabin. Very comfortable. Beautiful location. Very accommodating host.

Gavin was a great host! He was welcoming, friendly and great to speak with. He knows the area quite well and is always willing to offer advice. Although we didn't see him too much we were lucky enough to have Gavin come along to breakfast with us before we left. He showed us some great places to eat and was very entertaining. The room was exactly as advertised, except the bed was brand new and super comfortable. The bed in the current picture doesn't do it justice. Surry Hills is excellent. It's about a 10 minute walk from some great bars, and cafes and about a 5 minute walk from Central train station. Overall it was a wonderful stay.
Unique experience.

Perfect spot for my family. My partner was working at the hospital, while we had easy access to transport, food etc.  
Comfy Clean Perfect
Great place, even better than before now it has a kitchen and extra room.  Bernadette, Fred and Bilbo were as helpful and friendly as ever.

Mag's accomodation is a beautiful art deco apartment  in a quiet, beautiful location within minutes of the ferry which is a 20 min cruise into the city.  Mags was extremely courteous and helpful in answering any queries or issues that we encountered, and everything was dealt with in a concerned and expedient manner, including one unexpected issue that was quickly resolved ( thanks Mags and James :) The flat was well fitted out and we would love to visit again. One of the nicest places we have visited in Sydney. Thanks again Mags!!
安静舒适,性价比高,适合入住｡
This was a fun and relaxing stay. The place was lovely, clean, and very conveniently located. The hosts were friendly and knowledgeable of the local area.
Unit was amazing, a few small issues here and there but otherwise very well thought out and beautiful home. Would stay again.

A stylish wee unit in a handy location.  George the host was very easy to contact and very friendly. Appreciated the air conditioning, nice linens, amenities in the bathroom and furnishings. Thank you for your hospitality.

I did not personally stay with Cath, as we booked her room for an employee on an extended out of town stay. The booking process was very easy, and Cath was very understanding of our needs for the accommodation. 

The feedback from our staff member has been great - so much so he has requested that when he returns that he stays with Cath once more. The room is in a very central location of the Inner West region, with great access to buses, trains and the light rail at Dulwich Hill. 

I would highly recommend Cath's property for anyone looking for a cosy, homely location to stay :) Thanks Cath!

This was the first time I have booked through Airbnb and Eleni has set an extremely high standard for all my future bookings.  Everything worked smoothly from our first communication to the last.  Her apartment was perfect for our stay.  It is situated in such a great area, close to shops and even within walking distance to the CBD and Circular Quay.  It was sparkling clean and provided all the amenities we needed.  Thanks again Eleni for being a great hostess!
Very cool accommodation set amongst the tree-tops

Stephen was a fantastic host let me check-in early and also offed late check-out place had everything you needed to make yourself at home plus more hardly had to go out and buy anything & was so clean, defiantly recommend this place to anyone looking at staying.
The studio is very clean, modern and quiet.  We would definitely recommend to people to stay here.  All the little extras have been thought of.  Great shower!

Awesome location, clean and neat. Don't leave the attic room door open in summer though unless you have lots of insect protection. Mosquitoes had a field day until we got up and sprayed. Nothing Jeremy can do about that. 

We have already booked his place again in June.
Had a great stay with ample space. Very accommodating host. Beautiful location albeit the weather. Thank-you so much. Would definetly stay again
Great location, modern and comfortable apartment. Has everything you need.

Fabulous location. So close to the beach and great bushwalking through the National Park. We loved having pre dinner drinks at the community club, whilst watching the sun set over the water. Absolutely beautiful.
It is a beautiful place to stay in. It is a central place, you can find easily transport, restaurants, markets and pubs. Nearby to the city and Cassandra is a kind and friendly person.
Roberts place is in a great position and great for large groups or family’s
Place is near to the airport, both domestic and international. Bus stand with bus route to City is very nearby. Train station is just ~900meters. Place is kept sparkly clean.
Great spot for us, spacious and surprisingly quiet given the location. Would highly recommend. Thanks so much.

My overall experience at Redfern at Kath's was very high and enjoyable. This room was actually my second room staying with Kath right after the first which was also a wonderful experience. Kath was consistently a wonderful lady who made my partner and I feel very welcome right from the start, all the way to the end. Even prior to meeting her in person, what  I was impressed with how highly responsive Kath was with communication. She was very welcoming and friendly with an approachable nature. The room was very accurate to description; quite large and spacious with lots of natural light, especially with a wonderful and large balcony attached. I was very impressed with the interior design of the room by Kath herself which brought out the unique aspects, and brought character to the room. It was bright and beautiful with wonderful combinations of patterns and colours. It was very impressive. Everything was accessible and ready when we arrived, including many fresh towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash etc.,as well as chargers on either sides of the bed. The bed itself was very large and comfortable. Additionally, Kath even went out shopping and brought home cereal etc. which made us feel welcome. In addition, the accommodation at Redfern itself was quite convenient. It was approximately 200m away from the train station which was very close by Central (even within walking distance ~15mins). Late night shops, especially bars and restaurants were also close-by and near walking distance. Definitely will be recommending to family and friends to stay :). Thanks Kath.
Clean place, amenities available closeby, great host
Great central location! Clean.
Cute studio apartment with bridge views. Easy walk to Darling Harbor and very friendly and accomodating host. Would definitely recommend Ben's place.
Very good location and clean room condition.
Ana was very attentive and helpful.   Perfect location for us.

A very welcoming host as we were greeted with a much appreciated hamper of food and Christmas crackers when we arrived and the use of the car was very useful! A lovely area of welcoming neighbours and a selection of good shops/cafes, just a steep walk to the beach unfortunately which wasn't a problem for us, but perhaps the more elderly or young would have issues with. The house was as described and in a beautiful location on the northern beaches with the morning sun on the terrace for breakfast! Overall we had a fantastic family holiday here and would come again.

Marcella was very helpful and easy to contact, and the place was great and have everything we need for a group of 9!
The only downside was the floor wasn't that clean, but overall the place was huge and we had awesome stay!
Modern spacious apartment in fantastic location with very easy access to transport to and from the city. Very welcoming and accommodating host - an overall great experience!
We have stayed here for a couple of days the talkings where great and Duncan can if you like it show you whales whith his boat. We are glad that we have been by them

Charle & Gioia have a beautiful apartment in Fairlight, there were really helpful for the organisation of this trip, my mother and her friend who stayed there enjoy the location nearby the beach and the fact that the place was really quiet and sunny. I definitely recommend this place for travellers who like a place to settle for 1 week or more.. 
thanks :)
Erwan

This apartment is excellent - location is a stone's throw to the beach, coastal walk and great cafes, fantastic view, and a really well kept, comfortable and complete apartment for a family.  Thoroughly recommended
Vickie was a great host, gave us plenty of local tips when we arrived and made us feel very welcome. Lovely apartment in an ideal location for the city and the beaches!
We had a wonderful stay in Desiree's apartment.  Great location, spotlessly clean and very homely.  Would definitely stay again.
This place is in a good location! Beside the quite street, things are clean and the host is very helpful!

Very good hosts, room matched indications. 5 min walk to the beach, very convenient. Room was a bit too hot but mainly because I preferred to shut down the window to avoid any bugs at night. There is also a fan system if required.
Nice room at a good price. OK for getting your head down at night and getting sone rest. Host sounded very friendly through communication.
Really enjoyed staying with Serena and Mohmed!

We enjoyed our stay at Rachels home, however there were positives and negatives. Positives were the décor, the spacious bedrooms, the comfortable beds, the backyard area and the location. Although I didn’t get to meet Rachel, she seems very friendly. 

Overall, the cleanliness was unsatisfactory. The kitchen needed a good clean. The fridge interior, kitchen drawers and kitchen floor were all food stained. We had to wash all the unclean cutlery, glasses, pots, etc before using them. We also found dirty items in the dishwasher. We wanted to use the outside table for a group lunch but the large umbrella appeared to be broken and fixed or stuck in the corner.  

While the location is great to walk to restaurants, shops and down to Balmoral Beach, the noise of car traffic is very loud in the mornings. Difficult to sleep beyond 7am. The wifi did not work at all. We tried on many devices and nothing. Before we checked out, a broadband company arrived so hopefully the wifi will be ready for the next tenants.

Simon and Nicole's place was perfect for my needs. The location means that great cafes and restaurants, the central train station, the business district, and many of the main tourist attractions are all walkable.  The apartment is well equipped with high quality appliances and, best of all, a super-comfy bed! Nicole was responsive to all questions or requests, even though she was out of town at the time. I'll definitely try to stay here again the next time I visit Sydney.
Excellent location close to airport ... Steven was really friendly and nice... excellent spot for a stop over...Thanks Steven

Thanks Belinda for welcoming us to your beautiful Garden Studio.  We were also very greatful with your flexibility in changing the night for us as per our request.  The studio was well appointed with a great kitchen which had everything that I required to cook our meals etc.  Shower was also great.  Very close to beach and amenities.  Bundeena is lovely place to visit and Belinda's studio is a perfect place for a couple.

Nice well furnished room in a quiet neighborhood. Hosts are very kind and helpful, the dog is really cute, you'll fall in love with him.
We definitely recommend this place and had a beautiful stay there.
体验很好
close to the airport. 10 mins walking to the closest train station. nice 2-floor apartment with all necessary infrastructure.

This house is perfect for a large extended family group. It has so much room that you can go off and have a quiet time by yourself even if the house is fully occupied. The beds, bedding and towels are high quality, and the kitchen has everything you need to cater for a large group. The private beach and the hot tub are wonderful for just hanging out and relaxing. The house's many levels mean that even crying babies don't disturb others in the house.
Waking up to the gorgeous views of the trees, boats and water can't be matched. I would highly recommend this house and would come back.
Excellent place to stay in Sydney
Great self contained garden bungalow.  Close to transport and a short walk to coffee and cafes in norton street.

The best host ever !!! 
Larry et Casey sont des gens géniaux, d’une grande hospitalité et de bons conseils ! Nous n’hésiterons pas à retourner dans leur belle maison dès notre retour à Sydney !

Our main destinations were Sydney CBD and blue mountain. We found Serah's place as an ideal convenient place in between.  We are a big family of four adults and three children and we still found enough space. Haven't got time to use the pool though. There is a big dining table in the back where we had nice family dinner. We used the washing machine and dryer too. 

Sarah is a wonderful host too. She replied to my SMS's in no time. Thanks for being so friendly Sarah

I spent two nights at Michele's place and had a great stay. It's near some cool cafes in Newtown (which Michele kindly recommended), and it's an easy walk to the train station. The space itself is fairly small but it's bright, modern and clean and had everything I needed. The fruit and cereal were great to have in the morning and the shower was excellent. Michele was also very accommodating about me dropping off my bag earlier in the day and was always quick to respond to any messages. I would happily stay here again!

Absolutely wonderful stay at a beautiful home! Thank you so much Helen, you were helpful and went above and beyond during the whole booking process. Place was spotless when we arrived and beautifully decorated. Would 100% recommend and come back. Thank you

Our family has such a wonderful time living in Heidi's house. We have 7 adults and 1 baby and this house comfortably accommodates all. It is a very nice house with every convenient facility you could ask for a holiday rental. Heidi even got a rice cooker and so many spices that we use for our cooking. It's so great because my family is from Vietnam and they love to cook and cannot live without rice. We also have great time using the clean pool and barbecue. My husband and I had a good experience when taking my 5 month baby to swim for the first time. Heidi is a fantastic host that welcomed us in the first day and showed us every corner of the house. We are very satisfied and definitely will come back here if we have a chance

This was my second visit and I enjoyed it as much as the first time. The location is perfect both for business travel, being close to the CBD as well as leisure, being close to the harbour.

Thanks again.
A super convient place. The location is just great. The room is really clean and cozy. Although the kitchen is bit small, it is enough for me to make simple meal.

Could not speak highly enough of the host! I let her know it was a surprise for my husbands birthday. She went out of the way to put up banners and purchase a cake as a surprise for us! Communication was A+! The room was fabulous and so clean and comfy! Thanku so very much!
Always a great stay.  Fantastic location and very comfortable.
Perfect location!Clean and beautiful (Website hidden by Airbnb) you for the great apartment!

This North Sydney apartment is very convenient and well located, with nearby Ferry, train, buses and shops and restaurants. Stephen's welcome and attention is good and efficient. I would definitely come back here and recommend the apartment to any visitors.

This was my first Airbnb and after my wonderful experience with Craig, Leoni and family it will not be my last. Friendly interacting hosts, beautiful patio area with wild parrots flying around (great place to relax after a hectic day), large kitchen, dining area and sitting room,bedroom with private (Website hidden by Airbnb) were always made feel at home. Great quiet area close to Bondi Beach and shops and restaurants very close by.Why pay over twice as much for a small hotel room.
Vue incroyable du balcon, beau quartier, hôte à l'écoute de nos besoins. L'appartement en soit est humide car au sous-sol mais bon rapport qualité-prix.

Great apartment very close to everything you need in Manly without all the noise. Apartment came with all the basics (sheets, towels, parking permit, shampoo, tea) and it’s a short walk to the nearest supermarket, transport, beach, bars, takeaways etc. 
Apartment has two main bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, living room but also a little sunroom for extra space so it has a lovely feel to it. We very much enjoyed our stay and would happily come back again. Thank you Paul.

Isaac's house was as beautiful as can be, the room had sunlight and was cozy, clean and neat. 
cozy small kitchen comes with the room and a lively backyard with a lovely and very friendly dog that is not shy to say hello to you.

Definitely recommend staying at Isaac's, as he is also very nice and kind..

Wow just what the doctor ordered. EVERY tiny thing you needed was there from coffe, milk, appliances, crockery, cutlery, vegemite even tinned tomatoes, shower gel, etc. VERY COOL DVDS, classy chess set, glad wrap salt pepper maps - you name it. All new. All fresh. All those things you hate having to buy at every hotel stay - you dont need to here. Most of all absolute Zen atmosphere. Beautiful, restful location. IGA had anything else you may need. Exemplary communication  cant wait to come back. So grateful to our amazingly accommodating but discreet hosts. Mwah!

Fantastic apartment and only a 1 minute walk to Avalon beach. The apartment is beautifully furnished having 2 large double bedrooms both with ensuite bathrooms and it has everything you need. The hosts were very thoughtful and left fresh milk, bread and loads of other essentials, even books for our kids. The apartment is very private and looks out on a lush garden, the house is on a quiet street and access to the beach is  at the end of the road. Avalon village is also within walking distance and has lots of cafes, restaurants and cute shops. Absolutely recommend this property!!
A great apartment with a view

We had a wonderful time in Sydney in every way, superb dining, still savouring the memories, excellent sightseeing, the apartment worked out brilliantly, quiet, clean, perfect for our needs, in a great  location in it's proximity to Circular Quay with all it's forms of transport to anywhere in Sydney, plus cafe's, restaurants, supermarkets and shopping.  We were met on time on arrival at the apartment our host allowing us earlier entry than listed as well as a later departure time to suit our incoming and out going flights which we really did appreciate. Any issues were dealt with efficiently as per 11 light bulbs which were out and needed changing.  Thanks so much for a lovely stay, we'd definitely book the apartment again.  

Warm regards
Leonie
Great location. Everything you need in the city centre

Marcella's house was perfect for our reunion of two families (each of 2 adults and 2 kids). Both families were comfortable and at the same time not feeling that they were living on top of each other. The house had everything we needed to have meals in as well as a good choice of venues within 5 minutes walk. The area is great with the nice beach on the doorstep. The city was easy to access (40 mins by bus traffic permitting) with the bus stop just around the corner. No complaints from us and we will definitely consider staying again should we require so many beds!
Great location in the middle of the city.
Great location, good stay, couple of little things not repaired or maintained to the highest standard  but didn't really impact our stay

Staying at Bill's place is a home away from home. Beautifully decorated and enough room for 3 couples. Comfy beds, beautiful courtyard. It has everything you need, full kitchen if cooking. Very conveniently located in Glebe, only minutes from Light Rail Station, a short walk to Glebe Point Road to busses that take you into the CBD, lots and lots of restaurants, cafes, supermarkets. A short walk to the Glebe Markets held every Saturday (a must do in Glebe). Bill was very helpful and prompt in communicating, his book is very informative. Parking is scarce in Glebe, however Bill was able to supply parking permits at a very small cost. Value for money!!!

TOP 1 choice is you want to stay in Sydney no matter travel or work , you can have tranquil life in here with adorable cat and energetic frogs,. Also you can meditate in imposing garden and grab a cup of coffee. Greg and Maggie can give you plentiful information about transportation.
Very hospitable hosts! Great location, close to local amenities and the beaches. Excellent value for money.
Such a large and comfortable and well equipped Airbnb is hard to find in this area.  It has lots of space and is extremely well equipped. A gem.

Wayne and Kate's place is why I love Airbnb. Coordinating our arrival and check out was a breeze - and the apartment was everything it promised - big, sunny and right on the beach. I hope we get to return soon.

Fantastic location halfway between the city and the Sydney Olympic Park complex. Perfect for those in town for entertainment and then being able to enjoy all the things Sydney city have to offer. Would easily recommend and return in a moments notice. 5 stars all the way!

This is the ideal location for a single person or couple if you plan on travelling around Sydney and to country NSW. Public transport to everywhere is at your doorstep including trains, buses and light rail. A small convenience store is next door for milk and snacks. The range there, however, is limited and you would struggle to find ingredients to make a meal. Other food options are very close by. The bed is very comfortable and the balconies have nice views over Central Station towards Haymarket. Although there was a little bit of noise from the trains, it was minimal.

Great, central location in the Sydney CBD. Very close to Martin Place railway station, and a wonderful IGA supermarket allowing for self-catering.  The apartment is a good size, and nice to have a small balcony with furniture when the weather is warmer. The bedroom is spacious with a large king bed and mirrored wardrobes. The kitchen is a good size and has everything to knock up a meal. If staying longer, having the cupboard laundry is a huge bonus. We will return when staying in Sydney again. Highly recommended. Johannes was good to communicate with, and arrival and departure was simple.

In terms of the location it was perfect where we needed to be. The Newport pub was superb and only a couple minutes walk down the road. The homemade marmalade and muffins were delicious and a truly delicious idea. Tessa and Rod went out of their way to assist us and make us feel at home. The place also has some privacy which is great. We will definitely visit again!!
Great place and well recommended.

Hernan's place is in a good location close to shops and the beach. The apartment is on the 3rd floor so if you have a lot of luggage it's  bit awkward to go up and down.  Hernan is very efficient with responding to you.  Very good value for what it is.

The house is as described and more.  We hosted our mums 80th birthday here and she was blown away by the location.  We had 14 family members staying all having their own great size rooms and areas so we did not feel on top of each other.  I would recommend and will be back again.

Patrick & Christine's place was amazing. Spacious rooms (the photos make it look smaller instead of bigger!), the area is quiet and peaceful. The sunroom is PERFECT for sitting around with a cup of tea and a book. Communication was clear and friendly, buses right outside and a short walk to a train station, a quick drive/uber/taxi/bus to nightlife in Newtown, it's got everything you'd need. 

Couldn't recommend it enough. Thanks again Christine and Pat!

Awesome!  Location within about 5 minutes of the train station.  Nice neighborhood...felt like I was "coming home" every evening as I walked from the station.  Apartment has everything you need and a great view of the Harbor Bridge from the balcony.  Thanks Millie!
comfortable place.

Sarah was great host and was always reachable .her place is nicely located for  travelling around Sydney's  western suburbs .
The kids had a Funtime  with the cats and the outdoors.

I really enjoyed the fabulous mansion accommodation (with views of Sydney) and Fei's family's welcoming hospitality! The location is perfect for catching transport to the CBD and there are great restaurants right in Petersham. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay!
Tracy's wee unit was lovely & clean, Tracy is a fantastic host and went above and beyond to help us out!
My Daughter and I spent the weekend at Ziggy's. It was so clean and central to the beach and ferry. I would highly recommend this apartment to stay in. Thanks again Ziggy.
Location was perfect! Craige and Leoine are great hosts!
Great place to Stay.....
Lina's place was immaculately clean & was 5 minute walk to Nepean Hospital, which was perfect for our purposes. Lina was very helpful & obliging.
An amazing place to stay!

Stayed at Angelas very briefly for one night on way to Southern suburbs.  Place was easy to find and really close to the airport.  Rooms were nice and clean and modern.   Had a delayed late flight and Angela was very responsive and super easy to communicate with, and facilitated a late check in for me which was greatly appreciated.   Highly recommend this place :)

Belinda is a lovely host and their home is very welcoming & family friendly. You feel relaxed as soon as you arrive! Our kids loved the back yard and the trampoline and the other toys that Belinda kindly left out for us. Would highly recommend!
Very good suburb, nice hosts, close to transport

Great, affordable accomodation in prime location. Large home with everything you'd expect and more.
Would recommend highly.
Godelieve is a very kind women and staying in her place was really nice. I highly reccomend this house, spacious and cosy. Great for relax and enjoy a great time near the beach and shops.
perfect location for fantastic value!

This place is AMAZING. The photos don’t do the place justice. We stayed here for 5 nights with our 3 month old baby and it was the perfect place. 

It is clean and the private pool with gorgeous views made it so relaxing. It has a stove, microwave and little fridge for when we wanted to reheat food. 

It’s located well with a short 3 min walk to the Forage cafe for excellent morning coffees and short 10-15min drive to Palm Beach for seeing the Lighthouse and dining at the Boathouse or Jonas at Whale Beach or even Bert’s at Newport. 

Evelyn is a great host and we can’t wait to stay here again.

Clean and well positioned. Note that the whole building is currently undergoing construction, so as well as the noise (as mentioned in the listing) the halls and elevator are a worksite. The pool and sauna facilities are lovely though. I’m not sure I would stay here again for the price (& the cleaning fee $200+). There is nothing wrong with the apartment itself, however my experience overall was a little underwhelming.
It was okay, not bad not any issue,

The Studio was a lovely place for a weekend for my husband and I to get to know Bundeena. Well appointed, comfortable with a nice beach house decor. Quite private for a backyard studio - we only met the host when picking up and dropping off key - there is a separate entryway and the leafy garden outlook meant it was well screened from the main house. The only sounds were the birds and occasional possum. We enjoyed the breezy verandah which kept us cool on a very warm weekend. Very well located - walking distance to all the best beach spots, walking tracks, shops and ferry. Loved it.
A very comfortable and pleasant apartment in a terrific location, a few minutes walk from the ferry, the beach , and the Manly restaurants and shops.

Great location to base yourself when discovering lovely Newtown. Walking distance to all (cafes, bars, shops, train station) but still in the lovely residential side street.  Place is very clean and the host was prompt attending to all needs. Highly recommend this place.
A great location, an awesome accommodation - we will be coming back

Arnie and Lorraine were excellent hosts. They were welcoming but not intrusive. I stayed at this bnb for 4 nights while my husband was in St Vincents Private Hospital. The bnb was in a great location a 15-20 minute walk to the hospital. It is in a safe area with plenty of cafés and restaurants in the vicinity.  The keyless entry saved the worry about carrying keys. My first time using bnb. A good experience. Thank you.

We enjoyed our Sydney visit from Manly. Why? Because it was great to drive every morning via ferry into the city and to have the great view on the harbour bridge, the skyline and of course the great opera. In fact that was our initial reason to book our days at Jackies flat. In our eyes the best way to travel smoothly into the city without any stress. Our „home“ was great as well, we enjoyed the beautiful flat from the first second on. Worth to mention: Jackie and her husband are great conversation partners.
非常非常干净､像家一样､喜欢~

Hernan was a great host! Even though he wasn't at home, when we arrived, he gave us good instructions how to get to the apartment.
We stayed just for one night,but felt right at home. We really enjoyed our stay, the little chat, wine and cheese :)
Thanks again!
Polite helpful hosts, great location close to amenities, but still private enough to relax. Lovely clean space with everything you need.

We all enjoyed our time at your humble abode. Thank you, it is a beautiful home and everything was supplied we were all well looked after and I'll be sure to recommend this place to family and friends. Location was conveniently just a short stroll to the beach and shops. Thanks you Marcella
A beautiful and quirky place right amongst the hustle and bustle of Newtown/Enmore. Great amenities and a beautiful garden to sit amongst nature and bath in the sun.
房东态度可以 但是房间卫生一般
Super quaint area and easily accessible by the train. We had a great time and the host was super nice. Would 10/10 stay again

I had a lovely stay at Stevens place. He was such a great host, and let me check in super early after a red-eye flight, and was very accommodating. The accomodation was clean and as appeared in photos on AirBnB. Steven was an excellent communicator and was quick with responses on AirBnB chat. Steven also had good tips for navigating the back streets as a shortcut to get to the local train station, and had some great restaurant suggestions. Thanks for a lovely stay :)

Naveen's place was absolutely beautiful! Perfect location in vibey Darlinghurst and close to Kings Cross Station and buses. Loads of restaurants nearby.

Check in was super easy with the building concierge who also kindly kept our suitcases after check out when our flight was delayed.

High end toiletries provided. Washing machine and dryer available. Gym on the same floor. Excellent communication. 

Only notable thing is that there is bottle collection early in the morning which didn't really bother us but if you're a light sleeper or wanting somewhere quiet then maybe stay outside the city.

For the city slickers, this apartment is definitely an excellent spot!
Great house, great location and a great host.
Tiger is a very nice and friendly guy. I really enjoyed the stay. I got a lot of advices where to go and what to do. So I can really recommend to stay at his home.
Fantastic little apartment with easy access to Darling Harbor and surrounding areas. Will definitely be using this place again in the future.

Immaculately clean, with new modern furnishings and decor, and clear instructions. I would (and definitely tried) to stay here again! Located in what I would call the suburbs so Uber or self-driving is the best, though location is possible with a bit of walking and train/bus as instructed (or check (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps). WiFi was a saviour. It was cold at night but I discovered the heated blanket and all was alright. There is a washer but no dryer, so expect to hang dry.
比较市中心  到悉尼游客方便出行

I nearly cried when I hugged Terry goodbye. I was there for about 2 weeks and I really felt like I made a friend. Terry was super nice to talk to but she allowed you to set the boundaries so if you wanted to be social, you could and if you didn't want to be,you could have your privacy. Even though the listing technically says that you have a private room and washroom to yourself, I actually had the entire place to myself many days. Terry went the extra mile by taking me out to Salsa night for my birthday and we've had her home-cooked dinner while watching movies. The room comes with several guides on stuff to do in Sydney as well. Everything was clean and there was ample space in the fridge and the cupboards to store your food. Amazing experience overall.

Hugo was a super host! His apartment had spectacular views and was in a very central and convenient location. Near Townhall train station and a local supermarket. Very much appreciated Hugo’s thoughtfulness with local tips and sites to see and always had quick responses.
Spacious place with good access. Friendly host, very good at communication.

Paul was a friendly and helpful host. The apartment is strategic-located, walking distance from Manly Wharf. There are wi-fi, towels, shampoo and soap, and many more. I even can get an early check-in and a bit late check-out. Thank you so much Paul!
Fantastic room and wonderful persons that are connie and Hernan

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit bei Paul und Judith. 
Da wir sehr spät landeten, konnten wir erst gegen Mitternacht einchecken, was Paul nicht daran hinderte uns herzlich zu Begrüßen. Das Haus war wunderschön. Die Lage perfekt um die Stadt zu erkunden. 

Jederzeit wieder.
物超所值

This place has an awesome view from the large deck with grill, table, and seating. It is close to Blue Mountains hiking trails and lookouts and Blackheath is a nice small town to explore with restaurants, shops, antiques, and art. Katoomba is a very short drive.

The studio is in a safe and quiet neighborhood. During my stay I commuted to the CBD via bus and uber. The bus stop is on the corner and is an easy ride into the city. There are cafes, pubs, and convenience shops very close and within a short walking distance. Great spot for the price!

Super convenient place!! Right next to train station, so you could easily get to and from everywhere. Also, Newtown is a really neat and quirky area! The place is a great, quiet home base for Australia adventures :)
Wayne&Kate's house is amazing! Everything are same as photo on the web,location is excellent.and hosts are very welcome!
The place is very clean with all amenities and also at a location walkable to public transit. I had to extend my stay and I rebooked the same place as I liked it .

We had a lovely stay at Wayne and Kate’s apartment. The apartment is very comfortable, Wayne and Kate take a lot of care to make their guests feel welcome. The beds are incredibly comfortable, we hade everything we needed and the view is to die for. Watching the ocean from the balcony was both calming and rejuvenating. The cafe on the beach opposite serves great food and coffee and our kids loved the beach and the playground. Thank you Wayne and Kate for being so attentive and thoughtful, we had a wonderful time.
Excellent stay. Kassandra’s home is beautiful and situated in a fantastic location.

The apartment has a great location,easy to access to Circular Quay,Rock Trains and Darling harbor ,even the supermarket is very close,just 5 min by walk.The apartment was so good and well furnished living room,beds were so comfortable,the kitchen was a bit smaller,but you can find whatever you need.If you are looking for a good base to explore Sydney,this is a good one:))  Chloe is kind too.

Lovely building and spectacular view Vietnamese down stairs is delicious and cheap, there is also a mini mart and coffee shops in the below street which is really convenient 
Was disappointed to find the couch had a large tear running straight down the centre exposing the sponge of the cushion and there was child’s drawing/permanent marker all over the tv cabinet

We stayed in this lovely apartment for one week and had a fantastic time! Natasha is a wonderful host, welcomed us with a bottle of wine, shared a lot of recommendations for restaurant and activities with us and was always very responsive. The apartment has a perfect location right next to the bondi beach. There is also a rooftop with a fantastic view and the bus station to the city center is just in front of the apartment. The apartment itself is very modern, cozy and you feel at home. It has a perfect size for two people. We will definitely stay there again if we get back to Bondi Beach. Highly recommended.

We stayed with Kerri after we had moved house and before flying to Europe for a holiday and it was exactly what we needed! Kerri is a lovely, thoughtful host, offering us breakfast for the morning and making sure we were comfortable. Her place is really lovely, the bed is very comfy and the shower is the best! It's also very conveniently located to the cafes, shopping and nightspots of Newtown and Enmore, with the city a short train ride away. I would highly recommend Kerri's to others looking for a Sydney stay.
Great location. Very close to shops & beach.
Great location, clean, comfortable and spacious
We had a fantastic time here. The house is in a great location, and provided us with a brilliant base from which to explore Sydney. Paul and Judith were very welcoming - would definitely recommend.
The apartment was very nice, we had everything we need to spend a great weekend. Sacha was very kind and handy host, helping with everything we need to enjoy our stay.
Great place in a good location. Host very helpful. Would stay again!
Great host, great house and fabulous location! Thanks so much for having us!
Very cozy and comfortable. Very quiet neighbourhood and a lovely room. A great host as well! Enjoyed our stay!

i stayed 4 days with hernan and connie both very nice and friendly,room very clean,comfotable big bed,bus Station 5 minutes away.
all in all: perfect

Great Location. Prompt assistance and communication from Charles. Excellent wifi. Quiet accommodations close to all the fun spots. Supermarkets within walking distance. Train station just down the road.

Simon and Nicole welcomed us in their lovely apartment. The apartment has everything to help make our stay comfortable with all extras, I can think of nothing else they could include. Convenient location, comfortable bed, loved the decor. Thank you I would definetly stay again.

This is our second time in 3 months that we are back to this place. That tells a lot of my preference for this airbnb. We love the location - near shops and restaurants and especially its proximity to UNSW where my son is now studying. It is clean and well equipped. To top it all, Oliver is a great host being very flexible and responsive. I would highly recommend his place to everyone.

the location was just fabulous. only 5 min walk to Barangaroo and heart of Sidney.
Oriel was perfect host with warm heart.
however smoke alarm was little bit sensitive. I was just cooking my steak with hoods on with high function but the alarm rang so easily. Otherwise his place was just perfect.

LOVED staying here. So close to the beach and close to restaurants and shops. The place was a cozy and comfortable place to come back to at the end of the day. We had everything we needed and more to make us feel at home. I’d come back in a heartbeat!
Great location
The place was really clean and tidy. A microwave oven would be helpful. Sarah was a really nice and kind host.

We stayed at David's place for two nights and really enjoyed every minute of it. Nicely situated cosy apartment with plenty of space, light and character. Everything was clean and most comfortable. Communication during the booking, check in, check out process was too easy.
Great location, close to CBD and Darling Harbour. Comfortably accommodated a family of 5. Pool and gym were great.
Louise’s place is ideally located to walk to SCG (Sydney Cricket Ground) or any type of event located at Moore Park.

Great place with good locality.Host is so helpful and easily contactable...all check in and check out procedure is easy...I really like your padlock with bruce lee picture...i hope i can get onei can’t find it in sydney
Relaxed vibe, perfect for families or couples, fabulous location, close to great shops, restaurants and iconic Bondi Beach.

The location was very convenient, and the apartment was clean and new - perfect for my girlfriend and I. My only issue was that the sink was quite small, which made rinsing plates, pots and pans quite difficult before putting them in the dishwasher. Overall, it was a great stay, and dealing with Nicki before the stay was a pleasure. Recommended for someone who wants to stay within walking distance to the city.

We stayed in Victoria's place for a bit more than a week. The location is just outstanding; cafes, restaurants, cinema, public transport....everything is so close and nevertheless the flat is quiet at night and with air conditioning perfectly temperature wise at night during summer. We loved our time in the flat and thanks to Victoria it was a perfect start.

Ten out of ten. *****. The place is exactly as pictured - impeccably clean, bright and airy with all the facilities. Crisp white sheets, lots of pillows and a comfy bed complete the relaxing feel. I came here to rest and left refreshed and calm. Cathy was a perfect host. Her communications were excellent, prompt and relevant. I can't wait to return! Thankyou Cathy'
Great value for money. Great area to visit. Hosts were very attentive.

The house is in a great location - just 5 minutes walk to the beach and a few minutes from Hall Street cafes and restaurants. The neighborhood is quiet and residential. 

We enjoyed our stay. Treen was very helpful and quick to respond to our queries.  The house is all we needed with 3 bedrooms, open plan kitchen and living and a small back garden.  A second or bigger bathroom would have been ideal but the houses in the area tend to be small, so not an option. 

Would recommend for a stay in Bondi.
Second time staying here and was once again wonderful.  Clean, comfy, great location, wonderful hosts with great local knowledge and so helpful.  Thanks for a wonderful stay.  We will be back
Place was in an excellent prepared state with all amenities in working order. Jennifer made us feel especially welcome and was always available to solve any potential problems

Really lovely apartment in quiet block, great federation bathroom and renovated kitchen. Super clean and well equipped, in a nice leafy neighbourhood close to shops and water.
Host is friendly and very fast to respond. Overall a very good experience, highly recommend.

The location is very good. It is very close to circular quay and opera house. But it is little far from cbd... and its heater is broken. So it is little bit cold while i am staying here.......But they bring oil heater to me. Hahaha.......
Fantastic location for any event at Olympic Park. Very tidy apartment and host very responsive. Would definitely stay there again for any Homebush events.
Everything you need. Nicely self-contained and good value.

Arianne's place was exactly like as (Website hidden by Airbnb) was cosy and comfortable..the location was great as it was near the train station..arianne was a good host very responsive.. eventhough i didnt have a chance to meet her but her mother denise was very nice welcoming me and family to the house..
Went above and beyond with our stay. Comfortable, clean, modern apartment. One bedroom but plenty of room. Will definitely be back!

Really great experience. Coffee in the sun room was great. Only thing is that the person staying next door seemed to be walking around in high heels at 1am and it was very audible through the wall. Other then that amazing.
Hernan is an extremely polite, accommodating, respectful, and helpful host. His home is beautifully furnished, quiet, and a great escape from the city. I highly recommend!

Victoria’s place was spacious enough for two people and very clean studio. Its location was pretty good. She helped me and responded very quickly whenever I needed her. There is public coin washing machine and dryer on the same floor ($3 each) Everything was quite pleasant and safe.

Victoria was super quick to respond to all questions, the location is amazing, great area for cafes and bars, also very central to close to the train so it's very to get around.  Lovely and clean space, it was a pleasure to stay
Thanks for hosting us Ian! The apartment is very spacious and location is really good. It’s quiet and near the airport. :)

We chose to stay here due to proximity to the Australian Technology Park conference venue - 6-mins walk away!
A great set of cafes, restaurants and bars kept us entertained locally...but 5-mins walk to Redfern Station makes getting to the city or inner-west super-easy too.
Set in a beautiful, safe complex, it’s easy to feel like a local. 
The apartment has everything needed for cooking and a night in too. We hope that the hosts will keep on top of the cleaning, as it’s a great apartment to call home.
One of the best Airbnb's I've ever stayed. Rudi and Avalon are total legends and two of the kindest people I've ever stayed with. Would go back in a shot.

We had a great time at Gavin's apartment. Gavin is a super host. He helped us to plan our short stay in Sydney and we saved a lot of time by following is recommendations. The apartment is REALLY well located (a couple of minutes from the Central station) and clean. 
Don't hesitate to book this accommodation to discover beautiful Sydney!
We had a fantastic time in Bondi. Thanks Cat, your house is lovely. Comms were always prompt and very helpful.
Wendy's place is stylish and very clean. The balcony is lovely. Pool and sauna were amazing. Wendy replies to messages very fast and is flexible. I highly recommend Wendy's place.

My wife, daughter and I had an amazing time in Sydney and staying at Serena's place. 

The location is great, it is walking distance from most tourist attractions in the city (if you love a bit of walking like we do - about 25 mins walking to Opera house, Darling Harbour).  Supermarket is just around the corner. And if you are a Muslim looking for halal food, there are a couple of halal restaurants about 5 mins walk from the apartment. 

Serena's apartment is nice and cozy, the kitchen is well equipped for cooking a simple meal. 

Oh and Serena is very flexible with check-ins and check-outs; which is super helpful when travelling with a toddler. 

All in all, it is a great place to stay if you are travelling as a couple or with a small child.
A convenient and comfortable studio!

Susan and Greg were very helpful, letting us leave our bags when we arrived early and keeping in touch to let us know when the room was ready.  The studio is as comfortable as it looks - it's in a beautiful garden setting and the neighbourhood is a pleasant and safe place to walk around.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here, thank you.

Perfect house and location for our family! We could walk everywhere but also very close to train station. It was plenty big enough for 6 adults. Well equipped kitchen and comfortable beds. Highly recommend and we would definitely come back
it was good time with kath and rusky.
Great location.
Emplacement parfait!

The place is clean and cosy, I liked the  neighborhood and the bed is comfortable. You will have everything you need. Angela is a a very good host, she received us on the night quite late and was always easy to communicate with her, responsive to all my questions and give us some options to go around. You will enjoy your stay.

역이랑 엄청 가깝고 하버브릿지도 바로 앞에서 볼 수 있어서 매번 뷰 보고 감탄했네요~! 주택가라 조용하고 안전해서 다음에도 방문하고 싶습니당! 

I won’t say other words:)) Perfect!
Anita’s place is fantastic and she puts so much attention to detail in everything! I look forward to returning again someday!
A beautiful property. In a great location. Very stylish, great views, and a perfect place for a getaway! Quick responses from host, and very helpful. We will definitely come again :)
Wonderful quiet and clean studio, host Susan very helpful and friendly - had a lovely stay!
Chloe is very easy to work with and her place is in the perfect location for Sydney
Belinda has created a lovely, private studio that has everything we needed and provided a sanctuary at the end of the garden. It is well located close to beaches and the village and very comfortable.

This is a great place to stay, beautifully presented, very private (including own entrance), great location (in terms of proximity to Bronte beach, the Bondi cliff walk, local restaurants and public transport to the city), and extremely comfortable. The apartment is set at the rear of the stunning backyard garden with its own outside private area with table and chairs. Hosts are engaging, helpful and interesting without being intrusive.
The location is very good, a 3 min walk to Kingscross station and easy to find. The house is clean enough. Worth the price.
Great place and location! An excellent host and very responsive to questions. Will return for sure! Fully recommended! Thank you for having us!!!

Marcella's house at Maroubra is a wonderful space that hosted our party of seven adults easily. Two minute walk to the beach and around the corner from a club, hotel and restaurants. We had a fantastic time. Marcella responded quickly to our request and was happy to accommodate a late departure. Thanks Marcella.

The location is perfect, close to everything (between Bondi beach and the Opera house). There is a bus stop very close to have easily access to everything. It’s a lovely place, comfy and Jessica was always there if we had any question. It’s a good place to stay during your holiday.
We had a great time at Valentine's place.  Location is excellent, easy walk to beach, transportation, restaurants and stores, and views are spectacular.
Great place with a super stylish fit out!

Extremely clean and we had everything we needed at the property. The location was great and it was super easy to walk to main spots like Darling Harbour, George St and Pitt St shops. A fun and lively stay.

My partner and I stayed in this clean spacious apartment for five nights. It's right in the heart of Surry Hills, a five-minute walk to all kinds of fun shops and restaurants. We walked *everywhere* during our stay---to the harbor many times, and to many parks and neighborhoods. We enjoyed returning to this apartment and relaxing in the evenings. We loved the building's roof deck---seriously, it's a delight!---and fitness center. We cooked almost every night while we were there, and loved the easy walk to great markets. Nicole was out of town during our stay, but still she and Simon responded to us promptly. We're very glad we stayed here.
Beautiful. Serene. Private and in a beautiful location.
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great spot!
Great location.  Close to train station, great restaurants and bars.  Very clean and private space.
Hernan and Connie were kind, welcoming and accommodating.  It was just what we needed after our long days walking around Sydney.  Getting to see lorikeets on their balcony was an unexpected bonus!
I had a wonderful night's stay at Michy's cabin. What a beautiful place and the surrounding landscape is gorgeous.
Ven accepted our request 2 hours before our arrival. The room was very nice and clean and so was the bathroom which we had for ourselves.

Great apartment, close to public transport and amazing views back over the cbd. Being off the main road very quite and for a studio very roomy and comfortable with well appointed kitchen. The host was excellent
We loved our stay in Surry Hills! Great apartment, perfectly located in a FANTASTIC neighborhood. We would rent the place again in a heartbeat!
Great thanks

Nathan and April are great hosts and their place is top notch. Beachfront with a bus stop that goes almost everywhere in Sydney is tough to find. If you love the beach and surfing this is the place to go!

Nice place. Great host. Best location.
Highly recommended.

Very nice brand new apartment with a stunning view. Comfortable bed and nice furniture. Very clean and tidy. Host is hard to contact and communicate.
High wind area, the wind noise is strong even inside the apartment.
all as described
A lovely, quiet and well equipped cottage in the seaside suburb of Claireville. A perfect getaway for a single/couple.

Enjoyed my time staying in Clare’s house. Her place was modern and clean. The proximity to the train station was perfect. I could go anywhere I want easily. Its in the quiet end of Newtown so you wont get bothered by the youthful crowd. Clare made my stay as comfortable as possible giving me tips and tricks around the area and the city. Wouldn’t mind staying there again in the future.

Simone's house was the perfect location for our purpose in attending a conference nearby at the uni. It was bright and airy with plenty of room for 3 of us. It was also quite handy having the extra toilet outside!
The pantry is well stocked with the basics like salt, pepper, oil etc and there was a lovely bottle of wine in the fridge on arrival.
The nights were a little cool and although we found an extra blanket, we all felt we could have done with a quilt/doona as well.  The WIFI seemed a little slow...perhaps it was shaped at that time? but i found i needed to use my own personal hot spot on my phone rather than wait for the house wifi to load up.
The location is great as is also close to Coogee beach and The Spot offering a great variety of restaurants.

Great, spacious and clean apartment in an awesome location. My only suggestion would be two sets of keys, as myself and my colleague with whom I was staying had different dinner plans and had to coordinate to meet up in the city somewhere so we could return home at the same time. Would stay again, thanks.
Cathy's place is very clean and comfortable and is ideally suited to short stays. It is located within walking difference to shops and restaurants etc. We were very happy with our stay.

Nicole was excellent to deal with good communication throughout the booking 
Would highly recommend this property
Great place! great time!
위치 전철역 근처라.  편하고 호스트 너무 좋았어요 근처 마켓도 친절하 알려주시구. 챙겨주셔서 gooood

We had a great stay at Terry's in Sydney. The place was neat and clean in a well maintained apartment building. 
The location was also easily identifiable and close too to train stations.
Check in was smooth even though Terry was out on work. We had everything we needed right from bathroom amenities and a comfortable night stay.
Note for future travelers - make sure the right Vibe hotel ( Rushcutters bay) is entered in address as there are a couple of Vibe hotels in Sydney
Really lovely apartment , great location

A lovely apartment, right in the heart of Manly. It was clean, tidy, well appointed and provides everything  required. We were met with a very friendly welcome on arrival and shown the unit, but after that we were left undisturbed. I would happily recommend this apartment.
Alles gut. Sehr zu empfehlen. Super gelegene whg. In der nähe vom hippen Quartier Newtown. Alles gut und tolle tipps.
We had a lovely two days staying at Wayne and Kates' place. Wayne was both helpful and welcoming throughout the entire experience. A lovely apartment in a truly stunning location!

This is a clean, conveniently located apartment surrounded by an excellent selection of shops, bars, cafes and restaurants. It is just a few minutes walk from the train station (subway) and about a 20-minute walk from the CBD. The host, Paul, was very pro-active with email communications and very helpfully arranged for us to drop our bags off in the morning before the apartment had been cleaned, allowing us to spend the day in the city luggage-free.
Amazing place, very clean on arrival. They were always available for any questions we had. It was a great stay!
Beautiful views, spacious living areas and sleeping quarters, quiet neighbourhood. Very little to complain about. Bailey is very responsive and helpful for any queries.

Mohit was great host. Excellant communication, great location, everything was good as described. Unfortunately dryer and dishwasher were broken at the same time and it couldnt be fixed during our stay. Other than that our stay was very pleasant and welcoming. I would definately recommend Mohit's place for sydney visit. Close to city and shopping places. Big Cheers to Mohit and his places. Best wishes

Location is incredible and the apartment is cosy but well laid out. Bed is super comfortable and on a Saturday you can cross the road for the markets and listen to some live music with a coffee. Nothing I wouldn't recommend about this place!
Perfect for a mini break and a fantastic alternative to a hotel. Clean, comfortable and very welcoming. It was a oasis!
Beautiful spot to stay - easy walk to the beach and Susan and Greg we're very easy to co-ordinate with.
The host really kindly, and this room is comfortable for stay.

Beautifully renovated one bedroom apartment in the gentrified Potts Point area in a classic old building. Close to fantastic cafes and food outlets and transport. Very convenient.  Will definitely be back!

This place had so much potential but sadly didn’t quite deliver. It is certainly a trendy apartment but the place was incredibly noisy, both from the street & the upstairs tenants. The bed was the most uncomfortable bed I’ve ever slept in & really is ready for the tip as it has lost all springs through the middle section. I was disappointed that there was not even coffee or tea supplied & the bathroom soaks through after 1 shower (the bath mat easily become saturated). I was also disappointed that you had to pay up to an extra $75 to have the spare bed made up when requiring 2 beds for 2 guest, so we just bunked in together.
On a positive, after requesting an iron she did eventually deliver, unfortunately it was on our last day of our stay.
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Thank you
Great location!
It was really a good choice. Clean, pleasant, good organisation... I hope to come back soon.

Merci Victoria pour votre charmant accueil, votre appartement est charmant dans un quartier animé avec des cafés et restaurants à proximité. 15 mn à pied de CBD et de l'opéra de Sydney. La vue de l'appartement est dégagée et très bien exposé.
Merci pour vos messages de compassion suite aux attentants de Nice. Je vous recommande cette adresse.
Fabienne
交通非常便利,离UNSW步行只需要15分钟｡周围有许多餐馆可供选择,也可以在家烹饪简单的早餐｡Agata回复非常及时,也很热心帮助解决问题｡非常推荐这个地方｡

Our stay at Louise's place was fantastic - we didn't want to leave! The apartment was very clean with a well-stocked kitchen - everything we needed to have an enjoyable stay was right at our fingertips and Louise was incredibly helpful and had great suggestions for things to do/see. Would recommend for anyone looking for a cozy home base to explore Sydney!

Very recommended place to stay at Bondi Beach. Only 7 minutes walk from the beach. Brendan is an amazing host with kind heart and very helpful. He gave us a list of places to visit in Bondi, we could not visit all of them though. But we really enjoy staying in Bondi beach for 2 days. Brendan also gave us a short tour to Bondi beach, when we checked in. His place is very clean and stylish. Thank you so much for everything, Brendan. Cheers, Joseph & Jenny.

Amazing location! Very prompt replies - just overall a wonderful
experience - thank you!!!

We were thrilled with our stay here.  The location was great - it's centrally located near a main train station (Central) and it's a few blocks away from a grocery store, cafes, and restaurants.  It's a quieter neighborhood, which was perfect for us.  There was construction going on at the time, but Nicole let me know about that ahead of time.  The amenities were great - everything you could need.  The pool was being worked on, so that area was closed off.  When that space is back up and running, it's a great rooftop spot.  They even have a tennis court and Nicole and Simon provide you with rackets.  The bed was really comfortable and the layout of the apartment was perfect for a couple.  There was a day when it was raining, and we enjoyed snuggling up on the comfy couch, drinking tea, reading and watching movies.  They have a selection of movies available.  It seems they also had Netflix, but this was protected through parental controls, so we couldn't access it. It would be nice if there is an option for the renter to use their own account if they already have one, but that is really a minor thing in comparison with all the other great things this place offers.  Highly recommend staying here.
The place is located right in the central Sydney. Short distance to everything. Everything is great except the room could be much cleaner. There was dust in the bathroom. And there was no dish rack.

I would highly reccomended this place. Prime location, cute cosy apartment, nice and clean and very affordable . The hosts are soo helpful and get back to you very promptly.  The cleaning lady is lovley and does a excellent job. Sheil make you feel very welcome. I would highly reccomended this place to stay whilst your time in Sydney. Close to everything.  I would stay here again 100%

We stopped in Elise’s place for a couple nights as we were headed to a music festival close by, it was a perfect location and a good size house, with options to hang inside or chill out on the back deck!
Awesome location!  Liked our private apartment. Very clean. Our host was very nice and pleasant.  Had great amenities . Definitely would come back!
I like everything in the house: the design, color, the lovely dog!  Naveen and her husband are very friendly !
Do yourself a favour, if this place is free, book it!! Stunning. Thanks so much

Nice place, near to Bondi Junction station. 
Nice house/bedroom. 
Worth it!
sooooo convenient and clean apartment! The owner is very nice and if you are planning stay in Sydney,this place definitely is your first choice!

We loved how big the house is, and how awesome the location is. The house was baby friendly with a baby chair and toys. Thumbs up! However....... There are only 2 toilets for 8 guests. Everyone must try the gelato parlour nearby. Keep a lookout for its door bitch. Haha

The views from this apartment are simply stunning and they might be the best in Manly.  I highly recommend waking up early to catch a sunrise right from your bed or dining table with a coffee -- it's an unforgettable one.   During the morning, in the direct sunshine, the apartment can get quite warm if you don't utilize the shades properly, so be sure to do so.  
The apartment is in an incredibly convenient location, walking distance to the beach, a ton of shops and restaurants, and most importantly for me, a 5 minute walk to the Manly ferry wharf.  
Jarmo and Terje were incredibly helpful with anything I needed and I'll definitely be back!

Fantastic location, efficient communication, lovely leafy outlook over Fitzroy square, many eating, supermarket options nearby and public transport availability was very good. Good ventilation cross flow negated the need for the provided fan, bed comfortable and high quality linen and towels. Basic necessities all provided, great wi-fi, hot water good and amazing collection of books. A really enjoyable Air BnB experience.

David est un hôte très sympa et très disponible.
L'appartement correspond parfaitement à l'annonce, il est très agréable, le quartier très sympathique et idéal pour visiter la ville. 
Je recommande fortement!
Beautiful place, nice size room and very easy communication. Thanks Jennifer!

Gwen and Jim went out of their way to provide me with information on the apartment and neighborhood. They were fast to reply to communication and did everything they could to make sure my stay was comfortable. 
The location is out of this world. Close to good restaurants and bars and a 5 minute walk to the stunning Bondi Beach. 
The apartment is easy to access and comfortable. I would definitely stay here next time I am in Bondi.

A beautiful home in a stunning location. Perfectly located close to everything but very tranquil and peaceful. Visited by birds, galahs, cockatoos and lorikeets every morning. The house was so comfortable for 10 of us, so much room and lots of privacy. Couldn’t have asked for a better house for our family reunion. Bailey was very amenable with check in and check out.  We had our grandmother who loved the inclinator, young kids who adored the beach and the wildlife, and adults who enjoyed their evening cocktail on the beautiful balcony watching the sun set.  A perfect house for everyone. Thanks for a memorable stay.
The house was gorgeous, and perfect for jet-lag recovering guests. Darlinghurst was a great location from which to see Sydney. We loved it all.

Angela and Geoff were amazing hosts. They allowed us to check in early but we came too early, but it was a great opportunity for us to meet them and they're absolutely lovely! The place itself is beautiful, we stayed there to get ready for our wedding and the pictures are perfect. The location is central to all the beautiful beaches and close to the shops. We would definitely recommend staying here, in fact we're looking forward to the next opportunity for us to stay.
Sams was excellent
Really brilliant location and fantastic views. perfect as a base. we ate out most of the time but we could easily have eaten in.

Windows Windows Windows !!   Beautiful Windows !!!  And fabulous location in the heart of the city.  Walking distance to everything.  Comfortable and well equipped apartment as advertised.  Extra blankets, pillows, towels,  shampoo, laundry detergent, even tea and coffee.   Enjoyed our stay and very happy with our choice.  This was the first time I had used Airbnb so I was nervous about it.  I shouldn't have worried.  Everything went smoothly.   Thanks Gavin ! 
Reviewed by Laura from Ohio, USA.
We really enjoyed our stay in Paul's apartment. Very hospitable even though we didn't actually meet! Great location, perfect for a short stay in Sydney.
The loft was so spacious and clean! The location was about 5-7 minutes away from Central and the neighnorhood was great! I would definitely book Jason's loft again when I come back to Sydney.

The cabin was lovely & clean, well set out and yes - light drenched. Location was ideal - there was no problem with parking and we found some lovely cafes down the road. Check-in and out was easy & we thoroughly enjoyed our 2 night stay.

A great place for a short stay! Such a delight to be so close to the city and still have a beautiful, fully equipped and stylish apartment to stay in. The small decorative touches really make this space standout. The effort placed in communication was also incredible and super helpful. I could not praise this enough, thank you! It was far better than previous experiences with Airbnb hosts.
Lovely cabin. Perfect for a weekend escape in a beautiful location. We would definitely go back again.
Very good location and suitable accommodation
Great host and very accurate description!

This apartment is fantastic, amazing hosts with helpful and easy communication. Location was perfect if you need to be close to the city. 

The apartment it’s self is beautiful and I would 100% stay here again!
Great place and great location.  Really enjoyed our stay there.  Annie was great and really easy to deal with.
Incredible place!! Wish we could have seen it in all it's glory! Thanks for having us!
Great view to the bay and close to public transport.  Leslie is great host.
Great location so close to the train and airport. Lovely funky vibe to the unit and Steven is a warm and friendly host.

Stay here!!!!!! Great room. Service and communication was awesome. I arrived at the airport after midnight and still was able to get a response from her within minutes and room was perfect. Clean bathrooms are very important to me and her bathroom was amazing. Highly recommend it. Thanks again.
Sitio precioso, muy bien atendidos

A lovely 3 days spent in Victoria's studio apartment. Very well equiped and in a great location for seeing the sights of Sydney ! Victoria's attention to detail made it all the more special. We will definitely be back ! Thank you

Hi Mags!! 

Had a great stay at your Mosman apartment. Definitely would recommend to others. 

If their was something that I would ask for improvement; it would be to have better towels. One had bleach marks on them and the other was to have a full length mirror. 

Thank you so much for your cafe/ restaurant recommendations. The family loved the boathouse in balmoral. 

Once again, thank you.

Ronda' house was our little home away from home.  The decor was beautiful and the apartment was spotless with everything there that we could possible need.  Ronda was great and went above and beyond leaving beach chairs and umbrella out for us.  The price for such a great location was fantastic for our family of 5.  We will be back.
Great location, good size apartment for 5 adults. Danny provided a late check out in request. Thanks

Desiree was the perfect host.  The apartment is just as it is down on the airbnb site.  Desiree answered our many queries and requests super-quickly and she is very approachable and friendly.  The location is really close to all the CBD attractions and public transport.  Desiree added so many extras like a bottle of wine and chocolates to help us celebrate our milestone anniversary. We would highly recommend this listing. Thanks Desiree!
Great house, great location, great money for value. Highly recommend.

This is a great place to stay for a couple visiting Sydney. It is not large but very well equipped with high quality fittings and furnished to a high standard. Kings Cross station is within easy walking distance as are plenty of good eateries and a supermarket.
Bailey was an outstanding host. Easy to communicate with and the house is amazing. What a spectacular view! Thanks Bailey.
Fantastic place to stay - amazing location - would definitely recommend
Amazing location, the apartment was exactly how it described.  Desiree was very responsive and check in was easy.  Highly recommended!

Naveen and her husband Tris were exquisite hosts.  We were welcomed by Tris who working in the restaurant biz is a connoisseur of great eats and recommended some rad cafes.  The room was absolutely stunning, you wake up to a beautiful view of the rooftops and city, it makes it hard to want to get out of bed.  You are walking distance to quite a lot and have easy access to the train.  Naveen is super on top of checking in to ensure your needs are met and has great energy.  She invited us for a glass of wine when she arrived home from work and it felt like we were catching up with a friend.  I highly recommend staying here, it was a really lovely experience!

It would be hard to find a better location - you are so close to the beautiful streets of Darlinghurst, a short walk to the heart of the city and Circular Quay after that, just 5 minutes to a train station and you’re surrounded by everything you could possibly want. The house is a gorgeous terrace home styled beautifully. Our favourite part was the chilled sparkling water on tap (!!!). Matthew was an excellent host who did everything we could have asked to make our stay as smooth and enjoyable as possible. Highly recommend!
Great location, 40 minute walk to harbour front. Really enjoyed our stay

출장을 왔을 때 공항과 지리적으로 무척 가까운 곳에 위치해 있다.
월리 크릭역에서 한정거장만 가면 시드니 국제공항이 나온다.
단 시티 여행자에게는 좀 거리가 있다.
무척 청결한 숙소 상태에 감동 받았다
편안하게 잘 머물다 간다

I had a really nice but very short stay.
Arrived quite late & left early so I didn’t manage to meet my hosts but our communication was great & they were so flexible.
The place has so many thoughtful touches to make the stay more convenient. Comfortable bed also.
Just make sure you close the windows when you go to sleep as the airport is not far away.

Pascale was awesome! I got a very bad sunburn and she was so helpful, getting me aloe Vera and coconut oil to help out. She was very attentive and helped us with everything from restaurant recommendations to a place to park our car. The location was perfect; not far from the city but away from the craziness of it all.

Susan was a lovely friendly host, she provided a great breakfast and was very helpful with good restaurants to visit and local directions. The studio was perfect - clean, warm and spacious and a great price. The location in Leichhardt was within easy walking distance to eateries and transport. I'd definitely stay here again.

Great little spot, just as described in a beautiful part of Avalon. 
Evelyn was excellent in communicating with us and her partner was extremely welcoming with lots of tips for our stay. We had a car but the shops and main beach were in walking distance. The rooms were very clean and we appreciated the tea, coffee (and wine!) that was provided. I loved spending our last day relaxing by and swimming in the pool, the views from here were spectacular.  Thank you Evelyn for such a fabulous experience, I highly recommend it and would love to return :)
We enjoyed our stay with Shuang, it was so convenient to be close to the airport. Would definitely stay again!

Enjoyed our stay.
Very nice apartment in a convenient location to the facilities of Sydney Olympic Park.
Jennifer was very responsive and attentive!
A nice place for a few days in a good location. Wendy was very quick to respond to any queries

Organisation was great. No problems finding the lovely old terrace house or acccessing the key even though it was late Sunday. The room was bright, clean and airy with lovely linen. While the plane noise is a bit annoying the great location and access to trains and restaurants and the good price makes it a great place to stay.
great place and host
Leslie's unit was comfortable, clean and well equipped for travellers. Breakfast! The best ever! Leslie was very kind and friendly.  I strongly recommend Leslie's place.

MissD provided us with instructions for self-check-in which was easy and clear. The house was clean, everything is labeled, and there are instructions on how to do lots of stuff. The location is top-notch with Newtown's train station and lots of cafés etc. just around the corner. Despite this, the neighborhood is extremely quiet. Only noise you may get is from the other guests if they're not being considerate. Communication with MissD was pleasant and fast. Everything went great and I would recommend staying here.
Lucy maintains a wonderful property - clean with everything you need and in a quiet area but not too far from town for a night out. Lovely hosts and highly recommend Tree Fern Garden Apartment.

The hosts were really great with communication and kept in touch throughout our stay. The house was incredibly tidy. The house is a short drive from Cronulla beach and shops and restaurants. This a lovely home and definitely not somewhere for those looking to party. It's perfect for a cosy home away from home for families or couples. There's a lovely little garden we liked to eat our dinner in and enjoy the evenings. Fully stocked kitchen and air con was good. The main bathroom is amazing with shower and spa bath. It was lovely for our family to stay here whilst our daughter was treated at Westmead hospital and easy to get onto train into Sydney, go to the beach and go for dinner etc.

Although the pictures of the apartment were fairly accurate, we were unfortunately disappointed with the apartment. The apartment is in an old building and has been fully refurbished, but the net effect is that the rooms are small and dark with large gaps under all the doors. 
Also there was no wifi, which we were not aware of when we booked, and was disappointing - I think this should be standard for all rentals. 
The apartment was clean - but we did find old food in the fridge and freezer.
Good location - easy walk to shops and ferry.

This is a very nice clean studio, if like Horse Riding this is your spot, the place is very clean in safe neighborhood, Oliver was very helpful with the check in process, and there many good stuff such as coffee, beer, oatmeal, butter, cleaning stuff, dish washer, washing machine, drying machine etc.. It was A+ stay keep up the good work guys thanks for everything
Very comfortable and clean home.
Great clean place with anything one could ask for. Best location for anything. Close to everything incl. public transport, cafes, restaurants, beaches! Wow. You feel very spoiled staying there.
A beautiful space set in a tranquil garden. Well appointed and very clean, perfect for an escape from the big smoke to relax at the beach. Great host, easy to deal with and very accomodating.

Margaret and John were lovely and their two dogs friendly and welcoming. The carriage is spotless and beautifully restored! Absolutely loved the tranquility.... great stay and I highly recommend to all Air Bnb travelers!
Super appart juste à proximité des transports et du centre ville en train.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Stylish and comfortable.

What can I say.. This was our home for 2 weeks! The apartment is tastefully decorated, clean, spacious and had all the amenities we needed. It is the perfect space for two people. The location is ideal,  in the hustle and bustle of Potts Point. Despite being a busy area we managed to slept through every night without any disruption (maybe we are deep sleepers). Everything we needed was in walking distance, including Kings Cross station which has fantastic links to all the key attractions Sydney has to offer.  

To anyone looking at staying in Sydney, we highly recommend Paul's apartment!

Had a great stay at jess's apartment.
Place was sparkly clean, bed was comfy, pool was nice. Everything is as Jess said in the description. One stop to central station but spent most of my free time neandering newtown and erskineville.
