There is some street noise but it wasnt enough to bother me if you keep the windows shut its fine. This place was really a pleasant surprise after my last air bnb experience. Thanks for having me Jess 10/10 would stay again.
There's a beautiful lake for a nice walk, so peaceful and lovely.

Fantastic location with a very easy and smooth check in. So many great coffee shops close by and just minutes walk from Darling Harbour and the ICC. Great room for a short term stay as it is very basic. There were three of us over five nights and it suited fine, a little bit cramped but it was good for what we needed.
Great cafe right downstrairs. Easy and quick communication with jennifer.

We stayed at the Granny Flat whilst visiting family in Sydney.  It's not in the centre of Sydney but there are good rail links from Kingsgrove station a short walk from the property.  The accommodation is of the highest quality in terms of furnishings, facilities and cleanliness. It was good to have our own entrance so we could come and go as we please.  George and Lucia have thought of everything you could need away from home including shopping bags, washing powder, toiletries and food cupboard staples such as cooking oil, herbs and pasta.  The welcome gift of a box of chocolates and a fridge stocked with milk and butter was really useful.  There is a small Coles supermarket at the petrol station nearby (right at the end of the road) and there is a Woolworths, plenty of restaurants and smaller shops in Kingsgrove. George is very friendly and willing to help in any way he can during your stay.  Would definitely recommend and we will use again.
Great place, clean and near to airport! It would only take you 10mins to/from her place. Modern design, with a smart TV (need your own nexflix ID) which does add value to the whole experience.

I rented this property for several special guests in Australia on business. Rachel was an ideal host and extremely hospitable to us. 

The property is a elegant modern home with a beautiful decor. We were 15 minutes from the centre of Sydney and enjoyed the secluded nature of this property. Only 15 minutes from the beautiful Taronga Zoo and a local Beach. 

The stunning environment that was well heated on cold days but bright and warm on the sunny days was a great bonus as well as a gorgeous piano in the lounge room.

We would recommend this to any AirBnB users who want a special Sydney experience.
想像以上にとても清潔で､帰りたくなるお家でした｡Timさんはとても親切で､最初何もわからない私を駅まで車で送ってくれました｡すごく快適でした｡
Lovely space, and great hosts.
Kath was a wonderful host- very clean, safe, welcoming accommodations- and we fell in love with her dog! We Highly recommend her place.

Very responsive and helpful host. Apartment and building are vintage - a little rough around the edges, but clean, comfy, and nice to come home to at the end of the day. Building is safe (front door key access). 

Note - there is no freezer, and bedroom does not have a door (a thick curtain instead). 

Also - the bedroom is well circulated by the breeze if you leave the window open, but light sleepers might be interrupted by street noise (window opens to an alley between this building and the next). 

Small desk fan in lounge room works just fine, but not sure how building would be in summer (no a/c). 

Bathroom very well stocked with toiletries, and bedroom has handy shelving/hangers for clothes. A 10 minute leisurely walk straight to Oxford St. 

Good value for money given the location. A cute retro apartment.

The weather was so hot that I reserved an air conditioner house, but there was no air conditioner in the room.
and an air conditioner in the kitchen. But the air conditioner broke down and I couldn't use it.
But the rest of the facility was fine.

House is well situated in a "Soho" type fashionable area of the city - with easy access to great restaurants, Hyde Park and other areas of interest. House has been renovated with high end appliances and excellent showers - we only used two floors but note that there are stairs leading to both upstairs and downstairs bedrooms. Beds are very comfortable and there's a lovely small terrace off the kitchen.There's a parking garage space available; directions just need to be clearer.
Nice!

The location just right next to central station
Plus wifi supplied. I m highly suggest this place for ppl travel or business :)
Fantastic place to stay
The perfect accommodation for my Mum and I. Loved the location especially enjoying a morning coffee and watching the locals (and their dogs!) walking by. Highly recommend this little gem!
Awesome place to stay

Larger than anticipated. Good location. Comfy beds. 

When arriving read instructions slowly and purposely and all will be fine. Gabbie communicated quickly when I was a little  confused with instructions. 

We came into Sydney from overseas and were exhausted after 24 plus hours in transit and we ended up loving the place and location. Definitely get a good Sydney vibe in this area.

I did not Meet Mags in person but she was quick to return to me when I had queries and pleasant to deal with. The unit is basic but has everything you need for a short stay and was very tidy and clean.
Wonderful place, very close to the airport. Beautiful house.
Matt was an incredible host! He made our stay as stress-free as possible and went above and beyond our expectations! Highly recommend staying with him at his gorgeous apartment! Great location, too!

本次旅行最不满意的住宿,地理位置就不错,走5分钟去到中心站,楼下有便利店7仔,中心站出站有一家小型超市,可以满足简单需求,到世界购物中心要走10分钟｡但住宿条件不行,房间的灯很多不亮,整间屋只有卫生间有卷纸,厅里没有提供纸巾｡卫生间的干衣机里有很多衣物｡去时遇见一位女士开门交钥匙,她要求我们进屋要脱鞋,不可以穿鞋踩整屋地毯,觉得不太合理｡我订2天,第二天那位女士10点多过来敲门,进来后到处看,好像是检查我们似的｡wifi退房那天一醒来就上不了,估计改了密码｡太多不满意了,除了靠近中心站,其他选择需慎重｡

We were very comfortable and cosy in Susan's garden studio. Firstly because Susan is a delightful host - she's warm and welcoming and helpful and generous! I have some allergies, and Susan was so helpful in making everything work for me. The studio itself is clean, nicely presented, self contained, quiet and has everything you need to make it a great base for a few days in Sydney. There's an ensuite bathroom, sitting area, TV, tea-making facilities. Glad it was cosy, as Sydney turned on some chilly days (which we thought we'd left behind in Canberra!). Leichardt is close to the city and an interesting area with plenty of eating places nearby. All in all a great place to stay. Thanks Susan!

Thanks for taking us in on such short notice! We stayed just one night and it was a great experience overall. The bedroom and bathroom were very clean. Naveen is extremely organised and thoughtful, providing a number of things for guests to use from bathrobes to a beach bag to quality bath products to a candle and mood lighting. A unique room with floor to ceiling window overlooking the street. And a gym, sauna and pool! (Be sure to check out the view from the pool). Naveen was flexible with our requests, including a late check-out, and check-in was easy - they have a concierge desk where we picked up the keys as they were not home when we checked in. Tristan is also a great guy. One thing to beware of is that you may be tempted to steal their dog Felix - friendliest dog ever! Only thing to note is that the downstairs kitchen, living area and balcony are off limits so it's just the room and bathroom - kind of like a hotel set-up, but the location is extremely convenient with lots of cafes, supermarket, bakery, juice place etc. all very close by :-)

A perfect place to stay while in Sydney. It was a cozy and comfortable spot to rest and see the sights. The listing was accurate to what we found and they were the best to work with when it comes to arrival. I would highly recommend staying here.
Fantastic Location , nice house!
Treen’s place is lovely, clean and charming. A great place to relax if you’re coming for a holiday, and its location to nearby shops, cafes, and Bondi beach is icing on the cake. Highly recommended.

The apartment is everything you would want, clean, well designed and close to shops, cafes and train.  Kerri is a very gracious and friendly host, we enjoyed our stay and would most certainly come again.  Thanks Kerri!

Annie was very helpful with accomodating our early check in and provided plenty of information about the neighbourhood. The listing was clean, had a great location as everything was only a 20min walk away and provided plenty of entertainment/amenities for when we wanted to stay in. Overall, pristine listing and great host!
I loved that the place was in a quiet area and close to Coogee Beach. From there you can do the Coast Walk to Bondi Beach which is amazing.

Location is great and the massage chair was a bonus. But the second bedroom is very very small and the shower door in the en-suite does not shut properly and water goes everywhere. 
Min’s communication was fine and it was easy to gain access.
There also seemed to be some question about the “legality” of an Air BnB in that complex.
Great place. Very relaxing. Owners very helpful.

Felix is very quick to respond to questions!

Unit is close to local shops, walkable distance!
Very close to public transport!

Loved the mini courtyard in the front!

Susan was a wonderful and accommodating host and although we never met her she provided excellent communication. The studio was clean, spacious and comfortable and within walking distance to the beach, cafes and bus stops. This is a must if you are looking for a quiet beach escape!

Paul's place is super close to the train station and easily accessible to uber and taxi pick ups. Parking is a struggle so wouldn't recommend taking your car. It's a cozy place perfect for 2. Nice small kitchen to prepare meals. Dining table, lounge and study spaces available. Noisy street with trucks at times so may not be good for couples with children or light sleepers. Overall we rated this place very highly! Service was professional and so helpful. Thanks Paul for a great weekend

Dont think you can ask for more from the host and the accommodation. No excuses here. If you are creative you can make almost anything with the kitchenette. Perfect location
. All the privacy you need and conversation (mostly by text) but the host is always happy to pop in. 
Bed is comfortable and all the netflix ypu can have at your leisure. Go for it!

Very nice, clean and spacious apartment in a great location. Check-in was a bit difficult because I never received the instructions (not sure if it was the Airbnb app or what) and Johannes was unfortunately out of reach. But after a few hours we finally managed to get it. There was no light in the bathroom when we arrived (not sure how the cleaner managed to clean without any light) so we had to change the light bulb ourselves.
Besides that the stay was very nice and the apartment is lovely.

Richard's place and Mackerel Beach are fabulous. This house is perfect. Everything is as described, it is truly stunning and just perfect for a relaxing time. Richard is a great host and easy to contact when organising the trip. We first came to know of this place when friends stayed here last Easter and we were at another place, we are so happy to have found a chance to show my parents (from Canada) this amazing location. Loved the treehouse for my parents. Thanks for having us Richard. We WILL be back!!
So easy to communicate with Nicole. She answers questions really quickly. The apartment is generous in size and  clean.
good

Fantastic location within walking distance of so many of Sydney's sights. Space was definitely a bit more cramped than I had expected, but if you're spending the majority of your time out and about in Sydney, this isn't a huge deal.
Great one bedroom apartment. I cooked a couple of nights and kitchen facilities were fine. Check in worked fine. Location is great. Johannes let me know he was available if required, which he wasn't.
Great place to stay with fabulous views and great beaches at your doorstep
A beautiful and simple space in a great area. One of those places that I'm tempted to give just one star so that we can keep it to ourselves!

Sabrina's apartment is really well appointed and had many thoughtful touches, like the coffee machine. The provided carpark is really low, don't try and fit a larger car or 4wd in there. Regardless, Sabrina's hospitality was great and the place was clean and welcoming.

Maria and Jerome's place was absolutely fantastic... the location was perfect for our long weekend trip away. Close to fabulous cafes, restaurants and the most beautiful beaches.

The window seat is to die for... the activity outside in the water of swimming, surf skis and divers is very cool to watch before starting the day's activities.

I didn't get to meet Maria but her commutation and friendliness was amazing, she gave us tips of where to go, where to eat and things to do.

We met Jerome half way through our stay and he was so lovely and made us feel very welcome.

Would absolutely recommend... I want to go back already!

This is a little gem at the Northern Beaches. Tess and Rod were the most welcoming hosts and the little studio exceeded our expectations. From the moment we arrived until we departed we felt at home (and) away from home. (pardon the punt). Loved following the suggestions of the local pub and restaurants. Tess' decoration with personal touches and home made little gestures were really appreciated.  Great private outdoor area amongst lush gardens to soak in the afternoon sun. We couldn't have asked for more. Highly recommended.

Cute apartment in a nice location. Cedric has really thought about everything you need for a short stay! Well styled and clean. Apple TV was great. Recommend heading down to see the Tramsheds in Harold Park.
Great spot, huge room with comfortable bed. Stone's throw from everything you need in Newtown
Duncan and Ashlee are great hosts and their place was clean, cosy and very close to everything. Would definitely stay here again :D

My partner and I had a fantastic stay in Jenny's apartment. It’s the perfect base for exploring Sydney. Awesome neighborhood with lots of character. Make sure to check out the weekend markets across the road. While the building is a little rustic, the apartment has been renovated extremely well. Modern, clean, every amenity you’d need. As the description states - it’s a pied-à-terre. But we found it a-ok for a couple. Also communication was fantastic. Would definitely stay there again.
Lovely little place 5-10 minute taxi ride to the International or domestic airport. 10 minute walk to Wolli Creek train station which is perfect to get to the city centre.
Super friendly and accommodating host in a great location.

An absolute gem of a place. Immaculate, lovely location, everything provided that you could possibly need. Belinda was easy to deal with, efficient and friendly. This weekend idyll was everything I hoped it would be and more. Peaceful, easy to arrange, gorgeous location, beautiful accommodation, friendly hosts. Can't wait to book again!

It was a pleasure to stay in Greg's beautifully kept cabin. It overlooked a lovely garden and we enjoyed sitting in the little patio. We enjoyed the fruit and yoghurt and the home made marmalade and cereals mix. Wish the cat was less aloof!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Steven's place. It was clean, airy and sunny with beautiful decor and a very comfortable bed. Our hosts were delightful. Two things to note, parking can be a bit tricky (though we succeeded each time) and the street is under the flight path so you might have a 6.00 am wakeup call that makes you want to duck. We are used to Sydney flight traffic control so we will be going back for another stay.
Wi-Fi根本不能使用,和房东沟通后没有任何解决措施,公寓比较旧床品有一股汗味,是一室一卫用隔板改的,墙没有封,私密性很差,窗外就是在建的楼房与图片不符,虽然公寓的位置不错,交通便利,但是性价比较低,wouldn't recommend.
Ziggy provided a great place to stay right in the centre of manly, he was also very flexible which helped out massively!
Nicks place is amazing, he is very helpful and knowledgeable, the place is outstanding and beautiful right near Oxford street I would stay here again

The apartment is in a fantastic location a short walk down to Circular Quay. The beds & living area are comfortable & all basic kitchen, bathroom & laundry amenities are provided. Highly recommended for a stay in a superb part of Sydney!

We experienced positives and negatives during our stay. 
First the positives- communication between ourselves and the host was prompt and very helpful, the check in was very easy and the host met us at the arranged time to check us in and explain the things we needed to know, the apartment is located close to shops and there is an IGA just down the road. The apartment is also close to a bus station, the ferry and train station so getting into the city was very easy. The apartment was cosy with lovely views over the parramatta river. It was also well equipped with everything we needed. 
As for the negatives, unfortunately there were some cleanliness issues. When we arrived we found some dirty dishes, dirty towels and face washers in the bathroom and the shower was quite dirty. We were concerned that the sheets on the bed had not been changed after the previous guest so we contacted the host who confirmed that they had not been changed so we had to strip the bed, wash all bedding and remake the bed. Thankfully the host did respond to our questions promptly and truthfully and provided info about where to find clean bedding - however when staying in an air BnB I don't think it's too much to ask that the sheets are clean. We had to wait up until about midnight for the bedding to dry before we could go to sleep. 
All in all, good location, good communication, nice little apartment but a few minor cleanliness issues

Sam and Penny were the perfect hosts they really made us feel so safe and taken care of. We were traveling from Ireland and they couldn't have made us feel more at home. It was like home from home. They were so friendly and generous and even entertained us a few nights, Penny cooked some traditional Chinese food for us which was to die for and offered great advice on local transport, places to go around Sydney etc and it was so lovely getting to know them. We had all the essentials wifi, TV and more, it was clean and very cosy and the bed was super comfortable! We simply loved it. It's not often you meet people as genuine and caring as Sam nothing was too much trouble for them. They were the definition of Superhosts!!. Thanks Sam & Penny
Please read the below.

Adorable home owned by an amazing person! 

My mother and me went to Sydney standby and had problems from the very start! We arrived 6.5 hours before check in and Susan was amazing and accommodating, letting us go in early and cleaning up the room a bit. She then helped take us into town and buy a train pass. It was amazing for a first day. Susan is the most helpful person I have ever met and she actually cares that you have an amazing stay in her house. She helps every step of the way and doesnt let anyone fall through any vacation cracks; whether it is getting lost, grocery shopping, buying dinner, or car troubles Susan refuses to let you make a wrong decision and will stick by you through the worst of them! If I ever went back to Sydney, she is the person I would want to be with!

Great host. My friend and I felt very comfortable during our stay.   Gavin had an answer to all our touristical questions and it was nice to chat about other topics anyways. Loved the central location.

Ziggys place is great. The location of the unit is close to cafes, shops and beach. Its clean and modern with everything you need. The kitchen was particularly well equipped for those wishing to cook for themselves. Ziggy was helpful when we needed to ask questions. We would recommend his unit to anyone wanting to stay in Manly.

The house is very good.and it is close to all the scenic spots.The view is great and the entrance is safe.There's everything you need in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) owner is patient and careful.This is a very good choice if you choose a free trip.

We had a great little stay at Hugo's place. It was perfect for a couple, very comfortable and very clean.  Great location in regards to transport (very close to the Kings Cross train station), cafes, supermarket etc.  We felt safe aswell.  I walked from the apartment to the Opera House, and it was a great walk via Darlinghurst St and through the Botanical Gardens. Thank you Oliver for meeting me to handover keys and instructions.

Great location with a modern, clean and spacious interior. Nice views of Elizabeth Bay and close to cafes and all that Potts Point has to offer. Dino was super helpful through the check in and check out process too.
Linda very nice, answer quicky, near to city and station.

Susan's studio truly surpassed all our expectations. It is set in a corner of their stunning rear garden. The room was clean, comfortable and inviting and the light breakfast was fresh and delicious. 

Susan and her family were beautiful hosts! We would certainly stay a second time round - no hesitation.

Thanks Susan & family.
Great central location only a short walk from the beach, loved all of Cat's recommendations for the area and LOVED the fireplace!  Really homely and comfortable.

A cozy little place with artsy decorations. Location is perfect being right above the Paddington shoplots, and easy access to the CBD by the bus stop nearby. The room is clean and comfortable, but may get rather hot during summer. Wi-Fi is a plus, and overall very much great for value!
Great staying at Miss D, very clean bedroom and bathroom. Quiet neighbourhood with easy access into the city.
Perfect location. Warm home. Comfortable beds. Everything you could wish for in a place away from home.
호스트와 의사소통이 잘되고 central station에서 10분거리라서 편하긴해요. 그러나 역에서 오르막길이어서 생각보다 힘들었어요. 청소는 자주 안해줘서 지저분했어요.

This place is as good as it looks. 

Really cool style.
Very convenient for traveling to CBD by train or bus. Shopping just takes a few minutes from the Inna’s place. Inna is a friend host. It is highly recommended.
Outstanding communication prior to and during the stay. The apartment was great - would stay again!

Excellent! Spotless private studio at the back of Belinda's garden. Well maintained and thoughtfully equipped. Great location for beaches, ferry and National Park walks. 
Bundeena is a delightful ' hidden' treasure. 
Belinda was friendly but unobtrusive . Thoroughly recommended
Duncan und Ashlee waren tolle Gastgeber: freundlich, hilfsbereit und großzügig - bis hin zu einer Einladung mit ihnen das Silvesterfeuerwerk auf einer der Ferries zu erleben. Unvergesslich!!!
Really nice position and Really clean

The apartment was really clean and close to the Sydney airport, it was 20 minutes walk. 
One of the things that we struggled was the use of stove. The stove was locked for the safety reason and we had to unlock it, which we didn’t know how to. 
But the response by the host was really quick and they came and helped us!
Lovely place, Ali was very responsive and the place was perfect
David was a very flexible and accommodating host. He was very communicative and understanding.

Michele has been great.
He helped us since the beginning with their info and immediate answer.
Also if Michele was not in Sydney at our arrival (due NYE) he take care that we'll safely find and enter into the apartment.
House is in good position, quite and safe, good equipped.we enjoy our stay in Michele apartment and we hope to see him another time.
Good value accommodation at North ryde. Ample parking space and Suitable for business travellers

Very homely and unfussy house with a great garden and lovely neighbours. Belinda was very thorough about advice on local ameneties and very professional to deal with in all matters. They left bikes and a surfboard for my use too.

My stay at The Garden Studio (4 nights) was thoroughly enjoyed and a great experience... Why I'd recommend you stay:

* Lots of privacy, with your own entrance...

* Cath is a very generous, understanding, and thoughtful host, and easy to contact. We particularly loved her guides about where to eat in the local area.

* TGS is very well located in the central suburb of Marrickville - easy to get into the CBD/Newtown/Surry Hills, and if you drive like me, never any complications with street parking!

* The studio was meticulous, and very well stocked - Cath filled the fridge/kitchen with nearly everything you'd need... The variety of teas and delicious homemade cookies were mostly appreciated, and I'm sure most Airbnb users are interested in an espresso machine, which was also available!

* The shower in this place is truly amazing.

All in all, if you don't mind a smaller place, this is the place for you - we found it worked well for 2 people. Thank you again Cath. :-)

A beautiful apartment. Spotlessly clean. Excellent host. Brilliant location. Would highly recommend staying here. My only negative would be no air con but apart from that it was one of the best places we have ever stayed in.

Great location for (Website hidden by Airbnb) works a bit noisy but only started early on one day. Kitchen well equipped to cook a couple of meals in....lots of options nearby for eating out. Chloe was very friendly, efficient and helpful...perfect host!...

apartment was fantastic and location was perfect for our stay as it was close to the city, restaurants and public transport, host was great to deal with. very quick responses to queries. Definitely recommend staying here.

Jessica's place was lovely! She was so easy to communicate with and accommodating. The bed was super comfortable and had such nice sheets! She provided us with towels and had some lovely complimentary tea and cookies. Jessica was able to recommend many great local spots and made us feel very welcome. I totally recommend if you're looking for a nice spot to stay!

Amazing space and location! Walking distance to anything you might need. Annie was great with communication, check in was a dream. Will definitely be back.
Thanks!
Great location, just a 20 min walk into the CBD and nearby many shops. Neat, tidy, no frills place with great communication from Hugo and Ollie. Perfect for a place to sleep while in the city.
Clean and in a great and happening location. I would stay here again whilst in Sydney for work
Good location in Bondi. Right across the street from iceberg restaurant and spa. Convenient, clean and comfortable.
Yang and Edward's place looks like the photos. A great location.
The location of this Air bnb is perfect close to all shops, the wharf and the corso. You can even see the ocean from the bathroom and kitchen. We really enjoy staying at this apartment.

We recently (April 2015) had an amazing time at Bernadette and Fred's place! All communication was prompt and clear and the apartment was well equipped with everything you could need and want. Location was brilliant - beach across the road and ocean pool, walks, cafes and restaurants within walking distance. We had a hire car but public transport stopped right outside and was easy to use for access to the city. Our girls (7yr, 11yrs) had a great time and want to always stay here (we have stayed in the city every other time in the past) but this was a lovely change of pace. Fred offered use of kayaks and was extremely hospitable with local knowledge and suggestions. Bernadette left fresh orange juice and chocolate slice when we arrived and cereal and tea/coffee for breakfast. Apartment has new kitchen and there was nothing extra we needed that was not provided.  Thank you so much for a brilliant stay - we will definitely stay again!!!

Great Location to the CBD and Harbor. Nice apartment (as advertised!) with more than enough room for two using both the bed & fold out couch comfortably. The shower had great water pressure too :) & Excellent communication with the host with clear and easy instructions.
Great location near Kings Cross.
We were able to cook our own meals easily with plenty of fridge space. The house has such a colourful history and so much love has gone in to making it a home.
Great hosts! Cosy and has everything you need. Very quiet, homey and comfortable for any occasion. Food and shops within a close range.
Tim was very responsive and understanding of the fact that my flight got delayed. The place is amazing - sparkling clean, quiet, spacious. I really enjoyed staying there!

Best Airbnb stay ever! We like to think that we're pretty good hosts, but we can learn from Susan and Greg. The place is gorgeous, at the back of an enchanted garden (with a private entrance), but totally private. Perfectly set up and equipped for a couple. But it was the personal touches that made it so great: Coffee, tea, milk, juice, bagels delivered to our door, and Susan and Greg were really kind and friendly while giving us all the space we needed. The location is also perfect. Beautifully quiet street, a couple of minutes from a great cafe (Three Blue Ducks) and a fabulous fish restaurant (Moxhe - don't miss out on this one!). Bronte Beach and the gorgeous Bronte-Bondi walk less than ten minutes away on foot. Can't wait to be back for another lovely stay.
It was a pleasure staying at Susan's and Greg's garden studio. A beautiful retreat with respectful hosts. A lovely experience. Thanks!

Susan a le coeur sur la main : sens de l'accueil et de l'hospitalité. Elle est précieuse pour donner des conseils, s'assure que nous ne manquons de rien et que tout se passe bien. Une très belle rencontre. Mille mercis et à bientôt!
Beautiful place thank you for your hospitality

Overall the apartment was neat and tidy and we had a good stay. Areas to be improved: 
No soap in bathroom. No coffee or tea provided. Toilet seat does not fit the bowl so when you sit on the seat the toilet lid whacks you in the back.
Very nice place, close to the beach and shops. Relaxing and cosy house with spacious rooms! Only 15 min away from city and is very convenient with public transport!

It was great place to relax
Great view
But nothing much to do near the house
But if u have a car even if you dont, its only 10mins away by bus to Manly
Nice cute place

Lovely, thoughtful hosts who went out of their way to help us with recommendations for our child-related queries. They even left us a bottle of bubbly to see us into the new year. Very kind indeed. A gorgeous, well-designed cottage  that makes you feel like you're in the countryside despite being close to the city.
It's beautiful and comfortable, the location is suitable close to all the restaurants and shops

We had an absolutely wonderful time staying at Wayne and Kate's place.. you cannot beat waking up to the sounds of the ocean! We had friends travelling from overseas for our wedding, and we could not have asked for a better place to stay; 2-10 mins walk to any of Sydney's great beaches, and all the anemities that you need in an apartment to make the place as comfortable as possible. Wayne and Kate were fantastic in getting back to us on any inquiries and were very thoughtful and approachable. The perfect hosts! now we need another excuse to rent out the place again ;) Thanks for everything!
Great host highly recommend will be staying again

Thea的房子距离悉尼大学很近,而且房子安静且干净,还舒服,以至于我们每天早晨都不想起床｡虽然没有wifi但是我们并不觉得这个问题很难熬,毕竟房间里信号不错｡
Thea真是人美心善,我的行李箱轮子遇到了点问题,没法把它带去凯恩斯,征得Thea同意她愿意让我把行李箱寄存在她的公寓,这可帮了我大忙,让我在凯恩斯能轻装游玩,非常感谢｡我会记得这次澳洲旅行遇到的各位善良友好的澳洲人民｡
Thea's house is very close to the university of Sydney, and the house is quiet and clean and comfortable, so that we don't want to get up every morning. There's no wifi, but we don't find it particularly difficult. After all, it's a good signal in the room. 
  Thea was so kind that I had a problem with the wheel of my suitcase and couldn't bring it to cairns. With Thea's permission she was willing to let me deposit the suitcase in her (Website hidden by Airbnb) helped me a lot. It allowed me to travel light in cairns. Thank you very much.
 I will remember the kind and friendly Australian people I met on this trip.

Our stay with Millie was absolutely wonderful. Matched the description with a lovely view of the Harbour Bridge. Very spacious apartment within 5 minutes from Lunar Park. Easy access via train and water ferry. Lovely stay!

Huy is a good host.
Let me feel comfortable to stay there.
It’s a good location.
Very comfortable, easy access, clean, great location - really vibrant part of the city, but leafy back street quiet. I'd definitely stay there again

Natasa est une hotesse charmante et souriante, prete a vous aider.
La maison est grande, propre et la chambre identique a la photo avec un lit tres confortable.
Nous avons apprecié le quartier de Petersham prêt du centre avec le train.l'accueil

Great location, central to many great places, restaurants and suburbs. Cozy and comfy apartment. Clean and many amenities provided. Great service from Paul and the cleaner, very kind and polite. Can get a bit loud at night from the street and the lobby has a funny smell but those things kind of grow on you. Paul’s apartment is a nice little place to come back to after a night out!
excellent location in a compact studio, all required for a few days by the beach

Edouards apartment is lovely, quiet sunny in a cute suburb. Not far from a few shops, and a lovely little walk through the park to Bronte Beach. Was the perfect base for visiting friends in Bronte. The room was clean, comfortable and the entire place was nicely styled and tidy too. His flatmate was also very nice and helpful. Fully enjoyed my stay. Woke up to the sounds of the birds in the morning :)
Great place, easy access to everywhere and lovely host

The unit is pretty and had some nice conveniences. There was a lot of other conveniences in the kitchen that was so much better than a hotel. That was thoughtful. It looked bigger to me in the photos and fresher. Maybe more current photos would represent it better. It is located close to everything which was nice and the kitchen had everything we needed. The dishwater was great and it had plenty of nice extras needed to prepare a meal.....lThank You for that. It is a drafty place and there seemed to be a lot of noise of cars driving by.( seems the street has become a busy pass thru)there was lots of banging noises in the morning that we solved by putting towels over the doorway to stop that( one of the bedrooms has doors that lead to an semi exposed sitting area that was blowing a draft if the doors were closed it kept banging REALLY loud, after the towel was placed on top it stopped the constant open and closing of it. And one of the brass window closures was also banging all night from the breeze, I moved it to stop that but it woke us. I wanted to use the Jacuzzi tub but tried three times and the hot water ran out before it could be filled to level of jets.Maybe a bigger hot water tank might solve that. Bathroom was really good otherwise, quite gorgeous and towels were great. Liked the hand held shower head and shower was plenty of room. The beds weren't as large as I thought, I believe they were full size instead of Queen or King which I expected for the master suite. The bedding and Dooners as well as pillows were great. The chairs downstairs had blankets on them which seemed like a great touch. There was major rips and not much chair support left in them under the blankets( FYI ) all in all it was a nice stay. I just expected a bit more for the money paid. Slightly awkward floor plan. Wanted the four of us to chill out to watch a movie it just was laid out awkward downstairs. Just thought that area was bigger . Laundry was good, never used the drier. Dishwasher is a plus and it worked great.check in and out was seamless. The key in the door thing was weird. You had to leave the key in the door or you couldn't leave. This was awkward when we went for a walk and left kids at home we couldn't take keys with us because they could get out otherwise. Parking spot was good. Back yard looked nice but the fountain was full of old water that was green. Verandah was lovely. There are motion sensors in three of the rooms which felt a little weird to me when they went on but must be a security thing. I know we hadn't put the security on. Electricity didn't work in the bedrooms...

Great sized apartment for central Sydney and well situated whether you are in the city for business or leisure.
Communication with the owner was timely and effective and check in / check it was no hassle which is always appreciated.

We had an amazing time staying at Wayne and Kate's beautiful home. The location could not have been better, if what you're wanting is Sydney beach living. While our first choice was to stay directly on Bondi, much to our surprise this Tamarama location was so much better and away from the chaos on Bondi. 

This three bedroom home was clean and looked exactly like the pictures. Will definitely book this place again if I ever find myself in Sydney.

Heidi's place was absolutely amazing. The house was immaculate with plenty of space for the 3 other couples we had staying with us. The house itself had everything you could possibly want for a weekend in Sydney.
The location was absolutely incredible close to Carlton train station and not to far from the Airport.
A big backyard with plenty of space for kids to run around an amazing pool which was incredible. 
I will be recommending Heidi's place to all my family and friends and will not hesitate to contact Heidi for any further trips to Sydney to see if her place is available.

Tout était parfait, la localisation, la vue, l’appartement décoré avec goût, la ville etc... je recommande sans aucune hésitation cet appartement. De plus Kinga est une hôte très sympathique et arrangeante. J’espère pouvoir y revenir un jour !

We had a lovely time during our stay in Sydney. Dino’s apartment is in a nice quiet neighbourhood and central position. Its an easy walk to Kings cross Train station and restaurants. Wooloomooloo is also a easy walk away.

We were welcomed by Rick, a friend of Dino, who is taken care of the apartment when he is away. Communication was great from both of them and we felt well taken care of. 

I can recommed a good coffee from  “ Poppies “ on the corner owned by a lovely Greek family always served with a smile and a chat!
Many thanks Dino

Although I did not meet Rachel in person, she was a fantastic host and great communicator, who gave excellent directions and ensured that we found her property easily.  Keys were left as agreed and any questions were answered quickly.  We found the property was light filled, airy, beautiful and as pictured, including special touches like fresh roses on the dining room table.  The beds were comfortable and french provincial kitchen well equipped.  My daughter especially liked playing the piano.  The Mosman location was a treat as it was only a quick 800m walk to shops, including a supermarket and great take-away food / restaurants nearby were plentiful.  The beach at Balmoral (3 minute drive or 20 minute walk) was gorgeous, a short drive (2 minute) to Mosman Wharf had us on the ferry into Circular Quay with those amazing harbour views and Taronga Zoo was a 3 minute drive away too.   My husband travels to Sydney CBD frequently for work so I chose Rachels property in Mosman so he could experience Sydney like a local and how he has never seen it before.   Now he tells me he could live there!   Rachel's place ticked all our boxes for a family road trip to Sydney with two, almost teenage children in tow.  I would definitely recommend to others
Great stay! Sam kindly allowed us to check out a few hours later which was very lovely. Sam was always prompt and friendly with communication. We would stay here again!
Great

You don't need to be a train buff to really enjoy the experience of the carriage and surrounds. But it's even better if you are. :)
It is easy to get lost in the romance of train travel as it was. A perfect place for a romantic getaway; if only I was young again.
Highly recommended and I will be returning as it is a perfect place to relax but still be close to the big smoke.

Coordinating the check-in time and receiving the keys was effortless and smooth which is always much appreciated. The apartment is a few minutes walk from the beaches and the shops. There is also a cafe at the end of the block which was even more convenient for morning coffee/breakfast. Would definitely recommend!

Good place and location
it was my first time to book thru AIRBNB and i had a good experience

We had a fabulous time at Studio Bimbadeen. Stunning location by the river, very tranquil and relaxing. 
Shirley and her husband were lovely and very hospitable and their little dog was so sweet. 
We will definitely be coming back here.
Will be back, great place.
A modern, well equipped, spacious house with amazing views. It was family friendly and very comfortable. Susie was very organised and hospitable.

Sam was as amazing host! The place was in perfect condition, and the bed was super comfy. During our stay, Sam provided us with fresh sheets and towels, also giving us opportunity to use the house upstairs. Thank you for everything Sam! :)
Tota went out of her way to make me and my family feel comfortable in her home.She made sure we got everything we needed.The house is spacious and in a quiete neighborhood.
Relative close to Qudos arena, neat and tidy apartment.

Only stayed one night but Hernan is a lovely guy and the room is clean and very comfortable. Very nice apartment in a very nice area. I really recommend this for anyone who wants a quiet night near the airport. It's in a nice area too with lots of options for eating. Cheers Hernan!
Kath的房子非常干净整洁,离红坊区火车站只有7分钟路程,交通非常方便!家里有一只非常可爱的dog,叫Ruski.

Me and my mum stayed in the cabin for a few days and we absolutely loved it. It's close to the train station and the train only takes ten minutes to the city center. The cabin was very clean and beautiful. Steven and Peta were nice and helpful hosts with two lovely children. 

Thank you Steven, Peta, Max and Zara, we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend this cabin to everyone who visits Sydney for a few days and wants to stay close to the center. 

Best regards,
Maja and Katja
This property is next to a busy road with a landing walkway the other side. Very hot with no a/c or fan. A very basic apartment with a wooden create as a coffee table!
Fantastic apartment. Very clean, great communication and perfect location for any event at Sydney olympic Park

Mostly was as described, clean, and we had a good stay. We were disappointed though as a big part of our decision to stay here was based on the ability to do washing and when we arrived the washing machine was broken. It would have been great if Steven had communicated this to us in advance as we would have stayed elsewhere.

We had such a wonderful and memorable time at Susan's cosy Studio in Bronte Beach. Susan and Greg gave us a very warm welcome and spoiled us throughout the entire stay. The Studio, which is seperated from the main house, provides everything you would need and makes you feel home from the very beginning. It is perfectly located if you like to combine your visit to Syndey with a day, or two, at one of the city's most beautiful beaches. We hope to be back soon!
Average.

David har varit mycket enkel att ha att göra med, vänlig och hjälpsam. Mysig lägenhet. I Kings cross med alla dess kontraster har vi känt oss trygga. Står i beskrivningen att det är risk för ljud utifrån och det kan vi hålla med om. Trevlig vistelse.
We had a great stay with Terry. Beautiful house, location and view. I would highly recommend.

Bill is a most helpful and hospitable host, and the house is beautiful, peaceful and relaxing. It is located in a leafy suburb close to the CBD & right around the corner from restaurants, cafes and bars. Bill's place is the perfect base from which to explore Sydney and is a pleasure to come home to after a day out. The bedrooms are spacious, the kitchen is newly renovated and contains everything you need, and the living area is homely and comfortable. Bill's home is furnished with interesting and unique artworks and antiques, and the courtyard is a relaxing spot to enjoy a morning coffee or a glass of wine in the evening. Highly recommended!
I had great stay.
Gavin is a very nice host.  The bedroom is on the second floor of unit. The air conditioner is excellent. We liked the location of the condo..  It is very convenient  a variety of restaurants.
Bryan's cottage is an easy to find BNB. Very close to trams and bus routes. Owners are great with responding to questions.
Naveen is an excellent host, very friendly and thoughtful :) we were welcomed with a bottle of wine and face masks, which I thought was a wonderful touch. Definitely recommend!!
Sally is a very responsive and friendly host. The apartment is clean and cozy with very nice city view, close to central station , various restaurants nearby. Highly recommended!

Amazing location and well priced.
Host is very accommodating with quick responses.
The apartment was close to bondi junction shops and bondi beach. Only really suitable for two guests. The bed was comfy and there was plenty of storage for suitcases and clothes

Tam's place is a must stay. Located in an area close to restaurants and pubs on a quiet street. The apartment itself was immaculate. Tam thought of everything. The bed was a dream to sleep on, the decor was great and the place smelt amazing. It was light, airy and very clean! I would definitely return to stay if I'm in Sydney again. Tam was an amazing host, very understanding and accomodating when I hit a travel snag. He met me on arrival and showed me around, he also left a detailed guidebook I could refer to.

Our stay in Millie's Studio was perfect! The location is very easy to access public transportation or to walk across the bridge. Millie provided detailed notes for her studio and had everything we needed. We would definitely stay here again!
Great apartment!! Really good location and had all the amenities you need for a short stay! Mags was great to deal with and quick to respond

It is great place near international airport. I love the house and garden style.
Will come next time.
Had a great stay, thanks!

This was one of the best trips I've taken thanks to Mal and his beautiful apartment. It was exactly as advertised and in the best location you could ask for. We were directly across the road from Bondi Beach and the apartment was incredibly clean and comfortable. Mal had provided us with everything we could possibly ask for - beach towels, internet, movies, fresh fruit and tips on what to do in Bondi. I will definitely recommend Mal's apartment to friends and family and I hope to return soon myself!

Thanks for a lovely stay! Good location being so close to the airport, but if you have a suitcase I would recommend an Uber rather than walking from the train station. Nice and very clean room and bathroom with easy instructions in and out. So close to the airport with an uber that cost $10! Thanks Shuang!
A lovely little house in an interesting area. Walks to the Blackwattle Bay and fish market were great and Glebe markets were really good. Bryan is a great host. Really recommend.

Narelles unit is in a perfect location to experience all that Newtown has on offer.
Public transport, cafes and restaurants, bars and night clubs are within a hop, skip and jump.
The unit is modern, immaculate and presented tastefully. Considering the close proximity to the hustle and bustle of street, the units specialised glazed door blocks out all noise. 
The communication from the host was excellent and as a regular visitor to the area we will definately be returning for another stay.
Great location, very homely! Comfortable bed and great food supplied for breakfast. Overall very satisfied.

It was a lovley time staying with Michele, she was very quick with replies and very accommodating with us. Allowing us to check in earlier, and providing us with a bunch of travel info with getting to the house from the airport and how to get around Sydney from the Airbnb aswell. Would definitely stay with again when coming back to Sydney.

L'appartement de Victoria est très beau, très agréable, bien situé, très propre, il est parfait. Nous avons adoré ce logement. Il y a tout à proximité, transports, cafés, restaurants, supermarché, à 30 minutes à peine à pied de l'opéra de Sydney et son centre-ville. Victoria est très sympathique et nous a accueilli très agréablement, elle a été de bons conseils durant notre séjour. Nous la remercions infiniment.

I'm just so glad I'm here for 3nights, Hernan was really welcoming and the room is absolutely lovely and clean. I had nothing to complain about and  we had a good time together of sharing on. Would visit soon if we got chance and 100% sure to recommend my friend as well to stay at this amazing place with the friendly host ever.
Great location.

Beautiful spot in a great location exactly as advertised. The breakfast hamper in particular was a treat! Cath was a great host who made us feel welcome but also respected privacy as needed. 

We would be happy to stay there again in a heartbeat.

Anitas place is absolutely amazing the viewer spectacular spectacular the overall feel of the place is so lovely and Anita and her staff are so friendly and helpful if I ever return this would be where I would stay 
I recommend this space to everyone
absolutely wonderful place to relax

I love my host and the home. It's really a nice place with good transportation, close to the shopping place and good restaurants. Staying here, I have a feeling at home. My room is fantanstice with good sunshine! The house has a nice swimming pool and all the good facilities for us. I can cook, I can use the machine, I can the yard, swimming pool...and anything I need, I can ask the host Yang Dajie to help. Yang Dajie is Min's mom, she just likes a very friendly sister or mom to help us. You will never hesitate to ask her help. She is so considerate to all what we need and she is always smiling and humorous! If you feel lonely while travel alone, it's also the best choice for you. I even have chance to the  food Yang Dajie make, since you can refuse since she is so warm and want to share with you. This is the best host I ever met! Though I left, I miss this place and the peple who stay here. I think I already established a kind of connection with here. I would like to highly recommend friends to come and i will definitely come back again! 我真的很喜欢这里,这里的主人杨大姐和庄大哥是Min的父母,他们是我遇到的最友好的房东,在这里有家一般的感觉,即使我只短暂地在这里居住,但是永远地留下了美好的回忆｡对于旅途中的人来说,常常会感到孤单,但在这里,我却感受到了亲情与友情｡怀着感恩之心,有了这份相遇｡而我相信,他们对待每位短暂的过客都是如此热情,如此真心!我喜欢这里,不仅因为我的房间洒满阳光,院子里有生机盎然的茶花树,有美丽的游泳池,还因为一切人性化的考虑,这里可以免费使用厨房,有一应俱全的锅俱,油盐酱醋,有功能良好的洗衣机,还有秤可以提供,在外出行行李秤重必不可少｡主人做了美食,如果你刚好在,还会分享给你,或者专门留一点给你,这份深深的情谊是非常难忘的｡这里去Eastwood购物中心特别方便,也有不少中餐､韩国餐和咖啡可享用｡这里的公共交通也方便,火车､汽车都便利｡如果有朋友来,我一定推荐给他们｡我再回来悉尼,也一定会重新住回这里｡因为我不仅想找一个住处,还要回来看望我的老朋友｡

Clean apartment with very good facilities. Modern and sleek with everything working perfectly. Yang was very communicative and we had a good stay. Be prepared to travel a while to inner city: 1 hour with ferry or 50 minutes with bus/train to Circular Quay/Opera House, but public transport is a breeze to use here.

We could have really beautiful time with my family in Lizzy's apartment.
The view was so wonderful that we enjoyed day and night at balcony.
For my 3 years old baby,everything is perfect. We wanna be back someday.
We really appreciate Lizzy's kindness and helpfulness.
Thank you for everything.
Cathy is a lovely host. Quick replies and always checks in to see how you are travelling. Cathy gives great local tips and offers a hand if in need. Quite a comfortable place to stay :)

Beautiful apartment, close to Surrey Hills restaurants and shops. Communication was amazing between Nicole and Simon and I, and we were also checked on via message to make sure our stay was comfortable. The apartment was so beautifully done and exceptionally clean. Couldn't get over how many products they had in the bathroom for guest use...they really supplied everything. Thank you so much and will definitely be staying again!
Great stay. Really nice apartment right on bondi. Host very accommodating. Would recommend.
Great location, nice and cozy flat. Perfect for 2 people, not really for 3.

O apartamento é limpo e novo, exatamente como nas fotos, e o bairro tranquilo. As estações de trem ficam um pouco distantes, mas tem uma balsa bem próxima que te leva rapidamente para o centro. Laura responde as mensagens na hora.

Miss D was very helpful and responded quickly to every query.  The home and room were just as described - clean, airy, comfortable, and in a wonderful location.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and hope we may have a chance to return.
Cat’s place is beautiful, we really enjoyed our stay

Very nice flat in a very good location .
Close to the city center.
The room is quite clean and cozy, and the location is great. It is very convenient to travel. Tim  and Mel are great hosts! Hope to stay again
Large, clean, spacious apartment. Very accommodating.

Stayed here for a few nights in Sydney. Convenient to Darling Harbour, and walked everywhere else. Check in, although a little unusual, was easy. It was my mother’s first stay at an Airbnb and she enjoyed it!

Centrally located, comfortable, 4 star quality, beautifully decorated apartment with everything you could need including a lovely view of Hyde Park. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and are already looking forward to staying here again. Desireé was helpful and responsive. We miss it already.

For my first time using Airbnb, Susan's Garden Studio was such a fantastic little place to stay in! I really enjoyed my stay. Super close to transportation and supermarket! Susan was a great host and was very helpful. Highly recommend.

Grateful to the cleaners allowing us to leave our luggage in the room before check in. Apartment in excellent location. 
Departure delayed as the fire alarm went off and we had to evacuate the building. Not a huge problem for us and better to be safe than sorry but it's a long walk down.
Nous y sommes restés 5 jours avec mon compagnon. La localisation de l'appartement est vraiment bien. À 15 mn de bondi et à 10 mn du centre par des bus directs. La chambre est spacieuse et propre.
Great location! Walking distance easily to cruise terminal.
Great location with great privacy
The place was amazing with everything you could need for a weekend away! In a great location, the aircon and heating in each room was also so good especially in the winter. Thanks for a great stay.
Clean and excellent location! Tracey provides clear and accurate instructions. Perfect for an overnight stay.

It was amazing... I took my family in a business trip and also TO celebrate 12th wedding anniversary and that is why I have chosen Jarmo's place, cause It is in an amazing place with a perfect view and great facilities...
The true is that JArmo and his wife were amazing, I am for sure going to stay there many times from now on... If you are looking for the perfect place... Dont think twice, this is the place, and also the price is more than fair... Believe me, around the neighborhood you are not going to find a better place and not even a better price...
Thanks a lot mr. Jarmo, we hope to see you very soon :)

My partner and I stayed at this apartment for 10 nights in September.  The place was very very clean and homely and the owner made a lot of effort to ensure we were comfortable and had all the relevant info needed.  Only negative I would say was that it was more of a studio than a 1 bed so felt quite small with 2 of us. It would also have benefited from a plug in heater of some sort as it was very cold at night.   Other than that we very much enjoyed our stay.

Serena's apartment is tidy, comfy, attractively decorated and perfectly located just steps from bars, pubs and restaurants. She left us gift basket of jam, fruit, oatmeal and buns that was much appreciated. We could hear music from a nearby club or bar so would advise earplugs but we slept well. Great hot shower! We would definitely recommend it to others. Thanks!

We loved our stay at this delightful house. The house was perfect for our family holiday of 3 couples and 5 children. The backyard space and amenities were so well suited to our needs, our children happily played outside every waking hour. 
The kitchen is well equipped, with indoor and outdoor dining options. The bathrooms were modern and lovely. The bedrooms were clean and comfortable and spacious for those needing a portacot. 
Heidi is a lovely, accommodating and well organised host and made our stay very comfortable and easy. 
We will most definitely rebook here in the future.

The room is very clean. Location is very close to the airport. 15 mins walk to arncliff rail station. A quite neighborhood. Everything are well provided, utensils, etc. Washing machine is a plus. The detergent is provided as well, so doing your laundry is not a problem.
The host canceled this reservation 149 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

집은 매우 청결했고, 호스트와의 연락 역시 매우 용이하고 빨랐습니다.
깨끗한 침구와 집 내부가 매우 청결하였으면 늦은 체크인 역시나 매우 친절하게 맞아주었습니다!!
Thank you Lina!!

It was lovely staying at Susan's studio. Very peaceful, super comfortable and so close to public transport. Susan was very welcoming and so easy to talk to - I was really made to feel at home.  I was able to cook in Susan's kitchen and appreciated having fridge space to use too. The little deck off the kitchen was a perfect space for breakfast. Thanks so much Susan!
The host made us feel welcome by providing all the amenities of home, and the listing was exactly as described.  Beautiful view from the balcony... nice place!

Absolutely wonderful apartment in a perfect location! We had a fantastic stay in the Eagle's Nest and Hugo was so accommodating with checking in/out times. It's a lovely apartment with breathtaking views and walkable to all the sights. If we're in ever in Sydney again we'll definitely be back.

We stayed at Tim & Mel’s for 4 nights. The place was spotless and well located near  Green Square station. 

Check in was very easy and the hosts were quick to respond when contacted. 

We initially had a slight issue with the camera in the living area and where it was placed. After discussing this with Tim & Mel they agreed to move it to a more agreeable place within the room. We’d like to add that we were happy with the host’s response. 

All in all, a very good stay in a well located apartment.

This is a nice apartment in a convenient location, easy to get around, with plenty of restaurants and services nearby. It’s in a nightlife zone with a few adult shops and backpacker hostels around too, but noise and people were never a problem at all.  In fact I think it’s why there are so many neat coffee shops and diverse restaurants nearby. Be sure to eat at Pizza Boccone just behind the building, it’s the best pizza we have EVER eaten, anywhere!  

David set up the futon couch as a second bed for my son, very nice!  And he was super helpful getting us settled in and explaining how best to get around the area. Thanks David! We’d happily stay here again.
Clean, friendly, great location, and great price
整套房子干净,整洁｡布置的比较紧凑温馨｡摆放了很多画,照片,装饰品,Bill是非常周到细致的主人,准备了详细周边购物,交通,出游指南｡厨房用具非常全,我们一家五口做饭聚餐,不亦乐乎｡距离旁边轻轨站Glebe只有100多米,很方便｡主人家的小院子很棒,还有个小鱼池,绿植茂密,坐在院子里吃酒喝茶也是美事!

Linda’s place is comfortable and convenient. It was nice that the bedroom area on the second floor was separated from the living area. Also, there was an extra bathroom downstairs with toilet and sink. The airbnb was close to plenty of restaurants and cafes as well as the Central Park and Broadway malls. You can go to the city center by train from the Redfern station, which is only 5 minutes away from the apartment. Check-in and check-out were easy. Although we didn’t get to meet Linda in person, she was always available on text and was a wonderful host :)

Hernan was a great host.
He is very warm, friendly, helpful and easy to talk to.

Prior to my stay, he provided me with clear instructions on how to find and access his apartment.  

Great location and I would not hesitate in staying there again in the future.
Will comeback again.

Great place to stay. We were 5 adults and had plenty of room. Location in the city is perfect. Danny’s brother checked us in and he covered everything. Parking very close by at a Wilson car park. Lovely view of Darling Harbour from the balcony.
Amazing location right next to the Tamarama beach. The view is fantastic and the hosts have been great with all our questions! Really enjoyed our stay and can’t recommend it more :)
We had a lovely relaxing time here. Linda, was friendly and helpful. The apartment is well equipped and close to everything.
great experience
Tess, Rod and Charlie the dog gave us a warm welcome.  We were pleased to find a homey, quite and comfortable place.  Homemade muffins and jam were very much appreciated.  Thank you!

Very nice house with perfect location (walking distance to Hide Park, museum, Botanic garden, opera house, shopping street, Darling harbour, China town, etc.) We enjoyed walking around very much. 
Thanks very to Oli for the wonderful hosting. He's very quick and efficient for communication and very supportive with our requests. It made us a pleasant holiday.
If you want a convenient and central location, modern house with full equipment, and a nice host, that's it!

Very clean studio with beautiful view,nice garden.good location.Greg was so nice and gave us many useful information.highly recommend!
Greg的小屋给我们留下很深的印象｡小屋子距离chatswood 火车站很近｡附近还有快速公交,10多分钟到市中心｡房东很热情,提前跟我们确定到达时间｡小屋不大,但很干净｡花园很美,有个金鱼池,主人还有只可爱的猫,屋主非常热心,经常问询是否需要帮忙的,给了很多信息｡小屋性价比也不错｡推荐!

Easy and friendly communication throughout our stay here. Place was cute and although surrounded by other houses it was nestled amongst trees so it was quite secluded. A rustic but well maintained 1 bedroom cottage well prepared for airbnb guests. About a 20 minute walk to Avalon beach and local shops, restaurants etc. Very steep driveway :)

We had a wonderful time at Neiafu! Everything was so easy and well-organised, clean and tidy, Anne and her husband were very friendly and welcoming and they even put out some food for us and gave us some great advice about the area. I would love to come back!
Très bien situé, charmant.
A Quirky place in a lovely location full of charm and personal touches. It just works
Nice clean room, very close to both domestic and international airport terminals. We arrived by taxi but left by train - only 3 stops.
Great simple place to stay for traveling in/out of the Sydney airport. Self check in was easy.

What a great find, convenient location, quiet, close to public transport and walkable to many attractions. Secure space, secure parking, comfortable bed, plenty of towels,  a nice restaurant nearby, plenty of room and privacy.

This was my first Airbnb experience and I feel so fortunate to have stayed at Angela's property.  Angela is extremely responsive and friendly, and the studio is just perfect - so clean and spacious with everything I needed.  Staying here was a breeze :). She even provided me with chocolates and grocery items when she found out this was an extended stay!  I would definitely love to stay here again and highly recommend Angela and the property to everyone visiting Sydney :)
Great place to be at if you want some place relaxing.
This studio is wonderful and we hope to be back soon! It is super clean and stylish and in a great location!

Ben was an excellent host; he met me on time and showed me around the apartment ensuring that I was comfortable and had everything I needed. 
The apartment itself is a small but comfortable studio with beautiful views of the city. It's located close to Oxford St with access to public transport if needed. Only a short walk to Darlinghurst and the city. Also, a Woolworths Metro within 200m. 
Loved the place and would stay again.
Amazing location, just up the road from the Newport Hotel, but also walking distance into town if you're headed that way. Very much enjoyed our stay at Tess and Rod's.

Wayne and Kate were wonderful to deal with, quick responses in the lead-up to our stay and comprehensive instructions on how to get the key when we arrived. As soon as we walked in we knew we were in for a lovely stay. The view is magnificent and the apartment is spacious and airy, and well-represented in the photos on the website. The kids loved the big TV which meant more time on the deck for us! Great walks and easy parking which is not easy to come by in Sydney. Would thoroughly recommend this place.

Great location, cafes and bars and stores nearby. 
Spacious room. 
Lovely host, always helpful and super polite!
Highly recommended!!!

Justine's home was perfect for us.  The location was fantastic and the surroundings beautiful. It was exactly like the pictures if not better.  We really appreciated the little things that Justine did for us to make our stay easy and enjoyable.   Thank you Justine and we look forward to coming again in the near future.
Cheers Anke
I had a fantastic stay at Natalia's apartment. Great location and great host. I highly recommend it!

It's a good place at great hipster-ish neighborhood for a decent price. The whole vibe it gives out is much like communal youth apartment so if you're into that, you'll like the place. There were some cleanliness issues with bugs but it was generally okay. As far as the room goes you get what you see in the picture. :)
P.S. The complimentary breakfast (cereal) is quite good and a nice addition.

Great location and very easy to check in and out, concierge were great.
The place is ideally located in Darlinghurst with shops and restaurants right outside, Coles and Woolworths are within a couple minute walk.
It was great to have a place with a fully equipped kitchen and plentiful space, with the two levels and set up you don’t feel cramped and can comfortably hang out in the apartment without being on top of each other. Most other hotels in Sydney don’t have that luxury.
Thanks for having us!

Arnie was very helpful but also left us to come and go as we pleased and to use the facilities in his lovely home.  He gave us good recommendations of places to visit and pubs to eat in.

It was a great location and neighbourhood with lots of shops, cafes and restaurants within walking distance.  It was also near a bus route, which meant that the city centre and beaches were easily accessible.

It was our first AirBnB experience and we would recommend it.

Stayed here for a short business trip to Sydney. A very cosy apartment, very clean and as described. The bed is super comfortable and the fittings and fixtures are excellent (great shower). I love the location as its so close to Kings Cross and to central Sydney itself. Lots of places to eat, supermarket just down the road and the apartment building is quiet and well maintained. If you have a car, you just need some forward planning and research as parking can be an issue. It only took me one night to find the right spots along the streets though, and there is a pay as you go car park nearby. All in all, a great place to stay and will certainly be on my list for any future trips.

This place is set up really well for a family. Perfect beach decor and having a washer/dryer combo was a definite plus. Lots of places to eat nearby and the beach is so close. Everything you need, including a grocery store right up the street. Leigh was an incredibly helpful host. Thank you for the stay!!

Mixed bag on this stay but overall positive.  Great location near Circular Quay and the apartment is comfortable.  However, I was shocked to find out that I was required to supply my own toilet paper, trash bags, etc etc., so take note.  A few single use items were supplied but having to go to the store and buy my own toilet paper was ridiculous and no forewarning was provided.  There were no instructions on how to use the TV so weren't able to watch it. The hot water in the shower was hit and miss and there were no face cloths.
worthwhile

This is an outstanding apartment with fabulously comfortable beds, excellent bathroom and fully contained kitchen. One of the best air bnb apartments I have stayed in. The host was great with communication, the key was easy to find and the partner was immaculate! Thankyou. We loved our stay xx

Apartment was stunning, exactly like the photos. Very warm and welcoming and the little touches made my stay feel like home. 
Unfortunately there was a lot of construction work across the road, but as I was up for work during week, did not impact my stay. 
Nicole and Simon were both great hosts, particularly as I had to call them to assist. Great communication and very hospitable.

Paul's apartment is really a cozy nice place and located at an ideal area where is just 5 mins walking from Kings Cross station. I stayed 2 nights with my parents, the house keeper Wendy is nice and easy to communicate. For deep sleepers, it's not noisy at all. The only thing is I saw a cockroach in the smaller room and killed it. Overall is quite nice!
在Yang家住了愉快的三天,我和家人对房子都十分满意,坐船去悉尼歌剧院得方便,沿途的风景很好,超市,公交车站都很方便｡
Easy 15mins walk to Central station. Food and supermarkets right across the street. Overall, great value for accommodation in Sydney.

My Aunty and her friends had a good time over there. They were suppose to go around Sydney but they jus fell in love with laura home and prefer to spend more quality time at home. 

Laura is a very nice lady and helpful. I love the way she decorated her home and with all the convenient she provided at home just perfect. You need nothing except your luggage :) 

Highly recommended! 

I will book again for any of my friends and family for the next trip!

It was a very welcoming and comfortable stay. The location is pretty convenient for us to travel around Sydney City by buses or trains. The room is clean and tidy and   Equipped with everything that we need during the stay. Thanks for providing us with this awesome stay and hope to see you again!

Well, this was by far the best Accommodation experience I have ever had, after travelling 5 months around the world, that's a big call. It was really easy to get from the Airport and back and forth to the ICC at Darling Harbour. They were the most hospitable hosts you could wish to have, your own bathroom and comfy bed with plenty of room to move. So many restaurants to choose from and a huge Shopping Centre just up the road. I almost cried when I had to leave. Thank you sooo much.

Nice room in a convenient location just outside the city. About 15 minutes bus ride to the heart of the city, very convenient. Also, just a couple minutes walk will lead you into a few Annandale shops, consisting of cafes, bakeries and a convenience store. 

The room was clean and also cozy. No big complaints. Only one would be that the house is old, with creeking floors everytime someone walks by, so if you are a light sleeper/ gets annoyed by noises, this could be a concern.

Wyatt and Julie were also friendly, sharing with us about Sydney's hangout spots and some local insights on them. They were also very hospitable during our stay, constantly checking if we were all good during our time there.

Overall happy with the place!
Lovely clean apartment opposite the best nightlife in bondi walking distance to everything and great balcony

we choose stephens appartment as a base to explore sydney -worked well because of the ferries. next wharf 3 min walk. very nice cafe ( flying bear) in 4 min walk, great tip by cristie, who let us in on our late arrival , 11pm.
after all a great place to stay!!

Ruby was a great host. She was in touch and answering all of my questions (and I had lots of questions as this was my first air BNB experience)
The apt was lovely. 
I would definitely recommend it!
Good location, good value of money!
Nice location, close to everything, very clean and great entertainment facilities.

This is a great location for easy access to public transport, the city and surrounds. Comfortable beds and ample hanging space compliment the spacious four bedrooms. It was a nice place to rest after a busy day sightseeing.

Naveen and Tris have a well-appointed place in the cozy Sydney neighborhood of Darlinghurst. The area is bustling with cafes and well-rated restaurants. Naveen and Tris were attentive hosts even though they had just come home from a long trip themselves. They went out of their way to interact with us and we even stayed up late one night chatting over wine. 

The location is very close to King's Cross station which makes it a breeze to do day trips (we did Blue Mountains and Bondi) and get to/from the airport. However, the only con is that there is no direct subway line or bus to Circular Quay/the Rocks area. Walking 20min, you're in the city, but it probably took us 30-40 min to walk to the Rocks area.

Overall it was a pleasant stay!
Very clean and modern space!  Comfy bed, nice porch. They were quick to respond to our request to book which was so very helpful. Thank you for a nice stay.
This place was a very good place. Clean and excellent interior! This house is near a shopping center.

Amazing place and amazing people
Was abit of a last minute thing for us but that was no problem with them
There was great communication on how to find the place
A leaflet of places to eat and things to do ect
And the location was a couple of minutes walk from the ferry terminal
Would recomend

Millie's "Shoebox" would be great for one person or a couple looking for a value minded stay in Sydney with great view, clean accommodations, close to Milsons Point train station and even closer to the North Sydney ferry stop that takes you across the harbor to downtown Sydney and the Opera House.  You walk up the road a bit to North downtown and that's where you can buy all the groceries, beer and wine you need for your stay at a pretty good deal.  The views out the balcony are awesome - yes Millie's place is on the corner of a pretty busy stretch of street during commuter hours - but it adds to the charm; watching everyone scurry off to work while you're on holiday!  And the evening time was great for the balcony as you can open up the door, grab a glass of wine and enjoy the views of the Harbour Bridge at evening and sunset.  The bed was very comfortable for one, the kitchen was well stocked, the building itself seemed very safe and secure and it had a nice little counter w/ two bar stools that you can set up your IPad for the day/morning, have breakfast and get some work done before heading out onto your adventures.  You can tell I'm a big fan - as I'm an airbnb Superhost myself back in the USA.  The best part ... Millie's customer service and communication.  I cam a long way from SFO airport landing at 6:30 am after a long flight and Millie went out of her way to make sure I could either do an early check in or bag drop - and she was awesome during my visit with places to check out, etc.  She's a Superhost for a reason.  I've traveled around the world and have been to many countries and continents staying at various Airbnb units - Millie's was right up there for location, value, services, views and cleanliness.  Regards, Bret ~ 3ONE8 Manzanita in Manzanita, Oregon USA ~

What a property - it's a great space and totally unique! Perfect for a large group of friends having a getaway or getting prepared for a special event, as we were! 
One annoyance is having to pay extra for parking on the driveway.

Susan was a wonderful host and very helpful. Her little cottage was exactly as described and gave us the privacy we needed when working in the area. Susan provided a nutritious light breakfast each morning and anything else we requested. Her home is very near transport to the city and the restaurant area of Leichhardt. We had no trouble parking in the street right outside her house. I would definitely recommend this garden studio.
Very clean and quiet apartment. Directly across the road from the bus and close to everything else. Both Tessa and rod are very lovely people and make you feel very welcome.

Martin & Jackie are true superhosts. We stayed her in early March 2019 and had a fantastic time. Super apartment and Martin personally ensured our stay in Manly as comfortable and smooth as possible. AirBnB at its best. Thank you!

Incredible hosts! Ian and Carol went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable and comfortable. They are real authentic people who genuinely care about your stay and experience with them. Will be back.
Paul's apartment is super cute and in a lovely neighborhood. Clean and quiet, had everything we needed. Check in was a breeze and we had a lovely time!

Great location and so close to train station. Paul left a folder full of useful and helpful information. We love the cafe and patisserie downstairs. Everything was so conveniently located and my toddler enjoyed her stay there!
A really great find, clean and great space with everything you need and thoughtful touches.

The location of this apartment is excellent. It's a five minute walk to the ferry and rail terminals and waterfront, and a 15 minute walk to the opera house. It's a suitable size for a family of four, with two beds in the second bedroom. We loved having a washer and dryer. If you plan on using the kitchen, plan on supplying a sponge to wash the counters, salt and pepper, dish soap, paper towels.... There are no extras. This was ok, we just were surprised and ended up buying what we needed. Also, there is road construction going on and it's loud. It goes all night, and some nights were worse than others. Despite the noise, the apartment worked well for our family, and the location is really good.
The apartment was very centrally located, an easy walk to many tourist destinations. The wifi was a bit spotty. It was convenient to have a washer and dryer in unit. Would definitely stay here again!
Simple, clean, and good location. Alexey was very helpful and good to communicate with.

Michele's place is in a great location, in a lovely green neighbourhood that's an easy walk to the train and all of the action. Communication was great, and she kindly let us store our bags until we left for our flight later in the day.

Place is perfectly situated close to everything, building has good, secure set up and the pool was a hit with the kids. Oriel’s communication is excellent and he is very accommodating and provided us with some useful tips- we would definitely use this apartment on a return trip
Really lovely apartment in a great location!
Friendly host, Lovely apartment, excellent location for surry Hills, City and Central station.

We had total 7 people stayed for 3 nights. We all enjoyed a lot your spacious and tidy house!!! Walkable distance to the beach, shops, bars and restaurants, close to airport and downtown, your house is a really good place for a gang of friends or family for holiday!
Ali’s place is a great place to stay at. It contains everything you need, clean, neat, spacious. I hope more will come and stay here in future.

Really wonderful stay!

I needed to be at Darling Harbour for work this week, and Suzie's place is right there. Perfect central CBD location.

The room and the apartment are even nicer than described and shown n the photos. It's not a big place (expected in this location) but it's exquisitely appointed and meticulously clean.
