You get a room with a very comfy bed, and space to unpack your things. You also get your own bathroom with tub and shower. There's a sitting room, balcony: just really nice. 

And Suzie is lovely. I was very busy and we didn't cross paths much, but she was friendly and accommodating on the details of my arrival, and made it easy to live in her home for a few days. She added several nice touches, like fresh fruit in my room that was replenished.

The only thing that might be a worry for some folks: this is a downtown location and there's a busy freeway nearby, which could be a problem if you're the sort of sleeper who needs absolute silence. But it's not a worry after all, as Suzie has a supply of earplugs in the bedside table!

If you want a chic central apartment to be close to the action, Suzie's got your place.
A real gem. Good price, good location. Friendly hosts.

Our stay at Linda's apartment was fantastic. The accommodation was clean and comfortable with all the necessary amenities. The neighbourhood has many cafes and was an accessible walk to the downtown. Linda was a good host checking in on our stay and leaving information about the city along with coupons and treats.
很好的体验

Shuang’s place is excellent, very convenient, clean, well maintained and comfortable, walking distance to the international airport really helped, I would definitely recommend to anyone traveling through Sydney

Clean comfortable accommodation. Suitable for couples. 
Bundeena is a beautiful area which you can use as a base for exploring the surrounding 
Royal National Park.

I would highly recommend Jared and Diana’s place. It is a beautifully clean, light and airy place. The hosts are very welcoming. The location was perfect for me with the shops just downstairs. I would have extended my stay if that were possible and I would definitely stay again if I needed to visit the area.
Great location, very comfortable bed.  Everything just as shown on the website. We would stay here again if visiting Sydney.  Sydney is a wonderful place to visit!

The house located at strategic (Website hidden by Airbnb) 5 minutes walk to Darling Harbour and the convenient store.Walking distance to the bus station and the most important is the place is secured with tight security.Overall me and my friends had a great stay during our vacation !

Rhonda is a great person and she is very hospitable to the guests. I was made feel comfortable and the communication was good. We found common ground to talk about and exchanged our thoughts. I would suggest other guests to definitely give a go at her place. It's private and cozy.

The apartment is beautifully apportioned, spacious and has beautiful views. It is clean and comfortable, with all amenities as advertised. Joseph was very helpful with storage of luggage, as we arrived very early before check in time, and wanted to explore the town. The area felt safe and the train and bus were nearby and easy to use for guests without cars. (The bus stop was right outside the building, and the bus and train were exceptionally clean and also felt safe). I recommend researching the process for where to buy passes for the bus and train.

Ali's place is easy to get to if travelling to Sydney and then great to access many parts of Sydney without huge traffic delays.  We enjoyed our stay in the excellent and very clean Granny Flat which catered to our needs nicely. Quiet suburb yet close to major shopping centre and motorways to get you where you want fast. Great value and would hesitate to book again. Lisa
Great place  !!! great access to everything in the CBD (Opera/Chinatown/Museum).
X
The building and interior is great. And easy to catch bus 311 which can go to the city. Very quite and nice neighborhood areas. Recommend to who wants a quite holiday.
The boys really enjoyed their stay in the apartment, great value for money and so close to the shopping centre!  Jo was flexible with check in and a great communicator.  Thanks again Jo!

Awesome location and very easy to check in and deal with. 

Great hosts

We had a great stay at Boudine’s place. The apartment was clean and tidy. Big plus was a very comfortable bed, good shower and fast wifi. Walking distance to Bondi Beach, shops and restaurant. 
I would absolutely recommend this place for anyone who likes to stay at Bondi but wants to be away from the busy streets.
Thanks for the great stay Boudine!
Great house Simone! My family stayed here while my wedding was on and it was so close to Randwick shops. The house itself was very beautiful and had everything we needed.

The apartment is perfect!David are waiting for us once we are checking in.He can response quickly every time we need his help.What’s more,we love the fountain on the front his (Website hidden by Airbnb) next time we can live again
Great location. Very tidy place. Good communication with Paul. Very pleased
Amazing and such a cozy place ... had a lovely time and near to beaches and definitely would recommend this place to anyone ;)
Good place to stay!convenient & comfortable!Thanks Gavin
Highly recommended! Jackie and Martin are such exceptional hosts. My husband and I had enjoyed staying with them for two nights at their gorgeous apartment. Thank you again, guys!
住的地方很干净,shuang的父母很热心的帮助我们,告诉我们如何去机场!

I stayed 1 night. Angela's place is actually nicer than the photos. The beach is near and had amazing views. She let me use her phone charger because mine wasn't working and had breakfast available. The unit was very clean and fairly close to the airport and near shops. Angela was also flexible with my check out time. I would stay here again.
地理位置非常好 可以步行到达shopping center 悉尼歌剧院 住的也很舒适

Millie was great at instructing us how to get to her place and everything we needed to know once we were there. The space itself was nice and private. The one downfall is there is a lot of street noise all throughout the night and especially in the early morning when people start to head to work. So if you're a light sleeper, you might want to book elsewhere.
Cecilia room was big and spacious  ...close to all transport and restaurants..had air con and ensuite and very clean ..Thank you for allowing me to share your home

Had a lovely stay at Cathy's place.
Close to beautiful paradise beach and restaurant in hilltop Rd ouzo was conveniently located with great Greek food.

Pros - great host, location, clean, quiet.
Cons - Temp accommodation whilst FT occupant away hence their stuff present in storage drawers / cupboards.

Had another lovely and relaxing stay. Everything I needed was there and Tracy even thought to put an extra blanket in my bed before I came to make sure I was warm during the night. Had a lovely walk along the lake and was close to everything I needed. Thanks again Tracy!
Location was perfect for attending a workshop at the local University. Somewhere to sleep, friendly, clean and comfortable. Was able to walk to Coogee beach in 20 mins and the Uni.

Naveen and her husband have been one of the most patient hosts we had in our trip and was also the last place we stayed in Sydney before leaving. We want to thank her graciousness and consideration towards us as we fumbled through our last few days, trying to say bye to the amazing city. Naveen and her husband were also nice enough to provide interesting guides to cafes, maps and provided a thorough walk through of the neighbourhood which incidentally is - we believe to be - one of the cooler neighborhoods if you enjoy pubbing and cafe hopping.

Her home was exactly as described in the listing if not better and wowed us the moment we entered the house. We had our own private toilet just outside our room and was delighted with how immaculately clean the it was. Our room was cozy and the mood lighting light (that amazingly has 6 colors to choose from) made the room funky yet extremely homely. The space in the room was spacious enough for two people and 3 luggages. The bed was also extremely comfortable and to top it off was provided with comfy bath slippers and robes. Her living room is definitely one to check out and her husband Tristan gladly talked to us about how the design came about.

It was a pity we did not get to try out the gym, the pool and the sauna which was literally the adjacent room from the house.

Lastly, Naveen's dog has got to be the friendliest and cutest dog we have met in our travels, being extremy warm and cuddly and perhaps only barked once throughout the entire stay to greet us when we came back. It really gave us no trouble at all despite Naveen's joke on being a threat to our shoes.

Overall, the stay was good and we would recommend the place to anyone who wants to be close to the city but yet need an affordable place to stay. 

Thanks Naveen!!

I really enjoyed my stay by David, the appt was really clean and he's a perfect host, well organized and very helpful. You will have all the privacy that you might need.
All you need will be already in the room: recommendations, map, wifi code, plug, umbrella, extra blanket, everything!
The bed is very comfortable, and the terrace is such a luxury to enjoy some calm after walking all the day in that big city.
The location of the appt is efficient, as its really easy to get in all the different area of Sydney (the Domain, Botanical garden, Opera House, circular quay to get the ferry, Potts point and Oxford street is just down there).
David was kindly let me do a laundry, which is great when you are traveling for a while. I will definitely stay by him again for my next trip to Sydney.

It was an honor to have had Linda as my very first AirBnB host. She was very accommodating and easy to talk with. She made sure we had everything we needed during our stay. She also provided directions to the best restaurants and tourist attractions.  As for her place, it's well-organized and has an ample amount of space. The space is very comfortable that we were easily able to settle in. It also has all the essential appliances that a home needs. Its location is very convenient as it is relatively near to the city, close to grocery stores and restaurants, and within reach of a train/bus station for those who want to go around. I would highly recommend staying at Linda's place to anyone planning to visit Sydney! We sure had a great and hassle-free time during our stay!

Wonderful nights stay in a beautiful little guest apartment with everything you need and more. Amazing hosts super helpful and friendly and the little extra touches went a long way to making this a fantastic weekend escape.
Thank You Tessa and Rod
Hernan was a great host. the room was clean and close to the airport. he was helpful and friendly. true to the motto: take it easy.

My boyfriend and I had a lovely stay in Susan's little garden house. It was our first time trying Airbnb and we were really pleased. Susan was an amazing host, she helped us whenever she could. We really liked the location of her home because it wasn't in the busy city center but you could easily reach it by bus.

I do not normally care to write reviews but I had to after staying at this apartment in Redfern. The entire apartment is lovely and it is directly near the train station. The value of the property is great. Unfortunately, just about every Airbnb rental does not allow you to have parties or any big events, including this apartment. However, this apartment complex has a pool and a place to grill out (where you can bring people) which really sets it apart from other Airbnb rentals. What really surprised me was the excellent hospitality. Jess is extremely trusting and nice because she would always help me out with any possible inconvenience that I encountered. For example, once I requested to stay one night less because of my financial budget since I am a broke college student. Jess said that's fine and asks if she can pay me electronically (for the night that I would not be staying), but I had to ask her if she could pay me in cash because I had zero in my bank account (It takes a few days to transfer) and I needed the money for food for that week (However, I didn't tell her that). I felt bad asking for the cash to be delivered because I knew she had to take care her 3 - week old baby but it was like essential. Without hesitation, she dropped off the money the next day in cash and she didn't know how much that helped me out. Also, they provide you with a pamphlet that lists places to eat nearby, they give you privacy, jess constantly responds to your text messages immediately, and they have the place refurbished with every possible necessity. You would think that they wouldn't care about you and your stay after you give them a down payment, but unlike most Airbnb's, they want you to have a great stay even after you pay. It's like staying at a hotel. I highly recommend this place in particular because I researched all of the possible Airbnb rentals for hours and this was by far the best-valued one that I could find.
Great place to stay
Felix's place was cozy and located close to city. Will return again!

Great apartment. Anita is very kind and prepare everything I may need which is way too much beyond my expectation. You can see bondi beach in the apt and bus stop only 10meter away. Overall it is good choice when you travell to bondi. Thx Anita.
A fabulous apartment in the best spot. Thank you Oriel for being such a responsive host.
Great apartment, clean, tidy and very comfortable. Fantastic location and very close to the CBD.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Alison and Adam were my saviours in Sydney. our logistics officer booked us an hotel in the middle of nowhere in Ryde, claiming that it was the nearest point to Sydney Olympic Park as i had to attend the WPC14 with my colleagues. When i check the location, had to cancel and rushed to my ultimate accommodation portal, broadcasting generic message to nearby hosts to secure an accommodation the soonest.

Alison was among the first to reply, and to pre-confirm...
By the time i got there, Adam was already waiting for me and even kind enough to give me all the directions at 8am and off course waited for me outside to make sure that i'm paying the right cab fee. 

What can i say Adam, made feel at home from very first moment, kind, genuine and warm welcoming host. The house is is really nice fully refurbished, in a quite and well connected neighbourhood. My room was upstairs, a nice sunny room with  a queen bed and a bathroom attached. After i dropped in my luggage, Adam gave me guided orientation tour to the house, with access to all amenities. 

Felt like a VIP 5 star treatment as Adam even gave me a pre-paid bus ticket, which made my first(s) bus rides easier as some stations are pre-paid only.  So now that you that i have been at a great apartment, with great hosts, that's all, Rozelle is a really nice neighbourhood. walking distance from my hosts' place, you can make it to the main street packed, with cafe, bars and restaurant, a vibrant market and lot of attractions. if you happen to stay over a weekend don't miss Rozelle Market (Sat & Sun). 

Now the funny part, Adam was so happy to receive me as he's a all star backgammon player and he knows that Lebanese people are really good at that and he was so eager for round. One night we decided to play a round and Adam's expectations went all down the drain, i think i was the first Lebanese ever to be clumsy backgammon player. We agree that we will play another time via (Hidden by Airbnb) and i will have support from fellow Lebanese players :)

All in all, i great time, the house is warm, clean, and comfortable and the hosts are simply AWESOME

Sydney has come a long way since I was 19 and thinking how anglo it was compared to Melbourne.Now I am 52 and delighted to discover an enclave of Chinese food and culture on the upper North Shore. Min very kindly picked me up from the train and sent me the map on his phone when I managed to get lost a few times in the early days. Great big house, an Edwardian gem sympathetically renovated with a lovely pool. Very kind elderly relatives popping in and out and letting me know in Mandarin that it was about to rain (I had washing on the line.) This area is so great for Asian food. Cheap clothing place run by a Korean lady nearby. A delightful area surrounded by native bushland. A holiday at home and a great insight into the contributions made by enterprising recent arrivals. A chilled out house, no hassles. Such kindness that transcends the language barrier. A great month in the Harbour City at an unbeatable price.

Allen's home was clean and our room was spacious. It's not too far from the beaches ans parks. 
We enjoyed our stay there and definitely recommend it!

Naveen’s place is absolutley amazing for style location and price.

Naveen has a great eye for quirky things, the artwork and decorè is fabulous..

The gym and pool are on the same level right next to the apartment and are a real bonus.

This place is truely a rare gem..

Thankyou Naveen!

Had to stay the night before going to the airport the following morning, and the location is superb if you're in a similar situation like me. The place is huge, clean, and absolutely stunning. You will be greeted by a small garden leading up to the gate, and your room is nothing short of a hotel room with a comfy, white bed with warm covers. The place is clean and quiet, and also accessible as there is a 7/11 nearby. Would have loved staying here longer than just one night, but it was a pleasant experience nonetheless.

A wonderful warm and inviting home with lots of amenities in it to make our stay comfortable. A great location with lots of shops, cafes, restaurants and public transport nearby.
This is an excellent base for visiting the local area as well as having great access to the city.
The outdoor area with BBQ is brilliant and we just wish we had more time to enjoy the house.
I checked in on a stand-by rate and as such Steven's place is good value for money.

This was a lovely place to stay! it was nice and private but the hosts were also very kind  and friendly and happy to help out. Very cute pup! The rooms were clean and comfortable. We were really happy with our stay!
Great place to stay
very central close to  Everthing  specially public  transports ,  restaurants ,bars . shopping centres ,opera hpuse .very clean ,  I highly recommended.

MissD's place was clean, comfortable and convenient. Pictures were accurate and the location was good; near the shops and near the train station. Newtown is also a fantastic neighbourhood to stay in. MissD gives her guests privacy and is also quick to respond to any queries. Overall a very pleasant stay!

Our stay at Malabar was comfortable. Bernadette and
Fred welcomed us on the first night, and gave us the freedom to come and go as we pleased after that. The neighborhood was spectacular. We were a little surprised that there was no view of the coast from our rooms. All in all we had an enjoyable stay.
It is spacious and well-equipped! Good~!

Although I did not meet Anton personally, I could feel his hospitality through email communication. He accommodated  our early check in request and was quick to respond. My family and I really enjoy our stay at his apartment. The apartment is also stylish and modern. I would definitely come back. Anton, Thanks for being flexible and responsive!
Hernan place was very nice. The location is good. He is very accomodating and thoughtful. Will recommend Hernan’s place to my friends.

Great apartment in a great central location near the station and lots of bars and restaurants. Everything was as described and  I really enjoyed my stay. Would definitely stay here again if I find myself back in Sydney!

Lovely apartment, great location, great value,  spectacular view. We experienced a bit of a glitch with the booking but it wad remedied quickly and we were made to feel very welcome. Highly recommend the Caffe Amici downstairs (make sure you arrive hungry!)

This apartment is well appointed clean and comfortable. Close to Milsons point train and ferry stations for easy city access.  Parking space is a bonus as you won't need your car but awkward for large cars. Would definitely stay here again.

All expectations were met at Angela’s Airbnb. Such a beautiful setting with perfect touches inside and outside of this property. I highly recommend a stay at least once, thank you Angela for your kind hospitality.
Clean, well-kept, hospitable and gracious hosts.
A modern, clean and comfortable studio. All inclusions are perfect. This Sydney suburb is directly under the flight path and has aircraft noise.
Great location and amenities.

Gavin was really nice , easy to communicate with and flexible.The location of his place is ideal to visit Sydney. The bedroom is big and we could put our clothes away in the cupboard. We could easly cook in the kitchen.
A great convenient location to stay for visitors to Sydney with a great host.

A spacious house in a great location, a lovely host who makes sure you are at feel at home.  For those with a family the added playroom is fantastic.  I would highly recommend for those wanting to stay in the Sutherland Shire, 2 minutes drive to Cronulla and surrounding suburbs.

Angela made our stay in Sydney very easy, she informed us well about the neighborhood, public transports, restaurants & everything we needed at her place. She couldn't be there upon our arrival but we communicate seamlessly through Airbnb. She also arrange us because we needed to stay for one more night and it didn't cause any problems to her.

Her place was very cosy & nice, so was our room, very bright with all the commodities you'd expect. The bed was very confortable and helps us beat the jetlag easily as we were coming from a 8+12 hours flight from France!

The location itself is great, I mean, you can walk to the beach in 5/10 minutes from foot! There is also loads of restaurants/cafes near the beach and you're like 15 minutes away to Rockdale station by bus if you want to go to the city center! The neighborhood is safe and quiet, perfect for families too! Angela lives with her son Coby, and they never bothered us so that won't be an issue at all if you were wondering! Either you want to live your life or socialize is up to you as they are really easy & respectful people! 

Me and my girlfriend enjoyed our stay very much and we would definitely come back again!

Jared's apartment is located in a great spot in close proximity to circular quay. The apartment is of reasonable size and easily fitted the two couples staying. Access to the building requires a security fob for the front door and key to the apartment. Unfortunately only 1 set of keys is provided which makes it incredible challenging if there are more than 2 people staying. I contacted Jarad early in the stay however he wasn't willing to provide the key. It is also worth noting that the bedrooms back onto a laneway with rubbish trucks coming past in the early hours of the morning (we stayed on a friday/sat night). I would suggest bringing ear plugs and eye shades as the outside street light does shine into the rooms. The apartment was reasonably clean and apart from the access issues, was great value.

Stephanie is a delightful,thoughtful and generous host. She was prompt in responding to questions and left her home in a welcoming manner. The cottage is delightful,comfortable and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay there. Glebe is just wonderful with lots of atmosphere and close to many of Sydney's highlights.
This was our first foray into Airbnb and we are hooked! It was an excellent initiation and no doubt a hard act to follow!
I thoroughly recommend Stephanie and her cottage and Glebe. I hope that I can stay there again.
The description of the house as a mansion does not disappoint. This is a beautiful, stylish home with friendly, hospitable hosts.

最大的败笔就是图片和实物完全不是一间房间  也小不少   这个感觉很不好｡不喜欢这种行为｡

如果用实拍图其实房间不错的 干净整洁 像motel  适合临时住一晚｡有独立卫生间 基本用品   坐落于整体个house侧边单独修的一间房间 所以私密性比较强  如果你把它当成是motel其实还不错的  然后页面提到空调 衣架没看到有｡ 隔音不好｡全部如实描述｡
It's a nice stay with Hernan and thanks for the tidy room. Convenient to city and you can get everything nearby
Great place , very central and clean. We had a great time at Eleanor’s place and she was prompt and a great communicator

Great apartment to stay in if you are in Sydney! Perfect location, comfy couch, nice shower, very comfortable bed and stunning views. Hugo and Pamela are great hosts. They inform you well and respond quickly on messages. Check in is easy.
Thank you for such a great stay. House was clean and a lot bigger then the photos make it look. Plenty of room for our large group. The spa upstairs was nice after our pamper night.

Good value for money 
Good location 
Short stroll to ferry

Great space with interesting decor. The bed was in an interesting and cozy place and the bathroom extremely clean and spacious. 

P.S. If you can't find the remote for the speakers it might be under the couch pillows, not the host's fault. We found it randomly at the end of our stay so future dwellers be warned! haha

Mike is a very easy going, friendly host and gave me plenty of privacy. The apartment is good value and very well located: just a thirty minute walk to the CBD / Opera House or a $15 cab fare. This is an old but clean building and clean apartment. It is fairly noisy from the street traffic in the morning and early evening but I found I got used to it quickly. There a lots of places to eat and a supermarket is very convenient. I cooked for myself in Mike's kitchen with no dramas. Overall, this is excellent value. I would stay again, definitely.

The apartment was great overall. Fantastic location in Darlinghurst, right off of Williams St, a 10 minute walk to Town Hall station. 5 minutes to Hyde Park and 10 minutes to King's Cross. The studio is very well designed, with a nice large living area and floor to ceiling windows. The furniture could use an upgrade, as the chairs are a bit shabby, but they do the job.

It was perfect. There is nothing to tell about this house bad. I and my boyfriend had time at the house for 3 nights and 4 days. While staying here, we felt we were in a luxury hotel since it was very very clean and very well-organized. Before going to this house, my bf and me were unsure if this house would be real since the house or room was perfect but it was pretty cheap for its perfection. 
I highly recommend this house to everyone who wishes to stay around the airport (takes only 24mn by walk, 20mn by bus from the airport). I love this houseeeee!!!!!

Desirees place was awesome. The room was very clean, internet speed was sufficient, and all the goodies that she provides in the room ( extra toiletries, snacks, and even wine in the kitchen and refrigerator were a great bonus.  The location of the condo was very convenient to get around Sydney.  Lots of restaurants and train stations nearby !!!  Desiree was also very quick at responding to our needs and questions . Overall, 5 out of 5 stars for us !!!
We had a great time staying at Bernadette's apartment, they were friendly and very generous. The view from apartment is just amazing, we definitely will stay again :)
This is the 4th time I have stayed here and it never dissapoints.
房间也非常的干净,设施都齐全｡

You can tell Julia is a superhost because of her attention to details. From small welcome cards to simple but carefully selected breakfast products.
The location is great, just a quick walk away from Kings Cross station. Great appliances make the stay very comfortable and I thoroughly enjoyed the selection of teas and coffees offered.
The apartment itself is very "hygge", a term we learned reading one of the books available. It's very cozy and the decoration along with the lightning is beautiful.
Not only we stay here again but easily see ourselves living there.
Thanks Julia!
Great place for a business trip with everything needed

The place was overall very nice. The apartment was decently located and very comfortable for a family of 4. Although we had a few misunderstandings with the property managers, it was a very pleasant experience and we would definitely recommend it!

We loved staying at Michy's place in Clareville. It's a lovely self-contained cabin which is very well appointed. Originally booked this place as close by to a party we were attending, however given I was sick ended up staying in ordering take-away and enjoying the space instead. Loved having a cup of tea in the sunshine on the verandah in the morning. Would definitely recommend Michy's place to anyone wanting to explore the northern beaches of Sydney. Tucked away in one of the most beautiful suburbs of Sydney (one I had never visited, despite being a Sydney-sider) with lots to explore nearby.
Jared's accomodation was great. The location was quite near to the wharf and it was clean. Especially, Ana and Francisco were so kind. Thanks for everything.
The flat is very clean and super close to transport and amazing food. We love Newtown and will definitely stay again. Thanks Narelle for sharing your beautiful apartment.

very good location and apartment , would definitely come again . Coffee was very easy and flexible to communicate with , and would definitely recommend.

thank you

This is an amazing place for a family to stay. The hosts were quick with their responses and accommodating to our needs. The area is very cool and is well located to properly experience the Sydney area!

Sacha’s place was amazing, it is in great location only 8 minutes away from the beach. He was a great host and gave us tips to get around the neighborhood. The house is beautiful and very comfortable, it is by far the best airbnb I’ve stayed in, my family and I didn’t want to leave!

Could not recommend this place more highly! Travelling solo with my 3 month old daughter this place was a little piece of home! Immaculately cleaned and well thought out. Small touches like a bath robe, clothes washing and drying facilities, Apple TV and Netflix - all added to the experience! Close to supermarket and shopping centre and bus to Manly. Hosts were friendly and helpful - even letting me store my bags after check out! 

Sincerely enjoyed my stay. Only downfall is that I wasn't able to stay longer!!

Thanks again Leslie!
Great location, very roomy, lovely Darlinghurst terrace! Would recommend.
The apartment is lovely and the area is simply perfect. A fantastic walk through the Botanical Gardens to Sydney's CBD. Loads of great restaurants, bars and cafes on your doorstep.

Fantastic stay. Just like the pictures it was a beautiful apartment and location. Thanks Bernadette for the yummy home made biscuits on arrival with orange juice. Fred was a terrific host and I enjoyed my chat with him. A very wise man! Thank you both so much and can't wait to return. Loved the Beach cafe near by also.

Five stars. Lovely little flat very close to Newtown station (less than five minutes). Narelle has thought of everything - washing powder, plenty of sockets, small carton of milk - a great host. Small flat but perfectly formed. Very, very clean. Amazing comfortable bed, and nice and dark for a good lie in. Lovely little balcony. Triple glazing to keep out the traffic noise. I was travelling alone and felt very safe. Only issue could be the stairs - no lift - but I'm lazy and I could manage them easily! Highly recommend. I will try to stay here again next time I'm in Newtown.
Location was perfect for me. Clean room, nice view. A little noise (Saturday night, expected) but didn’t lose any sleep. Would stay again!
公寓乾淨整潔､窗外景致優美,略顯吵
Great place right in the heart of the city, including a beautiful view. The apartment is spacious and has plenty of room for lounging and for sleeping, ideal for groups.
非常好的位置｡距离Daring habour还有central 火车站走路可以到达｡距离悉尼大学非常近,周围超市吃的都很近,很方便｡

Bill was a lovely host, easy to communicate with, quick to respond. He ensured we had everything we needed and knew the locations of nearby essentials. The house was spacious, clean and equiped with all we needed. Beautiful art.
Place was sparkling. Very convenient location. Kitchen and washer and dryer worked well. Check in and check out worked well.

We've had a great stay in McMahons Point and the amazing space which was very well considered and curated. Everything was as described and there is plenty of space for a large group. The quirky decoration makes for many talking points. Communication was easy, clear and quick. Great location too with easy access to anywhere as it's close to the brigde with plenty of local shops also. A memorable space!

A great modern spacious apartment in a secure apartment complex. Perfect for what I needed. Has a laundry & full kitchen & basic kitchen essentials which was great for the meals I cooked. Also excellent public transport options only a few minutes walk away. Fantastic to have a secure car park if you do have a vehicle. The bed was also super comfy.

Oliver was great to deal with always replying straight away.

My only negative would be that it can be a little noisy. You can hear the lift which is just outside, the family with kids next door & the horses training in the morning. I am however a very light sleeper so may not be an issue for others & despite this I had a great stay & would recommend highly.
Alice is a great host! She’s easy and accommodating to all of my request. I love the location and it’s close to the nice eateries, very convenient!

I spent a very good time in Louise's apartment. Everything was as described. The arrival was very easy with the key in the key lock and Louise and her husband gave me all the information needed. They were very responsive and available by email. Internet connection worked perfectly in the apartment. The amazing city center is accessible by several buses (bus stop is about one minute by walk). The surrounding is quiet, I really appreciated the parrots coming on the balcony in the morning. Thanks Louise and John.
Good place.  Centrally located and a wonderful host
Loved the place! Easy to find, and a great apartment. Nicole was helpful and informative. Couldn't ask for more :)
Great apartment, exactly as it looked in photos. Right on the parade, just across from the beach. Kasey was very helpful and quick to respond. Highly recommended!
Great place and nice and clean
Sarah was so friendly and really accommodating. The kids loved the pool and even though it was short we had the best time. Easy parking and a lovely street!
Very nice and comfortable modern place
Very nice outlook however a little on the old side.

The apartment is very well located! You can walk to the shopping centers, the Sydney Opera or the Harbour Bridge! The kitchen has everything you need!
We had a good time at Clearance House!
Great place to stay! Lovely place. location is amazing, so close to the beach, shops and restaurants. Great communication. I would definitely stay here again!

Desireé’s apartment is the perfect place to explore Sydney city from. Perfectly central to all city sights. The apartment was super clean and neat. It hosts beautiful city views, a quick 5 minute walk to Museum rail station, and a hop to great restaurants and nightlife. The apartment is tastefully decorated with art and books from adventurous travels; furnished and accessorized with absolutely everything that I could require, plus more. I was impressed at the Desireé's thoughtfulness in accommodating her guests needs. Such things as a kind welcome note. Petite chocolates, mini fresh milk packs in the fridge, expresso machine and every conceivable toiletry item one could need inside a bathroom cabinet. Discreetly rolled up extension cords so you never have to look for one to reach the wall socket to charge your digital devices. The bed was comfortable, where sprigs of fragrant lavender greeted us laid upon freshly rolled up towels. We loved our stay and highly recommend Desireé as a host. She communicated well, was always polite and prompt with messaging all required information upon booking. There's no doubt why Desireé has been voted as a super host. You will be delighted.

The room with en suite is in a bit of a share house, so it's not like a lot of AirBnB places. A bit more anonymous and private. Judy, however, does respond super quickly to any requests, and I had no trouble getting what I needed. The street is very close to Epping Road, so there is a bit of noise that comes over from this busy street, but that also makes the location very convenient (so there's two sides to every trait). I would certainly stay again.

Sarah is an excellent host and goes out of her way to ensure that you are comfortable and have everything that you need.
We will definitely stay again, thanks Sarah.
Clean, private & great host - we recommend the ‘cubby’ for a stay

Paul and his lovely family were very hospitable and more than accommodating. Everything from the room to the kitchen to the rest of the house had personality, charm and above all, a wonderful homey atmosphere. The best part about our stay was Judith's (Paul's wife) excellent selection of coffee and of course, their two very friendly dogs.

We had a great stay in Paul's place. It's in a very convenient location for exploring the city and surroundings. The road directly outside the building is quite busy. If you are a light sleeper this might not be the best option for you, but we were mostly undisturbed. 
Paul was easy to communicate with and was flexible about check in, which I appreciated. I would recommend Paul's place to others who want a convenient base for exploring Sydney.

Great location and lovely 2 bedroom apartment.

Limited storage for guests, and kitchen essentials was limited.

Would stay again!!

Fred and Bernadette were excellent hosts, and made our week in Sydney much more enjoyable vs staying in a Hotel.  They were there if we needed anything, but also gave us our space.  The home is as advertised in their description.  Bus service just a few steps from your front door.  Strong WiFi signal.  

You will find that the bed isn't as comfortable as the one you may have at home, but we slept very well with the ocean breeze cooling the apartment.  

Laundry Room is around back of the Main House so be prepared to walk back and forth to manage your laundry.

Beach Cafe nearby is open everyday for Breakfast and Lunch but is only open for dinner on Friday and Saturday from 500-830.  Excellent food.

Groceries can best be found in Maroubra at Woolies or Coles.  There are also freshmarkets and meat shops there as well.  Great place to stock up if you are cooking for yourselves.

Bus Service.  The 399 is the main bus you will use for most trips you make.  End of the line is Circular Quay in the CBD with no transfers.  Recommend getting an Opal Card to make travel quicker and easier.   **TIP** You will need an Opal Card for each traveller, you cannot share them for multiple riders.

Airport Travel.  Take the 400 to Maroubra near PIcadilly Place and transfer to the 399 Little Bay.  $3.50 per person vs $40 taxi ride.

Beach Walks.  We took the walk from the apartment to Coogee, about 4 miles.  Beautiful walk, but the 1st 1/3 of the walk you are cutting across neighborhoods and parks as the boardwalk isn't complete to Malabar yet.  Bondi to Coogee was very easy to navigate.  You should do both!

Overall - We would highly recommend this location for Couples or a small familyon Holiday.  You will feel very "local" staying here, but the CBD and action of Sydney is only a 45 minute bus ride away with no transfers.

Thanks Fred and Bernadette for starting our Australian tour off with a bang!
Clean, stylish and cute

Susan's place was fantastic! Bright and lovely, in a great location. I stayed for three nights while in town for work. I had a hire car with me, and street parking wasn't an issue. Would definitely stay in this gorgeous studio again!

So clean, warm, good smell.
Close to the airport.

This is a great central location. We spent the night as we were attending the rugby at ANZ stadium. Station was close by and convenient. I appreciated the opportunity to stay. My wife, brother and sister in law were very comfortable.
Lovely place in a great location :) The studio is modern, clean and practical... the perfect place between the beaches and the city!

We could not fault this property! Ideal location literally minutes from Darling Harbour, spotlessly clean and modern, prompt communication with the owner, straight forward check in, a beautiful outlook over the water to the Maritime Museum and plenty of space for our group booking of 4. 10 out of 10!
Great room in a great location.  The room was spotless, as well as the other live spaces.  The host was very quick to respond and everything was very clear.  Had a great experience!
We had an amazing one night here. Had everything we needed for our short stay and was in an awesome location.  The room was really private which we loved. Thanks Tracey
This is the second time we have stayed here which is probably the most telling point - we love it and would certainly stay again.
Great location near central station and great bars and restaurants. Apartment was very stylish and communication with host was excellent. Also price worked out very good value for four people.
Clean and comfortable location close to transport and restaurants. Very helpful and friendly host.

Lovely little spot in Potts Point. Right amongst all the best it has to offer, Paul was very accomodating with an early check in and catered for our little family just perfectly, would definitely stay here again when in Sydney. The convenience was second to none.
Lina's home is clean and comfortable.  We had everything we needed. About an hour drive to the Blue Mountains.
Recomendo vivamente esta casa, muito bem localizada, muito bem organizada e decorada. O anfitrião muito simpático que facilitou todo o processo de entrada e saída. Obrigado.

Fantastic hosts and beautiful apartment, would book it again any time. The apartment has everything you need and Peter and Pauline have been great with communications and made the entire process super easy and convenient.

This is a great apartment, accurately represented in a perfect location near the ferry wharf at Manly.
It was clean, well equipped and we were able to get an early check-in.
Communication was prompt.
Customers do need to be warned, however, that there is a MAJOR construction site next door, and the noise does severely impact the experience.
Second time staying with Kerri. What can I say? Best place to stay in the Sydney area. Not only is this a comfortable, clean home, Kerri is the best host EVER! Absolutely loved my stay here!

This apartment was great for our quick Bondi stay. Location is great; right on main street, but beach side so the noise is not much. Beautiful view of Bondi from window and walking distance from all shops/entertainment and scenic walks. Check-in/ out easy with help from Anita, who also provided us with lots of helpful tips about the neighborhood. Bus to Sydney right outside apartment making for easy access to the other sites. No air-con, but fan and window helped immensely. Great place for a beach vacation in Bondi! Definitely would recommend to anyone.

Unfortunately, the house was not cleaned properly and meant that we had to wear shoes inside to stop dirt and grime from collecting on our socks/feet. Also, the house is very dark, the lounge and dining area (which are the only communal areas) felt like a cave most of the time. But is a great location in Maroubra and was quite affordable by Sydney standards.

Nicole was very friendly and helpful upon arrival.  The neighborhood was cute but we had trouble eating out in the area.  Only because everywhere was so crowded.  I would recommend reservations.  Even on week nights, the places we tried to go were overcrowded - this may have been just the restaurants we tried to go to though.
非常酷的地方,交通方便,设施齐全,干净温馨的家｡
Sensational location with amenities at your doorstep. Jeremy’s property is a great place to stay for a family get together. We will be back.

Absolutely perfect! 
Tidy, clean, tasty furnished. Location is great too: opposite Centennial Park, 15 minutes bus ride to the spectacular beaches of Clovelly and Coogee and 10 minutes to the CBD. 
Louise was a great host, very kind and helpful...I definitely loved her place.
Standard studio apartment, clean, good value.
Thanks for having me Alexey. Great location and a lovely bottle of wine on arrival- much appreciated.

Located 5 mins from Museum station and very close to the city centre. Ideal if you want to explore the city or neighbouring suburbs

Would highly recommend this well presented terrace house, although probably not suited for the elderly as the internal stairs to the first and second floors a quite steep and my mother struggled a little.

Overall it is a great house in a great location close transport and bars and restaurants as well as for groceries.

Would highly recommend for a stay in Sydney.

Leila
3rd (Email hidden by Airbnb) 7 for business this week. Love this little home away from home!
Great location and super easy to organise, check in etc.
A very welcoming place, and conveniently located.
A very nice place and room. Ven is a nice person and I had a great night :)

This place was adorable, with lovely details and personal touches - just perfect for my needs. The area had a great vibe, and the location so close to cafes and transport, made getting around and eating out so easy. I will definitely stay again, perhaps a week next time, as it was also very affordable.

The area is more suitable for a group of friends and light travelers as you will have to climb two flight of stairs to the second floor.  The area is quite unique where you have a nice weekend market just opposite at the Fitzroy garden, supermarkets within walkable distance and a fantastic Japanese restaurant just downstairs the accommodation. The noise wasn't that bad but the bed is not for someone who is looking for good quality sleep. Wendy responses quick to my enquiries :)
It was a nice place to stay. Quiet, nice, clean, comfortable, and spacious! I liked the easy check in and out system as well. Thank you Sam and Lee!
Tiger is a great host. The place is accurately described. It is by the train station and 2 stops away from Central station. It is tidy, clean and modern. I cannot recommend enough.

房子和图片里描述的一样,交通便利(靠近King Cross火车站,前后都有还有直达市区公交站)非常好找~
卧室､客厅､厨房都有无敌海景,房间也很舒服~
Terry人很热情,我爸妈完全不懂英文,她还是用心帮助,用翻译软件跟我爸妈细心沟通;分享她的投影电视,还特意找来中文电影给我爸妈佐餐,真是无敌好!我们因为行程定的太晚没和父母住一起,每天来接他们Terry也都热情接待,没觉得我们打扰,真的很感谢!
MissD's place is convenient with streets of food, pharmacies and a supermarket. She is a detailed and gracious host who provides more than just basic necessities. Highly recommended :)

Aunque apenas coincidimos con Jack, estuvo disponible en todo momento para cualquier cosa que necesitásemos. La casa está muy limpia, la habitación suficiente para dos, el baño es compartido, puedes usar la cocina. Muy bien situado, aunque no hay estaciones de tren muy cerca (a unos 10 minutos caminando), pero se puede ir al centro a pie.
Recomendaría este alojamiento!
Great location right in the middle of Bondi. Gwen was so helpful and made the whole process really easy. 100% would recommend.
It was such a beautiful room. Very clean and comfortable.
He's so kind and helps us have a good time here. The room is clean and roommates are also friendly and helpful whatever you ask. I'm glad to stay here!

The place was great and Alexey was an amazing host. It’s a central location and easily accessible to the train. This place is perfect for those who have never used a train before because all trains end up at this location. The train system starts in a loop first and then branches out into the rest of the city and his place is within this loop. The place is much larger than what the pictures depict. 2 floors with 2 full bathrooms and 2 balconies. There is a very nice restaurant below. Prior to staying in the apartment we thought the noise from the trains would be a problem at night but I️ dont actually remember hearing them.  So I️ basically slept like a baby and I’m a very very light sleeper. It could be that the trains stopped running at night but I’m not actually sure. All in all, this is a great place to stay. We highly recommend it.

Marcella was very quick with her replies and very easy to get to the accommodation. Location was very good and near the beach. Her place was very spacious and more than enough room for our group. Accommodation was generally quite clean but perhaps the upstairs wasn't used as often so it was a bit dusty. We had a small welcome pack which was a very nice touch! The extensive library was very impressive, wished we have more time to make more use of it.

This was exactly as described, and Cathy's extra touches made it a really comfortable stay.

The place was spotlessly clean, the bed linen was really nice quality, there was even shampoo and conditioner (which I appreciated, having forgotten to pack mine).  I also really appreciated the extra touch of providing breakfast -- lovely muesli, greek yoghurt, fresh berries and milk, and Cathy got in touch ahead of time to see what kind of milk I preferred. Extremely thoughtful.

Having stayed in a few places around this area, it was terrific to have off-street parking.

All in all, it was perfect for my needs as a sole traveller in the area for business; I would happily stay here again anytime.
Very nice stay.  Shuang's room allows you to go in and out on your own schedule and is perfect for short or overnight stays.  Highly recommended!

Spend a great 2 nights at Vickie's studio. Well decorated, had everything we need and surprisingly spacious. It was my first time in Sydney, so the location was just perfect; many good cafes and restaurants near by.

Vickie is an amazing host, she made sure we were comfortable and well adjusted. Great person to communicate with.
Jeremy was an excellent host and the house is perfect for a base near the cbd. The bars and restaurants locally are great. The house makes living in the area easy when working out of Sydney.

Es un departamento bonito y muy espacioso. Nos encontramos con algunos detalles desprolijos en los dormitorios, con sábanas arrugadas, algunos pelos en las almohadas, y polvo en los muebles. ´Puede que se haya descuidado esto por nuestra solicitud de ingreso unas horas antes del horario acordado, pedido que nos fue amablemente concedido.
不错的选择
Nice and clean, convenient terrace in Erskinville, thoughtful layout and finishes. Jan was very communicative and helpful.
Millie's flat was clean, comfortable and centrally located within short walk to ferry and train and just a couple of stops to city. Also, cafes and shops close by.
Great space with generous hosts. This is a great find.
Wonderful place to stay! Quiet, comfortable and clean facilities, friendly and helpful host, close to public transport and my partner and I would definitely come back, thank you so much

All in all a good private place very clean & tidy 
Great location within walking distance of a park ,Market place & many Restaurants 
Breakfast in the form of oatmeal sachets
& condiments Tea & Coffee 
Unrestricted parking on the street close bye
Great front room with natural light and comfortable bed. Wonderful location. The place is set up for airbnb guests. The hosts accommodated a same day check in for me, for which I was grateful.
Beautiful home and very helpful host. Had all the things we needed over the weekend. Thank you

Great place. We stayed here a whole month after transitioning  back to Sydney from overseas. I would highly recommend the area especially for nature lovers; cliffs, parks and amazing beaches all at your door step. Kariem had a genuine concern for our well being and comfort during our stay and was very professional and upfront about what the apartment did and didn't offer. I have stayed in many airbnbs in Sydney as I travel alot and so far this has been the most comfortable and relaxing. Recommended.

Lovely & very neat apartment with a really comfortable bed & that's really conveniently located. We loved the close proximity to Redfern Station & small shops nearby. Irene was very friendly & hospitable to us & responded promptly to any questions we had prior to our arrival. Highly recommended host!

Lovely bright apartment in perfect location! I booked David's Potts Point apartment for myself, as well as my mum and sister for two nights. It was a great size for the three of us! 

I loved sitting by the big window and people watching with a cup of tea in the mornings and glass of red in the evening! I really loved the apartment, quite spacious for Sydney - it was a plus that it was so secure too!

There are markets literally metres away on Saturday, which have plenty of food stalls on offer. There are so many restaurants & bars to choose from all well within walking distance!

David had brilliant communication and was very accommodating. He met us at the apartment and showed us on a map where to walk to get to the gallery the next day, which was extremely helpful and very kind of him. It's a nice walk into Circular Quay, Botanic Gardens and The Rocks.

Last but not least, all 3 of us were in awe of the book collection in the apartment. You have great taste David, I will have to make the next stay longer so I can read some! 

Thank you so much!

This would have to be one of the best airbnbs we've stayed in. The place was brand new, immaculate and fitted out with everything one would need-awesome attention to detail. We were traveling with our toddler and George and Lucia were thoughtful enough to provide some toys and even a step stool for her in the bathroom. It's that sort of stuff you don't see all the time but makes things much easier! Great hosts.
Desiree’s place was absolutely perfect for our time spent in Sydney. Amazing location and everything you could need! Highly recommend staying here while in Sydney!

The place was fine. The person that checked us in was great! Note ahead of time that the owner gives a warning that the ventilation isn’t great and be careful cooking food—-he said you would have to pay for it if the fire alarm went off while cooking. Other than that it’s in a great location for touristy sights in Sydney

I stayed at Cath's place for around 10 days and found it exactly as described. A cute space with a comfy bed, clean bathroom and handy kitchen. It included Cath's thoughful touches such as the breakfast hamper which was very nice. I would not hesitate recommending Cath's place.

Cath’s Studio was all we needed for a 4 night stay in Sydney. Close to Sydney Uni for the daily commute for lectures
Thank you Cath
It was a really nice time there
Rose bay is beautiful, the buses are 4 minutes walk and the 7 minutes. The entrance to your bedroom is through Shaun’s bedroom, though I did not find that a problem
Clean & cosy place to stay . Close to centre station which easy to use public transport to visit around .
Very thoughtfully provisioned studio and obviously a great location.  Couldn’t fault it.

Griffin was an amazing host and after a long haul flight from London we arrived to groceries as the supermarkets would be shut for ANZAC day! It was these small touches along with a stylish and extremely clean apartment that made our stay well worth it. If we ever come back to Sydney we will definitely be staying here again. Thank you Griffin!!
地理位置优越,过个马路就是地铁站,出行非常方便｡

Absolutely ideal. Amazing location, STUNNING home, hospitable hosts, staggering view from the room! Can not fault this experience, whatsoever. Super cute puppy, too! Thank you very much, Naveen. I'll be back.

I would highly recomend this property for so many reasons, location, stunning views, cleanliness, comfort, attention to detail, not just one deep bath but 2. Great gym, swimming pool and spa facilities. I felt very spoilt being there and Danny was so attentive, helpful and kind, the perfect host.
Great location, lovely decor, responsive host.
Great location for visiting all parts of the city. Lots of amenities close by making it a great place to stay

We had a wonderful time at Fred's Place, the unit was exactly as shown in the pictures. It was very beautiful and clean, complete with all the amenities you need. The view from the unit are picture perfect, it has a private beach and walled pool. Going to the city was so easy and convenient by bus that stops just a few meters from the unit. I would definitely recommend this place.

Perfect location! Easy access to the beach and the corso. Enjoyed the time spent there. Paul was an excellent host and had quick response times while communicating. Would stay here again and recommend to anyone else.

Jared's place was perfect for our 3 day/2 night stay in Sydney before we took off for another city on our honeymoon. The apartment was as described, and perfectly located near Circular Quay. Air conditioning was great to have during the 97 degree day and evening. Ana was very communicative and responsive to any questions we had. Would stay again. Thanks guys!

Natasa was very friendly I felt like a visited friends house.
The room was clean and bed was confutable and house is close to the city.
I'll be back again
Thank you,Natasa!! yum

Excellent modern and clean apartment. Close to all amenities and the beach, but also peaceful at night. Great communication from Ziggy. Would recommend for anyone looking for a nice place to stay in Manly.
Very comfortable room.

Ali and Maryam have a hidden gem here in the Hills District. It is quiet but close to restaurants and businesses in the area. It is clean and modern and felt very luxurious for our midweek getaway. It has everything that you need. We had complete privacy as it has its own entrance. There was great communication with the owners as well. We will definitely be returning for another stay and can highly recommend this granny flat to others. Thank you so much Ali and Maryam for sharing your beautiful accommodation with us.

A perfect location! Two beaches are a mere couple of minutes walk away. We also did a great walk in the National Park which started just down the road from Belinda's. The studio is extremely clean and the kitchen is excellently stocked with everything you're likely to want and need. There is a great BBQ as well. The studio is separated from the main house by a lovely garden, and feels private and very tranquil. 
Belinda was a fantastic host - very welcoming and friendly.
I would highly recommend Bundeena Garden studio to all.

Prime location. Easy access from airport, with 5 to 10 mins walk from Capitol Square light rail.
Convenient to go to everywhere with plenty of eateries around.

The location of Wayne & Kate's place seriously couldn't be more perfect!  You overlook beautiful Tamarama beach, which is right between Bondi and Bronte (both within walking distance).  The decor is simple and clean and the apartment was outfitted with just the right stuff (champagne and a nespresso machine :). The hosts were very accommodating and available to help with anything you need. Highly recommend this location for a base in Sydney.
Beautiful home in a fabulous area.  very clean, lovely bed and everything you need.  We enjoyed our stay very much. Thank you for having us.
Stayed in Brigette's lovely spacious modern 1 bedroom apartment with sofa bed. Only 20 min walk to the beach and 5 min drive to supermarket so handy for everything in Dee Why.
Logement très bien situé dans un bel immeuble ! Produits de première nécessité fournis . Bonne base pour visiter Sydney .

The apartment and the room are clean. Close to bus stop. (5min from CBD) 
Duncan and Ashlee are friendly, helpful and easy going hosts. We recommend.
The location is the best , place is very clean and the possibility for an early check up was so unexpectedly pleasing ! thank you and I would definitely recommend this place to other people .

We loved staying at Sara's. The place easily big enough for 4 adults and really close to both the CBD and surrounding Sydney. She welcomed us and made as sure we had everything we needed , and even let us stay late on Sunday. Definitely would stay again if back in Sydney!

It's was amazing to stay with Duncan and Ashlee! They are both extremely nice, communicative and open. Their place is exceptionally clean and equipped with all you need to have an overjoyous experience in Sydney. Highly recommended!

Naveen and Tristan were great hosts from start to finish. Though we didn't cross paths much, my partner and I felt really welcomed and looked after through our week.
Upon arrival, we were greeted by Tristan and the lovely puppy Felix. Tristan was sure to give us advice and recommendations for the local attractions and where was best to set up our banking and mobile networks. This was really helpful to us.

The room itself was perfect, fit with a very comfortable double bed, a huge window looking out onto the neighbourhood, and all the amenities we could possibly need.

I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking to explore Sydney and the surrounding areas, real value for money.

The apartment was spotlessly clean and comfortable to stay. Tam was so kind and responded promptly for all the questions I had during the stay which made the stay even more comfortable. Bed was really comfy and good pressure of shower was a plus! The apartment was close to cafes and restaurants in Darlinghurst, very close to the city centre and easy walking distance to Museum station - one train from airport. 

I would highly recommend Tam’s place for anyone who is visiting Sydney. I would stay here again when I visit Sydney next time! 

Thank you for your hospitality Tam :)
Central, great view, clear instructions, easy check in. Highly recommended.
It's a very nice place and very well situated. Charles allowed us to leave our luggage in the backyard for a couple of hours after our check out. We'd stay there again!
Comfortable apartment with a good location :)

Great stay! very clean and modern place if you need a room close to the airport. It was easy to find and it cost me only $2 to get there by bus from the airport! A Woolworths is only a few hundred meters away and the bus stop only a short 10 min walk.
Amazing, magical place, a hidden gem close to clean Waters of Pitt Water.

Great location, easy to get to central Sydney or the Airport. Good communication from Huy. There isn't a great deal of room if there are two of you with luggage, but if you are travelling light, then it's fine and Huy's mum is lovely!!

I would highly recommend this apartment- we really couldn't have asked for anything more. The apartment is beautiful and cosy, had everything we needed, and was fresh and spotless . Lots of lovely extra touches- luxury bathroom products, books, essentials for the beach, delicious food in the fridge.  Great location. Communication was  prompt and easy.

It was a pleasure staying in Marcella's home.  The house was well presented; each room even had travel toiletries.  The beds were comfortable and everyone enjoyed a good night sleep despite a small amount of noise from the neighbours.  
Location was perfect, only a 5min walk to the beach and a short cab ride from the airport (~$50 for a maxi cab).  There were some lovely cafes and restaurants in walking distance and looked as though even more were about to open up.  
Marcella was a fantastic host and I would definitely not hesitate to recommend a stay in her home.

Ziggy’s place was an unreal spot in Manly, so close to the beach and in the main town you couldn’t ask for better! He was an easy host to deal with and was flexible with checking in and out. Will definitely be staying again when I’m next in Manly.

Great location, clean, great hosts. Would recommend to anyone looking to stay in the area. Lots of nice little extra touches too - snacks, washing powder etc. the space was a lot bigger then expected. Thanks!
Great location in an upscale building.  Walking distance to EVERYTHING!  Communication was flawless.  Check in/ check out a breeze.  Chloe is a great host!

We can’t love this house more.
Parking was a little tricky but didn’t damper our experience. Highly recommend this stay being close to beach, buses and cafes :)

The apartment is located in a nice place.We can walk to the circular quay in 10 mins.The Rocks,Royal Botanic Gardens and Sydney Opera House are not far where we can walk to.The apartment is small but equiped well.There is everything we need.Cen is very helpful.But the mattress is too soft for my parents,since hard mattress is good for old people's back.

Natasa is very welcoming, friendly and lots of fun.
I spent a busy few days in her great terrace and enjoyed one of her delish curries with drinks on the leafy terrace.
I’m not surprised she always has so many guests.
Thanks Natasa

Kathy’s home in Randwick is perfect if you want something close to Sydney but gives you the option to enjoy the towns nearby.  The bus into Sydney is almost outside the house, so this provides a link to the rest of the extensive public transport system (a tram service will be available soon too).  Opposite Kathy’s house is the most amazing Centennial Park; lakes, walks, fantastic wildlife (including flying foxes roosting in the trees!) and a tasty coffee and snack mean you can spend a happy hour enjoying the peace and tranquility. 
There is so much to see and do in Sydney you will never be bored. We bought tickets for a performance at the Opera House, took ferry rides and walked miles around the streets. The Rocks and Bangaroo are beautiful and fascinating if you are interested in history, social change and architecture. Bangaroo Reserve is ‘must see’! 
Outside of the CBD are many other towns some with lovely seaside fronts and beaches. The bus to Coogee Beach is about five minutes away and takes you right to the promenade with shops, cafes and glorious golden sands in less than twenty minutes. 
Kathy is always on hand if you need some help and advice but you have your own space and privacy. A great place for exploring Sydney and the surrounding areas.

You cannot beat this location in Bondi. Walking distance to the beach, cafes and restaurants. The house was big enough to accommodate two couples and two babies plus have some friends over for dinner without feeling cramped. We ended up having bad weather so we were inside a lot but that didn’t matter because the house was so spacious and had a fireplace! I would highly recommend this house.

Well decorated studio apartment great for couples or single travelers. The apartment is newer and has a great efficiency kitchen with all appliances you need in addition to a nice bathroom.

The view looks into an inner space in between apartments and you can see into the neighbors kitchen, but nothing new if you have stayed in big city airbnbs.

The apartment did not have A/C at the time of stay, I would recommend this place as long as it's cooler outside or more fans were brought in.

The location is phenomenal. Lots of restaurants and a few coffee shops nearby with easy access to Kings Cross Station for your metro needs.

Great stay overall!
Konrad was a friendly host.

The views were  amazing , most of the time spent in the apartment were out on the balcony taking in the scenery . We felt like we were in a home from home the apartment was lovely and clean and the area was nice and quiet but just a few mins drive from the city centre . It had everything we needed and Sara responded immediately with any queries we had. It was a lovely place to stay and if I ever return to Sydney will be looking to book with Sara again
Good location and very roomy apartment

Wow......this met all of our expectations and more. Clean and tidy with fresh sheets on a comfy bed and Sheridan towels. Not to mention the extras that I wont bother to take next time we stay like umbrellas, shopping bags, tea bags, band aids and spare blankets. Perhaps having  a hairdryer available would have lightened my luggage! 
Check in and check out was easy. Ben was available ,approachable and very helpful. 
The location was perfect for exploring Sydney. A 20 min stroll down historic Oxford St to Darling Harbour. Many different buses right out the front to Centre Point, Bondi, Circular Quay  just to mention a few. Don't forget to get your Opal card from any newsagent and you can top it up with cash on line! Walking distance to the train to explore further a field.
 The studio apartment on the 7th floor has spectacular views ( the photos don't lie!) and is nestled in a friendly community with many restaurants/cafes/shops/chemists all within walking distance. We will be back for many visits I am sure...thanks again Ben!
Good proximity to international airport.

This property is reasonable value for $
Loved the location and the sun light streaming into the unit. Lovely and peaceful and a good size apartment.

If you’re ok with a worn lounge and a shower head that does wet you but not much else ... then give this one a go ... afterall it’s got to be one of the cheapest around so we were ok with these little problems.

The hosts provided an efficient friendly service ... so thank you :)

Allison and Daniel
The unit is well located and while small, had everything we needed to be comfortable. It was clean and the bed was very comfy. No complaints at all.

I spent a lovely weekend in this cute little fully self contained apartment. Belinda has though of all the little things that make your stay amazing. It close to the shops and the beach. There are some amazing nature walks and mountain bike trails in the area. 
Really good value and i would recommend this little gem to anyone...
great
Great location and stylish, nicely renovated apartment. Not much wardrobe space for clothes but otherwise well equipped. Kasey was very helpful and responsive. I would recommend this to friends.
Opted Judy’s place for the second time. Arrangements were perfect. Happy with the service and prompt responses whenever needed. Would definitely prefer staying here during my next visit as well.

Alexey's place is centrally located, just  metres away from Central Station. It's clean, comfortable and Alexey went out of his way for a flexible check in for us. There are also very thoughtful touches around the house - such as chardonnay on arrival. Highly recommend.

Wonderful apartment unit. Very clean and cozy. Louise mum was an absolute superstar. Clean bathroom too. Getting to CBD was easy. We always travel by UberX to Central Station which usually will cost us around $12-15 dollars. Many eateries within 10 minutes walking distance. The "travel around guide note" and "house manual print-out" which was prepared by Lousie  was very helpful indeed. The downside is the unit is on the 3rd floor with no lift. But in overall, we enjoyed the stay.
Shaun was very communicative,and his apartment was clean and close to public transport,I would recommend this apartment and Shaun as a host.
Great location, and the apartment is nicely appointed. Vickie was an excellent, communicative host. I would stay again.
Right in the middle of the CBD so this is the place to go for convenience.

Shuang's place was nice and very clean! Only about ten minutes walk to a big grocery store and another five to Wolli Creek train station. $10-15 for uber from and to the airport. Highly recommend staying here!

Location was great, 10 min walk to train station. View of bridge: amazing. Size: think Manhattan or Tokyo. Bed: extremely comfortable. 
Quirky and older building/apartment with a few things that remind you its old, though not any pressing issues. 
Noise at night like any big city, but free parking and an elevator make up for it. However, (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps nor GPS took me to the correct address, so be prepared if you’re driving. Safe, and served the purpose. Recommend to a single or easygoing traveler!

Bryan was a terrific host, very communicative, even anticipating our needs.  For instance, we are academics and Bryan, without prompting, sussed out that we might need a desk during our stay and set one up upstairs!  The Treehouse is in the perfect location - Glebe is AMAZING - and totally comfortable.
Exactly what it says on the tin. Great location, private & clean.
It was a great stay in Irene's place! The apartment is clean and cozy, located within walking distance from a train station as well as bus station. Both Irene and John are very helpful and welcoming.

What an absolutely fabulous place to stay. Michy is considerate warm and a genuine lady. From a warm welcome on arrival, milk in the fridge, everything one could desire in the perfect spot to even driving us to our restaurant for dinner she is amazing. The cabin is perfect, it is beautifully decorated. The bed is large, deep and immensely comfortable. It took a real effort to prize my boyfriend away amid grumbles of why he couldn't squat there.....the cabin is reached by the stepping stone path around the main house, through the small garden and sits on its own. It is breathtakingly pretty....has a comfy sofa, a full bookcase,  a gorgeous mosquito net that makes you feel like you are lost in the orient falling asleep. I cannot tell you how fantastic this little treasure is we will most certainly be returning.
很棒很棒的!!
Wonderful apartment with thoughtful touches of comfort.
Very clean, nice room. Accommodated our early check in request and was very responsive to our questions.

Tam's place is the ideal family home for a perfect getaway. The location was great to avoid the crowds but close enough to Curl Curl, Freshie and Manly to enjoy the beaches and all that the area has to offer. The pool was a definate draw card and the outdoor area is conducive to rest and relaxation. It's obvious that Tam is a keen cook as everything is thought of and available for entertaining. Would definately recommend and would come back again!

David’s apartment is lovely great position in the heart of Potts Point so convenient to everything. The communication with David was fabulous the apartment was spotless and all the ammenities you need for a short stay would highly recommend.
Cosy and clean apartment in a vibrant area. Griffin is very responsive and thoughtful host. We liked complimentary coffee and snacks provided. Recommended!

Great location. Great price for 3 seperate rooms. 
Starting to show some wear and tear but does the job. 6 adults easily accommodated.
Very responsive.
Unfortunate cleaners let the room down, travelled a lot but found a few things I def shouldn’t have! Others may have been more offended. Great value for 6 adults in the cbd though

Had a great time in the garden suite at Susan's! It was my own private bungalow which was just lovely. 

Leichhardt is an awesome suburb of Sydney and I found the bus system to be very easy to navigate with a stop at the end of the street (1 min away). 

Tons of cool cafes along Norton street, especially Petit Fours - delicious French bakery!

If you're looking for a more quiet relaxing Sydney vacation, this is the place to be.

I stayed 4 nights at Vivian's, the location was perfectly located 5mins of the best Sydney beaches. The studio was pristine fitted with everything I needed. The day I arrived there was a mini glitch with the door system, 5mins after my call, Patrick came over and fix it. Definitely a place to stay for few days !

Brendan is great and his apartment and room is very comfortable. Perfectly located. Brendan is a walking book if you need a tip for a trip around. Was very kind and let us bring out bags earlier than a check in time and also was  activily helpful in general. Thank you Brendan!
Everything was fantastic, great communication and very helpful. Would recommend

We had a lovely stay as well as I experienced a little issue when I got locked out of my room and the key was in there. Miss D was very helpful and this issue could be resolved in no time. A great stay and very comfortable Would highly recommend this place!

Had a wonderful week staying in Fred and Bernadette's lovely apartment! Such a stunning location right across from the beach! Fred and Bernadette were wonderful hosts and the apartment had everything we needed! Would definitely recommend for a wonderful beach getaway!
我们在这里住了两晚,男主人非常友善｡房东的作息规律,所以晚上整个屋子都很安静｡卧室和卫生间干净,步行至city需要20分钟｡

Great location, was a little bit noisy traffic wise, shops, pubs and public transport all very close. Home was clean, furnishings at a minimum, but comfortable enough. Strange burn’t plastic smell, host explained that heavy cooking/burning had happened previous. However even with doors opened for fresh air and a smelly candle, the smell would not go. In saying that I would stay again, as the location was fantastic and we could sleep 8.

A great place within a 20 minute walk to the international terminal. There was some construction near the airport, but plenty of signage directing me to the terminal. Check-in/check-out was very easy and the place was immaculate.

We had a mixture of ‘first time to Sydney ‘ and ‘ been before’ in our family group. The apartment was so convenient for everything - the beach - the shops and the ferry, it couldn’t have been better. If you are on the beach and have forgotten something it literally only takes a minute to return to the apartment.
We had a hire car and the large garage with electronic doors was a major ‘ plus’ as parking In Manly can be a  big challenge especially at the weekend when the beach is busy.
Anita has thought of everything - washing liquid - dishwasher tablets- sewing kit - ironing board - so many things that in other rentals you have to go out to stock up with a months supply that you only use for a week. Anita has it all - it’s a small touch that really raises the quality of the rental.
We are definitely coming back - already booked for trip two! The first timers and the experienced visitors in our family group all have new memories to cherish of our week in Manly.
Anita is very responsive and we are grateful to her for making our week in Manly so comfortable.
Fantastic location suitable to all different needs. Walking distance to the majority of central Sydney. Would definitely stay again and recommend to all who are interested.

My second stay at Fred & Bernadette's place was great! The morning sun & sound of the waves crashing is just divine. Once again the apartment was clean and there was even a birthday card with a present! I wish I could go back more often, highly recommended.
Great place!
Lovely place would definitely stay again!

Incredible location, sparkling clean and a fantastic host who responds quickly and goes the extra mile. Very thoughtful and helpful - all round a fantastic stay in Surry Hills and great value. Highly recommend to all.

We stayed at this wonderful home for 6 nights. We truly enjoyed staying at this quiet and lovely home of Carole and Steve. They are so helpful and caring. Indeed, the energetic 16 month old and very friendly Jack Russell Terrier "Buddy" who is very smart. Thank you so much, Carole and Steve. Surely we will come back to stay with you again.

House is really close to bondi beach to walk! And many restaurants are near to house;-) 
Host is also kind! She explained about nice places to visit!

Fantastic place to stay! Philip generously allowed me to drop my luggage off before official check in time which was greatly appreciated. I was greeted by Matt who was so friendly and welcoming. The house was immaculate in both presentation and cleanliness. The stairs take a little  bit of getting used to but they are very sturdy.
