Location was convenient for my needs and the neighbour felt safe. Certainly enjoyed my stay and would definitely recommend Philip's place. Thank you!

David is a great host. From the beggining letting us leave our ridiculous amount of luggage early so we did not have to lug it around till check in and also allowed us to check out late for the same reason. The apartment is in a perfect spot. Park across the road for our 5 year old daughter. Close to trains and buses, cafes and restaurants. A clean, comfortable and most enjoyable stay. Thank you. Lisa.

Really had a good time in the apartment.
Accurate description, and so happy to offer that to my sister's and husband first trip to Australia, Sydney.
Mavelous view when waking up, we've been lucky with the weather, great situation. Close to the ferry -10 mn, Neutral Bay, very close, couldn't be better. Feeling so lucky finding this apartment and being accepted.
Quiet environment, safe car park, good internet, all facilities... Good bed (according to my sister), I had the sofa and cannot complain either, what else can you expect?
Check-in has been brief, straight forward, well organised.
Stephen has been a great host and I want to thank him again.
I hope to come again, one day, if it's not over booked !!!
100% satisfied...
JP

Carole and her husband are extremely welcoming including their dog (Buddy). The house is nice and clean being a 10min walk from the nearest train station and 5min walk from the bus stop. Overall, great place to stay and we look forward to coming back!

Holy moly what an apartment. Actually better than the photos! The vibe is clean, open, breezy, sophisticated. After a picnic lunch at Bronte, We enjoyed dinner together at the table and an evening swim. We were a party of 6, and all of us slept comfortably and felt like a million dollars the entire time. The kitchen was awesome to cook in and the balcony a peaceful breakfast spot. It could not have been more perfect.

I had a wonderful time staying at Gregoire’s place in Sydney, it is a beautiful apartment, excellent communication, and the place was perfectly clean! Would definitely stay here if I was visiting Sydney again :) Thank you!
Amazing location and view
Great location.  clean. perfect.
Location is awesome
Very cute eclectic flat! We had clean sheets, absolutely perfect water pressure in the shower
Perfect place to stay
Great neighborhood and easy place to stay (for the second time).

If you're heading to Sydney and hoping to stay in Darling Harbour, Angela's apartment is ideal. The kitchen contained all of the equipment you could need and the supermarket is just a minutes walk away. The location was great. The apartment was tidy & quiet. Great value for families wanting to stay close to some beautiful sights and tourist attractions. We would highly recommend Angela's apartment.
Susan and her partner were extremely accommodating. Immaculate place with a short stroll to the beach and cafes. Thanks for a wonderful time.
Perfect stay, friendly hosts, lovely bedroom and well located. I highly recommend it!
This was an excellent experience.  A beautiful apartment in a fantastic neighbourhood.  Simon and Nicole were accommodating and easy to communicate with.  All good!
Another incredible stay at my favourite AirBnb yet! Thanks Narelle for having me
Fantastic apartment true to the description and painstakingly well maintained.
what a perfect spot a really beautiful place .

I was at Hernan's place for just one night, but he was very warm, accommodating, and approachable. His place is close to both the airport and a cute beach strip, great for a run first thing in the morning. Everything was very clean and comfortable, and I appreciated that he gave me a lot of space and privacy. Wonderfully easy going and accommodating of my late-ish check-in; great host!

Excellent location. Lovely quiet, well appointed apartment with an excellent degree of cleanliness. Lots of things to see and do in and around the apartment and lots more things very close by. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it!
I absolutely love how spacious the place is.  It's fantastic when travelling with family.
Lynne really went the extra mile to make our stay enjoyable. The location is perfect for beach and cafes, but still wonderfully quiet. Would definitely stay again
Jeremy 的热情好客,每次的反馈都非常及时,在我们到来之前还特意在房子放置了鲜花美化环境｡房子周边的配套还算方便,走路2-3分钟就有餐厅,10-15分钟就有超市,公交车站也是5分钟的路程｡家里的配套设施一应俱全,我们8个人居住得非常舒适｡唯一的小缺点就是这里的蚊子有点多,不过房东很及时又很贴心地为我们准备了各种灭蚊用品｡
Great apartment, great location and parking under building is a great bonus!
The host canceled this reservation 80 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Athena was very thoughtful with accommodating my needs. I needed to check in early and she was able to let me do so. The actual apartment is spacious and has everything someone would need for a stay in Sydney. It’s also very close to one of the harbors so it’s very easy to hop on a ferry and go to the beach.

The property is just like the description. Location is quite convenient for darling harbor and the rest of Sydney, several places to eat within a 5 minute walk. The space was clean. Staff was very accommodating to meet our requests for an early check in.

Positioned in the heart of Manly, walking distance to everything you could need (beach, wharf, shops, restaurants). The apartment was spacious and allowed for 4 people to fit very comfortably. Would highly recommend anyone looking at booking Paul’s apartment to just hit book!

とても静かな地域で過ごしやすいです!少し歩けば大きいｽｰﾊﾟｰもあります!
隣の部屋の音が少し聞こえてしまいますが､それが問題なければとても素晴らしい場所です!

I really tried to see the positives with this whole booking so it wasn't a negative review but I couldn't actually rate you zero - it wouldn't let me. So you have 1*

So I'll start with a thank you. Thank you for nothing.

We feel really let down by you as a company. 

 You cancelled our 1st  booking, apparently there was a problem with your airbnb account. (my alarm bells should have been ringing then, but the apartment seemed perfect for us, location and price wise). 
When I contacted you about the issue we re-booked. 
When requested you price matched the 1st booking. 
When I requested check-in details I had no response, 3 days prior to departure or day before departure. 
After a 27+hr flight from UK to Sydney we arrived at the airport and went to check the address details and directions and found the email to say the apartment booking had been cancelled. I get the reason, if its true, I understand. But we landed at 9pm with nowhere to stay. 
Did you personally offer to help us or find us alternative accommodation with you?  A BIG FAT NO! 
Refund when requested. 
Next day we attempted to book another apartment with you and you actually declined us, when really you should have been helping us  to find somewhere to stay.
That is what shocked me the most, the unhelpfulness. You knew why we wanted to stay, you knew the problems we had had before - none of them our fault and still you refused to help. 

No thanks to you, we now have a different apartment/hotel for the duration of our stay - not with your company. To say we were disappointed is an understatement. 

I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND YOU.
Angela and Coby were very accommodating and friendly. Thanks again.
Easy and uncomplicated Communication. It was nice and clean - absolute recommendable!

Margaret was very accomodating to our late check in and late check out the next day. There were thoughtful touches to the carriage that we only discovered before we left. On a longer stay, I’m sure there are more surprises to be found. A very memorable stay!

What a great city pad!!
Victoria was so welcoming and had thought of everything you might need including umbrellas ( which we did need!!)
The apartment was spotless & the location was easy enough to get into the centre by foot or bus ... we preferred walking via the amazing Botanical Gardens.. absolutely stunning!!!
Well located & fab restaurants on the door step too & if you like Thai food well Victoria recommended The Opium Den ... we went back twice.... omg it was superb!!
Thanks again Victoria!
Sue & Ian 
UK
The place is clean and the location is great. Unfortunately, Allen has an extremely disturbing flatmate. I felt so uncomfortable that I left the house two hours after arrival.
Clean, close to town and Ziggy is a legend

We had a great time at Bernadette’s place! Such a beautiful location and amenities, and the extra treats were much appreciated and enjoyed. We actually live in Sydney but not near the beach, so we had a fabulous time exploring the beaches, rock pool, cafes/restaurants and walks, along with more breeze and less humidity than usual ☺️ Highly recommended.

Location is good... value for money..
But if want to sleep in day time than no chance you can sleep their in day..
Too much noice from construction work around....
Easy location, everything close.. but apartment needs few repairs..
Things like sugar was there to use but not in a jar, just a open packet..
Glass, plates were not washed properly by last guest...
Max was very friendly and able to give quick response...
Still i will give 4 star as it was value for money....
Clean place, a bit small but good value for the money
Great location, great place, felt really comfortable here. Would recommend to anyone staying in town for a few days

Anitta was very quick with responding to any requests. Her artwork is fascinating and there are many personal features that make this unit quaint. The location is ideal for getting around the Eastern suburbs. The apartment looks out onto the garden and 'nature's alarm' will ring out every morning. I can't remember the last time I heard a kookaburra laugh!
Good location for walking around Sydney CBD,comfortable beds.

The view is second to none. 
A wonderful spot in Bondi.
You pay highly for the views .

Sehr schön, immer wieder gern, tolle angenehme Ausstattung mit Coffeemaker, Milchaufschäumer, Kühlschrank, Wasserkocher... eben alles, was man auf die schnelle braucht. Der Garten ist ein Traum und entspannt von hektischen Großstadt-Touren. Zu Fuß nur wenige Minuten zum Strand und dem schönen Bronte-Bondi-Walk. Wenn es nachts mal kühl werden sollte, ist eine gute Heizung vorhanden. Werde die Unterkunft wieder gern buchen.

The apartment was as immaculate and perfect as the pictures and has everything u need. The location of the apartment was awesome, a short 5-10min drive to the city and Westfield Eastgardens where we went for a late night movie. The only thing to note is that there are no lifts so be prepared to walk up 4 flight of stairs. Other than that, all was good. Louise was amazing, she was very responsive and helpful. Highly recommended :)

We were very happy with the location of Neiafu and loved being so close to restaurants, shops and the beach.  The apartment was clean and bed comfortable;  Andi had left lots of provisions for our stay, including a Xmas gift under a tree!  Beach towels were a welcome touch too.   Unfortunately, Andi and Ron were away when we arrived leaving us unsure of access areas.
It's really nice to stay in Hernan's place. It's clean and has very good view. The place near the beach.
Great place, fully equipped house, Tam is great host, great beach 5-10 min easy walk away.

Great location for the family as quite but close enough to the city action.  Lots of food choices in walking distance and a great cafe  (coffee) 100m away.  A comfortable 20m stroll to the Opera House via the gardens.  Apartment very generous in size for 4 and has all you need including foxtel.  Air Conditioner works well and car park is a bonus.
地理位置非常棒,离机场超级近,步行20分钟左右就可以到达国际机场航站｡房间干净而且装修简约美观,房东很热心亲和,住宿体验很棒,赞

Yang's place was a beautiful apartment with the best views! The place is furnished with everything you could need and is close to all public transport. 
I will certainly stay here again

Really enjoyed Hernan's place. It was exactly as described. I only got to meet Hernan on the last day of my stay in his apartment, as I was busy sigh seeing and he was working. However we communicated well by text message before and during my stay. When we did meet, he was very nice and friendly. His place is very clean and it was a pleasure staying there.
To have none
A Great stay, very welcoming, super clean and comfy, easy access - a home away from home. We'll be back!

My partner and I had an absolutely lovely stay in Minto. The property is beautiful and the train was such a unique and fun place to stay. Everything we could have needed was either provided or minutes away.  My only hope is that we can come back again some time soon :) Do note that you will definitely need to follow Margaret's directions. (Hidden by Airbnb) maps has no clue how to find this place!
Great place!
The cottage is a lovely & peaceful oasis tucked back in a gorgeous garden.  After a hot day at the beach, this is a perfect place to retreat.  Highly recommend!
房东的妈妈非要热情,很晚了还给我们开门
Very nice apartment, very well located, we recommend it!!!!
Oliver was a great host and made our stay extremely easy. The apartment is clean and cool set-up with the TV. View from the balcony is fantastic.

Hernan was just the kind of person who you'd want to visit--friendly, generous, and easy-going.  The place was simple, and had everything you need.  I walked down to the beach and it was a lot of fun just like all the beaches in Sydney.  A great place and a great deal!

Right in the heart of Sydney CBD - great location.
Great communication with Chloe, she made the whole process very easy.
The apartment also has a portacot - which would be useful if travelling with the little ones.
Overall a very good stay.
Beautiful apartment in a great spot. Kathy and Mary made us feel at home instantly
Beautiful place, easily accessible. The breakfast supplies were a thoughtful and personal touch that contributed towards a really wonderful and relaxing stay. Definitely recommended!

Place as described if not better. Was quite hot without aircon, but still completely bearable. Great location, close to shops, restaurants, bowling, bars etc.. Paid about $15-20 for an uber to circular quay! Thanks for the lovely stay.

Perfect apartment in a beautiful, quiet, relaxed setting still so handy to all that Sydney has to offer. Lucy and Ralph are the perfect hosts, we were welcomed with lovely, considerate gifts and kind hospitality. The apartment is comfortable, well equipped and private with lovely views and a gorgeous outdoor area that makes the most of the beautiful area. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay Lucy and Ralph!
Great hospitality and location
I found Hernant and Conni to be the ideal hosts- relaxed, attentive when it was required, with a lovely place which was clean and welcoming, but informal!
nice room and friendly host
Very comfortable clean accomodation in a lovely setting

Transportation is convenient, there are several bus routes to city within 30 minutes. Cindy's room is good for holiday and relaxation, it is near Coogee Beach and different parks. There also have shopping center, restaurants and supermarkets.  I will definitely recommend this room to all of you^^

Thanks to Nick for being such a great host! I truly enjoyed my stay, everything was great - the apartment absolutely clean, has amazing view and located close to everything (such as Bondi Beach and Sydney Opera House), Nick was very helpful with making me comfortable at his apartment and gave me several tips where to go in Sydney! Highly recommend this place!
Great location, convenient short walk to beach, and cafes. Fantastic outdoor facilities, great to sit back and relax in the hot tub with the Balinese like surrounds.
Wonderfully done, great place to stay and waking up to the smell of fresh pastries from the French Patisserie.

Loved our stay was the perfect girls pad and was so clean! Great beds and pillows which was awesome being pregnant! We honestly had a really nice stay and felt at Right at home when we didn’t want to go out.

The main bed was super comfortable and the place was clean and just what we needed.  Close to all the transit and sites.  The shower wall doesn't come out far and there is no curtain to prevent splashing, so you'll need to wipe down the toilet and floor after showering. Bring your own hand towel and wash cloth if you use one.  Also, it's on a heavily used road and the noise is constant.  Light sleepers won't rest well.
Sehr sauberes und bequemes Apartement im Zentrum von Sydney.
This apartment is clean and lovely and everything just like the description. Linda is so nice and all the foods and the welcome Timtam are so helpful when we arrived. We spend a great time there.
Millie was a wonderful host and all was as described - highly recommended.
Wonderful hosts, very warm and friendly. Absolute recommendation.
Very relaxing and clean ! Totally awesome, would go again !

On arrival we had a very warm welcome. We were shown around the accommodation which was of an exceptionally high standard. Our welcome pack included tea, coffee, milk and orange juice. 
Fantastic location, across the road from the bay. And a direct and regular bus route into circular quay. Would highly recommend staying with Fred and Bernadette and if we find ourselves back in Sydney in the future, we would definitely try and stay there again.
Wonderfully private garden setting with everything you could want.
Really good location, great communication

Die Unterkunft ist schlicht aber sehr schön eingerichtet und hat alles was man braucht. Man ist zu Fuß in 5 Minuten an der Bushaltestelle und braucht ca. 15 Minuten in die Innenstadt. Die Nachbarschaft ist ruhig und es hat einen Park in der Nähe. Man kann auch sehr schöne Spaziergänge um die Hafenbuchten unternehmen, die besonders schön beim Sonnenuntergang sind. Ashlee und Duncan sind zwei wundervolle Menschen und sind weitaus mehr als nur Gastgeber! Wir hatten 5 unvergessliche Monate mit ihnen und sind überglücklich sie kennen gelernt zu haben! Herzlichen  Dank nochmal für alles was ihr für uns getan habt! Es gibt nur positives über die Beiden und ihrer Unterkunft zusagen.❤
I loved the secluded bush setting of the train carriage, and found it a beautiful place to relax and recharge.

Accomodation was a perfect spot to stay at and everything in the apartment was exceptional. Host made check-ins easy and provided the answers to all my questions. Overall, amazing accomodation to stay at!

Michelle's place has a great feel and is more like a studio apartment. The private bathroom is a bonus and the privacy provided by a simple divider in the hallway is adequate while allowing for the homeliness of not being totally isolated from the family life of the house. Everything is brand new but one gets the impression that, even if it wasn't it would still be beautifully presented in Michelle's wonderful style. She has thought of everything which makes the stay a memorable experience.
An ideally located and comfortable apartment.

Cathy place is, private, clean and well equipped. Loved our stay, we appreciated the fan in the room to keep us as some days as it was very hot. Cathy is super nice and helpful! Public transport is near accomodation and Cathy is also happy to drop you to close locations. Would be happy to come back and stay. Overall a pleasant and affordable stay :)
Nice place to stay, if you need anything the hosts are more than happy to help out.
Lovely clean and central flat. Jenny was very helpful and overall stay was pleasant. Would definitely return.
Such a great apartment, super host and fantastic holiday!!!  Keeps in contact and replies to messages super fast
We loved our stay in this lovely part of Sydney. So close to shops, restaurants and public transport. Lovely walks near the harbour. Accurately described and photographed.
Beautiful views, great location.

Lovely apartment in a fabulous location.  Best location in Sydney in our opinion! The photos don’t do it justice. The view to the beach is lovely from the spacious terrace. The kitchen was great, with everything you could need plus.... great for foodies. The bed was extremely comfortable,  especially nice after a long trip from the UK. Also there are ceiling fans everywhere which kept us nice and cool in the heatwave temperatures. We didn’t need to use the air con. Ice machine was a real plus too. We felt instantly at home and much preferred it to the flashier looking apartments on offer on Airbnb. Would be great for families too. Thanks again Lizzy for being so helpful and accommodating.
People were friendly and the communication was great.
Very clean room and the May is veryFriendly.

Lovely room with cute and super friendly Natasa, which made me had a very good time in Sydney. Like her so much, and the location of the house was super close to the train station. Hopefully can see her again. Thanks a lot!
The unit was in a fantastic location to Olympic Park. It was very clean, tidy and well presented. I would highly recommend this host to anyone. 10/10

Great location, close to the station. Very cosy, clean and has everything you need. We loved our stay and will be back. Netflix's and wifi was a bonus, so was the shampoo/conditioner and soap. So many awesome cafes for breaky and also dinner places. We loved the Indian and the famous Portuguese chicken. The room was very bright in the morning, and the planes were loud but that didn't bother us at all.  Highly recommend this gorgeous cabin.
It was good stay, tidy and comfortable. Also good location.

Sams place is nestled  in very quiet, peaceful and resedential area. Place was very tidy, comfortable bed and sofa. Sam and husband were great host, showed excellent hospitality. Perfect for two of us. Would recommend anybody and will
stay again if I get an opportunity.
Hernan is a very attentions host and amazing to have a conversation. The informations are pretty precise and I strongly recommend him. Room very clean and comfortable.

Awesome location. 5 min walk to circular quay. 

Place is prob only good for immediate family as not much privacy but was perfect for us. 

The only thing I would have liked was a top sheet on the bed as a quilt is too warm but no sheet is too cold. 

Bathroom was a little grubby but I guess with a quick tern around of guests it may be hard to maintain. 

All over VERY good value for money and we will stay again one day
老板人很nice,热情而有礼貌,住宿干净,交通方便,有机会再去｡
A lovely cosy cabin, perfect for a weekend getaway.
Great location near to beach and airport. 2nd floor apartment. Overlooks President Ave. friendly helpful people.
I stayed here for an extended period for work and found the place very suitable to my needs. The garden area was lovely and the room as expected. Would recommend.
Great apartment in a great location. Stunning views from the roof terrace and a cool host to boot!

Hernan was extremely friendly and welcoming! It was a much-needed rest & recharge to stay at his place. Everything was comfortable, clean, and an easy walk to the beach. Hernan was very helpful answering questions and recommending places to go - thanks for a great stay!
Very friendly hosts and plenty of space to ourselves. Walking distance to trains with easy access to the Waterfront and City.

Sarah was flexible with the check-in and made things convenient for us. She ensured that we had privacy but also checked in when she could to make sure that all was good. No kitchen (as listed) but the mini fridge and kettle were helpful. Location was convenient with a few minutes walk from the bus stop. Our only surprise during the stay was the dog which was doing it's job loyally but got used to us pretty quickly

There are no difference between picture and real apartment.
It is beautiful apartment.
I really want to go again.
位置很好,就在中央车站边上,去市中心逛很方便｡不推荐使用厨房,抽油烟机没什么用｡
A modern and functional apartment in a cool area of Sydney. Close to train station, restaurants and a big food store.
建议不要做中餐,煮点意大利面可以,油烟不好散｡
I loved the apartment, the location is perfect, and Valentine & Jack has been very good hosts. Highly recommended!
Great place to stay - clean and comfortable. Would recommend

We loved the location of Vickie’s apartment. The area was so quaint with many great cafes in short walking distance and the supermarket just across the street. The bus and train provided us easy access around and the walk to the Opera House and Harbor Bridge through the Royal Botanical Gardens was beautiful, though a bit long. It was relaxing to sit at the bar top and look out at the tree-lined street below or further out to the CBD skyline.  We did find the apartment a bit tight when walking from the main living area to the entry hall where the mini fridge is with the bed lowered, so we probably should’ve raised it when not in use. When I slept I could sometimes feel the the bed frame through the mattress, so I think maybe a memory foam mattress might work a bit better, I’m not sure.  There is a step up/down getting in and out of the shower with somewhat reduced headroom which won’t affect most people but could if someone had limited mobility or was very tall.  The walls were thin but the neighbors were all quiet in the evenings.  Vickie was so sweet to provide coffee, tea, water, muesli, and milk, and she provided us great tips and recommendations on places to go and how to get there! Vickie is truly a superstar host and you’ll be in great hands with her!!!
May is a lovely person, I'll recommand her anytime! oh and, her dog daisy is adorable!

Unfortunately we didn't have a pleasant or restful stay here. Noise from car mechanic shop and building construction site right beside the apartment was so loud that it felt like it was coming from inside the unit! Went on all day long and none of this was mentioned in her listing! The noise was so unbearable that we had to cut our stay short. No one would want to waste their money on a noisy apartment while on vacation, especially after a very long flight!
Even with recorded audio as proof, the host still would not refund for the days we didn't stay. Obviously she doesn't bother checking what goes on around her apartment regularly and that is just negligence! She doesn't seem to care much about guest satisfaction!
Our group of five enjoyed our stay at Cy's place. The location was really great as it was in the middle of Haymarket and easy to get around by foot. Thanks for having us!

Stayed for ten days, good price, location.  Love to walk so enjoyed walking everywhere.  Through Rushcutters to Double Bay, Verona Cinema on Oxford St, Woollahra and Botanical Gardens/City via Woolloomooloo.  Although Uber arrive within minutes.  Would stay again.

Staying in this apartment, hosted by Linda, was a wonderful experience for me and my wife. All kitchen amenities provided, hot water and good plumbing, quiet, near Redfern station and the University, plus a coffee shop and pub right across. The host bot a rice cooker for our use too.
Great value. Very very clean and so good if you are coming by plane or need to get to the airport.
Great location. value to stay
Great location
A wonderful place to stay! A beautiful, bright apartment with harbour glimpses. Easy communications with Stephen and a great experience all round.

Coffee’s apartment is conveniently located in the CBD, with close access (5-10min walk) to 2 train stations, supermarkets and endless choices of eateries. The apartment is (very) spacious and has everything that we need (washing machine, dryer, pots and pans, utensils, etc). The central heating in the apartment appeared to have broken down and Coffee rushed over to help us with it and brought us new extra blankets. She even called us in the middle of our stay just to make sure we were ok—absolute superhost! We’d give her 50 stars if we could!! Thank you so much for hosting us, Coffee! We’d definitely stay again at your place! 

Just a note for travellers coming in from Sydney airport: we got cheated by the taxi driver and paid $160 for our ride to the apartment when it should be just around $50. Please check the cost with the taxi driver before getting onto the taxi!
Great hosts, good place, very chic, very nice, would come back again.

This is such a great place and ideally located in the ‘nicer’ part of the neighbourhood. 

I found it incredibly peaceful even with the hustle and bustle of the area and noise outside. This is helped by the bedroom view of the trees of the square opposite together with the sound of the water fountain. 

The place is easily accessible to lots of places and all the shops and restaurants nearby are classy and funky. 

I stayed in this area last time and this place is in a better location. 

The flat is cutely designed and a great size for a City break. I didn’t want to leave so soon! 

Great hosts. Friendly and helpful cleaner!
Staying with Kerri in Sydney was wonderful!  She is a lovely hostess whose home is beautiful and comfortable.  Indeed it was my very best Airbnb experience and I have use these listings many times!
Nice area, nice house and nice hosts. I am glad that I picked up this place.
Very central apartment, really spacious and clean and decorated lovely. Fully equipped with washing machine and dryer and kitchen
3 colleagues and I were in town for 5 nights and the place was home away from home! We loved the space so much! Highly recommended!
Excellent location, good value for money. Will stay again.

Location, location, location! DJ's place is in a great location. The accommodations are modern , comfortable and nice. As a host DJ is great. He was very welcoming, during my entire stay I felt welcomed and at ease. I highly recommended DJ.
Very clean and comfortable house. Location is  very close to city . The house lady is good to us when we stay there. Lovely Sydney.
Really nice, comfortable and clean studio, with all supplies (like fridge, coffeemachine, tea, eggcooker etc) inclusive!
Linda was a treat to communicate with, very responsive and warm. Her apartment was equipped with everything we needed for a week long stay. I highly recommend her place! Thank you very much Linda.
An ideal location to really experience all of the beauty Manly has to offer. Tricky getting a park but, you don’t need a car as the city is also a quick ferry ride away.
国际机场就十几分钟到二十分钟步行时间,热情的房主人带着我们走到主路指明方^_^回复也是能在第一时间解决到我的问题｡走几分钟可以走到大型超市,晚上11点才关门,附近还有一个小小堂人街,大概有6到7家的中餐馆｡家里整洁干净｡主要离机场近｡
The location is superb- right in the beach! Kasey was really lovely to engage with. The space is so nice, very organised and clean! Highly recommended!
A great place to stay when I come to Sydney on business.

Cosy, comfortable and clean place with with stylish modern decor. Easy check-in and out. Approximately 10 mins walk to the nearest train station. Note that occasional airplanes can be heard, but not at night. Would recommend.

J ai réservé cet appart en dernière minute, tout s est très bien passeé, l appart était impeccable, propre et très bien situé au milieu de la rue commerciale. L hôte etait déjà sur les lieux quand je suis arrivée.
Cependant wifi n est pas inclu dans le forfait, l hôte m a propose le wifi pour des couts supplementaires.
Beautiful apartment with amazing amenities!

I absolutely loved my stay at Yoco house! The apartment is so nice and the best value you can get in all of Sydney! Great location close to everything you need and want! I love how important sustainability recycling and renewable energy is to the house. Highly recommend staying here!

Hernan rocks! Extremely laid back, friendly and welcoming. I really appreciated his help with coordinating my early morning (445am) cab to the airport - this including him setting up the appointment and checking in on me at 4:40am to let me know the cab was outside. Super responsive and I had everything I needed. I will definitely stay with Hernan again if I find myself back in Sydney. 

The only thing to note is cabs in Sydney are quite expensive and he's probably a $40-50 cab ride away from the city (or so I heard). That said, the bus stop is a short walk away from the house, and I took it several times to the train station and directly into the city. He also provided public transportation maps to make trip planning that much easier!

Just can't get over how awesome Hernan is!
We stayed for only one Night. Everything was fine and Hernan was a great host. Would come back to his room.
Cosy apartment conveniently located close to cafes and public transport. Millie was quick to respond and provided detailed instructions for our stay . Thanks Millie!
I second what other guests have mentioned. Great location, cosy room, felt right at home. Loved having Ruski around too. Thanks Kath for having me!

We absolutely loved Naveen and Tristan's place, it is very well decorated and was always kept very neat and clean. We felt super comfortable and at ease. The guest's bedroom and bathroom are upstairs so you definitely get your privacy. They prepared everything you need, shampoo, conditioner, hair dryer, towels, body wash, etc. And you'll find plenty of pillows and a very comfortable bed, plenty of closet space, and A GORGEOUS VIEW! Naveen and Tristan are both very kind and helpful, and you will LOVE their dog Felix my goodness such a bundle of joy. Location of the b&b is very convenient, you are just 1-2 train stops away from the major scenic spots. You will find the best Gelato shop just down the road. There are plenty of restaurants super closeby. The neighborhood felt safe and welcoming. We loved Sydney because of this b&b :)
Great stay. Very comfortable
Jess' apartment was clean, comfortable & very spacious. Close to train station & supermarket. Great pool & balcony. Also quick response if any queries. Definitely recommended.

We had a great time in Paddington; the house is fascinating and the room was perfect. Sadly we never met Arnie in person, instead were shown around by his easy-going and lovely friend. Paddington Market is just across the road and we walked everywhere along Oxford St. Highly recommended.

I really loved millie's apartment , close to all public transport and harbour bridge . Nice view of the sky while in the bed and harbour bridge . Communication with millie was really good. I would recommend this plce and will be back again
We stayed here for a family of four. Fantastic location! Hot water pressure could have been stronger but otherwise it's fantastic accomodation for a short weekend away.
Anita is a lovely person. The apartment is very homely.
Hernan is a great guy.  The accommodation was also very good.  I would recommend this accommodation

“Wow” is probably the best word I can think to describe this incredible place. The photos just don’t do it justice. Finished with impeccable taste, this place is definitely a gem.  Located on the best part of Mackeral beach, and surrounded by wildlife - including a resident wallaby who comes so close you can feed him by hand! The water as crystal clear as Thailand and just a two seconds away, down a very well paved and not too steep path. The views from the house and tree house are beyond breathtaking and the owner is super nice and attentive. Upon arrival he sent a message to see if we got in OK and during the booking phase he responded immediately to our questions. The BBQ is state of the ark (very important!) and the place is totally set up for entertaining with a great coffee machine, two fridges, plenty of cutlery, glasses, plates etc ... . Everything has been thought of, from hats and repellant to hooks to hang out your wet beach towels. We will definitely be back. Everyone who stopped by to visit us while we were there will be booking too, so I just hope we can get in! Thank you Richard. You have created a little slice of heaven.

From beginning to end, Paul and Judith made us feel welcome. From the lovely continental breakfast to individual bedside lamps, you can tell they have thought of every detail to ensure you have a comfortable stay. Their place is in a great location, only a half hour walk from the city centre, very close to bus stops and 5mins walk away from two great cafes. We also enjoyed spending time with Bonnie and Benny, their two very friendly dogs :) Absolutely recommended and hope to stay here again next time we are in Sydney.
A super host!
Lovely clean apartment. Fantastic location. Four people stayed for 2 nights and would definitely stay here again
Great apartment, great location, would recommend it to anyone wanting to be in the middle of the city. We loved it, will definitely be back. Eleni was fantastic to deal with also!
Great location

George’s place is in an excellent location to the train and some really nice cafes right outside. The area can be a bit dodgey at night time but it definitely means you get to see a more authentic side to Sydney. Beautifully styled and comfortable. Will definitely keep this in mind when I visit Sydney again.
Amazing location ,great place , great response rate ,would go there again

The apartment is very nice and clean, exactly as shown in the pictures. The communication was easy and the location is good. The internet works properly for those who work remotely. I would recommend a stay here if visiting the city!

We had a fantastic time in Newtown it was exactly as described. The house was perfect for what we needed it was clean and quiet the only issue was the air-conditioning system did not seem to be working. However we did have a fan in our room so that was perfect. We would definitely recommend this Airbnb.
Everything is fantastic, more than worth!

I recently spent a Saturday night in Susan's leafy cabin in Leichhardt - my first Airbnb experience - and was pleased with the ease of booking and low cost. Susan is a friendly, relaxed and hospitable host. The cabin is spotlessly clean, cute, and had a very comfortable bed. Angelo the cat was sometimes chatty but not annoying. The area is convenient and easily accessible by public transport but also suburban which would be interesting for international visitors. The only drawback of the location is the overhead flight path which woke me on Sunday morning, although I went back to sleep once I realised what the noise was! It really felt like I was staying at an old friend's house - one where you could just please yourself - and I'd thoroughly recommend it to others.

Fabulous apartment in such a convenient part of the city. It’s a short walk to Central station and the city’s restaurants, bars and parks. Coffee is an excellent host and the apartment was so clean and comfortable. I hope to come back.

Dino was such a great host. The check-in/out process was seamless. The apartment itself was amazing. It was well equipped,  clean and very well decorated. The location is great, as the apartment is centrally located in Elizabeth Bay neighborhood. We had a wondeful time in Dino’s apartment  and would definitely recommend Dino's place to anyone considering visiting Sydney.

We have stayed several times at this Airbnb and will continue to in the future.  It is modern, comfortable, quiet, private and is in the perfect location for us.  Steven always answers us promptly and helps with anything we might need.  We have free parking on the street.  We were also delighted to be able to use Netflix.
Suzie is a great host! Respond quickly and very helpful. She gives me some really good suggestions about transportation and food. I had a great weekend there!
Perfect central location to everything sydney !

La maison est idéalement située pour découvrir Sydney. Le quartier est agréable et animé. La chambre est spacieuse et bien équipé. Les seuls reproches sont que la cuisine et la salle de bain n'étaient pas très propres et que nous n'avons vu personne dans cette maison pendant 4 jours. Décevant par rapport à notre envie de rencontrer des locaux ou autres voyageurs.

Hi , Really enjoyed staying in this beautiful house. It looked just as good as the pictures and everything was nice and clean. The garden was beautiful, really well done. It was close to the beach. 
Frances.
Simply good!

A cute little studio in the heart of Elizabeth Bay - close to transport, and a wide array of delicious food options. Mariana is a great host, who has included small touches (eg powerboard next to bed so you can charge multiple devices at once) which make the studio even more comfortable. Amazing bath/shower!

We had the room located at the ground floor with enough space for all our 3 luggage. The place is clean and the owner comes pretty much everyday and refills whatever needs to be like soap toilet paper etc... My girlfriend felt bad by the time of our arrival and he managed to let us in earlier than check in time. Really appreciated it! Thanks for a nice stay.

Cathy's fully self-contained studio apartment has the comfort and stylishness of an inner-city space. Step outside and you are graced with the stunning scenery of a wilderness landscape. Then head down to the Avalon shops and you have the atmosphere of a friendly village. 

I had the most magnificent mid-week break at Cathy's apartment. She and the sweet (and useless-as-a-guard-dog) Maggie were welcoming and friendly.

I can not recommend Cathy's place enough. It was rejuvenating. I live in the centre of Sydney, needed a break, so I headed north. The landscape, neighbourhood, people, food, everything was wonderful. And Cathy's kindness and her beautiful space just made it perfect.

I will be back. And soon.

房間位置有點尷尬,是跟屋主的房間連在一起(就是要進去房間時會先經過屋主的房間的意思),有隔著門但沒有鎖｡浴室也沒有鎖(很怕用到一半有人突然進來)｡會介意的人可能要考慮一下
在浴室看到不少小蟑螂
房間空間很小(除了床剩下一條小走道,大概跟床一樣長,跟枕頭的長一樣寬),無法打開2個人的行李箱,不太方便,當時我們是把一個人的行李箱放在外面,要拿東西的時候打開,拿完再關起來｡
洗澡的時候熱水大概7分鐘就會沒有,當時洗完頭髮還沒洗澡就沒熱水
離市區有一段距離,但交通還算方便,出去走5分鐘就有通往市區的公車,走8分鐘就有渡輪可以到環形碼頭
跟機場的交通比較麻煩,要轉2-3次的大眾運輸
Ziggys place is really close to the surf and lots of food outlets. Very safe and clean. Nice gym on site.

A very lovely, tastefully and comfortably appointed apartment in a beautiful location. The view is amazing and you can hear the ocean :). It's a moderate walk to food/shops, but through a very nice area. Would happily stay again.
Good location. Can take the bus to CBD directly.
We had a brilliant time exploring Sydney from Vickie’s apartment
good location, nice & clean apartment plus if you need anything Victoria is super fast in answering, would stay here again :)
Great place. Would stay again. Lots of extras. Great communication
Great apartment, right near manly wharf beach. You can walk everywhere. Photos don’t do it justice!
Another great stay

Clean, quiet and comfortable space! Very nice neighborhood, exactly what my partner and I needed as we were working odd hours in the area. Sarah was very accommodating with check in/out times and very good with communication. Recommended!
George是超赞房东!热情好客,体贴周到｡对我们造成的一些问题十分宽容,真诚感谢,强烈推荐!!
Wonderful to see the amazing  furniture that Fei has collected from all over the world .
Eleni’s place

Booked on behalf of a colleague from Melbourne who found the apartment to be in a superb location and very clean. The Hosts were very welcoming and thankfully waited for my colleague and family to let them in after they had their flights cancelled. Highly recommended place.
The best place with amazing view. Thx for preparing a lots of staff in the room. Wanna back again:)

Briohny little house was a perfect start for our Australian trip. The house was clean and comfortable (specially the balcony in the back). Her housemates were also quite nice and friendly. The location is great too, strongly recommend!
Lovely host and nice little place, very well located in Newport. Excellent value and so close to the beach. Would stay again.
Reliable host.
We had a great stay. The place was well equipped and in a great location- walking distance to beach, park and cafes.

Marcella's home is in an amazing location just around the corner and walking distance from a wonderful array of restaurants, coffee shops and the beach and had ample room to host our party of 12.   Marcella was quick to respond and assist in all our queries.  Thanks so much for hosting us!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Gwen and Jim's.  Both were great communicators and made our 11pm arrival a breeze!
Good little place in an amazing location, only very short walk to the water.  Thanks for having us!
Great place! Would be even better if there’s more lighting in the living room

Emma's White House was perfect for my husbands long stay for work purposes.
He had everything he needed and Na (the host) was awesome.... extremely pleasant and helpful. She always made sure that his stay was comfortable. Communication was prompt and efficient.
The location was quiet, safe and close to amenities. The unit is away from the house and he wasn't disturbed by noise.
It was fantastic value for money and he would most definitely stay here again. I highly recommend this Airbnb to others. 
Thanks Na for making the time away from home so pleasant.
Superbe. Tout était parfait. L'accueil chaleureux de Susane, le magnifique jardin, la décoration, tout est fait pour se sentir à la maison tout en étant indépendant.

We absolutely loved staying here. Lovely unit, great for the kids and in the perfect position for where we needed to be, with everything we needed. Nathan is a wonderful host. Thank you for having us, we hope we can stay again one day.
位置不错,房间也很好,房东回复很及时｡

Beautiful view. The apartment is spacious and right next to the beach.  But I'm confused why we received the keys in a coded box when it seems the hosts were staying close enough to the apartment to watch us and count how many people we had entering the apartment. We had a lunchtime BBQ with family from the city and were trying to take advantage of a beautiful spot but were interrupted on two occasions by the hosts driving to the apartment to tell our friends and family to leave the premises. We had no intention of breaching the six sleeper agreement and can't understand why a group of up to 15 people having a BBQ in the middle of the day is inappropriate or warrants the hosts' interruptions . If the hosts intended on being so strict with the number of people visiting, it would have made more sense for them to have advised us of their concerns when handing over the keys.

Wow wee!! What a brilliant time away. Geoff and Angela's place is just 'Brilliant', from the outdoor alfresco living space to the master bedroom suite, these areas are just perfect!
Oops I forgot to mention the beautiful back garden as well!

'We'll be back'

Cheers Damian Tanya and Jude.
A beautiful apartment. Loved the fact that Nicole left washing powder, soap, shampoo & conditioner. She was very flexible with great communication. Would definitely recommend.

Ben's place is really cool.  Very high tech. TVs in every bedroom and living room. It's on the 3rd floor of an older building with a great front view to the bay which brings a nice breeze.  It's convenient located to bars, laundry and the ferry. The ferry journey to CBD is just amazing. A must do. It's very quiet to sleep even with the windows open. During the day though there is noise from the cars passing in the busy road.

Place is in amazing location, right near the beach and the many cafes, restaurants and bars nearby. The perfect place for a getaway. Natasha was incredibly friendly and helpful and made the process smooth from start to finish. Highly recommend!
great value, location is epic.
Great place and location. Marcella was quick to reply prior to our stay.
Beautiful apartment with a stunning view and a great light inside! Very sympathetic host too
This place is a amazing. Perfect location, great host and a truly peaceful getaway.
The location is really great , walk diatance to harbor bridge and also shopa in center !

Muy lindo apartamento, muy completo con todo lo necesario.  Tiene una parada de ómnibus enfrente lo que permite una buena locomoción.  Muy cómodo que haya un supermercado debajo.
Muy agradable también la piscina, para refrescarse después de haber paseado por la ciudad todo el día.
Pasamos una semana espectacular en Sydney.
Michele’s place is lovely, great location , and quiet. Michele is a caring and helpful host couldn’t be happier...thanks Michele
Very cute home to stay in, sparkling clean and a view that takes your breath away!

My friend and I stayed with Wyatt over Easter and had a lovely time! It’s easy to get to the city with buses running past regularly. The bed is so comfortable and we felt very relaxed! I’d highly recommend Wyatt’s place, thanks again for having us!

I had the most wonderful stay in Pamela and Hugo’s unit.  Everything was perfect and the location is incredible!  I had friends staying in an executive sweet at the Hilton (just around the corner) and the view from Pamela and Hugo’s unit was much better!!  I would rate my stay 10/10.

Sorry for my late comment.This house is super good.I like it very much ,near the Coogee beach and it is very quiet area.Cindy and Claudio are very nice .Especially the koala on the bed,very cute.And also sweet recommendations:)I will choose again next time when I go to Sydney

As soon as you walked in everything was absolutely spotless. Quick responses by Phan. A lot of space which I was presently surprised about. Great stay overall. Will definitely be back if we are in that area again.

We had a lovely time at Susan and Gregg's beach studio. We were made to feel very welcome, the studio was immaculate and every morning we had a basket of fresh bread and jams left outside our door.

The studio is nestled under trees which keeps it cool, along with the ceiling fan above the bed.

Bronte is a peaceful suburb that is perfectly positioned for everything. The Bondi and Coogee walk is a must and Bronte is on route along that walk.

Thank you Susan and Gregg for being a wonderful part of our three week Oz adventure. :-)

It was an amazing experience to stay at Na's place. She is very hospitable and understanding. I booked the place for 15 days but i had to reduce the stay due to some personal emergency and it was very gracious of Na to accent the modification.

The  place was very clean and a must stay if you are around that area.
I would highly recommend Na's place.

Thanks a lot Na.

The house was nothing like the listing. It was filthy dirty and smelled of urine and was over run with cock roaches. It was un hygienic and uninhabitable, we had to seek alternative accomodation and are requesting a full refund......

1. The room is more spacious than it looks in the picture and the ceilling fan will keep the room cool. 2. You can either take a bus and a ferry or a bus and a train to get to the city. There are less frequent bus from the station to the place at night so you should probably check it in advance. From Strathfield, it takes roughly 20 mins by bus. 3. You can find lots of affordable/good Korean eateries in the near area as there is a hugh korean community. 4. If you are looking for super convinient place, this is not for you but if you like staying away from the coty
Great communication from start to finish. Amazing location right on Bondi. Certainly an enjoyable week.
Danny is very accommodating. Location is perfect.

Nicole and Simon's apartment in Surry Hills is a beautiful spot, really close to central station and all of Sydney's main attractions. The apartment itself was very comfortable and their attention to detail made it feel like a 5* hotel. Would thoroughly recommend staying there.
Leslie's place was perfect, we wish we could have stayed longer than one night. Well equipped with everything you could need and the view was spectacular!
Great pad in the heart of Bondi. A Feeling of absolute calm when you walk in. Great proximity to the beach, cafes and bars. House has everything you need for a short or long stay.

Kath's place is closed to the Redfern station. There is a fridge in the room so that we can store our groceries Individually. There are fruit, milk and bread provided as breakfast. It's very convenient place for tripper. There are also a dog and a cat live in there.  If you are an animal lover. It should be your great choice.
Location is great. And Chloe is a friendly and helpful host. Five star!
Great location and walking distance the venues at Sydney Olympic Park. Good views from the unit looking east to the city.

Really nice house, modern and full equipped. Arianne and Phillip are amazing hosts, making you feel like in your own house. They responded fastly to any enquiry and were always worried about us and our hispitality.
Really friendly helpful host, great location, good service.
leslie的房子位置极佳,而且有非常棒的厨具｡希望能再次见到你!

This was my first Airbnb experience and the bar HAS to have been set very high.  Mariana's place is in a lovely neighborhood, close to public transportation, shopping and a great back-street walk to Circular Quay is very do-able.  Mariana's flat is spotless, quiet and safe - a warm and welcoming host.  I couldn't have been happier and hope to be able to return!

A great experience staying at Victoria's place in Potts Point! Cozy place with great views.. we loved looking out the windows at the comings and goings of the street below. Also very centrally located, it was easy getting anywhere! Everything you need is available at the apartment and with Woolies just across the street, it was easy getting anything else you need too. Victoria is very responsive, and a pleasure to communicate with. Thanks for the great stay Vickie!
An excellent space in a excellent location. Everything you need at house and Philip went above and beyond with his assistance. Couldn’t be better.

My overall experience on Dangar Island was wonderful. Ann created a sense of being cared for, in a relaxed environment. Ann is a wonderful and interesting host with great historical knowledge of the local area. Meal time was fun; some of the food picked from the garden, the rest fresh, delicious and made to suit my individual requirements. Eating breakfast overlooking a pretty garden and watching the river made a pleasurable start to each day. My bed was comfortable and as promised by my host, big soft towels to use in the shared bathroom. The house itself is as interesting as its gracious host and well worth the short ferry ride to visit and stay in for a night or two. Most enjoyable!

Evelyn's apartment has the most beautiful views and is a lovely, clean and comfortable place to stay.
Evelyn was great to deal with, very prompt, friendly and kind.
We would highly recommend staying at this apartment!

房東人很好,熱情,訊息都有即時回覆
感謝Jill這幾天的照顧
Tracey’s place is a great place to stay. Easy to get to, great amenties and a great vibe. Almost feels like you are staying at your own house!

Cathy's room was just what I needed. It was clean, comfortable and quiet and only a few minutes walk from the sailing club where I was attending a wedding reception. It's not a big space but has everything you need for a short stay and I would readily recommend it.
Cathy was great with her directions and communication leading up to my stay. Oh and the surrounding area, all the huge mature eucalypts and down by the water are just beautiful. Thank's Cathy..
Anthony.
Good location and space. Lachlan was very friendly and on time when we arranged check in.

I had to work a few days at the University of Sydney, and this place was a short 5 minute walk to campus which was awesome. But it was also only 5 minutes to the nearest train station so when I started sightseeing, it was also super convenient. The apartment was clean and quiet and in a really pretty neighborhood.
The host canceled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Was such a great place to stay! Super clean and cozy and central to all the happening places! Will definitely be staying here again!!
Great location which near to train station. Convenient to go all around of Sydney. Great host which treated us like family.
His house is very clean and cozy. I strongly recommend his house. It's good choice for you.

We had a great weekend.  Marcella's house is beautifully placed near the beach a little hospitality strip.  

We didn't spend a lot of the time at the house, but enjoyed the fact is was reasonably close to Randwick Racecourse (what we were there for) and not too far away from the city.  

If you go there, make sure you check out the Spanish Restaurant just around the corner.  It was absolutely superb.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Open loungeroom / kitchen area with a nice balcony to sit and talk with friends! Very modern and has everything you will need for a comfortable stay! 
Very happy!

MissD was a great host. Although I never got to meet her she was friendly and responded to all my questions very quickly. The room was ideal for my boyfriend and I, location, cleanliness, value for money, everything.

The place was beautiful, clean, and looks just like all of the photos.  Nicole was very helpful and accommodating with all of our travel needs.  It was close to central station which was great, but if you will be traveling with large, heavy luggage from the train there were hills to keep in mind when pulling around your suitcase.

The room was lovely and clean, smelt of freshly washed linen.

Fantastic view, really comfortable space, easy walk to restaurants, good parking space and the kids loved the internet.

Will recommend and stay again when we next need to come to Sydney.

A great first Airbnb experience for us.
Brand new toilet, easy access
Great position and view of Manly beach from the balcony. Ward is a great guy too. Really enjoyed our stay thanks.
Such a fabulous spot!  Wonderful host. Everything you could hope for. I highly recommend.
Thanks Julia, it was a very well designed and comfortable space to stay while we were in Sydney.

Only stayed overnight. Arrived very late like midnight and had to carry 30kg or more up the stairs. Met Hernan the next morning and he allowed me to keep my luggage stored there for half the day which was great. The street noise was loud but i was exhausted from 22 hrs flying and slept uninterrupted. Hernan is a very nice guy and good communication.

Michy was very welcoming and our accommodation was perfect for visiting family , kicking back and taking in the wonderful environment in and around Clareville.
The cabin was spotless , bed was very comfortable with everything we required. We had a hire car but a bus stop was right out front for trips to the city or nearby Avalon and beyond.
Area was restful and we felt right at home with privacy but knowing Paul and Michy were a text away if required.
We would certainly recommend this cabin to others and would like to visit again soon.
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We stayed in the Sudan for a week and the place was lovely. It is in a great location that is 5 minutes walking distance to a shopping mall with a supermarket etc, and only 2 minutes walk to the bus stop and to local bars and restaurants.

The house itself is nice with everything there that you would need. The garage is really handy, albeit with a bit maneuvering required to get the car in if you have a longer car due to the back lane being fairly narrow.

We didn't have any interaction with Simone but she left us a bottle of wine, some milk and a great welcome pack with guides to house, shop, transport, etc., but everything was there so no interaction was required.

David was a great host during our stay at his place in Sydney. His house is very clean, comfortable, and well located. Several nice neighborhoods are within walking distance from his place, easy access to the major sightseeing attractions by bus around the corner, affordable places to eat, bars, clubs, and much more close by. David was friendly  and we even were able to catch a few drinks with him. Great host!
Great location, comfortable and clean. Min was very helpful and quick to respond to any requests. Thanks so much Min.

This apartment has a fabulous view and is very centrally located between Town Hall and Museum stations and close to a large supermarket at TH station.  The host was very helpful and available to assist if needed. The apartment is compact but with a range of facilities, including really good internet connection which was much appreciated.  There was traffic noise even on 34th floor with the windows closed, but it did not stop us  getting a sound sleep.   We were there during a heatwave, and one night was quite hot.  Otherwise, the cross breeze at night cooled the apartment and we were mostly out during the day.  The bed was comfortable.   We only had one access card to the building which at times was limiting if we wanted to go out separately.   A great place to stay and the view made up for the minor inconveniences such as traffic noise.

David and his wife have renovated this large 1840s home adding their special touch of Chinese art and furniture. A fascinating place to stay in the inner west.  David was a most generous host happy to talk about this interesting property.

Had a brilliant stay with Natasa. A beautiful person and SO easy to get along with. Has made my 1 month stay absolutely memorable and always had time to help out with even the smallest things and kick back and have a laugh over wine. The house location is easily commutable to the CBD and grocery stores are within 5-10 minute walk. Highly recommend staying with Natasa, she will make you feel right at home.
No issues here very helpful and good value for money
My partner and I loved staying at this lovely Bronte studio for the weekend. Conveniently located, every amenity thought of, and Susan and Greg are welcoming. I would highly recommend.
We would absolutely recommend this place, would have loved to stay longer and are hoping to be able to come back some day!

All the communication between Chloe was straightforward and easy. There was a thoughtful welcome gift left and Chloe allowed us to extend our check out by one hour which was greatly appreciated. We’d recommend at any time
Good location, nice stay.
Arnie's house was beautiful as others have said, and he and his family were very welcoming and friendly. It takes about 15-20 minutes by bus to CBD and the Opera House.
Great generous hosts. We'll miss it (hope to be back one day)  Very comfy and homily.  A nice Soft Landing for us :)
Lovely place brilliant location. Really enjoyed our stay.
We'll be back very soon!  Wonderful place to stay!

The treats and fruit were really lovely. Minuit's from beach and shops, very good hosts, would recommend. The parking was on the street but it was not a problem. We had our Egyptian Mau cat with us and it all worked really well. Thank's Anne and Ron and Happy Christmas to you and your family.
Cheers Lyndie

This apartment was spacious enough for us all... 2 adults and 5 teenagers.  The highlight was being able to sit on one of the 2 balconies and watch the action in darling harbour and the city streets.  The added bonus of pool, spa, sauna and gym was great.  Close enough to walk to the main attractions of sydney (bridge, opera house, eye tower, fish market, circular quay etc...and so many great places to eat, plus close to the main train stations).  The apartment itself could use a bit of maintenance, but was comfortable and neat.  Danny is a great host and communicates quickly.
Very nice and cosy space, perfect for relaxing
Utterly delightful and a home from home in every way. All the comforts and lots of additional touches that made the stay special

Le studio est spacieux, bien agencé et très lumineux, bien placé à côté de jolies balades et de plages parfaites pour les couchers de soleil. Bucolique c’est un lieu idéal pour un séjour calme proche de la nature !
Walking distance to Sydney CBD, great location!

Great hosts and place to stay! The apartment is immaculate, very clean and tidy. 
Excellent location if you want to watch the horse races and love to walk around Centennial Park. 
We really enjoyed our stay & will definitely stay again when holidaying and visiting Sydney!
The host was very quick to respond and was able to help with our late check in time. She was also very helpful with our needs and the place was very clean and nice.

Nicole & Simon's apartment was perfect for a weekend away. My girlfriend and I enjoyed every aspect of the apartment. It is very well furnished, stocked and all of a high quality. The apartment is in a prime location for walking to the City, Oxford street and Crown street. We didn't need the car at all! 
The attention to detail in the apartment is great, it has everything you need to make the most of your stay, it has a lot to offer. It is very quiet for its location, we never heard any noise during the day/night from inside the apartment. I highly recommend staying here for any couple! 
Thank you!
Endroit tranquille, très belle vu, accès au toit qui est super bien aménagé. Près du ferry pour se rendre au centre-ville. On recommande.
Great location with easy walk to many destinations.    Great views and lovely host with excellent friendly communication.   Definitely recommend

Had a brilliant stay at Gavin's place, which is conveniently located a short walk (less than a minute) from Central Station and also a reasonably short walk (15 -20 mins) to Oxford Street. Gavin is a friendly and engaging host and made my brief stay enjoyable.
The location is fantastic! The swimming pool was a real treat, we enjoyed staying in the apartment. Angela was a great host.
The apartment is really nice good location and the host reply very fast the room is big enough and kitchen is awesome I do enjoy stay here Thanks Andrea!

The apartment was exactly like the photos, brand new and very clean.
The bed was a fold out from the wall, very comfy and the pillow and blankets were amazing.

Great location and base to explore the city, near the central station, short walk to Darling Harbour.
The flat is as you can see on the pictures, nice, modern and spacious. 
The kitchen is relatevely well equipped for some small cooking or breakfast. There are also really good place for coffee and breakfast right around the corner. 
The host is really reactive and nice, indications to find and access the appartment were clear and easy. Check-in was smooth. 
Only the cleanliness was not up to my preference.
Great communication, great location, clean and very well laid out. Angela and Cody were great hosts.

Dino was a superb host and the apartment is beautifully presented in a charming neighbourhood close to everything and exactly as it was advertised. The pictures are 100% accurate. Everything was immaculate on our arrival with beautiful fresh orchids in every room - just gorgeous. Very private and secluded accommodation and the onsite parking was a bonus. Highly recommended, we'd stay again in a heartbeat.

Five star! Clean, fresh and beautifully styled. We had absolutely everything we needed. Wish we could have stayed longer. Excellent location, perfect host and communication. Would stay here again.

I would highly recommend this accommodation to anyone!
Good location, close to ferries and restaurants and a short walk to Pitt St Mall. Rooms comfortable with everything you need.
Lovely apartment with great service from Joseph and Judy - already looking forward to my next stay.

Don't be deceived by the Photos this is a lovely roomy home with plenty of space. Clean and Comfortably accommodating many in a sort of eclectic charm. Central to public transport and easy access to the motor ways, while being tucked away in a quiet location. Loved our stay, thanks George

Our stay in North Curl Curl was just great. The location is good, it is only a 15-20 minutes walk away from the beach. The place is very clean. If we have had some questions, Juliette always helped us. I would highly recommend this place!
Thank you Stephen, great apartment centrally located, great value for money.
I love the bed and the kitchen:)The location is very convenient:)

The room had everything to feel at home. Thanks for the strawberries, cereal options, coffee, tea, spreads... Loved the red door and the location. Very close to the main restaurants, cafe, train station and bus area. Super private and comfy.
fair price and great location

The room really has a great view and the location is perfect. 
But we were not really impressed since it was fairly dirty (dog hair in the room, on the bed, hair in the sink, dust) which just didn't fit the to the otherwise very modern place. 
Then what I found most random and I have stayed at many many airbnb, that 6 out of 8 pictures of the place are of parts which you never going to see. Its totally alright to say "we do not share kitchen and living room" and the apartment is perfect for that since you have your own space upstairs but why advertise then with all these pictures? I think that is a bit misleading. 
Otherwise it's a great place but needs some improvements again after a high number of guests.

Paul and Judith :
Thank you very much for everything you have done for us, please forgive me, because my English too bad, can't express my thanks to you.House clean, beautiful, convenient and provide us with a lot of help.Very happy to be living here.You are welcome to come to China ,I miss you guys paul  Judith and every things in the house.living here days will be the best pary of my memory.
Unfortunately I did not get to meet my hosts in person. However, communication was effortless and quick, and I had a pleasant stay. Thank you!

Amazing location. On a quiet one way street so it's not too loud, but also just a quick walk to downtown. Having a parking spot is key, too. It's a beautiful place! We would definitely stay here again.

Beautiful studio nestled in the hills of famous Bondi Beach.. need I say more?

This is the perfect spot for a couple looking to get away yet still in the best location. The apartment has everything you need to live comfortably. It's clean, stylish with tasteful styling/furnishes, and has inspiring views. You'll be close to dozens of cafe's restaurants, shops, bars, and the beach. I was particularly taken back by the quality and quality of restaurants, the food here is amazing and the coffee is unbeatable.

Communication by the host is was great, check-in/out was a breeze with the host giving a personalized walk through of the location and amenities. I was even offering a late check-out without asking.

It's easy to say that I will be looking forward to staying here again in the near future. Enjoy!

Hayley's place is very well located, close to Museum Station, which makes it very easy to get to the airport or the city centre.  Also close to Hyde Park, Oxford Street but best of all Crown Street - this is a great street with plenty of restaurants!   There are also supermarkets close by if required (for fruit / snacks).  Place is really nice and quiet, bed is huge and comfy, slept really well.  I only stayed 2 nights but enjoyed my stay and would definitely recommend this place.
Good location

What a perfect place to visit Sydney ! The apartment is beautiful, clean, well equiped, and the view is so nice.  It is also very well located, close to everything you need (train, shops, restaurants...) Also David was very welcoming. We had a wonderful week here !

An amazing host! Cathy went the extra mile in ensuring i was comfortable and had everything i needed. The flat is well laid out, clean and pretty. Could not have asked for a better host. Highly recommended!
Clean and friendly. The bed is big and comfortable

Just wanna say thank you for Craige & Leonie for this amazing few days we could spend in their home. There is nothing to complain about, everything was clean and georgous. The place is very close to the beach, there is many restaurants, coffees around, and the neighbourhood is quiet. They are the most welcoming, friendly people I have ever met, gave us all the information we needed to know, and helped with everything they could. 
Highly recommended!
We loved the central location, the quirkiness of the house and hospitality of the hosts.  We would return again when we visit Sydney. We couldn't have found a better place. Simple Marvellous!
Really enjoyed our stay at Evans place. Clean and stylish, great location and close by to the station. Communication was fast and helpful. We'll definitely come back in the future!
It is in the central CBD area quite close to both wynard station

Sarah’s place is perfect everything described is correct.

The bathroom is next door to your room and all to yourself, the area is quiet and there are plenty of eateries nearby.

Sarah is the perfect host, really quick at answering emails, extremely friendly and welcoming, she made you feel at home.
Great spot and location. Listing precise and accurate
What a great place you both have. Close to the things we need and affordable. Very well appointed and nice to have a place to sit and relax with your own hot drink at the end of a long day.

Naveen and Tris are absolutely delightful hosts. I had such a great stay with them. This was my first airbnb experience, so I had no idea what to expect and I was blown away by how well it all worked out.

Their place was exactly as described and as per the pictures. Location is fabulous - right in the thick of all the action in Darlinghurst and walking distance to everywhere I needed to go during my stay. 

The guest room is stunning - super comfy bed with high quality linen etc. Spotlessly clean and the most amazing view from the floor to ceiling window. Guests have their own private bathroom which again was spotless, great water pressure etc. Naveen has thought of all the little details - there is even a box of hotel style toiletries/amenities for guests to use. Their dog Felix is super cute and very well behaved.

I was very busy during my stay, but Naveen and Tris were very relaxed about me doing my own thing. They took me to a local cafe for a great coffee on my last morning and it was really nice to get to know them a bit. 

Tris even went out his way to drive me to the airport when we found out that trains weren't running. I really felt like I was staying with friends. I found them very easy to communicate with when booking and Naveen responded promptly to all of my messages. 

Would absolutely stay here again and have already recommend this property to friends who are planning trips to Sydney.

Key was ready for us.  Book of information was provided and we were made to feel welcome.  The location is fabulous with great views straight across to Bondi Beach.  Bus stop outside the door.  We loved our experience of being so close to the beach and of staying in an old Bondi "flat".  Many thanks, Mal.
Everything was so lovely! My sister and I really enjoyed our room, the location and the friendliness of the family!
The apartment was beautiful, luxurious and cosy.  The beds were very comfortable. Lucy was a great host. She even had plastic plates, cups and a kids stool to make our kids stay easy too.
Amazing place, very clean with nice views. Host were very helpfull
房子有个大庭院供孩子们玩耍,房东给了我们很多建议和帮助,让我们的行程方便了很多｡

I really enjoyed my stay here and would recommend it to everyone visiting Sydney. Herman provided me with a lot of helpful information and helped me with my suitcase and with finding the apartment. The bedroom has all you'll need and Herman provided me with an extra blanket and a heater since its was a little cold when I was there. Thanks again for a wonderful stay!
GREAT place to stay. You could actually walk to intl airport if are backpacking. Bathroom and shower spotless along with room. Food and train about 5 blocks away. Recommend this to anyone

Kasey was a wonderful host, very responsive and helpful. Her home had all the amenities we needed and was in a perfect location - right opposite the beach and surrounded by plenty of hip cafes and supermarkets. Would stay again!

Simone's home is perfect - well appointed, excellent location with great shopping, food and transport just around the corner.  Easy 20 minute bus trip to the center of the city, 5 minutes to Coogee beach. The house was the ideal base for our family when attending our son's wedding.  We were able to have friends over between wedding and reception as there were plenty of glasses, cups etc and a beautiful lounge and dining area to entertain in. As it was  quite hot the air conditioning and fans in all bedrooms were most welcome. Communication with Simone was effortless and we greatly appreciated the special touches and care shown for our special circumstances..

David’s apartment was fantastic- right in the middle of the Potts Point area, awesome restaurants - close to public transport and a short walk to the city. He accomodated our earlier arrival time and we were able to request a later check out time. Would highly recommend David’s home, and would gladly return again!

We stayed here for just under a week and it was a great trip. The location is amazing, such a short walk to the city, and the area is really vibrant. The house is stylishly appointed, and we really appreciated three bathrooms plus a kitchen. The stairs are steep but for my kids it was no bother. The home has been renovated to a high standard. Our communication was fast and quick, and it was a pleasure to stay at Philip's place.

Very enjoyable stay! Communication with David was great.  Very bright and welcoming... walking distance to main attractions and very close to kings cross train station.  One thing to note it's quite noisy at night from being right above the street but overall an excellent stay!

We had a great time, the apartment was lovely, clean, the views were spectacular and all expectations from the posting were met! They even left us bubbly!
The owners were very kind and even left us tips for the area.
I recommend this apartment and experience highly.

-Boyana
Great location for airport. Great Value. Wonderful host.

My partner and I came up for the weekend for a wedding - fantastic location for us and the house was just what we needed. Michy was friendly and contactable and even had some milk in the fridge for a cup of tea the next morning. Lovely host lovely house, we would definitely recommend it.

Would just like to express how much we enjoyed our stay at Gracious Darlinghurst. Great family Accomadation in a fantastic location. We would definitely stay again & would recommend to others. Thank you to our host Jeremy Godwin for all your help with our holiday in Sydney. The Wright Family x
Mariana’s place was great. In a good location and well setup with a great little kitchen and bathroom both beautifuly renovated. A great place to stay when visiting Sydney.

I loved staying at Cathy's place.  A perfectly sized beautiful space with a super comfortable bed and gorgeous to touch linen.  Lots of cute details in decor and Cathy provides everything you may need for a short stay.

Mooi appartement, op prima locatie dicht bij de Blue Mountains. 
Netheid liet wel iets te wensen over

Ziggy's place in Manly suited us superbly well. It is just off the Corso so was not at all noisy, it was a very secure, clean, and well appointed apartment for 2 people, close to both beaches, ferries and public transport etc.  The neighbourhood was friendly (cafe owners were OK for us to squat for an hour waiting for our transit to airport) people were helpful and we found great places to eat only minutes away. Can highly recommend Ziggy's apartment in Manly. a top spot!
Jude and Brian

Desiree’s apartment was wonderful. Beautifully furnished, sparkling clean, fabulous location and many thoughtful touches. The location is amazing and i would stay there any time I am in Sydney. Thank you for sharing your home Desireé and your thoughtfulness!
