Kevin and Ellie are very nice people and are welcoming and generous hosts.  Their apartment is spotless, comfortable and very nicely decorated.   The guest room and bathroom are great in all aspects and the apartment is ideally located.  I would strongly recommend this accommodation.

Great little cottage. Perfect for a family. We stayed with our 2 kids,  (3 & 6yrs )  for one night and had everything we could need.  Located in the host's  back yard on a quiet suburban street.  Surrounded by houses yet was very private. The local shopping centre with Coles just a few km's away.  We were very happy with our 1st Airbnb experience and when we next need accommodation in Sydney will try to book again.

Tessa and Rods unit was superbly situated for us - close to our family, lovely cafes and restaurants, and of course, the local bus service right past the door. Would recommend it strongly and love to stay again.
Phan was accomodating in every request. Place was clean and location is fantastic. Will stay again in future

The room is tidy and clean, with separate toilet and bathroom. It’s a good place to stay for a couple or a single person.  Ven is a very nice person. 
We had a little difficult to find the house when checked-in, because the street number is not included in the address. We had to call Ven to get exact address.  The bedroom door has a screaming sound when opening and closing, so it was embarrassing when we would like to use the door at early morning or at night.  It would be better if it’s been fixed.
Overall, it’s a comfortable place to stay.
Very friendly and helpful couple, also the place is great and looks like the pictures. Would recommend it for people with smaller luggage though because the room is on the 2nd floor

Really loved this place for our stay. Paul and Michy were really accommodating and helpful. Couldn't have asked for more. The place was really nice inside and very clean. A great little spot with it's own access and just accross from the beautiful Pittwater. Avalon cafes and restaurants had us covered all weekend and the weather really turned on for us while we were there. Can't recommend it highly enough, definitely no compaints.

What a great location, with a generous sized house.  The kitchen, dining and living rooms are very comfortable sizes, and a bonus for each bedroom to have its own level, two with balconies.

We would happily stay again and definitely recommend it to others.

Jeremy was very easy to communicate with, our booking went very smoothly!

We hope you enjoy your stay also!!!
Naveen is a wonderful host, her apartment is very stylish and comfortable. Secure apartment for anyone wanting to stay close to the city, with just a short stroll to many cafes and places to eat!
Great location,  comfy bed, quiet and private.
Amazing location, nice cozy apartment !
Excellent accommodation

Great value for money. Very large, clean studio. Leslie was a superb host, friendly and reliable. Beautiful view from the balcony. 
I would recommend for an affordable stay in Northern Beaches.

Location is amazing! Loved the feel of the apartment and how well appointed it is - David made the checking in experience really easy as well and also gave tips on how to get around/things to see. Thanks for a great stay!

Bliss! We had such a lovely time in Bronte and that was all thanks to Susan & her husband and their studio setup - to say we highly recommend this place would be an understatement. 
The location made for a convenient base to access both the city and the nearby surrounds of the eastern suburbs. 
The studio itself had all the facilities we needed for our stay with the decor and lighting creating the relaxing coastal oasis that we were after - even a tasty local breakfast was provided as a bonus! Thank you Susan, was so lovely meeting you and feeling so welcomed into Bronte.
The house is spacy, with nice back yard and very clean. It is close to public transport. Communication was easy with Arianne. I recommend the place!
Lovely place, beautiful view of Darling Harbour. Perfect stay for a free days in Sydney.

My sister and I had a wonderful stay at Victoria's place! It was in a quiet area that was a quick walk or Uber ride to wherever we were headed. The place was clean and check in was easy. We we're able to make breakfast each morning with the provided amenities. The apartment was perfect for our 3 day stay.
It was a great stay! Pictures do not do it any justice as view from balcony was absolutely amazing and it was a very stylish apartment for a nice girls weekend.

Exceptional value, in a great location, comfortable, clean, thoughtful touches such as home made muffins and jams, large space and extra large private courtyard with fountain, lovely and friendly hosts

Miss D and her husband are very kind..If you have any problem them will help you with their best..Besides you can find a lot of nice restaurant in Newtown..and it is very convenient to catch a train to the city^^
We enjoyed our stay!

We had a delightful time on a mother-daughter bonding stay. Tess and Rod were so kind and welcoming, always remaining respectful of our privacy while also being available should we need assistance. They were very kindly flexible on our check in and out times and were even sweet enough to help us with our bags. Thank you!

Susan was a lovely and friendly host.  She went to great lengths to make us feel welcome and to offer advice with respect to transport and facilities within the suburb.  The studio was very neat and tidy, representing excellent value for a visitor to Sydney.  Being separate from the main dwelling, this studio was also very private and peaceful.
Kasey's place was great. It was very clean and in a great location, right on the beach. Would highly recommend!
因为提前到了悉尼…所以联系房东是否可以提前入住…真的很感谢房东…满头大汗的收拾卫生…为了尽快让我们提前入住…房间不是严格意义上的两室…因为一间卧室就是在起居室放了沙发餐桌等东西…不过这丝毫不影响…房子最棒的是位置…基本步行到唐人街到coles到皮特街都可以…真的非常好…站在大阳台就可以看到中央车站…很好…
Very clear and easy instructions for check in. Lovely clean room. Fast response from host.
Great, central location. Very spacious apartment. Only issue is that the washing machine did not work
This is a super air BnB in a great location we recommend it unreservedly
Great location, close to shops and restaurants at East Village. Excellent, prompt communication and easy check-in and check-out.
The apartment’s location is very good. It is near the central station. We can go by foot for half a hour to every view spot.

Belinda was a wonderful host - quick to respond to enquiries and warm and friendly on arrival. The studio is beautiful exactly as shown in the photos. 
Tip - Be sure to read stove instructions before consuming wine. 
Bundeena is lovely. We enjoyed some short bush walks and lazed about the studio reading the paper. Perfect.
This is a lovely place to stay, all the comforts of home and a very stylish well appointed accommodation.
A nice affordable stay for a family of five in a central location in Sydney.
Cath was such a welcoming host! She left is the most beautiful fresh eggs from her hens, home made bread and little midnight snacks. The apartment was clean and tidy albeit small, but cosy!

It's been a lovely stay at Louise apartment. It is conveniently located with bus stops just a few blocks away, 20~30 mins to city centre and bondi beach. It's also very nice of Louise to offer the welcome pack full of fruits and bread and milk. The apartment is just as shown on the pictures, very spacious and stylish vintage furnitures. The area is quiet and safe, with very nice neighborhood. I already look forward to another stay at Louise apartment.
Good value for the price.

Shuang was very helpful in providing instructions and tips to getting to his place. The room itself is very clean, spacious, and modern. The neighborhood is pretty quiet and the person/people I shared the kitchen and bathroom with were very considerate and quiet. Getting around was pretty easy as it was only a 12 minute walk from Wolli Creek station and shorter walk to a few bus routes that will take you to Sydney or surrounding suburbs. My stay was very short as I was heading to the airport, and it's a relatively easy walk to the airport if you don't have too much luggage. Otherwise, it's an inexpensive taxi ride or short bus trip to the airport, which works just as well. Would definitely try to stay here again if I'm ever in the area again.
Sarah is lovely, but she hadn't attended to some very basic maintenance.
This place was perfect for us. Quite and easy location.

Richard's place is pure serenity. Private beach front this house is perfect for a relaxing get away and the kitchen is incredible. Everything you need! The beds are comfortable and the whole area is so serene. Perfect for a little getaway from Sydney! Can't wait to come back.
Great location and excellent value

We stayed in Paul's place for six nights and had a wonderful time. The flat is compact, comfortable, and stylish. There is a bathroom with bath and shower as well as WC. there is a kitchen with a gas cooker, a dining table which can seat four, and a dressing room with good storage space. It is perfect for one or two. The location is in potts point, just three minutes walk from kings cross station. You can walk into the centre of sydney in 20 minutes. There are big supermarkets within ten minutes walk of the apartment.

The apartment was just as it is advertised,great time,fantastic location and we highly recommend it.
We will definately use it again.
Thanks Mohit for being an excellent host.
Regards
Sam

I was meeting friends in Newtown so location for me was great. It's also only a short walk to the station from where you can go straight to circular quay. Bed was really comfortable and everywhere was very clean. 
Would stay again and definitely recommend.

Great host. Great and prompt/easy communication. Very polite. Only issues were very small and very much a personal opinion, you have to walk through the house to get the the little cabin out the back (Susan just said g'day when we walked through and very much gave us our space after a long drive, she was very chill about us walking through at any time of the night even through we were in early and out at a reasonable time) and the planes going to/from the airpott can be a bit of pain. But the cabin out the back is beautiful, very clean everything you need shes helpful to let you know as you get there etc. 
Definitely will look her up again!
It is a nice place, our family enjoy the stay very much. The host is very helpful when we have some questions.

Suzie was most welcoming, and our first Airbnb experience couldn't have gone better. The apartment is exquisitely furnished and feels very homey. It's posh yet comfy. The bed (including the bedding) is on par with upper-scale hotels. Suzie gave us a lot of privacy but was readily available to answer any question. The bathroom for our own usage also has the feel of chic hotels, with an assortment of high-end products. The location is great, between Wynward Station and Darling Harbour. The room is next to a road, but soundproofing is good and I slept well even without using ear plugs (Suzie provides high quality ear plugs should you need them). To sum up, my sister and I would go back in a heart beat.

The apartament is very good. It is very close bars, restaurant and metro station. It is perfect for a couple. The apartment does not receive much sunligh. But this is not a problem. I and my girlfriend recomend the Joanne apartament. Everthing is good.
We've stayed a few times with Kerri.  She's a great host and her apartment is lovely.  We're happy to recommend and look forward to our next visit.

We spent a very comfortable 8 nights in Desiree's apartment.  It is just as it looks in the pictures.  It is smartly decorated with comfortable furniture and lovely modern kitchen and bathroom.  There is a guest laundry in the building with coin operated machines and you can do a big wash and dry for $4 each.  The apartment is bright and airy and has a nice busy city outlook which we enjoyed.  You can certainly hear the buzz of the city around you but you are right in the CBD so that is to be expected and enjoyed.  The location is fantastic.  You can walk to just about everything in the city centre and trains and buses are only metres away if you want to get around more quickly or go further afield.  Very easy access from the airport by train into Museum station. The host, Desiree, was a pleasure to deal with, excellent communication all the way through.  This is a wonderful little home away from home putting you right into centre of the Sydney action.
This place is good coz everything around you.
This is a great place, very new and clean, easy street parking and level easy walk to restaurants ect. I have not stayed in this location before but thought it was great.
Take care with level of dust and odour

Ideal location for Marrickville and very convenient for the city train. The Cov is exactly as described, Joy checked regularly that all was well. Hope to be able to stay here again for next Sydney visit
Great location, charming house, very helpful host, great amenities. Very small sink in a bathroom, narrow stairs but after day or two get use to it. Will recommend this place to a friends.

This accommodation is full of character, with great views, especially from the top level. The kitchen was modern with plenty of cooking equipment. We were glad of the large fans in the bedrooms as we were there in summer. 
There is a great cafe nearby. Jeremy answered my queries very quickly. We had a lovely stay!
Conveniently located and clean. Overall, pleasant stay.
Nice location. Tidy room. Highly recommended.
Great location right in the centre of Sydney. Chloe was easy to work with, communicated well and was very flexible when we arrived earlier than expected. Thanks Chloe!
The location is Very easy to find ,and very convenient to tourist attractions .

A welcoming family in a well kept spotless home. Loved all the plants & outdoor use of land in a city environment. Close proximity for me and my plans in Olympic Park. Many thanks for the help with transport in the area. I would happily stay with you in he future.

Tristan made us feel very welcome upon arrival, showed us everything we'd need and recommended a great place to have breakfast! Although we unfortunately didn't end up meeting Naveen, she was very helpful over the phone! 

The apartment was exactly what we were looking for, the use of the gym and outside pool (with stunning views across the city and harbour bridge) are a great addition! We loved the style of the apartment too, very cool. 

Loved Darlighurst, conveniently located when travelling into the City and not too far from Bondi. 

We would highly recommend staying with Tristan & Naveen!
Great place to stay...clean, very central location and had everything we needed for our stay. Thanks!

We had a great time with Jyoti, they were great hosts and went out if their way to make us feel welcome and comfortable in their home. The bedroom and bathroom are very spacious.  Would definitely recommend staying here.
Good location near a beach and Sydney airport. It's very easy to find. Hernan is a very good guy. And the room is very very clean, made me feel like in my home in deed.

Cathy’s place couldn’t be more perfect! The bed and linens were incredibly comfortable, the room was beautiful, and a fan was cooling off the room on arrival. It also included a beach bag and towels, little kitchen set up, even yogurt and strawberries in the fridge. Along with Cathy’s wonderful recommendations for food in the area our stay couldn’t have been better. I would highly recommend staying here!

Amazing apartment at an amazing convenient location. Place was exactly as describe, it was way better then what we expected. The host went to further miles by providing Washing Machine Powder, Shower Gel and lots of kitchen amenities. It just awesome staying of at Max's Place! Highly Recommended.
Great location and value for money. Check in and out was easy. Would definitely recommend.

In a very nice and quiet area, Leslie’s house is very comfortable, clean, well-equipped with everything you might need. Close to public transports to the city and to the beach as well. 
Leslie and her family were very nice and helpful. I would definitely recommed staying at their place!
Kelly is a great host! Really friendly and helpful!
PERFECT!

The house was amazing and beautiful; also the owners family were very close and just a call away to solve any little hiccups and questions that we had. Clovelly is great, the house area was quiet at night and during the day with easy walking distance to the beach and restaurants. Also very close by to public transport (fundamental in Sydney) and for us that drove there, free and easy to find parking in the same street. We did love it the stay.
Best Airbnb I have stayed in in Sydney! Will stay again

Best hospitality ever, love the cleanliness and tidiness of this place. No shoe policy is my way to go in my house, so I appreciate having it in places where I travel to. 
The place is brand new and well maintained, bed is comfy. Linen soft and clean. I forgot my converter for the outlet and they had two available! Life savers! I would define you highly recommend it to anybody!

I was delighted with my stay. Carol and Steve are kind and thoughtful hosts. Beautiful rooms and bathroom, very clean. Having the lounge area was great for those rest times and having somewhere to chill out. It was the perfect accomodation for my weekend. Well done Carol and Steve, you guys were fab.

Beautiful and cozy house in the most amazing location, just minutes from Bondi restaurants, shops and the beach! The kitchen was very well stocked, with beautiful little touches arranged for our arrival. We were made to feel very welcome! Having the entire house meant our family of five could relax with enough room! I thoroughly recommend booking this place!

The studio is very cosy and in a great location. The light rail is just a short walk away and I found it very easy to get to everything. If you're driving, as I was, there is always a park on the street and you are just off a major arterial road (without any noise!). Susan was a lovely host, very friendly and accommodating, which made my first AirBnB experience very smooth and pleasant. Would recommend!
Juliette's place is beautiful, magnificent views. I was made so welcome. it was a joy to stay with them.

Everything is perfect! Location is great. House was very clean and tidy. Desireé is a very kind, helpful and responsible. Our communication are very smooth, no problem at all. It must be one of my favourite airbnb stay! Thank you for the lovely flowers and chocolates. Highly recommend to stay in Desireé 's place for your next accommodation!

This apartment is clean, modern, and comfortable.  We appreciated the thorough communication and ease of hand-off for the keys.  We were especially grateful for the toiletries, guidebooks, laundry powder, and coffee provided - the attention to detail was wonderful!  The building requires the key to use the elevator, so we felt very secure. We would stay here again!  Be aware that the 1BD is separated by a partial wall, so if you're looking for privacy from the living room, it is limited.

We enjoyed staying in Surry Hills. It is convenient being so close to Central Station.  It seems to be an up and coming neighborhood so I would advise others that you should assess your level of comfort with urban life. By day, I noticed all of the cute restaurants, yoga/barre spots, and shops. (Simon and Nicole provided excellent recommendations as well!) By night, I noticed more of the remaining graffiti, vacant storefronts, and quiet streets.  If you do not feel comfortable in cities or would feel more assured with constant tourist traffic, you may want to spend more to be closer to CBD. For us, it was perfect.  Thanks Simon and Nicole!
바로 앞에 바다도 있고 조금만 가면 시티도 있고 너무 좋은 곳이었어요! 집도 아기자기하고 인테리어도 이뻐서 너무 맘에 들었답니다 편하게 잘 쉬었어요

Lina’s place is a cozy granny flat in a nice, quiet location. It fit the four of us comfortably. The bottom bunk mattress was a little hard, but that was only negative. Lina was very helpful and even brought us extra blankets to help with the cold. Would stay again!
Gorgeous private space with tranquil garden outlook. Warm and generous hosts. Couldn't fault it!

We had a really great time at Hernans place even it was for one day.
The location was very nice .
Great beach nice restaurants.
Hernan is very chill and welcoming.
He makes you feel at home.
Wonderful place and very good location, with everything we needed and more. We'll definitely come back! Can't recommend enough.

Appartement très bien situé et bien agencé. Accueil attentionné. Chambre sur rue bruyante 
Globalement très bon séjour

We stayed 7 nights at Jenny's apartment and loved everything about it! Communication with Jenny was easy and she was flexible and let us keep our suitcases in the apartment after we checked out. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Sydney!

Super emplacement! À 5 minutes du métro de Kings Cross et de 3 épiceries. 

Grande chambre et salon. Beaucoup de rangement.
Même le futon était confortable. 

Cuisine fonctionnelle mais peu équipée. Avec un peu de créativité, on se débrouille bien. 

Petite salle de bains, pas de porte de douche et l'eau s'étend sur le plancher. Mais comme il y a très peu de pression, ce n'est pas trop problématique. 

Bruits de la rue et du corridor très perceptibles, bouchons pour les oreilles conseillés. 

Le logement prend la température de l'extérieur. Heureusement, il y avait des couvertures supplémentaires et un chauffage d'appoint portatif. 

J'y séjournerait de nouveau sans problème!
Fantastic place to stay - beautiful apartment in a top location. Hosts were very accommodating Would definitely stay there again. Thanks Naveen!
Donna was a lovely host and the cottage is so beautiful. Thank you for your hospitality!
Awesome place

Awesome experience! Ali was a great host and the space was very nice. He was very accommodating and quick to respond to all questions we had. The apartment is in a great neighborhood and is very well equipped and comfortable

Had the perfect stay at Michele's place. Everything is clean, comfy and as advertised and I had everything I needed. Location is great as well! Would definitely stay here again when next in Sydney. Thanks so much Michele!

Awesome quiet place, yet right near everything you'd want. I stayed at Cindy' s place for 3 nights. Not once did I need a cab. There's a bus stop right at the front door, which is great since Australia's public transportation system is so convienant . Theres a fun lively area right near there with bars and restaurants. Getting in contact with Cindy was very easy. I would stay at Cindy's again.
Great location. Great communication. We were late on our agreed check in time but ana patiently waited for us. Thank you so much. We enjoyed our stay.
Naveen is a nice host. Her apartment located in the hart of Sydney ,is convenient for walking around the CBD. But the dog was smelled,and the room too.
very close to the airport! the room was clean and cozy to stay. You can find the house to find easily.

The place was exactly as expected. We had a great stay. The place is nice and modern. It's within minutes of central station, a lot closer than I thought which was a great bonus. 
Communication was good throughout.
Excellent location to great cafe and restaurants.  Apartment is very modern and comfortable.  Excellent hosts.
Excellent location, within walking distance of all central attractions. Very easy check in/out with clean well equipped accomodation
Great value for money. Great host.
Sehr schön und empfehlenswert:)
Very good

A very helpful host when dealing with an initial booking issue, Edi went beyond the call of duty ! Ease to come and go. Nice stay, although being on the flight path took a bit of getting used to. would definitely stay again, recommended
Great place in a great location. I would recommend this property to all!
Awesome place to stay if you're traveling from or to the Sydney airport. I liked the place. Excellent. Clean and very professional.
Very homely and chilled quite and close to the city

Henan is very kind and active. My first Sydney trip started here is so good. The guesthouse in Henan, which is used by people from many countries, is very clean and comfortable. I traveled freely on public transport, but I did not feel any inconvenience. I would like to see you again next time you come to Sydney.

Great place, located just 5 minutes north of the sydney bridge, you can walks across to south sydney in 15/20 mins (all along the bridge so its a nice walk!). Very clean, all the facilities you would need! Would recommend and stay again!
Greg and Maggie's place was perfect for us. Greg was a very welcoming host. Thanks for a great stay!

The location is just perfect, very close to the old town, Sydney opera and botanic garden. Paul left in the flat some traveler books that are really useful :) 
The flat is all conform to the pictures. Arrival and departure very easy as no timetable.

Hilde is a fantastic host. She was very accommodating of our schedule and made sure we understood how to use everything. She also had a few nice surprises for us (I’ll keep them secret for the next people, but they were very tasty). The place is clean and spacious and perfect for a quiet getaway. Highly recommend this place to anyone.

Duncan and Ashlee provide a lovely room and good, friendly experience and stay.

The room is very clean and set up perfectly for arrival with a lot of space to store personal items and clothes. Everything was made easy and hassle-free, and the location itself is perfect for a quick tram or bus into town, so it easy to find be first time also. 

We didn't get to chat much with the hosts as we were coming and going and exploring, but we enjoyed our short time spent in their company.

We recommend this place for all aspects of a stay, and would be happy to stay longer than the 4 nights we had there.
Séjour très agréable. L’appart est comme sur les photos. Piscine super sur le toit. Très bien placé et très agréable pour une famille de 4.

Susan made me feel very welcome and made sure I had everything I needed.  Her little backyard cabin is just perfect and provides a serene, private and relaxing green oasis so close to the centre of Sydney.  Susan willingly shares her kitchen facilities and makes her place feel like a home away from home.  It is very convenient and within easy walking distance to buses and the shops, restaurants and amenities of Leichhardt.  I highly recommend Susan's cabin and will definitely consider staying here again.

Patrick & Christine's place is so nice, quiet, stylish and charming - very clean and well-equipped. The tram and train stations are in walking distance (7mins and 15mins respectively). We would love to stay longer!
A lovely character cottage with soul. Look forward to a return visit.Host very accommodating and a warm welcome.
Eleanor and her family are great,friendly and thoughtful,everything is excellent.

Arnie and Lorraine's property is an absolute treasure! Steeped in art and history and only one street back from Oxford St (and the delightful Saturday Paddington markets) I couldn't have picked a better place to stay. There's two Airbnb rooms who share the beautiful stone bathroom but I rarely noticed the other guests, the room I had isn't pictured but had a great feel with gorgeous natural light and plenty of space. Arnie and Lorraine felt like old friends after my week there and I'll definitely be back!

Sehr freundlicher Empfang mit einer super Einweisung in die Unterkunft. Mit weiteren Infos zu den direkten Örtlichkeiten, Stränden, öffentliche Verkehrsanbindung (Schiffsfähre) und den Sehenswürdigkeiten des wunderschönen Naturparks. 
Das eigenständige absolut ruhig gelegene Appartementhaus entsprach meiner Meinung nach zu 100% der Gastgeberbeschreibung und ist modern mit guter technischer und wohnlicher Ausstattung versehen. 
Es war sogar möglich kurzzeitig eine 3. Person in Abstimmung mit der Gastgeberin übernachten zu lassen. Insgesamt betrachtet war der Urlaubsaufenthalt hier einzigartig, in einem liebevoll ausgestattetem Ambiente inmitten von grüner Natur und Stränden.
Great host. Lovely house n neighbourhood. Really feel like home.

Linda was a great host and regularly kept in contact to ensure we were having a great time and there were no issues.

Everything was as described and the location was great. The walk to the train station was not too far; even with a crying infant and suit cases being wheeled. Great restaurants were only a short walk away as well.

The information left in the house for nearby attractions and was great, as was the access to the Entertainment Book.

I would highly recommend staying here. 

The next time we are in Sydney, Linda's apartment will be the first place we will try and book :)

Really nice place to stay, it's nice to be self-contained, basically like a little hotel room with plenty of space and a nice garden. Kitchen amenities available in house. Susan was nice and welcoming. Good location in Sydney too. To be honest the aeroplane noise was a bit of a shock at first but I was tired so I still slept really well from about 9-6 without being woken.

Ben's place was very comfortable and close to all public transport and commercial points. We had a wonderful stay. Apartment was very well equipped. Ben was also very quick in response for qns we had on any facility at home.
Amazing!!
The host canceled this reservation 44 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

well situated for railway station and in a safe up and coming area with a real sense of history, the flat is comfortable and has everything you would need for any length of stay, bed is comfortable and having two toilets is a bonus.
No problem with noise (except the stairs which do creak a bit) and plenty of fans to keep cool in both lounge and bedroom.
Linda responded very quickly to any questions and we would recommend the apartment.

This was a perfect location and a wonderful apartment. We plan to visit Sydney more often and have found our place. 
Chloe is great with communication and the check in was super easy.
The location is very nice!
谢谢热情好客房东的招待,是非常友好的房东,非常干净的房间,五星推荐哦!
Great house in a fun area! Really enjoyed the trip!

Great spread in a lively neighborhood. Walking distance to train and myriad bars/restaurants. I've been to Sydney 10 times, but somehow never visited Darlinghurst till now. (Thanks, Airbnb!) Naveen could not have been more accommodating--she even helped me sort out the train times for my pre-dawn airport schlep. Will return!
Cute apartment in a great neighborhood.  It has all the essentials, minus wifi.  A good bet for your money.

As per previous comments, issues with cleanliness and lack of crockery/towels upon arrival. Able to contact owner and he provided new towels, coffee cups, dishrack, tea towels etc the first morning and provided a small refund which was appreciated.  Main bed is soft but comfortable.  Very convenient location, mostly walked to nearby places or into town.  Easy to get to/from airport.

Very clean place and in awesome location. Although, parking says free all day, it doesn't mention you need to move your car every 2 hours every day you stay there - ruins your time if you do not know of this, we left a day early. 

Bring toilet paper and soap as these were not available at our stay. (they said they would reimburse us of the toilet paper)
Susan is a lovely host with a lovely home! Very helpful and welcoming. Directly underneath a flight path so it was a little noisy but love the Eco-friendliness of the place, and Angelo the cat :)
Belinda was very accommodating and it was a nice relaxed spot!
Better to provide some breakfast

Do yourself a favour and stay at Bills house. The locations in Glebe is wonderful, close to the city and Glebe but in a gorgeous quiet location. The house is really big and allows a large group to expand into the space. Bill is a very accommodating host. Thanks for everything.
Good transfer point for passengers heading for an early fight at international airport

Appartement parfait pour trois personnes ou couple + 1 enfant. Littéralement à deux pas de la station de train Hurlstone Park sur la ligne T3 qui amène au cœur de Sydney donc très pratique pour visiter la ville tout en étant au calme. Quartier résidentiel très calme avec petits commerces dans la rue adjacente et parc pas loin. Bref idéal pour aller découvrir Sydney en étant dans un petit coin calme. Rien à redire sur la propreté des lieux. Nous ne nous sommes pas croisés avec Angelina mais elle a su répondre à toutes nos demandes. Merci à elle et sa famille pour ce séjour.
Great apartment, fantastic location.. like the style and it is renovated very nicely. Enjoyed to jump out of the door into the ocean and to have all the nice cafes and restaurants around

Jason and David were very responsive hosts and facilitated an easy check in process despite arriving quite late at night. The loft was in a great location, central to public transport and walking distance to some yum eateries. Amenities in the loft were quite basic which was not too problematic as we did not spend much time physically there. Due to the proximity of the neighbours, it was not uncommon to be woken up early if the neighbours were up and about. All in all, an adequate place to return to after a long day of adventuring the city.
It was a warm and cosy stay! Loved the place! It was soo clean! Probably the cleanest place I have ever seen.Communication was fast and good. Easy checkout and checkin.Highly recommend this place! :)

Lovely place to stay and such a lovely
Host also :)
위치가 매우 좋았고, 청결하고 집도 넓고 쾌적했어요! 그리고 호스트가 매우매우 친절했습니다
Kariem was a great communicator and very accommodating. The unit was sunny, very tidy and in a stunning location. Booking and communicating with Kariem was easy.

很好很喜欢  房东是广东人  即使有一点小意外  但是房东的热情足矣抵消  从住宿到维多利亚女王大厦 中国城的路程不远 开车只有十几分钟 不过我每次出门都是打uber  总体来说还是值得推荐的
望房东生意越来越好!
Really excellent stay. Linda has provided well and very thoughtfully. Thank you   Location most convenient. Dora

Incredibly welcoming and friendly host. 
Apartment very freshly decorated with scented flowers and candle.
Very good appliances with ample kitchen utensils and tableware.
More than sufficient consumables such as milk, refreshments, bathroom and laundry products.
Towels and linen immaculate.

Lovely apartment in a very convenient part of Sydney. Five minutes from the Town Hall and QVB and about 20 minutes from Circular Quay. Lots of food and drink outlets in the immediate vicinity.  The apartment was clean and well equipped with amazing views over the harbour and Botanic Gardens. Hugo's instructions for getting in and using the apartment were clear and helpful. Bonus is the roof top terrace and swimming pool, which unfortunately we didn't have time to use!  Many thanks Hugo and Pamela
Definitely recommend this place- perfect beach pad and we didn’t want to leave :) very comfortable and hospitable.

We had a great time at Jennifer's place.
Everything was perfect! We really hope to go back there sometime soon!
Thank you!

On the positive side the apartment was in a fabulous location - close to attractions, restaurants and shopping. The check-in was seamless, despite my concerns about picking up keys from a convenience store. The apartment came with parking -  a real bonus in this area of Sydney. It took me 2 turns to find the carpark, but that was my fault I should have watched the video Angela provided on the day rather than a few days before. The apartment was very well equipped - dishwasher, washing machine and dryer etc. The beds were very comfy. Really good Wifi. 
On the negative side I was disappointed that we were only given one bath towel each (for a 4 night stay) and a fairly thin towel at that. No hand towels or face washers. The apartment was clean but could probably do with a spruce up as it looked a little tired. 
My big problem was the TV. It didn't work. When my husband telephoned one of the contact people he received a telephone call back saying that he couldn't help us and would get someone to look at it the next day - a bit too late as we were leaving the next morning. He also told my husband that he had spoken to the Concierge at the building and that a number of apartments were have antenna problems. We then tried to tune  the TV again and were able to "find" over 200 channels - but all of them were locked, including the free to air channels. 
My husband contacted the second contact person and he got back to us and said he couldn't understand why we were having problems as the family that had moved out that morning didn't have any issues. This was a complete lie - we had been in the apartment for the last three nights. 
I don't like people lying to me. Why not simply say that you can't rectify the problem, apologise for the inconvenience and leave it at that.  It wouldn't have been any big deal.
Finally I don't like hosts asking me (on several occasions) to give them a 5 star rating. I only give honest feedback.

This apartment is fantastic value, in a great location to enjoy Middle Harbour, Manly Beach and the Spit Bridge to Manly walk... which is spectacular. 
Comfy beds, spacious bathroom, practical kitchen and GREAT harbour VIEW.  Perfect location for using public transport.  Hope to stay again.

Je recommande vivement ce logement magnifiquement bien situé à proximité du Royal National Park, confortable et décoré avec beaucoup de goût. Les œuvres d’art de Belinda nous ont donné matière à réflexion tout le long du séjour ! Parfait également au niveau des équipements, et Belinda nous a donné toutes les informations pour que notre  séjour se passe au mieux.
Was great

Thanks Cath we really enjoyed our stay at your place. Nice chookies and dog Hazel. Lovely to eat eggs from your chooks and pick greens and tomatoes from your garden!
Right balance of privacy and contact - thanks we'll be back.
这件公寓简直像家一样,我喜欢它别致的格局,更喜欢和享受房东Max热心的建议和帮助｡虽然一直没能见面,但是Max为我们营造了家一样舒服的环境和氛围｡期待下一次悉尼之行!
Rhonda is very friendly, can help you is needed! The place is very nice and quiet! Thank you again
Our stay was very comfortable! The place was very nicely presented and welcoming. Thoroughly enjoyed and would highly recommend.
A great location and very helpful host! We very much enjoyed our stay here.
We really enjoy our stay at Naveen's home,the stunning room is amazing!! the room is clean and bright,has everything we need. Naveen is also very nice and friendly.

The place was spacious and comfortable but the best part about it is the location. It's in the center of town, making all the major destinations easily accessible. In addition, Ali and Joanne were very accommodating with our early check in. The amenities, however, were lacking. We were hoping to shower after our long flight but there were no bath towels when we arrived. I texted Ali and the towels were delivered while we were out for lunch. There was only one tube of shampoo and conditioner provided that were clearly taken from hotels. There was a bar of soap for bathing and it had obviously been used before. The previous things I can deal with, but for our 5 night stay for 2 people, there was only one and a half rolls of toilet paper. I texted Ali for toilet paper, shampoo, and soap twice, but received no response.

I loved the apartment, but it needs to be better stocked.
Great location!
Felt welcome n kids love the chocolate left behind. Big n clean apartment with plenty of extra linens n towels. Great CBD location with Darling Harbour right at the corner. Overall, happy stay.

Excellent and friendly host with a beautiful apartment and excellent room and bathroom. Recommend to anyone looking for a clean, neat and well maintained apartment in a good neighbourhood for shops, restaurants, public transport.
Place was very close to the airport. Would recommend if needing somewhere to stay before an early flight the next day
The property is in an incredible location in Darlinghurst with the most stunning views of the Sydney skyline. Jeremy is an amazing host who was accommodating, responsive and helpful
Had a great stay at the mews, right in the centre of newtown surrounded by cafes, coffee and public transport.  No traffic noise and plenty of space and very comfy bed.
Susan was a lovely and welcoming host. The studio is well equipped with everything you need for your stay and it's a really convenient location for buses into the city.

Nicole and Simon's apartment was exactly as pictured and we had a lovely stay in their clean, comfortable and spacious place. Our communication with Nicole was always easy and she was quick to reply. It is close to so many delicious restaurants and coffee shops, attractions and boutiques. We would highly recommend this place and hope to visit again. Thanks for everything!
Awesome location, 1 min walk to bondi and great restaurants! Best view of Bondi too

There was a note  that made us welcome. There was milk in the fridge. 
The kitchen was well stocked. A great location. Highly recommended. 
Accessible to galleries and public transport.

My daughter and I came to Sydney for her medical school interview.  Desiree was an outstanding host - providing detailed instructions on every stage of our stay, including our last day where she kindly offered for us to check out later than the arranged time.  The apartment was immaculate and really did provide a home away from home. You could seriously just turn up at his place as everything is provided for the guest's use. Desiree thought of all the little special touches - from fresh fruit and sparkling water to chocolates and flowers.  The location is fantastic - walking distance to all that Sydney has to offer.   Her guide book and restaurant recommendations were wonderful.  Highly recommended  - better than any hotel stay!  We  will be back again!  Many thanks Desiree

Belinda's little cottage was very cute and comfortable. 

For those spending the day out walking/going to the beach it's a great choice. 

The cottage is at the back of Belinda's house, which was clear on the listing, but might not be ideal for those wanting a place of their own.
You can find everything in this house. 20min from dt. Near beach. Recommend.
Home away from home!!

Cath was a great communicator and responded quickly to any questions. The studio was charming and a short walk to cafes and train stations etc. The breakfast muesli and freshly baked biscuits were delicious!

Julia’s place was great for my stay!  It was easy to get to by public transport from the airport and nicely located near the CBD and other areas.  While it did get warm during the day, you should be out exploring! And it cooled down nicely with the fan on and window open at night.  It was exactly as presented and a great spot for my first visit to Sydney.  Would definitely stay here again!
We had the best time & that was due to Stephanie's home & how at ease she made us feel. It was just like home away from home & Glebe is a beautiful suburb.
Franca and Alessio are very nice person. They answered my question and requests very fast! Also the apartment is very clean, we got a good living experience in there.

My stay was a pleasant one. Hernan was very responsive to my queries. It was a shame though that I didn't get the chance to meet him. But still, overall I really had a pleasant stay in Hernan's place. The room was very clean and tidy, and he even provided the bus route information on the table in the room (just in case some people might need to refer it). Oh and one thing, his place is just about 10 minutes walk to the Beach. If you want a quiet time at a nice beach with lesser people, you should definitely check out Hernan's place! I would totally recommend his place to my friends (:
No views BUT perfect for single or couple who want to get out and about and come back to comfort and quiet. All the facilities cleverly included even basic food supplies included and great bathroom.

The room was exactly as described, small but cozy and comfortable. Ideal for a short stay! It was very clean, and Cindy and Miki absolutely lovely hosts.
Located close to shops, restaurants and the beach it was only a short bus ride into central Sydney.
Highly recommend it!

Great spot to stay! Annie is a great communicator and the studio is lovely. It’s a great and lively part of town to be in so highly recommend staying there if you want to experience a thriving part of Sydney.

Nicole was great host with excellent communication before, during and after our stay, also welcomed us warmly on our arrival showing us every detail of the apartment and surrounding.

The place is just as good as on the pictures, and especially the bathroom to be underlined with amenities even more than you could need!

Location is great, close to central station, and Surry Hills is such a perfect place full of wonderful dinning spots. Make sure you follow Nicole's guide book, all her recommendations are golden words. We tried 4 restaurants from the book, fantastic!

We had very good time here. Highly recommended :D

David’s house is in perfect location and close to everything you can ask for. In front of the building across the street there is a lovely cafe and you can enjoy a brunch in the open air with sunshine kissing your face. That’s also a plus for this house. The only thing that can be improved is the shower. It would’ve been perfect if it was strong enough.

The apartment was beautiful! It was in an amazing location right in the center of things so it was easy to walk to many of the sights we wanted to visit. The train was also very close for when we needed it, and supermarkets and restaurants were easy to walk to. The door handle was loose which Gavin assured us he would fix. The apartment was clean, the beds were comfortable, and the kids loved the chocolates : )

We had really good time in this beautiful house. The pillows, sheets and towels are clean and smell good. Its location is good. We walked less than 10 mins from Petersham station. The host prepared some fresh fruits, milk and toast for us for breakfast and we liked it very much. We will choose here to stay if we come Australlia again.

I stayed in this guest room end of December for three nights. I had an excellent stay here, my first Aibnb experience. David was a great host. The room was exactly as described. Clean, very near to city centre, own bathroom, ... I have not a single thing to complain about and would stay here again, should I travel again to Sydney.

Welcoming dinner was greatly appreciated
Easy to access out of hours, clean and comfortable 
Thanks

Jamie's apartment overlooking Manly Beach was right on the Ocean .Very open and spacious. Also very handy for local restaurants and shops.
Jamie was most welcoming and we had a great stay , although we were unlucky with the weather for a few days.
Would recommend this apartment for anyone who likes being near a beach.

Fantastic location! Great place to stay if you're just looking for a comfortable bed and amenities such as a washing machine and dryer. After the cleaning fee and airbnb VAT fees, it cost $307 AUD a night, which is quite expensive compared to a hotel. But in saying that, you won't get some amenities mentioned and location may not be as ideal as Surry Hills. I was a little disappointed initially (looked better in the photos) but if you take into account this fantastic suburb location and want a clean and comfortable stay, then look no further. Lastly, it's a bit of an inconvenience with one set of keys when the listing stated two would be provided. The host did let us drop our luggage earlier but we couldn't officially check in til after 3pm.
非常感谢min提供的这套住房,安全整洁出乎我们的意料,市中心地理位置,出行超方便,客厅内有煤卫,可以自已做饭,还有洗衣和烘干机设备｡厅内按摩椅是额外的惊喜,回来累了可以享受一下按摩服务｡主人想得很周到,咖啡红茶都俱备,非常感谢,有机会还会入住｡
Fantastic stay. Great apartment and spot. Look forward to coming back.

We had a great stay!  The Airbnb is so conveniently located, it didn't take us long to get our bearings.  And the living space is fantastic, it was all that we needed and then some.   Thanks Michele for being such a fabulous host!
2nd time here-as good as I described before~thanks for the extra hangers!
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
房东人很好,帮我们解答各种问题｡厨房的大烤箱非常方便,从house附近的超市购买半成品pizza在用烤箱加工一下非常赞｡房子离Newtown火车站很近,到各个景点都很方便｡只是晚上有点吵,因为近飞机场｡

This place is AWESOME. It's small, but perfectly formed and has everything you need for a great stay. The location is absolutely perfect and close to all the best shops/restaurants/cafe's that Potts Point has to offer. Mariana is a fantastic host, very quick to respond and gave a great quality check in. I cannot recommend this place highly enough.

Angela's house was very clean and lovely 
It takes 10min to the airport

Millie’s place is very cute, clean and in a very good location. Plus the view is incredible! We had a wonderful stay and will definitely hope to stay at Millie’s again next time we visit Sydney. It really added to our experience ☺️

Beautiful view and excellent location for Sydney Olympic Park events. Kitchen has good amenities which is great as restaurants are a little few and far between unless you go to the Sydney Olympic Park precinct. Yang is a wonderful host and is very attentive. The bed is a little small if you're tall but other than that absolutely amazing! Construction noise unavoidable but once finished won't be an issue. Highly recommend.

Mariana's place is convenient to everything and centrally located with only few mins walk from KC's station. The apartment is same as desceibed as beautifully Art decorated. The place is fabously clean!!! Love my stay in Sydney as well as this adorable airBnB. Thanks for the beautiful hydrangea in the apartment too. I would defintiely recommend to frds who visit Sydney! ❤️❤️❤️ 

Though I havent met Mariana in person, her partner Don has given me warm greetings and show me everything in the apartment. Plus, they are fine with my late checkin time, which I am very appreaciated!!!❤️
Fantastic location; My first time in Sydney and the apt is at the heart of almost everything. Such a convenience to go around

We stayed here a few nights in December. The apartment is really well designed with modern appliances and everything you need for short or long stay. The place is very quiet but still in an incredibly central location. Mariana was very quick in her communication and obliging in her hospitality. Highly recommended.
Tess and Rod are wonderful hosts. We greatly appreciated the breakfast provided, as well as the chocolate cake. A wonderful place to stay in a great location.

We didn’t actually come across Tracey in our stay, but her Studio 32 flat is fantastic. It is very modern and very clean. It has a separate entrance down a back street for added privacy which is very secure. We drove and were able to park unmetered and untimed on a nearby street for the whole weekend (1 minute walk away).

Studio 32 is located above their garage (separate from the house) within easy walking distance to plenty of cafes, retail shops and restaurants. Lewisham train station is only about 10 minutes walk away.

Being under the flight path, it can be slightly noisy with planes overhead at times, but this is unavoidable and goes hand in hand with its fantastic location.

I’d highly recommend Studio 32 to others!
The whole apartment was very nice and clean. Beautiful room and private bathroom. The bed in the room was out of this world comfortable. We enjoyed our stay very much :) Definitely recommend!

Great location, very convenient and everything you would need can be found in this apartment. For the location, the price is of amazing value. Walkable distance to the local attractions. Chloe is friendly and easy to communicate with, will definitely recommend her apartment for others seeking a central city abode that doesn't break the bank.

Cindy is lovely, easy going and very pleasant to talk to. The house was very cozy and clean. Slightly away from the city but has bus right outside that goes directly to the city which is very good. There are many buses slightly longer opposite which takes about 5-10min walk. In the same area, it has restaurants and other shops so it pretty good and near all you need. Close to beautiful Coogee beach as well. Nice to stay at Cindy place.
凡姐的房子地理位置非常好,去任何地方步行即可到达,附近就有一家大超市,买东西吃饭都很方便!最赞的是凡姐个人的魅力,给了我们很大的帮助,真的是由衷的感谢!以后会再来入住,也会推荐朋友来入住!
Perfect view lovely host great location

I headed directly here from the Airport by train, and it was very easy to find! It's literally beside the Petersham train station. When I got to the home, it was nice and quiet in the surroundings and I liked that very much. The room is as in photos, the bed was comfortable, there's a writing table which was helpful for me. Natasa was really really nice and whipped up dinner for me when I was starving the first night. You'll enjoy your stay here! :)
Great first stay in an AirBnB - David was easy to communicate with, friendly, and the checkin process was a breeze. The house and the room were great, in a perfect location and very neat and tidy.
It's a very pretty place. I would definitely recommend it.

Susan is a wonderful host! The studio is lovely and has everything you'd need for a comfortable stay. Very clean, and a very comfortable bed which is a huge plus. The garden rounds the whole place off and makes it that much more charming. Susan is very kind, and prompt about responding to any questions you might have. If I'm in Bronte again someday I'll definitely stay at her studio.

Isabella was so lovely from the point of booking and until my stay. Her response to my messages were prompt and thorough. Her instructions were detailed on where things are in the house and where nice eateries are around Newtown, I think this was very kind of her to do so. 

Isabella's house is in a very convenient location, and moreover her bedroom is an inspiration, so tidy and quaint! I was made to feel like I was at home, and the bath tub in the bathroom is an absolute treasure! I will definitely stay here again!
A great place. Perfect for our family that came to visit us during our working holiday. We had a great stay and the hosts were always ready to help answer questions or provide things.
Great location so close to East Village. Great spot between airport and town and safe area with great buses to town or Bondi.

Dj is a nice host who provided warmest welcome and great hospitality. He self created a guide book to show me where to eat, to see and what to do in Sydney. He helped me to do laundry twice during my 5 day stay. He is place is well deco and quiet at night. The bed is extremely comfortable and I had good sleep every night. A nice place and I recommend his place to whoever Travelling to Sydney!
Arnie and his family are wonderful hosts. Making my guest feel welcome and comfortable with the level of support received prior and during stay. Thanks
Suzie is a great host and has the best location in my opinion. She also accommodates the interests of her guest (s) and has great recommendations. I highly recommend her place. Thanks a bunch Suzie!

Amazing location - walking distance to Bronte and Tamarama! 
Great space for a weekend away with friends.
Yeah. The stay was awesome. Naby, and the people I was lucky enough to meet were awesome to hang out with.

Stayed here for 2 nights with my mum and sister - was comfortable for the 3 of us. Very convenient being so close to everything! We could walk to circular quay, opera house, darling harbour & CBD shopping. Great price considering the location.

Fantastic location with spectacular views! Mal was very accomodating, meeting us on the day of arrival (even though we were late) and allowing for a later check out (was a lifesaver given our late flight out). Very well furnished and the perfect little getaway.
A great location and all the amenities that you need in the apartment to have a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

A wonderfully renovated and very comfortable separate flat which we will look to stay at again. Michy and Paul were very nice and accommodating people who went out of their way to ensure we were ok with everything. The location is in a quiet and very pretty surrounding which in future when we have more time we would like to explore more.
Overall a very pleasant experience which we would recommend to anyone and everyone.
Great stay! Room was clean, WiFi available, amenities and towels provided. Hernan was friendly and flexible. Would 100% stay again!
A beautiful, clean and cosy place in a nice and convenient neighbourhood. Jessica is a very friendly and helpful host. We enjoyed our stay here!

The apartment was great - clean and had everything we needed. It’s located in an area where you have everything at your door step and a short few mins walk to the central train station made getting around so much easier. We had some weather issues with our flight on arrival but Andrew and his team were very accommodating with our check in. Would definitely stay again.
perfect location.
Great house , tony was very nice and helpful when needed , would definitely stay there again

Carole is a very generous host. The accommodation is of a very high standard and so close to everything in the City. Great neighborhood with a lot of interesting things to do. All our needs were well catered for. Thank you so much. Definitely recommend Caroles place.
Great place with a great location, close to Sydney Harbour, would definitely stay again. The hosts were really nice.

NICE to meet Irene&Glenn! I had a good time in their home.They provided all that we need, the location for their apartment is convenient for us, room and bathroom are both clean. I had a great trip with my friends in Sydney.
This was very suitable for our needs and we enjoyed our time. Have recommended it to other family members.

Su’s apartment is in an amazing location, just a 30-minute walk from Circular Quay and close to lots of lovely restaurants. Apartment is really lovely and Su and the team were so accommodating about letting us check in early. A great stay.

Location was perfect. Dedicated parking spot was vital for us as we had a car and the area was super busy. The balcony with the awesome view is where we spent most of our time. I also liked the utility room downstairs which had a shower for us to clean off the sand from the beach.
Marcella's house was just what we wanted and as described in a great location.

Incredibly designed apartment. Super stylish with all the amenities and more provided.
Angela was super quick to respond and very nice to deal with. Highly recommend

We have a good stay at Marcelle's house at Maroubra Beach. The house is equipped with almost everything except WiFi and cloth dryer. Marcelle is very helpful and got us a hairdryer when we requested one from her.

The only bad experience we had is from the dirty floor at the kitchen area. Just wear shoes inside the house if you don't want to have black ink on your barefoot. We informed Marcelle about the floor and she quickly cleaned it but still not perfect.

Location of the house is only a few minutes walk to the beach and only 15 minutes drive to Sydney city or airport provided there is no congestion.  

Overall, we are happy with the stay but it would be better if the house get cleaned regularly and hygiene level is improved.

The location is superb. The service was great unfortunately the condition of the unit itself was disappointing and I felt sorry for the cleaners because they are obviously under pressure because of the high turnover.

We loved the soft seat in front of the fabulous views of Sydney through huge windows. The rest of the apartment - bed, bath, kitchen etc were so comfortable. Hugo & Pamela provided great directions, communication and welcome. We'll be back!
Great communication by host and the place was as described in the listing.
A great place, comfy bed, decorated very nicely and was bigger than expected! Hosts were lovely, with prompt replies and were very accomodating. Would definitely recommend and stay again :-)

Great night away with my partner! Very welcoming and friendly hosts! They went out of their way for us and we really appreciated it. 10/10 from us. 
We will be back, thank you!

pros
-great communication and availability to talk, even during holidays
 -willingness to resolve issues 
-location
-competitive price
-newly renovated kitchen, living and bed
-Apartment rooms look like the pictures

cons
-cockroaches present. before booking, ask if this is still a problem. we left after one night instead of the original length of booking from this issue (but hosts were willing to resolve without any problems)
-no wifi, even though it was listed as having in inclusions 
-only has a fan, no air con. This apartment heats quickly in summer weather, so air con is quite necessary in my opinion
-run down apartment complex (old)
-hallway is outdoors (I.e. when exiting the apartment, the hallways leading from the elevators to rooms are outdoors on balcony)
Enjoyed my stay again this week, thanks judy.
G&M's place has everything that you need, plus super clean, neat and tidy. Quick to reply, plus very clear instructions given.  Great place to stay!
Great host, quick responses, good location. Would highly recommend Tracey’s place for a couple

Much better than the photos. Tastefully done up decor. (Even the collection of books)Nice and clean,had everything we needed. 
Lucy and Ralph lovely people,very warm welcome and very friendly. Happy to have found this place. 40 minutes from cbd,great getaway!would love to visit again
A nice simple room with a very comfy bed! Judy was great, very responsive to my messages although I didn't get to actually meet her in person.
Excellent place for spending a great time, the host is really kind and nice. we definitely recommend this place.
Great place to stay. Host is super nice and sweet. Quick response and very accommodating. Would definitely recommend staying here.

We had 3 nights at Eleanor's place and it was perfect. Location, communication, very warm welcome with a fabulous breakfast hamper.  The views from the windows and front balcony are stunning and the locality offers really handy restaurants, cafes, convenience stores. A 10/10 apartment/location.  Thanks so much Eleanor.

Excellent location in the heart of Sydney. Great view private view of the harbour from the 34th floor. As 1st time visitors we had the prefect base for exploring the city. Detailed sign in instructions and Hugo was easy to reach ...though assistance was not needed as everything was as presented. Have no hesitation recommending as a good value. There is a Woolworths a block away to pick up any supplies.

Michele is certainly a super host. The studio was more than what was described and superbly appointed! Lots of lovely little touches from the groovy red door to the lovely chest as a coffee table! The bathroom is beautiful and the shower fantastic. Great bed and super comfy couches. A really top place to stay and perfect for our needs on this trip to Sydney.

Really a perfect place to stay in terms of location, facilities, value and comfort.  Communication was very clear from start to finish.  Slept brilliantly every night and really appreciated the fact that Narelle gave some of her local recommendations for Newtown.  Proximity to the train station means that you can be in the centre of Sydney well within half an hour.   Strongly recommended!

Room is wonderful , clean and tidy.
Kitchen have anything you need.
Is close train station ,by walk around 10mins
I'm so glad to meet this guys.
Just coming ,and you will know what I mean.
很開心來到這裡 ,
房東主人 Daniel&Elena很熱情的款待!
房間乾淨又整潔,廚房什麼東西都有｡
用走的只要10分鐘左右即可到達火車站
希望下一次有時間可以在過來住;)
Logement très beau et bien placé. David communique rapidement. Le quartier est calme et vraiment sympa . Nous reviendrons !

A lovely unit in a very convenient spot. Easy walk to Darling Harbour and walking bridge to city. Pyrmont ferry terminal close 10 minute walk - 5 stops to Circular Quay with great views of Harbour Bridge, Opera House and other sights as you travel. Coles 300 m away so easy to pick up groceries on way back from ferry. One stop to Balmain on ferry then catch 442 bus up to trendy shops and cafes. Catch 389 bus around corner into city or onto Bondi. Just be aware that all bathrooms in the building are being replaced so there may be some banging noise during the day depending on what level they are working on. Not overly loud at this stage. Clear, quick communication with those managing unit. Would recommend staying here.
Great flat - 2 decent sized bedrooms, nice living room and well equipped kitchen and really great location. Recommended!

Gavin was very friendly and accommodating and easy to get along with. He made the stay really comfortable.
His place was really tidy, clean, spacious (it's more spacious than the photos) and in a really convenient location (minutes from central station). I would definitely recommend!
Great place for a short stay in Sydney. The fashion room is very spacious and confortable and the neighbourhood is just perfect with great restaurants and local environment.
Very impressive apartment, great location and don’t hesitate to book this one if you in the Homebush area or anywhere for that matter! Great views
Over all good.

This is a great place to stay! Very clean and fresh apartment, close to beautiful coogee beach and easy to travel around in Sydney. The hosts are great, made you feel welcome and had good communication. I strongly recommend this place!
A great place to stay at palm beach!

This apartment is in such a perfect location, everything is within walking distance. It is very cosy and has everything you should ever need. Truly like a home away from home. Chloe was great at replying to any questions we had and her staff member, Crystal was equally as helpful. It just made our first ever trip to Sydney that much more enjoyable.
Lovely stay at a great property, nice area and host.
虽然没见到房东,但是也能感觉到房东是一个很热心的人｡打扫房间的那个小哥人也超棒!!房子地理位置好,环境也不错,唯一缺点就是房子不隔音｡
Thank you :)
Great place. Exactly as advertised.

Susan is great and a very attentive and friendly host and very informative on where things are locally and in Sydney if you don't know the area so well. I really enjoyed my stay at Bronte B&B studio. It is a lovely space in a garden setting, quiet and in a street where you can park easily and walk to the beach and restaurants. The studio is well set up with a comfy bed and everything you would need. The fridge was packed with nice things like strawberries and yogurt and it's easy to have a light meal/breakfast etc. There's also an outside paved area among the trees with table and chairs which makes it lovely.   Bronte is a great area and the cliff walk to Bondi is great. I would fully recommend this and so much better than staying in a hotel.
A beautiful apartment! Brenda was very accommodating with our arrival and departure times. This is a great spot for easy bus routes in to Sydney and a 15 min walk to Coogee Beach and Randwick.

David's place was really beautiful and (Darlinghurst) is the perfect location from which to explore the rest of Sydney.  The bedroom has plenty of space to 'unpack' and the adjacent balcony is great when you want stop moving for a bit.  The shared kitchen and living space are very comfortable.

Great location on the border of Sydney CBD and Surry Hills . Easy to get to via car and train. Kitted out to a good spec and comfortable.

Beware for the less mobile: steep internal staircases and low ceiling in attic room.

Great location. Both residential and touristy with many shops around. We could walk nearly everywhere and if we were tired the train and buses are right near the house. Make sure to have coffee at La Douce France right near the house. The studio is very comfortable, sunny and fully equipped.

El lugar está recientemente remodelado y es muy lindo y estiloso, cerca de todo, al frente de la playa, del transporte público y a dos cuadras del supermercado.
Tiene lavadora y proporcionan toallas, jabón, shampoo y acondicionador.
Lo mejor para esta época de verano es la jarra con agua helada esperandote en el refrigerador.
El dpto es muy iluminado aunque no tiene ventanas hacia la calle principal. 
Para los que lleven maletas hay que subir unas escaleras hacia el primer piso.
Se puede cocinar pero tener cuidado para que no suene la alarma de humo.
Tiene horno, hervidor, tostador todos nuevos.
Excelente lugar para unos días en Bondi.
Nos encantó.
Y Kasey preocupada de cómo estábamos siempre.

Gracias 
Monica
Really great location...perfect for a couple or small family for a short stay. lil noisy (from outside traffic) but nothing over the top. enjoyed our stay.

We had a great 2-week stay at the apartment.  It's in a great location right above the shopping centre.  Nicely furnished, very comfortable and fully equipped. Very clean on arrival and some really nice touches provided by the hosts.  Jared and Diana are great hosts, always replied promptly and gave us a warm welcome.

Nicole was an amazing host. The apartment was perfect and even better than the pictures. Excellent location to see a show at Sydney Olympic Park. 
Highly recommended
Amazing home right in the city. Can’t beat the experience and atmosphere by Joanne/Ali’s place! Had a lot of fun with my friends

Eleanor's place is lovely and both Eleanor and her mother were great to deal with and went out of their way to make me feel welcome and help me out. The flat is really great - it has everything you need, including an amazing view of the harbour bridge, and the obligatory Sydney fireworks!!

Suzie was absolutely wonderful in helping me get set up and make the most of my short time in Sydney. She was full of great recommendations and useful directions and was incredibly friendly. It's a great central location and a short walk to just about anywhere or an even quicker train ride away from everything. The apartment was extremely clean and Suzie has everything you might need available, including power adapters for international travelers.

I stayed with Natasa for around four months starting when I moved over from the UK in April. I was looking for somewhere chilled out to stay while I settled into my new job and Natasa's was perfect. Natasa is s great host, she is welcoming and friendly but at the same time gives you privacy. She knows so much about Sydney and will give lots of advice from anything from restaurants to transportation. I really enjoyed my time staying at Natasa's and definitely recommend for a great base for exploring Sydney.
Definitely a great place to stay, such a beautiful apartment. Thank you so much for ur kindly host Nicole :)
Well equipped and excellent location. The host was a pleasure to deal with from the outset.
Very quite area but close to public transport and easy to get beach also the city.  Allen response very quick and organized very well. I recommended this place!

Both Sarah and her place was absolutely brilliant. The accommodation was spotless, peaceful and everything written in the listing was there. Sarah herself was such a warm, generous and welcoming host, she responded very quickly and was always on hand if I need anything. Would definitely recommend it the place!
Good stay
房子很棒

The studio was great for us to stay. We love to stay in North Sydney and had the best stay in Millies studio with amazing bridge views. The studio is how it‘s described by Millie, for my wife and myself perfect to relax for a week. It‘s not to small as you will stay in it just for the night and in case of staying there for a longer time you can use the balcony with his amazing views.

We used the Milsons Point train station, but more often the ferry terminals North Sydney and Milsons Point because of the short ways to Circular Quay and city. Shopping is possible in North Sydney supermarkets which are 10 minutes away.

Millie answers very fast and is helpful in everything although there is (nearly) nothing that needs to be explained because of all the information Millie gives to you.

Would definitively love it to stay again in Millies studio!

Thank you again,
cheers Chris

n'hésitez pas à choisir l'appartement de Sally sur Sydney, l'emplacement est ideal pour ceux qui veulent avoir la ville sans dépenser en moyens de transports.
l'appartement est tel qu'indiqué , propre, lave-linge , seche linge avec wifi et netflix  et piscine et spa à disposition , pour un maximum de 4 personnes.
les indications et communications avec Sally sont claires et nettes , à recommander!
Excellent place to use as a launch pad for all of Bondi. Very clean and the view from the patio is excellent. The coffee and tea was a nice touch! Highly recommend.

We spent 10 days in this lovely space while at at Mardi Gras and could not have been happier.  Very short walk to hop on train, amazing neighborhood with great cafes, Saturday market in the park across the street on weekends.  12 minute walk to Oxford Street.  Loved it!
The location was amazing and Coffee was very welcoming, but the food stench in the entire place was awful. Otherwise, I'd totally recommend this place!

We LOVED this apartment so so tidy and clean , simplistic and stunning 
Thank you so much to great host also was helpful and very quick to answer phone etc

Natasha was a great host. 
Arrangements were made in case I arrived when she wasn't home but in the end they weren't need. 

Natasha was very welcoming and the house was well presented. Them room was also very nice.

This is a great location! Close to the cruise docks, ferry and the train. We walked to the opera house and had fun exploring the area. Took the train to other places as our main transportation, including to the airport at the end of our stay. The appartment has lots of room and fully stocked kithcen. The bed was very comfortable and there were plenty of towels. A washer and dryer was a bonus. Great place and location for the price!
Great space, good size, nice and clean, quiet, good location, air con (needed during summer months).
Phan responses quickly. The location is close to Central station (only 5 min walk), Woolworth supermarket (only 3 min) and China town (only 8 min). It is very convenient and we enjoy our stay.

I travelled from Brisbane to Sydney for a function in Manly and the location of Paul's place was fantastic. I was able to easily manage my luggage from the Manly ferry to the accommodation. Clean, neat, and all that was required.

Loved this place! For all it's character, space, location. Everything we wanted was close by and easily accessed by foot or public transport right at the door. Such a groovy space. Looks like a great team that run it, they were all so easy to communicate with.
Nice place, really central to a lot of features, nicely styled inside.

As you enter this comfortable apartment, it gives you a hearty welcome as you discover the many wonders of Sydney. Other add on's of this visit include a gym if you need a work-out and a wonderful pool that proves a fundamental as part of the torrid atmosphere of the city. The bedrooms are absolutely stunning! All the sheets are clean and the room itself is magnificently spotless. It is located at a perfect spot, with the closeness of the best 5 star hotel! A clear cut stay that's worthwhile!
Beautiful modern clean house with friendly helpful hosts. Location could not be more central in Bondi. Had an amazing stay - highly recommend.
Great flat, close to public transportation. Hernan was very nice and let us drop our bags off before chek-in. Would recommend a 100%
I had an awesome stay at Nathan's home. He was very easy to work with and I'm happy I got to stay here
We couldn't have asked for more.  :)  Great host, location, and oh so comfortable!

Shuang's place is a really good distance from the airport, thus making it a convenient location to stay for that reason. The space was clean, and the bathroom was modern and large. Not much else to do around there, but if you're staying for the airport it's great.

It would be difficult to overestimate how fantastic Hannah was as a host. We arrived in Sydney having been let down only 24 hours before arriving when our previous host gave us a late cancellation. We needed a property that could accommodate five children and Hannah came up trumps.
Hannah remained in constant contact with us throughout that stressful arrival day and offered us her house for the week. She was an absolute lifesaver and rescued our holiday. (For the record, Lisa Peterson of L'Abode Accommodation let us down with the cancellation and never inquired about our welfare throughout our stay in Sydney !)
Onto the house, it was beautiful, well equipped and a perfect location. Hannah and her family greeted us on our arrival and made us feel at home. We did not need anything extra and had a fantastic stay. We exchanged a couple of mails with Hannah during the week and knowing she was available was great.
The shops are close - supermarkets / restaurants and it was quick and easy access to the City. Great spot.
As I previously said, Hannah went out of her way to assist us and we are so grateful. Her house is perfect and if we are in Sydney again, I wouldn't hesitate to call Hannah again. 10 / 10......

Lisa Peterson of L'Abode accommodation was just appalling. Just imagine arriving in a city 12,000 miles from home (Sydney from London) with a wife and five kids and having no accommodation, with it being cancelled just six hours before you got on the plane, but email and with no personalized apology. Then magnify that issue with a host that just didn't (and obviously still doesn't care). This has really affected my view of Airbnb and I am not an advocate of the process, especially as I appear to be unable to warm other travellers about L'Abode Accommodation. I suppose Trip Adviser might assist but Airbnb should consider this for future.

This house is only 50 minutes from Sydney CBD and a 10 minute ferry/water taxi ride. It is literally on the beach and most rooms have fantastic views across the water. It is very relaxing and accommodating with everything you might need - just byo food and drink. After 3 days it felt like we had been away for a week. We would definitely come back again.

The landlord is very good, and then the house is very, very complete, and very clean. Well, we had a very nice few days' holiday here, and the landlord communicated with each other very promptly and had a very friendly reception. I would like to recommend it to others.

This is a fantastic situation. Located right across the street from the lake. Tracy offered us bicycles to use on the lake path. The apartment has everything you need and is very spacious. Short drive to the ocean beach for surfing and swimming. Kitchen well equipped. 
Tracy was very informative and engaging. 
We really enjoyed our stay!
Wonderful host, lovely space, great location. This property has it all.
It was a perfect stay. The location was great as was the friendly service. It was meticulously clean and had the most comfy bed IVE EVER SLEPT ON!!!
Expect a clean, modern and cosy home in a great location!

My family and I stayed in this apartment over the weekend. It was the first time I had booked with Airbnb - communication and assistance from our hosts was fantastic throughout the booking process and our stay. The apartment was clean and tidy.
