You really can’t beat the location - close to central station, only a block from secure parking and a short walk to Darling Harbour.

Vivian's place is lovely :) The apartment is stylish and really beautifully appointed. Everything is new and shiny! Vivian was responsive and lovely to deal with. Anything I needed, she followed up. It was a good location and close to the beautiful Bronte Beach and public transport. It was a really great experience staying at Vivian's place, I thoroughly recommend it to others!
We booked several Air Bnb's throughout our trip, this was the best one!
Easy access, close to everything and incredible veiw.
Thankyou Miss D, easy check in and accommodation exactly as described. Room and bedding comfortable and clean. Great handy location. Host provided good information and excellent communication.
Stayed with Hernan for the second time in as many weeks – great host, makes everything very easy and the perfect spot to get a good night’s rest before a flight.

Paul & Judith were wonderful hosts - we enjoyed staying with them in their beautiful home! We also loved the small conversations with them - they were so nice & open to answer all our questions : ) But they also respected our privacy. The location is perfect - so close to many good restaurants, bars & cafés. Highly recommended!

Can't say enough good things about this place. It's in one of the most beautiful spots in Sydney, with a gorgeous, sheltered North-east aspect looking over Barrenjoey Island. The house makes the most of the space - with beautiful and ample outdoor spaces to enjoy the view, and a gorgeously landscaped garden. It's even nicer than the photos if that's possible.

The house is full of character and very stylishly appointed, yet relaxed and beachy enough so you feel at ease - and OK with kids!

The treehouse bedroom is spectacular and we loved how it was decorated :-)

Richard and Claudia have thought of everything - there's filtered tap water, coffee pods, and even a rice cooker which we used. 

We absolutely loved the fire pit - we were staying in July and were surprised at how much heat it gave as we sat around it watching the moon rise and the stars come out.

Mackeral Beach itself is stunning - so nice to have peace from cars, and go for a bush walk on Sunday to Resolute Beach. The ferry was an easy way to travel, as was the water taxi.

A wallaby came to visit us on the first night which was lovely. 

Richard was so nice and helpful to deal with via email and texts. 

Basically, we all want to move here! Falling short of that, we'll definitely be back for a holiday.

We were warmly greeted by the owner Gregory, who showed us the studio and provided useful information like where to eat, distances to regions etc. The studio was immaculate – very clean & stylishly decked out. The studio includes thoughtful touches such as: maps and travels guides of Sydney, wifi, iPod/iPhone sound system adapter, beach towels, soaps, shampoo/conditioner, hair dryer, iron. The kitchenette was complete with amenities and complimentary food: oats, yoghurt, orange juice, fruit, milk, coffee. The studio is in a gorgeous garden setting. Its quiet and located just 5 min walk from the beach and 3 min walk from the delicious Three Blue Ducks. We would definitely recommend booking Bronte B & B Studio.

Great location for a 8-10 min stroll to the beach, plenty of cafes and shops much closer. Spacious place with great master bedroom, but small and uncomfortable (double) sofa bed in lounge - may be better to book a proper 2 bed place if you need two proper beds.

Stayed in Leanne's Queenscliff apartment for 3 weeks during a 5 week work stay in Sydney. Apartment was absolutely first class, great location so close to Manly and surrounding beaches. Leanne was a fantastic host, meeting me on check in and showing me around. Couldn't fault anything about the apartment, lovely neighbours, secure parking. I would 100% recommend Leanne's apartment to anyone looking to enjoy Manly and the surrounding area. As a hostess, Leanne epitomised the Airbnb values.

This was a lovely, charming place to stay. I absolutely loved it. The place was very clean and comfortable and I immediately felt at home. The bed was very comfortable, and there was an electric blanket underneath the linens so the bed was nice and warm (I was here in the winter so this was REALLY nice to have). There was also a little space heater, so it was very comfortable. There was a lovely breakfast set-up with cereal, tea and coffee, and a water boiler. There were fresh flowers on the table and Cathy had written a nice welcoming note. Cathy also drove me to one of my events (I was here for a wedding) when Uber didn't work. It was a lovely stay and I will definitely stay here again if I return!

I had a fantastic stay with Larry and Casey.
Comfortable, clean and airy light-filled space. Great location and lovely hosts.
Would highly recommend and hope to be back.
Susan's garden cabin was very comfortable and private. Susan was very helpful if I needed anything and the location was good.

We loved staying at Paul's place! He was very responsive and it is obvious that a lot of thought and care has been put into making the apartment feel airy and liveable. The location could not be more central and we had two excellent dinners at some of the many restaurants in easy walking distance. Thanks again, Paul.

I stayed Hugo's place for five weeks. Few minutes to Kings Cross Station or takes only about 20min to CBD. Great place for exploring Sydney. There is almost everything you need in the room. Public washing machine is located in down stairs you will need three one dollar coins to use washing machine. Unfortunately I could not use internet for 4weeks due to failure but Hugo gave me a refund for recharge my data-usage for hotspot.
The facilities were all as expected, convenient and would consider staying again if in same location
Gorgeous host and such a lovely comfortable room. Very flexible with my arrival.

It was great to stay at Linda's. Linda was kind enough to answer all of our request! We arrived at Sydney late night of Christmas eve so couldn't go for buying food or something. So Linda did shopping for us! We could have enjoyed great christmas dinner thanks for Linda ;) and House located near downtown, so we could walk to Darling Habour very easily. There was some trouble though. There was a black out for an hour, and we could'nt use Wifi. Linda was very sorry for those problem, so she give us USB for internet. She said she was waiting for Wifi installation and it will be available soon. I will stay at Linda's if I go Sydney again! ;)
Top hosts. Great apartment in a brilliant location. Really well set up and sparkling clean. Strongly recommended.

Allisons and co were awesome. The place was perfect for me. I just needed a couple of nights in Newtown with some similar aged people. Was a very relaxed and independent vibe. One of housemates was very nice and even invited me out with her friends. I felt very welcomed although with a good dose of space and privacy. Perfect 5/5. Oh and it was my first air bnb stay :) 
Thanks Allison and co!
Beautiful views and a great location
Great space in a fun lively location in Sydney, amazing view of the city, and very clean!

Tracey’s studio was exactly as described plus it was very clean and comfortable.
It suited our requirements including easy parking and close to major facilities.
I highly recommend this property and will be back

Great little apartment in Sydney. Super close to Kings Cross area for restaurants and bars. As well as several local cafes around. Not a bad walk into the actual city city (20-25mins depending on pace/destination and route). Communication was really good and we were able to leave our bags until our flight (obviously subject to booking demands). Convenient transport links nearby as well. Makes for a very good base to explore Sydney!

The property in hombush needs some considerable work done. An review as previously mentioned by other visitors including repairing if the lounge, removal of stains and unblocking of the shower drain need to occur. Also access on the weekend was difficult with nil entry to the main reception to “find” the key as there was no door man present.  Thinking these are isolated events might entice others to believe this should be fixed however we have experienced the same issues as another guest from 2 months ago. Communication was limited and only began after direct contact with air b&b. On a slighty better note the city view was beautiful which I got to enjoy all night as a fault battery in the cupboard alarmed every 30min.

Bailey has been an absolutely perfect host - he has gone out of his way by providing everything you would need to stay here. The house is amazing and the views and location are spectacular. It is all of the little things that made our holiday feel just like home. I would highly recommend staying here with families and friends.

Cat wasn't there to meet us but we had a fantastic time! The house was a comfortable distance from the hustle and bustle of the centre of Bondi, and only a short walk away from the sea side. Cat's Neighbours were also really friendly and hospitable. Ready to offer us assistance whenever. The heating in the house was great during winter and the wifi was fantastic! The check in process was quick. The kitchen and pantry were really well stocked and the houses was prepped to perfection with small thoughtful things like an international plug adaptor that we had forgotten to bring. Thanks Cat for the lovely stay!!
Fabulous apartment! Great views, super comfy bed, deep bathtub, excellent central location. Very detailed instructions and fast response and support from Hugo. Highly recommended.
It is a lovely place! Thank you very much for having me Wendy!
Easy check-in and out, Susan is very friendly and helpful. :)
Great apartment close to the centre of town

We were warmly welcomed by Michy to the lovely cabin which is modern, comfortable, clean and beautifully decorated.  We had everything we required. The Pittwater area is just stunning and we enjoyed exploring the surrounds, eating out and checking out the boating scene.  We had a fabulous weekend and can definitely recommend staying here.
Helen and Mike are very nice and hospitable and I enjoyed the clean and quite room during my trip. Thank you very much. Hope to be your guest again next time when I am back to Sydney :)
Gut ausgestattet, tolle Lage, zentru (Hidden by Airbnb) ah. Super Kontakt mit Gastgeberin.
A lovely, clean and spacious apartment right on Hyde Park. We loved the apartment and the little touches - a hand written note and fresh flowers. Thanks for having us, Desiree
Hugo was easy to communicate and a great host - would recommend.
A great room to hang out in around Sydney. Was close to Newtown and plenty of restaurants and shops. We walked everywhere.

Despite being one of the smaller Airbnbs we’ve stayed in this holiday this is one of my favourites. Well located, easy check in and it feels very cosy when you come in, especially after a flight. I appreciated the nice touches like plenty of breakfast supplies and the strawberries, and Michele was very communicative

Marcella was fantastic at communicating with us. She arranged for early cleaning & check in. Great location ! Couple of minutes to the beach. Excellent location for going into Sydney to see the sites. Also convenient to airport.
Good location, clean and comfortable apartment. Would recommend.
Fantastic place, far better than the photos show. Great location just out of the hustle of the CBD. Highly recommended.

Me and my wife have spent a very nice week at Jenny's apartment. Studio was clean, well-equipped with everything that we needed. Location is very good, close to the public transport, just a few minutes walk to the Kings Cross station. There are lots of bars, restaurants, supermarket in the neighborhood.
Jenny and Simon are a very nice and helpful. Check in was quick and nice, despite it was a late evening. Summarizing - everything was perfect. We hope to be back to Sydney and this lovely place.

Wir haben uns sehr wohl und willkommen gefühlt! Die Beschreibungen von der Unterkunft und dem Umfeld haben definitiv nicht zu viel versprochen. In 20 min. ist man bequem in der Innenstadt mit dem öffentlichen Nahverkehr, fußläufig gibt es mehrere Cafes und die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich, aufgeschlossen und stets mit einem guten Tipp zur Stelle. Wir würden definitiv gerne wieder kommen, sollte es uns erneut nach Sydney verschlagen. Absolut empfehlenswert!
Great location and fantastic host! Highly recommended!
great spot. super easy and clean and had everything I needed. would gladly recommend
A great place, close to public transport, supermarket and olimpic park.

We had a nice stay, the place is close to public transport which brings you downtown in 10-15min. Andrea's room and ensuite bathroom were very clean. Andrea was very nice and acomodating, I would definitely stay there again.
Wenige Minuten vom Bahnhof redfern entfernt, dadurch alle Sehenswürdigkeiten leicht erreichbar. Ruhige Umgebung. Geschäfte und Lokale alle zu Fuß erreichbar
Near to public transit

An amazingly great location -- couldn't be better!  But if you are hoping for something above "very basic", this isn't it.  The bed is VERY SOFT - very very soft and the place is desperate for some basic upgrades - wouldn't take muchto make it significantly better.

We really enjoyed our stay at Laura's apartment. It was clean, cosy and had an amazing view of the city. We made good use of the local ferry, which was only  a short walk from the apartment. Laura was a helpful and friendly host.
Great location, easy to deal with host and clean apartment
Hugo and Ollie made my first air BnB experience a good one, clean tidy apartment close to everything.. would recommended to others for sure!
离机场很近,走路就可以,先上天桥再过大桥,步行十七八分钟可到｡要去市区环形码头等地方,可以走十来分钟到火车站上车直达｡这片都是住宅区,独栋小别墅,很漂亮,晚上睡觉安静｡

It is an old building with three flights of stairs to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) is difficult although Paul does provide a street parking permit for when you get a spot.
The apartment is old but pleasant. Sleeping was very hot and uncomfortable
because of the time of year with no air conditioning or fans.
Location is excellent only a short walk to the ferry terminal, beaches, shops, cafes and restaurants.

Nice place in a great location.

This is a flat in a great location. Minutes only from the beach, public transport and of course, the cafes of Bondi Beach. The flat is well laid out and well suits someone staying in the local area. 

Sarah was a great host. We had a few initial issues but she was very efficient and courteous in resolving them. Her directions to get to the flat and the keys was terrific and worked like a dream. 

Well worth considering for your stay in Bondi
Loved it. Great family home
I really enjoyed my stay at David's place. He is very helpful and friendly host. The room is really comfortable and clean. Definitely will stay here again if I visit Sydney one day.

We had a lovely stay at MissD's home. It is very close (3 minute walk) to King Street for eats and drinks, as well as Enmore Theatre which was where we went for the evening. The home was clean, the bed and pillows were very comfortable, the towels were fluffy, and there are two clean and bright bathrooms. We will stay there again.
The house has everything you need and more.  wonderful location just steps away from great coffee and. rea shops and a stroll to the beach. s
I come to Sydney 4 times a year and this is always my #1 destination. But it's so popular that it's always booked out 6 to 9 months in advance for long term stays! Highly recommended!
I loved my second stay at Jackie and Martin's place. They're such kind people and the place is simply amazingly comfortable :)

I loved my time at Steven's place. Close to everything, neat, clean with little touches of luxury (can't compete with a waterfall shower head) - this is the AirBnB pick for you if you're searching for a slice of home in the big city. Steven is extremely welcoming and friendly, and if you're not familiar with the area, he'll soon fill your head with all sorts of inside tips and places to eat. Don't miss out on this Petersham paradise.

What I loved: 
*The freedom to come and go as I pleased with ease via the side gate.
*The bed was super comfortable. 
The villa is an ideal space for writers, professionals or anyone looking to get away on their own. Works for couples too. 
*The proximity to some of my old-school favourites, including Daisy's Milkbar.

A lovely place to stay, much better than I expected .
The living room is very large with a wonderful TV program.

We loved our stay. The  apartment is super-stylish, quiet, relaxing and really well appointed with all the bits and pieces required to make it feel like a home from home (a superb bed AND fast wifi). The "welcome pack" of fruit, bread, milk and eggs with tea and coffee (Nespresso - thank you Louise!) were more than welcome for a couple of weary travellers. The apartment's location is perfect - smack-bang in the middle of Woollahra village with it's lovely shops, pubs and coffee places and a hop, skip and a jump into the CBD. It is perfectly located if you are planning to spend some time in the Eastern suburbs of Sydney.  To top it all off, Louise was very responsive and really helpful. Thanks a lot Louise, if you'll have us, we will be back the next time we are in Sydney.

Une excellente adresse à Sydney, idéalement placée : à quelques centaines de mètres du train ou du ferry!Que demander de plus? Peut être une coupe de champagne à déguster sur le balcon en admirant au loin( pas si loin!) le Magnifique Harbour Bridge!!! A ne pas rater!!;merci Millie,!!!

I couldn't have wished for a better start to my trip to Australia.lilian and her entourage where exceedingly friendly ,welcoming and helpful.the room was very elegant in a reduced style.everything  was kept spick and span.you needed sunglasses IN the house for every surface was (Website hidden by Airbnb) was a lovely experience.hope we meet again and best of luck with your projects ,lilian!

My cousin and I stayed here for a couple nights in August 2015. It's a crazy short walk from Central Station, which makes it easy to get just about anywhere in the city and really handy if you're getting the train from the airport because the airport link stops at Central. The place was exactly as it looks in the photos: clean, spacious and filled with light. Nicole was lovely to deal with from start to finish and I said to my cousin that I'll definitely look this place up again next time I need a place in Sydney!

The Bronte B&B Studio is a little gem in a beautiful seaside neighbourhood, and yet with good transportation links to the CBD.  The accommodation is exactly as pictured, and is very peaceful, being in the garden of Susan and her husband's lovely home.  Our hosts were extremely welcoming and helpful, telling us about local restos, public transit into the city, and calling taxis when we needed a faster mode of transportation.  The breakfast provisions provided were generous and healthful, and we appreciated Susan remembering that we are vegetarians.  If you want a relaxing stay in Sydney, near a beach, the Bronte B&B Studio is the ticket, and Susan and her husband are great hosts.  Highly recommended.

Staying at Austin's house is a real treat. It looks awesome, like in the pictures and you are welcome to use all the facilities, including the outside entertainment area with bbq and pool! Austin is a very polite and caring host. He wants everyone to enjoy their stay and answers all questions immediately. Canterbury train station is just a short walk away, as is Woolworths and Aldi. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks for everything, Austin.
Amazing place, super close to the beach! Extremely clean and secure

I absolutely loved staying here, the hosts are amazing and the location is great. The house has great charm about it and I loved how the neighborhood  is so neat and quite, yet so close to shops, restaurants, cafes, and public transportation for city access. I had access to buses within a few min walk. The room was great, private and comfortable. The dogies are very nice and kind if you like dogs. Overall, amazing stay, would love to come back for sure.
The reservation was canceled 101 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Ven was very welcoming. The place was quiet and clean with all the amenities required. Very convenient for Nepean hospital and an easy walk to the shops.

Gwennaelle's has been an amazing host to us for the 2 nights we stayed in Bondi, she had been so  accommodating to our needs: due to circumstances we had to stay another night and she was more than happy to host us which was so kind of her! Her place is stunning and super clean with great amenities! Overall we had an amazing time at her appartment, which was also a short walk from Bondi Beach and really nice restaurants! Would come back, highly recommend to stay here if you're looking for a great host in Bondi.

If your looking for an ideal location with an easy walk to Bronte, Tamarama or Bondi beach; I highly recommend staying here! Very comfortable and convenient! 
Thank you Marcela for your Hospitality!

Fantastic, central location in Darlinghurst and within walking distance to lots of sights. As mentioned by previous reviews, the stairs are very steep but for people without mobility issues it should be no problem. Comfortable beds, stylish fit-out, inventive use of natural light and well-equipped for our long weekend in Sydney. No doors on two of the en suites was not hugely ideal for family/friend stay but we made it work perfectly fine and for couples it likely wouldn't have been an issue. Friendly hosts and easy check-in. Would highly recommend.
Great place and awesome location next to some great food. Cat was easy going and flexible on arrival and check out.

A beautiful moment was spent in Cath's Garden Studio from the warm welcome received from Cath, Chips the in-training guidedog and, the 3 chickens, her scrumptious breakfast hamper and an arranged portacot for our toddler. The studio was fully equipped and beautifully styled. Our privacy was respected. We will definitely be staying again on our next Sydney visit. Thank you Cath
There are some things you will be pleased with here but the cleanliness, clutter, kitchen facilities, bedding, crockery and plates will not be what you will enjoy, I'm sorry.

Natasa is a very amazing and lovely host. She was very warmful and helpful, always up for giving advice or to chat. The house is very well located : close to Petersham station so very easy to go to the center (but without any noise from the room). The room is spacious and nice!  And the kitchen (we enjoyed the terrace ;-)  and the bathroom are very well furnished and you have enough space to put all your personal stuff. 
We had a very great stay so thank you again Natasa !!!
房东很热情,房子环境比较好,很安静,最吸引我的还是房间的私密性,全力推荐｡

The place was fantastic
Would recommend to anyone
Great place, very convenient, clean, close to cafes and shops etc and transport into town. Stephen was a great host who responded quickly when we needed help and was flexible with meeting us.
I've stayed at Dino's place before and enjoyed it again this time. Lovely apartment in a great location!

We loved how Simon and Nicole's apartment was so close to the city and Central Station. We were in amongst the trendy cafes and restaurants and a quick walk took us to the train station so we could go anywhere we wanted very easily!
Jack and Hayley were great hosts. I felt welcome, the room was comfortable. No problems at all.

This apartment was a good choice for the provided amenities and convenient location. The walking distance to shops and cafes in Glebe was awesome for a visitor from out of town.

The fact that this apartment is on the first floor made air movement and noise in the evenings a little bit of an issue, but for the value that is just something to consider.

Overall this was a good experience!

Cindy is a really kind host and I loved to stay at her place. The room is cozy and perfect for one person.  Coogee beach is not far away and if you need to get to the city centre, then there is a bus stop just around the corner.  I would recommend and return again.
Good place to stay
Go to place close to the airport. Stylish and easy check in.
Great condition and it was a quite place!!

This place is pure magic! I had the most wonderful time with family and we had everything we needed in the house. The location the quiet and friiendly neighbourhood and the spectacular view of the ocean day and night makes this place a MUST to experience. Add to that a gracious host to welcone you and who is always around to assist. Highly recommended for families!

La casa está increíble, llena de detalles y arte. Me encantan las casas antiguas y esta estaba hermosa. El vecindario es de lo mejor, es muy relajado y seguro. Tienes parada de autobús muy cercana y puedes llegar caminando a tiendas y restaurantes, el barrio vale mucho la pena recorrerlo.
Casey y Larry fueron excelentes anfitriones.
El cuarto en muy amplio y cuentas con un baño al lado que solo es para esa habitación. En la habitación podías prepararte café o té, está muy iluminada y es bastante amplia.
Hay que subir muchas escaleras y te lo avisan con antelación, para nosotros estuvo muy bien.
Lindos detalles en la habitación y el baño, realmente teníamos todo lo necesario.
Pudimos lavar algo de ropa y eso fue muy bueno para nosotros.
Es un hermoso hogar  que Casey y Larry compartieron con nosotros.
Highly recommended if you are looking for a place to explore the Northern Beaches. Great location and we had a lovely comfortable stay. Cathy was a great host!

Beautiful apartment, close to a large Coles. Take a good coffee at the coffee shop on the entrance of the shopping mall.
Apartment is well equipped and offers a lot of space. Neighborhood is perfect and Green Square station is about 10mins walk and offers fast transport to the city.
Good location. Better then I spect
Good value, great location at Olympic Park, good view and very good coffee down the road. Will use again.

Fei and Jia were very welcoming, generous and friendly hosts. Their home has a unique history and they continue this in their care for it. It is truly beautiful. The room was spacious and comfortable with our own balcony. Great transport links. We very much hope to return.

The place is lovely and Susan very nice and welcoming.
Everything was clean and quiet
Definitely recommend!

Jared & Diana were wonderful hosts, were easy to communicate with, welcoming and happy to help in any way they could. The apartment is situated above a shopping precinct which was very convenient and was surprisingly very quiet! Highly recommend!
A great location but comes with very noisy traffic as it is on a round about on a main road.
Perfect AirBnb! Highly recommend.
My son stay overnight. He mentioned that the host had great hospitality and easy to check in.  We had great experiences.
Very much recommend this place.

We spent a week (during New Year's Eve) at Dj place. Everything was perfect : room clean with terrace and bathroom clean. Location is very good (restaurants, bars , bus connection, etcc). Definitely a place to stay. Bye Dj
Amazing holiday in Glebe. Very lovely house and very convenient. Close to the fish market and downtown. Thanks to the kindhearted landlord Bryan.
Very nice place

Looks just like in the photos, has everything you need (even fresh milk in the fridge!), clean, very central location right near Newtown station and surprisingly quiet with door closed or just tilted open, considering the busy street below. Also very good communication & quick resolution to an issue that arose with the downstairs lock. Definitely recommend!
just the perfect place to be edi makes you feel like home

Vickie is the best host, very friendly and kind. She gave us many advices about what to see, where to visit and how to get there, etc.
She took very nice care of us until the very end.

And of course, Vickie's place was nice. 
The room was cozy and clean.
Close to restaurants, transportations and others you may need for staying.

We definitely recommend this host and place.

Miss D was very responsive and helpful. I was amazed at how prompt she responded to all my queries. She also went an extra mile to always ensure that I was fully satisfied with the answers provided. I remember asking for a last minute change on the room setup as I had an extra friend joining us in the trip and she tried her best to accommodate my friend so we could all stay together. 

When I requested Miss D for an earlier check in, she also accommodated to my request. She even messaged me to ensure that I had no problem in checking in to the house. Throughout our short stay in Miss D's, she always ensured that we were comfortable and had all the necessities available and ready. Miss D was very friendly and exceptionally accommodating to her guests' request and feedback. 

I and my friend really liked the place! It was clean, organised, and very cosy. The room that we stayed in was also spacious even when there were 4 of us. The bathroom was clean. The house was very organised. I and my friend were so impressed that Miss D labelled everything so properly in the kitchen and put notes around the house which were helpful for visiting guests, who came from outside Sydney.

This was my first airbnb stay and I could not stop advocating this place to all my other friends :) I would without any hesitance come back again if I am to visit Sydney in the future. Thank you so much for making our stay a pleasant one. I am looking forward to visiting again in the future.

Cheers! :)

Wayne and Kate were so helpful,efficient and responsive from my first request. The apartment was great and in a fantastic position. Everything we needed was supplied including a bottle of champagne to welcome us - we are here for a family wedding so the best way to start. The balcony is a joy and such a social area.   If we ever have the chance would certainly book again.
Stunning location, great hosts

This apartment was so convenient and comfortable for our 3 night stay. Straight forward to access, with really clear instructions to follow. Incredibly handy to Darling Harbour and an easy walk tot he train station for travelling further a field. The pool was a welcome relief from the heat after long days exploring / shopping around Sydney. 
The space itself is much larger than other 1 bedroom apartments I have stayed in and was very comfortable. I would recommend this apartment to others heading to Sydney. I couldnt fault it!

Evelyn's place was stunning. Very thoughtful touches in the rooms, including a bottle of wine to enjoy! Avalon had incredible food and coffee, and palm beach was a great place to explore. It's about a 15-20 minute walk to Avalon, but well worth the walk. Transit is also very easy to get to/from the home, including trips to Palm beach and Sydney. My girlfriend and I had thoroughly enjoyed our stay, and would definitely come back!
Ziggy's place is excellent.

Best airbnb place we have stayed yet. The room was really spacious and it had it's own private lounge room. Lovely area to sit outside and great location, close to so many nice beaches. Tess and Rod were lovely and very friendly and helpful. Would recommend this place to everyone.

Hospitality, First Class. 
Accommodation, First Class, 
We were made to feel special. Our first taste of Air BNB. 
George & Lucia`s Granny Flat will be hard to beat. They really have set the bar high. Nothing is too much trouble.
Thanks
Mick Hartley& (son) Jack .
The house looks fantastic! Bus stops just at the corner and there are lots of restaurants and bars nearby. Hosts are friendly and willing to help.

Vivian's place is perfect! Next to the beach and super clean.
I loved!
Great location, clean and a lot of space

Angela and Geoff were so welcoming. It was lovely, comfortable, spacious yet cosy and very relaxing. You don't want for anything in this little sanctuary as everything is already thought out for you. Truly feel like you're in a home away from home. Pictures are exactly how you find it. Location is very convennient too. Thank you so much!!!
很棒的公寓,去哪里都很方便｡房东很热心｡
Cute place! Very homely and Steven is super welcoming.
Great location in the centre of Sydney. Chloe was very accomodating to us, allowing us a late checkout so that our 1-year-old could have a nap.

I am grateful to Angela for her help- I was in a rush to find a place to stay, and I am glad I found her home. She very swiftly communicated with me in regards to how to reach her home. What's more, she has a lovely, tidy, and clean home. Thank you so much for accommodating me at basically a moment's notice! Her home is not too far from the airport, which is best reached by car (I used Uber).
Suzanna was lightning fast at responding and a delight to deal with. The place is very clean, new and close walking distance to the sights of Sydney. Best Airbnb place I've stayed at.

A great location in the lively town of Newtown - under 5 minute walk to the train which gets you to central Sydney very quickly, lots of shops and restaurants around.  And a lovely apartment - clean, nice layout.  Check-in is very easy and communications are great.  Highly recommended.

Paul et Judith se sont immédiatement montrés très accueillants et chaleureux. Ils n'ont pas hésité à converser avec nous, nous ont donné des conseils quant aux transports en commun et ils s'intéressaient à ce que nous faisions la journée. Nous avions même le droit à du pain frais tous les matins. Le quartier était conforme à nos attentes: proche du centre-ville en utilisant les transports en commun et très tranquille pour y dormir. Une adresse à recommander les yeux fermés!

Fantastic place in surry hills. Very easy to check-in, as Simon and Nicole were waiting for me at the loft. 
The place is well designed, very bright and large. 
I would go back anytime!

Big thanks to Sarah for her accomodation! We had a great time staying at her Airbnb. The place is in a nice peaceful area which is near the Norwest Business Park where you will find lots of shops and restaurants. It is also close to public transport. Sarah was very helpful with everything. Highly recommend this Airbnb to everyone!
House was warm and decor fantastic. Had a great stay. Cat communicated promptly throughout.
Fantastic place to stay if you are after something a little different. Beautiful bush setting and lovely hosts. Very well recomended

Wonderful studio in a secluded spot at the rear of a beautiful garden. We had a private outdoor table. Delicious breakfast with yummy muesli and fresh fruit. Lovely soft towels and even beach towels were included. 

The studio is a short 8-10 minute walk to Bronte beach and the coastal walks to either Bondi or Coogee.

Cafes and restaurants are only a few minutes walk away.

Our hosts are friendly with a wonderful welcoming. Highly recommend this as a place to stay. We look forward to returning.
Great place to stay!

I had a LOVELY time staying here! We kept to ourselves in the private room which overlooked the city.

The coffee machine was an awesome touch and we felt very welcomed the entire time. Looking forward to staying again!

It was a short enjoyable trip thanks to Wyatt. Thank you for his hospitality and warmth welcome to his home. Wyatt is very easy-going and comfortable to get along with. We shared and exchanged quite a bit of interest in common and thanks to Airbnb I have made a new friend :)

We spent 10 days at Paul's and Judith's house and felt welcomed from the very first moment. The house is very nice and in a great location. There're many restaurants around and a bus stop just by the corner. The room and bathroom are  spacious, clean and nicely decorated.
Paul and Judith, as well as the rest of the family, were very nice, friendly and interesting to talk to. They also gave us many tips about things to do and places to visit in Sydney. We shared many good times with them and we would definitely book this room again.
Highly recommended!

Great location! 5 min walk to Circular Quay and the Sydney Opera House. We were able to walk and take public transportation to all the sights. 

The studio was spacious for our family of 3. The bathroom is a bit small but it worked. The bed was comfy and there were plenty of pillows and towels.
A nice CBD location close to the business district for business travellers. Nice location with lots of local places to dine.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Unit 2 is in a great location but we were very disappointed with the poor level of cleanliness in the bathroom & kitchen.
Amazing place, friendly host and good in value
Accoglienza buona.posizione ottima. Apt. Gradevolissimo
幾好,但地方距離市中心較遠遠

This is a great apartment with an awesome rooftop terrace and great sea view. Everything was brand new (Feb 2018) and barely used. Very comfortable for 2 couples. 

Great location close to the beach and all things you need to have in daily life are close by.
Definitely recommend a nice and clean place, best location.
A beautiful house in a great location! Furniture was very basic though. Could also use air-conditioning to help with the heat - although there are small fans everywhere.

Overall, this was a great space for our quick three night stay in Sydney.  The location was terrific for getting around the city either by train or on foot and the binder left by Paul gave some great suggestions of nearby places.  There were a few finer details missing that would have made the place feel more homey, but it was a terrific base to see Sydney from.  Thanks!!

Absoutely loved it ... 
loved it that much I'm booking it again. 
So close to everything and a beautiful home to nestle in and be away from the hustle and bustle .. 
I honestly didn't need to use my car at all cause everything is so close. 
And anything I wasn't sure about they helped me with right away. 
And make sure you check out the gorgeous coffee shop on the corner . 
Yummiest Italian food and nicest guys who own it .

We enjoyed our stay at Laura's place a lot. The ferry terminal to the city is just a few steps away, and the view is just overwhelming. It's a quiet and pretty neighborhood and shops, cafes, and restaurants are not too far away. The apartment is quite spacious and the kitchen has everything we needed. The instructions on where to find the key were a bit unclear to us at first, but in the end everything worked out well.

Helena’s place was ideal for my visit. Situated not far from the trendy neighbourhood and many eateries. The place also has balcony and great city scape views. Overall very enjoyable. Would love to stay again in the future. Helena was excellent and extremely prompt in communicating!

Elise responded very quickly and was a great host. The place was clean and provided all standard amenities. 
Walls must be thin as we could hear everything from the streets to next door neighbours. Other than that, convenient location and great accommodation. Would recommend. Thanks again Elise.
Great location, everything you need was provided.
Philip的房子非常棒!位置绝佳,可以步行到大多数景点,附近还有IGA超市,方便买东西｡房子里有各种生活用品,厨具,甚至煮饭的锅,我们很惊喜!Philip是个超级好的房东,非常大方和贴心,都能第一时间回复我们,帮我们解决问题｡希望下次有机会再来悉尼,再次入住!

Bill was a great host. He met us at the house and showed us around. He gave us a lot of tips. The house is amazing. So beautiful with everything you might need! We can definitely recommend staying here! It is beautiful!

Marcella is an awesome host, such a lovely friendly lady who made us feel most welcome
the accommodation was perfectly described and we throughly enjoyed staying there, we would have no reservations in recommending Marcella or this property to anyone

Hugo's friend was on hand to give us the keys and show us the apartment. He was really friendly and very helpful! The apartment was very clean, tidy and in a really good location. Hugo had also left out some tourist booklets for Sydney and the local area which was useful for us. Perfect for our 1st trip to Sydney!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Cassandra and David’s place. The location was amazing with an easy walk to parks and shops. Nice quiet streets, very family friendly. Well set up to accommodate two families especially with two car spaces. Inside it was modern and clean. Highly recommended.
Great place and location. Close to everything.

The room and bathroom were very clean and nicely decorated. It’s a very pretty area, close to plenty of bus stops and shops. 
Sam was very kind and helpful, I would’ve loved to get the chance to meet in person. Would definitely recommend!

Our second time staying at Susan’s place and it did not disappoint. Great hosts, central location with good transport, quiet stately neighbourhood and lots of special touches. Looking forward to our next visit!

A lovely lovely end terrace cottage. Beautiful inside and a picturesque courtyard outside.
Jennifer was a delightful hostess greeting us on arrival and showing us around. All communication was prompt. Lots of goodies left for us. near the main street so easy for the bus to city or ferry. Loved our stay.

Normally I find something that is wrong with an air b&b, just because I compare it to home.. This one is excellent. Our double room bed was comfy, our friends in the double decker bunk bed however said it was as if they were sleeping on the floor...

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Simone's beautiful house. Very spacious, with everything you could possibly need. The house was spotlessly clean, beds extremely comfortable and provisions left for us in the fridge. Also very convenient to local shops and only a bus ride away from the city. Wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Neils place is a treasure in the middle of paradise. Not much more to say, we just enjoyed our stay. Neil is a great host!

Steven was considerate! 
Bungalow is described accurately. 
Steven had female toiletries which is often over-looked and was nice to see. Place appeared nice and clean, had all the kitchen utilities I needed. Even brought me over some milk for a cup of tea!  Mosquitoes were apparently a bit of an issue, but I didn’t even notice as Steven had gone to measures to try and stop it from being a problem with sprays, creams ect. Had Everything for it and I wasn’t annoyed by one once. 
Just make sure you read about the smoking policy if you’re a smoker, as You must smoke on the street, off the property.  Was great for my quick stay. Thank you!
This was a terrific studio, with every little detail considered. Beautiful location across from the lake and a very private studio. Made to feel very welcome by Tracey and would highly recommend!
It’s a nice place. Everything is good.

I had a wonderful stay with Greg & Susan. Their Gorgeous little Chalet was just ideal for my stay. Greg & Susan certainly do accommodate for everything & so neat & clean . So close to shops, beach & cafés. I certainly would recommend their place for anyone wanting to stay in Bronty
Leone

We stayed at Griffin's space in Kings Cross/ Potts Point for a week and enjoyed it - the flat was bigger than I was expecting and being high up got beautiful light which we loved. It really had everything we needed. Griffin was very quick to respond to my messages and checked up on us mid week to make sure everything was fine which we appreciated. The location is fantastic being a couple of minutes to Kings Cross station and all the amenities the area has. The only thing I would mention is that being so central it can get a bit noisy in the flat, especially as the slatted window in the kitchen doesn't close as far as we could see and there was an air conditioning unit or something on the other side of it. But with ear plugs this didn't bother us too much and all the other excellent points more than made up for it. Thanks Griffin! Lucy and Ben
Great place to stay - amazing location! :)

Very friendly host that kept in touch throughout the booking phase as well as during the stay. Made everything easy which was great.The flat was ideal for a couple, very well laid out in a safe, quiet complex. Only 10 minute walk to Queenscliffe beach so ideal for someone looking to enjoy Manly and it's beach without being in the middle of everything.

Great location close to fantastic cafes, bars and eateries and to public transport.
Lovely home with very comfortable upstairs bedrooms.
Would definitely stay again!

I stayed at Stevens place for a few days whilst in Sydney for business. It was lovely and clean, stylish with homely touches. It’s in great location, only a 5 minute walk to the train station and shopping strip. Steven is very friendly and I highly recommend  his place to anyone visiting the area

A charming flat in an amazing location in Manly.
Had everything we needed for our stay, travelling with 2 children aged 7 and 3.
A great space to base ourselves for a few days, with access to several beaches within a very short walk which was ideal and close to shops and restaurants. Yet still in a quiet street so no nighttime disturbances.
Would love to stay again when next visiting Oz.
Thanks Paul for being a great host.
This place is best accommodation in Sydney.
Not bad, the breakfast is considerate. It’s near garden so there are lots of small insects and spiders, if you don’t mind, it’s a good option. And it’s near shops and restaurants as well
Clean and well presented
A unique experience. Amazing place. Not to be missed.

My partner and I Loved everything about Bronte b&b; the hosts were lovely, the accommodation perfectly clean and wonderful+, the neighbourhood quiet, picturesque and central.  Would definitely visit again.

My partner and I had the best stay at the Garden Studio, and hope to stay again one day. The space was beautifully and thoughtfully designed, and had everything we needed. We loved the generous breakfast spread and enjoyed fresh eggs and homemade bread both mornings, and slept so well in the loft bed. We had our car, and found Marrickville a really easy place to stay, it was very central to everywhere we needed to go (city, Surry Hills, Alexandria), and parking was easy.

Cath had also baked me the most beautiful white chocolate mud cake because she knew my birthday was coming up, and we arrived back to the studio one night to find a box of meringues waiting for us. I'd highly recommend the studio :)

Beautiful, enormous town house in a perfect location.  Within easy walking distance of the train station at  Kings Cross, the bars, restaurants and clubs on Oxford Street and even the centre of the city.  Stunning views of the city from the balcony outside the uppermost, Swiss-chalet style bedroom.  We had four adult males staying in the house and we all had plenty of space.  For a group of people, it's also very economical: much cheaper than trying to find a similar hotel suite for the same price.  Perfect for a short or extended stay in Sydney, and surprisingly tranquil for such a central location.  Small tip: if there are two or more of you, it's just as cheap to get a taxi from the airport than taking the train. Jeremy is also very friendly and helpful.
Highly recommended this place,Ziggy the host very friendly and gave us a very good thougher handover.Very central to all you need in Manly..will be back again one day
Amazing space love staying here and Neil and Jane make it so welcoming
The apartment was amazing. Perfect location. So comfortable and had everything we needed. Victoria was communicative and attentive. Would love to come back.
Great location. Walking distance to wharf, cafes beach shops. Nice and clean. Everything we needed for a family of four.
You cant find a better place to stay if you go to Sydney!
Fantastic little spot

My first trip to Sydney plus first Bnb experience were perfect thanks to Naveen and her husband Tris.  The neighborhood  was a great one where everything were so close and convenient, I actually had a number of my meals nearby and they were all very good.  The train was just 5 minutes away and we could get to almost anywhere within 40 minutes.   
Naveen and Tris are a cute couple, they were super helpful, I think I must have messaged Naveen 30 times throughout the trip asking questions from places to eat, to places to shop and visit.  They knew almost all the answers to my inquiries and on the rare occasions they would find it out for me in no time.  The main problem was not having enough time and appetite to visit all the great restaurants they recommended. 
As for the apartment, it is exactly what it looks like in the pictures, (which for me was the main reason I chose their place,) living in tiny apartments in Hong Kong, I find the place very spacious and all the necessary amenities were their for you on your arrival.  Their little pet Felix was also very friendly and is a great companion when the couple is out for work.
All in all, my first bnb experience was perfect and thanks to the couple, airbnb has a new loyal customer.
离机场很近  非常适合赶早班机的朋友们

Great location in Sydney. About a five minute walk from the harbour. It’s a small studio great for one or two people. There is a washer/dryer that I found super helpful since I ran the half marathon while I was visiting. It’s a good spot to stay a couple days in the city.

Shuang's place is beautiful! The room and bathroom are a substantial size and extremely clean. The comforter is SO comfortable! Shuang was also very prompt with providing directions and instructions immediately after booking and responded quickly thereafter. The Arncliffe train station is only a 10 minute walk and his place is conveniently located minutes from the airport. We stayed here due to an early  flight in the morning. This is a shared space with another Airbnb guest. Both rooms have private access and the door locks for extra security which gave us piece of mind. Overall great stay and highly recommended!

We had a great stay with Vickie. Check in was easy and she was very contactable and helpful throughout.  Tea and coffee making facilities appreciated.

Fold down bed was very comfy and made the most of the space within the room.  Also very stylishly decorates and (Hidden by Airbnb) TV was a great addition for watching Netflix.

Location was great, only a short walk to Kings cross station and loads of cool cafes close by.  Also worth noting is a shuttle to airport run by the hotel for only 14 dollars !!

We would happily stay there again.

Jeremy was a breeze to deal with during a challenging time for our family. We had a family member in St Vincent's hospital at very short notice and Jeremy's place is a few minute walk away. Restaurants, shops and the city are so close. Parking was wonderful and the location was safe and quiet. We were needy guests due to circumstance and Jeremy was very patience and kind and nothing was a problem. Thank you!

Great bed, excellent cooking facilities, quiet, close to all amenities and transport, everything you need and then add a sociable dog, (if you like to take one for a walk) a lake, beach and the occasional chat and you have Tracy's place! A perfect spot for two

The studio was very clean and welcoming, location was perfect as well. Vickie was very friendly, she came to greet us and show us the studio. Not suitable for cooking since the smell will stay in the studio, so we ate mostly around the neighbourhood which was perfectly fine with us since there are so many food options.

Nice and clean apartment, tastefully furnished in a very lively and interesting neighbourhood, and easy to reach with public transportation. Paul was an excellent and helpful host - very quick with communication when we needed it. Due to a delayed flight we had to check-in 15 hours later than planned, and Paul still made it possible, that was a real life saver - thank you, Paul! The bedroom window is not too far away from the street, so guests should not be too sensitive about acoustics from traffic driving by - but no problem with the crowd from Kings Cross which keeps a block away around the corner.

Really loved our stay at Kath's place. Convenient location as most trains go past Redfern, and only a one or two stations away from all the CBD goodness. The house is clean and tidy and her dog Ruski is just the sweetest!! The only thing I will say is if you're a light sleeper such as myself, it can be a bit noisy with the surroundings streets. However if thats not an issue for you then I highly recommend! :)

Dons place is wonderful absolutely loved it... it’s very stylish ideal for a couple.. it was also very clean and Don had left some lovely touches as it was stocked up with tea,coffee sugar even a bottle of milk which was definitely appreciated as we only arrived late at night. The apartment is ideally situated very close to bars and restaurants and also the train station... I would definitely recommend and I would love to stay here again... it was nice to know that Don was there and you know that you could call on him whatever the time day or night

This is a very comfortable room in a lovely little flat. It's in a great location - close to UNSW and Coogee Beach, and the 374 bus line into the cbd is right outside. 

Excellent value for money, great communication with Cindy - highly recommend.
Elise’s place is great! Easily accessible by public transport, with plenty of room, natural light and comfy beds.

We stayed here for 4 nights to attend a convention near by. 
Is a cute little granny flat. Close to everything. Na was a great host, easy to deal with. For how close it is to the highway, it was really quiet. Would stay here again

Amazing, beautiful and sophisticated house with beautiful paintings, fantastic kitchen, very hospital and lovely owner (Arnie and Lorraine), Very good location in a quiet and pretty street, possibility to get to the beach and city by bus, Thank you, Arnie and Lorraine :)

David's light and airy flat is situated just at the sweet spot on Macleay St between the grit and eclectic vibe of Kings Cross and the genteel delights of Potts Point. With the fountain across the street providing a constant bubbling soundtrack we spent a very enjoyable five nights with immediate Darlinghurst at our doorstep and, via KX station two minute walk out the door, greater Sydney. Our third person in our party wanted to report that the futon was one of the most comfortable she has ever slept on. David was helpful before arrival and met us on the door to walk us through the locking systems, easily mastered, of the semi-public courtyard setup of the building. Flat was comfortably and stylishly furnished and we were not lacking for any amenity. Very much recommended. Oh, he was flexible on our departure time as he had a late next arrival so this made our leaving that bit easier. Thx David.

Belinda's place is amazing for staying in Bundeena. Not only the garden studio itself is very cozy and comfortable, but the location is also great. It's very close to Jibbon beach and coast walk. It's very quiet and peaceful.

A great setup for families. Walking distance to the beach, a pool and a secure gated yard for the kids to play in. The accomodation itself is also perfect with two young families able to stay comfortably  good kitchen and bathroom facilities, a comfortable lounge area and indoor and outdoor dining options. We will definitely be back.

We only had a short stay for a a quick trip to Sydney. This place was perfect: clean, close to local shops, venues and well equipped with all the essentials and more. Lovely modern bathroom and comfy bed.
A lovely house in a great location with a very thoughtful and considerate host.  A real find!
Erins place is super nice with great hospitality.

Worst Airbnb experience ever! On arrival, the apartment was quite grubby and full of host's personal possessions with only 2 drawers left for the two of us over a fortnight. The fridge had half empty jars, food stains were all over the cabinet doors, and the place was dusty.
We had a disaster in that we accidentally left the keys in the apartment (that locks behind you!). We were unable to contact Ben for over 2 days as he had left the country without informing us - ending with us out on the street for hours, having to stay in a hostel overnight and eventually paying for a locksmith as we desperately needed our belongings. Ben was not even remotely apologetic once he finally got in contact with us. 
Once we asked him if it was possible for him to reimburse for the locksmith and other costs, he replied aggressively with snarky and unnecessarily nasty comments about our stay - saying we had left wet towels on the floor when actually we had left one wet towel in the laundry basket that we had used to clean the water from the leaking toilet that was a great inconvenience throughout our stay and has been a complaint from another guest. Also said we raked through his personal belongings which were against his 'rules', when actually we only used a couple of towels from a drawer since he only left us one bath towel for two people for a fortnight. Ben has also attempted to charge us 100AUD regarding a small stain on the bed sheet, which is a completely ridiculous price especially considering the fee that we paid for cleaning.
Furthermore, we asked where he would like his new keys to be left so he could get back in his apartment - to which eventually he said to 'leave them on the kitchen table'. This obviously doesn't make any sense and he only replied a few hours before our departure so we replied we would leave one of the keys in an envelope in his letterbox under his other mail. Only after we requested reimbursement days after we had left, he replied in a hostile manner that he had to pay for his own locksmith as we didn't leave him his key(?). 
Overall a dreadful experience that we wouldn't like anyone else to go through, as leaving the keys in an apartment when the door locks behind your back could essentially happen to anyone. This could have been handled far more efficiently & pleasantly if the host had actually been a decent person so BEWARE.

Brendan is a wonderful host. He will give you useful information. His flat is located from a 5-min walk from Bondi beach. But careful, the walk is steep when you come back from the beach ;) The coastal walk is very nice and a lot young people are gathering during summer time
Fantastic views, great location, very comfortable

It's a very comfortable home, complete with a very friendly big and lovable dog! We didn't feel incredibly safe out at night in the neighbourhood but the house was a secure safe haven for us. Thanks Kath & Ruski!

The location of this apartment is sensational. You can just sit at the breakfast bar and look into the passing parade of characters walking by the gorgeous El Alamein fountain. The apartment was like something out of a magazine: bright, white, and stylish. The bed was very comfortable, and there is an abundance of natural light through the leafy outlook.
Nice comfortable stay.

We really enjoyed our stay in Manly. Great location with plenty of coffee shops and resturants just down stairs and even markets on the weekend! Also close to the beach and wharf. Accommodation was just as described and pictured. Full working kitchen was a bonus. Ziggy was easy to deal with and even arranged early checkin. We would definitely choose to stay again.

Thank you very much for the great hospitality ,cleanliness ,decoration, location and facilities as well your commitment  .I could never imagine more than I had during my stay in your wonderful place.
I will rent again.

Angela and Geoff have created a stunning, homey getaway spot in North Avalon. So close to local cafes and shops and short walk to the beach. Perfect for a quick weekend away- exactly what we needed. They were very accommodating and have put effort into lovely little touches for their guests which make it that little bit more special. We will be back!!
Always a great place to stay when in Sydney - so easy to get around with the train at your footstep. Tiger is a great host and very quick and helpful to make sure your check in is smooth.
Good place - simple, cheap & just what we needed!

시드니 시티와 이곳은 페리로 최단거리로
갈수있고 페리타고 시티까지 가는 경치는

다음 시드니 여행때에도 shaun과 함께
하고싶다~^^ 집안에 식기 조미료 다있어요~ 편안한 공간입니다!!!

Comfortable accommodation in a great, quiet location, 5 minutes walk to downtown Newport and the main beach.  Private guest suite with well equipped kitchen and separate entrance.  Excellent bed and large pleasant bedroom.  The food Anne supplied made for a generous breakfast and lovely home baked treats were very welcoming.  Thank you for offering a great place to stay.
Fantastic place to stay would recommend to all will definitely stay here again when we next come back in June

Sara's home was just perfect for us. Large 2 bedroom, in a great location with views of the city. It was clean and comfortable with little touches like Netflix and Wifi. Sara's was a great communicator.. thanks so much 5 out of 5! Will def stay again next time in Sydney.

The house is quite easy to find and very near to the train station. Out of the house and after turning left, straight up and following the road out to the main road, turn left and walk straight for about 2 mins and you'll be at Newtown train station. 

There were 3 of us, and lucky for us we booked the room on the lower level (it'll be tough for us to carry our luggages up and down the stairs! ). The room is nice and clean, but as there were 3 of us, an extra mattress was added in front of the bed, making the room a little smaller and cramp, but still there is room for us to open 3 luggages at the same time, just that it makes it a little hard to walk. 

There is a common lounge and kitchen for everyone's use, cereals and milk provided as well for breakfast! There are 2 toilets, one in the building, one outside the house, a right turn from the kitchen just few steps away. Towels and toiletries are provided as well. However, as it is a shared toilet, it gets a little messy and dirty over the days.

We stayed for 4 days and generally it was a quite a pleasant stay and the room is cosy enough. Just a note, our room is next to the main entrance so it gets a little noisy when people come in and exit the house.
Sam was very responsive and friendly. The room was well furnished and kept clean. Enjoyed my stay here!

This was by far the best Airbnb Experience we have ever had! Neil and Jane's place is a DREAM, the accommodations, the beach, the restaurants nearby, the ferry, the cliff walks!  We literally kept pinching ourselves because we couldn't believe we were living (and could afford) such a luxury vacation in a luxury paradise! 
We cannot say enough wonderful things about this rental.  It is absolutely a decision you will not regret, we loved the place so much, that we never even got out and explored the city.  We truly just thought that it couldn't be better then exactly where we were.  An absolutely perfect relaxing and splendid holiday.  
Many thanks to you, Neil and Jane!
수영장은 집 안에 있는게 아니라 근처 공원 내에 약 6달러 정도 유로이용이에요. 역까지 걷기 괜찮은데 바로 앞은아니에요.

Great location and seamless checkin/checkout process. 
Lovely place!

We stayed 6 nights in Annie's flat.
Communication with Annie was efficient. Annie was very helpful and accommodated our arriving time.
Her flat is authentic and very nice to live in. It is very close to all transportation and at a reasonable walking distance from Sydney CBD. The neighbourhood have all you need and a excellent choice of eateries.
We definitely recommend Annie's appartement for holidays in Sydney!
Very good location. Incredible host, Desiree helped us out with everything and responded really fast. Everything we needed was at the appartment.

Brendan was an excellent host,  his home is lovely and l felt very comfortable staying there. He goes out of his way to make you feel at home which l  appreciated very much. I would recommend his home and will be booking again with  Brendan next time l visit Sydney.
I cannot recommend Jenny's place highly enough - lots of lovely little touches to make it feel like home, super communicative and helpful hosts, and a wonderful easy location!
Very clean and modern.

We were fortunate to secure a stay at Bradley's place in (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with Bradley was first rate throughout. 
The property is a quaint cottage superbly located in Paddington within walking distance of numerous great watering holes and eateries. The cottage was spotlessly clean and very homely for our stay in Sydney.  It was a great find and Bradley is clearly an experienced host.
Great location. Very clean and a fun place to stay.

Our stay at Sharon's home was delightful. Her home is lovely, clean and well presented and we were pleasantly surprised at how roomy it was. It is located in a fantastic spot, we were easily able to access Sydney's beautiful southern beaches as well as the city and many of Sydney's major sights. Sharon was lovely to deal with and happily accommodated our last minute request for additional guests and even went out of her way to return items that we had left behind. We had a lovely stay and we would happily stay again (I highly recommend this home for young families - my children just loved the chickens!).
The host canceled this reservation 40 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Clean & spacious apartment for two. 5-10 mins walk to King's Cross Station. Woolworths right across the street. Victoria was very nice to wait for us at the foyer for check-in, highly recommended!

We loved the location of Vanessa's house. We traveled with our entire family and were so pleased when we walked in and realized how huge the place was! The decorations were great and the beds were comfy. You can walk down very easy to take the ferry. It is in a nice and safe neighborhood.
Great location, hospitality and  quick response. It takes only few minutes walk to the beach. We really enjoyed it.
Paul and Judith are wonderful hosts and their home is a great base to explore Sydney from! Redfern also has tons of great cafes and restaurants. We would definitely stay here again!
Excellent i would say!!!!! Easy to get around. Nice and clean apartment. Very lovely place and host .

Great value for money, at a convenient location between the airport and the city. The apartments is clean and recently renovated, it is still missing some homely touches but has everything you need and it was perfect for us to spend the night at before our long haul flight. Small shopping centre with Woolworth and Aldi nearby, and a nice park for kids too which was handy.
Thanks Wayne and Kate we had a lovely time at your apartment. Was clean, beds comfy and great view of the beach!!
As always - great place to stay, clean and easy
Very nice place. Clean and comfortable. Terry, the host, was great, very friendly and helpful. The place is very convenience to travel by bus to center of town. Strongly recommend.
It's was lovely to stay in this apartment because I could walk to Anz stadium. Everything was amazing. Great view. Thanks for letting us stay I would love to stay again.

Amazing apartment. Modern interior, awesome design with well detailed decor. Quiet surrounding with many nice cafe for coffee and excellent breakfast. Smooth communication with Dino, and a big thanks here to Rick for helping us check in late at 11 pm.
Have to say it is one of the best apartment in AirBnb i've ever stay in.

El apartamente de Paul es muy bonito y bien situado para conocer la ciudad.
Quizás en mas fotografías se ve más cuidad y parece mucho más grande y luminoso. Estaba un poco descuidado, sobre todo a nivel limpieza profunda y comparándolo con las fotografías mostradas.
El trato de Paul perfecto! Amable, atento y servicial.

My Dad and myself spent two nights at this wonderful house with Konrad and Mish. The description of  what is on offer is spot on.
This is a great house with separate rooms in an decent location adjacent to bushland and not too far from shops and transport. Wonderful hosts who are willing to go the extra distance to help out.  Highly Recommended!
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Wayne and Kate are the most amazing hosts - from the moment we booked with them until we left, our experience was outstanding.  The apartment is wonderfully spacious, clean and well equipped and has the most stunning views of Tamarama.  We found it very difficult to tear ourselves away from the balcony and the beach to explore other areas!  The local tips they gave us for food and coffee were spot on.  Highly recommended!
Idéal pour découvrir Sydney

Susan was a great host. She was very flexible and accomodating fir us in our stay. The property is clean and I a great location and we would definitely stay again. Highly recommend.
Steve

Excellent quiet convenient  city location with easy walk into Newtown, St Peters train station etc. Great hosts easy check in with everything you need for one night or extended stay. Heater was great and kept us lovely and warm on a cold night. Thanks guys!
Tisha and Jarrah.

Great location. Good sized room and bed. Bathrooms are good but could do with having a mop available to clear the floor after a house full of people have used them as the floor gets covered in water for the rest of the day. The cereal for breakfast in the mornings is great. Only gripe is that there was no laundry facilities available. All in all very pleasant.
This property is our Executive's number 1 choice each time he comes to Australia from Europe. For more than a year now. Superb view, fantastic property, and the easiest communication with the host!

My sister and I️ stayed at Brendan’s for a few days and had a great time. Check in was easy and flexible, he waited for us despite my many plane delays. The place itself was very clean and comfortable, and we loved being able to make ourselves at home. Great proximity to Bondi Beach. Brendan was very helpful and kind. 10/10 would stay here again.

We thoroughly enjoyed our restful stay in this Malabar beach apartment . Fred gave us lots of local knowledge and was really helpful.
We enjoyed breakfast at the local beach cafe, and swimming in the rock pool,literally across the road.
We arrived in the dark,from the airport, tired and disheveled , but were welcomed into this comfortable apartment with minimum of fuss, and awoke in the morning to a view of the sparkling ocean.
Thank you Fred and Bernadette for our 1st very positive introduction to AirBNB.
Convenient location where nearby to the grocery store. Suitable for those that prefer to have light cook during the stay.
ｼﾃｨまで時間はかかるものの､最高の部屋でした｡また利用したいです｡
Great location for me in Waterloo-Private bathroom is nice!  Family was super nice

Sara's apartment is in a great location to plenty of convenience stores, cafes, takeaways and a bottle store. Handy to the buses and light rail system, but there is a bit of a uphill hike if you get off at the Glebe Station - it's a much easier walk if you get off at Jubliee Park Station.
She was very easy to deal with and flexible with the time to meet us and responded to messages promptly during our stay. Was a great space with all the amenities that you need, plus more - our wee girl loved all the toys and books (Thanks for having these available).
David is the perfect host. He was responsive and attentive. The apartment is well located, clean, and stocked with essentials. We thoroughly enjoyed our time there, and hope some day to return!
Nice place, very comfortable and located just off darling harbour. Place was just as described.
I just keep coming back. a home away from home. very spacious and well appointed and very quiet environment. A true gem.
It was wonderful stay...
It's cozy and quiet place to stay. There's a really good location, close to supermarket and 20 minutes walk from fish market. It's especially suitable for someone who use public transportation.

Really lovely cosy place in a vibrant and hip part of town. Cleverly and tastefully appointed to make a great cost effective studio. Michele is a fantastic host as well, with cereals, coffee, tea, milk,  and offering to go beyond with helpfulness. Thoroughly recommend.
交通便捷,靠近地跌和公交车站,很方便去市中心和DFO,附近有超市和购物中心, 房间很整洁,布置的很温馨,房主很nice,性价比很高,是一次极好的入住体验
Hosts are very welcoming and location is perfect to maximize your experience in Bondi Beach.
The place is very nice and clean. The most valuable things is the closeness to the airport. Is perfect for people who will flight at morning.
Great Location!Oriel is very nice and helpful, the apartment is very clean and comfort and the view was amazing:)
We had a great time while staying at Michy's. The room is super clean, cosy and has a great little library. Would definitely stay again!
Hernan is really friendly and helpful. He made the experience in Sydney very good. Would definitely recommend to the other travellers. Room was clean and amenities were more than enough.

Very nice hosts in a great apartment with a beautiful Ocean- and Bondi-Beach-View!

Valentine and her partner were very friendly and good to chat with. She was very flexible and made it possible to check in very late. She was a good host and did everything she could to make our stay even better! 

We would come back !
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Sam is truly a super host! very responsive to messages, and very hospitable as well. the house is neat and tidy, it is basically the same as the pictures posted online. Would definitely reccomend his place to everyone! Me and my husband love the different types of vegetables and fruits planted within the front yard of the house, most especially the strawberries!
Very lovely host easy to communicate and well service. I would check again in future
Very good
It's a good place to stay!
Keurig en praktisch appartement in rustige straat. Heel dichtbij de technische universiteit, openbaar vervoer en op loopafstand van alle belangrijke attracties van Sydney. Perfecte WiFi.
The house is super. We enjoyed our new year holiday with relaxing, clean and comfortable house. Fully furnished and amenities
Ruhige Lage im netten Viertel Potts Point. Alles was man braucht ist vorhanden und Vickie kümmert sich rührend.

This apartment is decorated nicely and in a great location. It’s a real apartment and not a hotel room, so expect the charms and imperfections of an apartment in an old building. Everything works and is clean and check-in was easy.

Leslie, Eric and your family are lovely people. we have provided anything we needed. their home is very spacious fit to stay whether on holiday or for work. the bus stop is within walking distance from home. Balgalowah is very beautiful and is very close to Manly. Thank you!
Evelyn was a great host. We had a lovely weekend. I recommend the place!

Hi Bill, we had a great stay. Thanks so much for your hospitality. The house was lovely and clean and well equipped. Easy walk down to Darling Harbour each day of our conference. Perfect location. Highly recommended
A conseiller sans problème.

This apartment was huge and in an excellent location.  You can walk to most major sites within 15 minutes. The TV and wifi worked really well and there were plenty of places nearby to buy food at restaurants and grocery stores. Danny was very nice and easy to communicate with. However, while this apartment can be a great value for a large group, it was a little rough around the edges. For example, the oven was caked with grease and there was an old carpet and doors on the balcony. Also, there were supplies to repair the drawer rollers in the bedroom. However, my 8 year old pulled a drawer out on her foot which took us to the ER for an afternoon so I'm thinking the repair hadn't been completed. Overall a good value and good apartment, but we found it to be a little less excellent than we expected.

This place is very nice place to stay. We stayed here for two nights with 5 adults & one toddler. The hosts are very quick in communication which was very good. Only one small issue was WiFi which can be slow at times but I think that’s due to many devices using it at same time but that didn’t worry us much anyway. We loved our stay here.
Good location, comfy bed smallish room thou. There was a semi-permanent tennant when I was there and he started work early...woke me at 5 but otherwise nice house
Great location in the heart of Newtown....a great spot in Sydney. Lovely house. We shared with 5 other guests in the house but was easy to go in and out.
We couldn’t stay there but communication was great

Nice studio, well located near public transport. 
Well equipped kitchen, with supermarkets are about 10 or 15 min walking distance.
Lovely hip street, Michele was a really lovely helpful host and the accomodation was clean and comfortable!
So much appreciate your thoughtfulness Robyn, it was a great joy to stay with you, thank you

Probably the best air bnb we’ve ever stayed in. Such care and attention to everything you would ever need. Fresh fruit, dairy products and bread provided and asked what we’d like pre-arrival. In addition to fresh flowers, an amazingly stocked kitchen, and a great place which was so clean - our hosts provided a range of toys (and kitchen utensils) for our toddler which were very well received. She loved playing in the garden and we enjoyed our bbqs while she was asleep in the evening! Thanks for a wonderful weekend
Amazing place , very good communicated with the train, supermarket and the CBD, so wonderful and spacious. I really recommend this place . So beautiful and clean .
Great place, great price, lovely people.
Great, tidy apartment in a really good location near shops, restaurants and Redfern Station.
房子离机场很近,转机很好的选择｡房东人很nice,帮忙叫了出租车,其实走路也就15分钟｡房子很干净｡
So comfortable and homely. Susan really has thought of everything to make your stay truly wonderful.
Perfect location close to both the ferry and beach. Very clean apartment. Great communication. Happy to have families.
Xin is a great host!

Great place to stay in Sydney in the centre of everything. Ollie was amazing with check in and out.
Thanks!

The apartment is perfectly located, easy access and walking distance to all attractions. Spotless clean, well appointed and really comfy, the seperate bedroom was great especialy when you are traveling with a baby !
Thanks again for our great stay :)
A great place to stay, highly recommended and Balmain is a very good base especially with the ferry so close by. We have already recommended it to some friends.
So clean and spacious! Really great location as well. Michele is lovely and very very accommodating
Brock and Alex's place is very cute and super close to the Sydney University. We enjoyed our stay!
Great hosts, lovely comfortable accommodation.

Pamela & Hugo's place has a spectacular view of the harbor and downtown. They gave us good suggestions about the local area. A great location to explore Sydney CBD. The apartment features a good living space for guests. I would pick this place again if I go back anytime in the future.
Such a beautiful home that is very comfortable and relaxing. My friends and I really enjoyed our stay here!
