Great views of Dee why beach and a lovely pool. Walk to beach and shops. Host was lovely and helpful with everything and quick to respond. Thanks for the lovely stay
Same as described, nice and convenient place.

Rather than an awesome room, Kerri was really an amazing host, very supportive and sociable. 
I enjoyed staying with her, it was a nice experience.  She would never hesitate to answer any question or even to offer any kind help.

This was our first time booking via airbnb, and the process was pretty straight forward. Sara was very nice, helpful and easy to get in touch with.Her apartment is nice and tidy and has amazing views.Plenty of shops/cafes in walking distance.Overall a really impressive stay, would recommend her apartment to anyone heading to sydney.
Apartment has everything you need for a work trip based in the best location for short trips.
Krythia's place is super clean and comfortable. I have never sleep on a bed like this, super soft. Krythia is thoughtful.
MissD’s place was clean and spacious and well organised. While she was not there herself she was very responsive. It is well located being easy to walk to King Street. A fun and lively area.

Loved my time at kath's apartment, spacious room with balcony, the welcome Tim tams were a treat.

It was so easy to get to the city from redfern station two blocks up. 

Would recommend staying there to anyone, didn't want to leave after a week
Listing was very accurate and what we expected!
Amazing property with an even more amazing view to wake up to. Can't recommend it enough.

Great relaxing place to stay. Loved the bush setting, the quirky carriage, the 2 welcoming cattle dog pups and all the little special touches that Margaret provides. Had a great stay and would return anytime.
The host was very accommodating as we had quite a few luggages with us. Very clean apartment with close location to the train. Also very close to the airport. Overall a fantastic value!
Luxurious apartment with everything you need. Very comfortable
We had a very good stay there, and also very easy for parking.
Thankyou Hugo and Ollie for having us at your Art Deco. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and being so close to everything was a huge bonus. Will be requesting to stay here again next time!

Glebe is a great neighbourhood, Elise's place is in a great spot, walking distance to cafes & restaurants on Glebe Point road and the Glebe market (Saturdays). 20 minute walk to Darling Harbour. Newtown and Chippendale areas are also near by.
Check in and check out was easy and communication was good.
The apartment caters for your basic needs and has a nice little courtyard, and is clean.
A couple of things to note: there is no iron available (as per Elise's advertisement - but I forgot to check this when making the booking). There is a bit of noise from the upstairs tenants and from the street as the apartment/bedroom is located along the street path. We were out of the apartment most of the time anyway but just something we noticed.
Overall, affordable, clean and in a a great location.

Perfect host! Vickie was so helpful and full of great recommendations. 
The location is perfect! Such a lovely area! 
Great coffee across the road at Bottega Del Vino (and that's coming from a melbourner).
Across the road from Woolworths, lovely bookshop down the road and great restaurants on your doorstep! 
The apartment is small but full of light! 
Perfect for two people. 
Will be staying back here if ever in Sydney again.

Grand old house with heaps of charm in the thick of Paddington. Room was big with a real comfy bed. Hosted by a very lovely and welcoming couple, relaxed and friendly. Fresh towels and even a chocolate on the pillow!

Vickie is The perfect host. She is very nice and polite. The apartment was cute and clean. The location of the flat is good and Vickie gives you recommendations of were to have good meals next to it. We would definetly come back there if we ever came to Sydney again!
Great place, great host, convenient location, my family was very happy staying here!
Great location, perfect family space, close to Manly.
Localização é muito boa, pertinho da Opera House. 15 minutos a pé!
Great little base from which to see Sydney,  We would stay again.
Nicole was a wonderful host and really thought of everything. We arrived to fruit ,chocolates and biscuits. It was really close to the conference venue as Nicole said and a lovely bright apartment.
Good communication
They are nice host. Room is clean and cosy.

Leigh’s place was amazing. Location is unbeatable and the place was big enough for family of 4(all adults). The place was more than expected. Loved home decoration as well. Everything is around there, bus, cafe,  restaurant, pub, super market. It made our trip very easy and comfortable.

Thank's Hernan. I had a short but pleasant stay here. 
Very good location. Walking distance to shops and restaurants. Easy Public transport to and from the airport. 
Very clean room and bathroom. Amenities and Wifi is provided. 
Hernan is a friendly guy. 
Would recommend for short business trips that require you to stay near the airport on a budget. 
Thanks for your hospitality. 
Cheers!

106 High Street was easy to find and a fantastic location.  We loved having a harbour view and being just a short walk from North shore wharf.  Milsom's wharf was beautiful too, tucked away in a secluded inlet where you could sip coffee, eat and enjoy clear skies and local boat activity. The local theatre had some amazing performances so we did not need to venture far.  Local eateries were of a high standard, although we were glad to find the local Aldi in North Sydney to help out with budget constraints!  We were able to run around Kiribilli and under the Bridge as well as over it.  A beautiful city and very pleased we stayed on this side. Stephen was very helpful and was on hand to ensure our stay was memorable. Many thanks from us UK visitors.

We were welcomed by cute little notes all over the house as the hosts were away
Really enjoyed the location and their home is very interesting
The views are amazing, the studio is styled beautifully and light filled and very private. You won’t be disappointed..
Wonderful place!! Super peaceful and sweet and lovely neighborhood!!! Appreciated the extra help they gave me with transportation issues I was having. They were a blessing to me!!
A well-located and very clean flat — would stay here again!

Looking for hip neighborhood with walking distance to food, bar, boutique shops & even a slice of pizza!  Annie place is right center of everything in Surry Hills.   Amazing host with super quick response.    I would definitely come back to stay with such a stylish place!!!!!  Thank you ;)
Nice friendly hosts. very good hospitality. we will come back again. Highly recommended.

It's sparkling clean room, feel cleaner than hotel room. I was impressed. Fully self check-in and check-out. I walked with my luggage directly from international terminal to the location, very convenient. Only 10 minutes walk to the train station and about 25 minutes ride to CBD. I enjoyed the stay.
What a beautiful, magical place to stay. Set in bush land this wonderful railway carriage is all romance and charm. Margaret and John were lovely hosts. A fantastic peaceful getaway from the city.

Not only was Kathy fabulous, also the place was great. Clean and opposite the park made it a beautiful environment inside and out. This is a home away from home with many little touches that made it even more delicious.
Excellent accommodation. Good location. Ease of  access to centre of Sydney via train. Very clean comfortable apartment. Fantastic views of cityscape. Parking in basement.

Angela and Geoff were so hospitable and thoughtful. Generosity in every thing they do makes for a wonderful airbnb experience. My Daughter and I visited the Avalon Beach apartments for a week. On Arrival - When we arrived we found to our delight a superb selection of Freshly baked bakery Bread, Premium Fruit (including mango, rock melon, blue berries and raspberries), Yogurt and the milk of our choice. We asked for an early check in which at this time of year (January)they could not do but to compensate there was a bottle of French Champagne in the fridge and a bottle of Aussie Red on the counter. But this was to be the first of many surprises. I then discovered a lovely selection of premium cheeses in the crisper. As well as selection of unopened French jams and spreads just added to the already extensive pantry. The kitchen – every need or requirement had been carefully thought of. Every type of glassware and china in the cupboards was of the highest standards in design and style and again very generously provided. The kitchen appliances, fridge, washer/Dryer, stove was all of the highest specification and all as new. Entertaining was a so easy. The generous designer lounge spilled out onto the terrace. State of the art technology provided many hours immersed in the latest movies. The windows featured an electronic block out blind for privacy and to mange the sun. Internally a thoughtful arrangement of blinds managed the totally privacy of the areas. Again, premium appliance including a Bose sound System and Jet Master Fireplace. Designer furniture, Interiors books and magazines. Picture windows opening on to the stunning tropical garden. As well as delightful collection of original artwork from the region. The Terrace – again every need had been carefully thought of. Centering on a delightful table for 8 the designer flagstone floor flowed seamlessly via concertina doors opening into the lounge. A huge 4 burner BBQ, ceiling mounted outdoor heating. Generous collection of Comfortable premium garden furniture to enjoy the stunning garden. Stylish beach mats provided. In the main bed room good design was again present in everything they had chosen. The premium beds and linen and towels were all immaculate. Stylish bathroom, double sink and huge European bath, heated towel rails, hair straightener and hair dryer, Spare Razors, makeup removal pads, cue tips and designer toiletries. – again, everything carefully provided. Double hanging and 30 black velvet covered hangers – generosity again. A fresh arrangement of orchids on the Dresser. Generous selection of fresh designer Turkish towels and Beach bags. Generous designer bath and beach towels provided. The second bedroom featured a double bed and again generous hanging and storage. It features a generous library of classics and current design and food books that kept me entertained for hours. Another large stylish en-suite bathroom with every need again considered. Again all immaculate. Local area recommendations for everything we could need in restaurants and cafés was provided in Blue Binder...
The house was easy to find and I was welcomed and settled in by Jyoti's mum. Everything was just lovely. It's a great spot if you need to be close to Olympic Park.

Dear David, we really enjoyed our stay in your wonderful apartment. We all felt comfortable right away. And thanks again for helping us with our crazy luggage load.  
best wishes. 
Judith, Daniel with  Matti and Emmi
That your for an amazing and comfortable stay

Faultless! This peaceful bungalow is exceptional value with everything you'd need during a busy visit to Sydney. It's in such a great location, too. Steven and Peta were easy to communicate with. Thanks for having us!

The house is located in a very special area of Sydney. Newtown is the beating heart of the underground scene and you have everything you need.

The house is conveniently located 5 min away from the Newtown station and it's basic but very clean. We didn't meet the host, neither all the other guests in the house but we didn't have a problem.

The room was really spacious and although we were expecting the third bed to be a real bed, my dad slept well on the floor on a thin mattress. The kitchen has everything you need for a basic cook and the two toilets were clean and very new.

The room did smell a bit of mould, but it's a very old house and those days Sydney was very rainy so didn't bothered us too much.

I would come back again for a short stay.

I had a great time staying with Anya, Urs and Finn. The room is light and bright with lots of space, and on a quiet road in Bondi that's still close to all the action and within walking distance to the Junction.
The place was really clean and Anya was great with her communication (particularly as I booked really last minute). 
I would definitely recommend their home as a great, peaceful base from which to explore Bondi.

Wayne and Kate's place was amazing.  It's the perfect location on Tamarama beach (beautiful beach between and a short walk to Bondi and Bronte).  The house is fully stocked with amenities, beds were very comfortable, and spaces bright and cozy.  Highly recommended.
Place is a little narrow, but very cosy. the second floor is gorgeous. The view near the park nearby is amazing if you're into good scenery. The host is very helpful and communicates well with you.
Excellent accommodation.  The host was always quick with replies.  Highly recommend.
Lovely central location with a nice open plan feel and two shower rooms
Enjoyed my stay, fantastic location,  excellent host.
Very big studio apartment, immaculately present and very comfortable.  Great location between Surry Hills village and central station.
Best location for Darling Harbour and opera house. Close to shopping, bus and train.
Super séjour, maison bien située et très propre!
Gd place to  stay for the price a bit noisy in the front room with traffic, planes, horns tooting. But an enjoyable stay.

Dino's apartment was beautifully decorated and was situated in the perfect location at Elizabeth bay. Dino was out of town at the time however his friend Rick was very helpful with the check in and answered all of my queries. I highly recommend staying here and will hopefully return soon!!

We had a very nice time in this flat last week.

In regards to the communication. Vicky was very easy to reach and we always received a swift response. She was very helpful and also had a few nice tips which obviously is the benefit of talking to a local.

The flat is located in a very nice area of Sydney with great restaurants and bars right in walking distance.

In walking distance is also the Botanical Garden as well as the Opera House. Just to highlight a couple of things.

The flat was very clean and we would definitely stay there again.

Hernan is a good man. I totally recommend him if you want somewhere close to the city, but removed just enough to not feel the angst, this is a good fit. He made my first experience with  airbnb a good one. And I was happy to return before my return to Canada.
We absolutely loved Lucy’s place- absolutely beautiful, immaculately clean and set in gorgeous trees with a backyard for the kids! Loved it, and will def be back. Thanks Lucy!
A stylish modern apartment in a great location. The hosts were very pleasant and accommodating.

Lovely house in a great location but let down by a dirty kitchen including the fridge along with a cockroach problem all of which could have been sorted with proper cleaning before handover. The Wifi was very weak throughout the house.

Ubicado estratégicamente, cerca al Opera house, nos desplazamos a pie facilmente por todos los lugares turísticos, la chica que nos recibió fue de gran ayuda, recomiendo este sitio 100% y volverla seguramente.

Paul and Judith are kind and friendly hosts who loves to meet new people. Judith is a still working teacher and Paul is at home. They give You good tips what to do in Sydney and are very helpful! Our stay was a Nice experience with interesting conversations with this two. 
Their Apartment is in Redfern, by feet You Need about 15 minutes to Sydney Harbour Bridge and Opera House. There are some cool restaurants in the area for a typical Aussie-Breakfast. The Supermarkt is just around the corner. 
We really enjoyed our time with Paul and Judith and hope to meet them again in the future!
Appartement près de l’aéroport. Idéal pour un séjour d’une nuit entre deux vols. La chambre et les aires communs modernes se trouvent dans un jolie maison rose entourées de belles fleurs.

Great location, easy to reach famous tourist spot including the Opera House, Darling Harbor, China town, etc. Also only 10min walk to supermarket. The apt is very clean with IKEA style decoration, and clothes washing machine, dish washer, oven are friendly to use. Host Eleni is very considerate and helpful, even first aid pad is also available for use in cabinet.
Hernan made me feel like a friend and was super welcoming. The room was as described, very clean and very close to shops, restaurants and the lovely Botany Bay.

A great place to visit for a little beach holiday on Sydney's Northern Beaches. Well away from the City hustle and bustle a short stroll to the beach. Great public transport if you need to get to the City, Manly, or even further North to Palm Beach. Andi is such a wonderful host and the place is so comfortable, quiet and relaxing!

Anita was the best host we have experienced and the apartment is so incredibly ideal we'll be coming back many times each year. We cannot sing Anita's praises high enough. The location, space and cleanliness rivals 5 star hotels. Fantastic.
The place was spacious and well decorated with a very comfortable bed and very good amenities
Great size and location.
A great spot to stay with a great host

Narelle was a lovely and highly accommodating host! The apartment was ideal, stocked with everything you might need for a comfortable and homely stay. I have now found my new spot for whenever I travel to Sydney for business! I highly recommend this place to all!

super comfortable room, great location (few min from manly wharf by bus or a fantastic walk on manly scenic walk). Safe neighbourhood and quiet. Leslie and Eric are great people and have a great family. Thanks very much!  I look forward to catching up again next time I am in Sydney. Elias
Everything good^^
周围非常便利. 正如房东所说的一模一样.! 附近有很多吃的. 不怕饿到. 打车都很方便! 很推荐
Nice place to stay in Sydney.

A very good place to stay, particularly if you are in Bundeena without a car as the shops are only 10 mins walk away.  Beach very close, with lovely swimming. Altogether a very peaceful place, apart from the noisy kookaburras!  Inclined to be a bit chilly in the mornings (October) until the sun was well up, as it is quite shady, so be sure to take a warm sweater.  
A charming cottage and highly recommended.

Arnie & Lorraine lead a life full of love. I felt right at home in their vibrant world of eclectic art and wonderful, engaging conversation. I was lucky enough to visit when they had their engagement party and had the chance to dance into the early hours, celebrating. My week in Sydney was incredible and was made more so with the friendship and welcoming arms of them both. I intend to return and highly recommend staying.
Nice apartment in a great city location. The building had an unexpected plumbing issue when we arrive but Danny organised another apartment for us immediately that suited our needs. A great host.
The clean apartment has well-equiped kitchen, beautiful view and strong wifi. Prompt and helpful communication. Thanks.

Cat's place was warm and welcoming, had everything we needed and was in a wonderful location close to Bondi beach but far enough away to be (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was easy and prompt.  The house was perfect for a group of friends or a couple of families.  I would be happy to stay again.
Neat and tidy home.
Gorgeous Art Deco apartment close to shops and ferry ⛴
lovely studio! nice location, clean room. almost everything you need is provided. room decorations are good.
It was a perfect appartment in Sydney !

Judy's place is a great place to stay. It is very clean, well managed and comfortable. It is 2min walk from the bus station and 6min walk from train station. Amenities are best in class and Judy is a great host. She responds immediately to any request or need.

Victoria is a great host as she was always there to answer any of our questions.  The studio is well situated with all the necessary amenities around you.  Very close to Kings Cross station, so very easy to get around.  The apartment was clean and comfortable.  Great stay!
Lovely house, perfect location, really friendly host and lots of thoughtful extras. Would stay again whenever possible.

Highly recommend this unit!  GREAT location with amazing views of the beach!! Super close to the coastal walk which I highly recommend you do while staying here! Anita was a great host.  She met me prior to my check in time and allowed me to leave my luggage at the apartment while it was being cleaned.  She also allowed me to check in early after the unit was ready!  She walked me around the entire complex to show me all the amenities and how to navigate the area.   The unit was in great condition and was very well decorated.  I enjoyed waking up each morning to the lovely  view of the beach and ocean right from the bed. On my last day, Anita offered a late check out as the cleaning service was running behind which was greatly appreciated! Anita has great communication with her guests which was very helpful during my stay! Overall,  Anita is a really amazing host who was super accommodating!! Definitely don't miss out on this unit!

A great house for seeing Sydney. 5 minutes from the nearest train station or bus stop and 10-20 minute walk to the shops and restaurants. House was fantastic, renovated recently to a very high standard, equipped with everything you need. Perfect for 2-3 couples as there are four floors. One floor is the living area and the other three floors has one bedroom and a bathroom on each.
A nice place with a nice distance and great view.

Susan's place is a fantastic studio in Bronte. We loved our first AirBnb experience. They have set the bar high. We would highly recommend it to people who want to immerse themselves in the area. Take your walking shoes and soak up the atmosphere! Also so close to local restaurants and public transport. Thank you
Great spot and very friendly and helpful hosts. Tess and Rod made me feel right at home and the little extra touches in the apartment made me feel very welcome.
very nice guy and tidy room,near to sea, recommend
Very conveniently located. Chloe was very helpful and the apartment is great.
Great House. Only there for two nights. Conveniently located good vibe

Fantastic location and a great space for a big family. Super close to the beach and very comfortable accommodation - we stayed over Christmas and very quickly felt at home. Marcella was quick to respond to any queries at all stages of our booking and stay. I would definitely recommend her place to future guests.

Mike is a great host felt special picking up the keys and having barista coffee thrown in.

The space is great the photos don’t do it justice, walking distance to Woolloomoo Wharf and Kings Cross,
clean, fresh and surprisingly quiet being in an major overpass.

Highly recommend Mike as a host and the space would stay again!
Perfect private space
Es war einfach ein grossartiger Aufenthalt! Super Host, praktische Lage, feines australisches Lamm, gemütliche Stunden. Danke vielmals.

Excellent value. Close to heaps of public transport and a short walk to Marrickville. A Woolies less than 10 mins away. Very quiet and clean. Stayed here for a few weeks with husband and baby while locating permanent accommodation. It is small and basic but clean and and excellent location. There is a beautiful kids park around the corner and less than 10 mins walk to cooks river. Only 15 min bus ride to Enmore/Newtown. Communication was excellent and fruit and cookies were left out to.
Awesome stay, felt like home. Even had the same brand of liquid soap as I have in my house.
Unusual and sophisticated house, very good location in a quite street, possibility to get to the beach by bus or on foot (40 mins walk), and very hospital and lovely owner. Thank you, Lorraine :)

My boyfriend and I were greeted by Angela and Geoff upon arrival and taken to the ground level of their private home  - their place looks just like the pictures!! What a great way to spend a mini weekend getaway. Angela and Geoff are so warm and welcoming and make you feel right at home from the moment we met them. Great place to stay in Palm beach, highly recommend their beautiful home! Couldn't get any better than this
nice apartment and nice view.

Nice, clean and simple style unit, we felt very comfortable, all  rooms are good size.
Close to transport, shopping and restaurants. Walk distance to all beaches around manly, the closer one take few minutes.
Paul is promptly respond to the request, easy instructions to follow.
The place is a part of our good memories in Manly trip, we definitely come to stay again.
Only thing we think the check in is a bit late 3.00PM and check out time 10.00AM
All over I give excellent level.

It was a pleasant stay for me and my other ten friends from September 5th until September 12th 2018 at George's place. The photos didn't do the house justice since it's far more spacious in real life. It's perfect for big groups and family. The Macquarie Fields train station isn't that far away and it goes straight to Central Station and Opera House! George was extremely responsive including in the middle of the night. Ask for anything, he will make sure your request will be granted as soon as he could. If there's any improvement I could recommend is only the entrance. George, that huge tree in front of the house got to go mate. Anything else was PERFECT! Thank you so much George. You are awesome! Looking forward to my next stay next year.
Really nice room

My boyfriend and I were looking for somewhere to stay in Sydney that was good value for money but with a homely feel and Duncan's place didn't disappoint. The room has so many little details from all the maps, the welcome information to the lindt chocolates on the towels! Although Ashlee and Duncan lead very busy lifestyles, they were always very friendly when they were around and made our stay very comfortable. The location is so convenient to get right into the heart of Sydney, just a short bus trip away (literally!) If you're considering between a hostel/hotel in the city or this air bnb - book the air bnb. It's really good value for money in a city that definitely comes with a hefty price tag.
Great place, host and value

We had a lovely stay. The Studio is private and has good amenities. Belinda greeted us on arrival and was very friendly and helpful, and the Bundeena area is beautiful. We were there for a family function, but there is plenty to do close by if you're just holidaying.

We spent 3 gorgeous nights at Great Mackeral Beach House. The house was equipped with everything we needed and the quality furnishings made for comfortable relaxing time with family and friends. Great for 2 young families, perfect beach for little ones and older folks alike with plenty to do if you ever tire of just soaking up the beautiful view. Owner was very easy to deal with - would definitely recommend this property. The best part was its proximity to Sydney, but the feeling of being worlds away.

A perfect studio in the 'heart' of Sydney. Great host,tastefully furnished,neat & tidy,top location  and about a third of the price of comparable hotel accomodation. Thoroughly recommended, and can't wait to return.
It is very suitable for family

David was such a wonderful host. He met me in front of his place and showed me around. He made sure everything was fine before he left me. The place was very clean , comfy pillows and mattresses . The place is beautiful , Internet was fast , you will feel safe and secure because the police station is just right across the apartment. The location was great , convenient as mentioned. We'll book again if given a chance to go back to Sydney . Thank you David !
The apartment is closed to everything. Suitable price for a central apartment.

Such a beautiful place to stay! Close to public transport(walking distance to train station), airport, and nearby cafe/restaurants. Perfect place for foodie. The area reminds me of Chapel Street in Melbourne . Very clear instructions in the house, numbers of goodfood guide book to go for meals.
The room downstairs that I stayed gets the noise from upstairs, but everything else is great!

The Ad makes it very clear what you get. Plenty of clean towels and bedding. We had 6 people sleep across 3 double mattresses and we had enough space. Kitchen and bathroom clean and well stocked. 3 fans and two air conditioners was great to have. Washing machine and dryer came in handy and the balcony was lovely :) only downside was hot water in showers was a bit hit and miss. 

Overall great value for money

Die Wohnung von Evan war sehr großzügig, modern eingerichtet und geräumig. Sie lag einige Gehminuten von der Metro entfernt, die direkt in die Stadt fuhr. Zum Flughafen eine Station. In die Stadt - je nachdem, wo man aussteigen wollte - 2-4 Stationen. Alles in allem ist die Unterkunft von Evan empfehlenswert und die Kommunikation lief auch sehr gut. Er hat uns auch Eier und Mangos im Kühlschrank hinterlassen, an denen wir uns bedienen konnten. Die Wohnung an sich ist echt toll mit einer echt schönen Aussicht. Man kann auch sehr gut auf dem Balkon sitzen.

It was like a home away from home. We went there for a one stay but extended more than one month. Daniel and Eliena were so friendly. we would recommend this place for anyone. Train station is just stones throw away.
Thanks Lina! Great and convenient place for my staff to stay while on work. Lina is a great communicator and helpful.

Mariana's flat was in the perfect location for me to walk to everything. Cute neighborhood with lots of shopping, eateries, and services. The flat has been completely remodeled using high-quality materials. It's quite a small space, very efficient, perfect for a solo traveler like myself. It could accommodate two people, although the kitchen would fit only (Email hidden by Airbnb) fy bed with quality linens, nice bathroom with big tub, everything was new and spotlessly clean. It's a walk-up so you need to navigate two flights of stairs which was no problem for me.
Jennifer was so helpful and the apartment was perfect to stay in!
Ann and her family were the most gracious of hosts, sharing their house, gorgeous food & (mostly bad) jokes to make me feel a part of the family.
All was good, maybe a fan for hot days would have been nice, otherwise very comfy apartment in a good location.

We stayed really comfortable to Elena and Daniel ‘s place.
Was nice to meet their as host , they are such a good people and very helpful for everything.
Another great stay. Thanks for looking after us again.
amazing !!
It was great. The place is clean and convenient, located very close to the train station.
Great apartment! It was large, spacious, well equipped, and clean. Check-in and check-out was very easy/quick!
Fantastic home in a great location to walk to everything in Bondi. Really loved the tranquil feel of the house and the back and front yard. Thanks Cat!
Great location. Close to shops and restaurants. Short drive to beach and ferry terminal. House was nice, could do with a thorough clean.
great location. not family friendly. weird damp smell in the building. quite a number of flights of stairs. very small also
The house is old and sparsely furnished and needed some maintenance. But it was clean and spacious. It is in a good location within walking distance of Beverl Hills station.
Great apartment. Great host.

Terry's place is lovely! The bed is SO comfy, and the living room is super spacious. Terry was a lovely host and really accommodating. Great location, just a short walk from Kings Cross and Edgecliff station and if you can't be bothered to explore there's a great pool for sunbathing.

Simon and Nicole were great hosts. The flat was impeccably clean and comfortable for our holiday stay. Communication was excellent for our late check-in. The heated pool upstairs is a nice touch, and the air conditioning was a good to have during the hot Australian summer days. Very much enjoyed staying here and would stay again!
I had a wonderful stay at Cathy's place. It was a great experience. Very accommodating and as described. Highly recommend!
Had a nice stay!

The emails with Javier and then contact and meeting with his friend, who gave us the keys, was very friendly. That was probably the best part of our stay in this flat. It does not meet the quality and standards that we have enjoyed from other flats on airbnb, whose customer service responded quickly and helped us relocate.

The photos of the flat are misleading: some furniture (like the two tables) has disappeared or been moved, some has been replaced, the two main blinds are broken, as is the shower-head holder - all in all resulting in a much less friendly and less practical feeling.
 
Besides that, we found there to be a general feel of neglect: though the flat had been cleaned before we arrived, we had to bleach the bath tub twice and scrub it to make it look not disgustingly grimy. At least its cleaner now ... The shower curtain was mouldy, and there was an unpleasant smell from the kitchen cabinets.

Finally, as the previous guest described in his comment - unfortunately posted after our booking - the neighbours are very very loud: they partied for three nights in a row until 4am, their front doors open to the corridor. We know Bondi Beach is a party place, but didn't expect it inside a residential building, and at this price for the flat.

I cannot recommend Evelyn's enough. She was absolutely brilliant and so welcoming. The apartment is self contained, spacious, and gorgeous. The bottle of wine was very well received and the views are second to none.
perfect house. great interiors, location fantastic. communication from host was ideal. highly recommended

Susan's studio is an excellent choice for those wanting to explore Sydney's inner west. Her place is close to public transport and and it's really easy to get into and out of town. Susan provided detailed instructions for getting to her place. The studio itself is cosy and comfortable. Breakfast in the morning in the main house was also a nice touch.

This was our first experience with an AirBNB booking and we were very impressed with how easy Linda made the whole experience from getting the key, the welcoming packet of biscuits, the offer to use all and sundry within the apartment. The location was perfect for us in that it was outside the CBD area yet walkable to it. The local restaurants, cafes were great and we have no hesitation in recommending the apartment to others.
Chris and Bob
It is very clean and comfortable accommodation. I recommend it to those who want to find a place closed to the Sydney International Airport.
All good

Very nice flat a stone's throw for Hyde Park, close to subway, food market, and the  hip bars and restaurants of Surry Hills.  It is a small flat but the way it was cleverly designed makes it look spacious and luminous, with a nice living room, a well-equipped open kitchen and a small outdoor area.  There are three very comfortable bedrooms each with own shower room, one on ground floor, and two on upper floors. I truly enjoyed my stay and definitely recommend this place to anyone.

We stayed at Vickie's apartment for five nights and we enjoyed it a lot. The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures and it's well-equipped, beautiful and cozy (the bed is especially comfortable). 
Victoria was very friendly and easy to communicate with. When we had issues with the wifi, she immediately came over and sorted everything out, although it was already 8 or 8.30 in the evening. She also gave us a lot of information about restaurants, bars and sights in the area. All of her recommendations were really good too!
We had an amazing time in Sydney, thanks to our great host Vickie and her lovely apartment. We can definitely recommend this place! :)
Very stylish and spacious apartment in a perfect central location
Outstanding in every way!!  If there were more stars in the ratings I would use every one!  They have set a very high standard for future Airbnb experiences.
Tim’s place is convenient, clean and perfect for travellers who are seeking a central location, close to public transport.

I definitely enjoyed my stay at here. Room is clean and cozy, house is beautiful and artistic, location is convenient, host is  really friendly and great. For me, can’t say anything bad about here!! Perfect!!

This place is charming and close to public transport. It made taking the train to an from the airport very convenient. It was walking distance to some tourist areas and close to a grocery store. I was very happy with my stay and communication was always prompt. There was a lovely touch of wine on arrival. It was clean with convenient amenities.
Very good - great position and Maria and Jerry were lovely

Great location! Close walk to darling harbour! 15 min walk to town hall station! Cute apartment with everything you need!
Car park is tiny though, so will only fit a small car.
great location. disappointed with dirty bathroom
房屋位置很好,只是过于老旧了,顶层木地板走起来有声音,阳台门锁不住,浴室竟然找不到一个可以挂毛巾的挂钩,隔音很差,总而言之一切只赢在了地理位置｡

Hugo's place is great, very clean, and fabulous location in Sydney.  We especially like the closeness to the Metro station, bus routes, and cafes and shopps at Kings Cross and Victoria Street.  The nearby gyms gave me free passes...wonderful!

We stayed in a group of 11 and absolutely loved the house. It was clean and comfortable. Marcella provided everything we needed and more. While there are many books and household items of hers around, she made sure there was plenty of storage for us including heaps of space in the fridge and wardrobe space in each room. 
The location of the house is perfect. A very short walk to the beach but off the main drag so not too busy. Most importantly everything was as described or better. Thank you for opening up your space for us.

The location was perfect, very central with great public transport near by. After some understandable complications with check in, Lachlan went above and beyond to make things up to us and ensure we had the best stay possible in Sydney. We would 100% go back.
Spacious and clean, loved the kitchen and bathroom.    Sarah was kind enough to let us check in early, this is really a treat after flying for 17 hours!

Ideally located next to Central Station and plenty of cafes in the area. The apartment was easy to find and felt secure.

The apartment was clean and bright with a balcony on both levels. 

Pleasantly surprised to find extra touches, such as extra towels and some toiletries also available. 

The kitchen was well equipped and we enjoyed the complimentary wine on arrival. 

Would highly recommend. The apartment is close to transport and a 30 minute walk to the CBD.
Eleni’s house is very clean and comfortable. The location is very good. Eleni and her sister are very nice. Everything is very well!
Host are very accommodating to your needs it is clean and tidy it is a little small so would only recommend 4 people at most

Absolutely beautiful house, just a stones throw to camp cove. Our host was fantastic and made sure we had everything we needed, even breakfast in the morning. We will definitely stay again      when in Sydney next. This listing is perfect, a must stay, ticks every box, it is beyond 5stars and it doesn't get much better than this
Cheers

Jennifer has a lovely period period home in what is like an inner city suburb. Might not feel inner city being in Balmain, but does have that feel. 

Our host is lovely and left us lots of provisions which made eating breakfast easy.

There are books to read, a daily newspaper delivered and a quick bus ride to the ferry.

A lovely time had by the four of us. Thank you.
Great apartment and amazing location. Handy for everything. Very comfortable and had everything we needed. Highly recommend.

The place has it all, great location, excellent views, shops and restaurants within a walking distance, ferry terminal just at the end of the street and if you don't want to visit CBD you are in the middle of Sydney Olympic park with great walks, bicycle rides and all the rest. Moreover, you have free secure parking included in the price.

Arnie and his wife were both friendly and helpful. The house is in a great neighborhood and is centrally located so it is quick and easy to get almost anywhere. The home itself is eclectic, charming and elegant. Definitely a good spot to stay!
Fanastic place to stay if you are visiting a loved one at the Adventist Retirement Village. Leena was a wonderful host.

Heidi was very pleasant to deal with and provided me the flexibility I needed when it came to a late checkout. 
The large beautiful home was extremely comfortable and very well equipped to suit my large family's needs. 
Her backyard was manicured abc the pool was super clean.

This is a very modern apartment in an incredible location. I wish I had more time to explore the surrounding area than I did. The host was very accommodating to travel plans, and very responsive to my communications. I would definitely stay here again if I come back to Sydney.

L’appartement est très bien situé, un peu petit mais convient très bien pour 2 personne. Il est propre.
Johannes répond rapidement aux questions
Beautiful view, gorgeous apartment, and perfect location. Would definitely stay here again the next time I’m in Sydney! Thanks for the wonderful stay, Desireé!

Ziggy’s apartment is in a fantastic position between the harbour and the beach (it even has water glimpses). 
Communication and check in was timely and easy. 
It is a very clean and spacious studio apartment. 
When we are back in Manly we will stay with Ziggy again.

Really fantastic location, super close and accessible to the city, kings cross, bondi beach, and local amenities like a super market. However, there is no proper ventilation so the room becomes very stuffy and hot during the day and evening.
It was very nice at Pauls appartment! So central with a lovely facility! We enjoyed our Weekend. Thanks! :-)

Sam should get extra positive points... when was the last time your host UNDERSTOOD how to sleep comfortably. This is the only host to use proper pillows that support your neck, thus spine, for a good sleep.

The accommodation: 
It is oddly picturesque as a converted garage situated at the bottom of the main house.

The greatness:
•Friendly residents. 
•The USB plug socket. 

Accommodation Tip: 
The towel rack is attached to the doorway between the main room and the kitchen.

Recommendations: 
Go to Church Street for those evening vibes. 

What felt missing from an Airbnb superhost: 
That welcome home goody bag feeling - this would incident a typical bathroom cup to put one's toothbrush in, cold water in the fridge, a full loaf of bread or dietary snack alternatives with spreads, an option of tea/coffee during the stay; these finer super host experience touch was being missed. However there was the salt and pepper condiments. 

The minutiae of an Airbnb feel was not felt, like a pen and pad, a welcome book with recommended foods and attractions. 

The neutral (for light sleepers): 
1. Only for the well instructed, and using your own power source. Good luck getting your Android to work with the MirrorCast device; don't forget to bring a 2A USB charger. 
2. The 6am singing from the bird wildlife for about 30mins. This is AUS, this should be expected and accepted by residence, otherwise try the CBD. 
3. The road noise in the distance (this is hardly noticed if not sensitive to sound) 
4. As mentioned by the host. The acoustics are not great and you can hear upstairs. This made it into the next category below.

The not so satisfying: 
Unfortunately as the accommodation is a conversion of the ground floor on the property, you can clearly hear the TV, conversations, wonderful chimes from the doorbell and footsteps through the front door from the property owner(s) upstairs. 
• The accommodation does not retain heat. 
• The digital signal for the TV in the accommodation always cuts off. 
• Bowls are provided :-) , but there are no larger size bowls... :-( 
• The accommodation door does not stop a cold  draught 
• The Wi-Fi is a home network. If you're able to connect, you will be sharing your devices visibility over the router during busy times with the others in the above property. You can accidentally play your music/videos to the wrong TV or speaker and shock the people in the building upstairs. This is also a security issue for the tech. savvy. 
• There's only one mirror and one sink, it is head height and is only in the kitchenette-shower. 
•The bed blanket visually looks like it has seen better days. 
• Bring your own coffee capsules for the machine.
Fred and Bernadette were more than accommodating, absolutely beautiful apartment with amazing views!
Great location, family friendly

A stylish, well equipped,  well proportioned  apartment in the best location.  As good as it looked in the photographs. Anita is a lovely host, quick to respond and made our arrival, stay and departure as simple and convenient to us as was possible .  Hope the apartment is free on my next visit!
Perfectly comfortable stay. Just what I was after for work

Tim and Mel’s place is as lovely as it looks; even better, should I say, when you consider their hospitality and thoughtfulness. They truly put themselves in their guests’ shoes and do their best to accomodate to your preferences (within limit, of course). I had a delightful time staying at their residence, which was very close to the Green Square train station, and I would highly recommend their place to anyone looking for a comfortable, affordable and convenient place to stay!

Very private location and walking distance to train.  Few stops to the city.  Gorgeous cottage, two beautiful fluffy cats to meet you each morning and one huge goldfish in the pond on the front verandah.  So quiet and clean.  Will be returning.
Awesome!
Chloe is always available to help and very responsive.. thank you Chloe!!

Belinda was vibrant and welcoming. The studio is lovely, private and decked out with everything you need for a cosy weekend away - there was even a fire pit which Belinda generously allowed us to use. The location is gorgeous, Bundeena is so relaxing, I didn't want to leave!
lovely place
신속한 피드백과 위치가 좋아서 여행하기 편했어요

We loved staying at Wayne and Kate's beautiful apartment right on the beach. The apartment is beautifully furnished and we felt right at home. Wayne and Kate were fantastic hosts and were in regular contact to make us feel welcome. We can't stress enough how good the location is, being able to walk across the road for a swim at a moments notice is amazing. Highly recommended!

Edi was super helpful from the moment I contacted her and Dion. Instructions were sent properly to access the house while she was away,and we even found the cat :) best cat ever I might say :) 
We really enjoyed how close to the station it was and close to the airport too. Location is great, security wise is amazing ,own keys for room ,plunger coffee and great stories if you around when Edi is there. Was delighted to wake up to Dion’s music and voice so thanks for that too. Will def return ! :)
Cathy is always a fantastic host - easy-going, flexible and a great communicator.
Great location and perfect for one person or a couple. Very spacious room and comfrotable bed. An Excellent value.

Xiaowen's place was great very comfortable and stylish. Had everything you needed for a great sleep. 

Unfortunately I didn't meet Xiaowen but spoke on the phone she was very helpful and polite.
Hernans place was perfect as usual. Unfortunately we didn't cross paths during my last stay but he is a great bloke and I recommend staying with him. Thanks again mate
A beautifully furnished place in close proximity to the SCH.
We had a perfect stay! Nice, comfortable room, very clean!
Great place, was just as much a pleasure as the first time!

Phan went out of her way to meet us at her place and had plenty of information about the neighbourhood, etc.  The apartment was clean and well equipped.  It was a great place for a good price and close to everything we needed.
The unit is very comfortable and it seems it has just been renovated. The location is good and also there's a car space to park. The shower is very good and the beds are comfortable.

Fred and Bernadette went out of their way to have the apartment ready early for us after the long flight from England with our two teenage children. There were thoughtful touches like cake, juice, coffee, cereal etc ready to help us settle in. We all felt very comfortable in this spacious homely apartment. Buses into the City were easy to use and close by. A quiet, pleasant neighbourhood in an amazing setting. The view of the bay and nearby golf course were outstanding. We only stayed three nights but would happily have stayed longer.
Shuang's place is really nice. I liked the interiors. The bed is comfortable. Bedroom and bathroom are clean.

I had the most wonderful stay with Rhonda and her family. It was my first time in Australia and I was quiet anxious to arrive. But straight away I met Rhonda and she showed me round where I was living, and the local places in the area. The location was perfect, I walked approximately 15 minutes everyday to Westfields where the bus stops/train station are located. It's a 7 minute train journey to Cronulla beach too. Westfields has every shop you'd ever need and some lovely food places. 

I felt extremely welcome and comfortable throughout my stay, I can't thank them enough!
Perfect host and location - thoroughly recommend!
Comfortable house , very close to the beach and fabulous round window!

Susan is a very welcoming host. She provides information about the public transport, which was really helpful. She also had really good recommendations for what to do in Sydney. The Studio was very clean and comfy. The plane noise was alright. You didn't have to set an alarm so you get up early and you see something of Sydney. The breakfast was very good. There were fruits, muesli, toast and coffee or tea. All in all I really enjoyed my stay in Sydney at Susan's studio.

Very hospitable and quick responses to requests.
Great location, close to public transport (bus & light rail).
Enjoyed our stay at Phan's place. Good location and friendly host with great communication.
Nice, clean apartment.  Great communications and very easy check in and out.  Upscale, nice neighborhood.  Very quiet.

The apartment was very spacious. The room was as per the picture. It had all the facilities and Purple was a delightful person. She even kept a packet of chocolates as a welcome gift, which was thoughtful :) 
I had a comfortable stay, but would like to suggest to change the description to room in an apartment(considering it was not an entire apartment to myself). 
Thanks for hosting me.

Kasey’s apartment is clean, modern, and perfect location for a stay in Bondi. All appliances are new and run well and Kasey was very attentive in making sure everything was up to standard. I would gladly recommend this apartment to anyone wanted to stay in Bondi!

What a spectacular location! The apartment, the view, the birds in the morning, dreamy and hard to leave! Evelyn was wonderful, friendly, considerate and thoughtful, a pleasure to meet and Avalon and Pittwater are really magical! One of the most peaceful and special places I've ever been to.

This apartment is a very stylish and excellently kitted out. It's first class accommodation in a first class location. The Manly ferry is ideal  for seeing Sydney and Manly itself has a very enjoyable spot with great facilities and relaxed feel to it.

Xinhui's apartment is in a quiet little street, very clean and tidy, and everything is the same as the picture. There is a  convenience store nearby, everything is convenient and totally beyond our expectations. Thanks to xinhui for providing free luggage.

Felt welcome and allowed privacy- lovely coffee in the morning too!

Nice area and handy for Sydney
This cabin was beautiful and exactly as described. We found the hosts welcoming and the neighbourhood perfect for visiting family living in the inner north.
Great little unit. Looked brand new. Overall clean and comfortable. Good location, convenient to airport, city and Eastern Suburbs. I would definitely stay here again

We could not have wanted anything more. The booking process and instructions were clear and any questions quickly answered from the start. The apartment is in an unbeatable location with views of Bondi Beach and an easy walk to everything. The apartment was spotlessly clean, modern, impeccably and tastefully presented and every possible amenity considered and provided. Anita was a pleasure to deal with and so accommodating to allow us to bring our dog. Honestly this has been the best air bnb experience we have ever had. Value for money in a prime location where we could bring both dog and a car made the trip a big highlight. Thanks Anita!

I drove down from Qld for the NRL grand final and found Rhonda and her family to be warm, friendly and generous hosts. They added little touches, like the care pack and the local information in the cosy granny flat, and I felt instantly at home. 
We had dinner at a local cafe on Friday night, and the food and company were great!
The street and yard are very pretty with lots of trees and birds.
I would definitely recommend this little piece of heaven, and would definitely come back!
Stunning location. Very clean. Comfortable bed. Even down to the smaller touches like beach towels and tea bags. Anita was a very helpful host and easy to communicate with. Highly recommend.
Andrew’s place is beyond my expectation. Me and my family really enjoy our stay. The location is good. It is really suite for someone who stay with family.

What a pleasant surprise after a string of "less than expected" experiences on air BnB.    

The secure parking and lifts are just the beginning.  Kerri has created a delightfully modern and stylish home that lends itself to being shared.   Truly tasteful and functional bathroom, and it was all mine.  It all continues upstairs with the perfect kitchen, a sun filled dining and lounge area, flowing  out onto large private deck with views of a vast city skyline, including the harbour bridge, which is probably ten kilometres  away.   Truly magnificent.  Yes there are some big noises from the road out front  and the jumbo jets above, but it really isn't a problem.  Kerri loves this space and who wouldn't.
Excellent value. Patrick and Christine were very accommodating to all our needs

Apartment shown is exactly as it turned out to be, modern and clean, the location was great and close to the cbd mall, QVB, Galleries, Town Hall stn etc. There was some traffic noise at night from cars below but that is to be expected living so central in a busy area. One downside was the hot water in the shower wasn't hot enough and the next person to shower didn't get much hot/warm water.

Good location but no supermarkets nearby - only expensive convenience stores. There was a fire alarm on one of the days which shut down the elevator all day requiring us to climb 18 flights of stairs. Other than that we had a good stay.
Great place to stay!
Great spot, plenty of room for everyone! Thank you

We had a wonderful relaxing stay at a beach break and lake. The location was great and the apartment was positioned directly between the beach and lake. It was also a very short drive to other nothshore beaches such as whale beach and palm beach. The host Terri was lovely, helpful, and very responsive to any queries.  The next door neighbours were also very friendly and welcoming which made you feel at home. Overall we had a great stay and didn't want to leave!

A smooth pre-stay process with an easy check-in and out procedure. We were a bit late arriving due to flight delays but that was no problem. There were a couple of hiccups that were dealt with quickly and I believe will be sorted for future guests as a result. 
Fabulous location (a bit of street noise, but that's what you get being in the centre of the city!) and I felt safe in the apartment which was comfortable.

Loved staying here, great location and amazing space. Has everything you need, Vivienne was quick to respond to any questions and the place has great amenities. Would definitely recommend to friends and stay again.
Great location, clean room and bathroom!
Really enjoyed your hospitality and company. Nice to see a happy couple. Wish you well in your Airbnb. Great value for money.
Great stay!
I highly recommend this place. Just as described. My girfriend and i had a awesome time here.
Lina is a very nice host, and the apartment is comfortable, quiet to live in.

We loved our recent stay at George and Lucia’s Granny flat. The place is very stylish, modern, very clean & has all the essentials you could possibly need for your stay. It’s extremely quiet on a night too and felt very safe. 

Both George and Lucia are great hosts, very welcoming & are always available for any help you may need. 

It took about 15 minutes on the train to get into the CBD but it’s a straight line from Kingsgrove so made life really easy to get about.

Would recommend the granny flat to anyone looking to explore Sydney!
The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great small apartment for 4 people to enjoy all the things Manly has to offer. The convenient location close to the wharf makes it very easy to get to the city. Very nice overall!

I booked the apartment for my parents whilst they were visiting us in Sydney. The flat is a great size for 2 people, and the small study with lots of storage and hanging space was a plus too. Kitchen is small (or about average if you live in a similar period block!) but has everything needed for cooking simple meals. Beautifully furnished and a great place to relax, plus amazing location. Only thing parents struggled with was traffic noise from the street, but some ear plugs and a weeks acclimatising to city life sorted that. Would highly recommend. Thanks Paul you were a great host!
Lovely guest pad that is separate from the main house which gives us privacy. The space is modern and beautiful as listed. We had a lovely and comfortable stay. Thank you!

Paul and Judith really went out of their way to make the stay pleasant and comfortable. They were friendly and sociable as well as leaving you to your own devices if you wished.

The house was clean and tidy, with a large bedroom and comfortable double bed. The room did get slightly hot some days but that was to be expected in the middle of summer and a fan was thoughtfully provided,

Plenty of space for clothes and other items in the room. Check in was very easy and I was let in by one of their friendly (adult) children.

They have two well behaved dogs who didn't cause any fuss. It was a large and extremely friendly house and would definitely recommend to anyone thinking of staying.

Super spacious and very homely styled house. Everything was very clean, all beds were made beautifully and George was a wonderful host. He always replied within the hour and was very helpful throughout the whole stay and even with checking out. Would highly recommend! Lovely large backyard too perfect for the big group we had

The apartment is excellent. Very confortable.
Bus stop just at the door. Very easy to reach most important places from there.
Mohit has been very kind with us.
We have been four nights and we can only say that everything has been excellent.

We have stayed in this apartment on 3 separate occasions, covering a period of nearly four months in total.  Why? It is a spacious airy apartment, ideal for two people, well equipped and nicely furnished, and the landlord has been a joy to deal with on each occasion. The residents of the other apartments have always been friendly and welcoming which is a plus.
	The raison detrê of this apartment however is its location. 
Local buses and shops are a 5 min stroll, with the main shopping centre of Mosman a short bus ride or 20 min walk. Mosman has all one can want in terms of shopping, two small supermarkets, and delightful local shops where we have always found friendly and excellent service, unlike the UK. The library is ideal for wi fi should you need it. In addition there is a local free bus (2 min away) which will take you shopping, to Balmoral beach and Taronga Zoo.  
The Ferry stop to the City is but a 15 min walk or 2 min bus ride.
We cannot recommend this apartment highly enough, for either a short or long stays. We will continue to return here as long as we are able, as it now become home from home.
The place could be a little cleaner and bug/spiderfree but bedides that the value you get is very good for the price you pay

The room is much better than it’s advertised. So modernized. The bathroom floor can be heated so that you feel very warm when taking a shower. The kitchen is well equipped with everything. The living room is spacious. Krythia leads a very healthy lifestyle and she goes out regularly to attend different activities. She goes to the gym regularly. We had a good chat and felt so comfortable in her house.
Coffee was extremely helpful and responsive. Her place was very clean and centrally located. Would definitely recommend :)

Granny flat accommodation close to Miranda/Sutherland exactly as described. 

Perfect for a few nights. Friendly communicative hosts, would recommend.

Stayed with Kerri as we needed somewhere close to the family (who have grown too much to fit us into their small house). Beautiful apartment and a lovely bedroom and bathroom for our use.  Kerri is a great host and a really nice person - with excellent taste.  We'd be happy to recommend her place to anyone and be happy to stay there again.

This cottage was quintessential Paddington. Very centrally located , very clean, and the flowers and starched white sheets were a special and unexpected treat. Only thing that surprised us was the  bedroom and bathroom were on different levels.  We loved our stay and would highly recommend this cottage.
Great location !!!!!

Had a great stay here. Very quick and informative responses to messages and questions. Description in ad very accurate. Literally 2 minutes to a great beach. 5 mins max walk to shops/cafes.  15 minute walk to other side of Newport. 
Thank you Anne.
Robyn was very welcoming and made sure that I was comfortable and warm as it had just turned very cold! Cosy bed. Very good value. Good central position. Lovely host!

This is an amazing modern creatively designed studio! We absolutely loved the interiors and thought put into making this space work. All the small bonus touches really made it feel like an hotel experience. The location is close enough to shops and cafes yet is still nestled amongst a quiet residential area.  Elise was great to deal with during the entire process, and communication was prompt friendly and honest. Would definitely stay again if we're in the area.  This is an absolute gem of a place if you're looking for a creative and stylish home at an affordable price point compared to your standard boxed apartment!

Hugo and Pamela's apartment is in a great location to visit all of Sydney. Public transport is very close 1/2 - 1 block depending where you are going. If you want to walk to Sydney Harbor, it is less than a mile, but we hopped on the bus each way because it is so convenient and affordable. 
Hugo will contact you a couple of days prior and explain how to access the apt. He gives very clear directions, easy to follow. He also has everything you need to know about the apt. written out in a binder, which we referenced a few times.
We loved the big windows with the view of the harbor. There's great air flow once the windows are all opened, so no worries about not having AC.
We had a great stay, and I would definitely recommend Pamela and Hugo's place.
only place I ever gave a bad review

译文
Scenery is very good and i want wo sent some pic here to prove what i said! We regret we arrived at the lodging place ahead of schedule, lead to the landlord and boyfriend back to the house immedietly. Landlord and her boyfriend are a couple in love and they are good person.The house have a lot of daily products, from bondi is also in 5 minutes distances, it is belong to the north, quiet rest environment. If u went along the way, there are many coffee shops, were only 4 or 5 minutes distance from the bus station, the sitting room can see the sea, very comfortable, we like it so much and thank you!

My husband and I had a great time staying at A's place. It was super cozy, clean and in a good location close to the rocks, circular quay, transit and a grocery store. A was very responsive whenever we had a question. Definitely will recommend this place to anyone visiting Sydney CBD
We spent one night in Terent's place and have to admit that communication between us was great. He responded very quickly to all my questions. Please was ok.

Carole and Steve were extremely welcoming and helpful.  We had a lovely stay and I would highly recommend this listing!
Everything you need in a convenient area.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!  Fred and Bernadette's place was lovely and inviting.  Upon our arrival, Fred recieved us and showed us around the place.  The place was nicely furnished and information on the local sights were also neatly layed out for us.  The place overlooks the lovely Malabar Bay.  

I am confident that future guests will enjoy the place just like we did.

Thanks again Fred and Bernadette!

A fantastic location - you could not be closer to the beach and bustle of beautiful Manly. Ward was a very helpful host, answering queries promptly and kindly leaving us a fridge full of food - very helpful when travelling with small children after a long flight. The flat could do with a little TLC, but the location and the view more than make up for this. A place to kick off your shoes, grab a beer and head straight out to the surf. Fantastic cafes and restaurants nearby too. Would stay here again.

Unfortunately the entire place was infested with bedbugs, so we had to cancel our stay. Yang was quick to respond but still charged us for a full night even if we didnt end up sleeping there. Yang did not seem overly concerned about the bedbugs and suggested we use the bugspray in one of the cabinets..we did not expect this. The place was nicely decorated but a bit far from downtown Sydney and the key was inside a safe in the building (and we needed the key to get into that (Website hidden by Airbnb) was quite a challenge! I sincerely hope that the bedbug issue will be taken care of seriously because our stay would have been great had it not been for that.
Shuang was very nice and helpful. He did everything to make us feel welcome. The place was nice and simple but with everything you needed. Very nice overall value for money.

Really nice place — clean, friendly, very nicely furnished — with a fridge — cereal, fruit, bread, bread, coffee and a pitcher of milk waiting for us.  It has dishes and flatware, and a plastic tub and drainer for washing dishes. The bathroom/shower are upscale and very nice.  Michelle is quick to respond to emails and phone calls, and is very helpful.  I’m sorry we weren’t able to coordinate our respective timing so we could meet in person.  
The location — Newton — is downscale trendy — close to the metro train station, so getting to places was fairly easy.  We were pleased with our stay there.  Amazing murals and graffiti.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Centrally located, nice host, but not quite what we were expecting.....
Clean and organized
Close to everything Manly has to offer
Great location and felt at home right away!! Host was excellent play was well presented and tidy. we'll be coming back for sure.

Great place to stay, conveniently located, a home away from home. We appreciate all the extra touches that Mariana did to make us feel even more welcome. Now that we've found her place we hope to return.
Very convenient
Location was reasonably closed to the train station and CBD. This listing is suitable for travellers who are easy going.

Nicole and Simon’s apartment was perfect for our two week stay in Sydney, right in the middle of Surry Hills, close to so many fantastic cafes, restaurants and pubs. Also really handy for Central Station or for a walk down into CBD or Sydney Harbour.  The apartment was exactly as described and immaculately maintained. Nicole and Simon provided a very handy guide to the local eateries which was really useful. Would not hesitate to go back again. Thanks so much to Nicole and Simon.
Ben was a great host, his apartment was central to Sydneys busy CBD and near lots of good places to eat. We would highly recommend staying here.

Great view, its all about the view. Over looking Sydney's best beach. Perfect. Transport is a little hit and miss, it always is for the bus but an Uber is only $30 each way from the apartment to the city. Easy stroll along the cliff top to Bondi and all the eating and drinking it offers. Great location for a short break in beautiful Sydney
简直完美!超大的房间,超棒的公共区域!完美的超乎想象!设施相当齐全,并且步行就可以到港口!这么久以来遇到的最喜欢的房间!
We had a wonderful 4 days loved the apartment and location.
Comfortable place to stay, good kitchen facilities, easy access to transport and nearby supermarket, places to eat etc.
Clean, tidy, home close to the best parts of Cronulla. Thank you Robert for opening your home to us.
Great would stay there again

We stayed in Unit 2, which is a different place to the pictures - it should be noted that this unit has a staircase, in case that may be a problem. Despite it being a different place, we enjoyed our stay and the location is absolutely fantastic - we left our car in the street and just walked around Newport for our 2-night stay. There's a great community feel to the area. Appreciated the fruit and breakfast items left out, as well as some choccy and a couple of beers! :)
Great place in the CBD, terrific location. Ana was also very patient with us as we were stuck in traffic.
A clean, light and modern apartment within reasonable walking distance of the city centre. A little on the cosy side, but perfectly comfortable!

The house is cozy and nice to live in with everything you need. The bedroom is clean and tidy. The host is great and welcoming. No more to ask for this price and it's within walking distance to Central. Definitely the first choice if u ever visit Sydney.

We loved our stay at Kristin’s!
The location is amazing and we walked everywhere from the house.
The room is very comfortable and clean. Perfect for two people.
We would definitely stay again!

This place was perfect! Very nice, large space great for our family to hang out if we had no plans in evening. Area was quiet, buy also livrky if that is what you were looking for. Very close to shopping and restaurants. Great place for families with young kids or young adults! Thank you the great stay!
Awesome location and cool apartment. Great contact from Sarah. Would stay again

Sam's place was very nice and convienent. It was clean and spacious, comfortablly seeping a group of 4. It is central to most of the city and close to public transport for other places you may want to go. Sam was also very accommodating in helping us store luggage after check out since our flight wasn't until late!
Warmly welcomed and extremely clean room.
A nice place. The bed is huge. They made me feel at home although they were at work most of the time. Very accommodating even when I had to check in late.

A great location for seeing the iconic sites of Sydney and the North Sydney beaches. After a 10 min walk to the trains, you can be in the CBD in 10 mins. From the airport to the apartment door was 50 minutes.
Amazing house, secure, clean, comfortable, sensational location, wonderful communication. What more could you ask for from an Airbnb? Highly Recommended!!

Paul's place was perfect, close to the beach and had everything we needed. Paul was extremely easy to communicate with and was very accommodating when we required an extra mattress. Check in and out was easy. It was great to have a parking permit as we left the car and walked everywhere during our stay. Thank you Paul.

Oriel is a fabulous host. He was super friendly and responsive and met us at the apartment to show us around.

The apartment itself is in a fabulous location with great views over to Darling Harbour and easy walk to nearby cafes and city shopping. It has a gym and pool.

Compared to hotels around it’s an absolute bargain. There’s a hefty cleaning fee but assuming that stays the same no matter how long you stay. We only stayed one night so proportionally it was a lot but if you stayed over a longer period the per night rate would be less. Even so it was still very economically priced.

It’s fully furnished but otherwise empty, and although not absolutely brand new it’s in great condition and clean and tidy. It’s just as described and in the photos.
Fill comfortable

Perfect locations, in the same street there are a lots of bars and restaurants. I haven't meet Hugo, but a friend of his made the check in for him, really nice person. Both of them were so nice to me and answered all my questions. The apartment is cozy and perfect for 1 person or a couple.

We enjoyed staying at the Treetop Cottage on our visit to Sydney!  Bryan welcomed us warmly when we arrived and provided a tour and a description of all the amenities.  The two level cottage is a charming row house in the historic district of Glebe.  Our family was very comfortable (2 adults, 2 children), it was truly a home away from home.  Bryan thought of everything to make our visit comfortable; from great coffee, to comfortable bedding.  He even went out of his way to offer a wifi connection and Opal cards for public transportation.  We loved our Australian holiday and really enjoyed Sydney and the Treetop Cottage!
地理位置不错,离机场7分钟车程,离City15分钟车程,房东回复信息很及时,到达时会亲自迎接你,公寓还有免费停车位｡

The location of the place is great for exploring Sydney. The kitchen and bathroom are quite worn in compared to the photos and were very dirty on check in. Throughout the stay there were cockroaches throughout the property even though the place had been cleaned.
Perfect location, house was wonderful and clean great communication from host A+++

I had a lovely stay in Isabella's house. The room was beautifully set up and very, very comfortable. The facilities were easy to find and were clean. The location is perfect and the house is located on a gorgeous inner-city street across from a park. Unfortunately I was unable to meet Isabella, as I was out and about during much of my short stay, but she made it very easy for me to let myself in and find everything I needed. I felt very welcome and at home.

My little boy(14mths) and I  had a long stay in Steven's cabin, for almost three weeks while my partner was in hospital recovering from surgery.
We found Steven and Peta to be very kind and generous hosts during this stressful period, of which we will always be very grateful. The lawn and garden in front of the cabin are perfect for little kids, and there were  playgrounds within walking distance. Numerous good and affordable restaurants and cafes very close by(5 mins walk/pram ride) and I was always able to find street parking. Highly recommend and we'll be back when next in Sydney.
Great! Definitely we will back!

I've never used Airbnb until this trip, and I was a bit nervous my first go around in an international city, but Angela made the process very smooth and saw to it that everything was taken care of for me. Very clean place and comfortable to stay in.
All as described, prompt response, highly recommended.
Great spot and host all good !!!

I stayed at David's place with my mother, who was visiting from the UK. We both found it to be a lovely, well-equipped apartment, in a fantastic location for exploring Sydney. The sun room is an especially nice space for watching the world go by down below.
David was a great host to communicate with and greeted us personally to show us in to the apartment. Thanks, David, for a great stay!

The host deserve every word of the great reviews. Communication was practically instantaneous. They provide a warm welcome, a beautifully clean, comfortable home, everything could possibly need for a short stay, in a great location. Really enjoy, looking forward to stay next time! I cannot recommend them more highly!
The host was great, the apartment was perfect and the neighborhood is amazing. A great place for a great vacation.

Alexey’s space was lovely! A great host, he made sure we could check in and out when needed, and responded to messages quickly. Extra touches like bringing us coffee, and providing a bottle of wine on arrival made the trip even better!
Great location!!! Short walk to ferries. Easy safe entry with very comfortable accommodations.

Perfectly located less than 100 meters from Green Square Train Station (one stop away from Central) this place is just as beautiful as the photos. Very, very clean and Tim and Mel are so kind and easy to chat with. They also give you your own space if that’s what you like. I had a lovely gift basket of muesli bars and crisps on the bed when I arrived. The whole area is brand new, and buildings are still going up, so there’s a bit of construction going on around the place (Sept 2018), however, it didn’t ruin my stay. The apartment building Tim and Mel’s place is in is very beautiful - quiet too!

Local tips: I’d recommend popping into Textbook Boulangerie which is about 200m away - amazing French Pastries. Grounds of Alexandria isn’t far either - hip cafe/coffee options. The new library is worth popping into as well - it’s quite a spectacle at night.

Woolworths is virtually on your doorstep too.

Thanks for a great stay!

Tim and Mel’s place was impeccable. It ticked all boxes and exceeded my expectations. Communication was great and Tim was very helpful to me as a guest newish to AirBnB.  Close to public transport, excellent cafes and shops. Great AirBnB experience.

Diana & Jared's is a nice well equipped Airbnb apartment located in a shopping mall, with a view on a bush and the rising sun from its balcony. 40kms away from CBD, but with all shopping facilities downstairs and a parking place that makes it a perfect location for business needs if you're planning to work somewhere around.

Not suitable for a long stay though, if you can't afford to pay for the whole duration upfront. Although my plans for a 3 months stay there were shared with the owner from day one, I discovered another booking had been accepted meanwhile when trying to extend my booking to the third month planned.
Angela was a wonderful host. The room was very clean, spacious and comfortable. It was very convenient from the airport! Thanks again Angela!
Amazing views!

Tess & Rod were wonderful hosts. They were there to greet us on arrival and explain the accomodation and available to answer our questions.
