The unit is cosy has a beautiful courtyard, and is a good size, the beds are very comfortable. It had everything we needed. Brekky was lovely with home made muffins and jams.

Tess even offered to drive us back to our transport, thank you for a great stay.
Terry is a great host ! She was up to every detail ! Lots of movies to choose from if you have a difficult day, great advices of the city and awesome place to stay

Hernanはすごく優しくて親切な方でした｡
部屋はとてもｷﾚｲでﾍﾞｯﾄﾞは大きく､ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑも清潔でｷｯﾁﾝも食器がたくさんあり､本当に快適でした｡
場所はﾊﾞｽ停からすぐですので､OPALｶｰﾄﾞやﾌﾘｰﾊﾟｽなどがあれば､CITYまで出るにも一切問題ありません｡
Hernanは本当に良いﾎｽﾄで､私はいつもﾘﾗｯｸｽして過ごすことができました｡
私は今回の旅でHerananに出会えたことが一番の思い出です!
本当にありがとうございました｡


Hernan is very kind parson.
We had amazing times.
Thank you!!!
room is very clean and bathroom and kitchen, also very good.
He is perfect host!!

The location of Cindy's house is great, quite accessible from the city. You can walk to the Coogee beach easily. The neighbourhood looked safe and is very quiet. Due to my busy schedule I couldn't spend much time at Cindy's house and chat with her. But the evening we met and sat down for a chat was great. She's kind, funny and very helpful. I wish her all the best and hope her place will be available when I visit Sydney next time.

Great value for money! The location is only around the corner from the library and the castle towers shopping centre which was so handy. Lulu and her mum were really helpful in accommodating. Thanks you both!
vary naice place, quiet, clean, neat and most of all, Shuang is an extremely helpful host. I really loved my stay.

The house was perfect for our needs -- two minutes from the beach and close to shops, restaurants, the pub and a frequent bus service to Bondi Junction and Sydney.  The house is more spacious than it looks in the photos --  six people spanning three generations could have been difficult but it wasn't, we never felt on top of each other.  The rooms were all very nice and the kitchen well-equipped for the most part. We all enjoyed our stay, Marcella was very accommodating when we requested an additional night. I would definitely recommend this to my friends.
A lovely apartment in a great location.

Wendy’s Unterkunft ist sehr modern und schick eingerichtet. Wir waren drei Mädchen, die für drei Nächte hier untergekommen sind. 

Da Wendy unterwegs war, hatte sie vergessen, dass wir zu dritt anreisen und daher war das dritte Bett nicht vorbereitet. Wir informierten sie also, dass wir noch das dritte Bettzeug bräuchten. Sie hat dann ganz schnell jemanden organisiert der uns das dritte Bettzeug und ein drittes Handtuch beschaffen hat. 

Die Kommunikation mit Wendy verlief super schnell und sehr gut. Sie hat sich ganz schnell bemüht uns entgegen zu kommen und uns noch einen Rabatt gegeben für die Unannehmlichkeit. Das fand ich super! 

Das Apartment war ansonsten mit allem ausgestattet was man braucht und das Bad ist sehr schön! 

Unser Check-in lief reibungslos und schnell. Für ein paar Nächte kann man hier gut unterkommen. Verschiedene Busse fahren die Straße runter und ein Schwimmbad sowie ein Fitnessraum bietet die Unterkunft auch. 

Ich würde die Unterkunft weiterempfehlen allerdings nur zu zweit. Das dritte Bett bzw. Sofa nicht ganz so komfortabel ist. Daher hat man allein oder zu zweit hier sicher eine fantastische Zeit. :) ein Supermarkt ist etwas weiter, aber wir haben uns eh viel in der Stadt aufgehalten also war das in Ordnung für uns.

Besonderes Lob für die tolle Kommunikation!
Excellent place. Highly recommend this place for everyone.
Great apartment! Highly recommend.
I will suggest it!!! Definitely:)

It's my first time to use this service in Sydney, I was a little nervous, not very sure what kind of place I would dwell in, not sure who I am going to deal with,to be honest. I was totally relaxed after the initial communication with her, she is very kind and warm, she kept on informing me what necessary matters, even including parking. 

When I arrived in front of her house, which is right behind the historical Valhalla cinema at Glebe, my eyes wildly opened, her place is sitting in an old-style building with a beautiful garden, a nice bobbling fountain. 

She met me and lead to my place, when I stepped in the room, my jaws fell on the ground and it took me a few minutes to pick them up and closed. In a big room, sits a nice iron-framed bed, the bedding looks like an oil painting, very artistic. The space is much more bigger than I would expect. The owner hearted prepare fruits, snacks and even bottled water, that is so touched, everyone who lives in Sydney would know drinking water is not an issue at all, however she prepares the bottled water, when she realized that I drink more water, she prepared jags of them, you know what, she even used the food wrapper to cover it. 

The independent bathroom is also big, she would clean it up everyday, when you step in it, it looks like it isn't being used at all, there is no a drop of water on the glass door, mirror, or wherever you would think it would be.

Both her husband and herself are super nice to the guest, even though I am a horrible one, hardly communicate with them, except basic greetings. How terrible I am. The night before I go back to China, both of them prepared a farewell dinner for me, but I bailed, you can see how a terrible guest I am. 

Her location is wonderful, next to Glebe point road, It's easy to walk around the neighbourhood, beautiful cafes, restaurants, stores and bus stops are within two minutes walking distance. 

Her place is so beautiful, I would wake up in the birds' singing every morning, sometimes, her cute house cat would come and greet you.

Stay at her place is a wonderful experience, like staying at home…this would carve in my brain for a long long time.

We were really unlucky with the weather. 48 hrs of torrential rain. So it is a bit difficult to review the area as we just couldn't enjoy the beach or sea pool. 
However the property was lovely. Very clean and tidy. Very modern and all as you would want to find it 
Bernadette greeted us and showed us around.  Cookies resplendent on the table,  fresh orange juice in the fridge. 
Unless you have a car be prepared, as the nearest useful shop is a bus ride away. Central Sydney is about a 45 minute bus ride away but it doesn't feel that long. 
If the weather had been kinder I think this would have been a perfect place to explore Sydney from.
Great location, comfy clean bed and great value. Jess is a lovely, friendly, helpful host.
I recommend anyone who'd like to get away from the tumult of the city this wonderful peaceful hideaway. They've thought of everything for a relaxing get away

A glorious water view is what you can wake up to, and Evelyn is a respectful and gracious host. 
If you are looking for a launch pad to the beaches, this is a great pick. 
Unfortunately no full kitchen, so plan to eat out!

We had a wonderful stay at Susans little cottage. It was perfect for our stay in the city as we were celebrating a friends birthday close by. We had some lovely chats and will be staying with Susan again.

Thanks for a great nights sleep in your wonderful apartment. It was clean, had nice touches that I enjoyed and was so close to Redfern station the city was not far away at all! It was secure, private and clean

Linda was excellent and more than helpful. It was very easy to communicate and keep in touch with her. She even accommodated for our late check in and late check out!
Apartment was excellent and couldn't have been better!

Thanks Linda!

Great stay at Cats house in Bondi! It was everything were after and more. Could not ask for a more perfect location. The house was clean and tidy and the bakery on the corner is to die for, we visited there every morning! Will definately stay again and recommend to all.
Perfect place to stay!

We enjoyed our stay at Linda's place. The apartment was clean and well equipped. Especially the kitchen included everything we needed and two bathrooms were a blessing for four people. The bed in the main bedroom was ok and two people slept on the sofa bed quite nicely.

The location of the apartment was good. The only downside is that there is no AC; the place (especially the upper floor) can get quite hot if it's very warm outside.

We can highly recommend Linda's place!

I booked this for family staying in Sydney for my wedding.  My family members staying here thoroughly enjoyed their stay.  The apartment was comfortable and clean and within a great area for being central whilst also away from the hussle and bustle of the city!!  Eleanor communicated well and helped out with all our queries before and during the booking.  Thank you!
Highly recommended! we've loved our stay there. Thanks!

Naturally the first thing that is most unique about staying at Andy’s place is that you are living in an attic/loft with 2 skylight windows that bring in plenty of sunshine! It’s not everyday you get to wake up with the sun shining down on you which made waking up very pleasant just busking in the morning light. 

Second of all, I don’t think we’ve ever been on a more comfortable bed. Every night we fall asleep so easily and soundly and every morning it takes us ages to get off the bed because it’s really just that comfortable. You have to try it to believe it.

While Andy wasn’t around in the place, her friend Jacque was and she was the warmest person ever. We were late checking in on the first night and she waited for us to get back so she could welcome us in. 

The toilets are also very extremely clean and well fitted, hot water readily available.

Andy also lives in a really nice quiet neighbourhood that isn't too far off from the city too, which is great cos travelling is convenient and you still get to come home to peace and quiet. That being said, there are plenty of great cafe's and eateries around the neighbourhood, so if you feel like avoiding the city hustle, you're covered.

All in all, we can’t recommend Andy’s place enough and we will definitely be back again soon!

Accurate description of property and located in a wonderful area - directly opposite an iconic beach! Great welcome pack with clear instructions on utilities. No problems with local parking. Easy access to beach and local shops. Great location for runners, surfers and sun bathers alike! Our boys wanted to move in!!

Highly recommended and may consider a return in the near future!! Loved it!
The best thing about this flat is its location. Overall is not as I expected it, pictures were better than the place actually was and cleanliness was quite poor.
Beautiful house in an amazing location just minutes from the rocks. Great host - easy, quick communication and lots of great tips. Highly recommend

Don was a fantastic host. Easy to communicate with and always responded quickly. The location was perfect, close to pubs, restaurants and an easy walk to the SCG. The apartment was clean and tidy and had all the comforts of home. Really appreciated the coffee card with 2 pre paid coffees for the local cafe! Would stay here again!
Had a great stay, thanks
Great spot, short walk to beach and a ton of great cafes and food options nearby!

Very good place to catch a plane. Walking distance from the airport and big supermarket nearby.
The appartment is really clean and very comfortable :)

We loved Eleanor’s place! She provided excellent check-in instructions and even left us cookies on Christmas Day, as well as breakfast items. The neighborhoods of North Sydney and Kirribilli were excellent and close to transit. Highly recommended!

Very quiet location and very close to shops like coles and woolies for essentials. 5 min drive to Blacktown Plaza if you feel like going shopping. The basic usual essentials are in the house for the stay and comfy beds.
Seriously great location and Don is a very knowledgeable host .
Brigitte is easy to communicate with and very hospitable. You need to be comfortable with stairs so not suitable for some travellers.

Kerri is a wonderful host! She is warm, friendly and helpful. She even drove us around to visit Sydney. Her apartment is nice and spacious enough to enjoy a comfortable stay. The location is on walking distance to public transportation. 
If we are ever back in Sydney, we would have no hesitation to stay with Kerri again. Highly recommend! 
Thanks for a great stay !

This is a very nice flat, well located and tastefully furnished great for me as a business traveller or a couple looking for something central.
Excellent communication prior to arrival. I had no problems arise and did not need any assistance during my stay.
I am very happy to recommend Gregoire’s flat to fellow travellers!
Nice guy and nice stay. Very convenient
My second stay with Natasha. If the place is available on your dates, just book it.

victoria is a really great host, she's really handy, and take care of us during stayed at her place. The place just amazing, love the minimalist interior, and looks super clean. and the big window with awesome view. the place close to public transport, bus station just across the street, the train station around 6-7 minutes by walk. i'll coming back to her place. :D

When we first arrived Leslie and Roy made us feel very welcome, explaining everything in detail so we had a really relaxed and smooth stay without any issues. Excellent access to the beach and local shops, highly recommended.

Cute. Compact. Private. A coffee machine with coffee, milk, sugar provided was lovely. Bed was comfy and really liked the pillows, not too soft, not too hard. We liked that the toilet was within the shower stall as it’s self-cleaning. A bit of a noise issue coming from upstairs which we did not mind at all. Close to bus stops and a good 15-minute walk to shops which was handy.
Wendy’s place is nice and modern. Even though we did not meet, she responded quickly to any inquiries that we had. Up and coming neighbourhood. Convenient access to airport by Uber.

We all loved our stay here. The house is beyond beautiful. The view is amazing and the house was perfect for our weekend getaway. 
Thank you to Erin and jo for your hospitality 
We had the best time.
Great stay

The location of Richards house is amazing! The views are beautiful and the peace and quiet is like nowhere else we’ve ever travelled! The house itself is well stocked with all the kitchen utensils you could want. It has been updated enough to have all the comforts you want and expect but still maintains the cottage feel. The only downside we experienced was with the mosquitos, even in winter you need to be mindful to keep all doors and windows closed.
Fantastic apartment in a quiet neighbourhood, very comfortable place to stay with very friendly and responsive hosts!

Tracey's place was the perfect accommodation for our  overnight needs at a nearby function. It is very new & really clean. Although it was a little difficult for the Uber to navigate to late at night - given that the entrance is via a couple of laneways. 
We enjoyed our stay and will return when next visiting our friends in nearby Haberfield.
Very clean, quiet and very close to the airport. Woolworths was a short walk away. Very happy here.

Great location, 10 minutes walk from the beach, really nice setting,  quiet. Justine made sure we would be comfortable. Lovely soaps, croissants orange juice and jam was a nice touch. would definitely go back.
Cozy and clean apartment with friendly host.  Easy access to public transport to and from Sydney airport. Walking distance to a beautiful beach.
The place is close to everything you need and it’s a great size to fit quite a few people!
Our family had a wonderful experience at Ilhwan's place. Would definitely visit again.

This was our first Air BnB experience and Gavin from the start was prompt and professional. As our flight was early, Gavin kindly made arrangements for my friend & I, to be able to check in early.  

The location of the apartment is amazing. It is literally less than 5mins walk from Central Station. The room is much larger than what we expected from the pictures, it had plenty of  room for our luggage. The apartment was clean, the room and bathroom immaculate, bed and pillows were comfortable and clean. Gavin even has a hair dryer for us ladies or guys with really long hair. 

We spent the day wondering around Surrey Hills and coming from Melbourne I need my coffee in the morning, Sample coffee on Devonshire st  and Le Monde on Foveaux St has amazing coffee and it is just around the corner less than 5mins walk.   
That evening we spent dinner with Gavin and had a enjoyable conversation while watching my AFL team WIN, GO HAWKS! 

Gavin is a great host making us feel welcome and comfortable, making sure we had everything we needed for our stay. Living in the area Gavin knows where everything is, is it spot on with recommending place to eat around Surrey Hills and its all within walking distance( I have said that enough already? lol). 

YOU MUST try the pie's at Bourke St Bakery and Churros from Movida.
As you can see I'm BIG on food. I Loved that we were only 5 mins walk away from china town, there is also a taxi depot in the next street so we had no issues getting a cab. 

If you are down for the weekend over spring head down to The Rocks for the markets and eat macarons at la renaissance café and the food stalls there amazing food!

If your a foodie like me my favourite places to eat was: Din Tai Fung for dumplings, be prepared to wait but they are worth it, Gumshara Ramen for their thick tonkotsu broth and N2  ice cream in Chinatown, Ms g's for a twist on Vietnamese food in Potts point. Around Surrey Hills Morh fish, Bourke st Bakery, Ruben Hills and Chur Burger.

All in all , with our bellies full, our legs and feet exhausted we had a great experience in Sydney and staying with Gavin and would defiantly stay again without hesitation.
A very nice experience at this place. Close to beach, city and airport. Overall, a good experience here.

Millie was an excellent host and had gone out of her way to make sure we felt welcome. She was always friendly and quick to reply to our questions. Her attention to detail and thoughtfulness included a handy one-page reference card (how to use the coffee machine, where to find the light switches, etc) and some menus from the local takeaway places. 

The unit was clean and matched it's photos and description. It was a short walk from the train station (easy even with a suitcase) and there was no noise from the train line. We would definitely stay here again. It was like staying at a tidy friend's house.

The view is superb.
Beautiful apartment a great location. The view is amazing especially if there is a lighting storm.
You will meet a true super host who anticipates your every need and who is as responsive as we have ever experienced.
We loved the apartment,  it was a lovely place to spend our weekend. Located in a beautiful area,  close to beaches,  cafes and restaurants.  Thanks for having us!
Great spot by the beach.
perpect

Great location, very clean and easy to communicate. The view is wobderful. Public transport is easy and cheap. Had a lovely time meeting Terry and would recommend. Thanks for your patience with flight cancellations and delays!

My family of four felt completely at-home in this BandB and in the surrounding neighborhood. There are great small restaurants nearby, a huge open-air market that sets-up in the park across the street on Saturday morning, and abundant transit (bus, train, taxi, uber) close-by to explore Sydney.

We had an amazing stay in Cath's studio. It has absolutely everything you could ever need. The thoughtful touches such as yoghurt, milk fresh bread and fresh eggs were just some of the things Cath provided us to make our stay as comfortable and enjoyable as it was. Beautiful clean studio that has everything and more you could possibly need. We will never be staying in a hotel in Sydney again ! Cath went above and beyond to welcome us and make our stay as comfortable as possible. Heaps of DVDs, magazines and books, fluffy towels and extremely comfortable bed and pillows ! Everything you could possibly need in the fridge and a great location to get to the airport and nearly by restaurants cafes and inner city. We loved our stay at Cath's! Will definitely be back soon!
My family of five found this apartment to be very comfortable and suiting our needs.  We wil stay again.
Great location, on site parking, easy check-in/out instructions, clean apartment, quick response.
We had a great stay in Anita's flat - it was very clean, superb location and plenty of room, would definitely recommend.
我和朋友两家一起住的,生活设施齐备,是个很温馨的小家,最主要是位置非常棒,毗邻悉尼市很多的景点,步行即可到达｡房东人很好,有问题也立即帮助解决｡这次是很棒的住宿体验｡
All good as advertised.

This is a lovely apartment with a fantastic view. It was a quick walk to the train or ferry so very convenient for getting around Sydney.  It’s a very quiet neighborhood but there are some nice places to eat a short walk away. Stephen met us as we arrived and explained all we need to know for our stay. Highly recommended for those exploring Sydney.

A stunning home in a lovely location, three minutes away from a bus stop taking you directly into the city of Sydney or to one of the many picturesque beaches under ten minutes away and Queens Park at the end of the street. There are also plenty of cafes in the area which do lovely breakfasts and coffees.
It was an amazing place to take the family, we could not have felt more at home.

We loved staying at Cooper Street! So close to everything including the city, restaurants, parks and transport! And the host Nicole went out of her way to accommodate our needs with our little one! Such a great spot!

The host as well as the house was lovely!  Tiny house full of restored furniture, the vintage vibe was soo nice! Just perfect! Had a lovely chat with the host even though we stayed there for a short time. Took us all together 1h with the train and by feet to get to the opera house. Would definitely go again!
Beautiful and clean apartment in a great neighbourhood, lots of lovely cafes in the vicinity. Eleni was a very helpful host. We enjoyed the stay a lot, thanks Eleni!
Good location close to the beach.

Very well located.
Nice and perfectly equipped
I highly recommend

check in was a bit of a strange routine and the apartment was a bit hard to find. The apartment was clean though and had everything we needed. The apartment claims to have 2 rooms but it actually has one and a sofa bed.
Modern and stylish appartments, short walk to shops and the train station. Neat and tidy. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend to future travellers!

Thanks for being the best host I’ve ever met! Communication was quick and easy! Everything is as stated on his advertisement - in fact, you received even more than you expect! Andrew has this little cheat sheet that he provides that has FAQs and local tips such as nearby restaurants and directions to important places. The apartment was stunning! I’ve been to Sydney before and no host has been better than Andrew. Water pressure is strong and amazing (from experience I’ve always experienced showers have a little drizzle coming out from the shower head). One of the reasons I chose this place was the kitchen. There’s a full kitchen and woolies is right around the corner so it’s great to shop and cook up some midnight snacks. 
10/10 would recommend!!!!

We stayed 3 nights at the beautiful Pittwater Paradise, the apartment had a gorgeous view and was incredibly peaceful. 
It was close to beaches, and great places to eat.
Evelyn was a great host, gave us some great tips on where to go and even gave us a bottle of wine on arrival. 
I will definitely be back. 
Niamh & John

Millie's apartment is very close to the train station and in front of a bus stop. Additionally, there are many little cafes within walking distance. Millie was great at communicating with me prior to the trip to provide me with helpful details regarding the apartment, she made check-in seamless. The apartment was clean, cozy, and had everything we needed - even tea! Thanks for the hospitality.
Great spot to stay, close to the beach, shops, restaurants and bars. Nice area too!

I stayed at Jenny's apartment in Potts Point for over a month and it was a perfect home away from home.  Jenny was an impeccable host.  So welcoming and accomodating - even when I locked myself out of the house she was around in five minutes to save me!  I loved every minute of my stay at the apartment.  Jenny's beautifully decked out apartment is a newly renovated studio, so compact but with everything you need - including a great kitchen and bathroom.   The location couldn't be better as you are in the heart of Potts Point, which is my favourite Sydney suburb.  My only wish is that I could have stayed longer!
Great location in Marrickville and a very clean and lovely home.
东西都特别齐全,很用心,而且房间收拾得特别干净,入住和退房程序都很简单易懂还不会打扰到主人

I really enjoyed my stay at Suzies place. A very, very clean, well located and stilish place to be. Suzie was very supporting and carrying and offered by the way a delcious breakfast. Also she was very flexible regarding extending my stay and finally the check out time.
An unreservedly recommended place for the perfect sydney Trip. 
Thanks a lot Suzie for being such a fabolous host!
Tanja
I was attending a 2 day course in Bexley. Perfect location for a one night stay. The room was spotless and an easy walk to Arncliffe train station.

great place to stay. 
location is awesome. place is clean and very accessible. will definitely stay again

Wayne and Kate are amazing hosts. Their enthusiasm, genuine care and willingness to go above and beyond was very much appreciated. If you are looking for an authentic Sydney experience, this is it! Would definitely recommend their beachfront home to anyone.

Kasey's apartment is brilliant. The location is perfect, being right on bondi beach and close to all the restaurants and bars that Bondi has to offer. The apartment itself is very clean and has everything you need for a comfortable and relaxing stay. Kasey was a brilliant host - she was incredibly responsive and helpful and constantly offered us any help if we needed it. A fabulous stay on Bondi - thanks Kasey!
Great, comfy little apartment very close to the action. Clean and new. We had a great stay.

It was an absolute delight staying here. So close to Bondi and Clovelly. The cottage is so comfortable and the attention to detail was excellent. The bed was super comfortable and there was even a light breakfast for us to enjoy. I highly recommend this property!

Place was in the midway btw CBD and Bondi beach so location was great with a car. Bedroom and living space is very clean with living necessities and utilities like towels and printer kindly prepared and available for use. Indoor decor design was classic and contentful. Host were really nice and friendly to allow us to use every utensil in the kitchen. Great stay

Place was very clean and presentable however there was only one roll of toilet paper, we had to go buy our own and there was no soap in the bathroom, we had to buy that too. Quick responses to our questions and very accommodating to our early arrival.
Gorgeous Victorian-style terrace, outrageously decorated with all kinds of fascinating art, artefacts and fittings. A super creative retreat with friendly hosts  and a pool out back.

Unfortunately we only stayed one night, instead of the intended 5 nights. The lift had broken down and the apartment was on the 8th floor.  2 large suitcases and 8 flights of stairs for 5 nights, it just wasn't convenient so we moved to a hotel. Alexey (the host) was very helpful and quick to respond to the issue, refunding the rest of our stay. The lift was fixed the next day, but by then we'd booked the hotel already. 

On the upside, the apartment is as per the pics. Very clean, the mattress was comfy and lots of space in the apartment. Nice white wine on arrival too. The location is great, but do pack ear plugs if you're a light sleeper - right opposite Central train station, which is very busy. Also some roadworks taking place.

We stayed 3 nights in May 2016. We had a lovely time both Wyatt and Julia. They made us both feel very welcome and we had some great chats. The apartment is close to liz of places to eat and very easy to get into the city. The house was clean and tidy the whole time we was there and We parked outside the house and it was free. Over all we had a great time staying at Wyatt house it was the best Airbnb experience we have had so far. We will for sure be back when we are next in Sydney.
Very nice place right in front of the beach.

We had a lovely stay at Neiafu. The unit is well appointed and provisions including cake on arrival were much appreciated. Location is excellent being quiet yet close to Newport Beach and the Newport shopping area with it's numerous restaurants. The bathroom is quite small and a bit awkwardly arranged but everything else very functional. Hosts were lovely and arrangements went smoothly.

We stayed in Isabelle's apartment for one month. We found Isabelle hospitable and thoughtful. Her beautiful studio was so clean and we enjoyed its amazing sunlight, great view and location (close to open spaces, CBD, cafes and restaurants). In short, this experience increased our expectations regarding a place to stay in Sydney!
The best Airbnb I have stayed in, in Australia & Overseas

Great place, super clean, perfect location and Linda was very responsive and nice (before, during and after our stay)
We enjoyed our stay and definitely recommend Linda's place.
great price and location
Great apartment, although no TV access the place was clean and Wendy was very responsive. Would go back there if I was in the area

This is a beautiful room in a great location! The views can't be beat and the bed is so comfy. 

Most importantly, Naveen and Tristan were kind a gracious hosts. They had great food recommendations in the area, Naveen outlined a lovely long day trip for me to take (in detail!), and I was messaging her every 5 minutes with questions which she answered promptly and kindly. 

She even invited me to the markets with her and arranged for me to take a free yoga class in her studio (unfortunately I couldn't make it to either bc I got a bit sick)

I'd definitely recommend this place and/or stay there again.

Classy, clean and comfortable space in a modern new apartment building. 

Tim could not have been more helpful and was there to greet us, even at an 11pm check-in.

Thoughtful touches like providing ear-plugs to combat the noise from overnight road works and letting us leave suitcases there for the day after we had checked out were definitely over and above.

Highly recommended to business and leisure travellers alike.

Great place. Booked it for my family, 5 adults, including elders. They loved it, very comfortable. One of the sinks was a little clogged, but no biggie. They loved the stay and would recommend! Very comfortable, lots of space, central location, and free street parking too.

Mariana is a fantastic host. She is very friendly and it was very easy to communicate with her.  We love her (Website hidden by Airbnb) is  well equipped and very clean.  There were many cafes nearby and King Cross Stn was a short walk away. We highly recommend this apartment.
Very clean, better experience than staying at a hotel. Don was courteous and helpful, would recommend Don's place to anyone wanting to stay in Sydney!
Glorious setting and fabulous self contained apartment. Pittwater is also close you can almost reach out and touch it!  Very private and quite - perfect for couples!

We had a wonderful stay! The apartment was exactly how it was shown and perfectly located in beautiful Potts Point. Our hosts we extremely friendly, professional and easy to communicate with. I would and will recommend them to everyone we talk to about our amazing trip! Thank you so much !!!
Nicely styled apartment in a central location for our activities. Enjoyed the leafy views from the bedroom window and weekend markets over the road. Excellent communication. Thanks for having us!

Oliver is a great host and we find his place suitably located for our purpose i.e. very near UNSW. His studio is also very clean and adequately equipped. He even provided drinks, a fruit basket, ice cream etc! Thanks Oliver. We will certainly be back.
This modern and clean house is located close to the Blue Mountains and an ideal place to stay for a one day trip. Well-equipped kitchen and big TV.

This apartment is well situated near Central Station and within walking distance to Oxford Street, Chinatown and many other attractions. It is well appointed with good quality appliances and products (shampoos etc). The look and feel of the apartment suggests space, and has a pleasing design. It was also a treat to have the large cable TV on hand. Nicole was very responsive and went out of her way to ensure I had a good stay. The gym was also particularly well appointed, which was unusual for these kinds of apartments. I recommend this apartment.
Great place to stay,Na is very welcoming

One of the best Airbnb experiences yet! Angela is a wonderful host and definitely knows how to run an Airbnb. Just staying a single night between flights, it was super convenient for an Uber to/from the airport and Angela was very accomodating with a last-minute booking. Hope to stay here again and share more travel stories!

Cath is een vriendelijke dame maar was niet gecharmeerd over onze opmerkingen over ladder en betonvloer. De buurt ligt direct onder de uitvliegroute van de luchthaven. Veel lawaai van zeer laag over komende vliegtuigen van 06.30 tot 23.00. Bed boven kan alleen kruipend bereikt worden omdat er geen stahoogte is.

The place was better than perfect.  - great location ( next to shops and the best transport, great lay out, all amenities, wonderful watching the sun set. Omio was a perfect host and was focused in my helping me in every situation. Had a terrific time.
Cindy was lovely and welcoming, the room was bright and airy and very clean. I’d highly recommend staying here

This is the perfect slice of history for those wanting to experience an authentic train carriage. The details of the restoration are perfect. Lovely country atmosphere, and great hosts! We had an amazing stay!
Good place to stay and close to CBD, Mariana's is great host and very friendly.

Really nice place to stay! The location is perfect, only few minutes walk to the Sydney bridge & the opera house. And the hosts were very nice, well communication, reply message quickly. 
Love it ~
Great stay! Very comfortable apartment, good facilities, close to airport and a little beach.

I can't thank Craige enough for making us feel so welcome. It was my first time using AirBnb but I didn't at all feel uncomfortable and he was so accomodating! The location couldn't have been better! Thanks so much for everything, I would defiantly stay there again.
I had the most enjoyable early morning swim to wake me up. I felt very welcomed and would happily stay again.
친절한 할머니, 똑똑한 14살 아이와 개구진 쌍둥이가 사는 집입니다. 공간은 완전히 1,2층으로 분리돼있습니다만, 어느정도 가족적인 분위기를 좋아하시는 분들께 추천드립니다. 저는 이 곳에 머물었던 기억때문에 시드니를 다시 올 것 같을 정도로 행복했습니다. 真好｡Awsome :)

We were met by a lady who showed us in and went through accomodation. We found the place very convinient and close to everything as described. Very clean and tidy too. Would reccomend to friends travelling to Sydney.
A very nice Apartment with a Great big garden and so many nice neighbours! Just awesome there! :)
Great little spot

Beautiful and modern furnished apartment with a great Location.
Communication with Oliver was very good and easy.
Apartment as described. Great location, neat and tidy, great view from balcony. Fantastic.
No regrets, nice, clean, quiet & reasonably priced and to top it up fantastic host
Great location , great place

Duncan's place was a perfect Airbnb. Duncan and Ashlee were welcoming, helpful and made sure that the entire stay was as hassle-free as they possibly could. 

They are Super Hosts who are very experienced in thinking of the things that a guest will need, well in advance of the guesting thinking of those things themselves!

The room and apartment is meticulously clean, the location is very good for the heart of the CBD (5 minutes over Anzac Bridge /  1 bus stop to the city). 

I don't think Duncan and Ashlee could have done any more as hosts to improve my stay in Sydney. They were excellent - thank you Duncan and Ashlee!!

.
Neat clean and cute. Lovely helpful host. Quiet location easy to find
Cathy is a terrific host and the accommodation had everything we needed. The location is beautiful and only a short walk down to the water or into town.

This was a lovely place to stay with very welcoming people. They were willing to help with info about the locality and anything else necessary.  The accomodation was pleasant and airy even on hot days.  It was beautifully kept. I would not hesitate about booking here again.

Great home for a short stay ... close to everything, has all amenities that most people would need on a break. George was great and prompt in communicating with us. The home has basic facilities but offers great value for money. Highly recommend for a short  stay for large groups.
This is such a wonderful space, really interesting house in a great location.  We'll definitely be back on our next visit.

We had a wonderful time in the Garden Studio.  It had everything we wished for, good bed, wonderful shower, and more!  A tasteful breakfasthamper i.e. Cath is a great host, who reacts very quickly and let us drop of our bags on her veranda very early in the morning.  We would recommend this address to everyone!

Staying at Naveen's place was wonderful! When you arrive, you are welcomed by the very cheerful little Felix, so prepare to cuddle him! Had no problem to get from the airport to Kings Cross station and then from the station to Naveen's place, and the concierge knew I was coming, so everything went well.
The room is beautiful, the bed hard to get out of and the view amazing. Naveen gives a lot of attention to details so you will find everything you could ever need in your room. Naveen and Tristan were very nice and I enjoyed talking to them, even though I didn't see a lot of them because I had so much to do in three days.
Besides, the place is close to a lot of touristic areas. You can walk to  the museum (around 15 min if you stop at redlights, 10 min if you're not patient), Sydney tower (25 min, and you walk through a park), then continue through George Street to Circular Quay, the Opera House, and then walk through the Royal Botanical Garden to go back home. 
This place is definitly a good pick.
It’s a very good apartment that is located near the supermarket. So convenient.
Fantastic location for Circular Quay and the city. Tidy and comfy.

A great location right near the Center of Newtown. It was a very homely and welcoming space that Michele has gone above and beyond to make her guest feel welcome and safe. Especially as a solo traveler it was great to know she was easy to contact and always there to help if I needed anything. Thanks for being such a great host!
I booked Maree's place for my family visit to Sydney. Maree is very friendly and quick to response.

Stayed there 3 weeks with one child and baby during winter and loved it. Lovely, very friendly and well organised hosts. Fantastic views of Manly and Shelly beach. Very well equipped apartment. Feels all new and clean! Everything in close walking distance: shops, cafes, restaurants, weekend markets , transport, pleasure walks, etc.  Residential parking available. 
Despite a bit of renovation noise we had from one of the units next to the apartment for a few days during the week we would stay there again any time! Manly beach is just beautiful and you get the best views there!
Very nice location in Sydney!
Victoria has been an amazing host. Her place is fully equipped with everything, cozy, great location and most importantly clean! Will definitely stay at Victoria's again when we visit Sydney!

A lovely spacious and comfortable apartment in lovely quiet cul-de-sac location.  Very handy to city centre, mainly caught an Uber for around $11 but could also easily walk through the botantic gardens which were right there.  Restaurants handy, Finger Wharf just over the road and a great little cafe just down on the corner of the street.
Andrea at World Apartments was excellent to deal with, very helpful with great location.
Highly recommend for a central Sydney stay
Jonny is an awesome host! His place is super clean and comfy! Could not recommend this highly enough!

Andrew's place corresponds completely to the advertisement. Communication with Andrew was very easy and timely.

The only caveat I might add is that, as is indicated in the description, the apartment has two fans, but no AC. We stayed there during a fairly intense part of Sydney summer and we roasted. The flip side is that the double doors to the balconies kept the noise out completely. So in winter (or in milder seasons), it's a quiet (and more temperate) place to stay!

Dino's home is such a wonderful place to stay. The unit is superb: nicely furnished, very clean, quiet yet perfectly located in Elizabeth Bay, and it features all comforts of home. It accommodates four people very well. Dino was polite, welcoming host and easy to deal with. We can highly recommend staying in this place.
Brendan's is beautiful close to the beach and many shops and cafe yet still far enough to get a little peace and quiet from the liveliness of the scene.

Judy's place is all that is expected, possibly more. The individual locks on doors and entry to the house is excellent and very safe. Even though there were other people in the house during my stay, I very rarely saw anyone else. I would definitely stay here again.

Had a lovely stay with my girlfriend. The view off the balcony was absolutely amazing, felt like a 5 star hotel. Oliver was very accommodating and gave us some handy tips for things to do in the area - thanks so much for such a great stay!
Ven was really nice, very helpful and very respectful to our privacy.

Clean, modern and stylish apartments. Great views neat and tidy, perfect for the stay.
Would defiantly stay here again and the host was wonderful and responded to my queries. Easy to get in and out of and much nicer than a hotel or serviced apartment.  Had everything that was needed including coffee for the morning 
Thank you for a wonderful place to stay in
Rob was a fantastic host. The place was neat and tidy and had everything that we needed. The location is great, a quick walk to the beach and only 15 or so minutes from Cronulla.
Great hosts - loved it!
Fantastic value and location. Super clean and nicely redecorated. Wouldn’t hesitate to book again
We had a great stay at Sarah's place. She was a very friendly host and the neighbourhood felt very safe and peaceful.

Thank you so much for providing an amazing place to stay! Firstly communicating with the host was so easy and quick. The apartment was better than the pictures displayed. Everything was very clean and nicely organized. The view was outstanding!! There was so much to use, plates, cups, cutlery, fresh cold water in fridge, ice in freezer, shampoo and conditioner in both bathrooms, clean towels to use, extra sheets and blankets to use for the sofa bed. What an amazing experience. Thank you again.

L'appartement de Ben est fonctionnel, cosy et très agréable. Ben à été un hôte parfait : bonne communication, présent à notre arrivée pour nous remettre les clés, appartement propre.. bref nous recommandons. Et la vue depuis l'appartement est absolument superbe !!! Coucher et lever de soleil sur Sydney magnifiques !!!
Location is just perfect .. I have a quick response for a couple of details at my arrival so I recommend Mal’s place widely

Duncan and Ashlee were great hosts! We arrived in a Friday night after work and as soon as we walked through the door they offered us a beer and to have dinner with them. It is in a brilliant location just 1 bus stop from the city and has a lot of good restaurants and bars on Darling Street. They were very welcoming hosts and we felt at home and comfortable for the duration of our stay. It was a good sized room and the place was clean and had everything we needed and more. They also cooked us dinner later in the stay which was very nice! I would recommend staying here very much!!
Great place, lovely hosts, 10/10 would recommend
Good house and central position

Very nice apartment, was right next to the beach just like the picture shows.  Bus stop nearby and the UBER service us widely used in Australia for private car service. We loved the apartment, traveled with 2 adults and 4 kids.  Wife wanted to take the bedding home because it was so comfortable! We just came off a 18 day cruise so we had a ton of laundry there was a dry cleaner that did it for $50 AUD nearby or you can do it in the apartment with the washer and dryer provided but we had too much.

The host was very involved prior and during our stay, they asked us what our interests were prior to coming and gave us some recommendations.  While there they checked on us several times to be sure things were working to our satisfaction and even offered to pickup our laundry and take them to the dry cleaners because we had too much for their unit to handle.  We also accidentally left a iPad there any they are being very helpful in getting it back to us, all we have to do is pay the cost of the until and they are packing it up and taking it to the local DHL office..

Very nice experience! Thanks!

The place was as described. Very well located for public transportation, groceries, and eating. Paul and Judith are very kind and are very willing to help you navigate Sydney, they are very very sweet. Everyone else in the family was also very helpful and nice. The dogs were very friendly and happy. The bathroom was shared, but we have not issued at all. All in the house was very well supply. We really appreciate al the nice touches to make our life easier in Sydney, like the opal cards.

A beautiful 3 bedroom stay. Very comfortable & the hosts supplied our family with beautiful bread & jams for breakfast for our first morning. Everything was above expectation & we also felt very much at home. Thank you to Hilde & David for their assistance & hospitality. A great find on airbnb.
Great place, close to train station
The house was perfect for what we needed!  Tranquil and close to shops beach bars and restaurants. Great communication from Cat.

Everything was amazing. I have stayed here twice within one month and it was great! Ziggy was so accommodating with checking in early for a wedding I needed to attend and late check out when needed as well. I will be staying here again!

Bondi Beach is must!! Anita's apartment is within a 2 minute walk distance to the beach. You can walk to all restaurants, bars and market. The train and bus to the apartment is very easy. The bus drops and picks up right in front of the apartment. The apartment is so cute we loved our stay!!

Greg&Maggie are very friendly and fantastic hosts. The studio is located quiet residential area, very clean and tidy self- contained apartment. I would recommend this place, I really enjoyed my stay. Thank you
Rhonda has been very helpful and she was happy to accommodate anything. I had a great time staying there.
Great place in great location. Thanks for hosting us Danny.

Our stay in Manly was really great, the location of the apartment was ideal, just across the street from the beach. The apartment is perfect for the location with great space and a homely feel. Would definitely recommend.
The hosting was great with awesome local tips.

Nice room and very friendly, helpful hosts.
Close to airport & beach, takes some time
to reach the city. But nearly unbeatable
concerning value for money :)

Angela was an outstanding host.. in fact she was the best host I have ever had! Will definitely stay again, the place was very well designed with quality finishes. We loved our holiday. Thank you for making it so lovely.

숙소가 정말 좋았어요! 시드니가면 무조건 다시 여기로 잡을거에요. 깨끗하고 위치도 너무 좋고, 조식이랑 과일도 늘 있어서 편하게 먹었어요. 집 시설도 되게 깔끔하고 좋았습니다. 테라스에서 일정 끝나고 맥주마시는 것도 짱이에요! 무엇보다 호스트분들이 인생 호스트였습니다. 비내리는날 직접 역안으로 데리러 와주시고 우산도 씌워주시고, 짐도 들어주셨어요. 친절 보스였어요!!!!❤️
Every morning, birds coming to the trees in the garden enjoy.

We did not meet our host but she made entry into the apt easy. The neighborhood was excellent. A perfect location to access the city and plenty of stores/restaurants within walking of the apt. We were very surprised though about the accommodations in general. The room picture was very accurate and the room itself was very nice. However the apt was run more like a hostel than we expected. There were several other guests staying in various rooms and the bathroom, kitchen and living room had a very communal feel. I would bring shower shoes for the shower.
Great location and nice unit for my wife and I. Host was super helpful and responsive.
Lovely clean flat in a superb location.  Gavin had lots of recommendations & local knowledge on how to have a great time in Sydney.

Tucked away in a secluded spot in Belinda's garden, this cute, (immaculately) clean and cosy cottage was just perfect for our few days away in Bundeena. It felt very private with lots of little touches that made it very comfortable. It was a great find and an enjoyable few days.

Brandnew house, location is beautiful.Lina is very nice host.We enjoy this stay.
Lina的房子位于一个漂亮而平静的社区,房子很新,附近几公里的地方有Woolworth超市和Chemistry warehouse,购物方便｡我在Airbnb上租了好多次房子了,这次是第一遇到华人房东,很亲切,Lina也是第一次遇到中国房客,她非常热情,给了我们很多旅行和购物的建议｡入住这里体验极佳,强烈推荐｡

We had a great weekend here. The house has lots of room and is equiped with everything you need. Fantastic location - 2 mins walk to cafes, restaurants, movie theatre and a delicious French patisserie. And the main shops of Randwick just up the road. We would recommend to couples, families, groups of friends, travellers or anyone looking for a great pad in the Randwick area.
交通十分便利,离coles步行就好,还有挺多美食店,房东很热情,回复问题也很耐心,很开心的一次入住~
房间超级明亮!床前就是大落地窗!!房东住在楼下所以不会互相打扰到,狗狗很可爱喜欢舔我的手,楼下客厅设计也很棒,有机会还会再来!
This place really is beautiful. The view, watching the boats from the balcony is stunning, especially if you're crazy enough to wake up for sunrise. Ruby was really accommodating and friendly.

Super location in annandale, not to far from centrum with a bus leaving evry 10 min from the doorstep to centrum (often late though). Wyatt was super nice even though he was in France, and had a great system to give us the key. The house is very neat and cool design with good facilities and beds.
Thanks a lot.

Fabulous family sized house! Very clean & Tidy. Well equiped ammenities. Delighted to find toiletries provided as we forgot to pack ours. Very close to train station, IGA and restaurants (all within walking distance). Alice and Richard were great hosts, willing to provide any request. Will definitely book this very affordable house again.

Was an amazing little apartment for the weekend. Perfect views. The only thing was that the bathroom door was quite hard to shut and the fire alarm battery was dead which meant it kept beeping every so often. Would highly recommend this place. couldn't have been happier with it! Mal was great at communicating with me prior to arriving. Just need the leak on the ceiling to be fixed! :) Thanks again!!

Felt very welcome in this gorgeous house. Was very comfortable, spacious, clean and peaceful. Loved the proximity to Avalon beach. Had a lovely swim and walk there. 
Looking forward to another stay there one day.

Prime location, short walking distance from Manly beach, fantastic cafes and Corso. Off street parking. Immaculately presented accommodation with thoughtful extras to make you feel at home. Great communication from host and flexible check and check out arrangements. Couldn't rate higher.
Great location, exceptional and very accommodating hosts which was a real benefit as we were a group of 7 people.

Our stay in Belinda's cottage was lovely. The cottage is clean and tidy and beautifully furnished. It was a short walk into Bundeena town and close to access to the beautiful national park. Our host was friendly and welcoming. Thank you!
The room is perfect, fit two people confortable. There are good space in the wardrobe. The bathroom is amazing.

Staying at Kath's place was an amazing experience! My mum and I were there for a few days to explore Sydney. Great location just minutes away from the train station and it took no time at all to get to the CBD. It was a really nice room with a nice balcony and everything was clean. It was great that we also had our own private mini fridge. Kath provided towels and soaps for the shower as well. Kath also provided suggestions for things to do in Sydney and she recommended a restaurant called Blue Fish in Darling Harbour which was the most delicious seafood dinner I have ever had. The service at the restaurant was also amazing, we mentioned Kath's name and they gave us a free calamari dish! The view from the restaurant was also beautiful. If you want a nice seafood dish I would definitely recommend it! Overall the experience was lovely and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again if I'm ever back in Sydney. Thanks Kath!
Brendan is easily one of the most nicest and hospitable hosts I’ve come across using AirBnB. His place was immaculate and contemporary. Highly recommended.
Excellent place to stay to visit Sydney and feel local.

A gorgeous and stylish apartment perfectly located for business or fun right in the heart of Sydney. Suzie is a delightful host - despite being busy with her own work  found time to provide a warm welcome and orientation tour from the stunning balcony overlooking town. Comfy bed, full privacy with own bathroom fully appointed with all the luxuries and conveniences of a 5-star hotel.

Sudan is a truly a great human, she is super nice and very caring. I really enjoyed staying there. It is a great value for the rate offered and the area is really nice too. Next time I am in Sydney I hope I can stay at her place again. I highly recommend staying at Susan's.
Very clean, fast response, good value. Thanks for a great stay.

We enjoyed the time staying at Naveens' and Tris' apt and can highly recommend staying with the two. Location was great, easy to achieve all sights in walking distance....both were very friendly and helpfull and when it came to picking up our rental car at the airport, Tris was giving us a ride...isn't this nice??? Thank you again for the time and for the hospitality. Stay in touch. Xoxo Bettina & Sam

Thank you Susan and Greg, for being such friendly hosts and for a pleasant stay in your lovely, quiet, peaceful, comfortable studio garden retreat near Bronte beach. Would be pleased to stay there again and to recommend it to others
Great location

I had the most amazing experience with Jyoti in Newington. She made me feel so welcome, and was able to help with anything I needed. Their house is beautiful – I loved the room! It was truly a great place to stay. Highly recommend!
lovely place to stay. stylish and comfy. will stay again.

Although I did not meet Alison, Adam showed me around.
He is very relaxed and this place was realy nice to stay.
Great bathroom and friendly quiet neighbourhood.  Easy to go to from this place to go to the centre as well.

I would definitely recommend this apartment!
Very clean and tidy.
Location is great, in front of the beach.
Communication with Kasey was so easy, and she even let us check in early in the morning!
Thanks for everything!

We had such a lovely time at this charming authentic train carriage. The train car had so much history and was such a unique place to stay and is nestled in a tranquil green setting surrounded by trees. 
From the moment we got there Margaret and her husband were  welcoming and gracious hosts. The little touches were fantastic and the fixings for breakfast were a welcome and lovely surprise. I would highly recommend this place.

The flat got everything I needed. The neighbourhood is very quiet at night, but it is also quite close to the Newtown city centre. You can see the graffiti on the house when walking to train station. Just the bathroom is actually outside of the room which you will need to step to the hallway. Other things look fine and nice.

From the moment I have booked the apartment Linda has always replied to messages immediately. She answered quickly whatever question I had. The location of the apartment is great since it's only about 5min walk to the train station. Food shops are not far away either. The apartment has all you need and it is in particular nice that you can use everything in there (like tea, jam, butter, oil etc). I loved the one balcony with morning sun. One of the best things were the instructions and recommendations she put together and provided in the apartment. So you could go back to this document and read what sights you should visit, where the garbage room is, what you have to do when checking out etc. Thanks so much Linda, you are a great host!!! I can definitely recommend the apartment to others.

Susan's studio in Bronte is a jewel. Located in her beautiful garden, the studio was just the perfect place for our stay in Sydney. Super well equipped with everything you need. Not only is the place beautiful, Susan is also the perfect host. Very sweet, caring and always there to help when you need anything. Thank you.

Eine tolles Zimmer! Das eigene Bad war prima, die Terrasse wunderschön. Judy war schnell zu erreichen und die Wohnung sehr sauber.

Unbedingt zu empfehlen!
Mal is so kind and warm hearted, he gave us a lot of advice about local shops. And the view outside the window of the house is fabulous, we will definitely choose to stay here again if we come back.

My 4 night stay at Garden Studio was a lovely, tranquil experience.  On arrival I was greeted at the front gate by the fragrance of frangipanis, my favourite!  The studio has been cleverly designed and has a crispy clean, fresh, airy feel to it.  Cath was the perfect host who was there if I needed anything while also giving me a sense of privacy.  All your needs are met at The Garden Studio with extras of yummy home baked ginger biscuits and the morning paper delivered to your front door!  All this with a lush raindrop shower head made for delightful stay - it was a treat and a retreat all in one.
Thank you very much Angela and Geoff, we have wonderful stay there! will definitely visit again and recommend to our friends !

My family stayed at Sam's place for five nights and we were extremely happy with the location as it is close to the train stations as well as the CBD. There was pretty much everything you could need (utensils, cookware, etc.) and as a family of five adults we were quite comfortable staying here.
great location and very clean

Nice clean room in share apartment.
There is no clothes ironing facilities and only basic cooking facilities.

Our stay was very comfortable. We had extremely long working hours everyday, this place kept our sanity :) We always looked forward coming back to it. Highly recommended. The hosts are very easy to deal with and always willing to help. We felt as if we were a part of their family. The accommodation could not have been any cleaner and well kept. TEN STARS

Very good. Mal delivered sheets & pillow cases to us at 8 o'clock at night (and a bottle of wine that evaporated very quickly) & remade the beds after his cleaner let him down on 2 separate occasions. We had a great chat and contact with Mal via AirBNB App or text was prompt & courteous. As a person who lives in and around the area Mal knows all the ins & outs & is very pleasant to deal with. Apartment is right across the road from the beach Bondi is a very funky area with a mix of both residents & tourists. It is a great place to just chill out & people watch or to get in amongst it. Each day you will see people surfing off the main beach from dawn to dusk. Many of you will know that the TV Show Bondi Rescue is shot down here in the Summer months. Great walk along the coastline also from Bondi to Coogee Beach (about 8 km). This takes you past the famous Icebergs Pool & Restaurant/Bar. The walk is well worth doing as is also eating & drinking afterwards at The Pavillon in Coogee (plenty of food options available & Gluten free meals as well - try the sashimi you won't regret it) Our daughter is gluten/lactose/MSG intolerant and we found all places that we ate at locally were able to cater for this. We ate at Raw Bar (my girls said best sushi they have had), Porch & Parlour (breakfast, coffee & dinner place - great tunes played the night we were there - White Stripes, SRV, etc.). Bondi Hardware (On Hall Street, shared plates/Tapas restaurant - good indie vibe & acid jazz being played when we we there) Aquabar Cafe (Next door to Porch & Overlooks Beach - good breakfast & great coffee) & Trio Cafe Bar locally. The Apartment itself is as you see it a 1 bedroom with 2 further beds available in the front room (1 bed slides out from under the other). Small bathroom but more than adequate & clean, has good water pressure & plenty of hot water for showers & great WiFi. Fridge in kitchen is excellent & heating in both bedroom & lounge also very good & simple to use. Easily caters for a family of 3 like us or 4 people using both beds in front room. Beds were good to sleep on (main bed is king size). Foxtel TV provided (basic package, so no sports, movies or some entertainment programs). Also DVD player & Sony sound dock that you can play your IPods/Phones through via Bluetooth. Buses available across the road which can get you to Bondi Junction & into the city. We used Uber extensively - X, Taxi & Black. Never had to wait more than 5 minutes for a pickup. Now for the fusspots, these comments didn't affect us nor detract from the great time we had, but some people can be more picky...

This was my first time with Airbnb and I needed a room near Sydney airport. Luckily I found a room at Shuang's place. The place looked almost newly built, neat and clean, quite, easy chekin and checkout and it was only walking distance from Sydney international airport. It had everything I needed including kitchen and a very clean bathroom. Great value for money. I would love to stay at this place again in future.

A simple, clean room with galley kitchen facilities (including dishwasher, fridge and induction cook plates (rather than a stove persay) and a good size bathroom.  We were only there one night, so didn't get to experience either the room or the magnificent view (due to poor weather) to any great extent, or the other nice touches like the provided Opal cards.  The beds were comfy and warm.  Loved the spare toothbrush - as I actually forgot to pack mine!  There are quite a few stairs to contend with but this is pointed out in the dossier (that I failed to read carefully).  Also a quiet neighbourhood.  Leslie responded to any query we had very quickly.  A very good first up Airbnb experience.
Location was good
Great location, awesome space with secure parking, close to food outlets with best view of Randwick Racetrack thanks Oliver

We had some miscommunication between my partner and the host, so my partner didnt really like when checking in. Also, we both really like to take a bath but bathtub was so dirty that we didnt even touch. Except for that everything was fine.
Great little completely self-contained studio.
Shaun is very good people, he made us feel at home. Nice person to have a talk and have a beer!

I really did enjoy my stay especially I was able to park the car indoor and the place was perfect with a stunning view of the river. highly recommend it to any future guests. I met Zed and his gf last few minutes before we checked out as they were away during the new year and they seems really friendly and nice even with just talking with them for a short time.

Stevens cabin is spotlessly clean, feels very secure and safe as it can only be approached through electric gates. 
Train station is 5 mins away. And there are good restaurants just round the corner
Great house in a great location. Very close to the bus stop and walking distance to the beach.
A fantastic location right in the heart of Darlinghurst. Very good value for money and would highly recommend any visitor to Sydney to hit up Jeremy for accommodation. 100% would stay here again.

Lovely cabin very close to Pittwater and Clareville Beach, and short drive to restaurants. Nice walking in the local area. Michy very easy to deal with and respectful of our privacy. Will be going back!
A very comfortable stay in a perfect location.
Good place, I like the heater inside the room, also I like to self-check in
Great area and lovely apartment in Elizabeth bay. Everything as described. We'd stay again!
L'appartment est tres bien situe a Tamarama. La chambre principale est spacieuse avec baie vitree. L'interieur de l'appartement est spacieux et clair.
Excellent location with a great view. Brigitte was a very good host.
Had a great experience here. Lovely location, excellent service. Cannot complain.
Great spot
位置很好,沟通顺利,不错的民宿

Very clean. Great location . House and room looks even better than the photos. Spacious your own bathroom and your own private lounge. Definitely come back here again. Btw, the cafe nearby is superb! You have to try :)

Awesome week in Sydney at Mike's apartment for me and my friend! Mike is a really nice person always here to help if you need information and make you feel home the first second you're at his place! and the plus is the view from the roof, just perfect ! also if you like walking everything is pretty close , KingCross station is not far by walk so easy to go to Bondi beach or anywhere else.
you can choose this place without a doubt!
Well located apartment clean and good
Really lovely friendly guy. Great lil place to stay.

Margaret is a great host, and this wonderfully restored train carriage is a unique piece of history and a far more interesting place to stay than your standard run-of-the-mill hotel. The property is located on a pleasant and secluded acreage, were you'll be gently woken by bird calls and the wind in the trees. The train carriage itself is cozy and well-appointed for two guests - with cooking facilities, chairs and benches for lounging, and a private room to retire in. We enjoyed the games that were provided, as well as reading about some of the history of the railroads in the greater Sydney area. We hope to visit again soon!
Great place to stay for a visit in the city. The view was incredible

The apartment was perfect for a week of visiting Sydney - we were walking distance from cafes, restaurants, tourist sites, and the central train station so we could get anywhere in the city. The pictures accurately represented the apartment, which was gorgeous, clean, and well appointed - but they didn't include the view, which was also spectacular. Thank you, Nicole, for making the visit so easy and seamless.
Prompt replies, easy to organise. Beds and linen fantastic
Great location

We crashed at Angela's place for a night. She was sweet and made sure we knew how to get around. There is a bus stop around the corner which made it easy to get back into Sydney. She is more than willing to explain how to get there.
Great location and very helpful host!

great location for the surry hills cafe and surrounding location. 

if sightseeing around the city it's a 40 minute walk to the rocks. 

the common area was a little on the small side

My husband and I loved staying at Susan's place. She thought of everything to have there in the kitchenette and we found everything so clean and tidy. The location is great and so close to the shops and cafes around Bronte (an adorable and safe suburb)! Susan and her partner had great suggestions and were always available for communication. 
It felt very homey coming back at the end of the day and we definitely recommend staying here!

We loved our stay at Dino’s beautiful apartment close to popular cafes, restaurants and bars.  A short walk to nearby parks and approximately a 20-minute walk to the Sydney Botanical Gardens/Opera house.  The apartment is clean, modern and spacious.  We could have easily stayed longer!
房子位于悉尼达令赫斯特街区,交通还算方便,周边餐厅很多,去超市也很近｡房间很干净,设施也比较齐全｡
Leslie's place was very cozy and clean.  It had all that we needed and more.  Leslie and her family were very welcoming and helpful.  Our family really enjoyed our short stay.
Nice apartment, super clean, great location.
Such a nice place, very clean and tidy. Flexible for check in time as my friend arrived a bit earlier.

If you’re looking for a truly magical stay in Tama this is the place. During our week long stay we never wanted to leave the apartment that was peaceful and zen like. We enjoyed our mornings checking the surf from the balcony and then walking barefoot to the beach for multiple swims. 

Truly it’s a slice of heaven.
Amazing, thoroughly enjoyed!
Appartement calme et très bien situé pour un séjour touristique à Sydney.
Mike was really friendly. Gave lots of advice about where to go. Very hospitable!

Fabulous Apartment with everything you need. Clean and comfortable - exactly as photographed. Quiet area with everything at your doorstep. Local cafes and restaurants are all excellent. Beaches and shops in wAlking distance. Marina & ferry close by and If your active, run to Bondi and surrounds and back.

Very nice place to stay, really clean and cute !
Close to the beach and not too far from the city and airport.
Cindy was really nice and helpful ! 
I will be back :D
OK

Nice little flat. Everything we needed. Good location for me. Coffee machine and a few DVD's were nice added touches. Tv is a bit small though.
The place is easy to find and access. Apart from the sound of some foot steps from time to time through the floor/ ceiling above, The place is peaceful & quiet and we weren't disturbed at any point during our stay.
Would definately consider staying there again.
Thanks
Very good location and walking distance to CBD. parking space was a big plus for us
Great value and very tidy!
Amazing location with access to everything we needed, super comfortable space. We'd definitely recommend this place!

Jennifer is a really helpful owner, the place she provides is more than fantastic. The apartment is clean, tidy and very convenient. My wife and I had stayed for 3 days and she really enjoyed it. Highly recommend for couples who wish to spend a sweet holiday in sydney.
Good place and really close to the beech
Fantastic place, great location, beautiful room, excellent host!
Great spot with good people
Trevlig lägenhet nära mysigt och myllrande restaurangområde. Alla faciliteter man kan behöva och gångavstånd till stan.
Great location.
It was ok.
Very nice hosts, fantastic garden, convenient location

Great location.
Walked 5 mins one way to Darling Harbour. Five mins the other way to Queen Vic Building/ Pitt st shops.
Danny easy to deal with. Gave us early check in.

We originally booked two nights to stay. Unfortunately, the first night we stayed we killed several cockroaches inside the apartment. We killed a large one in the room between the two bedrooms, several small/baby ones in the kitchen, including in the utensil drawer, on the floor, and on the ceiling. Also, a medium sized cockroach got away inside the kitchen drawers. We all were very uncomfortable sleeping there that night. We had to find other accommodations for the next night. We communicated with the owner about the cockroach issue but he says it’s not his fault bugs come in from the outside. He also stated that he had pest control come a week ago. Unfortunately, that didn’t seem to do much for his apartment’s cleanliness, and then became our problem. We were not refunded any amount upon first reaching out to the owner and then also reaching out to Airbnb. My advice is take more pictures than I did. My initial thoughts when seeing a cockroach in the apartment was to kill it, in hindsight I should have taken pictures each time before killing them.
Lovely place to stay in a neighbourhood with lots of public transport options. We really enjoyed our time in Sydney, thank you!
Charming and clean property in a great location. It was really easy to get around Sydney from here, but there's so much right on your doorstep too. We had everything we needed. Thanks!

Carole, Steve and Snoop Dog are a lovely and happy family ! 
There house is beautiful and so clean with a big new, modern bathroom all to ourself ! 
Perfect location right next to bus stops and funky cafe strips !
Defiantly worth the stay !
Thanks so much for having us !
xxx
离邦迪海滩非常近,走路十分钟就到了,靠海边那块全是这种house,车也不多很安静｡附近有商场和购物街道,房东人也很好,想在邦迪海滩附近玩的值得推荐｡

My sister and I had a lovely time at Cath's Garden Studio. It was the perfect little space with everything we needed. Cath was extremely lovely and helpful making sure we were comfortable and happy whenever we crossed paths in the garden. The fresh bread was amazing to wake up to on our first morning and the food provided really helped us in keeping our spending costs down. I will most definitely return to the Garden Studio next time I am having a little getaway in Sydney!
Awesome little apartment to yourself. Very kind host, very easy check in, no Wi-Fi but great amenities, everything working well, nice touches and character in the rooms!
Very good with communication. Yang's partner was onsite to meet us and handover keys when we arrived. The unit is gorgeous, brand new and comfortable.

Perfect location for weekend get away.  So close to Circular Quay, Opera House,etc.
Modern, Clean everything you need for a couple of nights away.  Thank you.
Had a wonderful stay at Hernan's place. Nice and clean apartment with easy access to public transportation and very welcoming hosts. Definitely recommended!
What an incredible location!!! The apartment is spacious and has everything you need. Comfortable bed. You can't beat the view!

Michele is an incredible host. She is always in contact and responsive to all our queries. The room is cozy, clean, convenient and with nice amenities. Pretty near to king street (hip venue for hip bars, clothes and food).
Great location and convenient access to public transport.

This was the best Airbnb we’ve experienced. Such a beautiful and stylish  space. My husband and I stayed here with another couple and it was the perfect size for 2 couples. The host went out of her way to ensure an easy stay. We really appreciated the milk, bread, yogurt, Nespresso pods and fruit placed in the kitchen for us. Awesome location with the beach at the bottom of the street and an easy stroll to the local shops and cafes. Hope to return one day soon.

This host cancelled same-day of my check in as they wouldn't accept dogs even though their listing I'd pet friendly and instantly bookable.
Left stranded in Sydney, she also fraudulently asked me to cancel the booking at my end to appear that the guest cancelled and not the host.
Why? Because she would receive the cancellation fees.
Even went to the point of telling me she had contacted Airbnb and they advised her I was to cancel!

Beware of this dodgy operator.

Many others out there who are honest and operate with integrity

We had a great time! Location is perfect, walking distance to Circular Quay, to the train, bus stops,shopping and the supermarket 3 min away! Apartment had everything we needed: equipped kitchen, washer, dryer... very comfortable place! Would definetly recommend it!
Central location, great views!
The location for us was a little too far from the hospital but otherwise Franca and Alessio were great hosts
Great relaxed location. 2 mins walk to Newport beach / town and 15 min walk to Newport arms. 10 min drive to palm beach. Perfect for a weekend away.
还不错,价格很划算｡
As usual Hernans place was fantastic. I stay here regularly when working in the area and its always great. Hernan is a champion and I recommend staying here

Kath has really thought about how to make the experience great for her guests. The place is super well organised and spotless. It has everything you could need (even shampoo in the room, plug adapters and spare light bulbs). Kath is very on the ball, welcoming and friendly. Ruski the dog is brilliant and an added bonus. Comfy bed and only a 5 min walk to Redfern station with good cafes nearby. Will definitely stay again.
Very good instructions apartment brilliant very central recommend it

From the moment I arrived at Natasa's I felt at home. She insisted on carrying my massive suitcase up the stairs for me, while explaining the layout of her home. She even suggested a wonderful spot for brunch for my friend and I. (I should actually say even before I arrived since she was extremely flexible and allowed me to alter my stay to a couple days later). My entire stay was extremely comfortable. Natasa gives the perfect balance of privacy and companionship to her guests. She never once disturbed me, but was always willing to have a chat on the rare occasion that we crossed paths (we both were in and out of the house quite often). Any time I was unsure of something she was available by text and always had a quick response. The location is also extremely convenient as it is only about a block from the Petersham station where I was able to catch either the bus or train to wherever I needed to go. You can take the bus to a grocery store, but Norton Plaza has 2 grocers as well as other little shops, and is only about a 10min walk. My only regret is that I did not book Natasa's place for my entire trip! If I return to Sydney I will definitely be booking her home again, and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient location, hosted by an extremely friendly and hospitable individual.
all ok...only we need microwave

This is one of the cleanest Airbnbs I have ever stayed in. Moreover, despite arriving from the airport after midnight, check in was a breeze thanks to fantastic directions. The room is spacious, very private and has all the amenities one could need. Moreover, it is walking distance to the international airport. I didn't have a chance to meet the host but I would HIGHLY recommend this place especially if you are coming or leaving from the airport. Thanks for a wonderful and restful night!!
We had a nice stay at Susan’s place. She’s a lovely host, great communication. Studio was cozy and clean. Good location, easy to get around with public transport. Everything was just as described!
I had a nice few days here, lots of friendly people, easy going. Defiantly recommend
Great location close to the airport and with easy access to the city. Easy-going, welcoming, experienced host. Great value for money as well.
Very nice hosts. It’s a very clean apartment. Convenient location. Close to the airport

First of all i have to say that Gavin is a great person and excellent host! He was very thoughtful and polite. Apartment was very clean and comfortable, on great location, near by Central Station. I would recomend Gavin"s place to everyone! Tnx Gavin for wonderful tree days in my favorite place on earth!!

Danny's house is in a great location! My family and I am able to walk to everywhere! It is only three minutes away from darling habour, we can also have a view of darling ha our from balcony!
