All of my family are satisfied with this house and we will definitely choose to live here again when we comes to Sydney next time!
The view from the apartment and the location were phenomenal. The host was also quite flexible!

Excellent location with basic, comfortable accommodations.  We could easily walk all throughout the CBD, the Quay, the Gardens, the several bridges.  Very excellent stay in the heart of  Sydney.  Note:  There are several Bridge Streets.  This one is between George and Loftus Streets in the lower CBD.

It was wild and wet when I had an escape from the city ... was expecting to swim and walk but the space is so relaxing, and the book shelves full of so many interesting reads that it wasn’t hard to stay in and just wander in the weather breaks! Came by train and ferry- perfect start to a welcome break.

Philip welcomed me and my family to his gorgeous house. He showed me around and explained how everything was working, from the dishwasher to tv. He is easy to communicate with and was very helpful if needed. And he's got such a nice home! It was super clean, comfy beds, great showers and it felt like a home but also like a luxury hotel.
Each bedroom has its own shower and toilet, perfect for a group traveling together. 
Its located in one of the coolest areas of Sydney, just a short walk to Darlinghurst and Surry Hills vibrant cafès, restaurants and shops. Even a short walk to public transport. This is a great place to stay and I would loved to have a home like this! 

Cheers!

Look no further! We had an excellent stay at this amazing apartment. It is so central everything is in walking distance, great restaurants, pubs, bars, entertainment yet the apartment is nice an quite. The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed. Nicole was only a phone call away and attend to all of our needs which were quite extensive. I will always come back to this apartment!

Great apartment 
Great location
Great host

Elizabeth is a delightful host, she and her husband Simon made us feel most welcome in their lovely and tranquil home. The bedroom was bright, airy and peaceful. The bed  was very comfortable and the bathroom private, spacious and spotlessly clean. 
Our visit was brief but Elizabeth and Simon were "easy-going" and very friendly, they made us feel at home and we would happily stay with them again. 
Thank you both.

Apartment was perfect for what we wanted.  Nice and clean.  Parking downstairs.  Nicole was great with communications and check in etc.

Definitely recommended!
Sweet as
Beautiful and great house ! Craige and Leonie are perfect ! It's the best housing of Bondi Beach !
This space is comfortable and has everything you’d need for a great stay. All interactions I had with Steven were very pleasant and I would highly recommend his place!

Justine's place was better than I expected. You really have to see it for yourself to truly appreciate it. Surrounded by tree tops and the sounds of birds, I felt relaxed the instant I walked through the door. And with up-scale amenities, it felt on par with a 5 star hotel (with all the benefits of actually not being a hotel!). Would recommend to anyone looking for a retreat-style getaway.

The flat is as per the pictures: decorated with taste, offers nice spaces and is very clean. The room is very pretty and the double bed has a super comfy matress- good sleep guaranteed. It was also much appreciable to have a own bathroom&toilets.
Kerri is welcoming and communicating with her was easy (i needed a room for the following day and she replied straight away). I felt comfortable as soon as I arrived, she is such a nice and warm person.
Moreover she is full of attention, I did not stay long but the bathroom had been cleaned and new fresh towels provided. It was no problem to use the washing machine (There is a tumble dryer, but also the possibility to have the clothes dry on the balcony). Just felt like home.
In short, a quality and easy stay with a fantastic host. I highly recommend anybody to stay at this place.
Kerri, I will remember the discussion we had around a glass of wine! Thanks for having hosted me.

Wonderful stay, thank you Casey and Larry! Was peaceful, comfortable, private…a beautiful home to experience. Very much enjoyed the conversations with both of you about Sydney and life in general _/\_

Paul made us feel very welcome even though he was out-of-town.  Paul gave us great info regarding getting to his apartment and Wendy was very helpful as well.    Fantastic location and apartment was lovely and cosy and met our needs.

Our stay (my boyfriend and I & a friend and I) with DJ was very conveniant. Our plane got in late which was no drama at all. The place is very conveniantly located in walking distance to all the good spots in Paddington, Surry Hills and Darlinghurst and about 15 - 20 minutes walk into the CBD. Everything was lovely and clean and the house was easy to get in and out of. DJ even provided a succinct list of dinner spots to try. 

I would definately reccomend staying here to all travellers. Thanks!

Ich habe der Aufenthalt bei Cindy und Miki total genossen. Obwohl wir uns in den 3 Tagen kaum gesehen und gesprochen haben, hatte ich immer das Gefühl willkommen zu sein und habe mich total wohlgefühlt. Ein schöner Aufenthalt. Die Stadt ist schnell mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen und trotzdem liegt die Unterkunft ruhig. Alles in allem ein sehr schönes wenn auch einfach eingerichtetes Zimmer. Alles sauber und gemütlich. Vielen Dank nochmals.

I'm glad I didn't let my perceived awkwardness of having to walk through the bedroom to get to the guest room get in the way of choosing this property. I did nearly all my SYD travel via ferry and it was fast and convenient. Also a half hour walk to Bondi Beach and the cliff walk. I felt welcome and the bath products are great. :)

Exceeded high expectations! The apartment is even more beautiful and charming than the pictures capture. And the location is PERFECT. Walking distance to everywhere - especially Crown Street where there are tons of cafes and coffee shops.

Oh and the bed is heavenly. 

I'm disappointed that these guys are booked during my next trip to Sydney in November, otherwise I wouldn't have looked any further. It seems they are booked roughly 90% of the time, based on the calendar Nicole showed me...so book early!

PS - their guide book is GOLD! Best listing of restaurants and cafes I've seen in 10 AirBnB stays.

A great size flat in an amazing location. Perfect access to every area of Sydney, while being far enough away from the centre of town.
Really cool bars and restaurants in the area.
Rooftop view is pretty good too!

Un super séjour chez Wyatt ! Le quartier est très sympa et a toute les commodités, l'accès au centre ville est simple et rapide ! Et Wyatt est toujours de bon conseil pour les visites à effectuer à Sydney !

We had a lovely time in Arnie's place, the house is lovely but we simply fell in love with the neighborhood: what a fantastic area! It's very safe, beautiful and there are cafés, pubs, public transport and a convenience store very nearby. It was a great base for our days in Sydney. We definitely recommend staying here.

Staying at Potts Point at Dave’s is hugely recommended for exploring Sydney - 3mins from metro, a short walk to Botanics, the biggest navy ships you can imagine and 20 mins walk to Opera house & CBD area. Very neat appartement, stylish, great daylight, high ceilings, opposite great coffee shop, playground nearby which was great for our 5&7 yr old. Overall a really good stay.
5* experience. Totaly recommended.
The space was great for a group as large as 7. Very centrally located and convenient. Probably need a pest control though.

Great 3 bedroom apartment on the South end of Manly Beach.  Close to the Corso and an easy walk to the ferry.  You can see the beach from the balcony, only a minute walk.  Apartment was light and airy, and just as pictured.  The common space is pretty big and very comfortable.  It was just me and my wife, so we didn't use the other bedrooms, but enjoyed some extra common space.  There is a washer and dryer, and a brand new gas grill on the balcony.  

This is the first airbnb that we have stayed in that had hotel quality beds, pillows and linens.  Very comfortable.  Only stayed 2 nights, but would go back for a week in a heart beat.
Kath is a beautiful hosted ,we  all like her and lovely Ruski ,a big dog .Her house is clean and warm .We enjoyed our holiday in Sydney.Thanks Kath !we will miss you!Good luck to her!

The apartment was not clean and had dog urine on all the carpets. It took 24 hours for 1 of the rugs to get replaced and the new one seemed masked with odor spray. The owner told me the place was clean after the first day but the urine smell was still in the apartment which kept us locked in our rooms while we weren’t out and about in the city. It was very unpleasant even after getting the cleaning fee and one nights stay refunded to us. It was a total break down in communication between the management company and the own, but that shouldn’t be at my expense after I had just taken a 14 hour flight from California.

The place was beautiful, modern and easy to get to. Its a quick ride to the international airport and there are great cafés and food spots about an 800m walk from the place. It is located closely to a bus station that can take you straight into the city and other train connections for site seeing and shopping. There is a spare pull out bed which was useful traveling with my dad and a nice little balcony to spend time outside. Id stay here again!
Rhonda is an excellent host, communicated quickly, the prace was clean and fresh. Happy to recommend.

A lovely apartment, very comfortable and hosts are a lovely young couple. Good value and close to public transport and all that Leichhardt brings, an inner city oasis with hidden gems. Would recommend to friends and family.

While in a great location, and still a specious apartment, there were a number of items missing/not thought if that would have made the stay a lot better. It is a two stores loft but all open so no doors to separate the two beds/sofa bed which is fine but just be aware. There was no bath mat, no cups for water or mugs for teas, no milk even for a tea, towels were very small and old, and hard to dry cause no heated towel rails, beds could have sheets as well in case doona is too hot. It was fine for a short stay as we weren’t in the room much but still value for money wasn’t there.

Glebe ist ein alternativer und sehr angenehmer Stadtteil und Bryans Haus liegt in einer ruhigen und schönen Seitenstraße mit alten Häusern. Besonders das Deck mit Blick auf die Anzac Bridge und das Wasser hat uns gut gefallen, frühstücken dort oder ein Glas Wein nach der Stadtbesichtigung trinken. Die Anbindung per Bus war unproblematisch, der Fußweg zum Jubilee Park (unbedingt den neuen Tramshed mit vielen tollen Läden und Restaurants besuchen!) und zum Darling Harbour herrlich am Wasser entlang und leicht zu finden. Kleines Minus: wir waren zu zweit und es hat uns gut gefallen, mit mehr Leuten könnte es etwas eng werden. Wir würden auf jeden Fall gerne wieder dort wohnen.

Good location with everything you need. Would be happy to stay here again. 
If you're traveling for work and a connection to the internet is necessary I'd recommend bringing a 4G modem, the connection got a little unreliable during peak times.

We had a fabulous time here, enjoying the positively amazing views from the beautiful window seat, sipping wine and munching chips, while enjoying the exciting passing parade of people walking along the promenade.  

The bed was super comfy, the decorations delightful and appropriate and pretty.  There was no problem with sharing amenities with Maria and Jerry, and we would highly recommend their lovely beachside home to all, so don't be shy about the share bathroom and kitchen; it worked out beautifully.
Lovely garden house with a little bit of a farm-like feeling to it. Cath was quick to respond and even though we had to leave earlier than planned, was very easy to get along with.

Our stay was fantastic, the room and bathroom were private and extremely clean and comfortable. The location is only a min from the train station and centrally located to bars, cafe's and restaurants.  Our stay was completely hassle free and very convenient.

Michele's place was wonderful; luxurious, comfortable, convenient, quiet and private. Michele has thought of everything that makes a stay easy and enjoyable. I enjoyed trying the local pubs and cafes, and exploring the historic streets. Top accommodatin!

A really nice place. We enjoyed our stay and Samanthas room was modern, clean and had a really comfortable bed. Samantha was a great host although she was travelling at the same time she did her best to stay in touch. We also received towels, shampoo, body wash and a sponge at the welcome, which was awesome. Beside this Samantha has two really cool housemates who are friendly and helpful. The busses and trains are in a walking distance of 10 minutes which takes you to the CBD, although the famous beaches as Manly and Bondi will take you more than one hour with public transport. I would highly recommend this place.

A fantastic homely property set in a quiet rural setting with enough local amenities nearby to get by on. The beaches and bays are idyllic and bundeena base is an excellent location to launch local excursions from. Hilde is very welcoming and a fantastic host. Thanks you!
Great location. Stylish apartment with thoughtful touches and good value. Can't fault it
David is a friendly and forthcoming host!
Great host, great location

Very nice as usual.
Everything was ready and Susan is always very friendly.

Excellent location. We walked pretty much to everything, all the major sightseeing spots in the city and to Central Station and Circular Quay to catch transportation for day trips out of the city. Home was clean and had all the amenities to make our stay comfortable. Also just really cool in design. So glad we choose this home.
First time Airbnb, Duncan was the perfect host,the room was exceptionally clean as was all of accomodation. Rozelle is the perfect place to rest whilst visiting Sydney.
Great place to stay.

Room was as described. A short stroll to public transport, Krythia communicated perfectly and also provided space for private time.  Local tips for transport were appreciated . I did not use wifi but password was also provided . Thanks, would stay again.

The studio was perfectly clean, plenty of treats for breakfast and all you need for a nice rest after a busy day. 
Definitely want to come back!
非常好的一次住宿体验｡房间干净整洁,房主很友好,还贴心地准备了麦片和牛奶｡地理位置离市中心近,交通便利,周围king street 非常热闹,离超市､饭店､素食馆子都很近｡

Our group of 14 friends and family has just had a very comfortable stay at Marcella’s house over the June long weekend. The communication with her was smooth, and the detailed info sheet and the house rule book explained all that we needed to know. She was also kind enough to rearrange the time for the post-departure cleaner so we could spend some extra time – which allowed me to go surfing and the others enjoy a walk along the beach. I’d recommend Marcella’s house for those seeking a comfortable/spacious place to stay close to a beautiful beach.

I selected this airbnb on the basis of its proximity to my son's place.  Although I didn't meet tge host There was very good communication sbout getting into the premises and other facilities. I had a very comfortable night's sleep. My room was very large and the shared facilities were fine. Close to Petersham eailway station which is a plus.

Lovely stay! The apartment was great, easy to find and get the keys. The location was great with a grocery store and cafe right across the street. The apartment had everything I needed, very comfortable stay.
The place was perfect! It is centrally located and a short walk to the park to the opera house and the bridge.
I had a great stay here! The room was excellent and had a very nice bathroom. I would definitely recommend this Host. The location was excellent too! Right by the Beach and transportation.
Homely place with everything you need and in a great location. We'll be back

I’d highly recommend Bryan’s house. It’s in a convenient location - handy to the tram, shops, and harbour, it was tidy and clean on arrival, had plenty of supplies to make living easy, and the deck is a very pleasant spot to relax with a good view. 
To top all of those factors off, you have Bryan who is very easy to communicate with, replies in a timely manner and is more than willing to assist when asked. 
Not sure you can ask for too much more.
Great location - so close to the train station, great place - nice, clean and tidy, Millie is a fantastic host.  I will be staying here again. Thanks Millie!

Absolutely great location. Walking distance to everywhere within city. 

One thing should be mentioned is that the building is old and there is only one bathroom, so if more than 4 people live in there will be a problem. We had 6 people originally, but once we saw the apartment we booked a hotel suite immediately.
We LOVED our stay! Location was incredible and the place itself was immaculate. Will definitely be staying again next time we are in Sydney! Everything we needed and more.

Me and my husband spend few days at the apartment and it was really nice!
The indidications to go there are very clear and it's close of the train station at Newtown.
It's a small apartment but very clean, all the staff we need to cook are there; I recommend this place to visit Sydney!

Great service. Would recommend this place to anyone in a heart beat. 
A++++ host. 
Quick to reply to messages

A fantastic apartment in a superb location with lots of lovely places to eat, drink and socialise nearby. Communication was brilliant - instructions for getting there were superb and very easy to follow and Nicole's welcome was warm and full of good local tips. We hope to return one day!

The house is very clean & roomy.  The location is excellent, minutes walking to beach and only half an hour bus to CBD.

The book collection in the living area is a huge bonus.  After a long day, it's great to read a lovely book.  Many books I have as well, so it is more like reading at home.
房间不错,很干净

Well equipped apartment perfectly located. Agnes was reachable very easily and helpful. 
Small but perfect apartment with everything we needed. 5 minute walk from the train station. I highly recommend this place. Thanks again

We really enjoyed our stay at Neiafu, it was a great weekend... Anne was very helpful and lovely, with the smallest of touches that made our stay even more memorable, like cookies and chocolate when we arrived, breakfast cereal and snacks left out and having an early/late check in/check out.

Her place had a real homely feel, very comfortable and the bed was soft and gave us a good night sleep!

This was our first airbnb experience and we would highly recommend her place for everyone to stay at... We only live in Neutral Bay so not far from Newport, but coming just for the night felt like we had got away from the hustle and bustle and we found it so relaxing, peaceful and quiet! 

We went on a little adventure on Sunday and found an amazing beach to just chill out at, so topped the weekend off nicely!

We will definitely go back in the future ;)
Nice place, good environment. We appreciated the sympathy and flexibility of Cathy.

Mal was absolutely fantastic!
He made us very welcome and comfortable within his apartment.
The pictures and description of the place doesn't do it justice, as it is magical!
The neighbourhood was great, cafes, restaurants, and locals were all wonderful!
Would love to stay here again!
great host, very.clean room

Beautiful place to stay when you want that quiet time out from daily life. The bath was a major factor for me in choosing this place and it was magnificent! The place was very beautiful and cosy and the views were just amazing!! Absolutely loved it
Convenient and a great place for a short trip.
Cindy was very welcoming and easy to communicate with. The space was everything I expected, and it made my weekend easy and comfortable. Thank you!
Great location - close to beach & shops. Robert communicated well with us as we checked in late after a long drive. Would definitely stay again.
Wonderful stay! David was very hospitable and it was as if we had the entire place to ourselves. Would definitely return!
Excellent location with an easy walk to the restaurants and attractions of darling harbour or the CDB. Perfect for a stay in Sydney.

We had a great stay at Javier's apartment! The location was ideal- so close to the beach and town. The flat was spacious and homely and perfect for our Christmas stay :). The bed was very comfy and kitchen had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend Javier's apartment!
Awesome location

It was very nice to have met Sacha in person. The house is a very lovely place that I have always dreamt to have! It was the perfect place for us to have a family gathering this weekend! The place was stylish, spotless and had lots of space for each of us to relax.

Staying with Allison and Adam was wonderful. The place is centrally located and easy to walk to downtown Sydney or even take a bus. I was able to get in a game of cricket with Adam I had a blast coming from America this was my first experience in Australia. The place is very clean and modern love the bathroom and the kitchen is great too. The bedroom was at the top of flat very quiet, clean the bed was very comfortable slept well. I would highly recommend this place for anyone in the future it was wonderful place to stay Adam and Allison are great!

We had a really lovely weekend stay in Steven's delightful cabin in Petersham and we enjoyed all the sites and sounds of the wondrful Sydney suburb. We hope to stay again next time we visit! Thank you Steven.

Our stay was exactly what we were looking for. The location was perfect, only a short drive to the national park and an even shorter walk to the beach. Belinda was very accommodating, providing us with information about the features of the studio as well as surrounding food and activities. The studio had everything we needed including a fully equipped kitchen and barbecue. The studio was quiet and peaceful, the perfect place to relax. We would love to stay again and will definitely recommend to friends.

We had a wonderful time staying with Ann at her amazing, historic and endlessly fascinating house. She even cooked Korean food for Minji, making her own version of KimChi! Her attention to detail and desire to ensure her guests have a great time makes Ann the consummate host. We thoroughly recommend a visit to this hidden treasure only 55min north of Sydney.
We really enjoyed our stay at Steven and Peta's place.  A very well equipped cabin with a very comfy bed.  It's located in a quiet side street but in walking distance to buses and trainline.
Lovely place close to the bus stop

Vivian’s place is great. Stylish, comfortable and extremely clean. The location is perfect for activities in the eastern suburbs. Vivian’s communication was excellent and check in and out was super easy.
Cosy and very well located. Very nice neighbourhood at only one bus stop from CBD. Duncan is a great host, always ready to help with good tips. We had a wonderful time.

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt bei leonie und craige. Die beiden waren extrem hilfsbereit und sehr freundlich. Die Lage des Hauses kann nicht besser sein, sehr ruhig und entspannt, gleichzeitig war die Hallstreet mit ihren Restaurants und Shops direkt um die Ecke. Zum Strand waren es keine 5 Minuten. Wir hätten es nicht besser treffen können!

What a great house. Close to everything Bondi has to offer. We loved the beach and the beach hotel. 
Really well equipped and very clean. Great big comfortable beds and great little extras. Thanks to Cat for the early check-in, it all went without a hitch. 
See you next time!

Location is excellent, so close to Alexandria and the Inner West which we had come to visit. We stayed with four children who were aged five and under, and the place was well equipped to accommodate all of us (although we were out and about for most of the days). The apartment was very clean and had plenty of everything we needed. Parking spot, swimming pool, security and location make this a great option for a Sydney stay.
Great location and wonderful space. A great way to start a trip to Sydney.

A perfect hideaway tucked in a laneway of leafy Paddington. A perfect spot to relocate whilst we were renovating our kitchen with a hop, skip & a jump to my favourite shopping hub of Glenmore Road as well as the delicious Jackie's. The 3 bedroom cottage looks so pretty from the outside and beautifully furnished & styled on the inside, it made me pine to move back to Paddington.
Perfect location! Great fit for 2 people on beach holiday. Tight fit for 3. Instructions to locate key were clear. Cleanliness was average. A bit noisy mornings and night.

Nice and tidy. 
Good place to stay for a short term.
Thank you George for hosting us!  We enjoyed staying at your apartment. Great location, close to good restaurants and coffee,  transport, historic places and parking was relatively easy too.
